eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, guests arrived in droves, excited to celebrate the occasion. The host had arranged for a designated parking area to accommodate everyone.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, abagenyi baatuuka mu bungi, nga basanyufu okujaguza omukolo. Omukyaza yali ategesewo ekifo eky'okusimbamu mmotoka okusobola okusuza buli omu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, wele mapol gubino ki yomcwiny me kwero kwer ne. Lador ot ne oyubu kama ki keto iye mutoka wek dano weng obed iye.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, apotu ipejok odumutu luipu, iyalamasi noi kanu ainumunum epucit. Abu edaran itemok aiboisit naitemokinitai kanu itunga kere aiboi.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria 'boria, omu eyi eca 'ba karakara eyi ma alea ayiko be ayiko si omu 'da inzizu. Ba angu 'ba a'izuri otu pari mutukari eyi o'bazu 'ba dria eyini aa'zu alenia.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurenga, abagyenyi bakaija omu guruupu, bashemereirwe kujaguza omukoro. Owabaire atebekaniise entebeekanisa y'omwanya gw'okupaakinga emotoka, kugira ngu buri omwe agumeho.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent incidents at similar events, the organizers decided to take extra precautions. They coordinated with local law enforcement to ensure a safe environment for all attendees.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo ku mikolo egifaananako bwe gityo gyebuvuddeko awo, abategesi baasalawo okwegendereza ennyo. Baakwataganye n'abakuumaddembe mu kitundu okukakasa embeera ey'obukuumi eri bonna abaabaddewo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki I yub marom enoni, luyub ne gumoko tamgi me gwokke tutwal. Gu winye ki joo ma gwoko cik me tedero me neno ni dano weng ma obedo tye gubedo agwoka.
teo_prompt: Katupitos akiro nueswamasi pac kotoma opucito kalu eputosi, apotu lu etemonokinak kotuboto aitwasam acoa naepol noi. Apotu kesi iriamunos keda ipolisin luka atutubet kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara aiboisit naka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ebipi i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba otuta otupi 'diyi asi 'du e'yo yi ma ta mbazu drile. Eyi 'ye ti ecita 'ba azita ma ta mbapi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie angu 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ni aa'zu ageitema be.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho aha mikoro erikushushana, abatebekanisa bakasharamu kwegyendesereza munonga. Bakakorengana n'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro omu byaro, okureeba ngu abantu boona abaizire omu ruteerane tibaine kabi.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, the streets filled with cars and excited voices. The annual neighborhood block party had drawn a larger crowd than anyone had anticipated.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, enguudo zajjula emmotoka n'amaloboozi ag'essanyu. Akabaga k'oku muliraano akabaawo buli mwaka kaabaddemu abantu bangi nnyo okusinga bwe kyali kisuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, gudu opong ki motoka ki dwon pa dano ma cwinygi yom. Yub me cungu iwi bye ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka obedo ki dano mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, apotu irotin kilelebunos keda amotokan keda iporotoi lu eyalamasi. Apotu itunga luipu kopotu toma opucit loka aiboisit kangin ekaru adepar lu aomitai.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria 'boria, nzila eyi ga tre mutukari eyi pie azini o'duko ayiko fepi 'diyi pie. Omu jo ejele ru 'diyi ni eli vusi ri ma alea 'ba eyi ndra kalafe angiri si aga 'ba alu alu ni ega ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwatandikire kurenga, enguuto zikaijuga emotoka n'eiraka ry'okushemererwa. Omukoro gw'okujaguza ogurikubaho buri mwaka, gukareeta abantu baingi kukira abo abaabaire nibateekateeka.

eng_prompt: As the festive season approached, the city of Arua buzzed with excitement and anticipation. Local businesses prepared for a night of celebration, planning events to attract both residents and visitors.
lug_prompt: Ebikujjuko bwe byasembera, ekibuga kya Arua kyajjula essanyu n'okusuubira. Abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu beetegekera ekiro ky'okujaguza, nga bategeka emikolo okusikiriza abatuuze n'abagenyi.
ach_prompt: I kare me karama ma obedo cok, dano mapol gubedo ki yomcwiny I boma madit me Arua. Lutim biacara me tedero guyube pi kwero nino madit, giyubu yub me ywayo cwiny lutedero ki wele.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete aparasia nuapolok, apol noi aiyalama kosite loka Arua. Apotu ibiasaran luka atutubet itemonokinos kanu ainumunum kware, aitemonokin iboro lu ingalaunete itunga keda ipejok.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti natali ni ri ni ecazu ogogo risi, aku ambo Arua niri ma alea 'ba eyi ndra ayikosi saaru. Tujara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu eyi inzi inzi inzi, eyi otu e'yo eyini ani 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ejizu tualu omu eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okujaguza ku bwahikire, orurembo rwa Arua rukaba rurimu okushemererwa n'okushemererwa. Bizinesi z'omubyaro, zitebekanisize ekiro ky'okujaguza, zitebekanisize emikoro y'okureeta abatuuragye n'abagyenyi.

eng_prompt: During the Sunday service, the Bishop emphasized the importance of community involvement and compassion. He highlighted the need for the church to extend its reach beyond the walls of the sanctuary.
lug_prompt: Mu kusaba kwa Ssande, Omulabirizi yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'abantu okwenyigiramu n'okusaasira. Yassa essira ku bwetaavu bw'ekkanisa okugaziya okutuuka kwayo okusukka bbugwe w'ekigo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lega me ceng cabit, Laneno oloko tutwal I kom ber pa lwak me bedo ki cwiny me kica. En owaco ni omyero kanica omede ki tic I kabedo mapat-pat mapat-pat manonge I ot lega.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ailip naka Naesabiti abu ebisop kitogogong ajokis naka aimorikikin itunga keda aitim. Abu ngesi kitogogong eipud loka ekanisa aisiekikin aiboisio nuka ekanisa.
lgg_prompt: Sawa inzita sabitisiri ma alia, Bisopi 'da fe okpo orodri ongulumu eyini aa'zu alenia azini aa'zu asi ndriza be ri ma dria. Ece e'yo lezu kanisa ma otu e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma kalafe angu alatararu 'diyi ma aliarisi amve.
nyn_prompt: Omu kushaba kw'eizooba rya sande, Bishopu akashoboorora omugasho gw'abantu kwejumba n'okugirira abandi esaasi. Akashoboorora ekyetengo ky'ekanisa okuhika aheeru y'ebisiika by'omwanya ogurikwera.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and struggle, we often turn to those who guide us spiritually. Their leadership and support play a crucial role in fostering unity and strength among us.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'okulwana, tutera okudda eri abo abatulungamya mu by'omwoyo. Obukulembeze bwabwe n'obuwagizi bikola kinene nnyo mu kutumbula obumu n'amaanyi mu ffe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki peko, pol kare walokke bot joo ma telowa i yo me cwiny. Tela gi ki kony gi konyo totwal me kelo ribe ki teko ikinwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko keda nuetioko, etapit oni aijulakin nejaas ngul lu isisianakinete oni koipone kalo ajokan. Engarenone kec keda agangat kes iswamaete ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor aimorikikina keda agogongu kanejaas oni.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyisi, ama oja ama 'ba ama drice'ba 'diyi vu. Driceza azini atita yini 'diyi azi okporu nga ti ecita azini okpo ejizu ama eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutetegyerezibwa n'oburemeezi, nitukira kuhindukirira abo abarikutuhabura omu by'omwoyo. Obwebembezi bwabo n'obuhwezi bwabo nibikora omurimo muhango omukureetaho okukwatanisa n'amaani omuriitwe.

eng_prompt: After a successful charity gala that brought the community together, the Bishop reflected on the hard work and dedication of those involved. He knew that without the event organisers' efforts, the evening would not have been possible.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'empaka z'obwannakyewa ezaaleetawo obumu mu kitundu, Omulabirizi yafumiitiriza ku mirimu n'obumalirivu bw'abo abakwatibwako. Yali akimanyi nti awatali kaweefube w'abategesi b'omukolo, akawungeezi tekandibaddewo.
ach_prompt: Ingee yub me miyo kony ma okelo ribbe ikin lwak, Laneno oloko I kom tic matek ki keto cwiny pa joo ma obedo tye. En onongo ngeyo ni labongo tute pa luyub yub eni, otyeno eni onongo pe twero time.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka epucit loajokan loajokan loajokan loajokan loabu koyangau itunga aimorikikin, abu ebisop koomoom nuikamunitos aswam kagogong keda ainakina naka ngul luimoriaritos. Ajeni ngesi ebe arai mam etemonokinak luka epucit iswamaete kagogong, mam atibong ngin ti epedori aitodolikin.
lgg_prompt: Omu drile suzaru 'ba azakoma fepi ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma vutia, Bisopi 'da ega e'yo azi okporu 'ba 'da eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria. Ni ra kini okpo 'ba otuta otupi 'diyiniri kokoru, ondre 'di econi te ovu ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'omukoro gw'okugaba obuhwezi ogwarugiremu abantu okukwatanisa, Bishopu akateekateeka aha kukora n'okwehayo kw'abo abaabaire bejumbiremu. Akaba naamanya ngu hatariho kuteeraho kw'abarikutebekanisa omukoro,omwebazyo gukaba gutarikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and division, the guidance of spiritual figures becomes increasingly vital. Strengthening the bonds between community members and their faith leaders can foster unity and resilience.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'enjawukana, okulambika kw'abantu b'eby'omwoyo kweyongera okuba okw'omugaso. Okunyweza enkolagana wakati w'abantu b'omu kitundu n'abakulembeze b'enzikiriza zaabwe kisobola okutumbula obumu n'okugumira embeera.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki apoka-poka, kony pa lutela dini pire tek tutwal. Jingo wat ikin lwak ki lutela dini gi twero kelo ribe ki diyo cwiny.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus aijen ka atiakatiaka, epolok noi aingarenikinio naka itunga luka edini. Aitogogong eidicane loejai kiding itunga keda engarenok lu ediini epedori aitopolor aimorikikina keda apedor.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini esele coza ni 'diyi ma alea, driceza 'ba e'yo aitanisi 'diyi niri eca orodriru tu. Ti ecita 'ba ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea drice'ba eyivile e'yo aita ni 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo otuzu ri eco ti ecita ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutabanguko n'okwebaganisamu, okuhabura kw'abantu b'eby'omwoyo nikweyongyera kuba okw'omugasho. Okunyweza enkoragana ahagati y'abantu b'omubyanga hamwe n'abebembezi b'amadiini gaabo, nikibaasa kureetaho okukwatanisa n'okugumisiriza.

eng_prompt: After decades of dedicated service and community involvement, the parish reached a significant milestone. Families gathered to reflect on the rich history and achievements of their beloved church.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi egy'obuweereza obw'obwesimbu n'okwenyigira mu kitundu, ekigo kyatuuka ku ddaala ery'amaanyi. Amaka gakungaanidde okufumiitiriza ku byafaayo n'ebituukiddwaako mu kkanisa yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny I kom lwak, parish oo I rwom ma lamal tutwal. Gangi gugure me lwodo lok I kom tekwaro ki jami mabeco ma kanica meggi ma gimaro tutwal otimo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aijanakin keda aidar itunga, abu eparish kodolok adoketait naepol noi. Apotu ikalia kotukokinos aomoom nuikamunitos akiro nukolo keda nueswamauna kokanisa kec.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyini azi ngazu asi driasi tualu ongulumu eyi pie 'bori ma vutia, parisi 'da esu e'yo azi okporu ni. Familia eyi tra eyi e'yo egazu e'yo agapi 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo eyini 'ye kanisa eyivileri ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuheereza n'okwejumba omu bantu, ekigo kikahika aha kigyendererwa ky'amaani. Amaka gaketeeranira hamwe kuteekateeka aha byafaayo n'ebikozirwe ekanisa yaabo.

eng_prompt: In a recent meeting, the residents gathered to discuss the progress of various initiatives. They aimed to assess the impact of these efforts on their neighborhood.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko olwaliwo gye buvuddeko, abatuuze baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ntambula y'enteekateeka ez'enjawulo. Baagenderera okwekenneenya engeri kaweefube ono gye yakwatamu ekitundu kyabwe.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki, lutedero gugure me nywako lok I kom yub mapat-pat matye katime. Gubedo ki miti me niang adwoki pa tic magi I kom kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet napac, apotu itunga lu atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem apol naka ainapeta nuegelegela. Alosikinet kec arai airereor epone loepedoriata aswamisio nu aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi azi ebipi o'diru ni ma alea, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo otita ndundu eyini muzu drile ri ma dria. Eyi ma asisile lezu e'yo 'yeta 'diyi ni 'ye angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo onezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko orwabaireho juba, abatuuragye baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha ntunguuka y'emirimo etari emwe. Bakaba baine ekigyendererwa ky'okushwijuma enkora y'emirimo egi omu byaro byabo.

eng_prompt: Faced with rising expenses and stagnant revenue, the team gathered for a brainstorming session. They knew they needed to find innovative solutions to improve their financial situation.
lug_prompt: Nga boolekedde okweyongerayongera kw'ensaasaanya n'omusolo ogutagenda mu maaso, ttiimu yakungaanidde wamu okukubaganya ebirowoozo. Baali bakimanyi nti beetaaga okuyiiya engeri y'okutereezaamu embeera yaabwe ey'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Pien wel cente ma mite me tic tye ka medde ki wel cente ma dano tye ka nongo, lutic guribbe ka tam I kom ngo ma omyero gutim. Onongo gingeo ni omyero gunong yoo manyen me ilo malo rwom me lim meggi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin etiai loka ikapun keda aibiror naka ikapun, apotu itunga luitolomete ikapun kotukokinos kanu aitemitem akiro. Ejenete kesi ebe ibusakinit kesi adumun iwaitin luitetiak lu itojokaret ejautene kec loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aje ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu robia esuza ma omgbo ni esizu tu 'diyisi, amuti 'da tra yi tualu e'yo otuzu. Eyi nii ra kini le eyi ma esu geri ndundu eyini ecozu eyi ma geri robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'enshohoza hamwe n'esente ezitarikwija, tiimu ekateeranira hamwe kuteesa. Bakaba nibamanya ngu baine kuronda oburyo burungi bw'okutunguura embeera yaabo y'esente.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and discussions, the church committee finally decided it was time to update the aging building. They organized a meeting to brainstorm ideas and gather support from the community.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi nga bateekateeka n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, akakiiko k'ekkanisa kasalawo nti kye kiseera okuzza obuggya ekizimbe ekikadde. Baategese olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okukung'aanya obuwagizi okuva mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki nywako lok, dul pa lutela me kanica dong gumoko ni kare dong oromo me roco gedo macon-ni. Guyubu kacoke me nywako tam ki coko cwak ki bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka aitemitem, apotu ekomiti loka ekanisa koseutu ebe erai apak naka aisiteteun aduketait nakolo. Apotu kesi itemokisi airiamunet kanu aitemitem aomisio ka adumun agangat kama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini agbatara gbazu 'bori ma vutia, komiti kanisa niri asizu asizu e'yo 'duzu kini sa'wa ca jo oku 'da ma sita o'diru. Eyi otu mitingi eyi agbatara gbazu egata eyi ma dria eyini ani atita trazu engazu ongulumu eyivu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okuhanuura, akakiiko k'ekanisa kakaheza kusharaho ngu n'obwire bw'okugarura busya ekyombeko ekikuru. Bakatebekanisa orukiiko rw'okuhanuura n'okurundaana obuhwezi kuruga omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In a world increasingly disconnected from spiritual values, it is essential to nurture a sense of purpose and community among youth. One way to achieve this is by guiding them towards meaningful vocations that promote service and leadership.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi eyeeyongera okweyawula ku mpisa z'eby'omwoyo, kya mugaso okukuza enneewulira y'ekigendererwa n'omukago mu bavubuka. Engeri emu ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kubaluŋŋamya okutuuka ku mirimu egy'amakulu egitumbula obuweereza n'obukulembeze.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma dano pe tye ka jenge i kom jami me cwiny, pire tek tutwal me pwonyo bulu me bedo ki miti i kwogi. Yo acel me cobo man obedo pwonyo lutino kwan me nongo tic mabeco ma kelo kony ki tela.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naepol noi naemamei arucokina keda iponesio luka Edeke, ejokuna noi aitopoloun apolou naka atutubet keda apolou naka atutubet kanejaas atumunak. Epone ediope loka aitodolikin ngun ngesi aitodikin kesi aswamisinei nuepedorete aitopolor aijanakin keda eingarenone.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo onitani 'diyi ma esele cozu tualuri ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo 'ba ode eyini aa'zu orodriru azini ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ezozu. Geri azi alu ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri lezu yi ma dri cezu afa azi orodriru azini driceza ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikweyongyera kutakwatanisa n'emitwarize y'eby'omwoyo, n'eky'omugasho okureeba ngu eminyeeto eine ekigyendererwa n'obuhangwa. Omuringo gumwe gw'okukora eki n'okubahabura okukora emirimo y'omugasho erikureetaho obuheereza n'obwebembezi.

eng_prompt: As the organization approaches a significant milestone, plans are already underway for a grand celebration. Excitement is building among the members as they prepare to honor 25 years of achievements.
lug_prompt: Nga ekitongole kisemberera ekiseera ekikulu, enteekateeka zitandise okujaguza okw'amaanyi. Essanyu lyeyongedde mu bammemba nga beetegekera okujaguza emyaka 25 egy'ebituukiddwaako.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dul ne tye ka oo I kare ma pire tek tutwal, yub me kwero nino madit dong tye kawot anyim. Yomcwiny tye ka mede ikin lumemba ikare ma gitye ka yubbe me kwero mwaka 25 me jami ma gutimo.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete atukot ngin aiboisit naepol noi, eutai aitemonokin ainumunum naepol noi. Ejai aiyalama kanejaas imeban kwape ekapanakinete kesi ainumunum ikar akaisarei ikany lu itodolikinitos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ni ecaria e'yo azi okporu ni ma alia, otuta eyi mu drile ayiko zuza amboru ni 'yezu. Ayiko zo 'ba memba ru 'diyi ma eselea eyini otuta 'yezu e'yo eyini 'ye eli 25 'diyi inzizu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ekitongore kirikuhika aha muheru gw'amaani, enteekateeka z'okujaguza kw'amaani zitandikire. Okushemererwa kuriyo nikweyongyera omu ba memba, nk'oku barikweteekateekyera okujaguza emyaka 25 y'ebikozirwe.

eng_prompt: As the year came to a close, the community began planning for their much-anticipated event. Excitement filled the air as individuals and families prepared to make the celebration a memorable one.
lug_prompt: Omwaka bwe gwatandika okuggwaako, abantu baatandika okuteekerateekera omukolo gwabwe ogwali gulindiriddwa ennyo. Essanyu lyajjula empewo ng'abantu ssekinnoomu n'amaka beetegekera okufuula omukolo ogw'okujjukira.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma mwaka ne tye ka tum, lwak ocako yube pi yub meggi ma gubedo kakuru tutwal. Cwiny dano obedo yom totwal I kare ma dano kacel ki gangi mapat-pat guyube me weko kwer ne obed ma wigi poo I komgi.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete ekaru angetakin, apotu itunga kogeutu aitemonokin kanuka epucit loewomitai ebe ebunit. Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos kokwam kwape itunga keda ikalia lu itemonokinete ainumunum ngin.
lgg_prompt: Eli ni ecaria i deria, ongulumu 'da e'do otuta eyi 'ye omu eyini ega saaru 'da ni. Ayiko fu oli ma alia 'ba yi ma ngulupisi azini familia yini yi oturia otuta 'yezu omu 'da ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Omwaka ku gwahikire aha muheru, abantu batandika kuteekateekyera omukoro gwabo ogwabaire nigubarindirwe munonga. Abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabw'abantu n'amaka okweteekateekyera omukoro gw'okwijuka.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming jubilee celebration, the organizing committee brainstormed various ways to gather financial support. They decided that hosting social events would be an effective strategy to engage the community and raise the necessary funds.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera okujaguza kwa jjubiri okujja, akakiiko akategesi kaalowooza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okukung'aanya obuyambi bw'ensimbi. Baasazeewo nti okutegeka emikolo gy'omukwano kyandibadde kakodyo akalungi okukwatamu abantu n'okusonda ensimbi ezeetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Ikare me yubbe pi kwero mwaka pyera riyo wiye abic matye kabino ni, dul ma yubu yub ne gubedo ki tam mapat-pat me nongo kony me lim. Gumoko tamgi ni bedo ki yub me bedo ki dano obedo yoo maber me rweyo lwak ki nongo cente ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin kanuka aiitun ikaru akaisakany lu ebunit, abu ekomiti lo itemonokini koomoom iponesio luegelegela luka adumun agangat na ikapun. Apotu kesi kotemasi ebe aitolot aiboisio nu inera itunga erai epone loajokan noi loka aimorikikin itunga keda adumun ikapun lu ekotos.
lgg_prompt: Otuta e'yo eli kaliri drini towi ni emuzu ri ma alia, komiti otuta otupi 'diyi ega geri ndundu eyini ecozu atita robia niri trazu 'diyi ma dria. Eyi 'du e'yo kini e'yo 'ba eyi 'bazu tualu 'diyi ma otuta ni nga adri geri kililiru ongulumu eyini e'yo 'yezu tualu robia 'bani lele 'diyi trazu.

eng_prompt: The community has been discussing the need for better access to the church for months. With increasing attendance and the upcoming events, it has become clear that improvements are necessary.

eng_prompt: Traveling to the diocese has become increasingly difficult for residents. Many have expressed frustration over the deteriorating road conditions that hinder public transportation options.
lug_prompt: Okugenda mu bulabirizi kyeyongedde okuba ekizibu eri abatuuze. Bangi balaze obwennyamivu olw'embeera y'enguudo embi eremesa entambula ey'olukale.

eng_prompt: To ensure proper land management and development, it is essential for landowners to maintain accurate records of their properties. This not only helps in planning and zoning but also protects their rights and interests.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa enzirukanya y'ettaka ennungi n'enkulaakulana, kya mugaso nnyo bannannyini ttaka okukuuma ebiwandiiko ebituufu ku bintu byabwe. Kino tekikoma ku kuyamba mu kuteekateeka n'okugabanya ebitundu naye era kikuuma eddembe lyabwe n'ebigendererwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni tic me ngom ki dongo lobo tye maber, pire tek tutwal ki wegi ngom me gwoko coc ma atir I kom jami gi. Man pe konyo I yub ki poko ngom keken ento gwoko twero ki miti gi bene.

lgg_prompt: Nyaku ma ta mbazu kililiru azini angu ezozu, eri orodriru nyaku e'ipiru 'diyini e'yo yi ma nyaku ma dria 'diyi ma ta mbazu kililiru. Diri ngani lu azakoma fe otita eyi 'yezu ku dika eri vini eyi ma drilemgbo azini e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma ta mba.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming urban development, extensive planning was undertaken to improve infrastructure. As part of this initiative, roads were constructed before declaring Lira a city.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera enkulaakulana y'ekibuga ejja, enteekateeka ey'amaanyi yakolebwa okutumbula ebizimbe. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, enguudo zaazimbibwa nga tebannalangirira Lira ng'ekibuga.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi dongo lobo me boma matye kabino anyim, kiyubu yub mapol me yubu jami mapat-pat. Macalo but yub man, kiyubu gudi mapwod pe kicwalo Lira macalo boma madit.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin nuka apol naka eibuga lo ebunit, aponi kitolomunai aitemonokineta nuepolok kanu aitojokar aiboisio. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi odukoi irotin eringa elimoria Lira kwape esite.
lgg_prompt: Otuta e'yo angu ezoma ni emupi 'diyi ma alia, 'ba 'ye otita angiri 'diyi afa ayuzaru 'diyi otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba si nzila eyi rakaka de nga po'di 'ba lu Lira ni aku ambo ru ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera entunguuka y'endembo erikwija, enteekateeka nyingi ekakorwa kutunguura ebyombeko. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, enguuto zikakorwa batakarangirire Lira nk'orurembo.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming community development project, a meeting was scheduled to discuss land use and resources. The local council chairman called for an urgent gathering to address the concerns of the village landowners.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera pulojekiti y'okukulaakulanya ekitundu ejja, olukiiko lwategekebwa okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkozesa y'ettaka n'ebikozesebwa. Ssentebe w'akakiiko k'ekyalo yayise olukungaana olw'amangu okukola ku nsonga za bannannyini ttaka mu byalo.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi yub me dongo lobo matye kabino anyim, kiyubu kacoke me nywako lok I kom tic ki ngom ki lonyo. Won kom me kancil me tedero olwongo kacoke pi tyeko lok pa wegi ngom me caro.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin epurojekt lo ebunit lo apol, aponi kitemokinai airiamun kanu aitemitem nuka alupok keda iboro. Abu apolon eicolong kolimok airiamun na atipet kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka ikulepek alupok.
lgg_prompt: Otuta otita angu ezoma ni emupi 'diyiniri ma alia, 'ba otu mitingi azi agbatara gbazu geri nyaku ayuzuri ma dria azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria. Bili ei kanisulu angu 'da ma alea ri omve mitingi mbeleru ni e'yo angu e'ipi calo 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the relationship between leaders and their constituents is fundamental to governance. Elected officials must prioritize the needs and concerns of the people they represent.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, enkolagana wakati w'abakulembeze n'abalonzi baabwe nkulu nnyo mu bukulembeze. Abakungu abalondebwa balina okukulembeza ebyetaago n'ebiruma abantu be bakiikirira.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, wat ikin lutela ki lubol kwir gi obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I tela. Lutic ma kiyero gi omyero guket cwiny gi i kom miti ki peko pa dano ma gi cungu pigi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka aseo, eidicane loejai kiding engarenok keda itungakec erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apugan. Ibusakinit eswamak lueseunitai aisingarenit ipudesia keda ipudesia luka itunga luebwoikinitos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alea, aa'ta drice'ba eyi ma eselea 'ba eyini opi nyapi 'diyi pie ri eri orodriru e'yo driceza niri ni. Le ꞌba ꞌbani ope ꞌdiyi ma ꞌba eꞌyo ꞌba yini pa sozu yi ma paria ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki, enkoragana ahagati y'abebembezi n'abantu abu barikujwekyera n'ey'omugasho omu bwebembezi. Abeebembezi abatoorainwe, bashemereire kwebembeza ebyetengo n'ebirikuteganisa abantu abu barikujwekyera.

eng_prompt: In recent months, various news outlets and community leaders have been highlighting the challenges facing local businesses and families. As a result, many individuals began to pay closer attention to economic trends and their personal financial situations.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, emikutu gy'amawulire egy'enjawulo n'abakulembeze b'ebitundu babadde balaga ebisoomooza bizinensi n'amaka mu kitundu bye boolekaganye nabyo. N'ekyavaamu, abantu bangi baatandika okufaayo ku mbeera y'ebyenfuna n'embeera yaabwe ey'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato ni, odi poko ngec mapat-pat kacel ki lutela me kabedo mapat-pat gubedo ka lok I kom peko ma biacara ki gangi tye ka kato ki iye. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol gucako keto cwinygi I kom lok me lim ki kit ma lim gi tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, apotu luka iyemuto luegelegela keda engarenok luka atutubet kitodiasi atiokisio nuetereikina keda ibiasaran keda ikalia luka atutubet. Kanuka ngun, apotu itunga luipu kogeutu apodokinit akiro nuka ikapun keda ejautene kec loka ikapun.

eng_prompt: In an effort to streamline property management and ensure accurate land records, the local government announced a new registration initiative. Notices were sent out to all landowners in the area, outlining the importance of this process.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutereeza enzirukanya y'ebintu n'okukakasa ebiwandiiko by'ettaka ebituufu, gavumenti y'ebitundu yalangiridde enteekateeka empya ey'okuwandiisa. Ebiwandiiko byaweerezeddwa bannannyini ttaka bonna mu kitundu nga biraga obukulu bw'enkola eno.
ach_prompt: I tute me yubu kit me doro jami ki neno ni coc me ngom tye kakare, gamente me tedero okati ki yub manyen me coyo dano. Kicwalo waraga bot wegi ngom weng ma ikabedo eni, ma nyutu ber pa yub man.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitemokin nuka alupok ka awanyun ebe iswamaete akiro nuka alupok ejok, apugan naka atutubet abu kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aiwadikao naka alupok. Aponi ijukarai aiwadikaeta mama ejaasi ikulepek alupok kere katutubet, itetemete ajokis naka ainapeta nu.

eng_prompt: After conducting extensive research on the community's needs, the team identified several key areas for development. They proposed a comprehensive initiative to address these issues effectively.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo ku byetaago by'ekitundu, ttiimu yazuula ebitundu ebikulu ebiwerako eby'enkulaakulana. Baateesa enteekateeka ey'awamu okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino mu ngeri ennungi.

eng_prompt: Investing in local initiatives can significantly enhance community well-being and foster a sense of belonging. By prioritizing these efforts, leaders can create lasting positive change in their neighborhoods.

eng_prompt: Access to knowledge and learning opportunities is fundamental for personal and societal growth. It is essential to recognize that education empowers individuals and fosters equality.

teo_prompt: Adumunun acoa ka aisisia erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol naka itunganan keda atutubet. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun ebe einakinit asioman itunga apedor ka aitopolor eirianu.

eng_prompt: Many individuals find the process of land registration to be cumbersome and time-consuming. As a result, they often avoid taking the necessary steps to formalize their property ownership.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi basanga enkola y'okuwandiisa ettaka nga nzibu era ng'etwala obudde bungi. N'ekivuddemu, batera okwewala okukola emitendera egyetaagisa okufuula obwannannyini bwabwe ku bintu mu mateeka.

eng_prompt: During the heated discussion about the future of the family estate, tensions rose as differing opinions emerged. Each member voiced their concerns about the implications of formalizing ownership.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi ku biseera by'omu maaso eby'obugagga bw'amaka, obunkenke bwavaayo ng'endowooza ez'enjawulo zivaayo. Buli mmemba yalaze obweraliikirivu bwe ku biyinza okuva mu kukkiriza obwannannyini mu mateeka.
ach_prompt: Ikare me nywako lok matek tutwal I kom anyim pa jami pa gang, lworo omede I kare ma tam mapat-pat obino. Lamemba acel-acel onyutu lworo gi i kom adwoki me keto rwom me bedo rwed dul enoni I te cik.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opeget loepol noi loikamunit oingaren naka iboro luka ekale, apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos naarai apotu aomisio nuegelegela kolomutu. Apotu imeban itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos atiokisio nuepedorete aitodolikin ikulepek.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance educational resources for local students, the community held a fundraising event last month. With the funds raised, they decided to invest in technology to support learning initiatives.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebikozesebwa mu kusoma eri abayizi b'omu kitundu, ekitundu kyakola omukolo gw'okusonda ssente omwezi oguwedde. Olw'ensimbi ezaasondeddwa, baasalawo okusiga ensimbi mu tekinologiya okuyambako enteekateeka z'okusoma.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me kwan pa lutino kwan me tedero, lwak guyubu yub me jogo cente I dwe ma okato. Ki cente ma gunongo, gumoko tamgi me keto lim I kom tet manyen me konyo yub me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong eswamae lo aisisia kanu esisiak luka atutubet, apotu itunga kiswamata aituk ikapun olap je. Keda ikapun lu atukunitai, apotu kesi koseutu aipikakin ikapunukec toma akiro nuka etatai loakwana kanu aigang nuka aisisia.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu afa onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu sukulu anzi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini, ongulumu 'da 'ye omu robia trazu ri imba ajerisi. Robia 'bani tra 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo robia ayuzu afa ndundu eyi edezu 'diyi ma alea atita fezu otita onita ni 'diyi dri.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve community access and support local development, the church decided to invest in infrastructure projects. Recognizing the need for better transportation, they allocated a portion of their budget for essential road improvements.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkulaakulana y'ekitundu, ekkanisa yasalawo okusiga ensimbi mu pulojekiti z'ebizimbe. Olw'okumanya obwetaavu bw'entambula ennungi, baateekawo ekitundu ku mbalirira yaabwe okulongoosa enguudo.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me nongo kony ki konyo dongo lobo, kanica omoko tamme me keto lim I yub me gedo. Ki niang miti me nongo yoo me wot maber, guketo but byek me limgi I yub me yubu gudi mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam na aitojokar eipone lo itodolikinere itunga ka aigangit apol, abu ekanisa koseu aipikakin ikapun toma opurojektin lu aduko. Kanu ajenun eipud loka elose loajokan, apotu kesi ibwaikisi atutubet naka ebajet kec kanu aitojokar irotin.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ongulumu eyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu dika atita fezu angu ezoma angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ni, kanisa 'da 'du e'yo robia ayuzu otita afa ndundu eyi sizu 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'bani e'yo acipa kililiru ri ma e'yo egazu risi, eyi 'ba otita ajeni eyini 'diyi ma kalafe nzila eyi ma wura otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura entunguka y'abantu n'okushagika entunguuka y'ekyaro, ekanisa ekasharamu kutamu sente omu purogyekiti z'okwombeka. Ahabw'okumanya ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'entambura nungi, bakataho ekicweka ky'embaririra yaabo eky'okutunguura enguuto.

eng_prompt: In response to the deteriorating condition of the local roads, community leaders gathered to discuss potential solutions. They decided that a fundraising initiative would be the best way to support the necessary construction efforts.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera y'enguudo y'omu kitundu eyeeyongera okwonooneka, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu ensonga. Baasazeewo nti okukungaanya ensimbi y'engeri esingayo obulungi ey'okuyambako mu kuzimba.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kit ma gudu me tedero tye ka bale kwede, lutela me tedero gugure me nywako tam i kom yoo me cobo peko eni. Gumoko tamgi ni yub me jogo cente obedo yoo maber loyo me tyelo kor tic me gedo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ejautene lo erono loka irotin luka atutubet, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin ngun. Apotu kesi koseutu ebe aituk ikapun ngesi epone loajokan kakere loka aigang aduko.

eng_prompt: The cultural landscape of Uganda is incredibly diverse, reflecting a rich tapestry of traditions and beliefs. This diversity is evident in the various faiths practiced throughout the country.
lug_prompt: Ebyobuwangwa bya Uganda bya njawulo nnyo, ekiraga obugagga bw'ennono n'enzikiriza. Enjawulo eno yeeyolekera mu nzikiriza ez'enjawulo ezikolebwa mu ggwanga lyonna.

eng_prompt: The city council reviewed the budget for the upcoming fiscal year. After careful consideration, they realized that the allocated resources were not enough to support the proposed project.
lug_prompt: Akakiiko k'ekibuga keetegereza embalirira y'omwaka gw'ebyensimbi ogujja. Oluvannyuma lw'okukirowoozaako n'obwegendereza, baakiraba nti eby'obugagga ebyateekebwawo byali tebimala kuwagira pulojekiti eyali etegekeddwa.

eng_prompt: After months of discussions and fundraising efforts, the congregation is excited to move forward with their vision. They believe that a new facility will better serve the community's needs.

lug_prompt: Okuzimba kubadde kugenda mu maaso era ttiimu yeesiga okutuukiriza ebisaanyizo by'ebiseera. Nga balina ebintu byonna ebyetaagisa mu kifo, essira balitadde ku kumaliriza emitendera egisembayo.
ach_prompt: Gedo obedo ka wot anyim motmot, dok lutic tye ki tek cwiny me cobo miti gi ikare ma kiketo. Ki jami weng mamite I kabedogi, gitye ki miti me tyeko ticgi me agiki.

ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom ngo ma omyero gutim ki byek lim gi, dul enoni oyubu yub me dongo lobo manyen. Pi neno ni tic tye maber, guwinye ni yubu kabedo madit me tic obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal.

eng_prompt: After careful budgeting and planning, the project team has secured the necessary financial support. With the final approval in place, they can now move forward confidently.

nyn_prompt: Abaikiriza baingi nibatunga obumwe n'ekigyendererwa omu nyikiriza yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibejumba omu mirimo y'ekanisa etari emwe n'emwe, okubaasa kuhamya enkoragana yaabo ey'eby'omwoyo.

eng_prompt: As part of the city's revitalization plan, a thorough assessment of the current infrastructure was conducted. It was determined that significant changes were necessary to accommodate the growing population and modern needs.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekimu ku nteekateeka z'okuzzaawo ekibuga, okwekenneenya okw'amaanyi okwakolebwa ku bikozesebwa ebiriwo. Kyamanyibwa nti enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi zaali zeetaagisa okusobola okutuukana n'omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera n'ebyetaago by'omulembe guno.

eng_prompt: During the recent inspection of the building, several structural issues were noted. Among these concerns, the integrity of the main offices was particularly alarming.
lug_prompt: Mu kwekenneenya ekizimbe gyebuvuddeko, ebizibu by'enzimba eby'enjawulo byazuuliddwa. Mu bino byonna, obwesimbu bwa woofiisi enkulu bwali bweraliikiriza nnyo.

eng_prompt: The vibrant culture of Northern Uganda was on full display as communities came together to celebrate their rich traditions. Various events were organized throughout the region, showcasing music, dance, and local cuisine.
lug_prompt: Obuwangwa obw'amaanyi obw'omu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda bwayolesebwa mu bujjuvu ng'ebitundu bikuŋŋaana wamu okujaguza eby'obuwangwa byabwe eby'obugagga. Emikolo egy'enjawulo gyategekebwa mu kitundu kyonna, nga giraga ennyimba, amazina n'emmere y'omu kitundu.

teo_prompt: Aponi kitodiarai inonosio luka Nyakoi nako Uganda ne imorikikinor itunga ainumunum inonosio kec. Aponi itemokinai ipucito luegelegela kotoma aiboisit kangin, itodunitos ikososinei, aikosi keda inyamat luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea 'diyi e'da eyi saaru ongulumu eyini emuzu tualu eyi ma a'bi lonyi be 'diyi inzizu. Ba otu e'yo ndundu eyi angu 'da ma alea ndulu, eyi e'da ongoni, ongo tuzani azini nyaka kari 'di ma alea 'diyi pie.

lug_prompt: Omwaka gwonna, emikolo egy'enjawulo gyakolebwanga mu kibuga, nga giraga eby'obugagga n'obuwangwa bw'ekitundu. Abatuuze bangi n'abagenyi beetaba mu bikujjuko, nga balaga obukulu bw'okukuuma obumanyirivu bwabwe obw'enjawulo.

eng_prompt: The community center organized a special event to inspire and uplift local women. Attendees gathered to share their experiences and learn valuable skills for personal and professional growth.

lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yali ebuuka ku kisaawe we baatendekerwa, abo abaali baagala okuyingira amagye baakuŋŋaana nga beetegekera emisinde egy'amaanyi. Nga emitima gyabwe gikulukuta n'omutima gwabwe gukulukuta, baasimba ennyiriri mu kifo we batandikira, nga beetegefu okulaga obusobozi bwabwe.

teo_prompt: Neadolia akolong kotoma aiboisit naituutoonorere, apotu itunga luekotosi alomar toma ajore kotukokinos kanu akerit naetiono noi. Keda etau kec loeuta aibwo noi, apotu kesi kiswamaunos koingaren, ekapakina aitodun ebe epedorete kesi.

lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza dria ma vutia, dakitari 'ba rua o'dipi 'diyi ma e'yo andripi ri 'yo kini e'yo drapi 'da ma e'yo 'bani ega ku. Ba familia ma alia 'diyi ece kini avuri ebi dri ci e'yo rua alanisi eli karakara.

lug_prompt: Abasawo b'eddwaliro bwe baamuddusa mu kasenge k'abalwadde ab'amangu, obunkenke mu bbanga bwalabika. Ng'oggyeko okufuba kwabwe okw'amaanyi n'ebyuma ebyali bimwetoolodde, essuubi lyatandika okukendeera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lutic yoto kom gutere I ot yat, lworo obedo tye I yamo. Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek tutwal ki macin matye ka dange ma orumu en, gen ocako rweny woko.

eng_prompt: Many organizations focus their recruitment efforts on younger candidates, believing they bring fresh perspectives and energy to the workplace. This trend has led to a perception that opportunities are primarily available to the youth demographic.

eng_prompt: During a recent community meeting, the minister emphasized the importance of fostering a culture of entrepreneurship and innovation. He urged citizens to shift their mindset towards creating opportunities rather than merely searching for employment.

lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi eyini eyi trazu eyivile kofia azini gomasi 'diyi ma alea, ayiko eyi ga angu 'da ma alea tre. Univasiti 'da omve 'ba azi okporu ni inzita fezu omu 'da ni.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events on campus, university officials held a meeting to address student conduct and the importance of adhering to the law. They emphasized the need for a safe and respectful environment for all members of the community.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo ku ssettendekero gyebuvuddeko, abakungu ba ssettendekero baatudde olukiiko okwogera ku nneeyisa y'abayizi n'obukulu bw'okugoberera amateeka. Baakkaatiriza obwetaavu bw'obutebenkevu n'obukuumi eri abantu bonna mu kitundu.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, it is essential for students to embody core values that guide their actions and decisions. By embracing these principles, they can contribute positively to their communities and foster a culture of respect and innovation.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyuka mangu, kya mugaso nnyo eri abayizi okubeera n'emitindo emikulu egibalambika mu bikolwa byabwe n'okusalawo kwabwe. Nga beettanira emisingi gino, basobola okuyambako mu bitundu byabwe n'okutumbula obuwangwa obw'ekitiibwa n'obuyiiya.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma lokke oyot-oyot tutwal, pire tek tutwal pi lutino kwan me bedo ki cik ma doro timgi ki moko tamgi. Ka guketo cwinygi I kom cik magi, gitwero miyo kony maber I kabedo gi ki dongo tekwaro me woro ki diro manyen.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges students face in today's competitive environment, the university has implemented a comprehensive support system. This initiative focuses on providing guidance and resources tailored to individual career aspirations.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa abayizi kwe basanga mu mbeera y'okuvuganya eriwo leero, yunivasite etaddewo enkola ey'obuyambi. Enteekateeka eno essira eritadde ku kuwa obulagirizi n'ebikozesebwa ebituukagana n'ebiruubirirwa by'omulimu gw'omuntu.

lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru sukulu anzi eyini esu e'yo a'bala ni ewu andruri ma alea 'diyisi 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, univasiti 'da e'do geri atita fezu 'ba eyidri 'diyi dria. Otita 'di 'ba asi imbata fezu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu e'yo 'ba alu alu ni le 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, the team discussed the challenges they faced in adapting to new strategies. One of the key points raised was the importance of focusing on personal growth rather than just academic qualifications.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko, ttiimu yakubaganya ebirowoozo ku kusoomoozebwa kwe baasanze mu kukola enteekateeka empya. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyayogerwako bwe bukulu bw'okussa essira ku kukulaakulana kw'omuntu ku bubwe mu kifo ky'okussa essira ku bisaanyizo by'okusoma byokka.

eng_prompt: During a recent community meeting, several local leaders discussed the importance of education in advancing their careers. One of the parish chiefs shared insights about the role of higher qualifications in securing better positions within the organization.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'ekitundu olwaliwo gyebuvuddeko, abakulembeze b'ebyalo abawerako baakubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukulu bw'okusoma mu kutumbula emirimu gyabwe. Omu ku bakulembeze b'amasaza yawadde amagezi ku mugaso gw'ebisaanyizo eby'oku ntikko mu kufuna ebifo ebirungi mu kitongole.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki, lutela me tedero mapol guloko I kom ber pa kwan me tyelo kor tic gi. Latela me paric acel opoko ngec I kom tic pa lutino kwan ma tye ki kwan ma malo me nongo kabedo maber I dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka itunga, apotu engarenok luipu kinerata ajokis naka asioman kanu aitopolor aswamukec. Abu ediopet kotoma engarenok luka atutubet kiner nuikamunitos aswam naka asioman naka adoketait nakokuju kanu adumun aiboisio nuajokak kotoma orionget.

eng_prompt: As the ceremony came to a close, the graduands reflected on their journey and the support they received along the way. With heartfelt gratitude, they turned to their families, acknowledging the invaluable guidance that had shaped their success.
lug_prompt: Omukolo bwe gwali gunaatera okuggwa, abattikirwa baalowooza ku lugendo lwabwe n'obuyambi bwe baafuna mu kkubo. Nga beebaza nnyo, baakyukira ab'omu maka gaabwe, nga basiima okulambikibwa okw'omuwendo ennyo okwabumba obuwanguzi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yub ne cok tum, lutino kwan ma gutyeko kwangi gutamo I kom yoo gi ki kony ma gunongo I yoo. Ki pwoc madit tutwal, gulokke bot lugangigi, kun gi yee tira ma pire tek ma okonyo gi me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana angetakinor epucit, apotu esisiak lu alomunak kosomero koomoomoto nuikamunitos alosit kec keda agangat na edumunitos kesi korot. Keda aiyalama naepol, apotu kesi kijulakinos mama ejaasi ikalia kec, aisiyalamikinete aicoreta nuapolok nuapotu ijaikisi kesi akerianut.

eng_prompt: In light of recent tensions in the community, local authorities organized a series of outreach programs. Their goal was to foster understanding and cooperation among residents during this critical time.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke obwaliwo gye buvuddeko mu kitundu, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baategeka pulogulaamu ez'enjawulo. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kyali kya kutumbula kutegeeragana n'enkolagana mu batuuze mu kaseera kano akazibu.

nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obunkenke obwahwireho omu bantu, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bakatebekanisa enteekateeka z'okuhwera abantu. Ekigyendererwa kyabo kikaba kiri eky'okureetaho okwetegyerezana n'okukwatanisa omu batuura gye omu bwire obu.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events and rising concerns about safety, community members are encouraged to take proactive measures. Collaboration between residents and law enforcement is essential for fostering a secure environment.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okweraliikirira okweyongera ku by'okwerinda, abantu b'ekitundu bakubirizibwa okubaako kyebakola. Enkolagana wakati w'abatuuze n'abakuumaddembe ya mugaso mu kutumbula embeera ey'obukuumi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki lworo ma tye kamedde I kom gwoko kuc, ki lego lwak me timo gin mo. Winye ikin lutedero ki joo ma gwoko cik pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kuc ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuiswamasi pac keda aiyalongong naka ayuwara, isinyikokitai itunga luka atutubet aswam iboro luingarakinete kesi. Aiswamanara kiding itunga keda ipolisin erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini asi otiza tupi ageitema ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba ai 'ba ongulumu ma alea 'diyi e'yo 'duzu okporu. Ti ecita 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi pie ri eri orodriru angu agei tema ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahaby'okwerinda, abantu b'omukyanga nibahigwa kukora ekirikwetengyesa. Okukwatanisa ahagati y'abatuuragye n'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho eby'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: In an effort to maintain public safety and order, law enforcement agencies are stepping up their patrols in high-crime areas. As a result, the police will arrest lawbreakers.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma obukuumi n'obutebenkevu mu bantu, ebitongole ebikuumaddembe byeyongedde okulawuna mu bitundu ebirimu obumenyi bw'amateeka bungi. N'ekinaavaamu, poliisi ejja kukwata abamenyi b'amateeka.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me gwoko ber bedo ki ber bedo pa lwak, dul ma gwoko cik tye ka tic matek me wot I kabedo matye ki bal mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, abili bimako lutim bal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam na aidar ayuara keda ainapakina naka itunga, eutasi atukona nuka ikisila aiyatakin aiboisio nuejaasi keda abilibilio naka ikisila. Kanuka ngun, epote ipolisin arocun lu ebilibilete ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu o'bi yi ma ageyi tezu azini otuta ma ta mbazu, amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi yi ma acita angu e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi pie 'diyi ma alia ri ma omgbo otu. E'yo 'disi, polisi eyi nga 'ba azita onyopi 'diyi obi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda obusingye n'obutereera omu bantu, ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro biriyo nibirambura omu myanya erimu obukozi bw'ebibi bwingi. Ekirikurugamu, poriisi neija kukwata abarikuhenda ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: Community safety is a shared responsibility that requires vigilance and proactive measures. By staying alert and reporting suspicious behavior, residents can help maintain a secure environment for everyone.
lug_prompt: Obukuumi bw'ekitundu buvunaanyizibwa obw'awamu obwetaagisa okubeera obulindaala n'okukola amangu. Nga basigala bulindaala n'okuloopa ebikolwa ebiteeberezebwa, abatuuze basobola okuyamba okukuuma embeera ey'obukuumi eri buli omu.
ach_prompt: Gwoko ber bedo pa lwak obedo tic ma dano weng omyero gutim dok omyero gubed ma wang gi twolo. I bedo ma wanggi twolo ki doto tim ma byek tye I komgi, lutedero twero konyo me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pi dano weng.
teo_prompt: Ayuwara na itunga erai aswam na aimorikikina na ekoto acobeu ka aitikitik. Kowai lo asalakin ekapakina ka aitijenar iponesio lu eomitai ebe ejai, epedorete itunga aingarakin aidar aiboisit na eyuwara kanuka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Ageitema ongulumu eyini ri eri azi 'ba dria eyini ani aa'zu mile be azini le 'ba ma 'du e'yo eyi mbeleru. Aa'ta mile be azini 'yeta 'bani ega eyi ma dria ku 'diyi ma o'duko si, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi eco angu 'ba dria eyini aa'zu ageitema be ri ma tamba ra.
nyn_prompt: Eby'okwerinda omu bantu n'obujunaanizibwa bw'abantu boona oburikwetenga okwerinda n'okukora ebirikwetengyesa. Abatuuragye nibahwera omu kurinda eby'okwerinda kurabira omu kuguma beteekateekire n'okuha ripoota aha mitwarize etarikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent surge in gang activity, law enforcement has developed a strategic plan. Authorities are determined to dismantle organized crime networks operating in the area.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweyongera kw'ebikolwa by'ebibinja by'abamenyi b'amateeka gye buvuddeko, abakuumaddembe bakoze enteekateeka ennungi. Ab'obuyinza bamalirivu okusaanyawo ebibiina by'abamenyi b'amateeka ebikola mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa tim pa dul pa lutim aranyi, dul ma gwoko cik guyubu yoo me tic. Lutela tye ki miti matek me tyeko dul pa lutim aranyi matye I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyatakino naka aswamisio nuka igurupun, etolomutu ipolisin ainapeta nuepedorete kesi aswam. Ekapakina apedorosio aibiror iriongeta lu abilak ikisila lu iswamaete kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ongmbo ong Okpo e'ipi 'diyi asi 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'ebibiina by'abakozi b'ebihagaro, abarikukwatisa ebiragiro bakozire enteekateeka y'amaani. Ab'obushoborozi bamazireyo kumaraho ebibiina by'enkozi z'ebibi ebirikukorera omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in crime rates, law enforcement officials have announced a zero-tolerance policy. They are determined to restore safety and order in the community.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'obuzzi bw'emisango gyebuvuddeko, abakwasisa amateeka balangiridde enkola y'obutagumiikiriza. Bamalirivu okuzzaawo obukuumi n'obutebenkevu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa rwom me timo bal ma otime cokcok-ki, lutic ma gwoko cik guwaco ni pe omyero ki wor tim maraco. Gumoko tam gi me dwoko ber bedo ki ber bedo ikabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin na abilibilio naka ikisila, alimor eswamak luka ikisila ebe mam ibusakinit acamanar keda ngul luiswamaete nuarokok. Ekapakina kesi ainyakun ayuara ka ainapakina kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongmbo e'yo onzi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi azi e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu ku 'diyi ma dria. Eyi owi eyi e'yo agei tema ni 'diyi ejizu ongulumu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire, ab'eby'obutegyeki barangirire ngu tibarikwija kugumisiriza abantu. Bamariirire kugaruraho obusingye n'obutebekana omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Authorities have reported a recent increase in thefts throughout the area. As a result, they are urging the community to stay vigilant and cautious when purchasing second-hand goods.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza bategeezezza ku kweyongera kw'obubbi mu kitundu. N'ekivuddemu, bakubiriza abantu okubeera obulindaala n'obwegendereza nga bagula ebintu ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Lutela guwaco ni kwo omede tutwal I kabedo eni. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka lego lwak me bedo ma wanggi twolo kace gitye ka wilo jami ma kitiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio olimosi ebe iyata akoko kotoma aiboisit. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitos kesi itunga aidar acoa kapak na agwel iboro luitosomao.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi eyi 'yo kini ogu eyi ma omgbo ni tu angu 'da ma alea sa'wa 'disi tutu. E'yo 'disi, eyi ai ongulumu eyi aa'zu mile be dika eyi ma aa milesi eyini afa ayule 'bo 'diyi je ria.

eng_prompt: Law enforcement agencies are intensifying their efforts to combat theft and recover stolen property. As a result, individuals found in possession of such items will face legal consequences.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole ebikuumaddembe byongera amaanyi mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa obubbi n'okuzuula ebintu ebibbibwa. N'ekinaavaamu, abantu ssekinnoomu abasangibwa n'ebintu ng'ebyo bajja kuvunaanibwa mu mateeka.
ach_prompt: Dul ma gwoko cik tye ka medo kero gi me lweny i kom kwo ki nongo jami ma ki kwalo. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ma ki nongo gitye ki jami ma kit meno binongo adwogi ne I kot.
teo_prompt: Eutasi atukona nuka ikisila aiyatakin aswamukec kanu aitiji akoko ka adumun iboro lu ekokotai. Kanuka ngun, itunga lu ewanyunitai ejaas keda iboro kwape kangun epote adumun nuelomunete kotoma okisila.
lgg_prompt: Amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi okpo 'ba a'di 'dizu ogu be azini afa oguzaru 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'bani esu afa 'dile 'diyi be 'diyi nga dri fu e'yo azita palaa 'diyi be ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro biriyo nibyeyongyera amaani omu kurwanisa obushuma n'okugarura ebintu ebiibirwe. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu abarikushangwa baine ebintu nk'ebyo, nibaija kutwarwa omu kooti.

eng_prompt: Authorities issued a public alert regarding a surge in criminal activity targeting individuals carrying large sums of cash. As a result, residents were advised to exercise caution and remain vigilant.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza baalabudde abantu ku kweyongera kw'obumenyi bw'amateeka nga baluubirira abantu abalina ssente ennyingi. N'ekyavaamu, abatuuze baakubirizibwa okubeera abeegendereza n'okusigala nga bali bulindaala.
ach_prompt: Lutela gu ciko lwak pi tim aranyi matye kamede I kom dano matye ka tingo cente madwong. Macalo adwogi ne, ki lego lwak me bedo ma wang gi twolo.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio kikwenyasi itunga nuikamunitos aiyatakino naka aswamisio nuarokok nu ekotosi itunga luejaasi keda ikapun luipu. Kanuka ngun, aponi icorakinai itunga acoikina.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi eyi fe bile ndu liza o'bi eyini e'yo 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu 'ba sende be angiri 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini imbata aa'zu mile be.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi bakarabura abantu ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire oburikugyenderera abantu abaine esente nyingi. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye bakahaburwa kwegyendesereza.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for financial services in the region, local officials announced the opening of a new banking institution. This initiative aims to enhance economic development and provide better access to banking facilities for residents.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obuweereza bw'ensimbi mu kitundu, abakungu b'ekitundu baalangirira okuggulawo bbanka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okusobozesa abatuuze okwanguyirwa okufuna ebintu bya bbanka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me tic ki lim I but lobo eni, lutic me tedero guwaco ni kibiyabo beng manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me medo rwom me timo biacara ki miyo gum me tic ki beng bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka ikapun kotoma aiboisit, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kolimosi apukor aingadis naka ikapun naitetet. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi aitopolor apol naka ikapun ka aijaikin itunga adumunun ikapun luka aingadisia nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi azi e'yo robia esuzu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu angu 'da ma alea risi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi azi e'yo angu ero robia ta mbazu o'diru ni ma ti zizu ri ma dria. Asisile 'diri lezu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia ri ma omgbo otuzu azini geri 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini robia ta mbazu 'diyi esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza bw'esente omu kyanga, abakuru omu byaro bakarangirira okwiguraho banka ensya. Ekigyendererwa n'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya n'okureetera abatuura gye kutunga obuheereza bwa banka.

eng_prompt: Over the past decade, the financial institution has expanded its services and established a strong customer base. As a result, the bank has cemented its existence in the country.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka kkumi egiyise, ekitongole ky'ebyensimbi kigaziye obuweereza bwakyo ne kifuna bakasitoma bangi. N'ekivuddemu, bbanka enywezezza okubeerawo kwayo mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: I mwaki apar ma okato angec, dul ma loyo lok kom lim omedo rwom me ticgi dok okelo luwil mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, bang eni ojingo bedo tye ne I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kokaru itomon luatuboros, eyataki erionget loka ikapun aijanakinakec kosodete adukun agwelak luipu. Kanuka ngun, abu aingadis naka ikapun kitogogong ajaut ke kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi mudri 'bo 'diyi ma alea, amuti ero robia ta mbazani 'da edri azi ngaza erini 'diyi ma omgbo ra dika eri e'do aje'ba okporu 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, ero robia ta mbazu 'da 'ba e'yo erini aa'zu kari 'di ma alea ri ma okpo kari 'di ma alea ri ma omgbo ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka ikumi ehingwireho,itendekyero ry'ebyesente riyongyeire obuheereza bwaryo kandi rikatandikaho abaguzi b'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, banka egumizemu kubaho omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: Many customers were surprised to learn about the ownership structure of their local financial institution. Recent discussions revealed that the bank operates under a different set of regulations than domestic banks.
lug_prompt: Bakasitoma bangi beewuunyizza okumanya obwannannyini bw'ebitongole by'ensimbi eby'omu kitundu kyabwe. Okukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakakolebwa kwalaga nti bbanka ekola mu mateeka ga njawulo ku bbanka z'awaka.
ach_prompt: Lutim biacara mapol gubedo ki ngeng I kare ma guniang kit ma gang ticgi me lim tye kwede. Nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni beng tiyo malube ki cik mapat ki beng me lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Apotu agwelak luipu koumokisi ajenun nuikamunitos ikulepek ikapun luka atukot naka ikapun. Ineresinei lu atuboros itodunitos ebe iswamai aingadis naka ikapun kotupitete ikisila luegelegela adepar aingadis naka ikapun luka akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Aje'ba karakara eyi eca osutasi eyini e'yo onizu amuti e'yo robia ni kari eyivile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma eipika eyi ma dria. Agbatara o'diru 'diyi ece kini ero robia ta mbazuri azi nga azita ndu ndu yi ma palaa aga ero robia ta mbazu kari ma alia 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bakasitoma baingi bakatangazibwa kumanya obw'eishe - emwe bw'ebitongore by'esente eby'omubyaro byabo. Okuhanuura okuhweireho kworeka ngu banka neekorera ahansi y'ebiragiro ebitarikushushana n'ebya banka z'omwihanga.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the potential of emerging markets, the bank has made a commitment to invest in local communities. By fostering strong relationships, they aim to support economic development and financial inclusion in the region.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obusobozi bw'ensi ezikyakula, bbanka yeewaddeyo okusiga ensimbi mu bantu b'omu kitundu. Nga batumbula enkolagana ey'amaanyi, baluubirira okuwagira enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okwegatta mu byenfuna mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I nge niang kero pa cuk matye ka dongo, bang ocikke me keto lim I tedero. Ki dongo wat matek, miti gi tye me tyelo kor dongo lobo I tenge me lim I but lobo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun apedor naka isokonin lu eyaunete, eswamau aingadis naka ikapun aiswamaun ikapun mama ejaasi itunga luka atutubet. Kowai lo aitopolor eidicane lo egogong, ekotosi kesi aigang apol keda aimorikikina naka ikapun kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo ecopi ra cuu efupi o'diru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, ero robia ta mbazuri owi i e'yo lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi 'bazu ongulumu angu ma alia 'diyi ma alia indi. Erita ako okporu 'diyi ma ta mbaza si, eyi le atita fe angu ezoma ni azini e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma omgbo angu 'da ma alea ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya obushoboorozi bw'obutare oburikwija, banka eyehaireyo kuta esente omu bantu b'omubyaro. Baine ekigyendererwa ky'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya n'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'empiiha omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the current market conditions and potential risks, the board has decided to adopt a more conservative approach. As a result, the bank will not make any business partnerships.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo ku mbeera y'akatale eriwo n'obulabe obuyinza okubaawo, akakiiko kasazeewo okukozesa enkola ey'obwegendereza. N'ekyavaamu, bbanka tejja kukola nkolagana yonna ya bya busuubuzi.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom jami matye katime kombedi I cuk kacel ki peko ma twero bedo tye, dul madoro tic omoko tamgi me tic ki yoo me gwokke. Macalo adwogi ne, beng pe obi bedo ki lurem me timo biacara.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos ejautene loka esokoni keda atiokisio nuepedorete alomun, aseun erionget aitwasam iponesio luajokak. Kanuka ngun, mam aingadis naka ikapun ebuni aiswamaun aiswamanara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo cuu ni curu'do 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru azini e'yo ewaru ecopi 'yepi ra 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, board 'du e'yo 'du geri 'bani ecozu e'yo 'yezu kililiru ri 'duzu'i. E'yo 'disi, erojo 'da ngani mu amuti tujari ni 'diyi 'ye tualu ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza embeera y'akatare eriho hati hamwe n'oburemeezi oburikubaasa kubaho, akakiiko kashaziremu kukoresa engyenderwaho y'obwegyendesereza. N'ekyarugiremu, banka terikwija kukorengana na buri omwe omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about economic development in the region, local leaders emphasized the importance of fostering a reliable financial environment. They believe that with the right support, the community can thrive and attract investment.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku nkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna mu kitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okutumbula embeera y'ebyenfuna eyeesigika. Balowooza nti n'obuyambi obutuufu, ekitundu kisobola okukulaakulana n'okusikiriza bamusigansimbi.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom dongo lobo I tenge me lim I but lobo eni, lutela me tedero guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me kelo lim maber I kabedo eni. Gitye ki niyee ni ki kony matir, kabedo ne twero dongo dok kelo biacara.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei luitetiak nuikamunitos apol naka ikapun kotoma aiboisit, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kitogogongoto ajokis naka aitopolorite ejautene loajokan loka ikapun. Iyuunitos kesi ebe keda agangat na abeit, epedorete itunga apol ka aisukunyun agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza e'yo angu ezoma ni angu 'di ma alea ri ma dria, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'ba asi orodri angu robia esuzu kililiru ri ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria. Eyi ai ra kini atita kililiru si, ongulumu eyi eco zo ra dika eyi eco lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho aha ntunguuka omu by'entatsya omu kyanga, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakahamya omugasho gw'okureetaho entatsya nungi. Nibiikiriza ngu abantu ku barikuhebwa obuhwezi oburikwetengwa, nibabaasa kutunguuka n'okureetaho eby'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to stimulate local economic growth, the financial institution has announced new initiatives. One of the key components of this plan is to support entrepreneurs and startups in the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyenfuna by'eggwanga, ekitongole ky'ebyensimbi kirangiridde enteekateeka empya. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nteekateeka eno kwe kuwagira abasuubuzi n'abatandisi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I tute me kelo dongo lobo I tenge me lim, dul ma loyo lok kom lim I lobo Uganda okati ki yub manyen mapat-pat. Tenge acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo me konyo lutim biacara ki jo matye ka cako biacara I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun, alimor erionget loka ikapun ainapeta nuitetiak. Adiopet koboro luapolok luka ainapeta ngun ngesi aigangit agwelanarak keda lu ageunete iboro kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu zota e'yo robia ni angu 'di ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti e'yo robia ni 'diyi ondrepi ri azi e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Afa azi okporu otita 'di ma alea ri eri atita fezu 'ba tujari 'yepi azini 'ba e'dopi o'diru 'diyi dri ongulumu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya omwihanga, ekitongore ky'ebyesente kirangirire enteekateeka nsya. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru omu nteekateeka egi n'okuhwera abashubuzi n'abatandikire emirimo omu byanga.

eng_prompt: In the late 20th century, the banking industry sought innovative solutions to enhance customer convenience and reduce wait times. One of the key advancements in this effort was the development of self-service banking technology.
lug_prompt: Ku nkomerero y'ekyasa ky'amakumi abiri, ekitongole kya bbanka kyanoonya engeri z'okwanguyizaamu bakasitoma n'okukendeeza obudde bw'okulinda. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyakolebwa mu kaweefube ono kwe kutondawo tekinologiya wa bbanka eyeekozesa.
ach_prompt: I tum pa cencwari me pyer aryo, lutic me beng guyenyo yoo manyen me konyo luwil ki dwoko piny kare me kur. Acel me kin dongo lobo mapire tek tutwal I yub man obedo yub me tic ki diro me beng ma pe jenge I kom dul mo keken.
teo_prompt: Kangetakinet naka ekaru ilukumin akaisarei, apotu aingadisia nuka ikapun odumutu iponesio luitetiak kanu aitapatan agwelak keda aitidisiar apak naka aidar. Adiopet kotoma apol naka aswamisioit kangin arai aitolomun etatai loakwana loka aingadisia nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Eli alifu kaliri ma asiria, okalamvu ero robia ta mbazani 'diyi nda geri o'diru 'diyi aje'ba eyini ayiko fezu azini sa'wa eyini tezu ri ma omgbo esizu. E'yo azi alu drile suza okporu okpo 'di ma alia ri e'yo 'bani ero robia ta mbazu 'diyi ma azi ngazu yi ma ngulupi si ri ma ezota ni.
nyn_prompt: Aha muheru gw'ekyasha kya 20, aba banka bakasherura oburyo bw'okutunguura eby'okureeberaho by'abaguzi n'okukyendeeza obwire bw'okurinda. Kimwe aha bintu bikuru ebyatunguukire omu nteekateeka egi, n'okutunguura tekinorogye y'okwekoresa omu banka.

eng_prompt: In order to stimulate economic growth and job creation, it is essential for policymakers to prioritize the needs of entrepreneurs and investors. By fostering a supportive atmosphere, businesses can thrive and contribute to the overall prosperity of the nation.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okutondawo emirimu, kyetaagisa abakola amateeka okukulembeza ebyetaago by'abasuubuzi n'abasiga nsimbi. Mu kukuza embeera ey'obuwagizi, bizinensi zisobola okukulaakulana n'okutumbula eggwanga okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Me kelo dongo lobo I tenge me lim ki cako tic, pire tek tutwal ni lutela omyero guket miti pa lutim biacara ki luket lim I biyacara obed gin ma pire tek. Kace kicweyo kabedo maber, biacara twero dongo dok medo rwom me lonyo pa lobo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun keda aitolomun aswamisinei, ejokuna noi itunga luitolomete ikisila aisingarenit ipudesia luka agwelanarak keda agwelanarak. Kowai lo aitopolor ejautene lo igangit, epedorete ibiasaran apoloun kosodete aitopolor apol naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia azini azi eyi ma edeta ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru 'ba azita sipi 'diyi ma 'du e'yo 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi ni azini 'ba lonyi vuti ale'ba 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria okporu. Angu atita fezu ri ma omgbo otuza si, tujari eyi eco zo ra dika kari ma zota ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya hamwe n'okutandikaho emirimo, n'eky'omugasho abarikukora ebiragiro kwebembeza ebyetengo by'abashubuzi hamwe n'abashubuzi. Kurabira omukureetaho embeera erikushagika, bizinesi nizibaasa kutunguuka n'okureetaho entunguka y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: To stimulate economic growth and encourage entrepreneurship, it is essential for the government to evaluate its current financial regulations. A more favorable tax environment could attract new businesses and support existing ones.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okukubiriza eby'obusuubuzi, kyetaagisa gavumenti okwekenneenya amateeka gaayo agafuga ebyensimbi. Embeera y'omusolo ennungi esobola okusikiriza bizinensi empya n'okuwagira ezo eziriwo.
ach_prompt: Me kelo dongo lobo I tenge me lim ki cuku cwiny I kom biacara, obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal ki gamente me ngiyo cik me lim ma en tye kwede kombedi. Rwom me mucoro maber twero kelo biacara manyen ki konyo biacara matye kombedi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun ka aisinyikokit agwelanar, ejokuna apugan airereor ikisila luka ikapun. Aiboisit naejok noi na isolosinei epedori ayangaun ibiasaran luitetiak ka aigang lu ejaas.
lgg_prompt: E'yo zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia azini ava fezu tujari 'yezu, eri orodriru gamete ni azita erini curu'do 'diyi ma ale andrizu. Angu musoro ofezu muke ndeni ri eco tujari o'diru 'diyi eji tualu tujari 'diyi atizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya hamwe n'okureetaho eby'obushubuzi, ni kikuru gavumenti okushwijuma ebiragiro byayo ebirikukwata ahaby'empiiha. Enkora nungi y'emishoro neebaasa kureetaho bizinesi nsya n'okushagika eziriho.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges faced by the agricultural sector, the organization sought to provide financial support. Their mission was to empower local farmers and enhance food security in the region.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa ekitongole ky'ebyobulimi n'obulunzi kwe kisanga, ekitongole kyagezaako okuwa obuyambi bw'ensimbi. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kyali kya kuwa abalimi b'omu kitundu amaanyi n'okwongera ku bungi bw'emmere mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ki niang peko ma tenge me pur tye ka kato ki iye, dul ne otemo miyo kony me lim. Miti gi obedo me tyelo kor lupur me tedero ki medo rwom me cam ikabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nu ejaas erionget loka akor, abu erionget ibwaik agangat na ikapun. Alosikinetekec arai aitigogong akoriok luka atutubet ka aitojokar inyamat katutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru esele agrikica niri ni esu 'diyisi, amuti 'da nda atita robia niri fezu. Asisile yiniri lezu okpo fezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri dika lezu nyaka angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi bw'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa,ekitongore kikagyezaho kuheereza obuhwezi bw'esente. Ekigyendererwa kyabo kikaba kiri eky'okwongyera abahingi amaani n'okureetaho eby'okurya ebirikumara omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In a world where financial institutions often prioritize profit over people, this bank seeks to redefine its mission. By focusing on community needs and accessibility, they aim to create a positive impact on society.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ebibiina by'ensimbi gye bitera okukulembeza amagoba okusinga abantu, bbanka eno eyagala okuddamu okunnyonnyola ekigendererwa kyayo. Nga essira balitadde ku byetaago by'ekitundu n'okutuukirirwa, baluubirira okutondawo enkyukakyuka ennungi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma dul mapat-pat makemme ki lok kom lim ipol kare giketo cente me nongo magoba me bedo gin ma pire tek loyo dano, beng man tye ka mito niang ticgi. Ki keto cwiny I kom miti pa lwak ki yoo me nongo kony, miti gi tye me kelo adwogi maber I kom lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na isingarenitos iriongeta luka ikapun ameda adepar itunga, ekoto aingadis naka ikapun aijulakin akiroke. Kowai lo aisingarenit ipudesia luka itunga, ekotosi kesi aitolomun nuejokuka kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru amuti e'yo robia ni 'diyi ni 'diyi ni tutuni orodri eyi 'bazu okporu ndeni ri ma alea, ero robia ta mbazu 'di le e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma ale andri o'diru. Asi 'bazu e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma dria azini geri eyini ecozu eyi esuzu 'diyi ma dria, eyi asi 'ba e'yo muke 'diyi ejizu ongulumu eyi ma alea.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support local communities and stimulate economic growth, the bank has launched several initiatives in the region. As a result, the bank has provided employment opportunities to the people in West Nile.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyamba abantu b'omu kitundu n'okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna, bbanka etongozza enteekateeka ez'enjawulo mu kitundu. N'ekivuddemu, bbanka ewadde abantu b'omu West Nile emirimu.

eng_prompt: The community has rallied around the financial institution, recognizing its vital role in local development. As a result, many individuals and businesses have actively engaged with the bank to promote its initiatives.

ach_prompt: Lwak guribbe I nget gang tic me lim enoni, kun gingeyo ni ticgi pire tek tutwal I dongo lobo. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ki biacara mapol gutiyo ki beng me tyelo kor yub meggi.

eng_prompt: In light of the upcoming festivities, community leaders gathered to address the importance of financial responsibility. They emphasized the need for mindful spending to ensure that everyone can enjoy the celebrations without falling into debt.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebikujjuko ebijja, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baakuŋŋaanye okwogera ku bukulu bw'obuvunaanyizibwa bw'ensimbi. Baakakasizza obwetaavu bw'okusaasaanya ssente n'obwegendereza okulaba nga buli omu anyumirwa ebikujjuko awatali kugwa mu mabanja.

eng_prompt: In his sermon, the bishop emphasized the importance of compassion and community support. He urged the congregation to take action in addressing the needs of those less fortunate.

eng_prompt: In his sermon, the bishop emphasized the importance of stewardship and responsibility in all aspects of life. He urged the congregation to consider their future and the well-being of their loved ones.
lug_prompt: Mu kubuulira kwe, omulabirizi yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'obukulembeze n'obuvunaanyizibwa mu mbeera zonna ez'obulamu. Yakubirizza abantu okulowooza ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso n'eby'abaagalwa baabwe.

teo_prompt: Kotoma olimu ke, abu ebisop kitogogong ajokis naka ayait keda aswam kotoma aijar naka itunga kere. Abu ngesi olimok ikuristayon aomoom nuikamunitos ngaren kec keda lu iminan kec.

eng_prompt: As the congregation gathered in the dimly lit church, anticipation filled the air. Many were eager to hear the bishop's insights on the importance of community and faith in challenging times.

ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak gugure I ot lega ma mac pe ryeny maber tutwal, dano gubedo ki miti madit tutwal. Dano mapol gubedo ki miti me winyo lok pa laneno I kom ber pa ribbe I kin lwak ki bedo ki niye I kare me peko.

eng_prompt: In a recent sermon, the bishop urged the congregation to reflect on the true meaning of the holiday season. He expressed concern that many customs had strayed from their spiritual roots.
lug_prompt: Mu kubuulira okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko, omulabirizi yakubirizza abantu okufumiitiriza ku makulu amatuufu agali mu biseera by'ennaku enkulu. Yalaze obweraliikirivu nti obulombolombo bungi bwali buvudde ku nsibuko yaabwo ey'eby'omwoyo.

eng_prompt: Maintaining a strong moral compass is essential for a healthy society. Engaging in ethical behavior fosters trust and respect among individuals and communities.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma kampasi y'empisa ennungi kya mugaso nnyo eri ekitundu ekirungi. Okwenyigira mu mpisa ez'empisa kikulaakulanya obwesige n'ekitiibwa mu bantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitundu.
