eng_prompt: In light of recent events that have raised concerns among the community, local leaders gathered to discuss safety measures. During the meeting, the bishop expressed his deep concern for the well-being of residents.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko ebireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bantu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukuumamu obulamu. Mu lukiiko, omulabirizi yalaze okufaayo kwe eri obulamu bw'abatuuze.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ma okelo lworo ikin lwak, lutela me tedero gugure me nywako tam i kom kit me gwoko kuc. Ikare me kacoke, laneno onyuto lworo madit tutwal I kom kwo pa lutedero.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac luapotu koyangautu aiyalongong kanejaas itunga, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu ayuara. Kotoma airiamunet, abu ebisop kitodu epodokinit ke noi kanuka aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ebipi yi 'yepi o'diru asi otiza ejipi ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma dria. Mitingi 'da ma alea, bisopi ece asi 'baza erini aa'zu onyiru 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebiherize kubaho ebireesire okwerarikirira omu bantu, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakateerana kuhanuura ahaby'okwerinda. Omu rukiiko, Bishopu akooreka okwerarikirira kwe ahabw'oburungi bw'abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: As the church bells chimed softly in the background, the bishop stood before the gathered faithful, a warm smile spreading across his face. He took a moment to reflect on the joy and togetherness that the season brings to their community.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebide by'ekkanisa bivuga mpola emabega, omulabirizi yayimirira mu maaso g'abakkiriza abakungaanye, akamwenyumwenyu ak'ebbugumu nga kamunyeenya mu maaso. Yafuna akaseera n'alowooza ku ssanyu n'obumu sizoni eno by'ereeta mu kitundu kyabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma olang me kanica tye ka goyo mot mot, laneno ocung inyim lukricto ma gugure, ki bwunyo me yomcwiny I wange. En okwanyo kare me tam I kom yom-cwiny ki ribe ma kare eni kelo I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Neautar abolobol naka ekanisa aibwo kwap, abu ebisop kobwo koingaren itunga luitunga lu atukonokin, keda aimurimuria naejok noi koingarenike. Abu ngesi koyangaik apak naepol noi kanu aomoom aiyalama keda aimorikikina na eyangaununei apakio kanu nejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: O'duko kanisa ni 'diyi ni o'duria e'yere, bisopi so pa 'ba e'yo a'ita ni okupi 'diyi ma driliarisi, cinya ayiko be eri ma andretia dria. Eri 'du sawa azi egazu ayiko azini ti ecita ma dria ayi ti 'di ni eji ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Engombe z'ekanisa ku zaabaire nizivuga mporampora, bishopu akeemerera omu maisho g'abaikiriza abaabaire bateeranire hamwe, akamwenyo kakamushwekyerera. Akatwara akaire k'okuteekateeka aha kushemererwa n'okukwatanisa ebi obwire obu burikureeta omu bantu baabo.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with distractions and moral ambiguity, it is essential to seek a higher standard of living. By striving for a life of integrity and compassion, we can find inspiration in the teachings of great figures throughout history.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde ebiwugulaza n'obutategeeragana mu mpisa, kya mugaso okunoonya omutindo gw'obulamu ogw'oku ntikko. Nga tufuba okubeera n'obulamu obw'obwesimbu n'obusaasizi, tusobola okufuna okubudaabudibwa mu njigiriza z'abantu abakulu mu byafaayo byonna.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma opong ki jami ma dwoyo tam pa dano ki kwo ma pe ber, pire tek tutwal me yenyo rwom me kwo ma lamal. Ka watye ka yele me kwo kwo maber dok ki cwiny me kica, watwero nongo cuku cwiny ki I pwony pa dano madongo I kare macon.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba keda iboro luitegelikina, ejokuna noi aimo adoketait na aijar naikiara. Kowai lo aswam agogongu kanu aijar na abeit ka asianut, ipedori oni adumun aisisianakino kama ejaasi itunga lukapolok kotoma akiro nukolosek.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo ewaru azini e'yo onzi 'diyi pie tre, eri orodriru geri aa'zu muke ndeni ri ndazu. E'yo 'bani lezu aa'zu edriru e'yo ada be azini asi ndriza be risi, ama eco ava esu embata 'ba okporu 'diyi ma dria ewu driori ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire ebirikuturemesa hamwe n'emitwarize etarikwetegyerezibwa, n'eky'omugasho okuronda omutindo gw'entuura oguri ahaiguru. Twagyendera aha magara marungi n'embabazi, nitubaasa kutunga okuhuumurizibwa omu nyegyesa z'abantu b'amaani kuruga omu byafaayo.

eng_prompt: In an increasingly unpredictable world, it is essential for individuals to take proactive measures. By being vigilant and prepared, one can mitigate potential risks and threats.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi eno eyeeyongera okuba etali ntegeerekeka, kikulu nnyo abantu kinnoomu okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu. Omuntu bw'aba bulindaala era nga yeetegese, asobola okukendeeza ku bulabe n'okutiisibwatiisibwa ebiyinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma dano pe ngeyo ngo matye ka time, pire tek tutwal ni dano acel acel omyero gutim gin mo. Ka ngat moni obedo ma wange twolo dok oyubbe maber, en twero dwoko piny rwom me peko ma twero bino.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na mam ejena, ejokuna itunga aswam nu ekot. Kowai lo akapakina ka acoikina, epedori itunganan aitidisiar atiokisio ka aitukurianeta.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo 'bani nile ku ri ma omgbo ni tu ra, eri orodriru 'ba alu alu 'diyini e'yo 'yezu okporu. Aa'ta mile be azini otuta be risi, 'ba azi eco e'yo ewaru ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikuguma neeyongyera kuba etarikwetegyerezibwa, n'eky'omugasho abantu okukora ekirikwetengyesa. Omuntu yaaba ayetegyereize kandi ayeteekateekire, naabaasa kukyendeeza akabi n'oburemeezi oburikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: During the Sunday service, the bishop addressed the congregation with a heartfelt message. He emphasized the importance of community involvement and the role of the church in their lives.
lug_prompt: Mu kusaba kwa Ssande, omulabirizi yayogeddeko eri abakungaanye n'obubaka obuva mu mutima. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu n'omulimu gw'ekkanisa mu bulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lega me ceng cabit, laneno oloko ki lwak ki kwena ma oa ki I cwinygi. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa bedo tye pa lwak kacel ki tic pa kanica I kwo gi.

lgg_prompt: Sawa inzita sabitisiri ma alia, bisopi nze e'yo 'ba kanisa'a 'diyi be o'dukoti engapi asi driasi. Eri fe okpo orodri ongulumu eyini aa'zu alenia ri ma dria tualu kanisa ma azi eyi ma edri ma alea ri be.
nyn_prompt: Omu kushaba kw'eizooba rya sande, bishopu akagambira abantu obutumwa kuruga aha mutima. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okwetabamu kw'abantu hamwe n'omurimo gw'ekanisa omu magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: As the service drew to a close, the bishop took a moment to address the importance of supporting the community. He emphasized the need for collective effort in their upcoming charitable initiatives.
lug_prompt: Ng'okusaba kunaatera okuggwa, omulabirizi yatutte akaseera okwogera ku bukulu bw'okuwagira ekitundu. Yakikkaatirizza obwetaavu bw'okukolera awamu mu mirimu gyabwe egy'obwannakyewa egijja.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yub me lega tye cok tum, laneno okwanyo kare mo me lok I kom ber pa konyo lwak. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom miti me tic kacelo I yub gi me miyo kony bot lupeko matye kabino anyim.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete ailip angetakin, abu ebisop kiner nuikamunitos ajokis naka aigang itunga. Abu ngesi kitogogong eipud loka aswam nepepe kotoma ainapeta kec luingaranakinete luetupakinete kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo inzita niri ni i deria, bisopi 'du sawa azi e'yo nzezu orodri atita fezu ongulumu eyini ri ma dria. Eri fe okpo e'yo lezu okpo 'ba dria ma 'bazu tualuri ma dria otita eyini emupi 'diyi ma alea.

eng_prompt: Many religious traditions emphasize the importance of generosity and supporting one's community. One way to practice this principle is through the act of tithing.
lug_prompt: Amadiini mangi gassa essira ku bukulu bw'obugabi n'okuyamba ekitundu ky'omuntu. Engeri emu ey'okussa mu nkola omusingi guno kwe kuwaayo ekimu eky'ekkumi.
ach_prompt: Tekwaro me dini mapol cuku cwiny dano i kom ber pa miyo jami ki konyo kabedo gi. Yo acel me keto cik man itic obedo miyo acel me apar.
teo_prompt: Inonosio luipu luka idiinin itogogongitos ajokis naka aikor keda aigang itunga. Epone ediope loka aitodolikin ainapeta ngun ngesi aijaikin idiope kotoma aparasia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dini ni karakara 'diyi okpo 'ba orodri feza ni azini atita fezu o'bi yi dri ri ma dria. Geri azi 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri geri 'bani afa mudri drini alu fezurisi.
nyn_prompt: Enyikiriza z'amadiini enyingi nizihamya omugasho gw'okuba efura n'okuhwera abantu b'omukyanga kyawe. Omuringo gumwe gw'okukoresa engyenderwaho egi, n'okuhayo kimwe kya ikumi.

eng_prompt: In a world where everyone faces different challenges, it's important to recognize that contributions can come in many forms. Each person's situation is unique, and support should be tailored to what individuals are able to offer.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nga buli omu ayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo, kikulu okukimanya nti obuyambi buyinza okujja mu ngeri nnyingi. Embeera ya buli muntu ya njawulo era obuyambi bulina okutuukagana n'ebyo buli muntu by'asobola okuwaayo.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma dano weng tye ka nongo peko mapat-pat, pire tek me niang ni kony twero bino I yoo mapat-pat. Kwo pa ngat acel acel pat dok kony omyero orwatte ki jami ma ngat acel acel twero miyo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naetereikina nginitunganan keda atiokisio nuegelegela, ejokuna ajenun ebe epedorete aijaanakinio koiponesio luegelegela. Erai ejautene ngol itunganan loitegelikina, ido ibusakinit aitodolikin agangat kotupitete apedor naka itunganan.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'ba dria ni e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esuzu ri ma alea, eri orodriru egazu kini afa feza eyi eco emu geri ndundu eyi si ra. E'yo 'ba alu alu niri ma dria ri ndu ndu, dika le 'ba ma fe atita 'ba alu alu 'diyini afa eyini eco fe 'diyi vusi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu buri omwe arikushanga oburemeezi butarikushushana, n'eky'omugasho kumanya ngu obuhwezi nibubaasa kwija omu miringo mingi. Embeera ya buri omwe n'ey'omutaano, kandi obuhwezi bushemereire kuhikaana n'ebi omuntu arikubaasa kuheereza.

eng_prompt: In a world where generosity is often expected, it's important to remember the true essence of giving. When acts of kindness come from the heart, they hold far more value than those given out of obligation.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi obugabi gye busuubirwa, kikulu okujjukira omugaso gw'okugaba. Ebikolwa by'ekisa bwe biva mu mutima, biba bya muwendo nnyo okusinga ebyo ebiweebwa olw'obuvunaanyizibwa.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma dano mapol tye ki miti me bedo jo ma cingi yot, pire tek tutwal me poo I kom ber pa miyo jami. Tic me kica ma aa ki i cwiny dano pire tek tutwal ka iporo ki tic ma ngat moni timo pien en omyero otim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naewomitai ebe ibusakinit itunga aijaikin, ejokuna aiitun ajokis naka aijaikin. Arai elomunete aswamisio nuka asianut kotoma etau, epol ajokis adepar lu ijaikitai itunganan kopone kaloibusakinit ngesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani asi feza leleri ma alea, eri orodriru ama ma ega e'yo orodriru afa fezani 'diyi ma dria. Afa 'bani 'ye asi alasi 'diyi ka enga asi driasi, eyi orodriru ndeni aga e'yo 'bani 'ye e'yo azi kokoru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu okugaba buriijo kushemereire kubaho, n'eky'omugasho kwijuka omugasho gw'okugaba. Ebikorwa by'embabazi ebirikuruga aha mutima, nibirungi munonga okukira ebyo ebirikukorwa ahabw'obujunaanizibwa.

eng_prompt: In today's world, the role of men is evolving, and it is crucial for them to actively engage in their communities. By stepping up and taking charge, they can contribute to a more balanced and equitable society.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, omulimu gw'abasajja gugenda gukyuka, era kya mugaso nnyo gye bali okwenyigira mu bitundu byabwe. Mu kuyimuka n'okutwala obuvunaanyizibwa, basobola okuyambako okuleetawo obwenkanya n'obwenkanya mu bantu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni, tic pa coo tye ka loke, dok pire tek tutwal ni gubed tye I kabedo gi. Ka gu aa malo ka gamo tic gi, gi twero konyo ikelo ber bedo ki ber bedo ikabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ilolo, euta aswam naka ikiliok aijulanakin, ido ejokuna kesi aswam kagogong kotoma atutubenakec. Kowai lo aibwo kosodete ayait aswam, epedorete kesi aitolomun aiboisit naejok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alea, azi agupi eyini ri ni i oja, dika eri orodriru eyini aa'zu ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea. Eyi ka pa tu azini eyi ma okpo 'du risi, eyi eco fe ongulumu eyini aa'zu trotro azini e'yo ada be.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, omurimo gw'abashaija guriyo niguhinduka, kandi n'eky'omugasho munonga aharibo kwejumba omu byanga byabo. Kubarikuhaguruka kandi bakatwara obujunanizibwa, nibabaasa kureetaho oburinganiza n'oburingaaniza omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges, the woman remains determined to support her family. Her resilience shines through as she navigates daily obstacles with unwavering strength.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'ayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi, omukyala asigala mumalirivu okulabirira ab'omu maka ge. Obusobozi bwe obw'okugumira embeera bweyolekera mu ngeri gy'ayolekaganamu n'ebizibu buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni tye ki peko mapol, dako ni omoko tamme me gwoko jo me ode. Tek cwiny ma en tye kwede nen ka maleng I kare ma en tye ka kato ki I peko me nino ducu ki tekcwiny ma pe lokke.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas keda atiokisio nuipu, ekapakina aberu aigang ekaleke. Itodunit ngesi ebe epedori ngesi aitikitik atiokisio nuka nginiparan keda agogongu naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru karakara yini esuzu ra ti, oku 'da ni asi 'ba asi familia eriniri atizu. Eri ma okpo e'da geri erini e'yo ewaru o'du driasi 'diyi ma ti ojizu okpo kokoru risi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi bwingi, omukazi agumire amaririire kureeberera eka ye. Obusinguzi bwe nibureebeka kurabira omu buremeezi obu arikutunga buriizooba n'amaani maingi.

eng_prompt: In a small town, rumors swirled about a woman whose relationships were as complicated as they were unconventional. Despite the gossip, she embraced her unique family dynamic with pride and love.
lug_prompt: Mu kabuga akatono, olugambo lwali lukwata ku mukazi eyalina omukwano omuzibu nga bwe gwali ogw'enjawulo. Ng'oggyeko olugambo, yakwatira ddala amaka ge ag'enjawulo n'amalala n'okwagala.

lgg_prompt: Tawuni werea aluri ma alia, e'yo onzi aci oku azi ma dria e'yo 'ba yi ma eselea 'diyi ni ovuzu kongolokoru ekile 'ba yi ma eselea 'diyi le. E'yo o'yoza ma talasi, eri a'i familia erivileri ma esele cozu afusi azini letaru.
nyn_prompt: Omu tawuni nkye,orugambo rukajanjaara aha mukazi owaabaire aine omukago gw'amaani. Oihireho orugambo, akakiriza amaka ge ag'omutaano n'ekitiinisa hamwe n'okukunda.

eng_prompt: Despite her vibrant personality and intelligence, she often found herself facing prejudice in her relationships. Many men were unwilling to accept her disability, leading to painful separations.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yali mugezi nnyo era nga mugezi nnyo, yasosololwanga mu mikwano gye egy'oku lusegere. Abasajja bangi tebaali beetegefu kukkiriza bulemu bwe, ekyamuviirako okwawukana mu ngeri ey'obulumi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en obedo dano ma ryek tutwal, en obedo ka nongo apokapoka I kin dano ma en bedo kwedgi. Coo mapol onongo pe gimito ye ni en tye lagoro, man okelo apoka-poka ma okelo arem cwiny.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda iponesio lukajokak keda acoa, abu ngesi kodum awanyunet naka atiakatiaka kotoma aijarake. Mam ikiliok luipu ekapakina acamun angwalu ke, ido abu koyangau aitiakakin.
lgg_prompt: Eri ma adriza onyiru azini onduaru 'diyi ma talasi, eri esu i e'yo opendu ni isu i ma eselea 'ba erini aa'zu yi be 'diyi ma eselea ra. Agupi karakara eyi leni ndra eri ma acota a'i ku, e'yo 'da fe eyini esele cozu e'yo ewaru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: N'obu araabe yaabaire aine emicwe mirungi n'obwengye, akaba ashangwa aine okushoroorwa omu mikago ye. Abashaija baingi bakaba batarikwenda kwikiriza oburema bwe, ekyarugiremu okwahukana okw'obusaasi.

eng_prompt: Despite facing numerous challenges and setbacks, she remained determined to make a better life for her loved ones. Every day, she wakes up before dawn, ready to face the grind.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yayolekagana n'ebizibu bingi, yasigala mumalirivu okufunira abaagalwa be obulamu obulungi. Buli lunaku, azuukuka ng'obudde tebunnakeera, nga mwetegefu okwolekagana n'emirimu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en orwatte ki peko mapol, en omoko tamme me yubu kwo maber pi dano ma en maro. Nino ki nino, en co woko ma peya piny oruc, ma oyubbe me cako tic matek.

lgg_prompt: Erini tro dri fuzu e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru karakara 'diyi be ra ti, eri awi asi'baza be idri muke 'ba erini leletu 'diyi dri. O'du driasi, eri enga uru de nga po'di etuka ecani ku, ngonde e'yo ewaru 'diyi 'yezu.

eng_prompt: After years of searching for a job that aligned with her passion for geology, she finally found an opportunity that excited her. With a newfound sense of purpose, she accepted a position that would allow her to explore the depths of the earth.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka ng'anoonya omulimu ogukwatagana n'okwagala kwe eri geology, yasembayo okufuna omukisa ogwamusanyusa. N'ekigendererwa ekipya kye yafuna, yakkiriza omulimu ogwandimusobozesezza okunoonyereza mu buziba bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me yenyo tic ma rwatte ki mar ma en tye kwede pi lok kom ngom, lacen en onongo gum ma oyomo cwinye. Ki ngec manyen ma en onongo, en oyee tic ma obi weko en kwedo jami matut tutwal I lobo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu aimo aswam naetapit keda aminake naka akiro nuka akwap, abu ngesi kodum arerengu naetapit ngesi. Keda apeleikinet naitetet, abu ngesi kocam aswam naepedori ngesi aingic aiboisio nukokinga nuka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Eli alipi 'bori ma vutia azi ndazu erini leta erini afa nyakuni 'diyi ma dria ri be, isu asizu drileba erini ayiko fepiri ra. Asisile erini esu o'diru risi, eri a'i pari azi ngapi eri dri fepi nyaku ma aliari ma ale andrizu ra.

eng_prompt: In a small village where opportunities are scarce, she works tirelessly to provide for her family. Every day, she gathers stones from the nearby hills, knowing that her efforts will help secure a better future for her children.
lug_prompt: Mu kyalo ekitono emikisa gye gitono, akola butaweera okulabirira ab'omu maka ge. Buli lunaku, akung'aanya amayinja okuva ku nsozi eziriraanyeewo, ng'amanyi nti okufuba kwe kujja kuyamba okukuuma ebiseera by'abaana be eby'omu maaso ebirungi.
ach_prompt: I caro matidi kama gum me tic nok iye, en tiyo matek me gwoko jo me ode. Nino ki nino, en coko got ki wi cere matye cok, kun ngeyo ni tute ne bikonyo me bedo ki anyim maber pi lutinone.
teo_prompt: Kocaalo loedit lo ikidioko arerengesio, iswamai ngesi kagogong kanu aidar ekaleke. Kanginipaaran, etukunenei ngesi amoru kotoma atutubena nueyapiete, naarai ajeni ngesi ebe ebuni aswamuke aingarakin adumun ingaren loajokan kanuka idweke.
lgg_prompt: Calo werea drileba yini ovuzu werea 'diyi ma alia, eri azi nga ande kokoru afa fezu familia eriniri dri. O'du driasi, eri oni eyi tra engazu 'be eyi ma agei 'diyi ma alea, erini nii ra kini okpo erini 'ba ri nga fe ewu drialeri ni aa'zu muke ndeni i vile anzi 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kyaro kikye ahu emigisha etari mingi, naakora n'amaani kureeberera eka ye. Buri eizooba, nashorooza amabaare kuruga omu bushozi oburi haihi, arikumanya ngu okuteeraho kwe nikwija kuhwera abaana be kutunga nyensya nungi.

eng_prompt: In order to provide her children with the best opportunities, she has been exploring various funding options. After careful consideration, she decided to apply for a scholarship program.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okuwa abaana be emikisa emirungi, abadde anoonya engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okuvujjirira. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, yasalawo okusaba sikaala.
ach_prompt: Pi miyo gum maber loyo ki lutinone, en obedo ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me nongo lim. Ingee tam matut, en omoko tamme me penyo pi kwan nono.
teo_prompt: Kanu aijaikin ikedwe arerengesio nuajokak, euta ngesi aingic iponesio luegelegela luka aigang ikapun. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, abu ngesi koseu aileleb afoomu naka asioman atitai.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu drileba muke ndeni 'diyi fezu eri vile anzi 'diyi dri, ebi geri ndundu robia esuzu 'diyi onda. Erini e'yo egazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, eri 'du e'yo waraga sizu drileba sukulu lazu pirini ri esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kuheereza abaana be emigisha mirungi, atwire naasherura oburyo bw'okutunga esente. Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka kurungi, akasharamu okushaba obuhwezi bw'okushoma busha.

eng_prompt: After months of struggling to make ends meet, she felt overwhelmed by her financial burdens. In her quiet moments of desperation, she turns to her faith for guidance and support.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi ng'alwana okusobola okweyimirizaawo, yawulira ng'emigugu gye egy'eby'ensimbi gimusukkiridde. Mu kaseera ke akasirifu ak'okuggwaamu essuubi, addukira mu kukkiriza kwe okufuna obulagirizi n'obuwagizi.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol ma obedo ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo, en owinyo ni peko me lim ma en tye kwede dong opoto I wiye tutwal. I kare ma cwinye tye ma opye mot, en loko I kom niyene pi kony ki tira.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aitelekaar aijar, abu ngesi kopup ebe epol ngesi keda ikapun luipu noi. Kotoma apakio nuepol noi nuetioko, elosi ngesi aiyuunike kanu aingarenikinio ka agangat.
lgg_prompt: Mba erini dri ciria afa dria esuzu 'bori ma vutia, eri etumu e'yo erini robia esuzu 'diyi ma e'yosi. Sa'wa erini ovuzu e'yere 'diyi ma alia, eri i oja i ma a'ita vu driceza azini atita esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okurwana kwebaisaho, akeehurira aremereirwe ahabw'oburemeezi bwe bw'esente. Omu bwire bwe obw'obucureera bw'okwerarikirira, naahindukira aha nyikiriza ye kumubangira n'okumuha obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: Growing up in a small town, she faced numerous health challenges that shaped her childhood. Despite the odds, her spirit remained unbroken as she navigated life with resilience.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba yakulira mu kabuga akatono, yayolekagana n'ebizibu by'obulamu bingi ebyamuviirako okukosebwa mu buto bwe. Ng'oggyeko ebizibu, omwoyo gwe gusigala nga tegumenyese ng'agenda mu maaso n'obulamu n'obuvumu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en odongo I taun mo matidi, en okato ki peko mapol me yotkom ma okelo peko mapol I kare ma en pud tidi. Kadi bed ni peko obedo tye, cwiny mege pud odong ma pe otur I kare ma obedo ka wot I kwo ki tekcwiny.
teo_prompt: Apolor kotoma otaun lodidi, abu ngesi kodum atiokisio nuipu nuka angaleu nuapotu itolitolutu apolouke. Karaida ejaas atiokisio, abu ngesi kibiror kotoma aijar ke keda agogongu.
lgg_prompt: Erini zozu tawuni werea ni ma alia, eri fu dri e'yo ewaru rua ala ni 'diyi be tre e'yo erini zozuri ojapi ra 'diyi pie. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma talasi, eri ma orindi awi nyo kokoru erini acizu idri ma alia asi driasi.
nyn_prompt: Okukurira omu tawuni nkye, akatunga oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara bwingi obwaretsireho oburemeezi omu buto bwe. Oihireho oburemeezi, omutima gwe gukaba gutarikuhwamu amaani obu yaabaire naagyenda omu maisho n'obumanzi.

eng_prompt: Despite her desperate pleas for assistance, the lady approached the government officials for support. She had been facing numerous challenges and hoped they would provide the help she needed.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yeegayirira nnyo obuyambi, omukyala yatuukirira abakungu ba gavumenti okumuyamba. Abadde ayolekedde okusoomoozebwa kungi era asuubira nti bajja kumuwa obuyambi bwe yeetaaga.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en olego pi kony matek tutwal, dako ne oloko ki lutic pa gamente pi kony. En obedo ka nongo peko mapol tutwal dok obedo ki gen ni gubi miyo kony ma en mito.
teo_prompt: Karaida ilipitos ngesi noi aingarakinio, abu aberu ngol kolot mama ejaasi eswamak luka apugan kanu agangat. Atereikina ngesi keda atiokisio nuipu ido aomit ngesi ebe epedorete kesi aijaikin ngesi agangat na ekoto ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro a'izaru asi driasi azakoma esuzu ra ti, oku nderi mu drile azi'ba gameteni 'diyi vu atita esuzu. Eri ebi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu te asi 'baza be kini eyi nga azakoma erini le ri fe ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okushaba kwe kw'obuhwezi, omukazi akahika aha bakuru ba gavumenti kumushaba obuhwezi. Abaire aine oburemeezi bwingi kandi aine amatsiko ngu nibaza kumuhwera.

eng_prompt: There is a common misconception that individuals with disabilities often struggle with substance abuse issues. This stereotype can lead to harmful assumptions about their lives and choices.
lug_prompt: Waliwo endowooza enkyamu nti abantu abaliko obulemu batera okulwanagana n'okukozesa ebiragalalagala. Endowooza eno eyinza okuviirako okuteebereza okw'obulabe ku bulamu bwabwe n'okusalawo kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gitye ki tam marac ni lugoro ipol kare gi nongo peko me nywaro tic ki yadi. Lanyut man twero kelo byek marac i kom kwo gi ki tam ma gimoko.
teo_prompt: Ejai aomisioit naronon ebe itunga lu engwalitos itereikina keda aimat ikee luitemerete. Epedori aomisioit ngin ayangaun aomisio nuarokok nuikamunitos aijar kec keda aseununeta kec.
lgg_prompt: Egata onzi 'ba karakara eyini 'diyi kini 'ba aco be 'diyi dri ci e'yo aro onzi 'diyi ma ayuza si. E'yo 'di eco fe 'bani ega e'yo onzi eyi ma edri ma dria azini e'yo eyini pe 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Hariho enteekateeka etahikire ngu abantu abaine oburema aha mibiri yaabo nibakira kurwanagana n'enshonga z'okukozesa emibazi erikutokooza obwonko. Ekiteekateeko eki nikibaasa kurugwamu okuteekateeka kubi aha magara gaabo hamwe n'ebibarikucwamu.

eng_prompt: Despite their potential, many individuals in this group struggle to find motivation and direction. As a result, they often fail to contribute meaningfully to their work environments.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde balina obusobozi, abantu bangi mu kibinja kino balwana okufuna okubudaabudibwa n'obulagirizi. N'ekivuddemu, batera okulemererwa okuwaayo mu ngeri ey'amakulu mu bifo gye bakolera.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gitye ki kero, dano mapol I gurup man gitye ka tute matek me nongo cuku cwiny ki tira. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare pe gi miyo kony ma pire tek I kabedogi me tic.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda apedorosiokec, ipu itunga luejaasi ogurupu kalo luiticanete noi kanu adumun aisinyikokinit keda aicoreta. Kanuka ngun, mam kesi epedorete aswam kagogong kotoma aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma okpo ni tro ovuzu ra ti, 'ba karakara ongulumu 'di ma alia 'diyi dri ci ava esuzu azini driceza esuzu. E'yo 'disi, eyi o'bi sa'wa driasi azi eyini nga 'diyi 'ye geri kililiru si ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obushoboorozi bwabo, abantu baingi omu guruupu egi nibarwana kuronda ebirikubareetera amaani n'obwebembezi. N'ekyarugiremu, tibarikukira kuhwera omu mirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: To foster economic growth and community engagement, it is essential for local leaders to prioritize the needs of businesses and their stakeholders. By addressing key challenges and providing necessary resources, the district can encourage active participation in the local economy.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu, kya mugaso nnyo abakulembeze b'ebyalo okukulembeza ebyetaago bya bizinensi n'abakwatibwako baabyo. Disitulikiti esobola okukubiriza abantu okwenyigira ennyo mu by'enfuna by'eggwanga ng'ekolako ku bizibu ebikulu n'okubawa ebyetaago.
ach_prompt: Me kelo dongo lobo I tenge me lim ki tic pa lwak, pire tek tutwal ki lutela me tedero me keto miti pa lutim biacara ki joo ma timo biacara kwedgi bedo gin ma pire tek. Distrik twero cuku cwiny dano me bedo tye i biacara me tedero kun gitiyo i kom peko mapigi tego kacel ki miyo kony ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun keda aiswamanara naka itunga, ejokuna noi engarenok luka atutubet aisingarenit ipudesia luka ibiasaran keda itunga. Kowai lo aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok ka aijanakin iboro lu ekotoi, epedori edisitrikt aisinyikokit itunga ajaut toma akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia azini o'bi yi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini e'yo tujari ni azini 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi 'duzu okporu. E'yo ewaru okporu 'diyi ma aza kozu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu risi, distrikiti eco ava fe fizu e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya hamwe n'okureetaho entunguuka omu bantu, nikikuru abebembezi b'ebyaro kwebembeza ebyetengo bya bizinesi hamwe n'abarikubikwataho. Disiturikiti neebaasa kwongyera amaani omu by'entaasya y'ekyaro, erikukora aha buremeezi bw'amaani n'okuhayo eby'okukoresa ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In a just society, every individual deserves the same rights and opportunities, regardless of their background. It is essential to recognize our shared humanity and promote fairness for all.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekirimu obwenkanya, buli muntu yeetaaga eddembe n'emikisa gye gimu, awatali kufaayo ku nsibuko ye. Kya mugaso okutegeera obuntu bwaffe obw'awamu n'okutumbula obwenkanya eri bonna.
ach_prompt: I kabedo maber, dano weng omyero gubed ki twero ki gum marom labongo paro pi kabedo gi. Pire tek tutwal me niang ni wan ducu watye dano acel ki me neno ni dano weng tye marom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet na ejok, ekot nginitunganan apedorite keda arerengesio nu eputosi, araida elomunit ngesi kokinga. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun ebe irai oni itunga ka aitopolorite etube loajokan kanuka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu kililiru ma alia, le 'ba dria ma esu drilemgbo azini drileba tro engazu ngua ri ma talasi. Eri orodriru e'yo amani aa'zu 'ba ada ru 'diyi ma e'yo egazu azini e'yo liza kililiru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'ba dria eyidri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka ekirimu oburingaaniza, buri omwe ashemereire kugira obugabe n'emigisha erikushushana, oihireho oburugo bwe. N'eky'omugasho kumanya obuhangwa bwaitu kandi tukareetaho oburinganiza ahari boona.

eng_prompt: Many families struggle to cope with the impact of addiction, as loved ones become increasingly withdrawn and unproductive. The burden of care often falls on those who are left behind, leading to feelings of frustration and helplessness.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi galwana okugumira ebizibu by'okwemanyiiza, ng'abaagalwa beeyongera okweyawula n'obutaba ba mugaso. Omugugu gw'okulabirira emirundi egisinga gukka ku abo abasigadde emabega, ekivaako okwetamwa n'obutaba na buyambi.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol tye ka tute matek me lweny i kom adwogi marac ma bino macalo adwogi me bedo opii, macalo dano ma gimaro gi bedo ka winye dok pe gitiyo maber. Tic me gwoko lutino ipol kare poto iwi joo ma kiweko gi angec, ma weko giwinyo calo pe gitwero timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Etereikina ikalia luipu keda atiokisio nuka aimat, naarai mam luminakec epedorete aswam. Ationis na aidar etapit aibiror nejaas ngul lu ejalakinio kau, eyangauni amamut aiyalama keda amamut agangat.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi dri ci e'yo eyi 'yepi eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu, ekile 'ba eyi ma alea 'diyi e'do eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ku dika eyini azi ngazu ku. E'yo 'ba eyi ma tambazu ri ni e'de 'ba 'bani eyi ku 'bo 'diyi ma dria, eyini ani aa'zu candi ru azini aa'zu e'yo kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi nigarwana kurwanisa oburemeezi bw'okukoresa emize, ahabw'okuba abarikukundwa beeyongyera kwetantara n'obutakora. Omugugu gw'okureeberera abantu nigukira kugwa ahari abo abasigaire enyima, ekirikubareetera okuhwa amaani n'obutabaasa.

eng_prompt: It is essential to challenge the misconceptions surrounding disability and recognize the diverse capabilities of individuals. By fostering a more inclusive mindset, we can appreciate the unique strengths that everyone brings to the table.
lug_prompt: Kikulu nnyo okusoomooza endowooza enkyamu ezikwata ku bulemu n'okukkiriza obusobozi bw'abantu ab'enjawulo. Bwe tukuza endowooza ya bonna, tusobola okusiima amaanyi ag'enjawulo buli omu g'aleeta ku mmeeza.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me kwero tam ma pe atir I kom goro ki niang kero pa dano. Ka wadongo cwiny me bedo ki dano weng, watwero pwoyo kero ma dano weng tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aitepeg aomisio nuarokok nuikamunitos angwalu ka ajenun apedorosio nuegelegela nuka itunga. Kowai lo aitopolor aomisioit naka aimorikikin itunga kere, ipedori oni ajenun agogong naka nginitunganan.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru e'yo onzi 'bani ega e'yo aco be 'diyi ma dria 'diyi atrizu dika 'ba ma ega e'yo 'bani eco 'ye 'diyi ma dria ra. E'yo 'ba dria ma eselea 'diyi ma ta mbaza si, ama eco okpo 'ba dria ni eji ri ma e'yo ega ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho okurwanisa ebiteekateeko ebitahikire ebirikukwata ahaburema n'okumanya obushoboorozi bw'abantu. Kurabira omu kutunguura emiteekateekyere y'abantu boona, nitubaasa kusiima emyoga y'omutaano ei buri omwe arikureeta aha meeza.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and hardship, the community faced numerous challenges that threatened their survival. Recognizing the need for unity, the leaders called upon the men to come together for the sake of their families.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'ebizibu, ekitundu kyayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi okwali kutiisa obulamu bwakyo. Olw'okumanya obwetaavu bw'obumu, abakulembeze baakubirizza abasajja okujja awamu ku lw'obulungi bw'amaka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki peko, lwak gunongo peko mapol ma oketo kwo gi kama rac. Ki niang ber pa ribe, lutela gulego coo me ribbe pi ber pa gangi gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus ajenanut keda atiokisio, apotu itunga odumutu atiokisio nuipu nuapotu kitukurianete aijar kec. Kanu ajenun eipud loka aimorikikina, apotu engarenok isinyikokisi ikiliok aimorikikin kanuka ikalia kec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma alia, ongulumu 'da esu e'yo ewaru karakara eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ku 'diyi. E'yo lezu ti ecita ma e'yo egazu risi, drice'ba eyi ai agupi eyi emuzu tualu familia eyivile 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutegyendesereza n'oburemeezi, abantu bakashanga oburemeezi bwingi obwabaire nibutinisa amagara gaabo. Ahabw'okumanya ekyetengo ky'okukwatanisa, abebembezi bakashaba abashaija kukorera hamwe ahabw'amaka gaabo.

eng_prompt: After years of being marginalized and overlooked, the historical community has finally gained recognition for their contributions. Many advocates are now calling for a designated day to honor their resilience and celebrate their long-awaited return from exile.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga basuuliddwa ku mabbali era nga tebafiibwako, abakugu mu byafaayo bafunye okusiimibwa olw'ebyo bye bakoze. Abalwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu bangi kati basaba olunaku olutegekeddwa okussa ekitiibwa mu bugumu bwabwe n'okujaguza okudda kwabwe okuva mu buwanganguse.
ach_prompt: Inge mwaki mapol ma kibedo ka cayo dok kicayo, dano ma gukwano lok me tekwaro dong gunongo pwoc pi jami ma gutimo. Lumii kony mapol kombedi tye ka lego ni myero kiyub nino mo me woro tek cwiny gi ki kwero dwogo gi ki ilobo ma woko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu lu eyangaritai kosodete apalunit, apotu itunga luka akiro nukolosek kodumutu aijen kanuka aswamukec. Ekotosi kwana itunga luipu apaaran na itegelikina kanu ayongite agogongukec ka ainumunum abongunukec kokinga.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyi ma vutia 'bani eyi ogazu kalaa dika eyi adizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo a'dani 'diyi esu asizu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ra. Ba karakara a'di 'dipi e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi le o'du 'bani 'ba eyi ma ngulupi si 'diyi inzizu dika eyi ma emvizu engazu kari 'di ma alea sa'wa ezu ri inzizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okushoroorwa n'okwangahurirwa, abantu b'ebyafaayo batungire okumanywa ahabw'emirimo yaabo. Abarwanirizi baingi hati nibashaba eizooba ry'okujaguza okugaruka kwabo kuruga omu buzaahe.

eng_prompt: In a bid to strengthen party unity ahead of the upcoming election, the former vice president embarked on a campaign tour across the region. His first stop was West Nile, where he aimed to rally local leaders and constituents.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okunyweza obumu bw'ekibiina nga beetegekera okulonda okujja, eyali omumyuka wa pulezidenti yatandika olugendo lw'okunoonya akalulu okwetooloola ekitundu. Yasooka kuyimirira mu West Nile, gye yagenderera okukunga abakulembeze b'ebitundu n'abalonzi.
ach_prompt: I yub me jingo winye ikin dul me cungu iwi bye mapud yer matye kabino anyim, lalub kor ladit lobo macon ocako wot me bito kwir I but lobo man mapat-pat. Kabedo mege me acel obedo West Nile, kama en obedo ki miti me rweyo lutela me tedero kacel ki lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong aimorikikina naka epate eringa aseo na ebunit, abu atupiton lokapolon akwap losek kogeu alosit aipejokin aiboisio kere. Abu ngesi kogeu aibwo ko West Nile, ne akoto ngesi atukonokin engarenok keda itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu ti ecita amuti politiki ni 'diyiniri okpo fezu opeta emupi 'diyi ma drilia, endru prisdent ndra okuri e'do e'yo ti odaza ni 'diyi ma aci angu kalasi dria. Pari erini asizu okori ndra angu westnile niri ma alea, erini lezu drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi trazu tualu 'ba angu erini opi nyazu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura okukwatanisa kw'ekibiina omu karuuru akarikwiija, owaabaireho omuhwezi wa purezidenti akatandika kuronda akaruuru k'okuronda akaruuru omu byanga. Akabanza yaayemerera omuri West Nile, ahu yabaire aine ekigyendererwa ky'okurundana abebembezi b'ebyaro hamwe n'abajwekyerwa be.

eng_prompt: In the wake of political turmoil, many individuals found themselves forced to leave their homeland. As the situation began to stabilize, a new movement emerged, fostering hope for reconciliation and collaboration among those separated by borders.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko mu byobufuzi, abantu bangi bawalirizibwa okuva mu nsi zaabwe. Embeera bwe yatandika okutereera, ekibiina ekipya kyajjawo, ne kireetawo essuubi ly'okutabagana n'okukolagana mu abo abaawuddwamu ensalosalo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lweny me cungu iwi-bye obedo tye, dano mapol gunongo ni omyero guwek lobogi. Ikare ma jami ocako bedo maber, dul manyen ocake, ma okelo gen me mato oput ki ribbe ikin joo ma wang lobo opoko gi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka amumu naka epolitikis, apotu itunga luipu opikosi anyoun kotoma akwapin kec. Neageuna ejautene ainapakina, abu atukot naitetet kogeu aitolomun amuno naka aimorikikin keda aiswamanara kanejaas ngul luetiakakinitai keda ikoruo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri politiki ni 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba karakara eyi esu eyi okpo kokoru kari eyivile 'diyi kuzu. E'yo nderi ni e'doria asianzuru, ongulumu azi o'diru ni efu, asi'baza e'yo ti icita ni azini ti icita ni 'diyi ma dria 'ba esele co'ba boda si 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea.

lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kuyingira kw'abantu abaasengulwa gyebuvuddeko, kikulu nnyo eri ab'obuyinza okukola ku byetaago by'ekitundu. Okukakasa nti abatuuze bonna naddala abateesobola bafuna obuyambi obumala kye kintu ekikulu.

eng_prompt: To address the ongoing water scarcity and support local agriculture, it is crucial for the community to explore sustainable water management solutions. Implementing effective irrigation systems will enhance crop yields and improve the livelihoods of residents.

Okutandikaho enkora nungi y'okwitirira, nikiija kwongyera aha buhingi bw'ebihingwa n'okutunguura emituurire y'abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: In our community, local governance plays a crucial role in fostering collaboration among residents. One of the key components of this system is the village assemblies, which serve as a platform for dialogue and engagement.

ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, tye lworo madit tutwal I kom adwoki pa lok makwako cwec ma orumuwa I kom yot kom pa lwak ki jami ma orumuwa. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero tye ka lokke bot dule ma oyubbe me nongo tira ki yoo me tic.

eng_prompt: Despite the growing awareness of environmental issues, many communities still rely on traditional fuel sources. Charcoal remains a popular choice for cooking and heating in various regions around the world.

eng_prompt: As industries expand and consumer demand increases, the impact of human activities on natural ecosystems becomes more pronounced. Many businesses prioritize profit over sustainability, leading to practices that harm the planet.

Tujura karakara eyi orodri eyi 'du okporu aga e'yo aa'pi ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi, e'yo 'dayi fe eyini e'yo onzi 'yezu angu ama agei ri ezazu.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, reliable transportation is often essential for daily life. Many individuals rely on vehicles to commute to work, run errands, and manage their responsibilities.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, entambula eyeesigika ya mugaso nnyo mu bulamu obwa bulijjo. Abantu bangi beesigama ku mmotoka okugenda ku mirimu, okutambuza ebintu n'okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami woto oyot-oyot tutwal, wot maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwo me nino ducu. Dano mapol gijenge I kom mutoka me cito I gang tic, timo biacara ki timo tic gi.

eng_prompt: In the hierarchy of the church, various roles and titles exist to help manage the spiritual and administrative needs of the congregation. Among these roles, archdeacons play a significant part in overseeing specific areas of church governance.
lug_prompt: Mu bukulembeze bw'ekkanisa, emirimu n'ebitiibwa eby'enjawulo biriwo okuyamba okuddukanya ebyetaago by'omwoyo n'obukulembeze mu kibiina. Mu mirimu gino, ba archdeacons bakola omulimu munene mu kulondoola ebitundu ebimu mu bukulembeze bw'ekkanisa.

teo_prompt: Ajaut keda emotoka epedori aitojokar aijar naka itunganan. Itunga luipu ewanyunitos ebe ajaut keda emotoka loka itunga einakini kesi ailajara naepol noi kotoma aswamisinei kec nuka nginiparan.

nyn_prompt: Okugira emotoka nikibaasa kutunguura amagara g'omuntu. Abantu baingi nibashanga ngu okuba n'emotoka yaabo nikibahwera kugira obugabe n'obwegyendesereza omu mirimo yaabo eya buriizooba.

eng_prompt: Understanding the complexities of growth requires patience and perseverance. Many factors contribute to the evolution of skills and ideas over time.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ebizibu by'enkulaakulana kyetaagisa obugumiikiriza n'okugumiikiriza. Ensonga nnyingi ziviirako okukulaakulana kw'obukugu n'ebirowoozo okumala ebbanga.
ach_prompt: Niang peko ma dongo lobo kelo mito diyo cwiny ki diyo cwiny. Tye jami mapol ma kelo dongo pa diro ki tam I ngee kare malac.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin ationis naka apol ekoto atitingikinit ka atitingikinit. Ipu iboro lu itolomunenete apol naka acoa keda aomisio kotoma apak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru zota ma dria 'diyi vazu le asi teza azini asi teza. E'yo karakara eyi fe ondua eyini tualu egata eyini 'diyi ma ezota sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza oburemeezi bw'entunguuka nikyetenga okugumisiriza n'okugumisiriza. Hariho ebintu bingi ebirikureetaho entunguuka y'emyoga n'ebiteekateeko bwanyima y'obwire.

eng_prompt: In many communities, the financial support for religious institutions can be limited. As a result, some religious leaders have a low standard of living.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, obuyambi bw'ensimbi eri ebitongole by'eddiini buyinza okuba obutono. N'ekivuddemu, abakulembeze b'enzikiriza abamu babeera mu mbeera embi.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, kony me lim ma kimiyo ki dule me dini twero bedo nok. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela dini mukene kwo gi piny tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu, ikidioko agangat na ikapun nejaas iriongeta lu idiinin. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi engarenok ice luka idiinin keda aijar naedit.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, atita robia ni fele amuti e'yo aitanisi 'diyini ri ma omgbo eri were. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba e'yo aitanisi 'diyi ma azi eyi aa wura muke ku 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, obuhwezi bw'esente oburikuhebwa ebitongore by'ediini nibukye. N'ekyarugiremu, abeebembezi b'ediini abamwe baine entuura y'ahansi.

eng_prompt: With determination and perseverance, we can turn our aspirations into reality. It is essential to believe in ourselves and take actionable steps towards our goals.
lug_prompt: Bwe tubeera abamalirivu era abagumiikiriza, tusobola okutuukiriza ebirooto byaffe. Kya mugaso nnyo okwekkiririzaamu n'okutwala emitendera egiyinza okukolebwako okutuuka ku biruubirirwa byaffe.
ach_prompt: Ka wamoko tamwa ki diyo cwiny, watwero cobo miti wa. Pire tek tutwal me bedo ki niyee i komwa kenwa ki dong timo jami ma twero konyo wa cobo miti wa.
teo_prompt: Keda apodokinit keda atitingikinit, ipedori oni aitodolikin apeleikinatawok. Erai ibore yenejok aiyuun awate wok kosodete aitodolikin alosikinetekosi.
lgg_prompt: Asi 'baza azini asi teza be, ama eco egata amani 'diyi oja e'yo ada ru ra. Eri orodriru ama ma ovu asi'baza be ama ma ngulupi ma dria azini ama ma 'du e'yo 'bani eco 'ye ra 'diyi muzu e'yo amani lele 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'amaani n'okugumisiriza, nitubaasa kuhindura ebigyendererwa byaitu okuba ebihikire. N'eky'omugasho kweikiririzamu kandi tukakora ebirikubaasa kuhika aha bigyendererwa byaitu.

eng_prompt: In today's interconnected world, various influential figures play crucial roles in shaping societal progress. Their decisions and actions can significantly impact economic growth, social change, and community well-being.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekwataganye, abantu ab'amaanyi ab'enjawulo bakola emirimu emikulu mu kubumba enkulaakulana y'ekitundu. Okusalawo kwabwe n'ebikolwa bisobola okukosa ennyo enkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna, enkyukakyuka mu mbeera z'abantu, n'obulungi bw'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni matye ki kubbe ikin dano, dano mapol ma oywek timo tic mapire tek tutwal I dongo lobo pa lwak. Tam gi ki tic gi twero kelo dongo lobo, aloka loka ikwo pa lwak ki ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naerucokina, itunga luipu luepolok iswamaete aswam naepol noi kanu aitopolor apol naka itunga. Aseununeta kec keda aswamisiokec epedorete aitojokara apol naka ikapun, aijulakin ejautene loka itunga keda aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alea, 'ba okporu karakara 'diyi azi okporu 'ye ongulumu eyi ma zota ma alea. E'yo yini 'dule azini e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi eco zota e'yo robianiri ma alia, ojata o'bi yi ma eselea, azini ongulumu yini ovuzu onyiru 'diyi oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erikukwatanisa, abantu b'amaani baingi nibakora emirimo y'amaani omukureetaho entunguuka omu bantu. Okusharamu kwabo n'ebikorwa byabo nibibaasa kukora kihango aha ntunguuka omu by'entaasya, empindahinduka omu bantu hamwe n'entunguuka y'abantu.

eng_prompt: In times of need, the community often looks to its spiritual guides for wisdom and direction. Various initiatives have been established to strengthen the bond between residents and their religious leaders.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obwetaavu, abantu batera okutunuulira abakulembeze baabwe ab'omwoyo okufuna amagezi n'obulagirizi. Enteekateeka ez'enjawulo zitandikiddwawo okunyweza enkolagana wakati w'abatuuze n'abakulembeze b'enzikiriza zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, lwak maro cito bot lutela gi pi ryeko ki tira. Gityeko kati ki yoo mapatpat me jingo wat ikin lutedero ki lutela dini gi.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu ican, etapit itunga asesen engarenokokec luka edini kanu acoa ka aicoreta. Etolomun iboro luegelegela kanu aitogogong eidicane loejai kiding itunga keda engarenok lu idiinin kec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ma alia, ongulumu eyi sa'wa driasi angu ndre 'ba eyini imbata fe 'diyi vu ondua esuzu azini imbata esuzu. Ba e'do e'yo ndundu eyi atita fezu aa'ta 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea drice'ba e'yo aitanisi 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, abantu nibasherurira obwengye n'obuhabuzi omu b'eby'omwoyo. Enteekateeka nyingi zitandikirweho okwongyera omukago ahagati y'abatuuragye n'abebembezi b'amadiini gaabo.

eng_prompt: Many people feel discouraged when they see others making progress faster than they are. However, with determination and the right strategies, success is within reach.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi baggwaamu amaanyi bwe balaba abalala nga bakulaakulana mangu okubasinga. Newankubadde, n'obumalirivu n'obukodyo obutuufu, obuwanguzi buli kumpi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol cwinygi cwer kace guneno jo mukene tye ka dongo oyot loyo gi. Kadi bed kumeno, ka imoko tammi ki diro matir, ci itwero nongo loc.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu itakadikinos newanyunia kesi luce elosete katipet adepar kesi. Konye, keda apodokinit keda iwaitin lu abeit, epedorio aitodolikin akerianut.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ava ako esu eyini 'ba azi 'diyi ndrezu angu zozu okposi ndeni aga eyidri 'bori ma e'yosi. Kani si, asi 'baza be azini geri kililiru 'diyisi, drile suza eri ewakokoru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibahwamu amaani ku barikureeba abandi nibatunguuka juba kukira bo. Kwonka n'amaani n'oburyo obuhikire,obusinguzi nibubaasa kuhikwaho.

eng_prompt: The government has been exploring various ways to improve transportation efficiency. One innovative solution involves the integration of modern vehicles into public service operations.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti ebadde enoonya engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okutumbula entambula. Enkola emu ey'obuyiiya ezingiramu okugatta emmotoka ez'omulembe mu mirimu gy'olukale.
ach_prompt: Gamente obedo ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me ilo malo rwom me tic me wot. Yoo acel manyen me tyeko lok en aye keto mutoka manyen I tic pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Euta apugan aingic iponesio luegelegela lu itojokarere elose. Adiopet aitemokinet naitetet imoriarit aimorikikin amotokan nuakwana toma aswamisio nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ebi geri ndundu eyi onda e'yo acipa ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo azi alu 'bani eco 'ye o'diru ri eri mutukari wura o'diru 'diyi 'bazu azi o'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti etwire necondooza emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okutunguura eby'engyenda. Omuringo gumwe ogw'okucondooza nigutwariramu okukoresa emotoka ez'omurembe omu mirimo ya boona.

eng_prompt: Due to their smaller size and lower visibility, motorcyclists often face significant risks while navigating busy streets. Many drivers fail to notice them, leading to dangerous situations.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunene bwazo obutono n'okulaba okutono, abavuzi ba pikipiki batera okusanga obuzibu obw'amaanyi nga batambulira ku nguudo ezirimu abantu abangi. Abavuzi b'ebidduka bangi balemererwa okuzitegeera, ekiviirako embeera ez'obulabe.
ach_prompt: Pi ditgi matidi ki neno piny, ludwo piki piki ipol kare ginongo peko mapol ka gitye ka ngwec I gudu ma dano dwong iye. Ludwo mutoka mapol pe gi tamo I komgi, man kelo peko ma rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanuka adoketaitikec naedit keda asesenekec naedit, etereikina duc iderepan luka ipikipikin keda atiokisio nuipu kapak kana airenge orotin luejaasi keda itunga luipu. Mam iderepan luipu ejenete ngun, ido eyangauni ejautene loerono noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini ovuzu werea azini angu ndrezaru werea risi, 'ba pikipiki onzupi 'diyi e'yo ewaru 'diyi esu yini aciria nzila 'bani acizaru 'diyi ma alia. Dereva karakara eyi econi eyi ndre ku eyini ani fezu e'yo onzi eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obuhango bwazo bukye hamwe n'okureeba kukye, abavugi ba pikipiki nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi baaba nibatambura aha nguuto ezirimu abantu baingi. Abavugi baingi tibarikubetegyereza, ekirikurugwamu embeera z'akabi.

eng_prompt: Excessive alcohol consumption can have serious negative effects on a teenager's physical and mental health. Additionally, it can impair their judgment and lead to risky behaviors.
lug_prompt: Okunywa omwenge ekisukkiridde kusobola okukosa obulamu bw'omuvubuka obw'omubiri n'obw'obwongo. Okwongerako, kisobola okukosa okusalawo kwabwe n'okuviirako okweyisa okw'obulabe.
ach_prompt: Mato kongo tutwal twero balo kom ki wic pa bulu. Medo i kom meno, twero balo tamgi dok kelo tim maraco.
teo_prompt: Aimat ajon naepol epedori aitolitol angaleu naka akwan keda aomisio nuka atumunak. Iyatakina bobo, epedori aitolitol aomisio kec kosodi ayangaun iponesio luarokok.
lgg_prompt: Ewa mvuza badakaru ri eco 'ba oderu 'diyi ma rua azini omi ma rua onzi 'diyi eji ra. Azi dika, eco yi ma egata eza azini eco fe yini adriza onzi 'diyi 'yezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okunywa amaarwa munonga nikibaasa kuteganisa omubiri n'ebiteekateeko by'eminyeeto. Okwongyera ahari ekyo, nikibaasa kuremesa okwetegyereza kwabo kandi kireete emichwe mibi.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, the dynamics of family life and community interactions are evolving. As a result, various social, economic, and environmental pressures are emerging that impact everyone.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyuka mangu, embeera y'obulamu bw'amaka n'enkolagana mu kitundu zikyuka. N'ekivuddemu, embeera z'abantu ez'enjawulo, eby'enfuna, n'obutonde bw'ensi bivaayo ebikosa buli omu.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kare-ni ma tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, kwo pa jo me ot ki kubbe ikin lwak tye ka loke. Macalo adwogi ne, lyeto me kwo pa lwak, biacara ki cwec ma orumuwa tye kabino ma tye ki adwoki ne i kom dano weng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, ejai aijulanakineta kotoma aijar naka ikalia keda itunga. Kanuka ngun, epote atiokisio nuka itunga, ikapun, keda ejautene lo akwap alomun nuetiroritos itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ewu andruri ma alea ojata okposiri ma alea, geri familia eyini aa'zu tualu ongulumu eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri ni i oja i ra. E'yo 'disi, e'yo ndundu o'bi yi ma eselea, e'yo robiani azini angu yi ma ageia 'diyi efu 'ba dria yi bipi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga, entwaza y'amaka hamwe n'emituurire y'abantu omu byaro biriyo nibihinduka. N'ekyarugiremu, oburemeezi bwingi omu by'obuhangwa, eby'entaasya hamwe n'obuhangwa bw'ensi nibubaho oburikuteganisa buri omwe.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, open communication and feedback are essential for fostering a healthy community. Therefore, it is crucial to ensure that all individuals feel empowered to express their concerns and opinions.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi erimu demokulasiya, empuliziganya ennungi n'okuddamu ebibuuzo bikulu nnyo mu kukuza obulamu obulungi mu kitundu. N'olwekyo, kikulu nnyo okukakasa nti abantu bonna bawulira nga baweereddwa obuyinza okwogera ebibaluma n'ebirowoozo byabwe.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, lok ki tam ma aa ki bot lwak obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me dongo kabedo ma dano tye iye ma komgi yot. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal me neno ni dano weng tye ki twero me miyo tam gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, einer kopone kaloejok ka abongokin akiro ejok kanu aitopolor aijar naka itunga. Kanuka ngun, erai ibore yenepol noi aanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere alimun aomisiokec keda aomisiokec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, e'yo nzeza ngmboru azini o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi orodriru ongulumu alata ni 'diyi ezozu. Ka'dini, eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba dria eyi ma okpo esu e'yo eyi ma dria azini egata eyini 'diyi ecezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki, empurizagana ey'amazima hamwe n'okugarukwamu ebiteekateeko n'eby'omugasho omukureetaho amagara marungi omu bantu. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu abantu boona bahurira baine obushoborozi bw'okugamba ebirikubateganisa n'ebiteekateeko byabo.

eng_prompt: In a healthy relationship, mutual respect and care are essential for fostering love and understanding. It is important for partners to support each other and recognize their worth.
lug_prompt: Mu mukwano omulungi, okuwaana ekitiibwa n'okufaayo bikulu nnyo mu kukuza omukwano n'okutegeeragana. Kya mugaso abaagalana okuwagiragana n'okusiimagana.
ach_prompt: I kin dano ma komgi yot, woro ki gwokke ikin gi obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo mar ki niang. Pire tek tutwal pi lunyom me konyre ki niang ber pa luwotgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma eidicane loejok, ayongite ka apodokinit nepepe eraasi nuepolok noi kanu aitopolor amin keda apuponoro. Erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ipaupa aigangakin yenice ka ajenun ajokisakec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea aa'pi rua ala be 'diyi ma alea, inzita tualu asi 'baza be 'diyi orodriru leta azini vata ma omgbo otuzu. Eri orodriru 'ba eyi ecipi eyi be 'diyini eyi atizu eyi ma eselea eyini ani eyi ma orodri esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bushwere burungi, okuheerezana ekitiinisa n'okureebererana n'eby'omugasho omukureetaho rukundo n'okwetegyerezana. N'eky'omugasho abashaija n'abakazi kushagikana n'okumanya omugasho gwabo.

eng_prompt: In a traditional family structure, roles and responsibilities are often clearly defined. A strong foundation of support and care is essential for a harmonious household.
lug_prompt: Mu nsengeka y'amaka ey'ennono, emirimu n'obuvunaanyizibwa bitera okunnyonnyolwa bulungi. Omusingi omunywevu ogw'obuwagizi n'okulabirira gwa mugaso mu maka ag'emirembe.
ach_prompt: I gang me tekwaro, tic ki tic pa dano ipol kare ki niango gi maber tutwal. Bedo ki guti matek me kony ki gwoko dano pire tek tutwal I gang matye ki kuc.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okalia lu atekerin, itetemitai aswamisinei keda aswamisinei ejok. Aingaren naka agangat ka aidar erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ekale loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Familia a'bini 'diyi ma alea, 'ba e'da azi eyi ma dria kililiru. E'yo atita fezu azini ta mbazani okporu ri eri orodriru aku aa'pi tualu ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu maka g'obuhangwa, emirimo n'obujunaanizibwa nibishoboororwa kurungi. Omusingye murungi gw'obuhwezi n'okureeberera n'eky'omugasho omu maka agarikukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: Despite his once-prominent position and the admiration of his peers, his life took a downward spiral. Friends and family watched helplessly as he succumbed to the bottle, leading to devastating consequences.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde yali mututumufu era nga banne bamwagala, obulamu bwe bwakendeera. Ab'emikwano n'ab'enganda baalaba nga talina ky'asobola kukola nga bw'afiira mu ccupa, ekyavaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en onongo tye ki twero madit tutwal I kare macon dok luwote mapol gubedo ki miti I kome, kwone odok piny. Lurem ki lugang ne guneno ma pe gitwero timo gin mo I kare ma en oto pi cupa, ma okelo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida ajaasi ngesi keda adoketait naepol noi keda aisiyalamikinet kama ejaasi ipaupake, abu aijarake kibiroros. Apotu ipapero keda lukokalekec kowanyutu bala emamei epone loapedoria ngesi atwanare kanuka acupa kangin, ido abu koyangau atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu pari erini okori ma alia azini 'ba eri ma agyipika 'diyi ma ayiko esuzu ra ti, eri ma idri 'du e'yo ewaru. Agyipi azini familia 'diyi ndre e'yo kokoru erini drazu cupa ma alia, erini fezu e'yo onzi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: N'obu araabe yaabaire aine omwanya gw'amaani hamwe n'okusiimwa bagyenzi be, amagara gye gakakyendeera. Banywani hamwe n'ab'omuka ye bakareebera bateine eki barikubaasa kumuhwera obu yaafa ahabw'ecupa, ekyarugiremu ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: After years of struggling with his dependency, he finally realized he needed support to make a change. With encouragement and understanding, his spouse stood by him during this challenging journey.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'alwanagana n'okwemanyiiza kwe, yakizuula nti yeetaaga obuyambi okukola enkyukakyuka. Olw'okuzzibwamu amaanyi n'okutegeerwa, mukyala we yamuyimiriddeko mu lugendo luno oluzibu.
ach_prompt: Ingee lweny pi mwaki mapol ki peko me jemo ne, I agiki ne oniang ni en mito kony me timo aloka-loka. Ki cuku cwiny ki niang, dakone ocung tung bote I kare me peko man.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ainingosit keda aimat ikee, abu ngesi kojen ebe ekoto ngesi agangat kanu aijulakin. Keda aisinyikokinit keda amisiikin, abu aberu ke kobwoun keda ngesi kotoma apak kana naetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara erini dri ciria e'yo erini atizuri be 'bori ma vutia, eri esu asizu kini i le atita ojata 'yezu ra. E'yo ava feza azini vata be, eri vile oku ri so pa eri be sawa e'yo ewaru 'di ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi arikurwanisa emize ye, akahendera yaayetegyereza ngu akaba nayetenga obuhwezi kukora empinduka. Omukazi we akamuhwera omu rugyendo rwe orurimu oburemeezi, arikumugaruramu amaani n'okumwetegyereza.

eng_prompt: Making lasting changes in one's life often requires a deep understanding of personal goals and challenges. Without the right support and encouragement, individuals may struggle to take the necessary steps toward transformation.
lug_prompt: Okukola enkyukakyuka ez'olubeerera mu bulamu bw'omuntu kyetaagisa okutegeera ebigendererwa bye n'okusoomoozebwa kwe. Awatali buyambi n'okukubirizibwa okutuufu, abantu bayinza okukaluubirizibwa okukola emitendera egyetaagisa okutuuka ku nkyukakyuka.
ach_prompt: Timo aloka-loka matye pi kare malac I kwo pa ngat moni ipol kare mito niang matut I kom miti ki peko ma ngat moni tye kwede. Labongo kony ki cuku cwiny matir, dano acel acel twero nongo tek tutwal me timo jami ma mite me kelo aloka loka.
teo_prompt: Aiswamaun aijulanakineta nuka apak naepol kotoma aijar itunganan ekot amisiikin nu ekotos itunganan keda atiokisio. Arai mam igangitai ka isinyikokitai ejok, etiono itunga aswam nu ekotoi kanu aijulakin.
lgg_prompt: Ojata aa'pi ewule 'diyi 'yezu 'ba aluni ma edri ma alea ri le 'ba ma va e'yo e'yo 'ba ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma dria. Atita kililiru azini ava feza kokoru, 'ba azi 'diyi eco dri ci e'yo ojata ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Okukora empindahinduka z'obuhangazi omu magara g'omuntu, nikyetengyesa okwetegyereza kurungi ebigyendererwa bye n'oburemeezi bwe. Hatariho obuhwezi n'okugarurwamu amaani, abantu nibabaasa kurwana kukora ebirikwetengyesa omu kuhinduka.

eng_prompt: In times of emotional turmoil, it can be tempting to seek comfort outside of a committed relationship. However, turning to infidelity often leads to more pain and complications.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutabanguko mu nneewulira, kiyinza okukema okunoonya okubudaabudibwa ebweru w'omukwano ogwewaddeyo. Newankubadde, okudda mu butali bwesigwa kitera okuleeta obulumi n'ebizibu ebirala.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko me tam, twero bedo atematema me yenyo kwe cwiny ma aa ki I kin jo munyomme. Kadi bed kumeno, donyo I tim me abor ipol kare kelo arem ki peko mapol.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko, epedori aitam aimo agangat kokinga naka eidicane loajokan. Konye, aibiror toma amumu eyangauni apipil keda atiokisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma alia, eri eco ovu o'bita ru asi omiza ndazu engazu yi ma eselea amveleru. Kani si, muzu e'yo ali o'bazaniri ma alia ri ni sawa driasi fe asi suza azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu.

eng_prompt: The dynamics of modern relationships often lead to questions about the appropriate timeline for developing a romantic partnership. Many people wonder what factors influence the duration of courtship before making a long-term commitment.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'omukwano ey'omulembe guno etera okuleetawo ebibuuzo ku budde obutuufu okukulaakulanya omukwano. Abantu bangi beebuuza ensonga ki ezikulemberamu ebbanga ly'omukwano nga tebannakola kweyama kwa bbanga ddene.
ach_prompt: Alokaloka matye I kin dano me kare-ni ipol kare kelo lapeny I kom kare ma opore me dongo mar. Dano mapol gipenye kekengi ngo ma weko winye bedo pi kare malac ma peya gucako winye pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Aijulanakineta nuka eidicane loakwana eyangauni aingiseta nuikamunitos apak naedolit kanu aitolomun eidicane loajokan. Ipu itunga lu ejenete iboro luepedorete ayangaun apak na epaperone eringa iswamaun ainakina na apak naepol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea ewu curu'do 'diyi ma alea ri ni fe 'ba eyi ma zi sa'wa kililiru 'bani eyi ma eselea aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri ma dria. Ba karakara eyi osu e'yo a'duni fe 'ba eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea sa'wa ezu 'diyi ma dria raka de nga po'di eyi 'duni e'yo eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea sa'wa ezu ri ku.

eng_prompt: In many countries, the legal definition of a minor is crucial for understanding various laws and regulations. This classification typically includes individuals who have not yet reached adulthood.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nnyingi, ennyonyola y'omwana omuto mu mateeka nkulu nnyo mu kutegeera amateeka n'ebiragiro eby'enjawulo. Okusengeka kuno kutwaliramu abantu abatannatuuka mu bukulu.
ach_prompt: I lobe mapol, tyen lok me cik makwako kom latin obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me niang cik mapat-pat. Apoka-poka man ipol kare bedo iye dano ma pwod pe oo I mwaka gi.

lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani 'ba eli capiku 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru azita ndundu eyi vazu. Esele coza 'diri ma alia 'ba capi nga po'di 'ba 'wara 'diyi ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu mahanga maingi, okushoboorora kw'omuntu akiri muto omu biragiro n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kwetegyereza ebiragiro n'ebiragiro bitari bimwe na bimwe. Ekicweka eki nikitwariramu abantu abatakahikire omu myaka y'obukuru.

eng_prompt: In order to promote healthier families and better reproductive health, it is essential for parents to explore their options. Understanding the various family planning methods available can empower them to make informed choices.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula amaka amalamu n'obulamu obulungi obw'okuzaala, kya mugaso eri abazadde okunoonyereza ku ngeri zaabwe. Okutegeera enkola ez'enjawulo ez'ekizaalaggumba eziriwo kisobola okubawa amaanyi okusalawo obulungi.
ach_prompt: Pi tyelo kor yotkom me gang ki yotkom me nywal, pire tek tutwal ki lunyodo me neno yoo mapat-pat ma gitwero tic kwede. Niang yoo mapat-pat me lago nywal ma tye twero minigi kero me moko tam maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor angaleu naka ikalia keda angaleu naka aur, ejokuka auriak airereor aseununeta kec. Ajenun iwaitin lu ilukunere aur ingarakini kes aiswamaun aseununeta nu ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo familia eyi ma rua ala ma omgbo otuzu tualu e'yo anzi tiza ni 'diyi pie, eri orodriru tipika eyini geri eyini ecozu eyi 'yezu 'diyi ondazu. Geri ndundu anzi eyi ma esele cozu 'diyi ma vata eco fe eyini okpo e'yo 'duzu kililiru ra.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kutunguura amaka marungi n'amagara marungi g'okuzaara, n'eky'omugasho abazaire okushwijuma emiringo yaabo. Okwetegyereza emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okuteekateekyera amaka, nikibaasa kubahwera kucwamu gye.

eng_prompt: Despite significant progress in gender equality, many women continue to face alarming levels of violence in their daily lives. This pervasive issue affects individuals across various cultures and socioeconomic backgrounds.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu kwenkanankana kw'ekikula ky'abantu, abakyala bangi bakyasanga ebikolwa eby'obukambwe mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo. Ensonga eno ekutte buli wamu ekosa abantu mu buwangwa obw'enjawulo ne mu mbeera z'ebyenfuna ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni alokaloka madit otime I lok me bedo ki mon marom, mon mapol pud gitye ka nongo tim gero I rwom ma lamal tutwal I kwo gi me nino ducu. Peko man ma opong tutwal ni mako dano ma aa ki I tekwaro mapat-pat ki kabedo mapat-pat me lim.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai apol naepol noi kotoma airiamara naka ikiliok keda angor, eringa angor nuipu itereikina keda amumu naepol noi kotoma aijar kec naka nginiparan. Ationis na naepol noi itolitoli itunga lu atekerin nu egelegela keda lu edumunenete ikapun luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo drileba angiri agupi eyini aa'zu oku eyi pie trotro ri ma talasi, oku karakara eyi nga po'di e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi esu eyi ma edri eyivile o'du driasi. E'yo 'di ni 'ba eyi 'ye e'yo suruni ndundu 'diyi ma alea tualu geri robia esuzu ndundu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka y'amaani omu by'oburinganiza, abakazi baingi nibagumizamu nibateganisibwa omu mitwarize yaabo eya buriizooba. Enshonga egi erikujanjaara yoona neekwata aha bantu omu by'obuhangwa n'eby'entaasya ebitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: In many religious traditions, individuals are called to dedicate their lives to spiritual service. This commitment often leads to a formal process of ordination.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa bw'enzikiriza nnyingi, abantu bayitibwa okuwaayo obulamu bwabwe mu buweereza bw'eby'omwoyo. Okwewaayo kuno kutera okuvaako enkola entongole ey'okutongoza.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro me dini mapol, kilwongo dano me keto kwogi I tic me cwiny. Cikke man ipol kare kelo yub me wiro dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma odiinin luipu, isinyikokitai itunga aijaikin aijarakec toma aijaanakinio naka edini. Ainanakinet ngin eyangauni duc ainapeta nuka aitolomunio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aitanisi karakara 'diyi ma alia, 'ba 'ba yi omve yi ma idri owizu azi ngazu e'yo Munguniri ma alia. E'yo 'di ni tutuni fe 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu drice'ba eyi ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu buhangwa bw'ediini nyingi, abantu nibeetengwa kuhayo amagara gaabo omu buheereza bw'eby'omwoyo. Okwehayo oku nikukira kureetaho enkora y'okutongoza omu butongore.

eng_prompt: In many religious traditions, the process of ordination is a significant event that involves the laying on of hands and the invocation of spiritual authority. During this ceremony, senior church leaders play a crucial role in recognizing and empowering individuals for their ministerial duties.
lug_prompt: Mu nnono z'enzikiriza nnyingi, enkola y'okutongoza mukolo munene oguzingiramu okussa emikono n'okusaba obuyinza obw'omwoyo. Ku mukolo guno, abakulembeze b'ekkanisa abakulu bakola omulimu munene mu kusiima n'okutumbula abantu ku mirimu gyabwe egy'obuweereza.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro me dini mapol, yub me keto ngat moni itic obedo gin ma pire tek ma kwako keto cing ki lega bot lutela me cwiny. Ikare me yub man, lutela madongo me kanica gitiyo tic mapire tek tutwal me miyo pwoc ki kero ki dano pi tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio luipu luka idiinin, erai ainapeta nuka ainapeta nuepolok nuepedorete aitodolikin akanin keda ailip apedorosio nuka edini. Kotoma opucit kalo, iswamaete engarenok luapolok lu ekanisa aswam naepol noi kanu ajenun ka aitigogong itunga kanu aswam kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dini ni karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu drice'ba ru ri eri e'yo azi okporu 'bani eyi ma dria dri 'bazu drinia azini 'ba eyi ma ru eyi omvezu. Omu 'di ma alea, drice'ba kanisa ni okporu 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo 'ba azi 'diyi ma e'yo egazu azini okpo fezu azi eyivile 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu migyenzo mingi y'ediini, omuringo gw'okutongoza n'omukoro gw'omugasho ogurikutwariramu okuteeka engaro n'okushaba obushoborozi bw'eby'omwoyo. Omu mukoro ogu, abeebembezi b'ekanisa abakuru nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kusiima n'okutunguura abantu ahabw'emirimo yaabo y'obuheereza.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with distractions and competing priorities, it's essential to remember the significance of our spiritual commitments. As we navigate our daily lives, we must recognize the profound impact of our actions on our faith and community.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde ebiwugulaza n'okuvuganya, kya mugaso okujjukira obukulu bw'obweyamo bwaffe obw'omwoyo. Nga tutambula mu bulamu bwaffe obwa bulijjo, tuteekeddwa okutegeera engeri ebikolwa byaffe gye bikosaamu enzikiriza yaffe n'ekitundu kyaffe.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma opong ki jami ma dwoyo tam ki pyem I kom jami ma pigi tego, pire tek tutwal me poo I kom ber pa cikke wa me cwiny. Ka watye ka wot I kwowa me nino ducu, omyero waniang adwoki pa jami ma watimo I kom niye wa ki kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda iboro luipu luitegelikina, ejokuna aiitun ajokis naka ainakina wok naka Edeke. Kwape iboyete sio kotoma aijar wok naka nginiparan, ekot oni ajenun epone loepedoriata aswamisiowok aitolitol aiyuun wok keda atutubet wok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo ewaru azini e'yo a'bala 'yepi 'diyi pie tre, eri orodriru ama ma ega orodri e'yo amani 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Amani aa'ria idri amani o'du driasi ri ma alea, le ama ma esu e'yo amani 'ye 'diyi ma okpo aita amani 'diyi ma dria tualu ongulumu amani 'diyi pie ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire ebirikuturemesa hamwe n'ebi turikwenda kwebembeza, n'eky'omugasho kwijuka omugasho gw'okwehayo kwaitu omu by'omwoyo. Nk'oku turikugyenda omu magara gaitu aga buriizooba, twine kumanya oku ebikorwa byaitu birikukwata aha nyikiriza yaitu hamwe n'abantu b'omubyaro byaitu.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with challenges and distractions, it's essential to reflect on the values that guide our actions. Remember that your conduct can influence not only your own faith journey but also the lives of those around you.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde okusoomoozebwa n'ebiwugulaza, kya mugaso okufumiitiriza ku mpisa ezilambika ebikolwa byaffe. Jjukira nti enneeyisa yo tesobola kukosa lugendo lwo mu nzikiriza yokka naye era n'obulamu bw'abo abakwetoolodde.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki peko ki jami ma dwoyo tam pa dano, pire tek tutwal me tam I kom jami mabeco ma doro tic wa. Wii myero opo ni kit ma itye kwede pe twero kelo alokaloka i kom yub me niyee mamegi keken ento bene i kom kwo pa jo ma itye kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba keda atiokisio keda iboro luipu, ejokuna noi aomoom nuikamunitos iponesio luingarakinete oni. Kiituni ebe mam iponesiokon epedorete aitodolikin aijarakon bon konye kotoma aijar naka ngul luejaasi keda jo.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi pie tre, eri orodriru ama ma ega e'yo 'yeta amani 'diyi ma dri cepi 'diyi ma dria. Mi ma ega kini adriza miniri econi lu mi ma aci aita ma dria ri oja ku te 'ba mi agei 'diyi ma idri vini.

eng_prompt: Many spiritual teachings emphasize the value of hard work and self-sufficiency. In this context, it is often said that true fulfillment comes from engaging in meaningful labor.
lug_prompt: Enjigiriza z'eby'omwoyo nnyingi zissa essira ku mugaso gw'okukola ennyo n'okweyimirizaawo. Mu mbeera eno, kitera okugambibwa nti okumatizibwa okwa nnamaddala kuva mu kwenyigira mu mirimu egy'amakulu.
ach_prompt: Pwony me dini mapol cuko cwiny dano i kom ber pa tic matek kacel ki nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. I lok man, pol kare ki waco ni bedo ki yomcwiny me ada aa ki I timo tic ma tye ki tyen lok.
teo_prompt: Isisianakineta luipu luka Edeke itogogongitos ajokis naka aswam kagogong ka apedor. Kowai kalo, ebakai duc ebe aiyalama na abeit elomunit kotoma aswam na abeit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onitani karakara 'diyi okpo fe orodri azi ngaza okporu azini e'yo 'ba ma ngulupi ma ta mbazuri ma dria. E'yo 'di ma alea, 'ba sawa driasi 'yo kini ayiko a'da ri enga azi orodriru 'diyi 'yeria.

eng_prompt: In every task you undertake, strive to bring positivity and commitment to your efforts. Embrace the opportunity to contribute with enthusiasm and hard work.
lug_prompt: Mu buli mulimu gw'okola, fuba okuleeta ebirungi n'obumalirivu mu kaweefube wo. Twala omukisa okuwaayo n'obwagazi n'okukola ennyo.
ach_prompt: I tic mo keken ma itimo, tute matek me bedo ki neno maber ki keto cwiny I kom ticci. Jolo gum me miyo kony ki mit kom ki tic matek.

eng_prompt: In the beginning, God created the heavens and the earth, filling it with life and beauty. He entrusted humanity with a sacred responsibility to care for and govern His creation.
lug_prompt: Mu ntandikwa, Katonda yatonda eggulu n'ensi, n'agijjuza obulamu n'obulungi. Yakwasa abantu obuvunaanyizibwa obutukuvu okulabirira n'okufuga ebitonde bye.
