teo_prompt: Kageunet, abu Edeke kiswamau akuj keda akwap, abu kilelebun keda aijar keda aibuses. Abu ngesi ijaik itunga aswam najokan na aidar ka aipuga isuban luka Edeke.
lgg_prompt: E'doria, Mungu ede angu azini nyaku, idri be tre azini onyiru be tre. Eri fe 'ba ada eyini azi alatararu afa erini ede 'diyi ma tambazu azini eyi ma dricezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu ntandikwa, Ruhanga akahanga eiguru n'ensi, yaaijuza amagara n'oburungi. Akaheereza abantu obujunanizibwa bw'okureeberera n'okwebembera ebihangirwe bye.

eng_prompt: Every small act of kindness and service you perform can reflect your faith and devotion. Remember, even the simplest gestures can hold profound significance in the eyes of the divine.
lug_prompt: Buli kikolwa ekitono eky'ekisa n'obuweereza by'okola bisobola okulaga okukkiriza kwo n'okwewaayo kwo. Jjukira nti n'ebikolwa ebitonotono bisobola okuba eby'omugaso mu maaso ga katonda.
ach_prompt: Tic mo keken matidi me kica ki tic ma itimo twero nyutu ni itye ki niye ki woro. Wii opo ni, kadi wa lanyut matino tino twero bedo ki tyen lok madit tutwal I wang lubanga.
teo_prompt: Kangin aswamisioit na iponesio luajokak ka aijanakin na iswamai ijo itodunit aiyuun kon keda ainakina kon. Kiituni, araida iponesio ludidik epedorete ajaut keda ajokis naepol noi kama ejai Edeke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dria mini 'ye kililiru azini azi mini nga 'diyi eco e'da e'yo mini a'ita ma dria azini asi feza mini 'diyi ra. E'yo egazu, e'yo e'daza werea 'diyi eco ovu orodriru tu Mungu ma milea ra.
nyn_prompt: Buri kikorwa kikye ky'embabazi n'obuheereza eki orikukora nikibaasa kworeka okwikiriza kwawe n'okwehayo kwawe. Ijuka ngu n'obubonero bukye nibubaasa kuba obw'omugasho omu maisho ga Ruhanga.

eng_prompt: Every person possesses inherent dignity and worth, reflecting a divine essence within us. This profound truth unites humanity in a shared identity and purpose.
lug_prompt: Buli muntu alina ekitiibwa n'omugaso eby'obutonde, ebiraga ensibuko y'obwakatonda mu buli omu ku ffe. Amazima gano ag'omuggundu gagatta abantu mu bumanyirivu n'ekigendererwa eky'awamu.
ach_prompt: Dano acel-acel tye ki rwom me woro ki ber pa dano, ma nyutu kit pa lubanga matye i cwinygi. Lok ada man ma pire tek ni ribo dano weng I ngec acel ki miti acel.
teo_prompt: Nginitunganan ejaas keda aibuses keda ajokis, itodunitos iponesio luka Edeke kotoma oni. Abeit na naepol imorikikinit itunga kotoma ajenanut keda alosikinet.
lgg_prompt: Ba alu alu ma dria inzita azini orodri 'bani fele 'diyi ci, e'dapi e'yo onyiru ama ma alia 'diyi. E'yo ada okporu 'diri ti ecita eji 'ba ada eyi ma eselea e'yo eyi ma eselea azini e'yo eyi 'yezu tualu.
nyn_prompt: Buri muntu aine ekitiinisa n'omugasho, ekirikworeka oburungi bwa Ruhanga omuriitwe. Amazima aga, nigakwatanisa abantu omu myoga hamwe n'ekigyendererwa kimwe.

eng_prompt: Ensuring a healthy and nurturing environment is essential for a child's development. It is crucial to prioritize their well-being and support their growth.
lug_prompt: Okuteekawo embeera ennungi era ennungi kya mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana y'omwana. Kikulu nnyo okukulembeza obulungi bwabwe n'okuwagira enkulaakulana yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki kabedo maber me dongo pa lutino pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa lutino. Pire tek tutwal me keto ber bedo gi obed gin ma pire tek dok me konyo dongo gi.
teo_prompt: Aibwaikin aiboisit na ejok ka najokan ejok kanu apolo na ikoku. Erai ibore yenepol noi aisingarenit aijar kec ka aigangit apolokec.
lgg_prompt: Angu alata azini imbata fezu ri ma tambaza eri orodriru mva ma zota ni. Eri orodriru e'yo eyini aa'zu muke ri 'duzu okporu azini atita fezu eyini zozu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu hariho embeera nungi n'obwegyendesereza n'eky'omugasho omu kukura kw'omwana. N'eky'omugasho kwebembeza eby'amagara gaabo n'okubahwera okukura.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with uncertainty and moral dilemmas, the role of spiritual guidance becomes increasingly vital. As intermediaries between the divine and the community, these leaders play a crucial part in fostering understanding and compassion.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde obutali bukakafu n'ebizibu by'empisa, omulimu gw'obulagirizi obw'omwoyo gweyongera okuba omukulu. Ng'abatabaganya wakati w'obwakatonda n'abantu, abakulembeze bano bakola omulimu omukulu mu kutumbula okutegeera n'okusaasira.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma opong ki peko me kwo, tic pa lutela me cwiny tye ka doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Lutela magi gitiyo tic mapire tek tutwal me kelo niang ki kica ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba keda amamus ajenanut ka atiokisio nuka iponesio, epol noi ajokis naka aingarenikin itunga koipone kalo ajokan. Kwape arucokina kiding Edeke keda itunga, iswamaete engarenok lu aswam naepol noi kotoma aitopoloria aitiakatiaka keda aitim.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo 'bani ega kokoru azini e'yo onzi 'diyi pie, azi driceza e'yo aitanisi 'diyiniri eca curu'do orodriru. Ekile 'ba e'yo Munguni azini ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ru, drice'ba 'diyi azi okporu 'ye vata azini asi ndriza ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire obutetegyerezibwa hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'emitwarize, omurimo gw'obwebembezi bw'eby'omwoyo nigweyongyera kuba ogw'omugasho. Abebembezi aba, nk'abarikuhikaanisa Ruhanga n'abantu, nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kureetaho okwetegyerezana n'embabazi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to ensure that everyone's voice was heard, the local leaders organized a series of town hall meetings. They wanted to gather input and address any concerns from the community before making their final decision.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube okulaba nti eddoboozi lya buli omu liwulirwa, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baategeka enkiiko eziwerako mu town hall. Baayagala okukungaanya ebirowoozo n'okukola ku nsonga zonna okuva mu bantu nga tebannasalawo.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me neno ni dwon pa dano weng owinye, lutela me tedero guyubu kacoke mapol I town hall. Gubedo ki miti me gamo tam ki tam pa lwak mapwod pe gumoko tam gi me agiki.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe epupiata itunga kere, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kitemokisi airiamununeta nuipu. Akotosi kesi atukun aomisio ka aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga eringa itolomuna aseunetekec nawasia.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ra kini 'ba dria ma o'duko eri ra, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu mitingi tawuni hall ru 'diyi karakara. Eyi le ndra e'yo eyi tra engazu ongulumu eyivu e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi ma aza ko de nga po'di eyi 'duni e'yo asizuri ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureeba ngu buri omwe ahurira eiraka rye, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakatebekanisa enkiiko nyingi. Bakaba nibenda kurundaana ebiteiso n'okukora aha nshonga zoona kuruga omu bantu batakacwiremu.

eng_prompt: Investing in new projects requires careful planning and resources. Without adequate funding and a commitment to the process, progress can be slow and challenging.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu pulojekiti empya kyetaagisa okuteekateeka n'obwegendereza n'ebikozesebwa. Awatali buyambi bumala n'obumalirivu mu nkola, enkulaakulana eyinza okuba mpola ate nga nzibu.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I yub manyen mito yub ki jami ma mite. Labongo cente ma oromo ki keto cwiny I kom yub eni, dongo lobo twero bedo mot dok tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma opurojektin luitetiak ekot aitemonokin ejok keda iboro. Arai emamei ikapun luedolitos keda ainakina toma ainapeta ngun, epedori apol aiyap ido etiono noi.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu otita o'diru 'diyi ma alia le otuta kililiru azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi. Robia feza kililiru azini asi 'baza e'yo nde ma dria ri kokoru, angu ezoma ni nga ovu e'yere azini ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Okuta esente omu purogyekiti ensya nikyetenga enteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza hamwe n'ebintu. Hatariho sente ezirikumara hamwe n'okwehayo omu nkora, entunguuka neebaasa kutwara obwire bukye kandi egumire.

eng_prompt: Urban infrastructure requires constant upkeep and investment. As populations grow and demands increase, the financial burden on city budgets becomes more pronounced.
lug_prompt: Ebikozesebwa mu bibuga byetaaga okulabirirwa buli kaseera n'okusiga ensimbi. Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu gweyongera n'obwetaavu bweyongera, omugugu gw'ensimbi ku mbalirira y'ekibuga gweyongera.
ach_prompt: Gedo mapat-pat me boma mito gwok ki keto lim I tic kare ki kare. Ka wel dano tye ka medde ki miti me jami bene tye ka mede, peko me lim I kom byek me lim pa citi tye kamede.
teo_prompt: Ekotos aiboisio nuka itaunin aidar duc ka aipikakin ikapun. Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga keda eipuda lo itunga, epolor noi ationis naka ikapun kotoma obajet loka eibuga.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru tawuni eyi ma alea 'diyi le 'ba ma mba eyi ma ta sa'wa driasi dika le 'ba ma 'ba robia eyi sa'wa driasi. O'bi ma kalafe ni tuzu azini afa 'bani le 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tuzu, e'yo robia ni aku ambo eyi ma bajeti eyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebyombeko by'omu ndembo nibyetenga okureebererwa buri kaire hamwe n'okutamu sente. Omuhendo gw'abantu ku gurikweyongyera n'ebyetaago kweyongyera, oburemeezi bw'esente aha mbariirira y'orurembo nibweyongyera.

eng_prompt: Urban planning requires careful consideration of land use and infrastructure development. To accommodate future growth and transportation needs, municipalities often designate specific areas for road reserves.
lug_prompt: Okuteekateeka ebibuga kyetaagisa okulowooza ennyo ku nkozesa y'ettaka n'enkulaakulana y'ebizimbe. Okukola ku byetaago by'enkulaakulana n'entambula mu biseera eby'omu maaso, munisipaali zitera okuteekawo ebifo eby'enjawulo eby'okuterekamu enguudo.
ach_prompt: Yubu boma mito ni myero ki tam matut i kom tic ki ngom ki dongo gedo mapatpat. Me gwoko dongo lobo I kare me anyim ki miti me wot, municipality ipol kare giyero kabedo mapat-pat me gwoko gudi.
teo_prompt: Aitemonokin itaunin ekot aomoom ejok nuka aitwasam alupok keda aitopol iboro. Kanu aitodolikin apol keda eipud loka elose koingaren, etapit municipality aitemokin aiboisio nuka irotin.
lgg_prompt: Le 'ba ma ega e'yo e'yo nyaku ayuza ma dria azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ezoza ma dria ra. E'yo zota ewu drialeri ma alea azini e'yo acipa ni 'diyi ma aza kozu, munisipaliti eyi sa'wa driasi angu ndundu eyi ope nzila eyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Entebekanisa y'endembo neeyetenga okuteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza aha nkoresa y'eitaka hamwe n'okutunguura ebyombeko. Okuhikiiriza ebyetaago by'entunguka n'eby'engyenda omu biro by'omumaisho, munisiparite nizikira kutaho emyanya y'okukoreramu enguuto.

eng_prompt: In many situations, open communication and understanding can lead to peaceful resolutions. It’s important to recognize that conflict can often be resolved without resorting to violence.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera nnyingi, okwogera mu bwesimbu n'okutegeeragana bisobola okuviirako okugonjoolwa mu mirembe. Kikulu okukimanya nti obukuubagano busobola okugonjoolwa awatali kukozesa ffujjo.
ach_prompt: I kare mapol, lok kacel ki niang maber twero kelo tyeko lok I kuc. Pire tek tutwal me niang ni lweny ipol kare kitwero tyeko labongo tic ki gero.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loepol, einer loepukora ka acamanar epedori ayangaun aitemokineta nuka aipuc. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun ebe epedorio aitemokin ingungeta komam aitwasam amumu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo nzeza azini vata kililiru ri eco fe e'yo eyi ma aza ko asianzu si ra. Eri orodriru nizu kini 'ba eco e'yo eyi ma aza ko e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi si ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu mbeera nyingi, okuhurizagana n'okwetegyerezana, nikibaasa kureetaho obusingye. N'eky'omugasho kumanya ngu entongane nizibaasa kukorwaho hatariho butabanguko.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive world, the choices we make during our formative years can significantly impact our lives. Therefore, it is essential for young people to dedicate themselves to their goals and aspirations.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'okuvuganya, okusalawo kwe tukola mu myaka gyaffe egy'okutendekebwa kusobola okukosa ennyo obulamu bwaffe. N'olwekyo, kikulu nnyo abavubuka okwewaayo eri ebiruubirirwa byabwe n'ebiruubirirwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: I lobo me pyem matek me kare-ni, tam ma wamoko ikare ma watye ka dongo twero gudo kwo wa tutwal. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal pi bulu me keto cwiny gi i kom yub gi ki miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap nalolo naepol abolobol, aseununeta nuiswama oni kotoma apakio nu idwe epedorete aitolitol aijar wok. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna atumunak aswam kagogongu kanu aitodolikin apeleikinata kec keda apeleikinata kec.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia a'bala ma alia, e'yo amani 'du eli ama vile onitaniri ma alia 'diyi eco ama ma idri oja ra. Ka'dini, eri orodriru 'ba ode eyini eyi owizu e'yo eyini lele 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu okuhayahayana, ebiturikucwamu tukiri bato nibibaasa kukora kihango aha magara gaitu. N'ahabw'ekyo, nikikuru munonga eminyeeto okwehayo aha bigyendererwa n'ebigyendererwa byabo.

eng_prompt: Empowering young people with the right skills is essential for fostering entrepreneurship. By providing training and resources, we can enable them to take charge of their futures.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula abavubuka n'obukugu obutuufu kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula eby'obusuubuzi. Nga tubawa okutendekebwa n'ebikozesebwa, tusobola okubasobozesa okwetikka ebiseera byabwe eby'omumaaso.
ach_prompt: Miyo diro ki bulu obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me dongo biacara. I yoo me miyo pwony ki jami ma mite, watwero konyogi me doro anyim gi.
teo_prompt: Aitogogong atumunak keda acoa najokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor agwelanar. Kowai lo aijaikin kes aitutuoro keda iboro, ipedori oni aingarakin kes ayait kes koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Ba ode eyini okpo fezu ondua kililiru 'diyisi ri eri orodriru tujari 'yezu. Imbata feza azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi si, ama eco eyi ma okpo fe eyini eyini ani eyi ma ewu drialeri ma ta mbazu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwegyesa eminyeeto emyoga ehikire n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'obushubuzi. Twabahereza okutendekwa n'eby'okukoresa, nitubaasa kubahwera kwebembera ebiro byabo by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: Effective communication is essential for the success of any government initiative. By ensuring that citizens are well-informed, the government can foster greater participation and support for its programs.
lug_prompt: Empuliziganya ennungi ya mugaso mu buwanguzi bw'enteekateeka ya gavumenti yonna. Nga kakasa nti bannansi bategeezeddwa bulungi, gavumenti esobola okutumbula okwetaba n'obuwagizi eri pulogulaamu zaayo.
ach_prompt: Kube maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti pa gamente. I neno ni anywali tye ki ngec muromo, gamente twero weko dano mapol bedo tye ki cwak pi yub megge.
teo_prompt: Einer loajokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut naka apugan. Kowai lo aanyun ebe ejenete itunga akiro, epedori apugan aitopolor ajaut keda agangat mama ejaasi ainapeta ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru ri eri orodriru e'yo dria gameteni 'diyi ma drile suza ni. Geri 'bani nezu ra kini kari anzi eyi ni e'yo eyi ma dria kililiru risi, gamete eco e'yo 'ba eyini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo otu dika atita fe otita eyini 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuhurizagana kurungi n'okw'omugasho ahabw'obusinguzi bw'enteekateeka ya gavumenti yoona. Gavumenti erikureeba ngu abatuuragye bamanyisibwa kurungi, neebaasa kureetaho okwejumba n'obushagiki omu puroguraamu zaayo.

eng_prompt: Our organization has expanded its operations significantly in recent years. As a result, we have several divisions in Uganda.
lug_prompt: Ekitongole kyaffe kigaziye nnyo emirimu gyakyo mu myaka egiyise. N'ekivuddemu, tulina enjawukana nnyingi mu Uganda.
ach_prompt: Dul megwa omedo ticgi tutwal I mwaki ma okato ni. Macalo adwogi ne, watye ki dul mapat-pat I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Apolor erionget wok aswamuke kotoma okar lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, ija oni keda atutubena nuipu ko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Amuti amavileri edri azi erini 'diyi ma ongmbo angiri eli agapi 'diyi ma alia. E'yo 'disi, ama vu esele coza kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi karakara.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore kyaitu kyongyeire amaani omu mirimo yakyo omu myaka egi. N'ekyarugiremu, twine ebibiina bitari bimwe na bimwe omu Uganda.

eng_prompt: Before the construction could begin, the planning committee finalized the boundaries for the new development. All stakeholders were informed of the designated areas to ensure a smooth transition.
lug_prompt: Nga okuzimba tekunnatandika, akakiiko akakola ku nteekateeka kaamaliriza ensalo z'enkulaakulana empya. Abakwatibwako bonna baategeezebwa ku bifo ebyalondebwa okulaba ng'enkyukakyuka egenda bulungi.
ach_prompt: Mapwod tic me gedo pe ocake, dul ma doro lok kom gedo gumoko wang lobo me dongo lobo manyen. Kimiyo ngec bot joo weng matye ki twero i kom kabedo ma kicimo me neno ni aloka-loka eni otimme maber.
teo_prompt: Erongo aduko egeuna, apotu ekomiti loka aitemonokin kongetakisi ikoruo luka apol naitetet. Aponi olimokinai itunga kere nuikamunitos aiboisio nu eseunitai kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna aijulanakineta.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di e'doni afa siza e'doni ku, komiti otita eyi o'bapi 'diyi asi boda angu ezoma o'diru 'da ni 'diyi ma dria. Ba lu 'ba ambo dria yi dri e'yo angu 'bani ope 'diyi ma dria e'yo ojaza kililiru ri nezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'okwombeka gutakatandikire, akakiiko k'eby'enteekateeka kakaheza kukora ensharo z'entunguuka ensya. Boona abu kirikukwataho bakamanyisibwa ebikwatireine n'emyanya eteirweho kureeba ngu habaho empinduka nungi.

eng_prompt: Every choice we face carries weight, shaping the path we walk. It's essential to consider the long-term effects of our actions.
lug_prompt: Buli kusalawo kwe twolekaganye nakwo kulina obuzito, okukola ekkubo lye tutambuliramu. Kya mugaso okulowooza ku biva mu bikolwa byaffe mu bbanga eggwanvu.
ach_prompt: Moko tam weng ma watye kwede tye ki peko madit tutwal, ma yubu yoo ma watye ka lubu. Pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom adwogi ma jami ma watimo twero kelo ikare malac.
teo_prompt: Kangol aseunet na itereikina keda oni epol ajokis, ido itopoloori epone loebeitor oni alosit. Erai ibore yenepol noi aomoom nuepedorete aswamisio wok ayangaun apak naepol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dria amani 'dule 'diyi ma okpo ci, geri amani acizu 'diyi ma e'yo 'ba. Eri orodriru ama ma ega e'yo amani 'ye sawa ezu ma alia 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Buri ncwamu ei turikubaasa kukora eine eki erikukora aha mihanda ei turikukuratira. N'eky'omugasho okureeba ebirikubaasa kuruga omu bikorwa byaitu.

eng_prompt: In matters of legal disputes, it is essential to establish the authority of the judiciary. This ensures that all parties involved adhere to the rule of law and respect the decisions made by the court.
lug_prompt: Mu nsonga z'obukuubagano bw'amateeka, kya mugaso okuteekawo obuyinza bw'ekitongole ekiramuzi. Kino kikakasa nti enjuyi zonna ezikwatibwako zigoberera enfuga y'amateeka n'okussa ekitiibwa mu kusalawo okukolebwa kkooti.
ach_prompt: I lok me laro lok me cik, pire tek tutwal me keto twero pa lungol kop. Man weko dano weng malube ki lok eni lubu cik dok giworo tam ma kot omoko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ingungeta luka ikisila, ejokuna aitolomun apedorosio nuka ikatubok. Itodunit ngin ebe ibusakinit itunga kere atupakinit ikisila ka ayongite aseununeta nuka ekooti.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azita ma dria 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru okpo 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ma dria ri e'dozu. Diri ne ra kini 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alia 'diyi nga azita ma vuti obi azini inzi e'yo dwani ni 'dule 'diyi inzi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nshonga z'empaka z'ebiragiro, ni kikuru kutaho obushoborozi bw'ekitongore ekiramuzi. Eki nikihamya ngu enjuyi zoona ezirikukwatwaho nizikuratira ebiragiro kandi ziheereze ekitiinisa okusharamu okwakozirwe kooti.

eng_prompt: Before a law enforcement officer can execute a search or arrest, they must obtain a warrant from a judge. This process ensures that there is probable cause for the action being taken.
lug_prompt: Nga abakuumaddembe tebannakola kunoonya oba kukwata, balina okufuna ekiragiro okuva eri omulamuzi. Enkola eno ekakasa nti waliwo ekiyinza okuvaako ekikolwa ekikolebwa.
ach_prompt: Mapwod abili ma gwoko cik pe otimo kwed onyo mako dano, omyero kong gunong waraga kibot langol kop. Yub man neno ni tyen lok ma oweko kitimo gin moni tye.
teo_prompt: Erongo engarenon lo ikisila epedori aikamun itunganan, ibusakinit kesi adumun awaranta kama ejai atubon. Itodunit ngin ebe ejai alosikinet naka aswamisioit ngin.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi econi 'ba eyi ma ale andri kani ku eyi obi ku, le eyi ma esu waraga 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ma dria ri engazu 'ba e'yo lipiri vu. Geri 'di ni ne ra kini e'yo 'bani 'ye 'da ma e'yo ci.
nyn_prompt: Ofiisa w'ebiragiro atakakozire okukyondooza nainga okukwata, ashemereire kutunga ekihandiiko kuruga aha muramuzi. Enkora egi neehamya ngu hariho oburemeezi oburikubaasa kureetaho ekikorwa.

eng_prompt: After careful review of the candidate's background, it became clear that there were significant legal issues involved. This raised concerns about their suitability for the position.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya n'obwegendereza ebyafaayo by'omuntu eyeesimbyewo, kyeyoleka bulungi nti waaliwo ensonga z'amateeka ez'amaanyi ezaalimu. Kino kyaleetawo okweraliikirira ku bisaanyizo byabwe eby'ekifo.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo lok matut I kom kwo pa lacungu ne, onen atyer kamaleng ni lok me cik mapigi tego obedo tye. Man okelo lworo I kom rwom gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor akiro nuikamunitos akiro nuikamunitos abwoan, aponi kojenunai ebe ejaasi akiro nuepolok nuikamunitos ikisila. Abu ngin koyangau aiyalongong kanu ebe edolitos kesi kanuka adoketait ngin.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo 'ba pa tupi 'da ma driari ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, eca kililiru kini e'yo azita ni okporu 'diyi ci. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza eyi ma dria e'yo eyini ecozu aa'zu pari 'da ma alea ra ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza ebyafaayo by'oyesimbireho, kikarebeka butunu ngu hakaba hariho enshonga z'amaani omu biragiro. Eki kikareetaho okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'obuhikire bwabo aha ntebe.

eng_prompt: In the courtroom, various factors influence the decision-making process of judges. Understanding the criteria they use can shed light on the complexities of legal judgments.
lug_prompt: Mu kkooti waliwo ebintu bingi ebireetera abalamuzi okusalawo. Okutegeera emitendera gye bakozesa kisobola okuwa ekitangaala ku buzibu bw'ensala z'amateeka.
ach_prompt: I ot kot, jami mapol tye ma weko lungol kop moko tamgi. Niang kit ma gitiyo kwede twero konyo me niang kit ma ngolo kop mapat-pat obedo tek kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okooti, ipu iboro lu itolomunenete aseununeta nuka ikatubok. Ajenun iwaitin lu itwasamaete kesi epedori aitemokin ationis na etube lo ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Kotia, e'yo ndundu eyi e'yo 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi ni pe 'diyi ma dria. E'yo yini ayu 'diyi ma vata vazu ri eco e'yo ewaru e'yo liza azita ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma aza ko ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kooti, ebintu bingi nibireetera abaramuzi kukora encwamu. Okwetegyereza engyenderwaho ezi barikukoresa nikibaasa kworeka oburemeezi oburi omu kucwa emanja.

eng_prompt: All legal documents pertaining to the case need to be filed promptly. Ensure that you follow the proper procedures for submission.
lug_prompt: Ebiwandiiko byonna eby'amateeka ebikwata ku musango birina okuweebwayo mu bwangu. Kakasa nti ogoberera emitendera emituufu egy'okuwaayo.
ach_prompt: Omyero kicwal waraga weng makwako lok eni oyot oyot. Nen ni ilubu yoo matir me cwalo tic.
teo_prompt: Iwadikaeta kere nu ikisila nu ikamunitos emusago ngol ekot aipikakin katipet. Koany ebe itupit ijo nutupitono kanu aijukar iboro.
lgg_prompt: Le 'ba ma si kokobi dria e'yo 'da ma dria 'diyi mbeleru. Le mi ma ne ra kini mi azita kililiru 'bani 'ba eyi ma ti pezu 'diyi ma vuti obi.
nyn_prompt: Ebihandiiko by'ebiragiro ebirikukwata aha mushango, bishemereire kuhebwayo ahonaaho. Reeba ngu okuratira engyenderwaho nungi y'okuheereza.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, access to justice is a fundamental principle that ensures individuals can seek redress for grievances. This access is enshrined in law, allowing citizens to challenge decisions and protect their rights.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, okufuna obwenkanya kya mugaso ekikakasa nti abantu basobola okunoonya okutereezebwa olw'okwemulugunya kwabwe. Enkola eno eri mu mateeka, ekkiriza bannansi okuwakanya okusalawo n'okukuuma eddembe lyabwe.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, nongo ngol matir obedo gin ma pire tek ma weko dano acel acel nongo yoo me cobo peko gi. Man tye I cik ma weko anywali twero kwero tam ma kimoko ki gwoko twero gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naeyait apugan, adumunun etube loajokan erai ainapeta nuepedorete aanyun ebe epedorete itunga aitemokin ationisikec. Ejaasi akiro ngun toma okisila, icamakinit itunga aitepeg aseununeta ka ayuarite apedorosiokec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, e'yo liza kililiru ri ma esuta eri e'yo azi okporu 'ba alu alu eyini ecozu geri ndazu e'yo eyi ma dria ra ni i. Driwala 'diri 'ba azita ma alia, fe kari anzi eyini e'yo 'dule 'diyi a'dazu azini drilemgbo eyini 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki, okutunga oburingaaniza n'omusingye ogurikworeka ngu abantu nibabaasa kushaba obuhwezi ahabw'okwetomboitwa kwabo. Okuhika aha nshonga egi kiri omu biragiro, ekirikwikiriza abatuuragye kuhakanisa ebiteiso n'okurinda obugabe bwabo.

eng_prompt: In cases where there is sufficient evidence to suggest a crime has been committed, law enforcement may seek judicial approval. This legal process ensures that individuals are not deprived of their liberty without just cause.
lug_prompt: Mu misango nga waliwo obujulizi obumala okulaga nti omusango gukoleddwa, abakwasisa amateeka bayinza okunoonya olukusa okuva mu kkooti. Enkola eno ey'amateeka ekakasa nti abantu tebaggibwako ddembe lyabwe awatali nsonga ntuufu.

eng_prompt: The practice of forcing young girls into marriage is a violation of their rights and well-being. It is crucial to take a stand against such harmful traditions that perpetuate inequality and abuse.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'okukaka abawala abato okufumbirwa etyoboola eddembe lyabwe n'obulamu bwabwe. Kya mugaso nnyo okwesimbawo ku bulombolombo obw'obulabe bwe butyo obuyimirizaawo obutali bwenkanya n'okutulugunyizibwa.
ach_prompt: Yub me diyo anyira matino me donyo I nyom obedo turu twero gi ki ber bedo gi. Pire tek tutwal me cung matek i kom tim maraco ma kelo apoka-poka ki nywaro dano.
teo_prompt: Aswamisioit naka abuikin apesur nudidika adukonokin erai aibil apedorosio kec keda aijar kec. Erai ibore yenepol noi aitepeg inonosio luarokok lu eyangaununete atiakatiaka keda aitisiliario.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ezoanzi nyiri eyi omizu aje ma alea ri eri e'yo 'bani eyi ma drilemgbo azini aa'ta muke ri ezazu. Eri orodriru tu pa a'di 'dizu e'yo onzi 'dile 'diyi ma dria ecopi e'yo esele coza ni azini candi fepi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omuze gw'okugyemesereza abaishiki bato omu bushwere, n'okutoroboza obugabe bwabo n'amagara gaabo. N'eky'omugasho kurwanisa emichwe mibi nk'egyo erikureetaho obutaingana n'okunyangarazibwa.

eng_prompt: During a recent town hall meeting, residents expressed their growing concerns about rising crime rates and the impact of violence on families. In response to these urgent pleas, the minister vowed to take action.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko olwatudde mu town hall gyebuvuddeko, abatuuze baalaze obweraliikirivu bwabwe olw'obumenyi bw'amateeka obweyongera n'engeri obutabanguko gye bukosaamu amaka. Ng'ayanukula okusaba kuno okw'amangu, minisita yeeyama okubaako ky'akolawo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke ma otime cokcok-ki I town hall, lutedero gunyutu lworo gi I kom medde pa timo bal ki adwoki me tim gero I kom gangi. I kare ma minista odok I lega magi, en ocikke me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka etogo loka etaun, apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongosiokec kanu aiyatakin naka abilibilio naka ikisila keda amumu naka ikalia. Kanu abongokin ailipasinei nu atipet, abu eminista isumun aswam ibore.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi aku ambu town hall niri ma alea ri ma alea, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo azita onyoza ni tupi tutu ri ma dria tualu e'yo ngiringiri ni familia eyi ma eselea ri pie. Omvitaniri ma omvitaniri ma omvitaniria, minisita so oyo e'yo 'yezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko orwabaireho omu town hall, abatuuragye bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire hamwe n'obutabanguko omu maka. Omu kugarukamu okushaba oku okw'ahonaaho, minisita akaraganisa kugira eki yaakora.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the growing concerns surrounding substance abuse, the local council has decided to take action. They believe that engaging the village elders will be crucial in addressing this issue effectively.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya okweraliikirira okweyongera okwekuusa ku kukozesa ebiragalalagala, akakiiko k'ekyalo kasazeewo okubaako kye kakolawo. Balowooza nti okukwataganya abakadde b'oku kyalo kijja kuba kya mugaso nnyo mu kukola ku nsonga eno obulungi.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo pi peko me nywaro tic ki yadi. Gitye ki niyee ni winye pa ludito me caro bibedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me cobo peko eni maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun aiyalongong naepol noi naka aimat ikee luitemerete, abu ekansulo loka atutubet koseu aswam ngun. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aimorikikin engarenok lu ocaalo erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitemokin ationis na ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo aro onzi 'diyi ma ayuza ma dria 'diyi ma e'yo egazu 'bori ma e'yosi, kanisulu angu 'da ma alea ri asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'yezu. Yi ai ra kini e'yo 'ba 'wara caloa 'diyi ma eselea ri ni nga ovu orodriru e'yo 'di ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi obweyongyeire omu kukozesa emibazi erikutokooza obwonko,akakiiko k'ekyaro kashaziremu kugira eki kakozireho. Nibateekateeka ngu okwetabamu abakuru b'ebyaro nikiija kuba eky'omugasho omu kukora aha nshonga egi kurungi.

eng_prompt: Many individuals find themselves in difficult situations where they fear the consequences of speaking out. This hesitation can stem from a variety of factors, including societal stigma and a lack of trust in the authorities.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi beesanga mu mbeera enzibu nga batya ebiva mu kwogera. Okubuusabuusa kuno kuyinza okuva ku nsonga ez'enjawulo, omuli okuvumwavumwa mu kitundu n'obuteesiga b'obuyinza.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol nongo gi ikare me peko ma gilworo adwogi ne ka giloko. Lworo man twero aa ki I kom jami mapat-pat, ma I kingi obedo cayo dano ki bedo peke ki gen I kom lutela.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu ewanyunitos kesi kotoma ojautene loetiono noi loekuriaka kesi nuepedorete alomun. Atiakatiaka na epedori alomun kotoma akiro nuegelegela, aimoriarit aibucaret kotunga keda amamus amunokina apedorosio.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi eyi esu eyi e'yo ewaru eyi ma alea eyini orisi e'yo nzezu e'yo eyi ma dria risi. Asi otiza 'diri eco e'do e'yo karakara eyi si, ekile 'bani 'ba eyi edezu ongulumu eyi ma alea, dika 'ba eyi ma asi 'bazu 'ba okpo e'iru 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibeshanga omu mbeera zigumire, barikutiina ebireije kuruga omu kugamba. Okwerarikirira oku nikubaasa kurugirira aha bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe, otwariiremu okushekyerera abantu hamwe n'obuteesiga ab'obushoborozi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing awareness of the prevalence and impact of gender-based violence in our communities. It is crucial for law enforcement to take proactive measures to address this issue effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okumanyisibwa okweyongera ku bungi n'ebikosa obutabanguko obwesigamiziddwa ku kikula mu bitundu byaffe. Kya mugaso nnyo abakuumaddembe okukola ku nsonga eno mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol dong gungeyo ni tim gero ikin mon ki coo tye mapol tutwal I kabedo wa. Pire tek tutwal ki dul ma gwoko cik me tic matek me tyeko lok man maber.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aijen naepol noi naikamunit amumu na okalia kotoma atutubena wok. Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga lu ikisila aitolomun iwaitin lu epedorete aitemokin ationis na ejok.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi ma mile tu e'yo ngiringiri agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie ri ma omgbo ni ri ma dria. Eri orodriru 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ni e'yo 'di ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu beeyongyeire kumanya oburemeezi n'oburemeezi oburikuruga omu kikura ky'abantu omu byanga byaitu. N'eky'omugasho ab'eby'obutegyeki okukora aha nshonga egi kurungi.

eng_prompt: In many societies, traditional practices and beliefs continue to exert a powerful influence on personal choices. As a result, some cultural institutions perpetuate harmful customs that undermine individual rights and freedoms.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, enkola n'enzikiriza z'obuwangwa zikyagenda mu maaso n'okukosa okusalawo kw'omuntu. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'ebyobuwangwa ebimu bikyagoberera obulombolombo obw'obulabe obutyoboola eddembe n'eddembe ly'omuntu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, cik me tekwaro ki niyee pud tye ki adwoki madit tutwal I kom moko tam pa ngat acel acel. Macalo adwogi ne, dul me tekwaro mukene tye ki tekwaro ma balo twero ki bedo agonya pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atekerin nuipu, inyikokinitos iponesio luka einono keda aiyuunikec aitodolikin aseununeta nuka itunga. Kanuka ngun, iswamaete atukono ace nuka inonosio nuepedorete amunar apedorosio keda ailajara naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo a'bini a'ita eyi pie ri ni nga po'di okpo fe e'yo 'ba eyi ma ngulupi ni pe 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, angu e'yo suruni 'diyi ni 'diyi ma azi eyi e'yo onzi 'yepi drilemgbo azini driwala 'ba alu alu ni 'diyi ma dria ku 'diyi 'ye.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu baingi, engyenderwaho n'enyikiriza z'obuhangwa nibigumizamu n'omugasho gw'amaani aha bi omuntu arikucwamu. N'ekyarugiremu, ebitongore by'obuhangwa ebimwe nibigumizamu n'emigyenzo y'akabi erikushiisha obugabe n'obugabe bw'abantu.

eng_prompt: After a heated argument at the party, she publicly criticized him in front of their friends. Feeling humiliated and enraged, he confronted her when they got home.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuyomba ennyo ku kabaga, yamunenya mu lujjudde mu maaso ga mikwano gyabwe. Olw'okuwulira ng'aswazibwa era ng'anyiize, yamukambuwalira bwe baatuuka awaka.
ach_prompt: Inge laro lok matek tutwal I kare me kwer, en okok I kome I nyim luremgi I dye lwak. Ki lewic ki akemo, en openye I kare ma guo gang.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka epeget loepol noi kotoma opucit, abu ngesi kitoron ngesi kama ejaasi ipaperokec. Apupio ngesi aibucaret keda anyunyura, abu ngesi kiner keda ngesi neadolunia kesi ore.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako okporu omu 'da ma alea 'bori ma vutia, eri ede eri o'bi eyi ma eselea eyi ma agyipi eyi ma eselea. Erini i etumu drinzaru azini aokosi, eri e'yo nze eri be yini ecazu akua 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhajaana aha mbaga, akamuhorereza omu maisho ga banywani baabo. Ahabw'okushwara n'ekiniga, akamuhakanisa ku baahikire omuka.

eng_prompt: To ensure compliance with local regulations and promote responsible drinking, it is essential for establishments serving alcohol to maintain transparency with local authorities. This will help create a safer community environment for residents and visitors alike.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa okugobererwa kw'ebiragiro by'ekitundu n'okutumbula okunywa mu ngeri ey'obuvunaanyizibwa, kya mugaso nnyo ebifo ebigabula omwenge okukuuma obwerufu n'ab'obuyinza b'ekitundu. Kino kijja kuyamba okutondawo embeera y'obukuumi mu kitundu eri abatuuze n'abagenyi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni lubu cik me tedero ki tyelo kor mato kongo, obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi kacato kongo me bedo ki ada ki lutela me tedero. Man bikonyo me yubu kabedo maber pi lutedero ki wele.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe etupitai ikisila luka atutubet ka aitopoloritor aimat ajon, ejokuka aiboisio nu ijanakino ajon ajaut keda eswamae lo ecai keda apedorosio nuka atutubet. Ingarakini ngin aitolomun aiboisit na eyuara kanejaas itunga keda ipejok.
lgg_prompt: Lezu 'ba ma obi azita angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma vuti azini lezu ewa mvuza kililiru ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru angu ewa awapi 'diyi ma aa e'yo ada be drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie. Diri nga azakoma fe angu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini azini omu eyini 'diyini aa'zu ageitema be.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu ebiragiro by'ebyaro nibikuratirwa, n'okureetaho okunywa okurikwetengwa, n'eky'omugasho amaju agarikuguza amaarwa, kugira amazima n'ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro. Eki nikiija kuhwera omu kureetaho obusingye omu bantu n'abagyenyi.

eng_prompt: To ensure a fair and competitive marketplace, it is essential that all businesses adhere to legal regulations. Registration not only provides legitimacy but also protects consumers and fosters trust in the economy.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa akatale ak'obwenkanya n'okuvuganya, kikulu nnyo bizinensi zonna okugoberera amateeka. Okwewandiisa tekukoma ku kuwa mateeka, naye era kukuuma abaguzi n'okutumbula obwesige mu by'enfuna.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni cuk tye maber dok pyem tye maber, pire tek tutwal ni biacara weng omyero gulub cik. Coone pe weko dano bedo ki twero keken ento bene gwoko luwil ki kelo gen I tenge me lim.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai esokoni loajokan, ibusakinit ibiasaran kere atupakinit ikisila. Mam aiwadikao einakini itunga aijen bon konye ingarakini kesi ayuarite agwelak ka aitopolor amunokina naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala ni azini kililiru 'diyi nezu, eri orodriru tujari dria eyi ma obi azita eyi ma vuti. E'yo ru siza niri feni lu e'yo azita palaa ri ku te eri vini 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma ta mba dika eri asi'baza eji e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu akatare karimu oburinganiza n'okuhayahayana, nikikuru ngu bizinesi zoona zikuratire ebiragiro. Okwehandikisa tikirikumaraho kureetaho oburingaaniza, kureka nikirinda abarikukoresa n'okureetaho obwesigye omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: Despite their significant contributions to society, many women and girls find themselves marginalized in discussions that shape their futures. This systemic exclusion perpetuates inequalities and undermines the value of diverse perspectives.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga bakola ebintu bingi mu kitundu, abakyala n'abawala bangi beesanga nga basuuliddwa ku mabbali mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okukwata ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso. Enkola eno ey'okusuulibwa ebbali esigazaawo obutali bwenkanya era etyoboola omugaso gw'endowooza ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gutiyo tic mapol I kabedo wa, mon ki anyira mapol nongo gipe ki gum me lok I kom ngo ma omyero gutim ikare me anyim gi. Man weko dano pe bedo marom dok balo ber pa tam mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda aswamisio nuepolok noi mama ejaasi itunga, ewanyunitos angor keda apesur luipu ebe mam epedorete einer nuikamunitos ingaren kec. Aimikinio na eyangauni amamus na eirian kosodi aitidisiar ajokis naka aomisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma orodri ongulumu ma alia 'diyi ma talasi, oku karakara azini ezoanzi karakara yi yi esu yi ma ngulupi si e'yo nzeza yi ma ewu drusiri ma driari ma aliarisi. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma esele cozu ri ni e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma esele cozu trotro ri ma omgbo esi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obuhwezi bw'amaani omu bantu, abakazi n'abaishiki baingi nibesharinga omu by'okuhanuura ebirikukwata aha biro byabo by'omumaisho. Okushoroora abantu omu by'obutegyeki nikureetaho obutaingana n'okureetera okuremwa kureeba ebintu omu muringo ogutarikushushana.

eng_prompt: Promoting equal rights and opportunities for all genders is essential for fostering social harmony. When everyone has a voice and a stake in the community, conflicts are less likely to arise.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula eddembe eryenkanankana n'emikisa gy'ekikula ky'abantu kikulu nnyo mu kutumbula obumu mu bantu. Buli omu bw'aba n'eddoboozi n'omugabo mu kitundu, obukuubagano tebutera kubaawo.
ach_prompt: Kelo rwom me twero ki gum marom pi mon ki coo pire tek tutwal pi kelo winye ikin dano. Ka dano weng tye ki dwon gi ki tic gi ikabedo gi, lweny pe twero bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Aitopolorite apedorosio keda arerengesio nu eirian nuka ikiliok keda angor ejok kanu aitopolor aimorikikina. Arai ejaasi nginitunganan keda eporot keda aswam kotoma atutubet, mam ingungeta epedorete atakanun.
lgg_prompt: Drilemgbo agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie tualu drileba eyi pie ri ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru ti ecita o'bi eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu. Ba dria ka ovu o'duko be azini e'yo yi 'yepi ongulumu ma alia ci, e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi econi e'do ku.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura obugabe n'emigisha erikwingana ahagati y'abashaija n'abakazi n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho obusingye omu bantu. Buri omwe ku arikugira eiraka hamwe n'omugasho omu byaro, entaro tizirikukira kubaho.

eng_prompt: In recent months, the community had faced increasing tensions regarding gender roles and expectations. Recognizing the need for change, the village leaders decided it was time to address these issues head-on.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, abantu baayolekaganye n'obunkenke obweyongera ku mirimu n'ebisuubirwa mu kikula ky'abantu. Olw'okumanya obwetaavu bw'enkyukakyuka, abakulembeze b'ekyalo baasalawo nti kye kiseera okukola ku nsonga zino.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato angec, lwak gubedo ki lworo madit tutwal I kom tic ki miti pa mon ki coo. Ki niang ni aloka-loka tye kamitte, lutela me caro gumoko ni kare dong oromo me cobo peko magi.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, etereikina itunga keda aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos aswamisinei nuka ikiliok keda angor. Kanu ajenun eipud loka aijulanakineta, apotu engarenok lu ocaalo itutuboto ebe erai apak na aitemokin akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu eyi esu e'yo asi omiza ni tupi eyi ma eselea e'yo agupi eyini aa'zu agupi eyi pie ri ma dria tualu e'yo eyini ega eyi ma dria 'diyi pie. E'yo ojata ma e'yo egazu 'boria, drice'ba calo ni 'diyi 'du e'yo 'di ma aza kozu drile.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, abantu bakaba batungire obunkenke obweyongyeire aha bikwatireine n'emirimo hamwe n'ebiteekateeko by'abashaija n'abakazi. Ahabw'okumanya ekyetengo ky'empinduka, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakasharamu ngu obwire buhikire kukora aha nshonga ezi.

eng_prompt: Educators have organized a collaborative event to enhance interdisciplinary learning. Participants from various schools and universities have gathered to share ideas and strategies.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bategese omukolo ogw'obwegassi okutumbula eby'enjigiriza eby'enjawulo. Abeetabamu okuva mu masomero ne zi ssettendekero ez'enjawulo bakungaanye okugabana ebirowoozo n'obukodyo.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye guyubu yub me ribbe pi medo rwom me kwan ma pat pat. Dano ma aa ki gangi kwan ki univaciti mapatpat gugure kacel me nywako tam ki yoo me tic.
teo_prompt: Apotu isisianakinak itemokisi airiamun na aimorikikin kanu aitopoloria aisisia na itunga. Apotu itunga luka isomeroi luegelegela keda iunibasitin luegelegela kotukokinos kanu aimor aomisio keda iwaitin.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba eyi otu otita eyi tualu onita geri ndundu eyi si ri ma omgbo otuzu. Ba engapi sukulu ndundu eyi ma alea azini university ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tra eyi e'yo eyi awazu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa batebekaniise omukoro gw'okukorera hamwe, okutunguura eby'obwegyese. Abeejumbiremu kuruga omu mashomero n'amatendekyero ga yunivasite gatarikushushana, bateeranire hamwe kugabana ebiteekateeko n'oburyo.

eng_prompt: To ensure a brighter future and empower the next generation, it is crucial that all young girls receive an education. This commitment to education is especially important during the formative years of adolescence.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa ebiseera by'omu maaso ebitangaavu n'okutumbula omulembe oguddako, kikulu nnyo abawala abato bonna okufuna obuyigirize. Okwewaayo kuno eri okusoma kwa mugaso nnyo naddala mu myaka gy'obuvubuka egy'okutendekebwa.
ach_prompt: Pi anyim maber ki ilo rwom pa anyira manyen, pire tek tutwal ni anyira weng omyero gunong kwan. Keto cwiny man i kom kwan pire tek tutwalle ikare me tino.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ngaren na ejok ka aitigogong ateker na etupakini, ejokuna apesur kere adumun asioman. Apodokinit na na asioman erai na epol ajokis noi kotoma apakio nu idwe lueraasi atumunak.
lgg_prompt: Lezu ewu drialeri ni aa'zu muke azini okpo fezu 'ba ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi dri, eri orodriru ezoanzi nyiri dria eyini onita esuzu. Asi feza 'diri onita ma dria ri eri orodriru tuni eli 'ba oderu 'diyi ma e'yo onizu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya ebiro bya nyensya birungi n'okutunguura abantu b'omurembe ogurikwija, n'eky'omugasho ngu abaishiki abato boona batunge obwegyese. Okwehayo ahaby'obwegyese n'eky'omugasho munonga omu myaka y'eminyeeto.

eng_prompt: Recognizing a child's unique abilities can significantly influence their development and self-esteem. By paying close attention to their interests and skills, parents can help nurture these talents effectively.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera obusobozi bw'omwana obw'enjawulo kisobola okukyusa enkulaakulana ye n'okwewa ekitiibwa. Abazadde bwe bassaayo omwoyo ku bye baagala n'obukugu bwabwe, basobola okuyamba okukuza ebitone bino obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ngeyo kero pa latin twero konyo tutwal I dongo mege ki woro ma en tye kwede. Ki keto cwiny I kom jami ma gimaro ki diro gi, lunyodo twero konyo me dongo diro magi maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ajenun apedorosio nuitegelikina nuka ikoku epedori aitodolikin apolo ke keda awate ke. Kowai lo apodokinit iboro lu ekotos idwe keda acoasineikec, epedorete auriak aingarakin aitopoloun acoasineikec ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani ecozu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu anzi eyi ma eselea ri ma e'yo egazu ri ni fe eyini zozu kililiru azini eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi ma e'yo egazu kililiru. Tipika eyi ka asi fe e'yo eyini le azini ondua eyini 'diyi ma dria, eyi eco feta Munguni fe eyini 'diyi ezo kililiru ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza obushoboorozi bw'omwana, nikibaasa kuhwera munonga okukura kwe n'okweheereza ekitiinisa. Abazaire nibabaasa kuhwera abaana baabo kutunguura etaraanta zaabo, barikufayo munonga aha bibarikukunda hamwe n'emyoga yaabo.

eng_prompt: Promoting gender equality in all fields is essential for fostering innovation and progress. Encouraging diverse perspectives can lead to more comprehensive solutions in science and technology.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula obwenkanya mu buli kikula kyetaagisa nnyo mu kutumbula obuyiiya n'enkulaakulana. Okukubiriza endowooza ez'enjawulo kisobola okuleetawo eby'okugonjoola byonna mu ssaayansi ne tekinologiya.
ach_prompt: Kelo rwom ma rom I kin mon ki coo I tenge weng pire tek tutwal I dongo diro ki dongo lobo. Cuku cwiny dano me bedo ki tam mapat-pat twero kelo yoo me cobo peko mapat-pat I tenge me cayanc ki tet manyen.
teo_prompt: Aitopolorite nuka angor kotoma aiboisio kere erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopoloria acoasinei nuitetiak ka apol. Aisinyikokit aomisio nuegelegela epedori ayangaun aitemokineta nuka esayanis keda etatai loakwana.
lgg_prompt: E'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru e'yo eyi edezu o'diru azini zota ma omgbo otuzu. Egata ndundu eyi ma ava engazu ri eco fe e'yo eyi ma aza kozu geri ndundu eyi si geri sayanisi ni azini tekenologia ni 'diyisi ra.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho oburinganiza omu bantu omu myanya yoona n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'obuhangwa n'entunguuka. Okushagika emiteekateekyere etarikushushana nikibaasa kureetaho oburyo burungi omu bya sayansi na tekinorogye.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve its educational system, Uganda has recognized the importance of collaboration and knowledge sharing. As a result, the country is actively seeking partnerships with various international organizations.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyenjigiriza byayo, Uganda etegedde obukulu bw'okukolagana n'okugabana amagezi. N'ekivuddemu, eggwanga linoonya nnyo enkolagana n'ebitongole by'ensi yonna eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me kwan, Uganda oniang ber pa ribbe ki poko ngec. Macalo adwogi ne, lobo ne tye ka yenyo winye ki dul mapat-pat me wilobo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitojokar nuka asioman, ejenit Uganda ajokis naka aimorikikina keda aimor acoa. Kanuka ngun, euta akwap aimo aiswamanara keda iriongeta luegelegela luka akwapin ace.
lgg_prompt: Okpo erini 'ba e'yo onitaniri otuzu, Uganda isu orodri ti icita ni azini ondua awazuri ra. E'yo 'disi, kari ni azi nga amuti kari eselia 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obwegyese, Uganda emanyire omugasho gw'okukwatanisa n'okugabana obwengye. N'ekyarugiremu, eihanga niritaayaayira okukwatanisa n'ebitongore by'amahanga agatari gamwe.

eng_prompt: The contributions of women have historically been overlooked and undervalued. It is essential to ensure that their perspectives and experiences are included in all aspects of decision-making.
lug_prompt: Ebyafaayo biraga nti emirimu gy'abakyala gisuuliddwa amaaso era tegisiimibwa. Kya mugaso okulaba nti endowooza n'obumanyirivu bwabwe bitwalibwa mu nsonga zonna ezikolebwa okusalawo.
ach_prompt: I kare mukato angec pe ki tamo I kom tic pa mon. Pire tek tutwal me neno ni kitero tam ki ngec gi ikare me moko tam.
teo_prompt: Akiro nu iswamaete angor aponi ipalunitai ido mam eyangaritai. Erai ibore yenepol noi awanyun ebe eponio aitodolikin aomisio kec keda akiro nuiswamauna kapak kana aitolomun aseununeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba ebi e'yo oku eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ku. Eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba ma 'du egata yini azini e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi e'yo dria 'bani peta pezu 'diyi ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Eby'omugasho by'abakazi omu byafaayo bitwire nibirekyererwa kandi bitaine mugasho. N'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu ebiteekateeko byabo n'obumanyirizi bwabo nibitwarirwa omunkora yoona y'okusharamu.

eng_prompt: Gender bias in the workplace often leads to unequal opportunities for women. When organizations fail to recognize and address this issue, they perpetuate a cycle of discrimination.
lug_prompt: Okusosola mu kikula ky'abantu mu bifo by'emirimu kitera okuviirako abakyala okufuna emikisa egy'enjawulo. Ebitongole bwe biremererwa okutegeera n'okukola ku nsonga eno, biwangaaza enkola y'obusosoze.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki apoka poka ikin mon ki coo ipol kare weko mon pe nongo gum marom. Ka dul mapat-pat pe oniang ki cobo peko man, man weko tim me apoka-poka mede anyim.
teo_prompt: Atiakatiaka naka ikiliok keda angor kotoma aiboisio nuka aswam eyangauni amamus na arereng naka angor. Arai mam iriongeta ejenete ka aitemokin ationis na, eyangaununete kesi atiakatiaka.
lgg_prompt: Opendu agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie pari azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea ri ni tutuni fe oku eyini drileba trotro 'diyi ku. Amuti eyi ka e'yo 'di ma aza ko ku, eyi e'yo opendu ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Okushoroora abantu kurugirira ahakikura kyabo omu myanya y'emirimo, nikireetera abakazi obutahebwa emigisha erikwingana. Ebitongore kubirikuremwa kumanya n'okukora aha nshonga egi, nibireetaho okushoroora.

eng_prompt: The pursuit of knowledge and personal development should be accessible to all individuals, regardless of gender. Ensuring equal opportunities in education is essential for fostering a just and equitable society.
lug_prompt: Okunoonya okumanya n'okukulaakulana kw'omuntu kulina okutuukirirwa abantu bonna awatali kufaayo ku kikula kyabwe. Okukakasa emikisa egy'enkanankana mu by'enjigiriza kya mugaso mu kutumbula ekitundu eky'obwenkanya n'obwenkanya.
ach_prompt: Dano weng omyero gubed ki gum me nongo ngec ki dongo kwo gi labongo paro pi coo onyo mon. Neno ni dano weng tye ki gum marom i gang kwan pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ma opore dok tye ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Aingic acoa ka apol ibusakinit adumun nejaas itunga kere araida ikiliok arai angor. Aitogogong arerengesio nu eirian kotoma asioman erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolorite aiboisit na ejok.
lgg_prompt: Le 'ba dria ma esu geri onita esuzu azini zozu eyi ma ngulupi si ri ra agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie ku. Drileba tro tro onita ma alia 'diyi ma ta mbaza eri orodriru ongulumu kililiru azini trotroru 'diyi ezozu.
nyn_prompt: Okusherura obwengye hamwe n'entunguuka y'omuntu, bishemereire kuhikwaho abantu boona, oihiremu abashaija n'abakazi. Okureeba ngu hariho emigisha erikwingana omuby'obwegyese n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho oburinganiza omu bantu.

eng_prompt: As the demands of modern work-life balance continue to grow, many parents struggle to find reliable childcare options. Implementing child daycare centres at workplaces can significantly alleviate this challenge.
lug_prompt: Nga obwetaavu bw'omulembe guno obw'okukwataganya emirimu n'obulamu bweyongera okukula, abazadde bangi balwana okufuna engeri ezesigika ez'okulabiriramu abaana. Okuteekawo ebifo ebirabirira abaana abato ku mirimu kisobola okukendeeza ennyo okusoomoozebwa kuno.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti me rwate ikit me tic ki kwo tye kamede kwede, lunyodo mapol tye ka yele me nongo yoo maber me gwoko lutino gi. Keto ka gwoko lutino i gang tic twero dwoko piny peko man.
teo_prompt: Kwape ekotosi aswam keda aijar naka itunga aiyatakin, eutasi auriak luipu aimo iponesio luajokak luka aidar idwe. Aitolomun aiboisio nu idarere idwe kotoma aiboisio nu iswamaere epedori aitidisiar ationis na.
lgg_prompt: Ekile e'yo 'bani lezu azi ngazu azini aa'zu edriru 'diyi ma esele cozu ri ni mu drile tu, tipika karakara eyi dri ci geri onyiru anzi eyi ma tambazu 'diyi esuzu. Pari anzi nyiri eyi ma tambazu o'du driasi 'diyi ma e'dota pari azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea ri eco e'yo ewaru 'di ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebyetaago by'omurembe gw'omurembe gw'omurembe gw'omurembe gw'omurembe gw'omurembe gw'omurembe, abazaire baingi nibarwana kuronda oburyo burungi bw'okureeberera abaana baabo. Okutaho emyanya y'okureebereramu abaana aha mirimo, nikibaasa kumaraho oburemeezi obu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the local government has implemented various training programs aimed at enhancing the employability of residents. As a result, Arua has been empowered with skills with job creation.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, gavumenti z'ebitundu zitadde mu nkola pulogulaamu z'okutendeka ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okutumbula obusobozi bw'abatuuze okufuna emirimu. N'ekivuddemu, Arua efunye obukugu n'okutondawo emirimu.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, gamente me tedero okatti ki yub mapat-pat me pwonyo lutedero me nongo tic. Macalo adwogi ne, Arua onongo diro me cako tic.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, etolomu apugan naka atutubet ainapeta nuka aitutuonoro kanu aitojokar aswamisinei nuka itunga. Kanuka ngun, aponi ijaikinai Arua acoa na aitolomun aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, local government 'ba otita imbatani ndundu eyini lezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe Arua ni okpo ondua eyini ani azi eyi edezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, gavumenti z'ebyanga zitandikireho enteekateeka z'okutendeka abatuuragye kugira ngu babaase kutunga emirimo. N'ekyarugiremu, Arua etungire emyoga erikureetaho emirimo.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising unemployment rates among young people, the organisation has launched a new initiative. This program aims to equip participants with the skills and knowledge necessary to start their own businesses.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebbula ly'emirimu eryeyongera mu bavubuka, ekitongole kitongozza enteekateeka empya. Pulogulaamu eno egendereddwamu okuwa abeetabamu obukugu n'amagezi ageetaagisa okutandikawo bizinensi zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa can tic ikin bulu, dul ne ocako yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me miyo ngec ki diro ma mite pi dano me cako biacara gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin amamus na aswamisinei kanejaas atumunak, etolomu erionget ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi ainakin itunga acoa ka acoa kanu ageun ibiasaran kec bon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ako ni tupi 'ba ode eyi ma eselea ri ma aza kozu, amuti 'da e'do e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma asisile 'ba emu'ba 'diyi dri ondua fezu tujari eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi e'dozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'eibura ry'emirimo omu minyeeto, ekitongore kitandikireho enteekateeka nsya. Puroguraamu egi negyenderera okuheereza abeejumbiremu emyoga n'obwengye oburikwetengwa kutandika bizinesi zaabo.

eng_prompt: In our village, community initiatives have been gaining momentum to engage the younger generation. One such effort focuses on practical skills that can empower them for the future.
lug_prompt: Mu kyalo kyaffe, enteekateeka z'ekitundu zibadde zeeyongera amaanyi okusikiriza abavubuka. Omu ku kaweefube ng'oyo essira ali ku bukugu obw'omugaso obuyinza okubawa amaanyi mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I caro wa, yub mapat-pat ma lwak tye katimo tye ka nongo kero me weko lutino bedo tye. Yub acel ma kit meno keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom diro me tic ma twero konyo gi ikare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Kocaalo kosi, eutasi ainapeta nuka itunga aiyatakin kanu aimorikikin atumunak. Aswamisioit adiope kwape kangin erai aisisianakin itunga acoasinei nu itwasamaete kes kanu oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Calo amavileri ma alea, e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi ebi okpo esu 'ba oderu 'diyi 'bazu eyi ma eselea. Okpo 'dile 'diyi ma azi okpo 'ba ondua azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria eyini ani ecozu eyi ma okpo fezu ewu drialeri ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu kyaro kyaitu, enteekateeka z'ekyanga zitwire nizitunguuka okureetaho eminyeeto. Omwe aha nteekateeka nk'egyo n'okureeba ngu batunga emyoga erikubaasa kubahwera omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost local economic development and create job opportunities, the city council has approved a new initiative. As part of this plan, the government is leasing one hundred acres of land for the construction of industries.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyenfuna by'ekitundu n'okutondawo emirimu, akakiiko k'ekibuga kakkirizza enteekateeka empya. Ng'ekimu ku nteekateeka eno, gavumenti ewa liizi ettaka eriweza yiika kikumi okuzimba amakolero.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me lim ki cako tic, kancil me boma madit omoko yub manyen. Macalo but yub man, gamente tye ka miyo ngom me acre miya acel me yubu cuma madongo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun keda aitolomun aswamisinei, acamakin ekansulo lo esite ainapeta nuitetiak. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta ngun, euta apugan aijaikin alupok nuka eka akwatat kanu adukio acuman.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu zota e'yo robia ni angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu azini drileba azi fezu 'diyi ejizu ri ma alea, kanisulu aku ambo 'da ma alea ri ai e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma azi ru, gamete ni nyaku eka turu alu si okalamvu eyi sizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'entaasya n'okutandikaho emirimo,akakiiko k'orurembo kakaikiriza enteekateeka nsya. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi,gavumenti eriyo neegaba eitaka rya hiika igana ry'okwombeka amakorero.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for skilled labor in the region, local leaders have proposed the establishment of a new facility. This initiative aims to equip young people with the necessary skills to thrive in various industries.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'abakozi abalina obukugu obweyongera mu kitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo bateesezza okuzimba ekifo ekipya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa abavubuka obukugu obwetaagisa okukulaakulana mu makolero ag'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lutic ma ludiro I twok piny eni, lutela me tedero gumiyo tam me yubu ot yat manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me miyo diro ma mite ki bulu me timo biacara mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin eipud loka eswamak lu emisiaritos kotoma aiboisit kangin, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kitemokisi adukun aiboisit naitetet. Alosikinet na erai ainakin atumunak acoa na ipudasi kesi kanu aswam iboro luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azi'ba ondua be angu 'di ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi fe egata e'yo 'bani lezu angu 'da ma sizu o'diru ri ma dria. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu 'ba oderu 'diyi dri ondua fezu eyini ani ecozu tujari ndundu eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'abakozi abakugu omu kyanga, abebembezi b'ebyaro bateireho ekiteiso ky'okwombeka eikorero risya. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okuheereza eminyeeto emyoga y'okukora emirimo etari emwe n'emwe.

eng_prompt: Investing in education and training programs is crucial for fostering a competitive workforce. By equipping young people with essential tools and knowledge, we can ensure they thrive in a rapidly changing job market.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu pulogulaamu z'ebyenjigiriza n'okutendekebwa kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula abakozi abavuganya. Nga tuwa abavubuka ebikozesebwa ebikulu n'amagezi, tusobola okukakasa nti bakulaakulana mu katale k'emirimu akakyuka amangu.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I yub me kwan ki pwonye pire tek tutwal pi dongo lutic matye ki kero me pyem. Ka wamiyo jami tic ki ngec ma mite ki bulu, watwero neno ni gudongo I kare man ma tic tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma asioman ka aitutuonoro erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor eswamak lu epedoritos abolobol. Kowai lo aijaikin atumunak iboro ka acoa, ipedori oni awanyun ebe epedorete kesi aswam ejok kotoma ojautene loka aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu otita onita ni azini imbata ni 'diyi ma alia ri eri orodriru azi'ba okporu 'diyi ezozu. Ba ode eyini afa ayuzaru azini ondua orodriru 'diyi fezu risi, ama eco ne ra kini eyi mu drile tu e'yo azi ni oja'ba mbeleru 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutamu sente omu by'obwegyese n'okutendeka abantu n'eky'omugasho munonga omukureetaho abakozi abarikuhayahayana. Twaheereza eminyeeto eby'okukoresa n'obwengye, nitubaasa kuhamya ngu nibatunga emirimo omu bwire obu obw'empindahinduka.

eng_prompt: As the job market continues to evolve, it is essential to recognize the potential of our young workforce. Investing in their skills and education will prepare them for meaningful roles in society.
lug_prompt: Ng'embeera y'emirimu yeeyongera okukyuka, kikulu nnyo okumanya obusobozi bw'abakozi baffe abato. Okusiga ensimbi mu bukugu bwabwe n'obuyigirize kijja kubateekerateekera emirimu egy'omugaso mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma can tic tye ka medde ameda, pire tek tutwal me niang kero pa lutic matino. Keto lim I diro gi ki kwan gi obi yubu gi pi tic mabeco I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aijulanakineta nuka esokoni loka aswamisinei, ejokuna noi ajenun apedor naka eswamak wok ludidika. Aipikakin ikapun toma acoasineikec ka asiomanikec ebuni aitemonokin kes kanu aswamisinei nuepolok noi kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Cu azi niri ni mu drile i ojazu, eri orodriru 'ba ode azi ngapi amavile 'diyi ma okpo esuzu. Robia 'bazu ondua yini azini onita yiniri ma alia ri ni nga yi otu azi orodriruni 'yezu ongulumu ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Obutare bw'emirimo ku burikugumizamu nibuhinduka, n'eky'omugasho kumanya obushoboorozi bw'abakozi baitu abato. Okuta esente omu myoga n'obwegyese bwabo, nikiija kubatebeekanisa kukora emirimo y'omugasho omu bantu.

eng_prompt: After years of neglect, the local residents had been advocating for support and resources to improve their living conditions. When the announcement came that the government would be investing in community projects, excitement filled the air.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka egy'okulagajjalirwa, abatuuze b'omu kitundu babadde balwanirira obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa okutumbula embeera zaabwe ez'obulamu. Ekirango bwe kyajja nti gavumenti ejja kuteeka ssente mu pulojekiti z'ekitundu, essanyu lyajjula empewo.
ach_prompt: Ingee cayo dano pi mwaki mapol, lutedero gubedo ka lego pi kony ki jami ma mite me yubu rwom me kwo gi. I kare ma kicwalo lok angeya ni gamente obi keto lim I yub mapat-pat pa lwak, yom-cwiny opong I kin lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar lu apalunitere, eutasi itunga luka atutubet ailip agangat ka iboro lu itojokarete aijar kec. Nealomunia alimoret ebe ebuni apugan aipikakin ikapunuke mama ejaasi ipurojektin luka itunga, apotu iyalamasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani eyi adizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi a'di 'di atita azini afa ayuzaru eyi ma edri otuzu. O'duko eceza ni emuzu kini gamete ni mu robia ayu otita ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea risi, ayiko ga angu ma alea tre.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okunagaijura, abatuuragye babaire nibarwanirira obuhwezi n'ebintu by'okutunguura emituurire yaabo. Kyarangirwe ngu gavumenti neeza kuta sente omu purogyekiti z'abantu, abantu bakashemererwa munonga.

eng_prompt: Implementing targeted job training programs is essential for equipping young people with the skills needed in today's job market. By fostering partnerships between educational institutions and local businesses, we can create more opportunities for young job seekers.
lug_prompt: Okuteeka mu nkola pulogulaamu z'okutendeka abantu ku mirimu kikulu nnyo mu kuwa abavubuka obukugu obwetaagisa mu katale k'emirimu leero. Mu kutumbula enkolagana wakati w'amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza ne bizinensi za wano, tusobola okutondawo emikisa mingi eri abavubuka abanoonya emirimu.
ach_prompt: Keto yub mapat-pat me pwonyo tic itic pire tek tutwal pi miyo ngec me tic ki bulu. Ka wadongo winye ikin gangi kwan ki biacara me tedero, watwero kelo gum mapol pi bulu ma tye ka yenyo tic.
teo_prompt: Aitegeario naka ainapeta nuka aitutuonoro nuka aswamisinei erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aijaikin atumunak acoa na ekotos kotoma osokoni loka aswamisinei. Kowai lo aitopolor aiswamanara kiding isomeroi keda ibiasaran luka atutubet, ipedori oni aitolomun arerengesio nuipu kanuka atumunak lu ekotosi aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: Otita imbatani azi ma dria 'diyi ma e'dota eri orodriru 'ba ode eyini ondua eyini le sa'wa 'di ma alea 'diyi fezu. Amuti sukulu eyi ma eselea tujari ogogo 'diyi pie, ama eco drileba ndundu eyi ede 'ba ode azi ndapi 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutandikaho enteekateeka y'okutendeka eminyeeto aha mirimo n'eky'omugasho omu kuheereza eminyeeto emyoga erikwetengwa omu butare bw'emirimo obwahati. Okureetaho enkoragana ahagati y'amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese hamwe na bizinesi ez'omubyaro, nitubaasa kureetera eminyeeto erikuronda emirimo emigisha mingi.

eng_prompt: In his speech at the annual youth summit, the mayor emphasized the importance of investing in personal growth and community involvement. He highlighted the potential of young people to shape the future through their unique skills and creativity.
lug_prompt: Mu kwogera kwe mu lukiiko lw'abavubuka olutegekebwa buli mwaka, meeya yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okusiga ensimbi mu nkulaakulana y'omuntu n'okwenyigiramu kw'ekitundu. Yayogedde ku busobozi bw'abavubuka okukulaakulanya ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso okuyita mu bukugu bwabwe obw'enjawulo n'obuyiiya.
ach_prompt: I lok mege I kacoke pa bulu ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka, meya oketo cwinye I kom ber pa keto lim I dongo pa ngat acel acel ki dongo pa lwak. En oloko I kom kero pa bulu me yubu anyimgi I yoo me diro ki diro gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oinerike kotoma airiamun naka atumunak, abu emeya kitogogong ajokis naka aipikakin ikapun toma apol naka itunganan keda aimorikikin itunga. Abu ngesi kitogogong apedor naka atumunak aitolomun ingaren itoritos acoa kec keda acoa na itegelikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini nze mitingi 'ba ode eyini eli vusi ri ma alea ri ma alea, meya 'da fe okpo orodri 'bani robia ayuzu zota 'ba ma ngulupi niri ma alea tualu ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie ri ma dria. Ece e'yo 'ba ode eyini ecozu ewu drialeri edezu geri eyini ondua ndundu eyivile 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu rubazo rwe aha rukiiko rw'eminyeeto orurikubaho buri mwaka, meeya akashoboorora omugasho gw'okuta esente omu kutunguuka n'okureetaho entunguuka omu bantu. Akashoborora obushoboorozi bw'eminyeeto omu kuhanga eby'omumaisho kurabira omu bukugu bwabo obw'omutaano hamwe n'okujumbura kwabo.

eng_prompt: Investing in education and vocational training is essential for empowering individuals and communities. By equipping people with the necessary skills, we can foster economic growth and enhance overall well-being.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu by'enjigiriza n'okutendekebwa mu by'emikono kya mugaso mu kutumbula abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitundu. Bwe tuwa abantu obukugu obwetaagisa, tusobola okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okutumbula embeera z'abantu okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I gangi kwan ki pwonye me tic cing pire tek tutwal pi ilo malo rwom pa dano ki kabedo gi. Ka wamiyo diro ma mite ki dano, ci watwero medo rwom me lim ki rwom me kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma asioman keda aitutuonoro naka akanin erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitigogong itunga keda atutubena. Kowai lo aijaikin itunga acoa na ekotoi, ipedori oni aitopolor apol naka ikapun ka aitopolor aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu onita ma alia azini imbata afa edele drisi 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru okpo fezu 'ba yi dri azini ongulumu yi dri. Ba eyini ondua kililiru 'diyi fezu risi, ama eco zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otu dika ama eco geri 'ba eyini aa'zu ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutamu sente omu by'obwegyese n'eby'emikono n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura abantu hamwe n'ebyanga. Twaheereza abantu emyoga erikwetengwa, nitubaasa kureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya n'entunguuka y'abantu.

eng_prompt: As the community continues to struggle with economic challenges, the rising number of jobless individuals has become a pressing concern. Addressing this issue is crucial for the overall well-being and stability of the district.
lug_prompt: Nga ekitundu kigenda mu maaso n'okulwanagana n'okusoomoozebwa mu byenfuna, omuwendo gw'abantu abatalina mirimu ogweyongera gufuuse ekyeraliikiriza eky'amangu. Okukola ku nsonga eno kikulu nnyo ku lw'obulungi n'obutebenkevu bwa disitulikiti okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma lwak tye ka medde ki lweny ki peko me can lim, medde pa wel dano ma gipeke ki tic dong odoko peko madit tutwal. Cobo peko man pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo ki ber bedo pa district.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos itunga ainingosit keda atiokisio nuka ikapun, eyatakin enaaba loka itunga luemamete keda aswamisinei erai ationis naepol noi. Aitemokin ationis na epol ajokis kanu ajokis keda ainapakina na edisitrikta.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini mu drile dri ciria e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyisi, kalafe 'ba azi kokoru 'diyi ni tupi tutu ri eca asi otiza okporu ni ru. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu ri eri orodriru aa'ta muke distrikiti 'di ma alea ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikugumizamu nibarwanagana n'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya, omuhendo gw'abantu abatagiine mirimo ogweyongyeire nigwerarikiriza munonga. Okukora aha nshonga egi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obuhangwa n'obutebekana omu disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for community support, local organizations have initiated programs aimed at integrating refugees into the workforce. These initiatives focus on providing skills training and resources to help them contribute meaningfully to society.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'obuyambi bw'ekitundu obweyongera, ebitongole by'omu kitundu bitandiseewo pulogulaamu ezigendereddwamu okuyingiza abanoonyiboobubudamu mu mirimu. Enteekateeka zino ziteeka essira ku kuwa abantu obukugu n'ebikozesebwa okubayamba okukola omulimu ogw'omugaso mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak me miyo kony, dul mapat-pat me tedero gucako yub me kelo luring ayella I tic. Yub magi keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom miyo pwony me diro ki jami me kony bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka agangat kama ejaasi itunga, etegeasi iriongeta luka atutubet ainapeta nu aimorikikin ikerai toma aswam. Iwaitin lu isingarenitos aitutuonoro keda iboro lu ingarakinete kesi aswam iboro luejokuka kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu azakoma ongulumu eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do otita eyi lezu emunyale eyini azi ngazu. Otita 'diyi asi 'baza 'ba ondua fezu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu yi ma aza kozu azi orodriruni ngazu ongulumu eyidri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'obuhwezi kuruga omu bantu, ebitongore by'omubyaro bitandikireho enteekateeka ezirikugyenderera okutwarira empungi omu mirimo. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okuheereza abantu emyoga n'eby'okukoresa okubaasa kuhwera abantu.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the growing importance of technology in today's job market, the local community center launched a new initiative. This program aims to equip young people with essential digital competencies.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba tekinologiya yeeyongedde okuba ow'omugaso mu mulimu ogukolebwa leero, ekitebe ky'ekitundu kyatandikawo enteekateeka empya. Pulogulaamu eno egendereddwamu okuwa abavubuka obukugu obwetaagisa mu by'amasimu.
ach_prompt: Ki niang ber pa tet manyen me tic I kare-ni, dul me tedero me tedero ocako yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me pwonyo bulu ki diro me tic ki intanet.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun ajokis naka etatai loakwana kotoma osokoni loka aswamisinei lolo, abu atukot naka atutubet kitegea ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aituutoonor atumunak keda acoa naka elago.
lgg_prompt: E'yo orodri e'yo tekenologianiri ni tuzu ewu andruri ma alia, pari o'bi yini angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do e'yo azi o'di ni. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu 'ba ode yi dri ondua orodriru e'yo tekenologianiri ma dria 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya omugasho gwa tekinorogye omu by'emirimo ebiro ebi, ekitongore ky'eby'obuhangwa kitandikireho enteekateeka nsya. Puroguraamu egi negyenderera okuheereza eminyeeto emyoga y'omugasho omu by'empurizagana.

eng_prompt: After months of heated debates and discussions, the proposed urban development plan was finally put to a vote. The anticipation in the chamber was palpable as representatives awaited the outcome of the crucial decision.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, enteekateeka y'okukulaakulanya ebibuga yasembyeyo okuteekebwa mu kalulu. Obweraliikirivu mu lukiiko bwali bweeyoleka ng'abakiise balindirira ebinaava mu kusalawo okukulu.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me laro lok ki nywako lok, kimoko tam me bolo kwir i kom yub me dongo boma. Gen obedo tye I ot moko cik I kare ma luwanggi tye kakuru adwogi me moko tam ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ipegeta keda ipegeta, aponi koinakinai aseo kanu aitopol ainapeta nuka itaunin. Apotu itunga luka airabet kowanyutu aiyalongong naarai autasi abwoikinitok aidar akiro nuelomunete kotoma aseunet naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia agbatara okporu 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba 'be asizu e'yo 'bani lezu angu ezoma ni aku ambo eyi ma alea ri ma dria voti ra. Asi 'baza jo ale aliza 'da ma alea ri ndra e'dazaru 'ba pa tupi eyi ma paria 'diyi ni te e'yo 'bani 'du e'yo okporu 'da ma dria ri te.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuhanuura n'okuhanuura, enteekateeka y'entunguuka y'endembo ekatebwa omu karuuru. Okwerarikirira omu ishengyero kukarebeka nk'abajwekyerwa barinzire ebyarugyire omu kucwamu okw'amaani.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, a heated debate arose regarding the proposed expansion of the project to include additional cities. Some members expressed concerns about the potential impact on resources and community needs.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko, wabaddewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi ku nteekateeka y'okugaziya pulojekiti okuzingiramu ebibuga ebirala. Bammemba abamu baalaga obweraliikirivu ku ngeri gye kiyinza okukosaamu ebintu n'ebyetaago by'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke, laro lok matek tutwal obedo tye I kom yub me medo boma madongo. Lumemba mukene gunyutu lworo I kom adwoki ne I kom jami ki miti pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet kangin, aponi kitegearai noi nuikamunitos epone loebeitor aitanyanyar epurojekt kanu aiyatakin isitei icie. Apotu imeban ice itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos epone loepedoria ngesi aitolitol iboro keda ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, agbatara okporu ni efu e'yo 'bani lezu otita 'da ma omgbo otuzu aku ambo azi 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria. Ba azi 'diyi ece asi otiza yini e'yo ecopi 'yepi afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, hakabaho okuhanuura kw'amaani aha nteekateeka y'okushanjuura purogyekiti y'okutaho endembo ezindi. Ba memba abamwe bakoreka okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'obuhwezi n'ebyetaago by'abantu.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have highlighted concerning trends in land ownership and usage across various regions. Many local communities are facing challenges as powerful entities seek to acquire large tracts of land for commercial purposes.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumiziddwa gye buvuddeko ziraga engeri obwannannyini ku ttaka n'engeri gye likozesebwamu mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. Abantu b'omu byalo bangi boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa ng'ebitongole eby'amaanyi bigezaako okufuna ettaka eddene olw'eby'obusuubuzi.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto kit ma rwom me bedo ki ngom tye kwede I but lobo mapat-pat. Lwak mapol gitye ka nongo peko ikare ma dul mapat-pat matye ki twero tye ka mito nongo ngom mapol pi timo biacara.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan lu atuboros itodutu nuikamunitos alupok keda epone lo itwasamaere alupok kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Etereikina itunga luipu keda atiokisio kwape ikampunin luapolok ekotosi adumun alupok nuepolok kanu agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo nyaku ma e'iru azini ayuza ma dria angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria ra. Ongulumu karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu amuti okporu 'diyi ni angu amboru 'diyi esuzu e'yo tujari ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka enkora y'obwannannyini n'okukoresa eitaka omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe. Abantu b'omubyaro bingi nibatunga oburemeezi ahabw'ebitongore by'amaani kuronda eitaka rihango ry'okukoresa omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: As the project progressed, concerns began to surface regarding the financial resources allocated to the urban development initiative. Stakeholders were increasingly anxious about how the ambitious plans would be sustained without a clear financial framework.
lug_prompt: Pulojekiti bwe yagenda mu maaso, okweraliikirira kwatandika okulabika ku by'ensimbi ezaaweebwa enteekateeka y'okukulaakulanya ebibuga. Abakwatibwako beeyongera okweraliikirira ku ngeri enteekateeka ez'amaanyi gye zandiyimiriddwamu awatali nsengeka ya ssente etegeerekeka.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yub ne tye ka mede anyim, lworo ocake I kom lim ma kimiyo pi yub me dongo boma. Lwak gubedo ki lworo madit tutwal I kom kit ma yub madongo egoni obumedde kwede labongo yub me lim matye.
teo_prompt: Neautar epurojekt alosit, apotu itunga kopotu aiyalongong kanu ikapun lu ijaikitai kanu aitopoloun itaunin. Apotu itunga lu epodokinitos akiro ngun kopodokisi aiyalongong epone loebeitor aitodolikin ainapeta ngun luapolok arai emamei ikapun luitegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'da ni muzu drile, asi otiza e'do efu e'yo robia fele e'yo angu ezoma ni aku ambo eyi ma alea ri ma dria. Ba ambo ndundu eyi ndra asi otiza be geri 'bani otita okporu 'diyi ma ta mbazu geri robia esuzu 'diyi kokoru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Purogyekiti ku yaagyendeire omu maisho, okwerarikirira kukatandika kubaho ahabw'esente ezaheirweyo omu nteekateeka y'entunguuka y'endembo. Abarikukwataho bakaba beerarikirire oku enteekateeka z'amaani zaabaire niziija kugumizamu bataine sente z'okukoresa.

eng_prompt: As the party primaries concluded, many candidates felt disheartened by the outcome. Faced with the prospect of political exclusion, they sought alternative paths to pursue their ambitions.
lug_prompt: Mu nkomerero y'okulonda kw'ekibiina okw'okusunsulamu, abeesimbyewo bangi baawulira nga baweddemu amaanyi olw'ebyava mu kulonda. Nga boolekedde okuboolebwa mu byobufuzi, banoonya amakubo amalala okutuukiriza ebigendererwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yer me party otum, lucungu mapol cwinygi otur pi adwogi yer ne. I kare ma onongo gitye ki byek me bedo mabor ki lok me cungu iwi bye, guyenyo yoo mukene me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Neangetakinor aseo naka epate, apotu abwaak luipu opupoto amamut keda aiyalama kanuka akiro nuelomunitos. Kojaasi kesi keda aomisioit naka alemar kotoma politikis, apotu kesi komoata iponesio ice luka aitodolikin apeleikinata kec.
