lgg_prompt: E'yo opetaa amuti politiki ni 'diyi niri ni i deria, 'ba karakara pa tupi 'diyi ma asi eza e'yo agata ni 'diyisi. E'yo 'bani egazu kini 'ba eco nga eyi atri politiki'a risi ra risi, eyi nda geri azi eyini ecozu eyi ma egata eyi 'yezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Oburuuru bw'ekibiina bwanyima y'okuhendera, abesimbireho baingi bakahwamu amaani ahabw'ebyarugiremu. Ahabw'okugira ngu bakaba nibaza kubingwa omu by'obutegyeki, bakasherura emiringo endiijo y'okuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byabo.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, allegations arose regarding the legitimacy of a political party's candidate selection process. Critics claimed that the party had violated electoral laws by nominating individuals for a constituency that had been dissolved years ago.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, ebyogerebwa byajja ku bwenkanya bw'enkola y'ekibiina ky'ebyobufuzi ey'okulonda abesimbyewo. Abavumirira baagamba nti ekibiina kyali kimenye amateeka g'eby'okulonda mu kusimbawo abantu mu konsituwensi eyali egobeddwa emyaka mingi emabega.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, adot obedo tye I kom kit ma dul me cungu iwi-bye moni yero kwede lucungu. Jo ma kwero lok pa dul me cungu iwi-bye ne guwaco ni dul me cungu iwi-bye ne oturu cik me yer ki cimo lucungu pi kabedo ma kicako tic iye mwaki mapol angec.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo itegelikina, apotu aitoroneta kolomutu kanuikamunitos ainapeta nuka aseun abwoak luka epate. Apotu itunga luetepesenitai kotemasi ebe ebilibilete epate ikisila luka aseo kopone lo aseun itunga luka aiboisit naetiakaritai ikar luipu kau.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ojazu osuta si, e'yo 'bani 'yozu kini amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma 'yeta 'ba pa sopi 'diyi opezuri ma dria. Ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi 'yo kini amuti politiki ni 'da onyo azita opetaa ni 'diyi erini 'ba eyi opezu angu opi nyaza ni 'diyi ma alea eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea risi.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, ebiteekateeko bikarugaho ebikwatiraine n'oburingaaniza bw'okuteera akaruuru k'ebibiina by'obutegyeki. Abarikuhakanisa bakagira ngu ekibiina kikashiisha ebiragiro by'eby'oburuuru obwo kirikuha abantu akaruuru omu kicweka ekyabaire kyahwaho emyaka mingi enyimaho.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising in the small town as disputes over property boundaries have escalated. The once-friendly neighbors now find themselves at odds, each claiming rightful ownership of the contested land.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kabuga akatono nga enkaayana ku nsalo z'ettaka zeeyongedde. Baliraanwa abaali ab'omukwano kati beesanga nga tebakkiriziganya, buli omu yeewozaako nti ye nannyini ttaka eririko enkaayana.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I taun matidi ne pien lara I kom wang ngom omedde tutwal. Dano ma onongo gubedo lurem I kare macon kombedi gitye ki tele I kingi, ngat acel-acel tye kawaco ni ngom eni meggi kikome.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotaun lodidi naarai apolor ingungeta kanu ikoruo luka alupok. Epedorete kwana idunyeta ngun lumojong ajaut keda ingungeta, kanginitunganan ebala ebe eraasi kesi ikulepek alupok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ri ebi tu tawuni werea 'da ma alea e'yo erita ako boda mile ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Jo ejele andra drio agyiru 'diyi esu yi yi ma eselea, alu alu ni 'yozu kini nyaku 'da ma e'ini a'daru.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu tawuni nkye ahabwokuba entongane aha nsharo z'eby'obugaiga zeyongyeire. Abaturanyi abaabaire bari abanywani obwahati nibesharinga, buri omwe naagira ngu niwe mukama w'eitaka eririkuhakanisibwa.

eng_prompt: The political landscape in Arua has been shifting rapidly, making it crucial for candidates to secure a victory. A strong win in this region could significantly influence the overall outcome of the national elections.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'ebyobufuzi mu Arua ebadde ekyuka mangu, ekireetedde okubeera eky'omugaso eri abeesimbyewo okukakasa obuwanguzi. Obuwanguzi obw'amaanyi mu kitundu kino busobola okukyusa ennyo ebyava mu kulonda kw'eggwanga okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Lok me cung iwibye I Arua tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, ma oweko obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi lucungu me nongo loc. Loc matek tutwal I but lobo man twero kelo adwogi maber I yer me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Ejulakinete akiro nuka epolitikis ko Arua katipet, ido einakini ngin itunga luebwoitos aitelekaar. Aitelekaarit naepol noi kotoma aiboisit kana epedori aitolomun nuelomunete kotoma aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni Arua ri ebi i oja mbeleru, erini fezu 'ba pa tupi 'diyi dri okporu agata esuzu. Agata okporu angu 'di ma alea ri eco e'yo opeta kari 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyi oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obutegyeki omuri Arua bitwire nibihinduka munonga, ekirikureetera abeesimbireho kusingura. Obusinguzi bw'amaani omu kicweka eki, nibubaasa kukora kihango aha birugyemu omu karuuru k'eihanga.

eng_prompt: As Uganda continues to experience rapid urbanization, the demand for new cities is becoming increasingly evident. Proper planning is essential to ensure sustainable development and infrastructure in these emerging urban areas.
lug_prompt: Nga Uganda egenda mu maaso n'okukulaakulana mu bibuga, obwetaavu bw'ebibuga ebipya bweyongera. Okuteekateeka okulungi kwa mugaso okulaba enkulaakulana ey'olubeerera n'ebizimbe mu bibuga bino ebivaayo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma Uganda tye ka dongo i rwom ma lamal tutwal, miti me gedo citi manyen tye ka mede. Yub maber pire tek tutwal me neno ni dongo lobo ki gedo mapat-pat I kabedo me boma mapat-pat matye ka dongo.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi Uganda aiboisio nuapolok, ejai eipud loka isitei luitetiak noi. Erai aitemonokin ibore yenepol noi kanu awanyun ebe ejai apol keda iboro luingarakinete kotoma aiboisio nuapolok.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ni mu drile tawuni eyi ma omgbo ni tuzu okposi risi, lezu aku ambo o'diru 'diyi sizu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Otuta kililiru ri eri orodriru angu ezoma ni azini afa o'bi eyini ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu angu tawuni eyini efupi o'diru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Obu Uganda erikugumizamu n'okutunguuka omu ndembo, okwetenga kw'endembo nsya kweyongyeire. Okuteekateekyera kurungi n'eky'omugasho okureeba ngu entunguuka n'ebyombeko bigumizamu omu myanya y'endembo eriho.

eng_prompt: As the election season approaches, concerns about the integrity of the voting process are rising. Many citizens are hopeful for a fair and transparent election this year.
lug_prompt: Nga sizoni y'okulonda esembera, okweraliikirira ku bwenkanya bw'enkola y'okulonda kweyongera. Bannansi bangi balina essuubi mu kulonda okw'amazima n'obwenkanya omwaka guno.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me bolo kwir tye cok, lworo I kom ber bedo pa yub me bolo kwir tye ka mede. Anywali mapol tye ki gen ni yer bibedo maber dok labongo ayela i mwaka ni.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, iyata aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos ainapakina naka ainapeta nuka aseo. Ejaasi itunga luipu keda amuno naka aitolot aseo najokan kokaru kalo.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecazu ogogo risi, asi otiza e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu uru. Kari anzi karakara eyi asi'baza be opeta kililiru azini e'yo ada be 'diyi ma dria eli 'disi.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikuhika haihi, okwerarikirira aha nkora nungi y'okuteera akaruuru kweyongyeire. Abatuuragye baingi baine amasiko omu karuuru k'amazima n'oburingaaniza omwaka ogu.

eng_prompt: As urban development accelerates, the establishment of governance structures becomes increasingly urgent. Community leaders are needed to guide the planning and implementation processes in these emerging areas.
lug_prompt: Ng'enkulaakulana y'ebibuga yeeyongera, okuteekawo enkola z'obukulembeze kweyongera okuba okw'amangu. Abakulembeze b'ebitundu beetaagibwa okulungamya enteekateeka n'enkola z'okussa mu nkola mu bitundu bino ebikulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Ka dongo lobo me boma tye kamedde anyim, yub me tela bene tye kamedde anyim. Lutela me tedero mite me doro yub ki keto itic yub i kabedo magi matye ka dongo.
teo_prompt: Kwape epoloi apol naka itaunin, epol atipet aitolomun ewai lo epugae. Ekotoi engarenok lu atutubet aingarenikin nuka aitemonokin ka aitegeario kotoma aiboisio nu eyaunete.
lgg_prompt: Angu tawuni eyini zoria, e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma sita ni eca curu'do e'yo okporu ni ru. Le drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma ce e'yo otita eyi 'yezu azini e'yo eyi 'yezu angu o'diru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka y'endembo ku erikweyongyera, okutandikaho engyenderwaho z'obwebembezi nikyeyongyera kuba okw'omugasho. Abeebembezi b'ebyanga nibetengwa, okureeberera enkora y'okutebekanisa n'okuta omu nkora ebintu omu myanya egi etandikireho.

eng_prompt: Many people find comfort in the familiar routines of their daily lives. As a result, they often resist any suggestions for improvement or transformation.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bafuna obuweerero mu bintu bye bamanyi mu bulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo. N'ekivuddemu, batera okugaana okuteesa kwonna okw'okulongoosa oba okukyusa.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ginongo kwe cwiny I kwo gi me nino ducu. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare gikwero tam mo keken me yubu jami onyo kelo aloka-loka.
teo_prompt: Edumunenete itunga luipu aiyalama kotoma aijar kec naka nginiparan. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi ainger adio aomisio nuka aitojokar arai aijulakin.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi asi anzu esu e'yo eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, eyi sa'wa driasi e'yo 'bani lezu eyi otuzu kani eyi ojazu ri ga si.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibatunga okuhuumurizibwa omu mirimo yaabo eya buriizooba. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kwangira ekiteiso kyona eky'okutunguuka nainga empinduka.

eng_prompt: Recent discussions have raised questions about the administrative status of various towns in the region. One such town under scrutiny is Fortportal, which may or may not be classified as an independent city.
lug_prompt: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakaggwa kuleeseewo ebibuuzo ku mbeera y'obukulembeze bw'ebibuga eby'enjawulo mu kitundu. Ekibuga ekimu nga kino ekiri mu kwekenneenyezebwa ye Fortportal, ekiyinza oba obutakwatibwa nga ekibuga ekyetongodde.
ach_prompt: Nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki okelo lapeny I kom kit ma boma mapat-pat me twok piny eni tye kawot kwede. Boma acel ma kitye ka ngiyo ne en aye Fortportal, ma twero onyo pe kitwero kwano ne macalo citi ma pe jenge I kom gamente.
teo_prompt: Ineresinei lu atuboros eyangautu aingiseta nuikamunitos eyaitene loka itaunin luipu kotoma aiboisit. Ediopet kotoma otaun kangol loeutai airereonor ngesi Fortportal, lo epedori arai bo mam epedorio aiwadikaun kwape esite lo aipugaikin bon.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara o'diru 'diyi eji zita eyi e'yo tawuni ndundu angu 'di ma alea 'diyi ma driceza ma dria. Aku ambo alu 'dile 'bani ma ale andrizu ri Fortportal, 'bani eco 'du ekile aku ambo ngulupisi ri le kaniku ku.
nyn_prompt: Okuhanuura okuhweireho kureesireho ebibuuzo ebikwatiraine n'obwebembezi bw'endembo nyingi omu kyanga. Orurembo rumwe nk'orwo orurikushwijumwa ni Fortportal, orurikubaasa kutwarwa nk'orurembo orwetongoire.

eng_prompt: Arua is one of the key urban centers in Uganda, known for its vibrant culture and economic activities. It serves as a hub for trade and transportation in the North West region of the country.
lug_prompt: Arua kye kimu ku bibuga ebikulu mu Uganda, ebimanyiddwa olw'ebyobuwangwa n'ebyenfuna byayo ebinyuma. Kikola ng'ekifo eky'obusuubuzi n'entambula mu kitundu ky'obukiikakkono bw'obugwanjuba bw'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Arua obedo acel me kin boma madongo I lobo Uganda, ma oywek pi tekwaro ki biacara ne. Obedo kabedo me cato wil ki wot I kumalo me kupoto ceng me lobo man.
teo_prompt: Erai Arua ediopet kotoma oibuga luepolok noi ko Uganda, ejenara noi kanuka inonosio ke keda aswamisinei ke nuka ikapun. Iswamai kwape aiboisit naka agwelanar keda alosit kotoma atutubet nako Nyakoi nako Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Arua ni angu aku ambo kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma azi, 'ba ni eri ma e'yo a'bi ni 'diyi pie tualu e'yo robia ni 'diyi pie. Eri azi nga angu tujari ni azini acipa ni kari 'di ma woko oruleru etuni 'dezuri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Arua n'emwe aha ndembo enkuru omu Uganda, emanyirwe ahabw'eby'obuhangwa n'eby'obushuubuzi. Nikikora nk'omwanya gw'eby'obushubuzi n'engyenda omu kicweka ky'amatemba g'oburengyerwa-izooba bw'eihanga.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the power of choice is fundamental to governance. Citizens gather to voice their opinions and preferences, shaping the future of their communities.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, eddembe ly'okwesalirawo lya mugaso nnyo mu bukulembeze. Bannansi bakungaana okwogera ebirowoozo byabwe n'ebyo bye baagala, okutondawo ebiseera by'ebitundu byabwe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, twero me yero ngat moni pire tek tutwal I tela. Anywali gure kacel me miyo tam gi ki ngo ma gimito, ki yubu anyim pa kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka aseo, apedor naka aseun erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma apugan. Iriamununete itunga kanu aitodun aomisio kec keda nu ekotosi kesi, aitolomun ingaren naka atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alea, okpo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu ri eri orodriru e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma alea. Kari anzi eyi tra eyi e'yo eyini ega 'diyi nzezu tualu e'yo eyini le 'diyi pie eyini ani ewu ewu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi edezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, obushoborozi bw'okucwamu n'obw'omugasho omu bwebembezi. Abatuuragye nibateeranira hamwe okworeka ebiteekateeko byabo n'ebi barikwenda, kugira ngu bakore aha biro by'omumaisho by'ebyanga byabo.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, effective governance relies heavily on grassroots leadership. As key figures in their communities, local chairpersons play a crucial role in ensuring that services reach the people who need them most.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, enfuga ennungi yeesigama nnyo ku bukulembeze obwa wansi. Ng'abantu abakulu mu bitundu byabwe, ba ssentebe b'ebitundu bakola omulimu omukulu okulaba ng'obuweereza butuuka eri abantu ababwetaaga ennyo.
ach_prompt: I Uganda, tela maber jenge tutwalle I kom tela ma aa ki bot lwak. Macalo dano ma pigi tego I kabedo gi, won kom me tedero timo tic mapire tek tutwal I neno ni kony oo bot joo ma mito kony.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, apugan na iswamai ejok esipokina noi keda engarenone lo okwap. Kwape itunga luepolok noi kotoma atutubenakec, iswamaete lukapolok aiboisio nuapolok noi kanu awanyun ebe edolonokinete aijanakino itunga lu ipudasi kes noi.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, driceza kililiru ri le driceza engazu 'ba ele 'diyi vu. Ekile 'ba okporu ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ru, ogua e'i eyi azi okporu ni nga nezu ra kini azakoma eyi ca 'ba eyini le saaru 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, obwebembezi burungi, nibwegamira munonga aha bwebembezi oburi ahansi. Nk'abantu b'omugasho omu byanga byabo, bakuru b'ebyanga nibakora omurimo gw'amaani okureeba ngu obuheereza bwahika ahari abo abuburikwetenga munonga.

eng_prompt: As the population continues to grow and urban areas expand, local leaders have proposed the creation of new districts to better manage resources and services. However, this initiative has sparked a heated debate among lawmakers and citizens alike.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu gweyongera okukula n'ebibuga okugaziwa, abakulembeze b'ebyalo bateesezza okutondawo disitulikiti empya okusobola okuddukanya obulungi ebintu n'obuweereza. Kyokka, enteekateeka eno ereeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi mu babaka ba palamenti ne bannansi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano tye ka medde ki dongo ki dongo pa boma, lutela me tedero gumiyo tam me cako districts manyen me tic maber i kom jami ki kony. Kadi bed kumeno, yub man okelo laro lok madit tutwal ikin luwang lwak I ot moko cik ki lwak bene.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga keda aiboisio nuka itaunin, etemokisi engarenok luka atutubena aitolomun idisitriktan luitetiak kanu aidar iboro keda aijanakino. Konye, eyangaunit aomisioit ngin epeget loepol noi kanejaas imeeban luka airabet keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: O'bi ma kalafe ni mu drile tuzu azini angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma kalafe ni zoria, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi fe egata distrikiti o'diru 'diyi e'dozu eyini ani afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru. Kani si, e'yo 'di eji agbatara okporu 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi ma eselea kari anzi yi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu nigugumizamu nigweyongyera kandi n'emyanya y'endembo neeyeyongyera, abebembezi b'ebyaro bateireho enteekateeka y'okutandikaho disiturikiti ensya, kugira ngu babaase kureeberera kurungi eby'obugaiga n'obuheereza. Kwonka, enteekateeka egi ereesireho okuhanuura ahagati y'abany'eishengyero hamwe n'abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: In order to secure the necessary financial support, the newly established districts must adhere to strict guidelines. This includes submitting comprehensive documentation to meet the expectations of the funding bodies.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okufuna obuyambi bw'ensimbi obwetaagisa, disitulikiti empya ezitondeddwawo zirina okugoberera ebiragiro ebikakali. Kino kizingiramu okuwaayo ebiwandiiko ebijjuvu okusobola okutuukiriza ebisuubirwa ebitongole ebivujjirira.
ach_prompt: Me nongo kony me lim ma mite, districts manyen omyero gulub cik matek tutwal. Man kwako cwalo coc weng ma mite me cobo miti pa dul ma miyo lim.
teo_prompt: Kanu adumun agangat na ikapun, ekot idisitriktan lu itolomunitai luitetiak atupakinit ikisila lu ikisila. Imoriarit ngin aijukar aiwadikaeta kere kanu aitodolikin nu ekoto atukona nuka agangat.
lgg_prompt: Atita robia niri esuzu, le distrikiti 'bani e'do o'diru 'diyi ma obi azita okporu 'diyi ma vuti. E'yo 'di ma alia, le 'ba ma o'ba kokobi dria eyini ani ecozu e'yo 'bani ega amuti robia fepi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuhwezi bw'esente oburikwetengwa, disiturikiti ensya ezatandikirweho, zishemereire kukuratira ebiragiro by'amaani. Eki nikitwariramu okureeta ebihandiiko byona, okubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'ebitongore ebirikugaba esente.

eng_prompt: As urbanization continues to accelerate across Africa, many cities are experiencing rapid population growth and development. In particular, Kampala has been identified as a key player in this trend, with significant investments in infrastructure and housing.
lug_prompt: Ng'okukulaakulana kw'ebibuga kugenda mu maaso okwanguwa okwetooloola Afirika, ebibuga bingi bifuna okukula kw'abantu okw'amangu n'enkulaakulana. Okusingira ddala, Kampala etegeerekese ng'omuzannyi omukulu mu muze guno, n'okusiga ensimbi okunene mu bikozesebwa n'amayumba.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dongo lobo tye kamedde I lobo Afrika, wel dano tye ka medde I boma madongo mapol. Ki niang Kampala tutwalle macalo kabedo ma pire tek tutwal I yub man, ki keto lim madit tutwal I gedo ki odi.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor apol naka itaunin ko Africa, eyatakinos itaunin luipu noi keda apol. Aponi kojenunai Kampala kwape akeran loepol noi kotoma aswamisioit kana, kojaasi keda iboro luipu luitolomete ikapun kotoma aiboisio keda itogoi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tawuni eyi ma ezota ni mu drile angu Africa ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi, aku ambo karakara eyi ma alea 'ba eyi ma kalafe ni tu ra tualu angu ezoma ni 'diyi pie. E'yo 'di ma alea, 'ba esu Kampala ni 'ba okporu e'yo 'di ma alea ni ru, erini lonyi vuti aleza okporu 'diyi 'bazu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma alea azini jo eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'abantu omu ndembo nikugyenda omu maisho omuri Afirika, endembo nyingi nizikura kandi zitunguuka. Okukira munonga, Kampala etungirwe nk'omurimo gw'amaani omunkora egi, n'okutamu sente nyingi omu byombeko hamwe n'amaju.

eng_prompt: Having a clear plan in place is essential for success. By outlining your objectives, you can create a structured approach to reach them effectively.
lug_prompt: Okuba n'enteekateeka etegeerekeka obulungi kyetaagisa nnyo okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Bw'olaga ebiruubirirwa byo, osobola okutondawo enkola entegeke okubituukako obulungi.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki yub maber pire tek tutwal pi nongo loc. I yoo me tito miti ni, itwero yubu yoo maber me cobo ne.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda ainapeta nuecaete ejok kanu akerianut. Kowai lo aitetem alosikinetekon, ipedori ijo aitolomun ewai lo itemokinitai kanu adolokin kes ejok.
lgg_prompt: Ovuzu otita kililiru be ri be ri eri orodriru drile suza ni. E'yo mini lele 'diyi ecezurisi, mi eco geri 'bani ecozu eyi esuzu kililiru 'diyi ede ra.
nyn_prompt: Okugira enteekateeka nungi n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi. Waashoboorora ebigyendererwa byawe, noobaasa kutunga omuringo gw'okubihikiiriza kurungi.

eng_prompt: By implementing a proactive monitoring system, the organization aims to enhance its decision-making processes. This approach will enable them to identify and address issues before they escalate.
lug_prompt: Mu kuteekawo enkola y'okulondoola, ekitongole kiruubirira okutumbula enkola yaakyo ey'okusalawo. Enkola eno ejja kubasobozesa okuzuula n'okugonjoola ebizibu nga tebinnayonooneka.
ach_prompt: I yoo me keto yub me ngiyo kit ma tic tye kawot kwede, dul ne tye ki miti me yubu yoo me moko tam. Yoo man bikonyogi me niang ki cobo peko mapud pe gudoko rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aitegear ewai lo aanyanar, ekot erionget aitojokar ainapeta nuka aitolomun aseununeta. Ebuni epone lo aingarakin kes ajenun ka aitemokin atiokisio eringa eyangauna.
lgg_prompt: Geri 'bani e'yo eyi ma pamvu onezu ri si, amuti 'da le geri erini e'yo pezu 'diyi ma omgbo otu. Geri 'di ni nga eyi ma aza ko e'yo eyi ma aza kozu de nga po'di eyi ma omgbo esi ku.
nyn_prompt: Ekitongore nikigyenderera kutunguura enkora yakyo y'okusharamu kurabira omu kutaho enkora y'okureebuuza. Enkora egi neija kubabaasisa kumanya n'okukora aha nshonga zitakatandikire.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and preparation, the final approvals have been secured. Excitement is building as the cities prepare to launch their new initiatives.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okwetegekera, olukusa olusembayo lufuniddwa. Obwagazi bweyongedde nga ebibuga byetegekera okutongoza enteekateeka zaabyo empya.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki yubbe, kimoko tam me agiki. Yomcwiny tye ka mede ikare ma citi tye ka yubbe me cako ticgi manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka aitemonokin, aponi koinakinai acamanar. Ejai aiyalama naepol noi naarai ekapakina isitei aitegear aswamisinei kec nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini eyi otuzu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba esu driwala asizu 'diyi 'bo. Ayiko zo o'bi eyi ma eselea ekile aku ambo eyi oturia otita eyini o'diru 'diyi e'dozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okweteekateekyera, orusa rw'ahamuheru rutungirwe. Okushemererwa kuriyo nikweyongyera ahabwokuba endembo nizetebekanisa kutongoza emirimo yaazo misya.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and negotiations, the government finally approved the infrastructure project. As a result, the cities have been allowed to start building roads.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okuteesa, gavumenti yasembye okukkiriza pulojekiti y'ebizimbe. N'ekyavaamu, ebibuga bikkiriziddwa okutandika okuzimba enguudo.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki winye, gamente dong omoko yub me gedo. Macalo adwogi ne, kiyee ki citi me cako yubu gudi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka ipegeta, abu apugan kocam epurojekt lo aduko. Kanuka ngun, ecamakitai isitei ageun aiduk irotin.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi 'yezu azini e'yo otuzu 'bori ma vutia, gamete ai asizu otita afa ndundu eyi sizu 'da ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ai aku ambo eyi e'dozu nzila eyi sizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okuteesa, gavumenti ekahendera yaikiriza purogyekiti y'okwombeka. N'ekyarugiremu, endembo zikwikirizibwa kutandika kukora enguuto.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent challenges and growing discontent among the citizens, it has become clear that a change in governance is necessary. Many residents feel that the current administration has failed to address their needs effectively.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa okwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'obutali bumativu obweyongera mu bannansi, kyeyoleka bulungi nti enkyukakyuka mu bukulembeze yeetaagisa. Abatuuze bangi bawulira nti gavumenti eriwo eremereddwa okukola ku byetaago byabwe obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko matye cokcok-ki kacel ki cwer cwiny matye kamede I kin anywali, nen atyer kamaleng ni aloka loka I tela obedo gin ma mite. Lutedero mapol gitye ki tam ni gamente matye kombedi pe twero cobo miti gi maber.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nupac keda amamut aiyalama kanejaas itunga, ecai cut ebe ibusakinit aijulakin epugae. Eomitos itunga luipu ebe epiko eyaitene loakwana aitemokin ipudesia kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru kari anzi eyini esu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku kari anzi eyini 'diyi ma eselea ri pie, eca e'da kini le 'ba ma oja e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ra. Ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ega kini driceza curu'do ri o'bi e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma aza ko kililiru ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburiho obwahati hamwe n'obutashemererwa obweyongyeire omu bantu, nikyoreka butunu ngu empindahinduka omu bwebembezi neeyetengwa. Abatuuragye baingi nibateekateeka ngu obwebembezi oburiho obwahati buremirwe kukora ahabyetengo byabo kurungi.

eng_prompt: As the meeting commenced, the atmosphere was charged with anticipation. The leaders gathered around the table, eager to hear about the latest initiatives shaping their community.
lug_prompt: Olukiiko bwe lwatandika, abantu baali beesunga nnyo. Abakulembeze baakuŋŋaanidde ku mmeeza nga baagala nnyo okuwulira ku bintu ebipya ebiri mu kitundu kyabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kacoke ocake, dano gubedo ki miti madit tutwal. Lutela gucokke I nget meca, ki miti me winyo lok I kom yub matye katime I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Neageunia airiamunet ngin, apotu itunga luapotu kojaasi keda aiyalama. Apotu engarenok kotukokinos aiboikin emesa, ekotosi apupokin nuikamunitos akiro nuitetiak nuiswamaete kotoma atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ni e'doria, 'ba eyi ndra asi 'baza be tre. Drice'ba eyi tra eyi mesa ma ageyia, ava be e'yo o'diru 'diyi erizu e'yo ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma edeta ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Orukiiko ku rwatandikire, abantu bakaba baine amatsiko. Abeebembezi baketeerana aha meeza, baine ekihika ky'okuhurira ebirikukwata aha by'obuhangwa bwabo.

eng_prompt: Recent discussions about the restructuring of local school districts have sparked significant controversy. Many community members are voicing their concerns over the potential impact of the proposed district merges.
lug_prompt: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku kuddamu okutegeka disitulikiti z'amasomero kuleeseewo okusika omuguwa okw'amaanyi. Abantu bangi mu kitundu balaze obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku biyinza okuva mu kiteeso ky'okugatta disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki I kom yub me roco gangi kwan me tedero okelo apoka-poka madit tutwal. Lwak mapol tye ka nyutu lworo gi i kom adwoki me ribbe pa districts.
teo_prompt: Ineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos aitemonokin idisitriktan lu isomeroi eyangautu engunget loepol noi. Itunga luipu luka atutubet itodunitos aiyalongongokec kanuka atiokisio nuka aimorikikin idisitriktan.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara o'diru 'diyi e'yo distrikiti sukulu eyini 'diyi ma esele cozu o'diru ri ma dria ri fe agata ga tre. Ba ongulumu eyi ma alea karakara eyi asi otiza eyi e'da e'yo eyini eco 'ye distrikiti eyi ma ti ecita si ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okuhanuura okuherize kubaho aha nshonga y'okuhindura disiturikiti z'amashomero, kireesireho obutaikirizana bw'amaani. Abantu baingi omu byaro nibereka okwerarikirira kwabo aha bikwatiraine n'enteekateeka y'okugarukanisa za disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: As urban development continues to expand, the government has implemented a plan to create several new districts. These areas are designed to accommodate the growing number of residents moving to the city.
lug_prompt: Ng'enkulaakulana y'ebibuga yeeyongera okugaziwa, gavumenti etadde mu nkola enteekateeka y'okutondawo disitulikiti empya eziwerako. Ebifo bino byakolebwa okusobola okusuza omuwendo gw'abatuuze ogweyongera ogugenda mu kibuga.
ach_prompt: Kit ma dongo lobo me boma tye kamede kwede, gamente okatti ki yub me cako districts mapol. Kabedo magi kiyubu gi me gwoko wel lutedero matye kabino I boma madit.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos apol naka itaunin, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuka aitolomun idisitriktan luitetiak luipu. Itemonokinitai aiboisio nu kanu aidar itunga luiyatasi alosit oibuga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni tawuni eyi ma alea ri ni mu drile, gamete 'ba otita azi distrikiti o'diru 'diyi e'dozu karakara. Ba ede angu 'diyi 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma kalafe tupi tupi aku ambu cityniri ma alea 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku entunguuka y'endembo erikugumizamu, gavumenti eteire omu nkora enteekateeka y'okutandikaho disiturikiti nsya nyingi. Emyanya egi ekateebwaho okureberera omuhendo gw'abatuuragye ogweyongyeire kuza omu rurembo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote gender equality within the organization, the board has decided to expand the number of women representatives. This change aims to ensure that diverse perspectives are better represented in decision-making processes.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obwenkanya mu kikula ky'abantu mu kitongole, akakiiko kasazeewo okugaziya omuwendo gw'abakiise abakyala. Enkyukakyuka eno egendereddwamu okukakasa nti endowooza ez'enjawulo zikiikirirwa bulungi mu nkola z'okusalawo.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor rwom me mon ki coo I dul enoni, dul madoro dul enoni omoko tamgi me medo wel luwang mon. Aloka-loka man tye ki miti me neno ni dano ma tam gi pat pat gubedo tye ikare me moko tam.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitopolorite nuka angor kotoma atukot kangin, abu eyaitene loingaranakinete angor kiyatakin enaaba loka abwoikinitok nungor. Alosikinet naka aijulanakineta ngun ngesi awanyun ebe ebwoikitai aomisio nuegelegela kotoma aitolomunun aseununeta.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri otuzu amuti 'da ma alea, board 'da ai 'ba pa tupi oku eyi ma paria 'diyi ma kalafe ra. Ojata 'diri lezu nezu ra kini 'ba pa tu e'yo ndundu eyi ma dria e'yo peta pezu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho oburinganiza omu kikura ky'abantu omu kitongore, akakiiko kashaziremu kwongyera aha muhendo gw'abakazi abarikujwekyera. Empindahinduka egi neegyenderera okureeba ngu enshonga ezitari zimwe zijwekyerwa kurungi omu by'okucwamu.

eng_prompt: In recent elections, voter turnout has varied significantly across different regions. This disparity has led to some districts having a high number of voters.
lug_prompt: Mu kulonda okwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo, abalonzi babadde ba njawulo nnyo mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. Enjawulo eno ereetedde disitulikiti ezimu okuba n'omuwendo gw'abalonzi omungi.
ach_prompt: I yer ma okato cokcok-ki, wel lubol kwir obedo pat-pat I but lobo mapat-pat. Apoka-poka man oweko districts mukene tye ki wel lubol kwir madwong.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aseo napac, egelegela noi enaaba loka aseak kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Apotu atiakatiaka ngin koyangautu icie idisitriktan ajaut keda enaaba loepol loka aseak.
lgg_prompt: Opetaa ebipi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, kalafe 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma eselea ri ndra ndundu angu ndundu eyi ma alea. Esele coza 'diri fe distrikiti azi 'diyi ma kalafe 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ni ovuzu angiri.
nyn_prompt: Omu karuuru akahweireho, abateezi b'akaruuru tibarikushushana omu byanga ebitarikushushana. Entaaniso egi ereesire za disiturikiti ezimwe kugira abateezi b'akaruuru baingi.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, it is essential that every voice is heard and valued. Ensuring fairness in governance requires that all community members have a say in decision-making processes.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, kikulu nnyo buli ddoboozi okuwulirwa n'okutwalibwa ng'eky'omuwendo. Okukakasa obwenkanya mu bukulembeze kyetaagisa abantu bonna mu kitundu okuba n'ekigambo mu nkola z'okusalawo.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, pire tek tutwal ni dwon pa dano weng ki winyo dok ki woro gi. Neno ni tela tye maber mito ni lwak weng gubed ki dwon gi ikare me moko tam.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, ejokuna noi apupio ka aitapatan iporotoi luka itunga kere. Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna kotoma apugan ekot itunga kere luka atutubet ajaut keda akirokec kotoma aitolomunun aseununeta.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru kini 'ba ma eri o'duko 'ba dria ni azini 'ba ma 'du eri orodriru. Driceza kililiru ri le 'ba dria ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma ovu e'yo nzeza be e'yo peta pezu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki, n'eky'omugasho buri jwi kuhurirwa kandi rikaheebwa ekitiinisa. Okureeba ngu hariho oburinganiza omu bwebembezi nikyetengyesa ngu abantu boona b'omubyanga bagire ekibagambaho omu by'okucwamu.

eng_prompt: During the meeting yesterday, the district leaders reviewed the recent initiatives and discussed the progress made in various schools. Overall, the atmosphere was positive, and everyone seemed satisfied with the current developments.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko olwatudde eggulo, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti beetegerezza enteekateeka ezaakakolebwa era ne bateesa ku nkulaakulana ekoleddwa mu masomero ag'enjawulo. Okutwalira awamu embeera yali nnungi era buli omu yalabika okuba omumativu n'enkulaakulana eriwo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke ma obedo laworo, lutela me district guneno kit ma tic tye kawot kwede ki bene gunywako lok I kom dongo pa gangi kwan ma padi padi. Pol pa dano gubedo ki yomcwiny pi jami matye katime kombedi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet bian, apotu engarenok luka edisitrikt airereonorata aswamisio nu iswamasi kosomeroi lu egelegela. Kawasia, ajokuna noi ejautene, ido esubit bala eyalamasi itunga kere keda apol naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi aje ri ma alea, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi one e'yo eyi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi dika eyi agbatara gba e'yo angu ezoma ni sukulu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo dria ma alea, angu nderi ndra onyiru, azini 'ba dria e'da kini yi ayikosi e'yo i 'yepi sawa 'disi 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rwa nyomwebazyo, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti, bakashwijuma enteekateeka ezibaireho obwahati, reero bahanuura aha ntunguuka omu mashomero agatari gamwe na gamwe. Okutwarira hamwe, embeera ekaba nungi kandi buri omwe akaba naareebeka nk'orikumarwa n'entunguuka eriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events that have caused widespread concern, community members have expressed their anxiety and frustration. To address the growing unrest, the district leaders have appealed to people to be calm.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko ebireeseewo okweraliikirira okungi, abantu b'ekitundu balaze obweraliikirivu n'okunyiiga kwabwe. Okumalawo obutabanguko obweyongera, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti basabye abantu okubeera abakkakkamu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ma okelo lworo I kin lwak, lwak onyuto lworo ki cwer cwiny gi. Me tyeko lweny matye kamede, lutela me district gulego lwak me bedo ma cwiny gi opye mot.
teo_prompt: Katupitos akiro nueswamasi pac nuepedorete ayangaun aiyalongong, apotu itunga luka atutubet itodiasi aiyalongongokec keda aiyalongongokec. Kanu aitemokin amumu na iyata, apotu engarenok luka edisitrikt ilipata itunga ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ebipi yi 'yepi o'diru asi otiza fepi 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza azini candi eyivile 'diyi. E'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi ai 'ba eyi aa'zu e'yere.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebiherize kubaho ebirikureetaho okwerarikirira, abantu b'omukyanga boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo n'okwerarikirira. Okukora aha butabanguko obweyongyeire, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti, bashabire abantu kuguma baine obucureera.

eng_prompt: As urbanization accelerates, more individuals are drawn to cities in search of better opportunities. However, this rapid growth often exacerbates existing social and economic challenges.
lug_prompt: Ng'okukulaakulana kw'ebibuga kweyongera, abantu bangi bagenda mu bibuga okunoonya emikisa emirungi. Newankubadde, okukulaakulana kuno okw'amangu kutera okwongera okusoomoozebwa kw'embeera z'abantu n'ebyenfuna ebiriwo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dongo lobo tye kamedde, dano mapol tye kabino i citi ka yenyo gum me tic maber. Kadi bed kumeno, dongo lobo man ma otimme oyot-oyot tutwal ni medo peko me kwo pa lwak ki biacara matye.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor apol naka itaunin, epote itunga luipu alosit otaunin aimo arerengesio nuajokak. Konye, apol na katipet itopolori atiokisio nu ejaas itunga keda ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Angu eyi ma zota ni tuzu okposi ri si, 'ba karakara eyi emu aku ambo eyi ma alea drileba muke 'diyi ndazu. Kani si, zota mbele mbele 'diri tuni e'yo ewaru o'bi yi ma eselea azini e'yo robiani 'diyi ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'abantu omu ndembo, nikureetera abantu baingi kuza omu ndembo kuronda emigisha mirungi. Kwonka, entunguuka y'amaani neeyongyera ahaburemeezi oburiho omu by'entaasya n'embeera z'abantu.

eng_prompt: It is essential to invest in the education and development of our youth. They hold the potential to shape the world in ways we can only imagine.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso okuteeka ssente mu by'enjigiriza n'enkulaakulana y'abavubuka baffe. Balina obusobozi okukyusa ensi mu ngeri gye tuyinza okulowoozaako.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me keto cente I kwan ki dongo lobo pa bulu. Gitye ki kero me yubu lobo I yoo ma pe watwero byekone.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aipikakin ikapun toma asioman keda apol naka atumunak wok. Ejaasi kesi keda apedor naka aijulakin akwap koponesio lu ipedori oni aomoom.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru tujari 'yezu onita azini zota 'ba ode amavile 'diyiniri ma alia. Eyi ma okpo ecozu wudrikuru 'bazu geri amani ecozu e'dazu 'diyi ma alea ci.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho okuta esente omu kwegyesa n'okutunguura eminyeeto yaitu. Biine obushoborozi bw'okuhindura ensi omu miringo ei turikubaasa kuteebereza.

eng_prompt: While urban life offers many opportunities, it also comes with its own set of challenges. From noise pollution to high living costs, city dwellers often face significant drawbacks.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'obulamu bw'omu bibuga buleeta emikisa mingi, naye era bujja n'okusoomoozebwa kwabwo. Okuva ku maloboozi amabi n'ebbeeyi y'ebintu eya waggulu, abatuuze b'omu bibuga batera okwolekagana n'ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kwo me boma kelo gum mapol, ento bene kelo peko mapol. Cako I kom woo ma aa ki I kabedo mapatpat me oo I wel cente madit tutwal ma mite pi kwo, lutedero ipol kare ginongo peko mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida ijaikini aijar na otaun arerengesio nuipu, ebuni keda atiokisio ke. Ageun keda acelanar naepol noi kitoni etiai loepol noi loka aijar, ejaas itunga luko oibuga keda atiokisio nuepolok noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aa'zu aku ambu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea ri ni tro drileba karakara eyi fe ra ti, eri vini emu e'yo ewaru 'diyi pie. Engazu o'duko efupi onzi 'diyi vu kpere aje idri nyazaniri ma ongmbo ururi vu, 'ba aa'pi aku ambo eyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: N'obu amagara g'omu ndembo garikuheereza emigisha mingi, nigareeta n'oburemeezi bwago. Abantu abarikutuura omu ndembo, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani, kuruga aha bwire bw'akaimukiriro, kuhisya aha ntambura y'amaani.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for skilled labor in the local construction industry, a new vocational training program was launched. This initiative aimed to empower displaced individuals by providing them with valuable skills for future employment.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'abakozi abakugu mu by'okuzimba mu ggwanga, enteekateeka empya ey'okutendekebwa mu by'emikono yatongozebwa. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula abantu abaasengulwa nga babawa obukugu obw'omuwendo olw'emirimu egy'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lutic ma ludiro I tenge me gedo, kicako yub manyen me pwonyo tic cing. Yub man obedo me tyelo kor joo ma oryemogi ki I gangi gi kun minigi diro me tic ma pigi tego I kare me anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka eswamak lu emisiaritos kotoma aiduk, aponi kitegearai ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aitutuoro. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai aitigogong itunga lu aponi itobwounai kotoma aiboisio kec kowai lo aijaikin kes acoa naepol noi kanu adumun aswamisinei koingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azi'ba onduaru okalamvu afa sizu kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, 'ba e'do otita onita afa edele drisi 'diyiniri o'diru ni. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi dri okpo fezu geri eyini ondua orodriru eyini ecozu azi esuzu ewu drialeri ma alea risi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'abakozi b'eby'emikono omu by'okwombeka omwihanga kweyongyera, puroguraamu y'okutendeka abantu omu by'emikono etandikirweho. Enteekateeka egi ekaba egyendereire kutunguura abantu ababingirwe omu maka gaabo, obwo erikubaheereza emyoga y'omugasho y'emirimo omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, the students were finally ready to celebrate their achievements. The atmosphere was filled with excitement and anticipation as families gathered to witness the momentous occasion.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga bakola n'obunyiikivu, abayizi baali beetegefu okujaguza ebituukiddwaako. Embeera yabadde ejjudde essanyu n'okusuubira ng'amaka gakungaanidde okulaba omukolo ogw'omugaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny, lutino kwan dong onongo gitye atera me kwero jami ma gutimo. Lwak gubedo ki yomcwiny madit tutwal I kare ma gugure me neno yub man ma pire tek tutwal-li.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogongu, akapakina kwana esisiak ainumunum aitodolikineta kec. Apol noi aiyalama keda aiyalama ne atukonokinata ikalia kanu asesen epucit loepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu avasi azini asi anzuru ma vutia, sukulu anzi 'da eyi ndra ngonde ayiko zu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Angu nderi ga ayiko si tualu asi 'baza be familia yini trazu yi ma eselea omu inzile inzi 'da ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, abeegi bakaba beteekateekire kujaguza ebikozirwe. Embeera ekaba eijwire okushemererwa n'okutegyereza ahabw'okugira ngu amaka gakateeranira hamwe kureeba omukoro gw'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote education and empower young women, the organization launched a new initiative. This program aims to provide opportunities for talented girls to gain international experience and broaden their horizons.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyenjigiriza n'okutumbula abakyala abato, ekitongole kyatongoza enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa abawala abalina ebitone omukisa okufuna obumanyirivu mu nsi yonna n'okugaziya ebirowoozo byabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor kwan ki tyelo kor mon matino, dul ne ocako yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me miyo gum ki lutino anyira ma gitye ki talanta me nongo ngec ki diro me tic I lobo mawoko.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor asioman ka aitigogong angor nudidika, abu erionget kitegea ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi ainakin apesur luejaasi keda atalanta arereng naka adumun amisiarit kotoma akwapin nukokinga ka aisiekikin aomisiokec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu onita ma omgbo otuzu azini oku oderu 'diyi dri okpo fezu, amuti 'da e'do e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu drileba fezu ezoanzi talanta be 'diyini e'yo esuzu kari eselia dika eyi ma egata ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obwegyese n'okutunguura abakazi bato, ekitongore kitandikireho enteekateeka nsya. Puroguraamu egi negyenderera okuheereza abaishiki abaine etaraanta emigisha y'okumanya ebirikukwata aha mahanga g'aheeru, n'okugaziya enteekateeka yaabo.

eng_prompt: During the recent faculty meeting, several exciting developments were announced regarding the curriculum. Among these updates, the program head highlighted the introduction of new educational offerings.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'abasomesa olwaliwo gyebuvuddeko awo, ebintu bingi ebisanyusa byalangirirwa ebikwata ku nteekateeka y'ebisomesebwa. Mu bino ebipya, akulira pulogulaamu yayogeddeko ku kutongoza eby'enjigiriza ebipya.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke pa lupwonye ma okato cokcok-ki, kicwalo lok angeya me dongo lobo mapol makwako pwony. I kin ngec manyen magi, lawii dul enoni oloko tutwalle I kom yub manyen me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka esisiak, aponi kolimorai akiro nuikamunitos aisisiaeta. Kotoma aijulanakineta nu, abu lokapolon ainapeta kitetem nuka aitolomunio naka iboro luitetiak luka aisisia.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi faculti eyini ri ma alea, 'ba azi e'yo ndundu ndundu eyini esu sukulu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo o'diru 'diyi ma eselea, drile otita 'da niri ece e'yo 'bani afa onita ni o'diru 'diyi e'dozu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'abeegyesa orwahwireho, ebintu bingi ebirikushemeza bikarangirirwa ebikwatiraine n'enkora y'eishomo. Omu mpindahinduka ezi, orikukurira puroguraamu, akagamba aha kutandika kw'eby'obwegyese ebitsya.

eng_prompt: After months of preparation and anticipation, students and faculty gathered to celebrate a significant milestone. Families traveled from near and far to witness the achievements of their loved ones.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okwetegekera n'okusuubira, abayizi n'abasomesa baakuŋŋaana okujaguza ekintu ekikulu ennyo. Amaka gaatambula okuva kumpi n'ewala okulaba ebituukiddwaako abaagalwa baago.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yubbe, lutino kwan kacel ki lupwonye gucokke me kwero nino ma pire tek tutwal. Gangi gu aa ki kabedo ma cok ki mabor me neno jami ma dano gi otimo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemonokin keda aomisio, apotu esisiak keda esisiak kotukokinos ainumunum akiro nuapolok. Apotu ikalia koloto kotoma aiboisio nueyapiete keda nukokinga kanu awanyun aitodolinikineta nuka luminan kec.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuza azini egata ma vutia, sukulu anzi eyi tualu imba'ba eyi pie eyi tra eyi okuzu e'yo azi okporu ni inzizu. Familia eyi aci engazu angu inyia azini re 'diyi ma alea eyini ani e'yo eyini 'ye 'ba eyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria ri ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okweteekateekyera, abeegi n'abeegyesa baketeeranira hamwe okujaguza omukoro gw'amaani. Amaka gakatambura kuruga haihi n'aha hare kureeba ebi abakundwa baabo batungire.

eng_prompt: In recent years, local schools have introduced vocational training programs to help students develop practical skills. As a result, many boys in the district are good at carpentry work.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, amasomero g'omu byalo gatandiseewo pulogulaamu z'okutendeka abayizi mu by'emikono. N'ekivuddemu, abalenzi bangi mu disitulikiti balungi mu kubajja.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, gangi kwan me tedero gucako yub me pwonyo lutino ki diro me tic cing. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino awobe mapol I district gitye ki diro me payo bawo.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, etolomutu isomeroi luka atutubet ainapeta nuka aitutuonoro kanu aingarakin esisiak adumun acoa naka aswam. Kanuka ngun, isap luipu kodisitrikt ejokuka noi kotoma aswam naka abawoi.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, sukulu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do otita imbatani afa edele drisi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi sukulu anzi eyi ma aza kozu ondua afa edele drisi 'diyi ezozu. E'yo 'disi, agupianzi karakara distrikiti 'da ma alea 'diyi azi mbawu si 'diyi 'ye onyiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, amashomero g'omubyaro gatandikireho enteekateeka y'okutendeka abeegi eby'emikono. N'ekyarugiremu, aboojo baingi omu disiturikiti, nibakora gye emirimo y'okubaija.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the importance of community engagement, the minister initiated a series of meetings with local leaders. Together, they identified key areas where support and resources were needed to empower the younger generation.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obukulu bw'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu, minisita yatandikawo enkiiko eziwerako n'abakulembeze b'ebyalo. Wamu, baazudde ebitundu ebikulu awaali obwetaavu bw'obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa okutumbula omulembe omuto.
ach_prompt: I niang ber pa ribbe pa lwak, minista ocako kacoke mapol ki lutela me tedero. Kacel, gunongo kabedo mapigi tego kama kony ki lim mite pi ilo malo rwom me tic pa joo matino.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun ajokis naka aimorikikin itunga, abu eminista kitegea airiamununeta keda engarenok luka atutubet. Nepepe apotu kesi kodumutu aiboisio nuepolok nu ekotoi agangat ka iboro kanu aitigogong atumunak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo orodri ongulumu eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea risi, minisita 'da e'do mitingi karakara eyi drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi pie. Eyi esu tualu angu okporu 'bani atita azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi lezu 'ba oderu 'diyi dri okpo fezu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya omugasho gw'okureeta abantu omu byaro, minisita akatandikaho enkiiko n'abebembezi b'ebyaro. Boona hamwe, bakareeba emyanya y'omugasho ahu obuhwezi n'eby'okukoresa byabaire nibyetengwa kutunguura eminyeeto.

eng_prompt: As we prepare for the upcoming training session, it's important to highlight the qualifications of our instructor. Their extensive background ensures that we will receive valuable insights and knowledge.
lug_prompt: Nga twetegekera okutendekebwa okujja, kikulu okulaga ebisaanyizo by'omusomesa waffe. Ebyafaayo byabwe ebinene bikakasa nti tujja kufuna amagezi n'amagezi ag'omuwendo.
ach_prompt: Ka watye ka yubbe pi pwonye matye kabino ni, pire tek tutwal me nyutu rwom me kwan pa lapwonywa. Ngec gi mapol weko wanongo ngec ki ngec ma pigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kwape iuta sio aitemonokin kanu aitutuonoro na ebunit, ejokuna aitodun nu iswamaete esisianakinak wok. Akiro kec nuepolok nuepedorete aingarakin oni adumun acoa naejok.
lgg_prompt: Amani ama otuta 'yeria imbata emupi ri ni, eri orodriru e'yo 'ba imbapi amavile 'diyiniri ecezu. E'yo eyini oni 'diyi ma omgbo angiri ri ni fe amani ondua orodriru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obu turikwetebeekanisiza okutendekwa okurikwija, n'eky'omugasho kworeka ebirikwetengwa omushomesa waitu. Eby'obuhangwa bwabo nibyoreka ngu nitwija kutunga okwetegyereza n'obwengye bw'omugasho.

eng_prompt: The school organized a fundraising event to showcase the creativity of its students. As a result, parents eagerly supported their children by purchasing the unique craft items on display.
lug_prompt: Essomero lyategese omukolo gw'okusonda okulaga obuyiiya bw'abayizi baayo. N'ekyavaamu, abazadde baawagira abaana baabwe nga bagula ebintu eby'emikono eby'enjawulo ebyayolesebwa.
ach_prompt: Gang kwan ne oyubu yub me jogo cente me nyuto diro pa lutino gi. Macalo adwogi ne, lunyodo gukonyo lutino gi ki miti madit kun gi wilo jami mapat-pat ma kiyubu ki cing gi.
teo_prompt: Abu esomero itemok aituk ikapun kanu aitodun acoa naka esisiak. Kanuka ngun, apotu auriak igangakisi idwekec kopone loka agwel iboro luitodiaritai.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu 'da otu omu robia trazu ni sukulu anzi eyi ma ondua e'dazu. E'yo 'disi, tipika eyi fe atita anzi eyivile 'diyini geri eyini afa edele drisi 'diyi jezu eyini ani.
nyn_prompt: Eishomero rikatebekanisa omukoro gw'okushorooza esente okworeka obukugu bw'abeegi baayo. N'ekyarugiremu, abazaire bakahwera abaana baabo barikugura ebintu by'omutaano ebyorekirwe.

eng_prompt: After completing the intensive program, she seemed more energized and focused. It was clear that the training had a significant impact on her daily habits.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumaliriza pulogulaamu ey'amaanyi, yalabika ng'alina amaanyi mangi era ng'afaayo. Kyali kyeyoleka bulungi nti okutendekebwa kwalina kinene kye kwakola ku nneeyisa ye eya buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Ingee tyeko pwonye matek tutwal, en nen calo obedo ki kero dok oketo cwinye I tic. Onen atyer kamaleng ni pwonye ne okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo ne me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka angetakin ainapeta ngun, esubit bala ajaasi ngesi keda agogongu naepol noi. Acai cut ebe abu aitutuoro ngin itojokari iponesioke luka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Otita okporu 'da dezu 'bori ma vutia, eri ena okpo azini asi 'baza be angiri. Eri ndra e'da kililiru kini imbata 'da 'ye ojata okporu adriza erini o'du driasi ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara puroguraamu y'amaani, akareebeka aine amaani n'amaani. Kikaba nikyoreka butunu ngu okutendekwa kukakora kihango aha mitwarize ye eya buriizooba.

eng_prompt: In her small workshop filled with colorful yarn, the lady spends her days crafting cozy garments. She has a passion for knitting and a special place in her heart for the little ones in her community.
lug_prompt: Mu musomo gwe omutono ogujjudde obuwuzi obwa langi ez'enjawulo, omukyala amala ennaku ze ng'akola engoye ez'ebbeeyi. Ayagala nnyo okuluka era alina ekifo eky'enjawulo mu mutima gwe eri abaana abato mu kitundu kye.
ach_prompt: I ka tic mege matidi ma opong ki bongo ma rangi ne beco tutwal, dakoni tiyo ki kare ne me yubo bongi mabeco tutwal. En maro cubo bongo dok maro lutino matino me kabedo ne mada.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunike naejaasi keda icupai luibusiak noi, eyangaikini aberu ngin apaaranike kotoma ainap igoen luibusiak noi. Emina ngesi noi aidony keda aiboisit na itegelikina kotoma etau ke kanuka idwe lu atutubeteke.
lgg_prompt: Otita erini azi ngazuri ma alia eri ma o'du 'du bongo ndrizaru 'diyi edezu. Eri le saaru bongo soza ma dria dika eri ma asi ma pari ndu ni anzi nyiri eri vile angua 'diyi dri ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu kishengye kye kikye ky'okushomeramu ekirimu emyenda ya rangi nyingi, omukazi namara ebiro bye byoona arikukora ebijwaro birungi. Naakunda kuruka kandi aine omwanya gw'omutaano omu mutima gwe aha baana bato omu kyanga kye.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges the family faced, she stepped in to offer her support. Her experience in teaching made her an invaluable resource for the children.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba yali amanyi okusoomoozebwa ab'omu maka ge kwe baali boolekaganye nakwo, yayingira mu nsonga n'abawa obuyambi. Obumanyirivu bwe mu kusomesa bwamufuula ow'omugaso ennyo eri abaana.
ach_prompt: I nge niang peko ma lugang ne tye ka kato ki iye, en odonyo I tic me miyo kony. Ngec ma en tye kwede I tic me pwony oweko en obedo lapwony maber tutwal ki lutino.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuetereikina keda ekale, abu ngesi kopedo aigang. Abu amisiarit ke kotoma aisisianakin ijaik ngesi aswam naejok noi mama ejaasi idwe.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo ewaru familia 'da ni esu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, eri fi pa so atita fezu. E'yo erini esu imbazaniri fe erini ovuzu orodriru anzi nyiri yi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi obu eka yaabo yaabaire etungire, akeejumba omu by'okushagika. Obumanyi bwe omu by'okwegyesa, bukamureetera kuba eky'omugasho munonga aha baana.

eng_prompt: After years of struggling to make ends meet, he finally decided it was time to take action. With determination in his heart, he began searching for opportunities that would provide a brighter future for his little girl.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'alwana okusobola okweyimirizaawo, yasemba okusalawo nti kye kiseera okubaako ky'akolawo. Ng'amaliridde mu mutima gwe, yatandika okunoonya emikisa egijja okuwa muwala we omuto ebiseera eby'omu maaso ebitangaavu.
ach_prompt: Ingee tute matek pi mwaki mapol me nongo cente, en dong omoko tamme ni kare dong oromo me timo gin mo. Ki miti matek I cwinye, en ocako yenyo gum me bedo ki anyim maber pi nyare matidi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aitelekaar aijar, abu ngesi kodum ebe erai apak naka aswam ngun. Keda apodokinitike, abu ngesi kogeu aimo arerengesio nuepedorete aijaikin akooke ingaren naejok.
lgg_prompt: Eli erini dri ciria afa dria esuzu 'bori ma vutia, asizu asizu asizu kini sawa ca 'di e'yo 'yezu ra. E'yo asi 'baza be, eri e'do drileba nda ecopi eri vile zamva wereari dri ewu drusiri fepi onyiru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi arikurwana kwebaisaho, ahamuheru akasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okukora. Ahabw'amaani omu mutima gwe, akatandika kuronda emigisha erikubaasa kuhwera omwishiki we omuto kugira ebiro birungi by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: As part of the culinary program, participants engaged in hands-on workshops focused on baking techniques. By the end of the course, they had gained confidence in their abilities to create delicious desserts.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekitundu ku pulogulaamu y'okufumba, abeetabye mu misomo beenyigira mu misomo egyesigamiziddwa ku bukodyo bw'okufumba emigaati. Ku nkomerero y'omusomo, baali bafunye obwesige mu busobozi bwabwe okukola eby'okulya ebiwooma ebiwooma.
ach_prompt: Macalo but yub me tedo, dano gubedo ki kacoke me pwonyo kit me tedo mugati. I agiki me pwonye, onongo dong gitye ki tek cwiny I kom kero gi me yubu dek mamit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nuka aipo, apotu itunga kojaikinos toma airiamununeta nuka ainom emugati. Kangetakinet naka ekoosi, apotu kesi odumutu amuno naka aitolomun inyamat luejijim.
lgg_prompt: Otita nyaka a'dizaniri ma azi ru, 'ba emu'ba 'diyi 'ye otita imbatani yi ma dria geri nyaka a'dizaniri ma dria. Onita 'da ni i deria, eyi esu ndra asi'baza eyini ecozu nyaka nyazaru 'diyi edezu ra ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka y'okuteeka, abeejumbiremu bakeejumba omu mishomo y'okuteeka emigaati. Omushomo ku gwahwaire, bakaba batungire obwesigye omu maani gaabo g'okukora ebyokurya ebirimu ebiriisa.

eng_prompt: After researching the local market and identifying a growing demand for affordable, homemade food, I realized there was a lucrative opportunity waiting for me. With my passion for cooking and a few secret recipes, I knew I could turn my skills into a profitable venture.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ku katale k'omu kitundu n'okuzuula obwetaavu bw'emmere ey'ebbeeyi eya wansi, eyakolebwa awaka, nakitegedde nti waliwo omukisa ogunsubirizza. Olw'okwagala kwange okufumba n'enkola ez'ekyama ntono, nnali nkimanyi nti nsobola okufuula obukugu bwange omulimu oguleeta amagoba.
ach_prompt: Inge kwedo cuk me tedero ki niang ni dano mapol tye ka mito cam ma kiyubu ki gang ma wele yot, aniang ni gum madit tye kakura. Ki mar ma atye kwede pi tedo ki diro me tedo, angeyo ni atwero loko diro na me doko biacara ma kelo magoba.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic esokoni loka atutubet ka ajenun eipuda lo itunga kanu agwel inyamat lu iswamao ore, abu eong ajenun ebe ejai arereng naka adumun ikapun luipu. Keda aminaka naka aipo keda iponesio idis lu aiyeyea, ajeni eong ebe apedori eong aijulakin acoa ka araun aswam na ikapun luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ma vuti ondaza cuu angu amavile 'diyi ma alea ri ma vutia azini e'yo 'bani lezu nyaka aje kokoru, edele akua 'diyi ma dria ri ma vuti ondazu 'bori ma vutia, ma esu ra kini drileba azi onyiru ni te ma te. Afa mani lele nyaka a'diza ma dria tualu geri ndindiru 'diyi pie, ani ra kini ma eco ma vile ondua 'diyi oja tujari orodriruni ru ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza akatare k'omukyanga kandi nkareeba okwetenga kw'ebyokurya eby'omuhendo gw'ahaiguru, nketegyereza ngu hakaba hariho omugisha murungi oguri kundinda. Ahabw'okukunda kwangye okuteeka hamwe n'okukoresa emiringo etari emwe n'emwe, nkaba nimanya ngu nimbaasa kuhindura emyoga yangye omurimo ogurikureeta amagoba.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, I finally landed a stable job with a decent salary. The financial struggles that once weighed heavily on my shoulders have begun to lift.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga nkola n'obunyiikivu, nnatuuka n'okufuna omulimu ogusasula obulungi. Obutabanguko mu by'ensimbi obwali bunzitooweredde ku bibegabega byange butandise okukendeera.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwinya I tic, agiki ne anongo tic matye ki mucara maber. Lweny me cente ma yam obedo peko madit tutwal I wiya dong ocako aa woko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong, abu eong adum aswam naejok keda eropit loejok. Ationis naka ikapun naepol noi kotoma apak kana ageun aitemokin.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza okporu azini asi anzuru ma vutia, ma esu asizu azi kililiru azini musara onyiru be ra. E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria okpo amboru ma dria 'diyi e'do asi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'obweziriki, nkahendera nabona omurimo ogurikwetengwa kandi ogurikuheebwa omushaara murungi. Oburemeezi bw'esente obwabaire buremeire ebibegabega byangye, butandikire kwihwaho.

eng_prompt: Access to sustainable resources is crucial for the well-being of displaced communities. Providing them with the means to cultivate their own crops can significantly enhance their quality of life.
lug_prompt: Okufuna eby'obugagga eby'olubeerera kya mugaso mu mbeera y'abantu ababundabunda. Okubawa ebikozesebwa okulima ebirime byabwe kiyinza okutumbula ennyo omutindo gw'obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Nongo jami ma mite ikare weng pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo pa lwak ma oryemogi ki I gangi gi. Miyo itgi yoo me puru cam gi twero ilo malo rwom me kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Adumunun iboro lu eyuara erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aijar naka itunga lu aponi itobwounai. Aijaikin kes ewai lo akoru iraanakec epedori aitojokar adoketait na aijarakec.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru ewu drile ri ma alea 'diyi esuzu ri eri orodriru aa'ta muke ongulumu eyini aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ni. Afa yini ecozu ori yini 'diyi ezozu 'diyi fezu yi dri ri eco eyi ma edri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga eby'obugaiga ebirikubaasa kugumaho n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obuhangwa bw'abantu ababingirwe omu maka gaabo. Okubaha obuhwezi bw'okuhinga ebihingirwe byabo, nikibaasa kwongyera aha mutindo gw'emituurire yaabo.

eng_prompt: To ensure the longevity and functionality of their tools, the organization provided guidelines for proper maintenance. It is essential for the beneficiaries to implement these practices effectively.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti ebikozesebwa byabwe biwangaala n'okukola obulungi, ekitongole kyawa ebiragiro ku kulabirira obulungi. Kya mugaso eri abaganyulwa okussa mu nkola enkola zino obulungi.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni jami tic gi orii pi kare malac, dul ne omiyo yoo me tic maber. Pire tek tutwal ki joo ma obi nongo kony me keto yub eni itic maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe eyangaikinete kesi iboro lu itwasamao, abu erionget ijaik aicoreta nuka aidar ejok. Erai ibore yenepol noi lu emedaunak aitegear aswamisio nu ejok.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma idri ta mbazu azini azi ngazu kililiru, amuti 'da fe azita eyi e'yo eyi ma tambazu kililiru 'diyi ma dria. Eri orodriru 'ba orodri esupi 'diyi ni 'yeta 'diyi 'yezu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya ngu ebikwato byabo nibibaho kumara obwire buraingwa, ekitongore kikaheereza engyenderwaho y'okureeberera kurungi. N'eky'omugasho abarikugasirwamu okuta ebikorwa ebi omu nkora kurungi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for gender equality and economic independence, local leaders proposed a new initiative. After extensive planning and community engagement, the women empowerment project was implemented in Gulu.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okwenkanankana mu kikula ky'abantu n'okwefuga mu byenfuna, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baateesa ku kaweefube omupya. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteekateeka ennyo n'okuyingiza abantu mu nsonga, pulojekiti y'okutumbula abakyala yateekebwa mu nkola mu Gulu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa mon me bedo marom ki coo ki coo, lutela me tedero gumiyo tam manyen. Ingee yube maber tutwal ki bedo tye pa lwak, yub me tyelo kor mon ki keto itic i Gulu.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud lo eyas loka angor keda ikiliok airiamara keda ikiliok keda angor, apotu engarenok luka atutubena kitolomutu aomisioit naitetet. Akaulo naka aitemonokin ejok keda aimorikikin itunga, aponi kitegearai epurojekt lo aitigogong angor ko Gulu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri ma aza kozu tualu drice'ba angu eyini aa'zu agupi eyi pie ri pie, drice'ba angu eyini 'diyi fe egata e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otuta angiri 'yezu azini ongulumu eyi ma ti ojizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'do otita okpo feza oku eyini ri 'yeta ma alea angu Gulu niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'ekyetengo ky'oburinganiza hamwe n'okwetegyeka omu by'entaasya, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakataho enteekateeka nsya. Bwanyima y'okukora enteekateeka nungi hamwe n'okwetabamu kw'abantu, purogyekiti y'okutunguura abakazi ekateebwa omu nkora omuri Gulu.

eng_prompt: The sun began to rise over the horizon, casting a golden glow on the water. As the boats returned from their night out at sea, the bustling landing site came to life with the sounds of fishers preparing for the day's activities.
lug_prompt: Enjuba yatandika okuvaayo mu bbanga ng'eyaka ng'ezaabu ku mazzi. Nga amaato gadda okuva mu kiro kyago ku nnyanja, ekifo ekijjudde abantu kyajja mu bulamu n'amaloboozi g'abavubi nga beetegekera emirimu gy'olunaku.
ach_prompt: Ceng ocako ryeny I kor piny, ma obedo ka ryeny I wi pii. I kare ma yeya ne odwogo ki I dyeworgi I nam, kabedo ma dano mapol tye iye odoko kwo ki dwon pa lumak rec ma tye ka yubbe pi tic me nino enuni.
teo_prompt: Abu akolong kogeu aibwo kwap, kosodi aica akipi. Neabongununei imaten kotoma akwarakec, apotu aiboisit naejaasi keda itunga luipu kodumutu aijar keda iporotoi luka ekamak agaria aitemonokin kanuka aswamisinei nuka aparan.
lgg_prompt: Etuka e'do e'do efu angu 'da ma dria, erini wura meleruri 'bezu yi ma dria. O'bo 'diyi ni emvizu engazu yi aliarisi, angu 'bani yi o'bezu 'diyi eca idriru o'duko 'ba e'bi 'bepi 'diyini yi oturia e'yo yini 'ye o'du 'da ma alia 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba rikatandika kuruga ahaiguru, niryaka nk'ezaabu aha maizi. Obwato ku bwabaire nibugaruka kuruga omu kiro kyabwo aha nyanja, omwanya ogwabaire gurimu abantu baingi gukaba guri ogw'amagara n'eiraka ry'abashohi barikwetebeekanisiza emirimo y'eizooba.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing needs of the local population, officials have been discussing plans for regional development. As part of this initiative, the government aims at establishing new infrastructures in Moyo district.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'abantu b'omu kitundu obweyongera, abakungu babadde bateesa ku nteekateeka z'okukulaakulanya ekitundu. Ng'omu ku nteekateeka eno, gavumenti eruubirira kuteekawo ebizimbe ebipya mu disitulikiti y'e Moyo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki miti pa lutedero matye kamede, lutic gubedo ka nywako lok I kom yub me dongo lobo. Macalo but yub man, gamente tye ki miti me yubu jami mapat-pat manyen I dicitrwik me Moyo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubet, eutasi eswamak aitemitem ainapeta nuka apol naka atutubet. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ekoto apugan adukun aiboisio nuitetiak ko disitrikta loko Moyo.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba eyi e'bi agbatara gba otita angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma dria e'yo 'ba angu ma alea 'diyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, gamete le afa ayuzaru o'diru 'diyi si distrikiti Moyo niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu b'omubyaro ebyeyongyeire, abakuru batwire nibagamba aha nteekateeka z'entunguuka y'ekyanga. Omu nteekateeka egi, gavumenti negyenderera okutandikaho ebyombeko bisya omu disiturikiti ya Moyo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to stimulate economic growth and attract new businesses, local officials sought innovative strategies to enhance the region's appeal. One of the key initiatives discussed was the implementation of financial incentives for investors.

eng_prompt: To facilitate high-speed internet access in remote coastal areas, a new communication system has been developed. This innovative solution aims to connect isolated communities to the global network.

eng_prompt: To improve connectivity and access to essential services, a new infrastructure project has been initiated in the region. This project involves the installation of extensive cable networks to enhance communication and power supply.

ach_prompt: Me yubu kubbe ki nongo kony ma mite pi kwo pa dano, kicako yub manyen me gedo I but piny eni. Yub man tye ki keto waya mapol me medo rwom me kubu lok ki mac.
