nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma enteekateeka za purogyekiti, tiimu ekateeranira hamwe kuhanuura ebirikubaasa kukora ahabyombeko by'omukyanga. Bakaba beerarikirire munonga oku okutaho za waaya ezaabaire niziija kutaataaganisa emihanda y'okutamburira aha maizi eriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: Health officials have reported an alarming increase in cases of fever and related symptoms among residents. As a result, they are investigating the potential causes and have identified a concerning trend in Moyo district.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bategeezezza ku kweyongera okw'entiisa mu balwadde b'omusujja n'obubonero obukwatagana nagwo mu batuuze. N'ekivuddemu, banoonyereza ku biyinza okuba nga bye biviirako era bakizudde nti waliwo embeera eyeeraliikiriza mu disitulikiti y'e Moyo.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni wel dano matye ka nongo two lyeto ki lanyut mapat-pat I kin lwak tye kamede tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka kwedo ngo ma twero kelo ne dok gunongo gin ma kelo lworo I distrik me Moyo.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis olimosi ebe iyata noi enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda eimidi keda ijenuneta luka eimidi. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aingic iboro luepedorete ayangaun ngun kosodete ajenun ibore yenepol noi kodisitrikta loko Moyo.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece e'yo 'ba azo fepi 'diyi ma kalafe tupi 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, eyi e'yo ecopi fepi 'diyi ma eti onda dika eyi esu e'yo azi asi otiza ni distrikiti Moyo niri ma alea ni.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bagambire aha kweyongyera kw'omushwija n'obubonero bwagwo omu batuura gye. N'ekyarugiremu, bariyo nibacondooza ebirikubaasa kurugwamu kandi batungire enkora y'okwerarikirira omu disiturikiti ya Moyo.

eng_prompt: Health officials are investigating a recent outbreak of yellow fever in the region. Local hospitals have reported an increase in cases, raising concerns among residents.
lug_prompt: Ab'ebyobulamu banoonyereza ku kubalukawo kw'omusujja gw'enkaka mu kitundu. Amalwaliro g'omu kitundu gategeezezza ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde, ekireeseewo okweraliikirira mu batuuze.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom tye ka kwedo peko me poto pa two yellow fever I but piny eni. Odi yadi me tedero guwaco ni wel dano matye ki two omede tutwal ma oweko lutedero tye ki lworo.
teo_prompt: Eutasi eswamak lu adekis aingic abwangun naka eimidi loidosoikini akonye kotoma aiboisit. Apotu adekisia luka atutubet olimosi ebe iyata enaaba loka adekak, eyangauni aiyalongong kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'yo eti onda e'yo azo yellow fever niri ma e'dota angu 'di ma alea ri ma dria. Arojo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo be 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra, e'yo 'di eji asi otiza 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara bariyo nibacondooza okubarukaho kw'omushwija gw'enkaka omu kyanga. Amarwariro g'omubyaro garangiriire okweyongyera kw'abarwaire, ekirikureetaho okwerarikirira omu batuura gye.

eng_prompt: In regions where yellow fever is endemic, health authorities implement rigorous screening measures. This ensures that individuals at risk are monitored and protected from potential outbreaks.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu omusujja gw'enkaka gye guli, ab'ebyobulamu bateekawo enkola enkakali ey'okukebera. Kino kikakasa nti abantu abali mu katyabaga balondoolebwa era bakuumibwa okuva ku kubalukawo kw'ekirwadde.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma two yellow fever onya iye, lutic yoto kom tiyo ki yoo me pim matek tutwal. Man weko dano ma peko tye I komgi ki neno ni ki gwokogi ki I kom peko ma twero poto.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuejaasi keda eimidi loidosoikini akonye, itwasamaete apedorosio nuka angaleu ainapeta nuka ainwakio. Einakini ngin awanyun ebe engicitai itunga lu ejai ationis ka ayuarite kanejaas adekasinei nuepedorete abwangun.
lgg_prompt: Angu azo yellow fever niri ni i erezu 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba alata ni 'diyi geri 'bani azo eyi ma rua o'bizu 'diyi 'ba okporu. Diri ne ra kini 'ba 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma pamvu andri azini yi ma ta mba e'yo ewaru ecopi e'dozu 'diyi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bicweka ahu omushwija gw'enkaka gurikujanjaara, ab'eby'amagara nibataho enkora y'amaani y'okukyebera. Eki nikihamya ngu abantu abari omu kabi nibarondoorwa kandi bakarindwa okubarukaho kw'oburwaire.

eng_prompt: Health officials conducted extensive testing on individuals who had been in close proximity to the confirmed yellow fever cases. The results have provided some reassurance regarding the spread of the virus.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu baakola okukebera okw'amaanyi ku bantu abaabadde kumpi n'abalwadde b'omusujja gw'enkaka abakakasiddwa. Ebyavudde mu kunoonyereza biwadde obukakafu obukwata ku kusaasaana kw'akawuka.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom gupimo dano mapol ma gubedo cok ki dano ma ki nongo ni gitye ki two yellow fever. Adwogi ne okelo gen i kom nya pa kwidi.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis inwakautu ainwakio naepol noi mama ejaasi itunga luejaasi keda itunga luejaasi keda eimidi loidosoikini akonye. Apotu akiro nuelomunitos koinakisi aomisio nuikamunitos awea naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ye o'bita angiri 'ba aa'pi 'ba azo yellow fever niri be 'diyi ma ageia 'diyi ma dria. E'yo efupi 'diyi fe asi omiza azi e'yo azo 'da ma ereta ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bakakora okukyebera kw'amaani abantu ababaire bari haihi n'abarwaire b'omushwija gw'enkaka. Ebyarugiremu bitumire abantu baingi baamanya oku akakooko ka korona karikujanjaara.

eng_prompt: Due to recent outbreaks in neighboring regions, health officials have expressed urgent concerns about the potential spread of yellow fever. However, the district is facing significant budget constraints that hinder their ability to respond effectively.
lug_prompt: Olw'okubalukawo kw'omusujja gw'enkaka mu bitundu ebiriraanyewo, abakungu b'ebyobulamu balaze obweraliikirivu obw'amangu ku kusaasaana kw'omusujja gw'enkaka. Kyokka, disitulikiti eyolekaganye n'ebbula ly'embalirira eriremesa okukola obulungi emirimu gyayo.
ach_prompt: Pi poto pa two i kabedo ma orumuwa cokcok-ki, lutic me yot-kom gunyuto lworo madit tutwal I kom nya pa two yellow fever. Kadi bed kumeno, dictrik tye ki peko me byek lim ma weko pe gitwero timo tic gi maber.
teo_prompt: Kanuka abwangun naka adeka naka yellow fever kotoma aiboisio nu idunyare, apotu eswamak luka angaleu itodutu aiyalongong naka awea naka yellow fever. Konye, etereikina edisitrikt keda ationis naepol noi naka ebajet naepedori aitikitik kesi aswam ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo efupi o'diru angu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alia 'diyisi, azi'ba alatani 'diyi ece asi otiza e'yo azo yellow fever niri ma ereta ma dria ra. Te, distrikiti ni e'yo ewaru bajeti ni 'diyi esu eyini ani ecozu e'yo nde 'yezu kililiru ri atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'omushwija gw'enkaka omu byanga ebituherereire, ab'eby'amagara boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'okujanjaara kw'omushwija gw'enkaka. Kwonka, disiturikiti eine eibura ry'embaririra eririkuremesa kukora kurungi.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak, health officials held a community meeting to discuss the urgent need for action. They emphasized the importance of collective efforts to combat the spread of the disease.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baatuuza olukiiko lw'ekitundu okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'okukolaganira awamu okulwanyisa okusaasaana kw'ekirwadde.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic me yot-kom gubedo ki kacoke me lok I kom miti me timo gin mo oyot-oyot. Guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me tic kacelo me lweny i kom nya pa two eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona, apotu eswamak luka angaleu iriamunos keda itunga kanu aitemitem nuibusakinit aswam katipet. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aswam nepepe kanu aitikitik awea naka adeka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ye mitingi ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea agbatara gbazu e'yo 'bani eco 'ye mbeleru ri ma dria. Eyi 'ba asi orodri okpo 'bazu tualu a'di 'dizu azo 'da ma ereta be.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati, abakuru omu by'amagara bakakora orukiiko rw'abantu b'omukyanga okuhanuura aha nshonga y'okukora ahonaaho. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okukorera hamwe okurwanisa okujanjaara kw'endwara.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak, health officials have been working tirelessly to educate the community about the risks associated with yellow fever. They organized workshops and distributed informational materials to raise awareness and promote preventive measures.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'omusujja gw'enkaka gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu babadde bakola butaweera okusomesa abantu ku kabi akali mu musujja gw'enkaka. Baategeka emisomo n'okugaba ebikozesebwa okumanyisa n'okutumbula enkola z'okwetangira.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic yoto kom gubedo ka tic matek me pwonyo lwak i kom rac pa two yellow fever. Guyubu kacoke me pwonye ki poko ngec me rweyo lwak i kom kit me gengo nyayo two.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka eimidi loidosoikini akonye, eutasi eswamak lu adekis aisisianakin itunga atiokisio nu ejaas keda eimidi loidosoikini akonye. Apotu kesi itemokisi airiamunun kosodete aikor akiro nuka aisisianakino kanu aisisianakin itunga iponesio luka aitikitik adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azo yellow fever niri ni e'dozu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ebi azi nga okpo kokoru imbata fezu o'bi eyidri e'yo onzi azo yellow fever niri ni 'diyi ma dria. Eyi otu otita imbatani 'diyi dika eyi awa afa imbatani 'diyi imbata fezu azini geri 'bani ecozu e'yo eyi atrizu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'omushwija gw'enkaka, abakuru omu by'amagara batwire nibakora n'amaani kwegyesa abantu akabi akarikuruga omu musujja gw'enkaka. Bakatebekanisa emishomo kandi bagaba ebikwato by'okumanyisa abantu n'okureetaho oburyo bw'okuzibira.

eng_prompt: The increasing number of infectious disease cases has raised concerns about the hospital's ability to manage patient care safely. As a result, a recent assessment highlighted significant gaps in the hospital's infrastructure.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde b'endwadde ezisiigibwa kuleeseewo okweraliikirira ku busobozi bw'eddwaliro okulabirira obulungi abalwadde. N'ekyavaamu, okwekenneenya okwakakolebwa kwalaga ebituli mu bikozesebwa mu ddwaliro.
ach_prompt: Rwom me medde pa wel lutwoo ma kobo okelo lworo I kom kero pa ot yat me gwoko lutwo maber. Macalo adwogi ne, ngiyo kor tic ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto peko madongo matye I yub me tic pa ot yat.
teo_prompt: Enaba lo iyatakina lo adekasinei nu ikopas eyangauni aiyalongong kanu apedorit adekis aidar adekak ejok. Kanuka ngun, abu aingic napac kitodu aibucanara naepol noi kotoma adukena nuka adekis.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe tupi tupi 'ba azo otipi 'diyi pie 'diyi fe asi otiza arojo eyi ma okpo aro fezu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, e'yo eti ondaza 'bani 'ye o'diru ri e'da e'yo onzi 'diyi arojo 'da ma afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire abarikukwatwa endwara ezirikuturira, kireesireho okwerarikirira ahabw'obushoboorozi bw'eirwariro kureeberera abarwaire kurungi. N'ekyarugiremu, okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka oburemeezi bw'amaani omu byombeko by'eirwariro.

eng_prompt: Due to recent budget cuts, the hospital has been struggling to maintain its supply of essential medical equipment. As a result, critical resources are becoming increasingly scarce.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukendeeza ku mbalirira gye buvuddeko, eddwaliro libadde lifuba okukuuma ebikozesebwa mu kujjanjaba ebikulu. N'ekivuddemu, ebintu ebikulu byeyongera okuba ebitonotono.
ach_prompt: Pi ngolo byek me lim ma otime cokcok-ki, ot yat tye ka tute matek me gwoko jami tic me ot yat mapigi tego. Macalo adwogi ne, jami ma pigi tego tye ka doko nok tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aitidisiar ebajet pac, etionikinit adekis aidar iboro lu itwasamao kanu amukian. Kanuka ngun, ikidioko noi iboro luepolok noi.
lgg_prompt: Otita aje robia niri ma omgbo esizu ri ma e'yosi, arojo 'da ebi dri ci afa ayuzaru arojo ni 'diyi ma tambazu. E'yo 'disi, afa orodriru 'diyi ma kalafe ni tu uru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyendeeza aha mbaririra y'eihanga, eirwariro ritwire niritahirira kuguma riine ebyoma by'okukoresa omu irwariro. N'ekyarugiremu, ebintu ebikuru biriyo nibyeyongyera kukyendeera.

eng_prompt: To ensure the safe and efficient handling of blood samples, the district health department needs to address the current challenges in sample transportation. Implementing proper storage solutions is essential for maintaining the integrity of these critical specimens.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti sampolo z'omusaayi zikwatibwa bulungi era mu ngeri ennungi, ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu mu disitulikiti kyetaaga okukola ku bizibu ebiriwo mu ntambuza ya sampolo z'omusaayi. Okuteekawo engeri ennungi ez'okuterekamu ebintu kya mugaso mu kukuuma obulungi bw'ebintu bino ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni kitingo remo maber dok maber, dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom omyero ocob peko matye ikit me cwalo remo. Keto yub me gwoko jami maber I tic pire tek tutwal pi gwoko jami magi ma pigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe eyuaritere aokot ejok, ekot ewai lo angaleu loka edisitrikt aitemokin atiokisio nu elosiere aokot. Aitolomun iwaitin lu idarere iboro ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar aijar naka iboro lu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani ari o'bizu kililiru azini kililiru ri nezu, le arakala alata ni distrikiti'a ri ma ko e'yo ewaru sa'wa 'disi 'diyi ma aza. Geri 'bani afa 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea ri eri orodriru afa 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eshagama erikukyeberwa neekorwa kurungi, ekitongore ky'ebyamagara ekya disiturikiti, nikyetenga kukora ahaburemeezi oburiho obwahati omu kutwara eshagama. Okuta omu nkora oburyo burungi bw'okubiika, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda oburungi bw'ebintu ebi ebirikwetengwa munonga.

eng_prompt: In the midst of the outbreak, the community faced a dire situation as the number of casualties continued to rise. Many volunteers stepped forward to help with the burials, but they were ill-equipped for the dangers they faced.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu kubalukawo kw'ekirwadde, abantu baayolekaganye n'embeera embi ng'omuwendo gw'abo abaakosebwa gweyongera okulinnya. Bannakyewa bangi baavuddeyo okuyambako mu kuziika, naye nga tebalina bikozesebwa olw'obulabe bwe baayolekaganye nabwo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me poto pa two eni, lwak gunongo peko madit tutwal I kare ma wel dano ma onongo awano omedde. Dano mapol ma gudyere gukati me konyo ikare me yik, ento pe gubedo ki jami weng ma mite pi peko ma gunongo.
teo_prompt: Kokiding na abwangunor adeka, apotu itunga kowanyutu ejautene loaronon naarai apolor enaaba loka itunga luemusunguna. Apotu itunga luipu luka aiyeyea kiswamata kanu aingarakin keda aidayo, konye mam kesi apedoritos aitikitik atiokisio nuapotu kesi odumutu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'da ni e'dozu ri ma talasi, ongulumu eyi esu e'yo onzi eyi kalafe 'ba eyini eyi avizu ri ni tutu risi. Ba karakara owi'ba yi ma ngulupi si 'diyi efu drile azakoma fezu avu saria, te eyi vu afa ayuzaru e'yo onzi eyini esu 'diyi yo.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okubarukaho kw'endwara, abantu bakashanga embeera mbi ahabw'okuba omuhendo gw'abantu abahutaziibwe gukeeyongyera. Abantu baingi abarikwehayo kuhwera omu kuziika, kwonka bakaba bataine by'okukoresa ahabw'oburemeezi obubaire nibubaho.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent tragedy that has affected our community, district leaders have mobilized resources to address the emotional needs of those impacted. Recognizing the profound grief experienced by many, they have prioritized providing assistance to families in mourning.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekikangabwa ekyakosa ekitundu kyaffe gyebuvuddeko, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti bakungaanyizza ebyetaago okukola ku byetaago by'abo abakoseddwa. Olw'okumanya ennaku ey'amaanyi bangi gye bayitamu, bakulembezza okuyamba ab'enganda mu kukungubaga.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko ma otimme cokcok-ki ma okelo peko i kabedo wa, lutela me district gu jogo jami ma mite me konyo joo ma peko eni otimme i komgi. Pien gingeyo can madit tutwal ma dano mapol tye ka kato ki iye, guketo pi miyo kony bot lugangi ma tye ka kumo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuetapit atakanun kotoma atutubetekosi, apotu engarenok luka edisitrikt ogurokisi iboro kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luetirorit. Kanu ajenun apipil naepol noi naetereikina keda itunga luipu, apotu kesi isingarenikisi aingarakin ikalia luka ngul luiticanete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ama vile ongulumu 'diyi bipi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi tra afa ayuzaru 'diyi 'ba e'yo ewaru isu'baa 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo candi amboru 'ba karakara eyini esu ri ma e'yo egazu risi, eyi 'du e'yo okporu eyini atita fezu familia eyini emvo 'be 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebihikiirizi ebirikuteganisa ekyanga kyaitu, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti bateireho ebintu by'okukora ahabyetengo by'abo abakosirwe. Ahabw'okumanya obusaasi bw'amaani obu baingi barikurabamu, bateireho enteekateeka y'okuhwera amaka g'abafereirwe.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve community health outcomes, the district health department launched a new initiative aimed at enhancing staff engagement. As a result, the district health department has motivated medical personnel.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulamu mu kitundu, ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu mu disitulikiti kyatongoza enteekateeka empya egendereddwamu okutumbula abakozi. N'ekivuddemu, ekitongole ky'ebyobulamu ekya disitulikiti kikubirizza abasawo.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me kony me yot kom I kabedo mapatpat, dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom I district ocako yub manyen ma ki keto pi medo rwom me tic pa lutic. Macalo adwogi ne, dul ma loyo lok kom yoto kom I district ocuku cwiny lutic yoto kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar eswamae loka angaleu kotoma atutubet, abu ewai lo angaleu ko disitrikt kitegea ainapeta nuitetiak nu ekotosi aitojokar eswamak. Kanuka ngun, abu ewai lo angaleu lo odisitrikt isinyikok eswamak lu adekis.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo alata ni ongulumu eyi ma alea ri otuzu, arakala alata ni distrikiti'a ri e'do e'yo azi o'diru azi'ba eyini 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, arakala alata ni distrikiti'a ri fe ava azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'amagara omu byaro, ekitongore ky'ebyamagara ekya disiturikiti kitandikireho enteekateeka nsya erikugyenderera okwongyera aha mirimo y'abakozi. Ekyarugiremu, ekitongore ky'ebyamagara ekya disiturikiti, kihaire abashaho amaani.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the voice of the citizens is paramount. It is essential that those in positions of power prioritize the needs and aspirations of their constituents.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya eddoboozi lya bannansi lye lisinga obukulu. Kya mugaso nnyo abo abali mu bifo by'obuyinza okukulembeza ebyetaago n'ebiruubirirwa by'abo be bakiikirira.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, dwon pa anywali pire tek tutwal. Pire tek tutwal ni lutela omyero guket miti pa lubol kwir gi obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, erai eporoto loka itunga ibore yenepol noi. Erai ibore yenepol noi ngul luejaasi toma aiboisio nuka apugan aisingarenit ipudesia keda ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alea, o'duko kari anzi eyini ri eri okporu ndeni. Eri orodriru 'ba pari opi nyazani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma 'ba e'yo 'ba yini opi nyazani 'diyi ma dria 'diyi okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, eiraka ry'abatuuragye niryo rikuru munonga. N'eky'omugasho abo abari omu myanya y'obwebembezi kwebembeza ebyetengo n'ebyetengo by'abantu abu barikujwekyera.

eng_prompt: The recent budget cuts have left many community programs underfunded, sparking outrage among residents. As the situation unfolded, it became clear that the local leaders were more focused on their own interests than the needs of their constituents.
lug_prompt: Okusala ku mbalirira gyebuvuddeko kulese pulogulaamu z'ekitundu nnyingi nga tezirina ssente zimala, ekivuddeko obusungu mu batuuze. Embeera bwe yagenda yeeyongera, kyeyoleka bulungi nti abakulembeze b'ebyalo baali beemalidde ku byabwe okusinga ebyetaago by'abalonzi baabwe.
ach_prompt: Ngolo byek me lim ma otime cokcok-ki oweko yub mapat-pat me kabedo mapat-pat peke ki lim ma oromo, ma okelo akemo ikin lwak. Ikare ma jami tye ka time, nen atyer kamaleng ni lutela me tedero gitye ka paro pi miti gi keken me kaka miti pa lubol kwir gi.
teo_prompt: Aijulanakineta nuka ebajet pac ajalakisi ainapeta nuka itunga luipu mam ejaasi keda ikapun luedolete, ido ayangau anyunyura kanejaas itunga. Neautar ejautene aijulakin, apotu kotakanutu ebe apodokinit engarenok luka atutubet ngun ipudesia kec bon itia ipudesia luka itungakec.
lgg_prompt: Otita aje robia niri ma omgbo esizu o'diru ri fe otita ongulumu eyini 'diyini robia esuzu ku, e'yo 'di fe 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini aokosi. E'yo ni mu drile, eca e'da kililiru kini drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi 'ba e'yo eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria aga e'yo 'ba eyini opi nyazu 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okukyendeeza embaririra y'eihanga, kireesire purogyekiti nyingi zitarikushashurirwa, ekireesireho ekiniga omu batuuragye. Embeera kuyabaire neegyenda omu maisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu abebembezi b'ebyaro bakaba nibafayo munonga aha byetengo byabo, okukira ebyetaago by'abantu abu barikujwekyera.

eng_prompt: The educational system in the area has faced numerous challenges over the years. As a result, access to quality schooling has been severely limited for the local population.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'ebyenjigiriza mu kitundu efunye okusoomoozebwa kungi okumala emyaka. N'ekivuddemu, abantu b'omu kitundu tebafuna buyigirize bwa mutindo.
ach_prompt: Yub me kwan I kabedo eni okato ki peko mapol tutwal I mwaki ma okato angec. Macalo adwogi ne, nongo kwan me rwom mamalo dong odoko tek tutwal ki lutedero.
teo_prompt: Adumunit erionget loka asioman kotoma aiboisit na atiokisio nuipu noi kokaru lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, mam itunga luka atutubet edumunenete asioman na abeit.
lgg_prompt: Geri onita ni angu 'da ma alea ri esu e'yo ewaru karakara eyi eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, geri 'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyini onita muke ri esuzu ri ebi ovu ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'eby'obwegyese omu kyanga etungire oburemeezi bwingi okumara emyaka mingi. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu b'omubyaro tibarikubaasa kutunga obwegyese burungi.

eng_prompt: The local schools have been struggling with inadequate resources and low student performance. To address these challenges, community leaders are calling for immediate action.
lug_prompt: Amasomero g'omu kitundu gabadde galwanagana n'ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa n'ensoma y'abayizi embi. Okusobola okuvvuunuka okusoomoozebwa kuno, abakulembeze b'ekitundu basaba wabeewo ekikolebwa mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Gangi kwan me tedero gubedo ka lweny ki peko me nok pa jami me tic ki lutino kwan me timo peny magoro. Me tyeko peko magi, lutela me kabedo gi tye ka lego ni myero kitim gin mo oyot oyot.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi isomeroi luka atutubet keda ationis naka amamus na iboro ka eswamae loaronon loka esisiak. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu, ekotosi engarenok luka atutubet aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi dri ci afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako si tualu sukulu anzi eyini agazu muke ku 'diyisi. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ai 'yeta mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Amashomero g'omubyaro gatwire nigarwanagana n'ebintu ebitarikumara hamwe n'okukora kubi kw'abeegi. Okukora ahaburemeezi obu, abebembezi b'ebyanga nibashaba okukorwaho juba.

eng_prompt: In a show of unity and faith, the local community gathered to welcome the Archbishop. His visit was highly anticipated, as he was set to lead the Eucharistic mass at Moyo Catholic parish.
lug_prompt: Mu kwolesa obumu n'okukkiriza, abantu b'omu kitundu baakuŋŋaanye okwaniriza Ssaabalabirizi. Okukyala kwe kwali kusuubirwa nnyo, kubanga yabadde ayolekedde okukulembera mmisa y'okusiima mu kigo ky'Abakatuliki e Moyo.
ach_prompt: I nyutu ribe ki niye, lwak gugure me jolo latel wi bicop. Kibedo ki gen madit tutwal I kom lim mege, pien en obedo ki yub me doro lega me ot lega I Moyo Catholic parish.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodun aimorikikina keda aiyuun, apotu itunga luka atutubet ogurokisi Ebisop lokapolon. Eomitai ebe ebuni ngesi aipejokin, naarai ebeit ngesi aingarenikin emisa loka eukaristia koMoyo Catholic Parish.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita azini aita e'dazu, 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi tra yi ma eselea Archbishopi a'izu. Ba ndra asi 'baza be omuru erivileri ma dria, a'disiku eri nga mu e'yo kanisa ni 'diyi ma dri ce angu Moyo Catholic Parish-a.
nyn_prompt: Omu kworeka okukwatanisa n'okwikiriza, abantu b'omukyanga baketeeranira hamwe okutangirira ishe abareeberezi. Okutayayira kwe kukaba kuteekateekwaho munonga, ahabw'okuba akaba nayeteekateekwaho kwebembera misa y'okushemererwa aha kigo ky'abakaturiki ekya Moyo.

eng_prompt: The long-standing effects of conflict and displacement have left deep scars on the community. As a result, differing opinions and grievances have emerged, leading to a fractured social fabric.
lug_prompt: Ebiva mu ntalo n'okusengulwa ebibaddewo okumala ebbanga eddene birese enkovu ku bantu. N'ekivuddemu, endowooza ez'enjawulo n'okwemulugunya bivuddeyo, ekiviiriddeko enjawukana mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Adwogi marac ma lweny ki rweny pa dano okelo pi kare malac ni oweko arem mapol tutwal I kom lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, tam mapat-pat ki koko mapat-pat okatti, ma okelo apoka-poka I kin lwak.
teo_prompt: Ationis na apak naepol noi naka ingungeta keda aibwot itunga kojalakisi aibucaret naepol noi mama ejaasi itunga. Kanuka ngun, apotu aomisio nuegelegela keda angurian kolomutu, ido ayangautu atiakatiaka kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni azini 'bani 'ba eyi ofuzu angu eyi ma alea risi sa'wa ezu 'diyi ku wura onzi eyi ongulumu eyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, egata azini onuta ndundu efu 'bo, e'yo fepi o'bi yi ma eselea esele cozu.
nyn_prompt: Ebyarugire omu butabanguko n'okuruga omu maka gaabo kumara obwire buraingwa, bisigire abantu enkovu nyingi. N'ekyarugiremu, ebiteekateeko ebitarikushushana n'okwetomboitwa bitandikire kubaho, ekirikureetaho okwebaganisamu omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and challenge, it is essential for believers to find strength and guidance. Embracing a deep spiritual connection can provide comfort and direction in their lives.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'okusoomoozebwa, kikulu nnyo abakkiriza okufuna amaanyi n'obulagirizi. Okukkiriza enkolagana ey'omunda ey'eby'omwoyo kisobola okubawa okubudaabudibwa n'obulagirizi mu bulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki peko, pire tek tutwal ki luyee me nongo kero ki tira. Bedo ki kubbe matut I yo me cwiny twero kelo kwe cwiny ki tira I kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka amamus ajenanut ka atiokisio, ejokuna noi itunga lu eyuunak adumun agogongu ka aingarenikinio. Aimorikikin keda eidicane loajokan loka edini epedori aijaikin kesi aisinyikokinio ka aingarenikinio kotoma aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru ma alia, eri orodriru 'ba a'ita be 'diyi ni okpo esuzu azini driceza esuzu. E'yo aa'zu 'ba eyi ma eselea okporu e'yo aitanisi ri eco eyi ma edri ma alea asi omiza azini driceza fe ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obutarikwetegyerezibwa n'oburemeezi, nikikuru abaikiriza kutunga amaani n'obwebembezi. Okukwatanisa omu by'omwoyo, nikibaasa kubaha okuhuumurizibwa n'obwebembezi omu magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: Collaboration among community members is essential for fostering growth and innovation. By pooling resources and ideas, we can create a more prosperous future for everyone involved.
lug_prompt: Enkolagana wakati w'abantu b'omu kitundu ya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula enkulaakulana n'obuyiiya. Bwe tukungaanya ebintu n'ebirowoozo, tusobola okutondawo ebiseera eby'omu maaso ebirungi eri buli muntu akwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Winye ikin lwak obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki dongo lobo manyen. Ka waribo jami ki tam, watwero yubu anyim maber pi dano weng matye iye.
teo_prompt: Aimorikikina kanejaas itunga erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor apol keda aitolomunun iboro luitetiak. Kowai lo aimorikikin iboro keda aomisio, ipedori oni aitolomun ingaren na ejok kanu itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi tualu egata eyi pie, ama eco ewu drialeri ma omgbo otu 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyini ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa kw'abantu b'omubyanga n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura entunguuka n'okujumbura. Kurabira omu kukorera hamwe n'ebiteekateeko, nitubaasa kureetaho ebiro bya nyensya birungi ahari buri omwe orikukwatwaho.

eng_prompt: The message of hope and redemption found in the gospel offers a transformative power that can guide believers through life's challenges. By accepting its teachings, Christians can experience profound personal growth and a deeper connection to their faith.
lug_prompt: Obubaka bw'essuubi n'obununuzi obusangibwa mu njiri buwa amaanyi g'enkyukakyuka agasobola okulungamya abakkiriza mu kusoomoozebwa kw'obulamu. Mu kukiriza enjigiriza zaayo, abakrisitaayo basobola okukulaakulana n'okukwatagana n'enzikiriza yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Kwena me gen ki laro kwo ma nonge i jiri tye ki teko me kelo aloka-loka ma twero konyo luyee me kato ki i peko me kwo. I yee pwony ne, lukricto twero dongo i yo matut ki kubbe matut ki niye gi.
teo_prompt: Akirot naka amuno keda alacakinio na ejai eijiri ejaasi keda apedor naka aijulakin itunga kotoma atiokisio nuka aijar. Kowai lo acamun aisisianakineta ke, epedorete ikurisitayon apoloun ka arucokina keda aiyuunikec.
lgg_prompt: O'duko asi'baza ni azini e'yo 'bani esu e'yo bari ma alea ri ni okpo ojata ejipi 'ba a'ita be 'diyi ma dri cepi e'yo ewaru idri ma alea 'diyi ma alea. Erini e'yo erini emba 'diyi a'izurisi, Kristayo eyi eco zo eyi ma ngulupi si azini eyi ma ti ecizu eyi ma aita be drile.
nyn_prompt: Obutumwa bw'amatsiko n'okucungurwa oburikushangwa omu engiri, nibubaasa kuhwera abaikiriza kurabira omu buremeezi bw'amagara gaabo. Kurabira omu kwikiriza engyesa zaayo, abakurisitaayo nibabaasa kutunguuka munonga n'okukwatanisa munonga n'okwikiriza kwabo.

eng_prompt: In a rapidly changing world, it is essential for believers to adapt their values and actions to address contemporary challenges. By embracing a forward-thinking mindset, Christians can better fulfill their responsibilities to society.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ekyuka mangu, kyamugaso eri abakkiriza okukyusa empisa n'ebikolwa byabwe okusobola okukola ku bizibu by'omulembe guno. Abakristaayo basobola bulungi okutuukiriza obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe eri abantu nga beettanira ebiseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, pire tek tutwal ki luyee me loko kitgi ki timgi me cobo peko me kare-ni. Kace gucako tamo pi anyim, ci lukricto twero cobo tic gi pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ijulakina katipet, ejokuna noi itunga lu eyuunak aijulakin iponesiokec keda aswamisiokec kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka apakio nu. Kowai lo aibwaikin aomisio nuka ngaren, epedorete ikurisitayon aitodolikin aswamukec mama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru i ojapi mbeleru ri ma alea, eri orodriru 'ba aita ni 'diyi ni eyi ma adriza ojazu eyini ani e'yo ewaru ewu 'disi 'diyi ma aza kozu. Kristiani eyini e'yo egazu ewu drialeri ma alea risi, eyi eco azi eyini ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'ye kililiru ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikuhinduka juba, niky'omugasho abaikiriza kuhindura emitwarize yaabo n'ebikorwa byabo, kugira ngu babaase kukora aha buremeezi oburiho hati. Abakristaayo nibabaasa kuhikiiriza gye obujunanizibwa bwabo omu bantu, barikukoresa emiteekateekyere y'ebiro bya nyensya.

eng_prompt: In times of reflection and spiritual growth, individuals often seek a deeper connection with their faith. Acknowledging one's shortcomings can lead to healing and forgiveness.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'okufumiitiriza n'okukula mu by'omwoyo, abantu batera okunoonya enkolagana ey'omunda n'enzikiriza yaabwe. Okukkiriza obunafu bw'omuntu kiyinza okumuviirako okuwona n'okusonyiyibwa.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lwodo lok ki dongo i yo me cwiny, dano ipol kare giyenyo kubbe matut ki niye gi. Ye bal pa ngat moni twero weko en cango ki timo kica.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu aomoom ka apolo, etapit itunga aimo arucokina naepol keda aiyuunikec. Aicun aibucanaro itunganan epedori ayangaun angaleu ka aitim.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'bani e'yo egazu azini zozu e'yo Mungunisi 'diyi ma dria, 'ba alu alu 'diyi tutuni e'yo yi ma a'ita be 'diyi nda. ꞋBani ꞌba azi ma eꞌyo onzi ꞌdiyi aꞌizu ꞌdiyi eco fe ꞌbani atizu azini truta esuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okuteekateeka n'okutunguuka omu by'omwoyo, abantu nibaronda enkoragana nungi n'enyikiriza yaabo. Okwikiriza enshobi z'omuntu nikibaasa kumureetera kukira n'okusaasira.

eng_prompt: Achieving a fulfilling and prosperous life often requires dedication and effort. To truly enhance one's quality of life, commitment to personal growth is essential.
lug_prompt: Okutuuka ku bulamu obumatiza era obugagga bulijjo kyetaagisa okwewaayo n'okufuba. Okutumbula ddala omutindo gw'obulamu bw'omuntu, okwewaayo mu nkulaakulana y'obuntu kyetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Nongo kwo ma opong ki yomcwiny mito keto cwiny ki tute matek. Me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa ngat moni, keto cwiny I dongo pa ngat moni pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Adumunun aijar najokan ido najokan ekoto duc ainakina keda agogongu. Kanu aitojokar adoketait na aijar itunganan, ejokuna noi apol naka itunganan.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu idri ayikosi azini drile suzaru ri ma esuta le sa'wa driasi ava feza azini okpo 'bazu drinia. Aa'zu 'ba alu ma idri ma omgbo otuzu, asi 'baza zota ma dria ri eri orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga amagara g'okushemererwa n'obusinguzi nikyetenga okwehayo n'amaani. Okwongyera aha mutindo gw'amagara g'omuntu, okwehayo kutunguuka n'eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: In a world increasingly divided by conflict and strife, many faith leaders are coming together to share a powerful message. They emphasize the importance of embracing one another and fostering a spirit of togetherness.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi eyeeyongera okwawukana olw'obukuubagano n'obukuubagano, abakulembeze b'enzikiriza bangi bajja wamu okugabana obubaka obw'amaanyi. Bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okukwatagana n'okukuza omwoyo gw'obumu.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma opoke tutwal pi lweny ki lweny, lutela dini mapol tye ka ribbe kacel me nywako kwena matek tutwal. Guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom ber pa jolo luwotwa ki dongo cwiny me ribe.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naetiakatiaka noi kanu ingungeta keda ingungeta, eutasi engarenok lu ediini aimorikikin aimor akiro nuepolok. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aimorikikin ka aitopoloria aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma esele coza e'yo ngiringiri ni azini ngiringiri ni 'diyisi ri ma alea, drice'ba aita ni karakara eyi emu tualu o'duko okporu 'diyi awazu. Eyi 'ba okpo orodri 'bani eyi atizu eyi ma eselea tualu eyi ma aa'ta tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erikweyongyera kwebaganisamu entaro n'obutabanguko, abeebembezi b'amadiini baingi bariyo nibekwatanisa kugabana obutumwa bw'amaani. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okwikiriza n'okureetaho okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: Despite its rich cultural heritage and natural resources, the region has faced numerous challenges over the years. Infrastructure and access to basic services remain severely lacking, hindering economic growth and development.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko eby'obuwangwa n'obugagga bw'obutonde, ekitundu kisanga okusoomoozebwa kungi okumala emyaka. Ebikozesebwa n'okutuuka ku mpeereza ezisookerwako bikyaliwo nnyo, ekiremesa enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kabedo man tye ki tekwaro ma beco ki lonyo ma lubanga aye ocweyo, kabedo man okato ki peko mapol tutwal I mwaki ma okato angec. Jami ma mite pi kwo ki nongo kony ma mite pud peke tutwal, ma eni gengo dongo lobo ki dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas keda inonosio luipu keda iboro lu isuban luka Edeke, etereikina aiboisit keda atiokisio nuipu kokaru lu atuboros. Iboro ka adumunun ejanakine lo itunga eringa ikidioko noi, itikitikete apol keda apol.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ovuzu e'yo a'bini 'diyi be angiri azini lonyi nyakuni 'diyi be ra ti, angu 'di esu e'yo ewaru karakara eli agapi 'diyi ma alia. Afa ayuzaru azini geri 'bani ecozu afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu ri ma ako ni nga po'di zota e'yo robiani azini angu ezoma niri atri.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obugaiga bw'eby'obuhangwa n'eby'obuhangwa,ekyanga kitungire oburemeezi bwingi okumara emyaka mingi. Ebyombeko n'okutunga obuheereza bikiriho, ekirikuremesa entunguuka n'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive landscape, leveraging available tools and opportunities is essential for success. By maximizing their resources, individuals can enhance their entrepreneurial efforts and drive growth.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero ey'okuvuganya, okukozesa ebikozesebwa n'emikisa ebiriwo kyetaagisa nnyo okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi. Abantu basobola okutumbula eby'obusuubuzi byabwe n'okutumbula enkulaakulana nga bakozesa obulungi eby'obugagga byabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare me pyem ma ite kare ni, tic ki jami tic ki gum ma tye pire tek tutwal pi nongo loc. Dano twero medo rwom me biacara gi ki dongo lobo gi ka gutiyo ki jami ma gitye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naka lolo, aitwasam iboro keda arerengesio nu ejaas erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut. Kowai lo aitwasam iboro kec ejok, epedorete itunga aitogogong aswamisinei kec kosodete aitopolor apol.
lgg_prompt: A'bala ewu andruri ma alea 'diyi ma alea, afa ayuzaru azini drileba ci 'diyi ayuzu ri eri orodriru drile suza ni. Afa yini 'diyi ma ongmbo otuza si, 'ba yi eco okpo yini tujari 'yezu ri ma omgbo otu azini zota eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu obw'okuhayahayana, okukoresa ebikwato n'emigisha ebiriho n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi. Abantu nibabaasa kutunguura eby'obushubuzi byabo kandi batunguure eby'entatsya yaabo, barikukoresa gye eby'obugaiga byabo.

eng_prompt: In today's complex and dynamic environment, effective leadership requires collaboration and input from diverse perspectives. By fostering a culture of inclusivity, organizations can enhance their problem-solving capabilities and drive better outcomes.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya leero enzibu era erimu enkyukakyuka, obukulembeze obulungi bwetaaga okukwatagana n'ebiteeso okuva mu ndowooza ez'enjawulo. Mu kutumbula obuwangwa obw'okuyingiza abantu bonna, ebitongole bisobola okutumbula obusobozi bwaabyo obw'okugonjoola ebizibu n'okuleeta ebivaamu ebirungi.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma jami tye mapol tutwal, tela maber mito winye ki tam ma aa ki bot dano mapol. I dongo tekwaro me bedo ki dano weng, dul mapat-pat twero medo kero gi me tyeko peko ki nongo adwogi maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka lolo loetiono noi, ekoto engarenone loajokan aiswamanara keda aomisio nuegelegela. Kowai lo aitopolor einono lo aimorikikin itunga, epedorete iriongeta aitemokin atiokisio kec kosodete aitodolikin akiro nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: Angu ewu andruri ma alea e'yo ewaru tu 'diyi ma alea, driceza kililiru ri le ti ecita azini egata engazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi otuzu risi, amuti eyi eco okpo eyini e'yo eyi ma aza kozu ri ma omgbo otu dika eyi eco agata muke 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire obu, obwebembezi burungi nibwetaga okukwatanisa n'okuheereza ebiteiso kuruga omu bantu batari bamwe na bamwe. Kurabira omu kutunguura eby'obuhangwa, ebitongore nibibaasa kutunguura obushoboorozi bwabyo omu kugonjoora oburemeezi n'okureetaho ebyarugamu birungi.

eng_prompt: Health officials have reported an increase in cases over the past few weeks. As a result, they are urging residents to take precautions against mosquito bites.
