eng_prompt: Recent reports from health officials indicate a concerning outbreak of yellow fever in several regions of the country. Among the most impacted areas are Moyo and Buliisa, where cases have been confirmed.
lug_prompt: Lipoota okuva mu bakungu b'ebyobulamu ziraga nti waliwo okubalukawo kw'omusujja gw'enkaka mu bitundu by'eggwanga eby'enjawulo. Mu bitundu ebisinga okukosebwa mwe muli Moyo ne Buliisa, awazuuliddwa abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Lok ma aa ki bot lutic me yot kom nyutu ni two yellow fever opoto I but lobo man mapol. I kin kabedo ma onongo peko madwong loyo aye Moyo ki Buliisa, kama kinongo iye lutwo.
teo_prompt: Akiro nupac kanejaas eswamak luka angaleu itodunitos abwangun naka eimidi loidosoikini akonye kotoma aiboisio nuipu kotoma akwapuwok. Kotoma aiboisio nuetiroritos noi ngesi Moyo keda Buliisa, ne itigogongorere adekak.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru engazu azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi vu 'diyi ece kini azo yellow fever niri e'do kari 'di ma woko karakara eyi ma alea. Angu 'bani esu candi amboru 'diyi ma eselea Moyo azini Buliisa, angu 'bani esu 'ba azo be 'diyi pie 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota kuruga omu bakuru b'ebyamagara, nizooreka okubarukaho kw'omushwija gw'enkaka omu bicweka bitari bimwe na bimwe omw'eihanga. Omu bicweka ebirikuteganisibwa munonga harimu Moyo na Buliisa, ahu abarwaire bahamiibwe.

eng_prompt: As the outbreak of yellow fever spread rapidly through the region, health officials issued urgent warnings to the public. In an effort to contain the disease, community leaders emphasized the importance of vigilance and prompt reporting.
lug_prompt: Ng'okubalukawo kw'omusujja gw'enkaka kusaasaana mangu mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baalabula abantu mu bwangu. Mu kaweefube w'okuziyiza ekirwadde, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okubeera obulindaala n'okuwa alipoota mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two yellow fever tye ka nyaa oyot-oyot tutwal I but lobo man, lutic me yot-kom guciko lwak oyot-oyot tutwal. I tute me lweny i kom two eni, lutela me kabedo guwaco ni pire tek me bedo ma wang gi twolo ki cwalo lok angeya con.
teo_prompt: Kwape abwangunor eimidi loidosoikini akonye kotoma aiboisit, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kikwenyasi itunga. Kotoma agogongu na aitikitik adeka, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kitogogongoto ajokis naka acoikina keda aikwenyar.
lgg_prompt: Azo yellow fever niri ni i erezu angu 'da ma alea mbeleru risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi fe bile ndu liza mbeleru o'bi eyidri. Okpo 'bazu azo 'da ma aza kozu, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi 'ba asi orodri aa'zu mile be azini o'duko siza mbeleru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bw'omushwija gw'enkaka ku bwabaire nibujanjaara omu kyanga, ab'eby'amagara bakaha abantu okurabura okw'amaani. Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa oburwaire, abebembezi b'ebyanga bakahamya omugasho gw'okwetegyereza n'okuha ripoota bukiri kare.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have highlighted environmental concerns in various regions of the country. One area that has come under scrutiny is Moyo district, where significant changes to the landscape are occurring.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumiziddwa gye buvuddeko ziraga okweraliikirira kw'obutonde bw'ensi mu bitundu by'eggwanga eby'enjawulo. Ekitundu ekimu ekyekenneenyeddwa ye disitulikiti y'e Moyo, enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi mu mbeera z'obutonde gye zigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto lworo I kom cwec ma orumuwa I but lobo man mapat-pat. Kabedo acel ma kitye ka ngiyo ne obedo Moyo, kama aloka-loka madongo tye ka time iye.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan lu atuboros itodutu aiyalongongo na ejautene lo akwap kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela kotoma akwapuwok. Aiboisit adiope naengicitai ngesi Moyo, ne ejai aijulanakineta nuepolok noi kotoma akwap.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo angu ama agei ri ma agei ri ma dria angu ndundu kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma alea. Angu azi alu 'bani e'yo eti ondazuri distrikiti Moyo niri'i, angu ojata okporu angu 'da ma alea 'diyini i 'yezu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka okwerarikirira kw'obuhangwa bw'ensi omu bicweka bitari bimwe na bimwe omw'eihanga. Omwanya gumwe ogurikwetegyerezibwa munonga ni disiturikiti ya Moyo, ahu empindahinduka y'amaani eriyo neekorwa.

eng_prompt: The mosquito-borne virus poses a significant threat to public health in tropical regions. Infected individuals often experience a range of symptoms that can lead to severe complications.
lug_prompt: Akawuka akaleetebwa ensiri ka bulabe nnyo eri obulamu bw'abantu mu bitundu eby'obutiti. Abantu abakwatibwa obulwadde batera okufuna obubonero obw'enjawulo obuyinza okuviirako ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Kwidi ma obee kelo kelo peko madit tutwal I kom yotkom pa lwak I kabedo ma piny lyet tutwal. Dano ma two omako gi ipol kare gi nongo lanyut mapat-pat ma twero kelo peko madongo.
teo_prompt: Erai adeka naka isiru naetiono noi aijar naka itunga kotoma aiboisio nuelangir noi. Itunga lu edekasi adekasinei ejaas keda aanyuneta nuepedorete ayangaun atiokisio nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: O'bu yiyia eyini eji ri eri e'yo azi onzi o'bi eyi ma rua ala ni angu drioru 'diyi ma alea. Ba azo 'da esupi 'diyi sa'wa driasi eceta ndundu eyi esu eyini ani ecozu e'yo ewaru 'diyi ejizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Akakooko akarikutwarwa ensiri, n'akabi munonga aha magara g'abantu omu myanya y'obutiti. Abantu abakwasirwe akakooko nibatunga obubonero bwingi oburikubaasa kureetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: Researchers are conducting a study to monitor the prevalence of yellow fever in the region. To ensure accurate results, they have collected samples from various locations, including the Uganda Virus Research Institute.
lug_prompt: Abanoonyereza bakola okunoonyereza okulondoola omuwendo gw'omusujja gw'enkaka mu kitundu. Okusobola okukakasa nti ebivuddemu bituufu, bakung'aanyizza sampolo okuva mu bifo eby'enjawulo omuli n'ekitongole ekinoonyereza ku kawuka ekya Uganda Virus Research Institute.
ach_prompt: Lutim kwed tye ka timo kwed me ngiyo kit ma two yellow fever tye ka nyaa kwede I but piny eni. Me neno ni adwoki me kwed tye kakare, gujogo jami ma kipimo ki I kabedo mapatpat, ma I kingi obedo Uganda Virus Research Institute.
teo_prompt: Ejaas angicak aingic kanu aanyanar eimidi loidosoikini akonye kaiboisit. Kanu aitodun akiro nuka abeit, apotu kesi otukutu aokot kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela, aimoriarit erionget loka aingic ekorona koUganda.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'yo ondapi 'diyi e'yo vuti ondaza 'ye azo yellow fever niri ma omgbo angu 'da ma alea ri onezu. E'yo eti ondazu kililiru, eyi tra afa eyi engazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea, amuti Uganda Virus Research Institute niri ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Abarikucondooza bariyo nibakora okucondooza kureebuuza oku omushwija gw'enkaka gurikujanjaara omu kyanga. Okureeba ngu ebyarugiremu bihikire, barundaine eby'okureeberaho kuruga omu myanya etari emwe, otwariiremu n'ekitongore ky'okucondooza aha ndwara ekya Uganda Virus Research Institute.

eng_prompt: As the outbreak of yellow fever continues to escalate, health officials are urging the public to take immediate precautions. One of the most effective measures to prevent transmission is through self-isolation.
lug_prompt: Ng'okubalukawo kw'omusujja gw'enkaka kweyongera okulinnya, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakubiriza abantu okwegendereza amangu ddala. Emu ku ngeri ezisinga obulungi ez'okutangiramu okusaasaana kwe kweyawula ku balala.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two yellow fever tye ka nyaa kwede, lutic me yot kom tye ka lego lwak me gwoke. Yo acel maber loyo me gengo nyaa pa two en aye me bedo kene.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor abwangun naka eimidi loidosoikini akonye, isinyikokitos eswamak luka angaleu itunga aitikitik. Adiopet koboro lu iswamaete ejok kanu aitikitik awea naka ekorona erai aitiak awate itunga.
lgg_prompt: Azo yellow fever niri ma e'dota ni mu drile tuzu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi o'bi eyi ai e'yo eyi 'yezu mbeleru. Geri azi alu 'bani ecozu azo 'da ma ereta atrizu ri eri geri 'bani 'ba eyi ma esele cozu eyi ma eselea risi.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'omushwija gw'enkaka nikugumizamu kweyongyera, abakuru omu by'amagara nibashaba abantu kwegyendesereza ahonaaho. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukirayo kurungi gw'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara n'okwetantara abandi.

eng_prompt: Health officials have reported a sudden increase in yellow fever cases across several regions. As news spreads, communities are growing increasingly anxious about the potential spread of the disease.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bategeezezza ku kweyongera okw'amangu kw'abalwadde b'omusujja gw'enkaka mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. Amawulire bwe geeyongera okusaasaana, abantu beeyongera okweraliikirira olw'okusaasaana kw'ekirwadde.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni wel dano matye ki two yellow fever omede tutwal I but lobo mapat-pat. Ka lok angea ne tye ka nyaa, lwak tye ka mede ki bedo ki lworo I kom nya pa two eni.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis olimosi aiyatakinio naka itunga luejaasi keda eimidi loidosoikini akonye kotoma aiboisio nuipu. Kwape ekorasi iyemuto, ekuriaka itunga noi nuikamunitos awea naka adeka.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece e'yo 'ba azo yellow fever niri be 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu angu kala karakara eyi ma alea. O'duko ni i erezurisi, ongulumu eyi asi otiza be e'yo azo 'da ma ereta ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bagambire aha kweyongyera kw'omushwija gw'enkaka omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe. Amahurire ku garikujanjaara, abantu nibeeyongyera okwerarikirira ahabw'okujanjaara kw'endwara.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak of yellow fever in several regions, health officials have been closely monitoring the situation. To address the growing concern, the ministry of health has deployed its medical experts to combat yellow fever.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'omusujja gw'enkaka mu bitundu ebiwerako, abakungu b'ebyobulamu babadde balondoola embeera. Okukola ku kweraliikirira okweyongera, minisitule y'ebyobulamu etadde abakugu baayo abasawo okulwanyisa omusujja gw'enkaka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two yellow fever I but lobo mapat-pat, lutic me yot-kom gubedo ka neno ngo matye katimme. Me tyeko lworo matye kamede, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom ocwalo ludiro gi me lweny i kom two yellow fever.
teo_prompt: Kanu abwangunor eimidi loidosoikini akonye kotoma aiboisio nuipu, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aanyanar ejok ejautene. Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong na iyata, abu erionget loka angaleu ibwaik ipirioitin ke aitiji eimidi loidosoikini akonye.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo yellow fever niri ni e'dozu angu karakara eyi ma alea ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'bi e'yo nde ma pamvu one. E'yo ewaru ma aza kozu, okalamvu alataniri 'ba 'ba e'yo nipi azo yellow fever niri be 'diyi a'di 'dizu azo yellow fever niri be.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'omushwija gw'enkaka omu bicweka bingi, ab'ebyamagara batwire nibareebuuza embeera. Minisiture y'eby'amagara eyongyeireyo abakugu baayo kurwanisa omushwija gw'enkaka.

eng_prompt: Yellow fever is a serious viral infection that can be transmitted through mosquito bites and can lead to severe health complications. To minimize the risk of transmission and protect public health, it is crucial to take precautions when dealing with individuals who have succumbed to the disease.
lug_prompt: Omusujja gw'enkaka bulwadde bwa kawuka obw'amaanyi obusobola okusaasaanyizibwa okuyita mu kuluma kw'ensiri era buyinza okuviirako obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu byobulamu. Okukendeeza ku buzibu bw'okusaasaanya n'okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu, kikulu nnyo okwegendereza nga tukolagana n'abantu abafudde obulwadde.
ach_prompt: Two yellow fever obedo two marac tutwal ma kwidi twero kobo ki ic pa ober dok twero kelo peko me yot kom. Me dwoko piny peko me nyaa pa two ki gwoko yotkom pa lwak, pire tek tutwal me gwoke ikare me tic ki dano ma two eni onekogi.
teo_prompt: Erai eimidi loidosoikini akonye adeka naepol noi naepedori aisiarakin kotoma aikony naka isiru ido epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok nuka angaleu. Kanu aitidisiar atiokisio nuka awea ka ayuarite angaleu naka itunga, ejokuna aitikitik itunga luetwakito kanuka adeka.
lgg_prompt: Azo yellow fever niri eri azo azi onzikanyaru omvele viral infection ru 'bani ecozu i erezu yiyia eyini nyazu risi dika eri eco e'yo rua ala ni onzi 'diyi eji ra. E'yo azo 'da ma ereta ma omgbo esizu azini o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'ba odrapi azo 'da si 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Omushwija gw'enkaka, n'oburwaire bw'amaani oburikujanjazibwa ensiri kurabira omu kurumwa kandi nibubaasa kurugwamu oburemeezi bw'amaani. Okutuubya aha kabi k'okujanjaara kw'endwara n'okurinda amagara g'abantu, n'eky'omugasho kwegyendesereza waaba nookora n'abantu abaisirwe endwara.

eng_prompt: One of the most concerning tropical diseases affecting humans is yellow fever. It is transmitted by mosquitoes and can lead to severe health complications.
lug_prompt: Obumu ku bulwadde obusinga okukosa abantu mu bitundu eby'obutiti bwe musujja gw'enkaka. Obulwadde buno busaasaanyizibwa ensiri era busobola okuleeta obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu bulamu.
ach_prompt: Two acel ma kelo lworo madit tutwal I kom dano en aye yellow fever. Obedo two ma ober aye kobo dok twero kelo peko mapol i kom dano.
teo_prompt: Adiopet adekasinei nuetioko noi nuetiroritos itunga ngesi yellow fever. Itosomaete isiru ido epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok nuka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Azo tropiki ru 'diyi ma azi 'ba eyini candi fepi saaru ri eri yellow fever ni. Yiyia eyi eri ere dika eri eco e'yo rua ala ni onzi 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Emwe aha ndwara ezirikukwata munonga abantu n'omushwija gw'enkaka. Nikijanjazibwa ensiri kandi nikibaasa kureeta oburemeezi bw'amaani omu magara.

eng_prompt: In response to a recent outbreak in neighboring regions, health officials expressed concern about the potential spread of yellow fever. To mitigate the risk, the Ministry of Health carried out an active search for yellow fever cases.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'obulwadde mu bitundu ebiriraanyeewo gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baalaze obweraliikirivu ku kusaasaana kw'omusujja gw'enkaka. Okukendeeza ku bulabe, minisitule y'ebyobulamu yakola okunoonya okw'amaanyi ku balwadde b'omusujja gw'enkaka.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki poto pa two ma otimme cokcok-ki I but lobo matye cok, lutic me yot-kom gunyutu lworo I kom nya pa two yellow fever. Me jwiko peko ne, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom oyenyo lutwo yellow fever.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka naka yellow fever kotoma aiboisio nu idunyare, apotu eswamak luka angaleu itodutu aiyalongong kanu awea naka yellow fever. Kanu aitidisiar atiokisio, abu erionget loka angaleu kogeu aimo itunga luejaasi keda eimidi loidosoikini akonye.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'dozu eturisi angu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece asi otiza yini e'yo azo yellow fever niri ma ereta ma dria. E'yo ewaru 'di ma omgbo esizu, okalamvu alataniri 'ye e'yo 'ba azo yellow fever niri be 'diyi ndazu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'omushwija gw'enkaka omu byanga ebituherereire, ab'eby'amagara boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'okujanjaara kw'omushwija gw'enkaka. Okutuubya aha kabi, minisiture y'eby'amagara ekakora okuronda kw'abantu abaine omushwija gw'enkaka.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising cases of mosquito-borne diseases, the government has launched a public health initiative. As part of this effort, the Ministry of Health has provided people with mosquito nets.
lug_prompt: Olw'obulwadde obuva ku nsiri okweyongera, gavumenti etongozza enteekateeka y'ebyobulamu ey'olukale. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, minisitule y'ebyobulamu egabidde abantu obutimba bw'ensiri.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa two ma obee kelo, gamente ocako yub me yot kom. Macalo but tic man, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom omiyo net ki dano.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyatakin na adekasinei nu ikur, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuka angaleu. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ejaiki erionget loka angaleu itunga aitiban nu isiru.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo yiyia ni eji 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, gamete e'do otita alata ni o'bi eyini ri 'bo. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, okalamvu alataniri fe 'ba eyini imba yiyia ni 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti etandikireho enteekateeka y'eby'amagara ahabw'oburwaire bw'ensiri obweyongyeire. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, minisiture y'eby'amagara egabiire abantu obutimba bw'ensiri.

eng_prompt: Before embarking on a trip to certain tropical regions, it's essential to consider the health risks associated with various diseases. One of the most significant concerns for those traveling to specific areas is yellow fever, a viral infection transmitted by mosquitoes.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kutandika lugendo mu bitundu ebimu eby'obutiti, kya mugaso okulowooza ku bulabe bw'ebyobulamu obukwatagana n'endwadde ez'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bintu ebisinga okweraliikiriza abo abagenda mu bifo ebimu omusujja gw'enkaka, obulwadde bw'akawuka obusaasaanyizibwa ensiri.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe icako wot I kabedo mogo me lyeto, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom peko me yot kom matye I kom two mapat-pat. Lworo acel madit tutwal pi joo matye ka wot I kabedo mukene obedo yellow fever, two ma kwidi ma ober kelo.
teo_prompt: Erongo egeuna alosit aiboisio ace nuka akwap, ejokuna aomoom atiokisio nu adekasinei nuegelegela. Adiopet kotoma aiyalongongo naepol noi kama ejaasi ngul luelosete aiboisio nuegelegela ngesi eimidi loidosoikini akonye.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mi e'doni aci angu drizaru 'diyi ma alia ku, eri orodriru egazu e'yo ewaru azo ndundu eyi pie 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi okporu 'ba aci'ba angu azi 'diyi ma alea 'diyini asi otizuri eri azo yellow fever niri, azo omvu yiyia ni eyi ere ni.
nyn_prompt: Otakatandikire oruramburo omu bicweka ebimwe eby'obutiti, nikikuru kuteekateeka aha kabi k'eby'amagara akarikukwata aha ndwara nyingi. Kimwe aha bintu ebirikukyerarikiriza munonga abo abarikugyenda omu myanya emwe n'omushwija gw'enkaka, oburwaire oburikujanjazibwa ensiri.

eng_prompt: In many regions, access to essential health resources is severely limited. As a result, communities are struggling to protect themselves from mosquito-borne diseases.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okufuna ebyetaago by'ebyobulamu ebikulu kukendeera nnyo. N'ekivuddemu, ebitundu birwana okwekuuma endwadde z'ensiri.
ach_prompt: I but lobo mapol, nongo kony me yot kom ma pire tek tye magoro tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lwak tye ka tute matek me gwoke ki i kom two ma obee kelo.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu, edite noi adumunun iboro lu amukian lu itwasamao. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga ainingosit ayuarite awate kec kanejaas adekasinei nu eyangaununete isiru.
lgg_prompt: Angu karakara eyi ma alea, geri e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo esi ra. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu eyi dri ci eyi ma ta mbazu azo yiyia eyini eji 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, okutunga ebintu by'omugasho omu by'amagara tikyorobi munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu nibarwana kwerinda endwara ezirikureetwa ensiri.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak, health officials urged the public to stay informed about yellow fever. To assist with this, the Ministry of Health provided a phone number to acquire information about yellow fever.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'omusujja gw'enkaka gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baakubirizza abantu okubeera abamanyi ku musujja gw'enkaka. Okuyambako mu kino, minisitule y'ebyobulamu yawaddeyo ennamba y'essimu okufuna obubaka obukwata ku musujja gw'enkaka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two eni, lutic me yot kom gulego lwak me bedo ki ngec i kom two yellow fever. Me konyo I lok man, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom omiyo nama cim me nongo ngec i kom two yellow fever.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka eimidi loidosoikini akonye, apotu eswamak luka angaleu isinyikokisi itunga aijen nuikamunitos eimidi loidosoikini akonye. Kanu aingarakin keda nu, abu erionget loka angaleu ijaik enaaba lo esimu kanu adumun akiro nuikamunitos yellow fever.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo yellow fever niri ni e'dozu o'diru risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ai o'bi eyi aa'zu o'dukoti be azo yellow fever niri ma dria. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, okalamvu alataniri fe namba simu ni o'dukoti esuzu azo yellow fever niri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'omushwija gw'enkaka, abakuru omu by'amagara bakashaba abantu kuguma nibamanya ebirikukwata aha musujja gw'enkaka. Okuhwera omuri eki, minisiture y'eby'amagara ekataho enamba y'esimu y'okutunga amakuru agarikukwata aha musujja gw'enkaka.

eng_prompt: Many cultural organizations are struggling to maintain their operations due to financial constraints. As a result, they face significant challenges in formalizing their status and securing necessary resources.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole by'ebyobuwangwa bingi birwana okukuuma emirimu gyabyo olw'ebbula ly'ensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kutongoza embeera yaabwe n'okufuna ebyetaago.
ach_prompt: Dule me tekwaro mapol tye ka tute matek me medde ki ticgi pi peko me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, ginongo peko madit tutwal I keto rwom gi I tic ki nongo jami ma mite.
teo_prompt: Iriongeta luipu luka inonosio eutasi ationis aidar aswamukec naarai ikidioko ikapun. Kanuka ngun, etereikina kesi keda ainingosia nuepolok noi kotoma aitogogong adoketaitikec keda adumun iboro lu ekotos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Amuti suruni karakara 'diyi dri ci azi yini 'diyi ma ta mbazu e'yo ewaru robia ni 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu e'yo eyini aa'zu 'diyi 'bazu azita palaa dika afa eyini lele 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore by'eby'obuhangwa bingi nibirwana kurinda emirimo yabyo ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kuhamya embeera yaabo n'okutunga eby'okukoresa ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In today's diverse society, it is essential for cultural leaders to navigate complex social dynamics responsibly. Adhering to established regulations not only fosters trust but also ensures the integrity of their initiatives.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu b'ennaku zino ab'enjawulo, kyetaagisa abakulembeze b'ebyobuwangwa okutambuza entambula y'embeera z'abantu enzibu n'obuvunaanyizibwa. Okukolera ku mateeka agaateekebwawo tekikoma ku kutumbula bwesige naye era kikakasa obutuufu bw'enteekateeka zaabwe.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapat-pat me kare-ni, pire tek tutwal ni lutela tekwaro omyero gutii ki jami mapat-pat matye ka time I kabedo mapat-pat. Lubu cik ma ki keto pe weko dano bedo ki gen keken ento bene weko tic gi bedo ber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijar naka itunga luegelegela, ejokuna noi engarenok lu atekerin aitodolikin akiro nuka itunga koipone kaloejok. Atupitos ikisila lu itolomunitai mam eyangauni amuno bon konye eyangauni aitogogongio naka aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea ndundu 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru drice'ba suruni 'diyini e'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu geri kililiru si. Azita 'bani o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obizuri feni lu asi'baza ma omgbo otu ku te eri vini e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi ma okpo fe.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba abaine emicwe etarikushushana, niky'omugasho aha beebembezi b'eby'obuhangwa okureeberera engyenderwaho y'abantu omu muringo gw'obujunaanizibwa. Okukuratira ebiragiro ebiteirweho tikirikureetaho obwesigye bwonka, beitu nikureetaho n'obwesigwa omu mirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: The Madi community has been advocating for the recognition of their traditional practices and governance structures. In recent discussions, they expressed a strong desire to formalize their cultural institution through legal means.
lug_prompt: Abamadi babadde balwanirira okukkiriza enkola zaabwe ez'ennono n'enkola z'obukulembeze. Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakaggwa, baalaga obwagazi obw'amaanyi okufuula ekitongole kyabwe eky'ebyobuwangwa mu mateeka.
ach_prompt: Lwak me Madi gubedo ka lweny pi niang tekwaro gi ki tela gi. I kare me nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki, gunyutu miti matek me keto tekwaro gi itic I yoo me cik.
teo_prompt: Isinyikokitos itunga luko Madi ajenun iponesio kec luka einono keda apugan kec. Kotoma oineresinei pac, apotu kesi itodutu eipud loka aitogogong atukot naka einono kec kowai lo ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu Madi ni 'diyi ebi a'di 'di e'yo 'bani e'yo yini a'di ni 'diyi ma e'yo egazu azini geri yini opi nyazu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo onzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alea, eyi e'da ava okporu eyini lezu eyi ma amuti suruni 'diyi 'bazu azita palaa geri azita palaa 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Abamadi batwire nibarwanirira okumanywa kw'emitwarize yaabo ey'obuhangwa hamwe n'enkora yaabo y'obwebembezi. Omu kuhanuura okwabaireho juba, bakoreka ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okureetaho enteekateeka y'eby'obuhangwa bwabo kurabira omu biragiro.

eng_prompt: Recent discussions have highlighted the growing divide between various cultural organizations. Many stakeholders express concerns about collaboration and shared goals.
lug_prompt: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakakolebwa kulaga enjawukana mu bibiina by'ebyobuwangwa eby'enjawulo. Abakwatibwako bangi balaze obweraliikirivu ku nkolagana n'ebiruubirirwa eby'awamu.
ach_prompt: Nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka matye I kin dul mapat-pat me tekwaro. Dano mapol gitye ki lworo i kom ribbe ki miti gi.
teo_prompt: Ineresinei lu atuboros itodunitos atiakatiaka naejai kiding iriongeta lu atekerin luegelegela. Itunga luipu itodunitos aiyalongongokec kanu aiswamanara keda apeleikinata.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara o'diru 'diyi ece esele coza tupi amuti suruni ndundu 'diyi ma eselea ri ra. Ba karakara eyi asi otiza e'da ti ecita eyi ma dria tualu e'yo eyini lele 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okuhanuura okuhweireho kworeka okwebaganisamu ahagati y'ebitongore by'eby'obuhangwa. Abantu baingi nibooreka okwerarikirira aha kukwatanisa hamwe n'ebigyendererwa byabo.

eng_prompt: Recent decisions regarding funding allocations have sparked heated debates among various departments. As a result, there are conflicts within the cultural administration.
lug_prompt: Okusalawo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku kugaba ensimbi kuleeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi mu bitongole eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo obukuubagano mu bukulembeze bw'ebyobuwangwa.
ach_prompt: Moko tam ma okato cokcok-ki I kom yub me poko lim okelo laro lok I kin dul mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, tele tye ikin lutela me tekwaro.
teo_prompt: Aseununeta nuitolomunitai pac nuikamunitos ikapun eyangautu ipegeta luipu kanejaas iriongeta luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, ejai ingungeta kotoma apedorosio nuka einono.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'du o'diru robia awaza ma dria 'diyi eji agbatara okporu arakala ndundu eyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, ngiringiri eyi driceza suruni 'da ma alea ci.
nyn_prompt: Okusharaho ebirikukwata aha kuheebwa esente, kireesireho okuhanuura kw'amaani omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho obutaikirizana omu bwebembezi bw'eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: The Madi community has a long history of leadership disputes, with various factions claiming legitimacy. As tensions rose, the question of who should lead became increasingly contentious.
lug_prompt: Abamadi balina ebyafaayo bingi eby'obukuubagano mu bukulembeze, ng'ebiwayi eby'enjawulo bigamba nti birina obutuufu. Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera, ekibuuzo ky'ani alina okukulembera kyeyongera okusika omuguwa.
ach_prompt: Lwak me Madi gubedo ki tele me tela pi kare malac, dul mapat-pat tye ka waco ni gitye ki twero. Ka telle omedde, lapeny me anga ma omyero otel odoko lara tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ejaas itunga luko Madi keda akiro nukolo nuka engunget lo engarenone, ido ipu atukona nu ebalasi ebe ejaasi kesi keda apedor. Neapolor atiokisio, abu aingiset naka ingai bo ibusakinit aingarenikin kibiroros.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu Madi ni 'diyi ma e'yo a'di driceza ni 'diyi ma alea sa'wa ezu 'bo, amuti ndundu eyini 'yozu kini eyi 'ye e'yo azita palaa 'diyi. Erita ako eyini tuzu 'bori ma vutia, e'yo 'ba a'di ma ma ce ni ri ma dria ri eca agata ga tre.
nyn_prompt: Ekibiina kya Madi kitwire kiine entaro z'obwebembezi, kandi ebibiina bitari bimwe na bimwe nibyetwara nk'ebirikwikirizibwa. Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire, ekibuuzo ky'oha oshemereire kwebembera kikongyera kuhakanisa.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous attempts to foster collaboration among various cultural organizations, the lack of a unified vision has hindered progress. As a result, many initiatives aimed at promoting cultural exchange have stalled.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo okugezaako okungi okutumbula enkolagana wakati w'ebitongole by'ebyobuwangwa eby'enjawulo, obutaba na ndowooza emu kiremesezza enkulaakulana. N'ekivuddemu, enteekateeka nnyingi ezigendereddwamu okutumbula okuwanyisiganya eby'obuwangwa ziyimiridde.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kitemo tutwal me kelo winye ikin dul mapat-pat me tekwaro, bedo peke pa neno acel ogengo dongo lobo. Macalo adwogi ne, yub mapol ma tye ki miti me tyelo kor lok me tekwaro ocung matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida etamitai aitojokar aiswamanara kiding iriongeta lu atekerin luegelegela, amamus na aomisio nuimorikikina isimiki apol. Kanuka ngun, iponesio luipu lu ekotore aitopoloria aineranara naka inonosio apotu kobwoutu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu ti ecita otuzu amuti suruni ndundu 'diyi ma eselea ra ti, egata aluri ma ako atri zota ra. E'yo 'disi, otita karakara 'bani lezu e'yo suruni 'diyi awazu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi so pa ci.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okugyezaho kwingi okureetaho okukwatanisa omu bitongore by'eby'obuhangwa ebitarikushushana, okubura enteekateeka erikukwatanisa kuremesize entunguuka. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka nyingi ezirikugyenderera okureetaho empurizagana y'eby'obuhangwa zikemerezibwa.

eng_prompt: In discussions about the future of their community, the elders emphasized the importance of unity among the Madi people. They believed that collaboration and solidarity were essential for progress and growth.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biseera by'omu maaso eby'ekitundu kyabwe, abakulu bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'obumu mu bantu b'e Madi. Baalowooza nti okukolera awamu n'okwegatta byali bikulu nnyo eri enkulaakulana n'okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gitye ka lok I kom anyim pa kabedo gi, ludito guwaco ni ber tutwal me ribe ikin dano me Madi. Gin onongo gitye ki niyee ni ribe obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitemitem nuikamunitos ingaren naka atutubetekec, apotu ipolok isinyikokisi ajokis naka aimorikikina kanejaas itunga luko Madi. Iyuunitos kesi ebe aiswamanara keda aimorikikina eraasi nuepolok noi kanu apol keda apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza ewu drialeri ma dria, 'ba 'wara 'diyi 'ba asi orodri ti ecita ni 'ba Madi ru 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria. Yi a'i ra kini ti ecita azini ti ecita eri orodriru zota azini zota ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugaaniira aha biro by'omumaisho by'ekicweka kyabo, abakuru bakahamya omugasho gw'okukwatanisa omu bantu ba Madi. Bakaba nibaikiriza ngu okukwatanisa n'okukwatanisa n'eby'omugasho aha ntunguuka n'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: In times of social change and uncertainty, the role of cultural leaders becomes increasingly vital. They possess the unique ability to inspire and unite individuals around a common vision for progress.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'enkyukakyuka mu mbeera z'abantu n'obutali bukakafu, omulimu gw'abakulembeze b'ebyobuwangwa gweyongera okuba omukulu. Balina obusobozi obw'enjawulo okubudaabuda n'okugatta abantu okwetooloola okwolesebwa okw'awamu okw'okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Ikare me aloka-loka ki peko me kwo pa lwak, tic pa lutela tekwaro tye ka doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Gitye ki kero me cuku cwiny ki ribo dano I kom neno acel me dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Apakio nu aijulanakineta keda amamus acamanar, epol noi aswam naka engarenok lu atekerin. Ejaasi kesi keda apedor na itegelikina naka aisinyikokin ka aimorikikin itunga kotoma aomisioit adiope naka apol.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ojata ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea, azi drice'ba suruni 'diyini ri eca curu'do orodriru. Eyi ma okpo 'ba eyini ava fezu azini ti ecita ejizu e'yo eyi ma eselea angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'empindahinduka n'obutabanguko, omurimo gw'abebembezi b'eby'obuhangwa nigweyongyera kuba ogw'omugasho. Baine obushoboorozi bw'omutaano obw'okugaruramu amaani n'okugarukanisa abantu ahabw'ekigyendererwa kimwe ky'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: To foster a vibrant community and promote local heritage, it is essential for the district to prioritize cultural development. Engaging with various stakeholders will ensure that the needs and interests of the community are met effectively.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula ekitundu n'okutumbula eby'obuwangwa, kya mugaso eri disitulikiti okukulembeza enkulaakulana y'ebyobuwangwa. Okukwatagana n'abakwatibwako ab'enjawulo kijja kukakasa nti ebyetaago n'ebigendererwa by'ekitundu bituukirizibwa bulungi.
ach_prompt: Pi dongo kabedo matye ki kwo maber ki tyelo kor tekwaro me tedero, pire tek tutwal ni dictrwik omyero oket tek me dongo tekwaro. Winye ki joo ma timo tic mapat-pat obi neno ni miti ki miti pa lwak ocobbe maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor itunga luejarete ka aitopolorite inonosio luka atutubet, ejokuna noi edisitrikt aisingarenit aitopol einono. Aiswamanara keda itunga luegelegela epote awanyun ebe itodolikinitai ipudesia keda ipudesia luka itunga koipone kaloejok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu Ti ecita 'ba ambo ndundu eyi pie ri ni nga ne ra kini e'yo o'bi eyini le 'diyi azini e'yo eyi le 'diyi ma aza ko kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho entunguuka omu byaro hamwe n'okutunguura eby'obuhangwa, disiturikiti eshemereire kwebembeza entunguuka y'eby'obuhangwa. Okukorengana n'abantu b'emiringo etari emwe, nikiija kureeba ngu ebyetaago n'ebyetengo by'abantu nibihikiirizibwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a noticeable shift in the rhetoric used by certain political figures. This shift raises concerns about the future of societal values and the role of established cultural frameworks.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo enkyukakyuka mu njogera ekozesebwa bannabyabufuzi abamu. Enkyukakyuka eno ereetawo okweraliikirira ku biseera by'omu maaso eby'empisa z'ekitundu n'omulimu gw'enkola z'obuwangwa eziteekeddwawo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, alokaloka madit otime I lok ma lucungu iwi bye mukene tiyo kwede. Alokaloka man kelo lworo I kom anyim pa cik me tekwaro ki tic pa cik me tekwaro ma ki keto.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aijulanakineta kotoma akiro nu itwasamaete itunga ice luka politikis. Eyangauni aijulanakineta ngun aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos ingaren naka iponesio luka itunga keda aswam naka inonosio luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alia, ojata e'dazaru e'yo nzeza 'ba politiki ni 'diyi ma azi yini ayu 'diyi ma alia ci. Ojata 'diri asi otiza eji ewu drialeri ma dria e'yo ongulumu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma dria azini azi e'yo suruni 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, habaireho empindahinduka omu migambire y'ab'eby'obutegyeki abamwe. Empindahinduka egi nereetaho okwerarikirira aha biro by'omumaisho eby'emitwarize y'abantu hamwe n'omugasho gw'enkora y'eby'obuhangwa etandikirweho.

eng_prompt: In response to growing divisions within the community, the district leaders recognized the need for a collaborative approach. They initiated discussions aimed at fostering inclusivity and understanding among diverse groups.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula enjawukana ezigenda zeeyongera mu kitundu, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti baalaba obwetaavu bw'okukolaganira awamu. Baatandika okukubaganya ebirowoozo okugenderera okutumbula obumu n'okutegeeragana mu bibiina eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki apoka-poka matye kamede I kin lwak, lutela me district gunongo ni omyero gutii kacelo. Gu cako nywako lok ma tye ki miti me kelo winye ikin dul mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiakatiaka naka itunga, apotu engarenok luka edisitrikt kojenutu eipud loka aimorikikina. Apotu kesi kogeutu aineranara kanu aitopoloria aimorikikina keda apuponoro kiding igurupun luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo esele coza ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi esu e'yo lezu e'yo 'yezu tualu ri ra. Eyi e'do e'yo nzeza 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma esele cozu tualu vata be amuti ndundu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutakwatanisa obweyongyeire omu bantu, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okukorera hamwe. Bakataho okuhanuura okugyendereire kureetaho okukwatanisa n'okwetegyerezana omu guruupu ezitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing tensions within the community, local leaders recognized the need for dialogue. They decided to take proactive measures to address the underlying issues affecting the residents.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke obweyongera mu kitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baalaba obwetaavu bw'okuteesa. Baasazeewo okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu okugonjoola ebizibu ebikulu ebikosa abatuuze.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me telle matye kamede I kin lwak, lutela me tedero guneno ber pa lok. Gumoko tam gi me tic matek me tyeko peko matye ka yelo lutedero.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu iyatakinete kotoma atutubet, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kojenutu eipud loka aineranara. Apotu kesi ocamutu aswam kagogongu kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuetiroritos itunga.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo nzeza ma orodri ra. Eyi ai e'yo eyi 'yezu e'yo ewaru 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obunkenke obweyongyeire omu bantu, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okuteisa. Bakasharamu kukora kyona ekirikubaasika kukora aha nshonga ezirikuteganisa abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about community governance, it has become increasingly clear that the role of traditional leaders is facing significant challenges. Their inability to present a united front has raised concerns about their effectiveness in addressing local issues.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakakolebwa ku bukulembeze bw'ekitundu, kyeyoleka bulungi nti omulimu gw'abakulembeze b'ennono boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi. Okulemererwa kwabwe okulaga obumu kireeseewo okweraliikirira ku busobozi bwabwe mu kukola ku nsonga z'ebitundu.
ach_prompt: I nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki I kom tela pa lwak, nen atyer kamaleng ni tic pa lutela tekwaro tye ka nongo peko madit tutwal. Kit ma pe gitwero kelo winye ikin gi okelo lworo I kom kit ma gitwero cobo kwede peko matye I tedero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos epugae lo itunga, ecai cut ebe ejaas engarenok lu atekerin keda atiokisio nuepolok noi. Mam kesi epedoritos aitodiar aimorikikina ngin eyangaunit aiyalongong naepedoriata kesi aitemokin atiokisio nuka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alia e'yo driceza ongulumu eyini ri ma dria, eca e'da kini azi drice'ba suruni 'diyiniri dri fu e'yo ewaru amboru 'diyi be. E'yo yini ecozu ti ecita ejizu ku ri fe asi otiza e'yo yini eco 'ye e'yo angu ma alia 'diyi ma aza kozu ra ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho ahaby'obwebembezi bw'abantu, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu abebembezi b'eby'obuhangwa baine oburemeezi bw'amaani. Okuremwa kwabo kworeka obumwe, kireesire okwerarikirira aha kukora kwabo kurungi omu kukora aha nshonga z'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have highlighted a troubling trend in adolescent behavior. Many young students are increasingly exposed to substances that can lead to addiction and other serious consequences.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko kwalaga omuze ogweraliikiriza mu nneeyisa y'abavubuka. Abayizi abato bangi beeyongedde okwenyigira mu bintu ebiyinza okubaleetera emize n'ebivaamu ebirala eby'obulabe.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto tim marac ma bulu tye kwede. Lutino kwan matino mapol tye ka mato jami ma twero weko gidoko opii ki jami mukene maracu.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit epone loetiono noi loka iponesio luka atumunak. Esisiak ludidika luipu ejenete iboro luepedorete ayangaun aimat keda atiokisio ace nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo azi asi otiza fepi 'ba oderu 'diyi ma adriza ma dria ra. nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka engyesho mbi omu mitwarize y'eminyeeto. Abeegi bato abaingi beyongyeire kukoresa ebintu ebirikubaasa kurugwamu emize hamwe n'ebindi bibi.

eng_prompt: To maintain a positive learning environment, it is essential for students to understand the importance of discipline and order. Therefore, clear guidelines must be established and upheld consistently.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma embeera y'okusoma ennungi, kyetaagisa abayizi okutegeera obukulu bw'okukangavvula n'obutebenkevu. N'olw'ekyo, ebiragiro ebitangaavu birina okuteekebwawo era ne bigobererwa buli kaseera.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko kabedo maber me kwan, pire tek tutwal ni lutino omyero guniang ber pa woro cik. Pi meno, omyero ki ket cik ma niange maber dok omyero ki tii kwedgi kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar ejautene loajokan loka aisisia, ejokuna noi esisiak amisiikin ajokis naka aicoreta ka ainapakina. Kanuka ngun, ekot aitolomun ikisila lu ecaete ka aitup duc.
lgg_prompt: Lezu angu onita ni muke ri ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru sukulu anzi eyi ma va orodri inzita ni azini otita ni 'diyi ma dria. Ka'dini, le 'ba ma si azita kililiru 'diyi azini le 'ba ma obi eyi sa'wa driasi.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced world, many families struggle to find quality time for meaningful conversations. As a result, children often lack the guidance they need to navigate moral dilemmas.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'amangu, amaka mangi galwana okufuna obudde obw'omutindo okunyumya okw'omugaso. N'ekivuddemu, abaana tebatera kufuna bulagirizi bwe beetaaga okutambula mu bizibu by'empisa.
ach_prompt: I lobo me kareni ma jami woto oyot-oyot tutwal, jo me ot mapol ginongo tek tutwal me nongo kare me lok maber. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino ipol kare gi peke ki ngec ma mite pi lubu cik.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naejaasi keda aswam naepol noi, etiono ikalia luipu adumun apak naejok kanu einer nuepolok. Kanuka ngun, mam duc idwe edumunenete aicoreta nu ekotos kesi kanu aitodolikin atiokisio nu iponesio.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alea, familia karakara eyi dri ci sa'wa esuzu e'yo nzezu orodriru. E'yo 'disi, anzi nyiri eyi vu tutuni imbata eyini lele e'yo onzi eyi ma dria 'diyi yo.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu obwire bwingi, amaka maingi nigarwana kutunga obwire burungi bw'okugaaniira. N'ekyarugiremu, abaana tibarikukira kutunga obuhabuzi obubarikwetenga, kugira ngu babaase kutwaza gye emicwe yaabo.

eng_prompt: The school administration conducted a thorough investigation into reports of drug use on campus. As a result of their findings, disciplinary actions were deemed necessary.
lug_prompt: Abakulembeze b'essomero baakola okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu ku alipoota z'okukozesa ebiragalalagala ku ssomero. Olw'ebyazuuliddwa, ebikolwa eby'okukangavvula byalabiddwa nga bikulu.
ach_prompt: Lutela me gang kwan gutimo kwed matut I kom tic ki yadi I gang kwan. Macalo adwogi me gin ma gunongo, kimoko ni pwod obedo gin ma mite.
teo_prompt: Apotu eyaitene lo esomero ongicata akiro nuikamunitos aimat na ikee kosomero. Kanuka akiro nuadumunitos kesi, aponi oyangarai ebe ibusakinit aitisilario.
lgg_prompt: Driceza sukulu niri 'ye vuti ondaza okporu e'yo o'duko e'yo aro onzi 'diyi ayuzu sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea ri ma dria. E'yo yini esu 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba 'du e'yo driceza fezu 'diyi orodriru.
nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi b'eishomero bakakora okucondooza okurikukwata aha kukoresa emibazi erikutokooza obwonko ahaishomero. Nk'ekyarugire omu bibatungire, okukwatirwa emicwe mibi kikareebwa nk'eky'omugasho.

eng_prompt: As part of the school's health and safety guidelines, the administration held an assembly to discuss the risks associated with substance use. During this meeting, they emphasized the importance of making responsible choices.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekimu ku biragiro by'essomero eby'obulamu n'obukuumi, abaddukanya essomero baatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kabi akali mu kukozesa ebiragalalagala. Mu lukungaana luno, bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okusalawo mu ngeri ey'obuvunaanyizibwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo but cik me yot kom ki gwoko ber bedo pa lutino kwan, ludito me gang kwan gubedo ki kacoke me nywako lok I kom rac pa nywaro tic ki yadi. Ikare me kacoke eni, guketo cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa moko tam maber.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediope kotoma aicoreta nuka esomero nuka angaleu keda ayuwara, abu eyaitene kitolomu airiamun kanu aitemitem atiokisio nuikamunitos aimat ikee. Kotoma airiamunet kana, apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aitolomun aseununeta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: Azita sukulu ni e'yo rua ala ni azini ageitema ni 'diyi ma azi ru, driceza sukulu niri 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo onzikanya aro onzi 'diyi ma ayuza ni 'diyi ma dria. Mitingi 'di ma alea, eyi 'ba asi orodri e'yo eyi pezu kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'emwe aha biragiro by'eishomero ebirikukwata aha magara n'okwerinda, abarikukurira eishomero bakakora orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha kabi akari omu kukozesa emibazi erikutokooza obwonko. Omu rukiiko oru, bakahamya omugasho gw'okukora encwamu n'obujunaanizibwa.

eng_prompt: After several warnings about inappropriate use during class, the teacher decided it was time to take action. The disruptive behavior continued, prompting a strict enforcement of the school's policy on electronic devices.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulabulwa ennyo ku nkozesa etasaana mu kibiina, omusomesa yasalawo nti kye kiseera okubaako ky'akolawo. Enneeyisa ey'obutabanguko yagenda mu maaso, ekyaviirako okussa mu nkola amateeka g'essomero agakwata ku byuma ebikozesa amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Ingee ciko dano mapol pi tic ki jami ma pe opore ikare me pwonye, lapwony omoko tamme ni kare dong oromo me timo gin mo. Tim maraco ne omede, ma oweko ki keto itic cik me gang kwan i kom nyonyo me cim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aikwenyar noi nuikamunitos aitwasam iboro lu mam ejokuka kotoma atukot, abu esisianakinan kotema ebe erai apak naka aswam ibore. Apotu iponesio luarokok inyikokisi, ido abu koyangau ainapeta nuka esomero nuikamunitos iboro luka elago.
lgg_prompt: E'yo bile ndu liza karakara 'diyi ma vutia e'yo ayuza kililiru ku ri ma dria kilasi'a 'bori ma vutia, imbapi 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bani e'yo 'yezu ra. Adriza e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi mu drile, e'yo fepi 'bani azita sukulu ni 'diyi 'bazu okporu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurabura munonga aha bikwatiraine n'okukoresa kubi ebintu omu kibiina, omwegyesa akasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okukora. Emicwe mibi ekagumizamu, ekyaretsireho okukuratirwa kw'ebiragiro by'eishomero ebirikukwata aha byoma ebirikukoresa amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: Before heading to school, I asked my parents what I should keep in mind to avoid any trouble. They emphasized the importance of adhering to the guidelines set by the school.
lug_prompt: Nga sinnagenda ku ssomero, nnabuuza bazadde bange kye nnina okujjukira okwewala obuzibu bwonna. Baakakasizza obukulu bw'okugoberera ebiragiro ebyateekebwawo essomero.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe acito I cukul, apenyo lunyodona ngo ma omyero abed kwede I wiya me gwokke ki I peko mo keken. Guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me lubu cik ma gang kwan oketo.
teo_prompt: Erongo eong alosit osomero, abu eong engit auriakaka nuibusakinit eong aiitun kanu ainac ationis. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis na aitup aicoreta nu esomero.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di amuni sukulua ku, a'i ma tipika yi a'di afa ma ma 'ba ma omi ma dria e'yo ewaru 'diyi atrizu. Eyi fe okpo orodri 'bani azita sukulu ni o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obizu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ntakatandikire eishomero, nkabuuza abazaire bangye ekishemereire kuguma omu biteekateeko byangye okwetantara oburemeezi bwona. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okukuratira ebiragiro ebyateirweho eishomero.

eng_prompt: Before the meeting, the manager emphasized the importance of making a good impression. As a result, we were given specific guidelines on our attire.
lug_prompt: Nga olukiiko terunnabaawo, maneja yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukola ekifaananyi ekirungi. N'ekyavaamu, twaweebwa obulagirizi obukwata ku nnyambala yaffe.
ach_prompt: Mapwod kacoke pe ocake, ladit tic oloko I kom ber pa bedo ki neno maber I kom dano. Macalo adwogi ne, kimiyo itwa cik ma lube ki ruk ma omyero waruk.
teo_prompt: Erongo airiamunet, abu eyaiton isinyikok itunga ajokis naka ajaut keda aomisio nuajokak. Kanuka ngun, aponi ijaikinai sio aicoreta nuikamunitos inapen wok.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mitingi 'da ecani ku, 'ba angu ocepirini 'ba asi orodri e'da onyiru fezu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe ama dri azita kililiru ama ma suta ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Mbwenu orukiiko rutakatandikire, manegya akashoboorora omugasho gw'okukora ekitiinisa. N'ekyarugiremu, tukaheebwa ebiragiro ebirikukwata aha kujwara kwaitu.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, the risks associated with sharing personal images have become increasingly concerning. Privacy breaches and the potential for exploitation make it crucial to think carefully before capturing intimate moments.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, akabi akali mu kugabana ebifaananyi by'obuntu bweyongedde okweraliikiriza. Okutyoboola eby'ekyama n'obusobozi bw'okutulugunyizibwa kifuula kikulu okulowooza n'obwegendereza nga tonnaba kukwata biseera bya mukwano.
ach_prompt: I kare me intanet me kare-ni, peko ma bino macalo adwogi me poko cal pa ngat moni tye ka kelo lworo madit tutwal. Bal me turu cik me kwo pa dano kacel ki twero me nywaro tic ki dano weko obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me tamo matut mapwod pe imako kare me bedo ki wat macok ki dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, eyatakinos atiokisio nuka aimor aputosia nuka itunga. Amumu na aiyeyea keda apedor naka aitolitol itunga einakinit itunganan aomoom ejok eringa iwadika akiro nuka aiyeyea.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'di ma alea, e'yo ewaru e'da eyi awazu 'diyi eca asi otiza ru. Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌba yi ma ngulupi ma eꞌyo onyozu azini ꞌbani ecozu ꞌba yi ayuzu ꞌdiyi fe ꞌbani egazu kililiru de nga ꞌba oꞌdu eꞌyo ꞌba yi ma eselea ꞌdiyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa digito obwa hati, akabi akarikuruga omu kugabana ebishushani byawe nikyeyongyera kukwerarikiriza. Okuhenda eby'okwerinda hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'okukoresa kubi abantu, nikikureetera okuteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza otakakwatsire obwire bw'ekihama.

eng_prompt: As I stand in front of the mirror, I can't help but notice how tight the fabric feels around my shoulders. It's clear that my body has changed since I first wore this uniform.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe nnyimiridde mu maaso g'endabirwamu, siyinza butamanya ngeri olugoye gye lunywezaamu ebibegabega byange. Kyeyoleka bulungi nti omubiri gwange gukyuse okuva lwe nnayambala yunifoomu eno.

teo_prompt: Neabwouna eong koingaren naka alabira, mam eong apedori aimorikikin eong epone loepodokinitor eong egoe ngol. Ecai cut ebe ejulakin akuanaka ageun napikakina eong eunifom lo.
lgg_prompt: Aka so pa angu ndreza ma drilea, ma econi ma aza ko ku afa bongo 'da ni ma ombelea okporu ri ndrezu. Eri e'da kililiru kini ma rua oja i e'dozu mani yunifomu 'di suzu okorisi.
nyn_prompt: Ku ndikuguma nyemereire omu maisho g'ekirahuri, tindikubaasa kwetantara kureeba oku ekibugu kirikukwata aha bibegabega byangye. Nikyoreka butunu ngu omubiri gwangye guhindukire kuruga obu nabanza kujwara yunifoomu egi.

eng_prompt: Consistent effort and dedication are key factors in achieving academic success. Those who prioritize their studies often find themselves reaping the rewards of their hard work.
lug_prompt: Okufuba n'obumalirivu ebitaggwaawo bye bikulu mu kutuuka ku buwanguzi mu by'ensoma. Abo abakulembeza okusoma kwabwe batera okwesanga nga bakungula ebibala by'okukola ennyo kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Tute matek ki keto cwiny ikwan obedo gin ma pire tek ma weko ngat moni cobo miti ne i gang kwan. Joo ma keto kwan gi obed gin ma pire tek tutwal ipol kare ginongo ni gitye ka kayo adwogi me tic matek ma gutimo.
teo_prompt: Aswam kagogong ka ainakina eraas iboro luingarakinete itunga aitodolikin akerianut kotoma asioman. Ngul luingarenikinitos asioman kec etapit aisak ikapun luka aswam kec kagogong.
lgg_prompt: Okpo feza azini ava feza sawa driasi ri eri e'yo okporu 'bani drile suza esuzu onita ma alea 'diyi. Ba e'yo onitani 'diyi 'dupi okporu 'diyi yi esu yi ma ngulupi ma dria orodri azi okporu yini 'diyiniri oku'i.
nyn_prompt: Okuteeraho munonga n'okwehayo n'enshonga nkuru omu kusingura omu by'obwegyese. Abo abarikwebembeza emishomo yaabo, nibashanga basharwire ebijuma by'okukora munonga.

eng_prompt: Various factors contribute to a student's academic success, including personal motivation and access to resources. Among these, the influence of family dynamics and socioeconomic status can play a significant role in shaping educational outcomes.
lug_prompt: Ensonga ez'enjawulo zireeta obuwanguzi mu kusoma kw'omuyizi, omuli okumukubiriza n'okufuna ebyetaago. Mu bino, embeera y'amaka n'embeera y'ebyenfuna n'embeera z'abantu bisobola okukola kinene mu kukola ebivaamu by'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Tye jami mapol ma weko lutino kwan cobo miti gi i gang kwan, man kwako cuku cwiny gi ki nongo jami ma mite pi lutino kwan. I kin magi, aloka-loka me gang ki rwom me lim ki kwo pa dano twero konyo tutwal I yubu adwoki me kwan.
teo_prompt: Ipu iboro lu ijaikitos esisiak akerianut kotoma asioman, aimoriarit aisinyikokinit keda adumun iboro. Kotoma ngun, epone loepedoriata ikalia keda ejautene loka ikapun keda itunga aswam ibore yenepol noi kotoma aitolomun eswamae loka asioman.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ndundu eyi sukulu anzi eyi ma drile suza onita ma alea ri ma omgbo otu, eyini ava fezu eyi ma ngulupi ni azini geri eyini afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu 'diyi pie. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, e'yo familia eyini aa'zu alenia ri tualu geri eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu
nyn_prompt: Hariho enshonga nyingi ezirikureetaho obusinguzi omu bigyezo by'omwegi otwariiremu okushemererwa n'okutunga eby'okukoresa. Omuri ebi, enkora y'embeera y'amaka hamwe n'embeera y'abantu omu by'entaasya, nibibaasa kukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kureetaho ebyarugire omu kwega.

eng_prompt: Despite her efforts to instill kindness and empathy in him, she received a troubling call from the principal. The news shattered her hopes for his future and left her questioning what went wrong.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yakola kyonna ekisoboka okumulaga ekisa n'okumukwatirwa ekisa, omukulu w'essomero yamuyita ku ssimu. Amawulire gaasaanyaawo essuubi lye ku biseera bye eby'omu maaso era ne gamuleka ng'abuusabuusa ekyali kikyamu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en otute matek me pwonyo wode ki cwiny me kica ki kica, en ogamo cim ki bot ladit gang kwan. Lok angea ne obalo gen ma en tye kwede I kom anyim mege dok oweko en obedo ki akala-kala I kom ngo ma otimme marac.
teo_prompt: Karaida abu ngesi iswama agogongu kanu aisisianakin ngesi asianut keda aitim, abu ngesi kodum esimu loetiono noi kama ejai apolon esomero. Apotu iyemuto itolitolutu amuno ke kanuka ngarenike kosodete ajalakin ngesi aingitun ibore yenerono.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro okpo 'bazu eri ma alia asi ndriza azini asi e'yeresi ra ti, eri isu simu e'yo ewaru ni engazu dricere vu. O'duko nderi eza eri ma asi'baza ewu drusiri ma dria ra dika eri ku e'yo i 'yepi onzi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteeraho kwe kumuhwera kugira embabazi n'embabazi, akatunga esimu kuruga owa mukuru weishomero. Amahurire gakashiisha amatsiko ge agarikukwata aha biro bye eby'omumaisho kandi gakamureka naayebuuza ekyabaire kitahikire.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, countless individuals have sought refuge from dire circumstances. Among the most pressing reasons for their exodus was the violence and instability caused by ongoing conflicts.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abantu bangi banoonye obubudamu okuva mu mbeera embi. Ebimu ku bintu ebyasinga okubaleetera okudduka bye bikolwa eby'obukambwe n'obutali butebenkevu ebireetebwa entalo ezigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro pa dano mapol, dano mapol guyenyo kalarre ki I kare me peko. I kin tyen lok mapigi tego ma oweko guweko lobo enoni obedo tim gero ki kuku kuku ma obedo tye macalo adwogi me lweny matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, apotu itunga luipu odumutu aiboi kotoma ojautene loetiono noi. Adiopet koboro luapotu kisinyikokisi kesi anyoun kotoma akwapin kec arai amumu keda amamus na ainapakina kanuka ingungeta lu elosi akonye.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi nda angu tambazu e'yo ewaru eyi ma alea 'diyisi. E'yo okporu ndeni eyini apazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma eselea ri ngiringiri azini e'yo ewaru eyini esu e'yo ngiringiri ni mupi drile 'diyi ma e'yosi ri.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu baingi batungire obuhungiro omu mbeera mbi. Ahabw'enshonga ezirikubareetera okuruga omu maka gaabo, hakaba hariho obwimukiriro n'obutabanguko obwaretsirwe entaro ezirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: After months of stealing from their businesses, the local merchants had finally had enough. They gathered in the alley, ready to take matters into their own hands.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi nga babba mu bizineesi zaabwe, abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu baali bamalirizza okufuna ekimala. Baakungaanidde mu kkubo, nga beetegefu okutwalira ensonga mu ngalo.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwalo jami ki I biacara gi pi dwe mapol, lucat wil me tedero dong otyeko nongo ma oromo. Gucokke I teng gudi, ma oyubbe me tero lok I cinggi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu ekokoere kotoma obiasarakec, apotu agwelanarak luka atutubet konyamata. Apotu kesi kotukokinos korot, ekapakina ayangar akiro akanin kec.
lgg_prompt: Mba yini oguzu engazu tujara yini 'diyi ma alia 'bori ma vutia, 'ba tujara 'yepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu asizu ra. Eyi tra eyi nzila alia ngonde e'yo eyi 'duzu eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okwiba omu bizinesi zaabo, abashuubuzi b'omukyanga kyabo bakatunga ekirikumara. Baketeeranira omu muhanda, beteekateekire kutwara enshonga omu mikono yaabo.

eng_prompt: After hours of searching, authorities finally located the missing hiker in the dense forest. Despite the efforts of the rescue team, the news was devastating.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala essaawa eziwera nga banoonya, ab'obuyinza baasobola okuzuula omuvuzi w'ebisolo eyabula mu kibira. Wadde nga ttiimu y'abadduukirize yakola kyonna ekisoboka, amawulire gaali mazibu nnyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee yenyo pi cawa malac, lutela gunongo ngat ma orwenyo I bunga. Kadi bed ni lutic me laro kwo gutiyo matek, lok angea ne obedo marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic isawan luipu, apotu apedorosio odumutu etunganan loabu kowolio kokibira. Karaida apotu itunga lu ayuarete itunga iswamata kagogong, apotu iyemuto itakadikisi.
lgg_prompt: Sawa angu ndaria 'bori ma vutia, 'ba okpo e'iru 'diyi esu asizu 'ba acipi angu ndundu eyi ma alea avipi 'da jere ma alea. Okpo 'ba pa so'baa 'diyi ni 'diyi ma talasi, o'duko nderi ndra onzi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara eshaaha nyingi barikuronda, ab'obushoborozi bakahendera bashanga omushaija owabuzire omu kibira. Oihireho amaani ga tiimu y'abajunanizibwa, amahurire gakaba gari ag'akabi munonga.

eng_prompt: After weeks of escalating violence and intimidation, law enforcement finally took action against the group. Their blatant disregard for public safety could no longer be tolerated.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera ng'obutabanguko n'okutiisibwatiisibwa byeyongedde, abakuumaddembe kyaddaaki baakola ku kibinja. Okubuusa amaaso kwabwe eri obukuumi bw'abantu tekwakyayinza kugumiikirizibwa.

lgg_prompt: Mitingi eli vusi ri ni e'doria, 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ri yi vile kiti ma alia ava be e'yo ogua e'i ni ega eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma dria 'diyi erizu. Asi 'baza be oli alia, 'ba dria ma mile oja pari e'yo nzezu 'diyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: I submitted my tuition payment last week and expected to hear back shortly. However, it has been several days, and I am starting to get concerned.
lug_prompt: Nasindika ebisale byange eby'essomero wiiki ewedde era nsuubira okuddamu okuwulira mu bbanga ttono. Naye kati wayise ennaku eziwerako era ntandise okweraliikirira.
ach_prompt: Aculu cente me culu kwan icabit ma okato dok abedo ki gen me winyo lokki oyot-oyot. Kadi bed kumeno, dong okato nino mapol, dong acako bedo ki lworo.
teo_prompt: Abu eong aijuk ikapun luka esomero osabiti je ido aomit eong ebe ebuni eong apupun. Konye, adaun kwana aparasia nuipu, ido ageun eong aiyalongong.
lgg_prompt: Afe ma vile fizi sabiti ajerisi ra azini ma ega e'yo erizu vile mbeleru. Kani si, eri ebi ovu o'du karakara, azini ma e'do asi otiza isu.

eng_prompt: After a thorough selection process, the organization has finalized its choices for the upcoming term. Excitement is building as the new committee members will swear in next month.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusunsula obulungi, ekitongole kimalirizza okulonda kw'ekisanja ekiddako. Obwagazi bweyongedde nga bammemba b'akakiiko abapya balayizibwa omwezi ogujja.
ach_prompt: Ingee yer maber tutwal, dul ne otyeko moko tamgi pi tem mabino ni. Cwiny dano tye ka yomo cwinygi tutwal pien lumemba manyen me dul enoni gubi kwongo I dwe manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aseo, adau erionget aitemokin aseunetake kanuka atamu naebunit. Ejai aiyalama naarai epote imeeban luka ekomiti ailair olap ngol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da asi e'yo eyini pe termi emupi ri ni 'diyi ma dria 'bo. Ayiko zo 'ba Komiti ni o'diru 'diyi ni oyo sozu imba drusirisi.

eng_prompt: After months of intense campaigning and numerous debates, the candidate emerged as the clear favorite among voters. His message of change resonated deeply with the electorate, leading to a historic turnout at the polls.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okunoonya akalulu n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi, eyeesimbyewo yalabika ng'asinga okwagalibwa mu balonzi. Obubaka bwe obw'enkyukakyuka bwasikiriza nnyo abalonzi, ekyaviirako okwetaba mu kulonda okw'ebyafaayo.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me bito kwi ki laro lok mapol, lacungu ne okato macalo ngat ma oywek tutwal I kin lubol kwir. Lok mege me kelo aloka-loka oywek tutwal I kin lubol kwir, ma oweko dano mapol gubolo kwir.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aisup aseeta keda ipegeta luipu, abu abwoan kotakan kwape loetapit noi kotoma aseak. Apotu akiroke nuka aijulakin akiro kojaunos keda aseak, ido abu koyangau itunga luipu alomar toma aseo.
lgg_prompt: Mba ti odaza okporu azini agbatara karakara 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba pa sopi 'da efu 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma eselea 'ba lepi ndeni ri ru. O'duko erini o'duko ojata niri fe 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi dri, erini fezu 'ba emu'ba opeta eyi ma alea 'diyi ma kalafe ni ecazu ewu driori ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuronda akaruuru hamwe n'okuhanuura kwingi, oyesimbireho akareebeka nk'orikukirayo kukundwa abateezi b'akaruuru. Obutumwa bwe oburikukwata aha mpindahinduka bukashemererwa munonga abateezi b'akaruuru, ekyarugiremu okwejumba kw'amaani omu kuteera akaruuru.

eng_prompt: As the political climate grew increasingly tense, the urgency for a decision became clear. During the meeting, he outlined the potential consequences of delaying the electoral process.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'ebyobufuzi bwe yeeyongera okuba ey'obunkenke, obwetaavu bw'okusalawo mu bwangu bweyoleka. Mu lukungaana, yalambika ebiyinza okuva mu kulwawo kw'okulonda.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok me cung iwibye omedde ki bedo tek, mite ni omyero kimok tam oyot-oyot tutwal. Ikare me kacoke en otito adwogi marac ma bino pi galle pa yub me yer.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor akiro nuka epolitikis, aponi kojenunai eipud loka aitolomun aseunet katipet. Kotoma airiamunet ngin abu ngesi kitetem atiokisio nuepedorete alomun kanu aiyap ainapeta nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni 'diyi ni ecazu e'yeresi, le 'ba ma 'du e'yo mbeleru. Mitingi 'da ma alea, ece e'yo ecopi i'yepi e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma sa'wa ezazuri ra.

eng_prompt: During the press conference, the former mayor reflected on his time in public service. He highlighted the key initiatives and projects that defined his tenure.
lug_prompt: Mu lukung'aana lwa bannamawulire eyaliko meeya yayogera ku biseera bye mu buweereza bwa gavumenti. Yayogedde ku bintu ebikulu bye yakola mu kiseera ekyo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lok ki luco lok angeya, meya macon oloko I kom kare ma en obedo I tic pa gamente. En oloko I kom yub mapigi tego ma otime I kare ma en tye I ker.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet keda arotak iyemuto abu emeya losek kiner nuikamunitos apak ke naka aijanakin apugan. Abu ngesi kitetem nuikamunitos ipurojektin luapolok luetapit ngesi aswam kapakio nu.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo nzezu 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie risi, meya ndra okuri ega e'yo sawa erini aa'zu azi ngazu o'bi eyidri ri ma dria. Ece e'yo otita okporu azini otita okporu e'dapi sawa erini azi ngazuri ma alia 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, owabaireho meeya akagamba aha bwire obu yaabaire ari omu buheereza bwa gavumenti. Akashoborora enteekateeka n'emirimo mikuru eyabaireho omu bwire bwe.

eng_prompt: After years of dedicated service and countless hours spent volunteering, he had become a beloved figure in the neighborhood. His unwavering support during difficult times had forged strong bonds with the residents.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'aweereza n'obunyiikivu era ng'amala essaawa nnyingi ng'akola nga nnakyewa, abantu mu kitundu baali bamwagala nnyo. Obuwagizi bwe mu biseera ebizibu bwaleetawo enkolagana ey'amaanyi n'abatuuze.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki cawa mapol tutwal ma en otiyo macalo latic ma pe jenge I kom gamente, en dong odoko dano ma dano maro adada I kabedo ne. Kony mege ma pe lokke I kare me peko okelo wat matek I kin en ki lutedero.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aijanakin keda isawan luipu luetapit ngesi aswam, araun ngesi itunganan yeniminanara noi kotoma atutubet. Agangat ke naepol noi kotoma apakio nuetioko abu kiswamau eidicane loegogong keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu asi driasi azini sa'wa kalafe angiri 'bani eza e'yo azi ngazuri ma alia 'bori ma vutia, eri eca 'ba 'bani lele tu angu ama agei 'diyi ma alia ni'i. E'yo erini atita fezu e'yo ewaru eyi ma alea ri fe erini aa'ta aa'zu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie okporu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi omu buheereza n'okumara eshaaha nyingi arikuhwera abantu, akahinduka omuntu orikukundwa munonga omu kicweka. Obuhwezi bwe omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, bukareetaho enkoragana nungi n'abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: In the recent community event, various organizations collaborated to ensure inclusivity and accessibility for all attendees. As a result, people with disabilities were well represented.
lug_prompt: Mu mukolo gw'ekitundu ogwabaddewo gyebuvuddeko, ebitongole eby'enjawulo byakolagana okulaba nga byonna bizingiramu n'okutuukirirwa eri bonna abaabaddewo. N'ekyavaamu, abantu abaliko obulemu bakiikirirwa bulungi.
ach_prompt: I yub me tedero ma otime cokcok-ki, dul mapat-pat gutiyo kacel me neno ni dano weng gubedo tye. Macalo adwogi ne, joo ma lugoro onongo gi cung pigi maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opucit loka atutubet napac, apotu iriongeta luegelegela kimorikikinos kanu awanyun ebe epatana itunga kere adolokin. Kanuka ngun, aponi abwoikinai itunga lu engwalitos ejok.
lgg_prompt: Yeta ongulumu eyini o'diru ri ma alea, amuti ndundu eyi nga azi tualu nezu ra kini 'ba dria emu'ba 'diyi eco e'yo nde 'ye ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba pa tu 'ba aco be 'diyi ma paria kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu mukoro gw'ekyanga ogwahwireho, ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe bikakorengana kureeba ngu boona abaabaire bariho bahikwaho. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu abaine oburema aha mibiri yaabo bakajwekyerwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: After years of dedicated service to the community, the church leadership decided it was time for a change. They believed a new environment would help the priest grow in his ministry.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga baweereza abantu, abakulembeze b'ekkanisa baasalawo nti kye kiseera wabeewo enkyukakyuka. Baalowooza nti embeera empya ejja kuyamba kabona okukula mu buweereza bwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic pi lwak, lutela me kanica gumoko ni kare dong oromo me kelo aloka loka. Gubedo ki niyee ni kabedo manyen ne bikonyo padi me dongo i ticce me pwony.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aijanakin itunga, apotu engarenok lu ekanisa koseutu ebe erai apak naka aijulakin. Iyuunitos kesi ebe ebuni aiboisit naitetet aingarakin esaserodoti apolo kotoma aijaanakinike.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyini azi ngazu o'bi eyini 'bori ma vutia, driceza kanisa niri 'du e'yo kini sa'wa 'di ojata ni. Yi a'ira kini angu o'diru ni nga padere ma aza ko zozu eri ma azi ngaza ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuheereza abantu, abebembezi b'ekanisa bakasharamu ngu obwire bw'empinduka buhikire. Bakaba nibaikiriza ngu embeera ensya neija kuhwera omubuurizi okukura omu buheereza bwe.

eng_prompt: During the annual meeting, the board members reflected on the significant progress made over the past year. They unanimously agreed that the chairman played a crucial role in guiding the organization through its challenges.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'omwaka, bammemba b'olukiiko bafumiitiriza ku nkulaakulana ey'amaanyi eyakolebwa mu mwaka oguwedde. Bakkiriziganya awatali kuwakanya nti ssentebe yakola omulimu omukulu mu kulambika ekibiina mu kusoomoozebwa kwakyo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka, lumemba me dul enoni gubedo ka tam I kom dongo lobo ma otimme I mwaka ma okato. Guwinye labongo jemo ni won kom otimo tic mapire tek tutwal I doro dul ne I kare me peko ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka ekaru, apotu imeeban luka atukot ngin kitetemoto nuikamunitos apol naka ekaru loatubor. Apotu kesi kocamanaros ebe abu apolon eicolong iswama aswam naepol noi kanu aingarenikin erionget kotoma atiokisio ke.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi eli vusi ri ma alea, memba board ni 'diyi ega e'yo drileba okporu 'bani isu eli agapi 'bo ri ma dria. Eyi ai ti e'yo si kini ogua e'i 'da 'ye azi okporu amuti 'da ma dri cezu e'yo ewaru erini esu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'omwaka, ba memba b'akakiiko bakateekateeka aha ntunguuka y'omwaka oguhwaire. Bakaikirizana ngu mukuru w'entebe akakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kwebembera ekitongore omu buremeezi bwakyo.

eng_prompt: After hearing the confusing updates from the news, she felt uncertain about the voting process. Concerned about the implications, she decided to reach out for more information.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira ebipya ebitabuddwatabuddwa okuva mu mawulire, yawulira obutali bukakafu ku nkola y'okulonda. Olw'okweraliikirira ebiyinza okuvaamu, yasalawo okufuna ebisingawo.
ach_prompt: Inge winyo lok angeya ma pe niange, en obedo ki akala-kala I kom yub me bolo kwir. Pi lworo I kom adwogi ne, en omoko tamme me nongo ngec mukene.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aipup akiro nuka iyemuto nuetioko, abu ngesi kopup abuonokin nuikamunitos aseo. Apodokinit nuikamunitos nuepedorete atakanun, abu ngesi koseu adolokin aingic akiro nuipu.
