eng_prompt: As the crowd hushed in anticipation, I leaned in closer, eager to hear the minister's announcement. Little did I know, the news would change everything I thought I knew about our community.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe baali basirifu, nange nnasemberera nga njagala nnyo okuwulira ekirango kya minisita. Nnali simanyi nti amawulire ago gajja kukyusa buli kimu kye nnali mmanyi ku kitundu kyaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dano gubedo ma cwinygi opye mot, acung cok, ki miti madit tutwal me winyo lok angeya pa minista. Onongo pe angeyo, lok angea ne obiloko jami weng ma onongo atamo ni angeyo I kom kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Neililingiaata itunga, abu eong apodokinit noi, akoto noi aipup alimoret naka eminisita. Mam eong ajeni ebe ebuni iyemuto aijulakin iboro kere lu aomit eong ebe ajeni eong nuikamunitos atutubetekosi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da eyini aa'zu ciri ma alea, ma so pa ogogo e'yo minisita 'da ni azi ngazu ri erizu avasi. Ma nini ndra ku, e'yo laza 'da ni nga e'yo dria mani ega kini ma ni ongulumu amavileri ma dria 'diyi oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Obu abantu baabaire bahunamiire, nkegamira haihi, nyine ekihika ky'okuhurira ekirango kya minisita. Nkaba ntarikumanya ngu amahurire ng'ago nigeija kuhindura buri kimwe eki naabaire ninteekateeka ngu nimanya aha bantu b'omukyanga kyaitu.

eng_prompt: Reflecting on my experiences, I realize how much I grew both personally and professionally. The challenges I faced and the decisions I made shaped my understanding of leadership.
lug_prompt: Bwe ndowooza ku bye nnayitamu, nkiraba engeri gye nkula mu bulamu bwange ne mu by'ekikugu. Okusoomoozebwa kwe nnayolekagana nakwo n'okusalawo kwe nnakola byakola kinene ku ngeri gye ntegeeramu obukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Ka atamo I kom jami ma akato ki iye, aniang kit ma adongo kwede ki kit ma atiyo kwede. Peko ma anongo ki tam ma amoko okelo niang ma atye kwede I kom tela.
teo_prompt: Aomoom nuikamunitos akiroka, ajeni eong epone loapolounit eong kwape itunganan keda kwape epirioit. Atiokisio nuetakanunit eong keda aseununeta nueswamat eong abu itopolo aomisio ka nuikamunitos eingarenone.
lgg_prompt: Mani egaria e'yo mani isule 'diyi ma dria, ma esu e'yo mani zozu ma ngulupisi azini e'yo onitani ma alia 'diyi ra. E'yo ewaru mani esu 'diyi tualu peta mani 'dule 'diyi pie oja vata mani driceza ma dria ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuteekateeka aha bi naarabiremu, nikinyoreka oku naakuzire nk'omuntu n'omuhangu. Oburemeezi obu nashanga hamwe n'okusharamu oku nakozire, bikakora aha ku naayetegyereza obwebembezi.

eng_prompt: Despite his extensive campaign efforts and numerous rallies, the public's support dwindled as the election date approached. Many voters expressed concerns about his policies and leadership style.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yafuba nnyo okunoonya akalulu era n'akuba enkungaana nnyingi, obuwagizi bw'abantu bwakendeera ng'olunaku lw'okulonda lusembera. Abalonzi bangi baalaga obweraliikirivu ku nkola ye n'engeri gy'akulemberamu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en otute matek me bito kwi kacel ki coko mapol, cwak pa lwak odok piny I kare ma nino me yer cok. Lubol kwir mapol gunyutu lworo I kom cik mege ki kit ma en telo kwede.
teo_prompt: Karaida abu ngesi kiswama ikampeins luipu noi keda ikampeins luipu, apotu agangat naka itunga kibiroros neyapiete apaarasia nuka aseo. Apotu aseak luipu itodutu aiyalongongo kanu ainapeta ke keda epone loingarenikit ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro ti odaza 'yezu okporu azini ti odaza karakara 'diyi 'yezu ra ti, o'bi ma atita esi o'du opetaa ni ecazu ogogo ri si. Ba karakara voti 'bepi 'diyi ece asi otiza yini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria azini geri erini dricezu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oyihireho okuronda akaruuru n'enteerane nyingi, obushagiki bw'abantu bukakyendeera nk'oku eizooba ry'akaruuru ryahika haihi. Abateezi b'akaruuru abaingi bakoreka okwerarikirira aha nkora ye hamwe n'emitwarize ye y'obwebembezi.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration and encouragement from his supporters, he felt a renewed sense of purpose. Despite the challenges he faced last time, he believed he could make a difference.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo n'okuzzibwamu amaanyi okuva mu bawagizi be, yawulira nga azzeemu okuba n'ekigendererwa. Wadde nga yafuna okusoomoozebwa omulundi ogwasembayo, yali mukakafu nti asobola okuleetawo enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut ki cuku cwiny ma aa ki bot lucwake, en owinyo ni tye ki tyen lok manyen. Kadi bed ni en okato ki peko mapol, en obedo ki niyee ni etwero kelo alokaloka.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok keda aisinyikokinit kama ejaasi egangitokoke, abu ngesi kopup aijar naejok. Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda atiokisio nuetereikina keda apak natubor, aomit ngesi ebe epedori ngesi aijulakin akiro.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo egazu kililiru azini ava fezu engazu 'ba eri ati'ba 'diyi vu 'bori ma vutia, eri ama asi 'baza o'diru. E'yo ewaru erini esu sawa ajerisi 'diyi ma talasi, eri a'i ra kini i eco ojata eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza hamwe n'okugarurwamu amaani kuruga omu bashagiki be, akagaruka yahurira aine ekigyendererwa. Oihireho oburemeezi obu yaatungire omurundi ogwahwaire, akaikiriza ngu naabaasa kukora empindahinduka.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote environmental sustainability, the community organized a meeting to discuss ways to combat climate change. One of the key initiatives proposed was a tree-planting campaign.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obutonde bw'ensi, ekitundu kyategese olukiiko okuteesa ku ngeri y'okulwanyisaamu enkyukakyuka y'obudde. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyateesebwako kwe kusimba emiti.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor gwoko cwec ma orumuwa, lwak guyubu kacoke me nywako tam i kom kit me lweny i kom alokaloka pa piny. Yub acel ma pire tek ma kimiyo obedo yub me pito yadi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopolorite ejautene lo akwap, apotu itunga itemokisi airiamunet kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itikitikere aijulujuleta nuka ekuse ka etepe. Adiopet koboro luapolok luitemokinitai ngesi aira ikito.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu angu ama agei ri ma tambazu, ongulumu 'da otu mitingi agbatara gbazu geri ecozu a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be. E'yo azi okporu 'bani le 'ye ri ma azi e'yo pati saza niri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obuhangwa, abantu bakatebekanisa orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha mihanda y'okurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebyateirweho, n'okubyara emiti.

eng_prompt: The rapid loss of forests around the world is a growing concern for environmentalists and scientists alike. As trees are cut down at alarming rates, the balance of our ecosystems is being disrupted.
lug_prompt: Okubula kw'ebibira okw'amangu okwetooloola ensi yonna kweyongera okweraliikiriza abakugu mu by'obutonde ne bannassaayansi. Ng'emiti gitemebwa ku sipiidi eyeeraliikiriza, enzikiriziganya y'obutonde bw'ensi etataaganyizibwa.
ach_prompt: Rweny pa bunga I rwom ma lamal tutwal I wilobo tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kin joo ma gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ki lucayan. Kit ma kitye ka tongo yadi I rwom ma lamal tutwal, rwom me kwo pa cwec ma orumuwa tye ka bale.
teo_prompt: Aibiror naka ikibiran kotoma akwap kere erai ationis naepol noi kanejaas itunga luidarete isuban luka akwap keda luka sayanis. Kwape atubutubete ikito noi, eutai aitolitol aiboisio nu ekwam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo oce ni avizu mbeleru wudrikuru ma alea ndulu ri eri asi otiza tu 'ba angu ama agei ri ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma dria tualu 'ba sayansini 'diyi pie. Ba pati eyi oga ongmbo angiri si, e'yo angu amavile 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi eza eyi.
nyn_prompt: Okuhwaho kw'ebibira okw'amaani omu nsi yoona, nikyerarikiriza ab'eby'obuhangwa hamwe na ba sayansi. Nk'oku emiti erikutemekwa aha rurengo rw'amaani, entuura y'obuhangwa bwaitu eriyo neteganisibwa.

eng_prompt: After discussing the environmental impact of deforestation, the group recognized the urgent need for sustainable solutions. Motivated by their desire to combat climate change, they explored various initiatives to make a positive difference.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri okutema ebibira gye kikosaamu obutonde bw'ensi, ekibiina kyalabye obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okugonjoola ensonga ez'olubeerera. Olw'okwagala okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde, baanoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okuleetawo enkyukakyuka ennungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok I kom adwoki pa tongo yadi I kom cwec ma orumuwa, gurup ne gunongo ni mite tutwal me nongo yoo me cobo peko eni. Pi miti gi me lweny i kom alokaloka me piny, guyenyo yoo mapat-pat me kelo alokaloka maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitemitem nuikamunitos ejautene lo akwap kanu atubutubio na ikito, apotu egurupu kojenutu eipud loka aitemokin ationis ngin. Apotu kesi kisinyikokisi keda eipud loka aitikitik aijulujuleta nuka ekuse loka ikwamin, apotu kesi kongicata iponesio luegelegela luka aitolomun aijulanakineta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agbatara gbazu e'yo angu ama agei ri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu 'da esu e'yo 'bani ecozu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu sa'wa driasi ri ra. E'yo eyini lezu a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be risi, eyi e'do e'yo ndundu eyi 'ye ojata kililiru ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura aha kabi akari omu kutema emiti, guruupu ekareeba ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okutereeza eby'obuhangwa. Ahabw'ekyetengo kyabo ky'okurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire, bakashwijuma emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'okukora empindahinduka.

eng_prompt: The recent surge in the company's profits has caught the attention of many investors. As a result, interest in acquiring ownership stakes has significantly increased.
lug_prompt: Amagoba kkampuni g'ekoze gye buvuddeko gakutte amaaso ga bamusigansimbi bangi. N'ekivuddemu, obwagazi mu kufuna emigabo bweyongedde nnyo.
ach_prompt: Medde pa magoba pa dul ne cokcok-ki oyomo cwiny lutim biacara mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, miti me bedo rwed dul mapat-pat omede tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aiyatakinio naka ameda naka ekampuni kama ejaasi agwelanarak luipu noi. Kanuka ngun, eyatakin noi eipud loka itunga adumun iborokec.
lgg_prompt: Orodri amuti 'da niri ma omgbo tupi o'diru ri eji 'ba lonyi vuti alezani 'diyi ma asi ra. E'yo 'disi, ava 'bani e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ngulupi si 'diyi esuzu ri ma omgbo tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'amagoba ga kampuni obwahati, kireesireho okwetegyereza kw'abashubuzi baingi. N'ekyarugiremu, ekyetengo ky'okutunga emigabo kyeyongyeire munonga.

eng_prompt: The rapid expansion of urban areas and agricultural land has led to significant deforestation. As a result, the environment is facing unprecedented challenges.
lug_prompt: Okugaziwa okw'amangu okw'ebibuga n'ettaka ly'okulimirako kuviiriddeko okutema ebibira okw'amaanyi. N'ekivuddemu, obutonde bw'ensi bwolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutabangawo.
ach_prompt: Dongo pa boma ki ngom me pur okelo tongo yadi mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, cwec ma orumuwa tye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apol naka itaunin keda alupok nu akoru ayangau atubutubio na ikito. Kanuka ngun, etereikina ejautene lo akwap keda atiokisio nuipu noi.
lgg_prompt: Angu tawuni eyini tuzu okposi tualu angu agirikica ni 'diyi pie ri fe 'bani pati eyi ogazu okporu. E'yo 'disi, angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ni e'yo ewaru ndundu 'diyi esu.

eng_prompt: During the community meeting, the mayor addressed the concerns about deforestation and the need for environmental initiatives. He emphasized the importance of increasing green spaces in the area.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'ekitundu, meeya yayogera ku kweraliikirira ku kusaanyaawo ebibira n'obwetaavu bw'okukola ku butonde bw'ensi. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okwongera ku bifo ebirabika obulungi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke pa lwak, meya oloko I kom peko me tongo bunga ki miti me timo jami mapat-pat I kom cwec ma orumuwa. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa medo kabedo ma alum I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka itunga, abu emeya kiner nuikamunitos atubutubio naka ikito keda eipud loka aitolomun iboro luingarakinete ejautene lo akwap. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aiyatakin aiboisio nu ekwam katutubet.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ongulumu eyini ri ma alea, meya 'da nze e'yo asi otiza ni eyi ma dria e'yo pati ogaza ni 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo 'bani lezu angu ama agei ri ma tambazu 'diyi ma dria. Eri fe okpo orodri angu ori eyi pie angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'ekyanga, meeya akagamba aha nshonga z'okutema emiti hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okukora aha buhangwa bw'ensi. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okwongyera emyanya y'obuhangwa omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: As stewards of the environment, it is crucial for us to take action in combating climate change. One effective way to contribute to a healthier planet is through reforestation efforts.
lug_prompt: Ng'abakuumi b'obutonde bw'ensi, kikulu nnyo ffe okubaako kye tukolawo mu kulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde. Engeri emu ey'omugaso ey'okuyambako mu bulamu bw'ensi kwe kuyita mu kaweefube w'okusimba ebibira.
ach_prompt: Macalo lugwok cwec ma orumuwa, pire tek tutwal ni omyero watim gin mo me lweny i kom alokaloka piny. Yo acel maber loyo me gwoko yotkom pa lobo en aye me puru yadi.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyaitok lu ejaas akwap, ejokuna noi oni aswam nu aitiji aijulujuleta nuka ekuse ka etepe. Epone ediope loajokan noi loka aitojokar aijar naka akwap erai aitwasam ikito.
lgg_prompt: Ba angu ama agei ri ma ta mbapi 'diyi ru, eri orodriru amani e'yo 'yezu a'di 'dizu e'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri be. Geri azi okporu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'yezu angu ma rua ala ma dria ri geri pati eyi ogazu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Nk'abakuumi b'obuhangwa bw'ensi, n'eky'omugasho munonga okurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okureetaho amagara marungi omu nsi n'okushara emiti.

eng_prompt: Many communities are exploring sustainable practices to enhance their livelihoods. One such practice gaining popularity is tree planting, which offers various economic benefits.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi byoonyereza ku nkola ezisobola okutumbula embeera z'obulamu bwaabyo. Ekimu ku bikolwa ng'ebyo ebyeyongera okumanyika kwe kusimba emiti, ekireeta emiganyulo egy'enjawulo mu byenfuna.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me dongo lobo gi. Yub acel ma oywek tutwal en aye pito yadi, ma kelo magoba mapol ilok kom lim.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aingic iponesio luajokak kanu aitojokar aijar kec. Adiopet kotoma aswamisio kwape kangun naepol noi ngesi aira ikito, na ijaikini itunga ameda naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi geri eyi nda eyini ani ecozu eyi ma edri otuzu. Yeta azi alu 'dile 'bani esu ewu driasi ri pati saza, orodri robia esuzu 'diyi fepi 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga bingi biriyo nibisherura oburyo bw'okutunguura emituurire yaabo. Omuringo gumwe ogurikumanywa munonga n'okubyara emiti, ekirikureeta emigasho mingi omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: In light of the alarming increase in deforestation and its impact on climate change, environmental experts gathered to discuss potential solutions. One of the key recommendations from the conference was to encourage communities to engage in re-afforestation efforts.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera mu kusaanyaawo ebibira n'engeri gye kikosaamu embeera y'obudde, abakugu mu by'obutonde b'ensi baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukikolamu. ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa tongo yadi ki adwoki ne I kom alokaloka me piny, ludiro me cwec ma orumuwa gugure me nywako tam I kom yoo me cobo peko eni. Lok acel ma pire tek ma obedo I kacoke en aye me cuku cwiny lwak me bedo tye I yub me pito yadi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aiyatakinio naka atubutubio naka ikito keda epone loepedoriata aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae, apotu ipiriotin luka akwap kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itemokinet. eng_prompt: In many rural communities, access to modern heating sources is limited. As a result, residents often rely on natural resources for warmth during the colder months.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ebyalo bingi, okufuna ensibuko z'ebbugumu ez'omulembe kitono. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze beesigama ku butonde okufuna ebbugumu mu myezi egy'obunyogovu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me caro, yoo me nongo lyeto ma ite kare ni nok tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero ipol kare gijenge I kom jami ma lubanga aye ocweyo pi nongo lyeto I kare me ngic.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, ikidioko itunga luepedorete adumunun amwanis naka akolong. Kanuka ngun, itwasamaete itunga isuban luka Edeke kanu adumun amwanis kapakio nuelilim.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi ma alea, geri 'bani ecozu angu driza o'diru 'diyi esuzu 'diyi ma esuta eri ewaru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tutuni asi'ba afa nyakuni 'diyi ma dria driza esuzu imba ambizaru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro ebingi, okutunga obutagasi bw'omurembe tikurikwetengwa. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye nibakira kwegamira eby'obuhangwa kutunga obutagatsi omu myezi y'obufuki.

eng_prompt: Lately, I've been feeling unusually stressed and distracted at work. Despite my efforts to stay focused, I can't shake the feeling that something is off.
lug_prompt: Gye buvuddeko, mbadde mpulira obweraliikirivu n'okusoberwa ku mulimu. Wadde nga nfuba okussaayo omwoyo, mpulira nti waliwo ekikyamu.
ach_prompt: I kare-ni, abedo ki lworo madit tutwal I dog tic. Kadi bed alwenyo matek me keto cwinya I kom lok, pe atwero weko winyo ni gin mo tye ma pe tye kakare.

lgg_prompt: O'du 'diyi ma alia, ma e'bi ma asi omiza azini e'yo onzi yi ma dria azi tia. Ma ka tro ma o'bi asi 'bazu ra ti, ma econi e'yo ega kini e'yo azini onzi.

eng_prompt: After a rigorous evaluation of their contributions and achievements, the team gathered to celebrate their successes. The atmosphere was filled with anticipation as the results of the performance review were about to be announced.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ennyo emirimu gyabwe n'ebituukiddwaako, ttiimu yakungaana okujaguza obuwanguzi bwabwe. Embeera yali ejjudde okweraliikirira ng'ebyava mu kwekenneenya emirimu byali binaatera okulangirirwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kor tic gi ki jami ma gutimo, joo ne gugure me kwero jami ma gutimo. Lwak gubedo ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma adwoki me ngiyo kit ma tic otime kwede onongo cok ki cwalo ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor aswam kec keda aitodolikineta, apotu etimu kimorikikinos ainumunum akerianut kec. Ajaasi itunga keda aiyalama naarai eyapie alimor akiro nuelomunitos kotoma airereonor eswamae.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da tra eyi ayiko zu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu alenia 'diyi ndra asi 'baza be e'yo agata 'bani 'ba eyi ma agata ma ale andrizu ri ni ecazu e'dazu 'bori ma vutia.

eng_prompt: As schools across the country closed their doors to prevent the spread of the virus, educators quickly adapted to new teaching methods. This shift has led to a significant increase in online learning platforms and resources.
lug_prompt: Amasomero okwetooloola eggwanga lyonna bwe gaggalawo enzigi zaago okutangira okusaasaana kw'akawuka, abasomesa baatandika mangu okukozesa enkola empya ez'okusomesa. Enkyukakyuka eno ereeseewo okweyongerayongera okw'amaanyi mu mikutu gy'okusomera ku mutimbagano n'ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gangi kwan I but lobo man mapat-pat oloro dogolagi me gengo nya pa two corona, lupwonye guyubu yoo me pwonyo manyen. Alokaloka man okelo mede pa yub me kwan kun gitiyo ki intanet.

lgg_prompt: Sukulu kari 'di ma alea ndulu 'diyi opi yi ma jotile yi ma ti ereta azo 'da niri atrizu, imba'ba eyi e'do geri onita ni o'diru 'diyi 'ye mbeleru. Ojata 'di fe ongmbo onita geri oli aliasi 'diyiniri tu ra.

eng_prompt: Despite the numerous resources available for learning, many learners struggle to grasp fundamental concepts. This trend has raised concerns among educators about the effectiveness of current teaching methods.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo ebikozesebwa bingi mu kuyiga, abayizi bangi balwana okutegeera ebintu ebikulu. Enkola eno ereeseewo okweraliikirira mu basomesa ku bukugu bw'enkola z'okusomesa eziriwo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni jami me kwan tye mapol, lutino mapol nongo tek tutwal me niang pwony ma pigi tego. Man okelo lworo ikin lupwonye i kom yoo me pwonye matye kombedi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu iboro lu itwasamao kanu aisisia, etiono esisiak luipu amisiikin akiro nukapolok. Eyangau epone ngol aiyalongong kanejaas esisianakinak kanu aitodolikin iwaitin lu isisianakino kwana.
lgg_prompt: Afa onita ni karakara 'diyi ma talasi, sukulu anzi karakara eyi dri ci e'yo okporu 'diyi vazu. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza imba'ba eyi ma eselea geri imbatani curu'do 'diyiniri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho eby'okukozesa bingi omu kwega, abeegi baingi nibarwana kwetegyereza enshonga nkuru. Enkora egi ereesireho okwerarikirira omu beegyesa aha bikwatireine n'omugasho gw'enkora y'okwegyesa eriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: Due to an increase in funding and resources, educational institutions were able to expand their capacity. As a result, they implemented new recruitment strategies to attract a larger number of applicants.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweyongera kw'ensimbi n'ebikozesebwa, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza gaasobodde okugaziya obusobozi bwago. N'ekyavaamu, baateekawo enkola empya ez'okuyingiza abakozi okusikiriza omuwendo gw'abasaba abangi.
ach_prompt: Pi medo lim ki jami tic, gangi kwan gumedo rwom gi. Macalo adwogi ne, gukati ki yoo manyen me coyo lutic pi kelo wel dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyatakinio naka ikapun keda iboro, apotu isomeroi kopedosi aitanyanyar adoketait kec. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi itolomutu iwaitin luitetiak lu itolomere itunga kanu aisukunyun itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni tuzu tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie risi, angu onita ni 'diyi ma okpo tu ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi e'do geri o'diru 'bani 'ba eyi sizu azi'ba eyi ma alea kalafe angiri ni eyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'esente n'ebintu, amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese gakabaasa kwongyera amaani gaago. N'ekyarugiremu,bakatandikaho emiringo misya y'okuheereza abantu emirimo kwenda kwongyera omuhendo gw'abantu abarikushaba emirimo.

eng_prompt: In the complex journey of education, the role of a teacher extends beyond mere instruction. It is essential for educators to provide support and direction to help students navigate their learning experiences.
lug_prompt: Mu lugendo oluzibu olw'okusoma, omulimu gw'omusomesa gusukka ku kuyigiriza kwokka. Kya mugaso nnyo abasomesa okuwa obuyambi n'obulagirizi okuyamba abayizi okutambula mu bye bayitamu mu kusoma.
ach_prompt: I yoo me kwan matek tutwal, tic pa lapwony pe obedo me pwonyo lutino keken. Pire tek tutwal ki lupwonye me miyo kony ki tira bot lutino kwan wek gukwan maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orot loetiono noi loka asioman, aswam naka esisianakinan mam erai aisisianakin bon. Erai ibore yenejok noi isisianakinak aijaikin agangat ka aicoreta kanu aingarakin esisiak aitodolikin aisisia kec.
lgg_prompt: Aci onitani ewaru 'di ma alea, azi emba'ba eyini ri aga lu imbata fezu ri ra. Eri orodriru imba'ba eyini atita fezu azini imbata fezu sukulu anzi eyini eyini ani ecozu e'yo eyini oni 'diyi ma alea ra beni.
nyn_prompt: Omu rugyendo rw'eby'obwegyese, omurimo gw'abegyesa nigukira aha kwegyesa kwonka. N'eky'omugasho abegyesa kuheereza abegyi obuhwezi n'obuhabuzi, kugira ngu babaase kwega gye.

eng_prompt: Her recent absence has raised concerns among her teachers and classmates. They are wondering if everything is alright with her.
lug_prompt: Okubulawo kwe gye buvuddeko kwaleeseewo okweraliikirira mu basomesa be ne bayizi banne. Beebuuza oba buli kimu kiri bulungi naye.
ach_prompt: Bedo peke pa nyakoni cokcok-ki okelo lworo ikin lupwonye ki lutino kwan luwote. Gitye kapenye kekengi ka jami weng tye maber I kome.
teo_prompt: Ajautene ke pac eyangaunit aiyalongong kanejaas isisianakinak ke keda ipaupake. Eutasi kesi aomoom arai ejokuna ngesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini curu'do aa'zu ku ri eji asi otiza imba'ba erini 'diyi ma eselea azini 'ba eri vile kilasia 'diyi pie. Yi yi osu kani e'yo dria eri be muke ya ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: Due to severe budget cuts and declining enrollment, the school district was forced to make difficult decisions. As a result, most of the teachers were laid off.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukendeeza ennyo ku mbalirira n'okukendeera kw'abayizi, disitulikiti y'essomero yawalirizibwa okusalawo mu ngeri enzibu. N'ekyavaamu, abasomesa abasinga obungi baagobebwa.
ach_prompt: Pi ngolo byek me lim matek tutwal ki wel lutino kwan matye kadok piny, dictrik me cukul omoko tam matek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, kijuko tic pa lupwonye mapol.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aitub ebajet loepol noi keda aibiror naka enaaba loka esisiak, aponi kobuikinai edisitrikta loka esomero aitolomun aseununeta nuetioko. Kanuka ngun, aponi kolemarai isisianakinak luipu.
lgg_prompt: Otita aje robia niri ma omgbo esizu okporu azini sukulu anzi eyi ma kalafe esizu ri ma e'yosi, distrikiti sukulu niri ndra okpo alea e'yo 'duza kongolokoru 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba dro imba'ba pari yi azia si ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okusharamu munonga embaririra hamwe n'okweyongyera kw'abeegi, disiturikiti y'eishomero ekagyemeserezibwa kukora encwamu egumire. Ekyarugiremu, abegyesa abaingi bakabingwa.

eng_prompt: In today's diverse classroom environments, each student brings unique challenges and learning styles. As a result, personalized support from educators has become increasingly essential for fostering academic success.
lug_prompt: Mu bibiina by'ennaku zino eby'enjawulo, buli muyizi aleeta okusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo n'engeri y'okuyiga ey'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, obuyambi obw'omuntu ku bubwe okuva mu basomesa bweyongedde okubeera obw'omugaso mu kutumbula obuwanguzi mu byensoma.
ach_prompt: I gang kwan mapat-pat me kare-ni, latin kwan acel-acel tye ki peko mapat-pat ma en tye kwede ki kit ma en pwonyo kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, kony ma aa ki bot lupwonye obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi dongo rwom me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela nuka atukot naka ilolo, ejaasi esisiak keda atiokisio nuegelegela keda iponesio luegelegela luka aisisia. Kanuka ngun, agangat kama ejaasi esisianakinak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopoloun akerianut kotoma asioman.
lgg_prompt: Angu kilasia ewu andruri ma alea ndu ndu 'diyi ma alea, sukulu mva alu alu ni e'yo ewaru azini geri onita onizu ndu ndu 'diyi eji. E'yo 'disi, atita alu alu engazu imba'ba eyi vu ri eca curu'do orodriru drile suza onita ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bibiina by'erizooba ebitarikushushana, buri mwegi aine oburemeezi n'emitwarize y'okwega etarikushushana. N'ekyarugiremu, obuhwezi kuruga omu beegyesa buriijo n'obw'omugasho munonga omukureetaho obusinguzi omuby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Maintaining a positive learning environment is crucial for student success. Therefore, educators must be aware of their actions and words during lessons.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma embeera ennungi ey'okusomeramu kya mugaso nnyo eri obuwanguzi bw'abayizi. N'olwekyo abasomesa balina okufaayo ku bye bakola ne bye boogera mu biseera by'okusomesa.
ach_prompt: Gwoko kabedo maber me kwan pire tek tutwal pi lutino kwan me cobo miti gi. Pi meno, lupwonye omyero gubed ki ngec i kom timgi ki lokgi ikare me pwonye.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda ejautene loajokan loka aisisia erai ibore yenepol noi kanu esisiak akerianar. Kanuka ngun, ekot isisianakinak acoite aswamisiokec keda akiro kec kapak naka aisisia.
lgg_prompt: Angu onita ni muke ri ma tambazu ri eri orodriru sukulu anzi eyi ma drile suza ni. Ka'dini, le imba'ba eyi ma aa milesi e'yo eyini 'ye azini e'yo eyini nze sa'wa embata nirisi 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'embeera nungi y'okwega n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obusinguzi bw'abeegi. N'ahabw'ekyo, abeegyesa bashemereire kumanya ebikorwa byabo n'ebigambo byabo baaba nibegyesa.

eng_prompt: Despite weeks of preparation and study sessions, the students felt unprepared for the challenging test. Many of them struggled to grasp the complex concepts covered in the course.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga bamaze wiiki nnamba nga beetegekera n'okusoma, abayizi baawulira nga si beetegefu ku bigezo ebisoomooza. Bangi ku bo baafunye obuzibu okutegeera ebintu ebizibu ebyayogerwako mu kkoosi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lutino kwan gubedo ka yubbe ki kwan pi cabit mapol, gin onongo giwinyo ni pe giyube pi peny matek tutwal. Polgi onongo tek tutwal me niang pwony matye I gang kwan ne.
teo_prompt: Karaida adaun isabitin lu aitemonokin ka aisisia, apotu esisiak opuputu mam ekapakina kanu aingito. Apotu luipu kotoma kakesi kotamitos amisiikin akiro nuelangir nuisisiaunitai kotoma aisisia ngin.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'bani eyi otuzu azini onita onizu 'diyi ma talasi, sukulu anzi eyi awini eyi otu obeta ewaru 'da ni ku. Ba karakara eyi esu ewaru e'yo kongolokoru 'bani esu onita 'da ma alea 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho esande z'okweteekateekyera n'okushoma, abeegi tibarabaasize kweteekateekyera ebigyezo. Baingi aharibo bakarwana kwetegyereza ebiteekateeko bigumire omu koosi.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the recent test scores, the teachers expressed their concerns about the students' lack of understanding. The parents were puzzled by the sudden drop in grades and sought answers.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obubonero bw'ebigezo, abasomesa baalaga okweraliikirira kwabwe ku butategeera kw'abayizi. Abazadde baasoberwa olw'okukka kw'ebigezo okw'amangu era ne banoonya eby'okuddamu.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kor adwogi peny ma okato cokcok-ki, lupwonye gunyutu lworo gi i kom peko me niang pa lutino. Lunyodo ne gubedo ki ngeng tutwal I kom kit ma rwom me kwan odok piny atura ci guyenyo lagam.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor eswamae loka aingito, apotu isisianakinak itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu amamus na amisiikin esisiak. Apotu auriak koumokinos kanu aibiror naka iguredin kosodete aimo abongonokineta.
lgg_prompt: O'duko obeta o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, imba'ba eyi ece asi otiza eyini sukulu anzi eyi ma vata ako ma dria. Tipika 'da eyi ndra osuta si e'yo sukulu anzi eyi ma agata ma omgbo esizu mbeleru risi dika eyi nda omvita eyi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma obubonero bw'ebigyezo, abegyesa bakooreka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'obutetegyereza kw'abeegi. Abazaire bakahwamu amaani ahabw'okugwa kw'ebibiina, reero basherura eby'okugarukamu.

eng_prompt: Recent polls show a significant decline in his approval ratings, and many voters express dissatisfaction with his policies. As a result, he is likely to lose the election.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko kulaga okukendeera mu kusiimibwa kwe, era abalonzi bangi balaze obutali bumativu n'enkola ye. N'ekyavaamu, ayinza okuwangulwa mu kulonda.
ach_prompt: Yub me bolo kwir ma otime cokcok-ki nyutu ni cwak mege odok piny tutwal, ki lubol kwir mapol gunyuto cwer cwiny gi i kom cik mege. Macalo adwogi ne, nen calo en obuloyo yer ne.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos aseeta nuitetiak aibiror naka adoketaitike, ido aseak luipu itodunitos amamut aiyalama keda ainapeta ke. Kanuka ngun, aticepak ebuni ngesi aibiror aseo.
lgg_prompt: Opeta o'diru 'diyi e'da kini 'ba erini le 'diyi ma ongmbo esi ra, dika 'ba karakara voti 'be'baa 'diyi ece kini yi apini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi si ku. E'yo 'disi, eri eco nga opeta nde ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuteera akaruuru okuhweireho nikworeka okukyendeera kw'amaani, kandi abateezi b'akaruuru abaingi tibarikwesiima ebiragiro bye. N'ekyarugiremu, naabaasa kusingwa akaruuru.

eng_prompt: As the team leader, he oversees multiple projects and manages a diverse group of employees. Balancing his workload requires exceptional organizational skills and dedication.
lug_prompt: Ng'omukulembeze wa ttiimu, alabirira pulojekiti nnyingi era y'addukanya ekibinja ky'abakozi ab'enjawulo. Okutebenkeza emirimu gye kyetaagisa obukodyo obw'enjawulo obw'okutegeka n'obumalirivu.
ach_prompt: Macalo latela me team, en doro yub mapat-pat dok doro dul pa lutic mapat-pat. Bedo ki rwom me tic marom mito diro me doro tic ki keto cwiny I tic.
teo_prompt: Kwape engarenon lo etimu, imanimani ngesi ipurojektin luipu ido eyait eswamak luegelegela. Aitirian aswamuke ekoto acoa na itegelikina keda ainakina.
lgg_prompt: Ekile drile amuti niri ru, eri otita karakara eyi ma pamvu one dika eri azi'ba karakara eyi ma ta mba. Azi erini 'diyi ma ongmbo otuzuri le ondua wura ndusi e'yo otuza ma dria azini asi feza.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omwebembezi wa tiimu, nareeberera purogyekiti nyingi hamwe n'abakozi b'emiringo mingi. Okutereeza omurimo gwe nikyetengyesa emyoga y'omutaano omu kutebekanisa hamwe n'okwehayo.

eng_prompt: In order to bring their vision to life, the organizers reached out to potential sponsors. After outlining their plans, they realized they needed additional funding to cover all expenses.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuukiriza ekirooto kyabwe, abategesi baatuukirira abayinza okubawa ssente. Oluvannyuma lw'okulaga enteekateeka zaabwe, baakiraba nti beetaaga ensimbi endala okusasula ensaasaanya yonna.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti gi, luyub yub gu lok ki joo ma twero culu pi yub eni. Ingee tito yub gi, guniang ni gimito lim mukene me culu cente weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin aomisioitikec, apotu etemonokinak odolokisi itunga luepedorete aigang ikapun. Akaulo naka aitetem ainapeta kec, apotu kesi kojenutu ebe ekotosi kesi ikapun icie kanu aitac ikapun kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini 'diyi 'yezu, 'ba otuta otupi 'diyi eyi esu 'ba ecopi robia fepi ra 'diyi. Otita yini 'diyi ecezu 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu ra kini eyi le robia azi dika afa ayuzaru 'diyi ofezu dria.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kuhikiiriza ekirooto kyabo, abatebekanisa bakahika aha bantu abarikubaasa kubashagika. Bwanyima y'okworeka enteekateeka zaabo, bakareeba ngu nibetenga esente ezindi z'okushashurira enshohoza yaabo.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming vote, local leaders organized a meeting to discuss the key elements of the new governance framework. Residents gathered at the town hall, eager to learn more about the proposed changes.
lug_prompt: Nga beetegekera okulonda okujja, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baategeka olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bintu ebikulu eby'enkola y'obukulembeze empya. Abatuuze baakuŋŋaanidde mu town hall nga baagala okumanya ebisingawo ku nkyukakyuka ezaali ziteeseddwa.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi bolo kwir matye kabino anyim, lutela me tedero guyubu kacoke me nyamo lok mapigi tego I kom tela manyen. Lutedero gugure I town hall ki miti me pwonyo jami mapol I kom aloka-loka ma kimito kelo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin kanuka aseo naebunit, apotu engarenok luka atutubena kitemokisi airiamun kanu aitemitem akiro nuepolok nuka epugae loitetet. Apotu itunga kotukokinos otaun hall, ekotosi aisisia nuipu nuikamunitos aijulanakineta nuebeit aswam.
lgg_prompt: Otuta voti 'beza emupi ri ni, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo okporu driceza o'diru ni 'diyi ma dria. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi aku ambu town hall niri ma alea eyini ava be onizu e'yo ojata 'bani lele 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera akaruuru akarikwiija, abeebembezi b'ebyaro bakatebekanisa orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha nshonga nkuru z'obwebembezi obusya. Abatuuragye baketeerana aha town hall, baine ekihika ky'okwega ebirikukiraho aha mpindahinduka eziteirweho.

eng_prompt: After serving her full sentence for a crime she insisted she didn't commit, the day finally arrived for her to walk out of the prison gates. Friends and family waited anxiously outside, eager to welcome her back into the world.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala ekibonerezo kye kyonna olw'omusango gwe yagamba nti teyazza, olunaku lwatuuka okuva mu kkomera. Ab'emikwano n'ab'enganda balinze wabweru nga beesunga okumwaniriza mu nsi.
ach_prompt: Inge tyeko pwod mege pi bal ma en owaco ni pe otimo, nino dong oo ma en twero kato woko ki buc. Lurem ki lugang ne gukure ki mit kom woko, ma cwinygi obedo yom me jolo nyakoni I lobo kany.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aijaanakin awenio ke kere kanuka emusago loabu ngesi kotema ebe mam ngesi iswamat, abu aparan kodolu kanu ngesi anyoun koijera. Apotu ipapero keda lukokalekec idarakisi kokinga, ekotosi aijaun ngesi abongun toma akwap.
lgg_prompt: Sawa erini li arujoarisi dria 'bori ma vutia e'yo onzi erini 'yozu kini i 'yeni ku ri ma dria, o'du erini acizu arujoarisi amve ri eca asizu ra. Agyipi azini familia 'diyi te asi driasi amve, ava be eri a'izu vile wudrikuru ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka ye yoona omu kihome ahabw'ekihagaro eki yaagizire ngu tarakozire, eizooba rikamuhika kuruga omu kihome. Banywani be n'ab'omuka ye bakamurinda aheeru, baine ekihika ky'okumuramutsya omu nsi.

eng_prompt: I was rummaging through the fridge, looking for a snack after a long day. Suddenly, I heard my brother's voice rise from the living room, filled with frustration.
lug_prompt: Nali ntambulatambula mu firiigi, nga nnoonya eky'okulya oluvannyuma lw'olunaku oluwanvu. Amangu ago, nnawulira eddoboozi lya muganda wange okuva mu ddiiro, nga lijjudde obwennyamivu.
ach_prompt: Abedo ka yenyo gin acama I kare ma abedo I frij. Cutcut, awinyo dwon omera ma aa ki I ot butu, ma opong ki cwer cwiny.
teo_prompt: Auta eong aimo akinyet kofirij akaulo naka apaaran naepol noi. Apotu eong apuputu eporoto loka onaceka kotoma aiboisit naidarere itiang.
lgg_prompt: Ari de angu fridruri ma alea afa nyazaru 'diyi ndaria o'du ezu ma vutia. Ma eri ma adri ma o'duko engazu jo ale aliza ma aliarisi e'yere.
nyn_prompt: Nkaba ninsherura omu furiigi, okuronda eky'okurya ahanyima y'obwire buraingwa. Ahonaaho, nkahurira eiraka rya murumuna wangye kuruga omu kishengye ky'okuraaramu, ryijwire amaganya.

eng_prompt: Many individuals express confusion regarding the selection process for candidates. As a result, there is a growing concern about transparency in how nominees are chosen.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi babuzaabuziddwa ku ngeri abesimbyewo gye balondebwamu. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bwerufu mu ngeri abesimbyewo gye balondebwamu.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol nyutu anywena-nywena I kom yoo me yero lucungu. Macalo adwogi ne, lworo tye kamede I kom adaa I kit ma kiyero kwede lucungu.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu itodunitos amamut aomisio nuikamunitos epone loeseunere abwoak. Kanuka ngun, ejai aiyalongong naepol noi naikamunit aica kotoma epone loeseunere itunga lueseunitai.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi e'da ava ako geri 'bani 'ba pa tupi 'diyi opezu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, asi otiza ma omgbo ni tu ra e'yo 'bani 'ba opezu 'diyi opezu geri kililiru si ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibereka okubuzabuzibwa aha bikwatiraine n'enkora y'okutoorana abesimbireho. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho okwerarikirira okurikweyongyera ahabw'oburingaaniza omu muringo ogu abetsimbireho barikworwamu.

eng_prompt: After months of careful planning and research, he finally decided to take the plunge into entrepreneurship. To turn his vision into reality, he has applied for a bank loan to start up a business.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi ng'ateekateeka era ng'anoonyereza, yasalawo okutandikawo bizineesi. Okusobola okutuukiriza ekirooto kye, asabye okwewola ssente mu bbanka asobole okutandikawo bizineesi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki kwedo lok, en dong omoko tamme me donyo I biacara. Me cobo miti ne, en olego lim adena ki beng me cako biacara.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aitemonokin ka aingic, abu ngesi kodum aswam agwelanar. Kanu aitodolikin airujasia ke, abu ngesi kilip eloni lo aingadis naka ikapun kanu ageun ebiasara.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuta kililiru 'yezu azini vuti ondaza ma vutia, asizu asizu asi 'du e'yo 'duzu e'yo tujarani 'diyi 'yezu. Egata eriniri ojazu e'yo adaru, eri si waraga mari 'duzu ero robia ta mbazuri ma alia tujari e'dozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera kurungi n'okucondooza, ahamuheru akasharamu kutandikaho eby'obushubuzi. Kubaasa kuhikiiriza ekirooto kye, akashaba rooni omu banka kutandikaho bizinesi.

eng_prompt: We submitted the necessary paperwork weeks ago, but we are still waiting for confirmation. Despite our repeated inquiries, there has been no update on the status of the funds.
lug_prompt: Twawaayo ebiwandiiko ebyetaagisa wiiki eziyise naye tukyalinze okukakasibwa. Wadde nga twebuuzizza enfunda n'enfunda, tewabaddewo kutegeezebwa ku mbeera y'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Wacwalo karatac ma mite cabit ma okato angec, ento pud watye kakuru gum. Kadi bed ni wapenyo lok tyen mapol, pe wabedo ki ngec manyen I kom kit ma lim tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Apotu sio ejukasi apapulai nu ekotoi isabitin luatuboros, konye iringa sio idarit aitigogongoret. Karaida ipudasi sio aingiseta nuipu, emamei akiro nuitetiak nuikamunitos ejautene loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Afe karatasi lele 'diyi sabiti agapi 'bo, te ama nga po'di te e'yo 'bani egazu ra ri te. Ama ni ta tro e'yo ozizu dika ra ti, e'yo azi o'dukoti edripi e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria ni yo.
nyn_prompt: Tukaheereza ebihandiiko ebirikwetengwa esande enyimaho, kwonka tukiriyo nitutegyereza okuhamya. Oihireho okubuuzibwa kwaitu emirundi mingi, tihabiireho amakuru ag'omutaano agarikukwata aha ntatsya y'esente.

eng_prompt: It's been quite a while since we last checked in on our finances. I wonder if the accountant is still handling our accounts.
lug_prompt: Kibadde kiseera kiwanvu bukya tukebera ku by'ensimbi byaffe. Nze nneebuuza oba omubalirizi w'ebitabo akyakola ku mbalirira zaffe.
ach_prompt: Dong okato kare malac tutwal nicake ma wakwongo ngiyo kit ma ticwa me lim tye kwede. Pe angeyo ka ngat ma gwoko buk lim pud tye ka tic i kom buk lim megwa.
teo_prompt: Adaun apak naepol noi ageun na awanyanar sio nuka ikapun. Mam eong ajeni arai eringa akauntant eyait akaunts wok.
lgg_prompt: Eli aga sawa angiri 'bo e'dozu amani ama vile robia ma ale andrizu asizu. Ma osu kani 'ba akawunti otipiri nga po'di ama vile akawunti 'diyi ma aza ko ya ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Hatwireho obwire bukye kuruga obu twakyebera esente zaitu. Ninyebuuza yaaba omubazi w'ebitabo akiriyo naakora aha bihandiiko byaitu.

eng_prompt: After weeks of denial and mounting evidence, he finally broke down under pressure. In a private meeting with investigators, he confessed to his involvement in the scheme.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga yeegaana n'okusonda obujulizi, yasembayo okugwa wansi olw'okunyigirizibwa. Mu nsisinkano ey'ekyama n'abanoonyereza, yakkiriza okwenyigira mu lukwe.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me kwero lokke ki nongo caden mapol, lacen en opoto piny I te lyeto. I kacoke ma obedo I mung ki lukwed, en oyee ni en obedo I yub ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka ainger keda aituk ajenanut, abu ngesi kibiroros. Kotoma airiamunet keda angicak, abu ngesi kocam ebe ajai ngesi toma akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti karakara eyi ma vutia e'yo a'ini 'diyi gazu azini afa ecetaru 'diyi trazu 'bori ma vutia, eri asizu e'de e'yo 'bani eri omizu 'bori ma vutia. Dri fuza ngulupisi 'ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi pie ri ma alea, eri ai e'yo erini fizu otita 'da ma alea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okwehakana n'okurundaana obujurizi, akahendera yaagwa ahansi ahabw'oburemeezi. Omu rukiiko rw'ekihama n'abakyondoozi, akeikiriza okwejumba kwe omu nteekateeka egyo.

eng_prompt: Despite his efforts to connect with the locals, he sensed an unspoken barrier that kept him at a distance. Rumors about his past circulated, casting a shadow over his intentions.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde yagezaako okukwatagana n'abantu b'omu kitundu, yawulira ekizibu ekitali kya kwogerwa ekyamukuumira wala. Olugambo olukwata ku bulamu bwe obw'emabega lwatambula, ekyassa ekisiikirize ku bigendererwa bye.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en otute matek me kube ki lutedero, en owinyo peko mapol ma oweko en obedo mabor ki lutedero. Lok angea I kom jami ma otime I kare mukato okato, ma oketo tipo I kom miti ne.
teo_prompt: Karaida abu ngesi iswama agogongu kanu arucokina keda itunga luka atutubet, abu ngesi kopup ationis na mam elimonokini ngesi. Apotu akiro nuikamunitos akekiro nukokau okerata, itodunit ebe mam ngesi epedori aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro okpo 'bazu yi ecizu 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi be ra ti, eri esu e'yo azi 'bani nze kokoru erini eri 'bazu re. E'yo nzeza e'yo erini agapi 'bo 'diyi ma dria 'diyi aci ra, e'yo erini le 'ye 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteeraho kwe kukwatanisa n'abantu b'omukyanga, akareeba oburemeezi oburikubaasa kumuremesa. Orugambo orurikukwata ahaby'obuhangwa bwe rukajanjaara, ekyarekire ekigyendererwa kye kitarikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: Frustrated by the lack of transparency and accountability, the citizens gathered to voice their concerns. Many felt that their needs were being ignored by those in power.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutaba na bwerufu n'obutaba na mbalirira, bannansi baakuŋŋaana okwogera ebibaluma. Bangi baalowooza nti abo abali mu buyinza tebafaayo ku byetaago byabwe.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a noticeable shift in societal attitudes towards women's roles in various sectors. As a result, more women are seeking opportunities to take on leadership positions and influence decision-making processes.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo enkyukakyuka mu ndowooza z'abantu ku mirimu gy'abakyala mu bitongole eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, abakyala bangi banoonya mikisa okutwala ebifo by'obukulembeze n'okukyusa enkola z'okusalawo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, aloka-loka obedo tye I tam pa lwak I kom tic pa mon I tenge mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, mon mapol tye ka yenyo gum me donyo I tela ki doro yub me moko tam.

eng_prompt: Despite significant progress in various sectors, disparities between men and women remain prevalent. Efforts to promote gender equality have not yet bridged the existing divide.

eng_prompt: Despite the progress made in gender equality, many traditional attitudes persist in society. This ongoing issue often manifests in the way men treat their partners, revealing deep-rooted cultural norms.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo enkulaakulana mu kwenkanankana kw'ekikula ky'abantu, endowooza z'obuwangwa nnyingi zikyaliwo mu kitundu. Ensonga eno egenda mu maaso etera okweyoleka mu ngeri abasajja gye bayisaamu bannaabwe, ekiraga empisa z'obuwangwa ezisimbye emirandira.

teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, ejaas angor nuipu keda atiokisio nu itikitikete apolokec keda aswamukec. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu ejok, ibusakinit oni aswam nepepe ka agangat.

lug_prompt: Mu kukyala kwaffe, nnalaga okweraliikirira kwange ku bulamu n'obulamu obulungi bw'omwana wange. Omusawo yeetegereza ebyafaayo by'obulamu bwabwe n'awa amagezi ku kugema okwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma walimo gang, awaco ni atye ki lworo I kom yotkom pa latinna. Daktar ongiyo lok kom two gi dok omiyo tam me nongo yat agwera ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana aipejokin sio, abu eong abu kiner nuikamunitos angaleu naka ikoku ka aijar. Abu emuron airereor akiro nu adekasinei kec kosodi aijaikin kesi aikis ekato.
lgg_prompt: Sawa amani emuzurisi, ma ece asi otiza mani ma vile mva ma rua ala ma dria azini aa'ta muke ri ma dria ra. Dakitari andri e'yo eyi ma rua alata ma dria 'diyi ma ale dika fe imbata aro soza kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kutaayaaya kwaitu, nkoreka okwerarikirira kwangye aha magara g'omwana wangye. Omushaho akashwijuma ebyafaayo byabo by'eby'amagara yaabahabura ngu bagyeme.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote public health and prevent the spread of infectious diseases, the government has launched a new initiative. This program aims to ensure that every child has access to essential vaccinations.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulamu by'abantu n'okutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa, gavumenti etaddewo enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okulaba nga buli mwana afuna eddagala ly'okugema eryetaagisa.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me yot kom pa lwak ki gengo nya pa two ma kobo oyot, gamente okatti ki yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me neno ni lutino weng gunongo yat agwera ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor angaleu naka itunga ka aitikitik awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi awanyun ebe epedori ngin ikoku adumun ikee luikisere ekato.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu o'bi eyi ma rua ala otuzu azini e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta atrizu, gamete e'do e'yo azi o'diru ni 'bo. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu nezu ra kini mva dria eco aro soza orodriru 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'amagara g'abantu n'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira, gavumenti etandikireho enteekateeka nsya. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okureeba ngu buri mwana yaatunga omubazi gw'okusirika.

eng_prompt: To protect him from serious diseases, the doctors recommended a vaccination schedule. His parents were informed about the importance of immunizations for newborns.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okumukuuma obutakwatibwa ndwadde za maanyi, abasawo baamugamba okugemebwa. Bazadde be baategeezebwa ku bukulu bw'okugema abaana abaakazaalibwa.
ach_prompt: Me gwoke ki i kom two maraco, ludaktari guwaco ni myero ki gwere ikare ki kare. Ki niango lunyodone I kom ber pa gwero lutino.
teo_prompt: Kanu ayuarite ngesi kaneejaasi adekasinei nuarokok, apotu imurok icorata ainapeta nuka aikis ekato. Aponi olimokinai auriakake ajokis naka aikis idwe luitetiak ekato.
lgg_prompt: Eri ma ta mbazu azo onzi 'diyi vurisi, dakitari eyi fe imbata sa'wa 'bani eri osozu aro soza si ri ma dria. Ba lu eri ma tipika eyini orodri aro soza odekua eyini ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kumubangira oburwaire bw'amaani, abashaho bakaha obuhabuzi bw'okugyema. Abazaire be bakamanyisibwa omugasho gw'okugyema abaana.

eng_prompt: Health officials have been monitoring the rising number of polio cases in the region. Despite efforts to secure adequate supplies, the hospitals lack enough polio vaccines.
lug_prompt: Ab'ebyobulamu babadde balondoola omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba poliyo ogweyongera mu kitundu. Ng'oggyeko kaweefube w'okufuna ebikozesebwa ebimala, amalwaliro tegalina ddagala ligema poliyo limala.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom gubedo ka neno wel lutwo akweya matye kamede i twok piny eni. Kadi bed ni ki keto tek me nongo jami ma oromo, odi yadi peke ki yat agwera me two akweya.
teo_prompt: Ewanyunitos eswamak lu adekis enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda polio kotoma aiboisit. Karaida iswamao kagogongu kanu adumun iboro lu edolitos, emamiatatar adekisia keda ikee luikisere adeka naka polio.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ebi kalafe tupi 'ba azo polio niri be 'diyi ma pamvu one angu 'di ma alea. Okpo 'bani 'ba afa ayuzaru 'diyi esuzu ra ti arojo eyivu aro soza polio ni 'diyi cani ku.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara batwire nibareebuuza omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba poliyo ogweyongyeire omu kyanga. N'obu haraabe hariho amaani g'okutunga ebintu ebirikumara, amarwariro tigaine emibazi y'okusirika poliyo erikumara.

eng_prompt: As the humanitarian crisis intensified, health officials scrambled to secure essential medical supplies. Unfortunately, logistical challenges arose, causing significant setbacks in the delivery of critical vaccines.
lug_prompt: Obwetaavu bw'abantu bweyongera, abasawo baagezaako okufuna ebikozesebwa mu kujjanjaba ebyetaagibwa ennyo. Eky'omukisa omubi, okusoomoozebwa kw'entambula kwajjawo, ne kuleetawo obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu kutuusa eddagala ly'okugema ery'omugaso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma peko me miyo kony me yot kom omedde, lutic yoto kom gubedo ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi yoto kom. Ki gum marac, peko mapat-pat obedo tye, ma okelo peko madit tutwal I kare me cwalo yat agwera mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor atiokisio nuka itunga, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kopedosi adumun iboro lu itwasamao kanu amukian. Nukaiturur, apotu atiokisio kotakanutu, ido abu koyangau aibiror naepol noi kotoma aitodolikin ikee luikisere ekato.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo 'ba ada eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ri dri ci afa arojo ni okporu 'diyi esuzu. Drile onziru, e'yo ewaru e'yo ndundu eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi efu ra, e'yo ewaru e'yo aro azo atrizu 'diyi ma esuza ma alea 'diyi ejipi.
nyn_prompt: Oburemeezi bw'abantu ku bwayeyongyeire, abakuru omu by'amagara bakarwana kutunga eby'okukoresa omu marwariro. Eky'omugisha mubi, hariho oburemeezi omu by'entambura, ekyareteire oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kuhisya emibazi y'okugyema.

eng_prompt: In the early 20th century, infectious diseases posed a significant threat to public health. Among these, polio emerged as a particularly feared illness, leading to widespread concern about its impact on communities.
lug_prompt: Ku ntandikwa y'ekyasa ky'abiri, endwadde ezisiigibwa zaali za bulabe nnyo eri obulamu bw'abantu. Mu bino, poliyo yavaayo ng'obulwadde obusinga okutiisibwatiisibwa, ekiviiriddeko okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi ku ngeri gye bukosaamu ebitundu.
ach_prompt: I acaki me cencwari me pyer aryo, two ma kobo oyotoyot obedo peko madit tutwal pi yot kom pa lwak. I kin magi, two akweya obedo two ma dano lworo tutwal, ma oweko dano mapol gubedo ki lworo I kom adwogi ne I kom lwak.
teo_prompt: Kageunet naka ekaru ilukumin iarei, apotu adekasinei nu ikopas kitukurianete angaleu naka itunga. Kotoma ngun, abu polio kitodia kwape adeka na ekuriaka noi, ido abu koyangau aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos epone loepedoria ngesi aitolitol itunga.
lgg_prompt: Eli alifu kaliri ni e'doria, azo 'bani eyi erezu 'diyi eji ndra e'yo onzi 'ba eyi ma rua ala ni. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, azo polio niri efu azo azi 'bani 'ye orisi tu ni ru, erini fe asi otiza 'ba karakara eyi ma dria e'yo erini 'ye ongulumu eyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kutandika kw'ekyasha kya 20, endwara ezirikuturira zikaba ziri ez'akabi aha magara g'abantu. Omuri ebi, poliyo ekareebeka nk'endwara erikutiinisibwa munonga, ekyaretsireho okwerarikirira kwingi aha bikwatiraine n'oburemeezi bwayo omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising incidence of preventable diseases, the government has prioritized public health initiatives. As part of this effort, the ministry of health has carried out vaccination to control the six killer diseases.
lug_prompt: Ng'eky'okuddamu eri okweyongera kw'endwadde eziziyizibwa, gavumenti ekulembezza enteekateeka z'ebyobulamu mu bantu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, minisitule y'ebyobulamu ekoze okugema okutangira endwadde omukaaga ezitta.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa two ma gengo, gamente oketo cwinye tutwal I kom yub me yot kom pa lwak. Macalo but tic man, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom otiyo ki yat agwera me gengo two abicel ma neko dano.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eikor loka adekasinei nuepedorio aitikitik, abu apugan isingarenit nuka angaleu naka itunga. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisio nu, abu erionget loka angaleu itolot aikis ekato kanu aitikitik adekasinei akanyape nu eyarete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'bani eco atri ra 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, gamete 'ba e'yo alata o'bi eyini 'diyi okporu. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, okalamvu alataniri 'ye aro soza azo 'ba o'dipi azia 'diyi atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'endwara ezirikubaasa kwetantarwa okweyongyera,gavumenti etandikireho enteekateeka y'eby'amagara g'abantu. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani aga, minisiture y'eby'amagara eteireho okugyema okurwanisa endwara mukaaga ezirikwita.

eng_prompt: In response to rising health concerns and lifestyle-related diseases, the government has launched a new initiative. This program focuses on promoting wellness and preventive care across the nation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okweyongera n'endwadde ezikwatagana n'embeera y'obulamu, gavumenti etongozza enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno essira eritadde ku kutumbula ebyobulamu n'obujjanjabi obuziyiza okusaasaana kw'obulwadde mu ggwanga lyonna.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kamede ki two ma bino macalo adwogi me kwo pa dano, gamente okatti ki yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me tyelo kor yub me gwoko yot kom ki gengo two I lobo ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naka angaleu keda adekasinei nu ikamanara keda aijar, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuitetiak. Isingarenit ainapeta ngun aitopolor nuka angaleu ka aitikitik adekasinei kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru alata ma dria tupi tu 'diyi ma aza kozu azini azo eyi ecipi geri 'ba eyini aa'zu ri be 'diyi pie, gamete e'do e'yo azi o'diru ni 'bo. Otita 'di 'ba asi e'yo alata ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo azo atrizu 'diyi ma tambazu kari 'di ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti etandikireho enteekateeka nsya ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire hamwe n'endwara ezirikukwata aha mitwarize y'abantu. Enteekateeka egi neeta amaani omu kutunguura eby'amagara n'okuzibira okwetoroora eihanga ryona.

eng_prompt: In the face of a growing health crisis, public health officials urged widespread vaccination to protect communities. However, a significant number of parents expressed concerns about the safety and efficacy of the vaccines.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baakubiriza okugema okw'amaanyi okukuuma ebitundu. Newankubadde, omuwendo omunene ogw'abazadde baalaze obweraliikirivu ku bukuumi n'obukozi bw'eddagala lino erigema.
ach_prompt: I kare ma peko me yot kom tye ka medde, lutic me yot kom gulego dano me gwero dano mapol me gwoko kabedo gi. Kadi bed kumeno, lunyodo mapol gunyutu lworo gi i kom gwero lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loepol noi loka ationis naka angaleu, apotu eswamak luka angaleu isinyikokisi itunga aikis ekato kanu ayuarite itunga. Konye, apotu auriak luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu ayuwara keda eswamae loka ikee luikisere ekato.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi tupi 'diyi ma dria, azi'ba e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ai 'ba eyi aro soza esuzu ongulumu eyi ma tambazu. Kani si, tipika kalafe angiri ece asi otiza yini e'yo azo atrizu ri ma tambaza azini azi ngaza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire, abakuru omu by'amagara bakashaba abantu baingi kusirikwa kwenda kurinda ebyanga. Kwonka, abazaire baingi bakoreka okwerarikirira ahabw'oburinzi n'okukora kurungi kw'okugyema.

eng_prompt: Despite the government's efforts to improve public health, many community members remained unaware of the upcoming initiatives. As a result, crucial information regarding the vaccination campaign was not effectively communicated to the public.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga gavumenti efubye okutumbula ebyobulamu by'abantu, abantu bangi mu kitundu baali tebamanyi ku nteekateeka ezaaliwo. N'ekyavaamu, obubaka obukulu obukwata ku kaweefube w'okugema tebwatuusibwa bulungi eri abantu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gamente tye ka yele me ilo malo rwom me yot kom pa lwak, lwak mapol pe gingeyo yub matye kabino anyim. Macalo adwogi ne, ngec mapire tek I kom yub me gwero dano pe kicwalo maber bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamat apugan kagogong kanu aitojokar angaleu naka itunga, mam itunga luipu ejenete nuikamunitos aswamisio nu ebunit. Kanuka ngun, mam akiro nuepolok nuikamunitos ekato aponi olimorai ejok mama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni tro okpo 'ba o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma omgbo otuzu ra ti, 'ba karakara ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi awi ni e'yo e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba awini o'duko orodriru e'yo otita aro soza niri ma dria 'diyi olu o'bi eyidri kililiru ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani ga gavumenti omu kutunguura eby'amagara g'abantu, abantu baingi omu byaro tibaramanyire ebigyendererwa ebyabaire nibiza kubaho. N'ekyarugiremu, amahurire g'omugasho agarikukwata aha kampeyini y'okusirika, tigaraheirwe kurungi abantu.

eng_prompt: In the wake of the vaccination rollout, health officials began monitoring side effects reported by recipients. Among the various reactions observed, some individuals experienced unexpected skin irritations.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okugema, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baatandika okulondoola ebizibu ebyava mu kugema. Mu bikolwa eby'enjawulo ebyalabidwa, abantu abamu baafuna okunyiiga kw'olususu okwabadde tekusuubirwa.
ach_prompt: I ngee cako tic me gwero dano, lutic me yot kom gucako ngiyo adwogi marac ma dano ma gunongo yat tye kwede. I kin jami mapat-pat ma kineno, dano mukene gunongo kiniga ma pe byek tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aikis ekato, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kogeutu aanyanar atiokisio nuka ekato. Kotoma atiokisio nuegelegela nuewanyunitai, apotu icetunga kodumutu aiyalongong naka emukule.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani aro soza ma ti ojizu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'do e'yo onzi 'ba aro esupi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo ndundu 'bani ndre 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba azi 'diyi isu e'yo enyiriko ni 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutandika kw'okugyema, abakuru omu by'amagara, bakatandika kureebuuza oburemeezi bw'okugyema. Omubikwatireine n'ebindi ebirarebirwe, abantu abamwe bakagira oburemeezi bw'omubiri obu batabaire nibateekateeka.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing health concerns in the community, local officials organized a meeting to address the needs of the residents. As a result, the district health workers extended health services to the people.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okweyongera mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyalo baategese olukiiko okukola ku byetaago by'abatuuze. N'ekyavaamu, abasawo ku disitulikiti baagaziya obujjanjabi eri abantu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom matye kamede i kin lwak, lutic me tedero guyubu kacoke me neno peko pa lutedero. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic yoto kom me dictrikgu cwalo kony me yot kom bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin aiyalongongo naka angaleu naka itunga, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kitemokisi airiamunet kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga. Kanuka ngun, apotu eswamak lu adekis kodisitrikt iyatakisi amukian mama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo tupi ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu mitingi azi e'yo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba arojo ni distrikiti'a 'diyi edri azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi o'bi eyivu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire omu bantu, abakuru b'ebyaro bakatebekanisa orukiiko rw'okukora ahabyetaago by'abatuuragye. Ekyarugiremu, abashaho aha disiturikiti, bakahisya obuheereza ahabantu.

eng_prompt: In many communities, discussions about sexual education and healthy relationships are often lacking. As a result, the youths engage in sex at a young age.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku by'okwegatta n'enkolagana ennungi tekutera kubaawo. N'ekivuddemu, abavubuka beegatta ku myaka emito.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, nywako lok i kom pwony me butu imit ki ber bedo ikin dano ipol kare peke. Macalo adwogi ne, bulu donyo I tim me butu imit I mwaka matino tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, amamete ineresinei nuikamunitos aisisianakino naka aelo keda angaleu naka idwe. Kanuka ngun, elomanarete atumunak aelo eringa edisiak.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo nzeza imbata ali o'baza ma dria azini aa'ta rua ala be ri ma dria ri yo. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ode eyi e'do ali o'ba de eyi ma eli nga were.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, okuhanuura aha kwegyesa ebikwatireine n'okuteerana hamwe n'amagara marungi tikuriho. Ekyarugiremu, eminyeeto neetaba omu by'okuteerana bakiri bato.

eng_prompt: In recent months, the community has seen a troubling rise in the number of early pregnancies among teenagers. Concerned about the impact on families and education, the district decided to take action.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, ekitundu kirabye okweyongera mu muwendo gw'abawala abafuna embuto nga bakyali bato. Olw'okweraliikirira ku ngeri kino gye kikwata ku maka n'ebyenjigiriza, disitulikiti yasalawo okubaako ky'ekolawo.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, wel lutino anyira matino ma nongo ic tye ka medde tutwal. Pi lworo I kom adwogi ne I kom gangi ki kwan, district omoko tamgi me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Kolapio lu atuboros, ewanyunit itunga aiyatakin na enaaba loka apotunun kanejaas apesur nudidika. Kanu aiyalongongoi nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata ikalia keda asioman, abu edisitrikt aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'diyi ma alia, ongulumu nderi ndre e'yo asi otiza fepi kalafe ezoanzi nyiri eyini ecazu okporovu ru 'diyi ma eselea ri tu ra. E'yo asi otiza ni familia eyi ma dria azini onita ma dria ri si, distrikiti 'du e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, abantu bareebire okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abaishiki abarikutwara enda bakiri bato. Ahabw'okwerarikirira aha bikwatireine n'amaka hamwe n'eby'obwegyese, disiturikiti ekasharamu kukoraho.

eng_prompt: In response to rising concerns about adolescent health and well-being, local officials recognized the need for comprehensive education and resources. As a result, the district has prioritized initiatives aimed at improving access to vital health information.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okulinnya ku byobulamu by'abavubuka n'obulamu obulungi, abakungu b'ebyalo bakitegedde obwetaavu bw'okusomesa okw'awamu n'ebikozesebwa. N'ekivuddemu, disitulikiti ekulembezza enteekateeka ezigendereddwamu okutumbula okufuna amawulire agakwata ku byobulamu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom yotkom ki kwo pa bulu, lutic me tedero guniang ni omyero gunong pwony ki jami ma mite pi lutino. Macalo adwogi ne, district oketo cwinygi I kom yub mapat-pat matye ki miti me medo rwom me nongo ngec ma pire tek I kom yot-kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naepol noi naikamunit angaleu naka atumunak, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kojenutu eipud loka asioman keda iboro luipu. Kanuka ngun, isingarenit edisitrikt ainapeta nu ekotore aitojokar adumunun akiro nuikamunitos angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi 'ba oderu 'diyi ma rua ala ma dria, azi'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma esu onita azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi dria ra. E'yo 'disi, distrikiti 'ba okpo e'yo 'bani lezu o'dukoti orodriru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha magara g'eminyeeto, abakuru b'ebyaro bakareeba ekyetengo ky'obwegyese hamwe n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa. N'ekyarugiremu, disiturikiti etandikireho enteekateeka y'okutunguura eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: Recent health reports have highlighted concerning trends in the region's healthcare outcomes. Specifically, local officials are alarmed by the rising number of deaths among pregnant women.
lug_prompt: Alipoota z'ebyobulamu ezaakafulumizibwa ziraga enkyukakyuka mu byobulamu mu kitundu. Okusingira ddala, abakungu b'ebyalo beeraliikirivu olw'omuwendo gw'abakyala abali embuto abafa ogweyongera.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic me yot kom ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto kit ma tic me yot kom tye kawot kwede I but lobo man. Ki lok ada, lutic me tedero gitye ki lworo I kom wel too pa mon ma oyac matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan luka angaleu luitetiak kitodutu nuikamunitos eswamae loajokan loka angaleu kotoma aiboisit. Kacut, ekuriaka eswamak luka atutubet kanu aiyatakin na atwakisia nuka angor nu epotiete.
lgg_prompt: O'duko o'diru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ece e'yo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria ra. Azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo kalafe odrapi okporovu eyi ma eselea ri si.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota z'ebyamagara eziherize kubaho, nizooreka entunguuka omu by'amagara omu kyanga. Abakuru omu byaro, beerarikirire ahabw'omuhendo gw'abakazi b'enda ogweyongyeire kufa.

eng_prompt: In response to alarming statistics and growing public concern, government officials have prioritized women's health initiatives. Recent studies have highlighted the urgent need for effective interventions to address the high rates of maternal mortality in the country.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebibalo ebitiisa n'okweraliikirira kw'abantu okweyongera, abakungu ba gavumenti bakulembezza enteekateeka z'ebyobulamu by'abakyala. Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti waliwo obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola ku muwendo gw'abakyala abafa nga bawere mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me kwed ma kelo lworo ki lworo madit tutwal I kin lwak, lutic pa gamente guketo cwinygi tutwal I kom yub me yot kom pa mon. Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni mite tutwal me nongo yoo me lweny i kom too pa mon ma oyac mapol tutwal I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo keda aiyalongongo naka itunga, apotu eswamak luka apugan isingarenitos nuka angaleu naka angor. Akiro nuitodunitos nuka aingic pac itodunit eipud loka atipet kanu aitemokin atwakisia nuka angor nu epotiete noi kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe 'ba eyini aa'zu orisi tualu asi otiza o'bi eyini ri pie, azi'ba gamete ni 'diyi 'ba e'yo okpo fe e'yo oku eyini aa'zu rua ala be 'diyi ma dria. E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece kini le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo okporu 'diyi mbeleru e'yo ayia eyini odrazu kari 'di ma alea ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebibaro ebirikutangaaza hamwe n'okwerarikirira kw'abantu, abakuru omu gavumenti bateire omutima ahaby'amagara g'abakazi. Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okutereeza omuhendo gw'abakazi abarikufa barikuzaara omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: In recent months, there has been a significant increase in the number of expectant mothers seeking care. Unfortunately, this surge has exposed a critical shortage of trained staff in the healthcare system.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise wabaddewo okweyongera mu muwendo gwa bamaama abali embuto abanoonya obujjanjabi. Eky'ennaku, okweyongera kuno kuzudde ebbula ly'abakozi abatendeke mu byobulamu.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, wel mon ma oyac ma gipenyo pi kony tye ka medde tutwal. Ki gum marac, mede pa wel man onyuto peko me nok pa lutic ma ki pwonyo gi I tenge me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, eyatakin enaaba loka angor nu epotiete aimo amukian. Nukaiturur, abu aiyatakino na itodunit ekadakada loka eswamak lu itutuoritai kotoma amukian.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ayia okporovu ru 'diyi ma kalafe eyi ma omgbo tu ra. Drile onziru, e'yo 'di ece e'yo azi'ba imbata esupi ra 'diyi ma ako geri alata ni 'diyi ma alia ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehwaire, omuhendo gw'abakazi abarikuzaara abarikuronda obuhwezi gweyongyeire. Eky'obusaasi, okweyongyera oku kworeka eibura ry'abashaho abatendekirwe omu kitongore ky'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In many regions, healthcare infrastructure is severely lacking, leaving communities without essential resources. As a result, individuals are often left without the means to make informed choices about their reproductive health.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, ebyetaago by'ebyobulamu tebiriiwo nnyo, ekireka ebitundu nga tebirina bikozesebwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo. N'ekivuddemu, abantu batera okulekebwa nga tebalina ngeri za kusalawo ku byobulamu bwabwe obw'okuzaala.
ach_prompt: I but lobo mapol, jami tic me yot kom tye ma goro tutwal ma oweko lwak peke ki jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ipol kare gi bedo labongo yoo me moko tam maber I kom yotkom gi me nywal.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu emamiatatar keda iboro lu amukian, ido ijalakini itunga komamete keda iboro lu itwasamao. Kanuka ngun, etapit duc itunga asalakin komam epedoritos aseun nuikamunitos angaleukec naka aur.
lgg_prompt: Angu karakara eyi ma alea, afa ayuzaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma alea yo, e'yo 'di fe ongulumu eyini afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi kokoru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi ku geri eyini ecozu e'yo 'duzu kililiru eyi ma rua ala anzi tiza niri ma dria ri kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, ebyombeko by'eby'amagara tibirikwetengwa munonga, ekirikureka abantu bataine bintu by'omugasho. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu tibarikubaasa kucwamu gye aha magara gaabo ag'okuzaara.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for comprehensive health education, the organization has decided to enhance its existing initiatives. This will include a focus on critical topics that empower individuals to make informed choices about their reproductive health.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okusomesa kw'ebyobulamu okw'awamu, ekitongole kisazeewo okutumbula enteekateeka zaakyo eziriwo. Kino kijja kuzingiramu okussa essira ku nsonga enkulu eziwa abantu ssekinnoomu amaanyi okukola okusalawo okulungi ku bulamu bwabwe obw'okuzaala.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti me pwonyo dano i kom yoto kom, dul enoni omoko tamme me medo rwom me yub ma gitye kwede. Man obi bedo ki keto cwiny I kom lok mapigi tego ma miyo kero ki dano me moko tam maber I kom yotkom gi me nywal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka asioman naka angaleu naka itunga kere, abu erionget kitogogong aswamisioitikec. Imoriaritos nu aisingarenit akiro nuepolok nu isinyikokitos itunga aiswamaun aseununeta nuikamunitos aur kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu 'ba eyini lezu imbata e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti 'da asi e'yo 'du e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Di ma alia 'ba nga asi 'ba e'yo okporu okpo fepi 'ba yi dri e'yo 'duzu kililiru e'yo yi ma rua ala anzi tiza niri ma dria 'diyi ma dria indi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kweyongyera kw'obwegyese bw'eby'amagara, ekitongore kisharamu kutunguura enteekateeka zaakyo eziriho. Eki nikiija kutwariramu okuta amaani aha nshonga nkuru ezirikuhwera abantu kukora okucwamu okurikukwata aha magara gaabo g'okuzaara.

eng_prompt: Promoting comprehensive sexual education and access to reproductive health services is essential for empowering individuals. By addressing the root causes of inequality, we can create a safer environment for all genders.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula okusomesa okw'awamu ku by'okwegatta n'okufuna obujjanjabi ku by'okuzaala kwa mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula abantu ssekinnoomu. Nga tukola ku bikulu ebiviirako obutali bwenkanya, tusobola okutondawo embeera ey'obukuumi eri buli kikula ky'abantu.
ach_prompt: Pwonyo dano weng i kom lok me butu imit ki nongo kony me yot kom ma kwako butu imit pire tek tutwal pi ilo malo rwom me tic pa dano. Ka walwenyo i kom jami ma kelo apoka-poka ikin mon ki coo, watwero yubu kabedo maber pi mon ki coo weng.
teo_prompt: Aitopoloria aisisianakino na akiro nuka aelo ka adumunun amukian naka aur ejok kanu aitigogong itunga. Kowai lo aitemokin iboro lu eyangaununete amamus airiamara, ipedori oni aitolomun aiboisit na eyuwara kanuka ikiliok keda angor kere.
lgg_prompt: Imbata feza onita dria e'yo ali o'baza niri ma dria azini azakoma fele e'yo anzi tiza niri ma dria ri eri orodriru okpo fezu 'ba yi dri. Geri amani e'yo e'yo esele coza ejipi 'diyi ma aza kozu risi, ama eco angu agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie aa'zu ageitema be ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura eby'obwegyese omu by'okuteerana n'okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'okuzaara n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura abantu. Twakora aha nshonga ezirikureetaho obutaingana, nitubaasa kureetaho obusingye burungi ahagati y'abashaija n'abakazi.

eng_prompt: Many students have reported feeling unwell due to the conditions in their school facilities. As a result, concerns have been raised about the health and safety standards in educational institutions.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi bagamba nti tebawulira bulungi olw'embeera eri mu masomero gaabwe. N'ekivuddemu, okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku mutindo gw'ebyobulamu n'obukuumi mu matendekero g'ebyenjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol guwaco ni pe giwinyo maber pi kit ma gangi kwan gi tye kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, lworo tye I kom rwom me gwoko yot kom ki ber bedo I gangi kwan.
teo_prompt: Ebakasi esisiak luipu ebe mam kesi epupete ejok kanuka ejautene lo esomero. Kanuka ngun, aponi itodunai aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos adoketait na angaleu keda ayuwara kotoma osomeroi.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi 'yo kini eyi aa'ni muke ku e'yo eyini aa'zu sukulu eyivile 'diyi ma alea risi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'bi asi otiza e'da wura alata ni azini ageitema ni angu onita ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi bagambire ngu tibarikwehurira gye ahabw'embeera eri omu mashomero gaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, okwerarikirira kweyongyeire aha mutindo gw'eby'amagara n'oburinzi omu matendekyero.

eng_prompt: In light of the rising health concerns and social issues within the community, the district leaders held a meeting to address the alarming trends. They emphasized the importance of making healthier lifestyle choices for the well-being of all residents.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweraliikirira kw'ebyobulamu okweyongera n'ensonga z'embeera z'abantu mu kitundu, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti baatuuza olukiiko okukola ku nsonga ezo. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'okusalawo obulamu obulungi olw'obulungi bw'abatuuze bonna.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yot kom ma tye kamede ki peko me kwo pa lwak, lutela me district gubedo ki kacoke me neno ngo ma omyero gutim. Guwaco ni pire tek me yero kwo maber pi ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin aiyalongongo naka angaleu keda atiokisio nuka itunga, apotu engarenok luka edisitrikt kitolototo airiamunet kanu aitemokin ngun. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aijar najokan kanuka aijar naka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi azini e'yo ewaru ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma dria, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi 'ye mitingi e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu. Eyi fe okpo orodri 'bani 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma edri 'bazu alata ru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara n'enshonga z'abantu omu byanga, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti bakakora orukiiko kukora aha nshonga ezi. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okukora emiringo y'amagara marungi ahabw'oburungi bw'abatuuragye boona.

eng_prompt: In response to growing community needs and feedback, local officials have prioritized enhancing access to essential health services. As part of this initiative, the district will extend the sexual reproductive health services to the people.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'ekitundu obweyongera n'ebiteeso, abakungu b'ebyalo bakulembezza okutumbula okufuna obujjanjabi obwetaagisa. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, disitulikiti ejja kuwa abantu obujjanjabi obukwata ku by'okwegatta n'okuzaala.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti ki tam pa lwak, lutic me tedero guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom medo rwom me nongo kony me yot kom ma pire tek. Macalo but yub man, district obi cwalo kony me yot kom ma kwako butu imit bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luepolok keda abongonokineta, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kisingarenit aitojokar adumunun amukian naejok. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ebuni edisitrikt aisiekikin nuka aur mama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini lele tu 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ba e'yo okporu eyini lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, distrikiti ni mu azakoma fele e'yo anzi tiza niri ma dria 'diyi edri o'bi eyivu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu n'okugarukwamu, abakungu b'ebyaro bateireho enteekateeka y'okutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'amagara. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, disiturikiti neija kuhisya obuheereza bw'okuzaara omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In times of economic uncertainty, individuals often face challenges in securing financial support. One effective strategy to overcome these obstacles is to collaborate with others in their community.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali butebenkevu mu by'enfuna, abantu batera okusanga okusoomoozebwa mu kufuna obuyambi bw'ensimbi. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okuvvuunuka ebizibu bino kwe kukwatagana n'abalala mu kitundu kyabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko me lim, dano ipol kare ginongo peko me nongo kony me lim. Yoo acel maber loyo weng me lweny i kom peko magi obedo ribe ki joo mukene ma ikabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko nuka ikapun, etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nuka adumun agangat naka ikapun. Adiopet naka aitemokin atiokisio nu erai aiswamanara keda luce kotoma atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia 'diyisi, 'ba yi dri e'yo ewaru esu atita robia niri esuzu. Otita azi alu ecopi e'yo ewaru 'diyi agapi ra ri eri ti ecizu 'ba azi 'diyi pie ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea.
