nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'eibura ry'esente, abantu nibatunga oburemeezi omu kutunga obuhwezi bw'esente. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okusingura oburemeezi obu n'okukwatanisa n'abandi omu byanga byabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to stimulate economic growth and reduce unemployment, the government has implemented various financial support programs. These initiatives aim to empower individuals by giving them the resources needed to start and expand their own businesses.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okukendeeza ku bbula ly'emirimu, gavumenti etadde mu nkola pulogulaamu ez'enjawulo ez'obuyambi bw'ensimbi. Enteekateeka zino zigenderera okutumbula abantu nga zibawa ebyetaago okutandika n'okugaziya bizinensi zaabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me kelo dongo lobo I tenge me lim ki dwoko piny rwom me bedo peke pa tic, gamente oketo yub mapat-pat me miyo kony me lim I tic. Yub magi tye ki miti me tyelo kor dano kun minigi jami ma mite me cako ki dongo biacara gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun ka aitidisiar amamus na aswamisinei, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuegelegela nuka agangat naka ikapun. Alosikinet naka iboro lu erai aitigogong itunga kowai lo aijaikin kes iboro lu ipudai kanu ageun ka aitanyanyar ibiasaran kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia azini azi ako ma omgbo esizu, gamete 'ba otita azakoma robia ni 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi 'yeta ma alia. Otita 'diyi ma asisile lezu 'ba yi dri okpo fezu geri yini yi dri afa yini lele tujari yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi e'dozu azini yi ma tujari ma ongmbo otuzuri fezurisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya n'okukyendeeza eibura ry'emirimo, gavumenti eteire omu nkora enteekateeka nyingi z'obuhwezi bw'esente. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okutunguura abantu, obwo barikubaheereza ebintu ebirikwetengwa kutandikaho n'okushanjuura bizinesi zaabo.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for practical skills in the community, local workshops were established to provide hands-on training. As a result, individuals have been empowered to pursue careers in various trades.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obukugu obw'emikono mu kitundu, emisomo gy'ebitundu gyatandikibwawo okuwa okutendekebwa okw'emikono. N'ekivuddemu, abantu ssekinnoomu baweereddwa amaanyi okukola emirimu mu mirimu egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo diro me tic cing I kin lwak, kacoke me pwonye me tedero kicako me miyo pwony me tic cing. Macalo adwogi ne, dano acel-acel gunongo kero me timo biacara mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin eipud loka aitutuoro kotoma atutubet, aponi itolomunai airiamununeta kanu aituutoonor itunga. Kanuka ngun, aponi igangakinai itunga aswam aswamisinei nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu ondua afa edele drisi 'diyini tuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba e'do otita imbatani angu eyi ma alea 'diyi imbata drisi 'diyi fezu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe 'ba yi dri okpo azi ngazu tujari ndundu yi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetago bw'emyoga y'emikono omu bantu, emishomo y'ebyaro ekatandikwaho okutendeka abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu batungire amaani g'okukora emirimo omu mirimo etari emwe.

eng_prompt: Many families are struggling to make ends meet due to rising living costs. As a result, education often becomes a financial burden they cannot afford.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi galwana okweyimirizaawo olw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu erinnya. N'ekivuddemu, okusoma kutera okufuuka omugugu gw'ensimbi gwe batasobola kwesasulira.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol tye ka canne me nongo jami ma mite pi rwom me cente ma tye ka medde. Macalo adwogi ne, kwan pol kare doko peko me lim ma pe giromo culu pire.
teo_prompt: Eutasi ikalia luipu aijar naarai eyatakinos itiaisinei luka aijar. Kanuka ngun, eraun asioman naepol noi na mam kesi epedoritos adumun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi dri ci afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi esuzu e'yo aje 'bani aa'zu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi. E'yo 'disi, onita ni eca curu'do nziza robia ni eyini ecozu ofezu ku ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi nigateganisibwa okubaho ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu kweyongyera. N'ekyarugiremu, obwegyese n'omugugu gw'esente ogutarikubaasa.

eng_prompt: Many individuals are struggling to make ends meet due to rising living costs. As a result, they find it difficult to allocate funds for entrepreneurial ventures.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bazibuwalirwa okweyimirizaawo olw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu erinnya. N'ekivuddemu, bakisanga nga kizibu okussaawo ensimbi z'okutandikawo bizineesi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi pi wel cente matye kamede. Macalo adwogi ne ginongo tek tutwal me nongo cente me cako biacara.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aijar naarai eyatakinos itiaisinei luka aijar. Kanuka ngun, etionikinit kesi adumun ikapun lu agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi e'yo esu afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi esuzu e'yo aje 'bani aa'zu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi. E'yo 'disi, eyi esu ewaru robia 'bazu e'yo tujari ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibarwana kwebaisaho ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu kweyongyera. N'ekyarugiremu, nibagumirwa kutunga esente z'okutandikaho emirimo y'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to uplift the community, local leaders held a meeting to discuss strategies for improvement. They emphasized the importance of education and collaboration among families to foster lasting change.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okusitula ekitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okutereezaamu. Baakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okusoma n'okukwatagana mu maka okusobola okuleetawo enkyukakyuka ey'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa lwak, lutela me tedero gubedo ki kacoke me nywako tam i kom yoo me yubu kwo pa lwak. Guketo cwiny gi i kom ber pa kwan ki winye ikin gangi pi kelo aloka loka ma rii.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitigogong itunga, apotu engarenok luka atutubet iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itojokarere. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka asioman keda aiswamanara kanejaas ikalia kanu aitolomun aijulanakineta nuka apak naepol.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ongulumu eyi ma omgbo otuzu, drice'ba angu eyini 'diyi 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu eyi otuzu ra 'diyi ma dria. Eyi 'ba okpo orodri onita ni azini ti icita familia eyi ma eselea ri ma dria ojata ewu drile ri ni ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okugaruramu abantu amaani, abeebembezi b'ebyaro bakakora orukiiko, okuhanuura aha mihanda y'okutunguura ebyaro. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'obwegyese n'okukwatanisa omu maka, kugira ngu habeho empinduka y'obuhangazi.

eng_prompt: Many communities are struggling to meet their basic needs. As a result, families lack food and clothing.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi birwana nnyo okutuukiriza ebyetaago byabwe ebikulu. N'ekivuddemu, amaka tegalina mmere na ngoye.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol tye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi, gangi peke ki cam ki bongi.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aitodolikin ipudesia kec. Kanuka ngun, emamiatatar ikalia keda inyamat keda igoen.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi dri ci afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, familia eyivu nyaka azini bongo eyi yo.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga bingi nibirwana kuhikiiriza ebyetengo byabyo. N'ekyarugiremu, amaka tigaine by'okurya n'emyenda.

eng_prompt: Due to the recent economic downturn, many individuals are facing financial hardships. As a result, lending institutions have tightened their requirements significantly.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukendeera kw'ebyenfuna okwaliwo gye buvuddeko, abantu bangi basanga obuzibu mu by'ensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole ebiwola ssente binywezezza nnyo ebyetaago byaabyo.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me lim ma obedo tye cokcok-ki, dano mapol tye ka nongo peko me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat makimiyo lim den i dul mapat-pat omedo rwom me jami ma gimito.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aibiror naka ikapun, ejaasi itunga luipu keda atiokisio nuka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, etigogongosi iriongeta lu ilonin ikisila kec noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu. E'yo 'disi, amuti mari fepi 'diyi otu azita yini 'diyi ma omgbo ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugwa kw'eby'entatsya, abantu baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, ebitongore ebirikugaba za rooni byongyeire amaani omu byetengo byabyo.

eng_prompt: As economic conditions shifted and traditional roles evolved, many families found themselves relying on women to take on new challenges. This change marked a significant transformation in societal expectations and family dynamics.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'ebyenfuna bwe yakyuka n'emirimu gy'obuwangwa ne gikyuka, amaka mangi geesanga nga geesigamye ku bakazi okwanganga okusoomoozebwa okupya. Enkyukakyuka eno yaleetawo enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi mu byetaago by'abantu n'enkulaakulana y'amaka.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok me lim olokke ki tic me tekwaro bene olokke, gangi mapol gunongo ni gijenge I kom mon me cobo peko manyen. Aloka-loka man okelo aloka-loka madit tutwal I kwo pa dano kacel ki kwo pa gangi.
teo_prompt: Nejulakinor ejautene loka ikapun keda aijulanakineta nuka einono, apotu ikalia luipu kongicunos keda angor kanu aitodolikin atiokisio nuitetiak. Abu aijulanakineta ngun kitodu aijulanakineta nuipu noi kotoma aijar naka itunga keda ikalia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ni 'diyi ni ojazu azini e'yo a'bini 'diyi ni i ojazu risi, familia karakara eyi esu eyi asi'ba oku eyi ma dria e'yo ewaru o'diru 'diyi 'duzu. Ojata 'diri e'da ojata okporu e'yo o'bi yini ega 'diyi ma alia azini e'yo familia yini yi 'yezu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Embeera y'eby'entaasya kuyahindukire hamwe n'emirimo y'obuhangwa, amaka maingi gakatandika kwesiga abakazi kukora aha buremeezi obusya. Empindahinduka egi ekareetaho empindahinduka y'amaani omu bantu n'omu maka.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about family dynamics and societal norms, experts highlighted the challenges and complications arising from polygamous relationships. As a result, community leaders issued a strong recommendation for men to reconsider their approach to marriage.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku mbeera y'amaka n'empisa z'abantu, abakugu baalaze okusoomoozebwa n'ebizibu ebiva mu kubeera n'abakyala abangi. N'ekyavaamu, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baalabula nnyo abasajja okuddamu okulowooza ku ngeri gye batwalamu obufumbo.
ach_prompt: I nyamo lok ma otime cokcok-ki I kom kit ma kwo me ot tye kwede ki kit ma kwo pa dano tye kwede, ludiro guwaco peko ki peko ma bino macalo adwogi me bedo ki mon mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me kabedo mapatpat gumiyo tam matek tutwal bot coo me tam I kom kit ma giwinyo kwede I kom nyom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos aijar naka ikalia keda iponesio luka itunga, apotu ipirioitin kitodutu atiokisio nuelomunete kama ejaasi angor nuipu. Kanuka ngun, apotu engarenok luka atutubet icorakisi ikiliok airereor eipone lo elosete kesi toma odukonekec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ma alea e'yo familia eyini aa'zu alenia ri ma dria, 'ba onita angiri be 'diyi ece e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru e'yo oku eyi 'duzu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi fe imbata okporu agupi eyini geri eyini aa'zu aje ma alea ri ma ale andrizu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho aha ntwaza y'amaka hamwe n'emitwarize y'abantu, abakugu bakooreka oburemeezi n'oburemeezi oburikuruga omu bushwere bw'abakazi baingi. N'ekyarugiremu, abebembezi b'ebyanga bakahabura abashaija kugaruka bashwijume engyenderwaho yaabo aha bushwere.

eng_prompt: In recent months, there has been a noticeable shift in the priorities of local youth. Many students are increasingly drawn to entrepreneurial ventures instead of traditional education.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise wabaddewo enkyukakyuka mu ebyo abavubuka b'omu kitundu bye bakulembeza. Abayizi bangi beeyongedde okusikirizibwa mu by'obusuubuzi mu kifo ky'okusoma okw'ennono.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, alokaloka mapol otimme I kom miti pa bulu me tedero. Lutino kwan mapol tye ki miti me cako timo biacara me kaka kwan macon.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, ejai aijulanakineta nuipu noi kotoma atumunak luka atutubet. Esisiak luipu ekotosi aswamisinei nu agwelanar itia asioman nakolo.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ojata e'dapi ra 'diyi ebi ovu e'yo 'ba ode angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ni e'yo okporu 'diyi ma alea ci. Sukulu anzi karakara eyi curu'do ava esu e'yo tujari 'yezu 'diyi ma alea aga onita a'di ni 'diyi ma alea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, hatwireho empindahinduka omu by'okwebembeza eby'eminyeeto y'omubyaro. Abeegi baingi beeyongyeire kwejumba omu mirimo y'obushubuzi, omu mwanya gw'okushoma eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: In order to foster effective learning environments, it is essential for educational institutions to establish clear frameworks. These frameworks provide the necessary guidelines and support for both teachers and students.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula embeera y'okusoma ennungi, kya mugaso amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza okuteekawo enkola entegeerekeka. Enkola zino ziwa obulagirizi obwetaagisa n'obuyambi eri abasomesa n'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me kwan maber, obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi gangi kwan me keto yub matye. Yub eni miyo tira ki kony ma mite pi lupwonye ki lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aiboisio nu isisiaere, ejokuna noi isomeroi aitolomun ainapeta nu ecaete. Einanakinete ainapeta ngun aicoreta keda agangat mama ejaasi isisianakinak keda esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Lezu angu onita ni muke 'diyi ezozu, eri orodriru angu onita ni 'diyi ma e'dota kililiru 'diyi. Otita 'diyi azita kililiru azini atita kililiru 'diyi fe imba'ba eyini tualu sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho embeera nungi y'okwegyeramu, n'eky'omugasho amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese kutaho engyenderwaho nungi. Enkora egi neeha abegyesa n'abeegi obuhabuzi n'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: In our small town, the rhythm of life often revolves around the weekly market. As a result, many students choose to skip school to help their families with shopping or selling goods.
lug_prompt: Mu kabuga kaffe akatono, entambula y'obulamu yeetooloolera ku katale ka buli wiiki. N'ekivuddemu, abayizi bangi basalawo okuwanduka mu masomero okuyamba amaka gaabwe mu kugula oba okutunda ebintu.
ach_prompt: I taunwa matidi, kwo pol kare jenge I kom cuk me cabit ki cabit. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan mapol yero me weko kwan wek gukony lugangigi ki wilo onyo cato jami.
teo_prompt: Ko otaun wok lodidi, ejai duc esokoni lo esabiti. Kanuka ngun, aseunete esisiak luipu ajalakin esomero kanu aingarakin ikalia kec keda agwel keda agwel iboro.
lgg_prompt: Tawuni amavileri ma alea, e'yo idri ni 'diyi tualu cu sabiti vusi 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, sukulu anzi karakara eyi pe sukulu kuzu eyi ma familia eyini azakoma fezu afa jeza si kani ku afa oziza si.
nyn_prompt: Omu rurembo rwaitu orukye, entwaza y'abantu neetandikira aha katare ka buri sande. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegi baingi nibasharamu okuruga omu mashomero okuhwera amaka gaabo n'okugura n'okuguza ebintu.

eng_prompt: Residents often struggle to reach essential services and jobs due to limited public transportation options. As a result, many people rely on private vehicles, which can be a burden for those without access.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze batera okulwana okutuuka ku mpeereza ez'omugaso n'emirimu olw'entambula y'olukale entono. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi beesigama ku mmotoka z'obwannannyini, ekiyinza okuba omugugu eri abo abatalina makubo.
ach_prompt: Lutedero ipol kare gi nongo peko me nongo kony ma mite pi kwo gi kacel ki tic pi peko me wot pa lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol gijenge I kom mutoka pa wegine, ma man twero bedo peko madit tutwal ki joo ma peke ki yoo me wot.
teo_prompt: Etionikinit duc itunga adolokin aijanakino ka aswamisinei nu epol ajokis naarai ikidioko iwaitin lu elosete itunga. Kanuka ngun, ejarete itunga luipu keda amotokan nuka itunga, nu epedori araun ationis nejaas ngul lumam epedoritos alosit.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi sa'wa driasi dri ci cazu azakoma orodriru 'diyi ma alea azini azi eyi ma alea eyini ani acipa o'bi eyini 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ku risi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi asi'ba mutukari ngulupisi 'diyi ma dria, e'yo 'di eco adri e'yo nzizaru 'ba ecopi mupi angu 'da ma alea ku 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye nibakira kurwana kuhika aha buheereza bw'omugasho hamwe n'emirimo ahabw'entambura y'abantu baingi. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi nibagyendera aha motooka z'abantu buntu, ekirikubaasa kuba omugugu ahari abo abatarikubaasa kuzihikaho.

eng_prompt: Recent assessments have revealed a concerning trend in academic achievement. Many students are struggling to meet the expected learning benchmarks.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko kwalaga embeera eyeeraliikiriza mu kuyita mu by'ensoma. Abayizi bangi balwana okutuukiriza ebisaanyizo by'okusoma ebisuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni rwom me kwan tye ka medde. Lutino kwan mapol tye ka yele me cobo miti gi me kwan.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit ebe ejai ationis naepol noi naka eswamae loka esisiak. Eutasi esisiak luipu aitodolikin adoketait na ebeit kesi adumun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo asi otiza fepi 'ba eyini agazu sukulu'a ri ra. Sukulu anzi karakara eyi dri ci e'yo onita ni 'bani ega eyi esuzu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okwakozirwe obwahati kworeka enkora y'okwerarikirira omu by'obwegyese. Abeegi baingi nibarwana kuhikiiriza ebirikwetengwa omu kwega.

eng_prompt: Many young learners find it difficult to engage with traditional teaching methods. As a result, their enthusiasm for learning often diminishes over time.
lug_prompt: Abayizi abato bangi bakisanga nga kizibu okwenyigira mu nkola z'okusomesa eza bulijjo. N'ekivuddemu, obwagazi bwabwe mu kuyiga bukendeera ekiseera bwe kigenda kiyitawo.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol ginongo tek tutwal me tic ki yoo me pwony macon. Macalo adwogi ne, miti gi me pwonyo piny ikare mapol.
teo_prompt: Esisiak ludidika luipu etionikinit aitwasam iponesio lu inonosio lukolo. Kanuka ngun, emina kesi noi aisisia akaulo naka apak.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi ode karakara eyi eri esu ewaru e'yo eyi 'yezu geri onita ni a'di ni 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, ava yini onita onizu ri ma omgbo esi sawa driasi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abaana baingi abarikwega, nikibagumira kwejumba omu mihanda y'eby'obwegyese eya ira. N'ekyarugiremu, omuhimbo gwabo gw'okwega nigukyendeera bwanyima y'obwire.

eng_prompt: Despite the teachers' efforts to engage students with interactive lessons, many learners have been consistently absent from class. This ongoing issue has created a challenging environment for both educators and students alike.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde abasomesa bafubye okwenyigiramu abayizi n'okusomesebwa, abayizi bangi babadde babulwa mu bibiina buli kaseera. Ensonga eno egenda mu maaso etaddewo embeera enzibu eri abasomesa n'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lupwonye gutute matek me weko lutino bedo ki miti me pwonyo lutino, lutino mapol pe gubedo tye I kilac. Peko man matye ka time ni okelo peko madit tutwal I kin lupwonye ki lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Karaida isisianakinak iswamaete kagogongu kanu aisisianakin esisiak akiro nu isisiaete, mam esisiak luipu elosete atukot. Ationis na na elosi akonye ayangau ainingosit nejaas isisianakinak keda esisiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo imba'ba eyini okpo 'bazu sukulu anzi eyini e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma alea ra ti, sukulu anzi karakara eyi ebi eyi avi kilasi eyi ma alea sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'di ni mu drile ri fe e'yo ewaru imba'ba eyini tualu sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani g'abegyesa okureetera abeegi kwejumba omu mishomo, abeegi baingi batwire nibabura omu bibiina. Enshonga egi erikugyenda omu maisho, ereesireho oburemeezi aha beegyesa hamwe n'abeegi.

eng_prompt: Education plays a crucial role in a child's development and future success. By fostering a love for learning, parents can help their children reach their full potential.
lug_prompt: Ebyenjigiriza bikola kinene nnyo mu nkulaakulana y'omwana n'obuwanguzi bwe mu biseera eby'omu maaso. Mu kukuza okwagala okusoma, abazadde basobola okuyamba abaana baabwe okutuuka ku busobozi bwabwe obujjuvu.
ach_prompt: Kwan pire tek tutwal I dongo pa latin ki cobo miti ne I kare me anyim. Ki pwonyo lutino me maro kwan, lunyodo twero konyo lutino gi me nongo kero gi weng.
teo_prompt: Erai asioman ibore yenepol noi kotoma apol naka ikoku keda akerianut koingaren. Kowai lo aitopoloun amin na aisisia, epedorete auriak aingarakin idwekec aitodolikin apedor kec.
lgg_prompt: Onita eri orodriru tu mva ma zota ma alia azini drile suza ewu drusiri ma alia. Tipika eyi ma leta onita ma dria ri ma ezota si, eyi eco anzi eyivile 'diyini azakoma fe eyini ecozu eyi ma okpo esuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Obwegyese n'obw'omugasho munonga omu kukura kw'omwana n'obusinguzi bwe omu biro by'omumaisho. Abazaire nibabaasa kuhwera abaana baabo kutunguura emyoga yaabo barikwegyesa abaana baabo okukunda eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Recent assessments have revealed significant gaps in student knowledge and skills across various subjects. As a result, educators and policymakers are increasingly concerned about the effectiveness of the current primary education system.
lug_prompt: Okukebera okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko kwalaga ebituli mu kumanya kw'abayizi n'obukugu mu masomo ag'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, abasomesa n'abakola amateeka beeyongedde okufaayo ku bulungi bw'ensoma ya pulayimale eriwo.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I ngec ki diro pa lutino I kom pwony mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, lupwonye ki lucungu iwi bye mapol gitye ka paro pi ber pa yub me kwan me puraimari matye kombedi.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit amamus na acoa na esisiak kotoma aisisiaeta nuegelegela. Kanuka ngun, epodokitos isisianakinak keda luitolomete ikisila nuikamunitos eswamae loajokan loka asioman naka epuraimare.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi e'da esele coza angiri sukulu anzi eyini ondua azini ondua eyini 'diyi ma alea sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, imba'ba eyi tualu 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi pie eyi asi otiza be e'yo geri onita pirimari ni curu'do ri ni azi ngazu kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okwakozirwe obwahati, kworeka oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kumanya n'emyoga y'abeegi omu mashomo gatari gamwe na gamwe. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegyesa hamwe n'abakozi b'ebiragiro beeyongyeire kufayo aha bukoryo bw'obwegyese bwa puraimare oburiho hati.

eng_prompt: Many families struggle to see the value of formal schooling in today's rapidly changing world. As a result, some parents express skepticism about the benefits of education for their children.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi galwana okulaba omugaso gw'okusoma mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu. N'ekivuddemu, abazadde abamu balaga okubuusabuusa ku miganyulo gy'okusoma eri abaana baabwe.
ach_prompt: Lugang mapol nongo tek tutwal me niang ber pa kwan i kare man ma jami tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lunyodo mukene tye ki akala-kala I kom ber pa kwan pi lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Etionikinit ikalia luipu ajenun ajokis naka asioman kotoma akwap na ijulakina atipet. Kanuka ngun, mam auriak ice ejenete ajokis naka asioman naka idwekec.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi dri ci orodri sukulu lazu sukulu'a ri ndrezu wudrikuru curu'do ojapi mbeleru 'di ma alea. E'yo 'disi, tipika azi 'diyi asi otiza e'da orodri onita ni anzi yini 'diyi driri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi nigatunga oburemeezi kureeba omugasho gw'okushoma omu nsi egi erikuhinduka juba. N'ekyarugiremu, abazaire abamwe tibarikwikiriza emigasho y'okwegyesa abaana baabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to foster entrepreneurial skills, many parents have begun to engage their children in local commerce. This shift has led to a growing trend where students prioritize business ventures over their academic responsibilities.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obukugu mu by'obusuubuzi, abazadde bangi batandise okwenyigira abaana baabwe mu by'obusuubuzi eby'omu kitundu. Enkyukakyuka eno ereeseewo omuze ogweyongera abayizi mwe bakulembeza emirimu gyabwe egy'obusuubuzi okusinga obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obw'okusoma.
ach_prompt: I tute me pwonyo lutino ki diro me timo biacara, lunyodo mapol gucako pwonyo lutino gi ki diro me timo biacara. Alokaloka man oweko lutino kwan tye ka keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom timo biacara ma ka keto cwinygi I kom kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor acoa naka agwelanar, ageutu auriak luipu aisisianakin idwekec akiro nuka agwelanar. Eyangaunit aijulanakineta ngun epone loepol noi lo isisianakinete esisiak aisingarenit aswamisinei nuka agwelanar adepar aswamisio nuka asioman.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ondua tujari 'yezu 'diyi ezozu, tipika karakara eyi e'do eyi ma anzi eyi su tujari ogogo 'diyi ma alea indi. Ojata 'diri fe e'yo sukulu anzi eyini tujari 'yezu 'diyi 'duzu okporu aga azi eyini sukulu'a 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura emyoga y'eby'obushubuzi, abazaire baingi batandikire kwejumba abaana baabo omu by'obushubuzi. Empindahinduka egi ereesireho omuze oguriyo nigweyongyera ogu abeegi barikwebembeza eby'obushuubuzi kukira eby'obwegyese bwabo.

eng_prompt: The school has been facing significant challenges this semester, with many students frequently missing classes. As a result, the lack of consistent attendance has led to a decline in academic achievement.
lug_prompt: Essomero libadde lisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu lusoma luno, ng'abayizi bangi batera okusubwa emisomo. N'ekivuddemu, obutabeerawo mu ssomero buli kaseera kiviiriddeko okukendeera mu by'ensoma.
ach_prompt: Gang kwan ne obedo ka nongo peko madit tutwal I tem me kwan eni, lutino kwan mapol gubedo ka keng kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, pe bedo tye pa lutino i gang kwan oweko rwom me kwan odok piny.
teo_prompt: Etereikina esomero keda atiokisio nuepolok noi kotoma atamu na, naarai etapit idwe luipu aibiror atukot. Kanuka ngun, amamus na esisiak alosenen nes eyaunit aibiror naka eswamae loka esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu 'da ebi e'yo ewaru 'diyi esu semesita 'disi sukulu anzi karakara eyi ecoko kilasi eyi ma alea sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'disi, sukulu anzi eyini muzu sukulu'a ku ri fe sukulu anzi eyi ma agata esi esi esi esi.
nyn_prompt: Eishomero ritwire nirishanga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu semesita egi, abeegi baingi barikukira kufeerwa emishomo yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, obutabaho bw'abaana abarikuguma nibaza omu mashomero, kireesire okukyendera omu by'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve education attendance rates, the local government implemented strict regulations. As a result, parents were fined five thousand shillings for not sending their children to school.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omuwendo gw'abayizi abagenda mu masomero, gavumenti z'ebitundu zaateekawo amateeka amakakali. N'ekyavaamu, abazadde baasasulwa engassi ya mitwalo etaano olw'obutasindika baana baabwe ku ssomero.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me lutino kwan, gamente me tedero oketo cik matek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, ki ngolo pwod me ciling alip abic iwi lunyodo pi kwero cwalo lutino gi igangkwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar adoketait na esisiak, abu apugan naka atutubet ibwaik ikisila lu ikisila. Kanuka ngun, aponi kotacai auriak isirigin ilukumin ikany kanu mam aijukar idwekec osomero.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba sukulu'a 'diyi ma kalafe otuzu, gamete angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ba azita okporu 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe tipika eyini panga silingi alifu towi eyini eyi ma anzi eyi ma ti pezu sukulu'a kurisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura omuhendo gw'abeegi, gavumenti y'ebyaro ekataho ebiragiro by'amaani. Ekyarugiremu, abazaire bakaheebwa engaro ya shiringi enkumi itaano ahabw'obutashomesa abaana baabo.

eng_prompt: In light of recent developments, educational institutions are emphasizing the importance of in-person learning. To support this initiative, schools have encouraged parents to send their children to school.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bigenda mu maaso gye buvuddeko, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza gatadde essira ku bukulu bw'okusomera mu buntu. Okuwagira enteekateeka eno, amasomero gakubirizza abazadde okusindika abaana baabwe ku ssomero.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, gangi kwan tye ka keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom ber pa pwonyo dano. Me cwako yub man, gangi kwan gucuku cwiny lunyodo me cwalo lutino gi igangkwan.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuiswamasi pac, eutasi isomeroi aitigogong ajokis naka aisisia itunganan. Kanu aigang aswamisioit na, isinyikokitos isomeroi auriak aijukar idwekec osomero.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, pari onita ni 'diyi okpo fe orodri onita 'ba ma ngulupi si ri ma dria. E'yo 'di atizu, sukulu eyi ai tipika eyi anzi eyivile 'diyi ma ti pezu sukulu'a.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha ntunguuka eriho obwahati, amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese nigashagika omugasho gw'okwegyera omuntu weena. Okushagika enteekateeka egi, amashomero gahigire abazaire kutwara abaana baabo omu mashomero.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent budget cuts and increasing demands on our schools, it has become clear that additional financial support is necessary. To ensure our students receive the resources they need, the district leaders should take action.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusala mu mbalirira gyebuvuddeko n'obwetaavu obweyongera ku masomero gaffe, kyeyoleka bulungi nti obuyambi bw'ensimbi obulala bwetaagisa. Okukakasa nti abayizi baffe bafuna ebintu bye beetaaga, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti balina okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki ngolo byek me lim ma otime cokcok-ki ki mede pa miti pa gangi kwan wa, nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero kimed kony me lim. Me neno ni lutino kwanwa gunongo jami ma gimito, lutela me district omyero gutim gin mo.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aitidisiar ebajet keda eipuda lo isomeroi wok, ecai cut ebe ipudai agangat na ikapun. Kanu awanyun ebe edumunenete esisiak iboro lu ipudasi kesi, ekot engarenok luka edisitrikt aswam nuiswama.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aje robia niri ma omgbo esizu o'diru ri ma e'yosi azini e'yo sukulu eyini lezu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, eca e'da kini le 'ba ma fe atita robia ni 'diyi drile. Le drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi ma 'ye e'yo ra kini sukulu anzi amavile 'diyi afa eyini le 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyendeeza embaririra y'eihanga n'ebyetaago by'amashomero gaitu, nikyoreka butunu ngu esente ezindi nizetengwa. Okureeba ngu abeegi baitu batunga eby'okukoresa ebibarikwetenga, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti bashemereire kugira ekibakora.

eng_prompt: Many residents have expressed their frustration with the lack of basic services in the area. As a result, community leaders are calling for urgent improvements to the local facilities.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze bangi balaze obwennyamivu bwabwe olw'ebbula ly'obuweereza obusookerwako mu kitundu. N'ekyavaamu, abakulembeze b'ekitundu basaba wabeewo okulongoosa okw'amangu mu byetaago by'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Lutedero mapol gunyutu cwer cwiny gi pi bedo peke pa jami ma mite pi kwo pa dano ikabedo eni. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me kabedo gi tye ka lego ni omyero ki yub yub yub me tic i kabedo gi oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luipu kitodu aiyalongongokec kanu amamus na aijanakino na itunga katutubet. Kanuka ngun, ekotosi engarenok luka atutubet aitojokar atipet aiboisio nuka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi e'da ayikosi e'yo azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi ma ako ni angu 'da ma alea risi. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ai 'bani angu 'da ma alea afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye baingi boorekire obusaasi bwabo ahabw'eibura ry'obuheereza omu kyanga. N'ekyarugiremu, abebembezi b'ebyanga nibashaba ngu ebyombeko by'ebyaro bitereerezibwa juba.

eng_prompt: Recent investments and upgrades have been made to the infrastructure. As a result, residents are beginning to notice significant changes in their daily commutes.
lug_prompt: Gye buvuddeko okusiga ensimbi n'okutumbula ebizimbe bibadde bikolebwa. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze batandise okulaba enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi mu ntambula yaabwe eya buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: I kare ma okato cokcok-ki ki keto lim I tic ki yubu jami mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero tye ka cako neno aloka-loka madit tutwal I kom kit ma giwoto kwede nino ki nino.
teo_prompt: Aponi itolomunai iboro luipu noi kotoma aiboisio. Kanuka ngun, egeunos itunga aanyun aijulanakineta nuipu kotoma orot kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'bi lonyi vuti aleza 'ye o'diru azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma wura otu o'diru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do ojata okporu 'diyi ndre geri eyini acizu o'du driasi 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ebyombeko by'ebyombeko bitandikirweho kandi byongyerwamu amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye batandikire kureeba empindahinduka y'amaani omu ntambura yaabo eya burizooba.

eng_prompt: In recent years, significant infrastructure development has taken place in the region. As part of this initiative, new transportation routes have been established to improve accessibility.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu kitundu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, amakubo g'entambula amapya gateereddwawo okwanguyiza okutuuka.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dongo lobo madit otime I twok piny eni. Macalo but yub man, kiyubu yoo me wot manyen me weko wot obed yot.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai apol naepol noi kotoma aiboisit. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisioit kana, etolomun irotin luitetiak lu elose kanu aitapatan alosit.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, angu ezoza orodriru 'diyi ebi pari 'du angu 'di ma alea. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba e'do geri o'diru acizu 'diyi e'yo acizu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, entunguuka y'ebyombeko eyeyongyeire omu kyanga. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, emiringo misya y'eby'engyenda eteirweho okwongyera ahakuhika.

eng_prompt: The local government has been facing significant financial challenges over the past few years. As a result, essential services and infrastructure projects have been severely impacted.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti z'ebitundu zibadde zisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu by'ensimbi mu myaka egiyise. N'ekivuddemu, empeereza enkulu ne pulojekiti z'ebizimbe bikoseddwa nnyo.
ach_prompt: Gamente me tedero obedo kanongo peko me lim I mwaki ma okato ni. Macalo adwogi ne, yub me miyo kony ma pire tek ki gedo mapat-pat oballe tutwal.
teo_prompt: Etereikina apugan na okwap keda atiokisio nu ikapun kokaru lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, etereikina noi aijaanakinio naka itunga keda ipurojektin lu ingarakinete itunga.
lgg_prompt: Gamete angu ndundu eyini 'diyi ebi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, azi ngaza orodriru tualu otita afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie 'diyi eza eyi saaru.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti z'ebyanga zitwire nizitunga oburemeezi bwingi omu by'empiiha omu myaka mikye ehwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, obuheereza obw'omugasho hamwe na purogyekiti z'okwombeka ziteganisiibwe munonga.

eng_prompt: Despite its growing population, Moyo town has struggled to attract investment in essential services. As a result, many residents are concerned about the quality of education available to their children.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'omuwendo gw'abantu gweyongera, ekibuga ky'e Moyo kifunye obuzibu okusikiriza bamusigansimbi mu buweereza obwetaagisa. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze bangi beeraliikirivu ku mutindo gw'okusoma oguliwo eri abaana baabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni wel dano tye ka medde, Moyo town tye ka nongo peko me kelo lim I tenge me miyo kony ma mite pi kwo pa dano. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero mapol tye ki lworo I kom rwom me kwan ma lutino gi tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata enaaba loka itunga, etionikinit etaun loka Moyo aitelekaar agwelanar kotoma aijaanakinio na itunga. Kanuka ngun, epodokitos itunga luipu nuikamunitos adoketait na asioman na idwe kec.
lgg_prompt: O'bi ma kalafe ni tuzu ra ti, tawuni Moyo niri esu ewaru e'yo lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi ejizu e'yo azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi otiza be onita onyiru anzi eyivile 'diyini ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu, orurembo rwa Moyo rurataniire kureetaho eby'obushubuzi omu by'obuheereza ebikuru. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baingi niberarikirira omutindo gw'obwegyese oguriho aha baana baabo.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent community feedback and economic assessments, it has become clear that improvements are necessary. To foster growth and improve living standards, proactive measures must be taken.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku nzirukanya y'abantu gye buvuddeko n'okwekenneenya ebyenfuna, kyeyoleka bulungi nti ennongoosereza zeetaagisa. Okutumbula enkulaakulana n'okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu, ebikolebwa ebyangu birina okukolebwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki tam ma lwak omiyo cokcok-ki ki ngiyo kor tic me lim, nen atyer kamaleng ni alokaloka tye kamitte. Me tyelo kor dongo lobo ki ilo malo rwom me kwo pa dano, omyero ki tii ki yoo matir.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aomisio nuka itunga keda aanyanario naka ikapun, ecai cut ebe ibusakinit aitojokar. Kanu aitopolor apol ka aitojokar adoketait na aijar, ekot aitolomun nu iswama.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'duko o'diru ongulumu eyini fe 'diyi ma e'yo si tualu e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'diyi pie, eca e'da kini otuta eri orodriru. Zota ma omgbo otuzu azini geri 'ba eyini aa'zu ri otuzu, le 'ba ma 'du e'yo okporu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha bi abantu barikugarukamu ebiro ebi hamwe n'okushwijuma eby'entaasya, nikyoreka butunu ngu empindahinduka n'ez'omugasho. Okureetaho entunguuka n'okutunguura omutindo gw'entuura y'abantu, haine ekishemereire kukorwa.

eng_prompt: In recent meetings, the district leaders discussed various strategies to enhance local governance and community development. They believe that attaining municipality status would provide greater resources and autonomy for their initiatives.
lug_prompt: Mu nkiiko ezaakaggwa, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti baakubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okutumbula enfuga n'enkulaakulana y'ekitundu. Balowooza nti okufuna embeera ya munisipaali kyandibawa ensimbi nnyingi n'obwetwaze eri enteekateeka zaabwe.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma okato cokcok-ki, lutela me district guloko i kom yoo mapat-pat me ilo malo rwom me tela ki dongo lobo. Gitye ki niyee ni nongo rwom me municipality obi weko gi bedo ki kero me timo tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamununeta pac, apotu engarenok luka edisitrikt kitetemoto iwaitin luegelegela lu itojokaret apugan keda apol naka atutubet. Iyuunitos kesi ebe adumun adoketait na emunisipaliti ijaikini kesi ikapun luipu ka apedor aswam nu iswamaete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi o'diru 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi agbatara gba geri ndundu eyini ecozu driceza angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu tualu ongulumu eyi ma ezota be. Yi a'i ra kini ovuzu munisipaliti ru ri ni nga fe lonyi angiri azini okpo e'yo yini 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkiiko ezibaireho juba, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti bakahanuura aha mihanda etari emwe n'emwe y'okutunguura obwebembezi n'entunguuka omu byaro. Nibateekateeka ngu okutunga ekitiinisa kya munisiparite nikiija kubongyera eby'obugaiga n'obushoborozi bw'emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: After years of community advocacy and fundraising efforts, the long-awaited infrastructure project finally received approval. Construction crews arrived on site to begin work on the much-needed access road.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga tubuulira abantu era nga tusonda ssente, pulojekiti y'ebizimbe eyali emaze ebbanga ng'erindiriddwa yasembyeyo okukkirizibwa. Abakozi b'okuzimba baatuuse mu kifo okutandika okukola ku luguudo olwetaagibwa ennyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me cuku cwiny lwak ki coko lim, yub me gedo ma kibedo kakuru pi kare malac ni dong onongo twero. Lutic me gedo gu oo I kabedo ne me cako tic I kom gudu ma mite tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aicor itunga keda aituk ikapun, aponi kocamakinai epurojekt lo idarit noi. Apotu itunga lu aduko odolokisi aiboisit kanu ageun aswam erot lo ekotoi noi.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara ongulumu eyini e'yo nzezu azini robia trazu 'bori ma vutia, otita afa ayuzaru 'bani ebi te sa'wa ezu ri esu asizu driwala ra. Ba afa si'ba 'diyi eca angu 'da ma alea e'dozu azi ngazu nzila 'bani lele tu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okurwanirira abantu n'okushorooza esente, purogyekiti y'ebyombeko eyabaire etegyereirwe kumara obwire buraingwa, ekahikiirira yaikirizibwa. Abombeki bakahika aha mwanya kutandika kukora aha ruguuto orurikwetengwa munonga.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing concerns about traffic congestion and safety, the local government has decided to take action. To ensure the project meets community standards, the district officials will supervise and regulate road construction in the area.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku mugotteko gw'ebidduka n'obukuumi, gavumenti z'ebitundu zisazeewo okubaako kye zikola. Okukakasa nti pulojekiti etuukana n'omutindo gw'ekitundu, abakungu ba disitulikiti bajja kulondoola n'okulungamya omulimu gw'okuzimba enguudo mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom pong pa mutoka ki ber bedo, gamente me tedero omoko tamme me timo gin mo. Me neno ni yub eni ocobo miti pa lwak, lutic me district gubi doro tic me yubu gudi i kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naka amotokan keda ayuwara, abu apugan naka atutubet koseu aswam ngun. Kanu awanyun ebe itodolikinit epurojekt adoketait na itunga, epote eswamak luko disitrikt aimaniman ka aitikitik adukio na irotin katutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza tupi nzila dria omita ma dria azini ageitema ma dria, gamete angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'yezu ra. Otita 'da ni aa'zu ongulumu eyi ma eselea, azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi mu nzila eyi ma sita one angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebyaro eshaziremu kukora ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'omwijuzo gw'ebiiruka hamwe n'eby'okwerinda. Okureeba ngu purogyekiti ehikaana n'omutindo gw'abantu, abakungu ba disiturikiti nibaija kureebuuza n'okureeberera omurimo gw'okwombeka enguuto omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In a recent community meeting, residents expressed their concerns about the lack of progress in local initiatives. As a result, people pledged their support to the leaders in enhancing development.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'ekitundu olwaliwo gye buvuddeko, abatuuze baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe olw'obutaba na nkulaakulana mu nteekateeka z'ekitundu. N'ekyavaamu, abantu beeyama okuwa abakulembeze obuwagizi bwabwe mu kutumbula enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki, lutedero gunyutu lworo gi i kom peko me dongo lobo matye. Macalo adwogi ne, dano gu cike me miyo kony gi bot lutela me ilo malo rwom me dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka itunga, apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongosiokec kanu amamus na apol. Kanuka ngun, apotu itunga isumunoto agangat kec nejaas engarenok kanu aitopol apol.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo angu ezoma ni angu 'da ma alea ri ma alea kuye ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, o'bi eyi owi eyi atita fezu drice'ba eyini angu ezoma ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rw'ekyanga, abatuuragye bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'obutabaho ntunguuka omu nteekateeka z'ebyaro. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu bakaraganisa kushagika abebembezi omu kutunguura entunguuka.

eng_prompt: The recent drought has severely impacted local agriculture, leading to widespread crop failures. As a result, many families are struggling to secure basic necessities.
lug_prompt: Ekyeya ekibaddewo gyebuvuddeko kikosezza nnyo ebyobulimi mu ggwanga, ekiviiriddeko okulemererwa kw'ebirime. N'ekivuddemu, amaka mangi galwana okufuna ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Rweny pa ceng ma okato cokcok-ki okelo peko madit tutwal I kom pur me tedero, ma oweko cam odoko rac tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo.
teo_prompt: Abu akamu na ajai pac itolitol noi akoru na akoru na akwap, ido ayangau aibiror na iraan. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ikalia luipu ainingosit adumun iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Eli ebipi o'diru ri eza e'yo agirikica ni kari ma alia 'diyi ma dria saaru, erini fezu ori yini e'dezu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ra. E'yo 'disi, familia karakara eyi dri ci afa lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanda ekibaireho obwahati kihindwire munonga eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa, ekyarugiremu okugwa kw'ebihingirwe omu bantu baingi. N'ekyarugiremu, amaka maingi nigarwana kutunga ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising rates of malnutrition in vulnerable communities, officials have been exploring various strategies to address this pressing issue. After extensive research and consultations, the government has decided to take immediate action.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'endya embi mu bantu abateesobola, abakungu banoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okugonjoolamu ekizibu kino eky'amangu. Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'okwebuuza, gavumenti esazeewo okubaako ky'ekolawo mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa two neto i kabedo ma peko tye iye, lutic gubedo ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me lweny i kom peko man. Ingee kwed ki lok mapol, gamente omoko tamme me timo gin mo cut.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka adeka naka aligirir kotoma aiboisio nuetioko, eutasi eswamak aingic iwaitin luegelegela luka aitemokin ationis na. Akaulo naka aingic ka aingitun akiro, abu apugan koseu aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ma omgbo tupi ongulumu e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma alia, azi'ba eyi ebi geri ndundu eyi onda e'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu. E'yo vuti ondaza angiri 'diyi ma vutia azini e'yo oziza ma vutia, gamete asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'yezu indikindi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu endwara y'endya mbi eyeyongyeire omu bantu abatarikwebaasa, abakungu batwire nibaronda oburyo bw'okukora aha nshonga egi. Bwanyima y'okucondooza n'okwebuuza aha bantu, gavumenti eshaziremu kukora ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Malnutrition remains a critical issue in many parts of the world, leading to severe health consequences. As a result, people have been affected by diseases like marasmus.
lug_prompt: Endya embi ekyali kizibu kya maanyi mu bitundu by'ensi bingi, ekiviirako obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu byobulamu. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bakoseddwa endwadde nga marasmus.
ach_prompt: Two neto pud tye peko madit tutwal I but lobo mapat-pat ma kelo peko madit tutwal I kom yot-kom. Macalo adwogi ne, dano tye ka nongo peko me two macalo marasmus.
teo_prompt: Eringa adeka naka aligirir erai ationis naepol noi kotoma aiboisio nuipu nuka akwap, ido eyangauni atiokisio nuarokok nuka angaleu. Kanuka ngun, ejaas itunga keda adekasinei kwape nat eimidi.
lgg_prompt: Nyaka nyaza onzi ri nga po'di e'yo azi okporu ni wudrikuru ma kala karakara eyi ma alea, dika eri e'yo onzi eyi eji e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, azo ekile marasmus le 'diyi ebi 'ba eyi bii ra.
nyn_prompt: Okurya kubi kukiri ekizibu ky'amaani omu bicweka bingi eby'ensi, ekirikureetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani aha magara. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu bateganisiibwe endwara nka marasmus.

eng_prompt: Nutritionists emphasize the importance of maintaining good health through proper eating habits. As a result, many health organizations are promoting dietary guidelines.
lug_prompt: Abakugu mu by'endya bassa essira ku bukulu bw'okukuuma obulamu obulungi okuyita mu kulya obulungi. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'ebyobulamu bingi bitumbula ebiragiro by'endya.
ach_prompt: Ludiro ma kwedo lok kom cam giwaco ni pire tek me gwoko yot kom ki camo cam maber. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat me yot-kom tye ka cuku cwiny dano me lubu cik me cam.
teo_prompt: Ipirioitin lu enyamete ejok itogogongitos ajokis na aidar angaleu kowai lo ainyam ejok. Kanuka ngun, eutasi iriongeta luka angaleu aitopolor aicoreta nuka ainyam.
lgg_prompt: Ba onita be e'yo nyaka nyazani 'diyi ma dria 'diyi okpo fe orodri aa'zu rua ala be geri nyaka nyazu kililiru risi. E'yo 'disi, amuti karakara e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi azita nyaka nyaza ma dria 'diyi otu.
nyn_prompt: Abakugu omu by'endya nibaha amaani omugasho gw'okurinda amagara marungi kurabira omu kurya kurungi. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore by'ebyamagara ebingi biriyo nibishagika ebiragiro by'eby'okurya.

eng_prompt: In light of recent studies highlighting the importance of nutrition in childhood development, health experts have emphasized the role of a balanced diet. As a result, many organizations are launching campaigns to educate families about proper dietary choices.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakakolebwa okulaga obukulu bw'endya ennungi mu kukula kw'abaana, abakugu mu byobulamu bakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'endya ennungi. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole bingi bitongoza kampeyini okusomesa amaka ku kulonda okulungi kw'emmere.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kwed ma otime cokcok-ki ma nyutu ber pa cam i dongo pa lutino, ludiro me yot kom gucuko cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa cam matye ki moc cam weng. Macalo adwogi ne, dule mapol tye ka cako yub me pwonyo gangi i kom cam mabeco ma omyero gucam.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuka aisisiaeta nuitodunitos ajokis naka aijulanakineta nuka idwe, apotu ipiriotin luka angaleu kitogogongoto ajokis naka aijul eode. Kanuka ngun, eutasi iriongeta aisisianakin ikalia nuikamunitos ainyam najokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ecepi orodri nyaka nyaza ni anzi nyiri eyi ma zota ma alea ri ma dria, 'ba onita angiri be e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi 'ba asi orodri nyaka nyaza kililiru 'diyiniri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, amuti karakara eyi otita eyi e'do imbata fezu familia eyini nyaka eyini nya kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha kucondooza okwakozirwe obwahati okurikworeka omugasho gw'eby'endya omu kutunguuka kw'abaana, abakugu omu by'amagara, bahamize omugasho gw'eby'okurya ebirimu ebiriisa byona. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore bingi bitandikireho ehururu y'okwegyesa amaka ebikwatiraine n'eby'okurya ebihikire.

eng_prompt: In response to alarming health statistics, local officials have prioritized community wellness initiatives. One of their key objectives is to address the pressing issue of food insecurity among residents.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebibalo by'ebyobulamu ebitiisa, abakungu b'ebyalo bakulembezza enteekateeka z'ebyobulamu mu kitundu. Ekimu ku bigendererwa byabwe ebikulu kwe kukola ku nsonga y'obutaba na mmere mu batuuze.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me kwed ma kelo lworo i kom lok me yot kom, lutic me tedero guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom yub me gwoko kwo pa lwak. Tyen lok acel ma pire tek ma gitye kwede obedo me tyeko peko me can cam ikin lutedero.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin akiro nuikamunitos angaleu, apotu eswamak luka atutubet isingarenitos nuka aijar naka itunga. Adiopet kotoma apeleikinata kec erai aitemokin ationis naka amamus na inyamat kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe angiri e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ba e'yo ongulumu eyini aa'zu muke 'diyi okporu. Asisile yini okporu 'diyi ma azi eri e'yo ewaru nyaka ako ni 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebibaro by'eby'amagara ebirikutiinisa, abakungu b'ebyaro bateire omutwe omu by'amagara g'abantu. Kimwe aha bigyendererwa byabo ebikuru n'okukora aha nshonga y'eby'okurya omu batuuragye.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have highlighted significant nutritional deficiencies among the local population. As a result, many children are facing serious health challenges.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti abantu b'omu kitundu tebalina mmere emala. N'ekivuddemu, abaana bangi boolekaganye n'ebizibu by'obulamu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto peko me peko me cam ikin lutedero. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino mapol tye ka nongo peko me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit ebe ikidioko itunga lu enyamete ejok. Kanuka ngun, ejaas idwe luipu keda atiokisio nu angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo nyaka ako ni 'diyi ma omgbo angiri 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, anzi nyiri karakara eyi e'yo ewaru rua ala ni 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka oburemeezi bw'eby'endya omu bantu b'omubyaro. N'ekyarugiremu, abaana baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: Many new mothers face significant challenges in adjusting to their postpartum lives. As a result, their nutritional choices often suffer during this critical period.
lug_prompt: Bamaama abapya bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kumanyiira obulamu bwabwe oluvannyuma lw'okuzaala. N'ekivuddemu, okulonda okulya kwabwe kutera okukosebwa mu kaseera kano akazibu.
ach_prompt: Mege mapol matino nongo peko madit tutwal ikare me ngiyo ki kwo gi ikare me nywal. Macalo adwogi ne, cam ma gimito ipol kare nongo peko ikare me peko man.
teo_prompt: Angor nuipu itereikina keda ainingosia nuipu noi kotoma aijar kec akaulo naka aidoun. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aimusung inyamat lu enyamete kesi kapakio nu.
lgg_prompt: Ayia o'diru karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyini aa'ria eyi ma edri osita ma vutia ri ma alea. E'yo 'disi, nyaka eyini nya 'diyi dri ci sa'wa ewaru 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abazaire baingi abasya, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omumagara gaabo ga bwanyima y'okuzaara. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'okurya byabo nibibonabona omu bwire obu obw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent economic challenges and food security concerns, experts are recommending sustainable practices. As a result, communities are being encouraged to focus on local food production.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna okwaliwo gyebuvuddeko n'okweraliikirira kw'ebbula ly'emmere, abakugu bateesa ku nkola eziyimirizaawo. N'ekivuddemu, ebitundu bikubirizibwa okussa essira ku kulima emmere eya wano.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me can lim ma otimme cokcok-ki kacel ki peko me nok pa cam, ludiro tye ka cuku cwiny dano me tic ki yoo mapat-pat ma twero weko cam bedo tye. Macalo adwogi ne, kitye ka cuku cwiny lwak me keto cwiny gi i kom puru cam me tedero.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun keda aiyalongongo naka inyamat, icorete ipirioitin iponesio luajokak. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitai itunga aisingarenit akoru inyamat luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru robia esuzu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini e'yo nyaka ako ni 'diyi ma dria, 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi geri 'bani ecozu e'yo 'yezu ewu drialeri ma alea ra 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ai ongulumu eyi asi 'bazu nyaka kari 'di ma alea ogogo 'diyi ma ezoza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya obwahati hamwe n'eby'okurya ebitarikumara, abakugu nibahabura okukoresa emiringo erikugumaho. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu bariyo nibahigwa kuta amaani omu kuhinga eby'okurya.

eng_prompt: After extensive consultations with local health experts and community leaders, the proposal was finalized. The committee presented their findings to the officials, highlighting the urgent need for improved dietary guidelines.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwebuuza ennyo ku bakugu mu byobulamu n'abakulembeze b'ebitundu, ekiteeso kyamalirizibwa. Akakiiko kaayanjulira abakungu ebizuuliddwa, nga kalaga obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okulongoosa enkola y'endya.
ach_prompt: Ingee lok ki ludiro me yot kom ki lutela me tedero, kimoko tam ne. Dul ne gumiyo adwogi kwedgi bot lutic, kun giwaco ni omyero ki yub yoo me cam maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara keda ipirioitin luka angaleu keda engarenok luka atutubet, aponi kongetakinai aomisioit ngin. Abu ekomiti itetem nu adumutu kesi mama ejaasi eswamak, itodunit eipud loka ainapeta nuajokak nuka ainyam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza angiri 'ba nita be e'yo rua alanisi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie tualu drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie ri ma vutia, 'ba de egata 'da asizu. Komiti 'da e'da e'yo eyini esu 'diyi azi'ba 'da eyi dri eyini e'dazu e'yo 'bani lezu azita nyaka nyaza ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu mbeleru ri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okwebuuza aha bakugu omu by'amagara hamwe n'abebembezi b'ebyanga, ekiteiso kikahwaho. Akakiiko kakoreka abakuru ebi karikushanga, karikworeka ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okutunguura eby'okurya.

eng_prompt: In a troubling trend, many young students are finding themselves drawn into the world of betting and games of chance. As a result, some are prioritizing their gambling habits over their education.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri etabula, abayizi abato bangi beesanga nga basendebwasendebwa mu nsi y'okusiba ku mizannyo n'okuzannya emizannyo egy'omukisa. N'ekivuddemu, abamu bakulembeza emize gyabwe egy'okusiba ku mizannyo okusinga okusoma kwabwe.
ach_prompt: I yo marac tutwal, lutino kwan matino mapol gitye ka nongo gum me donyo I tuku agii. Macalo adwogi ne, jo mukene gitye ka tero timgi me tuku agii calo gin ma pire tek loyo kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ationis naepol noi, eutasi esisiak luipu alomar toma akwap naka epiki keda aboliasio nuka arereng. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ice aisingarenit epone loka abolia epiki adepar asioman kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi asi otizaru ni ma alia, sukulu anzi ode karakara eyi eyi esu eyi ma ngulupi jizu e'yo jeki 'beza ni azini avita drile suza ni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba azi 'diyi e'yo avita sendesi 'diyi 'du okporu aga onita yiniri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikuteganisa, abeegi bato baingi nibesherekyerera omu nsi y'okuzaana zaara n'emizaano y'omugisha. N'ekyarugiremu, abamwe nibebembeza emize yaabo y'okuzaana zaara kukira eby'obwegyese bwabo.

eng_prompt: Involving parents in the financial aspects of their children's education fosters a sense of responsibility and accountability. Additionally, direct payments can help ensure that families are fully aware of the costs associated with schooling.
lug_prompt: Abazadde okwenyigira mu nsonga z'ebyensimbi mu kusoma kw'abaana baabwe kireetawo obuvunaanyizibwa n'obuvunaanyizibwa. Okwongerako, okusasulwa butereevu kusobola okuyamba okukakasa nti amaka gamanyi bulungi ku bisale ebikwatagana n'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Bedo tye pa lunyodo I lok me lim I gang kwan pa lutino gi weko giwinyo ni gitye ki tic ki kor tic gi. Medo i kom meno, cul atir twero konyo me neno ni gangi gingeyo wel cente ma mite pi kwan.
teo_prompt: Aibwaikin auriak toma akiro nuka ikapun nuka asioman naka idwekec eyangauni apodokinit keda aitodunit nuiswamauna. Kilema, epedori aitac ikapun katipet aanyun ebe ejenete ikalia ikapun lu itwasamao kosomero.
lgg_prompt: Tipika eyi ma suza e'yo robia ni anzi eyivile 'diyi ma onita ma alea ri ma alea ri ni fe 'ba eyini aa'zu azi ngazu eyi ma dria. Azi dika, robia ofezu kililiru ri eco fe ra kini familia eyi ni aje onita ni 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Abazaire okwejumba omu by'esente by'okwegyesa abaana baabo, nikitunguura enshonga y'obujunaanizibwa n'embaririra. Okwongyera ahari ekyo, okushashura butunu nikuhwera okureeba ngu amaka gamanya ebishare ebirikukwata aha kwega.

eng_prompt: When families receive financial assistance for education, it often alleviates the burden of school expenses. As a result, children can focus on their studies without the worry of tuition costs.
lug_prompt: Amaka bwe gafuna obuyambi bw'ensimbi mu kusoma, kitera okukendeeza ku buzito bw'ebisale by'essomero. N'ekivuddemu, abaana basobola okussa essira ku kusoma kwabwe nga tebeeraliikirira bisale bya kusoma.
ach_prompt: Ka gangi gunongo kony me cente pi kwan, man dwoko piny wel cul me cukul. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino twero keto cwinygi i kom kwan gi labongo lworo pi cul kwan.
teo_prompt: Arai edumununete ikalia agangat na ikapun kanu asioman, itidisiarete kesi ikapun lu esomero. Kanuka ngun epedorete idwe apodokinit asioman kec komam epodokinit ikapun luka esomero.
lgg_prompt: Familia ka atita robia niri esu onita ma dria, eri tutuni e'yo sukulu fizi niri ma omgbo esi. E'yo 'disi, anzi nyiri eyi eco asi 'ba onita eyivile 'diyi ma dria asi otiza kokoru robia sukulu lazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Amaka ku garikutunga obuhwezi bw'esente z'okwegyesa, nikikendeeza aha buremeezi bw'okushashura ebishare by'eishomero. N'ekyarugiremu, abaana nibabaasa kuta amaani aha mishomo yaabo bataine kwerarikirira ebishare by'eishomero.

eng_prompt: Many students face financial pressures and are struggling to cover their educational expenses. In search of quick cash, some have turned to risky alternatives like sports betting.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi boolekaganye n'okunyigirizibwa mu by'ensimbi era balwana okusasula ebisale by'okusoma kwabwe. Mu kunoonya ssente enkalu ez'amangu, abamu baddukidde mu ngeri endala ez'obulabe ng'okusiba ku mizannyo.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol tye ki peko me lim dok gitye ka tute matek me culu pi kwan gi. Pi yenyo cente oyot oyot, jo mukene gucako tic ki yoo mukene macalo betting.
teo_prompt: Etereikina esisiak luipu keda atiokisio nuka ikapun ido eutasi kesi aimo ikapun luka asioman kec. Kanu aimo ikapun katipet, apotu ice olototo aiboisio nuetioko kwape nat epiki loka emopira.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu dika eyi dri ci robia eyini ayu sukulu'a ri ofezu. Robia ndazu mbeleru, 'ba azi 'diyi oja yi geri e'yo onzi 'yepi avita eyi ma dria 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'esente kandi nibarwana kushashurira ebishare byabo by'okwega. Ahabw'okuronda esente z'ahonaaho, abamwe batandikire kukoresa emiringo y'akabi nk'okuzaana zaara y'eby'emizaano.

eng_prompt: Many families are struggling financially, leading some students to seek quick ways to make money. Unfortunately, this has resulted in a rise in gambling among teenagers, often with devastating consequences.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi galwanagana mu by'ensimbi, ekireetera abayizi abamu okunoonya engeri ez'amangu ez'okufunamu ssente. Eky'omukisa omubi, kino kivuddeko okweyongera mu zzaala mu bavubuka, ebiseera ebisinga n'ebivaamu eby'obulabe.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol tye ki peko me lim ma oweko lutino mukene tye ka yenyo yoo me nongo cente oyot-oyot. Ki gum marac, man okelo medde pa tuku agii ikin bulu, ma pol kare kelo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi ikalia luipu keda ationis na ikapun, ido ijaikini esisiak ice amoun iwaitin lu iswamaere ikapun katipet. Nukaiturur, eyangaunit ngin aiyatakinio naka epiki kanejaas atumunak, duc keda atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi dri ci e'yo robia nirisi, e'yo 'di fe sukulu anzi azi eyini geri mbeleru robia esuzu 'diyi ndazu. Drile onziru, e'yo 'di fe e'yo avita sendesi 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu anzi zopi zozo 'diyi ma eselea, e'yo onzi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi gaine oburemeezi bw'esente, ekirikureetera abeegi abamwe kuronda oburyo bw'okukora esente ahonaaho. Eky'obusaasi, eki kireesireho okweyongyera kw'okuzaana zaara omu minyeeto, ekirikureetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: As the school year progressed, many families faced challenges that led to increased absenteeism. By the time the third term began, it became evident that student attendance had significantly dwindled.
lug_prompt: Ng'omwaka gw'essomero gugenda mu maaso, amaka mangi gaayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okwaviirako okweyongerayongera kw'obutasoma. Taamu ey'okusatu we yatandikira, kyalabika nti abayizi baali bakendedde nnyo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma mwaka me kwan tye ka mede anyim, gangi mapol gunongo peko ma oweko lutino gubedo ka keng kwan. Ikare ma tem me adek ocake, nen atyer kamaleng ni wel lutino ma obedo tye I gang kwan ojwik tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neautar ekaru loka esomero alosit, apotu ikalia luipu kodumutu atiokisio nuapotu koyangautu asioman naepol noi. Kapak na ageunor atamu na iuniet, aponi kojenunai ebe ekidiokoto esisiak noi.
lgg_prompt: Eli sukulu niri ni mu drile, familia karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru eyini ani sukulu ku ri ma omgbo ra. Sawa tamu nasi ni e'doria, eri eca e'dazaru kini sukulu anzi eyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese ku gwagumire nigugyenda omu maisho, amaka maingi gakashanga oburemeezi obwareteire abaana kweyongyera okuruga omu mashomero. Taamu ya kashatu ku yaatandikire, kikarebeka butunu ngu abeegi bakakyendeera munonga.

eng_prompt: As the popularity of online gambling continues to rise, concerns about its impact on public health and safety have become increasingly prominent. Many citizens are calling for greater oversight to protect vulnerable individuals from potential exploitation.
lug_prompt: Ng'ettutumu ly'okuzannya zzaala ku mutimbagano lyeyongera, okweraliikirira ku ngeri gye kikosaamu obulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu kweyongedde. Bannansi bangi basaba wabeewo okulondoola okw'amaanyi okukuuma abantu abateesobola okuva ku kukozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Kit ma yweka me tuku agii iwi yamo tye kamede kwede, lworo I kom adwogi ne I kom yotkom ki ber bedo pa lwak tye kamede. Anywali mapol tye ka lego ni myero kibed ki wang mabit i kom tic me gwoko dano ma goro ki i kom tim me nywaro tic ki dano.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor ajenara naka epiki loka elago, eyatakinos aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos epone loepedoria ngesi aitolitol angaleu keda ayuwara naka itunga. Ekotosi itunga luipu aanyanario naepol kanu ayuarite itunga lumam epedoritos aitwasam ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo avita sendesi oli aliasiri ma omgbo ni tuzurisi, asi otiza e'yo erini 'ye o'bi yi ma rua ala azini ageitema ma dria ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu uru. Kari anzi karakara eyi le 'ba ma one e'yo 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma tambazu e'yo 'bani ecozu eyi ayuzuri vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Okumanywa kw'okuzaana zaara aha mitimbagano nikweyongyera, okwerarikirira okurikukwata aha magara g'abantu n'okwerinda kweyongyeire. Abatuuragye baingi nibashaba ngu habeho okurebereera kw'amaani, okurinda abantu abatarikwebaasa, okurekyeraaho kukozesibwa kubi.

eng_prompt: Despite widespread awareness of the legal age for gambling, many establishments continue to allow minors to participate. This lack of compliance raises concerns about the effectiveness of age restrictions in protecting young individuals.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde abantu bangi bamanyi emyaka abantu mwe balina okuzannyira zzaala, ebifo bingi bikyakkiriza abaana abatanetuuka okuzannya. Obutakolera ku mateeka gano kireetawo okweraliikirira ku bukugu bw'okukugira emyaka mu kukuuma abantu abato.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dano mapol tye ki ngec i kom mwaka me tuku agii, odi tuku mapol pud tye ka yee lutino matino me tuku agii. Pe lubu cik eni kelo lworo I kom tic pa kigeng me mwaka I gwoko dano matino.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejenete itunga luipu nuikamunitos ikaru lu ekisil lu epedorere abolia epiki, inyikokinitos aiboisio nuipu acamakin idwe lumam edolitos alomar toma. Amamus na aitup ikisila eyangauni aiyalongong kanuikamunitos aitikitik ikaru lu itunga lu edisiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba karakara eyi ma mile ozizu eli azita palaa ri ma dria ra ti, angu karakara eyi fe drile anzi eli capiku 'diyi dri fizu avita 'da ma alea ra. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma vuti obizu ku ri ni asi otiza eji e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eli atrizu 'diyi ma okpo 'bazu 'ba ode eyi ma ta mbazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okumanyisibwa kw'emyaka y'okuzaana zaara, ebitongore ebingi nibikiriza abaana bato kwejumbiramu. Okuremwa kukuratira ebiragiro, nikireetaho okwerarikirira aha bukoryo bw'okukyendeeza emyaka omu kurinda eminyeeto.

eng_prompt: The rise of online gambling platforms has made betting more accessible to young people. As a result, many children are drawn into risky behaviors to fund their gambling habits.
lug_prompt: Okweyongerayongera kw'emikutu gy'oku zzaala ku mutimbagano kifudde okuzannya zzaala okwangu eri abavubuka. N'ekivuddemu, abaana bangi beenyigira mu bikolwa eby'obulabe okusobola okusasula emize gyabwe egy'okusiba ku mizannyo.
ach_prompt: Dongo pa kabedo me tuku agii iwi yamo (internet) oweko tuku agii obedo yot tutwal ki bulu. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino mapol donyo I tim maraco me nongo cente me cako tuku agii.
teo_prompt: Apol naka aiboisio nuka epiki kolago einakinit atumunak adumunun epiki. Kanuka ngun, idwe luipu elomanarete toma aswamisio nuarokok kanu adumun ikapun luka epiki.
lgg_prompt: Angu avita sendesi oli aliasi 'diyi ma e'dota fe 'ba ode eyini avita sendesi 'diyi esu ewakokoru. E'yo 'disi, anzi nyiri karakara eyi e'yo onzi 'ye robia esuzu eyi ma adriza avita sendesi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'emikutu y'okuzaana zaara aha mitimbagano, kireesire okuzaana zaara kweyongyera kuhika aha minyeeto. N'ekyarugiremu, abaana baingi nibejumba omu micwe y'akabi, kugira ngu babaase kushashurira emize yaabo y'okuzaana zaara.

eng_prompt: With the rise of online gambling and its accessibility to young people, many experts are concerned about the potential risks involved. It is crucial for parents to take a proactive stance in protecting their children from harmful behaviors.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweyongera kw'okuzannya zzaala ku mutimbagano n'okufunibwa kw'abavubuka, abakugu bangi beeraliikirivu ku kabi akayinza okubaawo. Kya mugaso nnyo abazadde okubaako kye bakolawo okukuuma abaana baabwe okuva ku nneeyisa ey'obulabe.
ach_prompt: Ki medde pa tuku agii iwi yamo pa munu ki nongo gi bot bulu, ludiro mapol tye ki lworo I kom peko ma twero bedo tye. Pire tek tutwal ki lunyodo me gwoko lutinogi ki i kom tim maraco.
teo_prompt: Keda eyatakinet naka epiki loka elago keda epatana adolokin atumunak, epodokitos ipiriotin luipu atiokisio nuepedorete alomun. Erai ibore yenepol noi auriak ayuarite idwe kec kama ejaasi iponesio luarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo avita sendesi oli aliasi 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu azini geri 'ba ode eyini eyi esuzu ri si, 'ba onita angiri be 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo ewaru ecopi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria. Eri orodriru tipika eyini pa sozu okporu eyi ma anzi eyi ma ta mbazu adriza onzi 'diyi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okuzaana zaara aha mikutu hamwe n'okushangwa kw'eminyeeto, abakugu baingi niberarikirira akabi akarikubaasa kubaho. N'eky'omugasho munonga abazaire kukora kyona ekirikubaasika okurinda abaana baabo okwetantara emichwe mibi.

eng_prompt: Many people believe that gambling can be a lucrative venture if approached strategically. Despite the risks involved, some individuals are convinced that they can turn their luck into a steady revenue stream.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi balowooza nti okuzannya zzaala kusobola okuleeta ssente nnyingi singa kukolebwa mu ngeri ey'amagezi. Newankubadde waliwo obuzibu, abantu abamu bakakasa nti basobola okufuula omukisa gwabwe ensibuko y'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni betting twero bedo biacara ma kelo cente madwong kace kitiyo kwede maber. Kadi bed ni peko tye, dano mukene gitye ki gen ni gitwero loko gumgi me doko yoo me nongo cente.
teo_prompt: Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe epedori epiki adumun ikapun luipu arai iswamao ejok. Karaida ejaas atiokisio, eomitos icetunga ebe epedorete kesi aijulakin arerengukec araun epone loka adumun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini avita jeki 'beza niri eco adri tujari azi orodriru ni i 'ba ka eri 'ye geri kililiru si ria. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba azi 'diyi asi'baza be kini yi eco yi ma drileba oja geri robia esuzu ri ru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibaikiriza ngu okuzaana zaara nikubaasa kuba omurimo ogurikutunguura munonga waaba nookora kurungi. Oihireho oburemeezi oburiho, abantu abamwe baine obuhame ngu nibabaasa kuhindura omugisha gwabo okuba oburugo bw'esente.

eng_prompt: Many people believe that success in gambling is purely a matter of chance. However, some gamblers argue that skill and strategy play a significant role in determining who profits.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi balowooza nti obuwanguzi mu zzaala nsonga ya mukisa. Newankubadde, abazannyi ba zzaala abamu bagamba nti obukugu n'obukodyo bikola omulimu munene mu kusalawo ani alina amagoba.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni loyo tuku agii obedo gin me gum keken. Kadi bed kumeno, lutuk agii mukene giwaco ni diro ki diro konyo tutwal I moko anga ma nongo magoba.
teo_prompt: Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe akerianut kotoma abolia epiki erai ibore yen arerengu. Konye, ebakasi aboliak luka epiki ice ebe acoa keda acoasinei kes iswamaete ibore yenepol noi kotoma ajenun itunganan yenepedori aimedaun.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi ega kini drile suza avita jeki 'beza niri ma alea ri lu e'yo drilebaru ni. Kani si, 'ba avita jeki 'bepi 'diyi ma azi eyi 'yo kini ondua azini otuta eyi azi okporu nga 'ba orodri esupi 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibateekateeka ngu obusinguzi omu zaara n'enshonga y'omugisha. Kwonka, abazaani ba zaara abamwe nibagira ngu emyoga n'obukodyo nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kumanya orikugasirwa.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about addiction and crime, local officials held a series of community meetings to discuss the impact of gambling. After gathering input from residents and stakeholders, the district passed a bye-law to ban gambling activities in the area.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okulinnya ku mize n'obuzzi bw'emisango, abakungu b'ebyalo baatuuza enkiiko z'ekitundu okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku buzibu obuli mu kuzannya zzaala. Oluvannyuma lw'okukungaanya ebirowoozo okuva mu batuuze n'abakwatibwako, disitulikiti yayisa etteeka okuwera emirimu gy'okusiba ku mizannyo mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamede I kom tic ki tim aranyi, lutic me tedero gubedo ki kacoke mapol me nywako tam I kom adwoki pa tuku agii. Ingee nongo tam kibot lwak ki joo ma lok tye I komgi, district okatti ki cik me juku tic me tuku agii I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naepol noi naikamunit aimat keda abilibilio naka ikisila, apotu eswamak luka atutubet iriamunos keda itunga kanu aitemitem atiokisio nuka epiki. Akaulo naka atukun aomisio kanejaas itunga keda itunga, abu edisitrikt itutub ekisil loka aimik abolia epiki katutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo ni tuzu e'yo 'bani e'yo onzi 'yezu ri ma dria, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye mitingi ongulumu eyi ma alea karakara eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo avita sendesi 'diyiniri ma dria. E'yo trazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu tualu 'ba ambo eyi pie 'bori ma vutia, distrikiti ofu azita e'yo avita sendesi 'diyi atrizu angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'obukozi bw'ebibi, abakungu b'ebyaro bakakora enkiiko z'abantu okuhanuura aha kabi akarikuruga omu zaara. Ahanyima y'okurundaana ebiteiso kuruga omu batuuragye hamwe n'abu kirikukwataho, disiturikiti ekataho ekiragiro ky'okuzibira zaara omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In light of recent assessments showing a decline in student achievement, it is crucial for educational leaders to take immediate action. By addressing the underlying issues, district officials can enhance the overall learning environment.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakakolebwa okulaga okukendeera kw'ensoma y'abayizi, kikulu nnyo abakulembeze b'ebyenjigiriza okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu. Abakungu ba disitulikiti basobola okutumbula embeera y'okusoma okutwalira awamu nga bakola ku nsonga ezisookerwako.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kwed ma otimme cokcok-ki ma nyutu ni rwom me kwan pa lutino tye ka dwogo piny, pire tek tutwal ki lutela me gangi kwan me timo gin mo oyot-oyot. I yoo me tyeko peko matye, lutic me district twero ilo malo rwom me kwan.
teo_prompt: Katupitos akiro nuitodunitos ebe ekidiokoto eswamae loka esisiak, ejokuna noi engarenok lu asioman aswam katipet. Kowai lo aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok, epedorete eswamak luko disitrikt aitojokar ejautene loka asioman.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru e'dapi sukulu anzi eyi ma agata ma omgbo esizu ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru drice'ba onita ni 'diyi ma 'ye e'yo indikindi. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu risi, azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi eco angu onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okucondooza okurikukorwa obwahati okurikworeka okukyendeera kw'emishomo y'abeegi, nikikuru abeebembezi b'eby'obwegyese kukora ahonaaho. Abakozi ba disiturikiti nibabaasa kutunguura eby'obwegyese obwo barikukora aha nshonga ezi.

eng_prompt: Many families are struggling to make ends meet due to rising living costs and stagnant wages. As a result, educational resources and support are often sacrificed in favor of basic necessities.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi galwana okweyimirizaawo olw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya n'emisaala okuyimirira. N'ekivuddemu, ebyetaago by'ebyenjigiriza n'obuyambi bitera okusuulibwa mu kifo ky'ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol tye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo ki mucara ma tye ka medde. Macalo adwogi ne, jami me kwan ki kony ipol kare ki camo jami ma mite pi kwo.
teo_prompt: Eutasi ikalia luipu aitelekaar aijar naarai eyatakinos itiaisinei luka aijar keda eropit. Kanuka ngun, iboro lu asioman keda agangat duc eyangaritai kanuka iboro luipudasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi dri ci afa esuzu e'yo aje 'bani aa'zu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu azini musara eyi ma omgbo esizu ri ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo onita ni azini atita feza ni 'diyi owi afa 'bani lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi nigateganisibwa okubaho ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu eyeyongyeire hamwe n'emishaara etarikuhinduka. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'obwegyese n'obuhwezi nibitwarwa nk'ekintu kikuru munonga.

eng_prompt: Despite their efforts to study and prepare, many students struggled to grasp the material covered in class. As a result, their performance in the mock examinations reflected their difficulties.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baakola kyonna ekisoboka okusoma n'okwetegeka, abayizi bangi baalemererwa okutegeera ebintu ebyayigirizibwa mu kibiina. N'ekyavaamu, bye baakola mu bigezo bya mooka byalaga ebizibu byabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni guketo tek me kwan ki yubbe, lutino mapol onongo tek tutwal me niang jami ma ki pwonyo i ot kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, kit ma gutimo kwede peny me mock onyuto peko magitye kwede.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamaete kesi kagogong noi aisisia ka aitemonokin, apotu esisiak luipu kongetakisi amisiikin akiro nu isisiao atukot. Kanuka ngun abu eswamae kec kotoma aingito naka mock itodunit atiokisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma okpo sukulu lazu azini yi otuzu ra ti, sukulu anzi karakara eyi esu ewaru e'yo 'bani oni kilasia 'diyi vazu. E'yo 'disi, eyi ma agata obeta mock ru 'diyi ma alea ri ece e'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani gaabo g'okushoma n'okweteekateekyera, abeegi baingi bakabonabonesibwa kwetegyereza eby'okwega omu kibiina. N'ekyarugiremu, enkora yaabo omu bigyezo bya mooka ekyoreka oburemeezi bwabo.

eng_prompt: In light of the upcoming examinations, the district education officer held a meeting with students and parents to discuss the importance of preparation. He emphasized the need for dedication and hard work to achieve academic success.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebigezo ebijja, akulira ebyenjigiriza mu disitulikiti yatuuzizza olukiiko n'abayizi n'abazadde okuteesa ku bukulu bw'okwetegekera. Yakikkaatirizza obwetaavu bw'okwewaayo n'okukola ennyo okusobola okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu by'ensoma.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peny matye kabino anyim, ladit ma loyo lok kom kwan I district obedo ki kacoke ki lutino kwan ki lunyodo me nywako lok I kom ber pa yubbe. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom miti me keto cwiny ki tic matek me cobo miti ne I gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aingito na ebunit, abu lo epolokit nuka asioman kodisitrikt iriamunos keda esisiak keda auriak kanu aitemitem ajokis naka aitemonokin. Abu ngesi kitogogong eipud loka ainakina keda aswam kagogong kanu aitodolikin akerianut kotoma asioman.
lgg_prompt: Obeta emupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba onita ni distrikiti'a ri 'ye mitingi sukulu anzi eyi pie azini tipika eyi pie agbatara gbazu orodri otuta niri ma dria. Eri 'ba asi e'yo lezu asi feza azini azi ngaza okporu ma dria drile suza onita ma alia ri isuzu.
