nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebigyezo ebirikwija kubaho, orikukurira eby'obwegyese omu disiturikiti, akakora orukiiko n'abeegi hamwe n'abazaire, okuhanuura aha mugasho gw'okweteekateekyera. Akashoboorora ekyetengo ky'okwehayo n'okukora n'amaani okutunga obusinguzi omu mishomo.

eng_prompt: Despite their rigorous study schedule and countless hours spent preparing, Moyo and Obongi faced significant challenges during the mock examinations. Their efforts did not yield the results they had hoped for, leading to a disappointing outcome.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baali bayiga nnyo era nga bamala essaawa nnyingi nga beetegekera, Moyo ne Obongi baayolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu bigezo bya mooka. Kaweefube waabwe teyavaamu bye baali basuubira, ekyaviirako okuggwaamu essuubi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gukwano matek dok gutiyo ki cawa malac me yubbe, Moyo gin ki Obongi gunongo peko mapol I kare me timo peny me mock. Tute gi pe okelo adwogi ma gubedo ki gen I iye, ma okelo turcwiny.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda ainapeta nuelangir noi nuka aisisia keda isawan luipu luetapit kesi aitemonokin, apotu Moyo keda Obongi kodumutu atiokisio nuipu kapak naka aingito naka mock. Mam aswam kec abu koyangau akiro nu aomitos kesi, ido abu koyangau aitolitol.
lgg_prompt: Otita yini onita onizu okporu azini sawa yini 'diyi ma alia otuta 'yezu 'diyi ma talasi, Moyo piyi Obongi be fu dri e'yo ewaru 'diyi be sawa obeta mock ni 'diyi ma alia ra. Okpo eyini 'ba ri awini e'yo eyini egale 'diyi eji ku, e'yo eyini esu 'diyi asi nyoza eji.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho enteekateeka yaabo y'okwega n'eshaaha nyingi nz'okweteekateekyera, Moyo na Obongi bakashanga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu bigyezo bya mooka. Amaani gaabo tigarareesire ebirugiremu nk'oku babaire nibateekateeka, ekyarugiremu okuhwa amaani.

eng_prompt: Many students struggle to grasp the nuances of exam questions, leading to confusion and misinterpretation. This difficulty is often exacerbated by their limited proficiency in English.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi bazibuwalirwa okutegeera ebibuuzo by'ebigezo, ekiviirako okutabulwa n'okutaputa obubi. Obuzibu buno bweyongera olw'obumanyirivu bwabwe obutono mu Lungereza.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol nongo peko me niang lapeny matye I peny, man kelo anywena-nywena ki niang marac. Peko man mede tutwal pien ni pe gitye ki ngec muromo I leb munu.
teo_prompt: Etionikinitos esisiak luipu amisiikin aingiseta nuka aingito, ido eyangauni aitolitol. Etiono noi ationis na naarai mam kesi ejenete amusugun ejok.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi dri ci e'yo obeta eyi ma alea 'diyi vazu, e'yo 'di fe eyini e'yo eyi ma aza kozu azini eyi ma ti vazu geri onzi si. E'yo ewaru 'diri ma omgbo ni tu ra e'yo eyini munduti nzezu kililiru kuri ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi nibarwana kwetegyereza ebibuuzo by'ebigyezo, ekirikubareetera okubuzabuzibwa n'okutahurirwa kubi. Oburemeezi obu buriijo nibweyongyera ahabw'okugira ngu tibarikumanya gye orungyereza.

eng_prompt: As the academic year progresses, it becomes increasingly important for educators to focus on effective teaching strategies. By fostering a deep understanding of the subject matter, teachers can help students feel more prepared and confident.
lug_prompt: Ng'omwaka gw'ebyensoma gugenda mu maaso, kyeyongera okuba eky'omugaso eri abasomesa okussa essira ku nkola z'okusomesa ennungi. Abasomesa basobola okuyamba abayizi okuwulira nga beetegefu n'obwesige nga babayamba okutegeera obulungi essomo.
ach_prompt: Ka mwaka me kwan woto anyim, pire bedo tek tutwal ki lupwonye me keto cwinygi I kom yoo me pwonyo maber. Ki pwonyo lutino me niang matut i kom gin ma gitye ka pwonyo, lupwonye twero konyo lutino me bedo ma guyubbe dok ki tek cwiny.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi ekaru lo aisisia, epol ajokis noi kanu isisianakinak apodokinit iponesio luajokak luka aisisianakin. Kowai lo aisisianakin esisiak amisiikin akiro, epedorete isisianakinak aingarakin esisiak apodokinit ka amunokina.
lgg_prompt: Eli onitaniri ni muzu drile, eri eca curu'do orodriru imba'ba eyini asi 'bazu geri imbatani kililiru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo onita ni 'diyi ma vata ma omgbo otuza si, imba'ba eyi sukulu anzi eyi ma aza ko eyini aa'zu ngonde azini asi'baza be.
nyn_prompt: Omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese ku gurikugyenda omu maisho, nikyeyongyera kuba eky'omugasho abegyesa kuta amaani aha nkora nungi y'okwegyesa. Abeegyesa nibahwera abeegi kwetebekanisa kurabira omukubareetera kwetegyereza gye amashomo agu barikwegyesa.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a noticeable disparity in academic performance between genders in various testing environments. In particular, the results of the latest mock examinations have sparked discussions about the underlying factors contributing to this trend.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga enjawulo mu nsoma y'ekikula ky'abantu mu bifo eby'enjawulo. Okusingira ddala, ebyava mu bigezo bya mock ebisembyeyo bireeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga eziviirako omuze guno.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I timo peny ikin mon ki coo I kabedo mapat-pat me timo pim. Ki lok ada, adwogi peny me mock ma okato ni okelo laro lok I kom jami ma okelo tim man.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos aisisiaeta nuitetiak atiaketait naepol noi naka eswamae loka ikiliok keda angor kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela nuka aingito. Kacut, akiro nuelomunitos kotoma aingito naka mock eyaunitos ipegeta nuikamunitos akiro nuepedorete ayangaun aswamisioit ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo esele coza onita ma alia agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie angu obita ni ndundu 'diyi ma alea ri ra. Tutunisi, agata obeta o'diru mock ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi fe agbatara e'yo 'bani e'yo 'di 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka entaaniso omu kukora kw'abashaija n'abakazi omu bigyezo bitari bimwe na bimwe. Okukira munonga, ebyarugire omu bigyezo bya mooka ebyahwireho, bireesireho okuhanuura aha nshonga ezirikureetaho enkora egi.

eng_prompt: Many educators are feeling disheartened and undervalued in their profession. As a result, their motivation and attention in the classroom have significantly diminished.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bangi bawulira nga baweddemu amaanyi era nga tebasiimibwa mu mulimu gwabwe. N'ekivuddemu, okusikiriza kwabwe n'okussaayo omwoyo mu kibiina bikendedde nnyo.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol cwiny gi otur dok giwinyo calo tic gi konye pe. Macalo adwogi ne, miti gi ki keto cwiny gi I gang kwan ojwik tutwal.
teo_prompt: Isisianakinak luipu epupete ican ido mam ejenete ajokis na aswam kec. Kanuka ngun, ekidiokoto noi aisinyikokinit kec keda apodokinit kec kotoma atukot.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi asi ako be dika eyi ega kini eyi ma azi 'duni orodri ku. E'yo 'disi, ava feza yini azini asi feza yini kilasia ri esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa baingi nibahurira bagwire amaani kandi batiine mugasho omu mirimo yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, okushemererwa kwabo n'okufayo kwabo omu kibiina bikyendeire munonga.

eng_prompt: Despite the school's efforts to improve the curriculum, many students struggled to grasp the fundamentals of the language. As a result, the overall performance in the subject was disappointing.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde essomero lyafuba okulongoosa ensoma, abayizi bangi baalwana okutegeera omusingi gw'olulimi. N'ekyavaamu, okukola kwonna mu ssomo kwali kumalamu maanyi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gang kwan ne otute matek me yubu yub me pwonye, lutino mapol onongo tek tutwal me niang pwony ma pigi tego me leb eni. Macalo adwogi ne, rwom me timo peny ne pe obedo ber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu isomeroi iswamata kagogongu kanu aitojokar ainapeta nuka aisisia, apotu esisiak luipu kongetakisi amisiikin akiro nuka angajep. Kanuka ngun, mam esisiak apotu iswamata ejok.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu 'da ni tro okpo 'ba otita onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ra ti, sukulu anzi karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru ti 'da ma vuti onizu. E'yo 'disi, 'yeta dria e'yo 'da ma alea ri ndra asi nyoza ru.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani g'eishomero okutunguura engyenderwaho y'okwegyesa, abeegi baingi bakarwana kwetegyereza enshonga z'orurimi. N'ekyarugiremu, enkora y'ekigyezo ekaba etarikureebeka gye.

eng_prompt: Higher education plays a crucial role in preparing students for the workforce. By focusing on both theoretical knowledge and hands-on experience, these institutions foster a well-rounded education.
lug_prompt: Okusoma okw'oku ntikko kukola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kuteekateeka abayizi okukola. Mu kussa essira ku kumanya n'obumanyirivu, amatendekero gano gatumbula ebyenjigiriza byonna.
ach_prompt: Kwan me rwom ma malo konyo totwal me yubu lutino kwan pi tic. Ki keto cwinygi I kom ngec ki ngec ma dano tye kwede, gangi kwan magi konyo me dongo rwom me kwan maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Asioman na okwap erai naepol noi kanu aitemonokin esisiak kanu aswam. Kowai lo aisingarenit acoa na aomisio keda acoa naka akanin, isinyikokitos isomeroi lu asioman naejok.
lgg_prompt: Onita uruleru ri ni azi okporu nga sukulu anzi eyi otuzu azi ngazu. E'yo 'bani asi 'bazu e'yo onitani 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo 'bani 'ye drisi 'diyi pie, pari onita ni 'diyi onita kililiru 'diyi ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Obwegyese bw'ahaiguru nibukora omurimo muhango omu kutebeekanisa abeegi kukora. Amashomero aga nigareetaho obwegyese burungi, ahabw'okugira ngu nigareetaho obwegyese oburikukwata aha bigyendererwa hamwe n'obwegyese oburikukwata aha mikono.

eng_prompt: Many educators have observed a troubling trend in academic performance among students. This decline can often be traced back to inadequate preparation during their early years of schooling.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bangi balabye enkyukakyuka mu nsoma y'abayizi. Okukendeera kuno kutera kuva ku kwetegekera okutono mu myaka gyabwe egy'essomero egy'obuto.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol guneno kit ma lutino tye katimo peny maber kwede. Rweny pa rwom me kwan man pol kare tye macalo adwogi me pe yubbe maber ikare ma pud gitino.
teo_prompt: Apotu isisianakinak luipu owanyutu epone loetiono noi loka eswamae loajokan loka esisiak. Epedorio aitodun aibiror na naarai mam kesi itemonokino ejok kotoma apakio nu isomeroi.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi ndre e'yo asi otiza fepi sukulu anzi eyini agazu sukulu'a ri ra. ꞋBani eꞌyo ꞌdi ꞌyezu ku ꞌdiyi eꞌyo ꞌbani yi otuzu kililiru ku ꞌdiyi ma eꞌyosi.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa baingi bareebire omuringo ogurikuteganisa omu kukora kw'abeegi omu mashomero. Okukyerererwa oku nikureetwa okwetebekanisa kubi omu myaka yaabo y'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing awareness among families about the long-term benefits of academic achievement. As a result, many are prioritizing their children's learning experiences and opportunities.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okumanyisa mu maka ku miganyulo egy'ekiseera ekiwanvu egy'okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu by'ensoma. N'ekivuddemu, bangi bakulembeza eby'enjigiriza by'abaana baabwe n'emikisa.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, ngec tye ka mede ikin gangi i kom ber pa kato peny pi kare malac. Macalo adwogi ne, pol pa lutino gi tye kaketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom kwan pa lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aijen naepol noi kama ejaasi ikalia nuikamunitos ajokis na apak naepol naka aitodolikin asioman. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga luipu aisingarenit aisisia naka idwekec keda arerengesio.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, mile oziza familia eyi ma eselea e'yo orodri sa'wa ezu 'bani agazu sukulu'a 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi anzi eyivile 'diyini e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma dria tualu drileba eyini esu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, amaka geyongyeire kumanya emigasho y'obwegyese erikumara obwire buraingwa. N'ekyarugiremu, baingi nibakuza eby'emishomo n'emigisha y'abaana baabo.

eng_prompt: Recent environmental changes have led to the proliferation of coral reefs in the River Nile. As a result, local fishermen have found it increasingly difficult to navigate and fish in these areas.
lug_prompt: Enkyukakyuka mu butonde bw'ensi gye buvuddeko ziviiriddeko okweyongera kw'amayinja ga koraali mu mugga Kiyira. N'ekivuddemu, abavubi b'omu kitundu bakisanze nga kizibu okutambulira mu mazzi n'okuvuba mu bitundu bino.
ach_prompt: Alokaloka ma otimme cokcok-ki I kabedo ma orumuwa okelo nya pa got matino tino I nam River Nile. Macalo adwogi ne, lumak rec me tedero gunongo tek tutwal me ngwec ki mako rec I kabedo magi.
teo_prompt: Aijulanakineta nuka ejautene lo akwap eyau aiyatakin aiboisio nuipu noi kotoma ocilet loka Nile. Kanuka ngun, ewanyunitos ekamak agaria ebe etiono noi alosit keda aikam agaria kaiboisio nu.
lgg_prompt: Ojata angu ama agei 'diyi ma ta mbapi o'diru 'diyi fe coral reef yi ma omgbo ni tuzu yi ara Nile niri ma alia ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'bi 'bepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu eri ewaru tu acizu azini e'bi 'bezu angu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Empindahinduka y'obuhangwa bw'ensi eyabaireho juba ereesireho okweyongyera kw'ebisharara by'amabaare omu mugyera Nile. N'ekyarugiremu, abashohi b'omubyaro bashangire kigumire kutamburira hamwe n'okushoha omu myanya egi.

eng_prompt: In recent months, an unusual growth of aquatic plants has spread rapidly along the banks of the River Nile. This unexpected proliferation has raised concerns among local fishers about its impact on their livelihoods.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, omuwendo gw'ebimera by'omu mazzi ogutali gwa bulijjo gusaasaanidde ku lubalama lw'omugga Kiyira. Okweyongera kuno okutali kusuubirwa kuleeseewo okweraliikirira mu bavubi b'omu kitundu ku ngeri gye kukosaamu obulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, dongo pa jami ma dongo I pii omede tutwal I dog nam nile. Medde pa wel rec man okelo lworo ikin lumak rec me tedero I kom adwogi ne I kom kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, apol naka iraan luka akipi ekorete noi kosiep loka ecilet loka Nile. Apol na na mam eomitai eyangaunit aiyalongong kanejaas ekamak agaria nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata kesi aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ori yi ma alia 'diyi ma zota wura ndusi ri ere i okposi yi rapi rara nile niri ma tia. E'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'di fe asi otiza 'ba e'bi 'bepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea e'yo erini eco 'ye geri eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho,obuhangwa bw'ebimera by'omumaizi bweyongyeire aha rubaju rw'omugyera Nile. Okweyongyera oku okutarikuteekateekwaho kureesireho okwerarikirira omu bashohi b'eby'obushohi aha bikwatireine n'entuura yaabo.

eng_prompt: Many families in coastal communities struggle to make ends meet due to declining fish stocks and rising costs of living. As a result, education often takes a backseat to immediate financial needs.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi mu bitundu by'oku lubalama lw'ennyanja galwana okweyimirizaawo olw'ebyennyanja okukendeera n'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya. N'ekivuddemu, okusoma kutwalibwa mu kifo ky'ebyetaago by'ensimbi eby'amangu.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol ma gibedo I dog nam gitye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwogi pi rec matye kadok piny ki wel cente me kwo matye kamede. Macalo adwogi ne, kwan ipol kare bedo gin ma pire tek loyo jami ma mite pi kwo.
teo_prompt: Ikalia luipu luejaasi toma atutubena nu oicorin eutasi aijar naarai ekidiokoto agaria keda aijar naepol noi. Kanuka ngun, eyangaikini duc asioman aiboisit naiyareit adepar ipudesia luka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara angu yi tia 'diyi ma alia 'diyi dri ci afa esuzu e'yo e'bi ma omgbo esizu azini aje idri nyazaniri tuzu uru risi. E'yo 'disi, e'yo onita niri 'du pari irizu e'yo robia lepi sa'wa 'disi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi omu byaro by'aha rubaju rw'enyanja nigateganisibwa okubaho ahabw'ebyenyanja okukyendera hamwe n'emihendo y'ebintu kweyongyera. Ekyarugiremu, eby'obwegyese nibitwarwa nka bikuru kukira ebyetengo by'esente.

eng_prompt: Despite working long hours and taking on additional responsibilities, I find it increasingly difficult to make ends meet. The rising cost of living has made it clear that my current compensation is inadequate.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga nkola essaawa nnyingi era nga nnina n'obuvunaanyizibwa obulala, nkisanga nga kizibu okweyimirizaawo. Okweyongerayongera kw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu kulaga bulungi nti ssente ze nfuna kati tezimala.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni atiyo pi cawa malac dok bene atye ki tic mapol, anongo tek tutwal me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo. Rwom me mede pa wel cente me kwo oweko nen atyer kamaleng ni cul ma anongo kombedi pe romo.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamai eong isawan luipu ido eyangarit eong aswamisinei nuipu, etionikinit eong aijar. Apol naka etiai loka aijar itodunit ejok ebe mam eong edumunenei ikapun luedolitos.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngazu sa'wa ezu azini azi 'duzu ma dria ra ti, ma eri esu ewaru tu e'yo robia esuzu 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo aje idri nyazaniri tuzaniri ece kililiru kini ma vile ofeta sawa 'disi ri cani ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okukora eshaaha nyingi n'okutwara obujunanizibwa obundi, nikigumira munonga okureeberera ebyetaago byangye. Okweyongyera kw'emihendo y'ebintu kworeka butunu ngu esente ezi ndikutunga obwahati tizirikumara.

eng_prompt: Despite his growing debt, he felt confident in his ability to manage his finances. With a new business opportunity on the horizon, he decided to take a risk.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga ebbanja lye lyeyongera, yali yeesiga obusobozi bwe obw'okuddukanya ensimbi ze. Olw'omukisa gwa bizinensi omupya ogwali gugenda okujja, yasalawo okuteeka obulamu bwe mu matigga.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni banya ne omedde, en onongo tye ki tek cwiny me gwoko cente ne. Ki gum me biacara manyen matye kabino anyim, en omoko tamme me keto kwone I peko.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata ngesi keda apesenin nuipu, abu ngesi koany ebe epedori ngesi aidar ikapun ke. Keda arereng naka ebiasara loitetet, abu ngesi koseu aimusung ationis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mari erini tuzu tu ri ma talasi, eri ama asi'baza be e'yo erini ecozu i ma robia ayuzu ri ma dria. Drileba tujari ni o'diru ni e'doria, eri asi e'yo 'du e'yo ewaru 'diyi 'duzu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho eibanja rye ery'okweyongyera, akeehurira aine obwesigye ngu naabaasa kureeberera esente ze. Ahabw'omugisha musya gw'eby'obushubuzi ogwabaire guri haihi kubaho, akasharamu kutwara akabi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to combat the rising tide of substance abuse in our community, strict measures are being implemented. As part of this initiative, all drug abusers will be punished.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa omuwendo gw'abakozesa ebiragalalagala ogweyongera mu kitundu kyaffe, enkola enkakali ziteekebwa mu nkola. Ng'ekimu ku bigenda okukolebwa, abo bonna abakozesa ebiragalalagala bajja kubonerezebwa.
ach_prompt: I tute me lweny i kom tim me nywaro tic ki yadi mapat-pat matye kamede I kabedo wa, kitye ka keto yoo matek tutwal I tic. Macalo but yub man, kibimiyo pwod ki joo weng matye katic ki yadi calo jaigi-ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitikitik aimat na ikee luitemerete kotoma atutubetekosi, ejai ainapeta nuepedorete aitodolikin. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nu, eponio alecor itunga kere luetosomaete ikee luitemerete.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu a'di 'dizu e'yo aro onzi 'diyi ma ayuza ma omgbo tupi ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma alea ri be, 'ba e'yo okporu 'diyi 'ba 'yeta ma alea. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga panga fe 'ba dria aro onzi 'diyi ayupi 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa emize y'okukozesa emibazi erikutokooza obwonko erikweyongyera omu kyanga kyaitu, emiringo y'amaani eriyo neeteebwa omu nkora. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, abarikukoresa emibazi erikutokooza obwonko nibaza kubonerezibwa.

eng_prompt: After years of working in various industries, he sought a new opportunity that promised financial stability. Researching different sectors, he discovered the potential of the fishery market.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka ng'akola mu makolero ag'enjawulo, yanoonya omukisa omupya ogwali gumusuubiza obutebenkevu mu by'ensimbi. Ng'anoonyereza ku bitongole eby'enjawulo, yazuula obusobozi bw'akatale k'ebyobuvubi.
ach_prompt: Ingee tic pi mwaki mapol I tenge me cuma mapatpat, en ocako yenyo tic manyen ma weko en bedo ki cente muromo. I kare ma tye ka kwedo tenge mapat-pat, en oniang kero pa cuk me mako rec.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kotoma okampuni luegelegela, abu ngesi komo arereng naka adumun ikapun luipu. Kotoma aingic iriongeta luegelegela, abu ngesi kodum apedor naka esokoni loka agaria.
lgg_prompt: Eli erini azi ngazu okalamvu ndundu eyi ma alea 'bori ma vutia, eri nda drileba o'diru e'yo robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo vuti ondaza 'yezu esele ndundu eyi ma dria, eri esu okpo cuu e'bi 'beza niri ni ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi arikukorera omu makorero gatari gamwe na gamwe, akasherura omugisha musya ogwabaire nigumuraganisa obusingye omu by'entaasya. Bwanyima y'okucondooza aha bitongore ebitarikushushana, akajumbura obushoborozi bw'akatare k'eby'obushohi.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, my efforts in the fishery have finally paid off. The abundance of fish this season has significantly boosted my income.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga nkola n'obunyiikivu, kaweefube wange mu by'obuvubi asembyeyo okusasulwa. Ebyennyanja ebingi mu sizoni eno byongedde nnyo ku nnyingiza yange.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny i kom biacara me mako rec dong adwogi ne obedo ber tutwal. Rec ma dwong tutwal I kare man omedo cente na tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, apotu aswamuka naka aikam agaria itodolikisi. Apol naka agaria kapak kana eyataki eong edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu avasi azini asi feza be 'bori ma vutia, okpo mani 'ba e'bi 'bezu 'di ma alia ri ofe asizu ra. E'bi ma omgbo sa'wa 'di ma alia ri otu ma vile lonyi angiri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, amaani gangye omu by'obushohi garugiremu ebijuma. Obwingi bw'ebyenyanja omu bwire obu, bwongyeire aha ntatsya yangye.

eng_prompt: The rising rates of addiction and its impact on individuals and communities have become a significant concern. Many people are unaware of the severe consequences that come with substance misuse.
lug_prompt: Omuwendo ogweyongera ogw'okwemanyiiza n'ebikosa abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitundu bifuuse eky'okweraliikirira ennyo. Abantu bangi tebamanyi buzibu bwa maanyi obuva mu kukozesa ebiragalalagala.
ach_prompt: Rwom me medde pa two ki adwogi ne I kom dano ki kabedo mapatpat obedo gin ma kelo lworo madit tutwal. Dano mapol pe gingeyo adwogi marac ma bino macalo adwogi me nywaro tic ki yadi.
teo_prompt: Apolor naka iponesio luka aimat iboro keda epone loepedoriata itunga keda atutubena aiyalongong noi. Mam itunga luipu ejenete atiokisio nuelomunete kotoma aimat ikee.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu tualu e'yo eyini 'ye 'ba eyi ma ngulupi si azini ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi pie ri eca asi otiza angiri ru. Ba karakara eyi nini e'yo onzi emu'ba aro onzi 'diyi ma ayuza si 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu abarikukoresa emize hamwe n'oburemeezi bwabyo ahabantu n'ebyanga, nikyerarikiriza munonga. Abantu baingi tibarikumanya akabi akarikuruga omu kukoresa kubi emibazi.

eng_prompt: In our community, agriculture plays a vital role in daily life. Many families rely on a combination of crops and livestock to sustain themselves.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyaffe, ebyobulimi n'obulunzi bikola omulimu gwa maanyi mu bulamu obwa bulijjo. Amaka mangi geesigama ku birime n'ebisolo okusobola okwebeezaawo.
ach_prompt: I kabedo wa, pur obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwo me nino ducu. Gangi mapol gijenge I kom cam ki dyangi me gwoko kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubetekosi, ejaasi akoru keda aswam naepol noi kotoma aijar naka nginiparan. Ikalia luipu ejarete keda iraan keda ibaren kanu aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu amavileri ma alea, agirikica ni azi orodriru 'ye idri o'du driasi ri ma alea. Familia karakara eyi yi ati ori eyi ma eselea anyapa eyi pie eyini ani eyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kyanga kyaitu, eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu magara gaitu aga buriizooba. Amaka maingi nigakoresa ebihingirwe hamwe n'amatungo okubaisaho.

eng_prompt: Due to a combination of extreme weather conditions and rising input costs, many agricultural producers are struggling to maintain profitability. As a result, the financial stability of the farming community is increasingly at risk.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera y'obudde embi ennyo n'ebbeeyi y'ebintu ebikozesebwa okulinnya, abalimi bangi bafuba okukuuma amagoba. N'ekivuddemu, obutebenkevu mu by'enfuna mu kitundu ky'abalimi bweyongera okubeera mu katyabaga.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me piny marac tutwal ki wel jami ma mite me pur ma tye ka medde, lupur mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo magoba. Macalo adwogi ne, rwom me lim pa lupur tye kama rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ejautene loepol noi loka ikwamin keda etiai loepol noi loka iboro lu itwasamao, eutasi akoriok luipu ainingosit aidar ameda. Kanuka ngun, ejai ainapakina naka ikapun mama ejaasi itunga lu akoriok ationis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile ni ovuzu onzi tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma aje tuzu tualu 'diyisi, 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri ci orodri esuzu. E'yo 'disi, e'yo 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ma e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera y'obwire embi hamwe n'emihendo y'ebintu erikweyongyera, abahingi n'abariisa baingi nibarwana kurinda amagoba gaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, obutereera bw'eby'entaasya bw'abantu b'omuby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nibweyongyera omu kabi.

eng_prompt: After conducting extensive market research, the consultants presented several viable business opportunities. Among the options discussed, one stood out as particularly promising.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo ku katale, abawi b'amagezi baayanjudde emikisa gya bizinensi egiwerako. Mu bintu ebyateesebwako, ekimu kye kyayolesebwa ng'ekisinga okusuubiza.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut I kom cuk, lumii tam gumiyo gum me timo biacara mapol. I kin yoo mapat-pat ma kinywako iye lok, yo acel obedo ber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitolot aingic naka esokoni, apotu itunga itodutu arerengesio nuipu nuka agwelanar. Kotoma oponesio lu ineritere, abu ediopet kobwo kwape lo isumunitos.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza cuu ma dria 'diyi 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba imbata fe'baa 'diyi e'da drileba tujari 'yezu 'diyi karakara. Geri 'bani e'yo onzezu 'diyi ma eselea, alu e'da kililiru e'yo 'yepi onyiru 'dileni'i.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza aha katare, abahabuzi bakareetaho emiringo mingi y'eby'obushubuzi. Omubintu ebyabaire nibigambwaho, ekimwe nikyo kyabaire kiri eky'omugasho munonga.

eng_prompt: With a thriving poultry farm and a loyal customer base, his business has flourished over the years. As a result, he earns a lot of money from selling eggs.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba alina ffaamu y'enkoko ekulaakulana era ng'alina bakasitoma bangi, bizineesi ye ekulaakulanye okumala emyaka. N'ekivuddemu, afuna ssente nnyingi mu kutunda amagi.
ach_prompt: Ki gwoko gweno ma tye ka dongo ki luwil ma lugen, biacarane odongo tutwal I mwaki ma okato angec. Macalo adwogi ne, en nongo cente madit tutwal ki I cato tong gweno.
teo_prompt: Keda efaamu loka akokorei loepol noi keda agwelak luipu, apol ebiasarake noi kokaru lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, edumunenei ngesi ikapun luipu noi kotoma agwelanar abeei.
lgg_prompt: Pari aria ta mbazuri ni zozu tualu 'ba aje'ba 'diyi pie, tujara eri vile ri zo eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, eri robia esu badakaru engazu gbe oziza vu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okuba aine faamu y'enkoko erikweyongyera kurungi hamwe n'abaguzi b'amaani, bizinesi ye etunguukire kumara emyaka mingi. N'ekyarugiremu, natunga esente nyingi kuruga omu kuguza amahuri.

eng_prompt: After weeks of caring for his flock, he noticed they were becoming increasingly lethargic and unresponsive. Despite his efforts to keep them warm and healthy, a sudden illness swept through the coop.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwera ng'alabirira ekisibo kye, yakizuula nti baali beeyongera okuba abagayaavu n'obutafaayo. Wadde nga yakola kyonna ekisoboka okubikuuma nga bibuguma era nga biramu bulungi, obulwadde obw'amangu bwayita mu kiyumba.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me gwoko romine, en oniang ni komgi tye ka doko goro dok pe gitye ka winyo lok. Kadi bed ni en otute matek me gwokogi wek gubed ma komgi lyet dok gubed ma komgi yot, two opoto atura.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aidar ibaren ke, abu ngesi koany ebe mam kesi epodokinito. Karaida abu ngesi iswama agogongu kanu aidar kes amwanis ka angaleu, abu adeka naka atipet kodum kotogo.

lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula eby'obusuubuzi n'okusobozesa abatuuze okufuna ebintu ebipya, akakiiko k'ekibuga kaateesa akatale akapya. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteekateeka ennyo n'okuteesa kw'abantu, enteekateeka yafuna olukusa n'obuyambi bw'ensimbi okuva mu gavumenti.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor biacara me tedero ki miyo gum ki lutedero me nongo cam manyen, kancil me boma madit omiyo tam me yubu cuk manyen. Ingee yube maber tutwal ki kony pa lwak, yub eni onongo twero ki kony me lim ki bot gamente.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor agwelanar naka atutubet ka aijaikin itunga adumunun iboro luitetiak, abu ekansulo loka eibuga kitemok esokoni loitetet. Akaulo naka aitemonokin ejok keda aomisio nuka itunga, apotu apugan koinakisi agangat keda ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu tujari angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu dika fezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri geri eyini ecozu afa ofule o'diru 'diyi esuzu ri ma alea, kanisulu aku ambu city niri fe egata angu cuu ni o'diru ni sizu. Otuta angiri ma vutia azini 'ba ongulumu'a 'diyi ma ti pezu 'bori ma vutia, e'yo 'di esu driwala azini atita robia ni engazu gamete vu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obushubuzi n'okuheereza abatuuragye oburyo burungi bw'okutunga eby'okurya ebisya, akakiiko k'orurembo kakataho akatare akasya. Bwanyima y'okukora enteekateeka nungi hamwe n'obuhwezi kuruga omu bantu, enteekateeka ekaikirizibwa kandi yaatunga obuhwezi bw'esente kuruga omu Gavumenti.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to rise over the bustling marketplace, the owner gathered all the vendors for an important announcement. He emphasized the need for better organization and communication among the stalls.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okuvaayo mu katale akajjudde abantu, nnannyini katale yakunga abasuubuzi bonna okukola ekirangiriro ekikulu. Yakikkaatirizza obwetaavu bw'okutegeka obulungi n'empuliziganya mu midaala.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako aa malo I cuk ma dano dwong iye, rwed cuk olwongo lucat weng me winyo lok angeya mo ma pire tek. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom miti me yub maber ki kubbe I kin kabedo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibwo kotoma osokoni loepol itunga, abu elope itunga kitukok agwelanarak kere kanu alimoret naepol noi. Abu ngesi kitogogong eipud loka aitemonokin ka einer kiding idukai.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria efuria angu cu ni 'ba eyini aa'zu tu 'diyi ma dria, e'i 'da tra 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi dria e'yo azi orodriru 'yezu. Eri 'ba asi e'yo lezu otuta kililiru azini e'yo nzezu pari afa ozizu 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kwija omu katare akarimu abantu baingi, mukama w'akatare akarundaana abashuubuzi boona kugira ngu agambe ekirango ky'omugasho. Akashoboorora ekyetengo ky'entebekanisa nungi hamwe n'empurizagana omu maduuka.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support their businesses and manage their finances better, the local market vendors decided to come together. They recognized the importance of pooling their resources and sharing financial knowledge.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuwagira bizinensi zaabwe n'okuddukanya obulungi ensimbi zaabwe, abatembeeyi b'omu katale baasalawo okwegatta. Baategedde obukulu bw'okukungaanya eby'obugagga byabwe n'okugabana amagezi agakwata ku by'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I tute me konyo biacaragi ki tic ki limgi maber, lucat icuk me tedero gumoko tamgi me ribbe kacel. Gu niang ber pa ribo jami gi kacel ki poko ngec me lim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang ebiasara kec ka aidar ikapun kec ejok, apotu agwelanarak lu osokoni kimorikikinos. Apotu kesi kojenutu ajokis naka aimorikikin iborokec ka aimor acoa naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu tujari eyivile 'diyi atizu tualu robia eyivile 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru, 'ba afa ozipi cu'a ogogo 'diyi 'du e'yo emuzu tualu. Eyi esu orodri 'bani eyi ma lonyi eyi trazu tualu eyini ani ondua robia esuzu 'diyi awazu eyi ma eselea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okushagika bizinesi zaabo n'okureeberera esente zaabo kurungi, abashuubuzi b'omukatare bakacwamu kukorera hamwe. Bakeetegyereza omugasho gw'okukwatanisa n'okugabana ebirikukwata ahaby'empiiha.

eng_prompt: In order to enhance decision-making and strategic direction, the organization has established a structured governance framework. This framework includes various committees to oversee different aspects of the market's operations.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula enkola y'okusalawo n'obulagirizi, ekitongole kitaddewo enkola y'obukulembeze entegeke. Enkola eno erimu obukiiko obw'enjawulo okulondoola ebintu eby'enjawulo ebikwata ku mirimu gy'akatale.
ach_prompt: Me ilo malo rwom me moko tam ki yoo me tic, dul eni oketo yub me tela maber tutwal. Yub man tye ki dul mapat-pat me doro tic mapat-pat me cuk.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong aitolomunun aseununeta keda aingarenikin, etolomu erionget ainapeta nuka epugae. Imoriarit ainapeta ngun ikomitin luegelegela lu eanyanarete iboro lu iswamaete osokonin luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo peta peza ni azini driceza kililiru ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti 'da e'do geri driceza ni kililiru 'diyi. Otita 'di ma alia committees ndundu yi e'yo ndundu cuu ni 'diyi ma pamvu onezu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura eby'okucwamu hamwe n'obwebembezi, ekitongore kitandikireho enkora nungi y'obwebembezi. Enkora egi erimu obukiiko bwingi okureeberera emirimo y'akatare.

eng_prompt: Despite the long hours and challenging conditions, the dedication of the staff is evident in every aspect of patient care. Their commitment to providing the best service possible is truly inspiring.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko obudde obuwanvu n'embeera ezisoomooza, okwewaayo kw'abakozi kweyolekera mu buli kimu ekikwata ku kulabirira abalwadde. Obumalirivu bwabwe obw'okuwa obuweereza obulungi busikiriza ddala.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gitiyo pi cawa malac ki kwo matek, miti pa lutic nen I jami weng makwako gwoko lutwo. Keto cwiny gi me miyo kony maber loyo weng obedo gin ma yomo cwiny tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida eyangainikinete kesi isawan luipu keda ejautene loetiono, eswamae loajokan lo eswamak iwanyunitai kotoma aiboisio kere nuka aidar adekak. Apodokinit kec aijanakin ejanakine loajokan kakere erai ibore yenepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Sawa ezuru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma talasi, azi'ba 'da eyi ma ava e'da e'yo dria 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu 'diyi ma alea. Asi 'baza yiniri azi ngaza muke ndeni ri fezu ri eri ava engapi saaru.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho eshaaha ndaingwa n'embeera ezigumire, obweziriki bw'abakozi nibweyoreka omuri buri nshonga y'okureeberera abarwaire. Okwehayo kwabo omu kuheereza obuheereza oburikukirayo oburungi nikugaruramu amaani.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, we finally opened our doors to the community. It was a dream come true for me and my fellow partners.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga tukola n'obunyiikivu, kyaddaaki twaggulawo enzigi zaffe eri ekitundu. Kyali kirooto ekituukiridde gyendi ne bannange.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny, dong wayabo dogola wa bot lwak. Man obedo lek ma ocobbe pi an kacel ki luwota.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogong keda ainakina, apotu sio engara ikekek mama ejaasi itunga. Arai airujasia nuapotu opotu iswamata kanuka keda ipaupaka.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, ama zi asizu ama vile jotile ongulumu yi dri ra. Eri ndra orobi 'bani esu ma dria azini 'ba azi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, tukihendera twaigura enju zaitu omu bantu. Kikaba ekirooto kyangye n'abagyenzi bangye.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent health crisis, the government held an emergency meeting to address the urgent need for medical support. As a result, all health workers were urged to perform their duties.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obwaliwo gye buvuddeko, gavumenti yatuuza olukiiko olw'amangu okukola ku bwetaavu bw'obuyambi bw'ebyobulamu obw'amangu. N'ekyavaamu, abasawo bonna baakubirizibwa okukola emirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom ma obedo tye cokcok-ki, gamente obedo ki kacoke me cobo miti me kony me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, ki lego lutic yoto kom weng me timo tic gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis naka angaleu napac, abu apugan iriamunos kanu aitemokin eipud loka amukian. Kanuka ngun, aponi olimokinai eswamak lu adekis kere aswam aswamisineikec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyiniri ma e'yosi, gamete 'ye mitingi mbeleru e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyiniri ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ai azi'ba dria arojo ni 'diyi azi eyivile 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obwahwireho,gavumenti ekakora orukiiko rw'amaani, okureeba ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'obuhwezi bw'eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, abashaho boona bakashabwa kukora emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: After months of dedicated service at the local clinic, the doctor received an unexpected call from the hospital administration. They informed him that he would be taking on a new role at a larger facility in the city.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'obuweereza obw'obwesimbu mu ddwaliro ly'omu kitundu, omusawo yafuna essimu gye yali tasuubira okuva mu bakulembeze b'eddwaliro. Baamutegeeza nti ajja kuba akola omulimu omupya mu kifo ekinene mu kibuga.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek I ot yat me tedero, daktar ne ogamo cim ma pe obedo kakuru ki bot ludito me ot yat. Ki niange ni obucako tic manyen I gang tic madit I boma madit.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aijanakin adekis, abu emuron ngol kodum esimu kama ejaasi eyaitene lo adekis. Aponi olimokinai ngesi ebe ebuni ngesi adumun aswam naitetet kotoma aiboisit naepol noi koibuga.
lgg_prompt: Mba azi ngazu asi driasi arojo 'da ma alea 'bori ma vutia, dakitari 'da esu simu 'ba arojo ma driceza ni 'diyi vu. Eyi lu eri dri kini eri nga azi o'diru 'du pari azi ambo ni aku ambu cityniri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi omu irwariro, dokita akatunga esimu kuruga omu bakuru b'eirwariro. Bakamumanyisa ngu akaba naija kutandika omurimo omusya omu itendekyero rihango omu rurembo.

eng_prompt: After the emergency alert was issued, the medical team quickly organized a transport plan. They gathered the necessary supplies and prepared to move the patients to a safer location.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulabula okw'amangu okufulumizibwa, abasawo baakola enteekateeka y'entambula. Baakungaanya ebintu ebyetaagisa ne beetegekera okutwala abalwadde mu kifo ekisinga okuba eky'obukuumi.
ach_prompt: Ingee miyo ngec pi peko ma opoto atura, lutic yoto kom oyot oyot guyubu yub me wot. Gu jogo jami ma mite dok guyube me cwalo lutwo I kabedo maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na alimor akiro nu engeso, apotu imurok kitemokinos aitemonokineta nuka elose katipet. Apotu kesi otukutu iboro lu ekotoi kosodete aitemonokin ayangar adekak aiboisit naeyuwara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mile oziza e'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru ri fezu 'bori ma vutia, amuti arojo ni 'diyi otu geri acizu 'diyi mbeleru. Eyi tra afa lele 'diyi dika eyi otu eyi 'bazu 'ba azoru 'diyi jizu angu kililiru ni ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okureetaho akaimukiriro k'amaani, tiimu y'abashaho ekakora enteekateeka y'engyenda ahonaaho. Bakarundaana ebintu ebirikwetengwa kandi beeteekateekyera kutwara abarwaire omu mwanya ogutaine kabi.

eng_prompt: The local community has been actively involved in improving healthcare services. As a result, a governing body was established to oversee the operations of the health centre.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu kitundu beenyigidde nnyo mu kutumbula ebyobulamu. N'ekyavaamu, akakiiko akafuzi kaatondebwawo okulondoola emirimu gy'eddwaliro.
ach_prompt: Lwak me tedero gubedo tye i yub me ilo malo rwom me kony me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, kicako dul ma doro tic pa ot yat.
teo_prompt: Ejaas itunga luka atutubet toma aitojokar amukian. Kanuka ngun, aponi itolomunai atukot naeyait aswamisio nuka adekis.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye azi okporu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'do amuti azi driceza ni ni azi arojo ni 'diyi ma pamvu onezu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'omubyaro bejumbire munonga omu kutunguura eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu,akakiiko akarikwebembera kakateebwaho okureeberera emirimo y'eirwariro.

eng_prompt: Before proceeding with the examination, the doctor explained the clinic's policy regarding payment. The receptionist informed the patient about the necessary fees for the consultation.
lug_prompt: Nga tannagenda mu maaso na kukeberebwa, omusawo yannyonnyola enkola y'eddwaliro ku bikwata ku kusasula. Omukozi ayaniriza abagenyi yategeeza omulwadde ku bisale ebyetaagibwa mu kwebuuzibwako.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe omede ki timo pim, daktar otito cik me ot yat i kom cul. Latic ma jolo dano i ot ot ot owaco ki latwo wel cente ma mite me cito ka neno latwo.
teo_prompt: Erongo ngesi inyikokit ainwakio, abu emuron kitetem ikisila luka adekisia nuka aitac ikapun. Abu lo aijaun itunga kolimok adekan ikapun lu ebeit aitac kanu adumun amukian.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mu drile obita be ku, dakitari 'da nze e'yo azita kiliniki ni 'diyi ma dria ofeta ma dria ra. Agu 'ba ai'pi angu 'da ma alea ri lu 'ba azoru 'diyi dri aje 'bani lele aro esuzu ri ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Atakatandikire kukyebera, dokita akashoboorora ebiragiro by'eirwariro ebirikukwata aha kushashura. Omukozi orikwakiira abarwaire akamanyisa omurwaire ebishare ebirikwetengwa kukora obujanjabi.

eng_prompt: After experiencing frequent power outages that disrupted services, the health centre's management decided it was essential to invest in a reliable power source. They conducted a thorough assessment of their needs and identified the best option for their facility.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna amasannyalaze agavaako emirundi egiwera agaataataaganya obuweereza, abaddukanya eddwaliro baasalawo nti kyali kyetaagisa okusiga ensimbi mu masannyalaze agesigika. Beekenneenya ebyetaago byabwe era ne basalawo eky'okukola mu kifo kyabwe.
ach_prompt: Inge poto pa mac ma obedo ka balo tic pa lutwo, ludito me ot yat gumoko tamgi ni omyero guket lim I kabedo me nongo mac ma genne. Gu niang maber tutwal I kom miti gi dok gunongo yoo maber loyo weng pi gang tic gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka amamus na akim naepol noi, abu eyaitene lo adekis kotema ebe ibusakinit aipikakin ikapun toma aitolom akim na eyuara. Apotu kesi owanyutu ipudesia kec kosodete ajenun epone loajokan kakere kanu aiboisit kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aci ako ni e'dozu 'bori ma vutia, azi ngaza arojo 'da niri 'du egata kini eri orodriru tujari 'yezu geri aci esuzu kililiru 'diyi ma alea. Eyi one e'yo eyini le 'diyi kililiru dika eyi esu geri muke ndeni eyini ecozu eyi ma pari 'duzu ri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okureeba amashanyarazi garikugwaho munonga, abarikukurira eirwariro bakasharamu ngu n'eky'omugasho okuta esente omu mashanyarazi agatarikubura. Bakashwijuma kurungi ebyetengo byabo kandi bamanya ekirikukirayo oburungi ahabw'ekyombeko kyabo.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing needs of the community, the local health authorities decided to enhance their medical services. As part of this initiative, the health centre also acquired an ambulance.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'abantu obweyongera, ab'ebyobulamu mu kitundu baasalawo okutumbula obujjanjabi bwabwe. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, eddwaliro era lyafuna emmotoka etambuza abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak, lutic yot kom me tedero gumoko tam gi me medo rwom me kony me yot kom. Macalo but yub man, ot yat bene onongo ambulance.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga, apotu apedorosio nuka angaleu koseutu aitojokar amukian kec. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, abu adekis da odum amotoka nadekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba alata ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'du e'yo eyini lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, arojo 'da esu vini ambulansi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu, ab'eby'amagara omu byaro bakacwamu kwongyera aha buheereza bwabo. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, eirwariro rikatunga ambyurensi.

eng_prompt: As the night shift came to an end, the staff noticed something unusual in the parking yard. Suddenly, a loud engine roared to life, and chaos erupted as the vehicle sped away.
lug_prompt: Ekiro bwe kyatuuka ku nkomerero, abakozi baalaba ekintu ekitali kya bulijjo mu ppaaka. Amangu ago yingini yakuba eddoboozi ery'omwanguka era ne wabalukawo akavuyo nga emmotoka egenda ku sipiidi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma tic me dyewor tye ka tum, lutic guneno gin mo ma pe obedo ka time I gang tic me gwoko mutoka. Cutcut, injin odange matek adada dok kuku kuku obedo tye I kare ma motoka tye ka ngwec ki cipid.
teo_prompt: Neadolio aijulanakineta nuka akware, apotu eswamak kowanyutu ibore yenitegelikina kotoma aiboisit naipikakinere amotokan. Apotu injin kilelebunos noi, ido abu amumu kogeun kwape emotoka elosi keda esipidi.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani azi ngazu inisi ri ni i deria, azi'ba 'da eyi ndre afa azi nduni angu mutukari eyi o'bazu ri ma alea. Sawa 'disi, inzini ma o'duko ma o'duko enga ra, azini ngiringiri e'do mutukari ni nzuria.
nyn_prompt: Omurimo gw'ekiro ku gwahikire ahamuheru, abakozi bakareeba ekintu kitari kya buriijo omu kishengye ky'emotoka. Ahonaaho, ingini ekarugamu orwari rw'amaani, kandi hakabaho akavuyo emotoka ku yaabaire neyeyongyera.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy standoff and mounting public pressure, the judge finally intervened in the escalating situation. Tensions had reached a boiling point as the authorities surrounded the property, prompting urgent legal action.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusika omuguwa okumala ebbanga eddene n'okunyigirizibwa okuva mu bantu, omulamuzi yasembayo okuyingira mu nsonga. Obunkenke bwali butuuse ku ntikko ng'aboobuyinza bazingizza ekizimbe, ekyaviirako okutwalibwa mu kkooti mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare malac me jemo ki lyeto pa lwak, langolkop dong odonyo I lok ne. Lworo obedo tye matek tutwal I kare ma lutela orumo kabedo enoni, ma oweko kimoko ni omyero kimok cik oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi naka aimorikikin keda aiyalongong naka itunga, abu atubon konger akiro ngun. Apotu ingungeta kodolokinos noi naarai apotu apedorosio kogolokisi aiboisit ngin, ido abu koyangau aswamisio nuka ekisil katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erita ako ni sa'wa ezu 'bori ma vutia azini e'yo 'ba eyini 'ba eyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tuzu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipiri fi asizu e'yo 'da ma alea ra. E'yo erita ako ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra 'ba okpo e'ipi ru 'diyi ni angu 'da ma ageyia, e'yo 'da fe 'bani e'yo 'yezu mbeleru azita palaa.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okwemerera kumara obwire buraingwa hamwe n'okunyigirizibwa kw'abantu, omuramuzi akahikaho yaataahamu omu nshonga. Obunkenke bukaba buhikire aha rurengo rw'amaani obu ab'obushoborozi baazingire ebyombeko, ekyaretsireho okutwarwa omu kooti ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming budget review, the management team scheduled a crucial discussion. All relevant departments were informed, but the accounts department was particularly focused on their financial projections.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera okwekenneenya embalirira okujja, akakiiko akaddukanya kalina okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'omugaso. Ebitongole byonna ebikwatibwako byategeezebwa, naye ekitongole ky'eby'embalirira kyassa nnyo essira ku nteekateeka zaakyo ez'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi ngiyo kor byek me lim matye kabino anyim, lutela guyubu kare me nyamo lok mapire tek tutwal. Ki niango dul mapat-pat makemme ki lok eni, ento dul ma neno lok kom lim oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom byek me limgi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin nuka airereonor ebajet lo ebunit, abu eyaitene kitemok aineranara naepol noi. Aponi olimokinai iriongeta kere, konye apodokinit noi erionget loka ikapun aomisio kec nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Otuta otita aje robia niri ma ale andrizu ri ma otuta si, amuti driceza ni 'diyi otu e'yo nzeza okporu ni. Ba lu e'yo esele dria e'yo 'yepi 'diyi ma dria ra, te 'ba asi esele 'ba e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera okushwijuma embaririra erikwija, tiimu y'abebembezi ekatebeekanisa okuhanuura okw'omugasho. Ebitongore byona ebirikwetengwa bikamanyisibwa, kwonka ekitongore ky'eby'embaririra kikata omutima aha nteekateeka yaabo y'esente.

eng_prompt: The planning committee held a meeting to discuss the upcoming conference. After finalizing the details, they decided it was important to keep the chairman in the loop.
lug_prompt: Akakiiko akategesi kaatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku lukungaana olujja. Oluvannyuma lw'okumaliriza ebintu byonna, baasalawo nti kikulu okutegeeza ssentebe.
ach_prompt: Dul ma yubu yub obedo ki kacoke me nywako lok I kom kacoke matye kabino ni. Ingee tyeko lok weng, gumoko tamgi ni pire tek tutwal me niango won kom.
teo_prompt: Abu ekomiti lo itemonokini airiamun kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos atukonokin na ebunit. Akaulo naka angetakin akiro, apotu kesi koseutu ebe ejokuna aijaikin lokapolon eicolong aijen.
lgg_prompt: Komiti otuta ni 'diyi 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu otita imbatani emupi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo dria asizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi ai kini eri orodriru 'ba e'i 'da ma dria e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Akakiiko akarikutebekanisa kakakora orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha ruteerane orurikwija. Bwanyima y'okuhendera ebirikukwata aha nshonga, bakasharamu ngu n'eky'omugasho kumanyisa mukuru w'entebe.

eng_prompt: The current state of infrastructure in Uganda has been a significant barrier to economic growth and development. Many rural areas remain inaccessible due to poor road conditions, hindering trade and mobility.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'ebizimbe eriwo mu Uganda eremesezza nnyo enkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna n'enkulaakulana. Ebitundu by'ebyalo bingi tebituukikako olw'embeera y'enguudo embi, ekiremesa eby'obusuubuzi n'entambula.
ach_prompt: Rwom me gedo matye kombedi I lobo Uganda obedo lageng madit tutwal I dongo lobo ki dongo lobo. Kabedo mapol me caro pud pe ki twero oo iye pi kit ma gudi tye kwede, ma eni gengo biacara ki wot.
teo_prompt: Ejautene loakwana loka adukena ko Uganda erai ibore yenepedori aitikitik apol keda apol. Aiboisio nuipu nu ocaalo mam epedorio adolokin naarai mam irotin ejokuna, mam epatana agwelanar keda alosit.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru kari Uganda niri ma alea sa'wa 'disi ri ebi ovu e'yo okporu zota e'yo robiani azini angu ezoma niri atrizu ni'I. Angu calo ru karakara 'diyi ma alia 'diyi awi ca ku e'yo nzila ma wura onzi 'diyisi, e'yo tujari ni azini acita ni 'diyi atripi.
nyn_prompt: Embeera y'ebyombeko omu Uganda obwahati, eremesereize entunguuka n'entunguuka omu by'entaasya. Ebyaro bingi tibirikubaasika ahabw'embeera mbi y'enguuto, ekirikuremesa eby'obushubuzi n'engyenda.

eng_prompt: After months of saving and searching for the perfect vehicle, I had almost given up hope. To my surprise, my father decided to surprise me with a special gift.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okutereka n'okunoonya emmotoka entuufu, nnali katono okuggwaamu essuubi. Ekyanneewuunyisa, taata wange yasalawo okunneewuunyisa n'ekirabo eky'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I ngee dwe mapol me gwoko cente ki yenyo motoka maber, onongo dong pe atye ki gen. Abedo ki ngeng tutwal I kare ma babana omoko tamme me miya mic mo me awura.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aimono ikapun ka aimo emotoka loajokan, ajai eong atwaniar amuno. Kanu aumok eong, abu papaka koseu aumok eong keda ainakinet na itegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani ma ta mbazu azini mutukari kililiru ri ndazu 'bori ma vutia, ma asi ndra asi'baza be ra. Ma osuta ma dri, ma ati asi 'du e'yo ma osuta fezu afa azi wura ndu ni si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okubiika n'okuronda emotoka ehikire, nkaba ndi haihi kuhwa amatsiko. Ekyantangaziise, taata wangye akasharamu kuntangaaza n'ekiconco ky'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming election, the campaign committee made arrangements to ensure that all candidates had the necessary resources for their travels. As part of this initiative, all presidential candidates were given vehicles.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera okulonda okujja, akakiiko ka kampeyini kaakola enteekateeka okulaba nti abesimbyewo bonna balina ebyetaago by'entambula zaabwe. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, bonna abeesimbyewo ku bwa pulezidenti baaweebwa emmotoka.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi yer matye kabino anyim, dul ma doro bito kwi guyubu yub me neno ni lucungu weng gubedo ki jami ma mite pi wot gi. Macalo but yub man, kimiyo mutoka ki lucungu weng me cungu I yer pa ladit lobo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin kanuka aseo naebunit, abu ekomiti loka ikampeins kiswamau ainapeta kanu awanyun ebe ejaasi abwoak kere keda iboro luibusakinit kesi aswam kanu alosit kec. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta ngun, aponi ijaikinai abwoak lu ekotosi araun lukapolok akwap amotokan.
lgg_prompt: Otuta e'yo opetaa ni emupi 'diyi ma alia, komiti ti odaza ni 'diyi 'ye otuta nezu ra kini 'ba dria pa tupi 'diyi vu afa lele acizu 'diyi ci. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba fe 'ba dria pa tupi purezidenti ru 'diyi dri mutukari yi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera akaruuru akarikwiija, akakiiko k'ehururu kakakora enteekateeka kureeba ngu abesimbireho boona baine eby'okukoresa omu by'engyenda zaabo. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, abesimbireho ahabwa purezidenti boona bakaheebwa emotoka.

eng_prompt: Given the recent reports of increased criminal activity after dark, many residents are feeling uneasy about their safety. Local authorities have advised against traveling into town once the sun goes down.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku alipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko nti obumenyi bw'amateeka bweyongedde oluvannyuma lw'ekizikiza, abatuuze bangi tebafaayo ku bukuumi bwabwe. Ab'obuyinza ku byalo bawabudde abantu obutatambula mu kibuga ng'enjuba egwa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lok ma obedo katimme cokcok-ki ma nyutu ni tim aranyi tye ka mede ikare ma piny odoko col, lutedero mapol tye ki lworo i kom ber bedo gi. Lutela me tedero gumiyo tam pe me cito i boma ka ceng dong opoto.
teo_prompt: Katupitos iripotan lu iyata noi luka abilibilio naka ikisila akaulo naka akwap, mam itunga luipu ekotosi ayuwara kec. Apotu apedorosio luka atutubet icorakisi itunga mam alosit otaun akaulo naka aibiror akolong.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'duko efupi o'diru e'yo onzi eyi 'yepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu 'bori ma e'yosi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi aa asi otiza be eyi ma agei tema ma dria. Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi fe imbata acizu tawuni'a ku etuka ka 'de 'boria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu ebihagaro byeyongyeire bwanyima y'ekiro, abatuuragye baingi tibarikwetegyereza eby'okwerinda kwabo. Ab'obushoborozi omu byaro, bahabwiire abantu okwetantara okugyenda omu tauni eizooba ku ririkuza kugwa.

eng_prompt: I've always been fascinated by motorcycles, but I've never had the chance to learn. Despite my interest, I realize I lack the necessary skills to operate one safely.
lug_prompt: Njagala nnyo ppikipiki naye sifunangako kakisa kuyiga. Newankubadde njagala nnyo, nkitegedde nti sirina bukugu bumala okukikozesa obulungi.
ach_prompt: I kare weng abedo ki miti madit tutwal I kom pikipiki, ento pud pe abedo ki gum me pwonyo jami mapol. Kadi bed amaro, aniang ni pe atye ki diro ma mite me tic kwede maber.
teo_prompt: Amina eong noi ipikipikin, konye mam eong adumunit arereng naka aisisia. Karaida akoto eong, ajeni eong ebe amamete eong keda acoa na itwasamaere ejok.
lgg_prompt: Ma ovu sawa driasi ava be pikipiki ma dria, te ma esuni nga drileba e'yo onizu ku. Afa mani leleri ma talasi, ma esu ra kini ma vu ondua 'bani ecozu eri ayuzu kililiru ri yo.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire ninkunda pikipiki, kwonka tinkatungaga mugisha gw'okuzeega. N'obu naabaire ninyenda, nkamanya ngu tinyine bukugu bw'okukikoresa kurungi.

eng_prompt: After weeks of waiting for the parts to arrive, he finally received the call he had been anticipating. Excited to have his car back, he rushed to the shop to pick it up.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwera ng'alindirira ebitundu by'emmotoka okutuuka, yafuna essimu gye yali asuubira. Olw'essanyu lye yalina olw'okuddizibwa emmotoka ye, yadduka mangu mu dduuka okugiggyayo.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me kuro ni jami ne gubino, lacen en onongo cim ma obedo kakuru. Ki yomcwiny madit tutwal me dwoko mutokane cen, en oringo ocito ka gamo ne ki I dukan.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aidar isabitin kanu adolere iboro, abu ngesi kodum esimu loauta ngesi aomit. Eyalama noi kanu ainyakun emotoka ke, abu ngesi koker oidukane kanu adumun emotoka.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia afa ayule 'diyi ni ecazu 'bori ma vutia, eri esu asizu simu erini ebi te ega ri ra. Ayiko fu erini i vile mutukari esuzu vile risi, eri ari i dukani ma alia eri e'duzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara esande nyingi ategyereize ebicweka by'emotoka kuhika, ahamuheru akatunga esimu ei yabaire ategyereize. Ahabw'okushemererwa ahabw'okugarurwaho emotoka ye, akairukanga omu duuka kugitorora.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, the chairman emphasized the importance of ensuring all employees have their vehicles properly documented. He then outlined the steps we needed to take to comply with company policy.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko, ssentebe yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukakasa nti abakozi bonna emmotoka zaabwe ziwandiikiddwa bulungi. Oluvannyuma yalambika emitendera gye twetaaga okutambulirako okugoberera enkola ya kampuni.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke, won kom owaco ni pire tek tutwal me neno ni lutic weng gubedo ki motoka gi ma kicoyo maber. En otito jami ma omyero watim me lubu cik me kampuni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet, abu apolon eicolong kitogogong ajokis naka awanyun ebe eswamak kere iwadikaete amotokan kec ejok. Abu ngesi kitetem nuibusakinit oni aswam kanu aitup ainapeta nuka ekampuni.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, kome ei 'da fe okpo orodri 'ba dria azi'ba eyini mutukari eyivile 'diyi ma kokobi eyi ma dria kililiru ri ma dria. Ece amani e'yo amani eco 'ye azita amuti ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu ra 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, mukuru w'entebe akashoboorora omugasho gw'abakozi boona kuhandiika ebiiruka byabo kurungi. Akashoborora emitendera ei tushemereire kukuratira okukuratira ebiragiro bya kampuni.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the recent changes made to the kitchen, we gathered as a family to discuss our concerns. It became clear that the new design did not meet our expectations or needs.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya enkyukakyuka ezaakolebwa mu ffumbiro gye buvuddeko, twakungaana ng'amaka okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bitweraliikiriza. Kyategeerekeka bulungi nti enkola empya teyakwatagana na bye twali tusuubira oba ebyetaago byaffe.
ach_prompt: Inge neno aloka-loka ma otimme I jokon cokcok-ki, wacokke macalo jo me ot me nywako tamwa. Onen atyer kamaleng ni yub manyen ne pe ocobo miti wa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor aijulanakineta nueswamaunitai kotoma aipo, apotu sio iriamunos kwape ekale kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos aiyalongosiwok. Aponi kojenunai ebe mam epone loitetet abu itodolik aomisiowok keda ipudesiawok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ojata 'bani 'ye o'diru jokonia 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, ama oku dri familia ru e'yo onzezu e'yo ama ni 'diyi ma dria. Eca e'da kililiru kini otita o'diru 'da awini ama ma egata azini afa amani lele 'diyi 'ye ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma empindahinduka ezabaireho omu kiyungu, tukateeranira hamwe nk'eka kuhanuura ebirikutwerarikiriza. Kikarebeka butunu ngu enkora ensya terikuhikiiriza ebyetengo byaitu n'ebyetengo byaitu.

eng_prompt: Due to scheduling conflicts and various commitments, our leadership team has struggled to find a suitable time for discussions. As a result, we have not had any executive meetings since last month.
lug_prompt: Olw'obukuubagano mu nteekateeka n'obweyamo obw'enjawulo, abakulembeze baffe bafunye obuzibu okufuna ekiseera ekituufu eky'okukubaganya ebirowoozo. N'ekyavaamu, tetubadde na nkiiko za bakulembeze okuva omwezi oguwedde.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me yub ki jami mapat-pat ma omyero watim, lutela wa tye ka tute matek me nongo kare maber me nywako lok. Macalo adwogi ne, pe wabedo ki kacoke mo keken me tela nicake dwe ma okato.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ationis naka ainapeta keda ainakina naepol, etimu lo engarenone wok etionit adumun apak na ejok kanu aitemitem. Kanuka ngun, mam sio ijatatar keda airiamununeta nuka engarenok ageun olap je.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru otita eyi ma alea 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu 'diyisi, amuti amavile driceza niri ebi dri ci sa'wa kililiru 'bani e'yo onzezu ri esuzu. E'yo 'disi, ama ebi mitingi azi driceza ni 'diyi 'ye ku e'dozu mba ajerisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutaikirizana omu ntebeekanisa hamwe n'okwehayo kw'emiringo mingi, tiimu yaitu y'obwebembezi etungire oburemeezi kuronda obwire burungi bw'okuhanuura. N'ekyarugiremu, titukatungire orukiiko rw'abebembezi kuruga okwezi okuhweire.

eng_prompt: Due to the recent resignation of our local representative, we need to fill the vacant position. As a result, we are organizing a by-election.
lug_prompt: Olw'okulekulira kw'omukiise waffe ku kyalo gyebuvuddeko, twetaaga okujjuza ekifo ekikalu. N'ekyavaamu, tuteekateeka okulonda okw'omuddiring'anwa.
ach_prompt: Pien lacungu pi tedero wa oweko tic cokcok-ki, omyero wapong kabedo matye nono ni. Macalo adwogi ne, watye ka yubu yer mukene.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyengun naka abwoikinitonikosi loka atutubet, ekot oni ailelebikin aiboisit ngin. Kanuka ngun, iuta sio aitemonokin aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba ama vile ogua e'i angu 'da ma alea ri ni azi kuzu 'bori ma e'yosi, le ama ma si pari azi kokoru 'da ma alea. E'yo 'disi, ama opeta eyi otu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omujwekyerwa waitu w'ekyanga kurekura emirimo, twine kwijuza omwanya oguriho. N'ekyarugiremu, turiyo nitutebekanisa akaruuru k'okugarukamu.

eng_prompt: Voters have been preparing for weeks, discussing candidates and issues that matter most to them. As the final day approaches, excitement and anticipation fill the air.
lug_prompt: Abalonzi babadde beetegekera okumala wiiki, nga bakubaganya ebirowoozo ku beesimbyewo n'ensonga ezisinga okuba ez'omugaso gye bali. Ng'olunaku olusembayo lusembera, essanyu n'okusuubira bijjudde empewo.
ach_prompt: Lubol kwir gubedo ka yubbe pi cabit mapol, nywako lok I kom lucungu ki lok ma pigi tego botgi. I kare ma nino me agiki tye cok, yom-cwiny kacel ki bedo ki gen opong I yamo.
teo_prompt: Auta aseak aitemonokin kanu isabitin luipu, aitemitem nuikamunitos abwoak keda akiro nuepolok nuikamunitos kesi. Neyapiete apaaran naka awasia, eleleba aiyalama keda aiyalama kokwam.
lgg_prompt: Ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ebi eyi otu sabiti eyi ma alea, agbatara gba 'ba pa tupi eyi ma dria azini e'yo eyini le saaru 'diyi ma dria. O'du asizu ri ni ecazu ogogo, ayiko azini asi 'baza ga angu ma alea tre.
nyn_prompt: Abateezi b'akaruuru batwire nibeteekateekyera kumara esande nyingi, barikuhanuura aha beesimbireho hamwe n'eshonga ezibarikukunda munonga. Eizooba ry'ahamuheru ku ririkuhika haihi, okushemererwa n'okwerarikirira biijwire omumwanya.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent political upheaval, the government decided it was time for a change in leadership. As a result, they appointed new ministers this year.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko bw'ebyobufuzi obwaliwo gye buvuddeko, gavumenti yasalawo nti kye kiseera okukyusa obukulembeze. N'ekyavaamu, baalonda baminisita abapya omwaka guno.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me jemo me cungu iwi bye ma otime cokcok-ki, gamente omoko tamme ni kare dong oromo me kelo aloka loka I tela. Macalo adwogi ne, guyero minicta manyen I mwaka ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu abongokin toma akiro nuka epolitikis, abu apugan koseu ebe erai apak naka aijulakin engarenone. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi oseutu iminisitan luitetiak okaru lo.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo ewaru politiki ni ebipi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'di driceza ojazu ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi ope minisita o'diru 'diyi eli 'disi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko bw'eby'obutegyeki obwahwireho, gavumenti ekasharamu ngu obwire buhikire kuhindura obwebembezi. N'ekyarugiremu, bakatoorana ba minisita abasya omwaka ogu.

eng_prompt: As the election results were announced, a palpable tension filled the air. Many had hoped for a different outcome, leading to a divide among the community.
lug_prompt: Ebyava mu kulonda bwe byalangirirwa, waaliwo obunkenke bungi. Bangi baali basuubira enkomerero ey'enjawulo, ekyaviirako enjawukana mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kicwalo adwogi yer, lworo omako dano mapol tutwal. Dano mapol onongo gitye ki gen ni adwogi ne bibedo pat, man okelo apoka-poka ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Nealimorere akiro nuka aseo, apotu aiyalongongo kilelebunos kokwam. Amuno itunga luipu nuikamunitos akiro nuegelegela, ido abu koyangau atiakatiaka kotunga.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni e'yo opetaa ni efu'ba 'diyi azizu 'boria, asi otiza e'dapi ra ri ga angu ma alea dria. Ba karakara eyi 'ba ndra asi 'baza efuta nduni ma dria eyini ani esele cozu ongulumu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Ebyarugire omu buruuru ku byarangirwe, hakabaho okwerarikirira. Baingi bakaba baine amatsiko g'ebindi ebireije kubaho, ekyarugiremu okwebaganisamu omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing needs of the student body, the administration recognized the importance of enhancing support services. To improve overall efficiency and student experience, the school recruited more non-teaching staff.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'abayizi obweyongera, abaddukanya essomero baalaba obukulu bw'okutumbula obuyambi. Okutumbula obumanyirivu n'obumanyirivu bw'abayizi, essomero lyaleeta abakozi abalala abatali basomesa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lutino kwan, ludito gu niang ber pa medo rwom me kony. Me medo rwom me tic ki ngec pa lutino kwan, gang kwan ne ocoyo lutic mukene ma pe gubedo lupwonye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka esisiak, abu eyaitene koany ajokis naka aitojokar ejanakine lo agangat. Kanu aitojokar eswamae loajokan ka aijen naka esisiak, abu esomero itolomu eswamak lu mam eraas isisianakinak.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako sukulu anzi eyini tupi tutu 'diyi ma e'yosi, driceza sukulu niri esu orodri azakoma fele sukulu anzi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu ri ra. Azi ngaza ma omgbo otuzu azini sukulu anzi eyi ma nita ma omgbo otuzu, sukulu 'da si azi'ba imba'ba ru ku 'diyi ma azi eyi dika.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'abeegi, abebembezi b'eishomero bakareeba omugasho gw'okutunguura obuheereza. Okutunguura emikorere y'abeegi, eishomero rikongyera abakozi abatari beegyesa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote gender equality and empower young women, the school implemented a new initiative. This program aimed to provide resources and support for female students to develop their skills and confidence.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omwenkanonkano n'okutumbula abakyala abato, essomero lyassa mu nkola enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa abayizi abawala ebyetaago n'obuyambi okukulaakulanya obukugu bwabwe n'obwesige.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor rwom me mon ki coo kacel ki tyelo kor mon matino, gang kwan oketo yub manyen itic. Yub man obedo ki miti me miyo kony ki kony bot lutino anyira me dongo dirogi ki tek cwinygi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitopolorite nuka angor keda ikiliok, abu esomero kitegear ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai aijaikin iboro ka agangat nejaas esisiak nungor kanu aitopolor acoasineikec keda amunokina.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro ri ma omgbo otuzu dika okpo fezu ezoanzi nyiri eyidri, sukulu 'da 'ba e'yo azi o'diru ni 'yeta ma alea. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu afa ayuzaru azini atita fezu sukulu anzi ezoanzi ru 'diyini eyini ani ecozu eyi ma ondua ezozu azini eyi ma asi 'bazu eyi ma ngulupi si.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho oburinganiza n'okutunguura abakazi, eishomero rikatandikaho enteekateeka nsya. Puroguraamu ekaba egyendereire kuheereza abeegi abaishiki obuhwezi n'eby'okukoresa, kugira ngu batunguure emyoga yaabo n'obwesigye bwabo.

eng_prompt: In many social settings, women often find themselves isolated from discussions and decision-making processes. This exclusion can lead to a pervasive sense of alienation among them.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera z'abantu nnyingi, abakyala batera okwesanga nga beeyawudde ku kuteesa n'enkola z'okusalawo. Okuggyibwako kuno kuyinza okuleetawo enneewulira y'okweyawula ku balala mu bantu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol ma dano bedo iye, mon ipol kare nongo gitye kengi I lok me nywako lok ki moko tam. Kwanyo dano man twero kelo apokapoka ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuipu, etapit duc angor aimorikikin kotoma aitemitem keda aitolomun aseununeta. Aibiror na epedori ayangaun amamut aimorikikina kanejaas kesi.
lgg_prompt: Pari ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, oku eyi eyi esu eyi ma esele co e'yo nzeza azini e'yo peta pezu 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'bani yi ofuzuri eco fe yi ma esele cozu yi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya mingi y'abantu, abakazi tibarikubaasa kugaaniira hamwe n'okusharaho. Okubingwa nikureetaho okwetantara omu boona.

eng_prompt: In every aspect of society, it is crucial to recognize the value and contributions of women. A culture of equality and empowerment is essential for progress and harmony.
lug_prompt: Mu buli kitundu ky'ekitundu, kikulu nnyo okutegeera omugaso n'ebikolebwa abakyala. Obuwangwa obw'okwenkanankana n'okutumbula buli kintu kya mugaso mu nkulaakulana n'obumu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo weng me kwo pa lwak, pire tek tutwal me niang ber pa mon ki jami ma gutimo. Tekwaro me rwate ki ilo rwom pa dano pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo ki winye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio kere nuka itunga, ejokuna noi ajenun ajokis naka angor keda nu iswamaete. Inonosio lu eirian ka aitigogong itunga ejokuka kanu apol ka ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dria ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru tu e'yo orodriru oku eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma esele trotrozu azini okpo fezu ri eri orodriru angu ezoma ni azini aa'ta tualu ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu buri nshonga y'abantu, nikikuru kumanya omugasho n'omugasho gw'abakazi. Eby'obuhangwa by'oburinganiza n'okutunguura abantu n'eby'omugasho aha ntunguuka n'obumwe.

eng_prompt: In a world where societal expectations often undermined their confidence, a movement emerged to empower women. Workshops and seminars were organized to inspire them to embrace their potential and pursue their dreams.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ng'ebisuubirwa mu bantu bitera okutyoboola obwesige bwabwe, ekibiina kyajjawo okutumbula abakyala. Emisomo n'emboozi zaategekebwa okubasikiriza okwettanira obusobozi bwabwe n'okutuukiriza ebirooto byabwe.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma jami ma lwak tye ka byeko ni mon omyero gubed kwede pol kare balo tek cwiny gi, dul mo ocake me tyelo kor mon. Kiyubu kacoke me pwonye me cuku cwiny gi me cako tic ki kero gi ki cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaatar aomisio nuka itunga aibiror amunokina kec, aponi kitolomunai apugan naepedori aitigogong angor. Aponi itemokinai airiamunun keda airiamunun kanu aisinyikokin kes aitodolikin apedorosiokec ka aitodolikin airujasia kec.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'bani asi 'baza ongulumu eyini 'diyi ni sawa driasi asi 'bazu eyi ma ngulupi si ri ma alea, amuti azi efu okpo fezu oku eyini. Ba otu otita imbatani azini otita imbatani eyini 'diyi eyini ava fezu eyi ma okpo esuzu dika eyi ma orobi eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu ebiteekateeko by'abantu byabaire nibishiisha obwesigye bwabo, ekitongore kikareetwaho kutunguura abakazi. Emisomo hamwe n'emishomo, bikatebekanisibwa okubagaruramu amaani okukoresa obushoboorozi bwabo, n'okuhikiiriza ebirooto byabo.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a troubling trend in student attendance. Many factors, including health issues and family circumstances, contribute to this alarming situation.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kulaga enkola etawaanya mu kusoma kw'abayizi. Ensonga nnyingi, nga mw'otwalidde ebyobulamu n'embeera y'amaka, bireetawo embeera eno eyeeraliikiriza.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni wel lutino matye ka kwan tye ka medde tutwal. Jami mapol, ma I kingi obedo peko me yotkom ki kwo me ot, okelo peko man.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuitodunitos nueswamauna pac itodunitos eipone loetiono noi loka esisiak ajaut osomero. Akiro nuipu, aimoriarit nuka angaleu keda ejautene loka ekale, eyangaunete ejautene lo loetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo asi otiza fepi sukulu anzi eyini muzu sukulu'a ri ra. E'yo karakara eyi, e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi tualu e'yo familia ni 'diyi pie, eyi fe e'yo onzi 'di ni i.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka enkora y'okwerarikirira omu kwega kw'abeegi. Enshonga nyingi, otwariiremu eshonga z'eby'amagara hamwe n'embeera y'amaka, nibyo bireesireho oburemeezi obu.

eng_prompt: Despite my extensive campaign efforts and community outreach, the results were not in my favor. I had hoped for a different outcome, but the voters made their choice clear.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga nnafuba nnyo okunoonya akalulu era nga nfuba okutuusa obubaka mu bantu, ebyavaamu tebyannyamba. Nnali nsuubira nti ebinaavaamu bijja kuba bya njawulo, naye abalonzi baalaga bulungi kye baali basazeewo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni atiyo matek me bito kwi ki cwalo ngec bot lwak, adwogi yer ne pe obedo ber pira. Onongo atye ki gen ni adwogi ne bibedo pat, ento lubol kwir gumoko tam gi atyer kamaleng.
teo_prompt: Karaida abu eong aswam kagogong noi kotoma aisup aseeta keda aitodolikin itunga, mam akiro nuelomunitos ajokunar eong. Aomit eong ebe ebuni akiro ace aswam, konye apotu aseak kolimokisi aseunetekec.
lgg_prompt: Ma ti odaza ma alia okporu azini e'yo nzezu o'bi yi be ra ti, e'yo efupi 'diyi ovuni ma drile ku. Ma ndra asi 'baza be efuta nduni ma dria, te 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ece e'yo yini leleri ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho enteekateeka yangye y'okuronda akaruuru n'okuhutuura abantu, ebirugiremu tibirangiriire. Nkaba nyine amatsiko ngu ebirugyemu nibiija kuba ebindi, kwonka abateezi b'akaruuru bakoreka butunu ekibarikwenda.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a noticeable shift in societal attitudes towards women's roles in leadership. As more women advocate for their rights and representation, they are stepping into political arenas like never before.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo enkyukakyuka mu ndowooza z'abantu ku mirimu gy'abakyala mu bukulembeze. Ng'abakyala bangi balwanirira eddembe lyabwe n'okukiikirirwa, bayingira mu byobufuzi okusinga bwe kyali kibadde.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, alokaloka madit otime I tam pa lwak I kom tic pa mon I tela. I kare ma mon mapol gitye ka lweny pi twero gi ki cung pigi, gitye ka donyo I tenge me cungu iwi-bye calo I kare macon.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aijulanakineta kotoma aomisio nuka itunga nuikamunitos aswam naka angor kwape engarenok. Kwape itereikina angor keda apedorosio kec keda abwoikinitokec, eutasi kesi alomar toma akiro nuka epolitikis kwape sek.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, ojata e'dapi ra 'diyi ebi ovu 'yeta ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea azi oku eyini driceza ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Oku karakara eyini a'di 'dizu drilemgbo eyini azini 'ba pa tupi eyidri 'diyisi, eyi curu'do fi e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea drile.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, habaireho empindahinduka omu miteekateekyere y'abantu aha mirimo y'abakazi omu bwebembezi. Nk'oku abakazi baingi barikurwanirira obugabe bwabo n'okujwekyerwa, nibaza omu by'obutegyeki nk'oku kitarabaireho.

eng_prompt: In his address to the nation, the president emphasized the importance of unity during challenging times. He reminded us that collaboration is essential for achieving progress and overcoming obstacles.
lug_prompt: Mu kwogera kwe eri eggwanga, pulezidenti yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'obumu mu biseera ebizibu. Yatujjukizza nti okukolera awamu kikulu nnyo okusobola okutuuka ku nkulaakulana n'okuvvuunuka ebizibu.
ach_prompt: I lokke bot lobo, ladit lobo owaco ber pa ribe ikare me peko. En opoyo wiwa ni ribe obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo lobo ki lweny i kom peko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma einerike mama ejaasi akwap, abu lokapolon akwap kitogogong ajokis naka aimorikikina kotoma apakio nuetioko. Abu ngesi isiitik iso ebe epolok noi aiswamanara kanu aitodolikin apol ka aipikor atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo nzeria kari dri, prisdent 'da fe okpo orodri ti ecita niri ma dria sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyi ma alea. Eri ega ama ra kini ti ecita eri orodriru angu ezoma esuzu azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi agazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugamba kwe aha eihanga, omwebembezi w'eihanga akahamya omugasho gw'okukwatanisa omu bwire bw'oburemeezi. Akatwijusya ngu okukwatanisa n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguuka n'okusingura ebirikuturemesa.

eng_prompt: After a thorough selection process, the committee unanimously agreed on the best candidate for the position. With her extensive experience in public health and a proven track record of leadership, she was the clear choice.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusunsula obulungi, akakiiko kaakkiriziganya ku muntu asinga okwesimbawo ku kifo. Olw'obumanyirivu bwe mu byobulamu n'ebyafaayo by'obukulembeze, ye yali omulonde omulungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee yer maber tutwal, dul ne owinye I kom lacungu maber loyo weng. Ki ngec madit ma en tye kwede I tenge me yot kom pa lwak kacel ki ngec ma en tye kwede I tela, en obedo ngat ma kiyero maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aseun ejok, apotu ekomiti ocamutu itunganan yen ejokuna kanuka adoketait kangin. Keda amisiarit ke naepol noi kotoma angaleu naka itunga keda aiwadikaeta nuka eingarenone, arai ngesi aseunet najokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi opezu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, komiti 'da ai 'ba pa tupi muke ndeni 'da ma dria. E'yo erini nita be angiri e'yo alata o'bi eyini ri ma dria azini e'yo erini 'ye driceza ru 'diyi ma dria 'diyisi, eri 'ba 'bani pe kililiru ni'i.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushoroora kurungi,akakiiko kakaikirizana aha muntu orikukirayo oburungi aha ntebe egyo. Ahabw'obumanyirizi bwe bwingi omu by'amagara g'abantu hamwe n'ebi yaakozire nk'omwebembezi, akaba ari omwebembezi oshemereire kutooranwa.

eng_prompt: After feeling unwell for several days, she decided it was time to seek medical attention. Despite hoping it was just a minor issue, the persistent pain in her head became too much to bear.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala ennaku eziwera nga tawulira bulungi, yasalawo okufuna obujjanjabi. Newankubadde yali asuubira nti kyali kizibu kitono, obulumi obw'olubeerera mu mutwe gwe bwafuuka bwa maanyi nnyo okugumira.
ach_prompt: Inge winyo ni kome pe yot pi nino mapol, en omoko tamme me cito ka nongo kony pa daktar. Kadi bed ni onongo tye ki gen ni obedo peko matidi, arem ma obedo I wiye obedo tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na mam apupi ejok adaun aparasia nuipu, abu ngesi koseu adumun amukian. Karaida aomit ngesi ebe arai ationis naedit, abu ariebo naka akou ke koraun naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini aa'zu muke ku o'du karakara 'bori ma vutia, eri 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'di aro esuzu. Erini tro ovuzu asi 'baza be kini eri lu e'yo azi werea ni i, suta dria eri ma dria ri eca okporu tu erini ti ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumarayo ebiro bingi atarikwehurira gye, akasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okusherura obujanjabi. N'obu araabe yaabaire aine amatsiko ngu n'ekintu kikye, obusaasi bw'omutwe gwe bukamugumira munonga.
