eng_prompt: Recent reports have highlighted a troubling trend in local fishing areas. Authorities are increasingly concerned about illegal activities taking place in these seemingly peaceful spots.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga embeera eyeeraliikiriza mu bifo ebirimu abavubi. Aboobuyinza beeyongedde okweraliikirira olw'ebikolwa ebimenya amateeka ebigenda mu maaso mu bifo bino ebirabika ng'ebirimu emirembe.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto kit ma tic me mako rec tye ka time kwede. Lutela tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom tim ma turu cik matye katimme I kabedo magi ma nen calo tye ki kuc.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan lu atuboros itodutu epone loetiono noi kotoma aiboisio nuka aikam agaria. Iyalongongosi apedorosio nuikamunitos aswamisinei numam ekisil ecamunit nuiswamasi kotoma aiboisio nuesubit bala inapakina.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo asi otiza fepi angu e'bi 'bezu 'diyi ma alia ra. Okpo e'ipi eyi ma asi otiza e'yo 'yeta azita palaa ku 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra angu e'dapi asianzu ru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka enkora y'eby'obushohi omu byaro. Ab'obushoborozi beeyongyeire kwerarikirira ebikorwa ebitahikire omu myanya egi erikureebeka nk'ey'obusingye.

eng_prompt: After years of hard work and dedication, he finally completed his degree. Excitement and uncertainty filled the air as he prepared to enter the job market.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'akola n'obunyiikivu, yasobola okumaliriza ddiguli ye. Essanyu n'obutali bukakafu byajjula empewo nga yeetegekera okuyingira akatale k'emirimu.
ach_prompt: I ngee mwaki mapol me tic matek, en otyeko kwan me digiri. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma en tye ka yubbe me donyo I cuk me tic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam kagogongu, abu ngesi kongetakin edigurike. Apotu aiyalama keda aiyalongongo kilelebunos kokwam nautar ngesi aitemonokin alomar toma osokoni loka aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu avasi azini asi feza be 'bori ma vutia, eri de asizu i vile diguri 'bo. Ayiko zoza azini e'yo 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ga angu ma alia erini i oturia fizu cu azi niri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, akahendera yaamara diguri ye. Okushemererwa n'okwerarikirira bikarugaho obu yaabaire nayeteekateekyera okutaaha omu katare k'emirimo.

eng_prompt: Facing mounting bills and limited job opportunities, she encouraged her son to find a way to contribute financially. After much thought, he decided to take up fishing, a skill he had learned from his grandfather.
lug_prompt: Ng'ayolekaganye n'ebisale ebigenda byeyongera n'emirimu emitono, yakubiriza mutabani we okunoonya engeri gy'ayinza okuyambamu mu by'ensimbi. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, yasalawo okutandika okuvuba, omulimu gwe yali ayize okuva ewa jjajjaawe omusajja.
ach_prompt: Pi cente madwong ma en tye kwede kacel ki peko me tic, en ocuku cwiny wode me yenyo yoo me miyo kony me lim. Ingee tam matut, en omoko tamme me cako mako rec, diro ma en opwonyo ki bot kwarone.
teo_prompt: Kojaasi ngesi keda ikapun luiyatakinos keda aswamisinei nu ikidioko, abu ngesi isinyikok okooke adumun epone loka aigang ikapun. Akaulo naka aomoom noi, abu ngesi koseu aikam agaria, acoa na esisiaunit ngesi kama ejai kwaruke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aje ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu drileba azi ni 'diyi ma ongmbo be were risi, eri eka i ma mvi ni geri azi esuzu i ma aza kozu robia ma alia. E'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, eri asi e'yo 'du e'bi 'bezu, ondua erini oni engazu i ma a'bini vu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'emishoro erikweyongyera hamwe n'emirimo etarikumara, akahiga mutabani we kuronda omuringo gw'okuhwera omu by'empiiha. Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga, akasharamu kutandika kukwata eby'obushohi, omurimo ogu yaayegire ahari ishenkuru.

eng_prompt: In an effort to better manage local fisheries and ensure compliance with regulations, the government announced a new registration initiative. As part of this initiative, all fishermen were instructed to register at the district offices.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuddukanya obulungi eby'obuvubi mu ggwanga n'okukakasa okugobererwa kw'ebiragiro, gavumenti yalangiridde enteekateeka empya ey'okuwandiisa. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abavubi bonna baalagirwa okwewandiisa ku woofiisi za disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me doro tic me mako rec ki neno ni ki lubu cik, gamente okatti ki yub manyen me coyo lucat rec. Macalo but yub man, kiwaco ki lumak rec weng me coone I opic me district.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitikitik agaria nuka atutubet ka awanyun ebe etupitai ikisila, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aiwadikao. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi kolimokinai ekamak agaria kere aiwadikaun ko oyapesin luko disitrikt.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'bi 'bepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru dika lezu 'ba ma obi azita eyi ma vuti, gamete azi e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi osizu o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba fe azita 'ba dria e'bi 'bepi 'diyini yi ma ru osizu ofisi distrikiti ni 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureeberera kurungi eby'obushohi omwihanga n'okureeba ngu ebiragiro nibikuratirwa, gavumenti ekarangirira enteekateeka nsya y'okwehandikisa. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, abashohi boona bakahaburwa kwehandikisa aha ofiisi za disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support local communities and improve their livelihoods, the government initiated a program aimed at providing resources to small-scale fishers. As part of this initiative, fishers were given fishing nets to enhance their work.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyamba abantu b'omu kitundu n'okutumbula embeera zaabwe ez'obulamu, gavumenti yatandikawo enteekateeka egenderera okuwa abavubi abatono eby'okukozesa. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abavubi baaweebwa obutimba bw'okuvuba okwongera ku mirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me konyo lwak me tedero ki ilo malo rwom me kwo gi, gamente ocako yub me miyo kony bot lumak rec matino-tino. Macalo but yub man, kimiyo tandaruwa bot lumak rec me medo rwom me tic gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang itunga luka atutubet ka aitojokar aijarakec, abu apugan kitegea ainapeta nuka aijaikin agaria lu ikidioko iboro. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi ijaikinai ekamak agaria aitiban nu aikam agaria kanu aitogogong aswam kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi atizu dika geri eyini aa'zu ri otuzu, gamete e'do otita azi 'ba e'bi 'bepi were 'diyi dri afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba fe 'ba e'bi 'bepi 'diyi dri imba e'bi 'bezu 'diyi eyini ani azi eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuhwera abantu b'omubyaro n'okutunguura emituurire yaabo,gavumenti ekatandikaho enteekateeka y'okuheereza abashohi b'ebyenyanja eby'okukoresa. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, abashohi bakahebwa obutimba bw'okushoha kwenda kwongyera aha mirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Illegal fishing has become a growing concern in many coastal communities. Despite regulations in place to protect marine life, some individuals choose to disregard the law for personal gain.
lug_prompt: Envuba etali mu mateeka yeeyongedde okweraliikiriza abantu bangi ku lubalama lw'ennyanja. Newankubadde waliwo amateeka agateekebwawo okukuuma obulamu bw'omubyenyanja, abantu abamu basalawo obutafaayo ku mateeka olw'okwefunira ebyabwe.
ach_prompt: Mako rec iwi alii dong odoko peko madit tutwal I kabedo mapol matye I dog nam. Kadi bed ni cik tye me gwoko jami makwo I nam, dano mukene yero me cayo cik ne pi cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Aiyem agaria namam ekisil ecamakinit erai ationis naepol noi kotoma atutubena nuipu nu idoketait. Karaida ejaas ikisila lu eyuaritai kanu ayuarite aijar naka icorin, icetunga eseunete apalunit ikisila kanu ameda kec bon.
lgg_prompt: E'bi 'beza azita palaa ku ri eca curu'do e'yo azi okporu ni eyi ma eselea angu yi tia 'diyi ma alea. Azita 'bani 'ba yi ma eselea 'diyi ma ta mbazu ra ti, 'ba azi 'diyi pe azita 'da ma vuti obizu orodri yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okujuba okutarikwikirizibwa, kweyongyeire kureetaho okwerarikirira omu bantu baingi abarikutuura aha rubaju rw'enyanja. N'obu haraabe hariho ebiragiro by'okurinda amagara g'omu nyanja, abantu abamwe nibareka ebiragiro ahabw'okweyendeza.

eng_prompt: When venturing out to catch fish, it's important to be mindful of the environment and local regulations. Safety precautions and responsible practices can help ensure a successful and sustainable fishing experience.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba ogenda okuvuba ebyennyanja, kikulu okufaayo ku butonde bw'ensi n'amateeka g'omu kitundu. Okwegendereza eby'okwerinda n'enkola ennungi bisobola okuyamba okukakasa obuvubi obulungi era obw'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka mako rec, pire tek tutwal me tamo I kom cwec ma orumuwa ki cik me tedero. Rwom me gwokke ki tic maber twero weko mako rec bedo ber dok ma rii.
teo_prompt: Arai ilosi jo aikam agaria, ibusakinit ijo apodokinit nuikamunitos ejautene lo akwap keda ikisila luka atutubet. Iwaitin lu ayuara keda iponesio luajokak epedorete aingarakin aimo aikam agaria najokan.
lgg_prompt: Eka mu e'bi 'be amve, eri orodriru aa'zu mile be angu ama agei ri ma dria azini azita angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu kililiru 'diyi azini 'yeta kililiru 'diyi eco fe e'yo e'bi 'beza ni drile suzaru azini aa'zu ewu drile ri ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooza kukwata ebyenyanja, n'eky'omugasho kwegyendesereza eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'ebiragiro by'omubyaro. Eby'okwerinda hamwe n'emitwarize mirungi, nibibaasa kuhwera omu kushoha kurungi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to protect our natural resources and promote sustainable fishing practices, the government has implemented strict regulations. As a result, all people who fish illegally will be arrested.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma eby'obugagga byaffe eby'obutonde n'okutumbula envuba ennungi, gavumenti etaddewo amateeka amakakali. N'ekinaavaamu, abantu bonna abavuba mu bumenyi bw'amateeka bajja kukwatibwa.
ach_prompt: I tute me gwoko cwec ma lubanga aye ocweyo ki tyelo kor tic me mako rec, gamente oketo cik matek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dano weng ma mako rec iwi alii kibi mako gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na ayuarite iboro luka Edeke ka aitopoloritor iponesio luka aikam agaria, abu apugan ibwaik ikisila luegogong. Kanuka ngun, eponio arocun itunga kere luekorete agaria komam ekisil ecamakinit.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu afa amavile nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini geri e'bi 'bezuri ma omgbo otuzu, gamete 'ba azita okporu 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga 'ba dria e'bi 'bepi azita palaa ku 'diyi obi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda eby'obuhangwa byaitu n'okushongyera eby'obushohi, gavumenti eteireho ebiragiro by'amaani. Ekyarugiremu, abantu boona abarikushoha omu buryo butahikire nibaija kukwatwa.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy investigation, authorities discovered a suspicious pattern of fish sales in the local market. When they set up surveillance, they quickly identified the man as the primary suspect.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene, ab'obuyinza baakizuula nti ebyennyanja bitundibwa mu ngeri eyeekengera mu katale k'omu kitundu. Bwe baatandika okulondoola, baamanya mangu omusajja oyo ng'ateeberezebwa okuba omukulu.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed pi kare malac, lutela gunongo kit ma rec tye kacat kwede I cuk me tedero. Ikare ma guketo yub me bedo ki wang mabit, gunongo laconi macalo ngat ma byek me bal tye I kome.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic naepol, apotu apedorosio odumutu epone lo eomitai ebe egwelanarere agaria kosokoni. Neadukunatar kesi aingic, apotu kesi kojenutu etunganan ngol kwape loetepesenitai noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ezu 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba eyi esu geri e'bi ozizu cuu ogogo 'diyi ma alea 'diyi onzi. Bani e'dozu e'yo eti ondazu 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo 'da ma dria ri mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kumara obwire buraingwa, ab'obushoborozi bakareeba omuringo mubi gw'okuguza ebyenyanja omu katare k'omukyanga. Ku batandikireho okukyondooza, ahonaaho bakareeba omushaija nk'orikubanza kuteekateekwaho.

eng_prompt: Desperate for money and food, he knew he had to take drastic measures. As he crept along the shore under the cover of darkness, he spotted the fishermen's gear left unattended.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba yali yeetaaga nnyo ssente n'emmere, yali akimanyi nti alina okubaako ky'akolawo. Bwe yabadde atambulira ku lubalama lw'ennyanja mu nzikiza, yalabye ebyuma by'abavubi nga tebirabirirwa.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me can cente ki cam, en onongo ngeyo ni myero otim gin mo matek tutwal. I kare ma obedo ka ngwec I dog nam I col piny, en oneno jami tic pa lumak rec ma pe ki gwoko gi.
teo_prompt: Koipudasi ngesi ikapun keda inyamat noi, ajeni ngesi ebe ibusakinit ngesi aswam nuepedorete ngesi aswam. Neautar ngesi alosit kotoma odoket kotoma amuton, abu ngesi koany iboro luka ekamak agaria luaponi kojalakinai komam ewanyunitai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo sende azini nyaka ako niri si, eri nii ra kini le ma 'ye e'yo azi okporu ni. Erini acizu yi tia angu inisiri ma alia, eri ndre 'ba e'bi 'be'ba 'diyi ma afa yini 'diyi ku asi kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda munonga sente n'eby'okurya, akamanya ngu aine kukora ekintu ky'amaani. Ku yaatamburiire aha rubaju rw'enyanja omu mwirima, akareeba ebikwato by'abashohi ebitarikureebwa.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation, the police gathered enough evidence to arrest him. The charges against him were serious, leading to a trial that would determine his fate.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo, poliisi yakungaanya obujulizi obumala okumukwata. Emisango egyamuggulwako gyali gya maanyi nnyo, ekyaleetedde okuwozesebwa okwali kujja okusalawo ebiseera bye eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut, abili gunongo caden ma oromo me make. Adot ma ki keto i kome obedo rac tutwal, ma oweko kipido i kome ma onongo bimoko ngo matye anyim mege.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok, apotu ipolisin odumutu aitogogongoret naedolit kanu aikamario ke. Epol noi emusago lo iwosatai ngesi, ido abu koyangau aipup emusago lo ebeit aitemokin nuikamunitos aijarake.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, polisi eyi tra afa ecetaru eyini ani ecozu eri bizu ra. E'yo 'bani to eri ma dria 'diyi onzi tu, erini ani fezu 'bani eri ma e'yo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga, poriisi ekarundaana obujurizi oburikumara kumukwata. Ebyabaire nibimuhakanisa bikaba biri eby'amaani, ekyaretsireho okuhurira orubanja orwabaire niruza kusharamu ebiro bye by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, we discussed the recent increase in thefts within the organization. To ensure the safety of our assets, the chairman emphasized the importance of vigilance among all staff members.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko, twayogedde ku kweyongera kw'obubbi mu kitongole gye buvuddeko. Okukakasa obukuumi bw'ebintu byaffe, ssentebe yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'obwegendereza mu bakozi bonna.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke, wanywako lok I kom lok me kwo matye kamede I dul ne. Me gwoko jami wa maber, won kom owaco ni lutic weng omyero gubed ma wanggi twolo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet, apotu sio etetemoto eipone lo eyatakinor akoko kotoma orionget. Kanu awanyun ayuara naka iboro wok, abu apolon eicolong kitogogong ajokis naka acobeu kanejaas eswamak.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, ama agbatara gba e'yo ogu ni curu'do tupi amuti 'da ma alea ri ma dria. Afa amavile 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru, ogua e'i 'da fe okpo orodri 'ba dria azi ngapi 'diyi ni aa'zu mile be 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, tukahanuura aha kweyongyera kw'obushuma omu kitongore. Okureeba ngu eby'obugaiga byaitu bigumire, mukuru w'entebe akashoboorora omugasho gw'okwerinda omu bakozi boona.

eng_prompt: I've been keeping an eye on the market lately, and it's shocking how much everything has gone up. Just the other day, I noticed the cost of seafood at the grocery store was through the roof.
lug_prompt: Mbadde ntunuulira akatale ensangi zino, era kyewuunyisa engeri buli kimu gye kigenze waggulu. Olunaku olwo lwennyini, nnalaba ebbeeyi y'emmere y'omu nnyanja mu dduuka ly'emmere ng'erinnye nnyo.
ach_prompt: Abedo ki wang I kom cuk I kare-ni, dok obedo me ngeng tutwal kit ma jami weng omede kwede malo. I nino mukato angec, aneno wel cam me nam I dukan tye malo tutwal.
teo_prompt: Auta eong aanyanar esokoni apakio nu, ido erai ibore yenitegelikina epone loepolorororor iboro kere. Apaaran ace, abu eong aany etiai loka inyamat luka ocor koiduka loegwelanarere inyamat luka ocor apol noi.
lgg_prompt: Ma ebi cuu ma mile ma ta mba o'du 'diyi ma alia, dika eri osutaru afa dria yini tuzu ongmbo angirisi. O'du azi 'diyi ma alia, ma ndre aje seafoodni dukani nyaka ozizuri ma alia 'diyi tu uru tu.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire nindeeberera akatare ebiro ebi, kandi nikitangaaza oku buri kimwe kyeyongyeire. Eizooba erindi, nkareeba emihendo y'eby'okurya by'omu nyanja omu duuka erikuguza eby'okurya eri ahaiguru munonga.

eng_prompt: As the fiscal year approached, the community gathered to discuss their priorities and needs. With various projects on the horizon, they felt it was crucial to understand the financial resources available.
lug_prompt: Omwaka gw'ebyensimbi bwe gwasembera, abantu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bye baali baagala n'ebyetaago byabwe. Nga pulojekiti ez'enjawulo ziri mu maaso, baawulira nga kikulu okutegeera ensimbi eziriwo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma mwaka me lim cok cok, lwak gugure me nywako lok I kom ngo ma omyero gukwong ki ngo ma gimito. Ki yub mapat-pat matye kabino anyim, gubedo ki tam ni pire tek tutwal me niang lim ma tye.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete ekaru loka ikapun, apotu itunga kotukokinos kanu aitemitem nu ekotosi kesi keda nu ekotosi kesi. Keda ipurojektin luegelegela luebeit aitodolikin, apotu kesi kowomitos ebe ejokuna noi amisiikin ikapun lu ejaas.
lgg_prompt: Eli robia ni ri ni ecazu ogogo, ongulumu eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo eyini le 'diyi pie. Otita ndundu eyini e'dozu 'disi, eyi ega kini eri orodriru afa robia esuzu 'diyi ma vata ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omwaka gw'eby'esente ku gwahikire, abantu baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha byetengo byabo n'ebibarikwetenga. Ahabw'okugira ngu hariho purogyekiti nyingi ezirikugyenda omu maisho, bakareeba ngu n'eky'omugasho kumanya obuhwezi bw'esente oburiho.

eng_prompt: Before making any decisions for the upcoming year, he wanted to ensure everyone was on the same page regarding our financial situation. To facilitate this, he shared last year's budget with us.
lug_prompt: Nga tannasalawo kintu kyonna ku mwaka ogujja, yayagala okukakasa nti buli omu ali ku ludda lwe lumu ku bikwata ku mbeera yaffe ey'ebyensimbi. Okutuyamba okukola kino, yatubuulira embalirira y'omwaka oguwedde.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe omoko tam mo keken pi mwaka manyen, en onongo mito ni dano weng gubed ki tam marom I kom lok me lim. Me tyelo kor man, en opoko bajet me mwaka ma okato kwedwa.
teo_prompt: Erongo ngesi itolomuna adioseununeta nuka ekaru lo ebunit, akoto ngesi awanyun ebe ejenete itunga kere nuikamunitos ejautenekosi loka ikapun. Kanu aingarakin ngun, abu ngesi kimor keda sio ebajet lo okaru je.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di eri 'duni e'yo azini eli emupi ri ma dria ku, eri le ndra ne ra kini 'ba dria yi e'yo ama vile e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, eri ece ama be bajeti eli ajeriniri ra.
nyn_prompt: Atakakozire encwamu yoona y'omwaka ogurikwija, akaba nayenda kuhamya ngu buri omwe aine enteekateeka emwe aha bikwatiraine n'embeera yaitu y'esente. Okuhwera eki, akatugambira embaririra y'omwaka oguhwaire.

eng_prompt: As we reviewed the financial documents, it became evident that several key details were missing. We struggled to understand the allocations and priorities outlined in the proposal.
lug_prompt: Bwe twekenneenya ebiwandiiko by'ebyensimbi, kyazuuka nti ebintu ebikulu bingi byabula. Twalwana okutegeera engabanya n'ebintu ebikulu ebyayogerwako mu kiteeso.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka ngiyo karatac me lim, nen atyer kamaleng ni jami mapigi tego mapol orem. Watye ka tute matek me niang jami ma omyero ki mi ki dano ki jami ma omyero gubed mukwongo malube ki tam ma kimiyo.
teo_prompt: Neasesenia sio apapulai nuka ikapun, apotu kojenutu ebe amamete akiro nuipu. Apotu sio ationikisi amisiikin eipone lo ijaikitai ikapun keda iboro luepolok noi luejaasi toma aomisioit.
lgg_prompt: Amani kokobi e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andriria, eri eca e'dazaru kini e'yo okporu karakara yi avi ra. Ama esu e'yo ewaru afa 'bani awale 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo 'bani 'ba e'yo okporu 'diyi ma dria otita 'da ma alea 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Ku twashwijumeire ebihandiiko by'esente, kikarebeka butunu ngu ebintu bikuru bingi bikaba bibuzire. Tukatunga oburemeezi bw'okwetegyereza obuheereza n'ebikuru ebirikuza kwebemberwa omu kiteiso.

eng_prompt: After thorough discussions and revisions, the final version of the budget has been completed. It is now ready for submission to the ministry of finance.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'okukyusaamu, embalirira esembayo emaliriziddwa. Kati kyetegefu okuweebwayo eri minisitule y'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok matut ki ngiyo kor byek me lim dong kityeko tyeko coc me agiki me byek me lim. Kombedi dong tye atera me cwalo bot jang miri makemme ki lok kom lim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitemitem keda airereonor, adaun aitolomun ebajet lo awasia. Ekapakina kwana aijukar erionget loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza kililiru azini e'yo otiza ma vutia, 'ba de otita ajeni asizuri 'bo. Eri sa'wa 'disi ngonde 'bani eri fezu okalamvu robia niri vu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga n'okugaruka kushwijuma, embaririra y'ahamuheru yahwa. Hati kyeteekateekire kuheebwayo omu minisiture y'eby'esente.

eng_prompt: The finance committee finalized their proposals after weeks of deliberation. With all members in attendance, they were ready to share their findings.
lug_prompt: Akakiiko k'ebyensimbi kaamaliriza ebiteeso byaako oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okumala wiiki eziwera. Olw'okuba bammemba bonna baaliwo, baali beetegefu okugabana bye baali bazudde.
ach_prompt: Dul madoro lok kom lim gumoko tamgi I ngee cabit mapol me tam. Ki lumemba weng ma gubedo tye, gubedo atera me nywako ngec ma gunongo.
teo_prompt: Abu ekomiti loka ikapun kongetak aomisio kec akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aitemitem. Keda ajaut naka imeban kere, ekapakina kesi aimor akiro kec.
lgg_prompt: Komiti e'yo robia ni 'diyi ondrepi ri de asi egata yini 'diyi ma dria sabiti 'bani e'yo onzezu 'bori ma vutia. Memba dria emu'ba 'diyi pie, eyi ndra ngonde e'yo eyini esu 'diyi awazu.
nyn_prompt: Akakiiko k'eby'empiiha kakahendera enteekateeka zaako bwanyima y'okuteesa kumara esande nyingi. Ahabw'abanyakibiina boona abaabaire bariho, bakaba beteekateekire kugabana ebyarugire omu bigyezo byabo.

eng_prompt: After the meeting, he expressed his disappointment over the misunderstanding that occurred during the discussion. In light of this, he requested us to apologize to the minister of finance.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'olukiiko, yalaga obwennyamivu olw'obutategeeragana obwaliwo mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo. Okusinziira ku kino, yatusabye okwetondera minisita w'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Ingee kacokke, en onyuto cwer cwinye pi peko me niang ma obedo tye ikare me nywako lok. Ma lubbe ki lok man, en olego wa me kwayo kica bot minista ma loyo lok kom lim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airiamunet, abu ngesi kitodu aiyalongongoke kanuka amamus acamanar kotoma airiamunet. Kanuka ngun, abu ngesi ilip iso aitironikin nejai eminisita loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Dri fuza 'da ma vutia, ece i ma candi e'yo erita ako ni 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, eri ai ama truta ai'zu minisita robia niri vu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'orukiiko, akooreka okwetomboitwa kwe ahabw'obutetegyerezana obwabaireho omu kuhanuura. Ahabw'enshonga egi, akatushaba okushaba okusaasirwa owa minisita w'eby'esente.

eng_prompt: Despite the country's rich natural resources and potential for economic growth, the majority of the workforce struggles to make ends meet. This economic disparity is particularly evident in rural areas, where job opportunities are scarce.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'eggwanga lirimu eby'obugagga eby'omu ttaka bingi n'obusobozi bw'okukulaakulana mu by'enfuna, abakozi abasinga bafuba okweyimirizaawo. Enjawulo eno mu byenfuna yeeyolekera nnyo mu byalo, emirimu gye mitono.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lobo man tye ki lonyo me cwec ma orumuwa ki kero me dongo lobo, pol pa lutic tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Apoka-poka me lim man nen tutwalle I caro kama tic nok iye.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi akwap keda iboro luibusiak noi luka edeke keda apedor naka apol naka ikapun, ipu itunga luiswamaete. Atiakatiaka na naka ikapun ewanyunitai noi kocaaloi, ne ikidioko noi aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: Kari ni tro ovuzu lonyi nyakuni 'diyi be angiri azini ecozu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia ra ti, 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi ma pari yi dri ci afa dria esuzu. Esele coza e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alia 'diri e'da tuni angu caluru 'diyi ma alia, drileba azi ni 'diyi ma kalafe ni ovuzu were.
nyn_prompt: N'obu eihanga ryaba riine eby'obuhangwa bingi n'obushoboorozi bw'okutunguuka omu by'entaasya, abakozi abarikukira obwingi nibarwana kwebaisaho. Obutabanguko omu by'entaasya nibweyoreka munonga omu myanya y'ebyaro, ahu emirimo etari mingi.

eng_prompt: The rising cost of living has put immense pressure on household budgets. As a result, many families are struggling to make ends meet.
lug_prompt: Ebbeeyi y'ebintu erinnya etadde akazito ku mbalirira y'amaka. N'ekivuddemu, amaka mangi galwana okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: Rwom me mede pa wel jami ma mite pi kwo oketo lyeto madit tutwal I kom byek me lim pa gangi. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi mapol tye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Apol naka itiaisinei luka aijar einakinit ebajet loka ikalia aiyalongong noi. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ikalia luipu aijar.
lgg_prompt: Aje idri nyazani tupi 'diyi 'ba e'yo okporu bajeti aku yini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, familia karakara eyi dri ci afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'emihendo y'ebintu, kireesireho oburemeezi bw'amaani aha mbaririra y'amaka. N'ekyarugiremu, amaka maingi nigateganisibwa okureeberera ebyetaago byago.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the latest financial reports, it has become clear that our current spending plan is no longer feasible. To ensure we stay on track, the budget must be revised.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya alipoota z'ebyensimbi ezisembyeyo, kyeyoleka bulungi nti enteekateeka yaffe ey'okusaasaanya ssente kati tekyakola. Okusobola okukakasa nti tusigala ku mulamwa, embalirira erina okuddamu okwetegerezebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo adwoki me tic ki lim ma okato cokcok-ki, nen atyer kamaleng ni yub me tic ki lim ma watye kwede kombedi dong pe twero tic. Me neno ni wabedo I yoo matir, omyero kilok byek me lim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor iripotan luka ikapun luitetiak, ecai cut ebe mam bobo ikapun lu itwasamao kwape kwana epedorete aswam. Kanu awanyun ebe iboyete oni, ibusakinit airereor ebajet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo siza robia ni o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini otita amani robia ayuzu sawa 'disi ri econi curu'do azi nga ku. Ama ni aa'zu geri kililiru ri ma alea, le 'ba ma oja bajeti 'da ma ale ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ripoota z'eby'empiiha, nikyerekwa butunu ngu enteekateeka yaitu eriho hati terikubaasa kukorwa. Okureeba ngu tuguma aha muhanda, embaririra eshemereire kugarukwamu.

eng_prompt: The meeting was filled with confusion as the complex terminology left many participants scratching their heads. Despite the presenter’s efforts to clarify, it was clear that the majority were still lost.
lug_prompt: Olukungaana lwali lujjudde okutabulwa ng'ebigambo ebizibu byaleka abeetabye mu lukuŋŋaana nga beewuunya. Newankubadde omutegesi yagezaako okunnyonnyola, kyali kyeyoleka bulungi nti abasinga obungi baali bakyabuzaabuziddwa.
ach_prompt: Kacoke ne opong ki anywena-nywena pien nyig lok mapat-pat ma obedo tye oweko dano mapol obedo ka yelo wigi. Kadi bed ni lami lok angea ne otute matek me niango dano, nen atyer kamaleng ni polgi pud orwenyo ngecgi.
teo_prompt: Apotu airiamunet ngin kilelebunos naarai apotu akiro ngun kojalakisi itunga luipu aiyalongong akou. Karaida abu etodianaran iswama agogongu aitetem akiro ngun, apotu kojenutu ebe mam itunga luipu ejenete.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea e'yo ndundu eyi ndra ci e'yo 'bani e'yo nzezu eyi ma dria 'diyi fe 'ba karakara eyi ma dria e'yo ega eyi ma dria. Ba e'yo oyu'ba 'diyi ni tro okpo 'ba e'yo ecezu ra ti, eri e'da kililiru kini 'ba abari avi nga po'di ra.
nyn_prompt: Orukiiko rukaba rwijwire okubuzabuzibwa ahabw'okugira ngu ebigambo ebitarikwetegyerezibwa bikareetera abaabaire bariho okwetomboita emitwe yaabo. Oihireho amaani g'omwebembezi w'eihanga okushoborora, kikarebeka butunu ngu abaingi bakaba batarikumanya.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, he emphasized the importance of trust and accountability in our financial dealings. To ensure clarity, he requested us to be transparent about the expenditures.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana, yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'obwesige n'embalirira mu nkolagana yaffe ey'ebyensimbi. Okusobola okukakasa obwerufu, yatusabye okubeera abeerufu ku nsaasaanya.

teo_prompt: Kanu aitam aitojokar adumunun akipi nu elaete, apotu itunga imorikikinos kanu aitemokin ationis naka aikidiokus na akipi. Apotu kesi itemokisi airiamununeta kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin ngun kosodete aitemokin ebe aiduk agilon ngesi epone loajokan kakere.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu yi ala esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu, ongulumu eyi emu tualu e'yo yi ako ni mupi drile ri ma aza kozu. Eyi otu mitingi eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu dika eyi ai kini bowaholu sizu ri geri muke ndeni ri i.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura oburugo bw'amaizi marungi, abantu bakakoragana kukora ahaburemeezi bw'eibura ry'amaizi erikugyenda omu maisho. Bakatebekanisa enkiiko z'okuhanuura aha nshonga kandi bacwamu ngu okwombeka naikondo nikyo kirikukirayo kukora gye.

eng_prompt: The team was under pressure to meet tight deadlines and cut costs. As a result, they opted for a less experienced workforce to handle the tasks.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu yabadde wansi w'okunyigirizibwa okutuukiriza ebisale ebikakali n'okukendeeza ku nsaasaanya. N'ekyavaamu, baasalawo okukozesa abakozi abatalina bumanyirivu kukola mirimu.
ach_prompt: Dul tuku ne onongo gitye I lyeto me cobo miti gi ikare me agiki ki dong dwoko piny wel cente ma mite. Macalo adwogi ne, guyero lutic ma pe gitye ki ngec muromo me timo tic ne.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi etimu keda aiyalongong naka aitodolikin ainapeta nuka apak ka aitidisiar itiaisinei. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi oseutu eswamak lu mam ejenete aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ndra okpo alea sa'wa asizuri ma ta mbazu azini aje ma omgbo esizu. E'yo 'disi, eyi pe 'ba azi ngapi nita be were 'diyi azi 'da eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu ekaba eri ahansi y'oburemeezi bw'okuhikiiriza ebiro by'ahamuheru n'okusharamu aha nshohoza. N'ekyarugiremu, bakasherura abakozi abataine bumanyirizi kukora emirimo.

eng_prompt: Due to the increasing demand for clean water in the community, the district has initiated a water drilling project. However, the current budget falls short of what is necessary to see it through to completion.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'amazzi amayonjo obweyongera mu kitundu, disitulikiti etandise pulojekiti y'okusima amazzi. Kyokka, embalirira eriwo kati tesobola kutuukiriza ekyo ekyetaagisa okugimaliriza.
ach_prompt: Pi miti me pii maleng matye kamede i kabedo wa, district ocako yub me tongo pii. Kadi bed kumeno, byek lim matye kombedi pe tye ki jami ma mite me neno ni kityeko.
teo_prompt: Kanuka eipuda loepol noi loka akipi nu elaete kotoma atutubet, etolomu edisitrikt epurojekt loka aibok akipi. Konye, ebajet loejai kopana mam itodolikini iboro lu ekotoi kanu aitodolikin itoni angetakin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu yi ala niri ma omgbo tuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, distrikiti e'do otita yi ogazu ri 'bo. Kani si, otita ajeni sawa 'disi ri cani e'yo 'bani lezu eri 'yezu kpere 'bani eri dezu ri ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwetenga amaizi marungi omu bantu, disiturikiti etandikireho purogyekiti y'okutimba amaizi. Kwonka, embaririra eriho obwahati terikubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo byayo.

eng_prompt: Despite the initial optimism surrounding the project, budget constraints quickly became apparent. As the planning phase progressed, it became clear that additional resources would be necessary to meet the project's goals.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga mu kusooka pulojekiti yabadde n'essuubi, ebisoomooza mu mbalirira byalabika mangu. Nga enteekateeka egenda mu maaso, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti ebikozesebwa ebirala byetaagibwa okutuukiriza ebigendererwa bya pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dano gubedo ki gen I kom yub eni, peko me byek me lim onen oyot-oyot tutwal. Ikare ma yub tye kawot anyim, nen atyer kamaleng ni lim mukene mite me cobo miti pa yub eni.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi itunga keda amuno naepol noi kanu epurojekt, apotu atiokisio nuka ebajet kojenutu katipet. Kwape elosi ainapeta, apotu kojenutu ebe ibusakinit aiyatakin ikapun kanu aitodolikin alosikineta nuka epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi 'baza ni otita 'da ma ageia 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo ewaru bajeti ni 'diyi e'da mbeleru. E'yo otita 'da ni muzu drile, eri eca e'da kini le 'ba ma esu afa ayuzaru azi eyi dika otita 'da ma otita eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe haabaire hariho amatsiko aha purogyekiti, eibura ry'embaririra rikarebeka juba. Omuringo gw'okuteekateekyera ku gwagumire nigugyenda omu maisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu eby'obugaiga ebindi nibyetengwa kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa bya purogyekiti.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and fundraising, the community eagerly awaited news about the future of the long-anticipated project. In a recent announcement, a certain organization has pledged to complete the construction process.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okuteekateeka n'okusonda ensimbi, abantu baali balindirira amawulire agakwata ku biseera bya mu maaso ebya pulojekiti eyali emaze ebbanga nga esuubirwa. Mu kulangirira okwakakolebwa, ekitongole ekimu kyeyamye okumaliriza omulimu gw'okuzimba.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki jogo cente, lwak obedo kakuru lok angea I kom anyim pa yub ma obedo kakuru pi kare malac. I lok angeya ma okatti cokcok-ki, dul mo ocikke me tyeko tic me gedo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka aituk ikapun, autasi itunga aidar iyemuto nuikamunitos oingaren naka epurojekt kangol. Kotoma alimoret napac, esumu erionget aitodolikin aduko.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuza azini robia trazu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu 'da te asi driasi e'yo ewu drialeri ma dria otita 'bani ebi te sawa ezu ri ma dria. E'yo azi eceza o'diru ni ma alea, amuti azi owi i e'yo afa sizu 'da dezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okurundaana esente, abantu bakaba bategyereize amakuru agarikukwata aha biro bya nyensya bya purogyekiti. Omu kurangirira okwabaireho juba, ekitongore kimwe kiraganiise kumaririza omurimo gw'okwombeka.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the need for a more efficient workflow, the district leader decided to empower his team. He believed that by sharing responsibilities, they could foster greater collaboration and innovation.
lug_prompt: Bwe yalaba obwetaavu bw'okukola obulungi emirimu, omukulembeze wa disitulikiti yasalawo okuwa ttiimu ye amaanyi. Yali alowooza nti bwe bagabana obuvunaanyizibwa, basobola okutumbula enkolagana n'obuyiiya.
ach_prompt: Ki niang ni tic omyero owot maber, latela me district omoko tamme me miyo kero ki luticce. En onongo tye ki niyee ni ka gupoko tic, ci gubi kelo ribbe ki diro manyen.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun eipud loka eswamae loajokan, abu engarenon lo edisitrikt itogogong etimu ke. Iyuunit ngesi ebe kowai lo aimor aswamisinei, epedorete kesi aitopolor aiswamanara keda aitolomunun iboro luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo 'bani lezu azi ngazu kililiru ri ndrezu risi, drice'ba distrikiti niri 'du e'yo okpo fezu i vile amuti 'diyi dri. Eri a'i ra kini yini azi awazasi, yi eco ti ecita azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'okukora kurungi,omwebembezi wa disiturikiti akasharamu kwongyera tiimu ye amaani. Akaba naikiriza ngu okugabana obujunanizibwa, nikibaasa kureetaho okukwatanisa n'okujumbura.

eng_prompt: Residents have been voicing their concerns about the accessibility of the area. Many have noted that the deteriorating infrastructure is making it increasingly difficult for traders and customers to reach the centre.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze babadde balaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku ngeri y'okutuukiriramu ekitundu. Bangi bakitegeddeko nti ebintu ebigasiza abantu awamu ebikyamu byeyongedde okukaluubiriza abasuubuzi n'abaguzi okutuuka mu bibuga.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gubedo ka nyutu lworo gi I kom yoo me oo I kabedo eni. Dano mapol guneno ni rwom me jami mapat-pat matye ka bale tye ka weko bedo tek tutwal ki lucat wil ki luwil me oo I dye boma.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos epatana adolokin aiboisit. Apotu itunga luipu koanyutu ebe etionikinit agwelanarak keda agwelak adolere osenta.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'bi asi otiza e'da angu 'da ma esuta ma dria. Ba karakara eyi ndre kini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma wura ezapiri ni fe tujari 'yepi 'diyini azini aje'ba eyini cazu angu 'da ma alea ri ecazu ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye batwire nibereka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'oburungi bw'omwanya. Baingi bakareeba ngu ebyombeko ebirikugyenda omu maisho nibigumira abashuubuzi n'abaguzi kuhika aha rurembo ahagati.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous requests from the community for improved infrastructure, the local authorities have remained unresponsive. As a result, many residents are frustrated with the ongoing traffic issues.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo okusaba kungi okuva mu bantu okulongoosa ebizimbe, ab'obuyinza mu byalo tebakola. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze bangi bennyamivu olw'ebizibu by'ebidduka ebigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lwak gubedo ka lego ni omyero ki med rwom me gedo, lutela me tedero pud pe gutimo gin mo. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero mapol cwinygi pe yom ki peko me gudu matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu ailipasinei kanejaas itunga kanu aitojokar aiboisio, mam apedorosio nuka atutubet iswamaete. Kanuka ngun, mam itunga luipu iyalamasi kanu atiokisio nu elosi akonye nuka amotokan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini lezu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ra ti, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi awi e'yo 'ye kokoru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ovu candisi e'yo nzila ni mupi drile 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okushaba kwingi kuruga omu bantu, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro tibaragizire eki bakozire. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baingi tibarikushemererwa ahabw'oburemeezi bw'ebiiruka oburikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: After weeks of dry weather, the sudden downpour took everyone by surprise. Many residents were unprepared for the intensity of the storm.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera ez'ekyeya, enkuba ey'amangu yeewuunyisizza buli omu. Abatuuze bangi tebaali beetegefu olw'amaanyi g'omuyaga.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol ma piny otwo, kot ma ocwe atura omako dano ducu atura. Lutedero mapol onongo pe guyubbe pi teko pa yamo magwa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka esabitin lu akamu, abu edou kisumik itunga kere. Mam itunga luipu akapakina kanu agogong naka ekwam.
lgg_prompt: Angu driza ma sabiti 'bori ma vutia, ozo 'dipi mbeleru ri 'du 'ba dria osuta si. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma karakara eyi awini eyi otu okpo ozo 'da niri si ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obwire bw'ekyanda kumara esande, enjura y'ahonaaho ekatangaza buri omwe. Abatuuragye abaingi bakaba bateteekateekire amaani g'eihunga.

eng_prompt: In recent weeks, the region has been experiencing unprecedented weather patterns, leading to severe flooding. As a result, many communities are struggling to cope with the aftermath of the storms.
lug_prompt: Mu wiiki eziyise, ekitundu kibadde kifuna embeera y'obudde etali ya bulijjo, ekiviiriddeko amataba amangi. N'ekyavaamu, ebitundu bingi birwana okugumira ebizibu ebyava mu kibuyaga.
ach_prompt: I cabit ma okato ni, kabedo man obedo kaneno kit ma piny tye ka lokke kwede, ma okelo pong pa pii. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo mapol tye ka lweny ki peko ma kot okelo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma isabitin lu atuboros, ajai aiboisit ngin keda ekuse ka etepe lo mam itodunit, ido abu koyangau ebulone loepol noi. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga luipu ainingosit aitikitik atiokisio nuka ekwam.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, angu 'da ebi e'yo angu mile ni 'diyi esu drile, e'yo fepi yi tiza okporu 'diyi ni. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu karakara eyi dri ci e'yo oli okporu 'da ni fe 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu sande ezihweire, ekyanga kitwire nikitunga embeera y'obwire etarikushushana, ekirikureetaho okushandara kw'amaizi. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi nibarwana kurwanisa oburemeezi bw'eihunga.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent heavy rains and increased traffic, the condition of our village roads has deteriorated significantly. To address this issue, residents in our village are working together to maintain community roads.
lug_prompt: Olw'enkuba ennyingi eyaakavaako n'entambula y'ebidduka eyeeyongedde, embeera y'enguudo z'omu byalo byaffe eyonoonese nnyo. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno, abatuuze mu kyalo kyaffe bakolera wamu okulabirira enguudo z'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Pi kot ma ocwe matek tutwal ma okato cokcok-ki ki mutoka ma dwong tutwal, rwom me gudu me carowa oballe tutwal. Me tyeko peko man, lutedero me caro wa tye ka tic kacelo me yubu gudi ma ikabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kanuka edou loepol noi lo atuboros keda amotokan nuipu noi, erono noi ejautene loka irotin luko ocalokosi. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, iswamaete itunga luka ocalokosi nepepe kanu aidar irotin luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'dipi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini nzila eyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, nzila calo amavile 'diyi ma wura eza i saaru. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, 'ba aa'pi calo amavileri ma alea 'diyi azi nga tualu nzila ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enjura nyingi n'ebiiruka ebyeyongyeire, embeera y'enguuto z'omubyaro byaitu esiisire munonga. Okukora aha nshonga egi, abatuuragye omu kyaro kyaitu bariyo nibakorera hamwe okureeberera enguuto z'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: In a small, remote community, access to emergency medical services has always been a challenge. Despite the growing population, resources remain limited, leading to concerns about timely medical assistance.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekitono, eky'omu byalo, okufuna obujjanjabi obw'amangu bulijjo kibadde kizibu. Newankubadde omuwendo gw'abantu gweyongera, ebikozesebwa bikyali bitono, ekireetera okweraliikirira ku bujjanjabi obutuuka mu budde.
ach_prompt: I kabedo matidi dok matye I caro, nongo kony me yot kom I kare ma peko opoto atura obedo peko madit tutwal. Kadi bed ni wel dano tye ka medde, jami ma mite pud nok, ma oweko dano tye ki lworo ni kony me yot kom pe obino ikare.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi lu ikidioko, adumunun amukian na engeso erai duc ationis. Karaida iyata enaaba loka itunga, ikidioko iboro lu itwasamao, eyangauni aiyalongongo kanu amukian kotoma apak.
lgg_prompt: Angu werea calo ru 'diyi ma alea, geri azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi mbeleru 'diyi esuzu ri ebi ovu sawa driasi ewaru. O'bi ma kalafe ni tuzu ra ti, afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni nga po'di were, e'yo fe asi otiza e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyiniri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu byaro bikye, okutunga obuheereza bw'amarwariro obw'ahonaaho kitwire kiri ekizibu. Oihireho okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu, eby'obugaiga bikiri bikye, ekirikureetaho okwerarikirira ahabw'obuhwezi bw'eby'amagara omu bwire.

eng_prompt: Recent heavy rainfall has caused rivers to overflow, leading to widespread devastation in the area. As a result, emergency services are struggling to respond to the growing crisis.
lug_prompt: Enkuba etonnya gyebuvuddeko yaleetedde emigga okubooga, ekiviiriddeko okusaanyaawo ebintu mu kitundu. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole ebikola ku by'amangu birwana okwanukula ekizibu kino ekigenda kyeyongera.
ach_prompt: Kot ma ocwe matek tutwal I kare ma okato ni okelo pong pa pii I nam ma oweko jami mapol oballe tutwal I kabedo eni. Macalo adwogi ne, dul ma miyo kony pi peko ma poto atura tye ka tute matek me lweny i kom peko matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Apolou naepol noi naka edou nes ayangau ailelebikin na icilena, ido abu koyangau amunar aiboisit. Kanuka ngun, eutasi luka engeso ainingosit aitemokin ationis na.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'dipi o'diru 'diyi fe yi ara yi tizu tre, e'yo angu ezapi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba azakoma mbeleru 'diyi dri ci e'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Enjura nyingi etandikire kureetaho okushandara kw'emigyera, ekireesireho okushiisha munonga omu kyanga. N'ekyarugiremu, ab'eby'okwerinda nibarwana kurwanisa oburemeezi obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Residents have grown increasingly frustrated with the deteriorating condition of their streets. As a result, community leaders are organizing a protest to demand immediate repairs.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze beeyongedde okunyiiga olw'embeera y'enguudo zaabwe eyeeyongera okwonooneka. N'ekyavaamu, abakulembeze b'ekitundu bategeka okwekalakaasa nga baagala okuddaabirizibwa mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Lutedero cwinygi tye ka cwer tutwal pi kit ma gudu gi tye ka bale kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me kabedo gitye ka yubu jemo me lego ni myero ki yub yub yub eni oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga lukatutubet itakadikisi noi kanu ejautene lo erono noi loka irotin kec. Kanuka ngun, eutasi engarenok luka atutubet aitemonokin aidiya kanu ailip aitemonokino katipet.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma asi eza e'yo nzila eyini aa'zu muke ku 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ngiringiri otu eyini ani lezu 'ba ma ede eyi mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye beeyongyeire kuhwa amaani ahabw'embeera mbi y'enguuto zaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, abebembezi b'ebyaro, nibatebekanisa okwesharinga kwenda ngu ebyombeko bikorweho juba.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the budget proposals, the committee raised concerns about the allocation of resources. In response to these issues, the district leader blocked the diversion of funds.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebiteeso by'embalirira, akakiiko kaalaga okweraliikirira ku ngeri eby'obugagga gye byagabanyizibwamu. Mu kwanukula ensonga zino, omukulembeze wa disitulikiti yalemesezza okukyusakyusa ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo byek me byek me lim, dul enoni onyuto lworo I kom kit ma ki poko kwede lim. Ma lubbe ki lok magi, latela me district ojuko tic ki lim mapat.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor aomisio nuka ebajet, abu ekomiti kitodu aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos aikor iboro. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu, abu engarenon lo edisitrikt kimik ainyakario na ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otiza bajeti ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, komiti 'da nze asi otiza e'yo lonyi awaza ma dria ra. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi atri e'yo 'bani robia ojazu 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma enteekateeka y'embaririra, akakiiko kakoreka okwerarikirira aha ku eby'obugaiga byagabaniisibwe. Omu kugarukamu enshonga ezi,omwebembezi wa disiturikiti akaremesa okuhindura esente.

eng_prompt: The local government has approved a new infrastructure project aimed at improving connectivity. This initiative is expected to enhance transportation and accessibility for residents and businesses alike.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebitundu ekkirizza pulojekiti empya egendereddwamu okutumbula eby'empuliziganya. Enteekateeka eno esuubirwa okutumbula entambula n'okutuuka eri abatuuze ne bizinensi.
ach_prompt: Gamente me tedero oyee yub manyen me kubu lwak. Yub man kibyeko ni obi weko wot bedo yot ki lwak ki biacara bene.
teo_prompt: Abu apugan na okwap itigogong epurojekt loitetet lo ebeit aitojokar arucokina. Eomitai ebe ebuni aswamisioit ngin aitojokar elose ka adolokin itunga keda ibiasaran.
lgg_prompt: Gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ai otita o'diru 'bani lezu e'yo eyi ecizu ri ma omgbo otuzu. Ba ega e'yo 'di ni nga geri acizu 'diyi ma omgbo otu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini tualu tujari 'yepi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebyanga eikiriize purogyekiti ensya y'okwombeka ebyombeko erikugyenderera okutunguura eby'empurizagana. Ekigyendererwa eki nikiteekateekwaho kutunguura eby'engyenda n'okuhika aha bantu n'eby'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent infrastructure challenges, officials have prioritized the improvement of transportation networks. As a result, the government is exploring partnerships to expedite necessary projects.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebizimbe gye buvuddeko, abakungu bakulembezza okutumbula ebyentambula. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti enoonyereza ku nkolagana okusobola okwanguya pulojekiti ezeetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me tic mapat-pat matye cokcok-ki, lutic guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom yubu yoo me wot. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente tye ka yenyo lurem me tyelo kor yub ma mite.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nu ejaas pac, apotu eswamak kisingarenitos aitojokar elose. Kanuka ngun, euta apugan aingic aimorikikina kanu aisunyakin ipurojektin lu ekotoi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru angu siza ma dria o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba 'diyi 'ba e'yo okporu geri acipa ni 'diyi ma otuza ma dria. E'yo 'disi, gamete ni e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eti onda otita orodriru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.

lug_prompt: Ng'ebiragiro by'omuggalo biteekebwa mu nkola okukomya okusaasaana kw'akawuka, abantu bangi beesanga nga basibiddwa awaka n'abo abaali babayisa obubi. Embeera eno ey'entiisa yaleetawo okweyongerayongera mu alipoota z'obutabanguko mu maka n'okusobya ku bakazi okwetooloola eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma kiloro piny me gengo nya pa two corona, dano mapol onongo gitye I ganggi ki joo ma gubedo ka nywaro tic kwedgi. Lok man ma kelo lworo ni okelo medde pa lok me tim gero me ot ki butu tek tek I kin anyira I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kwape aponi ibwaikinai agolokinio naka akwap kanu aitikitik awea naka ekorona, apotu itunga luipu kodumutu ebe egolokinitai oreria keda itungakec. Abu ejautene lo loetiono noi koyangau aiyatakin na iripotan luka amumu nakokalia keda aibu asiyol kotoma akwapuwok kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo angu ti opizaniri 'bazu azo 'da ma ereta atrizu, 'ba karakara eyi esu eyi aku eyi ma alea 'ba eyini candi fezu 'diyi pie. E'yo onzi 'di fe o'duko e'yo ngiringiri aku eselesi azini e'yo 'bani 'ba obizu lazu okpo alia 'diyiniri tuzu kari ma alia dria.
nyn_prompt: Obukongi bw'eihanga ku bwabaire nibureetwaho okuzibira okujanjaara kw'akakooko ka muzibwe, abantu baingi bakeeshereka omu maka gaabo n'abo ababaire nibabatwariza kubi. Eki kikareetaho okweyongyera kw'obutabanguko omu maka hamwe n'okutoroboza omu by'okuteerana okwetoroora eihanga.

eng_prompt: Recent reports from local authorities indicate a troubling trend in the community. As the year progresses, concerns about rising crime rates have become more pronounced.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumye gye buvuddeko okuva mu b'obuyinza ku byalo ziraga omuze ogweraliikiriza mu kitundu. Ng'omwaka gugenda mu maaso, okweraliikirira ku bumenyi bw'amateeka obweyongera kweyongedde.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma aa ki bot lutela me tedero nyutu gin marac matye katimme ikin lwak. Ka mwaka ne woto anyim, lworo I kom medde pa rwom me timo bal omede tutwal.
teo_prompt: Eripoota loka apedorosio nuka atutubet itodunit epone loetiono noi kotoma atutubet. Kwape elosi ekaru, apol noi aiyalongongo kanu aiyatakin naka abilibilio naka ikisila.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru engazu drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi vu 'diyi ece e'yo azi asi otiza ejipi ongulumu eyi ma alea ni i. Eli ni muzu drile, asi otiza e'yo onzi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kuruga omu b'obushoborozi b'ebyaro, nizooreka enkora y'oburemeezi omu bantu. Omwaka ku gurikugyenda, okwerarikirira ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire kweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Many residents have expressed concerns about the deteriorating conditions of public buildings. It's becoming increasingly clear that action is needed to address these issues.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze bangi balaze obweraliikirivu olw'embeera embi ey'ebizimbe bya gavumenti. Kyeyoleka bulungi nti kyetaagisa okubaako kye tukolawo okugonjoola ensonga zino.
ach_prompt: Lutedero mapol gunyutu lworo gi i kom kit ma odi pa lwak tye ka bale kwede. Tye ka nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero kitim gin mo me tyeko peko magi.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu ejautene lo erono noi loka adukena nuka itunga. Ecai cut ebe ibusakinit aswam kanu aitemokin akiro nu.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi e'da asi otiza eyini e'yo jo o'bi eyini 'diyi ma wura onzi ri ma dria. Eri curu'do e'da kililiru kini le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo azi e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye baingi boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'embeera mbi y'ebyombeko bya gavumenti. Nikyeyoreka butunu ngu hariho ekishemereire kukorwa kukora aha nshonga ezi.

eng_prompt: An investigation into the hospital's financial records revealed several discrepancies. As auditors delved deeper, they uncovered alarming evidence of misappropriation.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza ku biwandiiko by'ebyensimbi by'eddwaliro kwazudde obutakkaanya bungi. Ababalirizi b'ebitabo bwe beeyongera okusima, baazuula obujulizi obw'entiisa obw'okukozesa obubi ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Kwed I kom rekod me lim pa ot yat onyuto apoka-poka mapol. I kare ma joo ma ngiyo kor tic ki lim gutimo kwed matut, gunongo lanyut mapol ma nyutu ni cente enoni kitiyo kwede i yo marac.
teo_prompt: Aingic naka aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun luka adekis abu kitodu amamus acamanar. Neautatar aanyanarak aingic, apotu kesi odumutu aitogogongoret naepol noi naka aitosom ikapun koipone kaloerono.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza e'yo robia ni arojo 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria ri isu e'yo eyi ma esele cozu ku 'diyi karakara. E'yo 'ba e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andri'ba 'diyi ni e'yo vuti ondazu 'boria, eyi esu afa ecetaru e'yo robia ayuza geri onzi si 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza aha bihandiiko by'eby'empiiha by'eirwariro, kukareetaho obutaikirizana bwingi. Abeebembezi b'ebitabo ku baayeyongyeire kucondooza, bakareeba obuhame oburikworeka ngu esente z'eihanga zikakoresibwa kubi.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated throughout the city as protests turned violent, leading to widespread chaos and destruction. As the unrest unfolded, many local establishments found themselves caught in the crossfire.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongedde mu kibuga nga okwekalakaasa kufuuse okw'effujjo, ekyaviiriddeko akavuyo n'okusaanyaawo ebintu. Obwegugungo bwe bwagenda bweyongera, ebitongole by'ebyalo bingi byasangibwa mu butabanguko.
ach_prompt: Lworo omedde I boma ne weng I kare ma jemo odoko gero, ma okelo kuku kuku ki balo jami mapol. Ikare ma kuku-kuku obedo tye, dul mapat-pat me tedero mapol gunongo gi I peko.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos koibuga kere naarai apotu aidiya kijulakinos amumu, ido abu koyangau amumu keda amumu. Neapotu amumu kogeutu, apotu itunga luipu kodumutu ebe ejaasi kesi toma akiro nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu aku ambu city niri ma alea dria eyini e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ojazu eyini ani e'yo ngiringiri ni azini afa ezaza ni 'diyi ejizu. E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ni e'doria, angu karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu eyi e'yo eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu rurembo ahabwokuba obwesharingo bukahinduka obw'akaimukiriro, ekyarugiremu akaimukiriro n'okushiisha ebintu. Obwimukiriro ku bwabaire nibubaho, ebitongore by'ebyaro bingi bikashangwa omu butabanguko.

eng_prompt: The school administration has recognized the need for additional housing due to the increasing number of students. As a result, plans were approved for a new boys dormitory to accommodate the growing population.
lug_prompt: Abakulembeze b'essomero bakitegedde obwetaavu bw'amayumba amalala olw'omuwendo gw'abayizi ogweyongera. N'ekyavaamu, enteekateeka zaakkirizibwa ez'ekisulo ky'abalenzi ekipya okusobola okusuza omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera.
ach_prompt: Lutela me gang kwan guniang ni omyero kimed odi pi wel lutino matye kamede. Macalo adwogi ne, kimoko yub me yubu ot butu pa awobe manyen pi wel dano matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Abu eyaitene lo esomero koany eipud loka itogoi lu iyatakina kanuka enaba lo idwe lu iyatakinos. Kanuka ngun, aponi itigogongorai aitemonokineta nuka aduketait naka isap kanu aidar enaaba loepol noi loka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Driceza sukulu niri esu ra kini le 'ba ma si jo azi eyi dika sukulu anzi eyi ma kalafe tupi tutu risi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ai otita sukulu anzi eyini sukulu lazu o'diru ni eyini ani 'ba eyi ma kalafe tupi tutu ri ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Abeebembezi b'eishomero bareebire ekyetengo ky'okwongyera amaju ahabw'omuhendo gw'abeegi ogweyongyeire. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka z'okwombeka oburaaro bw'aboojo obutsya zikaikirizibwa, kugira ngu abantu bagume nibyeyongyera.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for better healthcare services, local officials have been actively seeking financial support. Their efforts have paid off, as various organizations have stepped forward to contribute.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi obulungi, abakungu b'ebyalo babadde banoonya obuyambi bw'ensimbi. Kaweefube waabwe asasudde, ng'ebitongole eby'enjawulo bivuddeyo okuwaayo obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo kony me yot kom maber, lutic me tedero gubedo ka yenyo kony me lim. Tute gi okelo adwogi maber, dul mapat-pat bene okatti anyim me miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo aiyatakin kanu amukian najokan, eutasi eswamak luka atutubet aimo agangat na ikapun. Apotu aswamisiokec koropasi, naarai apotu iriongeta luipu kolomutu aijaikin agangat.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi muke 'diyi esuzu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi atita robia niri nda okporu. Okpo eyini 'ba ri esu orodri ra, amuti ndundu eyi efu drile afa fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda obuheereza burungi bw'eby'amagara, abakuru omu byaro batwire nibaronda obuhwezi bw'esente. Amaani gaabo garugiremu ebirungi, ahabw'okugira ngu ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe birugireyo kugaba obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: Many individuals and families fleeing conflict and persecution seek safety and a fresh start in unfamiliar places. To support these newcomers, various organizations have emerged to provide essential resources and assistance.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi n'amaka nga badduka entalo n'okuyigganyizibwa banoonya obukuumi n'okutandika obuggya mu bifo bye batamanyi. Okuyamba abapya bano, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bivuddeyo okuwa ebintu ebikulu n'obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol kacel ki gangi ma gitye ka ngweco lweny ki aunauna giyenyo gwok ki acaki manyen I kabedo ma pe gingeyo. Me konyo jo manyen magi, dul mapat-pat okatti me miyo kony ki jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu keda ikalia lu ekerete kotoma ojie keda aiticanio emoete ayuwara keda ageunet naitetet kotoma aiboisio numam kesi ejenete. Kanu aigang itunga lu luitetiak, apotu iriongeta luegelegela kitolomutu iboro ka agangat.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi tualu familia eyini apazu e'yo ngiringiri ni azini candi esuzu 'diyisi 'diyi tambaza nda dika eyi e'do o'diru angu eyini nile ku 'diyi ma alea. Atita fezu 'ba emupi o'diru 'diyi dri, amuti ndundu efu afa orodriru azini azakoma fezu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi n'amaka gaabo abarikuhunga entaro n'okuhiiganisibwa, nibaronda oburinzi n'okutandika busya omu myanya ei batarikumanya. Okuhwera abasya aba, ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe bitandikireho kuheereza eby'okukoresa n'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: After the storm damaged our village, we realized we needed medical assistance for the injured. With the roads blocked and communication down, we set out on foot to find help.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'omuyaga okwonoona ekyalo kyaffe, twakitegeera nti twetaaga obujjanjabi eri abaakosebwa. Olw'okuba enguudo zaali zizibiddwa era nga n'empuliziganya si nnungi, twatambula n'ebigere okunoonya obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Inge yamo magwa obalo caro wa, waniang ni wamito kony me ot yat pi jo ma onongo awano. Kit ma ki loro yoo ki kubbe obedo piny, wacito ki tyenwa me yenyo kony.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na ekwam aimusung ecalo kosi, apotu sio awanyutu ebe ikoto oni amukian kanu ngul luemusunguna. Keda agolokinio naka irotin keda amamus na arucokina, apotu sio aloto keda akeje aimo aingarakinio.
lgg_prompt: Oli okporu 'da eza ama vile calua 'bori ma vutia, ama esu ra kini ama le azakoma arojo ni 'diyi 'ba nya'biliko esupi 'diyi dri ra. Nzila yini ovuzu opizaru azini e'yo nzeza ni ovuzu ewaru risi, ama fu pasi muzu azakoma ndazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'eihunga kushisha ekyaro kyaitu, tuketegyereza ngu nitwetenga obuhwezi bw'eby'amarwariro ahabw'abo abahutaziibwe. Ahabw'okugira ngu enguuto zikingirwe kandi n'empurizagana etariho, tukagyenda n'ebigyere kuronda obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the area has experienced significant political instability and conflict. As a result, many individuals have been forced to flee their home countries in search of safety and security.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ekitundu kibaddemu obutali butebenkevu bungi mu byobufuzi n'obukuubagano. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi bawaliriziddwa okudduka mu nsi zaabwe okunoonya obukuumi n'obukuumi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, kabedo ne obedo ki lweny ki lweny mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol guringo ki I lobogi me cito ka yenyo gwok ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, etereikina aiboisit keda amamus na ainapakina keda ingungeta. Kanuka ngun, aponi kobuikinai itunga luipu akerit akwapin kec aimo ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, angu 'da esu e'yo ewaru politiki ni 'diyi tualu ngiringiri be. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi apa kari eyivile aku 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea risi angu tambaza esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi,ekyanga kitungire obutabanguko bwingi omu by'obutegyeki hamwe n'obutabanguko. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi bagyemesereziibwe okuruga omu mahanga gaabo kuronda oburinzi n'oburinzi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the number of displaced individuals fleeing conflict and persecution has surged across the continent. As a result, several nations have stepped up to provide refuge, with Uganda leading the way in hosting these vulnerable populations.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, omuwendo gw'abantu abanoonyiboobubudamu abadduka entalo n'okuyigganyizibwa gweyongedde okwetoloola ssemazinga. N'ekivuddemu, amawanga mangi gavuddeyo okuwa obubudamu, nga Uganda y'ekulembedde mu kukyaza abantu bano abateesobola.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, wel dano ma oringo lweny ki auna omede tutwal I lobo Afrika. Macalo adwogi ne, lobe mapol gukati me miyo luring ayela, kun Uganda tye ka telo yo me jolo dano magi ma peko tye i komgi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eyatakin enaaba loka itunga lu ekerete akiro nuka ingungeta keda aiticanio kotoma akwapin ace. Kanuka ngun, apotu akwapin nuipu kolomutu kanu aijaikin ikerai, ido Uganda ngesi engarenikinit kotoma aidar itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, kalafe 'ba angu kokoru e'yo ngiringiri ni azini candi feza ni 'diyi ni 'diyi ma kalafe tu angu ndundu eyi ma alea tutu. E'yo 'disi, kari karakara eyi efu emunyale eyi fezu, kari Uganda niri ni driceza 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, omuhendo gw'abantu abarikuhunga entaro n'okuhiiganisibwa gweyongyeire omuri Afirika. N'ekyarugiremu, amahanga maingi gatandikire kuhayo empungi, kandi Uganda niyo erikwebembera omu kutaayayisa abantu abo abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, the support of nearby residents becomes crucial for those seeking safety and stability. Many individuals and organizations step forward to offer assistance and resources to help newcomers integrate into their new environment.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, obuyambi bw'abatuuze abaliraanyewo buba bwa mugaso eri abo abanoonya obukuumi n'obutebenkevu. Abantu bangi n'ebitongole bivaayo okuwa obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa okuyamba abapya okwegatta mu bitundu byabwe ebipya.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, kony pa lutedero matye cok bedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi joo matye ka yenyo gwok ki ber bedo. Dano mapol kacel ki dule mapol gukati anyim me miyo kony ki jami me konyo jo ma obino manyen me donyo I kabedo gi manyen.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, agangat naka itunga lu idunyare erai ibore yenepol noi kanejaas ngul lu ekotosi ayuwara keda ainapakina. Itunga keda iriongeta luipu elomunenete kanu aijaikin agangat keda iboro lu ingarakinete itunga luitetiak aimorikikin keda aiboisio kec nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, atita 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma agei 'diyi niri eca orodriru 'ba ageitema lepi 'diyi dri. Ba karakara eyi tualu amuti karakara eyi pie emu drile azakoma fezu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu 'ba emupi o'diru 'diyi ma aza kozu eyi ma aa'ta angu eyini aa'zu o'diru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, obuhwezi bw'abatuuragye abarikutuhereraire nibukora munonga ahari abo abarikwenda obusingye n'obutebekana. Abantu baingi hamwe n'ebitongore nibigyenda omu maisho okuheereza obuhwezi n'ebintu ebirikubaasa kuhwera abasya kwejumba omu myanya yaabo misya.

eng_prompt: Uganda has become a significant host country for displaced individuals seeking safety and stability. As a result, many people fleeing conflict and persecution have crossed its borders.
lug_prompt: Uganda efuuse ensi esinga okukyaza abantu ababundabunda abanoonya obukuumi n'obutebenkevu. N'ekyavaamu, abantu bangi abadduka entalo n'okuyigganyizibwa basaze ensalo zaayo.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda odoko kabedo maber tutwal pi luring ayela ma gitye ka yenyo kuc ki ber bedo. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol ma gitye ka ngweco lweny ki aunauna gukato I wang lobo ne.
teo_prompt: Erai Uganda akwap na ijaununei itunga lu ekerete aiboisio kec lu ekotosi ayuwara ka ainapakina. Kanuka ngun, apotu itunga luipu luekerete kotoma ojie keda aiticanio kotuboto ikoruo ke.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri eca kari azi orodriru 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ma ta mbapi ageitema azini asianzu lepi 'diyini. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi apapi e'yo ngiringiri ni azini candi feza ni 'diyisi 'diyi ali mu kari 'di ma woko eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Uganda ehindukire eihanga ry'omugasho omu kutaayayisa abantu abarikuronda obusingye n'obutebekana. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi abarikuhunga entaro n'okuhiiganisibwa, bashaziremu ensharo zaayo.

eng_prompt: After years of advocating for better healthcare facilities, the community finally received the news they had been waiting for. The local council announced plans to construct a state-of-the-art hospital to serve the growing population.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga balwanirira eby'obujjanjabi ebirungi, abantu baasobola okufuna amawulire ge babadde balindirira. Akakiiko k'ekyalo kalangiridde enteekateeka z'okuzimba eddwaliro ery'omulembe okusobola okuweereza abantu abeeyongera.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lweny pi ot yat maber, lwak dong gunongo kwena ma gubedo kakuru. Lutela me tedero guwaco ni gitye ki yub me yubu ot yat me rwom ma lamal tutwal pi wel dano matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aipuga kanu amukian najokan, apotu itunga kodumutu iyemuto lu autasi kesi aidar. Abu ekansulo loka atutubet kolimo aitemonokineta nuka aiduk adekis na itegelikina kanu aijanakin itunga lu eyatakinos.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyini a'di 'dizu arojo muke 'diyi esuzu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu eyi esu asizu e'yo eyini ebi te 'bori ra. Kanisulu angu 'da ma alea ri azi otita eyi arojo wura o'diru ni sizu kalafe 'ba eyini tupi tutu ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okurwanirira obuheereza burungi bw'eby'amagara, abantu bakahendera batunga amahurire agu babaire bategyereize. Akakiiko k'ekyaro kakarangirira enteekateeka y'okwombeka eirwariro ry'omurembe, okubaasa kuheereza abantu abarikweyongyera.

eng_prompt: As the world grappled with the challenges of the pandemic, our village faced its own unique struggles. Many families found themselves in difficult situations, leading to a rise in unexpected circumstances among the youth.
lug_prompt: Ng'ensi yonna erwanagana n'okusoomoozebwa kw'ekirwadde bbunansi, ekyalo kyaffe nakyo kyayolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa okwenjawulo. Amaka mangi geesanga mu mbeera enzibu, ekiviiriddeko okweyongera kw'embeera ezitasuubirwa mu bavubuka.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo ne tye ka lweny ki peko ma two korona okelo, caro wa bene obedo ki peko mapat-pat. Gangi mapol gunongo kwo matek tutwal, ma oweko peko ma pe byek tye I komgi omedde ikin bulu.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda atiokisio nuka adeka naka ekorona, apotu icaalo kosi kodumutu atiokisio nuegelegela. Apotu ikalia luipu odumutu awate kec kotoma ojautene loetiono, ido abu koyangau ationis naepol noi kanejaas atumunak.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni dri ciria e'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri be, calo amavileri esu e'yo i ma ngulupi ni 'diyi. Familia karakara eyi esu eyi e'yo ewaru eyi ma alea eyini ani e'yo 'ba ode eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obu ensi yoona yaabaire neetunga oburemeezi bw'endwara ruranda nsi, ekyaro kyaitu nakyo kikashanga oburemeezi bwakyo. Amaka maingi gakeeshangira omu mbeera ezigumire, ekyarugiremu okweyongyera kw'embeera ezitarikuteekateekwaho omu minyeeto.

eng_prompt: The challenging living conditions and lack of access to education in refugee camps have led to a rise in vulnerability among young people. As a result, many adolescents find themselves facing difficult circumstances that contribute to early pregnancies.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'obulamu enzibu n'obutafuna buyigirize mu nkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu bireetedde okweyongera kw'obunafu mu bavubuka. N'ekivuddemu, abavubuka bangi beesanga mu mbeera enzibu eziviirako okufuna embuto nga bakyali bato.
ach_prompt: Kwo matek kacel ki peko me nongo kwan I kem pa luring ayela oweko bulu tye ki peko mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, anyira ma mwaka gi pe oromo mapol nongo peko ma weko gi yac con.
teo_prompt: Aijar naetioko keda amamus na adumunun asioman ko okabin eyangaunit aijar naetiono kanejaas atumunak. Kanuka ngun, etereikina atumunak luipu keda ejautene loetiono lo eyangauni apotun.

lug_prompt: Mu mbeera enzibu, abawala abato bangi beesanga nga boolekedde okusalawo okukaluba. Nga bwebayita mu mbeera zaabwe enzibu, baddukira mu ngeri ezitali za bulijjo okweyimirizaawo.

teo_prompt: Kojautene loetiono, etereikina apesur nudidika keda aseununeta nuetioko. Kwape ejarete kesi keda aijarakec naetiono, etapit kesi aitwasam iponesio luetiono noi kanu aigang awatekec.

eng_prompt: In many communities around the world, cultural traditions and economic pressures can lead to devastating consequences for young women. As a result, their futures are often dictated by the decisions of their families and society.

lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara wudrikuru ma alea 'diyi ma alea, e'yo suruni 'diyi azini e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi eco fe e'yo onzi 'yezu oku oderu 'diyi dri ra. E'yo 'disi, e'yo familia yini azini ongulumu yini 'diyi ni pe 'diyi yi ma ewu drialeri ni.

ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor kwo maber ki yot kom ikin lutino kwan, lupwonye guniang ber pa timo jami mapat-pat mapat-pat maketo cwinygi I kom yot-kom. Macalo adwogi ne, kicako yub me yubu kabedo ma konyo lutino kwan me nywako lok ki timo jami ma kwako yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitopolor aijar najokan keda aijar najokan kanejaas esisiak, ejenete isisianakinak ajokis naka aswamisinei nuegelegela nuikamunitos angaleu. Kanuka ngun, etolomun ainapeta kanu aitolomun aiboisio nuigangitos esisiak aitolot akiro ka aswamisinei nuikamunitos angaleu.

eng_prompt: Education is a vital foundation for personal and professional growth. By prioritizing their studies, students can unlock numerous opportunities that will shape their lives.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges faced by students in their academic pursuits, community members gathered to discuss ways to enhance educational outcomes. They emphasized the crucial role of parental involvement in fostering a positive learning environment.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa abayizi kwe basanga mu kusoma kwabwe, abantu b'omu kitundu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okutumbulaamu ebikolebwa mu by'enjigiriza. Baakkaatiriza omulimu omukulu ogw'okwenyigiramu kw'abazadde mu kutumbula embeera ennungi ey'okusoma.

ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, telle I kom twero ki tic ki ngom omede tutwal I but lobo man mapat-pat. Gangi ki kabedo mapol nongo gitye I lweny me cik I kom ngom pa kwaro gi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eyatakinos ingungeta luka itunga luejaasi keda alupok kotoma akwapuwok kere. Ikalia keda atekerin nuipu ewanyunitos ebe ejaasi kesi toma ojisinei luka ikisila keda ingungeta kanu alupok nuka lukapapaakec.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve local governance and resource allocation, the government proposed a restructuring of administrative boundaries. After extensive discussions and consultations, lawmakers voted in favor of the initiative.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enfuga y'ebitundu n'okugabanya eby'obugagga, gavumenti yateesa ku kukyusa ensalo z'obukulembeze. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi n'okwebuuza, ababaka baakuba akalulu nga bawagira enteekateeka.
ach_prompt: I tute me yubu tela me tedero ki poko jami, gamente omiyo tam me loko wang lobo pa gamente. I ngee nywako lok ki tam mapol, luwang lwak I ot moko cik gu bolo kwir me cwako yub eni.

ach_prompt: I tute matek me ilo malo rwom me tela ki luwang lwak, gamente omiyo tam me kelo aloka-loka mapol I tela. Ingee nywako lok ki tam mapol, ot moko cik bene ocako counties manyen.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitam aitojokar epugae lo okwap keda abwoikinitok, abu apugan kitemok aijulanakineta nuipu nuka eyaitene. Akaulo naka aineranara keda aingitun akiro, abu airabet kitolomu akwapin nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu driceza angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, gamete fe egata ojata eyi ma dria. E'yo onzeza angiri azini e'yo oziza ma vutia, koloseni e'do vini counties o'diru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura obwebembezi n'obujwekyerwa omu byaro,gavumenti ekataho enteekateeka y'okuhindura omu by'obwebembezi. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga, eishengyero rikatandikaho amagomborora masya.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising in our community as differing opinions on development projects emerge. As a result, there are fights between the local leaders in our village.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu kyaffe ng'endowooza ez'enjawulo ku pulojekiti z'enkulaakulana zivaayo. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo okulwanagana wakati w'abakulembeze b'ebyalo mu kyalo kyaffe.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I kabedo wa I kare ma tam mapat-pat I kom yub mapat-pat me dongo lobo tye kabino. Macalo adwogi ne, lweny tye ikin lutela ma icaro wa.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotoma atutubetekosi naarai ejaas aomisio nuegelegela nuikamunitos ipurojektin lu apol. Kanuka ngun, ejai ingungeta kiding engarenok lu ocaalo kosi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi e'bi tu ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma alea e'yo ndundu eyi e'dazu otita angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, aco coza eyi drice'ba angu ma alea 'diyi ma eselea calo amavileri ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ci.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu kyanga kyaitu, ahabw'okugira ebiteekateeko bitari bimwe aha purogyekiti z'entunguuka. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho endwano ahagati y'abebembezi b'ebyaro omu kyaro kyaitu.

eng_prompt: During the heated debate, tensions ran high as both candidates sought to gain the upper hand. In a desperate attempt to undermine her credibility, her opponent falsely accused her.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi, obunkenke bwavaayo ng'abeesimbyewo bombi bagezaako okufuna obuyinza. Mu kaweefube w'okutyoboola obwesige bwe, gwe yali avuganya naye yamuwaayiriza.
ach_prompt: Ikare me laro lok matek tutwal, telle obedo tye ikin lucungu aryo weng ma obedo ka yenyo loc. I tute matek tutwal me balo gene ne, ngat ma obedo ka pyem kwede okok I kome I goba.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apak naka epeget loepol noi, apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos naarai apotu abwaak iarei kere otamata aitelekaar. Kotoma aitam aitolitol aiyuunike, abu loaboloboloete keda ngesi kitoron ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Sawa agbatara okporu 'da ma alea, e'yo 'ba pa tupi 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea ri tu uru 'ba iri 'diyi ni geri ndazu okpo esuzu. E'yo 'bani lezu eri ma e'yo 'bazu onzi, 'ba ageti otipi eri be 'diyi to eri enzoru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura kw'amaani, obunkenke bukaba buri ahaiguru ahabw'abeesimbireho boona kuronda obushoborozi. Omushaija owaabaire naamuhakanisa akamubeeherera, arikugyezaho kuremesa abantu kumwesiga.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure that everyone's voice is heard, the community has organized a series of town hall meetings. These discussions will help outline the qualities and vision they seek in their next leader.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti eddoboozi lya buli omu liwulirwa, ekitundu kitegese enkiiko za town hall eziwerako. Okukubaganya ebirowoozo kuno kujja kuyamba okulaga engeri n'okwolesebwa kwe banoonya mu mukulembeze waabwe addako.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni dwon dano weng owinye, lwak guyubu kacoke mapol I town hall. Nywako lok man bikonyo me niang kit ki neno ma omyero gubed kwede I kom latela gi manyen.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe epupio eporoto lo itunga kere, etemokisi itunga airiamununeta nuipu. Ingarakini ineresinei lu aitodun iponesio ka aomisio nu ekotos kesi kotoma engarenon lo etupakini.
lgg_prompt: Lezu nezu ra kini 'ba dria ma o'duko eri ra, ongulumu 'da otu mitingi tawuni hall ru 'diyi karakara. E'yo onzeza 'diyi nga azakoma fe wura yini le drice'ba yini vileri ma alia 'diyi ma e'dazu.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya ngu eiraka rya buri omwe nirihurirwa, abantu batebekaniise enkiiko nyingi. Okuhanuura oku nikwija kubahwera kumanya emitwarize n'ebirooto ebibarikwenda omu mwebembezi waabo orikukurataho.

eng_prompt: Feeling increasingly frustrated by the rumors circulating about her, she decided it was time to confront her accusers. In a meeting with her colleagues, she made her expectations clear.
lug_prompt: Olw'okunyiiga olw'olugambo olwali lumwetoolodde, yasalawo nti kye kiseera okutunula mu maaso g'abo abaali bamulumiriza. Mu nsisinkano ne banne, yalambika bulungi bye yali asuubira.
ach_prompt: Ki cwer cwiny madit tutwal I kom lok angeya ma obedo ka wot I kome, en omoko tamme ni kare dong oromo me lok I kom jo ma doto en. I kacoke ma obedo kwede ki lutic luwote, en otito maber adada ngo ma en mito.
teo_prompt: Aponi itakadikinai noi kanuka akiro nuelimoritai nuikamunitos ngesi, abu ngesi kotema ebe erai kwana apak naka aitepeg ngul luitoronete ngesi. Kotoma airiamunet keda ipaupake, abu ngesi kitodu nuewomit ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako erini e'yo 'bani nze eri ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri 'du e'yo kini sawa ca 'ba eri to'baa 'diyi ma ti ojizu ra. Mitingi azi'ba erini 'diyi pie ri ma alea, ece e'yo erini ega 'diyi kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira obusaasi obweyongyeire ahabw'orugambo orwabaire nirugyenda omu maisho, akasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okureeba abarikumubeeherera. Omu rukiiko na bagyenzi be, akashoborora gye ebi arikwenda.

eng_prompt: After years of dedicated service and community involvement, she was finally elected to lead the local government. Her vision for progress and unity resonated with the voters, securing her position as a trailblazer in the region.
