lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'aweereza n'obunyiikivu mu kitundu, kyaddaaki yalondebwa okukulembera gavumenti z'ebitundu. Okwolesebwa kwe okw'okukulaakulana n'obumu kwawuniikiriza abalonzi, ne kimukakasa ekifo kye ng'omukulembeze mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek ki keto cwiny I kom lwak, kiyere me telo gamente me tedero. Lanyut mege me dongo lobo ki ribbe oyomo cwiny lubol kwir, ma oweko en odoko ngat ma okelo alokaloka I but lobo man.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aijanakin keda aijaanakin itunga, aponi koseunai ngesi kwape engarenon loka apugan naka atutubet. Abu aomisioitike naka apol keda aimorikikina kocamak aseak, ido abu koinak ngesi adoketait naepol noi kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani azi ngazu asi driasi azini e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba asizu eri pe gamete ele 'diyi ma dri cezu. Egata erini e'yo angu ezoma ni azini ti ecita ni 'diyi ma dria ri fe 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi dri ayiko erini pari 'duzu ekile 'ba drice'ba angu 'di ma alea ri le.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi omu buheereza n'okwejumba omu byaro, ahamuheru akatooranwa kwebembera gavumenti y'ekyaro. Ekiteekateeko kye eky'okutunguuka n'okukwatanisa kikashemererwa abateezi b'akaruuru, ekyamuhaire omwanya gw'okuba omwebembezi omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: Unity and cooperation are essential for the prosperity of our community. Embracing our differences while fostering a sense of belonging will strengthen our bonds.
lug_prompt: Obumu n'obwegassi bikulu nnyo mu kukulaakulanya ekitundu kyaffe. Okukkiriza enjawukana zaffe nga tukuza enneewulira y'okubeera awamu kijja kunyweza enkolagana yaffe.
ach_prompt: Ribe ki winye obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo pa kabedo wa. Cwako apoka-poka matye I kinwa kun nongo watye ka winye I kinwa bijingo wat I kinwa.
teo_prompt: Aimorikikina keda aiswamanara epol ajokis kanu apol naka itunga wok. Ayangar atiaketaitikosi kosodi aitogogong eidicane wok.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita tualu ti ecita be 'diyi orodriru angu amavile 'diyi ma zota ni. E'yo ama esele cozu 'diyi a'izu tualu e'yo ama ma eselea 'diyi pie ri ni nga e'yo ama eselea 'diyi ma okpo enga.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa n'okukwatanisa n'eby'omugasho ahabw'okutunguuka kw'ekyanga kyaitu. Okwikiriza entaaniso zaitu kandi tukagumizamu nituhurira ngu turi bamwe, nikiija kwongyera amaani omukukwatanisa kwaitu.

eng_prompt: Economic development is a complex process that relies on various factors working in harmony. One of the key elements is the active participation and collaboration of the community members.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna nkola nzibu eyeesigama ku nsonga ez'enjawulo ezikolera awamu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu kwe kwenyigiramu n'okukolagana kw'abantu b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo I tenge me lim obedo yoo matek tutwal ma jenge I kom jami mapol matye katic kacelo. Gin acel ma pire tek en aye bedo tye ki winye ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Apol naka edumune loka ikapun erai ibore yenetiono noi ido ejai iboro luegelegela lu iswamaete nepepe. Adiopet koboro luapolok ngesi ajaut keda aiswamanara naka itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia ri eri e'yo azi kongolokoru asi'bapi e'yo ndundu yini azi ngazu tualuri ma dria. Afa azi okporu 'diyi ma azi eri 'ba ongulumu ma alea 'diyi ma ti icizu azini ti ecizu tualu.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu by'entaasya n'omuringo gw'amaani ogurikwetengwa ahabw'enshonga nyingi ezirikukorera hamwe. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru n'okwejumba n'okukwatanisa kw'abantu b'omukyanga.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and challenge, the strength of a leader is often measured by their ability to connect with others on a human level. Fostering a culture of empathy and understanding can significantly enhance team dynamics and overall morale.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'okusoomoozebwa, amaanyi g'omukulembeze gatera kupimibwa ku busobozi bwe okukwatagana n'abalala ku mutendera gw'obuntu. Okutumbula obuwangwa bw'okusaasira n'okutegeeragana kisobola okutumbula enkulaakulana ya ttiimu n'empisa okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki peko, teko pa latela ipol kare kipimo ki kero ne me kube ki joo mukene. Pwonyo tekwaro me kica ki niang twero medo rwom me tic pa dul tuku.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko ka atiokisio, eponio ajenun agogong naka engarenon kotupitete apedorokec naka arucokina keda luce kwape itunga. Aitopoloun inonosio luka aitim keda apuponoro epedori aitojokar eswamae loka etimu keda iponesio luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alia, 'ba okpo drice'ba ni 'diyi ma ongmbo ma ongmbo yi ecizu 'ba azi 'diyi pie ri si. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea asi ndriza azini vata ma omgbo otuzu ri eco amuti eyi ma eselea 'ba eyi ma adriza otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutetegyerezibwa hamwe n'oburemeezi, amaani g'omwebembezi nigeipimibwa ahabw'okubaasa kwe kukwatanisa n'abandi aha rurengo rw'abantu. Okutunguura eby'obuhangwa by'okusaasibwa n'okwetegyerezana, nikibaasa kwongyera amaani omu tiimu hamwe n'emitwarize.

eng_prompt: As we gathered in the conference room, the atmosphere was charged with anticipation and hope. With a confident smile, the woman leader addressed the team, emphasizing the importance of unity in our mission.
lug_prompt: Nga tukungaanidde mu kisenge mwe bakuŋŋaanira, embeera yali ejjudde okweraliikirira n'essuubi. Ng'aliko akamwenyumwenyu, omukyala omukulembeze yayogeddeko eri ttiimu, ng'akkaatiriza obukulu bw'obumu mu kigendererwa kyaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wacokke I ot me cokke, dano mapol gubedo ki miti ki gen. Ki bwunyo matek tutwal, latela pa mon oloko ki joo ma obedo I dul enoni kun cuko cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa ribe I tic wa.
teo_prompt: Neautar sio atukokin toma agola naka airiamunet, apol noi aomisio keda amuno. Keda aimurimuria, abu angarenon na angor kiner keda etimu, abu kitogogong ajokis naka aimorikikina kotoma aswam wok.
lgg_prompt: Amani trazu pari otita imbatani ni 'diyi 'yezuri ma alia, angu nderi ma alia asi 'baza azini asi'baza be tre. Ayiko be, oku drice'ba 'da nze e'yo amuti 'da ma tia, erini asi 'bazu e'yo orodri ti ecita niri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Kuturikuteeranira omu kishengye ky'orukiiko, embeera ekaba erimu amatsiko n'amatsiko. Omwebembezi w'abakazi agambire tiimu n'akamwenyo k'amaani, arikworeka omugasho gw'okukwatanisa omumurimo gwaitu.

eng_prompt: Understanding human sexuality is an essential part of personal development. Comprehensive education in this area can empower students to make informed decisions.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ebikwata ku kikula ky'omuntu kitundu kikulu mu nkulaakulana y'omuntu. Obuyigirize obujjuvu mu kitundu kino busobola okuwa abayizi amaanyi okukola okusalawo okulungi.
ach_prompt: Niang lok kom butu imit obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I dongo pa dano. Kwan ma kwako jami weng I kabedo man twero miyo kero ki lutino kwan me moko tam maber.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin nuka aelo erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma apol naka itunganan. Asioman naepol noi kotoma aiboisit kana epedori aitigogong esisiak aiswamaun aseununeta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ali o'baza ma dria 'diyi ma vata eri afa azi orodriru zota 'ba ma ngulupiniri niri'i. Onita kililiru angu 'di ma alea ri eco sukulu anzi eyini okpo fe e'yo eyi pezu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza ebikwatireine n'okuteerana n'ekintu ky'omugasho omu kutunguuka kw'omuntu. Obwegyese oburikwetengwa omu nshonga egi, nibubaasa kuhwera abeegi kucwamu gye.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown alarming trends in student retention across various educational institutions. Many factors contribute to this issue, including socioeconomic challenges and a lack of engagement in the classroom.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti abayizi bangi mu matendekero ag'enjawulo basigala mu masomero. Ensonga nnyingi eziviirako ensonga eno, omuli okusoomoozebwa mu mbeera z'abantu n'ebyenfuna n'obutaba na kwegatta mu kibiina.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto kit ma lutino kwan tye ka medde ki kwan I gangi kwan mapat-pat. Tye jami mapol ma okelo peko man, ma I kingi obedo peko me lim ki kwo pa dano ki bedo peke pa lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit epone loerono noi loka aidar idwe kosomeroi luegelegela. Ipu iboro lu eyangaununete ationis na, aimoriarit atiokisio nuka ikapun keda amamus na aisisianakino kotoma atukot.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo onzi sukulu anzi eyini sukulu kupi sukulu'a ku 'diyi ma dria sukulu ndundu eyi ma alea. E'yo karakara eyi fe e'yo 'di ni, e'yo ewaru 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie tualu e'yo robia ni 'diyi pie tualu e'yo 'ba eyini 'ye kilasia 'diyi ma ako pie.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho, kworeka enkora y'okureeberera abeegi omu matendekyero agatari gamwe na gamwe. Hariho enshonga nyingi ezirikureeta enshonga egi, otwariiremu oburemeezi omu by'entaasya hamwe n'okuburwa kwejumba omu bibiina.

eng_prompt: Many children in Uganda face significant challenges in accessing education due to their families' financial struggles. As a result, many students are forced to leave school to support their households.
lug_prompt: Abaana bangi mu Uganda basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kusoma olw'ebizibu by'amaka gaabwe eby'ensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, abayizi bangi bawalirizibwa okuva mu ssomero okulabirira amaka gaabwe.
ach_prompt: Lutino mapol I lobo Uganda ginongo peko madit tutwal I nongo kwan pi peko me lim ma gangi gi tye kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan mapol kidiyogi me weko kwan wek gukony odi gi.
teo_prompt: Idwe luipu ko Uganda etereikina keda atiokisio nuipu nuka adumunun asioman kanuka atiokisio nuka ikapun luka ikalia kec. Kanuka ngun, ebuinikinio esisiak luipu anyoun kosomero kanu aigang ikalia kec.
lgg_prompt: Anzi nyiri karakara kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu onita esuzu e'yo ewaru familia eyivile 'diyini e'yo robia esuzu 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, sukulu anzi karakara eyi sukulu kuzu okpo alea eyini ani familia eyivile 'diyi atizu.
nyn_prompt: Abaana baingi omu Uganda nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kwega ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente omu maka gaabo. Ekyarugiremu, abeegi baingi nibagyemeserezibwa kuruga omu mashomero okuhwera amaka gaabo.

eng_prompt: Education plays a crucial role in shaping a child's future and providing them with opportunities. By fostering a supportive environment, we can help them recognize the value of their academic journey.
lug_prompt: Ebyenjigiriza bikola omulimu munene mu kukola ebiseera by'omwana eby'omu maaso n'okubawa emikisa. Bwe tukuza embeera ebawagira, tusobola okubayamba okutegeera omugaso gw'olugendo lwabwe olw'okusoma.
ach_prompt: Kwan pire tek tutwal I yubu kwo pa lutino I kare me anyim ki minigi gum. Ka wamiyo kabedo maber, watwero konyogi me niang ber pa kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Erai asioman naepol noi kanu aitolomun ingaren naka idwe ka aijaikin kes arerengesio. Kowai lo aitopolor aiboisit na igangit, ipedori oni aingarakin kes ajenun ajokis naka asioman kec.
lgg_prompt: Onita ni azi okporu nga mva ma ewu drialeri edezu dika eri drileba fezu. Angu atita fezu 'diyi ma ta mbaza si, ama eco eyi ma aza ko orodri eyini aa'zu sukulu'a ri esuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Obwegyese nibukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuhanga eby'omumaisho by'abaana n'okubaheereza emigisha. Okureetaho embeera nungi, nitubaasa kubahwera kumanya omugasho gw'orugyendo rwabo rw'eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Despite significant progress in recent years, many communities still prioritize boys' education over that of girls. This cultural preference often stems from deep-rooted beliefs about gender roles and the perceived value of educating males.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo enkulaakulana mu myaka egiyise, ebitundu bingi bikyakulembeza okusoma kw'abalenzi okusinga okw'abawala. Okwagala kuno mu byobuwangwa kuva ku nzikiriza ez'amaanyi ku mirimu gy'ekikula ky'abantu n'omugaso ogulowoozebwa mu kusomesa abasajja.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni alokaloka madit otimme I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, kabedo mapol pud gi tero kwan pa lutino awobe calo gin ma pire tek loyo pa lutino anyira. Miti me tekwaro man pol kare aa ki I kom tam matye I kom tic pa mon ki coo ki ber pa pwonyo coo.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai apol noi kokaru lu atuboros, eringa itunga luipu isingarenitos asioman naka isap adepar apesur. Eipud lo loka einono elomunit kotoma aiyuunikec nuikamunitos aswamisinei nuka ikiliok keda angor keda ajokis naka aisisianakin ikiliok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma talasi, ongulumu karakara eyi nga po'di agupianzi eyi ma onita 'ba okporu ndeni aga ezoanzi eyi ma onita. E'yo a'bi ni 'diri ni tutuni enga e'yo 'bani 'ba agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie 'diyi ma dria azini orodri 'bani ega agupi eyini onita fezu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho entunguuka y'amaani omu myaka egi, ebyanga bingi nibitwara obwegyese bw'aboojo nka bukuru kukira obw'abaishiki. Enkora y'eby'obuhangwa egi neekira kurugirira aha biteekateeko ebirikukwata aha mirimo y'ekikura ky'abantu hamwe n'omugasho gw'okwegyesa abashaija.

eng_prompt: In response to rising rates of sexually transmitted infections among youth, the organization has developed a comprehensive program. Their mission focuses on promoting healthy choices and providing accurate information to empower children.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abakwatibwa endwadde z'obukaba ogweyongera mu bavubuka, ekitongole kikoze enteekateeka enzijuvu. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kitunuulidde kutumbula kulonda okulungi n'okuwa obubaka obutuufu okutumbula abaana.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel lutino matye ka nongo two ma aa ki i butu imit, dul enoni oyubu yub ma opong ki jami weng. Ticgi tye me tyelo kor yub me yero jami mabeco pi yot kom ki miyo ngec matir me tyelo kor lutino.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyatakin na adekasinei nuka aelo kanejaas atumunak, etolomu erionget ainapeta nuipu. Alosikinetekec erai aitopolorite aseununeta nu angaleu ka aijaikin akiro nu abeit kanu aitigogong idwe.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo esule ali o'baza si 'diyi ma omgbo tupi 'ba ode eyi ma eselea ri ma aza kozu, amuti 'da e'do otita eyi dria. Asisile yiniri 'ba asi geri alata ni 'diyi otuzu azini o'dukoti kililiru 'diyi fezu anzi nyiri eyini okpo fezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburwaire oburikuruga omu kuteerana kweyongyera omu minyeeto, ekitongore kitandikireho enteekateeka y'amaani. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okushongyera eby'amagara n'okuheereza abaana amakuru agahikire.

eng_prompt: Many young women struggle with feelings of shame and confusion regarding their sexual experiences. As a result, they often find it difficult to communicate openly with their parents about these personal matters.
lug_prompt: Abakyala abato bangi balwanagana n'enneewulira z'ensonyi n'okutabulwa ku bikwata ku bye bayitamu mu by'okwegatta. N'ekivuddemu, bakisanga nga kizibu okuwuliziganya n'abazadde baabwe mu bwesimbu ku nsonga zino ez'obuntu.
ach_prompt: Pol pa mon matino gitye ka lweny ki lewic ki anywena-nywena I kom ngo ma gutimo ikare me butu imit. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare ginongo tek tutwal me lok ki lunyodogi i kom jami magi.
teo_prompt: Angor nuipu etereikina keda aiyalongong keda aomisio nuikamunitos aelo. Kanuka ngun, etionikinit kesi einer keda auriakakec nuikamunitos akiro nuikamunitos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Oku ode karakara eyi dri ci e'yo drinza ni azini e'yo ewaru eyini esu e'yo ali o'baza ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi esu ewaru e'yo nzezu eyi ma tipika eyi pie e'yo eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abakazi abato abaingi nibarwanagana n'okushwara n'okubuzabuzibwa aha bikwatiraine n'okuteerana kwabo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kugumirwa kugamba butunu n'abazaire baabo aha nshonga ezi.

eng_prompt: In a troubling case that has shocked the community, a trusted educator exploited their position of authority. Authorities revealed that the teacher manipulated the young student by offering her incentives for her academic needs.
lug_prompt: Mu musango ogutabuddwatabuddwa ogubadde guwuniikiriza ekitundu, omusomesa eyeesigika yakozesezza ekifo kyabwe eky'obuyinza. Ab'obuyinza baazudde nti omusomesa yakozesa omuyizi omuto ng'amuwa ebisikiriza olw'ebyetaago bye eby'okusoma.
ach_prompt: I lok ma okelo lworo madit tutwal I kin lwak, lapwony ma gene otiyo ki twero meggi. Lutela guwaco ni lapwony otiyo ki latin kwan matidi kun miye mic me cobo miti ne me kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma omusago loetiono noi loabu koumok itunga, abu esisianakinan lo emunoi kitosom adoketaitikec naka apedor. Apotu apedorosio kitodutu ebe abu esisianakinan itolitol esisian ngol kopone lo aijaikin ngesi iboro luingarakinete ngesi kotoma asioman.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azi ewaru ongulumu eyini osuta fepi ni ma alea, imbapi azi asi'baza be 'diyi ayu eyi ma pari okpo ni 'diyi ayu. Okpo e'ipi 'diyi ece kini imbapi 'da ayu sukulu mva werea 'da geri erini eri dri afa fezu erini afa erini le onita ma alea 'diyi esuzu risi.
nyn_prompt: Omu mushango ogurikuteganisa abantu, omwegyesa orikwesigwa akakoresa obushoborozi bwabo. Ab'obushoborozi bakareebeka ngu omwegyesa akakoresa abeegi bato, obwo arikumuha ebintu by'okushashurira ebyetengo bye by'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a troubling increase in aggressive behavior among young children. As educators and parents, we must explore effective strategies to address this growing concern.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti abaana abato beeyisa mu ngeri ey'obukambwe. Ng'abasomesa n'abazadde, tulina okunoonyereza ku ngeri ennungi ey'okugonjoolamu ekizibu kino ekigenda kyeyongera.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni tim gero tye ka mede ikin lutino matino. Macalo lupwonye ki lunyodo, omyero wanong yoo maber me tyeko peko man matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic napac ebe eyatakinos iponesio lu amumu kanejaas idwe ludidik. Kwape esisianakinak keda auriak, ekot oni aimo iwaitin lu epedoriata oni aitemokin ationis na.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece kini adriza onzi anzi nyiri eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Imba'ba azini tipika eyi ru, le ama ma esu geri kililiru eyini ecozu e'yo 'di ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka okweyongyera kw'emicwe mibi omu baana bato. Nk'abeegyesa n'abazaire, twine kuronda oburyo bw'okukora aha nshonga egi erikweyongyera.

eng_prompt: As a parent, I believe it's my responsibility to support my child's aspirations. I want to ensure she has every opportunity to succeed in whatever she chooses to pursue.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuzadde, nzikiriza nti buvunaanyizibwa bwange okuwagira ebigendererwa by'omwana wange. Njagala okukakasa nti afuna omukisa gwonna okutuuka ku buwanguzi mu kyonna ky'asalawo okukola.
ach_prompt: Macalo lanyodo, atye ki niyee ni obedo tica me cwako miti pa lutinona. Amito neno ni en tye ki gum weng me cobo miti ne I gin mo keken ma en oyero me timo.
teo_prompt: Kwape aurian, aomit eong ebe erai aswam ka aigangite apeleikinata nuka ikoku ka. Akoto eong awanyun ebe ejaasi ngesi keda arereng naka akerianar kotoma akiro kere nuekoto ngesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: A'dini tipika ru, ma a'i kini eri ma vile azi atita fezu asi 'baza ma vile anzi 'diyiniri ma dria. Ale ne ra kini eri ma drileba dria ci agata esuzu afa dria erini le 'ye 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omuzaire, ninyikiriza ngu n'obujunaanizibwa bwangye okushagika ebigyendererwa by'omwana wangye. Ninyenda kuhamya ngu aine omugisha gw'okusingura omuri buri kintu kyona eki arikucwamu kukora.

eng_prompt: As part of our life skills curriculum, we had a special guest speaker come in. She was a senior woman with years of experience in home management.
lug_prompt: Ng'omu ku misomo gyaffe egy'obukodyo bw'obulamu, twalina omwogezi omugenyi ow'enjawulo eyajja. Yali mukyala mukulu era ng'amaze emyaka mingi ng'akola emirimu gy'awaka.
ach_prompt: Macalo but pwony me diro me kwo, wabedo ki lalok ma pire tek adada. Nyakoni obedo dako ma otii dok obedo ki ngec pi mwaki mapol I tic me gwoko gangi.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediopet koboro lu isisianakinete sio nuka aijar, ajai sio keda einer lo itegelikina. Arai ngesi aberu napolon keda amisiarit naka ikar luipu kotoma aidar oreria.
lgg_prompt: Amuti amavile onita onitani idri ma alia 'diyi ma azi ru, ama vu 'ba omvele special guest speaker ruri emu ra. Eri ndra oku 'wara eli be nita be e'yo aku ma dricezaniri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'emwe aha mishomo yaitu y'emyoga y'amagara, tukaba twine omugambi w'omutaano. Akaba ari omukazi mukuru aine obukugu bw'emyaka mingi omu kukora emirimo y'omuka.

eng_prompt: Effective communication is crucial in the classroom, as it shapes students' confidence and motivation. However, certain phrases can have a detrimental impact on their learning experience.
lug_prompt: Empuliziganya ennungi ya mugaso nnyo mu kibiina, kubanga etondawo obwesige n'okukubiriza kw'abayizi. Newankubadde, ebigambo ebimu bisobola okuba n'obulabe ku bumanyirivu bwabwe mu kuyiga.
ach_prompt: Lok maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I ot kwan pien weko lutino bedo ki tek cwiny. Kadi bed kumeno, leb mukene twero bedo ki adwoki marac i kom kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Einer loajokan erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma atukot, naarai einakini ngin esisiak amuno ka aisinyikokinit. Konye, epedorete akiro ace aitolitol aisisia kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kililiru ri eri orodriru kilasia a'dusikuni eri sukulu anzi eyini asi'baza azini ava fe. Kani si, e'yo azi 'diyi eco e'yo onzi 'ye onita yini ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Okugamba kurungi n'okw'omugasho omu kibiina, ahabw'okuba nikureetaho obwesigye n'okugaruramu abeegi amaani. Kwonka ebigambo ebimwe nibibaasa kuba eby'akabi aha kwega kwabo.

eng_prompt: In a supportive initiative aimed at empowering young girls, a dedicated mentor has stepped forward to address a topic often shrouded in stigma. She provides guidance and resources to help them navigate the difficulties associated with menstruation.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuwagira abawala abato, omubuulizi eyeewaddeyo avuddeyo okwogera ku nsonga etera okubuutikirwa obusosoze. Awa obulagirizi n'ebikozesebwa okubayamba okutambula mu buzibu obuva mu nsonga z'ekikyala.
ach_prompt: I yub me miyo kony ma ki keto pi tyelo kor lutino anyira matino, lapwony matye ki miti madit okato anyim me lok i kom lok ma pol kare ki cayo i kom lutino anyira. En miyo tira ki jami ma konyo gi me kato ki peko ma bino macalo adwogi me two dwe.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamisioit naka aigang apesur nudidika, aponi kitegearai akiro nuikamunitos aitolitol apesur nudidika. Ijanakini ngesi aicoreta keda iboro lu ingarakinete kesi aitodolikin atiokisio nu ikamanara keda elap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo atita fezu 'bani lezu ezoanzi nyiri eyini okpo fezu ri ma alea, 'ba azi asi 'bapi ra ni efu drile e'yo nzezu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma dria e'yo onzi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria. Eri imbata azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fe eyidri eyini ani ecozu e'yo ewaru eyi ecipi imba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nteekateeka y'obuhwezi erikugyenderera okutunguura abaishiki bato, omwegyesa oyehaireyo ayemereize enshonga erikukira kushwekyerera. Nabaha obuhabuzi n'eby'okukoresa okubaasa kurwanisa oburemeezi oburikukwata aha nshonga z'ekiro.

eng_prompt: In many cultures, traditional practices dictate the roles and responsibilities of families in marriage. As a result, economic considerations often play a significant role in the decision-making process surrounding unions.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa bungi, enkola z'obuwangwa ziraga emirimu n'obuvunaanyizibwa bw'amaka mu bufumbo. N'ekivuddemu, ensonga z'ebyenfuna zitera okukola kinene mu nkola y'okusalawo okwetoolodde ebibiina by'obwegassi.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mapol, cik me tekwaro nyutu tic ki tic pa lunyodo I nyom. Macalo adwogi ne, tam me lim ipol kare timo tic mapire tek tutwal I yub me moko tam malube ki dul mapat-pat me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio luipu, einakinitos einono aswam keda aswamisinei nuka ikalia kotoma odukone. Kanuka ngun, aomisio nuka ikapun iswamaete noi kotoma aitolomunun aseununeta nuikamunitos asusaitin.
lgg_prompt: A'bi karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo a'bini 'diyi azi familia eyini 'diyi ma dria azini azi eyi ma dria aku eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, e'yo robia ni 'diyi tutuni azi okporu nga e'yo peta pezu amuti eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu buhangwa bwingi, emicwe y'obuhangwa neegamba emirimo n'obujunaanizibwa bw'amaka omu bushwere. N'ekyarugiremu,enshonga z'ebyentatsya nizikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kusharamu aha bikwatireine n'ebibiina by'okweteerana.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing recognition of the importance of promoting health and well-being among young people. As a result, many educational institutions have implemented comprehensive health initiatives aimed at addressing the unique needs of their students.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise wabaddewo okutegeera okweyongera ku bukulu bw'okutumbula ebyobulamu n'obulamu obulungi mu bavubuka. N'ekivuddemu, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza mangi gatadde mu nkola enteekateeka z'ebyobulamu ezigendereddwamu okukola ku byetaago by'abayizi baago eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol dong guniang ber pa ilo malo rwom me yot kom ki kwo maber ikin bulu. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi kwan mapol gukati ki yub me yot kom matye ki miti me cobo miti pa lutino kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejenuna noi ajokis naka aitopoloria angaleu keda aijar najokan kanejaas atumunak. Kanuka ngun, etolomutu isomeroi luipu ainapeta nuka angaleu kanu aitemokin ipudesia luitegelikina luka esisiak kec.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi esu e'yo orodriru 'bani 'ba ode eyi ma rua ala otuzu azini aa'zu muke ri ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, pari onita ni karakara 'diyi e'do otuta e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria 'bani lezu e'yo ndundu sukulu anzi eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu beeyongyeire kumanya omugasho gw'okutunguura amagara n'amagara marungi omu minyeeto. N'ekyarugiremu, amatendekyero maingi gatandikireho enteekateeka y'eby'amagara erikugyenderera kukora ahabyetaago by'abeegi baago.

eng_prompt: As urbanization continues to accelerate in Kampala, the city struggles to keep pace with the increasing volume of waste generated by its growing population. This challenge has significant implications for public health and the environment.
lug_prompt: Ng'okukulaakulana kw'ebibuga kugenda mu maaso mu Kampala, ekibuga kilwana okukwatagana n'omuwendo gw'ebisasiro ogweyongera ogufulumizibwa olw'omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera. Okusoomoozebwa kuno kukosa nnyo obulamu bw'abantu n'obutonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dongo lobo tye kamedde anyim I Kampala, boma ne tye ka tute matek me medde anyim ki wel yugi ma dano mapol tye ka kelo. Peko man tye ki adwoki marac tutwal I kom yotkom pa lwak ki cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyatakina apol naka itaunin ko Kampala, etionikinit eibuga aitodolikin agasia naepol noi naarai iyata enaaba loka itunga. Ejaasi ainingosit na keda atiokisio nuepolok noi mama ejaasi angaleu naka itunga keda alupok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni Kampalaa ri ni mu drile, aku ambo 'da ni dri ci e'yo okurunya ma omgbo ni tupi tupi 'diyi pie. E'yo ewaru 'diri ma e'yo onzi 'diyi o'bi yi ma rua ala azini angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma dria ci.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu omu Kampala nikugumizamu, n'orurembo nirurwana kugumizamu n'omuhendo gwa kasasiro ogweyongyeire ahabw'omuhendo gw'abantu ogweyongyeire. Oburemeezi obu nibukwata munonga aha magara g'abantu hamwe n'obuhangwa bw'ensi.

eng_prompt: In our community, maintaining cleanliness and hygiene is a top priority. To ensure this, we have established a regular waste management system.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyaffe, okukuuma obuyonjo kye kintu ekikulu. Okukakasa kino, tutaddewo enkola ya bulijjo ey'okuddukanya kasasiro.
ach_prompt: I kabedo wa, gwoko lengo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Me neno ni man otimme, waketo yub me tic ki yugi kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubetekosi, aidar aila keda aila nes ibore yenepol noi. Kanu aanyun ebe iswamauna ngun, itolomutu sio ainapeta nuka aidar agasia.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu amavileri ma alea, alata ma tambaza eri e'yo okporu tu. E'yo 'di nezu ra, ama e'do geri okurunya ma tambazu ri 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Omu kyanga kyaitu, okurinda obuyonjo n'obwegyendesereza nikyo kintu kikuru munonga. Okureeba ngu eki nikigyenda omu maisho, tutandikireho enkora y'okureeberera kasasiro.

eng_prompt: To maintain a clean and efficient community, proper waste management is essential. One key component of this system is the establishment of adequate facilities for garbage disposal.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma ekitundu nga kiyonjo era nga kikola bulungi, enkwata ya kasasiro ennungi ya mugaso. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nkola eno kwe kuteekawo ebifo ebimala okusuula kasasiro.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko lengo ki ber bedo pa kabedo, tic ki yugi maber pire tek tutwal. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo yubu kabedo ma opore me bolo yugi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar aiboisit na elai ka na ejok, ibusakinit aitikitik agasia ejok. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi kotoma ainapeta ngun ngesi aitolomun aiboisio nuepedorete aicak agasia.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ma tambazu alaru azini kililiru, okurunya ma tambaza kililiru ri eri orodriru. Afa azi okporu e'yo 'di ma alea ri eri angu 'bani ecozu okurunya 'bezu 'diyi ma sita kililiru ri i.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'oburungi bw'ekyanga, okukoresa kurungi kasasiro n'eky'omugasho. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru omu nkora egi n'okutandikaho emyanya mirungi y'okubiiramu kasasiro.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent increase in disease outbreaks, local officials held a community meeting to address public health concerns. During the discussion, the importance of proper sanitation practices was emphasized.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'okubalukawo kw'endwadde gye buvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyalo baatuuza olukiiko lw'ekitundu okukola ku nsonga z'ebyobulamu by'abantu. Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo, omugaso gw'obuyonjo gwassibwako essira.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki nyaa pa two ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic me tedero gubedo ki kacoke me lok I kom peko me yot kom pa lwak. Ikare me nywako lok, ki nyutu ber pa gwoko lengo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakino naka abwangun naka adekasinei, apotu eswamak luka atutubet iriamunos kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos angaleu naka itunga. Kotoma opeget, aponi kitogogongorai ajokis naka aila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo eyi ma e'dota ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru risi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye mitingi ongulumu eyi ma alea e'yo ewaru e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi ma aza kozu. Sawa agbatara nirisi, 'ba 'ba okpo orodri e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara omu bwire butari bwa hare, abakungu b'ebyaro bakakora orukiiko rw'abantu kukora aha nshonga z'eby'amagara g'abantu. Omu kuhanuura, omugasho gw'eby'obuyonjo gukashoboororwaho.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about community cleanliness, local officials have been discussing potential initiatives to improve the neighborhood's appearance. One idea that has gained traction among council members is the implementation of a designated day for regular cleaning efforts.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku buyonjo bw'ekitundu, abakungu b'ebyalo babadde bateesa ku nteekateeka ezisoboka okutumbula endabika y'ekitundu. Ekirowoozo ekimu ekifunye obuwagizi mu bammemba b'akakiiko kwe kuteekawo olunaku olutegekeddwa okuyonja buli kaseera.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamede I kom lengo pa lwak, lutic me tedero gubedo ka lok I kom yoo mapat-pat me yubu kit ma kabedo gi nen kwede. Tam acel ma oywek tutwal I kin lumemba me kancil en aye me keto nino ma kiyubu pi yub me lengo kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naka itunga, eutasi eswamak luka atutubet aitemitem iwaitin lu itojokarere adoketait naka aiboisit. Adiopet aomisioit naepol noi kama ejaasi imeeban luka ekansulo ngesi aitegeario naka apaaran naitemokinitai kanu aitala.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini aa'zu alaru ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, azi'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'bi agbatara gba e'yo ndundu eyini eco 'ye angu ama agei ri ma wura otuzu 'diyi ma dria. Egata azi alu 'ba kanisulu ru 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma ava esupi ri o'du 'bani 'ba opele 'diyi 'bazu o'du driasi e'yo angu inipiri ma ale inipiri'i.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'eby'obuyonjo omu byaro, abakuru b'ebyaro batwire nibagamba aha bintu ebirikubaasa kutunguura ebyaro. Ekiteekateeko kimwe ekirikukundwa ba memba b'akakiiko n'okutandikaho eizooba ry'okuboneza buri kaire.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about litter and environmental health, the local government has been exploring effective waste management solutions. After extensive discussions, the council has decided to implement a new initiative to improve sanitation across the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku kasasiro n'obulamu bw'obutonde bw'ensi, gavumenti y'ebitundu ebadde enoonya engeri ennungi ey'okuddukanyaamu kasasiro. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, akakiiko kasazeewo okussa mu nkola enteekateeka empya ey'okutumbula obuyonjo mu kitundu kyonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom yugi ki cwec ma orumuwa, gamente me tedero obedo ka yenyo yoo maber me tic i kom yugi. Ingee nywako lok mapol, kancil omoko tamgi me keto yub manyen me yubu lengo ikabedo weng itic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka agasia keda ejautene lo akwap, euta apugan naka atutubet aingic iwaitin lu epedoriata kesi aitikitik agasia. Akaulo naka ipegeta luipu, aseun ekansulo aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aitojokar aila kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu e'yo okurunya ni azini angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma rua ala ma dria, gamete angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi geri kililiru okurunya ma tambazu 'diyi onda. E'yo onzeza angiri ma vutia, kanisulu 'du e'yo azi ngazu alata ma omgbo otuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu okwerarikirira okurikweyongyera aha kasasiro hamwe n'obuhangwa bw'ensi, gavumenti y'ebyaro etwire neetandika kuronda oburyo burungi bw'okureeberera kasasiro. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga,akakiiko kashaziremu kuta omu nkora enteekateeka nsya y'okutunguura eby'obuyonjo omu bantu boona.

eng_prompt: Faced with increasing complaints from residents about overflowing bins, the city officials recognized the urgent need for a more efficient waste management solution. After reviewing various options, they decided to take immediate action.
lug_prompt: Olw'okwemulugunya okweyongera okuva mu batuuze ku bbaasa ezijjudde, abakungu b'ekibuga baalaba obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'enkola ennungi ey'okuddukanya kasasiro. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya engeri ez'enjawulo, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak gubedo ka kok i kom kabedo ma opong ki yugi, lutic me boma ne gunongo ni mite tutwal me nongo yoo maber me tic i kom yugi. Ingee neno yoo mapat-pat, gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo cut-cut.
teo_prompt: Kane ajaut keda angurian nu iyatakina kanejaas itunga kanu aibok agasia, apotu eswamak luka esite kojenutu eipud loka aitemokin agasia ejok. Akaulo naka airereonor iwaitin luegelegela, apotu kesi koseutu aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ni onuzu e'yo 'bani okurunya trazu 'diyi ma dria ri si, azi'ba aku ambo 'da ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo okurunya trazu 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru ri ra. E'yo ndundu eyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo 'ye indikindi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwetomboitwa kw'abatuuragye ahabw'ebikondo ebirikujanjaara munonga, abakuru b'orurembo bakareeba ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okukoresa kurungi kasasiro. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma emiringo mingi, bakasharamu kukora ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: There have been increasing reports of unethical behavior among local government officials. Many residents are concerned that certain council officers prioritize their own interests over the community's well-being.
lug_prompt: Wabaddewo alipoota ezigenda zeeyongera ez'enneeyisa etali ya mpisa mu bakungu ba gavumenti z'ebitundu. Abatuuze bangi beeraliikirivu nti abakungu ba kanso abamu bakulembeza ebyetaago byabwe okusinga obulungi bw'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Lok tye ka medde I kom tim maraco I kin lutic pa gamente me tedero. Lutedero mapol tye ki lworo ni lutela me kancil mukene giketo miti gi bedo mukwongo me kaka ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Apolor iripotan luka iponesio lumam iswamaete ejok kanejaas eswamak luka apugan. Iyalongongosi itunga luipu ebe isingarenitos eswamak ice luka ekansulo ipudesiakec adepar aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: O'duko e'yo adriza onzi ni 'diyi ma dria azi'ba local government ni 'diyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi asi otiza be kini azi'ba kanisulu ni 'diyi eyi ma egata eyi 'ba okporu aga ongulumu eyi ma aa'ta muke ri.
nyn_prompt: Habaireho ripoota nyingi ezirikworeka emicwe mibi omu bakozi ba gavumenti z'ebyanga. Abatuuragye baingi niberarikirira, ahabw'okuba abakuru b'akakiiko nibakuza ebyetengo byabo kukira eby'abantu.

eng_prompt: Frustration grew among the community as overflowing bins became a common sight on the streets. Many residents voiced their concerns during the recent town hall meeting, pointing fingers at the town councilor for the ongoing issue.
lug_prompt: Obwennyamivu bweyongera mu kitundu ng'ebikondo ebijjudde bifuuka bya bulijjo ku nguudo. Abatuuze bangi baalaze obweraliikirivu bwabwe mu lukiiko lwa town hall gyebuvuddeko, nga basonga engalo ku kansala w'ekibuga olw'ensonga egenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Cwer cwiny omede ikin lwak ikare ma bin ma opong odoko gin ma dano neno I teng gudu. Lutedero mapol gunyutu lworo gi ikare me kacoke me town hall ma otime cokcok-ki, kun gi nyutu cingi I kom kancila me town pi peko matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga lu atutubet ongurianata naarai apolor asadukun nuka agasia korotin. Apotu itunga luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kotoma airiamunet naka etogo loka etaun, itodunitos ekansulo lo otaun kanu akirot na elosi akonye.
lgg_prompt: Asi nyoza tu ongulumu eyi ma eselea e'yo cupa eyi ma omgbo ni tuzu nzila eyi ma dria ri si. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi e'da asi otiza eyini ri mitingi 'bani 'ye o'diru tawuni hall niri ma alea eyini e'dazu 'ba kansila ru 'diyi ma dria e'yo 'di ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu bantu ahabw'ebikondo ebyabaire nibijura aha nguuto. Abatuuragye baingi bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo omu rukiiko rw'orukiiko orwabaireho juba, barikworeka engaro aha kansara w'orurembo ahabw'enshonga ezirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to maintain cleanliness and promote civic responsibility, the local government implemented stricter regulations regarding waste disposal. As a result, the council officers punished people who throw garbage in road trenches.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma obuyonjo n'okutumbula obuvunaanyizibwa bwa bannansi, gavumenti z'ebitundu zaateekawo amateeka amakakali agakwata ku kusuula kasasiro. N'ekyavaamu, abakungu b'akakiiko baabonereza abantu abasuula kasasiro mu mifulejje gy'oku nguudo.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me gwoko lengo ki tyelo kor tic pa lwak, gamente me tedero oketo cik matek tutwal I kom bolo yugi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me kancil gumiyo pwod ki dano ma bolo yugi I gudi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aidar aila ka aitopolorite aswam naka itunga, apugan naka atutubet abu kitutub ikisila luikidioko nuikamunitos aicak agasia. Kanuka ngun, apotu eswamak luka ekansulo itisilasi itunga luecakete agasia orotin.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu alata ma ta mbazu azini e'yo o'bi yini 'diyi otuzu, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'ba azita okporu eyi e'yo okurunya o'bezu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba kanisulu ni 'diyi fe panga 'ba okurunya 'bepi nzila dria 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda obuyonjo n'okureetaho obujunanizibwa omu bantu, gavumenti y'ebyaro ekataho ebiragiro by'amaani ebirikukwata aha kubinga kasasiro. N'ekyarugiremu, abakuru omu kanso bakafubira abantu abarikubiika kasasiro omu mifuregye y'ahanguuto.

eng_prompt: In our local governance structure, market officers play a crucial role in maintaining order and efficiency. Their responsibilities extend beyond just overseeing market activities; they also manage essential services that impact the community.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola yaffe ey'obukulembeze bw'ebitundu, abakungu b'obutale bakola omulimu omukulu mu kukuuma emirembe n'obwangu. Obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe busukka ku kulondoola emirimu gy'obutale; era bakwasaganya obuweereza obwetaagisa obukosa ekitundu.
ach_prompt: I tela me tedero wa, lutic me cuk gitiyo tic mapire tek tutwal I gwoko kuc ki ber bedo. Ticgi pe obedo me doro tic me cuk keken ento bene gi doro tic mapigi tego ma kelo alokaloka I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apugan na okwap wok, iswamaete eswamak lu esokoni aswam naepol noi kowai lo aidar ainapakina keda aswam ejok. Mam aswam kec erai aimaniman aswamisinei nuka esokoni bon; epedorete kesi aitolot aswamisinei nuepolok nuetiroritos itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ama vile okalamvu local governance niri ma alea, azi'ba cu ni 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo otuza ni 'diyi ma tambazu. Azi eyivile 'diyi aga lu e'yo cuu ni 'diyi ma pamvu onezu ri ra; eyi vini azakoma orodriru ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma aza ko indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora yaitu y'obwebembezi bw'ebyaro, abarikukurira akatare nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda obusingye n'obwegyendesereza. Obujunanizibwa bwabo nibukira aha kureeberera emirimo y'akatare, nibukora n'obuheereza oburikukwata aha bantu.

eng_prompt: In a country marked by diverse faiths and beliefs, fostering dialogue and understanding among different religious communities is essential. To address this need, a collaborative initiative was established to bring together spiritual leaders from various backgrounds.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi erimu enzikiriza n'enzikiriza ez'enjawulo, okutumbula enteeseganya n'okutegeeragana mu madiini ag'enjawulo kya mugaso nnyo. Okusobola okukola ku bwetaavu buno, enteekateeka y'okukolagana yateekebwawo okugatta abakulembeze b'eby'omwoyo okuva mu mbeera ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma tye ki dini mapat-pat, dongo lok ki niang ikin dini mapat-pat obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Me tyeko miti man, yub me ribbe obedo tye me ribo lutela dini ma aa ki I kabedo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aiyuunikec luegelegela, ejokuna noi aitopolorite aineranara keda apuponoro kanejaas idiinin luegelegela. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, aponi kitolomunai aimorikikin engarenok luka edini luka aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Kari 'di ma alia a'ita azini a'ita ndu ndu 'diyi pie, e'yo nzeza azini vata ma omgbo otuzu ongulumu a'ita ni ndundu 'diyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru. Lezu e'yo 'di ma aza kozu, 'ba e'do otuta ti icita ni drice'ba e'yo aitanisi 'diyi ejizu tualu engazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu eihanga eririmu enyikiriza zitarikushushana, okureetaho okuganiira n'okwetegyerezana omu bantu b'amadiini agatari gamwe n'agamwe n'eky'omugasho. Okukora aha nshonga egi, bakatandikaho enteekateeka y'okukwatanisa, okureeta hamwe abebembezi b'eby'omwoyo kuruga omu myanya etari emwe.

eng_prompt: In Islam, there are five fundamental pillars that guide the faith and practices of its followers. One of these essential duties is the pilgrimage to Mecca, known as Hajj, which every Muslim is required to undertake at least once in their lifetime if they are able.
lug_prompt: Mu Busiraamu, waliwo empagi ttaano enkulu ezilambika enzikiriza n'ebikolwa by'abagoberezi baayo. Omu ku mirimu gino emikulu kwe kulamaga e Mecca, emanyidwa nga Hijja, nga buli Musiraamu yeetaagibwa okukikola waakiri omulundi gumu mu bulamu bweba nga asobola.
ach_prompt: I dini me cilam, tye guti madongo abic ma doro niyee ki tic pa lulub korgi. Tic acel ma pire tek en aye limo Mecca, ma kilwongo ni Hajj, ma cilam weng omyero gutim tyen acel ikwo gi kace gitwero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma isiramun, ejaasi ipirin ikany luingarenikinitos aiyuunikec keda aswamisiokec. Adiopet kotoma aswamisinei nuepolok ngun ngesi alosit Mecca, ejenara kwape Hajj, ibusakinit isiramun kere aswam irwan atipet kotoma aijar kec arai epedorete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Isilamu eyi ma alea, e'yo okporu eyini imbata fezu azini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria 'diyi towi. Azi alu orodriru 'diyi ma azi eri acizu Meccaa, 'bani nile Hajj ru, 'bani le isilamu dria ma 'ye paale alu idri yini ma alia ka eco ra ria.
nyn_prompt: Omu busiraamu, harimu empagi itaano ezirikwebembera enyikiriza n'emitwarize y'abakuratsi baayo. Omwe aha mirimo y'omugasho n'oruramburo rwa Mecca, orurikumanywa nka Hijja, eki buri musiraamu ashemereire kukora omurundi gumwe omu magara gye yaaba naabaasa.

eng_prompt: During the ninth month of the Islamic lunar calendar, many Muslims engage in a significant spiritual practice. This period is marked by reflection, prayer, and self-discipline.
lug_prompt: Mu mwezi ogw'omwenda ku kalenda y'obusiraamu, abasiraamu bangi beenyigira mu bikolwa eby'omwoyo eby'omugaso. Ekiseera kino kirimu okufumiitiriza, okusaba n'okwefuga.
ach_prompt: Ikare me dwe me abungwen me kalenda me dwe pa cilam, cilam mapol timo jami mapigi tego me cwiny. Kare man obedo kare me lwodo lok, lega ki bedo ki kit maber.
teo_prompt: Kolap lo ikanyetape loka ekaru loka isiramun, ejaasi isiramun luipu toma aswamisio nuepolok noi nuka edini. Apak kana erai na aomoom, ailip ka aitikitik awate.
lgg_prompt: Mba oromi kalenda isilamu eyini ri ma alea, isilamu karakara eyi e'yo eyi 'ye e'yo okporu 'diyi ma alea. Sa'wa 'di ma alea 'ba ma ega e'yo eyi ma dria, eyi ma izi azini eyi ma adriza otu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kwezi kwa mwenda okwa kalenda y'obusiraamu, abasiraamu baingi nibejumba omu mirimo y'eby'omwoyo. Obwire obu n'obw'okuteekateeka, okushaba n'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: Throughout the ages, many figures have emerged as pivotal leaders in various faiths, but few have had as profound an impact as Ibrahim. His unwavering faith and commitment to God have inspired countless generations across different cultures and religions.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka gyonna, abantu bangi bavuddeyo nga abakulembeze abakulu mu nzikiriza ez'enjawulo, naye batono abakoze kinene nga Ibrahim. Okukkiriza kwe okutajjulukuka n'okwewaayo kwe eri Katonda bikubirizza abantu abangi okuva mu mawanga n'amadiini ag'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma okato angec, dano mapol gubino macalo lutela ma pigi tego I dini mapat-pat, ento manok keken aye gubedo ki adwoki madit tutwal I kom dano calo Ibrahim. Niye mege matek tutwal ki keto cwinye I kom Lubanga okonyo yalwak mapol tutwal I tekwaro ki dini mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Apakio nukokau, apotu itunga luipu kolomutu kwape engarenok lu epol ajokis kotoma aiyuunikec, konye ikidioko luejaasi keda aomisio nuepolok kwape nat Ibrahim. Eyuunike keda ainakina ke mama ejai Edeke isinyikokitos itunga luipu kotoma inonosio keda idiinin luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi efu drice'ba okporu ru e'yo aita ni ndundu 'diyi ma alea, te 'ba were eyi 'ye e'yo okporu ni ekile Ibrahim le. Eri ma aita okporu azini asi feza Munguniri fe ava 'ba ewu karakara suru ndundu eyi ma alea azini dini ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka yoona, abantu baingi batandikireho nk'abebembezi b'amadiini gatari gamwe na gamwe, kwonka bakye nibo batandikireho nka Ibrahim. Okwikiriza kwe okw'amaani n'okwehayo kwe ahari Ruhanga bigumire nibihwera abantu b'emirembe mingi omu nganda n'amadiini gatari gamwe.

eng_prompt: During the festival of Eid al-Adha, families come together to commemorate the spirit of sacrifice and generosity. It is a time of reflection and gratitude, marked by various traditions and rituals.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'ebikujjuko bya Eid al-Adha, amaka gakungaana wamu okujjukira omwoyo gw'okwefiiriza n'obugabi. Kye kiseera eky'okufumiitiriza n'okwebaza, nga kirimu obuwangwa n'emikolo egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kwer me Eid al-Adha, lugangi gure kacel me poo ikom cwiny me jalle ki miyo jami ki dano. Obedo kare me tam ki pwoc, ma obedo kare me tekwaro ki yub mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka epucit loka Eid al-Adha, imorikikinos ikalia nepepe kanu aiitun ainanakineta keda ainanakinete. Erai apak naka aomoom ka aisiyalamikin, ido ejaasi keda inonosio luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti Eid al-Adha niri ma alea, familia eyi emu tualu eyi ma e'yo ega eyini eyi owizu eyi ma ngulupi si azini eyi ma aza kozu ri ma e'yo egazu. Eri sa'wa 'bani e'yo egazu azini awa'difo fezu, e'yo suruni azini e'yo a'di ni ndundu 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kivvulu kya Eid al-Adha, amaka nigateranira hamwe kwijuka omwoyo gw'okwehayo n'obufura. N'obwire bw'okuteekateeka n'okusiima, oburikwetengwa engyenderwaho n'emikoro etari emwe.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support local communities and promote food security, the government has initiated a new welfare program. This initiative aims to assist those in need, particularly during the holy month of Ramadan.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyamba abantu b'omu kitundu n'okutumbula eby'okulya, gavumenti etaddewo enteekateeka empya ey'okuyamba abantu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu kuyamba abo abali mu bwetaavu naddala mu mwezi omutukuvu ogwa Ramadhan.
ach_prompt: I tute me konyo lwak me tedero ki medo rwom me cam, gamente okatti ki yub manyen me konyo lwak. Yub man tye ki miti me konyo lupeko tutwalle I dwe maleng me Ramadhan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigangit itunga luka atutubet ka aitopolor akoru na inyamat, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet na erai aingarakin ngul lu ican, kacut kotoma olap loka Ramadan.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi atizu dika nyaka ma omgbo otuzu, gamete e'do otita azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu 'ba afa koko 'diyi ma aza kozu tutuni mba alatararu ramadani niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuhwera abantu b'omubyaro n'okutunguura eby'okurya, gavumenti etandikireho enteekateeka nsya y'okureeberera abantu. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okuhwera abo abatarikwebaasa, okukira munonga omu kwezi okurikwera okwa Ramadhan.

eng_prompt: In many cultures and religions, marriage practices vary significantly. In Islam, specific guidelines govern the institution of marriage, including the allowance for polygamy under certain conditions.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa n'enzikiriza nnyingi, enkola z'obufumbo zaawukana nnyo. Mu Busiraamu, waliwo amateeka agafuga obufumbo, omuli n'okukkiriza abakazi abangi mu bukwakkulizo obumu.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro ki dini mapol, yub me nyom pat-pat tutwal. I dini me cilam, cik mapat-pat doro yub me nyom, ma I kingi obedo yee me bedo ki mon mapol I te cik mogo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio keda idiinin luipu, egelegela noi iponesio luka edukone. Kotoma isiramun, ejaas aicoreta nuikamunitos edukone, aimoriarit acamakinit naka angor nuipu kotoma ojautene ice.
lgg_prompt: A'bi karakara eyi ma alea tualu dini karakara eyi pie, e'yo aje ma dria 'diyi ndundu saaru. Isilamu eyi ma alea, azita ndundu eyi e'yo aje ni 'diyi ma dria, azini drileba oku eyi 'duzu karakara ri ma dria e'yo azi eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu buhangwa n'amadiini maingi, enkora y'obushwere neetaana munonga. Omu busiraamu, hariho ebiragiro ebirikworeka enteekateeka y'obushwere, otwariiremu n'okwikiriza abakazi baingi omu bukwakurizo obumwe.

eng_prompt: In times of conflict and division, communities often struggle to thrive and support one another. When individuals prioritize their differences over common goals, the fabric of society begins to fray.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obukuubagano n'enjawukana, ebitundu bitera okulwana okukulaakulana n'okuwagiragana. Abantu bwe bakulembeza enjawulo zaabwe okusinga ebiruubirirwa bye bafaanaganya, embeera y'ekitundu etandika okusajjuka.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny ki apoka-poka, lwak ipol kare nongo tek tutwal me dongo ki konyo luwotgi. Ka dano acel-acel oketo cwinygi I kom apoka-poka ma tye I kingi me kaka keto cwinygi I kom miti ma gitye kwede, dul pa dano cako poto.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka ingungeta keda atiakatiaka, etiono itunga apol ka aigangit luce. Arai isingarenit itunga atiaketaitikec adepar apeleikinata kec, egeuni atutubet aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ngiringiri ni azini esele coza ni 'diyisi, ongulumu eyi sa'wa driasi dri ci eyi ma eselea atita fezu eyi ma eselea. Ba eyi ka eyi ma esele coza 'diyi 'ba okporu aga e'yo eyini lezu eyi ma eselea 'diyi, e'yo ongulumu eyini 'diyi e'do e'de ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutabanguko n'okwebaganisamu, abantu nibarwana kutunguuka n'okushagika bataahi baabo. Abantu ku barikutwara entaaniso zaabo nk'ez'omugasho kukira ebigyendererwa ebirikushushana, ebyombeko by'abantu nibitandika kusisikara.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with diversity and differences, it is essential to remember our shared humanity. Each of us reflects a unique aspect of the divine, reminding us of our interconnectedness.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde enjawulo n'enjawulo, kya mugaso okujjukira obuntu bwaffe obw'awamu. Buli omu ku ffe alaga engeri ey'enjawulo ey'obwakatonda, ekitujjukiza engeri gye tukwataganamu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki jami ma pat pat, pire tek tutwal me poo I kom kit dano ma watye kwede. Wan weng wanyuto jami mapat-pat pa lubanga, ma poyo wiwa i kom kubbe matye ikinwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda iponesio luegelegela, erai ibore yenepol noi aiitun iponesio luka itunga kere. Nginitunganan oni itodunit epone loitegelikina loka Edeke, isiitikini oni nuka arucokina wok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea wura ndundu eyi pie, eri orodriru ama ma ega e'yo amani aa'zu 'ba eyi ru 'diyi ma dria. Ama alu alu ni e'da e'yo wura ndusi Mungu ni 'diyi ma dria, e'yo ama egazu e'yo amani aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire ebitarikushushana, n'eky'omugasho kwijuka obuhangwa bwaitu. Buri omwe ahariitwe nayoreka enshonga y'omutaano eya Ruhanga, ekirikutwijutsya okukwatanisa kwaitu.

eng_prompt: Uganda has been actively engaging in diplomatic efforts to strengthen its ties with neighboring nations and beyond. As a result of these initiatives, various partnerships and collaborations have flourished.
lug_prompt: Uganda ebadde yeenyigira nnyo mu kaweefube w'okunyweza enkolagana yaayo n'amawanga agagiriraanye n'endala. Olw'enteekateeka zino, enkolagana ez'enjawulo n'okukolagana kweyongedde.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda obedo katic matek me jingo wat ma tye ikin lobbe ma orumuwa ki lobo mukene bene. Macalo adwogi me yub magi, ribbe mapat-pat tye ka dongo.
teo_prompt: Ejai Uganda toma aswam naepol noi kanu aitogogong eidicaneke keda akwapin nu idunyare keda akwapin ace. Kanuka aswamisio nu, apolor aimorikikina keda aiswamanara.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ebi okpo 'ba e'yo nzezu kari jo ejele ru 'diyi pie tualu kari azi 'diyi pie. Otita 'diyi ma e'yosi, ti ecita azini ti icita ndundu 'diyi tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Uganda etwire neejumba omu nteekateeka y'okutunguura enkoragana yaayo n'amahanga agatwetorwaire hamwe n'amahanga agandi. Ahabw'enteekateeka ezi, okukwatanisa n'okukwatanisa kwingi kweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: During the celebration of Eid al-Adha, families come together to honor the spirit of sacrifice and generosity. One of the key traditions during this festive occasion is the sharing of meat with loved ones and those in need.
lug_prompt: Mu bikujjuko bya Eid al-Adha, amaka gakungaana wamu okussa ekitiibwa mu mwoyo gw'okwefiiriza n'obugabi. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebikolebwa mu biseera by'ebikujjuko kwe kugabana ennyama n'abaagalwa n'abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kwero nino me Eid al-Adha, gangi cokke kacel me woro cwiny me jalo jami ki bedo jo ma cingi yot. Tekwaro acel ma pire tek tutwal I kare me karama man obedo poko ringo ki jo ma imaro ki jo matye I peko.
teo_prompt: Kapak kana ainumunum Eid al-Adha, imorikikinos ikalia nepepe kanu ayongite ainanakinete keda ainanakinete. Adiopet kotoma inonosio luapolok kotoma apakio nuapolok erai aimor akiring keda luminak keda lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Sawa inzita Eid al-Adha niri si, familia eyi emu tualu inzita fezu e'yo eyini eyi owizu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo azi okporu 'bani 'ye o'du natali ni 'diyi ma alia ri eri za awazu 'ba leletu 'diyi pie azini 'ba afa koko 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kujaguza Eid al-Adha, amaka nigakwatanisa hamwe okuheereza ekitiinisa omutima gw'okwehayo n'obufura. Emwe aha migyenzo mikuru omu biro ebi eby'okujaguza n'okugabana enyama n'abakundwa n'abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: Muslims around the world look forward to a special occasion that marks the end of Ramadan. This festive event brings families and communities together in joy and gratitude.
lug_prompt: Abasiraamu okwetooloola ensi yonna beesunga omukolo ogw'enjawulo ogukwata ku nkomerero y'omwezi gwa Ramadhan. Omukolo guno ogw'ennaku enkulu gugatta wamu amaka n'ebitundu mu ssanyu n'okwebaza.
ach_prompt: Cilam I wilobo lung gitye ki miti madit tutwal me neno ni dwe me Ramadhan otum. Yub me karama man ribo gangi ki lwak kacel ki yomcwiny ki pwoc.
teo_prompt: Ekotosi isiramun luka akwap kere ainapeta nuapolok nu itodunitos angetakinet naka elap loka Ramadan. Einakini epucit lo loapolon ikalia keda itunga aimorikikin keda aiyalama keda aiyalama.
lgg_prompt: Isilamu wudrikuru ma alea ndulu 'diyi asi driasi e'yo azi wura ndusi mba o'du Ramadani niri ni i dezu ri ma dria. Omu natali ni 'diri familia eyi tualu ongulumu eyi pie tualu ayikosi azini awa'difo be.
nyn_prompt: Abasiraamu okwetorora ensi yoona, nibategyereza omukoro gw'omutaano ogurikujaguza okuhendera kw'okwezi kwa Ramadhan. Ekijaguzo eki nikigaita amaka n'ebyanga hamwe omu kushemererwa n'okusiima.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with challenges and uncertainties, fostering connections with those around us becomes essential. Embracing compassion and kindness can transform our relationships and strengthen our communities.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde okusoomoozebwa n'obutali bukakafu, okukulaakulanya enkolagana n'abo abatwetoolodde kifuuka kikulu. Okukkiriza okusaasira n'ekisa bisobola okukyusa enkolagana yaffe n'okunyweza ebitundu byaffe.
ach_prompt: I lobo man ma opong ki peko ki peko, bedo ki wat ki jo ma orumuwa pire tek tutwal. Bedo ki cwiny me kica ki kica twero loko wat ma ikin wa ki dongo kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na eleleba keda atiokisio keda atiokisio, ejokuna noi aimorikikin keda ngul luejaasi keda oni. Aingarakin keda asianut epedori aijulakin eidicanewok ka aitogogong aiboisio wok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru 'di ma alea e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi pie tre, aa'ta 'ba ama agei 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo otuzu ri eca orodriru. Asi ndriza azini asi ndriza ai'zu ri eco ama ma eselea 'diyi oja ra dika eri eco ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma okpo enga ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi eijwire oburemeezi n'obutetegyerezibwa, okureetaho enkoragana n'abantu abatwetorwaire nikikuru munonga. Okukoresa embabazi n'embabazi nikibaasa kuhindura enkoragana yaitu n'okwongyera amaani omu byanga byaitu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support his community during tough times, he organized a charity drive. Many people contributed, but he wanted to ensure that those most in need received assistance directly.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyamba ekitundu kye mu biseera ebizibu, yategeka kaweefube w'okugaba obuyambi. Abantu bangi baawaddeyo, naye yayagala okukakasa nti abo abali mu bwetaavu bafuna obuyambi butereevu.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me konyo lwak mege I kare me peko, en oyubu yub me miyo kony bot lupeko. Dano mapol gumiyo kony, ento en onongo mito neno ni jo matye ki peko gunongo kony atir.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang itunga luka atutubeteke kotoma apakio nuetioko, abu ngesi itemok agangat. Apotu itunga luipu ijaikisi agangat, konye akoto ngesi awanyun ebe ngul luipudasi noi edumununete agangat.
lgg_prompt: Okpo erini 'ba ongulumu erivileri ma aza kozu sa'wa ewaru 'diyi ma alea, eri otu ongulumu 'ba azakoma fepi 'diyiniri ra. Ba karakara eyi fe robia ra te eri le ndra ne ra kini 'ba azakoma lepi ndeni 'diyi ma esu azakoma 'da eyi ma ngulupi si.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuhwera abantu be omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, akatebekanisa enteekateeka y'okugaba obuhwezi. Abantu baingi bakahayo, kwonka akaba nayenda kureeba ngu abo abatarikwebaasa batunga obuhwezi butunu.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been escalating for years, fueled by differing ideologies and competing interests. As leaders from both areas engage in heated debates, the divide only seems to widen.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera okumala emyaka, nga buva ku ndowooza ez'enjawulo n'ebigendererwa ebivuganya. Ng'abakulembeze okuva mu bitundu byombi beenyigira mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi, enjawukana yeeyongera.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede pi mwaki mapol, ma obedo macalo adwogi me tam mapat-pat ki miti mapat-pat matye ka pyem I kingi. Kit ma lutela me kabedo aryo egoni gitye ka laro lok matek tutwal, apoka-poka tye kamedde.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kanu ikar luipu, kanu aomisio nuegelegela keda ipudesia lueboloboloete. Kwape eutasi engarenok luka aiboisio airiamun, esubit bala iyatakinos atiakatiaka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo adra ni 'diyi ebi tu eli karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo egata ndundu eyini 'diyi ma e'yosi azini e'yo 'bani lezu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma e'yosi. Drice'ba engapi angu iri 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ni e'yo agbatara ni 'diyi 'yeria, e'yo esele coza ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu uru.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera kumara emyaka, ahabw'ebiteekateeko ebitarikushushana hamwe n'ebigyendererwa ebirikuhayahayana. Abeebembezi kuruga omu bicweka byombi, nibejumba omu kuhanuura kw'amaani, entaaniso neeyeyongyera.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the community's needs and feedback, the local leaders recognized the importance of enhancing economic opportunities. They convened a meeting to discuss potential improvements to local commerce.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyetaago by'abantu n'ebiteeso byabwe, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baalaba obukulu bw'okutumbula eby'enfuna. Baayita olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okutumbula eby'obusuubuzi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo miti ki tam pa lwak, lutela me tedero guniang ber pa ilo malo rwom me lim. Gulwongo kacoke me nywako tam i kom kit me ilo malo rwom me biacara me tedero.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ipudesia luka itunga keda abongokineta, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kojenutu ajokis naka aitopolor arerengesio nuka ikapun. Apotu kesi onyarautu airiamun kanu aitemitem aitojokar agwelanar na akwap.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma ale andrizu e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu orodri drileba robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ra. Eyi omve mitingi agbatara gbazu geri ecozu tujari kari 'di ma alea 'diyi otuzu ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okushwijuma ebyetaago by'abantu hamwe n'ebi barikugarukamu, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakareeba omugasho gw'okutunguura eby'entaasya. Baketa orukiiko kuhanuura aha nshonga z'okutunguura eby'obushubuzi omwihanga.

eng_prompt: As the summer festival approaches, local businesses are preparing for a surge in visitors. Many tourists are drawn to the capital city for its vibrant culture and exciting events.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebikujjuko by'omusana bisembera, abasuubuzi b'omu kitundu beetegekera abagenyi abeeyongera. Abalambuzi bangi bajja mu kibuga ekikulu olw'ebyobuwangwa n'emikolo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kwer me oro tye cok, lutim biacara me tedero tye ka yubbe pi wel wele matye kabino. Lulim piny mapol bino I boma madit me Uganda pi tekwaro ki yub mapat-pat mamwonya matye ie.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete epucit lo elap, eutasi ibiasaran luka atutubet aitemonokin kanu aiyatakin na ipejok. Etapit elatok luipu alosit oibuga loapolon kanu inonosio keda ipucito luibusiak.
lgg_prompt: Omu e'yo driasiri ni ecazu ogogo, tujara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otuta 'ye omu emu'ba 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu. Ba emu'ba angu onepi 'diyi emu aku ambu kari niri ma alea e'yo a'bi eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'
nyn_prompt: Ekijaguzo ky'obwiire bw'obutiti kukirikuhika haihi, abashuubuzi b'omubyaro nibeteekateekyera okujanjaara kw'abagyenyi. Abarambuzi baingi nibaza omu kibuga ekikuru ahabw'obuhangwa bwakyo n'emikoro yaakyo.

eng_prompt: After conducting a thorough soil analysis and assessing the climate conditions, we found that the area has abundant resources. The local ecosystem supports a diverse range of crops, making it an ideal location for agricultural development.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obulungi ettaka n'embeera y'obudde, twakizuula nti ekitundu kirimu eby'obugagga bingi. Embeera y'obutonde mu kitundu ewagira ebirime eby'enjawulo, ekigifuula ekifo ekirungi eky'okwekulaakulanya mu byobulimi.
ach_prompt: Inge kwedo ngom ki kit ma piny tye kwede, wanongo ni kabedo eni tye ki lonyo ma dwong. Jami ma ikabedo eni cwako cam mapat-pat ma weko kabedo eni bedo ber tutwal pi dongo lobo me pur.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic alupok ejok ka airereonor ejautene loka ikwamin, apotu sio adumutu ebe ejaasi aiboisit ngin keda iboro luipu. Ingarakinete isuban luka atutubet ikorion luegelegela, ijaikini ngin aiboisit najokan noi kanu apol naka akor.
lgg_prompt: Angu ma eti ondaza kililiru 'bori ma vutia azini angu mile ma wura ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, ama esu angu 'da ma lonyi nyakuni 'diyi karakara. Angu nyakuni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi afa nyakuni ndundu 'diyi ati ni fe angu 'da ni ecazu angu kililiru agirikica ma ezota ni i.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma eitaka n'embeera y'obwire, tukashanga ngu omwanya gwine eby'obugaiga bingi. Eby'obuhangwa eby'omubyaro nibibangira ebihingirwe bingi, ekirikubareetera okuba omwanya murungi gw'entunguuka y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support the local community and its growing needs, a prominent businessman decided to take action. He recognized the lack of adequate facilities for the town's emergency services and wanted to make a difference.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyamba abantu b'omu kitundu n'ebyetaago byabwe ebyeyongera, omusuubuzi omututumufu yasalawo okubaako ky'akolawo. Yakitegeera nti mu kibuga temuli bikozesebwa bimala era yayagala okukyusa embeera.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me konyo lwak me tedero ki miti gi matye kamede, latim biyacara mo ma oywek omoko tamme me timo gin mo. En oniang peko me bedo peke pa jami ma mite pi kony ma opoto atura I boma ne dok obedo ki miti me kelo alokaloka.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang itunga luka atutubet keda ipudesia luka atutubet, abu ebiasara loajokan koseu aswam ngun. Abu ngesi koany ebe emamiatatar keda aiboisio nuedolitos kanu aijaanakinio naka engeso kotoma otaun ido akoto ngesi aijulakin.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi atizu azini afa eyini lele tupi tutu 'diyi pie, agu tujari 'yepi okporu ni asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'yezu. Eri esu e'yo afa ayuzaru tawuni 'da ma alea azakoma mbeleru 'diyi ma ako ri ra erini ani lezu ojata ejizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuhwera abantu b'omubyaro n'ebyetaago byabo ebirikuguma nibikura, omushuubuzi orikumanywa akasharamu kukora. Akareeba eibura ry'eby'okukoresa ebirikumara omu rurembo kandi akaba nayenda kukora empindahinduka.

eng_prompt: To enhance my business strategy, I realized the importance of building strong relationships with my clients. By understanding their needs and preferences, I aimed to create a more personalized experience.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula eby'obusuubuzi bwange, nnakiraba nti kikulu okuba n'enkolagana ey'oku lusegere ne bakasitoma bange. Mu kutegeera ebyetaago byabwe n'ebyo bye baagala, nnaluubirira okutondawo obumanyirivu obwenjawulo.
ach_prompt: Me medo rwom me biacara na, aniang ber pa bedo ki wat matek ki luwil na. I niang miti gi ki gin ma gimaro, abedo ki miti me yubu jami ma lube ki miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor ewai ka loka ebiasara, abu eong ajen ajokis naka adukun eidicane loajokan keda ikasitomas ka. Kowai lo amisikin ipudesia kec keda iboro lu ekotosi kesi, abu eong akoto aitolomun iboro lu itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ma vile tujarani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, ma esu orodri aa'ta okporu 'ba ma vile aje'ba 'diyi pie ri ma dria ra. Vutinia e'yo vata yini le azini afa yini le 'diyi vazu risi, asi 'ba e'yo yi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura enkora ya bizinesi yangye, nketegyereza omugasho gw'okukora enkoragana nungi na bakasitoma bangye. Ahabw'okwetegyereza ebyetengo byabo n'ebi barikwenda, nkagyezaho kukora ebintu ebirikuhikaana n'ebyabo.

eng_prompt: Recent investments in transportation and utilities have transformed our community. As a result, businesses are thriving and attracting new residents.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi gyebuvuddeko mu byentambula n'ebikozesebwa kikyusizza ekitundu kyaffe. N'ekivuddemu, bizinensi zikulaakulana era zisikiriza abatuuze abapya.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I tic me wot ki jami ma konyo lwak I kare-ni okelo alokaloka I kabedo wa. Macalo adwogi ne, biacara tye ka dongo dok bene tye ka kelo dano manyen.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun mama ejaasi elose keda iboro luipu abu ijulak aiboisit wok. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ibiasaran apol noi ido ingalaunete itunga luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Lonyi vuti aleza o'diru 'bani 'ba acipa ma alia azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi oja ongulumu amavileri ra. E'yo 'disi tujari eyi zo tualu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea o'diru 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okutamu sente omu by'engyenda n'eby'obugaiga, kuhindwire abantu b'omukyanga kyaitu. N'ekyarugiremu, ebyobushubuzi biriyo nibyeyongyera n'okureeta abatuuragye abasya.

eng_prompt: As urbanization continues to reshape the landscape of society, many individuals seek better opportunities and lifestyles. This shift in population dynamics is driven by the allure of city life and the promise of employment.
lug_prompt: Ng'okukulaakulana kw'ebibuga kugenda mu maaso n'okukyusa embeera y'abantu, abantu bangi banoonya emikisa n'embeera z'obulamu ennungi. Enkyukakyuka eno mu nkulaakulana y'omuwendo gw'abantu evudde ku bulamu bw'omu bibuga n'ebisuubizo by'emirimu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dongo pa boma tye kamede ki kelo aloka-loka I kabedo mapat-pat, dano mapol tye ka yenyo gum ki kwo maber. Alokaloka man I kom wel dano tye macalo adwogi me kwo me boma madongo ki gen me nongo tic.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aiboisio nuka itaunin aijulakin ejautene loka itunga, ekotosi itunga luipu arerengesio nuejokuka keda aijar najokan. Aijulakinio naka enaaba loka itunga erai kanuka aijar naka eibuga keda aisumunet naka aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tawuni eyini tuzu ri ni mu drile angu 'ba eyini aa'zu ri ojazu, 'ba karakara eyi drileba muke 'diyi nda azini geri eyini aa'zu 'diyi. Ojata 'ba eyi ma kalafe ni ri ma omgbo ni ri e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu aku ambo eyi ma alea eyini aa'zu onyiru risi azini e'yo 'ba eyini azi esuzu risi.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'abantu omu ndembo nikugumizamu kuhindura entuura y'abantu, abantu baingi nibaronda emigisha n'emitwarize mirungi. Empindahinduka y'omuhendo gw'abantu, nereetwa amagara marungi g'omu ndembo hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'emirimo.

eng_prompt: After extensive research and analysis of environmental factors, experts have identified potential sites for the project. These locations were evaluated based on their accessibility, resources, and community impact.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'okwekenneenya ensonga z'obutonde bw'ensi, abakugu bazudde ebifo ebiyinza okukozesebwa pulojekiti. Ebifo bino byekenneenyezebwa okusinziira ku kutuukirirwa kwabyo, eby'obugagga n'engeri gye bikwatamu ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut ki ngiyo lok kom cwec ma orumuwa, ludiro gunongo kabedo ma twero bedo ber pi yub eni. Ki ngiyo kabedo magi malubbe ki yoo me nongo gi, lonyo gi ki adwoki me tic gi ikabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic keda airereonor iboro lu akwap, apotu ipirioitin kodumutu aiboisio nu epedorio aitolot epurojekt. Aponi owanyunai aiboisio nu kotupitete adolokin kec, iboro, keda epone loepedoriata kesi itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza angiri azini e'yo angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi esu angu ecopi otita 'di 'yezu ra 'diyi. Ba andri angu 'diyi geri eyini cazu, afa eyini ayu 'diyi, azini e'yo eyini 'ye ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi vusi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza n'okushwijuma enshonga z'obuhangwa, abakugu batungire emyanya y'okukoreramu purogyekiti. Emyanya egi ekashwijumwa kurugirira ahakuhikaho, eby'obugaiga hamwe n'omugasho gwayo omu bantu.

eng_prompt: After months of overcrowding and limited resources, the community leaders decided it was time for a change. The families gathered to discuss their options and ultimately agreed on a new location that promised better opportunities.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'omujjuzo n'ebikozesebwa ebitono, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baasalawo nti kye kiseera wabeewo enkyukakyuka. Amaka gakungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri gye bayinza okukikolamu era okukkakkana nga bakkiriziganyizza ku kifo ekipya ekyasuubiza emikisa emirungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me bedo ki dano mapol tutwal ki lim manok, lutela me kabedo ne gumoko ni kare dong oromo me kelo aloka loka. Gangi gucokke me nywako tam gi dok I agiki ne guwinye I kom kabedo manyen ma ocikke me nongo gum mabeco.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka itunga luipu noi keda iboro lu ikidioko, apotu engarenok lu atutubet koseutu ebe erai apak naka aijulakin. Apotu ikalia kitukokinos kanu aitemitem nuepedorete kesi aswam kosodete acamanar aiboisit naitetet naecamakinit arerengesio nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia 'ba eyi ma kalafe tualu afa ayuzaru were 'diyi pie, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi 'du e'yo kini sa'wa 'di ojata ni. Familia 'da eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria dika eyi ai angu azi o'diru eyini ani drileba muke ndeni 'diyi esuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'abantu baingi n'ebintu bikye, abeebembezi b'ekyanga bakasharamu ngu obwire bw'empinduka bukaba buhikire. Amaka gaketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga zaago reero gaikirizana aha mwanya musya ogwabaire niguraganisa emigisha mirungi.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising concerns about safety and security in the area, local authorities have decided to enhance law enforcement presence. As a result, there is a new police post in our trading center.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bikwata ku bukuumi n'obutebenkevu mu kitundu, ab'obuyinza mu byalo basazeewo okwongera amaanyi mu kukwasisa amateeka. N'ekyavaamu, waliwo ekitebe kya poliisi ekipya mu kabuga kaffe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom gwoko kuc ki ber bedo I kabedo eni, lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me medo rwom pa abili. Macalo adwogi ne, abili manyen tye i trading centre wa.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka ayuwara keda ayuwara kotoma aiboisit, aseutu apedorosio nuka atutubet aiyatakin ejautene loka ipolisin. Kanuka ngun, ejai epolis post loitetet osenta wok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi e'yo 'du 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, pari polisi eyini o'diru ni angu amavile tujari 'yezu 'da ma alea ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda omu kyanga, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bashaziremu kwongyera amaani omu kukuratira ebiragiro. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho eiteeraniro rya poriisi risya omu maduuka gaitu.

eng_prompt: The company has finalized plans to move its headquarters to a new location. As part of the transition, various logistical arrangements are being put in place.
lug_prompt: Kampuni emalirizza enteekateeka z'okutwala ekitebe kyayo ekikulu mu kifo ekipya. Ng'ekitundu ky'enkyukakyuka, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ziteekebwawo.
ach_prompt: Dul ne dong otyeko yub me kobo gang kal madit ne I kabedo manyen. Macalo but aloka-loka man, yub mapat-pat tye ka kati.
teo_prompt: Adau ekampuni aitemonokin aitobwot eyapiesike loapolon aiboisit naitetet. Kwape ediope kotoma aijulanakineta, eutai aitolomun ainapeta nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Amuti nderi de otita erini i vile aku ambori ojazu pari o'di ma alia 'bo. E'yo ojata ni 'diyi ma azi ru, 'ba otuta ndundu eyi 'ye.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni eherize kukora enteekateeka y'okutwara ekitebe kikuru omu mwanya musya. Nk'ekicweka ky'empindahinduka, enteekateeka z'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe ziriyo nizikorwa.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the current layout and logistics, it became clear that changes were necessary. However, the timeline for implementing these adjustments is proving to be more complicated than anticipated.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza enteekateeka eriwo n'engeri y'okutambuzaamu ebintu, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti enkyukakyuka zaali zeetaagisa. Newankubadde, obudde bw'okussa mu nkola enkyukakyuka zino buzibu okusinga bwe kyali kisuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma jami tye kawot kwede, nen atyer kamaleng ni aloka-loka obedo gin ma mite. Kadi bed kumeno, kare me keto aloka-loka magi itic pe obedo yot kit ma onongo byek tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ainapeta keda iboro lu itwasamao, apotu kojenutu ebe ejokuna aijulanakineta. Konye, apak naka aitegeario naka aijulanakineta ngun erai na etiono noi adepar naewomitai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri eca e'dazaru kini ojata eri orodriru. Kani si, sa'wa 'bani ojata 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea ri ni e'dazu ewaru ndeni aga 'bani ega ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma engyenderwaho eriho obwahati, kikarebeka butunu ngu empindahinduka zikaba nizetengwa. Kwonka, obwire bw'okureetaho empindahinduka ezi, tiburikwetengwa nk'oku kyabaire nikiteekateekwa.

eng_prompt: Recent discussions about resource allocation have led to confusion among the local authorities. As a result, there is a misunderstanding between the two refugee hosting districts.
lug_prompt: Okukubaganya ebirowoozo gyebuvuddeko ku kugabanya eby'obugagga kuleetedde okutabulwa mu bakulembeze b'ebyalo. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo obutategeeragana wakati wa disitulikiti ebbiri ezirimu abanoonyiboobubudamu.
ach_prompt: Nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom yub me poko lim okelo anywena-nywena ikin lutela me tedero. Macalo adwogi ne, telle tye ikin districts aryo matye ka jolo luring ayela.
teo_prompt: Ineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos aikor iboro eyangautu aitolitol kotoma apedorosio nuka atutubet. Kanuka ngun, emamei apuponoro kiding idisitriktan iarei lu ijaunitos ikerai.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara o'diru e'yo lonyi awaza ma dria 'diyi fe drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea e'yo onzi. E'yo 'disi, erita ako distrikiti angu fepi emunyale eyini 'diyi ma eselea ci.
nyn_prompt: Okuhanuura okwabaireho ebiro ebi, aha kuheereza abantu ebintu, kireesireho okubuzabuzibwa omu b'obushoborozi b'ebyaro. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho obutetegyerezana ahagati ya disiturikiti ibiri ezirikwakiira empungi.

eng_prompt: Recent political unrest and fluctuating commodity prices have raised concerns among analysts. As a result, many experts are predicting significant challenges ahead.
lug_prompt: Obutabanguko mu byobufuzi n'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okukyuka bireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bakugu. N'ekivuddemu, abakugu bangi bateebereza okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Lweny me cungu iwi bye ma otime cokcok-ki kacel ki lok pa wel jami acata okelo lworo ikin ludiro. Macalo adwogi ne, ludiro mapol tye ka byeko peko madongo matye anyim.
teo_prompt: Amumu naka epolitikis keda aijulanakineta nuka itiaisinei luka iboro kes eyangautu aiyalongong kanejaas itunga. Kanuka ngun, eomitos ipirioitin luipu ebe ejaas atiokisio nuepolok noi koingaren.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri politiki ni o'diru 'diyi tualu e'yo afa eyi ma aje ojazu 'diyi pie 'diyi eji asi otiza 'ba e'yo ama'baa 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi e'yo ewaru ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ega.
nyn_prompt: Obwimukiriro bw'eby'obutegyeki obwahwaire hamwe n'emihendo y'ebintu ebirikuhinduka, bireesireho okwerarikirira omu bantu. N'ekyarugiremu, abakugu baingi nibateebereza oburemeezi bw'amaani omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In a world where trust in institutions is waning, many individuals feel compelled to act when they perceive justice is not being served. This growing sense of disillusionment has led to a rise in vigilantism.
