lug_prompt: Mu nsi nga obwesige mu bitongole bukendeera, abantu bangi bawulira nga bawalirizibwa okubaako kye bakola bwe balaba nga obwenkanya tebuweebwa. Okuggwaamu essuubi kuno kweyongedde kuleetedde okubeera obulindaala.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma gen i kom dul mapat-pat tye ka rweny, dano mapol giwinyo ni omyero gutim gin mo kace gineno ni pe kitye katimo gin matir. Cwer cwiny eni okelo bedo ma wang gi twolo tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naemamei amuno naka iriongeta, epupete itunga luipu ebe ibusakinit kesi aswam ibore yenewomitos kesi ebe mam ejai etube loajokan. Apolou na aiyalongong naka aiyalongongo nes ayangau aijen naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma alia asi'baza amuti yi ma dria ri ni esizu, 'ba karakara yi yi ma ngulupisi yi ega kini e'yo liza kililiru 'diyi 'duni yi ku. E'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu ava ako si ri fe 'ba eyini aa'zu mile be angiri.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi ahu obwesigye omu bitongore buriyo nibuhwaho, abantu baingi nibahurira nibagyemeserezibwa kugira ekibakora baaba nibateekateeka ngu oburingaaniza tiburikuheebwa. Okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira kureesireho okweyongyera kw'obwegyendesereza.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been escalating in the streets as various political factions clash over their differing ideologies. As the election approaches, the atmosphere has become increasingly charged, leading to confrontations among rival groups.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongedde mu nguudo ng'ebiwayi by'ebyobufuzi eby'enjawulo birwanagana olw'endowooza zaabyo ez'enjawulo. Ng'okulonda kusembera, embeera yeeyongedde okutabuka, ekiviiriddeko okulwanagana mu bibiina ebivuganya.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I gudu I kare ma dul mapat-pat me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat tye ka lweny I kingi pi tamgi mapat-pat. I kare ma yer tye ka cok, lworo tye ka medde, ma oweko lweny tye ikin dul mapat-pat matye ka pyem I kingi.
teo_prompt: Eyatakinos aiyalongongo korotin kwape ipatei luegelegela luejaasi keda ipegeta luegelegela. Neyapiete aseo, eyatakinos akiro nuepedorete ayangaun ingungeta kiding igurupun lueboloboloete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi e'bi tu nzila eyi ma alea ekile amuti politiki ni ndundu eyini aco cozu eyi ma egata ndundu 'diyisi. E'yo opetaa ni ecazu ogogo ri ma alea, e'yo 'di ma omgbo ni tu uru dika eri fe e'yo a'di 'dizu amuti a'bala 'yepi 'diyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera aha nguuto ahabw'ebibiina by'obutegyeki ebitarikushushana kurwanagana ahabw'ebiteekateeko byabyo ebitarikushushana. Oburuuru ku burikuhika haihi, embeera eyeyongyeire kuba mbi, ekirikureetaho okurwanagana ahagati y'ebibiina ebirikuhayahayana.

eng_prompt: Recent reports indicate a growing sense of frustration among residents regarding the perceived ineffectiveness of law enforcement. As a result, more individuals are taking matters into their own hands.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti abatuuze beeyongedde okunyiiga olw'abakuumaddembe abatakola bulungi mirimu gyabwe. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi ensonga bazitwalira mu ngalo.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otimme cokcok-ki nyutu cwer cwiny matye kamede ikin lutedero malube ki neno ni dul ma gwoko cik pe tiyo maber. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol tye ka cako tic gi kengi.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos iripotan lu atuboros ebe mam itunga luka atutubet epedoritos aitodolikin ikisila ejok. Kanuka ngun, eutasi itunga luipu ayangar akiro akanin kec bon.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini candi 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra e'yo 'bani ega kini 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi azi nga muke ku ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo 'du eyi ma dria eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa, nizooreka oburemeezi obweyongyeire omu batuuragye, ahabw'okugira ngu abarikukwatisa ebiragiro tibarikukora gye. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi nibetwarira enshonga omu ngaro zaabo.

eng_prompt: Residents reported unusual activity in the area late last night. As a result, the police have launched an investigation to determine the cause of the matter.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze baategeezezza ku bikolwa ebitali bya bulijjo mu kitundu ekikeesezza olwaleero. N'ekyavaamu, poliisi etandise okunoonyereza okuzuula ekyaviiriddeko ensonga.
ach_prompt: Lutedero guwaco ni jami mapat-pat tye katimme I kabedo eni laworo I dyewor. Macalo adwogi ne, abili gucako kwed me niang ngo ma okelo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luka atutubet olimosi nu eswamae lo mam etapit kotoma aiboisit kangin kware. Kanuka ngun, ageutu ipolisin aingic kanu ajenun alibunet naka akirot ngin.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi olu e'yo 'yeta onzi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi aje inisi. E'yo 'disi, polisi eyi e'do e'yo eti ondaza e'yo 'da ma e'yo esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye bagambire ebikorwa bitari bya buriijo omukyanga ekiro kya nyomwebazyo. Ekyarugiremu, poriisi etandikireho okucondooza kumanya ekyareesire enshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: In many organizations, the true intentions of leaders often come into question. While some strive for the greater good, others seem more focused on their personal gain.
lug_prompt: Mu bitongole bingi, ebigendererwa by'abakulembeze ebituufu bibuusibwabuusibwa. Wadde ng'abamu baluubirira ebirungi eby'awamu, abalala balowooza nnyo ku byabwe.
ach_prompt: I dul mapat-pat mapol, miti pa lutela ipol kare bedo ki akala-kala. I kare ma jo mukene gitye ka yele pi ber pa lwak, jo mukene nen calo gitye ka paro pi gin ma konyogi keken.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oriongeta nuipu, mam itunga ejenete nu ekotos engarenok aswam. Karaida eutasi icetunga aswam kagogongu, esubit bala icetunga ekotosi ameda kec bon.
lgg_prompt: Amuti karakara eyi ma alea, drice'ba eyi ma egata a'da 'diyi e'yo eyi ma alea ku. Ba azi 'diyi ka tro asi 'ba e'yo onyiru 'diyi ma dria, 'ba azi 'diyi asi 'ba e'yo yi ma ngulupi ni isuzu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu bitongore bingi, ebigyendererwa by'abebembezi tibirikwetegyerezibwa. N'obu abamwe barikurwanirira ebirungi by'abantu boona, abandi nibasherura ebyetengo byabo.

eng_prompt: After a violent altercation in the town square, several individuals were severely injured by an angry mob. Local authorities struggled to restore order as the situation escalated, prompting emergency services to rush the victims to the region's main hospital.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okusika omuguwa okw'amaanyi mu kabuga, abantu abawerako baafuna ebisago eby'amaanyi okuva mu kibinja ky'abantu abaali banyiize. Ab'obuyinza mu byalo baalwana okuzzaawo obutebenkevu ng'embeera yeeyongedde, ekyaletera ab'obuyambi obw'amangu okuddusa abakoseddwa mu ddwaliro ekkulu ery'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: I ngee lweny ma obedo tye I town square, dano mapol gunongo awano marac adada ki bot lwak ma onongo gitye ki akemo. Lutela me tedero gulwenyo matek me kelo ber bedo ikare ma peko ne omedde, ma oweko lutic me yot kom gukelo dano ma onongo peko iot yat madit me twok piny eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ingungeta lu amumu kotoma osokoni, apotu itunga luipu kimusungunos noi. Apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet kopedosi ainyakun ainapakina naarai abu ejautene itolitol, ido abu koinak lu engeso ayangar adekak adekis napolon.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri okporu tawuni ma alia 'bori ma vutia, 'ba karakarau isu nya'biliko onzi onzi ongulumu aokoru 'diyi dri. Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'ye e'yo okporu e'yo 'da ma omgbo otuzu eyini ani 'ba azakoma mbeleru 'diyi arizu 'ba e'yo 'yepi 'diyi ma alea 'diyi arojo ambo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obutabanguko bw'amaani omu tawuni, abantu baingi bakahutazibwa munonga abantu b'ekiniga. Ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bakarwana kugaruraho obutebekana bw'eihanga ahabw'embeera kweyongyera, ekyareteire ab'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru kutwara abagwire omu irwariro erihango ry'ekyanga.

eng_prompt: The increasing population in our area has led to a rise in medical emergencies. Unfortunately, our emergency services are severely lacking in resources.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abantu mu kitundu kyaffe kuleetedde okweyongerayongera mu bujjanjabi obw'amangu. Eky'ennaku, ebitongole byaffe eby'amangu birina ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Wel dano matye kamede I kabedo wa oweko wel dano ma tye ka nongo kony me yot kom oyot oyot tye ka medde. Ki gum marac, dul ma miyo kony pi peko ma poto atura peke ki jami ma mite.
teo_prompt: Aiyatakino na enaaba loka itunga kaiboisit wok ayangau aiyatakin naka adekisia nu engeso. Nukaiturur, ikidioko noi aiboisio nu engeso.
lgg_prompt: O'bi ma kalafe tupi angu amavileri ma alea ri fe e'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra. Drile onziru, ama vile amuti azakoma mbeleru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi vu afa ayuzaru 'diyi yo.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu omu kyanga kyaitu, kireesire okweyongyera kw'oburwaire bw'ahonaaho. Eky'obusaasi, ebitongore byaitu ebirikuhwera abantu ahonaaho, tibiine by'okukoresa.

eng_prompt: Despite their shared goals, the discussions between the two leaders became increasingly tense. As they navigated complex issues, underlying tensions began to surface.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baalina ebiruubirirwa bye bimu, okukubaganya ebirowoozo wakati w'abakulembeze abo ababiri kweyongera okuba okw'obunkenke. Bwe baali batambula ku nsonga enzibu, obunkenke obwali busibukako bwatandika okulabika.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gubedo ki miti marom, lok ikin lutela aryo ne omede ki bedo tek. I kare ma gubedo ka tic i kom lok matego tutwal, telle ma obedo tye ocako nen.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi keda apeleikineta nuimorikikina, apotu ipegeta kiding engarenok iyarei kiyatakinos. Neautar kesi aitemokin akiro nuetioko, apotu ingungeta kogeutu ajenun.
lgg_prompt: Asisile yini tro ovuzu aluri ma talasi, e'yo nzeza drice'ba iri 'diyi ma eselea ri eca ewaru tu. Yi ni acizu e'yo kongoloko 'diyi ma aliarisi, e'yo ewaru yi ma eselea 'diyi e'do efu ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ebigyendererwa byabo, okuhanuura ahagati y'abebembezi babiri kweyongyeire. Bwanyima y'okukora aha nshonga ezigumire, obunkenke bukatandika kureebeka.

eng_prompt: Collaboration among leaders is essential for fostering a unified vision. When they support one another, they can effectively navigate challenges and drive progress.
lug_prompt: Enkolagana wakati w'abakulembeze ya mugaso mu kutumbula okwolesebwa okw'awamu. Bwe bayambagana, basobola bulungi okwaŋŋanga ebisoomooza n'okutumbula enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Ribbe ikin lutela obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me kelo neno acel. Ka gunyutu kony bot luwotgi, ci gitwero lweny i kom peko ma gitye ka kato ki iye dok gi tyelo kor dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Aimorikikina kiding engarenok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor aomisioit adiope. Arai ingaranakinos kesi, epedorete kesi aitemokin atiokisio ka aitopolor apol.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita drice'ba eyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru e'yo ti ecita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Eyi ka eyi ati eyi ma eselea, eyi eco e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza ko kililiru eyini ani zota ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa ahagati y'abebembezi n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho enteekateeka emwe. Kubarikuhagirana, nibabaasa kurwanisa oburemeezi n'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the area has become a focal point for humanitarian efforts. As a result, the district has seen a significant influx of displaced individuals seeking safety and support.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ekitundu kifuuse ekifo ekikulu eky'obuyambi bw'abantu. N'ekivuddemu, disitulikiti ebaddemu abantu bangi ababundabunda nga banoonya obukuumi n'obuyambi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, kabedo eni odoko kama tic me konyo dano tye iye. Macalo adwogi ne, dictrikeno wel dano mapol ma orwenyo gangi gi me cito ka yenyo gwok ki kony.
teo_prompt: Kokaru luatuboros, eraun aiboisit ngin aiboisit naingarakini itunga. Kanuka ngun, ewanyunit edisitrikt itunga luipu lueutasi aibwot kotoma aiboisio kec aimo ayuwara keda agangat.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, angu 'da eca angu okporu e'yo azakoma fezu 'ba ada eyidri 'diyiniri ru. E'yo 'disi, distrikiti nderi ndre curu'do 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ma emuta angu tambaza azini atita ndazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi,omwanya guhindukire omwanya gw'amaani gw'okuhwera abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, disiturikiti ereebire abantu baingi abarikuruga omu maka gaabo barikuronda oburinzi n'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: The recent disagreements among the community members have prompted the need for a discussion. To address these issues, there will be a reconciliation meeting tomorrow at the district headquarters.
lug_prompt: Obutakkaanya obwaliwo mu kitundu gye buvuddeko buleese obwetaavu bw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino, wajja kubaawo olukiiko lw'okutabagana enkya ku kitebe kya disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Telo tol matye ikin lwak I kare-ni okelo miti me nywako lok. Me tyeko lok magi, kacoke me mato oput bibedo tye diki I gang kal madit me district.
teo_prompt: Amamus acamanara naka itunga luka atutubet nes ayangau eipud loka aitemitem akiro. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu, ejai moi airiamunet naka aimorikikin koyapiesi lokapolon loka edisitrikta.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako o'diru 'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ri fe e'yo nzezu ra. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, mitingi truta niri nga ovu drusi aku ambu distrikiti niri ma alea ci.
nyn_prompt: Obutaikirizana obwahwaireho omu bantu b'omukyanga kireesireho ekyetengo ky'okuhanuura. Okukora aha nshonga ezi, nihaza kubaho orukiiko rw'okugarukana nyenkyakare aha kitebe kya disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: After years of dedicated service in local government, he has decided to take his political ambitions to the next level. With a strong vision for his community, he is ready to make a significant impact on a larger scale.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'aweereza mu gavumenti z'ebitundu, asazeewo okutwala ebyobufuzi bye ku ddaala eddala. Ng'alina ekiruubirirwa eky'amaanyi eri ekitundu kye, mwetegefu okukola enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi ku kigero ekinene.
ach_prompt: Ingee tic pi mwaki mapol I gamente me tedero, en omoko tamme me tero miti ne me cung iwibye I rwom ma lamal. Ki neno matek tutwal pi kabedo ne, en tye atera me kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kabedo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aijanakin kotoma apuganisinei nu okwap, abu ngesi koseu ayangar aswamuke naka epolitikis adoketait naepol noi. Keda aomisioit naegogong kanu itunga ke, ekapakina ngesi aswam nuepolok noi kotoma aiboisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Eli erini azi ngazu okporu local government ma alia 'bori ma vutia, eri asi e'yo 'du e'yo erini lezu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi 'duzu pari azini ma alia. E'yo erini 'ba ongulumu erivileri ma dria okporu risi, eri ngonde e'yo okporu 'yezu ongmbo angiri si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi omu gavumenti z'ebyaro, ashaziremu kutwara ebigyendererwa bye omu by'obutegyeki aha rurengo orundi. N'ekigyendererwa ky'amaani ahabw'ekyanga kye, ayeteekateekire kukora kihango omu bantu baingi.

eng_prompt: The recent statements made during the press conference have sparked significant controversy. In response to the claims, we must clarify our position.
lug_prompt: Ebigambo ebyayogerwa mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire gye buvuddeko byaleetawo okusika omuguwa okw'amaanyi. Mu kwanukula ebigambibwa, tulina okutangaaza ennyiriri zaffe.
ach_prompt: Lok ma kiloko cokcok-ki ikare me lok ki luco lok angeya okelo apoka-poka madit tutwal. Me gamo adot ne, omyero waniang ngo ma wamito.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuaponi kolimunai kopana kotoma airiamunet naka arotak iyemuto eyangautu engunget loepol noi. Kanu abongokin akiro ngun, ekot oni aitetem nuikamunitos akiro wok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani nze o'diru sawa 'bani e'yo nzezu 'ba osisia ni 'diyi be ri fe agata ga tre. Omvita e'yo 'bani 'yole 'diyi ma dria, le ama ma ece e'yo amani 'yele 'diyi ma dria ra.

eng_prompt: Despite the careful planning for the upcoming event, there seemed to be a mix-up in the guest list. As a result, the minister didn't receive the invitation.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko okuteekateeka n'obwegendereza omukolo ogujja, kyalabika nga waaliwo okutabula mu lukalala lw'abagenyi. N'ekyavaamu, minisita teyafuna kuyitibwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kiyubu yub maber pi yub matye kabino ni, wel wele ma gubino obedo ma opoke-opoke. Macalo adwogi ne, minicta ne pe onongo lwongo ne.
teo_prompt: Karaida itemonokitai ejok kanuka epucit lo ebunit, esubit bala ajai aitolitol kotoma aiwadikaeta nuka ipejok. Kanuka ngun mam eminisita abu kodum aiwororio ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani otuta kililiru 'yezu omu emupi ri ma dria ra ti, e'da kile 'ba omuru 'diyi ma ru eyi ma eselea e'yo onzi eyi ci. E'yo 'disi, minisita 'da awini omveta 'da esu kuye.

eng_prompt: In light of the growing number of displaced individuals seeking safety, community leaders gathered to discuss the urgent needs of their regions. During the meeting, one prominent advocate emphasized the importance of financial support for local services overwhelmed by the influx of refugees.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo ogweyongera ogw'abantu ababundabunda nga banoonya obukuumi, abakulembeze b'ebitundu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku byetaago eby'amangu eby'ebitundu byabwe. Mu lukungaana, omukulembeze omu omututumufu yakkaatirizza omugaso gw'obuyambi bw'ensimbi eri obuweereza bw'ekitundu obuzitowa olw'okuyingira kw'abanoonyiboobubudamu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki wel dano matye ka ngwec me cito ka yenyo gwok, lutela me kabedo gucokke me nywako lok I kom jami ma mite pi kabedo gi. Ikare me kacoke enoni, lacwak acel ma oywek owaco ni pire tek tutwal me miyo kony me lim ki kony me tedero ma opong ki luring ayela mapol tutwal.

lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ma kalafe tupi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo ewaru angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Mitingi 'da ma alea, 'ba azi okporu a'di 'dipi e'yo 'da ma dria ri 'ba asi orodri atita robia siri fezu azakoma fele o'bi eyidri angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri e'yo emunyale eyini emuzu angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria.

Omu rukiiko, omwebembezi w'eihanga orikumanywa munonga, akashoboorora omugasho gw'okuheereza obuhwezi bw'esente ahabw'empungi nyingi.

eng_prompt: As the world grapples with the ongoing health crisis, many communities are facing unprecedented economic challenges. The lockdown measures and job losses have severely impacted livelihoods, leading to alarming trends in financial instability.
lug_prompt: Nga ensi yonna erwanagana n'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso, ebitundu bingi byolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa mu by'enfuna okutabangawo. Enteekateeka z'omuggalo n'okufiirwa emirimu bikosezza nnyo obulamu bw'abantu, ekiviiriddeko obutali butebenkevu mu by'enfuna.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka lweny ki peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, kabedo mapol tye ka nongo peko me lim ma peya otimme. Loro piny ki rweny pa tic obalo kwo pa dano tutwal ma oweko lok me can lim omedde tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda ationis naka angaleu, etereikina itunga luipu keda atiokisio nuka ikapun. Iwaitin lu agolokinio naka akwap keda aibiror naka aswamisinei emunarete noi aijar naka itunga, ido eyangaunitos amamus aitojokaar ejautene loka ikapun.

nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ensi erikurwanagana n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho, abantu baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya. Ebiragiro by'okukumiirirwa hamwe n'okufeerwa emirimo, bihindwire munonga emituurire y'abantu, ekyarugiremu okweyongyera kw'eby'entaasya.

eng_prompt: As the number of accidents continues to rise, many are questioning the underlying issues contributing to these incidents. One major concern that has emerged is the deteriorating condition of our roadways.

ach_prompt: Kit ma wel can me gudu tye kamede kwede, dano mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom ngo ma okelo peko magi. Peko acel madit tutwal ma okatti en aye kit ma gudu tye ka bale kwede.

eng_prompt: After a decade of focusing on their individual careers, they often reminisced about the adventures they shared during their time on the road. The memories of late-night drives and spontaneous detours still brought smiles to their faces.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'emyaka kkumi nga batunuulira emirimu gyabwe egy'obuntu, bajjukiranga ebintu bye baaliko nga bali ku luguudo. Ebijjukizo by'okuvuga ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero n'okwekyusakyusa mu makubo byaleetawo akamwenyumwenyu mu ffeesi zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki apar me keto cwinygi I kom tic gi, gubedo ka tam I kom jami ma gutimo I kare ma gubedo I gudu. Wigi poo I kom dwoyo mutoka I dyewor ki ngwec I kabedo mapatpat I dyewor pud kelo bwonyo I wanggi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar itomon lu apodokinit aswamisinei kec, apotu kesi kiitunoto nuikamunitos aiboisio nu apotu kesi aimorata kapak kana alosit kesi orot. Apotu aiituneta nuka airenge keda emotoka kware keda airenge kotoma aiboisio nuipu koinakisi kesi aimurimuria.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance efficiency and meet increasing project demands, the management has decided to invest in advanced technology. This strategic move will enable the team to improve their road construction capabilities significantly.

eng_prompt: Frustration grew among the residents as we faced daily challenges navigating the crumbling roads and inadequate public facilities. In search of a solution, we decided to voice our concerns to those in charge.

ach_prompt: Cwer cwiny omede ikin lutedero ikare ma wanongo peko me wot I gudu matye katur ki jami ma konyo lwak. I yenyo yoo me tyeko lokke, wamoko tamwa me tito peko wa bot ludito tic.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luka atutubet itopoloutu aiyalongong naarai apotu sio adumutu atiokisio nuka alosit korotin luebilibilete keda iboro lumam itwasamao. Kanu aimo epone loka aitemokin ngun, apotu sio alimokisi aiyalongongokosi mama ejaasi ngul luapolok.
lgg_prompt: Asi nyoza zo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea amani dri fuzu e'yo ewaru eyi be o'du driasi nzila onzi 'diyi ma alea azini afa ayuzaru o'bi eyini 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ku 'diyisi. E'yo ma aza kozu, ama asi 'du e'yo amani asi 'bazu 'ba e'yo nde ma drilea 'diyi vu.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to rise, the bustling sounds of carts and voices filled the air. A well-worn path wound its way through the countryside, guiding travelers toward their destination.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okuvaayo, amaloboozi g'emmotoka n'amaloboozi gajjula empewo. Oluguudo olukoleddwa obulungi lwali luyita mu byalo, nga lulambika abatambuze okutuuka gye baali bagenda.

teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibwo, apotu iporotoi luka amotokan keda iporotoi kilelebunos kokwam. Apotu irotin luedoikinit kesi kopedosi aitodolikin aiboisio nu ocaalo, itodunitete alotok aiboisit na elosete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria efuria, o'duko mutukari eyini 'diyi ma o'duko azini o'duko eyi ga angu ma alea tre. Geri 'bani edele kililiru ni aci angu caluru 'diyi ma alea, 'ba aci'ba 'diyi ma dri ce angu eyini muzu ri ma alea.

eng_prompt: Drivers need to be cautious while navigating through the neighborhood. Recent heavy rains have worsened the condition of the streets significantly.
lug_prompt: Abavuzi b'ebidduka beetaaga okubeera abeegendereza nga batambulira mu kitundu. Enkuba etonnya gyebuvuddeko eyongedde okwonoona embeera y'enguudo.

eng_prompt: Recent investigations have revealed significant discrepancies in the financial records of the organization. As a result, it has come to light that the leaders are to blame for the diversion of funds meant for the project.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti ebiwandiiko by'ebyenfuna by'ekitongole ekyo tebikwatagana. N'ekivuddemu, kizuuse nti abakulembeze be bavunaanibwa olw'okukyusakyusa ensimbi ezaali zigendereddwamu pulojekiti.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I buk lim pa dul enoni. Macalo adwogi ne, nen atyer kamaleng ni lutela aye gitye ki bal me nywaro tic ki cente ma kimiyo pi yub eni.

eng_prompt: Frustrated by the deteriorating infrastructure, community members gathered to voice their concerns. At the forefront of the movement, a passionate woman leader emerged to rally support for their cause.

lgg_prompt: Angu 'da ma alea 'ba eyi tra eyi e'yo eyini aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma e'yosi. Ongulumu 'da ma drilea, drice'ba okuru ava be ni efu atita trazu e'yo yini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'ebyombeko ebyabaire nibisisikara, abantu b'omukyanga baketeeranira hamwe kworeka enshonga zaabo. Omwebeembezi w'abakazi aine ekiniga, akaza omu maisho g'ekibiina, kuronda obushagiki ahabw'ekigyendererwa kyabo.

lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'obuwagizi bwonna bwe mmuwadde okumala emyaka, nnali sisuubira nti ajja kuba ku ludda lwabwe. Kiwulikika nga buli omu anvuddeko omugongo mu kiseera we nsinga okubeetaagira.
ach_prompt: I ngee kony ma abedo ka mine pi mwaki mapol, pe abedo ki byek me cung tung botgi. Nen calo dano weng tye ka lokke ki bota ikare ma amito kony gi tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na agangat kere na ijaikinit eong ngesi kanu ikar luipu, mam eong aomit ebe ebuni ngesi ajaut keda kesi. Esubit bala eutasi itunga kere aijulakin eong egura kapak kana epuda eong kes noi.
lgg_prompt: Atita dria mani fe eri dri eli 'diyi ma alia 'bori ma vutia, ma egani ndra kini eri nga yi ma kala 'du ku. Eri ena kile 'ba dria yi ma nguku oja ma dria sawa mani yi lezu turi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'obuhwezi bwingi obu namuhereize okumara emyaka mingi, nkaba ntarikubasa kuteekateeka ngu naija kuba aha rubaju rwabo. Nikireebeka nk'omuntu weena orikumpindukira omugongo obu ndikukirayo kubwetenga.

eng_prompt: Intelligence reports indicated that a group of local youths had been gathering and discussing plans for a large-scale protest. Concerned about potential violence, law enforcement began monitoring their activities closely.
lug_prompt: Lipoota z'ekitongole ekikessi zaalaga nti ekibinja ky'abavubuka b'omu kitundu baali bakungaanye era nga bateesa ku nteekateeka z'okwekalakaasa okw'amaanyi. Olw'okweraliikirira olw'obutabanguko obuyinza okubaawo, abakuumaddembe baatandika okulondoola emirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Ripot ma aa ki bot dul makwedo lok angeya nyutu ni dul pa bulu me tedero gubedo kacoke ka nywako lok I kom yub me jemo madit tutwal. Pi lworo I kom tim gero matwero bedo tye, lutic cik gucako ngiyo ticgi maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan itodutu ebe eutasi atumunak luka atutubet aimorikikin kosodete aitemitem aitemonokineta nuka aidiya naepol noi. Kanu aiyalongong kanuka amumu, apotu ipolisin kogeutu aanyanar aswamisinei kec ejok.
lgg_prompt: O'duko e'yo eti ondaza ni 'diyi ece kini ongulumu 'ba ode angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ni 'diyi ebi eyi tra azini agbatara gba otita ngiringiri 'yezu 'diyi ma dria. Asi otiza e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma dria, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi e'do e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi ma pamvu one.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota z'eby'okwerinda zikooreka ngu guruupu y'eminyeeto y'omubyaro ebaire neeteerana kandi neegaaniira aha nteekateeka y'okwesharinga kw'amaani. Ahabw'okwerarikirira aha butabanguko oburikubaasa kubaho, abarikukwatisa ebiragiro bakatandika kureebuuza emirimo yaabo.

eng_prompt: Tensions escalated in the city as protests turned chaotic, resulting in clashes between demonstrators and law enforcement. In the aftermath, authorities reported multiple arrests.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongedde mu kibuga nga okwekalakaasa kufuuse akavuyo, ekyaviiriddeko okulwanagana wakati w'abeekalakaasi n'abakuumaddembe. Oluvannyuma lw'ekyo, ab'obuyinza baategeezezza nti abantu bangi baakwatibwa.
ach_prompt: Lworo omedde I boma madit I kare ma jemo odoko kuku kuku, ma okelo lweny ikin lujemo ki abili. Ingeye, lutela guwaco ni kimako dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos koibuga naarai apotu aidiya kibiroros, ido abu koyangau ingungeta kiding ediyak keda ipolisin. Akaulo, apotu apedorosio olimosi aikamanario na itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tu aku ambu city niri ma alea e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ni ecazu ngiringiri ru, e'yo fepi 'ba ngiringiri 'yepi 'diyi ma eselea 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi pie. E'yo 'da ma vutia, drice'ba eyi to e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi obizu 'diyi karakara.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu rurembo obu obwesharingo bwahindukire akavuyo, ekyarugiremu okurwanagana ahagati y'abeshaaringi n'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro. Ekyarugiremu, ab'obushoborozi bakakora ripooti y'okukwatwa kw'abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating for weeks, leading to a violent outbreak that shook the community to its core. In the aftermath, the affected town during the riot hosts the biggest number of refugees.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali buyitiridde okumala wiiki eziwera, ekivuddeko okubalukawo kw'obutabanguko okwasannyalaza ekitundu. Oluvannyuma, ekibuga ekyakosebwa mu kwekalakasa kyalimu omuwendo gw'abanoonyiboobubudamu ogusinga obunene.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka medde pi cabit mapol, ma oweko tim gero ocake ma oyelo lwak tutwal. Ingeye, boma ma onongo peko ikare me jemo enoni obedo ki wel luring ayela madwong loyo.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kanu isabitin luipu, ido abu koyangau abwangun na amumu na abu koinak itunga aiyalongong. Akaulo naka ngun, etaun loetirorit aidiya nes ijaunit enaba loepol noi loka ikerai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi e'bi tu sabiti eyi ma alea, e'yo ngiringiri ni e'dozu ongulumu eyi ma eselea. E'yo 'da ma vutia, tawuni andra e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi 'yepi ri ma alea 'ba emunyale ru 'diyi ma kalafe angiri ndeni.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera kumara esande nyingi, ekyarugiremu okubarukaho kw'obutabanguko obwateganiise abantu. Ekyarugiremu, orurembo orwateganisiibwe omu bwimukiriro nirwo rurikwakiira omuhendo gw'empungi ogurikukirayo obwingi.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating for weeks as protests against the government grew more intense. Many citizens were frustrated with the lack of response to their demands, and the absence of the opposition leader left a power vacuum that ignited the unrest.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde okumala wiiki nga okwekalakaasa ku gavumenti kweyongera. Bannansi bangi baali banyiivu olw'obutafuna kuddibwamu ku bye baagala, era okubulawo kw'omukulembeze w'oludda oluvuganya kwalekawo ekituli mu buyinza ekyaleetawo obutabanguko.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka medde pi cabit mapol I kare ma jemo i kom gamente omedde. Lutedero mapol cwinygi pe obedo yom pi peko me gamo lapeny gi, ki bedo peke pa latela pa dul ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente oweko loc obedo peke ma oweko jemo obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kanu isabitin luipu naarai apolor noi aidiya mama ejai apugan. Apotu itunga luipu itakadikisi kanu amamus abongokinet mama ejaasi ipudesiakec, ido amamus na engarenon loka etepegak abu kojalak ailajaara naka apugan na abu koyangau amumu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi omiza ni 'diyi ebi tu sabiti eyi ma alea eyini e'dazu e'yo ngiringiri ni gamete ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi. Kari anzi karakara eyi aa candiru e'yo 'bani e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu kurisi, dika drice'ba amuti politiki ni kari ma dricepiri ma alea ku ri ku e'yo okpo ako ni e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera kumara esande nyingi, obwesharingo oburikuhakanisa gavumenti bweyongyeire. Abatuuragye abaingi bakahwamu amaani ahabw'obutagarukwamu ebi barikwenda, hamwe n'obutabaho bw'omwebembezi w'orubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti, ekyarekireho obutabanguko.

eng_prompt: In a time of great unrest and oppression, the community looked to a figure who could champion their cause. With unwavering determination, the leader emerged as a beacon of hope for those who felt voiceless.
lug_prompt: Mu kaseera k'obutabanguko obw'amaanyi n'okunyigirizibwa, abantu baatunuulira omuntu eyandisobodde okulwanirira ensonga yaabwe. Olw'obumalirivu bwe, omukulembeze yafuluma ng'ekitangaala ky'essuubi eri abo abaali bawulira nga tebalina ddoboozi.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny ki diyo dano, lwak gubedo ka yenyo ngat ma twero cung pigi. Ki miti matek tutwal, latela ne okatti macalo mac me gen bot jo ma onongo giwinyo calo gipe ki dwon.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amumu keda aiticanio, apotu itunga kongicata itunganan yenepedori aigang akiro kec. Keda aomisioit naepol noi, abu engarenon kitodu kwape aanyunet naka amuno mama ejaasi ngul lumam apedoritos einer.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ngiringiri ni azini candi ni 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu eyi ndre angu 'ba azi ecopi e'yo eyini 'diyi ma aza kopi ra ni vu. E'yo asi 'baza kokoru si, drice'ba 'da efu asi'baza ru 'ba e'yo nzepi ku 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutabanguko n'okunyigirizibwa, abantu bakasherura omuntu orikubaasa kurwanirira enshonga zaabo. Ahabw'amaani mingi,omwebembezi akarebeka nk'ekyererezi ky'amatsiko ahari abo abaabaire bateine eiraka.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation, the officers discovered that the vendors were selling counterfeit goods. Despite their protests, the officers confiscate their merchandise and it's not returned to them.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo, abakungu baakizuula nti abasuubuzi baali batunda ebintu ebijingirire. Wadde nga beekalakaasa, abasirikale babowa ebintu byabwe era tebabaddiza.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut, abili gunongo ni lucat ne gubedo ka cato jami ma pe obedo ada. Kadi bed ni gubedo ka jemo, abili gumako jami acata gi dok pe kidwoko botgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok, apotu ipolisin kodumutu ebe autasi agwelanarak agwelanar iboro lumam eraasi luka abeit. Karaida angurianete kesi, apotu ipolisin ikamasi iborokec ido mam inyakakinio kes.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, azi'ba 'da eyi esu kini 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi afa inzoru 'diyi ozi. Yi ma awoko e'dazu ra ti, azi'ba 'da eyi eyi ma afa ozizaru 'diyi 'du eyi ma dria te 'ba omvi eyivu ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi, ba ofiisa bakashanga ngu abashubuzi bakaba nibaguza ebintu ebitahikire. Oihireho okwesharinga kwabo, abaserukare nibatwara ebintu byabo kandi tibarikubigarurira.

eng_prompt: In many rural areas, basic sanitation facilities are often inadequate or poorly maintained. As a result, local communities face significant challenges, especially on weekends when services are limited.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo bingi, eby'obuyonjo ebisookerwako tebimala oba bikuumibwa bubi. N'ekivuddemu, abantu b'omu byalo basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi naddala ku wiikendi ng'obuweereza butono.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me caro, jami ma konyo me gwoko lengo ipol kare pe tye ma oromo onyo pe ki gwoko maber. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero nongo peko mapol tutwalle I tum pa cabit kace kony tye manok.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, mam aiboisio nuka aila edolitos arai mam idaritai ejok. Kanuka ngun, etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nuepolok noi kacut kosabitin luikidioko aijaanakinio.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi ma alia, afa alatani 'diyi cani ku kaniku 'ba eyi ma ta mba kililiru ku. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu tuni sabiti ni i deria azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya mingi y'ebyaro, eby'obuyonjo tibirikumara nainga tibirikureebererwa kurungi. N'ekyarugiremu,abantu b'omubyaro nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani na munonga aha wiikendi obu obuheereza burikuba bukye.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions about improving local commerce, the city proposed a plan to establish vending sites in various locations. However, the community members expressed their concerns and ultimately decided against the proposal.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi ku kutumbula eby'obusuubuzi mu kitundu, ekibuga kyateesa ku nteekateeka y'okutandikawo ebifo eby'okutunda mu bifo eby'enjawulo. Kyokka, abantu b'omu kitundu baalaga okweraliikirira kwabwe era mu nkomerero baasalawo obutakkiriziganya na kiteeso ekyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok mapol I kom ilo malo rwom me cato wil I tedero, citi omiyo tam me yubu kacat I kabedo mapatpat. Kadi bed kumeno, lwak gunyutu lworo gi dok i agiki ne gumoko tamgi me kwero tam ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitemitem nuikamunitos aitojokar agwelanar, abu esite kitutub ainapeta nu aitolomun aiboisio nu agwelanar kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela. Konye apotu itunga luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongosiokec kosodete ainger aomisioit ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri ma vutia e'yo tujari angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria, aku ambo 'da fe egata otita 'bani angu afa ozizu 'diyi sizu angu ndundu eyi ma alea. Kani si, 'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini dika asizu eyi 'du e'yo 'da si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga aha kutunguura eby'obushubuzi omu byaro, orurembo rukataho enteekateeka y'okutandikaho emyanya y'okuguza ebintu omu myanya etari emwe. Kwonka, abantu b'omukyanga bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo kandi ahamuheru bakanga enteekateeka egyo.

eng_prompt: In response to numerous complaints about illegal street vendors, local authorities decided to take action. As a result, the city enforcement team impounds goods from vendors.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okwemulugunya okungi ku basuubuzi b'oku nguudo mu bumenyi bw'amateeka, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. N'ekivuddemu, abakuumaddembe mu kibuga bakwata ebyamaguzi ku batembeeyi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me koko mapol I kom lucat iteng gudi, lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Macalo adwogi ne, dul pa abili me boma ne gimako jami ki bot lucat.
teo_prompt: Kanuka angurian nuipu nuikamunitos agwelanarak luka irotin, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet koseutu aswam. Kanuka ngun, ikamasi etimu loka esite iboro kama ejaasi agwelanarak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba karakara eyini onuzu 'ba afa ozipi nzila dria azita palaa ku 'diyi ma dria risi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, amuti azita ma vuti obipi aku ambu city niri ma alea 'diyi afa ozizaru 'diyi obi engazu 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwetomboitwa kwingi okurikukwata aha batembeyi b'ahanguuto, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bakacwamu kukora. N'ekyarugiremu, ab'eby'okwerinda omu rurembo, nibakwata ebintu by'abatembeyi.

eng_prompt: Many street vendors rely on their small businesses to support themselves and their families. Displacing them without providing alternatives only exacerbates their struggles.
lug_prompt: Abasuubuzi bangi ku nguudo beesigama ku busuubuzi bwabwe obutonotono okweyimirizaawo n'amaka gaabwe. Okubasengula nga tobaleetedde ngeri ndala kyongera kwongera kulwanagana kwabwe.
ach_prompt: Pol pa lucat iteng gudi gijenge I kom biacara gi matino-tino me gwokke ki gangi gi. Kobo gi ki I kabedogi labongo miyo yoo mukene medo peko gi.
teo_prompt: Agwelanarak luipu lu orotin ejarete keda ibiasaran kec ludidik kanu aidar kes keda ikalia kec. Aijulakin kes kotoma aiboisio numam ijanakino iponesio ice iyatakini ationisikec.
lgg_prompt: Ba afa ozipi nzila dria 'diyi ma pari yi yi ati tujara yini werea 'diyi ma dria yi atizu yi ma ngulupi azini familia yini 'diyi pie. Yi ofuzu geri ndundu 'diyi kokoru ri ni lu e'yo yini 'diyi ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Abashuubuzi b'ahanguuto abaingi nibegamira aha bizinesi zaabo nkye kwebaisaho hamwe n'amaka gaabo. Okubaruga omu maka gaabo hatariho oburyo obundi, nikyongyera aha ntaro zaabo.

eng_prompt: In a city where job opportunities are scarce and wages are low, many individuals find themselves struggling to make ends meet. For some, the hustle of street vending has become a necessary means of survival.
lug_prompt: Mu kibuga emirimu gye gitono ate nga n'emisaala mitono, abantu bangi beesanga nga balwana okweyimirizaawo. Eri abamu, akajagalalo k'okutunda ebintu ku nguudo kifuuse ekyetaagisa okusobola okwebeezaawo.
ach_prompt: I boma madit kama tic tye manok dok mucara tye piny, dano mapol nongo tek tutwal me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Pi jo mukene, cato jami iteng gudi dong odoko yoo me kwo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oibuga lo ikidioko aswamisinei ido ikidioko eropit, etereikina itunga luipu keda aijar. Kanejaas icie itunga, erai agwelanar korotin epone loajokan noi loka aijar.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambu cityniri ma alia drileba azi ni 'diyi were azini musara yi eleru, 'ba karakara yi yi isu yi dri e'yo a'di 'dizu yi ma ta mbazu. Ba azi 'diyi dri, e'yo 'ba afa ozipi nzila tia 'diyiniri eca curu'do geri azi eyini ecozu aa'zu edriru ni i.
nyn_prompt: Omu rurembo ahu emirimo etari mingi kandi n'emishaara eri ahansi, abantu baingi niberwana kwebaisaho. Abantu abamwe, okushemererwa kw'okuguza ebintu aha nguuto, kihindukire eky'omugasho aha magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and anticipation, the city has finally announced the relocation of the marketplace. Excitement buzzes in the air as vendors on the streets prepare for the transition to the new market.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okuteekateeka n'okusuubira, ekibuga kyalangiridde okusengula akatale. Essanyu liwuuma mu bbanga ng'abatembeeyi ku nguudo beetegekera okugenda mu katale akapya.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki bedo ki byek, citi dong otyeko cwalo lok angeya me kobo cuk. Cwiny dano tye yom tutwal I kare ma lucat iteng gudi tye ka yubbe me kobo me cito I cuk manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemonokin keda aomisio, abu esite kolimo ebe ebuni kesi aijulakin esokoni. Ejaasi itunga keda aiyalama naarai eutasi agwelanarak lu orotin aitemonokin kanu aijulakin osokoni loitetet.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini e'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, aku ambo 'da azi asizu e'yo 'bani cuu 'da ojazu angu nduni ma alea ri ra. Ayiko efu oli alia 'ba afa ozipi nzila dria 'diyi yini yi oturia muzu cu o'diruri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okuteekateeka,orurembo ruherize kurangirira okuhindura omwanya gw'akatare. Okushemererwa nikweyongyera ahabw'abarikuguza ebintu aha nguuto okweteekateekyera okuza omu katare akasya.

eng_prompt: In response to growing complaints from local businesses and residents, the city authority decided to address the issue of unregulated street vending. They held a meeting to discuss potential measures to ensure compliance with local laws.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okwemulugunya okweyongera okuva mu basuubuzi b'omu kitundu n'abatuuze, ab'obuyinza mu kibuga baasalawo okukola ku nsonga y'okutunda ku nguudo okutali mu mateeka. Baatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukakasa nti amateeka g'ekitundu gagobererwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me koko mapol ma aa ki bot lutim biacara ki lutedero, lutela me boma ne gumoko tamgi me cobo peko me cato jami iteng gudi ma pe ki ngolo kop i komgi. Gubedo ki kacoke me nywako tam i kom yoo mapat-pat me neno ni kiworo cik me tedero.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin angurian nuka agwelanarak keda itunga luka atutubet, apotu apedorosio nuka eibuga kitemokisi aitemokin ationis naka agwelanar korotin. Apotu kesi iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitup ikisila luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako tujari 'yepi angu 'da ma alea tualu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi, drice'ba aku ambo 'da ma alea 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'bani 'ba afa ozipi nzila dria 'diyi ma dria azita kokoru ri ma aza kozu. Eyi 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu nezu ra kini 'ba eyi obi azita angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma vuti.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwetomboitwa kw'abashuubuzi n'abatuuragye, ab'obushoborozi omu rurembo bakacwamu kukora aha nshonga y'okuguza ebintu aha nguuto. Bakagira orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha mihanda y'okukuratira ebiragiro by'ekyaro.

eng_prompt: As urban populations continue to grow, city planners face increasing challenges in accommodating both residential and commercial needs. Effective land use strategies are essential to ensure that businesses have the space they require to thrive.
lug_prompt: Nga abantu b'omu bibuga beeyongera okukula, abategesi b'ebibuga basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kukola ku byetaago by'abatuuze n'ebyobusuubuzi. Enkola ennungi ez'okukozesa ettaka zeetaagisa okulaba nti bizinensi zirina ekifo we zeetaaga okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano me boma tye kamede ki dongo, luyub city nongo peko mapol tutwal me timo jami ma mite pi bedo ki biacara. Yoo me tic ki ngom maber pire tek tutwal me neno ni biacara tye ki kabedo ma mite me dongo.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luko otaun, etereikina keda ainingosia nuka aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga keda agwelanar. Iwaitin lu itwasamaere alupok ejok eraas lu epolok noi kanu awanyun ebe ejaasi ibiasaran keda aiboisit na ekotos kesi kanu apolor.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe o'bi eyini aku ambo eyi ma alea ri ni mu drile tu, 'ba aku ambo eyi otupi 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyini ani ecozu aku eyi ma alea tualu tujari 'yezu 'diyi pie. Geri nyaku ayuza kililiru ri eri orodriru tujari eyini angu eyini lele tujari eyi 'yezu ri esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu omu ndembo niguguma nigweyongyera, abateekateeki b'endembo nibatunga oburemeezi obweyongyeire omu kukora ahabyetaago by'abantu n'eby'obushubuzi. Enkora nungi y'okukoresa eitaka n'ey'omugasho okureeba ngu bizinesi ziine omwanya ogu zirikwetenga kutunguuka.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership requires not only vision and inspiration but also a strong foundation in management skills. To truly guide a team, one must demonstrate competence and integrity in all aspects of their role.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi tebwetaagisa kwolesebwa n'okubudaabudibwa kwokka wabula n'omusingi omunywevu mu bukugu mu nzirukanya y'emirimu. Okulambika obulungi ttiimu, omuntu alina okulaga obusobozi n'obwesimbu mu buli kimu ky'akola.
ach_prompt: Tela maber pe mito neno ki cuku cwiny keken ento bene mito guti matek. Me doro tim maber, omyero ngat moni onyut ni etye ki kero ki woro I jami weng ma en timo.
teo_prompt: Engarenone lo iswamai ejok mam ekoto aomisio ka aisinyikokinit bon konye ibusakinit itunganan ajaut keda acoa naepol noi na eyaitene. Kanu aingarenikin etimu, ekot itunganan aitodun ebe epedorit ngesi aswam iboro kere.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri leni lu egata azini ava feza ku te vini e'yo okporu ondua driceza ni 'diyi ma alia indi. Amuti azi ma dri cezu kililiru, le 'ba alu alu ma e'da okpo azini e'yo ada be e'yo dria eyini 'ye 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi, tiburikwetengyesa ebiteekateeko n'amaani byonka, beitu n'obwegyendesereza. Okwebembera tiimu, omuntu aine kworeka obushoboorozi n'obwesigwa omu mirimo ye yoona.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support each other during tough economic times, the local market vendors gathered to discuss their financial challenges. After much deliberation, they decided to take action by forming a saving group.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyambagana mu biseera ebizibu eby'ebyenfuna, abasuubuzi b'omu katale baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bizibu byabwe eby'ensimbi. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo nga bakola ekibiina ky'okutereka ssente.
ach_prompt: I tute me konyo luwotgi ikare me can lim, lucat icuk gugure me nywako lok I kom peko me lim ma gitye kwede. Ingee tam matut, gumoko tamgi me cako dul ma gwoko cente.
teo_prompt: Kanu agangat nepepe kotoma apakio nuetioko nuka ikapun, apotu agwelanarak luka esokoni kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem atiokisio kec nuka ikapun. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, apotu kesi koseutu aswam kowai lo aiswamaun egurupu loka aimono ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu atita fezu eyi ma eselea sa'wa e'yo robiani kongolokoru 'diyi ma alea, 'ba afa ozipi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi e'yo nzezu e'yo ewaru eyini esu robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria. Eyi ega e'yo eyi ma dria sa'wa ezu 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu geri eyini amuti robia trazu ri e'dozu risi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okushagikana omu bwire bw'eby'entaasya bugumire, abashuubuzi b'omubutare bakahurira hamwe kuhanuura ahaburemeezi bwabo bw'esente. Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga, bakasharamu kukora ekirikubaasika barikutandikaho ekibiina ky'okutereka sente.

eng_prompt: In any thriving community, various factors contribute to its growth and prosperity. Among these, the presence of a safe and secure environment plays a crucial role in attracting investment and fostering development.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyonna ekikulaakulana, waliwo ebintu bingi ebiviirako okukula n'okukulaakulana. Mu bino, okubeerawo kw'embeera ey'obukuumi n'obutebenkevu kikola kinene nnyo mu kusikiriza bamusigansimbi n'okutumbula enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken matye ka dongo, jami mapol tye ma weko dongo ki dongo bedo tye. I kin jami magi, bedo tye pa kabedo maber dok ma kuc tye iye konyo tutwal I kelo lim ki dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naepol noi, ipu iboro lueyangaunete apol keda apol. Kotoma ngun, ajaut naka aiboisit na eyuara ido na eyuwara erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ayangaun agwelanar keda aitopol apol.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu dria tupi muke 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ndundu eyi e'yo eyini zozu tualu lonyi eyini esu 'diyi pie. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, angu aa'zu muke azini ageitema be ri ni azi okporu nga lonyi vuti aleza ni 'diyi ejizu dika angu ezoma ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kyanga kyona ekirikukurakurana, hariho ebintu bingi ebirikureetaho okukura n'okutunguuka. Omuri ebi,okubaho kw'obuhangwa burungi n'oburinzi, nikikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kureetaho eby'obushubuzi n'okureetaho entunguuka.

eng_prompt: After months of campaigning and community engagement, the residents eagerly awaited the announcement of their new district leader. The atmosphere was filled with anticipation as the day of the swearing-in ceremony finally arrived.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okunoonya akalulu n'okukunga abantu, abatuuze balindirira n'essanyu okulangirira omukulembeze waabwe owa disitulikiti omuggya. Embeera yali ejjudde okweraliikirira ng'olunaku lw'okulayira lutuuse.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me bito kwi ki miyo ngec bot lwak, lutedero gubedo kakuru kwena pa latela gi manyen me dicitrwik. Lwak gubedo ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma nino me kwonge oo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aisup aseeta keda aisup itunga, apotu itunga idaritoto alimoret naka engarenon loitetet loka edisitrikt. Ajaasi itunga keda aiyalama naarai abu aparan naka ailair kopotu.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani ti odaza 'yezu azini ongulumu eyi ma ti ojizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi te asi driasi e'yo 'bani eyi ma drice'ba distrikiti ni o'diru ri oluzu ri. Angu nderi ga asi 'baza be o'du oyo soza niri ni ecazu 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuronda akaruuru hamwe n'okwetabamu kw'abantu, abatuuragye bakategyereza okurangirira omwebembezi wa disiturikiti omusya. Abantu bakaba bashemereirwe munonga ahabwokuba eizooba ry'okurahira rikahika.

eng_prompt: The community has been grappling with various socioeconomic issues that have hindered its development. As a result, residents are increasingly concerned about the state of local infrastructure and essential services.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kirwanagana n'ebizibu by'enfuna n'embeera z'abantu eby'enjawulo ebiziyizza enkulaakulana yaakyo. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze beeyongera okufaayo ku mbeera y'ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kitundu n'obuweereza obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka lweny ki peko me can lim ma obedo ka gengo dongo lobo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom rwom me jami ma mite I kabedo gi kacel ki kony ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi itunga luka atutubet ngin keda atiokisio nuka ikapun nuimikit apolokec. Kanuka ngun, epodokitos itunga noi nuikamunitos ejautene loka iboro ka aijanakino.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi dri ci e'yo ndundu e'yo robia ni 'diyi pie angu ezoma atripi 'diyi be. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo afa ayuzaru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma wura si tualu azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibarwanagana n'eshonga z'eby'entaasya ezirikuremesa entunguuka yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye beeyongyeire kufayo aha mutindo gw'ebyombeko hamwe n'obuheereza.

eng_prompt: Throughout the years, our community faced numerous challenges and changes in leadership. Despite the shifting political landscape, one individual consistently stood out for their dedication and service.
lug_prompt: Emyaka gyonna, ekitundu kyaffe kyayolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa kungi n'enkyukakyuka mu bukulembeze. Wadde ng'embeera y'eby'obufuzi yakyuka, waliwo omuntu omu eyasigala nga wa njawulo olw'obumalirivu n'obuweereza bwe.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato angec, kabedo wa okato ki peko mapol ki aloka loka I tela. Kadi bed ni lok me cungu iwi-bye obedo ka loke, ngat acel obedo ki miti me tic matek.
teo_prompt: Kokaru kere, abu atutubetekosi kodum atiokisio nuipu keda aijulanakineta nuka eingarenone. Karaida ejulakinete akiro nuka epolitikis, abu idiopetunganan kojen noi kanu ainakina keda aijanakinakec.
lgg_prompt: Eli driasi, ongulumu amavileri esu e'yo ewaru azini ojata driceza ni 'diyi karakara. E'yo politiki ni oja'ba 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba alu ni e'da i ma ava azini azi ngaza si.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka yoona,ekyanga kyaitu kitungire oburemeezi bwingi n'empindahinduka omu bwebembezi. Oihireho empindahinduka omu by'obutegyeki, hariho omuntu omwe owabaire ari ow'omutaano ahabw'obweziriki n'obuheereza bwe.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising between the two neighbors for weeks, fueled by disputes over the exact borders of their properties. As the argument escalated, tempers flared and words turned into violence.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera wakati wa baliraanwa bano bombi okumala wiiki eziwera, nga buva ku butakkaanya ku nsalo z'ebyobugagga byabwe. Okuyomba bwe kweyongera, obusungu bwabalukawo era ebigambo ne bifuuka eby'effujjo.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede ikin jirani aryo ne pi cabit ma okato angec, ma okelo daa I kom wang lobo matir pa jami gi. Laro lok ne omedde, kiniga omako dano dok lokke odoko gero.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kiding idunyeta ngul iarei adaun isabitin luipu, kanu engunget lo ikoruo lu alupok kec. Neapolor epeget, apotu anyunyurasi kosodete akiro aijulakin araun amumu.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri ebi ovu uru jo ejele iri 'diyi ma eselea sabiti eyi ma alea, e'yo erita ako eyini e'yo boda eyivile 'diyi ma dria 'diyisi. Erita ako 'da ma omgbo ni tuzurisi, e'yo 'bani nze 'diyi eca ngiringiri ru.
nyn_prompt: Obutaikirizana butwire nibweyongyera ahagati y'abaturanyi babiri kumara esande, ahabw'obutaikirizana aha nsharo z'ebintu byabo. Okuhayahayana ku kwayeyongyeire, ekiniga kikarugaho, ebigambo byahinduka obwimukiriro.

eng_prompt: In many countries, strict regulations govern the ownership and use of firearms. Understanding these laws is crucial for anyone considering owning a gun.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nnyingi, amateeka amakakali gafuga obwannannyini n'okukozesa emmundu. Okutegeera amateeka gano kikulu nnyo eri omuntu yenna alowooza ku ky'okuba n'emmundu.
ach_prompt: I lobe mapol cik tye matek tutwal I kom bedo ki ki tic ki muduku. Niang cik magi pire tek tutwal pi ngat ma mito bedo ki muduku.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwapin nuipu, ejaas ikisila luitikitikitos ajaut keda imudun keda aitosom imudun. Amisiikin ikisila lu epol ajokis kanu idiotunganan yen ekoto ajaut keda emudu.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, azita okporu eyi e'yo osu eyi ma ta mbazu azini eyi ma ayuza ma dria. E'yo vazu azita 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru 'ba ci egapi osu eyi ma ta mbazu ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu mahanga maingi, hariho ebiragiro by'amaani ebirikukwata aha kugira n'okukoresa ebikwato. Okwetegyereza ebiragiro ebi n'eky'omugasho ahari buri omwe orikuteekateeka kugira embundu.

eng_prompt: After years of conflict and suffering, the leaders finally recognized the urgent need for reconciliation. In a historic meeting, they gathered to discuss terms that would bring lasting peace to their war-torn regions.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'obukuubagano n'okubonaabona, abakulembeze kyaddaaki baalaba obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okutabagana. Mu lukungaana olw'ebyafaayo, baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okuleeta emirembe egy'olubeerera mu bitundu byabwe ebyalimu entalo.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me lweny ki deno can, lutela ne dong guneno ber pa mato oput. I kacoke ma pire tek tutwal, gucokke me nywako lok I kom yoo me kelo kuc matwal I but lobo gi ma lweny tye ka lweny I komgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ingungeta keda aiticanio, apotu engarenok kojenutu eipud loka acamanar. Kotoma airiamunet naka akiro nukolo, apotu kesi kotukokinos kanu aitemitem nuka ainapakin naepol noi kotoma aiboisio kec nuejaasi keda ejie.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara ngiringiri azini candi isuzu 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba 'da eyi esu asizu e'yo lezu ti ecita ejizu mbeleru ri ra. Mitingi adi ni ma alea, eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini ecozu asianzu ewule 'diyi ejizu angu eyini a'di 'dipi 'diyi ma alea ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'obutaikirizana n'okubonabona, abebembezi bakahendera baamanya ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'okugarukana. Omu rukiiko rw'ebyafaayo, baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura ebirikubaasa kureetaho obusingye omu byanga byabo ebirimu entaro.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising in the neighborhood for weeks, with reports of escalating violence among local youths. After a particularly violent altercation, authorities decided to intervene and restore order.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu okumala wiiki eziwera, nga waliwo alipoota z'obutabanguko obweyongedde mu bavubuka b'omu kitundu. Oluvannyuma lw'okusika omuguwa okw'amaanyi, ab'obuyinza baasalawo okuyingira mu nsonga n'okuzzaawo obutebenkevu.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka medde I kabedo ne pi cabit mapol, ki lok me gero I kin bulu matye I kabedo ne. Ingee lweny matek tutwal, lutela gumoko tamgi me donyo iyub eni me kelo kuc.
teo_prompt: Apolor aiyalongong kotoma aiboisit kangin adaun isabitin luipu, keda iripotan luka amumu naepol noi kama ejaasi atumunak luka atutubet kangin. Akaulo naka ingungeta lu amumu, apotu apedorosio kiswamaunos kanu ainyakakin ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ebi tu angu ama agei ri ma alea sabiti eyi ma alea, e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo tupi 'ba ode eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie. Erita ako okporu ni ma vutia, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu azini geri kililiru 'diyi ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu byaro kumara esande, n'amakuru g'obutabanguko omu minyeeto y'omukyanga. Bwanyima y'okutongana kw'amaani, ab'obushoborozi bakasharamu kutaahamu kugaruraho obusingye.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising in the community as developers eyed the prime land for a new luxury project. Frustrated by the constant encroachment on their homes, the residents decided to take a stand against the wealthy outsider.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde mu kitundu ng'abazimbi batunuulira ettaka ery'ettutumu okuzimba pulojekiti empya ey'ebbeeyi. Olw'okunyiiga olw'okuyingirirwa kw'amaka gaabwe buli kaseera, abatuuze baasalawo okulwanyisa omugwiira omugagga.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I kin lwak I kare ma lugedo gubedo ka yenyo ngom maber me yubu gedo manyen me rwom ma malo. Ki cwer cwiny pi tim me donyo I gangi gi ikare ki kare, lutedero gumoko tam gi me lweny i kom lulonyo ma aa ki woko.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotoma atutubet naarai ekotosi itunga alupok nuepolok kanu adukio epurojekt loejok. Apotu itunga luka atutubet kongeroto itunga luka akwapin ace luebaritos.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ri e'bi tu ongulumu eyi ma alea 'ba angu si'ba 'diyi ni angu okporu 'da ma alea angu 'bani ecozu angu 'da sizu o'diru 'diyisi. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma aku eyi ma alea sa'wa driasi 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi e'yo 'du 'ba lonyi be amve 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukaba bugumire nibweyongyera omu bantu, ahabw'abahingi kuronda eitaka ry'omutaano ry'okwombekamu purogyekiti y'eby'omuhendo. Ahabw'okwerarikirira ahabw'okutaaha omu maka gaabo, abatuuragye bakasharamu kurwanisa abagaiga ab'aheeru.

eng_prompt: Effective governance is crucial for a nation's progress and prosperity. When leaders fail to prioritize the needs of their citizens, the consequences can be dire.
lug_prompt: Obufuzi obulungi bwa mugaso nnyo eri enkulaakulana n'okukulaakulana kw'eggwanga. Abakulembeze bwe balemererwa okukulembeza ebyetaago bya bannansi baabwe, ebivaamu biba bibi nnyo.
ach_prompt: Tela maber pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo. Ka lutela pe guketo miti pa anywali gi obed gin ma pire tek, adwogi ne twero bedo rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Erai epugae loajokan ibore yenepol noi kanu apol keda apol naka akwap. Arai ipiko engarenok aisingarenit ipudesia luka itungakec, etiono noi nuelomunete.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri eri orodriru kari ma zota ni. Drice'ba eyi ka e'yo kari anzi eyivile 'diyini lele 'diyi 'du okporu ku, e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi onzi.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi n'obw'omugasho aha ntunguuka y'eihanga. Abeebembezi kubaremwa kwebembeza ebyetengo by'abantu baabo, ebirikurugamu nibibaasa kuba eby'akabi munonga.

eng_prompt: In a recent press conference, government officials discussed plans for urban development and expansion. As part of this initiative, the minister of local government announced new cities this year.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire olwaliwo gye buvuddeko, abakungu ba gavumenti baakubaganya ebirowoozo ku nteekateeka z'okukulaakulanya n'okugaziya ebibuga. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, minisita wa gavumenti z'ebitundu yalangiridde ebibuga ebipya omwaka guno.
ach_prompt: I kacokke pa luco lok angeya ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic pa gamente guloko i kom yub me dongo boma ki dongo lobo. Macalo but yub man, minista ma loyo lok kom gamente me tedero otito pi citi manyen imwaka ni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamun na pac keda lu iyemuto, apotu eswamak luka apugan kitetemoto nuka aitopol keda aitanyanyar itaunin. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, abu eminisita loka apuganisinei nu okwap kolimo isitei luitetiak okaru lo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi be eturisi, azi'ba gameteni 'diyi nze e'yo otuta angu ezoma ni azini angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma dria ra. Otita 'di ma azi ru, minisita local government niri azi aku ambo o'diru 'diyi eli 'disi.
nyn_prompt: Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, abakuru omu gavumenti bakahanuura aha nteekateeka y'okutunguura n'okushanjuura orurembo. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, minisita wa gavumenti z'ebyanga akarangirira endembo nsya omwaka ogu.

eng_prompt: In our small community, we often discuss the qualities that make a good leader. One person who consistently stands out in our conversations is the village chairman.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyaffe ekitono, tutera okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri ezifuula omukulembeze omulungi. Omuntu omu atuukira ddala mu mboozi zaffe ye ssentebe w'ekyalo.
ach_prompt: I kabedo wa matidi, ipol kare waloko i kom kit ma latela maber omyero obed kwede. Ngat acel ma maro lok I kinwa I kare weng obedo won kom me caro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubetekosi, ipegeta iso iponesio lu iswamaununei engarenon loajokan. Idiopetunganan yenepol noi kotoma oineresinei kosi ngesi apolon eicolong loka ecalo.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu amavile werea 'diyi ma alea, ama e'yo nze e'yo wura 'ba drice'ba muke 'diyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria. Ba alu ama vile e'yo onzeza 'diyi ma alia pa so'baa sawa driasi ri eri ogua e'i caluniri'i.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka kyaitu, nitukira kugaaniira aha mitwarize erikureetera omwebembezi murungi. Omuntu omwe orikumanywa munonga omu kugaaniira kwaitu ni mukuru w'entebe y'ekyaro.

eng_prompt: In moments of celebration and reflection, the significance of national symbols becomes clear. One such symbol is the national anthem, which serves as a powerful reminder of the values that bind the nation together.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'okujaguza n'okufumiitiriza, amakulu g'obubonero bw'eggwanga geeyoleka bulungi. Akamu ku bubonero obwo lwe luyimba lw'eggwanga, olutujjukiza obulungi obugatta eggwanga.
ach_prompt: I kare me kwero ki lwodo lok, ber pa lanyut me lobo nen atyer kamaleng. Lanyut acel ma kit meno obedo wer me lobo, ma poyo wi dano i kom jami mabeco ma kubu lobo kacel.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu ainumunum ka aomoom, ecai ajokis naka ijenuneta luka akwapuwok. Adiopet kotoma aanyunet kangin ngesi ekosio lo akwap, lo isisianakini itunga ajokisio nu imorikikinete akwapuwok nepepe.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ayiko zuza ni azini e'yo egazu ri ma alea, orodri eceta kari ni 'diyiniri eca kililiru. Wura 'dile 'diyi ma azi ongo kariniri'i, dika eri azi nga e'yo okporu e'yo onyiru kari 'di ecipi tualuri ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okujaguza n'okuteekateeka,omugasho gw'obumanyiso bw'eihanga nigureebeka gye. Kamwe aha bubonero nk'obwo n'ekyeshongoro ky'eihanga, ekirikwijusya amaani g'emitwarize erikukwatanisa eihanga.

eng_prompt: After years of dedicated service, the chairman announced his retirement, prompting a wave of nostalgia among the committee members. In honor of his contributions, the district committee organised a farewell party for the chairman.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'aweereza n'obunyiikivu, ssentebe yalangirira okuwummula kwe, ekyaleetawo okusubwa mu bammemba b'akakiiko. Olw'ebirungi bye yakola, akakiiko ka disitulikiti kaategeka akabaga akasiibula ssentebe.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic matek, won kom owaco ni ebiweko tic, man okelo cwer cwiny ikin lumemba me dul enoni. Me woro tic ma en otimo, dul me district guyubu pati me weko won kom.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aijanakin, abu apolon eicolong kolimo ebe ebuni ngesi aiyengun, ido abu koyangau aiyalongong kanejaas imeban luka ekomiti. Kanu ayongite agangat ke, abu ekomiti loka edisitrikt itemok epucit loka atupakinit apolon eicolong.
lgg_prompt: Eli azi ngazu asi driasi 'bori ma vutia, ogua e'i azi erini ava liza aziarisi, e'yo 'di fe 'ba committee ma alia 'diyi dri ava liza ra. Azi erini nga 'diyi inzizuri ma e'yosi, komiti distrikiti niri otu omu 'ba ogua e'i ni asizu ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi omu buheereza, mukuru w'entebe akarangirira okuhuumura kwe, ekyareteire ba memba b'akakiiko okwetomboita. Ahabw'obuhwezi bwe,akakiiko ka disiturikiti kakatebekanisa akabaga k'okusiibuura mukuru w'entebe.

eng_prompt: The community gathered in anticipation for the annual health awareness event. Local leaders and residents were excited to hear from prominent figures in the health sector.
lug_prompt: Abantu baakuŋŋaanye nga beetegekera omukolo gw'okumanyisa abantu ku byobulamu ogutegekebwa buli mwaka. Abakulembeze b'ebyalo n'abatuuze baali basanyufu okuwulira okuva mu bantu abamanyifu mu kitongole ky'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Lwak gugure pi yub me rweyo lwak i kom lok me yot kom ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka. Lutela me tedero ki lutedero cwiny gi obedo yom me winyo lok pa ludito me tenge me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga kotukokinos kanu aisisianakino nuka angaleu. Apotu engarenok keda itunga luka atutubet iyalamikinos noi aipup akiro kama ejaasi itunga luejenara noi luka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyi tra eyi eyini e'yo 'bani imbata fezu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma e'yo egazu. Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tualu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie ayikosi e'yo erizu engazu 'ba okporu arakala alata niri ma alea 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baketeerana bategyereize omukoro gw'okumanyisa abantu ebikwatireine n'eby'amagara ogurikubaho buri mwaka. Abeebembezi b'ebyaro hamwe n'abatuuragye bakashemererwa kuhurira kuruga omu bantu b'amaani omu by'amagara.

eng_prompt: In the early 2000s, a deadly outbreak of a mysterious virus began to spread across parts of Africa. Health officials were alarmed as reports of severe illness and high mortality rates emerged from northern Uganda.
lug_prompt: Ku ntandikwa y'emyaka gya 2000, okubalukawo kw'akawuka akatta abantu mu ngeri ey'ekyama kwatandika okusaasaana mu bitundu bya Afirika. Abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeraliikirivu nga alipoota z'obulwadde obw'amaanyi n'omuwendo gw'abafa omungi biva mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda.
ach_prompt: I acaki me mwaka alip aryo ki apar wiye acel, poto pa kwidi marac tutwal ocako nyaa I but lobo Afrika mapat-pat. Lutic me yot kom gubedo ki lworo I kare ma adwogi tic pa two matego ki too pa dano omede I kumalo me Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kageunet naka ekaru ilukumin iarei, abu adeka naka ekorona kogeu awear kotoma aiboisio nuka Africa. Apotu eswamak lu adekis okuriaka noi naarai apotu iripotan luka adekasinei nuarokok keda atwakisia nuipu kopotu ko nyakoi nako Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Eli alifu iri ma e'doria, azo onzi 'bani nile ku ni e'do i ere angu Africa ni 'diyi ma alea dria. Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi eca asi otiza si e'yo 'bani 'yozu azo okporu azini 'ba odrapi 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu ururi ni efuzu Uganda ma kala uruleruri ma aliarisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu ntandikwa y'emyaka ya 2000, okubarukaho kw'akakooko ka muzibwe kukatandika kujanjaara omu bicweka bya Afirika. Ab'eby'amagara baketomboitwa amahuriire g'okurwara kw'amaani n'okufa kw'abantu baingi kuruga omu matemba ga Uganda.

eng_prompt: There was a lot of discussion in the news about the recent outbreak of Ebola in Africa. Many were trying to understand how the virus was transmitted and who was at risk.
lug_prompt: Wabaddewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo kungi mu mawulire ku kubalukawo kwa Ebola mu Afirika gyebuvuddeko. Bangi baali bagezaako okutegeera engeri akawuka gye kasaasaanamu n'ani ali mu bulabe.
ach_prompt: Lok angeya oloko tutwal I kom poto pa two ebola I lobo Afrika. Dano mapol gubedo katemo me niang kit ma kwidi ne kobo kwede ki anga matye I peko.
teo_prompt: Epuakata noi iyemuto nuikamunitos abwangun naka adeka naka ebola koAfrica. Autasi itunga luipu aitam amisiikin epone lo ikopas ekorona keda lu ejai ationis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza angiri ndra o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma alea e'yo azo ebola niri ma e'dota Africaa ri ma dria. Ba karakara eyi ri o'bi va geri azo 'da ni i erezu ri ma dria tualu 'ba aa'pi e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Habaireho okuhanuura kwingi omu mahurire aha kubarukaho kwa Ebola omuri Afirika. Baingi bakaba nibagyezaho kwetegyereza oku akakooko karikuturira hamwe n'abo abari omu kabi.

eng_prompt: Health officials are increasingly concerned about the rapid transmission rates observed in recent outbreaks. As a result, they are urging the public to take necessary precautions to prevent further infections.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeyongedde okweraliikirira olw'okusaasaana okw'amangu okwalabibwa mu kubalukawo kw'ekirwadde gye buvuddeko. N'ekyavaamu, bakubiriza abantu okwegendereza okusobola okwewala okukwatibwa obulwadde.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom nyaa pa two korona ma otimme cokcok-ki. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka lego lwak me gwoke me gengo nyaa pa two mukene.
teo_prompt: Iyalongongosi eswamak luka angaleu kanu awea na adekasinei kapakio nu. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitos kesi itunga aitikitik adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi asi otiza be tu e'yo 'bani e'yo azo korona niri ma ereta mbeleru ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi o'bi eyi ai 'yeta kililiru 'diyi 'yezu azo eyi ma ereta atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara beeyongyeire kwerarikirira ahabw'oburwaire bw'amaani obureebirwe omu kubarukaho kw'endwara. N'ekyarugiremu,bariyo nibashaba abantu okwetantara okujanjaara kw'endwara.

eng_prompt: After months of deployment in the conflict-ridden regions of Congo, reports began to surface about a mysterious illness affecting the troops. As the soldiers returned home, concerns grew about the potential spread of this contagious disease.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi nga batwalibwa mu bitundu bya Congo ebirimu entalo, alipoota zaatandika okufuluma ku bulwadde obw'ekyama obwali bukosa amagye. Abasirikale bwe baddayo eka, okweraliikirira kweyongera ku kusaasaana kw'obulwadde buno obusiigibwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe ma kicwalo gi I kabedo ma lweny tye I iye I lobo Congo, lok ocako katti I kom two mo ma pe ngene ma onongo tye ka yelo lumony. Ikare ma lumony gudok gang, lworo omedde I kom nya pa two ma kobo oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aijukario kotoma aiboisio nuka ejie ko Congo, apotu iripotan kogeutu alomun nuikamunitos adeka namam ejena naetirorit isirikaalei. Neabongunia isirikaalei ore, apotu iyalongongosi kanu awea na adeka na.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani yi o'bazu angu a'di 'dipi Congoa 'diyi ma alia 'bori ma vutia, o'duko e'do efu e'yo azo 'bani nile ku ni asikari yi bi ri ma dria. Asikari yini gozu akua, asi otiza tu e'yo azo 'di ma ereta ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuheereza abaserukare omu bicweka bya Congo ebirimu entaro, ripoota zikatandika kubaho ezirikukwata aha ndwara etarikumanywa erikuteganisa abaserukare. Abaserukare ku baabaire nibagaruka omuka, okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira.

eng_prompt: In response to the Ebola outbreak, the government implemented strict protocols to ensure the safe handling of deceased individuals. This was crucial to prevent further transmission of the virus and to maintain public health safety.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kwa Ebola, gavumenti yassaawo enkola enkakali okulaba nti abafu bakwatibwa bulungi. Kino kyali kikulu nnyo mu kutangira okusaasaana kw'akawuka n'okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ebola, gamente oketo cik matek tutwal me neno ni dano ma otoo kitero gi maber. Man obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me gengo nya pa kwidi ki gwoko yot kom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka ebola, abu apugan ibwaik ainapeta nuegogong kanu awanyun ebe epedorio aidar itunga luetwakito ejok. Arai na ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik awea naka ekorona ka aidar angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo ebola niri ni e'dozu risi, gamete 'ba azita okporu 'diyi nezu ra kini 'ba odrapi 'diyi ma aza ko kililiru. Diri ndra orodriru azo 'da ma ereta atrizu azini o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara ya ebora,gavumenti ekataho engyenderwaho y'amaani okureeba ngu abafiire nibakwatwa kurungi. Eki kikaba kiri eky'omugasho munonga okuzibira okujanjaara kw'akakooko n'okurinda eby'amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: In the face of a severe outbreak, healthcare facilities were under immense pressure to provide effective care. Among them, Lacor hospital in Gulu stood out for its exceptional response and dedication to treating Ebola patients.
lug_prompt: Olw'okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde, amalwaliro gaali ku puleesa ya maanyi okuwa obujjanjabi obulungi. Mu byo, eddwaliro lya Lacor e Gulu lyasukkuluma olw'obwangu n'obumalirivu bwalyo mu kujjanjaba abalwadde ba Ebola.
ach_prompt: I kare ma two korona opoto matek tutwal, odi yadi onongo gitye ki lyeto madit tutwal me miyo kony me yot kom maber. I kingi, ot yat me Lacor I Gulu obedo ber tutwal pi tic matek tutwal me tic i kom lutwo Ebola.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loka abwangun naepol noi, ajaasi adekisia toma ainingosit naepol noi naka aijanakin amukian najokan. Kanejaas kesi, apotu adekisia nuka Lacor ko Gulu kitejenata kanu aswamukec naejok noi kanu aimuke adekak luka ebola.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, pari arojo ni 'diyi ndra okpo alia e'yo azakoma fezu kililiru ri fezu. Eyi ma eselea, arojo Lacor ni Gulu'a ri e'da e'yo erini azi ngazu kililiru azini asi 'baza fezu aro fezu 'ba azo ebola niri be 'diyini risi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obw'amaani, amarwariro gakaba gari ahansi y'oburemeezi bw'amaani okubaasa kuheereza obujanjabi burungi. Omuri byo, eirwariro rya Lacor omuri Gulu riketengwa ahabw'okugarukamu kurungi n'okwehayo kuragurira abarwaire ba Ebola.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for enhanced healthcare services, the government has prioritized the development of its workforce. To address this, the ministry organizes workshops aimed at improving health workers' performance.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi obulungi, gavumenti ekulembezza enkulaakulana y'abakozi baayo. Okukola ku nsonga eno, minisitule etegeka emisomo egigendereddwamu okutumbula enkola y'abasawo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me medo rwom me kony me yot kom, gamente oketo dongo pa luticce obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Me tyeko lok man, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom yoto kom yubu kacoke me pwonye ma tye ki miti me medo rwom me tic pa lutic yoto kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka aiyatakin nuka amukian, abu apugan isingarenit aitopol eswamak ke. Kanu aitemokin ngun, itemonokini erionget airiamunun kanu aitojokar eswamae lo eswamak lu adekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu, gamete 'ba e'yo okporu 'ba erini azi ngazu 'diyi ma ezota ma dria. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, okalamvu alataniri ni otita imbatani 'diyi otu azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma agata otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekyetengo ky'okwongyera aha buheereza bw'eby'amagara,gavumenti eteire omutima aha ntunguuka y'abakozi baayo. Okukora aha nshonga egi, minisiture neetebeekanisa emishomo erikugyenderera okutunguura emikorere y'abashaho.

eng_prompt: In today's world, the spread of various infectious diseases poses significant risks to public health. Understanding the precautions necessary for prevention and treatment is crucial for those affected.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, okusaasaana kw'endwadde ez'enjawulo ezisiigibwa kuleeta akabi ak'amaanyi eri obulamu bw'abantu. Okutegeera obwegendereza obwetaagisa okwetangira n'okujjanjaba kya mugaso nnyo eri abo abakoseddwa.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni, nyaa pa two ma kobo ikin dano kelo peko madit tutwal I kom yotkom pa lwak. Niang jami ma mite pi gengo ki nongo yat pire tek tutwal pi jo ma onongo peko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo, awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas eyangauni ationis naepol noi mama ejaasi itunga. Amisiikin iwaitin lu ekotoi kanu aitikitik ka amukian erai ibore yenepol noi kanejaas ngul lu edekasi.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, azo ndundu eyi ma ereta ni e'yo onzi eji o'bi eyi ma rua ala ni. Geri 'bani ecozu eyi ma tambazu azini eyi ma atita esuzu 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru 'ba e'yo 'da esu'baa 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira nikureeta akabi aha magara g'abantu. Okwetegyereza emiringo y'okwerinda n'okuragurira, n'eky'omugasho munonga ahari abo abakwasirwe.

eng_prompt: Recent health reports have shown a significant rise in tuberculosis cases across the region. Public health officials are increasingly alarmed by the growing trend and its potential impact on community health.
lug_prompt: Alipoota z'ebyobulamu ezaakaggwa ziraga okweyongera kw'abalwadde b'akafuba okw'amaanyi mu kitundu kyonna. Abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeyongedde okweraliikirira olw'omuze ogweyongera n'engeri gye guyinza okukosaamu obulamu bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic me yot kom ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni wel dano matye ki two aona opio omede tutwal I but lobo man. Lutic me yot kom tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom kit ma jami tye ka time kwede ki adwoki ne I kom yot kom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan luka angaleu itodutu ebe iyata noi enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka atapong kotoma aiboisit. Iyalongongosi eswamak luka angaleu kanuka eipone lo lo iyatakin keda epone lo epedoriata kesi aitolitol angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: O'duko o'diru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo tibi niri be 'diyi ma kalafe tu angu 'di ma alea dria. Azi'ba alatani o'bi eyini 'diyi ma asi otiza e'yo 'di ma dria tualu e'yo erini eco 'ye o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma dria ri pie.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota z'ebyamagara ez'obwahati nizooreka okweyongyera kw'abarwaire b'akakonko omu kyanga. Abakuru omu by'amagara, beeyongyeire kwerarikirira ahabw'omuringo oguriyo nigweyongyera hamwe n'oburemeezi bwagwo aha magara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: Many individuals struggle to understand their health conditions due to the overlapping nature of various illnesses. This often leads to misinterpretation of their symptoms and concerns.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bazibuwalirwa okutegeera embeera y'obulamu bwabwe olw'endwadde ez'enjawulo ezikwatibwako. Kino kitera okuviirako okutaputa obubi obubonero bwabwe n'ebibaluma.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol nongo tek tutwal me niang kit ma kwogi tye kwede pi peko me two mapat-pat matye I kingi. Man ipol kare kelo niang marac I kom lanyut gi ki peko gi.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu etiono amisiikin ejautenekec kanu adekasinei nuegelegela. Eyangauni ngin duc amisiikin aanyuneta kec keda nu epodokinito kesi.
