lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi dri ci e'yo eyi ma rua ala ni 'diyi vazu e'yo azo ndundu eyini eyi ecizu eyi ma eselea risi. E'yo 'di ni tutuni fe 'ba eyini e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma vata azini e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria geri onzi si.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibarwana kwetegyereza embeera y'amagara gaabo ahabw'endwara ezitarikushushana. Eki nikikira kureetaho okwetegyereza kubi obumanyiso bwabo hamwe n'ebibarikuteekateekaho.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various cultures have struggled to understand the causes of illness, often attributing mysterious ailments to supernatural forces. This misunderstanding can lead to a blending of medical and mystical explanations for health issues.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, obuwangwa obw'enjawulo bufunye obuzibu okutegeera ebivaako endwadde, nga zitera okugamba nti endwadde ez'ekyama ziva ku maanyi agatali ga bulijjo. Obutategeeragana buno busobola okuleetawo okutabula kw'ebyobujjanjabi n'okunyonyola okw'ekyama ku nsonga z'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro, tekwaro mapat-pat obedo ka tute matek me niang ngo ma kelo two, pol kare giwaco ni two ma pe niange obedo teko ma kato pa lubanga. Anywena-nywena man twero kelo nyweno lok me yot-kom ki tyen lok ma pe niange pi peko me yot-kom.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, etionikinitos inonosio luegelegela amisiikin iboro lu eyangaunete adekasinei, itodunit ebe adekasinei nu mam ejena eraas nuepedorete aswam. Atiokisio nu epedorete ayangaun aimorikikina naka amukian keda aomisio nuikamunitos angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo suruni ndundu 'diyi nga a'di 'di e'yo azo fepi 'diyi ma dria, eyini 'yozu kini azo 'bani nile ku 'diyi okpo onzi 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo vata ako ni 'diri eco fe 'bani e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria e'yo dakitari ni azini e'yo onzi 'diyi ecezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, eby'obuhangwa ebitarikushushana bigumire kwetegyereza ebirikureeta endwara, buriijo nibigira ngu endwara ezitarikwetegyerezibwa nizikorwa amaani g'obuhangwa. Obutetegyerezana obu nibubaasa kurugwamu okurabya omu by'amagara.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent outbreak, ensuring the safety of both patients and healthcare providers has become a top priority. To mitigate the risk of infection, it is essential that all personnel follow strict safety protocols.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kubalukawo kw'ekirwadde kino gyebuvuddeko, okukuuma abalwadde n'abakozi b'ebyobulamu kifuuse ekintu ekikulu. Okukendeeza ku bulabe bw'okukwatibwa, kyetaagisa abakozi bonna okugoberera amateeka g'obukuumi amakakali.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki poto pa two ma otimme cokcok-ki, gwoko lutwo ki lutic yoto kom obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Me dwoko piny rwom me nongo two, pire tek tutwal ni lutic weng omyero gulub cik me gwoko ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona, aanyun ebe eyuwara adekak keda eswamak luka angaleu erai ibore yenepol noi. Kanu aitidisiar atiokisio nuka adekasinei, ejokuna itunga kere atupakinit ainapeta nuka ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, e'yo 'ba azoru azini azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma tambazu ri eca e'yo okporu ni ru. Aa'zu e'yo azo esuzuri ma omgbo esizu, eri orodriru 'ba dria ma obi azita okporu ageitema ni 'diyi ma vuti.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati, okurinda abarwaire n'abashaho kihindukire eky'omugasho munonga. Okutuubya aha kabi k'okukwatwa akakooko, n'eky'omugasho abakozi boona kukuratira ebiragiro by'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: Maintaining good health is essential for overall well-being and can significantly impact one's quality of life. One of the most effective ways to achieve this is through consistent personal care practices.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obulamu obulungi kya mugaso nnyo eri obulamu obulungi era kisobola okukosa ennyo omutindo gw'obulamu bw'omuntu. Emu ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kwefaako buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Gwoko yotkom obedo gin ma pire tek pi kwo maber dok twero kelo alokaloka madit i rwom me kwo pa ngat moni. Yo acel maber loyo me cobo man obedo gwoko komwa.
teo_prompt: Aidar angaleu ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aijar naka itunganan. Epone ediopebon loka aitodolikin ngun ngesi aitwasam iponesio luka aidar akwan.
lgg_prompt: Rua ala ma ta mbaza eri orodriru aa'ta muke ri ni dika eri eco 'ba azi ma idri ma omgbo otu ra. Geri azi alu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu kililiru ri geri 'bani eyi ma tambazu kililiru risi.
nyn_prompt: Okuguma oine amagara marungi n'eky'omugasho aha magara marungi kandi nikibaasa kukora kihango aha mutindo gw'amagara g'omuntu. Omwe aha mihanda mirungi y'okukora eki n'okukoresa emiringo y'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: Despite the dedicated efforts of our teachers and students, we faced significant challenges throughout the academic year. As a result, many were concerned about our performance in the national examinations.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga abasomesa n'abayizi baffe baakola butaweera, twasanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu mwaka gw'ebyensoma gwonna. N'ekyavaamu, bangi baali beeraliikirivu ku ngeri gye twayitamu mu bigezo by'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lupwonye wa ki lutino kwan gutiyo matek tutwal, wanongo peko mapol I mwaka me kwan eni. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol gubedo ki lworo I kom kit ma watimo kwede peny.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu isisianakinak keda esisiak wok iswamata kagogong, apotu sio adumutu atiokisio nuepolok noi kokaru loka aisisia. Kanuka ngun, apotu itunga luipu kopodokisi nuikamunitos eswamaewok kotoma aingito.
lgg_prompt: E'yo okpo feza ama vile imba'ba azini sukulu anzi 'diyiniri ma talasi, ama fu dri e'yo ewaru 'diyi be eli onitani 'di ma alia dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi ndra asi otiza be agata amani obeta kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani g'abegyesa n'abeegi, tukashanga oburemeezi bwingi omu mwaka gw'eby'obwegyese. N'ekyarugiremu, baingi bakaba niberarikirira okukora kwaitu omu bigyezo by'eihanga ryona.

eng_prompt: Many factors can contribute to a student's academic struggles, including personal circumstances and external pressures. However, one significant issue often overlooked is the effectiveness of the teaching methods employed in the classroom.
lug_prompt: Ebintu bingi bisobola okuviirako omuyizi okulwanagana mu kusoma, omuli embeera ye n'okunyigirizibwa okuva ebweru. Newankubadde, ensonga emu enkulu etera okubuusibwa amaaso bwe bulungi bw'enkola z'okusomesa ezikozesebwa mu kibiina.
ach_prompt: Tye jami mapol ma twero kelo peko me kwan pa lutino kwan, ma I kingi obedo peko me kwo gi ki lyeto ma aa ki bot lutino kwan mukene. Kadi bed kumeno, lok acel ma pire tek ma ipol kare ki cayo ne obedo yoo me pwonyo maber ma kitiyo kwede I ot kwan.
teo_prompt: Ipu iboro luepedorete ayangaun atiokisio nuka esisiak kotoma asioman, aimoriarit ejautene lo itunganan keda aiboisio nu okinga. Konye, idiopebore yen epol lem epalunitai ngesi epone lo isisianakino lo itwasamao atukot.
lgg_prompt: E'yo karakara eyi eco fe sukulu anzi eyini e'yo ewaru esu sukulu'a, e'yo eyini aa'zu eyi ma ngulupi si 'diyi tualu e'yo okpo eyini esu engazu amve 'diyi pie. Kani si, e'yo azi okporu 'bani tuni adizu ri eri geri onita ni 'bani ayule kilasia 'diyi ma orodri ni.
nyn_prompt: Hariho ebintu bingi ebirikubaasa kureetaho oburemeezi omu kwega kw'omwegi otwariiremu embeera ye n'oburemeezi bw'aheeru. Kwonka, enshonga emwe enkuru erikukira kwebwa n'omugasho gw'emitwarize y'okwegyesa erikukoresibwa omu kibiina.

eng_prompt: In recent weeks, escalating tensions between students and administration have resulted in widespread protests. As frustrations mounted, the situation turned volatile, leading to significant unrest on campus.
lug_prompt: Mu wiiki eziyise, obunkenke obweyongera wakati w'abayizi n'abakulembeze buviiriddeko okwekalakaasa okw'amaanyi. Nga obwennyamivu bweyongera, embeera yafuuka etali nnungi, ekyaviirako obutali butebenkevu obw'amaanyi mu ttendekero.
ach_prompt: I cabit ma okato ni, telle matye ikin lutino kwan ki ludor gang kwan okelo jemo mapol. I kare ma cwer cwiny omede, lok ne olokke odoko tek tutwal, ma okelo kuku kuku madit tutwal I gang kwan me univaciti.
teo_prompt: Kosabitin lu atuboros, apotu ingungeta kiding esisiak keda eyaitene koyangautu aidiya naepol noi. Neyatakinor aiyalongong, abu ejautene koraun loetiono noi, ido abu koyangau amumu naepol noi kosomero.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ngiringiri ni tupi sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea driceza be ri fe ngiringiri karakara eyi 'yezu. Erita ako ma omgbo ni tuzurisi, e'yo 'da eca ewaru, erini fezu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu angu onita ni 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu sande ezihweire, obunkenke ahagati y'abeegi n'abebembezi bw'eishomero, buretsireho obwesharingo bw'amaani. Obwimukiriro ku bwayeyongyeire, embeera ekahinduka ey'akabi, ekyarugiremu obutabanguko bw'amaani aha itendekyero.

eng_prompt: After years of declining discipline and rising behavioral issues, the school community was eager for a change. With the appointment of a new head teacher, hopes were high for a positive transformation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'okukendeera kw'empisa n'okweyongera kw'ebizibu by'enneeyisa, abantu b'essomero baali baagala nnyo enkyukakyuka. Olw'okulondebwa kw'omukulu w'essomero omuggya, essuubi lyali ddene ku nkyukakyuka ennungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol ma kit me pwony tye ka dwogo piny ki peko me tim matye kamede, lwak me gang kwan onongo gitye ki miti matek me kelo aloka loka. Ki cimo lawii gangkwan manyen, gen me aloka-loka maber obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aibiror naka ainapeta keda aiyatakin naka iponesio luka esisiak, ekotosi itunga luka esomero aijulakin. Keda aseunet naka apolon esomero loitetet, ajai amuno naepol noi kanu aijulakin.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani imbata ma omgbo esizu azini e'yo adriza onzi 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu sukulu niri le ndra ojata ra. Dricere o'diru ni opezu ri si, asi'baza eyi ndra angiri e'yo ojata ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okutuubya emicwe n'emitwarize, abantu b'eishomero bakaba baine ekihika ky'empinduka. Ahabw'okutoorana mukuru w'eishomero omusya, amatsiko gakaba gari maingi aha mpindahinduka nungi.

eng_prompt: To ensure a productive and engaging experience, teachers encourage open communication between parents and students. This collaboration helps parents stay informed about their child's progress and challenges.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okulaba nti eby'enjigiriza biba birungi era nga bisanyusa, abasomesa bakubiriza abazadde n'abayizi okuwuliziganya mu bwesimbu. Enkolagana eno eyamba abazadde okumanya ku nkulaakulana y'abaana baabwe n'ebisoomooza.
ach_prompt: Pi neno ni lutino tye ki gum me kwan, lupwonye cuku cwiny lutino me lok ki lunyodo gi. Winye man konyo lunyodo me bedo ki ngec i kom dongo pa lutino gi ki peko gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna kosomero, isinyikokitos isisianakinak einer kiding auriak keda esisiak. Ingarakinit aiswamanara na auriak aijen nuka apol naka idwekec keda atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: O'bi eyini ani ecozu e'yo eyi 'yezu muke azini ayiko fezu ra, imba'ba eyi imbata fe e'yo nzezu tipika eyi ma eselea sukulu anzi eyi pie. Ti ecita 'di ni azakoma fe tipika eyini aa'zu o'dukoti be zota anzi eyivile 'diyiniri ma dria tualu e'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'okwegyesa biba birungi, abegyesa nibahiga abazaire kugamba butunu n'abeegi. Enkoragana egi neehwera abazaire kumanya entunguuka n'oburemeezi bw'abaana baabo.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for classroom resources, local officials announced a new initiative to support education. As part of this effort, they coordinated with the government to distribute essential supplies to schools.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'ebikozesebwa mu bibiina, abakungu b'ebyalo baalangirira enteekateeka empya okuwagira ebyenjigiriza. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, baakwataganye ne gavumenti okugabira amasomero ebintu ebikozesebwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lutino kwan, lutic me tedero gucwalo lok angeya manyen me konyo lutino kwan. Macalo but tic man, gu winye ki gamente me poko jami ma mite pi gangi kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka iboro lu itwasamao atukot, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kolimosi ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aigang asioman. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, apotu kesi kimorikikinos keda apugan kanu aikor iboro lu itwasamao kosomeroi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu afa ayuzaru kilasi eyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi azi e'yo azi o'diru ni atita fezu onita ni 'diyi ma dria. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, eyi 'ye ti ecita gamete be afa orodriru 'diyi awazu sukulu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'ebintu by'okukozesa omu bibiina kweyongyera, abakuru omu byaro bakarangirira enteekateeka nsya y'okushagika eby'obwegyese. Nk'ekicweka ky'amaani aga, bakakorengana na Gavumenti okugaba ebintu by'omugasho omu mashomero.

eng_prompt: In an effort to maintain a positive learning environment, educators often implement strict behavioral policies. When students repeatedly violate these rules, disciplinary actions may be taken.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma embeera y'okusoma ennungi, abasomesa batera okussaawo amateeka amakakali ku nneeyisa. Abayizi bwe bamenya amateeka gano enfunda n'enfunda, ebibonerezo biyinza okutwalibwa.
ach_prompt: I tute me gwoko kabedo maber me kwan, lupwonye ipol kare gi keto cik matek tutwal I tic. Ka lutino kwan tye ka turu cik magi teretere, pwod twero bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar aiboisit najokan naka aisisia, etapit isisianakinak aitegear ainapeta nuikamunitos iponesio. Arai ebilibilete esisiak ikisila lu irwan ipu, epedorio alecor kes.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu angu onita ni muke ri ma ta mbazu, imba'ba eyi tutuni azita adriza onzi 'diyi 'ba. Sukulu anzi ka azita 'diyi nyo dika dika, 'ba eco panga fe ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda embeera nungi y'okwega, abegyesa nibakira kutaho ebiragiro by'omutaano ebirikukwata aha micwe. Abeegi kubarikuhenda ebiragiro ebi emirundi mingi, nibabaasa kufubirwa.

eng_prompt: During a recent school visit, the inspector observed several instances of unprofessional behavior among staff. He emphasized the importance of role models in shaping students' attitudes and actions.
lug_prompt: Mu kulambula kw'essomero okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko, omulambuzi yalabye ebikolwa ebitali bya kikugu mu bakozi. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okubeera n'ekyokulabirako ekirungi mu kubumba endowooza n'ebikolwa by'abayizi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma inspector olimo gang kwan cokcok-ki, en oneno tim maraco mapol ikin lutic. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa bedo ki lutino ma gitye lanen maber me dongo tam ki tim pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aipejokin esomero pac, abu ekaanyanaran koany iponesio lumam iswamaete ejok kanejaas eswamak. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aanyunet najokan kotoma aitolomun aomisio keda aswamisio nuka esisiak.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani muzu omuru sukulu eyi ma alea o'di 'diyi ma alea, 'ba inspector ru ri ndre e'yo adriza onzi 'diyi karakara azi'ba eyi ma eselea. Eri fe okpo orodri 'ba ecetaru 'diyini sukulu anzi eyi ma adriza azini e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma edeta ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omurambuzi w'eishomero obu yaabaire ataayaayiire eishomero, akareeba emicwe etari mirungi omu bakozi. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okureeberaho kurungi omu kutendeka emiteekateekyere n'ebikorwa by'abeegi.

eng_prompt: After several complaints from faculty members about a student's behavior, the administration decided to investigate the matter further. The findings revealed a pattern of disrespectful interactions during class.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwemulugunya okuva mu basomesa ku nneeyisa y'omuyizi, abakulembeze baasalawo okwongera okunoonyereza ku nsonga. Ebizuuliddwa byalaga enkola y'okukwatagana mu ngeri etassa kitiibwa mu kibiina.
ach_prompt: Inge koko mapol ma aa ki bot lupwonye I kom tim pa lutino kwan, ludito me gang kwan gumoko tamgi me mede ki kwedo lok eni. Adwogi me kwed man onyuto kit ma dano gubedo ka lok kwede ikare me pwonye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka angurian nuipu kanejaas esisiak kanu iponesio luka esisiak, apotu eyaitene kiswamautu aingic akirot ngin. Apotu akiro nuitodunitos itodutu iponesio luka amamut ayongite itunga kotoma atukot.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onuza karakara engazu imba'ba eyivu sukulu anzi eyi ma adriza ma dria 'bori ma vutia, driceza 'da ai e'yo 'da ma eti ondazu drile. E'yo 'bani esu 'diyi ece geri 'ba eyini aa'zu inzita kokoru eyi ma eselea kilasi'a ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okwetomboitwa kwingi kuruga omu bashomesa aha bikwatireine n'emitwarize y'omwegi, abarikukurira eitendekyero bakasharamu kwongyera kucondooza aha nshonga egyo. Ebyarugiremu nibyoreka engyesho y'abantu abatarikuheereza abandi ekitiinisa omu kibiina.

eng_prompt: As the academic year comes to a close, educators are focusing their efforts on ensuring students are well-equipped for the challenges ahead. Intensive review sessions and mock tests are being organized to boost confidence and knowledge retention.
lug_prompt: Ng'omwaka gw'ebyensoma gunaatera okuggwaako, abasomesa batadde amaanyi gaabwe mu kukakasa nti abayizi beetegekeddwa bulungi okwanganga okusoomoozebwa okuli mu maaso. Okuddamu okwetegereza n'ebigezo ebikyamu bitegekebwa okutumbula obwesige n'okukuuma okumanya.
ach_prompt: I kare ma mwaka me kwan tye ka tum, lupwonye tye ka keto cwiny gi i kom neno ni lutino tye ki jami weng ma mite pi peko matye anyim. Gitye ka yubu kare me kwano ki timo peny mapat-pat me medo tek cwiny ki gwoko ngec.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi ekaru loka aisisia angetakin, eutasi esisianakinak aibwaikin agogongu kec awanyun ebe isisiak iswamaete ejok kanuka atiokisio nuejaas ngaren. Aponi itemokinai ainwakio naepol noi kanu aitogogong amuno ka aidar acoa.
lgg_prompt: Eli onitaniri ni i deria, imba'ba eyi okpo 'ba nezu ra kini sukulu anzi eyi esu afa dria eyini le 'diyi e'yo ewaru ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Ba otita 'bani 'ba eyi ma ale andrizu azini obeta 'bani eyi 'yezu 'diyi otu asi'baza ma omgbo otuzu azini ondua eyi ma tambaza ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese ku gurikuza kuhwa, abeegyesa nibata amaani gaabo omu kureeba ngu abeegi beeteekateekyera oburemeezi oburi omumaisho. Okushwijuma n'okukora ebigyezo by'okwegyezamu, nibitebeekanisibwa, okureetaho obwesigye n'okumanya.

eng_prompt: In light of recent challenges and community feedback, the local council has prioritized enhancing our village's infrastructure and services. They are committed to fostering a sense of unity and order among residents.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa okwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'ebiteeso by'abantu, akakiiko k'ekyalo katadde essira ku kutumbula ebyetaago n'obuweereza mu kyalo kyaffe. Beewaddeyo okutumbula obumu n'obutebenkevu mu batuuze.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko matye cokcok-ki ki tam pa lwak, kancil me tedero oketo cwinygi tutwalle I medo rwom me gedo ki kony me caro wa. Gitye ki miti me kelo ribe ki ber bedo ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka pac keda aomisio nuka itunga, abu ekansulo kisingaren aitojokar aiboisio keda aiboisio nuka ecaalo wok. Ekapakina kesi aitopolor aimorikikina keda ainapakina kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru o'diru 'diyi ma dria azini o'duko ongulumu eyini fe 'diyisi, kanisulu angu 'da ma alea ri 'ba e'yo okporu afa ayuzaru calo amavileri ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Eyi owi eyi ti ecita azini otuta ejizu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburiho hati hamwe n'ebi abantu barikugarukamu,akakiiko k'ekyaro kataire omutima aha kutunguura ebyombeko n'obuheereza omu kyaro kyaitu. Baine omuhimbo gw'okureetaho okukwatanisa n'obutereera omu batuuragye.

eng_prompt: As the cost of living continues to rise, many local businesses are feeling the financial strain. Recent discussions among vendors reveal growing concerns about the increasing expenses associated with operating in urban areas.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebbeeyi y'ebintu yeeyongera okulinnya, bizinensi nnyingi mu kitundu ziwulira obuzibu bw'ensimbi. Okukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko mu basuubuzi kulaga obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku bisale ebyeyongera ebyekuusa ku kukola mu bibuga.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel cente me kwo tye ka medde ameda, biacara mapol tye ki peko me lim. Nywako lok ma otime cokcok-ki ikin lucat nyutu lworo madit tutwal I kom wel cente ma mite pi tic I boma madongo.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata etiai loka aijar, epupete ibiasaran luipu ationis naka ikapun. Ineresinei luitetiak kiding agwelanarak itodunitos aiyalongong kanu aiyatakin etiai loka ikapun lu itwasamao kaiboisio nu otaun.
lgg_prompt: Aje idri nyazaniri ni mu drile turia, tujari karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria. Agbatara o'diru 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi ma eselea ri ece asi otiza tupi e'yo aje tupi tupi 'bani azi ngazu angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Emihendo y'ebintu ku erikugumizamu neyeyongyera, abashuubuzi b'omubyaro baingi nibahurira oburemeezi bw'esente. Okuhanuura okwabaireho ahagati y'abashuubuzi, nikyoreka okwerarikirira ahabw'emihendo erikweyongyera erikukwata aha kukorera omu ndembo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost economic growth and improve local commerce, officials have been working on various urban development initiatives. These initiatives aim to create a more competitive environment for businesses and enhance consumer access to goods and services.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkulaakulana mu byenfuna n'okutumbula eby'obusuubuzi mu kitundu, abakungu babadde bakola ku nteekateeka ez'enjawulo ez'okukulaakulanya ebibuga. Enteekateeka zino zigenderera kutondawo embeera esinga okuvuganya mu bizinensi n'okutumbula abaguzi okufuna ebyamaguzi n'obuweereza.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me lim ki biacara me tedero, lutic gubedo katic I kom yub mapat-pat me dongo boma madongo. Yub magi tye ki miti me kelo pyem ikin lutim biacara ki konyo luwil nongo jami ki kony.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol naka ikapun ka aitopolor agwelanar, eutasi eswamak aswam nuepedorete aitopolor itaunin. Alosikinet naka iboro kalu erai kanu aitolomun abolobol naka ibiasaran keda aitojokar adumunun iboro keda aijaanakinio kama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia azini tujari angu ma alia 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba eyi ebi azi nga e'yo ndundu aku ambo eyi ezozu 'diyi ma dria. Otita 'diyi 'ba asi e'yo a'bala 'yezu tujari eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu tualu 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi ma esuta azini azakoma esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya n'eby'obushubuzi omu byaro, abakungu batwire nibakora aha ntunguuka y'endembo nyingi. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okureetaho embeera y'okuhayahayana omu bizinesi n'okureetera abaguzi kutunga ebintu n'obuheereza.

eng_prompt: After receiving numerous complaints about illegal street vending, the city authority decided to take action. In a coordinated effort to enforce local regulations, they arrived at the market early this morning.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna okwemulugunya kungi ku by'okutunda ku nguudo mu bumenyi bw'amateeka, ab'obuyinza mu kibuga baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. Mu kaweefube w'okukwasisa amateeka g'ekitundu, batuuse ku katale ku makya nnyo leero.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo koko mapol I kom cato jami iwi alii I teng gudu, lutela me boma ne gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. I tute matek me keto cik me tedero itic, gu oo I cuk odiko matin.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun angurian nuipu nuikamunitos agwelanar korotin, apotu apedorosio nuka esite koseutu aswam. Kotoma agogong naka aitup ikisila luka atutubet, apotu kesi adolutu osokoni tupuruc na.
lgg_prompt: Erini onu esuzu karakara e'yo 'ba afa ozipi nzila dria azita palaa ku 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba aku ambu city ni 'diyi 'du e'yo 'yezu ra. Okpo 'bani 'ba tualu azita angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri ma alea, eyi eca cu'a o'biti 'dosi drioru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga okwetomboitwa kwingi ahabw'okuguza ebintu aha nguuto omu buryo butahikire, ab'obushoborozi omu rurembo bakacwamu kukora. Omu kaweefube w'okukuratira ebiragiro by'ekyaro, bahikire aha katare bukiri kare omu kasheshe k'erizooba.

eng_prompt: Managing a business involves juggling various responsibilities and ensuring smooth operations. Among these responsibilities, financial management plays a crucial role in maintaining the health of the company.
lug_prompt: Okuddukanya bizinensi kizingiramu okukyusakyusa obuvunaanyizibwa obw'enjawulo n'okulaba ng'emirimu gitambula bulungi. Mu buvunaanyizibwa buno, enzirukanya y'ensimbi ekola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kukuuma obulamu bwa kkampuni.
ach_prompt: Doro biacara kwako tic mapat-pat ki neno ni tic owoto maber. I kin tic magi, gwoko lim konyo totwal I gwoko kwo pa dul ne.

lgg_prompt: Tujura ma ocezuri ma alia 'bani azi ndundu eyi 'yezu kililiru azini e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu kililiru. Azi 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi azi okporu nga amuti ma rua ala ma ta mbazu.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, local law enforcement conducted a raid at the bustling marketplace. Reports indicated that several vendors were engaging in illegal practices that defied recent regulations.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, abakuumaddembe baakola ekikwekweto mu katale akajjudde abantu. Alipoota zaalaze nti abasuubuzi bangi baali beenyigira mu bikolwa ebimenya amateeka ebyawakanya amateeka agaakateekebwawo gye buvuddeko.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, lugwok cik me tedero gutimo mony I cuk ma dano dwong iye tutwal. Adwogi tic onyuto ni lucat mapol gubedo katimo jami ma turu cik.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo itegelikina, apotu ipolisin luka atutubet kiswamata asurokinio kosokoni loejaasi keda itunga luipu. Apotu iripotan itodutu ebe eutasi agwelanarak luipu aswam iboro lumam ekisil ecamunit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ojazu osuta si, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye e'yo amvuta ni angu cuu ni aa'zu 'ba eyi pie ri ma alea. O'duko ece kini 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi ma karakara yi 'ye e'yo azita palaa ku 'diyi.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about street congestion and public safety, the city council held an emergency meeting to address the issue of street vendors. After much deliberation, they decided to implement a temporary measure to manage the situation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku mugotteko gw'enguudo n'obukuumi bw'abantu, akakiiko k'ekibuga kaatuuza olukiiko olw'amangu okukola ku nsonga y'abatembeeyi b'oku nguudo. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, baasalawo okuteekawo enkola ey'ekiseera okukwasaganya embeera.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom pong pa gudu ki ber bedo pa lwak, kancil me boma madit obedo ki kacoke me atura me cobo peko pa lucat iteng gudi. Ingee tam matut, gumoko tam gi me kati ki yoo mo pi tutunu me tyeko peko eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naepol noi kanu ikur korotin keda ayuwara naka itunga, abu ekansulo loka eibuga kitolomu airiamunet na engeso kanu aitemokin ationis naka agwelanarak korotin. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, apotu kesi koseutu aitolomun ewai lo apak naedit kanu aitikitik ejautene.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza tupi nzila dria omita ma dria azini o'bi yi ma tambaza ma dria, kanisulu aku ambu city niri 'ye mitingi mbeleru e'yo 'ba afa ozipi nzila dria 'diyiniri ma aza kozu. E'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu sa'wa were si e'yo 'da ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'omwijuzo gw'enguuto hamwe n'okwerinda kw'abantu,akakiiko k'orurembo kakakora orukiiko rw'ahonaaho kukora aha nshonga y'abashuubuzi b'ahanguuto. Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga, bakasharamu kutaho oburyo bw'okukora aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: During a recent meeting, several women vendors expressed their frustrations regarding the lack of adequate facilities in the market. They highlighted the discomfort and safety concerns associated with sharing toilets with male vendors.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko olwaliwo gyebuvuddeko, abasuubuzi abakyala abawerako baalaga obwennyamivu bwabwe olw'obutaba na bikozesebwa bimala mu katale. Baalaga obutali bumativu n'obukuumi obuva mu kugabana kaabuyonjo n'abasuubuzi abasajja.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki, lucat ma mon mapol gunyutu cwer cwinygi pi bedo peke pa jami ma mite I cuk. Gunyutu peko ki peko ma bino macalo adwogi me nywako coron ki lucat ma coo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet napac, apotu agwelanarak lu angor kitodu aiyalongongokec kanu amamus na iboro lu itwasamao kosokoni. Apotu kesi kitodutu atiokisio nuikamunitos ayuwara keda amamut aimor icolonin keda agwelanarak lu ikiliok.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi azi ebipi o'diru ni ma alea, oku afa ozipi 'diyi ece e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi afa ayuzaru cu'a 'diyi ma ako si. Eyi ece e'yo ewaru azini e'yo agei tema ni 'diyi eyini ani coroni eyi awazu 'ba agupi afa ozipi 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko orwabaireho juba, abakazi abaingi abarikuguza ebintu omukatare, bakooreka obusaasi bwabo ahabw'eibura ry'ebintu ebirikumara omu katare. Bakashoboorora oburemeezi n'eby'okwerinda ebirikukwata aha kugabana ebihorooni n'abashaija abarikuguza ebintu.

eng_prompt: Residents have been expressing their frustration over the ongoing sanitation issues in the area. One major concern is the inconsistency in garbage collection services.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze babadde balaga obwennyamivu bwabwe ku nsonga z'obuyonjo ezigenda mu maaso mu kitundu. Ekimu ku bintu ebisinga okweraliikiriza kwe kuba nti enkola y'okukung'aanya kasasiro tekwatagana.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gubedo ka nyutu cwer cwiny gi pi peko me lengo matye kawot anyim I kabedo eni. Lok acel ma kelo lworo madit tutwal en aye ni yub me coko yugi pe tye kakare.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itodutu amamut aiyalama kec kanuka ationis na aila na elosi akonye katutubet. Ationis adiope naepol noi ngesi amamus na atukio agasia.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'bi e'da candi eyini esu e'yo alata ni angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo azi alu asi otizaru tu ri eri geri 'bani okurunya trazu 'diyi ma esele cozu yi ma eselea ku ri i.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye batwire nibereka obusaasi bwabo ahabw'eshonga z'eby'obuyonjo ezirikugyenda omu maisho omu kyanga. Ekintu kimwe ekirikwerarikiriza munonga n'obuheereza bw'okurundaana kasasiro obutarikwikirizana.

eng_prompt: As crime rates continue to rise in urban areas, many businesses are feeling the pressure to protect their assets. Ensuring the safety of both customers and merchandise has become a top priority for market owners.
lug_prompt: Ng'obuzzi bw'emisango bweyongera okulinnya mu bibuga, abasuubuzi bangi bawulira akazito okukuuma ebintu byabwe. Okukakasa obukuumi bwa bakasitoma n'ebyamaguzi kifuuse ekikulu eri bannannyini butale.
ach_prompt: Kit ma rwom me timo bal tye ka medde i boma madongo, lutim biacara mapol tye ka winyo lyeto me gwoko jami gi. Gwoko ber bedo pa luwil ki jami acata dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal bot wegi cuk.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata abilibilio naka ikisila kaiboisio nu otaun, epupete ibiasaran luipu agogong na ayuarite iborokec. Aitogogong ayuara naka agwelak keda iboro erai ibore yenepol noi kanejaas ikulepek esokoni.
lgg_prompt: Ongmbo e'yo onzi 'yezu ri ni mu drile tuzu angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea risi, tujari karakara eyi asi omiza esu afa yini 'diyi ma tambazu. Afa 'ba afa ozipi 'diyi ma tambazu azini afa ozizaru 'diyi ma tambazu ri eca curu'do e'yo okporu tu 'ba cuu e'ipiru 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Obukozi bw'ebibi ku burikuguma nibweyongyera omu ndembo, abashubuzi baingi nibahurira oburemeezi bw'okurinda ebintu byabo. Okureeba ngu abaguzi n'ebintu byabo biine oburinzi n'ekintu ky'omugasho munonga aha bakama b'obutare.

eng_prompt: During a recent community meeting, concerns were raised about food safety and hygiene practices among local vendors. In response, the health officer emphasized the importance of maintaining cleanliness in food stalls to protect public health.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lw'ekitundu olwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo, okweraliikirira kwaleetebwa ku bikwata ku bukuumi bw'emmere n'enkola y'obuyonjo mu basuubuzi b'omu kitundu. Mu kwanukula, omukungu w'ebyobulamu yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukuuma obuyonjo mu maduuka agatunda emmere okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke pa lwak ma otime cokcok-ki, lworo obedo tye I kom gwoko cam ki lengo ikin lucat. I gamo ne, latic me yot kom owaco ni pire tek me gwoko lengo I kabedo ma kicato iye cam pi gwoko yot kom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka itunga pac, aponi kitodiarai aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos ayuwara naka inyamat keda aila kanejaas agwelanarak. Kotoma abongokinet, abu eswaman loka angaleu kitogogong ajokis naka aidar aila kaiboisio nu idukai kanu ayuarite angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi ongulumu eyini o'diru ri ma alea, 'ba nze asi otiza eyi e'yo nyaka ma tambaza ni azini alata ma dria 'ba afa ozipi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. Omvitaniria, azi'ba alatani 'da fe okpo e'yo alata ma tambazu pari nyaka ozizu 'diyi ma alea ri ma orodri o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma tambazu.

eng_prompt: After receiving numerous complaints from residents about unsanitary conditions, the town council convened to discuss the state of local businesses. They quickly realized that inadequate toilet facilities were a significant issue affecting public health and safety.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna okwemulugunya okungi okuva mu batuuze ku mbeera embi, akakiiko k'ekibuga kaatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mbeera ya bizinensi z'omu kitundu. Baakiraba mangu nti kaabuyonjo ezitali zimala kizibu kya maanyi ekikosa obulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo koko mapol kibot lwak pi peko me lengo, dul me town council gubedo ka lok i kom kit ma biacara tye kwede. Guniang oyot-oyot ni coron ma pe oromo obedo peko madit tutwal ma balo yot-kom ki ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun angurian nuipu kanejaas itunga kanu amamus aila, apotu ikansulo luka etaun iriamunos kanu aitemitem ejautene loka ibiasaran luka atutubet. lgg_prompt: E'yo onuza karakara eyi esuzu engazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu e'yo alata ako ni 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, kanisulu tawuni niri tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo tujari angu 'da ma alea 'diyiniri ma dria. Eyi esu mbeleru kini angu coroni eyini aa'zu ku 'diyi e'yo azi okporu e'yo rua ala ni azini ageitema ni o'bi eyini ri eza ni.

eng_prompt: Shoppers in the area are always on the lookout for great deals. Recently, a new local market opened its doors, attracting attention with its competitive pricing.
lug_prompt: Abasuubuzi mu kitundu bulijjo baba bulindaala okufuna ddiiru ennungi. Gye buvuddeko, akatale akapya aka wano kaggulawo enzigi zaako, nga kisikiriza abantu n'ebbeeyi yaako ey'okuvuganya.
ach_prompt: Lutim biacara me kabedo eni pol kare gibedo ka yenyo jami ma welle yot tutwal. Cokcok-ki, cuk manyen me tedero oyabo dogola ne, ma oywayo cwiny dano ki welgi me pyem matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Etapit duc agwelanarak luka atutubet ngin aimo iboro luepedorete kesi agwel. Apakio nu, apukor esokoni loitetet loka atutubet ikekek, ido abu ingalaunit itunga keda itiaisinei lueboloboloete.
lgg_prompt: Ba afa je'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi sa'wa driasi afa oziza onyiru 'diyi nda. O'du 'diyi ma alea, cuu azi o'diru angu 'da ma alea ri ma ti zi i vile jotile 'diyi, erini 'ba eyi ma asi 'bazu aje erini abala 'yezu 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Abaguzi b'omumwanya, buriijo nibasherura eby'okuguza ebirikusingayo oburungi. Enyimaho,akatare akasya kakiguraho enyigi zaako, kakareetaho empaka ahabw'emihendo yakako.

eng_prompt: In our community, everyone comes together to support one another, regardless of their financial status. This spirit of inclusivity is evident in the way local markets operate.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyaffe, buli omu ajja wamu okuyamba munne, awatali kufaayo ku mbeera ye ey'ebyensimbi. Omwoyo guno ogw'okuyingiza abantu bonna gweyolekera mu ngeri obutale bw'omu kitundu gye bukoleramu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo wa, dano weng cokke kacel me konyo luwotgi labongo paro pi lim ma gitye kwede. Cwiny man me bedo tye I kin dano weng nen I kit ma cuk me tedero tiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubetekosi, imorikikinos itunga aigangit luce, araida ejaasi kesi keda ikapun idis. Epone ngol loka aimorikikin itunga kere ewanyunitai kotoma epone loiswamata isokonin luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu amavileri ma alea, 'ba dria emu tualu atita fezu eyi ma eselea eyini ta tro aa'zu lonyi be 'diyi ma talasi. Asi 'baza 'ba dria ma eselea 'diri e'da geri cu angu 'da ma alea 'diyini azi ngazuri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka kyaitu, buri omwe naaza hamwe kuyamba mugyenzi we, oihiremu eby'entaasya bye. Omwoyo gw'okwetwariramu abantu boona, nigureebeka omu mirimo y'obutare bw'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: As the popularity of roadside markets continues to grow, many shoppers flock to these local gems for fresh produce and unique goods. However, the increasing number of visitors has highlighted a significant issue.
lug_prompt: Nga obuganzi bw'obutale bw'oku mabbali g'enguudo bweyongera okukula, abaguzi bangi beeyiwa mu butale buno obw'omu kitundu okufuna ebibala ebipya n'ebyamaguzi eby'enjawulo. Newankubadde, okweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abagenyi kulaga ensonga enkulu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma yweka pa cuk ma iteng gudi tye kamede ki dongo, luwil mapol tye kabino I cuk magi me nongo cam manyen ki jami mapat-pat mapat-pat. Kadi bed kumeno, wel wele matye kamede tye ka nyutu peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape ejenara noi isokonin lu orotin, itunga luipu elosete osokonin lu kanu agwel iboro luitegelikina. Konye, enaaba loepol noi loka ipejok itodunit ationis naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani cuu nzila kalatia 'diyi ma ru ku ri ni mu drile tuzu, 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi karakara eyi mu angu 'da eyi ma alea afa ofule o'diru 'diyi esuzu tualu afa ndu ndu 'diyi pie. Kani si, omu eyi ma kalafe tupi tutu ri e'da e'yo azi okporu ni.
nyn_prompt: Obu obutare bw'aha rubaju rw'enguuto burikuguma nibweyongyera, abaguzi baingi nibaza omu butare obu kuronda eby'okurya ebitsya n'ebintu ebitarikushushana n'ebindi. Kwonka, omuhendo gw'abagyenyi ogweyongyeire, gureesireho enshonga nkuru.

eng_prompt: Last summer, a series of unfortunate events unfolded in the bustling marketplace. Despite the vendors' efforts to keep their stalls safe, disaster struck when a small flame ignited amidst the crowded aisles.
lug_prompt: Ekyeya ekiwedde, ebintu ebitali bimu eby'omukisa omubi byaliwo mu katale akajjudde abantu. Newankubadde abasuubuzi baakola kaweefube okukuuma emidaala gyabwe, akatyabaga kaagwawo omuliro omutono bwe gwaka wakati mu makubo agaali gajjudde abantu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me oro ma okato, jami maraco mapol otimme I cuk ma dano dwong iye tutwal. Kadi bed ni lucat gutiyo matek me gwoko kabedo gi maber, gin marac otimme I kare ma mac mo matidi ocako lyel ikin lucat ma obedo dano mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akwap natubor, apotu akiro nuarokok kotakanutu kosokoni loejaasi keda itunga luipu noi. Karaida apotu agwelanarak iswamata kagogongu kanu aidar aiboisio kec ejok, apotu ationis kojaikinos ne abu akim kicweun kokiding aiboisio nuipu itunga.
lgg_prompt: Eli ajerisi, e'yo onzi karakara eyi 'ye i angu cu ni 'ba eyini aa'zu tu 'da ma alea. Ba afa ozi'ba 'diyi ni tro okpo 'bazu pari yini ozizu 'diyi ma ta mbazu kililiru ra ti, e'yo onzi 'ye i aci werea ni e'doria geri 'ba eyini acizu 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omushana oguhwaire, ebintu bibi bingi bikabaho omu katare akarimu abantu baingi. N'obu abashuubuzi barikuteeraho kurinda emidaara yaabo, akabi kakabaho omuriro mukye ku gwatandikire ahagati y'abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: Deforestation has become a significant concern in many regions, driven by various human activities. One of the major contributors to this environmental issue is the demand for charcoal, which leads to widespread tree removal.
lug_prompt: Okusaanyaawo ebibira kifuuse kizibu kya maanyi mu bitundu bingi olw'emirimu gy'abantu egy'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebiviiriddeko embeera y'obutonde bw'ensi eno kwe kwetaaga amanda, ekiviiriddeko okutema emiti okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Tongo yadi dong odoko peko madit tutwal I but lobo mapat-pat, ma man tye macalo adwogi me tic mapat-pat pa dano. Gin acel madit ma okelo peko me cwec ma orumuwa en aye miti madit tutwal pi maka, ma oweko tongo yadi tye kamede.
teo_prompt: Erai atubutubio na ikito ationis naepol noi kotoma aiboisio nuipu, kanu aswamisinei nuegelegela nuka itunga. Idiopet koboro lu eyangaunitos ationis na akwap ngesi eipuda lo atotol, ido eyangauni aibiror na ikito.
lgg_prompt: E'yo pati ogaza niri eca curu'do e'yo azi okporu ni angu karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo 'ba ada eyini 'ye 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo okpo fepi e'yo angu ama agei ri ma tambazu 'di ma dria ri eri lezu makalea ri, eri fe pati eyi ma ogaza ma omgbo ni tuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okutema emiti, kihindukire enshonga y'amaani omu byanga bingi, ahabw'emirimo y'abantu etarikushushana. Kimwe aha bintu ebirikureetaho oburemeezi bw'obuhangwa n'okwetenga amakara, ekirikureetaho okutema emiti.

eng_prompt: In response to increasing concerns about environmental degradation, local officials conducted an investigation into illegal construction practices. As a result, the environment authority has put down several buildings constructed in swamps.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku kwonoona obutonde bw'ensi, abakungu b'ebyalo baakola okunoonyereza ku bikolwa by'okuzimba ebimenya amateeka. N'ekyavaamu, ekitongole ky'obutonde bw'ensi kimenye ebizimbe ebiwerako ebyazimbibwa mu ntobazi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom balo cwec ma orumuwa, lutic me tedero gutimo kwed I kom yub me gedo ma turu cik. Macalo adwogi ne, dul ma loyo lok kom cwec ma orumuwa guturu odi mapol ma kiyubu I dagu.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin aiyalongongo kanu amunar alupok, apotu eswamak luka atutubet itolototo aingic kanu aduko namam ekisil ecamakinit. Kanuka ngun, abu erionget loka isama kibirokin adukena nuipu nu edukitai osama.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi angu ama agei ri ma ezaza ma dria, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye e'yo eti ondaza e'yo afa sizu azita palaa ku 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, amuti angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma drilea ri 'be jo karakara 'bani si angu yiru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi va.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha nshonga y'okushiisha eby'obuhangwa, abakungu b'ebyaro bakakora okucondooza aha nkora y'okwombeka etari mu mateeka. N'ekyarugiremu, ekitongore ekirikujunanizibwa aha buhangwa bw'ensi kishenyire ebyombeko bingi ebyombekirwe omu bisharara.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the importance of nurturing the next generation, the community has rallied around initiatives aimed at empowering young people. As a result, the leader has put a lot of money in youths development activities.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obukulu bw'okukuza omulembe oguddako, abantu bakungaanye okwetoloola enteekateeka ezigendereddwamu okutumbula abavubuka. N'ekivuddemu, omukulembeze atadde ssente nnyingi mu mirimu gy'okukulaakulanya abavubuka.
ach_prompt: Ki niang ber pa dongo anywali manyen, lwak guribbe kacel pi yub mapat-pat matye ki miti me tyelo kor bulu. Macalo adwogi ne, latela ne oketo cente madit tutwal I yub me dongo bulu.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun ajokis naka aitopoloun atumunak luetupakinete, apotu itunga imorikikinos kanu aitigogong atumunak. Kanuka ngun, abu engarenon ibwaik ikapun luipu toma aswamisinei nu itopoloete atumunak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo orodri 'bani 'ba o'diru 'diyi ezozu ri ma e'yo egazu risi, ongulumu eyi tra eyi e'yo 'ba ode eyini okpo fezu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba 'da 'ba robia angiri 'yeta 'ba ode eyini ezozu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya omugasho gw'okureeberera abantu b'omurembe ogurikukurataho, abantu bakwatanisa omu nteekateeka ezirikugyenderera okutunguura eminyeeto. N'ekyarugiremu, omwebembezi ataire esente nyingi omu mirimo y'okutunguura eminyeeto.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote environmental awareness and community involvement, the local council organized a tree-planting initiative. The chairman led a group of youths who planted trees along the community streets.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okumanyisa abantu ku butonde bw'ensi n'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu, akakiiko k'ekyalo kaategeka enteekateeka y'okusimba emiti. Ssentebe yakulembera ekibinja ky'abavubuka abasimba emiti ku nguudo z'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: I tute me rweyo lwak i kom cwec ma orumuwa, kancil me tedero oyubu yub me pito yadi. Won kom otelo wi dul pa bulu ma gupito yadi I teng gudu.
teo_prompt: Kanu aisinyikokit aisisianakin itunga nuka ejautene lo akwap keda akwap, abu ekansulo lo atutubet itemok aira ikito. Abu apolon eicolong ingarenik egurupu lo atumunak lu apotu iraata ikito korotin luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu mile oziza angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma omgbo otuzu azini ongulumu eyi ma eselea, kanisulu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu e'yo pati saza niri. Bili ei 'da ce ongulumu 'ba ode eyini pati eyi sazu nzila o'bi eyini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha buhangwa bw'ensi, akakiiko k'ekyaro kakatebekanisa enteekateeka y'okubyara emiti. Mukuru w'entebe akebembera guruupu y'eminyeeto ey'okubyara emiti aha nguuto z'ekyanga.

eng_prompt: Improper waste management practices have become increasingly prevalent in urban areas. As a result, communities are facing significant environmental challenges.
lug_prompt: Enkola embi ez'okuddukanya kasasiro zeeyongedde mu bibuga. N'ekivuddemu, ebitundu byolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu butonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: Yub me tic ki yugi i yo ma pe opore tye ka mede tutwal I boma madongo. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo mapatpat tye ka nongo peko me cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Iponesio luarokok luka aidar agasia epuakata noi kaiboisio nu otaun. Kanuka ngun, etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nuepolok nuka ejautene lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: Geri okurunya ma tambazu geri kililiru ku 'diyi curu'do tu tawuni eyi ma alea tutu. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu eyi e'yo ewaru angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Enkora mbi y'okureeberera kasasiro eyeyongyeire omu myanya y'endembo. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu by'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: In today's world, environmental awareness has become a pressing issue, prompting a closer examination of human actions. As a result, the media plays a crucial role in highlighting the negative impacts of these activities on our planet.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, okumanyisa abantu ku butonde bw'ensi kifuuse kizibu kya maanyi, ekireetedde okwekenneenya ennyo ebikolwa by'abantu. N'ekivuddemu, emikutu gy'empuliziganya gikola omulimu munene mu kulaga ebizibu ebikolebwa ebintu bino ku nsi yaffe.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni, rweyo lwak i kom cwec ma orumuwa dong odoko lok ma pire tek tutwal, ma oweko omyero ki nen tic pa dano maber. Macalo adwogi ne, odi poko ngec timo tic mapire tek tutwal me nyutu adwogi marac pa jami magi i kom lobo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo, akiro nuikamunitos akwap erai ibore yenepol noi, ido ijaikit aingic aswamisinei nuka itunga. Kanuka ngun, iswamaete arotak iyemuto aswam naepol noi kotoma aitodiar atiokisio nu iswamao kotoma akwap wok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, e'yo mile oziza angu ama agei ri ma dria ri eca e'yo azi okporu ni ru, e'yo fepi 'bani e'yo 'ba ada eyini 'ye 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru. E'yo 'disi, geri o'dukoti ofezu 'diyi azi okporu nga e'yo onzi 'yeta 'diyi ni 'ye angu amavile 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, okumanyisa abantu ebirikukwata aha buhangwa bw'ensi kihindukire enshonga y'amaani, ekirikureetera okushwijuma gye ebikorwa by'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, abanyamakuru nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kworeka oburemeezi bw'emirimo egi aha nsi yaitu.

eng_prompt: Despite the abundance of fishing gear available, some fishermen still rely on outdated methods. This often leads to the use of ineffective equipment that can harm both their catch and the environment.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo ebintu bingi ebikozesebwa mu kuvuba, abavubi abamu beesigama ku nkola enkadde. Kino kitera okuviirako okukozesa ebintu ebitali birungi ebiyinza okukosa eby'okukwata n'obutonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni jami me mako rec tye mapol, lumak rec mukene pud gijenge I kom yoo me mako rec macon. Man ipol kare kelo tic ki jami ma pe tiyo maber ma twero balo rec gi ki cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu iboro luekorete agaria, eringa icekak agaria itwasamaete iwaitin lumojong. Eyangauni ngin aitwasam iboro lumam iswamaete ejok lu emunarete aikamario kec keda alupok.
lgg_prompt: Afa e'bi 'bezu 'diyi ma kalafe ni ta tro ovuzu tre ra ti, 'ba e'bi 'bepi 'diyi ma azi yi nga po'di yi ati geri andra drio 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di ni tutuni fe 'bani afa ayuzaru azi ngapi muke ku 'diyi ayuzu eyini ani ecozu eyi ma e'bi eyi ezazu tualu angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho ebikwato bingi by'okushoha, abashohi abamwe nibagyendera aha mihanda ya ira. Eki nikikira kureetaho okukoresa ebyoma ebitarikukora kurungi ebirikubaasa kushiisha eby'okwita hamwe n'obuhangwa bw'ensi.

eng_prompt: In many regions, farmers have adapted their practices to utilize the unique characteristics of wetland areas. These ecosystems provide rich nutrients and ample water, making them ideal for certain types of crops.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, abalimi bakyusizza enkola zaabwe okukozesa engeri ez'enjawulo ez'ebitundu by'entobazi. Ebintu bino biwa ebiriisa bingi n'amazzi amangi, ekibikola ebirungi eri ebika by'ebirime ebimu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, lupur guloko yoo gi me tic ki jami mapat-pat matye kama dagu tye iye. Jami magi ma orumuwa miyo cam ki pii madwong, ma weko gubedo ber tutwal pi kwai cam mukene.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu, ejulakisi akoriok iponesiokec kanu aitwasam iponesio luitegelikina luka isama. Einanakinete aiboisio nu inyamat keda akipi nuipu, ijaikini kesi ajokunar noi kanuka iraan ice.
lgg_prompt: Angu karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba amvu 'yapi 'diyi oja geri eyini 'diyi eyini ani ecozu angu yiru 'diyi ayuzu. Afa nyakuni 'diyi afa nyakuni 'diyi fe tualu yi be tre, fe yini ovuzu onyiru ori wura azi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu bicweka bingi, abahingi bahindwire emiringo yaabo, kugira ngu bakorese ebintu by'omutaano ebiri omu bisharara. Eby'obuhangwa ebi nibiheereza eby'okurya bingi hamwe n'amaizi maingi, ekirikubareetera kukoresa emiringo y'ebihingirwe emwe.

eng_prompt: As urban areas continue to expand and industrial activities increase, the impact on air quality has become a growing concern. Many people are beginning to notice the detrimental effects of pollution on their health and the ecosystem.
lug_prompt: Nga ebibuga byeyongera okugaziwa n'amakolero okweyongera, okukosebwa kw'omutindo gw'empewo kweyongedde okweraliikiriza. Abantu bangi batandise okulaba akabi akali mu bucaafu ku bulamu bwabwe ne ku butonde.
ach_prompt: Kit ma kabedo me boma tye kamede ki dongo ki tic me yubo jami tye kamede, adwogi ne i kom rwom me yamo tye ka kelo lworo madit tutwal. Dano mapol dong gucako niang adwogi marac ma balo kabedo ma orumowa i kom yotkom gi ki jami ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aiboisio nuka itaunin aisiekikin keda aiboisio nuka icuman aiyatakin, epol noi ationis naka ekwam. Egeunete itunga luipu aanyun atiokisio nuka ekwam aijar kec keda isuban lu akwap.
lgg_prompt: Angu tawuni ru 'diyi ni tuzu drile azini e'yo okalamvu ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu, e'yo oli ma wura ma dria ri eca asi otiza ru tu. Ba karakara eyi e'doki e'yo angu ezoni 'diyi ma eza e'yo eyi ma rua ala ma dria tualu angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Emyanya y'endembo ku erikugumizamu n'okushanjuuka hamwe n'emirimo y'amakorero kweyongyera, okukwatwaho kw'omutindo gw'omwoya kweyongyeire. Abantu baingi batandikire kwetegyereza oburemeezi bw'obutwa aha magara gaabo hamwe n'obuhangwa bw'ensi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost the economy and promote sustainability, various initiatives have been launched across the country. One of the key strategies involves increasing the number of trees cultivated for commercial use.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyenfuna n'okutumbula obuwangaazi, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo zitongozeddwa okwetooloola eggwanga. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebiyinza okukolebwa kwe kwongera ku muwendo gw'emiti egirimibwa okufunamu ssente.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me lim ki dongo lobo, yub mapat-pat kicako I but lobo man mapat-pat. Yo acel ma pire tek en aye me medo wel yadi ma ki pito me nongo cente.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopolor edumune loka ikapun ka aitopolor aijar naka itunga, aponi kitegearai ainapeta nuegelegela kakwap wok. Adiopet kotoma iwaitin luapolok imoriarit aiyatakin enaaba loka ikito lu ekorio kanu agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo lonyi ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo ewu drile ri ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba e'do e'yo ndundu eyi kari 'di ma alea ndulu. Otita azi okporu 'diyi ma azi eri pati eyi ma ezota tujari 'yezu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'entaasya n'okutunguura eby'obuhangwa, enteekateeka nyingi zitandikirweho okwetoroora eihanga. Omwe aha mihanda mikuru n'okwongyera omuhendo gw'emiti erikuhingibwa kukoresa omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: Many students in Uganda are becoming increasingly aware of environmental issues and the importance of sustainability. As a result, they have started forming groups to promote eco-friendly practices within their communities.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi mu Uganda beeyongera okumanya ku nsonga z'obutonde n'obukulu bw'okuyimirizaawo ebintu. N'ekivuddemu, batandise okukola ebibiina okutumbula enkola ezitali za bulabe eri obutonde mu bitundu byabwe.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol tye ka dongo ngecgi I kom lok me cwec ma orumuwa ki ber pa gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Macalo adwogi ne, gucako cako dul mapat-pat me tyelo kor tic me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ikabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Esisiak luipu ko Uganda ejenete akiro nuikamunitos akwap keda ajokis naka aidar akwap. Kanuka ngun, ageutu kesi aiswamaun igurupun kanu aitopolor iponesio luajokak luka alupok kotoma atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi e'yo angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma dria azini orodri 'bani ecozu angu 'da ma ta mbazu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi e'do amuti eyi e'do eyini ani ecozu e'yo angu ama agei ri ma tambazu 'diyi otuzu ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi baingi omu Uganda beeyongyeire kumanya enshonga z'obuhangwa n'omugasho gw'okureeberera eby'obuhangwa. N'ekyarugiremu, batandikire kukora guruupu okushongyera emicwe y'obuhangwa omu byanga byabo.

eng_prompt: After years of construction and planning, the long-awaited infrastructure project has finally been completed. Engineers and architects have worked tirelessly to design a structure that meets modern safety and efficiency standards.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuzimba n'okuteekateeka okumala emyaka, pulojekiti y'ebizimbe ebadde erindiriddwa okumala ebbanga eddene emalirizibwa. Bayinginiya n'abakubi b'ebizimbe bakoze butaweera okuteekawo ekizimbe ekituukana n'emitindo gy'obukuumi n'obwangu ebiriwo.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me gedo ki yube, yub me gedo ma kibedo kakuru pi kare malac dong otum. Engineers ki architects gutiyo matek tutwal me yubu gedo ma rwate ki rwom me gwoko kuc ki tic maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aiduk keda aitemonokin, adaun aitodolikin epurojekt lo idarit noi. Iswamaete ijinias keda adukon keda agogongu kanu aitemonokin aduketait na itodolikini adoketait naka ayuwara keda eswamae loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani sizu azini otita eyi o'bazu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba asi otita afa ayuzaru 'bani ebi te sa'wa ezu ri de 'bo. Inginiya eyi tualu 'ba angu si'ba 'diyi pie nga azi okposi angu 'da sizu geri eyini aa'zu ageitema be sa'wa 'disi 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okwombeka n'okuteekateekyera, purogyekiti y'ebyombeko eretsirweho obwire buraingwa, eherize kuhwa. Ba ingyiniya hamwe n'abombeki b'ebyombeko, bakozire n'amaani okukora ekyombeko ekirikuhikaana n'omutindo gw'eby'okwerinda oguriho hati.

eng_prompt: Weather conditions can significantly impact various modes of transportation. Among these, water transport is particularly vulnerable to changes in the environment.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'obudde esobola okukosa ennyo entambula ez'enjawulo. Mu bino, entambula y'oku mazzi y'esinga okukosebwa enkyukakyuka mu butonde bw'ensi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma piny tye kwede twero balo yoo me wot mapatpat. I kin jami magi, wot iwi pii obedo gin ma kelo alokaloka I kabedo ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Epedorete ejautene loka ikwamin aitolitol iponesio luegelegela luka alosit. Kanejaas ngun, elose lo akipi nes epatana aijulakin ejautene lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile ni 'diyi eco geri ndundu acizu 'diyi oja ra. Diyi ma eselea, acipa yi dria ri eri e'yo ojata angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyiniri ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Embeera y'obwire neebaasa kuteganisa emiringo y'engyenda etari emwe. Omuri ebi, eby'engyenda by'aha maizi, nibyo birikubaasa kuhikwaho empindahinduka omu by'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: Travelers planning a visit to Kalangala Island should be aware of the limited transportation options available. To reach the island, they must carefully schedule their journey around the ferry's timetable.
lug_prompt: Abatambuze abateekateeka okukyalira ekizinga ky'e Kalangala balina okumanya ebyentambula ebitono ebiriwo. Okutuuka ku kizinga, balina okutegeka obulungi olugendo lwabwe okusinziira ku budde bw'ekidyeri.
ach_prompt: Luwot ma tye ki yub me cito ka limo cula nam me Kalangala omyero gunge yoo me wot matye. Me oo I cula nam, omyero guyube maber pi wot gi malube ki kare ma ferry tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Itunga lu ekapanakinete aipejonokin aiboisit nako Kalangala ekot aijen ebe ikidioko iwaitin lu elose. Kanu adolere odoket, ibusakinit kesi aitemonokin alosit kec kotupitete ainapeta nuka apak naka apotipot.
lgg_prompt: Le 'ba aci'ba otupi muzu omuru angu Kalangala niri ma alea 'diyi ma ni e'yo geri acizu 'diyi ma kalafe ni ovuzu were ri ma dria ra. Cazu angu alioru 'da ma alea, le eyi ma otu geri eyini acizu 'diyi kililiru sa'wa feri ni 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abagyenzi abarikuteekateeka kutaayaayira ekirwa kya Kalangala, bashemereire kumanya oburyo bw'engyenda bukye oburiho. Okuhika aha kirwa, bashemereire kukora enteekateeka y'orugyendo rwabo kurugirira aha bwire bw'ekidyeri.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership requires navigating complex situations and making tough decisions. As they strive to implement their vision, leaders often encounter obstacles that test their resolve and adaptability.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi bwetaagisa okulambula embeera enzibu n'okukola okusalawo okukaluba. Nga bagezaako okussa mu nkola ekirooto kyabwe, abakulembeze batera okusanga ebizibu ebigezesa obumalirivu bwabwe n'obusobozi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Lutela mabeco omyero gunge kit me tic i kare ma kwo tek dok gumok tam matek. I kare ma gitye ka yele me keto neno gi itic, lutela ipol kare ginongo peko ma temo tek cwiny gi.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan ekoto aitodolikin ejautene loetiono ka aitolomun aseununeta nuetioko. Neiswamaete kesi kagogongu aitodolikin aomisio kec, etapit duc engarenok adumunun atiokisio nu inwakunete aomisio kec keda apedorit kec.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri le e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi 'duzu. Drice'ba eyini okpo 'bazu e'yo eyini lele 'diyi 'yezu, eyi tutuni e'yo ewaru eyi esu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi nibwetaga okugyenda omu mbeera ezigumire n'okukora encwamu egumire. Obu abeebembezi barikugyezaho kuta ebirooto byabo omu nkora, nibatunga oburemeezi oburikuteganisa okucwamu kwabo n'okubaasa kwabo.

eng_prompt: Despite the government's assurances of financial support, there is growing skepticism among citizens regarding the effectiveness of these programs. As a result, many people complain the money sent by the government doesn't reach in full.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga gavumenti ekakasa obuyambi bw'ensimbi, waliwo okubuusabuusa mu bannansi ku bikwata ku buwanguzi bwa pulogulaamu zino. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi beemulugunya nti ssente gavumenti z'eweereza tezibatuukako mu bujjuvu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed gamente ocikke me miyo kony me lim, dano mapol tye ki akala-kala I kom yub magi. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol kok ni cente ma gamente cwalo pe oo weng.
teo_prompt: Karaida isumunit apugan agangat na ikapun, ejai abuonokin kanejaas itunga nuikamunitos aswam naka ainapeta ngun. Kanuka ngun, engurianete itunga luipu ebe mam ikapun lu ijukunit apugan edolonokinete kere.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni tro asi'baza fezu atita robia niri ma dria ra ti, 'ba kari anzi eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma agata e'yo otita 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi onu kini robia gamete ni efe ri cani eyi ma alea dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obuhame bwa gavumenti obw'obuhwezi bw'esente, hariho okubanganisa omu bantu aha bikwatireine n'okukora kurungi kwa puroguraamu ezi. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi nibetomboitwa ngu esente ezi gavumenti erikwohereza tizirikuhika omu bwijwire.

eng_prompt: In an effort to empower women and promote economic independence, numerous programs have been implemented nationwide. These initiatives focus on equipping women with essential skills and knowledge to enhance their livelihoods.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula abakyala n'okutumbula obwetwaze mu byenfuna, pulogulaamu nnyingi ziteekeddwa mu nkola mu ggwanga lyonna. Enteekateeka zino ziteeka essira ku kuwa abakyala obukugu n'amagezi ag'omugaso okutumbula embeera zaabwe ez'obulamu.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor mon ki ilo malo rwom me timo biacara, yub mapol dong ki keto itic ilobo ni lung. Yub magi keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom miyo diro ki ngec ma pire tek bot mon me ilo malo rwom me kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitigogong angor ka aitopolor aipugaikin bon kotoma ikapun, etolomun ainapeta nuipu kakwap kere. Alosikinet naka aswam ngun erai ainakin angor acoa ka acoa naepol noi kanu aitojokar aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu okpo fezu oku eyini dika okpo fezu eyi ma ngulupi esuzu e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alea, 'ba e'do otita karakara eyi kari 'di ma alea ndulu. Otita 'diyi 'ba asi oku eyini ondua azini ondua orodriru eyini 'diyi fezu eyini ani ecozu eyi ma edri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura abakazi n'okureetaho okwetegyeka omu by'entaasya, puroguraamu nyingi zitandikirweho omwihanga ryona. Enteekateeka ezi nizigyenderera okuheereza abakazi emyoga n'obwengye bw'omugasho kutunguura emituurire yaabo.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, agriculture plays a crucial role in the daily lives of many families. Most households rely on farming as their primary source of food and sustenance.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, ebyobulimi n'obulunzi bikola kinene nnyo mu bulamu bw'amaka mangi. Amaka agasinga geesigama ku bulimi ng'ensibuko y'emmere n'okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: I Uganda, pur tye gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwo pa gangi mapol. Pol pa gangi gijenge I kom pur macalo yoo me nongo cam ki kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, ejaasi akoru keda aswam naepol noi kotoma aijar naka ikalia luipu. Ikalia luipu ejarete kotoma akoru kwape epone loepedoriata kesi adumun inyamat.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, agirikica ni azi okporu nga familia karakara eyi ma edri o'du driasi. Aku pari yi yi ati amvu 'yaza ma dria yini nyaka esuzu azini yi ma ta mbazuri ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu maka maingi. Amaka amaingi nigeemerera aha buhingi n'oburiisa nk'oburugo bwago obukuru obw'eby'okurya n'okwebaisaho.

eng_prompt: In our village, agriculture plays a vital role in the local economy. Many farmers rely on modern equipment to enhance their productivity and efficiency.
lug_prompt: Mu kyalo kyaffe, ebyobulimi n'obulunzi bikola kinene nnyo mu by'enfuna by'ekitundu. Abalimi bangi beesigama ku byuma eby'omulembe okutumbula amakungula gaabwe n'obwangu.
ach_prompt: I caro wa, pur tye gin ma pire tek tutwal I tenge me lim. Lupur mapol gijenge I kom jami tic ma ite kare ni me medo rwom me kacgi.
teo_prompt: Kocaalo kosi, erai akoru na epol ajokis noi kotoma odumune loka ikapun. Akoriok luipu itwasamaete iswamasia luakwana kanu aiyatakin eswamae kec.
lgg_prompt: Calo amavileri ma alea, agirikica ni azi okporu nga e'yo robia esuzu angu 'da ma alea ri ma alea. Ba ori ezo'ba 'diyi ma pari yi yi ati afa ayuzaru ewu curu'dorisi 'diyi ma dria afa ofule yini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kyaro kyaitu, eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu by'entaasya y'ekyaro. Abahingi baingi nibegamira aha byoma by'omurembe okwongyera aha buhingi bwabo.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced economy, financial stability is more important than ever. To ensure sustainable growth and resilience, organizations must prioritize the importance of financial literacy among their members.

ach_prompt: I kare man ma biacara tye ka wot oyot-oyot tutwal, bedo ki lim maber pire tek tutwal. Me neno ni dongo lobo tye ka mede anyim, dul mapat-pat omyero gukwong pwonyo lumemba gi ki lok kom lim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naikiara noi naka ikapun, ejokuna noi ainapakina naka ikapun adepar kapakio nukokau. Kanu awanyun apol na ejok, ekot iriongeta aisingarenit nuka aisisia nuka ikapun kanejaas imebanakec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni curu'do tupi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma aa'ta kililiru ri eri orodriru ndeni aga oku driorisi. E'yo zota ewu drile ri ma alea, amuti eyi ma 'ba okpo e'yo onita e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria eyi ma memba eyi ma eselea.

eng_prompt: Despite ongoing efforts to improve living conditions, many communities continue to struggle with the aftermath of conflict. As a result, the country still faces refugee problems in northern Uganda.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo kaweefube agenda mu maaso okutumbula embeera z'obulamu, ebitundu bingi bikyalwanagana n'ebiva mu butakkaanya. N'ekivuddemu, eggwanga likyalina ebizibu by'abanoonyiboobubudamu mu bukiikakkono bwa Uganda.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni tute tye me yubu rwom me kwo pa dano, but lobo mapol pud tye ka lweny ki peko ma lweny okelo. Macalo adwogi ne, lobo pud tye ki peko pa luring ayela I kumalo me Uganda.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamao kagogongu kanu aitojokar ejautene lo aijar, inyikokitos itunga luipu ainingosit keda atiokisio nuka ingungeta. Kanuka ngun, eringa akwap etereikina keda atiokisio nuka ikerai ko nyakoi nako Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba o'bi eyini aa'zu edriru ri otuzu ra ti, ongulumu karakara eyi nga po'di dri ci e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi be. E'yo 'disi, kari ni nga po'di fu dri e'yo emunyale eyini 'diyi be kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea.

eng_prompt: After weeks of hands-on workshops and expert guidance, the participants gained valuable skills in soap-making techniques. With newfound knowledge and confidence, the youths can now make liquid soap after the training.

ach_prompt: I nge cabit mapol me pwonye ki pwony pa ludiro, joo ma obedo tye gunongo diro me yubu cabun. Ki ngec manyen ma gunongo ki tek cwiny, bulu dong twero yubu cabun ma pii i nge pwonye.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support community initiatives, financial institutions are increasingly focusing on youth empowerment. One way they are doing this is by providing financial assistance to groups aimed at fostering development.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuwagira enteekateeka z'ekitundu, ebitongole by'ebyensimbi byeyongera okussa essira ku kutumbula abavubuka. Engeri emu gye bakikolamu kwe kuwa obuyambi bw'ensimbi eri ebibiina ebigenderera okutumbula enkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: I tute me miyo kony bot lwak, gangi tic me lim tye ka keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom tyelo kor bulu. Yo acel ma gitye katimo man obedo miyo kony me lim bot dul mapat-pat ma mito kelo dongo lobo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigangite aswamisio nuka itunga, eutasi iriongeta luka ikapun aitigogong atumunak. Epone ediope loiswamaete kesi ngun ngesi aijaikin agangat na ikapun mama ejaasi igurupun lu ekotosi aitopol apol.

lug_prompt: Mu katale ka leero akalimu okuvuganya, bizinensi zirina okukozesa enkola ennungi okusobola okukulaakulana. Ekintu ekimu ekikulu ekiyinza okukosa ennyo ebivaamu bwe bulungi bw'enkola zaabwe ez'okuteekateeka.

teo_prompt: Kojautene loka abolobol lolo, ekot ibiasaran aitwasam iwaitin lu itutuoritai kanu apolor. Adiopebore naepol noi naepedori aitodolikin eswamae loajokan ngesi aitemonokineta kec.

eng_prompt: Recent efforts to strengthen community policing and enhance local governance have fostered a sense of safety among residents. As a result, collaborative initiatives between law enforcement and community leaders have been implemented.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing interest among young people in exploring alternative sources of income. Many are turning to agriculture as a viable option, particularly in areas with a strong demand for fresh produce.

ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, but lobo man obedo ki kuku kuku ki lweny mapol tutwal, ma oweko mite ni omyero ki dony I lok eni. Macalo adwogi ne, kicako yub mapat-pat me tyeko peko matye ka kelo kuc.

lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, angu 'da esu e'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo angiri, e'yo 'di fezu e'yo 'yezu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'do e'yo ndundu eyi e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu azini asianzu ejizu.

lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'abanoonyiboobubudamu ekigenda kyeyongera, ebibiina by'obwannakyewa eby'enjawulo bikungaanyizza ebyetaago n'obuyambi. Amaanyi gaabwe gateekeddwa ku kuwa obuweereza obw'omugaso n'obuyambi eri abo abali mu bwetaavu.

lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde obutakkaanya n'obunkenke, okunoonya engeri y'okugonjoolamu ensonga awatali ffujjo kya mugaso mu mirembe egy'olubeerera. Ebyafaayo bitulaze nti okuteesa n'okutegeeragana emirundi egisinga bivaamu eby'okugonjoola ebizibu eby'olubeerera okusinga obulumbaganyi.

lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ebyalo bingi, okufuna amafuta g'amazzi ag'omulembe kikyali kizibu. N'ekivuddemu, engeri ez'edda ez'okufunamu amazzi zikyaliwo.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me caro, nongo pii ma ite kare ni pud tek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, yoo macon me nongo pii pwod tye.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, mam epedorete itunga adumunun akipi nuakwana. Kanuka ngun, eringa iponesio lumojong luka adumun akipi iswamaete.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi ma alia, geri o'diru aci oseza ni 'diyi ma esuta ma esuta ma ongmbo ni nga po'di ca ku. E'yo 'disi, geri oku 'bani yi esuzu 'diyi nga po'di ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya mingi y'ebyaro, okuhikwaho za payipu ez'omurembe tikirikwetengwa. N'ekyarugiremu, emiringo y'obuhangwa y'okutunga amaizi ekiriho.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote accessibility and sustainability, the government has partnered with local utilities to ensure that all citizens have access to essential resources. As a result, the national corporation charges affordable fees for water connection and consumption.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obwangu n'obutebenkevu, gavumenti ekwataganye n'ebitongole by'eby'obugagga eby'omu kitundu okulaba nga bannansi bonna bafuna ebintu ebikulu. N'ekivuddemu, ekitongole ky'amazzi mu ggwanga kisaba ssente entono ku kuyungibwa n'okukozesa amazzi.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me tyelo kor nongo jami ma mite pi kwo pa dano, gamente oribbe ki dul mapat-pat me neno ni anywali weng tye ki jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, dul me national corporation ngolo wel cente ma yot pi kubu ki tic ki pii.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitopolor adumunun iboro keda aijar naejok, eswamanara apugan keda iboro lu itwasamao kanu awanyun ebe edumunenete itunga kere iboro lu itwasamao. Kanuka ngun, etaci erionget loka akipi ikapun luikidioko kanu arucokinit akipi keda aitosom.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo 'bani ecozu eyi esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu, gamete 'ye ti icita 'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie nezu ra kini kari anzi dria eyi eco afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esu ra. E'yo 'disi, amuti e'yo yii ni ondrepi national corporation ni robia aje weresi 'diyi a'i yi ma ti ecizu azini yi ayuza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entunguka n'obuhangwa,gavumenti ekwataniise n'ebitongore by'omubyaro kureeba ngu abatuuragye boona batunga ebintu ebikuru. N'ekyarugiremu, ekitongore ky'amaizi ekya national corporation nikishashura ebishare by'okukozesa amaizi.

eng_prompt: Access to clean water is essential for public health and sanitation. Without it, communities struggle to uphold basic hygiene practices.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amazzi amayonjo kya nkizo eri obulamu bw'abantu n'obuyonjo. Awatali ekyo, ebitundu birwana okukuuma empisa z'obuyonjo ezisookerwako.
ach_prompt: Nongo pii maleng pire tek pi yot kom pa lwak. Labongo ne, kabedo mapatpat nongo tek tutwal me gwoko lengo.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akipi nu elaete ejok kanu angaleu ka aila. Arai emamei, etiono itunga aidar aila.
lgg_prompt: Yi ala esuzu ri eri orodriru o'bi eyi ma rua ala ni. Afa 'da kokoru, ongulumu eyi e'yo ewaru 'ye alata ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga amaizi marungi n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'abantu. Hatariho, abantu nibarwana kurinda obuyonjo.

eng_prompt: In many industries, the efficiency of operations heavily relies on essential resources. One of the most critical resources needed for various tasks is a reliable water supply.
lug_prompt: Mu makolero mangi, obulungi bw'emirimu bwesigama nnyo ku bintu ebikulu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyetaagibwa mu mirimu egy'enjawulo kwe kufuna amazzi agesigika.
ach_prompt: I faktori mapol, tic maber jenge tutwalle I kom jami ma mite pi tic. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal ma mite pi tic mapat-pat en aye bedo ki pii ma oporre.
teo_prompt: Kotoma okampuni luipu, eswamae loajokan lo itwasamao erai iboro lu itwasamao. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi lu ekotoi kanu aswamisinei nuegelegela ngesi akipi nu ejokuka.
lgg_prompt: Okalamvu karakara eyi ma alea, azi ngaza kililiru ri ni asi'ba afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria. Afa azi orodriru 'bani le azi ndundu eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma azi yi awaza kililiru ri i.
nyn_prompt: Omu makorero maingi, okukora kurungi nikwegamira munonga aha bintu ebirikwetengwa. Kimwe aha bintu by'omugasho munonga ebirikwetengwa kukora emirimo etari emwe n'emwe n'okutunga amaizi.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming wildfire season, city officials have implemented new safety measures. One key initiative involves establishing strategic resources for emergency response teams.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera sizoni y'omuliro ogujja, abakungu b'ekibuga bataddewo enkola empya ez'obukuumi. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebijja okukolebwa kwe kuteekawo enkola y'okuyamba abo abali mu mbeera ez'amangu.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi kare me mac matye kabino ni, lutic me boma madit gukati ki yoo manyen me gwoko kuc. Yub acel ma pire tek obedo keto jami ma mite pi dul ma miyo kony ikare me peko ma opoto atura.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin kanuka apak naka akim naebunit, etolomutu eswamak luka esite iwaitin lu ayuara. Alosikinet adiope naepol noi imoriarit aitolomun iboro luingarakinete itimun lu engeso.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa acini emupi ri ma otuta si, azi'ba aku ambu city ni 'diyi 'ba geri o'diru ageitema ni 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo azi okporu 'bani 'ye ri ma azi eri geri 'bani 'ba e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu 'diyi sizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera obwire bw'omuriro ogurikwija, abakuru b'orurembo bateireho oburyo busya bw'okwerinda. Ekigyendererwa kimwe ekikuru nikitwariramu okutandikaho emirimo y'amaani eya tiimu ezirikukora ahabw'ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing water scarcity issues faced by local communities, the development committee has prioritized sustainable solutions. After extensive planning and community consultations, they have initiated a project to improve access to clean water.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebizibu by'ebbula ly'amazzi ebigenda mu maaso ebisangibwa mu bitundu, akakiiko k'enkulaakulana kasobozesezza okugonjoola ebizibu eby'olubeerera. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteekateeka ennyo n'okwebuuza ku bantu, batandiseewo pulojekiti okutumbula okufuna amazzi amayonjo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me nok pa pii matye kawot anyim ma lwak tye ka kato ki iye, dul ma doro lok kom dongo lobo oketo cwinygi I kom yoo me cobo peko eni. Ingee yube maber ki lok ki lwak, gucako yub me medo yoo me nongo pii maleng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka aikidiokus na akipi nu ejaas itunga luka atutubet, apodokinit ekomiti loka apol aitemokin ationis ngin. Akaulo naka aitemonokin ka aingitun itunga, etegeasi kesi epurojekt lo aitojokar adumunun akipi nu elaete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru yi ako ni ongulumu eyini esu 'diyi ma aza kozu, komiti angu ezoma ni 'diyi fe okpo e'yo eyi ma aza kozu sa'wa driasi. Otuta angiri 'yezu azini e'yo nzezu ongulumu eyi be 'bori ma vutia, eyi e'do otita eyi yi ala esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eibura ry'amaizi oburikugyenda omu maisho omu byaro, akakiiko k'entunguuka kataireho oburyo burungi. Bwanyima y'okukora enteekateeka n'okwebuuza aha bantu, batandikireho purogyekiti y'okwongyera amaizi marungi.

eng_prompt: The company had been struggling financially for months, and the latest sales figures were dismal. As the bills piled up, it became clear that tough decisions had to be made.
lug_prompt: Kampuni ebadde erwanagana mu by'ensimbi okumala emyezi, era omuwendo gw'ebyamaguzi ogusembyeyo gwali mubi. Ebisale bwe byagenda byeyongera, kyalabika bulungi nti okusalawo okw'amaanyi kwali kulina okukolebwa.
ach_prompt: Dul ne obedo ka nongo peko me lim pi dwe mapol, dok wel cato jami ma okato pe obedo ber tutwal. I kare ma wel cente omedde, nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero kimok tam matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi ekampuni ngol keda ationis naka ikapun adaun ilapio, ido etiono noi agwelanar. Kwape apolor ikapun, apotu kojenutu ebe ibusakinit aitolomun aseununeta nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ebi dri ci e'yo robia nirisi mba karakara, dika kalafe afa oziza ni o'diru 'diyi ndra muke ku. E'yo aje ma ongmbo ni tuzu 'boria, eri eca e'dazaru kini le 'ba ma 'du e'yo okporu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Kampuni ekaba etwire neetunga oburemeezi bw'esente kumara ameezi, kandi ebirikugyenda omu maisho omu by'obushubuzi bikaba biri bibi munonga. Ebishare ku byabeire nibyeyongyera, kikarebeka butunu ngu hariho okusharamu kw'amaani oku bashemereire kukora.

eng_prompt: Frustration grew among the workers as their financial struggles intensified. After weeks of waiting, they decided it was time to take a stand.
lug_prompt: Obwennyamivu bweyongedde mu bakozi ng'obukuubagano bwabwe mu by'ensimbi bweyongera. Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga balinda, baasalawo nti kye kiseera okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Cwer cwiny omede ikin lutic I kare ma peko me lim omedde. Ingee kare me kuro pi cabit mapol, gumoko tamgi ni kare dong oromo me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak kopoloros keda aiyalongong naarai apol noi ingungeta kec luka ikapun. Akaulo naka aidar isabitin luipu, apotu kesi koseutu ebe erai apak naka aibwo.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza tu azi'ba eyi ma eselea eyini e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi. Sabiti 'bani tezu 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu bakozi, ahabw'oburemeezi bwabo bw'esente kweyongyera. Bwanyima y'esande z'okurinda, bakasharamu ngu hati n'obwire bw'okwemerera.

eng_prompt: In a shocking turn of events, an investigation revealed that the officer had been involved in illegal activities. As the evidence mounted, authorities decided to take action against him.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, okunoonyereza kwalaga nti omuserikale yali yeenyigira mu bikolwa ebimenya amateeka. Obujulizi bwe bweyongera, ab'obuyinza baasalawo okubaako kye bamukolako.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, kwed onyuto ni abili ne obedo I tim ma turu cik. Ikare ma caden omede, lutela gumoko tam gi me timo gin mo I kome.
