teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakinio naka akiro, abu aingic kitodu ebe ajai epolisit toma aswamisinei numam ekisil ecamunit. Neautar ajenanut aiyatakin, apotu apedorosio koseutu aswam nuikamunitos ngesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo eti ondaza ece kini azi'ba 'da fi e'yo azita palaa ku 'diyi ma alea. Afa ecetaru 'diyi ni tuzu tualurisi, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo 'du eri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza,okucondooza kworeka ngu ofiisa abaire ayejumbire omu bikorwa ebitahikire. Obujurizi ku bwayeyongyeire, ab'obushoborozi bakasharamu kumukoreraho.

eng_prompt: As tensions escalated in the crowded streets, a confrontation broke out between the mob and law enforcement. In the chaos, the officer found himself surrounded and outnumbered, desperately trying to maintain control of the situation.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera mu nguudo ezaali zijjudde abantu, okulwanagana kwabalukawo wakati w'ekibinja ky'abantu n'abakuumaddembe. Mu kavuyo, omuserikale yeesanga nga yeetooloddwa era nga bamusinga mu bungi, ng'agezaako nnyo okufuga embeera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle omedde I gudu ma dano dwong iye, lweny ocake ikin lwak ki abili. Ikare me kuku kuku enoni, abili ne gunongo ni kilorogi dok welgi dwong, oteme matek tutwal me doro ngo matye katimme.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor aiyalongong korotin luejaasi keda itunga luipu, apotu ingungeta kobwangunos kiding itunga keda ipolisin. Kotoma amumu kangin, abu epolisit kodum ebe elukunitai ngesi ido ipu itunga luipu, kotoma aitam aitikitik ejautene.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu nzila o'bi eyini tre 'diyi ma alea, e'yo ngiringiri ni e'do 'ba ongulumuru 'diyi ma eselea 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi pie. Ngiringiri 'da ma alea, azi'ba 'da esu i ma agei te kalafe si, erini o'bizu okporu e'yo nde ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire omu nguuto ezabaire zijwire abantu baingi, hakabaho okurwanagana ahagati y'abantu n'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro. Omu kavuyo, ofiisa akeesherekyerera kandi yaasingwa omubare, arikugyezaho munonga kurinda embeera.

eng_prompt: As he hurried across the busy street, he barely noticed the approaching vehicle. Suddenly, a loud horn blared, and he turned just in time to see the lorry barreling towards him.
lug_prompt: Ng'ayanguwa okusala ekkubo eririmu abantu abangi, yalaba katono emmotoka eyali ejja. Amangu ago, ejjembe ery'amaanyi lyavuga, era yakyuka mu budde okulaba loole ng'emutuukirira.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en tye ka ngwec I dye gudu ma dano dwong iye, en pe oneno motoka matye kabino. Cutcut, tung dwan malongo owinye, en olokke I cawa kikome me neno lorry matye kabino tung bote.
teo_prompt: Neautar ngesi akerit korot loejaasi keda itunga luipu noi, mam ngesi abu koany amotoka naebunit. Kapak kana, abu ekwang loepol, kosodi ngesi aijulakin kotoma apak naepedori ngesi asesen elore elosi ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Erini arizu nzila 'bani acizuri ma aliarisi, awini mutukari emupi 'da ndre ku. E'yo mbeleru, o'duko o'duko urusi ri si, azini eri oja i sawa kililiru ma alia lori ni emuria eri vu ri ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Obu yaabaire naarahuka kurabira omu ruguuto orwabaire rurimu abantu baingi, akaba atarikumanya emotoka eyabaire neyija. Ahonaaho, ehoru y'amaani ekarugaho, yaahindukira omu bwire butari bwa hare kureeba roore erikwija omu maisho ge.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to dip below the horizon, the air was filled with an unsettling tension. People hurried about, unaware that something unexpected was about to unfold.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yatandika okukka wansi mu bbanga, empewo yajjula okusika omuguwa okutaataaganya. Abantu baayanguwa, nga tebamanyi nti ekintu ekitasuubirwa kyali kinaatera okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto piny, lworo omako yamo. Dano guringo oyot-oyot, kun pe gingeyo ni gin mo ma pe byek tye I kome dong cok time.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror kwap, apotu akwap kilelebunos keda aiyalongong naepol noi. Apotu itunga kikerata, mam ejenete ebe ejai ibore yen mam eomitai ebe ebuni atakanun.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni e'doria e'doria e'deria, oli ma alia e'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi ga tre. Ba eyi ari eyi ma agei te, eyini ani egazu ku kini e'yo azi 'bani ega kokoru ni nga i 'ye i ra.
nyn_prompt: Eizooba ku ryatandikire kugwa ahansi y'eiguru, empewo ekaba eijwire okwerarikirira kw'amaani. Abantu bakahonaaho, batarikumanya ngu ekintu ekyabaire kitarikuteekateekwaho kikaba kiri haihi kubaho.

eng_prompt: Frustration among the community had been building for months as essential services continued to decline. In a recent town hall meeting, residents voiced their concerns, demanding immediate action from local authorities.
lug_prompt: Obwennyamivu mu bantu bubadde bweyongera okumala emyezi ng'empeereza ez'omugaso zigenda mu maaso n'okukendeera. Mu lukiiko lwa town hall olwaliwo gyebuvuddeko, abatuuze baalaze obweraliikirivu bwabwe, nga baagala wabeewo ekikolebwa mu bwangu okuva mu b'obuyinza b'ebyalo.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki cwer cwiny pi dwe mapol tutwal I kare ma rwom me kony mapigi tego omedde ki dok piny. I kacoke ma otime cokcok-ki I town hall, lutedero gunyutu lworo gi, kun gimito ni lutela me tedero gutim gin mo oyot-oyot.
teo_prompt: Mam itunga eyalamasi kanu ilapio luipu naarai apotu ijanakino luka itunga kibiroros. Kotoma airiamunet naka etogo loka etaun, apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongosiokec, ekotosi apedorosio nuka atutubet aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: Asi nyoza ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri e'bi tu imba karakara eyisi e'yo azi orodriru 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ri si. Mitingi aku ambu town hall niri ma alea, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini, eyini lezu e'yo 'yezu mbeleru engazu drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira omu bantu kutwire nikweyongyera kumara ameezi, obuheereza bw'omugasho bukaguma nibukyendera. Omu rukiiko orwabaireho juba omu town hall, abatuuragye bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo, barikwenda ngu ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bakoreho juba.

eng_prompt: The recent string of thefts and vandalism had left the community in shock. As rumors spread, the villagers began to suspect that their own neighbors were involved in the criminal activities.
lug_prompt: Obubbi obw'omuddiring'anwa obwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'okwonoona ebintu byalese abantu mu ntiisa. Olugambo bwe lwasaasaana, abatuuze b'oku kyalo baatandika okuteebereza nti baliraanwa baabwe bennyini beenyigira mu bikolwa eby'obumenyi bw'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Tim me kwo ki balo jami ma otime cokcok-ki oweko lwak obedo ki ngeng tutwal. I kare ma lok angea omede ki nyaa, lutedero gucako byeko ni jirani gi bene tye ikin lutim bal.
teo_prompt: Apotu akoko keda amumu kojalakisi itunga lu atutubet aumok. Nealalakina akiro ngun, apotu itunga lu ocaalo ogiroto ebe ejaas idunyetakec toma aswamisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ogu ni azini e'yo onzi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ku ongulumu eyi osuta ma alea. E'yo onzi 'diyi ni i erezurisi, 'ba calua 'diyi e'do ega kini yi ma jo ejele yi 'ye e'yo azita onyoza ni 'diyi ma alia indi.
nyn_prompt: Obushuma n'okushiisha ebintu ebyabaireho obwahati, bikahiga abantu. Engambo ku zaagumire nizijanjaara, abatuuragye bakatandika kuteekateeka ngu bataahi baabo beejumbire omu bikorwa by'obwinazi.

eng_prompt: After hours of being trapped in the abandoned warehouse, their hope was dwindling. Just as they began to lose faith, the sound of sirens pierced the silence.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'essaawa eziwera nga basibidde mu sitoowa eyalekebwawo, essuubi lyabwe lyali ligenda likendeera. Bwe baatandika okuggwaamu okukkiriza, amaloboozi ga sireni gaayita mu kasirise.
ach_prompt: Ingee bedo I ot gwoko jami matye nono pi cawa malac, gen meggi obedo ka rweny. Ikare ma gucako rwenyo niye gi, dwan me siren okelo lworo madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isawan luipu luka aibwo kotogoi loabu kojalak, ajai amuno kec aibiror. Neageuna kesi aibiror aiyuunikec, apotu iporotoi luka isirikaalei kotuboto aililing.
lgg_prompt: Sawa yini ovuzu ombezaru pari afa ta mbazuri ma alia 'bori ma vutia, yi ma asi 'baza ri e'de ra. Yi ni e'doria yi ma a'ita avizu 'boria, o'duko sirenni 'diyi ma o'duko fu angu 'da ma aliarisi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara eshaaha nyingi omu sitoowa, amatsiko gaabo gakatandika kukyendeera. Ku baatandikire kuhwaho okwikiriza, eiraka rya sireni rikarabanisamu obusingye.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation and a series of witness interviews, law enforcement officials were able to identify the individuals involved in the recent string of burglaries. Following a dramatic chase, the suspects are in police custody.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'okubuuza abajulizi abawerako, abakwasisa amateeka basobodde okuzuula abantu abeenyigira mu bubbi obwaliwo gye buvuddeko. Oluvannyuma lw'okuyigga abantu mu ngeri ey'ekitalo, abateeberezebwa bali mu kaduukulu ka poliisi.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut kacel ki lok ki lucaden mapol, lutic ma gwoko cik onongo twero niang anga ma obedo I tim me kwalo ot ma otimme cokcok-ki. Ingee ryemo lutim bal matek tutwal, abili omako jo mabyek me bal tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok keda aingitingit ajenak luipu, apotu ipolisin kopedosi ajenun itunga luejaasi toma akoko naka itogoi. Akaulo naka ameet naepol noi, ejaas lu ekamunitai polis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia azini 'ba sadiniru 'diyi ozizu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi esu 'ba e'yo ogu ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ra. E'yo 'bani 'ba obizu okporu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba 'bani ega eyi eza e'yo 'diyi polisi eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi n'okubuuza abajurizi, ab'eby'obutegyeki bakabaasa kumanya abantu abaabaire bejumbire omubwibi obwabaireho. Ahanyima y'okuhigwa munonga, abarikuteekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro bari omu kaduukuru ka pooriisi.

eng_prompt: During the police interrogation, the detective pressed him for details about his involvement in the case. When asked about his connections to the individuals in question, he quickly shook his head.
lug_prompt: Mu kubuuzibwa ebibuuzo kwa poliisi, bambega baamukaka okumanya ebisingawo ku kweyingiza kwe mu musango. Bwe yabuuziddwa ku nkolagana ye n'abantu aboogerwako, yakankana mangu omutwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma abili tye kapenye ki lapeny, lakwed oketo lyeto I kome pi ngec matut I kom tim ne. I kare ma kipenye pi kubbe ma en tye kwede ki dano ma kiloko i komgi, en oyengo wiye oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingisingisio nuka ipolisin, abu engican kingit ngesi akiro nukaidules nuikamunitos ajautake toma omusago kangol. Ne ingitingitai ngesi nuikamunitos arucokina ke keda itunga lu ineritere, abu ngesi kikwenya akou katipet.
lgg_prompt: Sawa polisi eyini e'yo ozizu 'bori ma alea, 'ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi zi eri e'yo dria erini fizu kesi 'da ma alea ri ma dria. Ba ka eri zi e'yo erini ovuzu yi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria, eri si i ma dri mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Obu poriisi yaabaire nemubuuza ebibuuzo, omuporisi akamushaba kumanya ebirikukwata aha kwejumba kwe omu mushango. Ku yababuuziibwe aha nkoragana ye n'abantu abo, akateera omutwe ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Under the cover of darkness, they meticulously planned their heist. With the streets deserted, they felt it was the perfect time to strike.
lug_prompt: Mu budde obw'ekizikiza, baakola enteekateeka y'obubbi bwabwe n'obwegendereza. Olw'okuba enguudo zaali njereere, baalowooza nti kye kiseera ekituufu okwekalakaasa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma piny col, guyube maber tutwal me kwalo kwo gi. Kit ma dano onongo gipe I teng gudu, gin gutamo ni man obedo kare maber me jemo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma amuton, apotu kesi itemonokinos noi akoko kec. Kwape emamei itunga korotin, apotu kesi kowomitos ebe erai na apak najokan noi naka aidiya.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikurusi, eyi otu eyi ma otuta ogu 'da ni ri geri kililiru si. Nzila eyini aa'zu 'ba kokoru risi, eyi ega kini 'di sa'wa muke eyini ecozu ngiringiri 'yezu ri i.
nyn_prompt: Omu mwirima, bakatebekanisa kurungi okwiba kwabo. Ahabw'okugira ngu enguuto zikaba zitari bantu, bakeehurira ngu n'obwire burungi bw'okwesharinga.

eng_prompt: The situation has escalated beyond our control, and immediate action is required. We cannot handle this matter internally any longer.
lug_prompt: Embeera yeeyongedde nnyo era twetaaga okubaako kye tukolawo mu bwangu. Tetukyasobola kukola ku nsonga eno munda mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Lok ne odoko rac tutwal ma pe watwero gengo ne, omyero watim gin mo oyot oyot. Pe dong watwero tic I kom lok man I gang.
teo_prompt: Apolor ejautene lo mam oni ipedori aitikitik, ido ekotoi aswam katipet. Mam oni ipedori aitemokin akiro nu kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'di ma omgbo tu ama ma okpo dria ku, dika le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo mbeleru. Ama econi e'yo 'di ma aza ko ogogo ku.
nyn_prompt: Embeera eyeyongyeire kandi titurikubaasa kugitegyeka, n'ahabw'ekyo twine kugira eki twakora ahonaaho. Titurikubaasa kukora aha nshonga egi omunda.

eng_prompt: After the incident during the training exercise, there were whispers among the ranks about his actions. The commanding officer decided that the matter needed to be addressed formally.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ekyabaddewo mu kutendekebwa, waaliwo okuwuubaala mu nnyiriri ku bikolwa bye. Omuduumizi yasalawo nti ensonga yeetaaga okukolebwako mu butongole.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngo ma otimme I kare me pwonye, lok obedo tye I kin lumemba I kom tim mege. Ladit wi abili omoko tamme ni omyero kityek lok eni I yoo ma lube ki gamente.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akangas naka aituutoonor, apotu itunga luapolok kinerata nuikamunitos aswamisioke. Abu ekomanda kotema ebe ibusakinit aitemokin akirot ngin kopone kaloejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi sawa embata nirisi 'bori ma vutia, e'yo nzeza yi ma eselea e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria ci. Azi'ba komanda ruri 'du e'yo kini le 'ba ma ko e'yo nde ma aza kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ebyabaireho omu kutendekwa, hakabaho okuhuhurirana aha bikwatireine n'ebikorwa bye. Orikukurira ofiisa akasharamu ngu enshonga egyo eshemereire kukorwaho omu butongore.

eng_prompt: As the police officer approached, the suspect shifted nervously from foot to foot, glancing down at the ground. When questioned about the incident, a look of regret crossed his face.
lug_prompt: Omuserikale wa poliisi bwe yasemberera, ateeberezebwa okukyuka n'obunkenke okuva ku kigere okudda ku kirala, ng'atunula wansi ku ttaka. Bwe yabuuzibwa ebikwata ku ekyo ekyaliwo, yalaga nti yejjusa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma abili tye ka bino cok, ngat ma byek me bal tye I kome-ni obedo ka lokke ki tyene me cito I tyene mukene, kun neno piny I ngom. I kare ma kipenye pi ngo ma otimme, en obedo ki tam me koko ange I wange.
teo_prompt: Neadolunia epolisit, abu loetepesenitai kijulakin akeje kere, kosodi airereor kwap. Neingitingitai ngesi nuikamunitos akangas kangin, abu ngesi koany epone loka aiitun aitoronikin.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba polisi ni ni emuzu ri si, agu 'bani ega eza e'yo 'da oja i pa alu alu si, erini angu ndrezu va. Bani eri zizu e'yo 'da ma dria 'boria, eri ma andretia e'da e'yo asi otiza ni.
nyn_prompt: Ofiisa wa poriisi ku yaahikire haihi, owabaire nateekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro akagyenda arikureeba ahansi. Ku yababuuziibwe ebyabaireho, akareebeka nk'orikwefuuza.

eng_prompt: After the accident, the injured individuals were quickly assessed for their injuries. Realizing the severity of the situation, they decided to seek help immediately.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akabenje, abantu abaafuna ebisago baakeberebwa mangu ebisago byabwe. Olw'okukimanya nti embeera yali mbi nnyo, baasalawo okunoonya obuyambi mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Ingee can me gudu enoni, dano ma onongo awano ki pimo awano gi oyot-oyot tutwal. Pien guniang kit ma peko ne rac kwede, gumoko tamgi me yenyo kony cut-cut.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akangas, aponi owanyunai atiokisio nuka ngul luemusunguna. Apotu kesi kojenutu ationis na ejautene, apotu kesi odumutu aingarakinio katipet.
lgg_prompt: Drileonzi 'da ma vutia, 'ba andri 'ba nya'biliko esupi 'diyi ma rua indikindi. E'yo ewaru e'yo 'da ma dria 'boria, eyi 'du e'yo azakoma ndazu indikindi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'akabenje, abantu abahutaziibwe bakakyeberwa ahonaaho obuhuta bwabo. Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi bw'embeera, bakasharamu kuronda obuhwezi ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: As the police set up a checkpoint on the highway, they noticed a suspicious lorry approaching. The driver seemed nervous, glancing around as if he were hiding something.
lug_prompt: Nga poliisi eteekawo ekifo we bakeberera ku luguudo olukulu, baalaba loole eteeberezebwa nga ejja. Ddereeva yalabika ng'atya, ng'atunudde mu maaso ng'alinga alina ky'akweka.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma abili guyubu kabedo me ngiyo piny I gudu madit, guneno lorry ma pe ngene ni tye kabino. Ladwoo mutoka ne nen calo lworo omake, obedo kaneno piny calo ngat ma tye ka kano gin mo.
teo_prompt: Neadukunia ipolisin aiboisit na engicere korot, apotu kesi kowanyutu elore lo eomitai ebe ebunit. Etakani ederepa bala ekuriaka noi, kosodi airereor bala ejai ibore ibusakinit ngesi aingop.
lgg_prompt: Polisi eyini angu andrita ni 'diyi sizu nzila dria risi, eyi ndre lori azi 'bani ega eyi ma dria ku ni emuria. Dereva nderi e'da ndra asi otizaru, erini angu ndreria ekile erini afa azini ozile le.
nyn_prompt: Abaporiisi ku batandikireho omwanya gw'okukyebera aha ruguuto oruhango, bakareeba roore erikuteekwateekwaho kwija. Dereeva akareebeka nk'orikwerarikirira, arikureeba nk'orikushereka ekintu.

eng_prompt: Due to increasing concerns over public health and safety, the Ugandan government held discussions about the regulation of traditional alcoholic beverages. After extensive debates, officials decided that stricter measures were necessary to curb the negative impacts of unregulated alcohol production.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira okweyongera ku by'obulamu n'obukuumi bw'abantu, gavumenti ya Uganda yakola okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga y'okuggya amateeka ku mwenge ogw'ekinnansi. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi, abakungu baasalawo nti ebiragiro ebikakali byetaagibwa okukendeeza ku buzibu obuva mu kukola omwenge ogutali mu mateeka.
ach_prompt: Pi lworo ma tye kamedde I kom yotkom ki ber bedo pa lwak, gamente me Uganda obedo ki nywako lok I kom cik ma doro mato kongo. Ingee laro lok mapol, lutic gumoko tamgi ni omyero kimok yoo matek me gengo adwogi marac ma bino pi yubu kongo ma pe ki doro.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo naepol noi naka angaleu keda ayuwara naka itunga, abu apugan naka Uganda kiner nuikamunitos ainapeta nuka aimat ajon. Akaulo naka ipegeta luipu, apotu eswamak kotuboto ebe ibusakinit aitikitik atiokisio nuelomunete kama ejaasi itunga luitolomete ajon.
lgg_prompt: Asi otiza ma e'yosi e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu rua ala be azini ageitema be ri ma dria, gamete Uganda niri 'ye e'yo nze e'yo ewa eyi ma ayuta ma dria. Agbatara ezu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba 'diyi 'du e'yo kini le 'ba ma 'du e'yo okporu 'diyi e'yo onzi ewa ma edeta azita palaa ku 'diyiniri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha magara n'obuhwezi bw'abantu,gavumenti ya Uganda ekagiraho okuhanuura aha nshonga y'okureeberera ebyokunywa ebirimu amaarwa. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga, abakuru bakasharamu ngu ebiragiro by'amaani bikaba nibyetengwa, okubaasa kurwanisa oburemeezi oburikuruga omu kukora amaarwa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance collaboration and efficiency among local residents, several initiatives were introduced. These programs aimed to engage individuals and foster a sense of shared responsibility.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkolagana n'obwangu mu batuuze b'omu kitundu, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo zaatandikibwawo. Pulogulaamu zino zaagenderera okwenyigiramu abantu ssekinnoomu n'okutumbula enneewulira y'obuvunaanyizibwa obw'awamu.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo ribe ki tic maber ikin lutedero, yub mapat-pat okati. Yub eni obedo ki miti me weko dano weng bedo ki ngec me tic kacel.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong aiswamanara ka aswam ejok kanejaas itunga luka atutubet, aponi kitegearai ainapeta nuipu. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai aisinyikokit itunga aimorikikin ka aimorikikin aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba e'do e'yo ndundu eyi. Otita 'diyi 'ba asi 'bazu 'ba yi ma eselea azini asi 'bazu e'yo yi 'yepi tualu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho okukwatanisa n'okukoragana kurungi omu batuuragye, enteekateeka nyingi zikatandikwaho. Puroguraamu ezi zikaba zigyendereire kureetaho enkoragana n'obujunaanizibwa.

eng_prompt: Excessive drinking can lead to dangerous behaviors and impaired judgment. As a result, the impact of alcohol consumption extends beyond the individual, affecting those around them.
lug_prompt: Okunywa ennyo kuyinza okuviirako okweyisa okw'obulabe n'okusalawo obubi. N'ekivuddemu, ebikosa okunywa omwenge bisukka ku muntu, bikosa abo abamwetoolodde.
ach_prompt: Mato kongo tutwal twero kelo tim maraco ki ngolo kop ma pe tye kakare. Macalo adwogi ne, adwogi me mato kongo pe oo I kom ngat acel acel, ento dano ma cok kwede bene ginongo peko.
teo_prompt: Aimat ajon noi epedori ayangaun iponesio luarokok keda aomisio nuarokok. Kanuka ngun, amamus na aimat ewaragi adepar itunganan, emunarete ngul luejaasi keda kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ewa mvuza badakaru ri eco fe 'ba eyini adriza onzi 'yezu azini e'yo egazu kililiru ku. E'yo 'disi, e'yo ewa mvuza ni 'diyi aga 'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi ra, eyi 'ba eyi ma agei 'diyi bii indi.
nyn_prompt: Okunywa amaarwa ekirenga nikibaasa kureeta emicwe y'akabi n'obutabaasa kucwamu kurungi. N'ekyarugiremu, oburemeezi bw'okunywa amarwa tiburikukwata aha muntu, burikukwata n'abo abarikwetorwaire.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing investigation, the authorities decided to handle the situation internally. As tensions rose, it became clear that outside intervention could complicate matters further.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okugenda mu maaso, ab'obuyinza baasalawo okukwasaganya embeera munda. Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti okuyingira mu nsonga okuva ebweru kuyinza okwongera okukaluubiriza ensonga.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kwed matye kawot anyim, lutela gumoko tamgi me tyeko lok eni kengi. I kare ma telle omedde, nen atyer kamaleng ni donyo pa lobo ma woko twero weko lokke doko tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos aingic na elosi akonye, apotu apedorosio koseutu aitemokin akirot ngin. Neapolor atiokisio, apotu kojenutu ebe ebuni akiro nuka akwapin nukokinga aitolitol akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ni mupi drile ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba eyi pe e'yo 'da ma aza ko eyi ma eselea. Erita ako ni turia, eri eca e'da kililiru kini e'yo amve 'diyi eco e'yo eyi ma aza ko ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okucondooza okurikugyenda omu maisho, ab'obushoborozi bakasharamu kukora aha nshonga egyo. Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire, kikarebeka butunu ngu okutaahamu kw'aheeru nikubaasa kwongyera kuteganisa enshonga.

eng_prompt: During the town hall meeting, community members expressed their concerns about rising alcohol-related incidents. In response, the councillor took the opportunity to address the issue head-on.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko lwa town hall, abantu b'ekitundu baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe olw'ebikolwa ebyekuusa ku mwenge okweyongera. Mu kwanukula, kansala yakozesezza omukisa okwogera ku nsonga eyo butereevu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke ma obedo i town hall, lwak me tedero gunyutu lworo gi i kom medde pa tim me mato kongo. Me gamo lapeny enoni, kancila otiyo ki kare man me lok I kom lok eni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naka etaun hall, apotu itunga luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu aiyatakin naka imusagon luka aimat ajon. Kanu abongokin, abu ekansulo kodum arerengu ngin aitemitem akirot ngin.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi town hall niri ma alea, 'ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo ewa mvuza ni tupi tutu 'diyi ma dria. Erini e'yo omvizu, kansila 'du drileba 'da e'yo nde ma aza kozu drinia drinia.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rwa town hall, abantu b'omukyanga boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire ahabw'okunywa amaarwa. Omu kugarukamu, kansala akakoresa omugisha ogwo kugamba aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have highlighted the alarming rise in substance abuse among young people. One of the most concerning trends is the increasing prevalence of alcoholism in this demographic.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti okukozesa ebiragalalagala kweyongedde nnyo mu bavubuka. Ekimu ku bikyasinze okweraliikiriza kwe kweyongera kw'obutamiivu mu bantu bano.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto medde pa nywaro tic ki yadi I kin bulu. Tyen lok acel ma kelo lworo madit tutwal obedo medde pa tim me mato kongo I kin lwak man.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit ebe iyata noi aimat na ikee kanejaas atumunak. Adiopet koboro lu epodokitos noi ngesi aimat ajon naepol noi kama ejaasi itunga kalu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo 'bani 'ba ode eyi ma eselea aro onzi 'diyi ayuzuri ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo azi asi otiza fepi tu 'diyi ma azi e'yo ewa mvuza ma omgbo ni tuzu 'ba 'di ma eselea ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka okweyongyera kw'okukozesa emibazi erikutokooza obwonko omu minyeeto. Kimwe aha bintu ebirikwerarikiriza munonga n'okunywa amaarwa omu bantu aba.

eng_prompt: In the small town, residents were reminded of the new regulations that had recently been put in place. To ensure compliance, local authorities decided to take a more active role in monitoring the situation.
lug_prompt: Mu kabuga akatono, abatuuze bajjukiziddwa amateeka amapya agaakateekebwawo gyebuvuddeko. Okukakasa okugobererwa, ab'obuyinza ku byalo baasalawo okwenyigira ennyo mu kulondoola embeera.
ach_prompt: I taun matidi, ki poyo wi lwak i kom cik manyen ma kiketo cokcok-ki. Me neno ni kiworo cik, lutela me tedero gumoko tam gi me bedo ki tic matek me neno ngo matye katime.
teo_prompt: Ko otaun lodidi aponi isiitikinai itunga ikisila luitetiak luitolomunitai pac. Kanu awanyun ebe etupitai ikisila, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet kiswamata ejok kanu aanyanar ejautene.
lgg_prompt: Tawuni werea 'da ma alea, 'ba ega 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi azita o'diru 'bani o'bale eturisi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'da ma vuti obizu, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu okporu e'yo 'da ma pamvu onezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu tawuni nkye, abatuuragye bakaijusibwa ebiragiro ebitsya ebyabaire bitairweho. Okureeba ngu ebiragiro nibikuratirwa, ab'obushoborozi ahabyaro bakacwamu kukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kureebuuza embeera.

eng_prompt: During the investigation, law enforcement seized several items from the suspect's premises. These items were deemed crucial for the ongoing case.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonyereza, abakuumaddembe baakwata ebintu bingi mu maka g'omutemu. Ebintu bino byalabiddwa ng'ebikulu mu musango ogugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kwed, abili gumako jami mapol ki I gang pa ngat ma kimako ni. Jami magi kineno calo gin ma pire tek tutwal I lok matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic, apotu ipolisin ikamasi iboro luipu kama ejai lo iwosatai. Aponi oyangarai iboro lu kwape lu epolok noi kanu emusago lo elosi akonye.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo vuti ondazurisi, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi obi afa karakara eyi engazu agu 'bani ega eza e'yo 'da ma joa. Ba 'du e'yo 'diyi orodriru kesi mupi drile ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu kucondooza, ab'eby'obutegyeki bakaboona ebintu bingi kuruga omu maka g'omusibe. Ebintu ebi bikareebwa nk'eby'omugasho omu mushango oguriyo nigugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In a society governed by laws, it is crucial to uphold the principles of justice and order. When individuals act outside the legal framework, chaos and injustice can ensue.
lug_prompt: Mu bantu abafugibwa amateeka, kikulu nnyo okunywerera ku misingi gy'obwenkanya n'obutebenkevu. Abantu bwe beeyisa mu ngeri etali mu mateeka, wabaawo obuvuyo n'obutali bwenkanya.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma cik aye doro, pire tek tutwal me gwoko cik me ber bedo ki ber bedo. Kace dano timo jami ma pe lube ki cik, kuku kuku ki ngolo kop alenga twero bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naeyait ikisila, ejok aidar ainapeta nuka etube loajokan ka ainapakina. Arai iswamaete itunga lu mam etupitos ikisila, epedorete amumu keda amamus na aipuga apugan alomun.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu azita palaa 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo liza kililiru azini kililiru 'diyi ma ta mbazu. Ba yi ka e'yo 'ye azita ma pala ku, ngiringiri azini e'yo liza kililiru ku 'diyi eco efu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu abarikutegyekwa ebiragiro, n'eky'omugasho okugumizamu n'emitindo y'oburingaaniza n'obutereera. Abantu ku barikukora ebitarikuhikaana n'ebiragiro, hakabaho akavuyo n'obutari buringaaniza.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation, the authorities have gathered enough evidence to proceed with the case. As a result, the accused will be taken to the courts of law.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo, ab'obuyinza bakungaanyizza obujulizi obumala okugenda mu maaso n'omusango. N'ekinaavaamu, abavunaanibwa bajja kutwalibwa mu mbuga z'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut, lutela gu nongo caden ma oromo me mede anyim ki lok ne. Macalo adwogi ne, ngat ma ki keto bal iwiye ni kibitere I nyim kot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok, adumutu apedorosio ajenanut naedolit kanu ainyikokin keda emusago ngol. Kanuka ngun, eponio ayangar lo iwosatai adieket.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, drice'ba eyi tra e'yo ecopi e'dapi kini e'yo nde 'ye ra 'diyi ma omgbo ca ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga agu 'bani to 'da ji kotia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi, ab'obushoborozi, batungire obujurizi burikumara, okugyenda omu maisho n'omushango. Ekyarugiremu, orikujunaanwa naija kutwarwa omu kooti z'ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: The community faced numerous challenges, including high unemployment rates and inadequate access to essential services. As a result, local leaders recognized the urgent need for comprehensive reforms.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kyayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa kungi omuli ebbula ly'emirimu n'obutafuna buweereza bumala. N'ekyavaamu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baalaba obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'enkyukakyuka ez'omuggundu.
ach_prompt: Lwak ne gunongo peko mapol, ma I kingi obedo bedo peke pa tic ki peko me nongo kony ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me tedero guniang ni aloka-loka mapol tye kamitte.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga odumutu atiokisio nuipu, aimoriarit amamus na aswamisinei keda amamus na adumunun aijanakino. Kanuka ngun, apotu engarenok luka atutubena kojenutu eipud loka aijulanakineta.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da esu e'yo ewaru karakara eyi tualu azi ako ma omgbo angiri tualu azakoma fele o'bi eyini 'diyi ma esuta kililiru ku 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo 'bani lezu ojata eyi 'yezu mbeleru ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu bakashanga oburemeezi bwingi, otwariiremu eibura ry'emirimo n'obutabaasa kuhikwaho obuheereza bw'omugasho. N'ekyarugiremu, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakareeba ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'empinduka.

eng_prompt: Each region has its own set of regulations tailored to local needs. As a result, the implementation of these rules varies significantly across the state.
lug_prompt: Buli kitundu kirina amateeka gaakyo agakwatagana n'ebyetaago by'ekitundu. N'ekivuddemu, okussa amateeka gano mu nkola kwawukana nnyo mu buli ssaza.
ach_prompt: But lobo acel-acel tye ki cik meggi ma lubbe ki miti gi. Macalo adwogi ne, keto cik magi itic pat-pat I lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Ngin aiboisit ejaas keda ikisila ke lu itodolikinete ipudesia luka atutubet. Kanuka ngun, egelegela noi epone loka aitodolikin ikisila lu kotoma akwapin kere.
lgg_prompt: Angu dria eyi ma azita eyi ma ngulupi si 'bani eyi edele e'yo angu eyini le 'diyi ma alea 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, geri 'bani azita 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alia 'diyi co esele kari dria ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Buri kyanga kiine ebiragiro byakyo ebirikuhikaana n'ebyetaago by'ekyanga. N'ekyarugiremu, okuta ebiragiro ebi omu nkora nikitaana munonga okwetoroora eihanga.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising in the region as resources become scarce and competition for land intensifies. Many locals fear that the influx of new arrivals will disrupt their way of life and lead to conflict.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu ng'ebikozesebwa bikendeera n'okuvuganya ku ttaka kweyongera. Abatuuze bangi batya nti okuyingira kw'abapya kujja kutaataaganya obulamu bwabwe era kuleetewo obukuubagano.
ach_prompt: Lworo tye ka mede I but lobo man pien lonyo me lobo tye ka doko nok dok pyem me ngom bene tye ka mede. Lutedero mapol tye ki lworo ni wel dano mapol matye kabino obalo kwo gi dok bikelo lweny.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotoma aiboisit kangin naarai ikidioko iboro lu akwap ido iyata abolobol naka alupok. Ekuriaka itunga luipu ebe epote itunga luitetiak aibil aijar kec kosodete ayangaun ingungeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi omiza ni 'diyi e'bi tu angu 'di ma alea e'yo lonyi eyini aa'zu 'diyi ni ecazu weresi azini baka seza nyaku ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tuzu. Ba angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi 'ye urisi kini 'ba emupi o'diru 'diyi ma omgbo ni nga eyi ma edri eza ra dika eri nga e'yo eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu kyanga ahabwokuba eby'obugaiga nibikye kandi n'okuhayahayana ahabw'eitaka kweyongyeire. Abatuuragye baingi nibatiina ngu okweyongyera kw'abantu abasya, nikwija kurabanisamu emituurire yaabo kandi kireete entaro.

eng_prompt: After a long day of hiking, we finally reached our destination. The camp lies north of the district.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okutambula olugendo oluwanvu olunaku lwonna, twatuuka gye twali tugenda. Enkambi eri mu bukiikakkono bwa disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Ingee wot pi nino malac tutwal, wa oo kama wacito iye. Kem ne tye tung kumalo me dicitrwik.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka alosit apaaran naepol noi, apotu sio adolutu ne alosit. Ejai ekabi nyakoi nako disitrikt.
lgg_prompt: O'du ezu angu tuzu 'bori ma vutia, ama ca asizu angu amani muzu ri ma alia ra. Kembe 'da distrikiti ma woko oruleru ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutambura eizooba riringwa, tukahika ahu twabaire nituza. Enkambi eri omu matemba ga disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing humanitarian crisis, local organizations launched a fundraising campaign. Their efforts have garnered significant community support and donations.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'obuntubulamu ekigenda kyeyongera, ebitongole by'omu kitundu byatandikawo kaweefube w'okusonda ssente. Kaweefube waabwe afunye obuyambi n'obuyambi bungi okuva mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me konyo dano matye kamede, dul mapat-pat me tedero gucako yub me jogo cente. Tute gi okelo kony ki kony ma dwong ki bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu itunga, apotu iriongeta luka atutubet kogeutu aituk ikapun. Apotu aswam kec odumutu agangat keda agangat kama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo 'ba eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu, amuti angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do otuta robia trazu ri ni. Okpo eyini 'ba 'diyi esu atita ongulumu eyini ri tualu feta eyini fe 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu obweyongyeire,ebitongore by'omubyaro bitandikireho ehururu y'okushorooza esente. Amaani gaabo gatungire obuhwezi n'obuhwezi bwingi kuruga omu bantu.

eng_prompt: Many communities across the country are experiencing demographic changes. As a result, some districts unknowingly host refugees.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi okwetooloola eggwanga birimu enkyukakyuka mu bungi bw'abantu. N'ekivuddemu, disitulikiti ezimu zikyaza abanoonyiboobubudamu nga tezimanyi.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol I but lobo man tye kanongo alokaloka I kom wel dano. Macalo adwogi ne, districts mukene gwoko luring ayela labongo ngec.
teo_prompt: Atekerin nuipu kakwap kere ejaas keda aijulanakineta nuka itunga. Kanuka ngun, ijaunitos idisitriktan ice ikerai komam ejenete.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ojata o'bi eyi ma kalafe ni 'diyi esu. E'yo 'disi, distrikiti azi 'diyi angu fe emunyale eyini ani kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga bingi okwetorora eihanga nibibonabona omu mpindahinduka y'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, disiturikiti ezimwe niziakiira empungi zitarikumanya.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for youth programs, local leaders have decided to organize a fundraising initiative. This effort aims to enhance the quality and accessibility of summer camps for children in the area.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'enteekateeka z'abavubuka, abakulembeze b'ebyalo basazeewo okutegeka enteekateeka y'okusonda ssente. Kaweefube ono agenderera kutumbula omutindo n'okufunibwa kw'enkambi z'abaana mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa yub pa bulu, lutela me tedero gumoko tam gi me yubu yub me jogo cente. Yub man tye me medo rwom ki yoo me nongo camp pa lutino ma ikabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka ainapeta nuka atumunak, aseutu engarenok luka atutubet aitemokin aituk ikapun. Alosikinet naka aswam ngun erai aitojokar adoketait naka aiboisio nuka idwe luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu otita 'ba ode eyini 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo robia trazu ri otuzu. E'yo 'di lezu anzi nyiri angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aa angu ndundu eyi ma alea sa'wa driasiri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bwa puroguraamu z'eminyeeto, abebembezi b'ebyaro bashaziremu kutebekanisa enteekateeka y'okushorooza esente. Omurimo ogu nigugyenderera okwongyera aha mutindo n'okushangwa kw'emyanya y'okushemererwamu abaana omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In a tense meeting, the officials debated the best course of action regarding the detained individuals. After much discussion, a directive was issued to release those held in police custody.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko olwaliko obunkenke, abakungu baakubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okukwatamu abantu abaasibirwa. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, ekiragiro kyafulumizibwa okuyimbula abo abaali mu kaduukulu ka poliisi.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma obedo ki lworo madit tutwal, lutic ne guloko i kom ngo ma omyero gitim malube ki jo ma kimakogi. Ingee nywako lok mapol, kimiyo cik me gonyo jo ma onongo gitye I buc pa abili.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet naetiono noi, apotu eswamak kitetemoto nu ebeit aswam kanuikamunitos itunga lu ikamaritai. Akaulo naka aineranara noi, aponi koinakinai aicoreta kanu alacakin ngul lu ikamaritai polis.
lgg_prompt: Dri fuza okporu ni ma alia, azi'ba 'da eyi agbatara gba e'yo eyini eco 'ye 'ba arujoa 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria. E'yo onzeza angiri ma vutia, 'ba fe azita 'ba 'bani obile polisia 'diyi ofuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko orwabaire rurimu obwimukiriro, abakuru bakahanuura aha ky'okukora aha bantu abari omu kihome. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga, ekiragiro kikaheebwa kurekura abari omu kaduukuru ka pooriisi.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the financial records, the auditors found several discrepancies in the reported transactions. When questioned about the missing funds, the individuals involved insisted on their innocence.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebiwandiiko by'ebyensimbi, ababalirizi b'ebitabo baasanze obutakkaanya bungi mu byobusuubuzi ebyaloopebwa. Bwe baabuuzibwa ku ssente ezaali zibuze, abantu beenyigiddemu baagamba nti tebalina musango.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo rekod me lim, joo ma ngiyo kor tic ki lim gunongo jami ma pe tye kakare. I kare ma kipenyo gi i kom cente ma orweny, joo ma otimo bal ne guwaco ni gi peke ki bal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun, apotu engican kodumutu amamus acamanar kotoma akiro ngun. Neingitingitai kesi nuikamunitos ikapun luemamete, apotu ngul luetiroritos kotemasi ebe amamete kesi keda aibucaret.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma ale andri'baa 'diyi esu e'yo yi ma eselea 'diyi karakara. Ba ka e'yo ozi robia avipi 'da ma dria, 'ba e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi si asi kini eyi e'yo kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebihandiiko by'esente, ababazi b'ebitabo bakashanga ebitarikuhikaana omu bihandiiko. Ku baabuuriziibwe ebirikukwata aha sente ezabuzire, abantu abaabaire bejumbiremu bakagira ngu tibaine rubanja.

eng_prompt: In the heart of the city, a new community has begun to take shape. Many families have found temporary shelter in the area, seeking safety and stability.
lug_prompt: Mu kibuga wakati, ekitundu ekipya kitandise okukulaakulana. Amaka mangi gafunye aw'okusula mu kitundu, nga ganoonya obukuumi n'obutebenkevu.
ach_prompt: I cwiny city, kabedo manyen ocako dongo. Gangi mapol gunongo kabedo pi tutunu I kabedo eni, kun giyenyo gwok ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Kokiding na esite, ageun aitolomun aiboisit naitetet. Apotu ikalia luipu odumutu neperot kotoma aiboisit kangin, aimo ayuwara keda ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: Aku ambu cityniri ma agadria, ongulumu azi o'dini e'do e'do i e'do 'bo. Familia karakara eyi esu angu aa'zu sa'wa were si angu 'da ma alea, ageitema azini asianzu ndazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu mutima gw'orurembo, abantu basya batandikire kukora. Amaka maingi gatungire oburaaro obw'akanya kakye omu kyanga, barikuronda oburinzi n'obutebekana.

eng_prompt: As the fog rolled in and the old buildings creaked in the wind, whispers of the town's haunted past began to circulate among the locals. Legends of its sudden abandonment fueled speculation and intrigue, leading to a chilling conclusion.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuzira gukulukuta n'ebizimbe ebikadde ne biwuuma mu mpewo, okuwuuma kw'ebyafaayo by'ekibuga kyatandika okutambula mu bantu b'omu kitundu. Engero z'okusuulibwa kwayo okw'amangu zaaleetawo okuteebereza n'obukuusa, ekiviiriddeko okukomekkerezebwa okw'entiisa.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma wii col omede ki gedo ma otii ma owinye ki yamo, lok me woo I kom jami ma otime I kare macon me boma ne ocako wot I kin lutedero. Ododo me weko ne oyot oyot okelo byek mapat-pat ma okelo agiki marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape abu ekwam kibiror keda adukena nuemojongito kotoma ekwam, apotu akiro nuikamunitos apakio nuarokok nuka etaun kogeutu alosit kanejaas itunga luka atutubet. Akiro nuikamunitos aibiror ke katipet abu koyangau aomisio ka aomisio, ido abu koyangau angetakinet naetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo ni ecaria azini jo oku 'diyi ni ecaria oli ma alia, o'duko e'yo tawuni 'da ma ewu agapi 'bo 'diyi ma dria 'diyi e'do aci 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'bani e'yo 'bani eri adizu mbeleru ri ma dria 'diyi fe 'bani egazu e'yo azini e'yo onzi 'yezu 'diyi ma omgbo ra, e'yo 'dani fezu e'yo asizu onzi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omwirima ku gwatandikire kwija, n'ebyombeko ebikuru biketomboitwa omu muyaga, okuhuhurira ebyabaireho omu tawuni kukatandika kutambura omu bantu b'omubyaro. Engano z'okurekurwaho ahonaaho, zikareetaho okuteebereza n'okwerinda, ekyarugiremu okuhendera okurikutangaaza.

eng_prompt: As the number of displaced individuals continues to rise, the need for adequate resources becomes increasingly urgent. One of the most critical necessities is access to clean and safe drinking water.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu abasenguddwa gweyongera okulinnya, obwetaavu bw'ebikozesebwa ebimala bweyongera okuba obw'amangu. Ekimu ku byetaago ebikulu kwe kufuna amazzi amayonjo era amayonjo ag'okunywa.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano ma orwenyo gangi gi tye ka medde ameda, miti me nongo jami ma oromo tye kamede ameda. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal en aye nongo pii maleng me amata.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luekotosi aibwot, ejai eipud loka iboro luedolitos noi. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi ngesi adumun akipi nu elaete nu aimat.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba angu kokoru 'diyiniri ni mu drile turia, le 'ba ma fe afa ayuzaru 'diyi drile. Afa azi orodriru tu 'diyi ma azi yi mvuza ala azini kililiru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abantu abarikuruga omu maka gaabo niguguma nigweyongyera, ekyetengo ky'ebintu ebirikumara nikyeyongyera. Kimwe aha bintu ebirikwetengwa munonga n'okutunga amaizi marungi g'okunywa.

eng_prompt: In a collaborative effort to expand the community park, local officials reached out to nearby areas for support. As a result of these discussions, the land was provided by the neighboring districts.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube ow'awamu ow'okugaziya ppaaka y'ekitundu, abakungu b'ekitundu baatuukirira ebitundu ebiriraanyeewo okufuna obuyambi. Olw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo kuno, ettaka lyaweebwayo disitulikiti eziriraanyeewo.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero gucito I kabedo matye cok me nongo kony pi yub me dongo kabedo me gwoko lee pa lwak. Macalo adwogi me nywako lok eni, dictrikma orumuwa aye gumiyo ngom eni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam na aimorikikina kanu aitanyanyar aiboisit naidarere itiang, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kodolokisi aiboisio nu idunyare kanu agangat. Kanuka ipegeta lu, apotu idisitriktan lu idunyare ijaikisi alupok ngun.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba tualu lezu angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ca angu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea atita esuzu. E'yo o'yoza 'diyi ma vutia, distrikiti jo ejele ru 'diyi fe nyaku 'da ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkwatanisa y'okushanjuura paaka y'ekyaro, abakuru bakahika omu myanya eyabaherereire kutunga obuhwezi. Ahabw'okuhanuura,eitaka rikaheebwa disiturikiti ezituherereire.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, it is essential for nations to extend their support to those in need. Providing assistance to refugees not only upholds humanitarian values but also fosters stability and integration within communities.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, kyetaagisa amawanga okuwa obuyambi bwago eri abo abali mu bwetaavu. Okuwa abanoonyiboobubudamu obuyambi tekikoma ku kutumbula mpisa za buntu naye era kireetawo obutebenkevu n'okwegatta mu bitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal ni lobo mapat-pat omyero gumi kony bot lupeko. Miyo kony ki luring ayela pe konyo me gwoko ber bedo pa dano keken ento bene kelo kuc ki ribbe ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka atiokisio, ejokuka akwapin aijukar agangat kec mama ejaasi ngul luipudasi. Aijaikin agangat nejaas ikerai mam itopolori itunga bon konye eyangauni ainapakina keda aimorikikina kotoma atutubena.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, eri orodriru kari eyini atita eyini ri fezu 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi dri. Azakoma feza emunyale eyini ri ni lu e'yo o'bi eyini 'diyi ma ta mbazu ku te eri vini asianzu eji tualu ongulumu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, ni kikuru amahanga kuheereza obuhwezi bwago abo abarikwetenga obuhwezi. Okuheereza empungi obuhwezi tikirikukoma aha kuhwera abantu, kureka nikureetaho obucureera n'okukwatanisa omu bantu.

eng_prompt: After receiving reports of unusual activity in the area, the authorities decided to investigate further. They reached out to local officials to verify the information.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna alipoota z'emirimu egitali gya bulijjo mu kitundu, ab'obuyinza baasalawo okwongera okunoonyereza. Baatuukirira abakungu b'ekitundu okukakasa amawulire.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo adwogi tic mapat-pat I kabedo eni, lutela gumoko tamgi me mede ki kwedo lok. Gu lok ki lutic me tedero me niang lok eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun iripotan luka aswamisio nu mam etapit kotoma aiboisit kangin, apotu apedorosio koseutu aingic akiro ngun. Apotu kesi odolokisi eswamak luka atutubet kanu aanyun abeit akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: O'duko esuzu e'yo 'yeta ndundu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo eti ondazu drile. Eyi eci eyi azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie e'yo 'da ma eti e'dazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okutunga ripoota z'emirimo etari ya buriijo omu mwanya, ab'obushoborozi bakasharamu kwongyera kucondooza. Bakahika aha bakuru b'ebyaro kuhamya amakuru ago.

eng_prompt: As the sun began to set, casting eerie shadows across the landscape, the group approached what they thought was an abandoned site. Whispers of supernatural tales had circulated, but the reality was far more complex.
lug_prompt: Omusana bwe gwatandika okugwa, nga gussa ebisiikirize eby'entiisa mu ttaka, ekibinja kyasemberera kye baalowooza nti kifo ekisuuliddwa. Okuwuubaala kw'enfumo z'obwengula kwali kusaasaanye, naye amazima gaali mazibu nnyo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, kun keto tipo mapat-pat mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat, gurup ne cok ki kama gutamo ni obedo kabedo ma kiweko woko. Lok angeya me ododo me teko ma kato pa cwec ma orumuwa obedo ka wot, ento lok ada obedo tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neageuna akolong aibiror, aipikakin aanyunet naepol noi kotoma aiboisit, apotu egurupu kolomutu newomitotor kesi ebe erai aiboisit naemamiatatar itunga. Apotu akiro nuikamunitos akiro nuikamunitos iboro luitegelikina kiswamata, konye akiro nukabeit nuikamunitos iboro luitegelikina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo etuka ni e'doria e'doria, angu ndundu eyi ma dria, ongulumu 'da eyi emu angu eyini egale aa'zu angu 'bani ku 'da ma alea. E'yo o'yoza e'yo onzi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi aci 'bo, te e'yo a'da ri ndra ewaru ndeni.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwatandikire kurenga, gukabiika ebisiikirize omu mwanya, guruupu ekahika aha mwanya ogu baabaire nibateekateeka ngu gwatsigirweho. Orugambo rw'enfumu z'eby'obuhangwa zikaba zitambwire, kwonka amazima gakaba gari maingi munonga.

eng_prompt: After enduring months of hardship and uncertainty, the refugees gathered to voice their concerns. They shared stories of their struggles and the dire conditions they faced in the camps.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okugumira emyezi egy'obuzibu n'obutali bukakafu, abanoonyiboobubudamu baakuŋŋaana okwogera ebibaluma. Baagabana emboozi z'entalo zaabwe n'embeera embi ze baasanga mu nkambi.
ach_prompt: Inge tyeko dwe mapol me can ki peko, luring ayela gucokke kacel me tito peko gi. Gunywako lok I kom peko gi ki kwo marac ma gunongo I kem.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka angirikin ilapio luka atiokisio keda amamus ajenanut, apotu ikerai kotukokinos einer nuikamunitos aiyalongongokec. Apotu kesi kinerata akiro nuikamunitos ationis kec keda ejautene loaronon loetereikina keda kesi ko okabin.
lgg_prompt: Mba e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma ti ta mbazu 'bori ma vutia, emunyale eyi tra eyi e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi oluzu. Eyi nze o'duko e'yo eyini esu 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo onzi eyini esu kembe eyi ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okugumisiriza emyezi y'oburemeezi n'obutetegyerezibwa, empungi zikateeranira hamwe kugamba ebirikuziberarikiriza. Bakabagana ebirikukwata aha ntaro zaabo hamwe n'embeera mbi ezibatungire omu kampu.

eng_prompt: Many communities in the region are struggling to meet their basic needs. As a result, their priorities have shifted significantly.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi mu kitundu birwana nnyo okutuukiriza ebyetaago byabwe ebikulu. N'ekivuddemu, ebintu bye bakulembeza bikyuse nnyo.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol I but piny eni tye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, jami ma pigi tego I kwogi olokke tutwal.
teo_prompt: Atekerin nuipu kotoma atutubet ngin eutasi aitodolikin ipudesia kec. Kanuka ngun, ejulakinos noi iboro luingarenitos kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri ci afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, e'yo yini okporu 'diyi oja yi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga bingi omu kyanga nibirwana kumaraho ebyetengo byabyo. N'ekyarugiremu, ebibarikutwara nka bikuru bihindukire munonga.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming summer program, the camp coordinators held a meeting to discuss resource requirements. They outlined the necessary supplies and support needed to ensure a successful experience for all participants.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera pulogulaamu y'omusana ogujja, abakwanaganya enkambi baatuuzizza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku byetaago by'ebikozesebwa. Baalaze ebintu ebyetaagisa n'obuyambi obwetaagisa okulaba nga bonna abeetabye mu mpaka zino bafuna obuwanguzi.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi yub me kare me oro matye kabino ni, ludor wi camp gubedo ki kacoke me nywako tam i kom jami ma mite. Gunyuto jami ma mite ki kony ma mite me neno ni dano weng ma obedo tye I yub eni gunongo adwogi maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin ainapeta nuka elap lo ebunit, apotu engarenok luka ikabin iriamunos kanu aitemitem iboro lu ekotos. Apotu kesi kitetemoto iboro ka agangat na ekotoi kanu awanyun ebe iswamaete ngun ejok.
lgg_prompt: Otuta otita eli drile ri ni emuzu ri ma alia, 'ba kembe eyi ma dricepi 'diyi 'ye mitingi e'yo nzezu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria. Eyi ece e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi azini atita 'bani lele 'diyi nezu ra kini 'ba dria fi'ba 'diyi esu drile suza ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera puroguraamu erikwija, abarikukurira kampu bakakora orukiiko, okuhanuura ahabyetaago by'abantu. Bakashoborora ebintu ebirikwetengwa hamwe n'obuhwezi oburikwetengwa okureeba ngu boona abeejumbiremu batunga obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: The government has announced plans to accommodate an influx of refugees, but logistical challenges remain. As officials work to finalize arrangements, many are left in limbo regarding their immediate future.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka z'okusenza abanoonyiboobubudamu abayingira mu ggwanga, naye okusoomoozebwa kukyaliwo. Nga abakungu bakola okumaliriza enteekateeka, bangi balekeddwa mu buzibu ku bikwata ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Gamente otito yub me jolo luring ayela mapol matye kabino, ento peko mapol pud tye. I kare ma lutic tye ka tic me tyeko yub, dano mapol pud tye ki akala-kala I kom anyimgi.
teo_prompt: Alimo apugan aitemonokineta nuka aidar ikerai luipu, konye erongo ainingosia. Kwape iswamaete eswamak kanu angetakin ainapeta, mam itunga luipu ejenete nuikamunitos ingaren kec.
lgg_prompt: Gamete azi otita emunyale eyini emupi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma tambazu 'bo, te e'yo ewaru eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi nga po'di ci. Azi'ba yini azi ngazu otita yi dezu 'boria, 'ba karakara yi awi e'yo yi ma ewu drialeri ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka y'okureeberera empungi, kwonka oburemeezi bukiriho. Nk'oku abakungu barikukoresa amaani okuhendera enteekateeka, baingi bakasigara batarikumanya ebiro byabo by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, effective leadership becomes crucial for maintaining order and support among displaced populations. The challenges faced by refugees require strong guidance to foster a sense of community and belonging.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, obukulembeze obulungi buba bwa mugaso nnyo mu kukuuma emirembe n'obuyambi mu bantu ababundabunda. Okusoomoozebwa abanoonyiboobubudamu kwe boolekaganye nakwo kwetaaga okulambikibwa okunywevu okutumbula enneewulira y'okukwatagana n'okubeera awamu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, tela maber pire tek tutwal me gwoko kuc ki kony ikin joo ma orwenyo gangi gi. Peko ma luring ayella nongo omyero ki mi itgi tira ma ber wek gubed ki cwiny me ribbe ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka atiokisio, erai engarenone loajokan ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar ainapakina keda agangat kanejaas itunga luekotosi aibwot. Atiokisio nu itereikina keda ikerai ekotosi aicoreta nu egogong kanu aitopolorite aomisio nuka itunga ka aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, driceza kililiru ri eca orodriru e'yo otuza ni azini atita fezu 'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo ewaru emunyale eyini esu 'diyi le imbata okporu eyini ani aa'zu ongulumu eyi ma alea azini aa'zu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, obwebembezi burungi n'obw'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obusingye n'obuhwezi omu bantu ababingirwe omu maka gaabo. Oburemeezi obu empungi zirikurabamu nibetenga obuhabuzi bw'amaani okubaasa kureetaho enkoragana n'obumwe omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent influx of displaced individuals, it is crucial to address their immediate needs. To ensure adequate support and resources, a budget should be established to cater for the refugees.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kuyingira kw'abantu abaasengulwa gye buvuddeko, kikulu nnyo okukola ku byetaago byabwe eby'amangu. Okukakasa obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa ebimala, embalirira erina okuteekebwawo okulabirira abanoonyiboobubudamu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki wel dano ma orwenyo gangi gi cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal me cobo miti gi. Me neno ni kimiyo kony ki jami ma oromo, omyero ki ket byek lim pi luring ayela.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo alomunor itunga luipu noi, ejokuna noi aitemokin ipudesia kec. Kanu aanyun ebe ejaas agangat keda iboro luedolitos, ekot aitolomun ebajet kanu ikerai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ma emuta ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo 'yezu e'yo eyini le mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu. Atita azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, le 'ba ma o'ba otita ajeni 'ba emunyale eyini 'diyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu abantu baingi batwirwe omu myanya yaabo, ni kikuru kukora ahabyetengo byabo. Okureeba ngu hariho obuhwezi n'ebintu ebirikumara, hashemereire kubaho embaririra y'empungi.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising among the staff ever since the last team meeting. Disagreements over the camp's direction have created a rift between the leaders.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu bakozi okuva mu lukiiko lwa ttiimu olwasembayo. Obutakkaanya ku bukulembeze bw'enkambi buviiriddeko enjawukana mu bakulembeze.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede ikin lutic nicake I kacoke me team ma okato. Telo tol ikin lutela okelo apoka poka ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kiding eswamak ageun airiamunet nawasia naka etimu. Amamus acamanara kanu aingarenikinio naka ekaabi ayangau atiakatiaka kiding engarenok.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'bi tu azi'ba eyi ma eselea e'dozu mitingi amuti ni asizu ri ma alea. Erita ako driceza kembe niri ma dria ri fe esele coza drice'ba eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu bakozi kuruga omu rukiiko rwa tiimu orwahwaire. Obutaikirizana ahaby'obwebembezi bw'empungi, kireesireho okwebaganisamu ahagati yaabo.

eng_prompt: After weeks of living in overcrowded conditions, the refugees gathered to discuss their needs and concerns. They expressed their frustrations about the limited space and resources available to them.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga babeera mu mbeera ez'omujjuzo, abanoonyiboobubudamu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku byetaago byabwe n'ebibaluma. Baalaga obwennyamivu bwabwe olw'ekifo n'ebikozesebwa ebitono bye balina.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me bedo I kabedo ma dano dwong iye, luring ayela gucokke me nywako lok I kom miti gi ki peko gi. Gunyutu cwer cwinygi pi kabedo ki jami ma gitye kwede matye manok.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aiboi isabitin luipu kotoma ojautene loepol noi, apotu ikerai kotukokinos kanu aitemitem ipudesia kec keda aiyalongongokec. Apotu kesi itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu aiboisit keda iboro lu ikidioko lu ejaas kesi.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani aa'zu 'ba eyi ma omgbo angirisi 'bori ma vutia, emunyale eyi tra eyi e'yo nzezu e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma dria. Eyi e'da e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma kalafe si tualu afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie ri si.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okutuura omu bantu baingi munonga, empungi zikateeranira hamwe kuhanuura ahabyetengo byazo n'ebibarikuteekateekaho. Bakoreka okwetomboitwa kwabo ahabw'omwanya mukye n'ebintu bikye ebibaine.

eng_prompt: In order to foster a more collaborative environment, it is essential for each district to develop effective conflict resolution strategies. By addressing issues within their own teams, they can promote unity and strengthen their community ties.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula embeera y'okukwatagana, kya mugaso nnyo eri buli disitulikiti okukola enkola ennungi ez'okugonjoola obukuubagano. Nga bakola ku nsonga mu ttiimu zaabwe, basobola okutumbula obumu n'okunyweza enkolagana yaabwe mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Me kelo ribbe ikin lwak, pire tek tutwal ni dictrwik omyero gubed ki yoo me cobo peko matye. Ka gitiyo I kom peko matye ikin dul gi, gi twero kelo ribe ki jingo wat ikin lwak gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aimorikikina, ejokuna noi kangol edisitrikt aitolomun iwaitin lu itemonokinet ingungeta. Kowai lo aitemokin atiokisio nuka itimun kec, epedorete kesi aitopolor aimorikikina ka aitogogong eidicane lo atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo ti icita ni ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru distrikiti dria eyini geri kililiru eyini ecozu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi e'dozu. E'yo eyi ma aza kozu amuti eyivile 'diyi ma alea risi, eyi eco ti ecita eji dika eyi ma eselea 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea ra.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kureetaho okukwatanisa, buri disiturikiti eshemereire kugira oburyo burungi bw'okumaraho entongane. Kubarikutereeza enshonga omu tiimu zaabo, nibabaasa kureetaho okukwatanisa n'okwongyera amaani omu bantu baabo.

eng_prompt: In any thriving community, effective governance is essential for maintaining harmony. As such, the leaders are tasked with addressing and resolving conflicts that arise among residents.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyonna ekikulaakulana, obukulembeze obulungi bwa mugaso mu kukuuma obumu. N'olw'ekyo, abakulembeze baweebwa omulimu gw'okukola n'okugonjoola obukuubagano obuva mu batuuze.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken matye ka dongo, tela maber pire tek tutwal me gwoko kuc. Pi meno, kimiyo tic ki lutela me tyeko lweny matye ikin lutedero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naepol noi, erai epugae loajokan ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar aimorikikina. Kwape kwape kangun, ijaikitai engarenok aswam naka aitemokin ka aitemokin ingungeta luebeit ajaun kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu dria drile suzaru 'diyi ma alea, driceza muke ri eri orodriru aa'ta tualu ri ma tambazu. Ekile 'dile, drice'ba eyi ma azi e'yo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka kyona ekirikutunguuka,obwebembezi burungi n'obw'omugasho ahabw'okurinda okukwatanisa. N'ahabw'ekyo, abeebembezi nibaheebwa omurimo gw'okukora aha ntongane ezirikubaho omu batuuragye.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been escalating between the two districts, leading to misunderstandings and conflicts. In order to move forward and foster a collaborative environment, it's essential for both sides to find common ground.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera wakati wa disitulikiti ebbiri, ekiviiriddeko obutategeeragana n'obukuubagano. Okusobola okugenda mu maaso n'okutumbula embeera y'okukwatagana, kya mugaso eri enjuyi zombi okufuna ekintu kye zikkiriziganyaako.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede ikin districts aryo egoni, ma okelo telle ki lweny. Me medde anyim ki dongo ribbe, pire tek tutwal pi dul aryo weng me nongo yoo me winye.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kiding idisitriktan iyarei, eyangauni amamus acamanar keda ingungeta. Kanu alosit ngaren ka aitopolor aiswamanara, ejokuna noi aiboisio kere aimorikikin.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'bi tu distrikiti iri 'diyi ma eselea drile erita ako azini ngiringiri ejipi. Aa'zu drile azini aa'ta tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu, eri orodriru kala iri 'diyi ni e'yo otuzu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera ahagati ya disiturikiti ibiri, ekirikureetaho obutetegyerezana n'obutaikirizana. Kubaasa kugyenda omu maisho n'okureetaho okukwatanisa,n'eky'omugasho ngu enjuyi zombi zisherure enshonga ezirikukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising among the community members for weeks, as each group felt their needs were being overlooked. As discussions progressed, it became clear that the allocation of resources was a major point of contention.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu bantu b'ekitundu okumala wiiki eziwera, nga buli kibinja kiwulira nga ebyetaago byabwe bibuusibwa amaaso. Nga okukubaganya ebirowoozo kugenda mu maaso, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti engabanya y'ebikozesebwa yali nsonga nkulu ey'obutakkaanya.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede ikin lwak pi cabit mapol, pien dul acel-acel otamo ni miti gi tye ka keng. I kare ma nywako lok omedde, nen atyer kamaleng ni poko lim obedo peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apolor aiyalongong kanejaas itunga luka atutubet kanu isabitin luipu, naarai apupi ngin egurupu ebe mam epalunitai ipudesia kec. Neautar ipegeta alosit, apotu kojenutu ebe aikor iboro arai ationis naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi e'bi tu 'ba ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea sabiti eyi ma alea, ekile ongulumu alu ni egazu kini 'ba adi e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo onzeza ni mu drile, eri eca e'dazaru kini e'yo lonyi awazu ri eri e'yo okporu agata gazaniri'i.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu bantu b'omukyanga kumara esande, ahabw'okugira ngu buri guruupu ekaba neehurira ngu ebyetengo byaabo tibirikuheebwa kitiinisa. Okuhanuura ku kwagyendeire omu maisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu okugaba eby'obugaiga kikaba enshonga nkuru y'obutaikirizana.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising among the districts for months, as many felt their needs were being overlooked by the central authority. In a surprising turn of events, one of the districts broke out of the established union.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu disitulikiti okumala emyezi, nga bangi bawulira nga ebyetaago byabwe bibuusibwa amaaso ab'obuyinza. Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, emu ku disitulikiti yava mu mukago ogwatandikibwawo.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede ikin districts pi dwe mapol, kit ma pol giwinyo kwede ni gamente tye ka cayo miti gi. I aloka-loka ma obedo ki ngeng tutwal, districts acel oa woko ki I dul enoni.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kiding idisitriktan kanu ilapio, naarai apotu itunga luipu opupoto ebe mam apedorosio nuka apolon epalunitos ipudesia kec. Koipone kalo itegelikina, abu ediopet kotoma odisitriktan konyou kotoma aimorikikina kangin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi e'bi tu distrikiti eyi ma eselea imba karakara eyisi, ekile 'ba karakara eyi egazu kini driceza kari 'di ma alea ri adi e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma dria ku. E'yo azi osutaru ni ma alia, distrikiti alu fu ti ecita 'bani e'do 'da ma aliarisi amve.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu disiturikiti kumara ameezi, ahabw'okugira ngu baingi bakaba nibateekateeka ngu ebyetengo byabo tibirikuhindurwa ab'obushoborozi abakuru. Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, disiturikiti emwe ekaruga omu mukago ogwabaire gutandikirweho.

eng_prompt: Recent budget cuts have forced the school board to consider splitting resources between the two districts. As a result, the proposed division will lead to significant challenges for both areas.
lug_prompt: Okusala ku mbalirira gyebuvuddeko kiwalirizza akakiiko k'essomero okulowooza ku ky'okugabana ebyetaago wakati wa disitulikiti ebbiri. N'ekinaavaamu, enjawukana etegekeddwa ejja kuleeta okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi eri ebitundu byombi.
ach_prompt: Ngolo byek me lim ma otime cokcok-ki oweko dul madoro gangi kwan tye ki tam me poko lim ikin districts aryo egoni. Macalo adwogi ne, apoka-poka ma kicwako ni obi kelo peko madit tutwal I kabedo aryo weng.
teo_prompt: Aitidisiario naka ebajet nes abu koinak eyaitene lo esomero aomisio nu aitiak iboro kiding idisitriktan iarei. Kanuka ngun, ebuni atiakatiaka ngin ayangaun atiokisio nuepolok noi mama ejaasi atutubena ngun kere.
lgg_prompt: Otita aje robia niri ma omgbo esizu o'diru ri fe driceza sukulu niri ega e'yo lonyi awazu distrikiti iri 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, esele coza 'bani leleri ni nga e'yo ewaru eji angu iri 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Okusharaho embaririra y'eishomero omu bwire butari bwa hare, kireesire akakiiko k'eishomero kuteekateeka aha kugabana eby'obugaiga ahagati ya disiturikiti ibiri. N'ekyarugiremu,okwebaganisamu nikwija kureetaho oburemeezi bw'amaani omu byanga byombi.

eng_prompt: Authorities were conducting a routine search in the area due to rising concerns about gang activity. During their investigation, they stumbled upon a hidden stash.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza baali bakola okunoonya okwa bulijjo mu kitundu olw'okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bikolwa by'ekibinja ky'abamenyi b'amateeka. Mu kunoonyereza kwabwe, baasanze ekintu ekikwese.
ach_prompt: Lutela gubedo ka timo kwed I kabedo eni pi lworo ma tye kamedde I kom tim pa dul pa lutim aranyi. Ikare me kwedgi, gunongo gin mo ma ki kano.
teo_prompt: Autasi apedorosio nuka apugan aingic aiboisit naarai eyatakinos nuikamunitos aswamisio nuka igurupun. Kotoma aingic kec, apotu kesi kodumutu iboro lu engopitai.
lgg_prompt: Okpo e'ipi 'diyi ri e'yo angu 'da ma ale andrizu ri 'ye e'yo asi otiza ni tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi. Sawa yini e'yo vuti ondazurisi, eyi esu afa azi ozizaru ni.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi bakaba nibacondooza buriijo omu kyanga ahabw'okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'ebibiina by'ebibi. Omu kucondooza kwabo, bakashanga ekintu kyona ekisherekirwe.

eng_prompt: After the chaotic scene unfolded, investigators began to piece together the events that led to the confrontation. They soon discovered a crucial piece of evidence at the site.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'obutabanguko obwaliwo, abanoonyereza baatandika okukwataganya ebyaliwo ebyaviirako okulwanagana. Baazudde obujulizi obw'omugaso mu kifo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma kuku kuku obedo tye, lukwed gucako yubu jami ma oweko lweny obedo tye. Cutcut gunongo caden ma pire tek tutwal I kabedo ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka amumu, apotu angicak kogeutu aimorikikin akiro nuapotu koyangautu ingungeta. Apotu kesi kodumutu aitogogongoret naepol noi kotoma aiboisit kangin.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'dozu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo vuti ondapi 'diyi e'do e'yo e'dopi e'yo 'di 'yepi 'diyi ma eselea. Eyi esu mbeleru afa azi ecetaru ni angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obutabanguko kubaho, abakyondoozi bakatandika kukwatanisa ebyabaireho ebyareesireho okurwanagana. Bakatunga obujurizi bw'amaani aha mwanya.

eng_prompt: The investigation revealed that a specific item had been missing from the crime scene. Detectives soon discovered that it had been used by one of the suspects for personal reasons.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kwalaga nti waliwo ekintu ekimu ekyali kibuze mu kifo awaali wazziddwa omusango. Bambega baakizuula mangu nti yali ekozesebwa omu ku bateeberezebwa olw'ensonga z'obuntu.
ach_prompt: Kwed onyuto ni gin mo orweny ki kama bal otime iye. Lutim kwed gunongo ni ngat acel I kin jo mabyek me bal tye I komgi otiyo kwede pi tyen lok ma mege.
teo_prompt: Abu aingic kitodu ebe emamiatatar ibore kotoma aiboisit naeswamaere ngun. Apotu ipolisin kojenutu atipet ebe itosomai ediopet kotoma otunga luitepesenitai kanu akeswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini afa azi avi pari 'bani e'yo onzi 'yezuri ma alia ra. Ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi esu mbeleru kini 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo ra ada 'diyi ma azi ayu eri e'yo i ma ngulupi ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza kworeka ngu ekintu kimwe kikaba kibuzire aha mwanya ahu ekihagaro kyabeireho. Bambega bukiri kare bakareeba ngu ekakoresiibwe omwe aha bateekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro.

eng_prompt: In a shocking turn of events, a group of armed assailants ambushed a police patrol in the city center. Chaos erupted as the gunmen opened fire, targeting law enforcement personnel.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri ey'entiisa, ekibinja ky'abamenyi b'amateeka abaali bakutte emmundu baalumba poliisi eyali elawuna mu kibuga wakati. Akavuyo kaabalukawo ng'abazigu bakubye amasasi mu bakuumaddembe.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma okelo lworo madit tutwal, gurup pa dano ma gubedo ki muduku gumonyo abili ma gubedo ka wot I dye boma madit. Kuku kuku obedo tye ikare ma ludito muduku gucelo lutic cik.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakinio naka iboro, abu egurupu loka itunga luejaasi keda imudun kosurok ipolisin lueutasi alosit aidar aiboisio kokiding na esite. Abu amumu kogeun naarai apotu imudu kinomata akim mama ejaasi ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu 'ba osu be 'diyi amvu polisi angu andripi aku ambu city niri ma alea 'diyi. Ngiringiri e'do 'ba osu be 'diyi ni aci tizu 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, guruupu y'abantu abaine embundu bakatahirira abapooriisi abaabaire nibarambura omu rurembo ahagati. Hakabaho akaimukiriro, abashaija b'embundu ku baakubire amasasi, barikugyenderera abarikukwatisa ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: In the face of rapidly changing circumstances and increasing challenges, it is crucial for those in leadership positions to stay informed and adaptable. The current climate demands a proactive approach to decision-making and strategy.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera ezikyuka amangu n'okusoomoozebwa okweyongera, kikulu nnyo abo abali mu bifo by'obukulembeze okusigala nga bamanyi era nga basobola okukyusakyusa. Embeera eriwo kati yeetaaga enkola ey'obwegendereza mu kukola okusalawo n'obukodyo.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma jami tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal ki peko matye kamede, pire tek tutwal ki joo matye I tela me bedo ki ngec dok me loko kit ma jami tye kwede. Kwo matye kombedi mito ni omyero ki tii ki diro me moko tam.
teo_prompt: Kojautene lo ijulakina katipet keda atiokisio nu iyatakina, ejokuna noi ngul luejaasi toma aiboisio nu engarenok aijen keda aijulakin. Ekoto ejautene loejai kwape kwana epone loka aitolomunun aseununeta keda ainapeta.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ojapi mbeleru azini e'yo ewaru tupi tupi 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru 'ba drice'ba ru 'diyi ni aa'zu e'yo eyi ma dria azini aa'zu e'yo eyi ma aza kozu. E'yo ewu curu'dori ma alea ri le 'ba ma 'du e'yo okporu e'yo peta pezu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera ezirikuhinduka juba hamwe n'oburemeezi obweyongyeire, nikikuru abo abari omu myanya y'obwebembezi kuguma nibamanya kandi bahikaana n'embeera. Embeera eriho obwahati neeyetenga enkora y'amaani omu kukora ebiteiso n'enteekateeka.

eng_prompt: In light of the escalating violence in their home country, the international community has urged the refugees to remain in Uganda. Authorities have expressed concerns about the dangers they would face if they attempted to return.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko obweyongera mu nsi zaabwe, ensi yonna ekubirizza abanoonyiboobubudamu okusigala mu Uganda. Ab'obuyinza balaze obweraliikirivu olw'obulabe bwe bandisanze singa bagezaako okuddayo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki tim gero matye kamede I lobogi, lobo mapat-pat olego luring ayela me bedo I lobo Uganda. Lutela gunyutu lworo gi i kom peko ma gubi nongo ka gudok cen.
teo_prompt: Katupitos amumu na iyata noi kakwapukec, esinyikokit akwapin ace ikerai asalakin Uganda. Apotu apedorosio itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu atiokisio nu epote kesi adumun arai etamit kesi abongun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni tupi kari eyivile aku 'diyi ma alea ri ma e'yosi, ongulumu kari amve 'diyi ai emunyale eyi aa'zu kari Uganda niri ma alea. Okpo e'ipi eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo onzi eyini nga esu eyini ka obi gozu 'bo 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire omu ihanga ryabo,amahanga goona gashabire empungi kuguma omu Uganda. Ab'obushoborozi boorekire okwerarikirira aha kabi akarikubaasa kubaho baaba bagarukire.

eng_prompt: In light of escalating tensions and recent violent incidents, authorities have issued a stern warning to all armed individuals in the area. The situation has become increasingly precarious, prompting urgent measures to ensure public safety.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke obweyongera n'ebikolwa eby'obukambwe ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko, ab'obuyinza bafulumizza okulabula okw'amaanyi eri abantu bonna abalina emmundu mu kitundu. Embeera yeeyongedde okuba ey'obunkenke, ekireetedde okuteekawo enkola ez'amangu okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle matye kamede ki tim gero ma otime cokcok-ki, lutela guciko dano weng matye ki muduku i kabedo eni. Lok ne tye ka doko rac tutwal, ma oweko kimoko yoo me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin naka ingungeta keda amumu napac, apotu apedorosio ikwenyasi itunga kere luejaasi keda imudun katutubet. Erai ejautene lo erono noi, ido ibusakinit aswam katipet kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni tuzu tualu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi pie, drice'ba eyi fe bile ndu liza okporu 'ba dria osu be angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri. E'yo 'di eca curu'do onzikanyaru dika eri fe 'bani e'yo mbeleru 'diyi 'yezu o'bi eyini aa'zu ageitema be.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutaikirizana obweyongyeire hamwe n'obutabanguko obwakyerereirwe, ab'obushoborozi bahabwire abantu boona abaine embundu omu kyanga. Embeera eyeyongyeire kuba ey'akabi, ekirikureetera abantu kukora kyona ekirikubaasika okurinda abantu.

eng_prompt: After receiving a tip-off about suspicious activity in the area, the police prepared to take action. They gathered their team and formulated a plan to address the growing concern over gun violence.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna obubaka obukwata ku bikolwa ebiteeberezebwa mu kitundu, poliisi yeetegese okubaako ky'ekolawo. Baakungaanya ttiimu yaabwe ne bakola enteekateeka y'okugonjoola okweraliikirira okweyongera ku butabanguko bw'emmundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo ngec I kom tim ma byek tye I komgi I kabedo eni, abili oyubbe me timo gin mo. Gu coko luticgi ka guyubu yub me tyeko lworo ma tye kamedde I kom tim gero I kom muduku.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun akiro nuikamunitos aswamisio nu eomitai ebe ejai atutubet kangin, apotu ipolisin itemonokinos aswam ngun. Apotu kesi kimorikikinos keda etimu kec kosodete aitolomun ainapeta nuka aitemokin aiyalongong naka imudun.
lgg_prompt: Polisi eyi esu e'yo 'yeta 'bani ega eyi ma dria ku angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, eyi otu eyi e'yo 'yezu. Yi tra yi vile amuti azini 'diyi otuta 'ye e'yo asi otiza tupi e'yo ngiringiri osu ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga amakuru agarikukwata aha bikorwa ebitarikwetegyerezibwa omu kyanga, poriisi eketeekateekyera kukoraho. Bakakorana tiimu yaabo bakakora enteekateeka y'okukora aha nshonga y'obutabanguko bw'embundu obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events, authorities are implementing stricter measures to ensure public safety. As tensions rise, it is crucial to address any potential threats posed by armed individuals seeking refuge.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko, ab'obuyinza bateekawo emitendera emikakali okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu. Ng'obunkenke bweyongera, kikulu nnyo okukola ku bulabe bwonna obuyinza okuva mu bantu abalina emmundu abanoonya obubudamu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, lutela tye ka keto yoo matek me gwoko kuc pa lwak. Ka telle tye kamedde, pire tek tutwal me cobo peko mo keken ma dano matye ki muduku ma gitye ka yenyo luring ayela gi kelo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac, eutasi apedorosio aitegear iwaitin lu itigogongoritai kanu ayuarite itunga. Kwape iyata aiyalongong, epolok noi aitemokin atiokisio nuepedorete itunga luejaasi keda imudun aimo aiboi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba eyi geri okporu 'diyi 'ba o'bi eyi ma tambazu. E'yo ewaru eyini tuzu 'bori ma vutia, eri orodriru e'yo ewaru 'ba osu be 'diyi ni 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebiherize kubaho, ab'obushoborozi bariyo nibataho enkora y'amaani okurinda abantu. Obunkenke ku burikweyongyera, niky'omugasho kukora aha kabi koona akarikubaasa kureetwa abantu abaine embundu abarikuronda obuhungiro.

eng_prompt: After a thorough search of the suspect's residence, law enforcement officials discovered several hidden compartments. As the investigation continued, they have recovered three guns already.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonya amaka g'omutemu, abakuumaddembe baazuula ebisenge ebiwerako. Nga okunoonyereza kugenda mu maaso, baazudde emmundu ssatu.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo gang pa ngat ma byek me bal tye I kome, abili gunongo kabedo mapol ma ki kano ie. I kare ma kwed tye ka mede, gunongo muduku adek.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aimo oreria luka loetepesenitai, apotu ipolisin kodumutu iboro luipu lu engopitai. Kwape elosi aingic, apotu kesi kodumutu imudun iuni.
lgg_prompt: Bani jo 'bani ega eza e'yo 'da ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi esu pari ozizaru 'diyi karakara. E'yo eti ondaza ni mu drile, eyi esu curu'do osu eyi na.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okuronda munonga amaka g'omusibe, abarikukwatisa ebiragiro bakashanga ebishengye bingi. Okucondooza kukagyenda omu maisho,bakatunga embundu ishatu.
