eng_prompt: In an effort to improve local governance and service delivery, the city administration has been reviewing its administrative divisions. As a result of this assessment, more subcounties have been declared in Kampala.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enfuga y'ebitundu n'obuweereza, abakulembeze b'ekibuga babadde beetegereza enjawukana zaabwe ez'obukulembeze. Olw'okukebera kuno, amagombolola amalala gatongozeddwa mu Kampala.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me ilo malo rwom me tela ki miyo kony, lutela me city gubedo ka ngiyo kit ma dul mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat mapat-pat Macalo adwogi me kwed man, kiloko i kom subcounties mapol I Kampala.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitam aitojokar eipugae lo okwap keda ejanakine, euta eyaitene lo esite airereor atiakatiakakec. Kanuka airereonor akiro nu, alimor atutubena nuipu ko Kampala.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo driceza angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu azini azakoma fele o'bi eyidri ri ma omgbo otuzu, driceza aku ambo 'da niri e'bi e'yo esele coza erini 'diyi ma ale andri dika. E'yo eti ondaza 'di ma e'yosi, 'ba e'do distrikiti eyi kambala dika.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura obwebembezi n'obuheereza omu byaro, abebembezi b'orurembo batwire nibareebuuza emigabano yaabo y'obwebembezi. Ahabw'okushwijuma, amagomborora maingi garangirwe omuri Kampala.

eng_prompt: After years of planning and collaboration with local leaders, significant investments have been made in infrastructure and community services. As a result, our subcounty has been developed.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga tuteekateeka era nga tukolera wamu n'abakulembeze b'ebitundu, ssente nnyingi ziteekeddwa mu bintu ebikozesebwa n'obuweereza bw'ekitundu. N'ekivuddemu, amagombolola gaffe gakulaakulanye.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me yube ki winye ki lutela me tedero, ki keto lim madit tutwal I tic me gedo ki miyo kony bot lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo wa odongo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aitemonokin ka aiswamanara keda engarenok luka atutubet, aponi itolomunai ikapun luipu noi kotoma aiboisio ka aijanakino naka itunga. Kanuka ngun, aponi itopolounai atutubetekosi.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyi ma vutia otuta 'yezu tualu azi ngazu tualu drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi pie, 'ba 'ba robia angiri afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma alea tualu azakoma ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ezo ama vile subcounty 'di ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okukwatanisa n'abebembezi b'ebyaro, sente nyingi zikozirwe omu byombeko hamwe n'obuheereza bw'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, amagomborora gaitu gatunguukire.

eng_prompt: In light of recent incidents in the area, we felt it was necessary to enhance our safety measures. To ensure our well-being during the event, we decided to hire additional personnel.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko mu kitundu, twawulira nga kyetagisa okwongera ku mateeka gaffe ag'ebyokwerinda. Okusobola okukakasa nti tubeera bulungi ku mukolo, twasalawo okupangisa abakozi abalala.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki I kabedo eni, wawinyo ni omyero wamed rwom me gwoko kuc. Me neno ni kwo wa obedo ber ikare me yub eni, wamoko tamwa me coyo lutic mukene.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu kotoma atutubet kangin, apotu sio awanyutu ebe ibusakinit aitogogong iwaitin lu ayuara wok. Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna sio kotoma opucit, apotu sio adumutu eswamak icie.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi angu 'da ma alea o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, ama ega kini eri orodriru ama ma tambaza ma omgbo otuzu. Lezu ama ma aa muke sa'wa omu 'da nirisi, ama asi 'du e'yo 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi 'duzu drile.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebintu ebyabaireho omu kyanga kyaitu, tukareeba ngu nikyetagisa okwongyera amaani omu by'okwerinda byaitu. Okureeba ngu turikuguma gye aha mukoro, tukasharamu kwongyera abakozi.

eng_prompt: After months of uncertainty and poor communication, it has become clear that the direction the company is taking is not aligned with our values. The recent changes have left many of us feeling disillusioned and frustrated.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'obutali bukakafu n'empuliziganya embi, kyeyoleka bulungi nti kampuni gy'etambulirako tekwatagana na mpisa zaffe. Enkyukakyuka ezaakagwawo zilese bangi ku ffe nga tuweddemu amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me bedo ki akala-kala ki kubbe marac, nen atyer kamaleng ni yoo ma dul ne tye ka lubu pe rwatte ki jami ma wamaro. Aloka-loka ma otime cokcok-ki oweko dano mapol cwinygi otur dok cwinygi pe yom.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka amamus acamanar keda einer loaronon, ecai cut ebe mam ekampuni iswamai kotupitete iponesio lukajokak. Aijulanakineta nupac ajalakisi oni luipu epalunitos.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani aa'zu e'yo kokoru azini e'yo nzeza kililiru kuri ma vutia, eca e'da kini driceza amuti 'di ni 'du ri ovuni e'yo amani lele 'diyi be ku. Ojata ebipi o'diru 'diyi fe ama karakara yi dri ava ako azini candi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi gatari maingi n'empurizagana mbi, kimanyirwe butunu ngu enkora ya kampuni terikuhikaana n'emitwarize yaitu. Empindahinduka ezibaireho obwahati, zireesire baingi omuriitwe turikuhwamu amaani.

eng_prompt: Despite the promises made during his campaign, the community has seen little improvement in our living conditions. Many residents feel disillusioned and frustrated with the lack of progress.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko ebisuubizo ebyakolebwa mu kakuyege we, abantu balabye okulongooka kutono mu mbeera z'obulamu bwaffe. Abatuuze bangi bawulira nga baweddemu amaanyi olw'obutaba na nkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en ocikke ikare me bito kwir, rwom me kwo pa lwak pe oyube tutwal. Lutedero mapol cwinygi pe yom dok cwinygi pe yom pi dongo lobo matye.
teo_prompt: Karaida isumunit ngesi iboro luipu kapak kana aisup aseeta, mam itunga lu atutubet ewanyunitos ajokis na aijar wok. Apotu itunga luipu itakadikisi kanu amamus na apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini owizu ti odaza ma alia ra ti, ongulumu nderi ndre e'yo amani aa'zu ri ma otuza were. Ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma asi eza eyi e'yo angu ezoma ni yo risi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ebiraganiso ebikozirwe omu kampiini, abantu tibakareebireho mpindahinduka y'amaani omu magara gaitu. Abatuuragye baingi nibahwamu amaani ahabw'obutabaho bw'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: Many people around the world are unaware of the struggles faced by citizens in various countries. In Uganda, systemic issues have led to widespread inequality and suffering.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi mu nsi yonna tebamanyi ntalo bannansi ze basanga mu nsi ez'enjawulo. Mu Uganda, ensonga z'enkola ziviiriddeko obutali bwenkanya n'okubonaabona okusaasaanidde.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol I wilobo lung pe gingeyo peko ma anywali me lobo mapat-pat tye ka kato ki iye. I lobo Uganda, peko me yub mapat-pat okelo apoka-poka ki deno can mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu kotoma akwap kere mam ejenete atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga kotoma akwapin nuegelegela. Ko Uganda, eyangautu atiokisio nuka ainapeta amamut airiamara keda atiokisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara wudrikuru ma kalasi 'diyi nini e'yo ewaru kari anzi kari ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini esu 'diyi ma dria ku. Kari Uganda niri ma alea, e'yo otita ni 'diyi fe e'yo esele coza ni azini candi isuza ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi omunsi yoona tibarikumanya oburemeezi obu abatuuragye barikurabamu omu mahanga gatari gamwe na gamwe. Omu Uganda, enshonga z'eby'obutegyeki, zireesireho obutaingana n'okubonabona.

eng_prompt: Despite the growing unrest in the city, many residents chose to remain peaceful. They believed that violence would only escalate the situation further.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waaliwo obutabanguko mu kibuga, abatuuze bangi baasalawo okusigala nga bakkakkamu. Baalowooza nti obutabanguko bwandyeyongedde okwonoona embeera.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lweny tye kamede i boma ne, lutedero mapol oyero me bedo ki kuc. Gubedo ki niyee ni tim gero bimedo peko matye.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata amumu koibuga, apotu itunga luipu koseutu asalakin inapara. Iyuunitos kesi ebe ebuni amumu aiyatakin ejautene.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni tupi aku ambu city niri ma alea ra ti, 'ba karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pe aa'zu asianzu si. Yi a'ira kini ngiringiri ni nga lu e'yo 'da ma omgbo otu drile.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obutabanguko obweyongyeire omu rurembo, abatuuragye baingi bakasharamu kuguma baine obusingye. Bakaba nibaikiriza ngu obwimukiriro nibwija kwongyera ahaburemeezi.

eng_prompt: After weeks of speculation and negotiations, the political landscape has shifted dramatically. In a move to stabilize the government, the president announced significant changes to the administration.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera ez'okuteebereza n'enteeseganya, embeera y'ebyobufuzi ekyuse nnyo. Mu kaweefube w'okutebenkeza gavumenti, pulezidenti yalangiridde enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi mu bukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me byek ki winye, kabedo me cung iwibye olokke tutwal. I yub me kelo ber bedo I gamente, ladit lobo owaco aloka-loka madongo I tela ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aomisio keda ipegeta, ejulakinos noi akiro nuka epolitikis. Kanu aitogogong apugan, abu lokapolon akwap kolimo aijulanakineta nuepolok noi kotoma apugan.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani e'yo egazu azini e'yo otuzu 'bori ma vutia, e'yo politiki ni 'diyi oja eyi saaru. E'yo lezu gamete ma e'yo otuzu, prisdent azi ojata okporu 'diyi e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteebereza n'okuteesa, eby'obutegyeki bihindukire munonga. Omu kaweefube w'okugarura busingye omu gavumenti, omwebembezi w'eihanga akarangirira empinduka y'amaani omu bwebembezi.

eng_prompt: After reviewing our budget for the month, it became clear that we were short on funds. As a result, we realized that we would have to make sacrifices for our upcoming trip.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embalirira yaffe ey'omwezi, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti tetwalina ssente zimala. N'ekyavaamu, twakiraba nti olugendo lwaffe olwali lugenda okututuukako lwali lugenda kutwetaagisa okubaako bye twefiiriza.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo byek me lim wa pi dwe enoni, onen atyer kamaleng ni pe watye ki cente muromo. Macalo adwogi ne, waniang ni omyero wajal jami mogo pi wotwa matye kabino anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ebajet wok lo elap, apotu kojenutu ebe ikidioko sio ikapun. Kanuka ngun, apotu sio awanyutu ebe ibusakinit sio ailem iboro kanuka alositekosi naebunit.
lgg_prompt: Bani ama vile bajeti mba 'di ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri eca e'dazaru kini ama vu robia were. E'yo 'disi, ama esu ra kini le ama ma owi afa azi eyi aci amavile emupi ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embaririra yaitu y'omwezi, kikarebeka butunu ngu tukaba tutaine sente. N'ekyarugiremu, tuketegyereza ngu nituza kwefeerereza ahabw'orugyendo rwaitu orurikwija.

eng_prompt: After weeks of planning, my family decided it was time for a visit. My father went to the village.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga tuteekateeka, ab'omu maka gaffe baasalawo nti kye kiseera okukyalira. Taata wange yagenda mu kyalo.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yubbe, lugang na gumoko tamgi ni kare dong oromo me limgi. Babana ocito I caro.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin lu aitemonokin, abu ekaleka koseu aipejokin. Abu papaka kolot ocalo.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani otuta 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, familia mavileri 'du e'yo kini sawa ca muzu omuru ra. Ma ati mu caloa.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteekateekyera, eka yangye ekasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okutayayira. Taata akaza omu kyaro.

eng_prompt: After weeks of escalating arguments and tensions at home, the situation became unbearable. Feeling unsafe and desperate for help, they decided to take action.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga beeyongera okuyomba n'obunkenke mu maka, embeera yafuuka etali ya kugumiikiriza. Nga bawulira nga tebalina bukuumi era nga baagala nnyo obuyambi, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me laro lok ki telle I gang, peko ne odoko tek tutwal. Kit ma gubedo ki lworo dok onongo gimito kony tutwal, gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka ingungeta keda ingungeta ore, abu ejautene koraun lo mam apedorio aiting. Apupiata kesi ebe emamei ayuwara ido ekotosi kesi aingarakinio, apotu kesi koseutu aswam nuiswama.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia agata ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu e'yo ewaru akua 'diyi pie, e'yo 'da eca ewaru. Eyi ega eyini aa'zu ageitema koko dika eyi le azakoma saaru, eyi ai e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okuhajaana n'okwerarikirira omuka, embeera ekaba etarikwikirizibwa. Ahabw'okwetenga oburinzi hamwe n'okwetenga obuhwezi, bakasharamu kukora.

eng_prompt: After weeks of uncertainty and speculation, we received an unexpected invitation from the board. It was clear that something important was about to be discussed.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga tetukakasa na kuteebereza, twafuna okuyitibwa okuva mu kakiiko. Kyali kyeyoleka bulungi nti waliwo ekintu ekikulu ekyali kigenda okukubaganyizibwako ebirowoozo.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me bedo ki akala-kala ki byek mapat-pat, wanongo lwongo ma pe wageno ki bot dul madoro tic. Onen atyer kamaleng ni gin mo ma pire tek omyero ki lok iye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu lu mam ejena ka aomisio, apotu sio adumutu aiwororio na mam aomitai kanejai atukot naka eyaitene. Acai cut ebe ejai ibore yenepol noi ebeit aitemitem.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia e'yo egazu ku azini e'yo egazu ku 'diyi ma vutia, ama esu omveta 'bani ega kokoru engazu board vu. Eri ndra e'da kililiru kini 'ba nga e'yo nze e'yo azi orodriruni ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuteekateeka n'okuteebereza, tukatunga okwetwa okutarikuteekwateekwa kuruga omu kakiiko. Kikaba nikyoreka butunu ngu hariho ekintu ky'omugasho ekyabaire nikiza kuhanuurwaho.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous attempts to find common ground, the discussion became increasingly heated. Each participant seemed more focused on defending their position than on reaching a consensus.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waaliwo okugezaako okungi okuzuula ensonga ez'awamu, okukubaganya ebirowoozo kweyongera okuba okw'ebbugumu. Buli omu ku beetabamu yalabika ng'essira ali ku kulwanirira endowooza ye okusinga okukkaanya.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dano mapol oteme me nongo yoo me winye, lok ne omede ki bedo tek. Nen calo ngat acel-acel ma obedo I yub ne obedo ki miti me gwoko tamgi me kaka winye.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu itunga luipu otamata adumun akiro nu eputosi kesi, apotu ineresinei kibiroros noi. Esubit bala epodokinit nginitunganan aigang aiboisit ke adepar adolokin acamanara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu ti ecita esuzu 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, e'yo nzeza 'da ma omgbo tu ra. Ba dria fi'ba amuti 'da ma alea 'diyi e'da kile asi 'ba e'yo yini 'diyi ma ta mbaza ma dria aga e'yo ti ecizu eyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okugyezaho kwingi okureetaho obumwe, okuhanuura kukaguma nikweyongyera. Buri omwe owabaire ariho akareebeka nk'orikugyenderera kurwanirira enteekateeka ye okukira okuhika aha kwikirizana.

eng_prompt: In a world rife with division and injustice, he felt compelled to share his vision for a better future. Drawing inspiration from historical movements, he crafted a document that outlined his beliefs and aspirations.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde enjawukana n'obutali bwenkanya, yawulira ng'alina okugabana ebirowoozo bye ku biseera eby'omu maaso ebirungi. Ng'afuna okubudaabudibwa okuva mu bibiina by'ebyafaayo, yakola ekiwandiiko ekyalaga enzikiriza ye n'ebigendererwa bye.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma opong ki apoka-poka ki ngolo kop alenga, en owinyo ni myero opok tamme pi anyim maber. Kun nongo cuku cwiny ki I kom jami ma otime I kare macon, en ocoyo waraga ma onyuto tamme ki miti ne.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda atiakatiaka keda amamus na etube, abu ngesi kopup ebe ibusakinit ngesi aimor aomisioitike kanuka ingaren naejok. Kowai lo aisinyikokinit kotoma akiro nukolo, abu ngesi kitolomu aiwadikaeta nuikamunitos aiyuunike keda apeleikinata ke.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru esele coza azini e'yo liza kililiru ku 'di ma alea, eri ama asi e'yo erini ega ewu drusiri ma driari awazu ra. Erini ava esuzu engazu ongulumu ewu driori ma alea 'diyi vu, eri ede kokobi e'yo erini a'i 'diyi ma dria azini egata erini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi erimu okwebaganisamu n'obutari buringaaniza, akahurira naagyemeserezibwa kugabana ebiteekateeko bye ahabw'ebiro bya nyensya birungi. Arikukoresa eby'obuhangwa, akahandiika ekihandiiko ekirikworeka ebi arikwikiriza n'ebi arikwenda.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and presenting our ideas, we finally received the support we needed. The organization recognized our potential and decided to invest in our entrepreneurial dreams.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi nga tuteekateeka n'okwanjula ebirowoozo byaffe, kyaddaaki twafuna obuwagizi bwe twetaaga. Ekitongole kyalabye obusobozi bwaffe ne kisalawo okussa ssente mu birooto byaffe eby'okutandikawo bizineesi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki nyutu tam wa, lacen wanongo kony ma wamito. Dul ne guneno kero wa dok gumoko tamgi me keto lim I lek wa me cako biacara.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka aitodiar aomisiowok, apotu sio adumutu agangat na ikoto oni. Abu erionget koany apedorosiowok kosodi aseun aipikakin ikapunukec toma airujasiawok nuka agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otuta 'yezu azini egata amani 'diyi e'dazu 'bori ma vutia, ama esu asizu atita amani leleri ra. Amuti nderi ndre e'yo amani eco 'ye ra 'diyi ra azini asi 'du lonyi vuti aleza ama vile orobi tujari 'yezuri ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera n'okureeta ebiteekateeko byaitu, tukaheza kutunga obuhwezi obu twabaire nitwenda. Ekitongore kikareeba obushoboorozi bwaitu kyasharamu kutweka omu birooto byaitu by'okutandika bizinesi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events and rising tensions in the community, the president addressed the nation during a press conference. He emphasized the importance of upholding the rule of law and maintaining order.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gye buvuddeko n'obunkenke obweyongera mu kitundu, pulezidenti yayogeddeko eri eggwanga mu lukungaana lwa bannamawulire. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukuuma amateeka n'obutebenkevu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki ki telle matye kamedde I kin lwak, ladit lobo oloko ki lwak I kare me lok ki lucoo lok angeya. En owaco ni pire tek tutwal me gwoko cik ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac keda aiyalongong naepol noi kotoma atutubet, abu lokapolon akwap kiner keda itunga luka akwapuwok kotoma apak naka einer keda lu iyemuto. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aitogogong ikisila ka aidar ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu e'yo ewaru tupi ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi pie, purezidenti nze e'yo kari 'di ma alea sa'wa 'bani e'yo nzezu 'ba osisiani 'diyi pie risi. Eri fe okpo orodri e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini geri kililiru 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'obunkenke obweyongyeire omu bantu, omwebembezi weihanga akagambira eihanga omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okurinda obusingye n'obutebekana.

eng_prompt: Before entering the examination hall, it's crucial that all students have the necessary documentation. One of the most important items required is the student identity card.
lug_prompt: Nga tebannayingira mu kisenge ky'ebigezo, kikulu nnyo abayizi bonna okuba n'ebiwandiiko ebyetaagisa. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyetaagibwa ye ndagamuntu y'omuyizi.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe gudonyo I ot peny, pire tek tutwal ni lutino weng gubed ki karatac ma mite. Gin acel ma pire tek loyo ma mite obedo lanyut mamegi nyo ID pa lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Erongo elomar toma agola naka aingito, ejokuna noi esisiak kere ajaut keda apapulaikec. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi lu ekotoi ngesi akaadi naka esisiak.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di eyi fi pari obeta eyi 'yezu ri ma alea ku, eri orodriru sukulu anzi dria eyi ma kokobi eyi ci. Afa azi orodriru 'bani le 'diyi ma azi eri kokobi sukulu anzi eyini aa'zu alenia ri i.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi batakataaha omu kishengye ky'ebigyezo, ni kikuru ngu boona bagire ebihandiiko ebirikwetengwa. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebirikwetengwa n'endagamuntu y'omwegi.

eng_prompt: After a long day of campaigning and voter turnout, the polling stations have finally closed. Election officials are now preparing to tally the votes.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'olunaku oluwanvu olw'okunoonya akalulu n'okujja kw'abalonzi, ebifo ebironderwamu byaggalwa. Abakungu b'ebyokulonda kati beetegekera okubala obululu.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare malac me bito kwir ki wel lubol kwir, kabedo me bolo kwir dong kiloro. Lutic me bolo kwir kombedi tye ka yubbe me kwano kwir.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apaaran naepol noi naka aisup aseeta keda aseo, aponi kogolokinai aiboisio nu aseo. Ekapakina kwana eswamak luka aseo aimar abootin.
lgg_prompt: O'du ezu ti odazaniri ma vutia azini 'ba voti 'be'baa 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu 'bori ma vutia, pari opetaa ni 'diyi opi 'bo. Azi'ba opeta eyi ma alea 'diyi sa'wa 'disi eyi otu voti eyi lazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuronda akaruuru n'abateezi b'akaruuru kumara eizooba riringwa, emyanya y'okuteera akaruuru ekahwaho. Ab'eby'oburuuru hati nibeteekateekyera okubara oburuuru.

eng_prompt: When I was trying to apply for a passport, I realized I was missing some important documents. One of the most crucial items I couldn't find was my birth certificate.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnali ngezaako okusaba paasipooti, nnakizuula nti waliwo ebiwandiiko ebikulu bye nnali sisoose kufuna. Ekimu ku bintu eby'omugaso ennyo bye ssaasobola kusanga ye satifikeeti yange ey'obuzaale.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma atye ka temo coyo waraga me penyo pi passport, aniang ni pe atye ki karatac mogo ma pigi tego. Gin acel ma pire tek ma pe atwero nongo obedo waraga nywala.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong aitam ailip apapula naka alosit akwapin ace, abu eong ajen ebe emamiatatar eong keda apapula ace nuepolok. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi lumam eong apedori adumun ngesi apapulaika naka aurio.
lgg_prompt: Erini o'bizu waraga passport ruri sizurisi, ma esu ra kini ma avi kokobi azi orodriru 'diyi ra. Afa azi okporu mani awini esu ku ri ma vile kokobi ositaniri'i.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire ninteeraho kushaba paasipooti, nketegyereza ngu nkabura ebihandiiko by'omugasho. Kimwe aha bintu by'omugasho munonga ebi naabaire ntarikubaasa kushanga, n'ekihandiiko kyangye ky'obuzarwa.

eng_prompt: As part of the enrollment process, the school required various documents from all new students. To ensure proper registration, our parents were informed about the necessary paperwork needed.
lug_prompt: Ng'omu ku mitendera gy'okwewandiisa, essomero lyali lyetaaga ebiwandiiko eby'enjawulo okuva mu bayizi abapya. Okusobola okwewandiisa obulungi, bazadde baffe baategeezebwa ku mpapula ezeetaagisa ezeetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Macalo but yub me coyo lutino kwan, gang kwan ne obedo kamito karatac mapat-pat ki bot lutino kwan manyen weng. Pi nongo nying maber, ki niango lunyodo wa i kom karatac ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nuka aiwadikaun, ekoto esomero apapula nuegelegela kanejaas esisiak luitetiak. Kanu awanyun ebe iwadikauna ejok, aponi olimokinai auriakakosi nuikamunitos apapulai nu ekotoi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ru sizu 'diyi ma azi ru, sukulu 'da le kokobi ndundu eyi sukulu anzi o'diru 'diyi vu. Ru siza kililiru ri nezu, 'ba lu ama ma tipika eyini e'yo kokobi 'bani lele 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'emwe aha nkora y'okwehandikisa, eishomero rikashaba ebihandiiko bitari bimwe na bimwe kuruga omu beegi abasya. Okureeba ngu twehandikisa kurungi, abazaire baitu bakamanyisibwa ebihandiiko ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: The deadline for submitting the required documents was yesterday. As a result, the instructor reviewed the submissions and noticed some were missing.
lug_prompt: Nsalesale w'okuwaayo ebiwandiiko ebyetaagibwa yabadde jjo. N'ekyavaamu, omusomesa yeetegereza ebyaweebwayo era n'akiraba nti ebimu byabula.
ach_prompt: Nino me agiki me cwalo karatac ma mite obedo laworo. Macalo adwogi, lapwony ongiyo waraga ma kicwalo botgi dok oniang ni mukene orem.
teo_prompt: Apaarasia nuka awasia nuka aijukar apapulai nu ekotoi arai bian. Kanuka ngun, abu esisianakinan koany nu ijukakitai kosodi aanyun ebe emamiatatar ice.
lgg_prompt: O'du asizu kokobi 'bani lele 'diyi ma ti pezu ri ndra aje. E'yo 'disi, imbapi andri afa 'bani fele 'diyi ma ale ra azini ndre kini afa azi 'diyi avi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ekiro ky'ahamuheru ky'okureeta ebihandiiko ebirikwetengwa kikaba nyomwebazyo. N'ekyarugiremu,omwegyesa akashwijuma ebihandiiko kandi yaareeba ngu ebimwe bikaba bibuzire.

eng_prompt: In many communities, access to education remains limited, leading to significant disparities in literacy rates. As a result, some parents are illiterate.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okufuna ebyenjigiriza kukyali kutono, ekivaako enjawulo mu muwendo gw'abantu abasoma n'okuwandiika. N'ekivuddemu, abazadde abamu tebamanyi kusoma na kuwandiika.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, nongo kwan pud tye magoro, ma okelo apoka-poka madit tutwal I rwom me kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, lunyodo mukene pe gukwano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, ikidioko lu epedorete adumunun asioman, ido ngin eyangauni atiakatiaka naepol noi kama ejaasi itunga luejaasi keda epone loka aisiom keda aisiom. Kanuka ngun, mam auriak icie isisiaete.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, geri onita esuzu ri ma omgbo ni nga po'di were, e'yo 'di ni fe esele coza angiri ongmbo afa lazu lazu ri ma alea. E'yo 'disi, tipika azi 'diyi sukulu la ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, okutunga obwegyese nikukye, ekirikureetaho entaaniso y'amaani omu bwingi bw'abantu abarikumanya okuhandiika n'okushoma. N'ekyarugiremu, abazaire abamwe tibarikwega.

eng_prompt: After months of investigation, authorities finally caught up with the man who had been posing as a police officer. Witnesses reported suspicious behavior, leading to his eventual apprehension.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyezi mingi nga banoonyereza, ab'obuyinza baasobola okukwata omusajja eyali yeefudde omuserikale wa poliisi. Abaabaddewo baategeezezza nti yeeyisa mu ngeri eyeekengera ekyaviiriddeko okukwatibwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo lok pi dwe mapol, lutela gumako lacoo ma obedo kakwo calo abili. Lucaden guwaco ni en obedo ki kit marac tutwal ma oweko kimake.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aingic, apotu apedorosio kodumutu etunganan loabu kotema ebe erai epolisit. Apotu ajenak olimosi iponesio lumam eyuwara, ido abu koyangau aikamanario ke.
lgg_prompt: Mba vuti ondaza ma vutia, 'ba okpo e'iru 'diyi obi asizu agu ebipi i 'yepi azi'ba polisiniri ra. Sadini eyi to e'yo 'yeta 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ma dria, eyini ani fezu 'bani eri obizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okucondooza, ab'obushoborozi bakahendera bakwata omushaija owabaire ayehindwire ofiisa wa poriisi. Abajurizi bakagamba aha mitwarize etarikwetegyerezibwa, ekyarugiremu okukwatwa.

eng_prompt: After much deliberation, we decided that it would be best to focus on our studies rather than stress about testing. Ultimately, we concluded that registering for exams was not the right choice for us this semester.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, twasalawo nti kyandibadde kirungi okussa essira ku misomo gyaffe okusinga okussa essira ku bigezo. Mu nkomerero, twasalawo nti okwewandiisa okukola ebigezo si kye kintu ekituufu kye twandikoze mu lusoma luno.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut, wamoko tamwa me keto cwiny wa I kom kwan ma ka keto cwiny I kom timo peny. I agiki ne, wamoko ni coo ne pi timo peny pe obedo gin maber piwa i semester eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom noi, apotu sio aseutu ebe ejokuna noi apodokinit asioman wok itia aiyalongong noi kanu aingito. Kawasia, apotu sio awanyutu ebe mam aiwadikaun kanu aingito arai aseunet najokan kanukosi atamu na.
lgg_prompt: E'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, ama 'du e'yo kini eri nga adri muke ndeni asi 'bazu ama vile onita ma dria aga asi omiza obeta ma dria ri ra. Asizu, ama ega kini ru sizu obeta eyi 'yezu ri ovuni peta kililiru ama dri semester 'disi ku.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga, tukasharamu ngu nikirungi okuta omutima aha mishomo yaitu, okukira okuta omutima aha bigyezo. Ekyarugiremu, tukasharamu ngu okwehandikisa kukora ebigyezo, tikyo kintu ekihikire omu semesita egi.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming project, the team gathered to discuss important deadlines. During the meeting, the director emphasized the need for everyone to complete their registrations promptly.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera pulojekiti ejja, ttiimu yakungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsalesale ez'omugaso. Mu lukiiko, dayirekita yakkaatirizza obwetaavu bwa buli omu okumaliriza okwewandiisa kwe mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi yub matye kabino anyim, lutic gurwate me nywako lok I kom nino me agiki mapigi tego. Ikare me kacoke, lador dul enoni owaco ni dano weng omyero gutyek coc gi oyot-oyot.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin kanu epurojekt lo ebunit, apotu etimu iriamunos kanu aitemitem ainapeta nuepolok. Kotoma airiamunet, abu engarenon kitogogong eipud loka itunga kere angetakin aiwadikao kec katipet.
lgg_prompt: Otita emupi ri otuzu, amuti 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu sa'wa okori ma dria. Mitingi 'da ma alea, dricere 'da fe okpo 'ba dria eyini eyi ma ru siza dezu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kwetebeekanisiza purogyekiti erikwija, tiimu ekateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha bwire bukuru. Omu rukiiko, mukuru w'eishomero akahamiiriza ngu buri omwe ashemereire kumaririza kwehandikisa ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Due to the ongoing disruptions caused by the pandemic, schools have implemented alternative assessment methods. As a result, many students will not sit for final exams.
lug_prompt: Olw'okutaataaganyizibwa okugenda mu maaso okwaleetebwa ekirwadde bbunansi, amasomero gataddewo enkola endala ez'okukebera. N'ekivuddemu, abayizi bangi tebajja kutuula bigezo byabwe eby'akamalirizo.
ach_prompt: Pi peko ma two korona okelo, gangi kwan gutiyo ki yoo mukene me pimo lutino. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan mapol pe gubi timo penygi me agiki.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ationis naepol noi na eyaunit adeka naka ekorona, etolomutu isomeroi iponesio ice luka aingic. Kanuka ngun, mam esisiak luipu epote aiboikin aingito naka awasia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi, sukulu eyi e'do geri 'bani afa eyi ma ale andrizu 'diyi ma azi eyi. E'yo 'disi, sukulu anzi karakara eyi ngani mu obeta eyi 'ye ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburikureetwa endwara ruranda nsi, amashomero gatandikire kukoresa emiringo endiijo y'okushwijuma. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegi baingi tibarikwija kukora ebigyezo by'akamaririzo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, our university has seen an increase in the diversity of its student body. Among them, there are individuals who have fled their home countries due to conflict and persecution.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, yunivasite yaffe ebaddemu abayizi bangi ab'enjawulo. Mu bo mulimu abantu abadduka mu nsi zaabwe olw'entalo n'okuyigganyizibwa.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, wel lutino kwan me univacitiwa omede tutwal. I kingi tye dano ma oringo ki I lobogi pi lweny ki aunauna.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ewanyunit eunibasiti wok aiyatakinio naka esisiak luegelegela. Kanejaas kesi, ejaasi itunga luekerete akwapin kec kanuka ingungeta keda aiticanio.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, ama vile university ri ndre e'yo sukulu anzi ndundu eyi ma kalafe ni tuzu ra. Eyi ma eselea, 'ba karakara eyi apa kari eyivile akua 'diyi ma alea risi e'yo ngiringiri ni azini candi fezu 'diyisi 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, Yunivasite yaitu ereebire okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abeegi baayo. Omuri bo harimu abantu abairukire omu mahanga gaabo ahabw'entaro n'okuhiiganisibwa.

eng_prompt: After fleeing his war-torn country, he sought guidance from legal experts about his options for safety. They explained the process and benefits of seeking asylum in a new nation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okudduka mu nsi ye eyalimu entalo, yanoonya okulambikibwa okuva mu bakugu mu by'amateeka ku ngeri gy'ayinza okweyimirizaawo. Bannyonnyola emitendera n'emigaso gy'okusaba obubudamu mu nsi empya.
ach_prompt: Inge ngwec ki I lobone ma lweny obalo, en openyo tam ki bot ludiro me cik I kom kit ma en twero gwokke kwede. Gutito yoo me nongo luring ayela ki ber pa nongo luring ayela I lobo manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akerit akwapuke naejaasi keda ejie, abu ngesi kingit aicoreta kama ejaasi ipiriotin luka ikisila kanuikamunitos eyuwara ke. Apotu kesi kitetemoto ainapeta keda ajokis naka aimo ikerai kotoma akwap naitetet.
lgg_prompt: Erini apazu kari erini a'di ni ezale 'bori ma vutia, eri nda imbata engazu 'ba onita be e'yo azita ma dria 'diyi vu geri erini ecozu ageitema esuzu 'diyi ma dria. Eyi nze e'yo geri 'bani emunyale eyi esuzu kari o'diru 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria tualu orodri eyini esu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutoroka eihanga rye eryateirweho orutaro, akashaba obuhabuzi kuruga omu bakugu b'ebiragiro aha by'okwerinda kwe. Bakashoborora enkora n'emigasho y'okushaba obuhungiro omu ihanga risya.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a troubling trend in education. Many students are facing challenges that lead them to leave school before graduation.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kulaga embeera etabula mu by'enjigiriza. Abayizi bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okubaleetera okuva mu ssomero nga tebannattikirwa.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto kit ma jami tye ka time kwede ilok kom kwan. Lutino kwan mapol gitye ka nongo peko ma weko gi weko kwan ma pwod pe gutyeko kwangi.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuitodunitos nuka aingic pac itodunit epone loetiono noi kotoma asioman. Ejaas esisiak luipu keda atiokisio nu ijaikitos kesi anyoun kosomero eringa egraduasi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ebipi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo azi asi otiza fepi onita ma alia ni'i. Sukulu anzi karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyini fe eyini sukulu kuzu de nga po'di eyi depi ku 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka enkora mbi omu by'obwegyese. Abeegi baingi nibatunga oburemeezi oburikubareetera kuruga omu mashomero batakaherize kujwara diguri.

eng_prompt: Research shows that parental involvement plays a crucial role in a child's academic success. Therefore, it is essential for parents to engage actively in their children's educational journey.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza kulaga nti abazadde okwenyigiramu kikola kinene nnyo mu buwanguzi bw'omwana mu kusoma. N'olwekyo, kikulu nnyo abazadde okwenyigira ennyo mu kusoma kw'abaana baabwe.
ach_prompt: Kwed nyutu ni bedo tye pa lunyodo pire tek tutwal I kwan pa lutino. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal ni lunyodo omyero gubed tye ikwan pa lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic ebe ajaut naka auriak iswamai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut naka idwe kotoma asiomanikec. Kanuka ngun, ejok auriak ajaut toma asioman naka idwekec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ece kini e'yo tipika eyini aa'zu alenia ri eri orodriru anzi eyi ma agata onita ma alea ri ma alea. Ka'dini, eri orodriru tipika eyini aa'zu okporu eyi ma anzi eyini muzu onita ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza nikworeka ngu okwejumba kw'abazaire nikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu businguzi bw'abaana omu mashomero. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho abazaire kwejumba omu kwegyesa abaana baabo.

eng_prompt: After searching through every box and file in the attic, they realized they had lost the most important documents. The family had been preparing for the upcoming trip, but there was one crucial detail they hadn't accounted for.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonya mu buli kasanduuko ne fayiro mu kasolya, baakizuula nti baali babuze ebiwandiiko ebisinga obukulu. Aba famire babadde beetegekera olugendo olujja, naye waliwo ekintu kimu ekikulu kyebabadde tebalowoozaako.
ach_prompt: Inge yenyo bok ki fail weng I ot, guniang ni gurwenyo karatac ma pigi tego loyo weng. Lugang ne gubedo ka yubbe pi wot matye kabino anyim, ento onongo tye gin acel ma pire tek ma pe gutamo I kome.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aanyanar kotoma asadukun kere keda apapulai nuka etogo, apotu kesi kojenutu ebe emamiatatar kesi apapulai nuepolok noi. Auta ekale aitemonokin kanuka alosit na ebunit, konye ajai ibore yenitegelikina lomam kesi apodokinit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo sanduku dria azini fayiru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu ra kini eyi avi kokobi orodriru ndeni 'diyi ra. Familia 'da ri de i otu aci emupi ri ni, te e'yo azi okporu eyini ega ku ni ci.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okusherura omu bbokisi zoona hamwe na fayiro omu kashengye, bakareeba ngu bakabura ebihandiiko ebikuru. Eka ekaba etebekanisa oruramburo orurikwija, kwonka hakaba hariho ekintu kimwe kikuru ekibabaire batarikumanya.

eng_prompt: After weeks of waiting for their important paperwork, the students finally gathered to voice their frustrations. Many felt that the school had mishandled their sensitive information, leading to unnecessary stress and confusion.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga balinda ebiwandiiko byabwe ebikulu, abayizi baasembyeyo okukungaana okulaga obwennyamivu bwabwe. Bangi baawulira nti essomero lyakozesezza bubi obubaka bwabwe obw'ekyama, ekivuddeko okusoberwa n'okutabulwa.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me kuro karatac gi ma pigi tego, lutino kwan gucokke me tito cwer cwiny gi. Dano mapol gubedo ki tam ni gang kwan otiyo marac i kom ngec gi, ma okelo lworo ki anywena-nywena.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aidar isabitin kanu apapulaikec nuepolok, apotu esisiak kotukokinos kanu aitijenar aiyalongongokec. Apotu itunga luipu opupoto ebe mam esomero itingit akiro kec nu aiyeyea, ido abu koyangau aiyalongong keda aitolitol.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia eyi ma kokobi orodriru 'diyi tezu 'bori ma vutia, sukulu anzi eyi tra eyi asizu e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi 'diyi ecezu. Ba karakara eyi ega kini sukulu 'da 'ye e'yo eyini 'diyi geri kililiru si ku, e'yo 'da fe eyini aa'zu asi otiza ru azini e'yo eyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara esande nyingi barinzire ebihandiiko byabo ebikuru, abeegi bakahendera bateeranira hamwe kworeka oburemeezi bwabo. Baingi bakahurira ngu eishomero rikaba rikwasire kubi amakuru gaabo ag'ekihama, ekyaretsireho okwerarikirira n'okubuzabuzibwa.

eng_prompt: To ensure proper seating arrangements and materials are available, it is essential to know the total number of participants. Accurate attendance is crucial for maintaining the integrity of the testing environment.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti enteekateeka y'okutuula ennungi n'ebikozesebwa biriwo, kya mugaso okumanya omuwendo gw'abantu bonna abeetabamu. Okubeerawo mu budde kikulu nnyo mu kukuuma obulungi bw'embeera y'okukeberebwa.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni kabedo ki jami tic tye maber, pire tek tutwal me ngeyo wel dano weng matye I yub eni. Bedo tye i gang kwan ikare weng pire tek tutwal pi gwoko ber bedo pa kabedo me pim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aanyun ebe ejaas aiboisio nu iboikinete ka iboro lu itwasamao, ejokuna noi ajenun enaaba loka itunga kere. Alosenen na itunga ejok kanu aidar aiboisit na ainwakio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu kililiru azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma aa'ta kililiru ri nezu, eri orodriru kalafe 'ba emu'ba 'diyi niri nizu. Ba emu'ba 'diyi ma kalafe kililiru ri eri orodriru angu 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua o'bizu ri ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu entebekanisa nungi y'okushutama hamwe n'ebikwato biriho, n'eky'omugasho kumanya omuhendo gw'abantu boona abarikwejumbamu. Okubaho kurungi omu bigyezo n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda oburinganiza bw'embeera y'okukyeberwamu.

eng_prompt: In light of the upcoming academic year, the school administration sent out a reminder to all families. To ensure a smooth enrollment process, timely payments were emphasized.
lug_prompt: Olw'omwaka gw'ebyensoma ogujja, abakulembeze b'essomero baalagidde amaka gonna. Okusobola okukakasa nti okwewandiisa kugenda bulungi, essira lyassibwa ku kusasula mu budde.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki mwaka me kwan matye kabino anyim, ludito me gang kwan gucwalo lok me poyo wic bot gangi weng. Me neno ni yub me coyo lutino tye maber, ki keto cwiny tutwal I kom culu lutino ikare ki kome.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ekaru loka aisisia lo ebunit, apotu engarenok luka esomero ijukasi aiitunite mama ejaasi ikalia kere. Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna ainapeta nuka aiwadikao, aponi isinyikokinai aitac ikapun kotoma apak.
lgg_prompt: Eli onitani emupiri ma e'yosi, driceza sukulu niri fe e'yo egaza familia dria yi dri ra. Lezu e'yo ru siza niri ni muzu kililiru, 'ba 'ba asi robia ofezu sa'wa dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese ogurikwija, abebembezi b'eishomero bakohereza ebiijusyo omu maka goona. Okureeba ngu enkora y'okwehandikisa neetambura kurungi, okushashura omu bwire kikateebwaho amaani.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming flu season, the hospital reviewed its inventory. After assessing the needs of the community, they decided to increase their supplies.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera sizoni ya ssennyiga ejja, eddwaliro lyatunula mu biwandiiko byalyo. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyetaago by'ekitundu, baasalawo okwongera ku bintu byabwe.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi two aburu matye kabino ni, ot yat ne ongiyo jami weng ma tye I iye. Ingee neno miti pa lwak, gumoko tam gi me medo jami gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin kanuka eimidi lo ebunit, abu adekis airereor iboro ke. Akaulo naka airereor ipudesia luka itunga, apotu kesi koseutu aiyatakin iboro kec.
lgg_prompt: Otuta sa'wa abua ni emupi ri ni, arojo 'da andri afa erini 'diyi ma ale andri. Bani e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi asi e'yo 'du afa eyini ayu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera oburwire bwa senyiga oburikwija, eirwariro rikashwijuma ebintu byaryo. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebyetaago by'abantu, bakasharamu kwongyera aha bintu ebi baabaire baine.

eng_prompt: After a long and arduous journey, the refugees finally arrived at the border seeking safety and shelter. Local authorities quickly mobilized resources to assist those in need.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'olugendo oluwanvu era oluzibu, abanoonyiboobubudamu baatuuka ku nsalo nga banoonya obukuumi n'obukuumi. Ab'obuyinza b'ebitundu baakungaanya mangu eby'obugagga okuyamba abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: Ingee wot mabor dok matek tutwal, luring ayela ne dong guo I wang lobo me yenyo gwok ki kabedo. Lutela me tedero gu jogo kony oyot-oyot me konyo lupeko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka erot loewoja noi ido loetiono noi, apotu ikerai kodolokisi oikoru aimo ayuwara keda neperot. Apotu apedorosio nuka atutubena kikamutu iboro atipet kanu aingarakin ngul lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Aci ezu azini ewaru ma vutia, emunyale 'da eyi eca asizu boda milea angu tambaza ni azini angu aa'zu ri ndazu. Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tra robia mbeleru 'ba azakoma lepi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'orugyendo ruraingwa kandi orugumire, empungi zikahika aha nsharo kuronda oburinzi n'oburaaro. Ab'obushoborozi omu byaro, bakahayo juba eby'okukoresa okuhwera abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: After learning about the hospital's urgent need for supplies, the visitors decided to take action. They organized a fundraising event to gather resources for the local healthcare facility.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuyiga ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'ebikozesebwa mu ddwaliro, abagenyi baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. Baategese omukolo gw'okusonda ssente okusonda ebyetaago by'eddwaliro ly'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee niang ni ot yat tye ki miti matek tutwal I kom jami tic, wele gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Guyubu yub me jogo cente pi ot yat me tedero.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na aisisia nuikamunitos eipuda lo adekis lo iboro, apotu ipejok koseutu aswam ibore. Apotu kesi itemokisi aituk ikapun kanu aituk iboro lu adekis.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo onizu arojo 'da ma e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi lepi mbeleru ri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, omu 'da eyi 'du e'yo 'yezu. Eyi otu omu robia trazu 'diyi afa ayuzaru arojo eyi ma alea 'diyi trazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okumanya ngu eirwariro niryetenga eby'okukoresa ahonaaho, abagyenyi bakasharamu kukora. Bakatebekanisa omukoro gw'okurundaana esente z'okurundaana eby'okukoresa omu irwariro ryabo.

eng_prompt: After a thorough review of the inventory, the committee decided it was time to officially document all assets. To ensure proper tracking, the equipment was registered by the chairman.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebintu byonna, akakiiko kaasalawo nti kye kiseera okuwandiika ebintu byonna mu butongole. Okusobola okukakasa okulondoola okulungi, ebyuma byawandiisibwa ssentebe.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma jami weng tye kwede, dul enoni omoko tamgi ni kare dong oromo me coyo jami weng. Me neno ni ki lubu kor tic maber, won kom aye ocoyo jami ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor akiro ngun, abu ekomiti kotema ebe erai apak na aiwadika iboro kere. Kanu awanyun ebe ewanyanaritai ejok, abu apolon eicolong iwadika iswamasia ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani afa 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, komiti 'da 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bo afa dria 'diyi sizu azita pala. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma pamvu onezu kililiru, ogua e'i si yi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi eby'obugaiga, akakiiko kakasharamu ngu nibwo bwire bw'okuhandiika eby'obugaiga omu butongore. Okureeba ngu ebyoma bikahandiikwa kurungi, ebyoma bikahandiikwa mukuru w'entebe.

eng_prompt: After a thorough examination in the emergency room, the doctors decided she needed further observation. The nurse prepared the paperwork for her transfer.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumukebera ennyo mu kasenge k'abalwadde ab'amangu, abasawo baasalawo nti yeetaaga okwekenneenyezebwa ennyo. Omusawo yategeka empapula z'okumuzza mu kifo ekirala.
ach_prompt: Ingee pime maber tutwal I ot yoto kom, ludaktari gumoko tamgi ni omyero kimedde ki ngiyo kome. Nac oyubo karatac me kobo nyakoni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainwakio ejok kotoma agola naka engeso, apotu imurok kotuboto ebe ibusakinit ngesi aanyanar noi. Abu anaasit itemok apapulai kanu aijulanar ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Bani eri andrizu kililiru pari azakoma mbeleru 'diyi ma alia 'bori ma vutia, dakitari 'du e'yo kini eri le 'ba ma andri eri drile. Nurse 'da otu karatasi eyi erini eri ojazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumukyebera kurungi omu kishengye ky'abarweire ab'ahonaaho, abashaho bakasharamu ngu akaba nayetenga kwongyerwa kurebebwa. Naasi akatebeekanisa ebihandiiko by'okumuhindura.

eng_prompt: After a successful fundraising campaign, the community came together to support the hospital's needs. As the donations poured in, the atmosphere of hope and generosity filled the air.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'enteekateeka ennungi ey'okusonda ssente, abantu baakolera wamu okuyamba ebyetaago by'eddwaliro. Obuyambi bwe bwajjanga, embeera y'essuubi n'obugabi yajjula empewo.
ach_prompt: Ingee yub me jogo cente maber tutwal, lwak guribbe kacel me miyo kony ki jami ma mite pi ot yat. I kare ma jami ma kimiyo obino, dano mapol gubedo ki gen ki cwiny me miyo kony.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aituk ikapun, apotu itunga imorikikinos kanu aigang iboro lu ekoto adekis. Neautar ainanakineta alomun, apotu amuno keda ainanakinete kilelebunos kokwam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia trazu drile suzaru 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu emu tualu atita fezu arojo 'da ma afa lele 'diyi dri. Afa feza eyini emuria, asi'baza azini asi'baza eyi ga angu 'da ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushorooza esente kurungi, abantu bakakoragana kuhwera ebyetaago by'eirwariro. Obuhwezi ku bwabaire nibweyongyera, abantu bakaba baine amatsiko n'obufura.

eng_prompt: The community organized a workshop to address important health issues. Participants gathered to learn about various aspects of wellness and prevention.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kyategese omusomo okukola ku nsonga z'ebyobulamu enkulu. Abeetabamu baakuŋŋaanye okuyiga ku nsonga ez'enjawulo ez'obulamu obulungi n'okuziyiza.
ach_prompt: Lwak guyubu kacoke me pwonye me cobo peko me yot kom mapigi tego. Dano ma obedo tye i yub eni gugure me pwonyo jami mapol makwako yot kom ki gengo two.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itemokisi airiamun kanu aitemitem akiro nuka angaleu. Apotu itunga kotukokinos aisisia nuikamunitos aijar ka aitikitik adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da otu otita imbatani ni e'yo rua ala ni okporu 'diyi ma aza kozu. Ba emu'ba 'diyi tra eyi imbata esuzu e'yo ndundu alata ni 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo eyi atrizu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu bakatebekanisa omushomo gw'okukora aha nshonga nkuru z'eby'amagara. Abeejumbiremu baketeerana kwega ebirikukwata aha magara marungi n'okuzibira.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote well-being and resilience, the school organized a series of workshops. These sessions aimed to empower students with knowledge and resources related to emotional and psychological health.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obulamu obulungi n'okugumira embeera, essomero lyategese emisomo egy'enjawulo. Entuula zino zaagendererwamu okuwa abayizi amagezi n'ebikozesebwa ebikwatagana n'obulamu bw'ebirowoozo n'obwongo.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor bedo maber ki diyo cwiny lutino, gang kwan ne oyubu kacoke me pwonye mapol. Yub eni obedo me tyelo kor lutino kwan ki ngec ki jami ma kwako yotkom me tam ki tam.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aijar naka itunga keda apedor, abu esomero itemok airiamununeta nuipu. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai aitogogong esisiak keda acoa ka iboro luikamunitos angaleu naka aomisio keda aomisio.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu aa'ta muke ri ma omgbo otuzu, sukulu 'da otu otita imbatani karakara eyi. Otita 'diyi ma asisile lezu sukulu anzi eyini okpo fezu onita azini afa ayuzaru eyi ecipi e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura entuura nungi hamwe n'okugumisiriza, eishomero rikatebekanisa emishomo mingi. Enteerane ezi zikaba zigyendereire kutunguura abeegi n'obwengye n'ebintu ebirikukwata aha magara g'ebiteekateeko n'ebiteekateeko.

eng_prompt: The recent outbreak of a severe respiratory illness has taken a devastating toll on vulnerable populations. Health officials are alarmed by the rising number of cases among young children.
lug_prompt: Okubalukawo kw'obulwadde bw'okussa okwaliwo gye buvuddeko kukosezza nnyo abantu abateesobola. Ab'ebyobulamu beeraliikirivu olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde mu baana abato ogweyongera.
ach_prompt: Two me yweyo ma opoto cokcok-ki okelo peko madit tutwal I kom dano matye I peko. Lutic me yot kom tye ki lworo I kom wel lutino matye ki two matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Abwangun naka adeka naepol noi naka eiyengane nes emunarit itunga lu ican. Iyalongongosi eswamak lu adekis kanu enaaba lo idwe lu eyatakinos.
lgg_prompt: E'dota o'diru azo oli sezani onzi 'diyiniri 'du 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma dria onzi. Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi asi otiza be kalafe tupi 'ba azo be 'diyi ma eselea anzi nyiri eyi ma eselea risi.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'endwara y'okwisya eyabaireho obwahati, kutwaire abantu baingi munonga. Ab'ebyamagara berarikiriire ahabw'omuhendo gw'abaana abakiri bato ogweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: The influx of refugees has sparked intense debates among local communities and policymakers. Many residents express concerns about the impact on resources and social cohesion.
lug_prompt: Okuyingira kw'abanoonyiboobubudamu kuleeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi mu bantu b'omu kitundu n'abakola amateeka. Abatuuze bangi balaze obweraliikirivu ku ngeri gye kinaakosaamu eby'obugagga n'okukwatagana kw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Bedo tye pa luring ayela okelo laro lok madit tutwal ikin lwak ki lutela. Lutedero mapol tye ki lworo I kom adwogi ne I kom lim ki ribbe ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Alomun na ikerai nes eyaunit epeget loepol noi kiding itunga keda luitolomete ikisila. Itunga luipu itodunitos aiyalongongokec kanuikamunitos epone loepedoria ngesi aitolitol iboro keda aimorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Emunyale eyi ma emuta eji agbatara okporu ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'ba azita sipi 'diyi pie. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi asi otiza e'da e'yo eyi 'yepi lonyi eyivile 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okugaruka kw'empungi kureesireho okuhanuura kw'amaani omu bantu b'omubyaro hamwe n'abakozi b'ebiragiro. Abatuuragye baingi niberarikirira aha bikwatireine n'eby'obugaiga hamwe n'okukwatanisa kw'abantu.

eng_prompt: Many women around the world face significant health risks during pregnancy and childbirth. Despite advancements in medical care, the challenges in accessing quality healthcare persist.
lug_prompt: Abakyala bangi okwetooloola ensi yonna boolekaganye n'obulabe obw'amaanyi mu by'obulamu nga bali mbuto n'okuzaala. Wadde nga waliwo enkulaakulana mu by'obujjanjabi, okusoomoozebwa mu kufuna obujjanjabi obw'omutindo kukyaliwo.
ach_prompt: Mon mapol I wilobo lung gi nongo peko me yot kom ikare me yacu ki nywal. Kadi bed ni rwom me kony me yot kom tye malo, peko me nongo kony me yot kom ma rwom gi malo pud tye.
teo_prompt: Angor nuipu kotoma akwap kere ejaas keda atiokisio nu angaleu kapak naka apotu ka aidoun. Karaida ejai apol toma amukian, eringa atiokisio nuka adumun amukian na abeit ejaas.
lgg_prompt: Oku karakara wudrikurusi ndulu 'diyi e'yo ewaru rua ala ni 'diyi esu sawa okporovu ni azini mva osiria. E'yo angu ezoma ni arojo eyi ma alea ra ti, e'yo ewaru e'yo alata muke 'diyi esuzu ri ma alea 'diyi nga po'di ci.
nyn_prompt: Abakazi baingi omunsi yoona nibatunga akabi aha magara gaabo baaba baine enda n'okuzaara. Oihireho entunguuka omu by'amagara, oburemeezi bw'okutunga obujanjabi burungi bukiriho.

eng_prompt: The government has recognized the alarming rates of maternal and child deaths in the region. In response, health officials are implementing new strategies to improve healthcare access and education for expectant mothers.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti etegedde omuwendo gw'abakyala abafiira mu ssanya n'abaana abafiira mu ssanya mu kitundu. Mu kwanukula, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bateeka mu nkola enkola empya okutumbula obujjanjabi n'okusomesa bamaama abali embuto.
ach_prompt: Gamente oniang wel mege ki lutino ma too ikare me nywal tye ka kelo lworo tutwal I twok piny eni. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me yot kom tye katic ki yoo manyen me ilo malo rwom me nongo kony me yot kom ki kwan pi mon ma oyac.
teo_prompt: Abu apugan koany adoketait naepol noi naka atwakisia nuka angor keda idwe katutubet. Kanu aitemokin ngun, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aitegear iwaitin luitetiak kanu aitojokar adumunun amukian keda asioman naka angor nuepotiete.
lgg_prompt: Gamete esu e'yo ewaru ayia eyini azini anzi nyiri eyini odrazu angu 'di ma alea ri ra. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi geri o'diru 'diyi 'ba geri eyini ecozu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu azini onita fezu ayia okporovu ru 'diyini ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti eyorekire omuhendo gw'abakazi n'abaana abarikufa omu kicweka ekyo. Ab'eby'amagara bariyo nibata omu nkora oburyo busya bw'okutunguura eby'amagara n'obwegyese bw'abakazi abaine enda.

eng_prompt: The local government has recognized the need for improved healthcare access in rural areas. As a result, they have announced plans to enhance medical facilities in underserved communities.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebitundu etegedde obwetaavu bw'okutumbula obujjanjabi mu byalo. N'ekivuddemu, balangiridde enteekateeka z'okutumbula ebyobulamu mu bitundu ebitakyaweebwa.
ach_prompt: Gamente me tedero oniang miti me medo rwom me nongo kony me yot kom I caro. Macalo adwogi ne, gunyuto yub me ilo malo rwom me odi yadi I kabedo ma pe ki kony ma oromo.
teo_prompt: Abu apugan na okwap koany eipud loka aitojokar adumunun amukian kocaaloi. Kanuka ngun, alimor kesi aitemonokineta nuka aitojokar aiboisio nuka amukian kotoma aiboisio nu mam ijanakino.
lgg_prompt: Gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo lezu alata ma esuta angu caloru 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi azi otita eyi arojo eyi ma omgbo otuzu ongulumu eyini azi ngazu ku 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebyanga eyorekire ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'okutunguura eby'amagara omu byaro. N'ekyarugiremu,barangirire enteekateeka y'okutunguura eby'amagara omu byaro ebitarikuhikwaho obuheereza.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the integrity of the electoral process is crucial for ensuring that every voice is heard. Therefore, it is essential to promote an environment where citizens can express their choices without fear or violence.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, obwesimbu bw'enkola y'okulonda bukulu nnyo okukakasa nti buli ddoboozi liwulirwa. N'olw'ekyo, kya mugaso okutumbula embeera bannansi mwe basobola okwogera bye baagala awatali kutya na butabanguko.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, ber bedo pa yub me bolo kwir pire tek tutwal me neno ni dwon pa dano weng ki winyo. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal me kelo kabedo kama anywali twero loko tamgi labongo lworo onyo tim gero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka aseo, ejokuna noi ainapeta nuka aseo kanu awanyun ebe epupio iporotoi kere. Kanuka ngun, erai ibore yenepol noi aitopolorite ejautene loepedoriata itunga einer nu ekotos kesi komam akurianu keda amumu.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democracia ni ma alea, e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi ma wura muke ri eri orodriru nezu ra kini 'ba dria ma o'duko eri ra. Ka'dini, eri orodriru angu azi kari anzi eyini ecozu e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi ecezu ori kokoru azini ngiringiri kokoru ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, oburingaaniza omu by'oburuuru n'obw'omugasho kureeba ngu buri jwi ryahurirwa. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho okureetaho obusingye obu abatuuragye barikubaasa kugamba ebi barikwenda bataine kutiina nainga obutabanguko.

eng_prompt: After weeks of enduring long hours and inadequate resources, she finally decided to voice her frustrations. The constant stress and lack of support had taken a toll on her morale.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwera ng'agumiikiriza essaawa empanvu n'obutaba na bikozesebwa bimala, yasembayo okusalawo okulaga obwennyamivu bwe. Okweraliikirira buli kiseera n'obutaba na buyambi byali bimukosezza nnyo.
ach_prompt: Inge cabit mapol me diyo cwinye pi cawa malac ki jami ma pe oromo, en dong otyeko moko tamme me tito cwer cwiny ma en tye kwede. Lworo kacel ki can kony ma onongo en tye kwede ikare weng oketo cwinye I peko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka ainguun isawan luipu keda ikapun luikidioko, abu ngesi kotub aomisioitike. Ajaut keda aiyalongong naepol noi keda amamus na agangat abu koinak iponesioke aibiror.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia sa'wa ezu tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako be, asizu asizu asi e'yo erini candi fezu 'diyi ecezu. E'yo asi omiza azini atita ako sawa driasi ri 'du eri ma adriza onzi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okugumisiriza eshaaha ndaingwa hamwe n'eby'obugaiga ebitarikumara, ahamuheru akasharamu kugamba oburemeezi bwe. Okwerarikirira obutoosha hamwe n'okuburwa obuhwezi bikamutwara aha mutima.

eng_prompt: After hours of heated discussion, the group found themselves at an impasse. Each member had differing opinions on the best course of action, leading to frustration and confusion.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okumala essaawa eziwera, ekibinja kyatuuka mu kattu. Buli mmemba yalina endowooza ez'enjawulo ku ky'okukola ekisinga obulungi, ekyaviirako okwetamwa n'okutabulwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee lok matek tutwal pi cawa malac, gurup ne gunongo gi I peko madit tutwal. Lamemba acel-acel obedo ki tam mapat-pat I kom ngo ma omyero otimme, ma okelo anywena-nywena ki anywena-nywena.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara noi adaun isawan luipu, apotu egurupu odumutu ebe ejai ationis. Ajaasi imeeban luka atukot ngin keda aomisio nuegelegela nuikamunitos epone loibusakinit aswam, ido abu koyangau aitolitol keda aitolitol.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani agbatara okporu 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu 'da esu eyi e'yo ewaru ma alea. Ba alu alu 'diyi ma egata ndundu e'yo 'bani 'ye kililiru ri ma dria, e'yo fepi candi fezu azini e'yo onzi ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga kumara eshaaha nyingi, guruupu ekaba etungire oburemeezi. Buri muntu akaba aine ebiteekateeko ebitarikushushana aha ky'okukora, ekyarugiremu okwerarikirira n'okubuzabuzibwa.

eng_prompt: Recent incidents of unauthorized crossings and rising tensions in the region have raised concerns about border security. As a result, officials are evaluating measures to enhance protection and ensure safety.

eng_prompt: During our meeting with the president, we expressed our concerns about the challenges faced by our community. The lack of adequate healthcare resources has become a pressing issue that we felt needed immediate attention.

ach_prompt: I tic me yot kom, bedo ki gen ki winye ikin lutwo pire tek tutwal pi kony me yot kom maber. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal ki lutic yoto kom me keto woro ki woro pa joo ma gitiyo botgi obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam naka amukian, aiduk amunokina keda eidicane loajokan keda adekak erai ibore yenepol noi kanu amukian najokan. Kanuka ngun, erai ibore yenepol noi angaleu aisingarenit aibuses keda ayongit naka ngul lu ijanakinete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Azi dakitari niri ma alea, asi'baza sizu tualu aa'ta 'ba azoru 'diyi pie ri eri orodriru azakoma kililiru fezu. Ka'dini, eri orodriru azi'ba arojo ni 'diyini inzita fezu 'ba eyini azi ngazu 'diyi dri okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu buheereza bw'eby'amagara, okwesiga abarwaire n'okubagirira omukago, n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okureeberera kurungi abarwaire. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho munonga abashaho kwebembeza ekitinisa n'ekitiinisa ky'abo abu barikuheereza.

eng_prompt: Despite their tireless efforts during the pandemic, many healthcare professionals are facing financial uncertainty. As a result, there is growing frustration among medical staff regarding delayed payments.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga bafubye nnyo mu kiseera ky'ekirwadde, abasawo bangi boolekaganye n'ebizibu by'ensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo obwennyamivu obweyongera mu basawo olw'okulwawo okusasulwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek tutwal I kare man me poto pa gemo, lutic yot kom mapol gitye ki peko me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, cwiny lutic yoto kom tye ka cwer pi cul ma gale.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamaete kesi kagogong kotoma apakio kanu nuka ekorona, ejaasi eswamak luka angaleu keda atiokisio nuka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, ejai aiyalongong kanejaas eswamak lu adekis kanu aiyap aitac kes.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini 'ye sawa azo 'dezanirisi ra ti, azi'ba arojo ni karakara 'diyi dri fu e'yo ewaru robia ma dria 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, e'yo 'ba azi ngapi arojoa 'diyi ma dria sawa ezaza ma e'yosi ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani gaabo omu bwire bw'endwara ruranda nsi, abashaho baingi tibarikumanya oburemeezi bw'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, abakozi b'eby'amagara beeyongyeire kwetomboita ahabw'emishara yaabo erikukyerererwa.

eng_prompt: Despite working long hours and taking on multiple responsibilities, our financial situation remains dire. Many of us struggle to make ends meet each month.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga tukola essaawa nnyingi era nga tulina obuvunaanyizibwa bungi, embeera yaffe ey'eby'enfuna ekyali mbi. Bangi ku ffe tufuba okweyimirizaawo buli mwezi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni watiyo pi cawa malac dok watye ki tic mapol, lok me lim pud tye marac tutwal. Pol pa wan watye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo dwe ki dwe.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamai sio isawan luipu ka aswam aswamisinei nuipu, eringa ejautenekosi loka ikapun erono noi. Ipu oni lu itereikina keda aijar kangolilap.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza sawa ezu ri ma talasi azini azi 'duza karakara 'diyi 'duzu ra ti, e'yo robia ni amavile ri ni ri nga po'di onzi. Ama karakara eyi dri ci afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi esuzu imba alu alu vusi.
nyn_prompt: N'obu turaabe nitukora eshaaha nyingi kandi twine n'obujunaanizibwa bwingi, embeera yaitu y'esente ekiri kubi munonga. Baingi omuriitwe niturwana kureberera ebyetengo byaitu buri kwezi.

eng_prompt: After a long discussion about budgeting and saving, the parents decided it was time to distribute the funds. The children eagerly gathered around the table, excited to see how much they would receive this month.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okumala ebbanga eddene ku mbalirira n'okutereka, abazadde baasalawo nti kye kiseera okugaba ensimbi. Abaana baakungaanidde ku mmeeza nga baagala nnyo okumanya ssente mmeka ze bagenda okufuna omwezi guno.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok pi kare malac I kom byek me lim ki gwoko lim, lunyodo gumoko ni kare dong oromo me poko lim. Lutino gucokke ki miti madit tutwal I nget meja, cwiny gi obedo yom me neno wel cente ma gubi nongo I dwe eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitemitem nuka ebajet keda aimono ikapun, apotu auriak koseutu ebe erai apak naka aikor ikapun. Apotu idwe kotukokinos ameja, iyalamasi noi kanu aanyun ikapun lu edumunenete kesi olap lo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza ezu 'bori ma vutia otita aje robia niri ma dria, tipika 'da eyi 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bo robia 'da awazu. Anzi nyiri eyi tra eyi mesa ma kalasi avasi eyini ayikosi ndrezu robia eyini nga esu imba 'disi ri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura obwire buraingwa aha nkora y'embaririra hamwe n'okubiika, abazaire bakasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okugaba esente. Abaana baketeeranira aha meeza, bashemereirwe kureeba esente ezibarikuza kutunga okwezi oku.

eng_prompt: In response to growing environmental concerns and community health issues, local residents urged the district council to take action. After extensive discussions and public hearings, the council decided to implement stricter regulations.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'obutonde bw'ensi obweyongera n'ensonga z'ebyobulamu mu kitundu, abatuuze baasaba akakiiko ka disitulikiti okubaako kye kakolawo. Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi n'okuwulira abantu, akakiiko kaasazeewo okussaawo amateeka amakakali.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me cwec ma orumuwa kacel ki peko me yot kom ma tye kamede, lutedero gulego dul me district me timo gin mo. Ingee nywako lok mapol ki winyo lok pa lwak, kancil omoko tamgi me keto cik matek tutwal itic.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyalongongo na akwap keda nuka angaleu naka itunga, apotu itunga kilipata ekansulo loka edisitrikt aswam ngun. Akaulo naka ipegeta luipu keda apupio naka itunga, abu ekansulo koseu aitegear ikisila luetioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ama agei ri ma tambazu tualu e'yo rua ala ni ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi pie, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ai kanisulu distrikiti niri e'yo 'yezu. E'yo onzeza angiri azini o'bi yi ma tia 'bori ma vutia, kanisulu 'du e'yo azita okporu 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enshonga z'obuhangwa bw'ensi hamwe n'eby'amagara g'abantu, abatuuragye bakashaba akakiiko ka disiturikiti kugira eki kakozireho. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga n'abantu,akakiiko kakacwamu kutaho ebiragiro by'amaani.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous discussions and a clear mandate from the community, the council has struggled to take decisive action. As a result, many residents are growing increasingly frustrated with the lack of progress.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo kungi n'ekiragiro ekitangaavu okuva mu kitundu, akakiiko kafunye obuzibu okusalawo. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze bangi beeyongera okunyiiga olw'obutaba na nkulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lwak gubedo ka lok i kom lok enoni tyen mapol, dul enoni onongo tek tutwal me moko tamgi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero mapol tye ka cwer cwiny gi pi peko me dongo lobo matye.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi ipegeta luipu keda aicoreta nuecaete kanejaas itunga, etionikinit ekansulo aswam nuepedori kere. Kanuka ngun, mam itunga luka atutubet iyalamasi kanu amamus na apol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza karakara 'diyi ma talasi azini azita 'bani fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi ma talasi, kanisulu 'da esu ewaru e'yo 'duzu okporu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma asi eza e'yo angu ezoma ni yo risi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuhanuura kwingi hamwe n'ekiragiiro kirikwetegyerezibwa kuruga omu bantu, akakiiko karemirwe kukora eky'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baingi beeyongyeire kuhwamu amaani ahabw'obutabaho bw'entunguuka.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous environmental regulations in place, local authorities faced pressure from developers eager to clear land for new projects. In a controversial decision, district officials chose to overlook the law.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waaliwo amateeka mangi agakwata ku butonde bw'ensi, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baayolekagana n'okunyigirizibwa okuva mu bazimbi abaali baagala okuggulawo ettaka lya pulojekiti empya. Mu kusalawo okwabaddemu okusika omuguwa, abakungu ba disitulikiti baasalawo okubuusa amaaso etteeka.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni ki keto cik mapol i kom cwec ma orumuwa, lutela me tedero gunongo lyeto ki bot lugedo ma onongo gitye ki miti me kwanyo ngom pi yub manyen. I moko tam ma opong ki apoka-poka, lutic me district oyero me cayo cik.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas ikisila luipu luka alupok, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubena odumutu agogongu kama ejaasi itunga luekotosi aitemokin alupok kanu ipurojektin luitetiak. Kotoma aomisio nuetioko, apotu eswamak luko disitrikt koseutu apalunit ekisil.
lgg_prompt: Azita angu ama agei ri ma tambazu 'diyi ma talasi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi esu okpo engazu 'ba angu ezoma ejipi 'diyi vu lepi angu 'da sizu otita o'diru 'diyini. E'yo 'duza okporu ni ma alea, azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi pe e'yo 'duzu azita ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho ebiragiro by'obuhangwa bw'ensi bingi, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bakashanga oburemeezi kuruga omu ba purogyekiti abaabaire nibenda kushorooza eitaka ry'okukoreramu purogyekiti ensya. Abeebembezi ba disiturikiti, omu kusharamu kubi, bakasharamu kwehuzya ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote environmental sustainability and enhance community green spaces, local officials announced a new initiative. As part of this program, the district has provided people with trees for planting.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obutonde bw'ensi n'okutumbula ebifo ebirabika obulungi mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyalo baalangirira enteekateeka empya. Ng'omu ku nteekateeka eno, disitulikiti ewadde abantu emiti egy'okusimba.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ki medo rwom me kabedo ma orumowa, lutic me tedero gucwalo lok angeya manyen. Macalo but yub man, district omiyo yadi ki dano me apita.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopolor aiboisio nu akwap keda aitopolor aiboisio nu ekwam, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kolimosi ainapeta nuitetiak. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta nu, ejaiki edisitrikt itunga ikito lu iraete.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu angu amani aa'zu alenia ri ma tambazu dika angu o'bi eyini aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi azi e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma azi ru, distrikiti fe 'ba eyini pati eyi sazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obuhangwa n'okutunguura emyanya y'ebyaro, abakuru b'ebyaro bakarangirira enteekateeka nsya. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, disiturikiti ehereize abantu emiti y'okubyara.

eng_prompt: Despite the importance of community engagement, many local leaders struggle to find time for public forums. This has led to growing concerns about transparency and accountability in local governance.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga kya mugaso okukwataganya abantu, abakulembeze b'ebitundu bangi balwana okufuna obudde mu nkungaana z'olukale. Kino kireetedde okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bwerufu n'embalirira mu bukulembeze bw'ebitundu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni ber tutwal me rweyo lwak, lutela me tedero mapol gi nongo tek tutwal me nongo cawa me lok ki lwak. Man okelo lworo madit tutwal I kom ada ki kor tic I tela me tedero.
teo_prompt: Karaida epol ajokis naka aimorikikin itunga, etionikinitos engarenok luka atutubet adumun apak naka atukonokin keda itunga. Eyangaunit ngin aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos aica ka aitodunit eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun kotoma apuganisinei nuka atutubena.
lgg_prompt: E'yo orodri ongulumu eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri ma talasi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi dri ci sa'wa esuzu mitingi o'bi eyini 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'di fe asi otiza tuzu e'yo ada ma dria azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria driceza angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho omugasho gw'okwetabamu kw'abantu, abebembezi b'ebyaro baingi nibarwana kutunga obwire bw'enteerane z'abantu boona. Eki kireesireho okwerarikirira ahabw'oburingaaniza n'embaririra omu bwebembezi bw'ebyaro.

eng_prompt: In light of recent evaluations, the district has decided to implement new measures to improve workforce efficiency. As part of this initiative, the district will delay the payments of non-performing civil servants.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko, disitulikiti esazeewo okussaawo enkola empya okutumbula abakozi. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, disitulikiti ejja kulwawo okusasula abakozi ba gavumenti abakola obubi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kwed ma otime cokcok-ki, district omoko tamme me keto yoo manyen me ilo malo rwom me tic pa lutic. Macalo but yub man, district obi gale ki culu lutic pa gamente ma pe tye katimo maber.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nu inwakunitai pac, aseun edisitrikt aitegear iponesio luitetiak luka aitojokar eswamae loka eswamak. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ebuni edisitrikt aiyap aitac eswamak lu mam iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani andri o'diru 'diyi ma dria, distrikiti 'du e'yo geri o'diru 'diyi 'bazu azi'ba eyi ma okpo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, distrikiti ni mu azi'ba gameteni azi ngapi muke ku 'diyi ma musara sa'wa eza.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha kucondooza okwakozirwe obwahati, disiturikiti eshaziremu kutaho emiringo misya y'okutunguura omutindo gw'abakozi. Omu nteekateeka egi, disiturikiti neija kukyerererwa okushashura abakozi ba gavumenti abarikukora kubi.

eng_prompt: In order to improve the quality of education and services, the district must address its staffing challenges. A thorough assessment of current personnel has revealed significant gaps in expertise and experience.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutumbula omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza n'obuweereza, disitulikiti erina okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kw'abakozi baayo. Okwekenenya ennyo abakozi abaliwo kulaga ebituli ebinene mu bukugu n'obumanyirivu.
ach_prompt: Me ilo malo rwom me kwan ki kony, district omyero ocob peko me nongo lutic. Kwed matut I kom lutic matye I kare-ni onyuto apoka-poka madit tutwal I diro ki ngec ma gitye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar adoketait na asioman keda ejanakine, ekot edisitrikt aitemokin atiokisio nuka eswamak. Aingic ejok eswamak lu ejaas kwana itodunit ebe emamiatatar kesi keda acoa naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Lezu onita ma omgbo otuzu azini azakoma fele o'bi eyidri ri ma omgbo otuzu, le distrikiti ma ko e'yo ewaru azi'ba eyini 'diyi ma aza. ꞋBani aziꞌba sawa ꞌdisi ꞌdiyi ma ale andrizu kililiru ꞌbori ece eꞌyo ꞌbani azi ngazu kililiru azini nita be ꞌdiyi ma eselea ꞌdiyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Okubaasa kutunguura omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese hamwe n'obuheereza, disiturikiti eshemereire kukora ahaburemeezi bw'abakozi baayo. Okucondooza kurungi abakozi abariho hati, kworeka oburemeezi bw'amaani omu bukugu n'obumanyirizi.

eng_prompt: In response to ongoing concerns about productivity and effectiveness, the district conducted a thorough evaluation of its staff. As a result, several employees were identified as not meeting performance standards.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okugenda mu maaso ku kukola n'obwangu, disitulikiti yakola okwekenneenya mu bujjuvu ku bakozi baayo. N'ekyavaamu, abakozi abawerako baazuulibwa nga abatatuukiriza mutindo gw'emirimu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo matye ikit ma tic tye kawot kwede, district otimo kwed matut I kom luticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, ki nongo ni lutic mapol pe gutimo tic ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu elosi akonye nuikamunitos aswam keda eswamae loejok, abu edisitrikt irereonor eswamak ke. Kanuka ngun, aponi kodumunai ebe mam eswamak luipu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni muzu drile e'yo azi ngazu kililiru ri ma dria, distrikiti 'ye azi'ba erini 'diyi ma ale andri kililiru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba esu azi'ba karakara eyi awini azi nga kililiru ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu okwerarikirira okurikugyenda omu maisho, disiturikiti ekakora okushwijuma kw'abakozi baayo. N'ekyarugiremu, abakozi baingi bakareebwa nk'abatarikukuratira omutindo gw'emirimo.

eng_prompt: Many families have been displaced from their homes due to ongoing conflict and instability. As a result, they find themselves in dire situations, struggling to secure basic necessities.
lug_prompt: Amaka mangi gasenguddwa mu maka gaabwe olw'obukuubagano n'obutali butebenkevu obugenda mu maaso. N'ekivuddemu, beesanga mu mbeera embi, nga balwana okufuna ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Gangi mapol gurwenyo gangi gi pi lweny ki lweny matye kawot anyim. Macalo adwogi ne, ginongo kengi I kwo matek tutwal, gitye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Aponi itobwounai ikalia luipu koreriakec kanuka ingungeta keda amamus na ainapakina. Kanuka ngun, edumunenete kesi awate kec kotoma ojautene loetiono noi, etiono adumun iboro luipudasi kesi.
lgg_prompt: Familia karakara eyi ofu aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea risi e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma e'yosi. E'yo 'disi, yi yi esu e'yo ewaru ma alia, yini dri ciria afa lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Amaka maingi gasindwirwe kuruga omu maka gaago ahabw'entaro n'obutabanguko ebirikugyenda omu maisho. N'ekyarugiremu, nibeshanga omu mbeera mbi, barikurwana kutunga ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of refugees entering the country, officials recognized the need to better understand their circumstances. To address this, the government has initiated a comprehensive assessment of their needs and obstacles.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abanoonyiboobubudamu ogweyongera okuyingira eggwanga, abakungu baalaba obwetaavu bw'okutegeera obulungi embeera zaabwe. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno, gavumenti etandise okwekenneenya ebyetaago byabwe n'ebibalemesa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki wel luring ayela matye kadonyo I lobo Uganda, lutic guniang ni omyero guniang maber kit ma kwo gi tye kwede. Me tyeko lok man, gamente ocako timo kwed matut I kom miti gi ki peko gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka ikerai lueutasi alomar toma akwapuwok, apotu eswamak kojenutu eipud loka amisiikin ejautenekec. Kanu aitemokin ngun, egeunit apugan airereonor ipudesia kec keda atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe emunyale eyini emupi kari 'di ma alea tutu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi esu e'yo eyi ma e'yo vazu kililiru ra. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, gamete e'do e'yo yi ma afa lele azini e'yo eyi atripi 'diyi ma ale andrizu dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'empungi ogweyongyeire kuza omu ihanga, abakuru bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okwetegyereza gye embeera zaabo. Okukora aha nshonga egi,gavumenti etandikireho okushwijuma ebyetengo byabo hamwe n'ebibaremesa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support displaced communities, the government has implemented a new program aimed at providing sustainable livelihoods. As part of this initiative, the refugees have been given land to engage in agricultural activities.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyamba abantu ababundabunda, gavumenti etadde mu nkola enteekateeka empya egendereddwamu okubeezaawo obulamu obweyagaza. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abanoonyiboobubudamu baweereddwa ettaka okwenyigira mu byobulimi.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me konyo kabedo ma dano guringo ki I kabedogi, gamente okatti ki yub manyen ma tye ki miti me miyo yoo me kwo maber. Macalo but yub man, kimiyo ngom ki luring ayela me pur.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aigang itunga lu aponi itobwotarai, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuitetiak nu ekotosi aijaikin itunga aijar na ejok. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ejaikitai ikerai alupok kanu akoru.
