lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani lezu atita fezu ongulumu 'bani ofu angu eyi ma alea risi, gamete 'ba otita azi o'diru 'bani lezu geri eyini aa'zu aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba fe emunyale eyini nyaku 'yeta agirikica ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuhwera abantu ababingirwe omu myanya yaabo, gavumenti etandikireho enteekateeka nsya erikugyenderera okureetaho emituurire mirungi. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, empungi ziheirwe eitaka ry'okwejumba omu mirimo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing needs of the community, local officials have prioritized improvements in the education sector. As a result, the district has established new education infrastructures.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'abantu obweyongera, abakungu b'ebyalo bakulembezza okutumbula ebyenjigiriza. N'ekivuddemu, disitulikiti etaddewo ebizimbe by'okusomeramu ebipya.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak, lutic me tedero guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom ilo malo rwom me kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, dictrikoyubu gangi kwan manyen.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kisingarenata aitojokar ewai loka asioman. Kanuka ngun, aduku edisitrikt isomeroi luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini lele tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'ba e'yo okporu esele onita niri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, distrikiti si angu onita ni o'diru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu ebyeyongyeire, abakuru omu byaro bateire amaani omu kutunguura eby'obwegyese. Ekyarugiremu, disiturikiti etandikireho eby'obwegyese ebisya.

eng_prompt: Many aspiring entrepreneurs face significant financial barriers when trying to launch their ventures. As a result, they often struggle to secure the necessary funding for their business projects.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi abaagala okutandikawo bizineesi basanga obuzibu bw'ensimbi nga bagezaako okutandikawo bizineesi zaabwe. N'ekivuddemu, batera okulwana okufuna ensimbi ezeetaagisa mu pulojekiti zaabwe eza bizinensi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol matye ki miti me cako biacara ginongo peko me lim kace gitye ka cako biacara gi. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare gi nongo peko me nongo lim ma mite pi yub me biacara gi.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu lu ekotosi agwelanar etereikina keda atiokisio nu ikapun kapak kana aitegear ibiasaranakec. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi ainingosit adumun ikapun lu ekotos kesi kanu ipurojektin kec luka ebiasara.
lgg_prompt: Ba lepi tujari 'yepi 'diyi ma karakara eyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu eyini eyi ma tujari e'doria. E'yo 'disi, eyi sa'wa driasi dri ci robia esuzu otita eyini tujari 'yezu 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi abarikwenda kutandika bizinesi nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi bw'esente baaba nibagyezaho kutandika zaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kurwana kutunga esente ezirikwetengwa kukora purogyekiti zaabo.

eng_prompt: In light of recent budget cuts and increasing demand for services, the district is exploring various funding options. One potential avenue is to seek financial assistance from government programs dedicated to enhancing community services.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusala mu mbalirira gyebuvuddeko n'obwetaavu bw'obuweereza obweyongera, disitulikiti enoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okuvujjirira. Engeri emu eyinza okukozesebwa kwe kunoonya obuyambi bw'ensimbi okuva mu pulogulaamu za gavumenti ezirwanirira okutumbula obuweereza mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki ngolo byek me lim ma otime cokcok-ki ki mede pa miti me miyo kony, district tye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me nongo lim. Yo acel matwero tic kwede obedo yenyo kony me lim kibot yub pa gamente makemme ki ilo malo rwom me miyo kony bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitidisiar ebajet keda eipud loka aijanakino, euta edisitrikt aingic iwaitin luegelegela luka aigang ikapun. Epone ediope loibusakinit aswam ngesi aimo agangat na ikapun kanejaas ainapeta nuka apugan kanu aitojokar aijanakino naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Otita aje robia niri ma omgbo esizu o'diru ri ma e'yosi tualu e'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele o'bi eyidri ri ma omgbo tuzu ri be, distrikiti ni geri ndundu robia esuzu 'diyi onda. Geri azi ecopi ra 'diyi ma azi eri atita robia niri esuzu engazu otita gamete ni 'diyi vu azakoma fele o'bi eyidri ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyendeeza embaririra y'eihanga hamwe n'okwetenga kw'obuheereza kweyongyeire, disiturikiti eriyo necondooza emiringo mingi y'okutungiramu sente. Omuringo gumwe n'okuronda obuhwezi bw'esente kuruga omu nteekateeka za gavumenti ezirikwongyera aha buheereza bw'abantu.

eng_prompt: Due to recent budget cuts and declining revenue, local officials are struggling to meet the community's growing needs. As a result, essential projects have been put on hold indefinitely.
lug_prompt: Olw'okusala ku mbalirira gyebuvuddeko n'okukendeera kw'omusolo, abakungu b'ebyalo balwana okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'ekitundu ebigenda byeyongera. N'ekivuddemu, pulojekiti ez'omugaso ziyimiriziddwa ekiseera ekitali kigere.
ach_prompt: Pi ngolo byek me lim ma okato cokcok-ki ki wel lim matye kadok piny, lutic me tedero gitye ka tute matek me cobo miti pa lwak matye kamede ameda. Macalo adwogi ne, yub mapat-pat mapigi tego ki juku tic gi pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aitidisiar ebajet keda aitidisiar ikapun, eutasi eswamak luka atutubet aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga. Kanuka ngun, aponi ibwaikinai ipurojektin luepolok noi.
lgg_prompt: Otita aje robia niri ma omgbo esizu azini robia esuza ma omgbo esizu risi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri ci e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba atri otita orodriru 'diyi sa'wa ezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embaririra y'eihanga okukyendeera, abakuru b'ebyaro nibarwana kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, purogyekiti ez'omugasho zibingirweho.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing concerns about deteriorating infrastructure, local officials have been advocating for improvements. After extensive discussions, the decision was made to prioritize transportation upgrades.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku by'obutonde ebyonoonese, abakungu b'ebyalo babadde balwanirira okulongoosebwa. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, okusalawo kwakolebwa okukulembeza okulongoosa entambula.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamede I kom rwom me tic mapat-pat matye ka bale, lutic me tedero gubedo ka lweny pi dongo lobo. Ingee nywako lok mapol, kimoko tam me medo rwom me tic me wot.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naepol noi naikamunit aibiror naka adukena, ekotosi eswamak luka atutubet aitojokar. Akaulo naka ipegeta luipu, aponi itolomunai aseunet naka aitojokar elose.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi a'di 'di e'yo otuza ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo onzeza angiri ma vutia, 'ba 'du e'yo 'duzu e'yo acipa ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu okori ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira ahaby'okwombeka ebirikugyenda omu maisho, abakuru omu byaro batwire nibarwanirira entunguuka. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga, hakabaho okusharamu kutunguura eby'engyenda.

eng_prompt: Many displaced individuals face significant challenges in accessing basic necessities. As a result, their living conditions often deteriorate significantly.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi ababundabunda basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu kufuna ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo. N'ekivuddemu, embeera z'obulamu bwabwe zitera okwonooneka ennyo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma gurwenyo gangi gi nongo peko madit tutwal I nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, rwom me kwo gi pol kare bale tutwal.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu lu aponi itobwounai kotoma aiboisio kec etereikina keda ainingosia nuipu noi kanu adumun iboro luipudasi kesi. Kanuka ngun, emunarete aijar kec noi.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara angu kokoru 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu afa lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, geri yini aa'zu ri ma wura ni i ezara tu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi ababingirwe omu maka gaabo, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kutunga ebintu ebikuru. N'ekyarugiremu, emituurire yaabo neetandika kusiisikara munonga.

eng_prompt: Many displaced individuals face significant challenges in their new environments. As a result, they often struggle to find adequate healthcare resources.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi ababundabunda basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu bifo byabwe ebipya. N'ekivuddemu, batera okulwana okufuna obujjanjabi obumala.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol ma gurwenyo gangi gi nongo peko madit tutwal I kabedo gi manyen. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare gi nongo peko me nongo kony me yot kom ma oromo.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu lu aponi itobwounai kotoma aiboisio kec luitetiak ejaas keda atiokisio nuepolok noi. Kanuka ngun, etiono kesi adumun amukian naedolit.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara apapi engazu angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea risi 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu angu eyini aa'zu o'diru 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, eyi sa'wa driasi dri ci afa arojo ni 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi ababingirwe omu maka gaabo, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu myanya yaabo misya. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kurwana kutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara oburikumara.

eng_prompt: Many young girls face significant challenges in refugee camps, including limited access to basic hygiene products. As a result, their health and dignity are often compromised during critical times.
lug_prompt: Abawala abato bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu nkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu, omuli n'okulemererwa okufuna ebintu ebikozesebwa mu buyonjo. N'ekivuddemu, obulamu bwabwe n'ekitiibwa kyabwe bitera okukosebwa mu biseera ebizibu.
ach_prompt: Anyira matino mapol ginongo peko mapol tutwal I kem pa luring ayela, ma I kingi obedo peko me nongo jami ma mite pi gwoko lengo. Macalo adwogi ne, yotkom gi ki woro gi ipol kare gi bale ikare me peko.
teo_prompt: Apesur nuipu itereikina keda atiokisio nuipu ko okabin lu ikerai, aimoriarit adumunun iboro lu aila. Kanuka ngun, etapit duc angaleukec keda aibuses kec aimusung kapakio nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: Ezoanzi nyiri karakara eyi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu kembe emunyale eyini 'diyi ma alea, eyini ani ecozu afa alata ni 'diyi esuzu ku. E'yo 'disi, eyi ma rua ala azini inzita eyi e'de sa'wa ewaru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Abaishiki bato abaingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu kampu z'empungi, otwariiremu oburemeezi bw'okutunga ebintu by'obuyonjo. N'ekyarugiremu, amagara gaabo n'ekitiinisa kyabo nibiteganisibwa omu bwire bw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote gender equality in entrepreneurship, various organizations have launched initiatives aimed at supporting female entrepreneurs. As a result, women have been given funds to boost their businesses.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omwenkanonkano mu by'obusuubuzi, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bitandise enteekateeka ezigendereddwamu okuyamba abakyala abasuubuzi. N'ekivuddemu, abakyala baweereddwa ensimbi okutumbula bizinensi zaabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor rwom me mon ki coo I biacara, dul mapat-pat gucako yub mapat-pat ma ki keto pi konyo mon matye ka cako biacara. Macalo adwogi ne, kimiyo cente ki mon me tyelo kor biacara gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopolorite apedor naka angor keda ikiliok kotoma agwelanar, etolomutu iriongeta luegelegela nu ekotosi aigang angor nu agwelanar. Kanuka ngun, ejaikitai angor ikapun kanu aitopolor ebiasarakec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be trotro tujari 'yezu ri ma omgbo otuzu, amuti karakara eyi e'do otuta eyini lezu atita fezu oku eyi dri tujari 'yepi 'diyi dri. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe oku eyini robia tujari eyivile 'diyi otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho oburinganiza omu by'obushubuzi, ebitongore bingi bitandikireho enteekateeka ezirikugyenderera okuhwera abakazi abarikukora bizinesi. N'ekyarugiremu, abakazi baheirwe esente z'okutunguura bizinesi zaabo.

eng_prompt: Despite the urgent need for support, there were alarming reports of financial irregularities within the aid organization. Investigations revealed that funds allocated for refugees were misappropriated.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'obuyambi, waaliwo alipoota ez'entiisa ez'obutali bwenkanya mu by'ensimbi mu kitongole ky'obuyambi. Okunoonyereza kwazudde nti ssente ezaaweebwa abanoonyiboobubudamu zaakozesebwa bubi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni omyero kimi kony oyot-oyot tutwal, lok obedo tye I kom tim me camucana I dul ma miyo kony. Kwed onyuto ni cente ma kimiyo pi luring ayela kitiyo kwede i yo marac.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai eipud loka agangat katipet, ajai iripotan luitukurianete nuikamunitos aibucaret naka ikapun kotoma atukot naka agangat. Abu aingic kitodu ebe aponi itolitolunai ikapun lu ijaikitai ikerai.
lgg_prompt: Afa azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ma talasi, o'duko asi otiza fepi e'yo onzi robia ni 'diyi ma dria amuti azakoma fepi 'diyi ma eselea ci. E'yo eti ondaza ece kini 'ba ayu robia fele emunyale eyini ri geri onzi si.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'obuhwezi, hakaba hariho ripoota ezirikutangaaza ezirikukwata ahaby'empiiha omu kitongore ky'obuhwezi. Okucondooza kworeka ngu esente ezaheirwe empungi zikakoresibwa kubi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of displaced individuals seeking safety, various initiatives have been launched to support those who open their doors to refugees. One key aspect of these initiatives is the financial assistance offered to communities that host these vulnerable populations.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo ogweyongera ogw'abantu ababundabunda nga banoonya obukuumi, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo zitandikiddwawo okuyamba abo abaggulirawo abanoonyiboobubudamu enzigi zaabwe. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nteekateeka zino bwe buyambi bw'ensimbi obuweebwa ebitundu ebirimu abantu bano abateesobola.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel luring ayela matye ka yenyo gwok, yub mapat-pat kicako me konyo jo ma yabo dogola gi bot luring ayela. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub eni obedo kony me lim ma kimiyo ki kabedo ma dano ma goro eni bedo iye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin enaaba loepol noi loka itunga luemamete keda aiboisio kec kanu aimo ayuwara, aponi kitegearai iponesio luegelegela kanu aigang ngul lu engara ikekia kec mama ejaasi ikerai. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi luka aswamisio nu ngesi agangat na ikapun na ijaikitai itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe 'ba emunyaleru 'diyi ma kalafe tupi angu ndundu eyi ma alea agei tema ndazu risi, 'ba e'do e'yo ndundu eyi atita fezu 'ba emunyale eyini angu eyivile 'diyi ma ti zipi 'diyi dri. E'yo azi okporu 'yeta 'diyi ma alia ri eri azakoma robia ni fele ongulumu 'ba e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi dri ri i.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu omuhendo gw'abantu abarikuruga omu maka gaabo nigweyongyera kuronda oburinzi, enteekateeka nyingi zitandikirweho kuhwera abo abarikwikiriza empungi. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru omu nteekateeka ezi n'obuhwezi bw'esente oburikuhebwa abantu abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to ensure transparency and accountability, local officials have decided to take a proactive approach. They believe that oversight is essential for the successful implementation of initiatives funded by taxpayer dollars.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukakasa obwerufu n'embalirira, abakungu b'ebyalo basazeewo okukola enkola ey'obwegendereza. Balowooza nti okulondoola kwa mugaso mu kussa mu nkola enteekateeka ezivujjirirwa ssente z'omuwi w'omusolo.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me neno ni jami weng tye atir, lutic me tedero gumoko tam gi me tic maber. Gitye ki niyee ni doro tic obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi keto yub mapat-pat matye ki cente pa mucoro itic.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na awanyun ebe ejai aica ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun, aseutu eswamak luka atutubet aswam kagogongu. Iyuunitos kesi ebe ejokuna aanyanar kanu aitodolikin aswamisio nu igangitai keda ikapun luka esolo.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo ada be azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'du e'yo 'yezu okporu. Eyi ai ra kini e'yo eti ondaza niri eri orodriru e'yo 'bani 'ye robia 'ba musoro ofepi 'diyiniri si 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureeba ngu hariho amazima n'embaririra, abakuru omu byaro bashaziremu kukoresa oburyo burungi. Nibateekateeka ngu okureberera n'eky'omugasho omu kuta omu nkora enteekateeka ezirikushashurirwa sente z'omushoro.

eng_prompt: In an effort to stimulate local economic growth, the district launched a new initiative aimed at supporting entrepreneurs. As part of this initiative, the district has registered people with business proposals.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna mu kitundu, disitulikiti yatongoza enteekateeka empya egendereddwamu okuyamba abasuubuzi. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, disitulikiti ewandiise abantu abalina ebiteeso bya bizinensi.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor dongo pa biacara me tedero, district ocako yub manyen me konyo lutim biacara. Macalo but yub man, district ocoyo dano matye ki tam me timo biacara.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apol naka edumune loka ikapun, abu edisitrikt kitegea ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aigangit agwelanarak. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ewadika edisitrikt itunga luejaasi keda aomisio nuka agwelanar.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu zota e'yo robia ni angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, distrikiti e'do otita azi o'diru 'bani lezu atita fezu 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi dri. Otita 'di ma azi ru, distrikiti osi 'ba e'yo tujari ni 'diyi be 'diyi ma ru va.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'entaasya omu byaro, disiturikiti ekatandikaho enteekateeka nsya erikugyenderera okuhwera abashuubuzi. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, disiturikiti ehandikiise abantu abaine enteekateeka za bizinesi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for local commerce and community support, officials have announced new initiatives. These efforts aim to enhance economic opportunities and provide accessible shopping options for residents.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'ebyobusuubuzi n'obuyambi bw'ekitundu, abakungu balangiridde enteekateeka empya. Kaweefube ono agendereddwamu okutumbula eby'enfuna n'okusobozesa abatuuze okugula ebintu mu ngeri ennyangu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lutim biacara me tedero ki kony pa lwak, lutic gunyuto yub manyen mapat-pat. Yub eni tye me medo rwom me biacara ki wilo jami ma mite pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loepol noi loka agwelanar keda agangat kama ejaasi itunga, apotu eswamak kolimosi ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka aswam ngun erai aitojokar arerengusio nuka ikapun ka aijaikin itunga aiboisio nuepedorete kesi agwel iboro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu tujari 'yezu angu 'da ma alea tualu atita ongulumu eyini ri pie ri ma omgbo ni tuzu, azi'ba eyi azi e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'diyi lezu drileba robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini geri afa jezu 'diyi fezu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'eby'obushubuzi n'obuhwezi bw'abantu b'omubyaro, abakuru batongoize enteekateeka nsya. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okutunguura eby'entaasya n'okureetera abatuura gye kugura ebintu.

eng_prompt: In response to the deteriorating infrastructure and increasing traffic concerns, local officials have prioritized improvements in rural areas. As part of this initiative, the government will carry out road reconstruction in Moyo and Obongi.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebizimbe ebyonoonese n'obunkenke bw'ebidduka obweyongera, abakungu b'ebyalo bakulembezza okulongoosa mu byalo. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, gavumenti ejja kuddamu okuzimba enguudo mu Moyo ne Obongi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa jami ma konyo dano ki peko me gudu, lutic me tedero guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom dongo lobo I caro. Macalo but yub man, gamente obi yubu gudi i Moyo ki Obongi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka amotoka keda amotokan nuarokok, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kisingarenitos aitojokar aiboisio nuka ocaloi. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ebuni apugan aiduk irotin Moyo keda Obongi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ezaza azini e'yo nzila dria 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ba okpo e'yo angu calo ru 'diyi otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, gamete ni mu nzila eyi si Moyo azini Obongi'a.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebitarikwetengwa hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'ebiiruka obweyongyeire, abakungu b'ebyaro bateireho enteekateeka y'okutunguura ebyaro. Omu nteekateeka egi, gavumenti neija kwombeka enguuto omuri Moyo na Obongi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing healthcare needs of the community, local officials have been discussing plans for improvement. After extensive assessments and consultations, a decision has been made to enhance medical facilities.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyalo babadde bateesa ku nteekateeka z'okutereezaamu. Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera ennyo n'okwebuuza, okusalawo kukoleddwa okutumbula ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak i kom lok me yot kom, lutic me tedero gubedo ka nyamo yub me ilo malo rwom me yotkom. Ingee timo kwed ki lok mapol, kimoko tam me medo rwom me odi yadi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo aiyatakin lo amukian naka itunga, eutasi eswamak luka atutubet aitemitem iwaitin lu itojokarere. Akaulo naka airereonor ka aingitun akiro, aponi itolomunai aseunet naka aitojokar aiboisio nuka amukian.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo tupi ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'bi agbatara gba otita eyi otuzu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo eti ondaza azini e'yo oziza ma vutia, 'ba 'du e'yo arojo eyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'eby'amagara ebyeyongyeire omu bantu, abakuru omu byaro batwire nibagamba aha nteekateeka y'okutunguura eby'amagara. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'okwebuuza aha bantu, bacwiremu kutunguura eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: Collaboration among various stakeholders is essential for the success of public initiatives. By fostering a unified approach, leaders can maximize resources and ensure that projects meet the needs of the community.
lug_prompt: Enkolagana wakati w'abakwatibwako ab'enjawulo ya mugaso mu buwanguzi bw'enteekateeka z'olukale. Mu kutumbula enkola ey'awamu, abakulembeze basobola okukozesa obulungi ebintu n'okukakasa nti pulojekiti zituukiriza ebyetaago by'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Winye ikin dano mapol pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti pa lwak. I yoo me ribe, lutela twero tic ki jami ma mite me neno ni yub eni ocobo miti pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Aiswamanara kanejaas itunga luegelegela erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut naka ainapeta nuka itunga. Kowai lo aitopolor epone ediope, epedorete engarenok aitwasam iboro luipu ka awanyun ebe itodolikinete ipurojektin ipudesia luka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita 'ba ambo ndundu eyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru otita o'bi eyini 'diyi ma agata ni. Geri ti ecita ni si, drice'ba eyi eco afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otu dika eyi ne ra kini otita eyi nga e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukwatanisa omu bantu b'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe n'eky'omugasho ahabw'obusinguzi bw'enteekateeka za gavumenti. Ahabw'okureetaho enkora erikukwatanisa, abeebembezi nibabaasa kukoresa kurungi eby'obugaiga kandi bakareeba ngu purogyekiti zihikiiriza ebyetengo by'abantu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance local development and streamline project implementation, the government announced a new initiative. As part of this initiative, Moyo district officials were assigned the task of coordinating government projects.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula enkulaakulana y'ekitundu n'okutumbula enkola ya pulojekiti, gavumenti yalangiridde enteekateeka empya. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abakungu ba disitulikiti y'e Moyo baaweebwa omulimu gw'okukwasaganya pulojekiti za gavumenti.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me dongo lobo I tedero kacel ki keto yub eni itic, gamente okati ki yub manyen. Macalo but yub man, kimiyo tic ki lutic me Moyo me doro yub pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong apol naka atutubet ka aitapatan aitegeario naka ipurojektin, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi ijaikinai eswamak luko Moyo aswam naka arucokinit ipurojektin lu apugan.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani lezu angu ezoma angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu dika otita eyi ma 'yeta ma omgbo otuzu, gamete azi e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba fe azi'ba distrikiti Moyo niri ni 'diyi dri azi otita gamete ni 'diyi ma ti ojizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho entunguuka omu byaro hamwe n'okutunguura enkora ya purogyekiti, gavumenti ekarangirira enteekateeka nsya. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, abakuru omu disiturikiti ya Moyo bakaheebwa omurimo gw'okureeberera purogyekiti za Gavumenti.

eng_prompt: After years of advocating for self-governance, the local leaders finally secured the necessary support from the regional government. As a result, Obongi has become independent as a district.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi nga balwanirira obwetwaze, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baasobola okufuna obuwagizi obwetaagisa okuva mu gavumenti y'ekitundu. N'ekyavaamu, Obongi efuuse disitulikiti eyeetongodde.
ach_prompt: Ingee lweny pi mwaki mapol pi loc ken, lutela me tedero dong gunongo kony ma mite ki bot gamente me tedero. Macalo adwogi ne, Obongi dong odoko districte ma pire kene.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aipugaikin bon, apotu engarenok luka atutubena odumutu agangat kama ejai apugan naka atutubet. Kanuka ngun, araun Obongi edisitrikta.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara eyi ma vutia a'di 'dizu drice'ba angu ndundu eyini 'diyini eyi ma ngulupi ma dricezu 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba angu ndundu eyini 'diyi esu asizu atita eyini le 'diyi engazu gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri vu. E'yo 'disi, Obongi eca distrikiti ngulupini ru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okurwanirira okwetegyeka, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakahendera batunga obuhwezi kuruga omu gavumenti y'ekyanga. N'ekyarugiremu, Obongi ehindukire disiturikiti eyetongoire.

eng_prompt: Ensuring equitable distribution of resources is essential for fostering social cohesion and economic stability. To achieve this, the government must prioritize fairness in its financial support mechanisms.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti eby'obugagga bigabanyizibwa mu bwenkanya kya mugaso mu kutumbula okukwatagana mu bantu n'obutebenkevu mu by'enfuna. Okutuukiriza kino, gavumenti erina okukulembeza obwenkanya mu nkola zaayo ez'obuyambi bw'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Neno ni ki poko lonyo i yo marom obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me kelo ribbe ikin lwak ki bedo ki kuc I tenge me lim. Me cobo man, gamente omyero oket yub me miyo kony me lim obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Aicor iboro koipone kaloejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor aimorikikina keda ainapakina kotoma ikapun. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ibusakinit apugan aisingarenit aitodolikin nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma awaza kililiru ri eri orodriru ti ecita ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu tualu e'yo robiani 'diyi ma tambazu. E'yo 'di 'yezu, le gamete ma 'ba okpo e'yo ada ma dria geri erini atita robia niri fezu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'obugaiga bigabanibwa kurungi n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho okukwatanisa omu bantu hamwe n'obutebekana omu by'entaasya. Okuhikiiriza eki, gavumenti eshemereire kwebembeza oburinganiza omu nkora yaayo y'obuhwezi bw'esente.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been escalating between the two districts as they vie for control over financial resources. Recent disputes have centered around the allocation of funds, leading to a significant rift between Moyo and Obongi.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera wakati wa disitulikiti ebbiri nga bwe zivuganya ku buyinza ku by'ensimbi. Enkaayana ezibaddewo gye buvuddeko zaali zeesigamye ku ngeri ssente gye zaagabanyizibwamu, ekiviiriddeko enjawukana wakati wa Moyo ne Obongi.
ach_prompt: Lweny tye kamedde I kin districts aryo egoni I kare ma gitye ka pyem I kom lim. Telo tol ma okato cokcok-ki obedo I kom yub me poko lim, ma okelo apoka-poka I kin Moyo ki Obongi.
teo_prompt: Eyatakinos ingungeta kiding idisitriktan ngul iarei lueboloboloete kanu aipuga ikapun. Apotu ingungeta lu atuboros kisingarenos nuka aikor ikapun, ido abu koyangau atiakatiaka kiding Moyo keda Obongi.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'bi tu distrikiti iri 'diyi ma eselea yini abala 'yeria e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria. Ngiringiri o'diru 'diyi e'bi ovu e'yo 'bani robia awazu ri ma dria, erini fezu esele coza okporu Moyo pi ma eselea Obongi be.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera ahagati ya disiturikiti ibiri, ahabw'okuhayahayana ahaby'empiiha. Entongane ezibaireho obwahati, nizikwatiraine n'okuheebwa kw'esente, ekyarugiremu okwebaganisamu ahagati ya Moyo na Obongi.

eng_prompt: Recent tensions have escalated between the communities of Moyo and Obongi, leading to disputes over resources and local governance. To ensure peace and stability in the region, it is crucial for authorities to intervene.
lug_prompt: Gye buvuddeko obunkenke bweyongedde wakati w'abantu b'e Moyo ne Obongi, ekiviiriddeko enkaayana ku by'obugagga n'obukulembeze bw'ebitundu. Okukakasa emirembe n'obutebenkevu mu kitundu, kikulu nnyo ab'obuyinza okuyingira mu nsonga.
ach_prompt: Lweny ma obedo tye ikin lwak me Moyo ki Obongi I kare ma okato cokcok-ki okelo tele I kom lonyo ki tela me tedero. Me neno ni kuc ki ber bedo tye I twok piny eni, obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi lutela me donyo I lok eni.
teo_prompt: Apolor kwana ingungeta kiding itunga luko Moyo keda luko Obongi, eyangaunit ingungeta kanu iboro keda apugan. Kanu awanyun ebe ejai aipuc ka ainapakina aiboisit, ejokuna noi apedorosio alomun toma.
lgg_prompt: O'du 'diyi ma alia, erita ako ma omgbo tu ongulumu Moyo ni azini Obongi ni 'diyi ma eselea, erini fezu e'yo yi 'yezu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria azini driceza angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Asianzu azini asianzu ma ta mbazu angu 'di ma alea, eri orodriru drice'ba eyi ma fi e'yo 'di ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Obwahati, obunkenke bweyongyeire ahagati y'abantu ba Moyo na Obongi, ekyarugiremu obutaikirizana ahaby'obugaiga hamwe n'obwebembezi bw'ebyaro. Okureeba ngu hariho obusingye n'obutebekana omu kyanga, nikikuru ab'obushoborozi kugira eki barikukora.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent challenges faced by local communities, it is crucial for leaders to prioritize collaboration. By pooling their resources and expertise, they can address the pressing needs of their constituents more effectively.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa abantu b'omu kitundu kwe basanga gye buvuddeko, kikulu nnyo abakulembeze okukulembeza enkolagana. Bwe bakolera awamu ebintu byabwe n'obukugu bwabwe, basobola okukola ku byetaago by'abantu baabwe mu ngeri esingayo obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma lwak tye kanongo cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal ni lutela omyero guket ribbe obed gin ma pire tek. Ka gurib jami gi kacel ki ngec gi, gitwero cobo miti pa lubol kwir gi maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuetereikina keda itunga luka atutubet, ibusakinit engarenok aisingarenit aiswamanara. Kowai lo aimorikikin iborokec keda acoa kec, epedorete kesi aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubenakec ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini esu o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru drice'ba eyini ti ecita 'bazu okporu. Afa yini 'diyi tualu ondua yini 'diyi pie, eyi eco e'yo 'ba angu eyini opi nyazu 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma aza ko kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu abantu b'omubyaro batungire, nikikuru abebembezi kwebembeza okukwatanisa. Kubarikugaita eby'obugaiga n'obukugu bwabo, nibabaasa kukora ahabyetaago by'abantu abu barikujwekyera.

eng_prompt: In response to the escalating conflict and the influx of displaced individuals, officials recognized the urgent need for humanitarian assistance. As a result, the government established refugee camps.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obukuubagano obweyongera n'okuyingira kw'abantu abaasengulwa, abakungu baalaba obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'obuyambi bw'obuntubulamu. N'ekyavaamu, gavumenti yatandikawo enkambi z'abanoonyiboobubudamu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lweny matye kamede ki dwogo pa dano ma oryemogi ki I kabedogi, lutic guniang ni kony tye kamitte oyot-oyot tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente oyabo camp pa luring ayela.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu iyatakinete keda itunga lu ekerete aiboisio kec, apotu eswamak kojenutu eipuda lo engeso. Kanuka ngun abu apugan oduk ikabin lu ikerai.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ma omgbo be, azi'ba eyi esu e'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fezu 'ba ada eyidri mbeleru ri ra. E'yo 'disi, gamete si kembe emunyale eyini 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire hamwe n'abantu baingi ababingirwe omu maka gaabo, abakuru bakareeba ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'obuhwezi. Ekyarugiremu,gavumenti ekatandikaho kampu z'empungi.

eng_prompt: Originally from a small village in Uganda, he has a deep connection to his roots. His family has lived in the region for generations, shaping his identity and values.
lug_prompt: Okuva ku kyalo ekitono mu Uganda, alina enkolagana ey'amaanyi n'ensibuko ze. Ab'omu maka ge babadde mu kitundu kino okumala emyaka mingi, era ekyo kye kyamuleetera okuba n'engeri gye yeeyisaamu n'engeri gye yeeyisaamu.
ach_prompt: En aa ki icaro mo matidi I lobo Uganda, en tye ki kubbe matek ki kaka mege. Lugang mege gubedo I twok piny eni pi kare malac tutwal, ma man okelo lanyut mege ki kit ma en kwo kwede.
teo_prompt: Ebunit ngesi kocalo loedit ko Uganda, ejaasi ngesi keda arucokina naepol keda iraasitake. Iboyei ekaleke aiboisit kangin adaun apakio nuipu, ido apotu kiswamautu aijenake keda iponesioke.
lgg_prompt: E'dozu engazu calo werea kari Uganda niri ma alea ri si, eri ma ti eci i ma ola eyi pie saaru. Familia eri vileri ebi ovu angu 'di ma alea eli karakara, erini e'dazu e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Naaruga omu kyaro kikye omu Uganda, aine akakwate kahango n'obuhangwa bwe. Eka ye etwire omu kyanga eki kumara emyaka mingi, ekirikubareetera okumanywa n'okugira emitwarize mirungi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve literacy rates and access to education, local officials held a series of community meetings to discuss the pressing need for educational reform. After gathering input from residents and assessing the challenges faced by families, the government decided to take action.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula omuwendo gw'abantu abasoma n'okuwandiika n'okutuuka ku buyigirize, abakungu b'ebyalo baatuuza enkiiko z'ekitundu okuteesa ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'ennongoosereza mu by'enjigiriza. Oluvannyuma lw'okukung'aanya ebirowoozo okuva mu batuuze n'okwekenneenya okusoomoozebwa amaka kwe gasanga, gavumenti yasalawo okubaako ky'ekola.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me kwan ki nongo kwan, lutic me tedero gubedo ki kacoke mapol me nywako tam i kom miti me kelo aloka loka I lok me kwan. Inge winyo tam pa lwak ki neno peko ma gangi tye ka kato ki iye, gamente omoko tamme me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aikeun adoketait na asioma keda adumunun asioman, apotu eswamak luka atutubet iriamunos keda itunga kanu aitemitem eipud loka aijulanakineta nuka asioman. Akaulo naka atukun aomisio kanejaas itunga ka airereor atiokisio nu ejaas ikalia, abu apugan koseu aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ongmbo sukulu lazu ri ma omgbo otuzu azini geri onita esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye mitingi ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma alea karakara eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo lepi 'ba ma oja e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma egata trazu azini e'yo ewaru familia eyini esu 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, gamete 'du e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura omutindo gw'okushoma n'okushoma n'okutunga obwegyese, abakungu b'ebyaro bakakora enkiiko z'abantu b'omubyaro kuhanuura aha kyetengo ky'okureetaho empinduka omu by'obwegyese. Bwanyima y'okurundaana ebiteiso kuruga omu batuuragye n'okushwijuma oburemeezi obu amaka garikurabamu, gavumenti ekasharamu kukoraho.

eng_prompt: In a recent meeting with school administrators, concerns were raised about the declining academic performance of students across the district. As a result, the district education officer issued new guidelines to address the issue.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko olwaliwo gyebuvuddeko n'abakulembeze b'amasomero, okweraliikirira kwaleetebwa ku kukendeera kw'ensoma y'abayizi okwetoloola disitulikiti. N'ekyavaamu, akulira ebyenjigiriza mu disitulikiti yafulumya ebiragiro ebipya okukola ku nsonga.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma obedo cokcok-ki ki ludito me gangi kwan, lworo obedo tye I kom kit ma lutino kwan tye kadok piny I kwan gi I district. Macalo adwogi ne, ladit ma loyo lok kom kwan I district omiyo cik manyen me cobo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet napac keda engarenok lu isomeroi, aponi itodunai aiyalongongo kanu aikidiokor eswamae lo idwe ko disitrikt. Kanuka ngun, abu lo eyait nuka asioman kodisitrikt kitolomu aicoreta nuitetiak kanu aitemokin akirot ngin.
lgg_prompt: Dri fuza 'ba sukulu ma drice'ba eyi pie ri ma alea, 'ba nze asi otiza sukulu anzi eyi ma agata ma omgbo esipi distrikiti 'da ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba onita ni distrikiti'a ri fe azita o'diru e'yo nde ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko orwabaireho obwahati n'abebembezi b'amashomero, okwerarikirira kukareetwaho ahabw'okugwa kw'emishomo y'abeegi omu disiturikiti. N'ekyarugiremu, orikukurira eby'obwegyese omu disiturikiti, akaha ebiragiro bisya by'okukora aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: Investing in education is crucial for the development of our community. By ensuring that every child has access to schooling, we can enhance the overall educational landscape.
lug_prompt: Okusiga ensimbi mu by'enjigiriza kya mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana y'ekitundu kyaffe. Bwe tukakasa nti buli mwana afuna okusoma, tusobola okutumbula embeera y'ebyenjigiriza okutwalira awamu.
ach_prompt: Keto lim I gangi kwan pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo wa. Ka waneno ni lutino weng tye ki gum me kwan, watwero ilo malo rwom me kwan.
teo_prompt: Aipikakin ikapun toma asioman erai ibore yenepol noi kanu apol naka atutubetekosi. Kowai lo awanyun ebe epedori ngin ikoku adumunun asioman, ipedori oni aitojokar eswamae loka asioman.
lgg_prompt: Robia 'bazu onita ma alia ri eri orodriru angu amavile 'diyi ezozu. Geri amani nezu ra kini mva dria eco sukulu esu ra, ama eco e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutamu sente omu by'obwegyese n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka y'ekyanga kyaitu. Okureeba ngu buri mwana akatunga obwegyese, nitubaasa kutunguura eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Due to varying levels of academic performance, the school has decided to implement a new policy regarding student promotions. As a result, some students will be promoted on probation.
lug_prompt: Olw'omutindo gw'okusoma ogw'enjawulo, essomero lisazeewo okussa mu nkola enkola empya ekwata ku kutumbula abayizi. N'ekinaavaamu, abayizi abamu bajja kuyisibwa ku bigezo.
ach_prompt: Pi rwom me kwan ma padi padi, gang kwan ne omoko tamgi me keto cik manyen malube ki medo rwom me kwan pa lutino. Macalo adwogi ne, kibicwalo lutino kwan mukene I gang kwan I kare me temo.
teo_prompt: Kanuka adoketait naegelegela naka eswamae loka esisiak, aseun esomero aitegear ainapeta nuitetiak nuikamunitos aitopolorio naka esisiak. Kanuka ngun, eponio aitopolor esisiak ice kotoma aingito.
lgg_prompt: E'yo sukulu anzi eyi ma agata sukulu'a ndundu 'diyisi, sukulu 'da 'du e'yo azita o'diru ni e'dozu sukulu anzi eyi ma otuta sukulu'a ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga sukulu anzi azi 'diyi ma ti pe otuta ma alia o'bita ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enkora y'abeegi etarikushushana omu mashomero,eishomero rishaziremu kutaho engyenderwaho nsya erikukwata aha kutunguura abeegi. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegi abamwe nibaza kutwarwa aha bigyezo.

eng_prompt: Many educators have observed a decline in reading engagement among students. This trend raises concerns about the impact of automatic promotion on their academic development.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bangi balabye okukendeera mu kwagala okusoma mu bayizi. Enkola eno ereetawo okweraliikirira ku ngeri okukuzibwa okw'obwegendereza gye kukosaamu enkulaakulana yaabwe mu by'ensoma.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol guneno ni miti pa lutino me kwan tye ka dok piny. Man kelo lworo I kom adwoki me tyelo kor lutino I kwan gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu isisianakinak luipu owanyutu aikidiokus na asioman kanejaas esisiak. Eyangauni ngin aiyalongongo kanuikamunitos epone loepedorere aitopolorite kesi kotoma asiomanikec.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi ndre e'yo sukulu anzi eyini ava fezu e'yo lazu ri ma omgbo esizu ra. E'yo 'di ni asi otiza eji e'yo 'bani 'ba otuzu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma zota onita ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa baingi bareebire okweyongyera kw'okwenda kwega omu beegi. Omuringo ogu nigureetaho okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'okukuzibwa kwabo omu mishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: After months of rigorous preparation and dedication, the students eagerly awaited the results of their primary leaving examinations. The atmosphere was filled with anticipation as families gathered to celebrate their children's hard work and achievements.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi nga beetegekera n'obunyiikivu, abayizi baali balindirira n'essanyu ebyava mu bigezo byabwe eby'akamalirizo. Embeera yali ejjudde okweraliikirira ng'amaka gakungaana okujaguza emirimu gy'abaana baabwe n'ebituukiddwaako.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yubbe matek tutwal, lutino kwan gubedo kakuru adwogi penygi me cinia. Lwak gubedo ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma gugure me kwero tic matek pa lutino gi ki jami ma gutimo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka aswam kagogong, apotu esisiak idarakisi akiro nuka aingito naka epuraimare loiwongonet. Ajaasi itunga keda aiyalama naarai apotu ikalia kimorikikinos ainumunum aswam naka idwekec keda aitodolikineta.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuza okporu azini asi feza ma vutia, sukulu anzi 'da eyi te obeta eyivile pramari ondresi 'diyi ma o'duko asi driasi. Angu nderi ga ava si familia yini okuzu yi vile anzi 'diyi ma azi okporu azini e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi inzizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okweteekateekyera n'obweziriki, abeegi bakategyereza ebyarugire omu bigyezo byabo eby'okubanza. Embeera ekaba eijwire amatsiko obu amaka garikuteeranira hamwe okujaguza okukora n'obusinguzi bw'abaana baabo.

eng_prompt: In today's educational landscape, many educators seem to prioritize standardized testing over meaningful learning experiences. As a result, the emphasis on rote memorization often overshadows the development of critical thinking skills.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'ebyenjigiriza ey'ennaku zino, abasomesa bangi balabika nga bakulembeza ebigezo eby'omutindo okusinga eby'okuyiga ebirina amakulu. N'ekivuddemu, okussa essira ku kukwata ebyawandiikibwa emirundi egisinga kubikka ku nkulaakulana y'obusobozi bw'okulowooza.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me kwan me kare-ni, lupwonye mapol nen calo gimaro timo pim ma rwom gi maloyo pwonyo jami ma tye ki tyen lok. Macalo adwogi ne, keto cwiny I kom mako lok I wii dano ipol kare balo dongo pa diro me tam.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aisisia ilolo, esubit bala isisianakinak luipu ekotosi aingito naepol adepar aisisia naejok. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitai noi aiitun akiro nuisisiaunete itunga mam epedorete aitodolikin acoa na aomoom ejok.
lgg_prompt: Angu onita ni andruri ma alea, imba'ba karakara eyi e'da kile e'yo obeta eyi 'yezu 'diyi 'du okporu aga e'yo onita ni orodriru 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, okpo 'bani 'ba e'yo osiza ma dria ri ni tutuni e'yo egaza kililiru 'diyi ma zota ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obwegyese eby'erizooba, abegyesa baingi nibenda kukora ebigyezo by'omutindo kukira eby'okwega ebirikubaasa kuba eby'omugasho. N'ekyarugiremu, okuta amaani omu kukwata ebyahandiikirwe, nikireetera okukura kw'emyoga y'okuteekateeka.

eng_prompt: In an effort to encourage academic excellence, educational institutions are implementing new evaluation criteria. As a result, schools will promote pupils who have a decent performance.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukubiriza okusukkuluma mu byensoma, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza gateekawo emitendera emipya egy'okukebera. N'ekinaavaamu, amasomero gajja kutumbula abayizi abakola obulungi.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor rwom me kwan, gangi kwan tye ka kati ki yoo manyen me pimo lutino. Macalo adwogi, gangi kwan gubi tyelo kor lutino ma gutimo peny maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam na aisinyikokit asioman najokan, eutasi isomeroi aitegear iponesio luitetiak luka airereonor. Kanuka ngun, epote isomeroi aitopolor idwe lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu 'ba eyini ava fezu agata onita ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, pari onita ni 'diyi geri o'diru eyini ecozu e'yo eyi ma ale andrizu 'diyi e'dozu. E'yo 'disi, sukulu eyi nga sukulu anzi agapi muke 'diyi ma ti pe sukulu drilea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho oburungi omu by'obwegyese, amatendekyero g'eby'obwegyese gariyo nigataho emihanda misya y'okushwijuma. N'ekyarugiremu, amashomero nigeija kutwara abeegi abakora kurungi omu mashomero.

eng_prompt: Despite efforts to improve recruitment and retention, the education system in the area continues to face significant challenges. As a result, many classrooms are left without the necessary expertise to support student learning effectively.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo kaweefube w'okutumbula enkola y'okuyingiza n'okusigaza abasomesa, ebyenjigiriza mu kitundu bikyasanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi. N'ekivuddemu, ebibiina bingi bisigala nga tebirina bukugu obwetaagisa okuyamba abayizi okuyiga obulungi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kitye ka yele me medo rwom me coyo ki gwoko lutino, yub me kwan I kabedo eni pud tye ki peko mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, kiweko kilac mapol labongo ngec ma mite me konyo lutino kwan me kwan maber.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamao kagogongu kanu aitojokar aitolomio naka esisiak keda aidar kes, eringa erionget loka asioman kotoma atutubet ngin etereikina keda atiokisio nuepolok. Kanuka ngun, aponi kojalakinai atukono nuipu komamete keda acoa na ekotoi kanu aingarakin esisiak aisisia ejok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba sizu azi'ba eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu ra ti, geri onita ni angu 'da ma alea ri nga po'di e'yo ewaru eyi esu. E'yo 'disi, kilasi karakara eyi awi afa onita ni 'diyi kokoru sukulu anzi eyi ma onita ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho amaani g'okutunguura omurimo gw'okuheereza abantu emirimo, eby'obwegyese omu kicweka ekyo nibigyenda omu maisho n'oburemeezi bw'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu,ebibiina bingi nibisigara bitaine bukugu oburikwetengwa kuhwera abeegi kwega kurungi.

eng_prompt: Many educators face numerous challenges throughout the academic year, including time constraints and varying student needs. As a result, they often find it difficult to cover all the material outlined in the school curriculum.
lug_prompt: Abasomesa bangi basanga ebisoomooza bingi mu mwaka gw'ebyenjigiriza, omuli obunafu mu budde n'ebyetaago by'abayizi eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, bakisanga nga kizibu okusoma ebintu byonna ebiri mu nteekateeka y'ebisomesebwa mu ssomero.
ach_prompt: Lupwonye mapol ginongo peko mapol I kare me mwaka me kwan, ma I kingi obedo peko me cawa ki miti pa lutino ma padi padi. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare ginongo tek tutwal me kwano jami weng ma kiketo I yub me kwan.
teo_prompt: Etereikina isisianakinak luipu keda atiokisio nuka ekaru loka asioman, aimoriarit atiokisio nuka apak keda ipudesia luegelegela luka esisiak. Kanuka ngun, etionikinitos kesi aisisia iboro kere luejaasi toma aisisiaeta nuka esomero.
lgg_prompt: Imba'ba karakara eyi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu eli onita ni 'diyi ma alea, sa'wa ako eyi tualu sukulu anzi eyini le 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, eyi sa'wa driasi eri esu mbazaru e'yo dria 'bani sile sukulu ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abeegyesa baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi omu mwaka gw'eby'obwegyese, otwariiremu oburemeezi bw'obwire hamwe n'ebyetaago by'abeegi ebitarikushushana. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kushanga kigumire kwega ebintu byona ebiri omu bigyezo by'eishomero.

eng_prompt: Concerns have been raised by parents and teachers regarding the lack of oversight in local schools. Despite repeated requests for updates, the district education officer has not conducted any recent evaluations.
lug_prompt: Okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa abazadde n'abasomesa ku butalondoolwa mu masomero g'omu kitundu. Wadde nga baasaba enfunda n'enfunda obubaka obupya, akulira ebyenjigiriza mu disitulikiti takoze kwekenneenya kwonna gyebuvuddeko.
ach_prompt: Lunyodo kacel ki lupwonye gubedo ki lworo I kom peko me bedo peke pa lutela I gangi kwan me tedero. Kadi bed ni kilego tyen mapol pi ngec manyen, ladit ma loyo lok kom kwan I district pud pe otimo kwed mo ma otime cokcok-ki.
teo_prompt: Apotu auriak keda isisianakinak itodutu aiyalongongo kanu amamus na aanyanar isomeroi. Karaida ilipitai duc akiro nuitetiak, mam eswaman loka asioman kodisitrikt iswamat aanyanario.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi efu tipika eyi vu imba'ba eyi pie e'yo 'bani sukulu eyi ma pamvu onezu ku ri ma dria. Erini tro a'i o'dukoti o'diru 'diyi ma dria ra ti, azi'ba onita ni distrikiti'a 'diyi 'yeni nga e'yo eyi ma ale andripi o'diru 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Abazaire n'abeegyesa boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'eibura ry'obureberezi omu mashomero g'omubyaro. Oihireho okushaba emirundi mingi, orikukurira eby'obwegyese aha disiturikiti, tihaine eki yakozire.

eng_prompt: Many students arrive at school without having eaten a proper breakfast. As a result, their ability to focus and learn is significantly hindered.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi batuuka ku ssomero nga tebannalya kyankya kirungi. N'ekivuddemu, obusobozi bwabwe obw'okussaayo omwoyo n'okuyiga bulemesebwa nnyo.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol oo igangkwan labongo camo cam me odiko maber. Macalo adwogi ne, kero gi me keto cwiny gi ki pwonyo gi pe tye maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Idwe luipu elosenenete osomero komam enyamete inyamat lukatupuruc luajokak. Kanuka ngun, mam kesi epedorete apodokinit ka aisisia ejok.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi eca sukulua nyaka etusiri nya kokoru. E'yo 'disi, yi ma okpo asi 'bazu azini onita onizu ri atri ra.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi abaingi nibahika aha eishomero batariire kyantsya nungi. N'ekyarugiremu, okubaasa kwabo kuta omutima n'okwega nikuremererwa munonga.

eng_prompt: To enhance student learning and retention, it is essential to implement regular assessments. Consistent practice helps reinforce concepts and identify areas that need improvement.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula okusoma kw'abayizi n'okusigala mu masomero, kya mugaso okuteekawo okwekebejjebwa buli kaseera. Okwegezaamu buli kiseera kiyamba okunyweza endowooza n'okuzuula ebitundu ebyetaaga okulongoosebwa.
ach_prompt: Pi medo rwom me kwan pa lutino kwan, pire tek tutwal me ngiyo kit ma lutino kwan tye ka kwano kwede kare ki kare. Bedo ka timo jami kare ki kare konyo me tyelo kor tam ki niang kabedo ma omyero kimed iye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitojokar asioman naka esisiak ka aidar kes, ejokuna aanyanar esisiak duc. Aswam duc ingarakini aitogogong aomisio ka ajenun aiboisio nuibusakinit aitojokar.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi eyi ma onita ma omgbo otuzu azini eyi ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru 'bani eyi ma pamvu andrizu sa'wa driasi. E'yo eyi 'yezu sa'wa driasi ri ni azakoma fe egata eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini angu 'bani ecozu eyi otuzu ra 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okwongyera aha kwega kw'abeegi, n'eky'omugasho okukyebera buri kaire. Okwegyesa abantu buri kaire nikibahwera kumanya emyanya ei bashemereire kwongyeramu amaani.

eng_prompt: In an educational system that values fairness and achievement, it is essential to recognize individual contributions. Therefore, decisions regarding student advancement must be based on their performance and capabilities.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola y'ebyenjigiriza etwala obwenkanya n'okutuuka ku buwanguzi nga bikulu, kya mugaso okusiima ebikolebwa buli omu. N'olwekyo, okusalawo okukwata ku nkulaakulana y'abayizi kulina kwesigamizibwa ku nkola yaabwe n'obusobozi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: I yub me pwonye ma neno lok me ber bedo ki cobo miti pa lutino obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me pwoyo jami ma ngat acel acel otimo. Pi meno, moko tam malube ki dongo pa lutino omyero ojenge I kom kit ma lutino timo kwede ki kero gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget loka asioman loigangit aitodolikinio ka aitodolikin, ejokuna noi aijen nu iswamatos itunganan. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit aiswamaun aseununeta nuikamunitos apol naka esisiak kotupitete eswamae kec keda apedorosiokec.
lgg_prompt: Geri onitaniri ma alia e'yo adaru azini e'yo 'bani 'ye 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru e'yo 'ba alu alu ni 'ye 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Ka'dini, le 'ba ma 'du e'yo sukulu anzi eyi ma zota ma dria 'diyi agata eyini ri vu azini okpo eyini ri vu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora y'eby'obwegyese erikworeka oburinganiza n'okuhikiirira, n'eky'omugasho okusiima obuhwezi bwa buri omwe. N'ahabw'ekyo, okusharamu ebirikukwata aha ntunguuka y'abeegi kushemereire kurugiirira aha kukora kwabo n'obushoboorozi bwabo.

eng_prompt: Despite the community's growing population and increasing healthcare needs, the local authorities have failed to invest in the necessary infrastructure. As a result, Moyo general hospital is not well facilitated.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'omuwendo gw'abantu mu kitundu gweyongera n'obwetaavu bw'ebyobulamu bweyongera, ab'obuyinza balemeddwa okussa ssente mu bikozesebwa ebyetaagisa. N'ekivuddemu, eddwaliro ly'e Moyo ekkulu teririna bikozesebwa bimala.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni wel dano tye ka medde ki miti me nongo kony me yot kom tye kamede, lutela me tedero pud pe guketo lim I gedo ma mite. Macalo adwogi ne, ot yat madit me Moyo pe tye ki jami weng ma mite.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata enaaba loka itunga keda ipudesia luka angaleu, epikosi apedorosio nuka atutubet aipikakin ikapunukec toma aduketa nu ekotos. Kanuka ngun, mam adekis napolon nako Moyo ejaasi keda iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe ongulumu eyini tuzu ri ma talasi azini e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma talasi, drice'ba angu eyini 'diyi o'bi robia ayu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma alea kuye. E'yo 'disi, arojo ambo Moyo niri ma alea afa ayuzaru 'diyi yo.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okweyongyera kw'abantu omu byaro hamwe n'ebyetaago by'eby'amagara, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro baremirwe kuta esente omu byombeko ebirikwetengwa. N'ekyarugiremu, eirwariro rya Moyo erihango tiriine by'okukoresa.

eng_prompt: As the population in the region continues to grow rapidly, local healthcare facilities are struggling to keep up with the demand for medical services. This has raised concerns about the adequacy of resources and infrastructure in Moyo general hospital.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu mu kitundu gweyongera okukula amangu, amalwaliro g'omu kitundu galwana okutuukana n'obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi. Kino kireeseewo okweraliikirira ku bikwata ku bikozesebwa n'ebizimbe ebimala mu ddwaliro ly'e Moyo ekkulu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano tye ka medde ameda i twok piny eni, odi yadi me tedero tye ka tute matek me bedo ki miti me nongo kony me yot kom. Man okelo lworo I kom jami tic ma oromo I ot yat madit me Moyo.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga kotoma aiboisit kangin, eutasi adekisia nuka atutubet ainingosit adumun eipuda lo amukian. Eyangaunit ngin aiyalongong kanu ikapun keda iboro luedolitos kadekis napolon nako Moyo.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe angu 'da ma alea ri ni mu drile tuzu okposi, arojo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri ci e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza e'yo afa ayuzaru azini afa ayuzaru arojo ambo Moyo niri ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu omuhendo gw'abantu omu kyanga nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, amarwariro g'omubyaro nigateganisibwa okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara. Eki kireesireho okwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'ebintu ebirikumara omu irwariro rya Moyo erihango.

eng_prompt: The increasing number of patients seeking medical care has overwhelmed the local healthcare facilities. As a result, many hospitals are struggling to accommodate those in need of urgent treatment.
lug_prompt: Omuwendo gw'abalwadde abeeyongera okunoonya obujjanjabi guyitiridde mu malwaliro g'ebyobulamu mu kitundu. N'ekivuddemu, amalwaliro mangi galwana okusuza abo abeetaaga obujjanjabi obw'amangu.
ach_prompt: Wel lutwo matye ka yenyo kony me yot kom omede tutwal I odi yadi me tedero. Macalo adwogi ne, odi yadi mapol tye ka nongo peko me gamo joo ma mito kony me yot kom pi oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Enaba loepol lo adekak lu ekotosi amukian epuakata adekisia nu okwap. Kanuka ngun, eutasi adekisia nuipu aimo itunga lu ekotos amukian katipet.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe tupi tupi 'ba azoru aro ndapi 'diyi ma kalafe ni fe arojo eyi ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo 'disi, arojo karakara eyi dri ci 'ba azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire kuronda obujanjabi, gugwire amarwariro g'omubyaro. N'ekyarugiremu, amarwariro maingi nigatunga oburemeezi bw'okureeberera abo abarikwenda kuragurirwa ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: After years of neglect and declining infrastructure, the local government recognized the urgent need for improvements in healthcare facilities. As a result, plans were set in motion to revitalize Moyo general hospital.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka gy'okulagajjalirwa n'ebizimbe okukendeera, gavumenti z'ebitundu zaalaba obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okutumbula ebyobulamu. N'ekyavaamu, enteekateeka zaateekebwawo okuzzaawo eddwaliro ly'e Moyo ekkulu.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol ma ki cayo dok ki balo jami me tic, gamente me tedero oniang ni omyero kimed rwom me ot yat oyot-oyot tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, kiketo yub me roco ot yat madit me Moyo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka apalunit ka aibiror naka adukena, apotu apuganisinei kojenutu eipud loka aitojokar aiboisio nuka amukian. Kanuka ngun, aponi kitolomunai aitemonokineta nuka aisiteteun adekis napolon nako Moyo.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani e'yo arojo ni 'diyi adizu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo esizu 'bori ma vutia, gamete angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma otu arojo eyi ma omgbo mbeleru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'do otita eyi arojo ambo Moyo niri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okunagaijura hamwe n'ebyombeko ebyabaire nibikyendeera, gavumenti y'ebyaro ekareeba ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okutunguura eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka z'okugarura busya eirwariro erihango erya Moyo zikateebwaho.

eng_prompt: Access to quality healthcare is essential for the well-being of the community. To address the growing health needs, local facilities must expand their services.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi obulungi kya mugaso eri obulamu obulungi bw'ekitundu. Okusobola okukola ku byetaago by'ebyobulamu ebigenda byeyongera, amalwaliro g'omu kitundu galina okugaziya obuweereza bwago.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom maber pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo pa lwak. Me tyeko peko me yot kom matye kamede, odi yadi omyero gu tyel kor tic gi.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian na adoketait ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aijar naka itunga. Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka angaleu lu iyata, ekot adekisia aiyatakin ejanakineikec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo alata muke ri esuzu ri eri orodriru aa'ta muke ongulumu eyini ri ni. Azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu, le pari azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ma tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obujanjabi burungi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'amagara marungi g'abantu. Okukora ahabyetaago by'eby'amagara ebirikweyongyera, amarwariro g'omubyaro gashemereire kwongyera aha buheereza bwago.

eng_prompt: Due to a recent surge in patient admissions and ongoing staff shortages, the healthcare facility is struggling to meet the demands of its community. As a result, critical gaps in staffing have emerged, impacting patient care.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweyongera kw'abalwadde mu malwaliro n'ebbula ly'abakozi, eddwaliro lifuba okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'abantu baayo. N'ekivuddemu, ebituli ebinene mu bakozi bivuddeyo, ekikosa obujjanjabi bw'abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Pi wel lutwo matye kadonyo I ot yat kacel ki nok pa lutic, ot yat tye ka tute matek me cobo miti pa lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, peko me bedo peke pa lutic tye ka kelo peko i kom gwoko lutwo.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aiyatakinio naka adekak keda ekadakada loka eswamak, etionikinit adekis aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga. Kanuka ngun, apolor amamus na eswamak, ido itolitoli amukian na adekak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azoru 'diyi 'duzu arojoa tualu azi'ba eyi ma ako be, arojo 'da ni dri ci e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, esele coza azi'ba eyi ma eselea ri efu e'yo 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire omu marwariro hamwe n'eibura ry'abakozi, eirwariro rigumire kuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho eibura ry'abakozi, ekirikuteganisa okureeberera abarwaire.

eng_prompt: Local health officials have reported a concerning trend in adolescent health. Recent surveys indicate a rise in sexual activity among teenagers, leading to alarming statistics.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu byalo baategeezezza ku mbeera eyeeraliikiriza mu byobulamu by'abavubuka. Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga okweyongera mu kwegatta mu bavubuka, ekiviiriddeko ebibalo ebitiisa.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom me tedero guwaco ni rwom me yot kom pa bulu tye ka medde tutwal. Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki nyutu ni tim me butu imit tye ka mede ikin bulu, man okelo wel ma kelo lworo.

lgg_prompt: Azi'ba alata ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece e'yo asi otiza ni e'yo 'ba oderu 'diyi ma rua ala niri ma dria. E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini e'yo ali o'baza ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu 'ba oderu 'diyi ma eselea ra, e'yo 'di fe kalafe 'bani asi otizuri.

eng_prompt: Many young mothers encounter various challenges as they approach childbirth. These challenges can lead to significant health risks for both the mother and the baby.
lug_prompt: Bamaama abato bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'enjawulo nga basemberera okuzaala. Okusoomoozebwa kuno kuyinza okuvaako obulabe obw'amaanyi eri obulamu bwa maama n'omwana.
ach_prompt: Mege matino mapol ginongo peko mapol ikare gi me nywal. Peko magi twero kelo peko madit tutwal I kom yotkom pa mego ki latin.

eng_prompt: The healthcare system in the region has been struggling for years due to insufficient funding and resources. As a result, many facilities, including Moyo general hospital, are unable to provide adequate care to their patients.
