eng_prompt: Communities around the world are recognizing the importance of collaboration and innovation. As a result, various initiatives are being launched to address pressing social and economic challenges.
lug_prompt: Abantu okwetooloola ensi yonna bakitegedde obukulu bw'okukolagana n'okuyiiya. N'ekivuddemu, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo zitandikibwawo okukola ku bizibu by'embeera z'abantu n'ebyenfuna eby'amangu.
ach_prompt: Lwak ma ilobo mapat-pat gitye ka niang ber pa ribbe ki diro manyen. Macalo adwogi ne, kitye ka cako yub mapat-pat me cobo peko me kwo pa lwak ki biacara.
teo_prompt: Itunga luka akwap kere ejenete ajokis naka aimorikikina keda aitolomunun iboro luitetiak. Kanuka ngun, eutai aitegear iboro luegelegela kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga keda nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu wudrikuru ma kalasi ndulu 'diyi orodri ti ecita ni azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi esu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'do e'yo ndundu eyi e'yo ewaru o'bi eyi ma eselea tualu e'yo robia ni 'diyi pie 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu omu nsi yoona nibamanya omugasho gw'okukwatanisa n'okujumbura. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka nyingi ziriyo nizitandikwa kukora aha buremeezi bw'abantu n'eby'entaasya.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote inclusivity and support diverse talents, various organizations have launched initiatives aimed at empowering underrepresented groups. As a result, people with disabilities have been given sponsorships.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula abantu bonna n'okuwagira ebitone eby'enjawulo, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bitandise enteekateeka ezigendereddwamu okutumbula ebibinja ebitakiikirirwa. N'ekivuddemu, abantu abaliko obulemu baweereddwa sikaala.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me tyelo kor tic pa dano weng ki tyelo kor talanta ma padi padi, dul mapat-pat gucako yub mapat-pat ma ki keto pi tyelo kor dul ma pe ki cungu pigi. Macalo adwogi ne, kimiyo gum me kwan nono ki lugoro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitopoloritor itunga kere ka aigangite atalanta nuegelegela, etegeasi iriongeta luipu nuepedorete aitogogong igurupun lumam ebwoikitai. Kanuka ngun, ejaikitai ingwalasik asioman natitai.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'ba dria otuzu azini atita fezu talanta ndundu eyini, amuti ndundu eyi e'do e'yo ndundu eyini lezu okpo fezu ongulumu 'bani pa tupi eyi ma paria ku 'diyi dri. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe 'ba aco be 'diyini atita sukulu lazu pirini 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura abantu boona n'okushagika ebitone ebitarikushushana, ebitongore bingi bitandikireho enteekateeka ezirikugyenderera okutunguura guruupu ezitarikujwekyerwa. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu abaine oburema aha mibiri yaabo, baheirwe obuhwezi bw'okwegyera busha.

eng_prompt: Ensuring equal opportunities and support for all citizens is a fundamental responsibility of the government. To achieve this, it is essential to allocate resources that address the unique needs of vulnerable populations, particularly those with disabilities.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa emikisa egyenkanankana n'obuyambi eri bannansi bonna buvunaanyizibwa bwa gavumenti. Okutuukiriza kino, kyetaagisa okugaba ebintu ebikola ku byetaago by'abantu abateesobola naddala abo abaliko obulemu.
ach_prompt: Miyo gum ki kony marom pi anywali weng obedo tic ma pire tek pa gamente. Me cobo man, pire tek tutwal me poko jami ma konyo dano ma goro tutwalle lugoro.
teo_prompt: Aitogogong arerengesio nueriakasi keda agangat nejaas itunga kere erai aswam naepol noi naka apugan. Kanu aitodolikin ngun, ejokuna noi aikor iboro lu itemonokinete ipudesia luka itunga lu ican, kacut ngul lu engwalitos.
lgg_prompt: Drileba tro tro azini atita fezu kari anzi dria eyini ri eri azi gamete ni okporu ni i. E'yo 'di 'yezu, eri orodriru afa 'bani lele 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma aza kozu, tutuni 'ba aco be 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abantu boona baine emigisha erikwingana n'obuhwezi, n'obujunaanizibwa bwa gavumenti. Okuhikiiriza eki, n'eky'omugasho okugaba ebintu ebirikubaasa kukora ahabyetaago by'abantu abatarikwebaasa, namunonga abo abaine oburema.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for skilled workers, local leaders have been exploring ways to enhance vocational training programs. As a result, the district has encouraged technical education in the area.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'abakozi abakugu obweyongera, abakulembeze b'ebyalo babadde banoonya engeri y'okutumbula pulogulaamu z'okutendekebwa mu by'emikono. N'ekivuddemu, disitulikiti ekubirizza okusoma eby'emikono mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lutic ma ludiro, lutela me tedero gubedo ka yenyo yoo me medo rwom me pwonye me tic cing. Macalo adwogi ne, district ocuku cwiny lutino me kwan me tic cing ikabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka eswamak lu emisiaritos, eutasi engarenok luka atutubet aimo iwaitin lu itopoloorere ainapeta nuka aitutuoro. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokit edisitrikt asioman naka etatai kaiboisit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azi'ba onduaru 'diyi ma kalafe ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'bi geri nda otita onita afa edele drisi 'diyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, distrikiti eka onita afa edele drisi 'diyiniri angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'abakozi abakugu kweyongyera, abebembezi b'ebyaro batwire nibasherura oburyo bw'okutunguura enteekateeka y'okutendeka eby'emikono. N'ekyarugiremu, disiturikiti eyongyeire amaani omu kwega eby'emikono omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In light of recent corruption scandals, local authorities emphasized the importance of maintaining integrity throughout the upcoming registration process. As a result, district officials were reminded of the legal and ethical implications of engaging in corrupt practices.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku mivuyo gy'obuli bw'enguzi egyaliwo gye buvuddeko, ab'obuyinza mu byalo bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okukuuma obwesimbu mu kwewandiisa okujja. N'ekyavaamu, abakungu ba disitulikiti bajjukiziddwa ku buzibu obuli mu mateeka ne mu mpisa bw'okwenyigira mu buli bw'enguzi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki bal me camcana ma otime cokcok-ki, lutela me tedero guwaco ni pire tek me gwoko ber bedo ikare me coone matye kabino ni. Macalo adwogi ne, ki poyo wi lutic me dictri kom adwoki me tim camcana malube ki cik.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos amidicio naka apiyai nupac, apotu apedorosio kitogogongoto ajokis naka aidar aiyuwara kotoma aiwadikao naebunit. Kanuka ngun, aponi isiitikinai eswamak luko disitrikt atiokisio nu ikisila keda nu iponesio luka aswam amidicio naka apiyai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anyamgbolo ni 'diyi ma dria, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi fe okpo e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ru osizu kililiru ri ma tambazu sa'wa dria 'bani eyi ma ru osizu ri ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ega azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi e'yo onzi azini onzi 'bani eco 'ye e'yo anyamgbolo ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'emishango y'obushomankuzi eyabaireho juba, ab'obushoborozi ahabyaro bakahamya omugasho gw'okurinda oburingaaniza omu kwehandikisa okurikwija. N'ekyarugiremu, abakuru aha disiturikiti, bakaijusibwa ebirikubaasa kuruga omu kwejumba omu bikorwa by'obushomankuzi.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure that national identity cards are issued fairly, the government has established specific eligibility criteria. This includes a requirement that applicants must be citizens of Uganda.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa nti endagamuntu z'eggwanga ziweebwa mu bwenkanya, gavumenti etaddewo emitendera egy'enjawulo. Kino kizingiramu ekyetaagisa nti abasaba balina okuba bannansi ba Uganda.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni kimiyo lanyut mamegi nyo ID maber, gamente okatti ki yoo mapat-pat me moko ni ngat moni oporre me nongo lanyut meno. Man bene tye ki cik ni dano ma mito penyo pi kony omyero gubed anywali me lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ijanakino akaadin nuka akwap ejok, etolomu apugan nutupitono nuibusakinit itunga aswam. Imoriaritos nu ekotoi ebe ibusakinit itunga ailip araut itunga luko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Lezu nezu ra kini 'ba kadi kari ni 'diyi awa kililiru, gamete 'ba geri 'bani ecozu eyi esuzu ra 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di ma azi lepi 'ba waraga sipi 'diyi ma ovu kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya ngu endanga muntu z'eihanga niziheebwa omu buringaaniza, gavumenti eteireho enkora y'okukuratira. Eki nikitwariramu ekirikwetagisa ngu abarikushaba, bashemereire kuba bari abatuuze ba Uganda.

eng_prompt: In light of recent policy changes, the government has decided to revise its approach to refugee documentation. As a result, new regulations will impact the issuance of identification for displaced individuals.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku nkyukakyuka mu nkola gye buvuddeko, gavumenti esazeewo okuddamu okutunula mu nkola yaayo ku biwandiiko by'abanoonyiboobubudamu. N'ekivuddemu, amateeka amapya gajja kukosa okugaba endagamuntu eri abantu ababundabunda.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki aloka-loka me cik ma otimme cokcok-ki, gamente oloko kit ma en tiyo kwede me coyo waraga pa luring ayela. Macalo adwogi ne, cik manyen obi kelo alokaloka I kom miyo lanyut ma nyutu ni ngat moni orweny ki I kabedone.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aijulanakineta nuka ikisila, abu apugan ocam aijulakin epone loepedoria ngesi aiwadika apapulai nuka ikerai. Kanuka ngun, epote ikisila luitetiak aitolitol epone loka aijaikin akadin mama ejaasi itunga luekerete koreriakec.
lgg_prompt: Ojata o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete asi e'yo 'du geri erini kokobi emunyale eyini 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma ale andrizu. E'yo 'disi, azita o'diru 'diyi nga mu e'yo 'ye e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ofuzu angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi fezu 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'empindahinduka y'ebiragiro eyabaireho juba,gavumenti eshaziremu kugarukamu omuringo ogu erikukoresa omu kuhandiika ebihandiiko by'empungi. N'ekyarugiremu, ebiragiro ebitsya nibiija kuhwera omu kuheereza abantu ababingirwe endanga muntu.

eng_prompt: Amid widespread allegations of corruption, an investigation was launched into the practices surrounding the national identity card registration exercise. Whistleblowers revealed that some district officials were exploiting the process for personal gain.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu bigambibwa nti waliwo obuli bw'enguzi, okunoonyereza kwatandikibwa ku bikolwa ebyetoolodde okwewandiisa kw'endagamuntu. Abaabikkula amawulire baategeezezza nti abakungu ba disitulikiti abamu baali bakozesa enkola eno okwefunira ebyabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma byek me camcana tye mapol tutwal, kicako kwed I kom tim me coyo dano pi lanyut mamegi nyo ID. Lumii ngec bot lwak onyuto ni lutic me district mukene gubedo katic ki yub eni pi cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitoroneta nuipu nuikamunitos amidicio naka apiyai, aponi kogeunai aingic nuikamunitos aswamisio nuikamunitos aiwadikao naka akadi naka akwap. Apotu lu alimonokinete itunga kotemasi ebe eutasi eswamak ice luka edisitrikt aitosom ainapeta ngun kanu ameda kec bon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anyamgbolo ma dria 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba e'do e'yo eti ondaza e'yo 'yeta 'bani 'ba eyi osizu kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Ba e'yo nze'ba 'diyi ece kini azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi ma azi eyi e'yo 'di ayu orodri eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu hariho obushomankuzi bwingi,kakatandikwaho okucondooza aha bikorwa ebirikukwata aha kuhandikisa endanga muntu z'eihanga. Abarikugambira abantu ebirikukwata ahari disiturikiti, bakareebeka ngu bamwe aha bakuru ba disiturikiti, bakaba nibakoresa engyenderwaho egyo ahabw'ebyetengo byabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to increase participation and ensure that everyone has access to essential identification, the government announced a new initiative. This initiative aims to simplify the registration process for those unable to visit registration centers.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okwongera okwetaba n'okulaba nga buli omu afuna endagamuntu ezeetaagisa, gavumenti yalangiridde enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okwanguyiza enkola y'okwewandiisa eri abo abatasobola kugenda mu bifo we beewandiisiza.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me bedo tye ki neno ni dano weng tye ki gum me nongo lanyut ma mite pi kwo gi, gamente okatti ki yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me weko tic me coone bedo yot pi jo ma pe twero cito I kabedo me coone.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aiyatakin ajaut keda itunga ka awanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere adumunun akadin, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet na erai aitapatan ainapeta nuka aiwadikaun kanu ngul lumam epedoritos alosit aiboisio nu aiwadikaun.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu 'yeta 'da ma alea dika nezu ra kini 'ba dria eco e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ngulupi si 'diyi esu ra, gamete azi e'yo azi o'diru ni. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo ru siza ni 'diyi ma e'yo otuzu 'ba ecopi mupi angu ru siza ni 'diyi ma alia ku 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okweyongyera kwejumba n'okureeba ngu buri omwe yaatunga endanga muntu, gavumenti ekarangirira enteekateeka nsya. Ekigyendererwa n'okwanguhiereza abo abatarikubaasa kuza omu myanya y'okwehandikisa.

eng_prompt: In order to access essential services and participate fully in civic duties, it is crucial for citizens to have proper identification. Therefore, Ugandans should take the necessary steps to ensure they are registered for national identification cards.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okufuna obuweereza obwetaagisa n'okwenyigira mu bujjuvu mu mirimu gy'obwannannyini, kya mugaso nnyo bannansi okubeera n'endagamuntu entuufu. N'olwekyo, Bannayuganda balina okukakasa nti beewandiisa okufuna endagamuntu.
ach_prompt: Me nongo kony ma mite pi kwo ki bedo tye I tic pa lwak, pire tek tutwal pi anywali me bedo ki lanyut maber. Pi meno, anywali me Uganda omyero gutim jami weng ma mite me neno ni ki coyo gi me nongo lanyut mamegi nyo ID.
teo_prompt: Kanu adumunun aijanakino ka ajaut toma aswamisinei nuka itunga, ejokuna noi itunga ajaut keda aiwadikaeta nuajokak. Kanuka ngun, ekot itunga luko Uganda aswam nu ekotoi kanu awanyun ebe iwadikauna kesi kanu adumun akaadi naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Azi orodriru 'diyi esuzu azini fizu azi o'bi yini 'diyi ma alia kililiru, eri orodriru kari anzi yi vu kokobi e'dazu kililiru 'diyi ovuzu ci. Ka'dini, le kari anzi Uganda ni 'diyi ma 'du e'yo eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi nezu ra kini eyi osi eyi kadi kari ni 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuheereza bw'omugasho n'okwejumba omu mirimo y'abantu, n'eky'omugasho munonga abatuuragye kugira endagamuntu nungi. N'ahabw'ekyo, abanya Uganda bashemereire kukora kyona ekirikwetengyesa kureeba ngu beehandiikisa kutunga endanga muntu.

eng_prompt: Despite the government's efforts to streamline the issuance process, many citizens are still facing delays. As a result, some people have not received their national identity cards.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga gavumenti efubye okwanguya enkola y'okugaba, bannansi bangi bakyalina okulwawo. N'ekyavaamu, abantu abamu tebannafuna ndagamuntu zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gamente tye ka yele me yubu yoo me miyo kony, pol pa dano pwod gitye ka galle. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mukene pwod pe gunongo lanyut mamegi nyo ID.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamat apugan kagogong aitapatan ainapeta, eringa itunga luipu etereikina keda aiyap. Kanuka ngun, mam itunga ice edumunitos akaadin kec nuka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni tro okpo 'ba e'yo 'bani robia fezu ri ma omgbo otuzu ra ti, kari anzi karakara eyi nga po'di sa'wa eza. E'yo 'disi, 'ba azi 'diyi esuni nga eyi ma kokobi kari ni 'diyi ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani ga gavumenti okushemeza omuringo gw'okugaba ebitabo, abatuuragye baingi nibatunga oburemeezi bw'okukyerererwa. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu abamwe tibakatungire endanga muntu zaabo.

eng_prompt: In a recent survey conducted in Moyo district, officials aimed to assess the progress of the national identity card distribution program. The results revealed a significant uptake among the local adult population.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonyereza okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko mu disitulikiti y'e Moyo, abakungu baaluubirira okwetegereza enkulaakulana mu nteekateeka y'okugaba endagamuntu z'eggwanga. Ebyava mu kunoonyereza byalaga nti abantu abakulu mu kitundu baagala nnyo.
ach_prompt: I kwed ma otime cokcok-ki I distrik me Moyo, lutic ne gubedo ki miti me neno kit ma yub me poko lanyut mamegi nyo ID tye ka wot kwede. Adwogi ne onyuto miti madit tutwal I kin ludito me tedero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aingic napac ko disitrikt loko Moyo, alosikinet naka eswamak arai airereor eipone lo akorar akaadin nuka akwap. Apotu akiro itodutu ebe epuakata noi itunga luapolok luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza 'bani 'ye distrikiti Moyo niri ma alea o'diru ri ma alea, azi'ba eyi le ndra muzu otita 'bani kadi kari ni 'diyi awazu ri ma omgbo onezu. E'yo efupi 'diyi e'da kini 'ba 'wara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi le e'yo 'da saaru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kucondooza okwakozirwe omu disiturikiti ya Moyo, abakungu bakagyenderera okureeba oku enteekateeka y'okugaba endanga muntu erikugyenda omumaisho. Ebyarugiremu nibyoreka ngu abantu abakuru omu byaro, nibakunda munonga.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising in the region as an influx of refugees sought shelter and resources. As both groups struggled to secure their livelihoods, disputes over land ownership became increasingly contentious.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu ng'abanoonyiboobubudamu bangi banoonya aw'okubeera n'ebikozesebwa. Ng'ebibinja byombi birwana okusobola okweyimirizaawo, enkaayana ku bwannannyini ku ttaka zeeyongera.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I but lobo eni I kare ma luring ayela mapol gubino ka yenyo kabedo ki jami me tic. I kare ma gurup aryo weng gubedo ka lweny me nongo yoo me kwo gi, telle I kom twero me ngom odoko tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotoma aiboisit kangin naarai apotu ikerai luipu kodumutu neperot keda iboro. Neautar igurupun ngun kere aitelekaar aijarakec, apotu ingungeta luka alupok kiyatakinos.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri ri e'bi tu angu 'da ma alea emunyale karakara eyini emuzu aku ndazu tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie. Ongulumu iri 'diyi ni dri ciria geri eyini aa'zu edriru 'diyi ma tambazu, erita ako e'yo nyaku ma e'ipika niri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu kyanga ahabw'empungi nyingi kuronda oburaaro n'ebintu. Obu guruupu zombi zaabaire nizirwana kurinda entuura yaazo, entongane ahabw'obugabe bw'eitaka zikyeyongyera kuba ez'akaimukiriro.

eng_prompt: In an effort to streamline the process of obtaining essential identification documents, the government has announced a new initiative. This initiative aims to ensure that all citizens have access to vital records from an early age.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okwanguya enkola y'okufuna ebiwandiiko by'endagamuntu ebikulu, gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okulaba nga bannansi bonna bafuna ebiwandiiko ebikulu okuva ku myaka emito.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me yubu yoo me nongo lanyut ma mite pi dano, gamente okatti ki yub manyen. Yub man tye me neno ni anywali weng tye ki gum me nongo ngec ma pigi tego nicake ma pud gitino.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitapatan ainapeta nuka adumun apapulai nuka aijen, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun ngesi awanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere adumunun aiwadikaeta nuepolok ageun edisiak.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo kokobi e'dapi 'diyi ma esuta ma e'yo otuzu, gamete azi e'yo azi o'dini 'bo. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu nezu ra kini kari anzi dria eyi ma kokobi orodriru 'diyi esu e'dozu eli werea 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura omuringo gw'okutunga endanga muntu, gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka nsya. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okureeba ngu abatuuragye boona batunga ebihandiiko ebikuru kuruga omu myaka mikye.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous attempts to engage in dialogue, tensions have escalated between the local government and the refugee community. As a result, many feel their concerns are being ignored.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo okugezaako okungi okwetaba mu kuteesa, obunkenke bweyongedde wakati wa gavumenti z'ebitundu n'abanoonyiboobubudamu. N'ekivuddemu, bangi bawulira nti ebyeraliikiriza byabwe bibuusibwa amaaso.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kitemo tutwal me lok, telle tye kamedde ikin gamente me tedero ki luring ayela. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol gitye ki tam ni pe kitye ka winyo lokgi.
teo_prompt: Karaida etamitai duc aitolot aineranara, eyatakinos ingungeta kiding apugan naka atutubet keda ikerai. Kanuka ngun, eomitos itunga luipu ebe mam epalunit aiyalongongokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo nzezu 'diyi ma kalafe ni tro ovuzu tre ra ti, e'yo ewaru gavumete angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ongulumu emunyale eyini 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi ega kini 'ba asi e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okugyezaho kwingi kwejumba omu kugaaniira, obunkenke bweyongyeire ahagati ya gavumenti z'ebyaro hamwe n'empungi. N'ekyarugiremu, baingi nibateekateeka ngu enshonga zaabo tizirikufayo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to ensure that all residents have access to essential services, the government initiated a comprehensive identity card registration program. This initiative aimed to include vulnerable populations, including those seeking asylum.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube okulaba nga abatuuze bonna bafuna obuweereza obwetaagisa, gavumenti yatandikawo enteekateeka y'okuwandiisa endagamuntu. Enteekateeka eno yali egendereddwamu abantu abateesobola nga mw'otwalidde n'abo abanoonya obubudamu.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me neno ni lutedero weng gunongo kony ma mite pi kwo gi, gamente ocako yub me coyo dano weng me nongo lanyut mamegi nyo ID. Yub man obedo ki miti me konyo dano ma goro, ma I kingi obedo luring ayela.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere adumunun aijanakino, abu apugan kitegea ainapeta nuka aiwadikao naka akadin nuka akwap. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun arai aimorikikin itunga lu ican, aimoriarit ngul lu ekotosi ikerai.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ra kini 'ba dria aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma esuta azakoma orodriru 'diyi esu ra, gamete e'do otita 'bani 'ba eyi ma ru osizu 'ba eyi ma kokobi e'dazuri ma dria. Asisile e'yo 'di niri lezu 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma eselea 'ba emunyale ndapi 'diyi ma eselea indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureeba ngu abatuura gye boona bahikwaho obuheereza, gavumenti ekatandikaho enteekateeka y'okuhandiika endanga muntu. Enteekateeka egi ekaba negyenderera abantu abatarikwebaasa, otwariiremu n'abo abarikushaba obuhungiro.

eng_prompt: Engaging the community in the planning process is essential for fostering trust and transparency. By incorporating diverse perspectives, district officials can make more informed and effective decisions.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigira mu nteekateeka y'ekitundu kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula obwesige n'obwerufu. Nga bayingiza endowooza ez'enjawulo, abakungu ba disitulikiti basobola okukola okusalawo okulungi era okulungi.
ach_prompt: Dwoko lwak I yub eni pire tek tutwal pi kelo gen ki ada. Kace ludito me district gutiyo ki tam ma pat pat, man weko gumoko tam maber dok ma tiyo maber.
teo_prompt: Aimorikikin itunga toma ainapeta nuka aitemonokin erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolorite amuno keda aica. Kowai lo aimorikikin aomisio nuegelegela, epedorete eswamak luko disitrikt aitolomun aseununeta nuajokak.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyi suzu otita eyi ma alea ri eri orodriru asi'baza azini e'yo ada ejizu. Geri 'ba eyini e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu ri si, azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi eco peta kililiru azini kililiru 'diyi pe ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutwarira abantu omu nteekateeka n'eky'omugasho munonga omukureetaho obwesigye n'oburingaaniza. Ab'eby'obutegyeki aha disiturikiti, nibabaasa kusharamu kurungi, barikukoresa emiteekateekyere etarikushushana.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous meetings and discussions about the proposed initiatives, there has been little progress in executing the outlined strategies. As a result, many stakeholders are growing increasingly frustrated with the lack of action.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga wabaddewo enkiiko nnyingi n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nteekateeka eziteeseddwa, wabaddewo enkulaakulana ntono mu kussa mu nkola enteekateeka ezo. N'ekivuddemu, abakwatibwako bangi beeyongera okunyiiga olw'obutabaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kacoke ki nywako lok mapol obedo tye I kom yub mapat-pat ma kimito kelo, pe tye dongo pa yub mapat-pat matye. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol tye ka cwer cwiny gi pi peko me tic.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu airiamununeta keda ipegeta nuikamunitos aomisio nu ebeit aswam, ikidioko nu iswamasi kanu aitodolikin nu ebeit aswam. Kanuka ngun, ekadakitos itunga luipu kanu amamus na aswam.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi karakara eyi ma talasi, e'yo nzeza e'yo 'bani lele 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria ra ti, angu zoza e'yo 'bani lele 'diyi 'yezu ri ma alea ri ma ongmbo ni nga aa were. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, 'ba karakara e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi ma asi eza e'yo 'bani e'yo nde 'yezu kurisi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho enkiiko nyingi n'okuhanuura aha nteekateeka, hatwireho entunguuka nkye omu kuta ebiteekateeko omu nkora. N'ekyarugiremu, abaine akakwate omu by'obutegyeki beyongyeire kuhwamu amaani ahabw'obutabaho.

eng_prompt: In light of the increasing tensions arising from the influx of refugees, it is crucial for local authorities to take proactive measures. Effective communication and mediation strategies must be implemented to foster understanding and cooperation between the refugees and the hosting communities.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bunkenke obweyongera obuva ku kuyingira kw'abanoonyiboobubudamu, kya mugaso nnyo eri ab'obuyinza mu byalo okubaako kye bakolawo nga bukyali. Enkola ennungi ey'empuliziganya n'okutabaganya erina okuteekebwa mu nkola okutumbula okutegeera n'enkolagana wakati w'abanoonyiboobubudamu n'ebitundu ebibakyaza.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle matye kamede macalo adwogi me donyo pa luring ayela, pire tek tutwal ki lutela me tedero me timo gin mo. Omyero ki tii ki yoo me lok ki laro lok maber wek winye ki winye obed tye ikin luring ayela ki lwak ma ikabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aiyalongong na iyata kanuka ikerai, ejokuna noi apedorosio nuka atutubena aitolomun nu iswamaete. Ekot aitolomun iwaitin luajokak luka einer keda aimorikikin kanu aitopolor aiswamanara kiding ikerai keda atekerin nu ijaunitos kes.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru emunyale eyini emuzu angu 'da ma alea ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyini e'yo eyi 'yezu okporu. Le 'ba ma o'ba geri e'yo nzezu kililiru azini ti ecita ejizu emunyale eyi ma eselea ongulumu angu fepi emunyale eyini 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obunkenke obweyongyeire kuruga omu kuhika kw'empungi, niky'omugasho ab'obushoborozi kukora ekirikubaasika. Enkora nungi y'empurizagana n'okugarukanisa, eshemereire kukorwa, okureetaho okwetegyerezana n'okukwatanisa ahagati y'empungi n'abantu abarikubakiira.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the region has seen a significant influx of displaced individuals seeking safety and stability. As a result, local authorities have been working to accommodate the growing population of refugees.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, ekitundu kibaddemu abantu bangi ababundabunda nga banoonya obukuumi n'obutebenkevu. N'ekyavaamu, ab'obuyinza mu byalo babadde bakola okusenza omuwendo gw'abanoonyiboobubudamu ogweyongera.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, but lobo man obedo ki wel dano mapol ma orwenyo gangi gi me cito ka yenyo gwok ki ber bedo. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me tedero gubedo katic matek me jolo wel luring ayela matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ewanyunit aiboisit ngin aiboisio nuipu noi nuka itunga lu emunaritos aiboisio kec aimo ayuwara keda ainapakina. Kanuka ngun, iswamaete apedorosio nuka atutubena kanu aidar enaaba loka ikerai.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, angu 'di ma alea 'ba karakara eyi emuki angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea eyini ani ageitema azini asianzu ndazu. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi azi nga angu fezu kalafe emunyale eyini tupi tutu 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, ekyanga kireebire abantu baingi abarikuruga omu maka gaabo barikuronda obusingye n'obutebekana. N'ekyarugiremu, ab'obushoborozi omu byaro batwire nibakora munonga okureeberera omuhendo gw'empungi ogweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Despite the growing need for support in the community, local leaders have largely remained uninvolved. This lack of engagement has raised concerns about the effectiveness of ongoing initiatives.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde obwetaavu bw'obuyambi bweyongedde mu kitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo basigadde nga tebeenyigiddemu. Obutakwatagana buno buleese okweraliikirira ku buwanguzi bw'enteekateeka ezigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni miti me kony tye kamede I kabedo mapatpat, lutela me tedero pol kare pe gubedo tye. Bedo peke pa miti eni okelo lworo I kom tic pa yub matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata eipud loka agangat kotoma atutubet, mam engarenok luka atutubet iswamaete ngun. Amamus na aiswamanara ayangau aiyalongong kanu aitodolikin aswamisio nu elosi akonye.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu atita ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ra ti, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi awi e'yo 'da ma alea ku. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea ku ri eji asi otiza e'yo otita mupi drile 'diyiniri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho ekyetengo ky'obuhwezi omu byaro, abebembezi b'ebyaro tibarikwejumbamu. Okuremwa kwejumba omu by'obutegyeki kireesireho okwerarikirira aha kukora kurungi kw'enteekateeka ezirikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing challenges faced by rural communities, local leaders convened to discuss strategies for development. Their discussions highlighted the need for comprehensive initiatives to improve infrastructure, education, and economic opportunities in these areas.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweyongera kw'okusoomoozebwa abantu b'omu byalo kwe boolekaganye nakwo, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukulaakulanyaamu. Okukubaganya ebirowoozo kwabwe kwalaga obwetaavu bw'enteekateeka ez'awamu okutumbula ebizimbe, ebyenjigiriza n'emikisa gy'ebyenfuna mu bitundu bino.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko matye kamedde I caro, lutela me tedero gubedo tye me nywako tam i kom yoo me dongo lobo. Nywako lok meggi onyuto ber pa yub mapat-pat me ilo malo rwom me tic, kwan ki biacara I kabedo magi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas ocaaloi, apotu engarenok lu ocaaloi iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu apol. Apotu kesi kitetemoto eipud loka ainapeta nuepedorete aitojokar adukena, asioman keda ikapun kaiboisio nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru angu calu ru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu angu ezozu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo nzeza yini 'diyi ece e'yo lezu e'yo dria 'diyi 'yezu afa ayuzaru 'diyi otuzu, onita ma omgbo otuzu azini drileba robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu angu 'diyi ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obweyongyeire oburikushangwa abantu b'omubyaro, abebembezi b'ebyaro, bakabugana kuhanuura aha nkora y'entunguuka. Okuhanuura kwabo kukashoboorora ekyetengo ky'okutandikaho enteekateeka y'okutunguura ebyombeko, eby'obwegyese hamwe n'emigisha y'eby'entaasya omu myanya egi.

eng_prompt: Despite the community's growing needs and aspirations for improvement, the budget constraints have become increasingly evident. As a result, many proposed initiatives are being put on hold indefinitely.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'ebyetaago by'abantu byeyongedde era nga baagala okulongooka, obuzibu mu mbalirira bweyongedde. N'ekivuddemu, enteekateeka nnyingi eziteeseddwa ziyimiriziddwa ekiseera ekitali kigere.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni miti ki miti pa lwak tye kamede, peko me byek me lim tye ka time. Macalo adwogi ne, yub mapol ma kimito kelo gitye ka juku tic gi pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata ipudesia luka itunga keda eipud loka aitojokar ejautene, apolor noi ationis naka ebajet. Kanuka ngun, iponesio luipu luitemokinitai kes ibwaikitai apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongulumu eyini lele tualu e'yo eyini lezu ecazu muke ra 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo ewaru robia ayuza ma dria 'diyi eca e'da sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo karakara 'bani le 'ye 'diyi atri sa'wa ezu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ebyetaago by'abantu ebyeyongyeire n'ebigyendererwa by'okutunguuka, oburemeezi bw'embaririra bweyongyeire. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka nyingi niziyimirizibwa.

eng_prompt: Concerns have been raised by various stakeholders regarding the management of refugee programs. Despite multiple requests for information, the chief administrative officer has not provided adequate updates or clarity on the processes involved.
lug_prompt: Okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa abakwatibwako ab'enjawulo ku bikwata ku nzirukanya ya pulogulaamu z'abanoonyiboobubudamu. Wadde nga baasaba obubaka emirundi mingi, akulira eby'obufuzi tannaba kuwa bubaka bumala oba okutangaaza ku mitendera egirimu.
ach_prompt: Lwak mapol gubedo ki lworo I kom kit ma yub me gwoko luring ayela tye kawot kwede. Kadi bed ni kipenyo pi ngec tyen mapol, lador dul enoni pe omiyo ngec ma oromo onyo niango matut I kom yoo me tic matye.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luegelegela itodutu aiyalongongikec kanuikamunitos eyaitene loka ainapeta nuka ikerai. Karaida ilipitai luipu akiro, mam lokapolon eyaitene ijaikit akiro nuitetiak nuikamunitos ainapeta nuikamunitos akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ba ambo ndundu eyi e'bi asi otiza e'da otita emunyale eyini 'diyi ma driceza ma dria. Erini tro e'yo a'izu karakara ra ti, drice'ba e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma drilea ri feni nga o'dukoti o'diru 'diyi kani ku e'yo eceza kililiru geri 'bani e'yo nde 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire kuruga omu bantu baingi aha bikwatiraine n'enkora ya puroguraamu z'empungi. N'obu haraabe hariho okushaba kwingi kw'amakuru, orikukurira eby'obwebembezi tihaine eki arikumanya ekirikumara.

eng_prompt: Due to unexpected budget cuts and rising costs, the local government is struggling to manage its financial resources effectively. As a result, the district lacks enough funds to regulate its projects.
lug_prompt: Olw'okusala ku mbalirira mu ngeri etasuubirwa n'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya, gavumenti z'ebitundu zirwana okuddukanya obulungi ensimbi zaayo. N'ekivuddemu, disitulikiti terina ssente zimala kulabirira pulojekiti zaayo.
ach_prompt: Pi ngolo byek me lim ma pe byek tye iye ki mede pa wel lim, gamente me tedero tye ka tute matek me tic ki limgi maber. Macalo adwogi ne, district peke ki cente ma oromo me doro yub meggi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aitidisiar ebajet keda itiaisinei lu iyatakinos, euta apugan na okwap ationikin aitwasam ikapun ke ejok. Kanuka ngun, emamiatatar edisitrikt keda ikapun lu edolitos kanu aitemonokin ipurojektin ke.
lgg_prompt: Otita ajeni 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ma omgbo esizu tualu aje tupi tupi 'diyisi, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi dri ci robia eyini ri ayuzu kililiru. E'yo 'disi, distrikiti vu robia otita erini 'diyi ma ta mbazu ri yo.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyendeeza embaririra hamwe n'okweyongyera kw'enshohoza,gavumenti z'ebyaro niziteganisibwa okukoresa kurungi esente zaayo. N'ekyarugiremu, disiturikiti teine sente z'okureeberera purogyekiti zaayo.

eng_prompt: Many displaced individuals are facing dire living conditions in the camps. Access to essential resources, such as clean water, remains a critical challenge for these vulnerable populations.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi ababundabunda mu nsi zaabwe boolekaganye n'embeera embi mu nkambi. Okufuna ebintu ebikulu, gamba ng'amazzi amayonjo, kikyali kusoomooza kwa maanyi eri abantu bano abateesobola.
ach_prompt: Luring ayela mapol tye ka nongo kwo marac tutwal I kem. Nongo jami mapigi tego calo pii maleng pud obedo peko madit tutwal ki dano ma goro.
teo_prompt: Ikerai luipu ejaas keda aijar naronon ko okabin. Adumunun iboro kwape nat akipi nu elaete, erai ainingosit naepol noi kanejaas itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara efu'ba engazu angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi aa e'yo onzi eyi ma alea kembe eyi ma alea. Afa orodriru ekile yi ala le 'diyi esuzu ri nga po'di e'yo ewaru 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi ababingirwe omu maka gaabo, nibatuura omu mbeera mbi omu kampu. Okutunga ebintu by'omugasho nk'amaizi marungi, kikiri ekizibu ky'amaani aha bantu abo abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: In recent months, reports of stolen vehicles have surged across the city. Many residents are increasingly concerned about the safety of their cars.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, alipoota z'emmotoka enzibe zeeyongedde okwetooloola ekibuga. Abatuuze bangi beeyongera okufaayo ku bukuumi bw'emmotoka zaabwe.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, lok me kwalo mutoka omede tutwal I boma ne. Lutedero mapol tye ka paro pi ber bedo pa mutokagi.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, apolor akiro nuikamunitos amotokan nu ekokoi koibuga kere. Ipu itunga lu epodokitos nuka ayuwara naka amotokan kec.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'diyi ma alea, o'duko e'yo mutukari oguzaniri ma dria 'diyi tu aku ambu city niri ma alea ndulu. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi karakara eyi asi otiza be mutukari eyivile 'diyi ma tambaza ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, ripoota z'emotoka eziibirwe zeyongyeire omu rurembo. Abatuuragye baingi beeyongyeire kufayo aha mutindo gw'emotoka zaabo.

eng_prompt: Every nation establishes regulations to manage the flow of people and goods. These regulations are enforced at designated locations where travelers and shipments can enter or exit the country.
lug_prompt: Buli ggwanga liteekawo amateeka okukwasaganya entambula y'abantu n'ebyamaguzi. Ebiragiro bino bikakasibwa mu bifo ebirondeddwa abatambuze n'emigugu gye basobola okuyingira oba okufuluma eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Lobo weng keto cik me doro wot pa dano ki jami acata. Cik magi ki keto itic I kabedo ma kicimo kama luwot ki jami gi twero donyo iye onyo aa ki I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Kangol akwap itolomununei ikisila kanu aitikitik alosit naka itunga keda iboro. Itwasamao ikisila lu kotoma aiboisio nuebeit alotok keda iboro alomar arai anyoun kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Kari dria eyi azita eyi si acita 'ba eyini tualu afa ozizaru 'diyi pie ri ma aza kozu. Ba azita 'diyi 'ba pari 'bani 'ba aci'ba azini afa ozizaru 'diyi ecozu fizu kari ma alia kani ku fuzu kari ma aliarisi ra 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Buri eihanga niritaho ebiragiro by'okureeberera entambura y'abantu n'ebintu. Ebiragiro ebi nibiteebwa omu nkora omu myanya eteirweho, ahu abarikugyenda hamwe n'ebintu byabo barikubaasa kutaaha n'okuruga omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: Car theft has become a growing concern in many urban areas. Understanding the motivations behind this crime can help in developing better prevention strategies.
lug_prompt: Obubbi bw'emmotoka bweyongedde mu bibuga bingi. Okutegeera ebiviirako obumenyi bw'amateeka buno kiyinza okuyamba mu kukola enkola ennungi ez'okubutangira.
ach_prompt: Kwalo mutoka odoko peko madit tutwal I boma mapol. Niang tyen lok ma oweko bal eni otimme twero konyo me yubu yoo me gengo ne.
teo_prompt: Akoko na imotokan erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma aiboisio nuipu nu otaun. Ajenun nu isinyikokinitos itunga aswam nuarokok ingarakini aitolomun iwaitin lu itikitikere.
lgg_prompt: Mutukari eyi ma ogu eca curu'do e'yo azi okporu ni ru tawuni karakara eyi ma alea. E'yo 'bani e'yo onzi 'di 'yezu 'diyi ma e'yo vazu ri ni nga azakoma fe geri kililiru 'bani ecozu e'yo nde atrizu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obushuma bw'emotoka bweyongyeire omu myanya y'endembo. Okwetegyereza ebirikureetaho obukozi bw'ebibi obu nikibaasa kuhwera omu kukora oburyo burungi bw'okuzibira.

eng_prompt: In today's world, vehicles are a common sight on the roads, and each one is assigned a unique identifier. This system allows for efficient tracking and management of automobiles.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, emmotoka zitera okulabibwa ku nguudo, era buli emu ewereddwa endagamuntu ey'enjawulo. Enkola eno esobozesa okulondoola n'okuddukanya obulungi emmotoka.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni, mutoka obedo gin ma dano mapol neno I gudu, ki ngat acel-acel kimiye lanyut ma kite dok pat. Yub man weko ki lubu ki doro mutoka maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ilolo, etapit itunga asesen amotokan orotin, ido ijaikitai ngol emotoka ajenunet na itegelikina. Ingarakini epone ngol aingic keda aidar amotokan ejok.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, 'ba mutukari yi ndre o'du driasi nzila dria, azini 'ba fe dria yi dri e'daza wura ndu ni. Geri 'di ni fe 'bani mutukari eyi ma pamvu onezu azini eyi ma tambazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, emotoka nizikira kureebeka aha nguuto, kandi buri motoka neheebwa akakongi k'omutaano. Enkora egi neebaasisa okurondoora n'okureeberera ebiiruka kurungi.

eng_prompt: In a world filled with challenges and uncertainties, many are searching for guidance and motivation. They often wonder where they can find the role models and influences that will ignite their passions and dreams.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ejjudde okusoomoozebwa n'obutali bukakafu, bangi banoonya okulambikibwa n'okukubirizibwa. Batera okwebuuza wa we bayinza okuggya ebyokulabirako n'ebikubiriza ebijja okukuma omuliro mu bye baagala n'ebirooto byabwe.

lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, enzirukanya y'emirimu ya mugaso nnyo mu kukola emirimu emirungi n'okuddukanya obulungi emirimu. Okutegeera obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe kisobola okuwa okutegeera ku ngeri ekitongole gye kiddukanyizibwamu okutwaliza awamu.

lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi ma drice'ba eyi oja eyi mbeleru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi eyi esu eyi pari opi nyaza ni 'diyi ma alea geri opetaa ni 'diyi kokoru.

eng_prompt: The country's diverse ecosystems and rich biodiversity make it a prime destination for nature enthusiasts. Many travelers seek unique experiences that allow them to connect with the natural world.

eng_prompt: In the academic world, the dissemination of knowledge is crucial for progress and innovation. To share their findings and insights, researchers, professors, and other experts write journals.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'ebyenjigiriza, okubunyisa okumanya kwa mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana n'obuyiiya. Okugabana ebizuuliddwa n'okutegeera kwabwe, abanoonyereza, bapulofeesa n'abakugu abalala bawandiika ebitabo.

eng_prompt: To maintain order and safety in urban areas, various measures are implemented. One crucial aspect of this is the role of traffic police officers.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma emirembe n'obutebenkevu mu bibuga, enkola ez'enjawulo ziteekebwa mu nkola. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu kino gwe mulimu gwa poliisi y'ebidduka.

eng_prompt: To ensure the safety of all individuals on the road, it is essential to establish clear rules and guidelines. These rules help maintain order and prevent accidents in busy traffic environments.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu bonna ku nguudo, kyetaagisa okuteekawo amateeka n'ebiragiro ebitegeerekeka obulungi. Amateeka gano gayamba okukuuma obutebenkevu n'okutangira obubenje mu bifo ebirimu akalippagano k'ebidduka.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko kwo pa dano weng ma iteng gudi, pire tek tutwal me keto cik ma niange maber. Cik magi konyo me gwoko kuc ki gengo can me gudu I kabedo ma dano dwong iye.

lgg_prompt: Aa'zu kililiru kini 'ba dria nzila dria 'diyi ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru azita kililiru 'diyi sizu. Azita 'diyi azakoma fe e'yo otuzu azini drileonzi eyi atrizu angu nzila ni 'diyi ma alea.

eng_prompt: To ensure safety on the roads, it is essential that all individuals operating vehicles are properly trained and certified. This requirement applies to both motorcyclists and car drivers alike.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi ku nguudo, kyetaagisa nnyo abantu bonna abavuga emmotoka okutendekebwa obulungi n'okufuna ebbaluwa ezibakakasa. Kino kyetaagisa eri abavuzi ba pikipiki n'abavuzi b'emmotoka.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko ber bedo I gudu, pire tek ni dano weng ma dwoyo mutoka omyero gunong pwony ki waraga ma moko ni gutimo ticgi maber. Miti man tye pi ludwo piki piki ki ludwo mutoka.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ayuara orotin, ejokuna noi itunga kere luitolosete amotokan aituutoonorio ka adumun apapulai. Ibusakinit ngin aswam nejaas ipikipikin keda iderepan luka amotokan.

eng_prompt: Safety is a top priority for all road users, especially those on two wheels. To reduce the risk of serious injury in the event of an accident, proper protective gear is essential.
lug_prompt: Obukuumi kye kintu ekikulu eri abo bonna abakozesa enguudo nnaddala abo abatambulira ku nnamuziga bbiri. Okukendeeza ku bulabe bw'obuvune obw'amaanyi mu kabenje, eby'okwekuumisa ebituufu bikulu nnyo.
ach_prompt: Gwoko kwo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi joo ma tiyo ki gudi, tutwalle joo matye ki cuma tyen aryo. Me dwoko piny rwom me nongo awano ikare me can me gudu, jami ma gwoko kwo pa dano pire tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ayuwara nes ibore yenepol noi kanejaas itunga kere luitosomaete erot kacut ngul luejaasi keda amopiran aarei. Kanu aitidisiar aimusungeta nuarokok kotoma akangas, ibusakinit jo ajaut keda iboro lu ayuara.

eng_prompt: In an effort to maintain road safety and ensure compliance with traffic laws, authorities have implemented strict enforcement measures. As a result, drivers are held accountable for their actions on the road.

eng_prompt: To ensure the safety of everyone on the road, it is essential that all individuals, whether driving, cycling, or walking, understand their responsibilities. Adhering to established rules helps prevent accidents and promotes a harmonious flow of traffic.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi bwa buli muntu ku luguudo, kyamugaso buli muntu, oba avuga, abavuga obugaali, oba atambula, okutegeera obuvunaanyizibwa bwe. Okukwata amateeka agaateekebwawo kiyamba okutangira obubenje n'okutumbula entambula y'ebidduka.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko kwo pa dano weng ma iteng gudi, pire tek ni dano weng, kadi itye ka dwoyo motoka, ngwec ki lela, onyo woto ki tyengi, omyero guniang tic gi. Lubu cik ma kiketo konyo me gengo can me gudu ki weko gudu woto maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ayuara naka nginitunganan korot, ejokuna itunga kere, araai irengei, irengei, arai bo alosit, amisiikin aswamisinei kec. Atupitos ikisila lu itolomunitai ingarakini aitikitik akangasia ka aitopolor elose lo amotokan ejok.
lgg_prompt: Lezu 'ba dria nzila dria 'diyi ma ta mbazu kililiru, eri orodriru 'ba dria, ka tro nzu mutukari si, gari si, kani aci pasi, yi ma azi yi vazu. Azita 'bani o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obizuri ni azakoma fe drileonzi eyi atrizu dika eri fe nzila eyini acizu kililiru.

eng_prompt: To ensure the safety of everyone on the road, it is crucial to adhere to speed limits. Reckless driving can lead to serious accidents and endanger lives.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukakasa obukuumi bwa buli muntu ku luguudo, kikulu nnyo okugoberera amateeka agafuga sipiidi. Okuvuga obubi kusobola okuviirako obubenje obw'amaanyi n'okuteeka obulamu mu matigga.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko kwo pa dano weng I gudu, pire tek tutwal me lubu cik me dwiro. Dwoyo mutoka marac twero kelo peko me gudu ki keto kwo pa dano kama rac.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga kere luejaasi orot, ejokuna noi aitup ikisila luka esipidi. Airenge erono epedori ayangaun akangasia nuarokok ka aimusung aijar.
lgg_prompt: Lezu 'ba dria nzila dria 'diyi ma ta mbazu, eri orodriru e'yo okposiri ma vuti obizu. Mutukari ti ojiza onzi ri eco drileonzi onzi 'diyi eji ra dika eri eco 'ba eyi ma edri 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya oburinzi bwa buri omwe aha nguuto, n'eky'omugasho okukuratira ebiragiro by'okwiruka. Okuvuga kubi nikubaasa kureeta butandu n'akabi aha magara.

eng_prompt: Before opening its doors to students, a school must ensure it meets all regulatory requirements. One of the key requirements is obtaining the necessary legal authorization to function as an educational institution.
lug_prompt: Nga essomero terinnaggulawo miryango gyalyo eri abayizi, lirina okukakasa nti lituukiriza byonna ebyetaagibwa mu mateeka. Ekimu ku byetaago ebikulu kwe kufuna olukusa olwetaagisa mu mateeka okukola ng'ettendekero ly'ebyenjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe oyabo dogola ne pi lutino kwan, gang kwan omyero onen ni ocobo jami weng ma mite malube ki cik. Gin acel ma pire tek en aye nongo twero me tic macalo gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Erongo esomero engara ikekek mama ejaasi esisiak, ekot awanyun ebe itodolikinit iboro kere lu ekotoi. Adiopet koboro lu ekotoi ngesi adumun alasisi na ekisil kanu aswam kwape esomero.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di sukulu eyi ma jotile eyi ma ti zi sukulu anzi eyidri ku, le eyi ma ne ra kini eyi e'yo dria azita palaa 'diyi 'ye ra. Afa azi okporu lepi 'diyi ma azi eri kokobi azita palaa 'diyi esuzu azi ngazu sukulu ru.
nyn_prompt: Amashomero gatakaigwireho abaana, gashemereire kubanza garikuhikiiriza ebirikwetengwa omu biragiro. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebirikwetengwa n'okutunga orusa rw'ebiragiro kukora nk'eitendekyero ry'eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In an effort to ensure quality education and protect students' rights, the government has implemented stricter regulations on educational institutions. As a result, unlicensed schools shall be closed.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukakasa omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza n'okukuuma eddembe ly'abayizi, gavumenti etaddewo amateeka amakakali ku matendekero g'ebyenjigiriza. N'ekinaavaamu, amasomero agatalina layisinsi gajja kuggalwa.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me neno ni kwan tye maber ki gwoko twero pa lutino, gamente oketo cik matek i kom gangi kwan. Macalo adwogi ne, kibiloro gangi kwan ma peke ki lancic.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na awanyun ebe ejai asioman na abeit ka ayuarite apedorosio nuka esisiak, abu apugan ipikak ikisila lu isomeroi. Kanuka ngun, eponio agolokin isomeroi lumam ejaas keda alasisi.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu onita muke ri ma ta mbazu azini drilemgbo sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi ma tambazu, gamete 'ba azita okporu eyi angu onita ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga sukulu kokobi azi ngazuri kokoru 'diyi opi ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureeba ngu eby'obwegyese biri aha mutindo n'okurinda obugabe bw'abeegi, gavumenti eteireho ebiragiro by'amaani aha matendekyero. Ekyarugiremu, amashomero agateine rayisinsi nigeija kukingwa.

eng_prompt: As the demand for quality education continues to rise, many families are seeking options that meet global standards. To address this need, several institutions have established international schools in Uganda.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'okusoma okw'omutindo bweyongera okulinnya, amaka mangi ganoonya engeri ezituukana n'omutindo gw'ensi yonna. Okusobola okukola ku bwetaavu buno, amatendekero ag'enjawulo gataddewo amasomero g'ensi yonna mu Uganda.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti me kwan ma rwom mamalo tye kamede kwede, gangi mapol tye ka yenyo yoo me kwan ma rwom me kwan tye I rwom me wilobo. Me tyeko miti man, gangi kwan mapol guyubu gangi kwan me lobo mawoko I lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda lo asioman na adoketait najokan, eutasi ikalia luipu aimo iponesio lu itodolikinete adoketait na akwap kere. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, apotu isomeroi luipu odukutu isomeroi luka akwapin ace ko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu onita kililiru ri ma ongmbo ni tutu risi, familia karakara eyi geri ndundu eyini ecozu aa'zu eyi ma eselea wudrikuru si 'diyi nda. Lezu e'yo 'di ma aza kozu, pari onita ni karakara 'diyi e'do sukulu kari eselia 'diyi kari Uganda niri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ebyetengo by'obwegyese burungi birikweyongyera, amaka maingi nigasherura oburyo oburikuhikaana n'omutindo gw'ensi yoona. Okukora aha nshonga egi, amatendekyero maingi gatandikireho amashomero g'ensi yoona omu Uganda.

eng_prompt: In an effort to standardize education across the country, the government has established guidelines for what students should learn at each grade level. This initiative aims to ensure that all children receive a quality education regardless of their location.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okussaawo omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza mu ggwanga lyonna, gavumenti etaddewo ebiragiro ku bayizi bye balina okuyiga ku buli ddaala. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okulaba ng'abaana bonna bafuna obuyigirize obw'omutindo awatali kufaayo ku kifo we babeera.
ach_prompt: I tute me kelo rwom me kwan marom ilobo ni, gamente oketo cik ma doro ngo ma lutino omyero gupwony I kilac acel acel. Yub man tye me neno ni lutino weng gunongo pwony maber labongo paro pi kabedo ma gitye iye.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu naka aitodolikin adoketait naka asioman kotoma akwap kere, etolomu apugan aicoreta nuibusakinit esisiak aisisia kangin eguredi. Alosikinet na erai awanyun ebe idwe kere edumunenete asioman na abeit araida ejaasi kesi aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu onita ma omgbo otuzu kari 'di ma alea ndulu, gamete o'ba azita sukulu anzi eyini ecozu e'yo oni kilasi dria eyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di ma asisile lezu nezu ra kini anzi nyiri dria eyi onita muke ri esu pari eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma talasi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureetaho omutindo gw'eby'obwegyese omu eihanga ryona,gavumenti etandikireho engyenderwaho y'ebi abeegi bashemereire kwega buri kereedi. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okureeba ngu abaana boona batunga obwegyese burungi, oihireho ahu barikutuura.

eng_prompt: Access to knowledge and learning opportunities is essential for the development of every child. It is crucial to recognize the fundamental entitlements that support their growth and future potential.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amagezi n'emikisa gy'okusoma bya mugaso mu nkulaakulana ya buli mwana. Kikulu nnyo okutegeera eddembe lyabwe ery'omusingi eribayamba okukula n'okuba n'obusobozi mu biseera eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Nongo ngec ki gum me kwan pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa lutino. Pire tek tutwal me niang twero ma pire tek ma konyo dongo gi ki kero gi me anyim.
teo_prompt: Adumunun acoa ka asisia erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka apol naka kangin ikoku. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun apedorosio nuka itunga nu igangitos apol kec keda apedorosio nuka oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Onita esuzu azini drileba onita ni 'diyi ma esuta eri orodriru mva dria ma zota ni. Eri orodriru e'yo egazu drilemgbo okporu yini zozu tualu okpo yini ewu drialeri ma alia 'diyi pie 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obwengye n'emigisha y'okwega n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka ya buri mwana. N'eky'omugasho kumanya obugabe bw'omutaano oburikubaasisa kutunguuka n'okubaasa kwabo omu biro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: In response to the escalating tensions in the city, authorities have implemented strict measures to maintain order. As protests turned increasingly aggressive, law enforcement prepared to intervene decisively.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke obweyongera mu kibuga, ab'obuyinza bataddewo enkola enkakali okukuuma emirembe. Okwekalakaasa bwe kweyongera okuba okw'obukambwe, abakuumaddembe beetegekera okuyingira mu nsonga.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me telle matye kamede i boma ne, lutela guketo yoo matek me gwoko kuc. I kare ma jemo omede ki bedo marac tutwal, joo ma gwoko cik guyube me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu iyata noi koibuga, apotu apedorosio itolomutu ikisila lu ikisila kanu aidar ainapakina. Neapolor aidiya, apotu ipolisin okapakina alomar toma.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ma omgbo tupi aku ambu city niri ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, drice'ba eyi 'ba e'yo okporu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea e'yo otuza ni 'diyi ma tambazu. E'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ni ecazu okporu, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi otu eyi ma ti e'dozu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire omu rurembo, ab'obushoborozi bateireho oburyo bw'okurinda obusingye. Okwesharinga kwayeyongyera kuba okw'akabi, ab'eby'obutegyeki beeteekateekire kutaahamu.

eng_prompt: Understanding the roots of human behavior is essential for fostering better relationships. One area of interest is the factors that contribute to negative emotions and aggressive interactions.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ensibuko y'enneeyisa y'omuntu kya nkizo mu kukuza enkolagana ennungi. Ekitundu ekimu eky'obwagazi bye bintu ebiviirako enneewulira embi n'enkolagana embi.
ach_prompt: Niang kit kwo pa dano pire tek tutwal pi dongo wat maber ikin dano. Kabedo acel me miti obedo jami ma kelo tam marac ki tim gero ikin dano.
teo_prompt: Ajenun iwaitin lu ejai iponesio luka itunga erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor eidicane loajokan. Aiboisit adiope na ekotoi ngesi iboro lu eyangaununete aomisio nuarokok keda aelo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo geri 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma vuti e'yo vazu ri eri orodriru aa'ta muke ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo azi 'bani lele 'diyi ma azi e'yo ecopi fepi 'ba eyini aa'zu e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi pie tualu 'ba eyini aa'zu e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi pie 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza oburugo bw'emitwarize y'abantu n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho enkoragana nungi. Omwanya gumwe ogurikwetengwa n'enshonga ezirikureetaho ebiteekateeko ebitahikire hamwe n'okukoragana kubi.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure a high-quality education for all students, it is essential to establish clear guidelines and expectations. These guidelines help maintain consistency and accountability within the educational system.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okulaba nti abayizi bonna bafuna obuyigirize obw'omutindo, kikulu okuteekawo ebiragiro ebitangaavu n'ebisuubirwa. Ebigobererwa bino biyamba okukuuma obutebenkevu n'embalirira mu nkola y'ebyenjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni lutino weng tye ka nongo rwom me kwan maber, pire tek tutwal me keto cik ki jami ma mite pi lutino. Cik magi konyo me gwoko ber bedo ki kor tic I tenge me pwony.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejaasi esisiak keda asioman naikiara, ejokuna aitolomun ainapeta nuecaete ka iboro lu ekotoi. Ingarakinete aicoreta ngun aidar ainapakina keda aitodunit eipone lo itwasamatere akiro nuka asioman.
lgg_prompt: Bani ani ecozu onita muke ri esuzu sukulu anzi dria eyidri, eri orodriru azita kililiru azini e'yo 'bani ega eyi ma dria 'diyi 'bazu. Azita 'diyi azakoma fe e'yo otuza ni azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma tambazu geri onita ni 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu abeegi boona batunga obwegyese bw'omutindo gw'ahaiguru, ni kikuru kutaho ebiragyiro ebirikwetengwa. Ebiragiro ebi nibihwera omu kurinda obusingye n'embaririra omu by'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: A well-structured educational framework is crucial for fostering student development and success. Without a comprehensive curriculum, schools would struggle to provide consistent and effective learning experiences.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'ebyenjigiriza entegeke obulungi ya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula enkulaakulana y'abayizi n'obuwanguzi. Awatali nsengeka y'ebisomesebwa enzijuvu, amasomero gandibadde galwana okuwa ebyenjigiriza ebikwatagana era ebikola obulungi.
ach_prompt: Yub me kwan ma kiyubu maber pire tek tutwal pi dongo pa lutino kwan ki cobo miti gi. Labongo yub me pwonye ma opong ki jami weng, gangi kwan nongo peko me pwonyo lutino kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Asioman na itemonokitai ejok erai naepol noi kanu aitopolor apolo keda akerianut naka esisiak. Arai emamei aisisiaeta nuajokak, etiono isomeroi aijaikin aisisiaeta nuejokuka.
lgg_prompt: Geri onita ni 'bani si kililiru ri eri orodriru tu sukulu anzi eyi ma zota azini drile suza ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo onita ni 'diyi kokoru, sukulu eyi nga dri ci e'yo onita ni 'diyi fezu sa'wa driasi azini kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Enkora nungi y'eby'obwegyese n'eyomugasho omu kutunguura abeegi n'obusinguzi. Hatariho engyenderwaho nungi y'okwegyesamu, amashomero nigabaasa kurwana kuheereza eby'okwega ebirikugyenda omu maisho kandi ebirikukora kurungi.

eng_prompt: When communicating important updates or changes, it's essential to provide clear and concise information. One effective way to do this is through a letter of notice.
lug_prompt: Mu kubuulira ebipya ebikulu oba enkyukakyuka, kya mugaso okuwa amawulire amategeerekeka era amakakali. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okukola kino kwe kuyita mu bbaluwa y'okutegeeza.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka miyo ngec manyen mapigi tego onyo aloka-loka, pire tek tutwal me miyo ngec ma niange maber dok macek. Yo acel maber me timo man obedo ki waraga me miyo ngec.
teo_prompt: Arai ijukaria ijo akiro nuitetiak arai aijulanakineta nuepolok, ibusakinit aijaikin akiro nu ecaete. Epone ediope loajokan noi loka aswam ngun ngesi aiwadikaun aiwadikaet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'duko orodriru 'diyi kani ojata yi ecezurisi, eri orodriru e'yo ecezu kililiru azini kililiru. Geri azi onyiru 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri eri geri 'bani e'yo ecezu ri si.
nyn_prompt: Waaba noogamba ebikwatireine n'empindahinduka y'amaani, n'eky'omugasho kuheereza amakuru garikwetegyerezibwa kurungi. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okukora eki n'okukozesa ebaruha y'okumanyisa.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, it is essential for students to develop skills that will prepare them for the future. As technology continues to evolve, educators recognize the importance of integrating computer literacy into the curriculum.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, kya mugaso nnyo abayizi okukulaakulanya obukugu obujja okubateekerateekera ebiseera eby'omu maaso. Nga tekinologiya agenda mu maaso okukulaakulana, abasomesa bakitegedde obukulu bw'okuyingiza kompyuta mu misomo.
ach_prompt: I kare man me tic ki intanet, pire tek tutwal pi lutino kwan me dongo diro ma obi yubu gi pi anyimgi. Kit ma tet manyen tye ka dongo kwede, lupwonye guniang ber pa pwonyo lutino ki komputa.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu nuka elago, ejokuna noi esisiak adumun acoa na itemonokini kesi kanukoingaren. Kwape inyikokinit etatai loakwana apolor, ejenete isisianakinak ajokis na aisisianakin aisisiaeta nuka akompiutan.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa 'di ma alea, eri orodriru sukulu anzi eyini ondua eyini ecozu eyi otuzu ewu drialeri ni. E'yo tekenologianiri ni mu drile angu ezoria, imba'ba eyi esu orodri onita afa computer ru 'diyi ma dria ri sukulu anzi eyini 'diyi ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa digito obwa hati, ni kikuru abeegi kugira emyoga erikubaasa kubatebeekanisa ahabw'ebiro bya nyensya. Obu tekinorogye erikugumizamu neetunguuka, abegyesa nibamanya omugasho gw'okwegyesa abantu kukoresa kompyuta omu mishomo yaabo.

eng_prompt: In order to advance in their education, students must demonstrate their understanding of the material. Successful completion of assessments is a key factor in determining their progress.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okugenda mu maaso mu kusoma kwabwe, abayizi balina okulaga nti bategeera bye basoma. Okumaliriza obulungi okwekebejjebwa nsonga nkulu mu kusalawo enkulaakulana yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Me mede anyim I kwan gi, lutino kwan omyero gunyut ni guniang ngo ma gitye ka pwonyone. Tyeko peny maber obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I neno dongo pa lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu apolor kotoma asiomanikec, ekot esisiak aitodun ebe epedorete kesi amisikin akiro ngun. Aitodolikin aanyanario ejok erai ibore yenepol noi itodunit elosiokec.
lgg_prompt: Bani muzu drile onita eyivile ri ma alea, le sukulu anzi eyi ma e'da e'yo eyini va e'yo 'da ma dria ra. E'yo 'bani e'yo eyi ma ale andrizu kililiru ri eri e'yo okporu eyini muzu drile ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi kubaasa kweyongyera omu mishomo yaabo, bashemereire kworeka ngu nibabyetegyereza. Okumaririza kurungi okucondooza n'enshonga nkuru omu kumanya entunguuka yaabo.

eng_prompt: In order to ensure a consistent educational experience, schools provide educators with structured guidelines. These guidelines outline the topics and objectives that must be covered throughout the academic year.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okulaba ng'okusoma kugenda mu maaso, amasomero gawa abasomesa ebiragiro ebitegekeddwa obulungi. Endagiriro zino ziraga emitwe n'ebigendererwa ebirina okukolebwako mu mwaka gw'ebyensoma gwonna.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni lutino tye ka pwonyo maber, gangi kwan miyo ki lupwonye cik ma doro tic gi. Cik magi nyutu lok ki miti ma omyero kilok I komgi I mwaka me kwan eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe isisianakinete isisianakinak iponesio luegelegela, einakinitos isomeroi isisianakinak aicoreta nuegelegela. Itodunitos aicoreta nu akiro keda alosikineta nu ebeit aitodolikin okaru loka asioman kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onita ni aa'zu alenia ri nezu ra, sukulu eyi imba'ba eyini azita kililiru 'diyi fe. Azita 'diyi e'da e'yo dria azini e'yo 'bani le 'ye eli onitani 'di ma alea 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'obwegyese nibigyenda omu maisho, amashomero nigaheereza abegyesa engyenderwaho nungi. Ebiragiro ebi nibyoreka enshonga n'ebigyendererwa ebishemereire kukorwaho omu mwaka gw'eby'obwegyese gwona.

eng_prompt: Due to a significant decline in enrollment and funding, many educational institutions faced insurmountable challenges. As a result, some schools were forced to cease operation.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukendeera kw'abayizi n'ensimbi, amatendekero g'ebyenjigiriza mangi gaayolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutagonjoolwa. N'ekyavaamu, amasomero agamu gawalirizibwa okuyimiriza emirimu.
ach_prompt: Pi wel lutino kwan matye kadok piny ki cente ma obedo tye, gangi kwan mapol gunongo peko mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, kidiyo gangi kwan mukene me juko ticgi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aikidiokus na idwe keda ikapun, apotu isomeroi luipu odumutu atiokisio nu etiono aitikitik. Kanuka ngun, aponi kobuikinai isomeroi ice apalar aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba sukulu lapi 'diyi ma omgbo esizu tualu robia ma omgbo esizu tualu, angu onita ni karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru 'bani eco nde ku 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ombe sukulu azi 'diyi ma azi yi ma ti opi ci.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyendera munonga kw'abeegi n'esente, amatendekyero maingi gakashanga oburemeezi bw'amaani. Ekyarugiremu, amashomero agamwe gakagyemeserezibwa kurekyeraaho kukora.

eng_prompt: In every educational institution, there is a leader responsible for overseeing operations and guiding the staff and students. This individual plays a crucial role in shaping the school's vision and culture.
lug_prompt: Mu buli ttendekero ly'ebyenjigiriza, waliwo omukulembeze avunaanyizibwa ku kulondoola emirimu n'okulungamya abakozi n'abayizi. Omuntu ono akola omulimu munene mu kukola enteekateeka y'essomero n'obuwangwa.
ach_prompt: I gang kwan acel-acel, tye latela ma doro tic ki doro lutic ki lutino. Dano man timo tic mapire tek tutwal I yubu neno ki tekwaro pa gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma osomeroi kere, ejai engarenon lo ikamunitos nuka aanyanar aswam ka aicor eswamak keda esisiak. Iswamai ngin itunganan aswam naepol noi kotoma aitolomun aomisio keda inonosio luka esomero.
lgg_prompt: Pari onitani dria ma alia, drice'ba azi ni azi ngaza ma pamvu onezu azini azi'ba azini sukulu anzi yi driceza fezu ni ci. Ba 'di ni azi okporu nga sukulu ma egata azini e'yo suruni 'diyi ma edeta ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omuri buri itendekyero ry'eby'obwegyese, harimu omwebembezi orikujunanizibwa aha mirimo n'okwebembera abakozi n'abeegi. Omuntu weena naakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kukora enteekateeka y'eishomero hamwe n'eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to avoid the monotony of traditional education, many students seek alternative ways to engage with their learning. As a result, some students dodge classroom lessons.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okwewala obutali bumativu bw'okusoma okw'ennono, abayizi bangi banoonya engeri endala okwenyigira mu kusoma kwabwe. N'ekivuddemu, abayizi abamu beewala okusoma mu kibiina.
ach_prompt: I tute me gwokke ki peko me kwan macon, lutino mapol giyenyo yoo mukene me kwan gi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutino kwan mukene weyo kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitikitik asioman naka atekerin, emoete esisiak iponesio ice luka aisisia. Kanuka ngun, mam esisiak icie isisiaete atukot.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo onita a'bini 'diyi ma alia ri atrizu, sukulu anzi karakara eyi geri ndundu eyi nda eyini ani e'yo onita ni 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, sukulu anzi azi 'diyi embata kilasia 'diyi kuzu ja.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okwetantara oburemeezi bw'obwegyese obwa ira, abeegi nibasherura emiringo endiijo y'okwega. N'ekyarugiremu, abeegi abamwe nibeetantara emishomo y'omukibiina.

eng_prompt: As the situation escalated, law enforcement agencies coordinated their efforts to ensure public safety. To facilitate their response, they mobilized a fleet of specialized units.
lug_prompt: Embeera bwe yeeyongera okusajjuka, ebitongole ebikuumaddembe byakolagana mu kaweefube w'okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eyo, baaleeta amagye ag'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma peko ne omedde, dul ma gwoko cik gutiyo matek me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pa lwak. Me konyo gi me gamo lapeny gi, gu rweyo dul mony mapat-pat matye ki ngec matut tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neapolor ejautene, apotu atukona nuka ikisila kimorikikinos kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga. Kanu aitapatan aswamukec, apotu kesi ijukutu atukona nuipu noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'da ni tuzu drile, amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi otu okpo eyini 'diyi o'bi eyi ma tambazu. E'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma aza kozu, eyi tra asikari karakara eyi.
nyn_prompt: Embeera kuyabiire neyeyongyera, ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro bikagaita amaani gaabyo okurinda abantu. Okuhwera omurimo gwabo, bakakoresa amahe g'eby'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: Ensuring proper sanitation is crucial for public health in rural areas. One effective solution for waste management is the use of pit latrines.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obuyonjo kikulu nnyo eri obulamu bw'abantu mu byalo. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okukwatamu kasasiro kwe kukozesa kaabuyonjo.
ach_prompt: Gwoko lengo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi yotkom pa lwak I caro. Yo acel maber me tic i kom yugi obedo tic ki coron.
teo_prompt: Aitijenar aila ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka angaleu naka itunga kocaaloi. Idiopebore yenepedori aitemokin agasia ngesi aitwasam icolonin.
lgg_prompt: Alata kililiru ri ma tambaza eri orodriru e'yo alata o'bi eyini angu caluru 'diyi ma alea ri ni. E'yo azi orodriru okurunya ma tambazu ri eri coroni eyi ma ayuza.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya obuyonjo n'eky'omugasho aha magara g'abantu omu byaro. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okureeberera kasasiro n'okukoresa ebihorooni.

eng_prompt: Despite regulations aimed at ensuring educational quality, many institutions find ways to circumvent the licensing process. This has raised concerns among parents and educational authorities alike.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo amateeka agateekeddwawo okukakasa omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza, amatendekero mangi ganoonya engeri z'okwewala okuweebwa layisinsi. Kino kireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bazadde n'abakulira ebyenjigiriza.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni ki keto cik me neno ni rwom me kwan tye maber, gangi kwan mapol nongo yoo me kwero nongo lancic. Man okelo lworo ikin lunyodo ki lutela me gangi kwan.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas ikisila lu ekotoi aanyun adoketait na asioman, iswamaete isomeroi icie iponesio luepedorete aitodolikin ainapeta nuka asioman. Eyangaunit na aiyalongong kanejaas auriak keda apedorosio nuka esomero.
lgg_prompt: Azita o'bale onita ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, pari onita ni karakara 'diyi geri isu e'yo driwala feza ni 'diyi ma dri cezu ku. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza tipika eyi ma eselea drice'ba onita ni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ebiragiro ebirikugyenderera okureebeka ngu eby'obwegyese biri aha mutindo, amatendekyero maingi nigasherura oburyo bw'okwetantara okuhebwa rayisinsi. Eki kireesire okwerarikirira omu bazaire hamwe n'abarikukurira eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Before applying for a license, it's important to understand the specific requirements and steps involved in the process. Many people are often unsure about the necessary documentation and tests needed to obtain their license.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kusaba layisinsi, kya mugaso okutegeera ebisaanyizo n'emitendera egiri mu nkola. Abantu bangi tebatera kuba bakakafu ku biwandiiko ebyetaagisa n'okukeberebwa okwetaagisa okufuna layisinsi zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe ipenyo pi lancic, pire tek tutwal me niang jami ma mite ki yoo mapat-pat matye I yub eni. Dano mapol pe tye ki ngec matut I kom coc ma mite ki pim ma mite me nongo license gi.
teo_prompt: Erongo ilipit alasisi, ejokuna amisiikin iboro lu ekotoi ka ainapeta nu ejaas toma ainapeta ngun. Mam itunga luipu ejenete apapula keda ainwakio nu ekotoi kanu adumun alasisi kec.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di mi si waraga azi ngazu ri ku, eri orodriru afa 'bani lele 'diyi vazu azini e'yo 'bani 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Ba karakara eyi aa'ni kililiru kokobi 'bani lele 'diyi ma dria ku azini obita 'bani lezu eyi ma kokobi azi ngazu ri esuzu 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Otakashabire rayisinsi, n'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza ebirikwetengwa n'emitendera erikukwata aha nkora egyo. Abantu baingi tibarikumanya ebihandiiko ebirikwetengwa n'okukyeberwa okurikwetengwa okutunga rayisinsi zaabo.

eng_prompt: In many countries, education is considered a fundamental right, leading to the establishment of various types of schools. Among these, government aided schools play a crucial role in providing accessible education to all students.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nnyingi, okusoma kutwalibwa ng'eddembe ekkulu, ekiviiriddeko okutandikawo amasomero ag'engeri ez'enjawulo. Mu bino, amasomero agayambibwako gavumenti gakola omulimu munene mu kuwa abayizi bonna obuyigirize obutuukirirwa.
ach_prompt: I lobe mapol, kwan kitero calo twero ma pire tek ma oweko kicako gangi kwan mapat-pat. I kin gangi kwan magi, gangi kwan ma gamente konyo gi timo tic mapire tek tutwal me miyo pwony ma dano weng twero nongo.
teo_prompt: Kakwapin nuipu, eyangaritai asioman kwape apedorosio nuka itunga, ido eyangauni adukio naka isomeroi luegelegela. Kanejaas lu, isomeroi lu igangitai apugan iswamaete aswam naepol noi kanu aijaikin esisiak kere asioman na epatanara.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba onita 'du drilemgbo azi okporu ni ru, dika eri fe 'bani sukulu esele ndu ndu 'diyi sizu. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, sukulu gamete ni atita fepi 'diyi azi okporu nga onita 'bani eco esu ra ri fezu sukulu anzi dria eyidri.

eng_prompt: Before engaging in any business operations, it is essential to understand the legal requirements that govern such activities. Obtaining the necessary permits ensures compliance with local regulations and protects both the business and its stakeholders.
lug_prompt: Nga tonnaba kwenyigira mu bizinensi yonna, kikulu okutegeera amateeka agafuga emirimu ng'egyo. Okufuna olukusa olwetaagisa kikakasa okugobererwa kw'amateeka g'ekitundu n'okukuuma bizinensi n'abakwatibwako baayo.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe idonyo I biacara mo keken, pire tek tutwal me niang cik ma doro tic enoni. Nongo twero ma mite weko dano lubu cik me tedero dok gwoko biacara ki joo ma timo biacara.
teo_prompt: Erongo ijo elomar toma aswamisio adio nuka ebiasara, ejokuna noi amisiikin nu ekotoi kotoma okisila nu eyaitere aswamisinei kangun. Adumunun apapulai nu ekotoi itodunit ebe etupitai ikisila luka atutubet kosodi ayuarite ebiasara keda itunga.

eng_prompt: The Anglican Church is one of the major branches of Christianity, rooted in the traditions of the Church of England. Its followers adhere to a set of beliefs that shape their understanding of faith and spirituality.
lug_prompt: Ekkanisa y'abangirikaani y'emu ku matabi agasinga obunene mu bukrisitu, nga gasimbye emirandira mu nnono z'ekkanisa ya Bungereza. Abagoberezi baayo banywerera ku nzikiriza ezitali zimu ezibakwatako mu nzikiriza ne mu by'omwoyo.

teo_prompt: Ekanisa loka Anglican ngesi ediope kotoma atenun nuapolok nuka ikurisitayot, luegelegela kotoma akiro nuka ekanisa loka England. Etupitos atupitokec aiyuuneta nuipusata kesi nuikamunitos aiyuunikec keda eyuunikec.
lgg_prompt: Kanisa Anglican niri eri arakala azi okporu Kristayo ni 'diyi ma azi, engazu kanisa England ni 'diyi ma alea. ꞋBa eri ma vuti obiꞌba ꞌdiyi asi ꞌba eꞌyo yini aꞌita ma dria ꞌdiyi ma dria azini eꞌyo yi ma eselea ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi ma dria.

eng_prompt: As discussions about the future of the church intensified, many members began to question the current structure and its effectiveness. This led to a growing interest in alternative organizational models, prompting the inquiry:
lug_prompt: Nga okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku biseera by'ekanisa eby'omu maaso kweyongera, bammemba bangi baatandika okubuusabuusa enkola eriwo kati n'obukozi bwayo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma nywako lok I kom anyim pa kanica omedde, lumemba mapol gucako bedo ki akala-kala I kom yub matye kombedi ki kit ma ticgi tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kwape apolor ineresinei nuikamunitos ingaren naka ekanisa, apotu imeban luipu kogeutu abuonokin nuka aduketait naka ekanisa keda epone loiswamata kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza kanisa ma ewu drialeri ma dria ri ni tu uru, memba karakara eyi e'do e'yo zi geri kanisa ni aa'zu sa'wa 'disi ri ma dria azini e'yo erini azi ngazu kililiru ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: During each meeting, it is essential to keep a detailed account of the discussions and decisions made. To ensure accuracy and accountability, someone must take on the responsibility of documenting these proceedings.
lug_prompt: Mu buli lukiiko, kya mugaso okuwandiika byonna ebyayogerwa n'okusalawo okwakolebwa. Okukakasa obutuufu n'embalirira, omuntu alina okutwala obuvunaanyizibwa bw'okuwandiika ebigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke acel-acel, pire tek tutwal me coyo coc matut I kom ngo ma kinywako ki ngo ma kimoko. Me neno ni lok tye kakare ki kit ma tic tye kawot kwede, omyero ngat mo okwany tic me coyo jami magi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet kangin, ejokuna aiwadika akiro nu ineritere ka aseununeta nu iswamatai. Kanu awanyun abeit ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere akiro, ibusakinit itunganan aiwadika akiro ngun.

eng_prompt: In many communities, religious institutions play a vital role in providing support and guidance. To ensure their operations run smoothly, various management structures are often put in place.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, ebitongole by'eddiini bikola omulimu omukulu mu kuwa obuyambi n'obulagirizi. Okusobola okukakasa nti emirimu gyabwe gitambula bulungi, enkola z'obukulembeze ez'enjawulo zitera okuteekebwawo.

teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, iswamaete iriongeta luka idiinin aswam naepol noi kanu aijanakin agangat keda aicoreta. Kanu awanyun ebe iswamaete kesi ejok, itemonokinitai iwaitin lu eyaitene luegelegela.

eng_prompt: Many people have their own traditions and routines for the weekend. For Christians, one of the most important practices is gathering for worship.

eng_prompt: In the church hierarchy, the bishop plays a crucial role in overseeing various aspects of the diocese. To ensure effective management and support, the bishop usually delegates certain responsibilities to the archdeacon.
lug_prompt: Mu bukulembeze bw'ekkanisa, omulabirizi akola omulimu omukulu mu kulondoola ebintu eby'enjawulo mu bulabirizi. Okukakasa obukulembeze obulungi n'obuyambi, omulabirizi bulijjo awa obuvunaanyizibwa obumu eri ssaabadinkoni.

teo_prompt: Kotoma opate loka ekanisa, ejaasi ebisop keda aswam naepol noi naka aimaniman iboro luegelegela luka edaiosis. Kanu awanyun eyaitene loajokan keda agangat, einanakini ebisop aswamisinei ace mama ejai archdeacon.

eng_prompt: With determination and hard work, anything is possible. Many people have turned their aspirations into reality through perseverance.

lgg_prompt: Asi 'baza azini azi ngaza okporu si, afa dria eco i ra. Ba karakara eyi oja e'yo eyini lele 'diyi e'yo adaru eyini asi 'bazu e'yo eyi ma dria risi.
nyn_prompt: N'amaani n'okukora n'amaani, buri kimwe nikibaasika. Abantu baingi bahindwire ebigyendererwa byabo okuba ebihikire, barikurabira omu kugumisiriza.

eng_prompt: In any successful relationship, whether personal or professional, the ability to convey thoughts and feelings clearly is crucial. Without effective dialogue, misunderstandings can arise and hinder progress.

eng_prompt: The rapid advancement of technology has transformed the way we gather knowledge. With just a few clicks, we can explore a vast array of topics and resources online.

eng_prompt: In the hierarchy of the church, various leaders play crucial roles in guiding the congregation. Among these leaders, the bishop and archbishop hold significant positions of authority and responsibility.
lug_prompt: Mu bukulembeze bw'ekkanisa, abakulembeze ab'enjawulo bakola emirimu emikulu mu kulambika abantu. Mu bakulembeze bano, omulabirizi ne ssaabalabirizi balina ebifo ebikulu eby'obuyinza n'obuvunaanyizibwa.
