eng_prompt: The history of the Catholic Church in Uganda is rich and complex, marked by significant events and milestones. To understand its impact, one must consider the timeline of the diocese's establishment and growth in the region.
lug_prompt: Ebyafaayo by'Eklezia Katolika mu Uganda bya bugagga era bizibu, nga bijjudde ebintu ebikulu n'ebikulu. Okutegeera enkola yaakyo, omuntu alina okulowooza ku biseera by'okutandikawo n'okukulaakulana kw'obulabirizi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Tekwaro pa Kanica pa Katoli I lobo Uganda opong ki jami mapol tutwal, jami mapol mapigi tego tutwal otimme I iye. Me niang adwogi ne, omyero ngat moni otam I kom kare ma diocese ocakke ki dongo I but piny eni.
teo_prompt: Akiro nukolo nuka ekanisa loka atulik ko Uganda eraasi nuepolok noi ido epol noi akiro nuapolok nuiswamasi. Kanu amisikin epone loepedoria ngesi, ibusakinit itunganan airereor apakio nuka aiduk keda apol naka edaiosis kotoma aiboisit.

nyn_prompt: Ebyafaayo by'ekanisa y'abakaturiki omu Uganda n'eby'omutaano kandi bigumire, birimu ebyabaireho hamwe n'ebikuru. Okwetegyereza enkora yaayo, omuntu ashemereire kureeba obwire obu obureeberezi bwabaire nibutandika n'okutunguuka omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In the hierarchical structure of the Anglican community, various leaders oversee different aspects of church governance. Among these leaders, the bishop holds a pivotal role in guiding the spiritual and administrative functions of the church.
lug_prompt: Mu nteekateeka y'ekkanisa y'abangirikaani, abakulembeze ab'enjawulo be balabirira enkola z'ekkanisa ez'enjawulo. Mu bakulembeze bano, omulabirizi akola omulimu omukulu mu kulambika emirimu gy'ekkanisa egy'eby'omwoyo n'enzirukanya y'emirimu.
ach_prompt: I rwom me tela pa dul pa prutanti, lutela ma padi padi gi doro tic mapat-pat me tela pa kanica. I kin lutela magi, laneno tye ki tic mapire tek tutwal me doro tic me cwiny ki tela pa kanica.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitemonokineta nuka ekanisa, engarenok luegelegela kes eyaitos aiboisio nuegelegela nuka apugan naka ekanisa. Kanejaas engarenok lu, ejaasi ebisop keda aswam naepol noi kotoma aingarenikin aswamisinei nuka ediini keda nuka ekanisa.
lgg_prompt: Otita kanisa ni 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba ndundu eyi e'yo ndundu kanisa ni 'diyi one ni. Drice'ba 'diyi ma eselea, bisopi ni azi okporu 'ye e'yo kanisa ni 'diyi ma dri cezu azini e'yo driceza ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkora y'ekanisa y'abakurisitaayo, abeebembezi baingi nibareeberera engyenderwaho y'ekanisa etarikushushana. Omu beebembezi aba, bishopu aine omurimo gw'amaani omu kwebembera eby'omyoyo n'obwebembezi bw'ekanisa.

eng_prompt: The Ugandan constitution guarantees various fundamental rights, including the right to practice one's religion freely. As a result, diverse faiths coexist peacefully within the country.
lug_prompt: Ssemateeka wa Uganda akuuma eddembe ly'obuntu nga mw'otwalidde n'eddembe ly'okusinza mu ddembe. N'ekivuddemu, enzikiriza ez'enjawulo zibeera wamu mu mirembe mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Pencik me lobo Uganda gwoko twero pa dano mapol, ma I kingi obedo twero me woro dini ma megi labongo lageng mo keken. Macalo adwogi ne, dini mapat-pat gibedo kacel I kuc I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Ingarakinit ekisil loka Uganda apedorosio nuipu, aimoriarit apedorosio nuka itunganan aitolot ediini ke kotoma ailajara. Kanuka ngun, ejarete idiinin luegelegela kainapakina kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Azita kari Uganda niri ma dria ri ni drilemgbo okporu karakara eyi fe, azini drilemgbo 'ba alu alu ni e'yo aitanisi 'diyi 'yezu i'ma ngulupi si. E'yo 'disi, dini ndundu eyi aa tualu asianzu si kari 'di ma alea.

eng_prompt: Marriage is often seen as a significant milestone in life. It marks the beginning of a new chapter where two individuals commit to building a shared future together.
lug_prompt: Obufumbo butera okutwalibwa ng'ekintu ekikulu ennyo mu bulamu. Kiraga entandikwa y'essuula empya abantu babiri mwe beeyama okuzimba ebiseera eby'omu maaso eby'awamu.

teo_prompt: Ewanyunitai duc edukone kwape ainapeta nuapolok noi kotoma aijar. Erai ngin ageunet naka atutubet naitetet naepedoriata itunga iarei aiduk ingaren nepepe.
lgg_prompt: Ba oku biza ndre sa'wa driasi ekile e'yo azi okporu ni ru idri ma alia. Eri e'dota e'yo o'di ni 'ba iri yini yi owizu ewu drialeri sizu tualu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Obushwere buriijo nibureebwa nk'ekintu ky'omugasho omu magara. N'entandikwa y'eshuura ensya ahu abantu babiri barikwetenga kwombeka nyensya hamwe.

eng_prompt: When considering financial strategies, it's essential to understand the potential outcomes of various options. Many people seek opportunities that can grow their wealth over time.
lug_prompt: Bw'oba olowooza ku nkola z'ebyensimbi, kikulu okutegeera ebiyinza okuva mu nkola ez'enjawulo. Abantu bangi banoonya mikisa egiyinza okutumbula obugagga bwabwe oluvannyuma lw'ekiseera.

teo_prompt: Kapak kana aomoom nuikamunitos ikapun, ejokuna noi amisiikin nuepedorete atakanun kotoma aseununeta nuegelegela. Emoete itunga luipu arerengesio nu epedorete aiyatakin abar kec kotoma apak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo geri robia esuzu 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru e'yo ecopi efu'ba e'yo ndundu 'diyi ma alia 'diyi vazu. Ba karakara eyi drileba eyi nda eyini ani lonyi eyivile 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu sa'wa driasi.
nyn_prompt: Waaba nooteekateeka aha nkora y'esente, n'eky'omugasho kwetegyereza ebirikubaasa kuruga omu kukora ebintu bitari bimwe na bimwe. Abantu baingi nibaronda emigisha erikubaasa kwongyera obugaiga bwabo bwanyima y'obwire.

eng_prompt: In our parish, all financial matters are subject to strict oversight. To ensure transparency and accountability, the bishop must approve any kind of church contributions.
lug_prompt: Mu kigo kyaffe, ensonga z'ebyensimbi zonna zirondoolwa nnyo. Okukakasa obwerufu n'embalirira, omulabirizi alina okukakasa buli kika ky'obuyambi bw'ekkanisa.
ach_prompt: I parish wa, lok me lim weng ki doro maber tutwal. Me neno ni jami weng tye atir, laneno omyero oyee yub mo keken me miyo kony ki kanica.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubetekosi, ejai aingic naepol noi naka akiro nuka ikapun. Kanu awanyun abeit ka aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun, ibusakinit ebisop aitigogongor agangat naka ekanisa.
lgg_prompt: Parisi amavileri ma alea, 'ba e'yo dria robia ni 'diyi ma pamvu one okporu. Aa'zu e'yo ada be azini e'yo 'yezu kililiru, bisopi ma ai afa dria kanisa ni fe 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu muruka gwaitu, enshonga zoona ez'esente nizirondoorwa munonga. Okureeba ngu hariho amazima n'embaririra, Bishopu ashemereire kwikiriza obuhwezi bw'ekanisa.

eng_prompt: To ensure a high quality of education, regulatory bodies establish specific criteria for schools. Regular evaluations are conducted to assess compliance with these established standards.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa omutindo gw'ebyenjigiriza ogwa waggulu, ebitongole ebifuga biteekawo emitendera egy'enjawulo ku masomero. Okukebera buli kaseera kukolebwa okukebera okugobererwa kw'emitendera gino egyateekebwawo.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni rwom me kwan tye malo, dul ma doro lok kom gangi kwan keto cik mapat-pat pi gangi kwan. Ki ngiyo kit ma tic tye kawot kwede kare ki kare me neno kit ma tic tye kawot kwede malube ki cik ma kiketo.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun adoketait naepol noi naka asioman, itolomunenete iriongeta luka isomeroi nutupitono. Inwakio duc ainwakio kanu awanyun ebe itodolikinitai adoketait na.
lgg_prompt: Onita ma omgbo otuzu, amuti sukulu eyi ma drilea 'diyi azita eyi o'ba sukulu eyini. Ba e'yo eti ondaza eyi 'ye sa'wa driasi e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma vuti obizu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'obwegyese biri aha rurengo rw'ahaiguru, ebitongore ebirikujunanizibwa ahaby'obwegyese nibitandikaho enkora y'amashomero. Okucondooza buri kaire nikukorwa okureeba ngu abantu nibagyendera aha mutindo oguteirweho.

eng_prompt: The community has a long-standing tradition of respecting sacred spaces. It is essential to preserve the integrity of these areas for future generations.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kirina obuwangwa obw'edda obw'okussa ekitiibwa mu bifo ebitukuvu. Kya mugaso okukuuma obulungi bw'ebitundu bino eri emirembe egijja.
ach_prompt: Lwak tye ki tekwaro me woro kabedo maleng pi kare malac. Pire tek tutwal me gwoko lengo pa kabedo magi pi anyim.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi itunga keda inonosio luapolok noi luka ayongite aiboisio nu ilipere. Erai ibore yenepol noi aidar aiboisio nu kanu aijar naka itunga lu oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ma e'yo inzita fezu pari alatararu 'diyi ma dria ri sa'wa ezu. Eri orodriru angu 'diyi ma ta mbazu ewu drusirisi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga kiine engyenderwaho y'obwire buraingwa ey'okuheereza emyanya erikwera ekitiinisa. N'eky'omugasho okurinda oburungi bw'emyanya egi, ahabw'eminyeeto erikwija.

eng_prompt: In many countries, property ownership is formalized through legal documentation. This ensures that individuals can prove their rights to the land they possess.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nnyingi obwannannyini ku bintu buwandiisibwa mu mateeka. Kino kikakasa nti abantu basobola okulaga eddembe lyabwe ku ttaka lye balina.
ach_prompt: I lobe mapol, rwom me bedo rwed jami tye I te cik. Man weko dano acel acel twero nyutu twero gi I kom ngom ma gitye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kakwapin nuipu, itodunitere ebe eraas itunganan yenejaasi keda iboro kotoma apapula naka ikisila. Einakini na awanyun ebe epedorete itunga aitodun apedorosio kec nuka alupok nu ejaas kesi.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba e'yo nyaku ma e'ipika niri si geri kokobi azita palaa 'diyisi. Diri ne ra kini 'ba alu alu eco e'da yi ma drilemgbo nyaku yini 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu mahanga maingi, obwannannyini bw'ebintu nibukirizibwa kurabira omu bihandiiko by'ebiragiro. Eki nikihamya ngu abantu nibabaasa kworeka obugabe bwabo ahaitaka eri baine.

eng_prompt: Many religious traditions hold specific beliefs about divine figures and their significance. Among these, Christianity uniquely emphasizes the role of Jesus Christ in its teachings.
lug_prompt: Ennono z'enzikiriza nnyingi zirina enzikiriza ez'enjawulo ku bantu ba katonda n'amakulu gaabwe. Mu bino byonna, Obukrisitaayo bussa nnyo essira ku kifo kya Yesu Kristo mu njigiriza zaabwo.
ach_prompt: Tekwaro me dini mapol tye ki niyee i kom lubanga ki ber pa lubanga. I kin magi, dini pa lucristayo keto cwinygi tutwalle I kom tic pa Yecu Kricito I pwonygi.
teo_prompt: Inonosio luipu luka idiinin ejaas keda aiyuunikec nuikamunitos itunga luka Edeke keda ajokisikec. Kotoma aiboisio nu, einakinit ikurisitayot aijen nuikamunitos aswam naka Yesu Kristo kotoma aisisianakineta ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dini ni karakara 'diyi ma a'ita wura ndundu eyi ma dria 'diyi ci dika eyi ma orodri eyi pie. E'yo 'diyi ma eselea, Kristayo ni okpo fe azi Yesu kristo ni e'yo erini 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria.

eng_prompt: As we gather here today, it's important to reflect on the impact we can have on our environment. One simple yet powerful action we can take is to contribute to the greening of our community.
lug_prompt: Nga tukungaanidde wano leero, kikulu nnyo okulowooza ku ngeri gye tuyinza okukwatamu obutonde bw'ensi. Ekimu ku bintu ebyangu naye nga bya maanyi bye tuyinza okukola kwe kuyamba mu kulongoosa ekitundu kyaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wacokke kany tin, pire tek tutwal me tam I kom adwoki ma watwero kelo I kom cwec ma orumuwa. Gin acel ma yot dok ma pire tek tutwal ma watwero timone en aye miyo kony me gwoko kabedo wa wek obed ma alum.
teo_prompt: Neimoriar oni ne ilolo, ejokuna aomoom nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata oni aitodolikin ejautene lo akwap wok. Adiopebore naedit konye naepol noi naepedori oni aswam ngesi aitojokar aiboisit wok.
lgg_prompt: Amani ta trazu 'dia andrurisi, eri orodriru ama ma ega e'yo amani eco 'ye angu ama agei ri ma dria ri ma dria. Yeta azi ewakokoru te okporu amani eco 'ye ri fezu angu amani aa'zu 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Obu turikuteeranira aha erizooba, n'eky'omugasho okuteekateeka aha muringo ogu turikubaasa kukoresa eby'obuhangwa bwaitu. Ekintu kimwe kyanguhi kandi ky'amaani eki turikubaasa kukora n'okuhwera omu kutunguura ebyanga byaitu.

eng_prompt: The landscaping team worked tirelessly to enhance the aesthetic appeal of the property. Their efforts were evident as vibrant foliage began to flourish throughout the grounds.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu y'abakubi b'ettaka baakola butaweera okwongera ku bulungi bw'ekibanja. Kaweefube waabwe yeeyoleka ng'ebikoola ebirabika obulungi bitandika okumera mu kibangirizi kyonna.
ach_prompt: Luyub ngom gutiyo matek tutwal me medo leng pa kabedo eni. Tute gi onen ikare ma oboke ma beco ocako dongo I dyekal.
teo_prompt: Apotu etimu loka aitemonokin akwap iswamata kagogongu kanu aitojokar aibuses naka aduketait. Aponi kojenunai aswam kec naarai apotu akwii kogeutu apolo kotoma alaro kere.
lgg_prompt: Ba angu edepi 'diyi nga azi okpo kokoru afa 'da ma ndriza otuzu. Okpo eyini 'ba ri e'da kililiru sa'wa 'bani ebikobi ndundu eyi e'doria aku dria 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu y'abatebeekanisa eitaka ekakora n'amaani okwongyera aha burungi bw'eitaka. Amaani gaabo gakarebeka nk'amababi marungi agarikutandika kumera omu mbuga zoona.

eng_prompt: The church community has always placed great importance on spiritual leadership. As a result, they have developed a deep trust and respect for their pastors.
lug_prompt: Ekkanisa bulijjo etadde nnyo essira ku bukulembeze obw'omwoyo. N'ekivuddemu, bafunye obwesige n'ekitiibwa eri abasumba baabwe.
ach_prompt: Lwak me kanica I kare weng guketo tek tutwal I kom tela me cwiny. Macalo adwogi ne, gunongo gen ki woro madit tutwal I kom lukwat gi.
teo_prompt: Etapit duc itunga luka ekanisa aijaikin agogongu naepol noi mama ejaasi engarenok luka edini. Kanuka ngun, adumutu kesi amunokina keda ayongit nejaas ipasitan kec.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu kanisa ni 'diyi sawa driasi e'yo okporu 'diyi 'ba driceza e'yo aitanisi 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi esu asi'baza azini inzita angiri 'ba atalao eyivile 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'ekanisa buriijo bateire omugasho gw'amaani aha bwebembezi bw'eby'omwoyo. N'ekyarugiremu, batungire obwesigye n'ekitiinisa aha bashumba baabo.

eng_prompt: Education plays a vital role in shaping the future of our communities. As a result, many religious organizations have established institutions to provide quality learning opportunities.
lug_prompt: Ebyenjigiriza bikola omulimu munene mu kukola ebiseera by'ebitundu byaffe eby'omu maaso. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole by'enzikiriza bingi bitandiseewo amatendekero okuwa ebyenjigiriza eby'omutindo.
ach_prompt: Kwan obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I dongo anyim pa kabedo wa. Macalo adwogi ne, dule me dini mapol guyubu gangi kwan ma miyo gum me kwan ma rwom gi malo.
teo_prompt: Erai aisisia naepol noi kanu aitolomun ingaren naka itunga wok. Kanuka ngun, adukutu iriongeta luka idiinin isomeroi lu isisianakinete nuka adoketait najokan.
lgg_prompt: Onita ni azi okporu nga ewu drialeri 'bazu ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, amuti e'yo aitanisi karakara 'diyi e'do pari onita ni onyiru 'diyi fezu 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Obwegyese nibukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kuhanga eby'omumaisho by'abantu baitu. N'ekyarugiremu,ebitongore by'ediini bingi bitandikireho amatendekyero g'okwegyesa abantu eby'omutindo.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for our services, the company decided to expand its workforce. As a result, more employees were recruited.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'obuweereza bwaffe obweyongera, kampuni yasalawo okugaziya abakozi baayo. N'ekyavaamu, abakozi abalala baayingizibwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lutic wa, dul ne omoko tamgi me medo wel luticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, ki coyo lutic mapol.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin eipud loka aijaanakinio wok, abu ekampuni kitogogong eswamakake. Kanuka ngun, aponi itolomai eswamak luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu 'ba eyini amavile azi ngazu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, amuti 'da 'du e'yo 'ba eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma kalafe otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba si azi'ba azi eyi dika.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza bwaitu obweyongyeire, kampuni ekasharamu kwongyera aha bakozi baayo. Ekyarugiremu, abakozi baingi bakaheebwa emirimo.

eng_prompt: Throughout his tenure, he consistently prioritized the needs of the community above his own. His dedication and commitment to public service were evident in every decision he made.
lug_prompt: Mu kiseera kye kyonna, yakulembezanga ebyetaago by'abantu mu kifo ky'ebye. Okwewaayo kwe n'obumalirivu bwe eri obuweereza bwa gavumenti byeyolekera mu buli kusalawo kwe yakola.
ach_prompt: I kare ne weng, en oketo miti pa lwak obedo gin ma pire tek loyo mege. Cwinye kacel ki mitine me tic pi lwak onen I tam weng ma omoko.
teo_prompt: Apakio kere nuka aipuga ke, abu ngesi isingarenit ipudesia luka itunga adepar ke. Aponi koanyunai ainakina ke keda ainakina ke kanu aijanakin itunga kotoma aseunet kere naiswamat ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Sawa dria erini azi ngazu ri ma alea, eri 'ba e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi okporu aga i ma ngulupi ni 'diyi. Eri ma ava azini ava azi ngazu o'bi eyini ri e'da e'yo dria erini pe 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwe bwona, akatwara ebyetaago by'abantu nka bikuru kukira ebyawe. Okwehayo kwe n'okwehayo kwe omu buheereza bw'abantu bikarebeka omu kusharamu kwe kwona.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing humanitarian crisis, communities around the world are mobilizing to address the needs of those displaced. Various organizations and governments are collaborating to provide essential resources and assistance.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'abantu obugenda mu maaso, ebitundu okwetooloola ensi yonna bikunga abantu okukola ku byetaago by'abo ababundabunda. Ebitongole ne gavumenti eby'enjawulo bikolera wamu okuwa obuyambi obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me konyo dano matye kawot anyim, kabedo mapat-pat I wilobo tye ka rweyo dano me timo jami ma mite pi joo ma oryemogi ki I kabedogi. Dule ki gamente mapat-pat tye ka tic kacelo me miyo kony ki jami ma mite pi kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis na itunga, eutasi itunga luka akwap kere aimorikikin kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga lu aponi itobwounai. Iriongeta luegelegela keda apuganisinei iswamaete nepepe kanu aijanakin iboro ka agangat.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'ba eyini aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma e'yosi, ongulumu wudrikuru ma alea ndulu 'diyi eyi tra e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma alea risi 'diyi ma aza kozu. Amuti karakara eyi tualu gamete eyi pie azi nga tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi awazu tualu azakoma okporu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu oburiyo nibugyenda omu maisho, abantu omu nsi yoona bariyo nibeteerana kukora ahabyetaago by'abo ababingirwe omu maka gaabo. Ebitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe hamwe na gavumenti nibikwatanisa okuheereza obuhwezi n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: Many congregations rely on the generosity of their members to support various community initiatives. As a result, religious leaders always appreciate the donations people make.
lug_prompt: Amakanisa mangi geesigama ku bugabi bwa bammemba baago okuyambako enteekateeka z'ekitundu ez'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, abakulembeze b'enzikiriza basiima obuyambi abantu bwe bawaayo.
ach_prompt: Kanica mapol gijenge I kom mic pa lumemba gi me konyo yub mapat-pat matye I kabedo gi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela dini ipol kare gipwoyo kony ma dano miyo.
teo_prompt: Egangitos ikanisan luipu agangat naka imebanakec kanu aigangite aswamisio nuegelegela nuka itunga. Kanuka ngun, isiyalamikit duc engarenok lu idiinin agangat na ijaikitos itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kanisa karakara eyi atita fe e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyini. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba e'yo aitanisi 'diyi sawa driasi awa'difo be afa feza 'ba eyini fe 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Amakanisa maingi nigasherura obuhwezi kuruga omu ba memba baago, okuhwera enteekateeka z'ebyaro ezitarikushushana. N'ekyarugiremu, abeebembezi b'ediini nibasiima obuhwezi obu abantu barikuhayo.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing hunger crisis in their community, a local organization organized a food drive. Volunteers gathered supplies and prepared to distribute them to those in need.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'enjala ekyeyongera mu kitundu kyabwe, ekitongole ky'ekitundu kyategese okugaba emmere. Bannakyewa baakuŋŋaanyizza ebintu ne beetegekera okubigabira abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me kec matye kamede I kabedo gi, dul mo me tedero oyubu yub me poko cam. Dano ma odyere gujogo jami ma mite dok guyube me poko ne bot joo ma onongo peko tye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka etenge kotoma atutubetekec, abu erionget loka atutubet kitemok aikor inyamat. Apotu luka aijaanakinak otukutu iboro kosodete akapanakin aikor mama ejaasi ngul luipudasi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru abiri ni tupi ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri ma aza kozu, amuti azi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu e'yo nyaka awazu ri ra. Ba owi'ba 'diyi tra afa ayuzaru 'diyi azini eyi otu eyi awazu 'ba azakoma lepi 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'enjara obweyongyeire omu kyanga kyabo, ekitongore ky'ebyaro kikatebekanisa okugaba eby'okurya. Abaheekyera bakarundaana ebintu kandi beeteekateekyera kubiheereza abo abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: The filtration system is still undergoing maintenance. As a result, the water has not yet been purified.
lug_prompt: Enkola y'okusengejja ekyali mu kuddaabirizibwa. N'ekivuddemu, amazzi tegannalongoosebwa.
ach_prompt: Kitye ka yubu cuma ma ngiyo pii. Macalo adwogi ne, pii ne pwod pe ki lwoko.
teo_prompt: Eringa eutai aitemonokino epone loka aicwe akipi. Kanuka ngun, mam ber akipi iteteunitai.
lgg_prompt: Ba nga po'di geri afa oli edezu 'diyi ma tamba. E'yo 'disi, 'ba otuni nga yi 'da ku.
nyn_prompt: Enkora y'okucendeeza amaizi ekiriyo nereebererwa. N'ekyarugiremu, amaizi tigakashemeziibwe.

eng_prompt: In today's economy, rising prices and stagnant wages have created significant financial strain for countless individuals. As a result, many families find themselves struggling to make ends meet.
lug_prompt: Mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino, okweyongerayongera kw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu n'emisaala egiyimiridde bireeseewo okusika omuguwa okw'amaanyi mu by'enfuna eri abantu bangi. N'ekivuddemu, amaka mangi geesanga nga galwana okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: I tenge me lim ma ite kare ni, mede pa wel jami ki mede pa mucara okelo peko me lim I kom dano mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi mapol nongo tek tutwal me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka ikapun loka lolo, aiyatakin naka itiaisinei keda aiboisio nuka eropit nes eyaunit aiyalongong naka ikapun mama ejaasi itunga luipu. Kanuka ngun, etereikina ikalia luipu keda aijar.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lonyi ni ewu andruri ma alea, aje tupi tu 'diyi azini musara eyi ma omgbo esipi ku 'diyi fe e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi 'ba karakara eyini. E'yo 'disi, familia karakara eyi eyi esu eyi dri ci afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'entatsya y'erizooba, okweyongyera kw'emihendo hamwe n'emishaara etari kugyenda omu maisho, bireesireho oburemeezi bw'esente aha bantu baingi. N'ekyarugiremu, amaka maingi nigashanga gaine oburemeezi bw'okureeberera amagara gaago.

eng_prompt: In light of recent natural disasters and their devastating impacts, government officials have recognized the urgent need for enhanced safety measures. As a result, more money has been allocated to disaster preparedness.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bubenje bw'obutonde obubaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'ebikosa abantu, abakungu ba gavumenti bakitegedde nti waliwo obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okutumbula eby'okwerinda. N'ekivuddemu, ssente nnyingi ziteekeddwawo okwetegekera obutyabaga.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko ma poto atura ma otimme cokcok-ki ki adwogi ne marac tutwal, lutic pa gamente guniang ni mitte tutwal me medo rwom me gwoko kuc. Macalo adwogi ne, kimedo cente I yubbe pi peko ma poto atura.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka isuban keda atiokisio nuka isuban, apotu eswamak luka apugan kojenutu eipud loka ayuwara. Kanuka ngun, aponi ibwaikinai ikapun luipu kanu aitemonokin kanuka atiokisio nuepedorete atakanun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo nyakuni 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria, azi'ba gameteni 'diyi esu e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi 'yezu okposi ri ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'ba robia angiri otuta e'yo ewaru eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebihikiirizi by'obuhangwa ebyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'oburemeezi bwabyo, abakuru omu gavumenti bareebire ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okwongyera aha by'okwerinda. N'ekyarugiremu, esente nyingi ziteirwe omu nteekateeka y'ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, Uganda has become a significant destination for those fleeing conflict and persecution in their home countries. The government's open-door policy has led to a substantial increase in the number of displaced individuals seeking safety within its borders.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, Uganda efuuse ekifo ekikulu eri abo abadduka entalo n'okuyigganyizibwa mu nsi zaabwe. Enkola ya gavumenti ey'okuggulawo enzigi eviiriddeko okweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abantu abanoonyiboobubudamu abanoonya obukuumi mu nsalo zaayo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, Uganda odoko kabedo maber tutwal pi jo ma oringo lweny ki aunauna I lobogi. Cik pa gamente me yabo dogola pa gamente okelo medde pa wel dano matye ka yenyo gwok ki I wang lobo ne.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eraun Uganda aiboisit naepol noi naka itunga luekerete kotoma akwapukec. Ainapeta nuka apugan nu apukor ekek eyangaunit aiyatakino na enaaba loka itunga lu ekerete aiboi kotoma oikoruon ke.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, kari Uganda niri eca angu azi orodriru 'ba eyini apazu e'yo ngiringiri ni azini candi esuzu kari eyivile aku 'diyi ma alea 'diyini. Gamete ma azita jotile ngmboru ri fe kalafe 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ma kalafe ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, Uganda ehindukire omwanya muhango gw'abo abarikuhunga entaro n'okuhiiganisibwa omu mahanga gaabo. Enkora ya gavumenti ey'okwiguraho emihingo, ereesire okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu abarikuruga omu maka gaabo barikuronda oburinzi omu nsharo zaayo.

eng_prompt: As the sun dipped below the horizon, an eerie calm settled over the city. Suddenly, the lights flickered and went out, plunging the entire nation into darkness.
lug_prompt: Enjuba bwe yagwa wansi mu bbanga, akasiriikiriro ak'ekyewuunyo kaabuna ekibuga. Amangu ago, ebitaala byazikira, eggwanga lyonna ne liri mu kizikiza.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka poto piny, piny oling mot tutwal I boma ne. Cutcut mac ocako lyel ci orweny woko ma oweko lobo ne odonyo I col piny.
teo_prompt: Neautar akolong aibiror kwap, abu ainapakina naepol noi kojaikin toma oibuga. Apotu akimian kibiroros kosodete alemar kosodete aipikakin akwap kere toma amuton.
lgg_prompt: E'yo etuka ni e'deria, angu e'yere aku ambu cityniri ma dria. Sawa 'disi, aci 'da eyi e'da azini eyi emu amve, kari 'di ma alea dria ri 'be angu ini ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwahikire ahansi y'eiguru, hakabaho obucureera omu rurembo. Ahonaaho, ebitaara bikacweka kandi byahwaho, eihanga ryona rikagwa omu mwirima.

eng_prompt: As fossil fuel reserves continue to dwindle and environmental concerns escalate, it has become increasingly clear that our current energy practices are unsustainable. To ensure a cleaner and more sustainable future, we need to resort to renewable sources of energy.
lug_prompt: Ng'amafuta g'omu ttaka geeyongera okukendeera n'okweraliikirira kw'obutonde bw'ensi kweyongera, kyeyoleka bulungi nti enkola zaffe ez'amasannyalaze eziriwo kati teziyimirizaawo. Okusobola okulaba nti ebiseera eby'omu maaso biba biyonjo era nga biwangaala, twetaaga okuddukira mu nsibuko z'amasannyalaze ezizzibwa obuggya.
ach_prompt: Kit ma moo ma kiyubu ki kom jami ma orumuwa tye ka medde ki dwogo piny ki lworo me cwec ma orumuwa tye ka medde, nen atyer kamaleng ni yub me mac ma watye kwede kombedi pe twero medde anyim. Me neno ni anyim wa bedo maleng dok maber, omyero wacak tic ki mac ma aa ki icing dano.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos aiboisio nuka akinyeta nuka akwap aikidiokor keda aiyalongongo naka akwap, ejenuna noi ebe mam iponesio luka agogongu luka akinyet kwape kwana epedorete aitodolikin. Kanu awanyun ebe ejai ingaren lo elai ido lo eyuwara, ekot oni aitwasam aiboisio nu itwasamaere akim.
lgg_prompt: Afa nyakuni 'diyi ma omgbo ni mu drile esi dika e'yo angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu uru, eri eca e'da kini geri amani aci ayuzu curu'do 'diyi econi aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ku. Aa'zu ewu drialeri ni aa'zu ala azini ewu drialeri ni aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea, le ama ma e'do geri okpo fezu 'diyi ayu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku amajuuta g'eby'obuhangwa garikugumizamu nigakyendeera n'okwerarikirira kw'obuhangwa bw'ensi kweyongyera, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu enkora yaitu eriho hati y'eby'amashanyarazi terikubaasa kugumizamu. Okureeba ngu ebiro byaitu by'omumaisho nibiba birungi, twine kukoresa amashanyarazi agarikubaasa kugarurwa busya.

eng_prompt: The sun has been relentless, and the ground is parched. Farmers are worried as the crops struggle to survive without sufficient rainfall.
lug_prompt: Omusana gubadde tegukoma era n'ettaka likalu. Abalimi beeraliikirivu ng'ebirime birwana okuwangaala awatali nkuba emala.
ach_prompt: Ceng obedo ka ryeny teretere dok ngom bene otwo tutwal. Lupur tye ki lworo ni cam gi tye ka yele me kwo labongo kot ma oromo.
teo_prompt: Etapit akolong aiyengun, ido ewonitor alupok. Iyalongongosi akoriok naarai etionikinit iraan aijar komamei edou loedolit.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ebi ovu asi kokoru azini nyaku e'wi 'bo. Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi asi otiza be ori yini dri ciria yi ta mbazu ozooniri kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Omushana gutwire nigweyongyera, kandi eitaka rigumire. Abahingi n'abariisa beerarikirire ahabwokuba ebihingirwe byabo nibirwana kubaho enjura etarikumara.

eng_prompt: Residents have been facing numerous challenges due to unreliable electricity. Many businesses are struggling to operate efficiently because of the inconsistent power availability.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze babadde basanga okusoomoozebwa kungi olw'amasannyalaze agatali geesigika. Bizineesi nnyingi zirwana okukola obulungi olw'ebbula ly'amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gubedo kanongo peko mapol pi mac ma pe tiyo maber. Biacara mapol tye ka tute matek me tic maber pi mac ma pe bedo tye kare ki kare.
teo_prompt: Etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nuipu kanuka akim namam ejokuna. Eutasi ibiasaran luipu ainingosit aswam ejok kanuka amamus na akim.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu e'yo aci ako nirisi. Tujura karakara eyi dri ci azi ngazu kililiru e'yo aci ako ni 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye batwire nibatunga oburemeezi bwingi ahabw'amashanyarazi agatarikwesigwa. Bizinesi enyingi nizirwana kukora kurungi ahabw'amashanyarazi agatarikugumaho.

eng_prompt: To ensure a steady flow of materials and mitigate risks, it's essential to diversify our sourcing strategy. Relying on multiple suppliers will help us maintain operational stability.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okulaba ng'ebikozesebwa bitambula bulungi n'okukendeeza ku bulabe, kikulu nnyo okukyusakyusa mu ngeri gye tufunamu ebintu. Okwesigama ku batunzi ab'enjawulo kijja kutuyamba okukuuma obutebenkevu mu mirimu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni jami tic tye kawot maber ki bene me dwoko piny rwom me peko, pire tek tutwal me loko yoo me nongo jami. Jenge I kom lucat jami ma dwong bikonyo wa me bedo ki kuc I tic.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ejai iboro luipu ka aitidisiar atiokisio, ibusakinit oni aijulakin epone loka agwel iboro. Aitogogong agwelanarak luipu ingarakini oni aidar eswamae loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma acizu kililiru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma omgbo esizu, eri orodriru ama ma geri afa ayuzaru 'diyi jezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Asi'baza 'ba afa ozipi karakara 'diyi ma dria ri ni nga ama aza ko azi ngazu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu eby'okukoresa biguma nibikuratirwa n'okutuubya aha kabi, n'eky'omugasho okukoresa emiringo etari emwe n'emwe. Okwesiga abarikuguza ebintu bingi, nikiija kutuhwera kurinda obutebekana omu mirimo yaitu.

eng_prompt: The storm knocked out power lines across the entire region. As a result, our neighborhood has been plunged into darkness.
lug_prompt: Omuyaga gwakoona waya z'amasannyalaze okwetooloola ekitundu kyonna. N'ekivuddemu, ekitundu kyaffe kibadde mu kizikiza.
ach_prompt: Yamo magwar ne ongolo waya mac I but piny eni weng. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo wa tye I col piny tutwal.
teo_prompt: Abu ekwam onang iwayai lu akim katutubet kere. Kanuka ngun, ejai amuton toma aiboisitikosi.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'da si wayi aci ni 'diyi angu 'da ma alea ndulu. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, angu amavile 'diyi ma ageia 'diyi fi angu ini ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Eihunga rikatema waya z'amashanyarazi omu kicweka kyona. N'ekyarugiremu, ekyaro kyaitu kitwirwe omu mwirima.

eng_prompt: After several attempts to run their equipment, the team grew increasingly frustrated. Their productivity was severely hindered by the lack of resources.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okugezaako enfunda eziwera okuddukanya ebyuma byabwe, ttiimu yeeyongera okunyiiga. Omulimu gwabwe gwataataaganyizibwa nnyo olw'ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Inge temo tyeko tic ki jami ticgi tyen mapol, cwiny lutic ne obedo ka cwer tutwal. Rwom me tic gi ojwik tutwal pi nok pa jami tic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitam aitolot iswamasia kec, abu etimu itolitol noi. Abu amamus na iboro itolitol aswamukec noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu yi vile afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ti ojizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da eca asi nyoza be drile. Afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ako atri e'yo yini azi ngazuri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okugyezaho emirundi mingi kutwara ebyoma byabo omu nkora, tiimu ekatandika kuhwa amaani. Eby'okukora bikazibirwa munonga ahabw'eibura ry'ebintu.

eng_prompt: The government has recognized the urgent need for a more reliable energy infrastructure. As a result, various initiatives are being launched to address the ongoing electricity shortages.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti etegedde obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'ensengeka y'amasannyalaze eyeesigika. N'ekivuddemu, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo zitandikibwawo okugonjoola ebbula ly'amasannyalaze erigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Gamente oniang ni miti tye pi yub me mac ma genne. Macalo adwogi ne, kitye ka cako yub mapat-pat me tyeko peko me nok pa mac matye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Abu apugan koany ebe ejai eipud loka aitolom akim naegogong noi. Kanuka ngun, eutai aitegear iboro luegelegela kanu aitemokin ekadakada lo akim.
lgg_prompt: Gamete esu e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo aci ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu kililiru ri ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'do e'yo ndundu eyi e'yo aci ako ni 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti eyorekire ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'eby'amashanyarazi ebirikwesigwa. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka nyingi ziriyo nizitandikwaho kumaraho eibura ry'amashanyarazi erikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: Despite the country's efforts to improve its energy infrastructure, many households and businesses continue to use electricity inefficiently. This has led to significant concerns about sustainability and resource management.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde eggwanga lifuba okulongoosa eby'amasannyalaze, amaka mangi ne bizinensi zikyakozesa amasannyalaze mu ngeri etali nnungi. Kino kireeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi ku buwangaazi n'okuddukanya eby'obugagga.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lobo ne tye ka yele me yubu mac, gangi ki biacara mapol pud tye katic ki mac I yoo ma pe ber. Man okelo lworo madit tutwal I kom gwoko jami ki tic maber.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamaete akwapuwok kagogongu kanu aitojokar eswamae lo akim, itunga keda ibiasaran luipu erongo itwasamaete akim ejok. Eyangaunit ngin aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos aidar iboro keda aitwasam ejok.
lgg_prompt: Kari ni tro okpo 'ba e'yo aci ni 'diyi otuzu ra ti, aku karakara eyi tualu tujari karakara eyi pie aci ayu geri kililiru ku 'diyisi. E'yo 'di fe asi otiza angiri e'yo 'bani ecozu angu 'da ma ta mbazu ri ma dria azini geri 'bani ecozu lonyi eyi ma tambazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho amaani g'eihanga okutunguura ebyombeko by'amashanyarazi, amaka n'eby'obushubuzi ebingi nibigyenda omu maisho n'okukoresa amashanyarazi kubi. Eki kireesireho okwerarikirira kw'amaani ahaby'obuhangwa hamwe n'okureeberera kurungi eby'obugaiga.

eng_prompt: Electricity has become an essential part of modern life, powering various appliances and devices. One of the most common uses of this energy source is in the kitchen.
lug_prompt: Amasannyalaze gafuuse ekintu ekikulu mu bulamu obw'omulembe guno, nga gakola ku byuma n'ebintu eby'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bintu amasannyalaze gano gye gasinga okukozesebwa mu ffumbiro.
ach_prompt: Mac elektriciti dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwo me kare-ni. Yo acel ma pol pa dano tiyo kwede ki mac man obedo i ot tedo.
teo_prompt: Araun akim naka epiei ibore yenepol noi kotoma aijar naka lolo, itosomaete iboro luegelegela. Adiopet kotoma aswamisinei nuetapit itunga aitosom akim na erai kaipo.
lgg_prompt: Aci osezari eca curu'do afa azi orodriru ewu curu'do ri ma alea ni i, afa ayuzaru azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma okpo fezu. Afa 'bani aci 'di ayuzu tu 'diyi ma azi eri jokonia.
nyn_prompt: Amashanyarazi gahindukire ekintu ky'omugasho omu magara g'obunaku obu, nigakoresa ebintu bingi. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukirayo kukoresibwa amaani aga n'omu kiyungu.

eng_prompt: Regular maintenance is essential for ensuring the longevity and efficiency of electrical equipment. Over time, wear and tear can lead to performance issues.
lug_prompt: Okuddaabiriza ebyuma by'amasannyalaze buli kaseera kya mugaso okulaba nga biwangaala era nga bikola bulungi. Ekiseera bwe kigenda kiyitawo, okusajjuka n'okukutuka bisobola okuviirako obuzibu mu kukola.
ach_prompt: Gedo mac kare ki kare pire tek tutwal me neno ni jami mac tiyo maber dok pi kare malac. Ka kare woto ki kato, rweny pa jami twero kelo peko me tic.
teo_prompt: Aitemonokin duc iboro lu akim ejok kanu awanyun ebe eyangaikinete kesi apak naepol ka aswam ejok. Akaulo naka apak, epedori ainang keda aibiror ayangaun atiokisio nuka eswamae.
lgg_prompt: Afa aci oseza ni 'diyi ma ta mbaza sa'wa driasi ri eri orodriru afa aci oseza ni 'diyi ma aa'zu sa'wa ezu azini azi ngazu kililiru. Sa'wa ma vutia, eyi ma rua eza azini eyi ma tiza eco fe e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Okugarura busya ebyoma by'amashanyarazi buri kaire n'eky'omugasho kureeba ngu bigumaho kandi bikora kurungi. Obwire ku burikuhinguraho, okujwara n'okushwekyerera, nikibaasa kureetaho oburemeezi omu kukora.

eng_prompt: After a thorough inspection of the electrical system, it became clear that there were multiple issues affecting the reliability of the service. As a result, the entire power line needs to be serviced.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera ennyo enkola y'amasannyalaze, kyafuuka kyeyoleka bulungi nti waaliwo ensonga nnyingi ezaali zikosa obwesigwa bw'empeereza. N'ekivuddemu, layini y'amasannyalaze yonna yeetaaga okukolebwako saaviisi.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo yub me mac I yoo matut, onen atyer kamaleng ni jami mapol tye ka balo yub eni. Macalo adwogi ne, omyero ki yub line me mac weng.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aanyanar ejok eswamae lo akim, aponi kojenunai ebe ipu akiro nuetapit aitolitol ejanakine. Kanuka ngun, ibusakinit aitemonokino elago kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aci osezari ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini e'yo karakara eyi e'yo aci oseza ni 'diyi ma aza ko ni. E'yo 'disi, le 'ba ma ede layini aci ni 'diyi dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi enkora y'amashanyarazi, kikarebeka butunu ngu hakaba hariho enshonga nyingi ezaabaire niziteganisa obuheereza bwago. N'ekyarugiremu, amashanyarazi goona nigetenga kugarurwa busya.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation of the scene, the authorities gathered evidence to determine the source of the blaze. Witnesses reported seeing sparks near the electrical panel just before the flames erupted.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo mu kifo, ab'obuyinza baakuŋŋaanyizza obujulizi okuzuula ensibuko y'omuliro. Abaabaddewo baategeezezza nti baalaba enjala okumpi n'amasannyalaze ng'omuliro tegunatandika.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwedo kabedo ne maber tutwal, lutela guyubu caden me niang kama mac ne oaa ki ie. Lucaden guwaco ni guneno mac mac cok ki kom mac ma peya mac ocake.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok aiboisit kangin, apotu apedorosio otukutu ajenanut kanu ajenun alibunet naka akim. Apotu ajenak kotemasi ebe apotu kesi kowanyutu akimian eidunya keda aiboisit naka akim eringa akim abwangun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru angu 'da ma alea 'bo ri ma vutia, drice'ba eyi tra e'yo ecopi e'dapi kini aci 'da e'do ngole 'diyi. Sadini eyi 'yo kini eyi ndre e'yo aci oseza ni 'diyi pari aci oseza ni 'diyi ma ageia de nga po'di aci 'da e'doni ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okucondooza munonga aha mwanya, ab'obushoborozi bakarundaana obuhame kumanya oburugo bw'omuriro. Abajurizi bakagira ngu bakareeba amashanyarazi haihi n'ekipande ky'amashanyarazi omuriro gutakatandikire.

eng_prompt: Severe storms swept through the area last night, causing widespread damage to power lines and infrastructure. As a result, the entire community has been plunged into darkness.
lug_prompt: Omuyaga ogw'amaanyi gwakubye ekitundu ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero, ne gukosa layini z'amasannyalaze n'ebintu ebirala. N'ekivuddemu, ekitundu kyonna kibadde mu kizikiza.
ach_prompt: Kot ma ocwe matek obalo kabedo man laworo dyewor ma oweko mac ki jami mukene oballe tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo weng tye I col piny.
teo_prompt: Apotu ekwam kibiroros aiboisit ngin akware nabian, ido abu komudia iwayai luka akim keda iboro luipu. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi itunga kere toma amuton.
lgg_prompt: Oli okporu 'diyi oli angu 'da ma alea ini ajerisi eyini ani afa aci oseza ni 'diyi ezazu tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi dria fi angu ini ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Eihunga ry'amaani rikagyenda omu mwanya ekiro kya nyomwebazyo, rikashiisha amashanyarazi n'ebintu ebindi. Ekyarugiremu,abantu boona omu kyanga bagwire omu mwirima.

eng_prompt: After hours of waiting in the dark, we gathered around the fireplace, sharing stories to pass the time. The storm outside raged on, leaving us anxious for the power to be restored.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'essaawa eziwera nga tulinda mu nzikiza, twakungaana okwetooloola omuliro, nga tugabana emboozi okuyita mu kaseera. Omuyaga gw'ebweru gwagenda mu maaso, ne gutuleka nga tweraliikirivu nti amasannyalaze gajja kuddawo.
ach_prompt: Inge kuro pi cawa malac I col piny, wacokke I nget mac, wanywako lok me kato ki kare. Yamo ma obedo ka cwer matek adada oweko wabedo ki par tutwal me nongo mac.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aidar isawan luipu kotoma amuton, apotu sio atukokinos akim, aimor akiro kanu aitub apak. Abu ekwam kinyikok kinga, kojalak sio epodokinit adumun akim.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani te angu ini ma alia 'bori ma vutia, ama tra ama aci ma ageia, e'yo o'yozu sawa agazu. Ozoo amveleru ri mu drile, fe amani asi otiza be aci ma omvitaniri ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurinda eshaaha nyingi omu mwirima, tuketeeranira haihi n'omuriro, turikubagana ebirikugyenda omu maisho kumara obwire. Eihunga ry'aheeru rikagumizamu kutureetera okwerarikirira ngu amashanyarazi nigaija kugaruka.

eng_prompt: Access to reliable electricity is crucial for the development of remote communities. Without it, residents struggle to improve their quality of life and economic opportunities.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amasannyalaze agesigika kya mugaso nnyo mu nkulaakulana y'ebitundu eby'omu byalo. Awatali ekyo, abatuuze balwana okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bwabwe n'emikisa gy'ebyenfuna.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki mac ma pe rweny ikare weng pire tek tutwal pi dongo lobo me caro. Labongo ne, lutedero nongo peko me ilo malo rwom me kwo gi ki gum me nongo lim.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akim na iswamai ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka apol naka aiboisio nuka ocaloi. Arai emamei, etiono itunga aitojokar adoketait na aijar kec keda arerengesio nu ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Aci ma esuta kililiru ri eri orodriru angu caloru 'diyi ma ezota ni. Eri kokoru, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri ci eyi ma edri otuzu tualu drileba robia esuzu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga amashanyarazi agatarikurugaho n'eky'omugasho aha ntunguuka y'ebyaro. Hatariho, abatuuragye nibarwana kutunguura emituurire yaabo hamwe n'emigisha yaabo omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: After reviewing their impressive performance over the past quarter, the board decided to allocate additional funds to the team. As a result, they received more money.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya enkola yaabwe ennungi mu myezi esatu egiyise, akakiiko kaasalawo okuwa ttiimu ensimbi endala. N'ekyavaamu, baafuna ssente endala.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma gutimo kwede maber tutwal I dwe adek ma okato, dul madoro dul ne omoko tamgi me medo lim I dul tuku eni. Macalo adwogi ne gunongo cente madwong.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor eswamae kec loajokan noi kotoma okaru ilukumin iuni luatuboros, apotu lukapolok ijaikisi etimu ikapun icie. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi odumutu ikapun luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eyini 'ye onyiru 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, board 'du e'yo robia fezu amuti 'da dri dika. E'yo 'disi, eyi esu robia angiri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma emikorere yaabo mirungi omu kwezi kwa kashatu okuhweire, akakiiko kakacwamu kwongyera esente omu tiimu. Ekyarugiremu, bakatunga esente nyingi.

eng_prompt: In his address to the nation, the president highlighted the urgent need for infrastructure improvements. He emphasized that reliable energy sources are essential for economic growth and the well-being of all citizens.
lug_prompt: Mu kwogera kwe eri eggwanga, pulezidenti yalaga obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okulongoosa ebizimbe. Yakikkaatirizza nti ensibuko z'amasannyalaze ezeesigika za mugaso mu kukulaakulanya ebyenfuna n'obulamu obulungi bwa bannansi bonna.
ach_prompt: I lok mege bot lwak me lobo, ladit lobo owaco ni omyero ki yub jami ma mite pi lwak oyot-oyot tutwal. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom lok ni yoo me nongo mac ma genne obedo gin ma pire tek pi dongo lobo ki ber bedo pa anywali weng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma einerike mama ejaasi akwap abu lokapolon akwap kitodu eipud loka aitojokar adukena. Abu ngesi kitogogong ebe ibusakinit itunga kere adumun akim naejok kanu apol naka ikapun keda aijar naka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza erini kari dri ri ma alea, prisdent ece e'yo 'bani lezu afa ayuzaru 'diyi otuzu mbeleru ri ma dria. Eri 'ba asi kini geri aci esuzu 'diyi orodriru zota e'yo robianiri ni azini kari anzi dria eyini aa'zu muke ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugamba kwe aha eihanga, omwebembezi w'eihanga akashoboorora ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okutunguura ebyombeko. Akashoboorora ngu oburugo bw'amashanyarazi oburikwesigwa n'obw'omugasho aha ntunguuka y'eby'entaasya hamwe n'entunguuka y'abantu boona.

eng_prompt: Despite the extensive preparations and high expectations, the atmosphere was noticeably different without his presence. Many attendees were left wondering about the reasons for his absence.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waaliwo enteekateeka ez'amaanyi n'ebisuubirwa bingi, embeera yali ya njawulo nga taliiwo. Bangi ku abo abaaliwo beebuuza ensonga lwaki teyaliiwo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub tye mapol ki gen madit tutwal, kabedo ne obedo pat tutwal ka en peke. Dano mapol ma gubedo tye gubedo ki ngeng I kom tyen lok ma oweko en pe obino.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas aitemonokineta nuepolok keda aomisio nuepolok, egelegela noi ejautene komamei ngesi. Apotu itunga luipu kojalakisi aomoom nuikamunitos akiroke nuka amamut ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otuta ni 'diyi ma talasi azini e'yo 'bani ega 'diyi ma talasi, angu nderi ndra ndu 'bani eri vu yo. Ba emu'ba 'diyi ma karakara eyi awi osu e'yo eyini emuzu kuye 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entebekanisa nungi hamwe n'okushemererwa kwingi, embeera ekaba etarikushushana we atariho. Abantu baingi abaabaire bariho bakaguma nibeebuuza ahabw'enki yaabaire atariho.

eng_prompt: After months of negotiations with management yielded no satisfactory results, the frustration among the employees reached a boiling point. In a meeting held last night, they unanimously decided to take a stand for their rights.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'enteeseganya n'abaddukanya emirimu nga tewali kivaamu kimatiza, obwennyamivu mu bakozi bwatuuka ku ntikko. Mu lukiiko olwatudde ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero, baasazeewo awatali kuwakanya kulwanirira ddembe lyabwe.
ach_prompt: Inge dwe mapol me winye ki ludito tic pe okelo adwogi maber, cwiny lutic pe obedo yom. I kacoke ma obedo laworo idi woo, gumoko tamgi me cung pi twero gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ipegeta keda eyaitene mam apotu kodumutu akiro nuajokak, abu amamut aiyalama kiding eswamak kodolok adoketait naepol noi. Kotoma airiamunet na ajai bian, apotu kesi koseutu aibwo kanu apedorosio kec.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'yo o'yozu driceza be 'diyi ma vutia, e'yo azi ngaza ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni ca uru. Mitingi 'bani 'ye aje inisi ri ma alea, eyi 'du e'yo pa tuzu drilemgbo eyivile 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteesa n'abarikukurira ekitongore, tihaine ekyarugiremu, abakozi bakahurira kubi munonga. Omu rukiiko orwabaireho ekiro kya nyomwebazyo, bakasharamu bataine ekiteekateeko kimwe kurwanirira obugabe bwabo.

eng_prompt: The teacher took attendance at the beginning of the class. After calling out each name, she noted who was missing.
lug_prompt: Omusomesa yajja ku ntandikwa y'ekibiina. Oluvannyuma lw'okuyita amannya ga buli omu, yawandiika ani eyali abuze.
ach_prompt: Lapwony ocako kwan I acaki me kilac. Inge lwongo nying ngat acel acel, en ocoyo anga ma orweny.
teo_prompt: Abu esisianakinan kijaik asioman ageunet naka atukot. Akaulo na anyaraun ekiror kanginitunganan, abu ngesi kiwadik itunganan yenemamei.
lgg_prompt: Embapi 'du 'ba emu'ba kilasi 'da ma alea 'diyi kilasi e'doria. Erini 'ba alu alu ma ru omvezu 'bori ma vutia, eri si 'ba avipiri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omwegyesa akatandika kwejumba aha kutandika kwa kiraasi. Bwanyima y'okugamba amaziina ga buri omwe, akareeba owabuzire.

eng_prompt: In an effort to streamline decision-making and foster collaboration, the organization decided to hold an exclusive gathering. Invitations were carefully curated to ensure that only key leaders would participate in the discussions.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okwanguya okusalawo n'okutumbula enkolagana, ekitongole kyasalawo okukuba olukiiko olw'enjawulo. Ebiwandiiko ebiyita abantu byakolebwa n'obwegendereza okulaba nti abakulembeze abakulu bokka be beetaba mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo.
ach_prompt: I tute me yubu yoo me moko tam ki dongo ribe, dul ne omoko tamgi me bedo ki kacoke acel keken. Kiyubu lwongo ne maber tutwal me neno ni lutela madongo keken aye gubedo tye I kare me nywako lok.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitigogong aitolomunun aseununeta ka aitopolor aiswamanara, abu erionget kitemok aitolot airiamunet. Aponi kitemokinai ejok aiwororio kanu aanyun ebe engarenok lukapolok bon kes ebeit ajaikin toma oineresinei.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo 'duza ma aza kozu azini ti icita ma omgbo otuzu, amuti 'da 'du e'yo okuta 'ba yi ma eselea ri 'yezu. Ba oti e'yo 'ba omvezu 'diyi geri kililiru si nezu ra kini lu drice'ba okporu 'diyi nga fi e'yo onzeza ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutereeza eby'okucwamu n'okureetaho okukwatanisa, ekitongore kikacwamu kutaho orukiiko rw'omutaano. Okwetwa kukateebwaho n'obwegyendesereza kureeba ngu abebembezi abakuru nibo bonka abaabaire nibaza kwejumba omu kuhanuura.

eng_prompt: To ensure successful outcomes and adherence to deadlines, the management team implemented a rigorous oversight process. Regular updates and evaluations were scheduled to track progress and address any potential issues promptly.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa ebivaamu ebirungi n'okunywerera ku ssalessale, akakiiko akaddukanya kaateekawo enkola ey'obwegendereza ey'okulondoola. Ebipya n'okwetegereza byateekebwawo okulondoola enkulaakulana n'okukola ku nsonga zonna eziyinza okubaawo mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni adwogi tic tye maber ki lubu nino me agiki, ludito tic guketo yub matek tutwal me neno kit ma tic tye kawot kwede. Kimiyo ngec manyen kare ki kare me neno kit ma tic tye kawot kwede ki me tyeko peko mo keken ma twero bedo tye oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe iswamao ejok kosodete aitodolikin apaarasia, abu eyaitene kitolomu ainapeta nuka aimaniman. Aponi kitemokinai aisiteteun ka airereonor akiro kanu aanyanar apol ka aitemokin atiokisio atipet.
lgg_prompt: Aa'zu e'yo drile suzaru azini o'du asizuri ma vuti obizu, amuti driceza niri 'ba geri okporu azi pamvu onezu 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. Ba o'ba o'dukoti eyi o'diru azini e'yo eti ondaza eyi sa'wa driasi angu ezoma ma pamvu onezu azini e'yo ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma aza kozu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu ebyarugire omu bigyezo nibibaho kurungi, tiimu y'abebembezi ekataho engyenderwaho y'amaani. Ebirikukwata aha nshonga n'okushwijuma ebyakozirwe, bikatebwaho okurondoora entunguuka n'okukora aha nshonga zoona ezirikubaasa kubaho ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Despite promising significant reforms and improvements, the political leaders failed to deliver on their commitments. As a result, many constituents felt betrayed and disillusioned with the leadership.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baasuubiza enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi, abakulembeze b'ebyobufuzi baalemererwa okutuukiriza obweyamo bwabwe. N'ekyavaamu, abalonzi bangi baawulira nga baliddwamu olukwe era nga baweddemu amaanyi olw'obukulembeze.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gucikke me kelo aloka-loka mapol, lutela me cungu iwi-bye ne pe gucobo cike gi. Macalo adwogi ne, lubol kwir mapol guwinyo calo ki cato wigi dok cwiny gi pe obedo yom I kom tela ne.
teo_prompt: Karaida isumunitos kesi aijulanakineta, apotu engarenok luka politikis ipikosi aitodolikin aisumuneta kec. Kanuka ngun, apotu itunga luipu luka atutubetekec opuputu ebe etwaniaritai kesi ido apotu itakadikisi kesi keda engarenone.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro owizu ojata okporu azini otuta ma dria ra ti, drice'ba politiki ni 'diyi awini e'yo yini owizu 'diyi 'ye ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba angu opi nyazani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma karakara eyi ega kini 'ba o'di eyi dri azini eyi ma asi eza e'yo driceza ni 'diyisi ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuraganisa empindahinduka n'okutunguuka, abebembezi b'eby'obutegyeki bakaremwa kuhikiiriza ebibaraganiise. N'ekyarugiremu, abajwekyerwa baingi bakahurira ngu obwebembezi bukabareebya kandi bukabamara amaani.

eng_prompt: In recent years, numerous investigations have revealed widespread misconduct within various government agencies. As a result, public trust in leadership has significantly eroded.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okunoonyereza okungi kuzudde emize emibi mu bitongole bya gavumenti eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, obwesige bw'abantu mu bukulembeze bukendedde nnyo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, kwed mapol onyuto tim maraco mapol tutwal I dul mapat-pat pa gamente. Macalo adwogi ne, gen pa lwak I kom tela ojwik tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apotu aingic naepol kitodu iponesio luarokok kotoma oriongeta lu apugan luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, ekidiokoto amuno naka itunga mama ejaasi engarenok.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo vuti ondaza karakara eyi e'da adriza onzi karakara eyi amuti gamete ni ndundu 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eyi ma asi'baza driceza eyi ma dria ri esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, okucondooza kwingi kworeka emicwe mibi omu bitongore bya gavumenti ebitarikushushana. N'ekyarugiremu, obwesigye bw'abantu omu bwebembezi bukyendeire.

eng_prompt: Despite the extensive promotion and reminders sent out, attendance for the event was surprisingly low. Organizers had hoped for a full house, but the turnout was disappointing.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo okutumbula kungi n'ebijjukizo ebyaweerezebwa, abajja ku mukolo mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa baali batono. Abategesi baali basuubira nti ennyumba ejja kuba ejjudde abantu, naye abantu tebajja.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kicwalo lok angeya mapol me tyelo kor yub eni, wel dano ma obino I yub eni obedo nok tutwal. Luyub onongo gitye ki gen ni ot obi pong, ento wel dano ma obino pe obedo ber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida aponi kitolomunai aisisianakino naepol noi, ikidioko itunga luapotu kojaikinos toma opucit kangol. Aomitos etemonokinak ebe epote itunga ailelebun, konye mam itunga apotu opotu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otuta ni 'diyi ma talasi azini e'yo egaza ni 'diyi ma ti pezu ra ti, 'ba emu'ba omu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma kalafe ndra were. Ba e'yo otupi 'diyi 'ba ndra asi kini jo 'da ma alea 'ba eyi nga ga tre, te 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho okushongyera kw'amaani n'okwijusya okwasindikirwe, abaizire aha mukoro bakaba bakye munonga. Abatebekanisa bakaba nibateekateeka ngu enju neija kwijuza abantu, kwonka abantu bakamaramu amaani.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating for weeks as opposing groups clashed over differing political ideologies. As the election approached, the atmosphere grew increasingly charged, leading to a series of confrontations at the events.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde okumala wiiki eziwera ng'ebibiina ebivuganya birwanagana olw'endowooza z'ebyobufuzi ez'enjawulo. Okulonda bwe kwagenda kusembera, embeera yeeyongera okuba ey'obunkenke, ekyaviirako okulwanagana okw'amaanyi mu biseera ebyo.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede pi cabit mapol tutwal I kare ma dul mapat-pat me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat obedo ka lweny I kingi. Ikare ma yer tye cok, lworo omedde, ma oweko lweny obedo tye ikare me yer ne.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kanu isabitin luipu naarai apotu igurupun luegelegela kongurianata kanu aomisio nuegelegela nuka epolitikis. Neyapiete aseo, abu ejautene kiyatakin, ido abu koyangau ingungeta luipu kotoma opucito kangun.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri e'bi tu sabiti ma alia ekile ongulumu a'di 'dipi yi ma eselea 'diyi ni aco cozu e'yo politiki ni ndundu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo opetaa ni ecazu ogogo ri ma alea, e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra, dika e'yo 'bani eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera kumara esande nyingi, obu guruupu ezitarikushushana zaabaire nizirwanagana ahabw'ebiteekateeko by'eby'obutegyeki ebitarikushushana. Oburuuru ku bwabaire nibuhika haihi, embeera ekaba ey'akabi munonga, ekyarugiremu entongane nyingi aha mikoro egyo.

eng_prompt: After a long winter, the town's infrastructure has taken a beating. Residents are increasingly frustrated with the state of the streets.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'obutiti obuwanvu, ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kibuga bikoseddwa. Abatuuze beeyongedde okunyiiga olw'embeera y'enguudo.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare me koyo piny ma obedo pi kare malac tutwal, gedo me boma ne dong odoko goro tutwal. Lutedero tye ki cwer cwiny pi kit ma gudi tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi naka akwap, apotu iboro luka etaun kibiroros. Mam itunga iyalamasi kanu ejautene lo irotin.
lgg_prompt: O'du ambiza ezu 'bori ma vutia, afa ayuzaru tawuni 'da ma alea 'diyi esu candi ra. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma asi ezaza nzila eyi ma wura si tutu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obwire buraingwa bw'obufuki, ebyombeko by'omururembo bitandikire kuteerwa. Abatuuragye beeyongyeire kuhwa amaani ahabw'embeera y'enguuto.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent project delays, the team felt it was essential to discuss the next steps. They decided that a meeting with the director would be the best way to address their concerns.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kulwawo kwa pulojekiti gyebuvuddeko, ttiimu yawulira nga kya mugaso okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mitendera egiddako. Baasazeewo nti okusisinkana ne dayirekita y'engeri esingayo obulungi ey'okugonjoolamu ebizibu byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki galle pa project ma otime cokcok-ki, dul ne otamo ni pire tek tutwal me nywako tam i kom ngo ma omyero watim. Gumoko tamgi ni rwate ki ladit tic obedo yoo maber loyo me cobo peko gi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aiyap na epurojekt, abu etimu koany ebe ejokuna aitemitem nu ebeit aswam. Apotu kesi itutuboto ebe airiamun keda engarenon erai epone loajokan noi loka aitemokin atiokisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Otita 'da ma sa'wa ezaza ma e'yosi, amuti 'da ega kini eri orodriru agbatara gbazu e'yo drile 'diyi ma dria. Eyi 'du e'yo kini mitingi dricere be ri eri geri muke ndeni eyini ecozu e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyerererwa kwa purogyekiti obwahati, tiimu ekahurira ngu n'eky'omugasho kuhanuura aha ky'okukora. Bakasharamu ngu orukiiko na mukuru nigwo muringo murungi gw'okukora aha nshonga zaabo.

eng_prompt: Despite his passionate speeches and grand promises, many began to doubt his commitment to change. As the months passed, it became clear that his actions did not align with his ambitious goals.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko okwogera kwe okw'amaanyi n'ebisuubizo ebinene, bangi baatandika okubuusabuusa obumalirivu bwe obw'okukyusa. Emyezi bwe gyagenda giyitawo, kyeyoleka bulungi nti ebikolwa bye byali tebikwatagana na biruubirirwa bye.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en oloko ki mit kom dok ocikke me timo jami mabeco, dano mapol ocako bedo ki akala-kala I kom cikke ne me kelo aloka-loka. Ikare ma dwe okato, nen atyer kamaleng ni tim mege pe orwatte ki miti ne.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi ngesi keda einer loajokan noi keda aisumuneta nuapolok, apotu itunga luipu kongicata ainakina ke naka aijulakin. Kapak kana atuboros ilapio, abu kotakanu ebe mam aswamisioke arucokina keda apeleikinata ke.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro e'yo nzezu ava be azini e'yo owizu okporu 'diyi ma talasi ra ti, 'ba karakara e'do e'yo ega asi 'baza erini ojata 'yezu ri ma dria ku. Mba yini agazu 'boria, eca e'da kililiru kini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi awini yi eci e'yo erini le 'ye 'diyi be ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okugamba kwe okw'omuhimbo hamwe n'ebiraganiso bye eby'omutaano, baingi bakatandika kubanganisa okwehayo kwe kuhinduka. Emyezi ku yaahingwireho, kikarebeka butunu ngu ebikorwa bye bikaba bitarikuhikaana n'ebigyendererwa bye.

eng_prompt: After weeks of delays due to bad weather, the construction crew finally arrived on site. The community had been eagerly waiting for the road to be completed.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga balwawo olw'embeera y'obudde embi, abakozi b'okuzimba kyaddaaki baatuuka mu kifo we baali bazimba. Abantu babadde balindirira n'essanyu okuggwa kw'oluguudo.
ach_prompt: Ingee gale pa cabit mapol pi peko me piny, lutic me gedo dong guo I kabedo ne. Lwak gubedo kakuru ki mit kom tyeko yubu gudi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aiyap isabitin luipu kanuka ekuse ka etepe loaronon, apotu itunga luka aduko kodolokisi aiboisit. Auta itunga aidar noi kanu angetakin erot.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia sa'wa ezaza ma e'yosi, 'ba afa si'ba 'diyi eca asizu angu 'da ma alea. Ongulumu 'da ebi nzila 'da te asi driasi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okukyerererwa ahabw'embeera y'obwire embi, abombeki bakahika aha mwanya. Abantu bakaba bategyereize n'ekihika ngu oruguuto ruhende.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and construction, the newly renovated market was finally ready to open its doors. The improvements promised to attract more customers and boost sales for everyone involved.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okuzimba, akatale akapya kaali keetegefu okuggulawo enzigi zaako. Enkulaakulana yasuubiza okusikiriza bakasitoma bangi n'okutumbula eby'okutunda eri buli muntu akwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki gedo, cuk ma ki roco manyen-ni dong tye atera me yabo dogola ne. Yub eni ocikke me kelo luwil mapol ki medo cat pa dano weng matye I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka aiduk, aponi kogwelarai esokoni loitetet. Apotu aitojokareta ngun isumunitos ayangaun agwelak luipu ka aitopolor agwelanar naka iboro.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini eyi sizu 'bori ma vutia, cu 'bani edele o'diru 'da de asizu ngonde jotile ivile 'diyi ma ti zizu. E'yo otuta ni 'diyi owi eyi aje'ba eyi ejizu dika eyi ma oziza ma omgbo otuzu 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyini.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera n'okwombeka,akatare akasya kakaba kateekateekire kwiguraho. Entunguuka ekaraganisa kureetaho abaguzi baingi n'okureetaho entunguuka omu by'obushubuzi.

eng_prompt: Every weekend, vendors from all over the region gather to sell their goods, attracting crowds of eager shoppers. The vibrant atmosphere and diverse offerings make it a must-visit destination for both locals and tourists.
lug_prompt: Buli wiikendi, abasuubuzi okuva mu bitundu byonna bakungaana okutunda ebyamaguzi byabwe, ekisikiriza enkuyanja y'abantu abaagala okugula. Embeera ennungi n'ebintu ebyenjawulo ebirimu bigifuula ekifo ekirina okulambulwa abatuuze n'abalambuzi.
ach_prompt: I tum pa cabit ducu, lucat ma aa ki I but lobo man weng gure me cato jamigi, ma man kelo dano mapol ma mito wilo jami. Kabedo ma dano dwong iye ki jami ma pat pat ma dano miyo weko obedo kabedo ma dano me tedero ki lulim piny omyero gulim.
teo_prompt: Kangolisabiti, etukonokinos agwelanarak kotoma aiboisio kere agwelanar iborokec, ido ingalaunete itunga luipu luekotosi agwelak. Ejautene loejok noi keda iboro luegelegela ijaikini ngin aiboisit naibusakinit itunga luka atutubet keda lu elatok aipejokin.

eng_prompt: The community initiative aimed to improve local resources and support systems. As a result, the positive impact was felt by a wide range of individuals and families.

eng_prompt: After weeks of speculation and public outcry, many are eagerly awaiting an official statement. Concerns over the recent policy changes have prompted numerous inquiries from citizens and advocacy groups alike.

eng_prompt: As I walked through the bustling streets, the vibrant colors and enticing aromas filled the air. It was clear that the local economy thrived on the diverse offerings of small businesses.

lug_prompt: Olw'abavuganya abapya bangi abayingira mu mulimu guno, kigenda kyeyongera okuba ekizibu okwawukana ku balala. N'ekivuddemu, akatale kalimu omugotteko.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been escalating for weeks, and the atmosphere in the city was charged with anger and frustration. As night fell, a group of angry protesters gathered, their shouts echoing through the streets.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde okumala wiiki, era embeera mu kibuga yali ejjudde obusungu n'okunyiiga. Ekiro bwe kyagenda kiyitawo, ekibinja ky'abeekalakaasi abaali banyiize baakuŋŋaana era enduulu zaabwe zaabuna mu nguudo.
