eng_prompt: The community had been buzzing with anticipation for weeks, as the topic of discussion promised to address pressing local issues. As the day approached, interest grew, and it became clear that attendance would be high.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kisuubira okumala wiiki eziwera, ng'omutwe gw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo gwasuubiza okukola ku nsonga z'omu kitundu ez'amangu. Olunaku bwe lwasembera, obwagazi bweyongera era ne kyeyoleka bulungi nti abajja bajja kuba bangi.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki miti madit tutwal pi cabit mapol, pien lok me nywako lok ne ocikke me tyeko lok mapigi tego tutwal I kabedo gi. Ka nino ne woto ki nyiko cok, miti omede, dok nen atyer kamaleng ni wel dano ma obino obedo pol.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi itunga keda aiyalama kanu isabitin luipu, naarai abu akirot naka aineranara isumun aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok noi nuka atutubet. Neyapiete apaaran, apotu itunga luipu opotu, ido aponi kojenunai ebe epote itunga luipu aipejonokin.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi ovu ava be sabiti karakara eyisi, e'yo 'bani e'yo onzezu 'da owi i e'yo okporu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. O'du 'da ni ecazu ogogo risi, ava ni tu ra, dika eri eca e'da kini 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma kalafe ni nga ovu angiri.
nyn_prompt: Abantu babaire bategyereize kumara esande nyingi, ahabw'okugira ngu omutwe gw'okuhanuura gukaba niguraganisa kukora aha nshonga z'omubyaro. Eizooba ku ryahikire, abantu beeyongyeire kukunda, kandi kikarebeka butunu ngu nibaza kubaho baingi.

eng_prompt: In a quiet neighborhood, residents began to notice a rise in suspicious activity late at night. Despite their efforts to stay vigilant, they were unprepared for the wave of crime that would soon unfold.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekisirifu, abatuuze baatandika okwetegereza okweyongerayongera mu bikolwa ebiteeberezebwa ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero. Wadde nga baakola kyonna ekisoboka okusigala nga bali bulindaala, tebaali beetegefu olw'obumenyi bw'amateeka obwali bugenda okubalukawo.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma opye mot, lutedero gucako neno medde pa tim maraco ikare me dyewor. Kadi bed ni guketo tek me bedo ma wanggi twolo, onongo pe guyubbe pi tim aranyi ma onongo cok time.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisit naililingi, apotu itunga luka atutubet kogeutu aanyun ebe iyata aswamisinei nuarokok kware. Karaida apotu kesi iswamata kagogongu, mam kesi akapakina kanuka abilibilio naka ikisila naebuni atakanun.
lgg_prompt: Angu ama agei ri ma alea, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu inisi. Yi ma okpo aa'zu mile be ra ti, eyi awini eyi otu e'yo azita onyoza ni ecapi mbeleru 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka ekirikwetoroora, abatuuragye bakatandika kureeba okweyongyera kw'emirimo etarikwetegyerezibwa nyekiro. Oihireho amaani gaabo g'okwetegyereza, tibarabaasize kweteekateekyera obukozi bw'ebibi obwabaire nibwija kubaho.

eng_prompt: Thanks to the recent infrastructure improvements in our community, we can finally enjoy essential resources. One of the most significant benefits of these upgrades is that we have access to clean water.
lug_prompt: Olw'enkulaakulana eyakolebwa gyebuvuddeko awo mu kitundu kyaffe, tusobodde okufuna ebyetaago ebikulu. Ogumu ku miganyulo emikulu egiri mu kulongoosa kuno kwe kufuna amazzi amayonjo.
ach_prompt: Ki pwoc madit tutwal pi dongo lobo ma otime cokcok-ki I kabedo wa, dong watwero nongo jami ma mitte pi kwo. Magoba acel madit tutwal ma aa ki I yub eni obedo ni watye ki yoo me nongo pii maleng.
teo_prompt: Eyalama noi kanuka aitojokaario naka adukena kotoma atutubetekosi, ipedori oni alelakin iboro luipudasi oni. Adiopet kotoma ajokisio nuepolok noi nuka aitojokaario na akwap ngesi ebe idumuni oni akipi nu elaete.
lgg_prompt: Awa'difo e'yo angu amavile o'diru 'diyi otuzu ongulumu amavileri ma alea risi, ama eco asizu ayiko esu afa orodriru 'diyi si ra. Orodri azi okporu tu otuta 'diyi ma alia ri eri kini ama eco yi ala esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okutunguuka kw'ebyombeko omu kyanga kyaitu, nitubaasa kushemererwa n'ebintu ebikuru. Omwe aha migasho y'amaani ey'okutunguuka oku n'okugira ngu nitubaasa kutunga amaizi marungi.

eng_prompt: After extensive testing and evaluation, the committee submitted their findings to the regulatory body. Following a thorough review, the proposed water standards were put forward for approval.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera ennyo n'okwekenneenya, akakiiko kaawaayo ebizuuliddwa mu kitongole ekirondoola. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obulungi, ebiteeso by'omutindo gw'amazzi byateekebwawo okukakasibwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee pimo ki niang matut, dul enoni ocwalo adwoki me kwedgi bot dul ma doro lok kom yoto kom. Ingee ngiyo lok matut, kiketo cik ma doro lok kom pii I nyim lwak me yee.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainwakio ka airereonor, apotu ekomiti ijaikisi akiro kec nejai atukot naeyait ainapeta. Akaulo naka airereonor ejok, aponi kitolomunai adoketait na akipi kanu aitigogongor.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza angiri ma vutia, komiti 'da fe e'yo eyini esu 'diyi amuti e'yo ndundu eyi onepi 'diyi dri. E'yo eti ondaza kililiru ma vutia, 'ba 'ba e'yo 'bani lezu yi ma dria 'diyi atizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okukyebera munonga n'okushwijuma,akakiiko kakaheereza ebirugiremu omu kitongore ekirikujunanizibwa ahaby'obutegyeki. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma kurungi,ebiteiso by'omutindo gw'amaizi bikateebwaho kwikirizibwa.

eng_prompt: Maintaining good health and well-being is essential for everyone. One important aspect of this is ensuring that we practice proper cleanliness in our daily lives.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma obulamu obulungi n'okubeera obulungi kya mugaso eri buli omu. Ekimu ku bikulu mu kino kwe kufuba okulaba nti tukuuma obuyonjo mu bulamu bwaffe obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Gwoko yotkom ki kwo maber obedo gin ma pire tek pi dano weng. Gin acel ma pire tek ma omyero watim en aye me neno ni wabedo leng ikwo wa.
teo_prompt: Ajaut keda angaleu najokan erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka nginitunganan. Adiopet koboro lu epol ajokis kanu ngun ngesi awanyun ebe iswamaete oni aila kotoma aijar wok naka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Rua ala ma ta mbazu kililiru ri eri orodriru 'ba dria ni. E'yo azi orodriru 'di ma azi ri lezu ama ma ne ra kini ama alata 'ye idri amani o'du driasi 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okuguma oine amagara marungi n'amagara marungi n'eky'omugasho ahari buri omwe. Omuringo gumwe ogw'omugasho omuri eki n'okureeba ngu tukoresa obuyonjo omu magara gaitu aga buriizooba.

eng_prompt: After months of hard work and countless revisions, the team submitted their proposal to the investors. They anxiously awaited a response, hoping for the best.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okukola ennyo n'okukyusaamu okutali kumu, ttiimu yawaayo ekiteeso kyayo eri bamusigansimbi. Baalindirira n'obweraliikirivu okuddamu, nga basuubira ekisinga obulungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tic matek ki yubu jami mapol, dul pa lutim biacara gumiyo tam gi bot luket lim I biyacara. Gu kuru lagam gi ki miti madit tutwal, kun gigeno ni jami bibedo maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aswam kagogong keda aijulanakineta nuipu, apotu etimu ijaikisi aomisioitikec mama ejaasi agwelanarak. Apotu kesi idarakisi abongokinet, aomit ebe ejokuna.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza mba 'diyi ma vutia azini e'yo ojaza karakara 'diyi ma vutia, amuti 'da fe egata yini 'diyi 'ba lonyi vuti alezani 'diyi dri. Eyi te omvita asi driasi asi 'baza be e'yo muke ndeni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'okukora n'amaani n'okugarukamu emirundi mingi, tiimu ekaheereza enteekateeka yaabo aha ba invesita. Bakategyereza eky'okugarukamu, baine amatsiko g'okumanya ekirikukirayo oburungi.

eng_prompt: We conducted the necessary experiments yesterday, and now we are eagerly awaiting the findings. The team is anxious to see how the samples performed under the new conditions.
lug_prompt: Twakoze okugezesa okwetaagisa eggulo, era kati tulindirira n'obwagazi ebizuuliddwa. Ttiimu yeesunga okulaba engeri sampolo gye zaakolamu mu mbeera empya.
ach_prompt: Watimo pim ma mite laworo, dok kombedi watye kakuru adwogi ne. Dul ne tye ki miti madit me neno kit ma jami ma ki nongo ki i komgi gutimo kwede malube ki ngo ma otimme.
teo_prompt: Apotu sio ainwakioto ibian, ido kwana idarit sio akiro nuelomunete. Ekapakina etimu aanyun epone loeswamata ainwakio kotoma ojautene loitetet.
lgg_prompt: A'ye aje e'yo 'bani ecozu e'yo eyi 'yezu ra 'diyi ra, dika ama te e'yo 'bani esu 'diyi te avasi. Amuti 'da le saaru ndre e'yo afa 'bani o'bi eyi ma rua 'diyi 'yepi geri o'diru 'diyi ma alea ri.
nyn_prompt: Tukakora okukyebera okurikwetengwa nyomwebazyo, kandi hati twine ekihika ky'okutegyereza ebirugyemu. Tiimu eine ekihika ky'okureeba oku eby'okukyeberwa byakozire omu mbeera ensya.

eng_prompt: As the number of patients continues to rise, healthcare providers are struggling to keep up with the demand for accurate diagnoses. In order to effectively manage the situation, the hospitals need more testing equipment.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde gweyongera okulinnya, abasawo balwana okutuukana n'obwetaavu bw'okuzuula obulwadde obutuufu. Okusobola okuddukanya obulungi embeera, amalwaliro geetaaga ebyuma ebirala ebikebera.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel lutwo tye kamede kwede, lutic yoto kom tye ka tute matek me bedo ki miti me nongo yat matir. Me tic maber i kom peko eni, odi yadi omyero gubed ki jami me pim mapol.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka adekak, eutasi imurok luka angaleu ainingosit aitodolikin eipuda lo aingic adekasinei. Kanu aitikitik ejok ejautene, ekotosi adekisia iboro luipu lu inwakere.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azoru 'diyiniri ni mu drile turia, 'ba arojo'a 'diyi dri ci e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba ma esu azo kililiru ri be. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu kililiru, arojo eyi le afa 'bani azo eyi o'bizu 'diyi ma azi eyi ma omgbo ra.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire nigugumizamu nigweyongyera, abashaho nibarwana kugumizamu n'omuhendo gw'abarwaire abarikwetenga okukyeberwa kurungi. Okubaasa kukora kurungi aha nshonga egi, amarwariro nigetenga ebikwato by'okukyebera.

eng_prompt: Access to clean drinking water is essential for maintaining public health. Unfortunately, many communities around the world still rely on contaminated sources for their water supply.
lug_prompt: Okufuna amazzi amayonjo ag'okunywa kya mugaso mu kukuuma obulamu bw'abantu. Eky'omukisa omubi, ebitundu bingi okwetooloola ensi bikyesigama ku nsibuko z'amazzi embi.
ach_prompt: Nongo pii maleng me amata pire tek tutwal pi gwoko yot kom pa lwak. Ki gum marac, kabedo mapol I wilobo lung pud gijenge I kom kabedo ma obale pi pii gi.
teo_prompt: Adumunun akipi nu elaete ejok kanu aidar angaleu na itunga. Nukaiturur, itunga luipu kotoma akwap kere eringa itwasamaete akipi nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Yi mvuza ala esuzu ri eri orodriru e'yo alata o'bi eyini ri ma tambazu. Drile onziru, ongulumu karakara wudrikuru ma kalasi 'diyi nga po'di yi esu engazu angu ondiru 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga amaizi marungi g'okunywa n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda amagara g'abantu. Eky'obusaasi, abantu baingi omunsi yoona, nibagyendera aha burugo bw'amaizi bubi.

eng_prompt: Typhoid fever is a serious bacterial infection that primarily spreads through contaminated food and water. If left untreated, it can lead to severe complications.
lug_prompt: Omusujja gwa typhoid bulwadde bwa bakitiriya obw'obulabe obusinga okusaasaana mu mmere n'amazzi amafu. Bwe kitajjanjabibwa, kiyinza okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Two typhoid obedo two marac tutwal ma kwidi ma kelo ma nya tutwalle ki cam ki pii ma obale. Ka pe ki cango, twero kelo peko madongo.
teo_prompt: Erai eimidi loka typhoid adeka naepol noi na ikopas keda inyamat keda akipi nu ekorono. Arai mam imukia, epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Azo typhoid fever niri eri azo azi onzikanyaru omvele bacteria ru ni i erepi tuni geri nyaka azini yi ondiru 'diyisi. Ba ka eri ku aro kokoru, eri eco e'yo onzi 'diyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Omushwija gwa typhoid n'oburwaire bw'amaani oburikukira kujanjaara kurabira omu by'okurya n'amaizi mabi. Kyaba kitarikutambirwa, nikibaasa kureeta oburemeezi bw'amaani.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing number of displaced individuals, the government has implemented policies to ensure that all refugees receive necessary medical care. As part of these initiatives, various health programs have been established to support their well-being.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abantu abanoonyiboobubudamu ogweyongera, gavumenti etaddewo enkola okulaba nga abanoonyiboobubudamu bonna bafuna obujjanjabi obwetaagisa. Ng'omu ku nteekateeka zino, pulogulaamu z'ebyobulamu ez'enjawulo zitandikiddwawo okuwagira obulungi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel luring ayela, gamente oketo cik me neno ni luring ayela weng gunongo kony me yot kom ma mite. Macalo but yub magi, ki kati ki yub mapat-pat me yot-kom me konyo kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin enaaba loepol loka ikerai, etolomu apugan ainapeta nu awanyun ebe ikerai kere edumununete amukian na ekotoi. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, etolomun ainapeta nuka angaleu nuegelegela kanu aigang aijar kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo kalafe 'ba emunyaleru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, gamete 'ba azita eyi nezu ra kini emunyale dria eyi aro esu ra. Otita 'diyi ma azi ru, 'ba e'do otita ndu ndu e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi atita fezu eyi ma aa'ta muke ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'empungi ogweyongyeire, gavumenti eteireho ebiragiro by'okureeba ngu empungi zoona zitunga obujanjabi oburikwetengwa. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka ezi, enteekateeka z'eby'amagara ezitarikushushana zitandikirweho okubangira.

eng_prompt: Regular inspections of the water supply system revealed several issues. As a result, it was determined that some boreholes need maintenance work.
lug_prompt: Okulambula enkola y'amazzi okwa buli kaseera kwazudde ebizibu ebiwerako. N'ekyavaamu, kyasalibwawo nti nnayikondo ezimu zeetaaga okuddaabirizibwa.
ach_prompt: Bedo ka ngiyo kit ma pii tye kawot kwede kare ki kare onyuto peko mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, kimoko ni tangi mukene mito yubu gi.
teo_prompt: Aanyanar duc ewai lo akipi abu kitodu atiokisio nuipu. Kanuka ngun, aponi kojenunai ebe ekotos agilon ace aitemonokino.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi awaza ma ale andrita sawa driasi ri isu e'yo eyi karakara. E'yo 'disi, 'ba esu kini bowaholu azi 'diyi le azi edeza ra.
nyn_prompt: Okukyebera emifuregye y'amaizi buri kaire, kikareetaho oburemeezi bwingi. N'ekyarugiremu, kikashangwa ngu za naikondo ezimwe nizetenga kugarurwa busya.

eng_prompt: The community has been struggling with severe drought conditions for months. As a result, many families are facing a critical shortage of essential resources.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kirwanagana n'embeera y'ekyeya okumala emyezi. N'ekivuddemu, amaka mangi goolekaganye n'ebbula ly'ebintu ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka lweny ki peko me ceng pi dwe mapol. Macalo adwogi, gangi mapol tye ki peko me can jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Etereikina itunga keda akamu naepol noi adaun ilapio. Kanuka ngun, ejaas ikalia luipu keda ekadakada loka iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi dri ci ozo okporu 'diyisi imba eyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, familia karakara eyi e'yo afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi ma ako ni esu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu batwire nibarwanagana n'ekyanda kumara ameezi maingi. N'ekyarugiremu, amaka maingi nigatunga eibura ry'ebintu by'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Several members of the community have been experiencing severe gastrointestinal symptoms. After consulting with local health officials, it was confirmed that they are suffering from typhoid.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi mu kitundu babadde bafuna obubonero obw'amaanyi mu byenda. Oluvannyuma lw'okwebuuza ku bakungu b'ebyobulamu mu kitundu, kyakakasibwa nti balina obulwadde bwa typhoid.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol I kabedo eni gubedo ka nongo lanyut marac tutwal I kom ic. Inge lok ki lutic yoto kom me tedero, kimoko ni gitye ki two typhoid.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu kotoma atutubet ejaasi keda aanyuneta nuarokok nuikamunitos akoik. Akaulo naka aingitun eswamak lu adekis, aponi itigogongorai ebe ejaas kesi keda adeka naka typhoid.
lgg_prompt: Ba kalafe angiri ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi e'da e'da e'da e'da e'dapi 'diyi esu. E'yo nzezu azi'ba arojo ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie 'bori ma vutia, 'ba esu eyi dri ci azo typhoid nirisi.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi omu kyanga batwire nibatunga obubonero bw'amaani omu byenda. Bwanyima y'okwebuuza aha bakuru b'ebyamagara, kikahamibwa ngu baine oburwaire bwa typhoid.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing demand for advanced medical services, the hospital administration decided to enhance its capabilities. As a result, they allocated additional funds for upgrading the facility's resources.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi obw'omulembe, abaddukanya eddwaliro baasalawo okutumbula obusobozi bwalyo. N'ekyavaamu, baateekawo ensimbi endala okutumbula ebyetaago by'eddwaliro.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo kony me yot kom ma rwom gi malo, ludito me ot yat gumoko tamgi me medo kero gi. Macalo adwogi ne, gimiyo cente mukene me ilo malo rwom me tic pa ot yat.
teo_prompt: Kanuka eipud loepol noi loka amukian, abu eyaitene lo adekis kitogogong apedoroke. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi ijaikisi ikapun icie kanu aitojokar iboro lu adekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, driceza arojo 'da niri asi e'yo 'du arojo 'da ma okpo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, eyi 'ba robia azi dika afa ayuzaru arojo 'da ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara, abarikukurira eirwariro bakasharamu kwongyera aha bushoboorozi bwaryo. N'ekyarugiremu, bakongyera esente z'okutunguura eby'okukoresa omu irwariro.

eng_prompt: Creating a welcoming environment is essential for fostering a sense of belonging. It is important to recognize the challenges refugees face and support their integration into the community.
lug_prompt: Okutondawo embeera ey'okwaniriza kikulu nnyo mu kukuza enneewulira y'okubeerawo. Kya mugaso okumanya ebisoomooza abanoonyiboobubudamu bye basanga n'okubayamba okwegatta mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Yubu kabedo me jolo dano pire tek tutwal pi dongo cwiny me bedo dano acel. Pire tek tutwal me niang peko ma luring ayela nongo ki dok me konyo gi me donyo I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Aitolomun aiboisit na isiyalamikit itunga erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor eipud loka itunga. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun atiokisio nuetereikina keda ikerai ka aingarakin kesi aimorikikin keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'bani 'ba eyi ai'zu ri ma edeta eri orodriru aa'ta eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo otuzu. Eri orodriru e'yo ewaru emunyale eyini esu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu azini atita fezu eyini aa'zu ongulumu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Okureetaho embeera erikwakiira abantu n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho okwetegyereza. N'eky'omugasho kumanya oburemeezi obu empungi zirikurabamu n'okuziyamba kwegaita aha bantu.

eng_prompt: In response to the escalating conflict and humanitarian crisis, governments and organizations have mobilized resources. As a result, temporary shelters have been established to accommodate those fleeing violence and persecution.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula entalo n'obwetaavu bw'abantu obweyongera, gavumenti n'ebitongole bikungaanyizza ebyetaago. N'ekivuddemu, ebifo eby'okusulamu eby'akaseera obuseera biteekeddwawo okusuza abo abadduka effujjo n'okuyigganyizibwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lweny matye kamede ki peko me konyo dano, gamente ki dule mapat-pat gu jogo kony. Macalo adwogi ne, gityeko yubu kabedo pi tutunu pi jo ma oringo tim gero ki aunauna.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ingungeta lu iyatakinos keda atiokisio nu itunga, apugan keda iriongeta luipu atukutu iboro. Kanuka ngun, adukun aiboisio nuka apak naedit kanu aidar ngul luekerete kotoma amumu keda aiticanio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu tualu e'yo ewaru o'bi eyini fe 'diyi pie, gamete eyi tualu amuti eyi pie tra afa ayuzaru 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'do angu 'ba eyini aa'zu sa'wa were si 'diyi 'ba eyini apazu e'yo ngiringiri ni azini ecandiza ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti hamwe n'ebitongore bitungire eby'okukoresa ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, amaju g'obwire bukye gatandikirweho okureeberera abo abarikuhunga obwimukiriro n'okuhiiganisibwa.

eng_prompt: In many rural communities, access to clean water is a daily challenge. As a result, residents often rely on traditional sources for their water supply.

eng_prompt: As the congregation gathered in the dimly lit church, a sense of anticipation filled the air. The pastor stepped up to the pulpit, ready to share a message that would resonate deeply with everyone present.

ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak gucokke I ot lega ma mac pe ryeny maber tutwal, cwinygi obedo yom tutwal. Lapwony dini ocito iwi kom, ma oyubbe me nywako kwena ma dano weng ma gubedo tye guwinyo.

eng_prompt: Many athletes have chosen to settle in Uganda's vibrant capital. This city has become a hub for sports and culture, attracting talent from various regions.
lug_prompt: Abazannyi b'emizannyo bangi basazeewo okusenga mu kibuga ekikulu ekya Uganda. Ekibuga kino kifuuse ekifo ky'ebyemizannyo n'ebyobuwangwa, ekisikiriza ebitone okuva mu bitundu eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Lungwec mapol oyero me bedo I boma madit me Uganda. Boma madit man odoko kabedo me tuku ki tekwaro ma oywayo dano ma gitye ki diro ki I but lobo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Aseutu akerak luipu aiboi toma oibuga lokapolon loko Uganda. Araun esite lo aiboisit na aboliasio ka inonosio, ido ingalauni itunga luejaasi keda atalanta kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ba ongu onzu'ba karakara 'diyi pe eyi aa'zu aku ambo kari Uganda niri ma alea. Aku ambo 'diri eca curu'do pari avita ni azini e'yo suruni 'diyiniri ru, erini feta Munguni fe 'diyi ejizu engazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abairuki baingi bacwiremu kutuura omu kibuga ekikuru ekya Uganda. Orurembo oru ruhindukire omwanya gw'eby'emizaano hamwe n'eby'obuhangwa, ekirikureeta etaraanta kuruga omu bicweka bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: After months of discussions and debates about the future direction of the organization, the members gathered for a crucial vote. The atmosphere was charged with anticipation as everyone prepared to make their voices heard.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri ekibiina gye kirina okutambulamu mu biseera eby'omu maaso, bammemba baakuŋŋaana okulonda okw'amaanyi. Embeera yabaddemu okweraliikirira nga buli omu yeetegekera okuwulira eddoboozi lye.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me nywako lok ki laro lok I kom yoo me tic pa dul enoni I kare me anyim, lumemba gucokke pi bolo kwir ma pire tek tutwal. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma dano weng tye ka yubbe me winyo dwon gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemitem keda epeget loikamunit epone loebeitor atukot ngin aswam koingaren, apotu imeban kotukokinos kanu aseo naepol noi. Ajaasi itunga keda eipud loepol noi naarai apotu itunga kere itemonokinos aitodiar iporotoikec.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani agbatara gbazu azini agbatara gbazu driceza amuti 'da ni ewu drialeri ma alea ri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, memba eyi tra eyi voti 'bezu e'yo okporu ni ma dria. Angu 'da ma alea 'ba eyi ndra ayikosi 'ba dria eyini eyi otuzu o'duko eyivile 'diyi erizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuhanuura n'okuhanuura aha ntwaza y'ekitongore omu biro by'omumaisho, abanyakibiina baketeeranira hamwe kuteera akaruuru k'amaani. Abantu bakaba bashemereirwe munonga, buri omwe arikweteekateekyera kworeka eiraka rye.

eng_prompt: In light of recent financial discrepancies, it is essential to ensure transparency in our organization's funding. To maintain trust and integrity, we must implement measures for financial oversight.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ensimbi obubaddewo gye buvuddeko, kikulu nnyo okuba abeerufu mu kuwa ekitongole kyaffe ensimbi. Okusobola okukuuma obwesige n'obwesimbu, tulina okuteekawo enkola y'okulondoola ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me lim ma otimme cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal me neno ni lok ada tye I kom lim ma dul megwa tye kwede. Me gwoko gen ki ber bedo, omyero waket yoo me doro tic ki lim I tic.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun, ejokuna noi awanyun ebe ejai aica kotoma aijaario naka ikapun luka erionget wok. Kanu aidar amuno keda asipokina, ekot oni aitegear iwaitin lu eanyanarere ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo esele coza robia ma alia o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru ndrezu kini e'yo ada amuti amavile 'di ma robia ma alia ci. Asi'baza azini e'yo ada ma ta mbazu, le ama ma 'ba geri e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma pamvu onezu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'esente obwakyerereirwe, niky'omugasho okureeba ngu hariho amazima omu ntatsya y'ekitongore kyaitu. Kubaasa kuguma twine obwesigye n'oburingaaniza, twine kutaho oburyo bw'okureeberera esente.

eng_prompt: With a keen interest in innovation and collaboration, he has taken on various roles within the organization. His diverse skill set allows him to contribute effectively across different initiatives.
lug_prompt: Olw'okwagala ennyo okuyiiya n'okukolagana, abadde n'emirimu egy'enjawulo mu kitongole. Obukugu bwe obw'enjawulo bumuyamba okukola obulungi emirimu egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Ki miti madit tutwal I kom diro manyen ki ribbe, en otimo tic mapat-pat I dul ne. Diro mege ma pat pat ma en tye kwede weko en miyo kony maber tutwal I yub mapat-pat mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Keda eipud loepol noi loka aitolomunun iboro keda aiswamanara, eyangarit ngesi aswamisinei nuegelegela kotoma atukot kangin. Iwaitin luegelegela lu ejaas ngesi ingarakinete ngesi aswam ejok kotoma aswamisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Erini ava angiri be e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma dria azini ti icita ma dria, eri 'du azi ndundu eyi amuti 'da ma alea. Ondua erini 'diyi fe erini azi ngazu kililiru e'yo ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda munonga okujumbura n'okukwatanisa, atwire emirimo mingi omu kitongore. Emyoga ye etarikushushana neemuhwera kukora kurungi omu mirimo etari emwe.

eng_prompt: In a recent address to the nation, the president outlined his vision for the future. He emphasized the importance of transparency and communication with the public.
lug_prompt: Mu kwogera kwe gye buvuddeko eri eggwanga, pulezidenti yalambika ekirooto kye eky'ebiseera eby'omu maaso. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'obwerufu n'okuwuliziganya n'abantu.
ach_prompt: I lok ma en oloko cokcok-ki bot lwak me lobo man, ladit lobo otito kit ma en neno kwede anyim. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa bedo ki ada ki lok ki lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oinerikec mama ejaasi akwap, abu lokapolon akwap kitetem aomisioitike nuka oingaren. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aica ka einer keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza erini o'diru kari dri, prisdent ece egata erini ewu drialeri ma dria ri ra. Eri fe okpo orodri e'yo ada ni azini e'yo nzeza o'bi yi be ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugamba kwe ahari ihanga, omwebembezi w'eihanga akashoborora enteekateeka ye y'ebiro bya nyensya. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'oburingaaniza n'empurizagana n'abantu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, Uganda has become a major destination for displaced individuals seeking safety and stability. Among its regions, Arua stands out for its significant influx of refugees.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, Uganda efuuse ekifo ekikulu eky'abanoonyiboobubudamu abanoonya obukuumi n'obutebenkevu. Mu bitundu byayo, Arua yeeyolekera olw'okuyingira kw'abanoonyiboobubudamu okunene.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, Uganda odoko kabedo ma dano mapol ma orwenyo gangi gi ka yenyo gwok ki ber bedo tye iye. I kin but lobo mapat-pat manonge I iye, Arua tye ki luring ayela mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, eraun Uganda aiboisit naepol noi na elosete ikerai lu ekotosi ayuwara ka ainapakina. Kotoma aiboisio, erai Arua aiboisit naepol noi na ikerai.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, kari Uganda niri eca angu okporu 'ba 'bani ofu angu eyivile 'diyi ma alea ageitema azini asianzu ndapi 'diyini. Angu erini 'diyi ma eselea, Arua ni e'da e'yo emunyale eyini emuzu angu 'da ma alea ri si.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, Uganda ehindukire omwanya muhango gw'okufurukiramu abantu abarikuronda oburinzi n'obutebekana. Omu byanga byaayo, Arua neshangwa ahabw'empungi nyingi.

eng_prompt: I had high hopes for his performance after hearing so many positive reviews. Unfortunately, he fell short in several key areas.
lug_prompt: Nnalina essuubi ddene mu mutindo gwe oluvannyuma lw'okuwulira ebirungi bingi. Eky'ennaku, yalemererwa mu bintu ebikulu ebiwerako.
ach_prompt: Abedo ki gen madit tutwal I kom kit ma en otimo kwede I nge winyo lok mabeco mapol. Ki gum marac, en opoto piny I kabedo mapol mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi eong keda amuno naepol noi kanu eswamae ke akaulo naka aipup akiro nuejokuka. Nukaiturur abu ngesi ibiror kotoma aiboisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Asi 'baza angiri ndra avita eri vileri ma dria erini e'yo o'dukoti onyiru 'diyi erizu 'bori ma vutia. Drile onziru, eri e'de angu okporu 'diyi ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Nkaba nyine amatsiko maingi aha kukora kwe ahanyima y'okuhurira ebirikukwata aha kukora gye kwe. Eky'obusaasi, akaremwa omu bintu bikuru bingi.

eng_prompt: After years of neglect, the once-bumpy path had finally undergone a much-needed transformation. Local officials announced the completion of the long-awaited road improvement project.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'emyaka gy'okulagajjalirwa, ekkubo eryali eririmu ebinnya lyali lifunye enkyukakyuka eyali yeetaagibwa ennyo. Abakungu b'ebyalo baalangiridde okumaliriza pulojekiti y'okutereeza enguudo ebadde erindiriddwa okumala ebbanga.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me cayo yoo ne, yoo macon ma onongo tye ki bur tutwal-li dong okato ki aloka-loka ma mite tutwal. Lutela me tedero guwaco ni yub me yubu gudi ma kibedo kakuru pi kare malac dong otum.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu lu apalunitere, abu erot loajaasi keda iboro luipu kodum aijulanakineta nuipudai noi. Apotu eswamak luka atutubet kolimosi angetakin epurojekt lo idaritere irotin.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani adizu 'bori ma vutia, geri andra okporu 'da isu asizu ojata 'bani le saaru ri ra. Azi'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi azi e'yo 'bani otita nzila eyi edezu sa'wa ezu ri dezu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okunagaijura,omuhanda ogwabaire gurimu ebiina gukahindurwa. Abakungu b'ebyaro bakarangirira okuhendera kwa purogyekiti y'okutereeza enguuto.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, transparency and responsibility are essential for maintaining trust between the government and its citizens. As such, elected officials must ensure that their actions align with the needs and expectations of the people they serve.
lug_prompt: Mu demokulasiya, obwerufu n'obuvunaanyizibwa bikulu mu kukuuma obwesige wakati wa gavumenti ne bannansi baayo. N'olw'ekyo, abakungu abalonde balina okukakasa nti ebikolwa byabwe bikwatagana n'ebyetaago n'ebisuubirwa by'abantu be baweereza.
ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, bedo ki ada ki tic maber pire tek tutwal pi gwoko gen ikin gamente ki anywali ne. Kit meno, lutic ma kiyero gi omyero gunen ni timgi tye malube ki miti ki miti pa dano ma gitiyo pigi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naejaasi keda aseo naka itunga, aica keda aswam ejok kanu aidar amunokina kiding apugan keda itungake. Kwape kwape kangun, ekot eswamak lu eseunitai awanyun ebe iswamaete kesi kotupitete ipudesia keda aomisio nuka itunga lu ijanakinete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu democratia ni ma alia, e'yo ada azini e'yo 'yeza kililiru ri eri orodriru asi'baza ma tambazu gamete ma eselea 'ba kari ni 'diyi pie. Ekile 'dileri le, le azi'ba 'bani ope 'diyi ma ne ra kini e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi aa e'yo 'ba eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ni le azini afa eyini ega 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, amazima n'obujunaanizibwa n'eby'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obwesigye ahagati ya gavumenti n'abantu baayo. N'ahabw'ekyo, abakuru abaronzirwe bashemereire kureeba ngu ebikorwa byabo nibihikaana n'ebyetengo n'ebyetengo by'abantu abu barikuheereza.

eng_prompt: The nearest medical facility is over an hour away, making it difficult for residents to access timely healthcare. As a result, many villagers have expressed their concerns about the lack of medical services in our community.
lug_prompt: Eddwaliro erisinga okumpi liri mu bbanga erisukka mu ssaawa emu okuva wano, ekikaluubiriza abatuuze okufuna obujjanjabi mu budde. N'ekivuddemu, abantu b'omu byalo bangi balaze obweraliikirivu bwabwe olw'ebbula ly'obujjanjabi mu kitundu kyaffe.
ach_prompt: Ot yat matye cok tye I bor piny me cawa acel, ma oweko obedo tek tutwal ki lutedero me nongo kony me yot kom ikare ki kome. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero mapol gunyutu lworo gi i kom bedo peke pa kony me yot kom ikabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Adekis na eyapie ejai aiboisit na edeparit esawa ediope, einakini ationis nejaas itunga adumun amukian kotoma apak. Kanuka ngun, itunga luipu lukocaloi itodunitos aiyalongongokec kanu amamus na amukian katutubetekosi.
lgg_prompt: Pari arojo eyini aa'zu ri ma angu aa'zu sa'wa alu ma drilea, e'yo 'di ni fe ewaru 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini aro esuzu sa'wa dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba calua 'diyi ece asi otiza yini e'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyiniri ma ako ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Eirwariro eririkuri haihi n'ery'eshaaha erikuhinguraho, ekirikugumira abatuuragye kutunga obujanjabi omu bwire. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baingi boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'eibura ry'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara omukyanga kyabo.

eng_prompt: I wanted to check in regarding the concerns you raised last week. We are following up on the issue.
lug_prompt: Njagala kumanya ebikweraliikiriza bye wayogedde wiiki ewedde. Tugoberera ensonga.
ach_prompt: Amito niang I kom par ma I loko I komgi I cabit ma okato. Watye ka lubu kor lok ne.
teo_prompt: Akoto eong aanyun nuikamunitos aiyalongongosi kon osabiti je. Iuta sio atupakinit akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ale andri e'yo mini nze sabiti ajerisi 'diyi ma dria ra. Ama e'yo nde ma vuti obiria.
nyn_prompt: Nkaba niinyenda kumanya ebikwatiraine n'ebi waagambire esande ehweire. Turiyo nitukuratira enshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: The initiative was designed to enhance educational resources and support for learners. By focusing on their needs, the project aims to create a more effective learning environment.
lug_prompt: Enteekateeka yakolebwa okutumbula ebyetaago by'ebyenjigiriza n'obuyambi eri abayizi. Mu kussa essira ku byetaago byabwe, pulojekiti eruubirira kutondawo embeera y'okusoma ennungi.
ach_prompt: Yub eni kiyubu me ilo malo rwom me kwan ki kony ki lutino kwan. I keto cwiny I kom miti gi, yub eni tye ki miti me kelo kabedo maber me kwan.
teo_prompt: Aponi kitemokinai aswamisioit ngin kanu aitojokar iboro lu asioman ka agangat nejaas esisiak. Kowai lo apodokinit ipudesia kec, ekot epurojekt aitolomun aiboisit na isisiaet na ejok.
lgg_prompt: Ba oti e'yo 'di afa onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu sukulu anzi eyini. Otita 'da ni asi 'bazu afa eyini le 'diyi ma dria ri lezu angu onita ni muke ndeni ri edezu.
nyn_prompt: Enteekateeka ekaba etebekanisiibwe kutunguura eby'obwegyese n'obuhwezi bw'abeegi. Omu kuta amaani ahabyetaago byabo, purogyekiti negyenderera kureetaho embeera nungi y'okwega.

eng_prompt: Life is filled with obstacles that test our resilience and adaptability. From personal struggles to societal pressures, individuals navigate a complex landscape each day.
lug_prompt: Obulamu bujjudde ebizibu ebigezesa obugumu bwaffe n'obusobozi bwaffe okukyusakyusa. Okuva ku lutalo lw'obuntu okutuuka ku kunyigirizibwa kw'ekitundu, abantu batambulira mu mbeera enzibu buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Kwo opong ki peko ma temo kerowa me lweny ki peko. Cako I kom peko ma ngat acel acel tye kwede me oo I kom lyeto ma lwak tye kwede, dano acel-acel nongo peko mapol nino ki nino.
teo_prompt: Ileleba aijar keda atiokisio nu inwakunete apedorit wok. Anyoun kotoma atiokisio nuka itunganan kitoni aijar naka itunga, itunga itereikina keda aiboisio nuetioko kanginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Idri ga e'yo ewaru ecopi ama ma okpo azini e'yo amani eco 'ye ra 'diyi pie tre. E'dozu e'yo eyi ma ngulupi ni 'diyisi kpere e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi pie, 'ba eyi aa e'yo ewaru eyi ma alea o'du driasi.
nyn_prompt: Amagara gaijwire oburemeezi oburikugyeza amaani gaitu n'okubaasa kwaitu. Kuruga aha buremeezi bw'omuntu kuhisya aha kugyemeserezibwa kw'abantu, abantu nibashanga oburemeezi burizooba.

eng_prompt: In search of better grazing lands and more favorable weather conditions, the nomadic tribe prepared for their annual journey. With their belongings packed and the herds ready, they set out at dawn.
lug_prompt: Mu kunoonya ettaka ly'amalundiro eddungi n'embeera y'obudde ennungi, ekika ky'abanoonyiboobubudamu kyetegekera olugendo lwabwe olwa buli mwaka. Nga basitudde ebintu byabwe era nga n'ebisibo byetegefu, baasitula ku makya.
ach_prompt: I yenyo ngom me lum maber ki kit ma piny ber kwede, kaka ma gibedo I kabedo mapatpat oyubbe pi wot gi me mwaka ki mwaka. Ki jami gi kacel ki dyangi ma oyubbe, gucako wot I odiko.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aimo alupok nuajokak nuka ameja ka ekuse loka ikwamin, apotu itunga luka atekerin luka akwapin ace itemonokinos kanu alosit kec naka ekaru. Keda iborokec luetemonokinitai ka aitemonokin ibaren, apotu kesi kogeutu atupuruc.
lgg_prompt: Angu anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazu kililiru azini angu mile kililiru 'diyi ndaria, suru 'ba acipi angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi otu eyi ma aci eyini eli driasi ri ni. Yi vile afa 'diyi be 'bo azini anyapa yi ngonde, yi e'do o'bitisi.
nyn_prompt: Barikuronda eitaka ry'okurya rirungi hamwe n'embeera y'obwire nungi, abantu abaabaire nibatambura, baketeekateekyera orugyendo rwabo orurikubaho buri mwaka. Bwanyima y'okurundaana ebintu byabo n'ente zaabo, bakagyenda omu kasheeshe.

eng_prompt: In recent meetings, community leaders expressed their frustrations regarding the lack of support from local authorities. They highlighted the challenges faced by pastoralists in accessing essential resources and services.
lug_prompt: Mu nkiiko ezaakaggwa, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baalaga obwennyamivu bwabwe olw'obutaba na buyambi okuva mu b'obuyinza. Baalaze okusoomoozebwa abalunzi kwe basanga mu kufuna ebintu ebikulu n'obuweereza.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma okato cokcok-ki, lutela me tedero gunyutu cwer cwinygi pi peko me kony ma aa ki bot lutela me tedero. Gu nyutu peko ma lupur nongo ikare me nongo jami ki kony ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamununeta pac, apotu engarenok luka atutubet itodutu amamut agangat kama ejaasi apedorosio nuka atutubet. Apotu kesi kitetemoto atiokisio nuetereikina keda akoriok kanu adumun iboro ka aijanakino.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi o'diru 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ece e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi e'yo atita ni engazu drice'ba eyivu risi ku ri ma dria. Eyi ece e'yo ewaru 'ba anyapa ta mbapi 'diyini esu eyini ani afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkiiko ezibaireho juba, abeebembezi b'ebyanga boorekire obusaasi bwabo ahabw'obutaheebwa buyambi kuruga omu b'obushoborozi b'ebyaro. Bakashoboorora oburemeezi obu abariisa barikurabamu omu kutunga ebintu n'obuheereza.

eng_prompt: The community gathered to discuss important issues facing the region. As a result, many ministers attended the event.
lug_prompt: Abantu baakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga enkulu eziri mu kitundu. N'ekyavaamu, baminisita bangi beetabye ku mukolo.
ach_prompt: Lwak gugure me lok I kom peko mapigi tego matye I twok piny eni. Macalo adwogi ne, luminicta mapol gubedo tye I yub ne.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga kotukokinos kanu aitemitem akiro nuepolok nu ejaas atutubet. Kanuka ngun, apotu iminisitan luipu kojaikinos toma opucit.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo okporu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, minisita karakara eyi emu omu 'da ma alea ni.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga nkuru eziri omu kyanga. N'ekyarugiremu, ba minisita baingi bakeija aha mukoro.

eng_prompt: After months of drought and dwindling resources, the herders gathered to discuss their worsening situation. Tensions rose as they realized their livestock were suffering and their livelihoods were at stake.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'ekyeya n'ebikozesebwa okukendeera, abalunzi baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku mbeera yaabwe eyali yeeyongera okwonooneka. Obunkenke bwajjawo bwe baakiraba nti ebisolo byabwe byali bibonaabona era n'obulamu bwabwe bwali mu matigga.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol ma piny otwo ki jami acata matye kadok piny, lukwat gugure me nywako lok I kom peko gi matye kamede ameda. Lworo omede ikare ma gunongo ni dyangi gi tye ka deno can ki kwo gi tye kama rac.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka akamu keda aibiror naka iboro, apotu akoriok kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem ejautene kec loaronon. Apotu ingungeta kiyatakinos nawanyunia kesi ebe eutasi ibaren kec aiticanit ido ejai aijar kec toma ationis.
lgg_prompt: Mba e'yo etuka ni azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo esizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba anyapa ta mba'ba 'diyi tra yi oku e'yo onzezu e'yo yi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo eyi ma eselea tu ra eyini e'yo esuzu kini eyi ma anyapa eyi candi nya azini eyi ma edri eyi e'yo ewaru ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'ekyanda hamwe n'ebintu ebirikuhwaho, abariisa bakahurira hamwe kuhanuura aha mbeera yaabo eyeyongyeire. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire ahabw'okumanya ngu amatungo gaabo gakabonabona kandi n'amagara gaabo gakaba gari omu kabi.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions with agricultural leaders and community representatives, the urgent needs of the pastoralist communities were brought to the forefront. Recognizing the challenges they faced, the administration sought ways to provide support and resources.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'abakulembeze b'ebyobulimi n'abakiise b'ebitundu, ebyetaago eby'amangu eby'ebitundu by'abalunzi byaleetebwa mu maaso. Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa kwe baayolekagana nakwo, abakulembeze baanoonya engeri y'okubawa obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok mapol ki lutela me pur ki luwang lwak, jami ma mite pi lwak ma gwoko dyangi ki dyangi okatti anyim. Ki niang peko ma gunongo, ludito guyenyo yoo me miyo kony ki jami ma mite.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara keda engarenok lu akoru keda abwoikinitok itunga, aponi kitodiarai ipudesia luka itunga lu ekoriete. Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuetereikina keda kesi, abu eyaitene komo iponesio luka aijaikin agangat keda iboro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri 'bori ma vutia drice'ba agirikica ni 'diyi pie tualu 'ba pa tupi ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi pie, 'ba eji e'yo 'ba anyapa ta mbapi ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyini le mbeleru 'diyi drile. E'yo ewaru eyini esu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu risi, driceza nderi nda geri atita fezu tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura n'abebembezi b'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa hamwe n'abajwekyerwa b'abantu b'omubyaro, ebyetaago by'abantu b'oburiisa bikareetwa omu maisho. Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi obubarikurabamu, abebembezi bakasherura oburyo bw'okubaha obuhwezi n'ebintu.

eng_prompt: Despite their initial reluctance to voice their concerns, the group felt increasingly frustrated with the lack of attention to their needs. After several meetings with management yielded no results, they decided it was time to take a stand.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde mu kusooka baali tebaagala kwogera ku nsonga zaabwe, ekibinja kyawulira nga kiweddemu amaanyi olw'obutafaayo ku byetaago byabwe. Oluvannyuma lw'enkiiko eziwerako n'abaddukanya emirimu nga tewali kivuddemu, baasalawo nti kye kiseera okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni I acakkine pe gubedo ki miti me lok I kom peko gi, dul ne gubedo ki cwer cwiny pi peko me keto cwiny I kom miti gi. Inge kacoke mapol ki ludito tic ma pe okelo adwogi maber, gumoko ni kare dong oromo me cung.
teo_prompt: Karaida apotu kesi kongeroto alimor atiokisio kec, apotu egurupu itakadikisi naarai mam apodokinit ipudesia kec. Akaulo naka airiamununeta nuipu keda eyaitene, mam apotu itolomutu akiro, apotu kesi koseutu ebe erai kwana apak naka aibwo.
lgg_prompt: Yi ni tro ovuzu asi otizaru e'yo yini 'diyi ecezu ra ti, amuti 'da ma asi ezaza e'yo 'bani asi 'bazu e'yo eyini le 'diyi ma dria kurisi. Drifuza karakara eyi ma vutia driceza eyi pie e'yo azi efupi kuye 'diyi ma vutia eyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okwerarikirira kwabo okw'okubanza, guruupu ekaguma neetamwa ahabw'obutafayo ahabyetengo byabo. Bwanyima y'enkiiko nyingi n'abebembezi, tihaine ekyarugiremu, bakasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okwemerera.

eng_prompt: After months of voicing their concerns about the poor working conditions, the employees finally decided to take action. They organized a meeting to present their grievances to management, hoping for a positive response.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi nga balaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe olw'embeera y'emirimu embi, abakozi baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. Baategese olukiiko okwanjulira abaddukanya emirimu okwemulugunya kwabwe nga basuubira okuddamu okulungi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me nyutu lworo gi i kom kit ma tic tye ka time kwede, lutic ne dong gumoko tam gi me timo gin mo. Guyubu kacoke me cwalo koko gi bot ludito tic ki gen me nongo lagam maber.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aitodiar aiyalongongokec kanu ejautene loaronon loka aswam, apotu eswamak koseutu aswam. Apotu kesi itemokisi airiamunet kanu aitodiar angurian kec mama ejaasi eyaitene, aomit ebe epote kesi abongokin.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani e'dazu asi otiza yini geri azi ngazu muke ku 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba 'da eyi asi 'du e'yo 'yezu ra. Eyi otu mitingi e'yo eyini onuzu 'diyi 'bazu driceza eyivu asi 'baza be e'yo eyi ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okworeka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'embeera mbi y'emirimo, abakozi bakahendera bacwamu kukora. Bakatebekanisa orukiiko rw'okureeta okwetomboitwa kwabo omu bakuru, barikuteekateeka ngu nibaza kugarukwamu kurungi.

eng_prompt: He looked out over the sprawling fields, noting the familiar shapes grazing in the distance. Despite their presence, he knew the truth of the matter.
lug_prompt: Yatunula mu nnimiro ennene, n'alaba ebintu ebimanyiddwa nga birya mu bbanga. Wadde nga baaliwo, yali amanyi amazima agakwata ku nsonga.
ach_prompt: En ongiyo poto mapol tutwal, kun neno jami ma en ngeyo ma gitye ka cam I bor piny. Kadi bed ni gubedo tye, en onongo ngeyo lok ada.
teo_prompt: Abu ngesi kosesen amisirin nuipu noi, kosodi aanyun iponesio lukajokak luejaasi toma aiboisio nukokinga. Karaida ajaas kesi, ajeni ngesi abeit naka akirot ngin.
lgg_prompt: Eri ndre amve amvu angiri 'diyi ma dria, ndre afa 'bani nile 'diyi anyapa asea 'diyi anyapa asea 'diyi ma dria angu zozuri ma alia. Erini tro ovuzu yi ma alia ra ti, eri ni e'yo ma adari ra.
nyn_prompt: Akareeba omu musiri muhango, yaareeba ebishushani ebirikwetegyerezibwa nibirya omubwire. Oihireho okubaho kwabo, akaba naamanya amazima g'enshonga.

eng_prompt: Uganda has become a popular destination for people seeking better opportunities and safety. As a result, the country has seen a significant influx of newcomers from various regions.
lug_prompt: Uganda efuuse ekifo ekimanyiddwa ennyo eri abantu abanoonya emikisa emirungi n'obukuumi. N'ekivuddemu, eggwanga lirabye okuyingira kw'abapya okuva mu bitundu eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda odoko kabedo ma dano mapol maro cito iye ka yenyo gum ki gwok. Macalo adwogi ne, lobo ne oneno wel dano mapol matye kabino ki I but lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Erai Uganda aiboisit na ejenara noi kanejaas itunga lu ekotosi arerengesio nuajokak keda ayuwara. Kanuka ngun, ewanyunit akwapuwok abwoetait naepol noi naka itunga luitetiak kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri eca angu 'bani lele tu 'ba eyini drileba muke ndeni 'diyi ndazu azini ageitema esuzu 'diyi ru. E'yo 'disi, kari nderi ndre curu'do 'ba emupi o'diru engazu angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo ra.
nyn_prompt: Uganda ehindukire omwanya ogurikumanywa munonga abantu abarikuronda emigisha mirungi n'oburinzi. N'ekyarugiremu, eihanga ryaboneire okweyongyera kw'abantu abasya kuruga omu bicweka bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: Due to unforeseen circumstances, the committee decided to reevaluate the project timeline. As a result, they announced that they would postpone the deadline.
lug_prompt: Olw'embeera etasuubirwa, akakiiko kaasazeewo okuddamu okwekenneenya obudde bwa pulojekiti. N'ekyavaamu, baalangirira nti bagenda kwongezaayo nsalesale.
ach_prompt: Pi jami ma otimme atura, dul enoni omoko tamgi me ngiyo kit ma yub eni obi time kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, guwaco ni gibimedo nino me agiki ne anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ejautene lomam ewanyunitai, abu ekomiti ocam airereor ainapeta nuka apak naka epurojekt. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi kolimosi ebe epote kesi aisukunyar apaarasia nuka awasia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani nile ku 'diyi ma e'yosi, komiti 'da 'du e'yo sa'wa 'bani otita 'da 'yezu ri ma ale andrizu o'diru. E'yo 'disi, eyi azi kini eyi nga o'du asizuri idri drile.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'embeera etarikuteekateekwaho,akakiiko kakacwamu kugaruka kushwijuma obwire bwa purogyekiti. N'ekyarugiremu, bakarangirira ngu nibaza kwongyerayo ebiro by'ahamuheru.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming veterinary conference, the participants attended a workshop focused on the importance of understanding zoonotic infections. As a result, they were sensitized about animal diseases.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera olukungaana lw'abasawo b'ebisolo olujja, abeetabye mu lukungaana luno beetabye mu musomo ogukwata ku bukulu bw'okutegeera obulwadde obusiigibwa ebisolo. N'ekyavaamu, baasomesebwa ku ndwadde z'ebisolo.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi kacoke pa daktari lee matye kabino anyim, joo ma obedo tye gubedo tye I kacoke me pwonye ma oketo cwinygi I kom ber pa niang I kom two ma dano nongo ki bot lee. Macalo adwogi ne, ki pwonyo gi i kom two ma mako lee.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin airiamunet naka ikee lu itiang na ebunit, apotu itunga kojaikinos toma airiamun na ikamunitos ajokis naka amisiikin adekasinei nu ikopas kanejaas itiang. Kanuka ngun, aponi kes isisianakinai nuka adekasinei nu itiang.
lgg_prompt: Otuta otita imbatani e'yo anyapa eyini 'diyi ma dria ri ma alea, 'ba emu'ba 'diyi mu otita imbatani 'bani asi 'bazu orodri e'yo azo eyini esu engazu anyapa eyivu 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe eyini imbata azo anyapa eyini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kwetebeekanisiza oruteerane rw'abashaho b'enyamaishwa orurikwija, abeejumbiremu bakeejumba omu mushomo ogwabaire nigugyenderera omugasho gw'okwetegyereza oburwaire oburikuruga omu nyamaishwa. N'ekyarugiremu, bakegyesibwa aha ndwara z'amatungo.

eng_prompt: After months of complaints from the neighbors about noise and mess, the local authorities finally decided to take action. A notice was posted on the community board, warning that the animals would need to be removed from the premises.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okwemulugunya okuva mu baliraanwa ku maloboozi n'obutabanguko, ab'obuyinza mu kitundu baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. Ekiwandiiko kyateekebwa ku lubaawo lw'ekyalo nga kirabula nti ebisolo byetaaga okuggyibwa mu kifo.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwon pa jirani pi dwon ki kuku kuku, lutela me tedero dong gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Kiketo lok angeya I kom dul me tedero me ciko dano ni myero kikwany lee ne ki I kabedo ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka angurian kanejaas idunyeta kanuka acelanar keda amumu, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet koseutu aswam. Aponi kipikakinai aiwadikaet toma oicolong loka itunga, aikwenyar ebe ibusakinit alemar itiang kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Mba yini onuzu engazu jo ejele yi vu o'duko azini e'yo onzi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba angu ma alia 'diyi asizu asi 'du e'yo 'yezu ra. Ba 'ba o'dukoti osisi ongulumu eyini ri ma dria, bile ndu liza fezu kini le 'ba ma nze anyapa eyi angu 'da ma alea risi te.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'okwetomboitwa kuruga omu bataahi ahabw'eiraka n'obutabanguko, ab'obushoborozi bakahendera bacwamu kukora. Ekihandiiko kikateebwa aha kakiiko k'ekyanga, okurabura ngu enyamaishwa zikaba niziza kwihwa omu mwanya.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising in the factory for weeks, with management imposing stricter rules and unrealistic deadlines. As a result, the workers were harassed.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kkolero okumala wiiki, nga abaddukanya bataddewo amateeka amakakali n'ennaku z'omwezi ezitali ntuufu. N'ekyavaamu, abakozi baatulugunyizibwa.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I gang tic ne pi cabit mapol, ludito tic ne guketo cik matek tutwal ki nino me agiki ma pe ber. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic ne gunongo aunauna.
teo_prompt: Apolor aiyalongong kotoma acuma kangin adaun isabitin luipu, ido abu eyaitene ibwaik ikisila luetioko keda apaarasia nuetioko. Kanuka ngun, aponi itisilanarai eswamak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ebi ovu uru okalamvu 'da ma alea sabiti karakara 'bo, driceza 'da ni azita okporu 'diyi 'ba azini o'du asizuri 'bani e'yo 'yezu kililiru ku 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba candi fe azi'ba 'da eyini.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke bukaba butwire nibweyongyera omu ikorero kumara esande, abarikureeberera bakataho ebiragiro by'amaani hamwe n'ebiro by'ahamuheru ebitahikire. N'ekyarugiremu, abakozi bakabonabonesibwa.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and stress, it's important to remember the impact our actions can have on those around us. Compassion and understanding can go a long way in fostering a supportive community.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'okunyigirizibwa, kya mugaso okujjukira engeri ebikolwa byaffe gye biyinza okukosaamu abo abatwetoolodde. Okusaasira n'okutegeeragana bisobola okuyamba ennyo mu kukuza ekitundu ekiyambagana.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki lworo, pire tek tutwal me poo I kom adwoki pa jami ma watimo I kom jo ma orumuwa. Kica ki niang twero konyo tutwal I dongo kabedo ma dano cwako.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus ajenanut ka aiyalongong, ejokuna aiitun epone loepedoriata aswamisiowok aitolitol ngul lu idunyasi oni. Amina keda apuponoro epedorete aingarakin noi kotoma aitopolorite itunga luigangitos luce.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru ma alia, eri orodriru ama ma ega e'yo amani 'ye 'diyi ni ovuzu 'ba ama ma ageia 'diyi ma dria ra. Asi ndriza tualu vata be 'diyi nga ongulumu atita fepi 'diyi ezozu saaru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutetegyerezibwa n'okwerarikirira, n'eky'omugasho kwijuka oku ebikorwa byaitu birikubaasa kukwata ahari abo abatwetorwaire. Okusaasira n'okwetegyerezana nibibaasa kuhwera munonga omukureetaho obushagiki omu bantu.

eng_prompt: After a long journey through the dense forest, they finally spotted the distant rooftops of the village. Eager to find shelter and rest, they quickened their pace.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okutambula olugendo oluwanvu nga bayita mu kibira, baasembayo okulaba akasolya k'ekyalo. Nga baagala nnyo okufuna aw'okusula n'okuwummulira, baayanguya olugendo lwabwe.
ach_prompt: Inge wot pi kare malac I bunga ma opong ki lum, lacen guneno wii ot me caro ma tye kama bor tutwal. Ki miti matek me nongo kabedo ki yweyo, gin gumedo rwom me wotgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka alosit apak naepol noi kotoma okibira, apotu kesi kosesenata atuluru nuka ecaalo. Keda eipud loka adumun neperot ka aiyengun, apotu kesi kisinyikokisi alosit kec.
lgg_prompt: Aci ezu 'bori ma vutia oce aliasi, yi asizu angu caluniri ndre ra. Asi driasi angu aa'zu azini ava liza esuzu, eyi otu eyi ma aci ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'orugyendo rw'ahaiguru barikurabira omu kibira, bakahendera bareeba enju y'ekyaro eri hare. Ahabw'okugira ekihika ky'okusherura oburaaro n'okuhuumura, bakongyera ahanguuto.

eng_prompt: A team of scientists has gathered to investigate the recent outbreak. Their goal is to understand the causes and effects of the disease.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu ya bannassaayansi ekuŋŋaanyiziddwa okunoonyereza ku kubalukawo kw'ekirwadde. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kwe kutegeera ebivaako n'ebiva mu bulwadde.
ach_prompt: Dul pa lucayan gugure kacel me kwedo peko me poto pa two eni. Miti gi tye me niang ngo ma okelo two eni ki adwoki ne.
teo_prompt: Abu etimu loka itunga luka sayanis kiriamunos kanu aingic abwangun naka adeka. Alosikinetekec erai amisiikin iboro lu eyangaununei keda atiokisio nuka adeka.
lgg_prompt: Ba sayansini 'diyi tra yi tualu e'yo efupi o'diru 'diyi ma eti ondazu. Asisile yiniri afa fepi azo 'di ni azini e'yo erini eji 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu y'abanyasayansi erukungaine okucondooza aha kubarukaho kw'endwara. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okumanya ebirikureeta endwara hamwe n'ebirikurugwamu.

eng_prompt: After a thorough examination and analysis, the medical team gathered in the conference room to discuss the findings. Once the discussions were complete, the doctors prepared to meet with the patients.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukebera n'okwekenneenya obulungi, abasawo baakuŋŋaanira mu kisenge mwe bakuŋŋaanira okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bizuuliddwa. Bwe baamala okukubaganya ebirowoozo, abasawo beetegekera okusisinkana abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Ingee pimo ki kwedo lok matut tutwal, lutic yot kom gugure I ot cokke me nywako lok I kom ngo ma gunongo. Ikare ma lok otum, ludaktari guyube me rwate ki lutwo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ka aingic ejok, apotu imurok kotukokinos toma agola naka airiamun kanu aitemitem akiro nuedumunitai. Akaulo na angetakin aineranara, apotu imurok itemonokinos airiamun keda adekak.
lgg_prompt: Vuti ondaza kililiru azini e'yo eti ondaza ma vutia, amuti dakitari eyini 'diyi tra eyi pari okuza ni 'diyi ma alea agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini esu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo onzeza 'da ma vutia, dakitari eyi otu eyi dri fuzu 'ba azoru 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okukyebera kurungi n'okushwijuma, tiimu y'abashaho ekateeranira omu kishengye ky'orukiiko kuhanuura aha bishangirwe. Okuhanuura ku kwahwaire, abashaho baketeekateekyera kubugana abarwaire.

eng_prompt: Health officials have reported a significant increase in malaria cases across the region. As a result, urgent measures are being implemented to address the growing health crisis.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu baategeezezza nti abalwadde b'omusujja gw'ensiri beeyongedde nnyo mu kitundu kyonna. N'ekivuddemu, enkola ez'amangu ziteekebwa mu nkola okukola ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni wel dano matye ki two malaria omede tutwal I but lobo man. Macalo adwogi ne, kitye ka kati ki yoo me cobo peko me yot kom matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis olimosi ebe iyata noi enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda eimidi kotoma aiboisit. Kanuka ngun, eutai aitolomun iwaitin lu engeso kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu na iyata.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo malaria niri be 'diyi ma kalafe tu angu 'di ma alea dria ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'yo mbeleru 'diyi 'ye e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bagambire aha kweyongyera kw'abarwaire b'omushwija gw'ensiri omu kyanga. N'ekyarugiremu, emiringo y'amaani eriyo neekorwa kukora ahaburemeezi bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Health officials have confirmed an outbreak of the virus in the region. Emergency medical teams have been deployed to assist those affected.
lug_prompt: Ab'ebyobulamu bakakasizza okubalukawo kw'akawuka mu kitundu. Ttiimu z'abasawo ez'amangu ziyiiriddwa okuyamba abakoseddwa.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom gumoko ni two eni opoto I twok piny eni. Ki cwalo lutic yoto kom pi konyo jo ma peko opoto i komgi.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis itigogongoto abwangun naka ekorona kotoma aiboisit. Aponi kipikakinai itimun luka adekis kanu aingarakin ngul luetirorit.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi esu e'yo azo korona niri ni e'dozu angu 'da ma alea ri ra. Ba o'ba amuti azakoma fepi e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi 'ba e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bahamize okubarukaho kw'akakooko omu kyanga. Za tiimu z'eby'amagara ez'ahonaaho, ziteirweho okuhwera abo abateganisiibwe.

eng_prompt: The region had been experiencing a severe outbreak of mosquito-borne diseases. Despite efforts to control the spread, the situation worsened, leading to tragic consequences.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kifuna okubalukawo kw'endwadde z'ensiri okw'amaanyi. Wadde nga waaliwo kaweefube w'okutangira okusaasaana kw'ekirwadde, embeera yeeyongera okwonooneka ekyavaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Twok piny eni obedo ka nongo peko me poto pa two ma obee kelo. Kadi bed ni ki keto tek me gengo nya pa two eni, peko ne omede ameda ma okelo peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi atutubet ngin keda abwangun na adekasinei nu ikur. Karaida etamitai kagogong aitikitik awea naka ekorona, abu ejautene kibiror, ido abu koyangau atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'da ebi e'yo ewaru azo yiyia eyini eji 'diyi esu. Okpo 'bani 'ba ereta ma aza kozu ra ti, e'yo eza i ra, e'yo drile onzi 'diyi ejipi.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga kitwire nikitunga okubarukaho kw'endwara ezirikureetwa ensiri. N'obu haraabe hariho amaani g'okurwanisa okujanjaara kw'endwara, embeera ekasisikarira kimwe, ekyarugiremu ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: Researchers have been investigating the symptoms and patterns of the illness for years. Despite extensive studies and numerous theories, the underlying cause remains elusive.
lug_prompt: Abanoonyereza babadde banoonyereza ku bubonero n'enkola y'obulwadde okumala emyaka. Newankubadde waliwo okunoonyereza okungi n'endowooza ez'enjawulo, ekivaako tekimanyiddwa.
ach_prompt: Lutim kwed gubedo ka kwedo lanyut ki kit ma two eni time kwede pi mwaki mapol. Kadi bed ni kwed tye mapol ki tam mapol, gin ma kelo ne pud pe ngene.
teo_prompt: Eutasi angicak aingic ijenuneta keda iponesio luka adeka kanu ikar luipu. Karaida ipu aisisiaeta keda aomisio nuipu, mam ejena ibore eyangaunit ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'yo ondapi 'diyi ebi e'da azo 'di ni 'diyi ma eti onda eli karakara. E'yo eti ondaza angiri 'diyi ma talasi azini egata karakara 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo 'bani e'yo nde 'yezu ri nga po'di 'ba ni ku.
nyn_prompt: Abacondoozi batwire nibacondooza obubonero n'emitwarize y'oburwaire kumara emyaka mingi. Oihireho okucondooza kw'amaani n'ebiteekateeko bingi, ekirikubireeta tikirikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: A sudden and severe storm swept through the region, causing widespread destruction. As a result, many animals died yesterday.
lug_prompt: Omuyaga ogw'amangu era ogw'amaanyi gwakuba ekitundu kyonna, ne guleetawo okusaanyaawo ebintu bingi. N'ekyavaamu, ebisolo bingi byafudde eggulo.
ach_prompt: Yamo magwar obalo jami mapol tutwal I but piny eni. Macalo adwogi, lee mapol otoo laworo.
teo_prompt: Abu ekwam loepol noi kibirokin aiboisit ngin, ido abu komudia iboro luipu noi. Kanuka ngun, apotu itiang luipu kotwaka bian.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo okporu azini okporu ni aci angu 'da ma alea dria, erini afa ezaza ejizu angiri. E'yo 'disi, anyapa karakara eyi odra aje.
nyn_prompt: Omuyaga gw'amaani gukateera ekyanga kyona, gukacwekyereza munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, enyamaishwa nyingi zifiire nyomwebazyo.

eng_prompt: After a long and difficult battle with the disease, the sanctuary staff made the heartbreaking decision to say goodbye to the beloved creatures. In a solemn ceremony, they honored the lives of the animals that had brought joy to so many.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulwanagana n'obulwadde okumala ebbanga eddene era nga kizibu, abakozi b'ekkuumiro ly'ebisolo baasalawo okusiibula ebitonde byabwe eby'omuwendo. Ku mukolo ogw'ekitiibwa, baassa ekitiibwa mu bulamu bw'ebisolo ebyali bireese essanyu eri bangi.
ach_prompt: Ingee lweny matek tutwal ki two, lutic me ot gwoko lee gumoko tam me weko jami magi ma gimaro. I kwer madit tutwal, guworo kwo pa lee ma okelo yomcwiny bot dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ejie loelangir ido loetiono noi keda adeka, apotu eswamak luka aiboisit naidarere itiang kiswamata aseunet naetiono noi naka aisiyalamikin keda iboro lueminasi kesi. Kotoma opucit loapolon, apotu kesi itutuorata aijar naka itiang luapotu koyangautu aiyalama mama ejaasi itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: A'di 'dizu azo be sa'wa ezu azini kongolokoru 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba pari alatararu 'diyi ma alia 'diyi 'du e'yo asi nyozani 'yozu kini yi o'du yi afa leletu 'diyi be ra. Omu azi okporu ni ma alea, eyi fe inzita idri anyapa eyini ayiko ejipi 'ba karakara eyidri 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurwana kurungi n'oburwaire, abakozi b'omu ebihangirwe bakacwamu kubi kusiibuura ebirikukundwa. Omu mukoro gw'amaani, bakaheereza ekitinisa amagara g'enyamaishwa agabaire gareteire abantu baingi okushemererwa.

eng_prompt: Anthrax is a serious infectious disease caused by the bacterium Bacillus anthracis. While it is often associated with human cases, it is important to recognize that it can also impact various animal species.
lug_prompt: Obulwadde bwa kalusu bulwadde obw'obulabe obusiigibwa obuwuka obuyitibwa Bacillus anthracis. Wadde nga kitera okukwatagana n'obulwadde bw'abantu, kikulu okumanya nti kisobola okukosa ebika by'ebisolo eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Anthrax obedo two marac tutwal ma kwidi ma kilwongo ni Bacillus anthracis aye kelo. Kadi bed ni pol kare kubbe ki two pa dano, pire tek me niang ni twero bene balo kwai lee mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Erai adeka naka anthrax adeka na ekorona na eyangaunit adeka naka Bacillus anthracis. Karaida etapit duc arucokina keda adekasinei nuka itunga, ejokuna ajenun ebe epedori aitolitol iponesio lu itiang luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Azo omvele anthrax ruri eri azo azi onzi 'ba eyi erepi omvele bacterium Bacillus anthracis ni fe ni i. Erini tro ovuzu e'yo 'ba ada yini 'diyi be ra ti, eri orodriru nizu kini eri eco vini anyapa esele ndu ndu 'diyi 'ye onzi ra.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwa kakooto n'oburwaire bw'amaani oburikuturira oburikureetwa bakitiria ya Bacillus anthracis. N'obu kiraabe nikikira kukwatanisa n'abantu, n'eky'omugasho kumanya ngu nikibaasa n'okuteganisa enyamaishwa nyingi.

eng_prompt: Many herbivorous species have evolved to thrive on a diet primarily consisting of plant material. This adaptation allows them to efficiently extract nutrients from their natural environment.
lug_prompt: Ebika by'ebisolo ebirya omuddo bingi bikula bulungi nga birya ebirime. Kino kibasobozesa okufuna obulungi ebiriisa okuva mu butonde bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Kwai lee mapol ma camo lum guloke me bedo ki cam ma pole tye ki jami ma aa ki I kom jami apita. Alokaloka man weko gi nongo moc cam maber ki I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Iponesio luipu lu enyamiete iraan apolor noi kanu ainyam inyamat lu iraan. Ingarakinit aijulanakineta ngun kesi adumun iboro lu enyamio kotoma aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Ori anyapa asea nyapi 'diyi ma esele karakara eyi e'do idri nya afa nyakuni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di ni fe yi dri afa nyazani 'diyi esuzu geri kililiru si engazu angu yini ovuzu alenia 'diyi ma aliarisi.
nyn_prompt: Ebihangirwe bingi ebirikurya eby'obuhangwa bitandikire kurya eby'obuhangwa. Enkora egi neebasisa kwihamu ebiriisa kurungi kuruga omu buhangwa bwazo.

eng_prompt: An outbreak of a deadly disease swept through the region, affecting livestock and wildlife alike. As the situation worsened, reports began to emerge of unusual deaths among various animal populations.
lug_prompt: Obulwadde obw'obulabe bwabalukawo mu kitundu kyonna, ne bukosa ebisolo n'ebisolo by'omu nsiko. Embeera bwe yeeyongera okwonooneka, alipoota zaatandika okuvaayo ku kufa okw'enjawulo mu bisolo eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Two marac adada opoto I but lobo man ma okelo peko I kom dyangi ki lee lum. Ikare ma peko ne omedde, adwogi tic ocako katti I kom too pa lee mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Apotu adekasinei nuarokok kobwangunos katutubet kangin, aimusungite ibaren keda itiang lukokutwi. Neapolor ejautene, apotu iripotan kogeutu atwakisia nuka itiang luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Azo azi onzi ni efu angu 'di ma alea dria, anyapa eyi eza tualu anyapa asea 'diyi pie. E'yo ni ecazu onzi ru, o'duko e'do efu drata 'bani nile ku 'diyi ma dria anyapa karakara eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'endwara y'akabi kakatahirira ekyanga kyona, ekirikuteganisa amatungo n'enyamiishwa. Embeera kuyabiire neyeyongyera, ripoota zikatandika kubaho ez'okufa kw'enyamaishwa nyingi.

eng_prompt: The veterinary team has scheduled a health check for all the animals. After the examination, the animals will be vaccinated tomorrow.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu y'abasawo b'ebisolo etegese okukebera obulamu bw'ebisolo byonna. Oluvannyuma lw'okukeberebwa, ebisolo bijja kugemebwa enkya.
ach_prompt: Daktari lee guyubu kare me pimo lee weng. Ingee pime, kibi gwero lee diki.
teo_prompt: Etemoki etimu loka imurok lu itiang ainwakio naka itiang kere. Akaulo naka aingito, eponio aikis itiang ekato moi.
lgg_prompt: Dakitari anyapa eyini 'diyi otu sa'wa 'bani anyapa eyi ma rua o'bizu dria. Obita ma vutia, 'ba nga anyapa yi oso aro aro azo atrizurisi drusi.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu y'abashaho b'enyamaishwa etebekaniise okukyebera amagara g'enyamaishwa zoona. Bwanyima y'okukyeberwa,amatungo nigaija kugyemwa nyenkyakare.

eng_prompt: As the congregation gathered for the service, a heated argument broke out among the members. The tension in the air was palpable, and it quickly escalated into chaos.
lug_prompt: Ekkanisa bwe yakungaana mu kusaba, waabalukawo okuyombagana okw'amaanyi mu bammemba. Obunkenke obwali mu bbanga bwalabika, era mangu ne bufuuka akavuyo.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma lwak gucokke pi lega, laro lok matek tutwal ocakke ikin lumemba. Lworo ma obedo I yamo ne onen tutwal, dok odoko kuku kuku oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neautar ikuristayon atukonokin kanu ailip, apotu ipegeta kotakanutu kanejaas imeban. Aponi kojenunai aiyalongong kotoma okwam, ido abu kitopolor toma amumu.
lgg_prompt: Ba kanisa'a 'diyi ni yi trazu kanisa'a 'boria, agata onzi e'do 'ba memba ru 'diyi ma eselea. Ngiringiri oli alia ri ndra e'dazaru, azini eca e'yo ngiringiri ru mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikuteeranira hamwe okushaba, hakabaho okwetomboita kw'amaani omu bantu. Obunkenke obwabaire buri omu mwanya bukarebeka, kandi bukarahuka bwahinduka akaimukiriro.

eng_prompt: After months of mounting pressure and allegations of misconduct, the board convened to discuss the chairman's fate. In a historic vote, the decision was made to remove him from office.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okunyigirizibwa n'ebigambibwa nti yeeyisa bubi, akakiiko kaatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nkomerero ya ssentebe. Mu kalulu ak'ebyafaayo, okusalawo kwakolebwa okumuggya mu woofiisi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me lyeto ki adot me tim maraco, dul madoro dul ne gubedo kacoke me nywako lok I kom agiki pa won kom. I bolo kwir ma pire tek tutwal, kimoko tam me kwanye ki I opic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aiyalongong keda aitoroneta nuka iponesio luarokok, apotu lukapolok ikamunitos nuikamunitos apolou naka apolon eicolong. Kotoma aseo naka akiro nukolo, aponi kitolomunai aseunet naka alemar ngesi kotoma oyapesi.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia okpo tuzu tualu e'yo 'bani ega eyi ma adriza onzi 'diyi pie, board eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo 'Bili ei ni 'diyi ma agata ma dria. Voti 'beza adi ni ma alia, 'ba 'du e'yo 'duzu eri 'duzu pari azini ma aliarisi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okunyigirizibwa hamwe n'okwetomboitwa kw'emitwarize mibi, akakiiko kakashutama kuhanuura ahamuheru gwa mukuru w'entebe. Omu karuuru k'ebyafaayo, bakasharamu kumwiha omu ofiisi.

eng_prompt: After a lengthy investigation, the authorities gathered enough evidence to charge the suspects. As a result, they were sent to court.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza okumala ebbanga eddene, ab'obuyinza baakuŋŋaanya obujulizi obumala okuvunaana abateeberezebwa. N'ekyavaamu, baasindikibwa mu kkooti.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed pi kare malac, lutela guyubu caden ma oromo me keto bal iwi joo mabyek me bal tye I komgi. Macalo adwogi ne, kicwalo gi I kot.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic apak naepol, apotu apedorosio kodumutu ajenanut naedolit kanu aitepesen ngul luitepesenitai. Kanuka ngun aponi ijukarai kesi okooti.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza ezu ma vutia, drice'ba eyi tra afa ecetaru 'diyi e'yo 'ba 'bani ega eyi eza e'yo 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ji eyi kotia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kumara obwire buraingwa, ab'obushoborozi bakarundaana obujurizi burikumara okujunaana abarikuteekateekwaho. N'ekyarugiremu, bakatwarwa omu kooti.

eng_prompt: As the tension in the room escalated, the committee members exchanged glances, clearly unimpressed with his previous explanations. Finally, the chairperson leaned forward and addressed him directly.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera mu kisenge, bammemba b'akakiiko baatandika okutunula mu maaso nga tebakkiriziganya n'ebyo bye yannyonnyola emabegako. Ku nkomerero, ssentebe yafukamira mu maaso n'ayogera naye butereevu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lworo omedde I ot, lumemba me dul enoni guloko wanggi I komgi, ma nen atyer kamaleng ni pe cwinygi obedo yom ki lok ma en otito con. I agiki ne won kom ojuke me lok kwede atir.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor aiyalongong kotoma agola, apotu imeeban luka ekomiti kowanyutu ebe mam kesi eyalamasi keda akiroke nukokau. Kawasia abu apolon eicolong kibirokin kosodi einer keda ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako jo ale aliza ma alia ri ni tu uru, memba committee ni 'diyi oja yi ma mile yi ma eselea, e'da kililiru kini yi ovuni ayikosi e'yo erini nze drio 'diyi vu ku. Asizu, ogua e'i so pa drile azini nze e'yo eri be trotro.
nyn_prompt: Obutabanguko omu kishengye ku bwayeyongyeire, ba memba b'akakiiko bakareeba hamwe, batarikushemererwa n'okushoborora kwe okwabaireho. Ekyarugiremu, mukuru w'entebe akeegama yaaza omu maisho yaamugambira butunu.

eng_prompt: Despite the overwhelming evidence against him, he remained silent during the trial. His lack of response left the jury with no choice but to draw their own conclusions.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waaliwo obujulizi bungi obwali bumulumiriza, yasirika busirisi mu kiseera ky'omusango. Obutabaako ky'addamu kyaleka abalamuzi nga tebalina kyakukola okuggyako okwewozaako.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni caden mapol tye i kome, en oling woko I kare me pido ne. Bedo peke pa lagam mege oweko lungol kop peke ki gin atima mapat ki moko tam gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu ajenanut nuikamunitos ngesi, abu ngesi iling kotoma apak naka emusago. Amamus ke na abongokin abu kojalak atubok emamei aseunet bon.
lgg_prompt: Afa e'dapi kini eri eza e'yo ra ti, eri awi ciri sawa 'bani eri obizurisi. Erini e'yo omvizu kuri ku 'ba e'yo lipi 'diyi dri e'yo azi 'yezu yo.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obujurizi bwingi obwamuhakanisa,akaguma ahunami omu kuhurira orubanja. Okuremwa kugarukamu kwe kukasiga abaramuzi bataine ky'okukora, okwihaho okwekora ebiteekateeko byabo.

eng_prompt: As the last guests departed, the event coordinator made a final check of the venue. Satisfied that everything was in order, she turned the key in the lock.
lug_prompt: Abagenyi abasembayo bwe baagenda, omukwanaganya w'omukolo yakebera ekifo. Olw'okuba yali mumativu nti buli kimu kyali kitebenkedde, yazza ekisumuluzo mu kkufulu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wele me agiki gucako wot, lador yub ne ongiyo kabedo ne me agiki. I kare ma cwinye obedo yom ni jami weng tye maber, en oloko lagony woko.
teo_prompt: Neautar ipejok lu awasia anyoun, abu eyaiton loka epucit koanyana aiboisit. Arai iyalama ngesi ebe ejokuna iboro kere, abu ngesi kijulak ilaceta luka agolokinio naka ikekia.
lgg_prompt: Omu asizu 'diyi ni fuzu 'boria, 'ba e'yo otupi 'diyi andri angu 'da asizu. Erini aa'zu ayikosi kini e'yo dria ovu kililiru, eri oja fungua yi ma ti opizaru.
nyn_prompt: Abagyenyi abahererukireyo kubarugireho, orikukurira omukoro akakyebera omwanya. Bwanyima y'okumanya ngu buri kimwe kihikire, akahindura ekishumuruzo omu kikingirizo.

eng_prompt: Despite several attempts to coordinate their schedules, the team members failed to reach a consensus. As a result, confusion arose regarding when they were supposed to meet.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baagezaako emirundi mingi okukwataganya enteekateeka zaabwe, bammemba ba ttiimu baalemererwa okutuuka ku nzikiriziganya. N'ekyavaamu, wajjawo okutabulwa ku bikwata ku ddi lwe baali balina okusisinkana.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kitemo tyen mapol me ribo yubgi, lumemba me dul tuku ne pe guwinye. Macalo adwogi ne, anywena-nywena obedo tye ikit ma omyero gurwate kwede.
teo_prompt: Karaida etamitai duc aimorikikin ainapeta kec, apotu imeban luka etimu ipikosi adolokin acamanar. Kanuka ngun, abu aibiror opotu kanuikamunit apak naibusakinitor kesi airiamun.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro o'bizu e'yo yi ma eselea 'diyi otuzu ra ti, 'ba amuti 'da ma alea 'diyi awini ti eci ti eyi ma eselea ku. E'yo 'disi, e'yo yi ma eselea sawa yini muzu dri fuzu ri ma dria efu ra.
nyn_prompt: Oyihireho okugyeragyeranisa enteekateeka zaabo, ba memba b'akakiiko bakaremwa kwikirizana. N'ekyarugiremu, hakabaho okubuzabuzibwa aha bwire obu baabaire bashemereire kubugana.

eng_prompt: We are still awaiting confirmation on the details for the upcoming meeting. As of now, the venue of the meeting has not been communicated.
lug_prompt: Tukyalinze okukakasibwa ku bikwata ku lukiiko olujja. N'okutuusa kati, ekifo ky'olukiiko tekinnategeezebwa.
ach_prompt: Pud watye kakuru ngec matut I kom kacokke matye kabino ni. I kare-ni pud pe ki niango kabedo me kacokke ne.
teo_prompt: Iringa sio idarit aitigogongoret nuikamunitos akiro nuka airiamunet na ebunit. Kitoni kwana, mam elimonorio aiboisit na ebeit airiamunet ajaikin.
lgg_prompt: Ama nga po'di e'yo 'bani ngazu e'yo dria drifuza emupi ri ma dria ri te. Kpere sawa 'disi, 'ba lu ni nga pari mitingi 'da ni ngazu ri ku.
nyn_prompt: Tukiriyo nitutegyereza okuhamya ebirikukwata aha rukiiko orurikwija. Obwahati, omwanya gw'orukiiko tigukamanyisibwe.

eng_prompt: Due to the unexpected absence of the chairperson, the vice-chairperson stepped in to lead the discussion. The agenda was packed, and important decisions needed to be made.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabaawo bwa ssentebe mu ngeri etasuubirwa, omumyuka wa ssentebe ye yayingiddewo okukulembera okukubaganya ebirowoozo. Enteekateeka zaali zitegekeddwa bulungi era nga n'okusalawo okw'omugaso kwetaaga okukolebwa.
ach_prompt: Pien won kom pe obedo tye, lalub kor won kom odonyo me doro lok. Yub obedo tye dok kimito moko tam mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kanuka amamus na apolon eicolong, abu atupiton eicolong kolom aingarenikin aineranara. Aponi kitemokinai nu ebeit aswam, ido ibusakinit aitolomun aseununeta nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'Bili ei ni aa'zu kuri ma e'yosi, endru 'Bili ei niri fi e'yo onzeza ma dri cezu. Otita e'yo otuza ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ndra dria, dika le 'ba ma 'du e'yo okporu 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabaho bwa mukuru w'entebe, omuhwezi we akaija kwebembera okuhanuura. Ebirikugyenda omu maisho bikateebwaho, kandi ebikuru bikaba nibyetengwa kukorwa.

eng_prompt: As scandals continued to surface and public trust dwindled, the pressure on the administration grew. Many citizens felt that the leader's actions were not only unethical but also a violation of their democratic principles.
lug_prompt: Nga emivuyo gyeyongera okulabika n'obwesige bw'abantu okukendeera, akazito ku bukulembeze bweyongera. Bannansi bangi baawulira nti ebikolwa by'omukulembeze tebyali bya mpisa byokka naye era byali bimenya emisingi gyabwe egy'obwannakyewa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma bal mapat-pat omedde ki time dok gen pa lwak odok piny, lyeto I kom gamente omedde. Lutedero mapol guwinyo ni tim pa latela ne pe obedo ber keken ento bene obedo turu cik me tela pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos abilibilio naka ikapun kosodete amunokina itunga aibiror, abu ainingosit naka eyaitene kiyatakin. Apotu itunga luipu kowomitos ebe mam aswamisio nuka engarenon eraas nu mam ejokuna konye ebilibilete ainapeta nuka apugan kec.
