lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi eyini mu drile e'dazu dika asi'baza o'bi eyini ri ma omgbo esizu, okpo driceza ma dria ri tu ra. Kari anzi karakara eyi ega kini e'yo drice'ba 'da ni 'ye 'diyi ovuni lu adriza onzi si ku te eyi vini e'yo eyi ma driceza o'bi eyini 'diyi ma dria onzi.
nyn_prompt: Obushumankuzi ku bwayeyongyeire kubaho, obwesigye bw'abantu bukakyendeera, oburemeezi aha bwebembezi bweyongyeire. Abatuuragye abaingi bakahurira ngu ebikorwa by'omwebembezi tibirikukwata aha mitwarize, kureka n'okuhenda engyenderwaho zaabo eza demokurasiya.

eng_prompt: After gaining valuable experience in the corporate world, I've realized that my true passion lies in entrepreneurship. I've been contemplating the idea of launching my own venture for quite some time now.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna obumanyirivu obw'omuwendo mu nsi y'ebitongole, nkitegedde nti okwagala kwange okwa nnamaddala kuli mu by'obusuubuzi. Mbadde ndowooza ku ky'okutongoza bizineesi yange okumala ebbanga ddene.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo ngec mapol I tenge me biacara, aniang ni miti na tye I timo biacara. Abedo ka tam I kom cako biacara mega pi kare malac dong.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka adumun amisiarit kotoma akwap naka ikampunin, ajeni eong ebe akoto eong noi aswam ebiasara. Auta eong aomoom nuikamunitos aitegeario naka ebiasara ka bon adaun apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Erini e'yo orodriruni esuzu tujari ma alia 'bori ma vutia, ma esu ra kini e'yo mani le saaru ri tujari 'yezuri ma alia. Ma ebi e'yo ega e'yo ma ma ngulupi ma tujari e'dozuri ma dria sawa ezu 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okutunga obukugu bw'omugasho omu by'obushubuzi,nyetegyereize ngu okukunda kwangye okwabuzima kuri omu by'obushubuzi. Ntwire ninteekateeka kutandikaho ekitongore kyangye kumara obwire.

eng_prompt: All participants have been informed about the schedule. We have finalized the details for the upcoming meeting.
lug_prompt: Abeetabi bonna bategeezeddwa ku nteekateeka. Tumalirizza enteekateeka y'olukiiko olujja.
ach_prompt: Ki niango dano weng ma gubedo tye I yub eni. Watyeko tyeko lok matut I kom kacokke matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Aponi olimokinai itunga kere nuikamunitos ainapeta. Apotu sio adautu akiro nuka airiamunet na ebunit.
lgg_prompt: Ba lu 'ba dria fi'ba 'diyi dri e'yo otita 'da ma dria 'bo. Ama de e'yo dria drifuza emupi ri ma dria 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Abeejumbiremu boona bamanyisibwe enteekateeka. Twamazire ebirikukwata aha rukiiko orurikwija.

eng_prompt: As the event coordinator welcomed the guests, she reminded everyone of the importance of keeping track of attendees. With a warm smile, she gestured towards the table where the visitors' book lay open.
lug_prompt: Nga omukwanaganya w'omukolo ayaniriza abagenyi, yajjukiza buli omu obukulu bw'okukuuma omutindo gw'abazze. Ng'aliko akamwenyumwenyu ak'ebbugumu, yasonga ku mmeeza ekitabo ky'abagenyi we kyali kiggule.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lador yub ne tye ka jolo wele, en opoyo wi dano weng I kom ber pa lubu kor joo ma obedo tye. Ki bwunyo mamwonya tutwal, en oloko I kom meja kama buk pa wele tye iye.
teo_prompt: Neautar eyaiton loka epucit aijaun ipejok, abu ngesi isiitik itunga kere ajokis naka aingic itunga lu ajaas. Keda aimurimuria, abu ngesi kicorak mama ejai emesa loajai eitabo loka ipejok engara.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba omu 'da ma alea ri ni omu eyi ai risi, eri ega 'ba dria eyini orodri 'ba emu'ba 'diyi ma pamvu onezu ri ma dria. Curu'do cinya be, eri fe eceta mesa buku omu eyini 'diyi ma ti opizuri vu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'orikukurira omukoro arikwakiira abagyenyi,akabijusya buri omwe omugasho gw'okukuratira abaizire. N'akamwenyo k'amaani, akareeba aha meeza ahu ekitabo ky'abagyenyi kyabaire kigwire.

eng_prompt: After days without sufficient food supplies, the community gathered in the town square, their faces drawn and weary. The smell of freshly baked bread wafted through the air, intensifying their longing for a meal.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ennaku nga tebalina mmere emala, abantu baakuŋŋaanidde mu kibangirizi ky'ekibuga nga bakooye. Akawoowo k'omugaati ogwali gwakafumbiddwa kaali mu bbanga, ne kibaleetera okwongera okwegomba okulya.
ach_prompt: Ingee nino mapol labongo cam ma oromo, lwak gugure i town square, komgi obedo col dok giol. Ngwec me mugati ma ki tedo manyen obedo kabino I yamo, ma oweko gubedo ki miti matek me camo dek.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apaarasia numam ejaasi keda inyamat luedolitos, apotu itunga kotukokinos kotoma osokoni lo otaun, apasit noi. Abu akinyet naka emugati loitetet kibiror kokwam, ido abu kiyatak kesi eipud loka ainyam inyamat.
lgg_prompt: O'du eyini aa'zu nyaka kokoru 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu eyi tra eyi aku ambu tawuni niri ma alea eyi ma andretia eyini aa'zu andezaru azini andezaru. Mukati 'bani a'di o'diru 'diyiniri ma oli ri aci oli alia, yini ava nyazuri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ebiro bitari by'eby'okurya ebirikumara, abantu baketeeranira omu rurembo baruhire. Akahoho k'omugaati ogwabaire gwaherize kuhingwa kakaba nikongyera aha kyetengo kyabo ky'okurya.

eng_prompt: Everyone is gathered in the conference room, eagerly waiting for the speaker to arrive. The clock on the wall ticks steadily, indicating that it's almost time to start.
lug_prompt: Buli omu akuŋŋaanidde mu kisenge mwe bakuŋŋaanira ng'alindirira sipiika okutuuka. Essaawa ku bbugwe ekuba mpolampola, ekiraga nti obudde bunaatera okutandika.
ach_prompt: Dano weng gugure I ot me cokke kun gitye ka kuro oo pa lalok madit. Cawa matye I kor ot tye ka goyo mot mot, ma nyutu ni kare dong cok me cake.
teo_prompt: Itukokinos itunga kere agola naka airiamun, aidarit noi adolonokin naka eraban. Euta esawa loka arwatat ainang, itodunit ebe eyapie apak na ageun.
lgg_prompt: Ba dria tra yi pari otita imbatani ni 'diyi 'yezuri ma alia, te asi driasi anzenzea ei ni ecazu. Sawa abi driri ma dria ri ni 'da e'dapi kini sa'wa e'dozuri eca 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Buri omwe akung'anire omu kishengye ky'orukiiko, ategyereize sipiika kuhika. Eshaaha aha kisiika neegumizamu, erikworeka ngu obwire buri haihi kutandika.

eng_prompt: The audience was captivated from the moment he stepped onto the stage. As he began to share his insights, it was clear that he had a unique perspective on the topic.
lug_prompt: Abantu baakwatibwako okuva lwe yalinnya ku siteegi. Bwe yatandika okugabana ebirowoozo bye, kyalabika bulungi nti yalina endowooza ey'enjawulo ku nsonga.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ki miti madit tutwal I kare ma en odonyo I wi abam. Ikare ma en ocako tito tamme, nen atyer kamaleng ni en tye ki tam ma kite dok pat I kom lokke.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga ikamunitos akaulo na abwounor ngesi toma ositesen. Neageuna ngesi aimor aomisioke, apotu kojenutu ebe ajaasi ngesi keda aomisioit na itegelikina nuikamunitos akirot ngin.
lgg_prompt: Ba emu'ba 'diyi ovu ndra ayikosi e'dozu sawa erini pa sozu pari avitaniri ma dria 'bori ma vutia. Erini e'doria e'yo erini ega 'diyi ecezurisi, eri e'da kililiru kini eri ma egata e'yo nde ma dria ri ndrizaru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu bakashemezibwa kuruga obu yaahika aha sitegi. Kutyatandikire kugamba ebiteekateeko bye, kikarebeka butunu ngu akaba aine enteekateeka y'omutaano aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: After months of declining sales and increasing expenses, the company faced a dire financial situation. In a difficult decision, the manager realized he had no choice but to make drastic cuts to save the business.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okukendeera kw'ebyamaguzi n'okweyongera kw'ensaasaanya, kampuni yayolekaganye n'embeera y'ensimbi embi. Mu kusalawo okukaluba, maneja yakizuula nti talina kyakukola okuggyako okukendeeza ennyo okusobola okutaasa bizinensi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol ma cat odok piny ki wel cente ma kitiyo kwede omede, dul ne onongo peko me lim. I moko tam matek tutwal, ladit ticce oniang ni pe tye gin mukene ma en twero timone mapat ki dwoko piny rwom me biacara.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luikidioko agwelanar keda aiyatakin ikapun, abu ekampuni kodum ejautene loaronon loka ikapun. Kotoma aomisioit na etiono, abu eyaiton koany ebe emamei ngesi aseunet kilema aitub ikapun luipu kanu ayuwar ebiasara.
lgg_prompt: Mba ma vutia afa oziza ma omgbo esizu azini aje ma omgbo tuzu, amuti nderi esu e'yo ewaru robia ni ma alia. E'yo 'duza ewaru ma alea, 'ba angu ocepirini esu kini eri vu e'yo azi 'yezu yo erini ani ecozu tujari 'da ma ta mbazu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okukyendeera kw'obushubuzi n'okweyongyera kw'enshohoza, kampuni ekashanga oburemeezi bw'esente. Omu kusharamu kugumire, manegya akeetegyereza ngu taine ky'okukora okwihaho okusharamu munonga okukiza bizinesi.

eng_prompt: After the security breach was discovered, all employees were instructed to stay away from their workspaces. When he attempted to enter, the guard informed him of the new restrictions.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'obutabanguko mu by'okwerinda okuzuulibwa, abakozi bonna baalagirwa okwewala ebifo we bakolera. Bwe yagezaako okuyingira, omukuumi yamutegeeza ku bukwakkulizo obupya.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo peko me gwoko kuc, kiwaco ki lutic weng me bedo mabor ki ka ticgi. I kare ma en otemo donyo, lagwok ber bedo owaco bote cik manyen ma ki keto.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na ajenun abilibilio naka ayuwara, aponi kolimokinai eswamak kere ainac aiboisio nu iswamaete kesi. Neatamit ngesi alomar, abu edaran kolimok ngesi nuikamunitos ikisila luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Ba esu 'bani e'yo agei temani 'da ma vutia, 'ba fe azi'ba dria eyini azita aa'zu pari eyini azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea ku. Erini o'bizu fizu 'boria, agu ageitema ni 'yo eri dri e'yo azita o'di 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okujumbura oburemeezi bw'eby'okwerinda, abakozi boona bakahaburwa okwetantara emyanya yaabo y'okukoreramu. Ku yaagyezaho kutaaha, omukuumi akamumanyisa ebiragiro ebitsya.

eng_prompt: After a heated argument with his boss, he realized he had made a grave mistake. In a fit of frustration, he decided to sever all ties with the company.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuyomba ennyo ne mukama we, yakizuula nti yali akoze ensobi ya maanyi. Olw'okunyiiga, yasalawo okukomya enkolagana yonna ne kampuni.
ach_prompt: Inge laro lok matek ki ladit ticce, oniang ni otimo bal madit adada. I kare ma cwinye pe obedo yom, en ongolo wat ki dul ne woko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka epeget keda lokapolonike, abu ngesi kojen ebe eswamat ngesi aibucaret naepol noi. Kotoma anyunyura, abu ngesi kotub arucokina kere keda ekampuni.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako okporu eri ma 'ba amburi be 'bori ma vutia, eri esu ra kini i 'ye e'yo onzi onzi. E'yo ewaru ma alia, eri asi e'yo 'du e'yo yi ogazu amuti 'da be dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhajaana na mukama we, akeetegyereza ngu akakora enshobi y'amaani. Ahabw'okwerarikirira kwe, akasharamu kusharaho enkoragana ye na kampuni.

eng_prompt: After much deliberation and weighing his options, he realized that his health was suffering due to the long hours. Ultimately, he made the difficult decision to prioritize his well-being.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo n'okulowooza ku ky'ayinza okusalawo, yakizuula nti obulamu bwe bwali butawaanyizibwa olw'essaawa empanvu. Mu nkomerero, yakola okusalawo okukaluba okukulembeza obulungi bwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut ki tamo I kom ngo ma en twero timone, en oniang ni yotkom mege tye ka canne pi cawa malac ma en tiyo. I agiki ne, en omoko tam matek tutwal me keto ber bedo mege obed mukwongo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom noi keda aomoom nuipedori ngesi aswam, abu ngesi kojen ebe ejai angaleuke ationis kanuka isawan luipu. Kawasia abu ngesi iswama aseunet na etiono kanu aisingarenit aijarake.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'duza angiri ma vutia azini e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri esu ra kini eri ma rua ma alata ni candi isu sawa ezu ri ma e'yosi. Asizu, eri 'du e'yo ewaru e'yo erini aa'zu onyiru ri 'duzu okori'i.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteekateeka munonga n'okushwijuma eby'okukora, akeetegyereza ngu amagara gye gakaba garwaire ahabw'okukora eshaaha nyingi. Ekyarugiremu, akakora encwamu egumire y'okwebembeza oburungi bwe.

eng_prompt: After months of increasing pressure and unrealistic expectations, I finally reached my breaking point. When I received the news about my suspension, I felt a mix of disbelief and frustration.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okunyigirizibwa n'okusuubira ebintu ebitali bituufu, nnatuuka we nnali sikyasobola. Bwe nnafuna amawulire agakwata ku kuyimirizibwa kwange, nnawulira obutali bwesigwa n'okunyiiga.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me bedo I lyeto ki bedo ki gen ma pe atir, I agikine onongo dong atye ka tur woko. I kare ma anongo lok angea me ryem-ma, cwinya pe obedo yom dok cwinya pe obedo yom.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aiyalongong keda aomisio nu mam abeit, abu eong adolok aiboisit naebwounitor eong. Neabu eong adum iyemuto ebe aponi irengiarai eong, abu eong apupi amamut aiyuun keda aiyalongong.
lgg_prompt: Mba eyi ma vutia okpo tupi azini e'yo 'bani ega e'yo adaru 'diyi pie, ma ca asizu angu mani asizu ri ma alea ra. Mani o'duko esuzu e'yo 'bani ma ofuzuri ma dria 'bori ma vutia, ma ama asi e'yo a'izaru tualu asi nyoza be.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'oburemeezi obweyongyeire hamwe n'ebiteekateeko ebitahikire, nkaheza kuhika aha nshonga yangye y'okuhenda. Ku natungire amahurire g'okubingwa kwangye, nkahurira obutetegyereza hamwe n'okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing recognition of the importance of sustainable agriculture. As a result, governments and private investors are increasingly channeling funds into the farming sector.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okweyongera okutegeera obukulu bw'obulimi n'obulunzi obuwangaazi. N'ekivuddemu, gavumenti ne bamusigansimbi ab'obwannannyini beeyongera okusindika ensimbi mu byobulimi.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol dong guniang ber pa pur. Macalo adwogi ne, gamente kacel ki lutim biacara ma pe jenge I kom gamente tye ka keto lim I tenge me pur.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejenuna noi ajokis naka akoru na ejok. Kanuka ngun, euta apugan keda itunga luipikakinete ikapun toma orionget loka akor.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba eyi esu e'yo orodri agirikica ewu drialeri ma alea ri niri ra. E'yo 'disi, gamete eyi tualu 'ba lonyi vuti ale'ba 'diyi pie robia ayu esele agirikica niri ma alea tutu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu beeyongyeire kumanya omugasho gw'obuhingi n'oburiisa. N'ekyarugiremu,gavumenti hamwe n'abashubuzi ab'abantu buntu beyongyeire kuta esente omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, it is crucial to recognize the potential and resilience of individuals seeking safety. By providing support and resources, we can help them rebuild their lives and contribute to society.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, kikulu nnyo okumanya obusobozi n'obuvumu bw'abantu abanoonya obukuumi. Nga tubawa obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa, tusobola okubayamba okuddamu okuzimba obulamu bwabwe n'okuyamba ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal me niang kero ki kero pa dano matye ka yenyo gwok. Ka wamiyo kony ki jami ma mite, watwero konyogi me roco kwo gi ki miyo kony bot lwak.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu atiokisio, ejokuna noi ajenun apedor ka agogong naka itunga lu ekotosi ayuwara. Kowai lo aijanakin agangat keda iboro, ipedori oni aingarakin kes aiduk bobo aijar kec ka aingarakin itunga.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, eri orodriru 'ba eyi ma okpo azini okpo 'ba eyi ma ngulupi eyini tambaza ndazu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu. Atita azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezurisi, ama eco yi ma aza ko yi ma edri si dika afa fe ongulumu eyini ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, nikikuru kumanya obushoboorozi n'obwegyendesereza bw'abantu abarikusherura oburinzi. Twabahereza obuhwezi n'ebintu, nitubaasa kubahwera kugaruka kwombeka amagara gaabo n'okuhwera abantu.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for sustainable farming practices, the government has announced a new initiative. As part of this initiative, agricultural projects will be funded.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okulima n'okulunda mu ngeri ey'obutebenkevu, gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka empya. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, pulojekiti z'ebyobulimi zijja kuweebwa ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti me tic ki diro me pur ma gwoko kwo pa dano, gamente okatti ki yub manyen. Macalo but yub man, kibi keto lim I yub me pur.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka akoru na ejokuna, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, eponio aijaikin ipurojektin lu akoru ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu 'ba amvu 'yapi sa'wa driasi 'diyi ma tambazu, gamete azi e'yo azi o'di ni. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba nga robia fe otita agirikica ni 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka nsya ahabw'okwenda kw'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ebirikugumaho. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, purogyekiti z'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa niziija kuheebwa esente.

eng_prompt: Participants gathered to enhance their skills and share ideas. Excitement filled the air as the date for the workshop approached.
lug_prompt: Abeetabamu baakuŋŋaanye okutumbula obukugu bwabwe n'okugabana ebirowoozo. Essanyu lyajjula mu bbanga ng'olunaku lw'omusomo lusembera.
ach_prompt: Dano ma gubedo tye gucokke me medo diro gi ki nywako tam gi. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma nino me kacoke me pwonye ne cok.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga lu ajaas atukokinos kanu aitojokar acoasineikec ka aimor aomisiokec. Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos neyapiete apaarasia nuka airiamun.
lgg_prompt: Ba emu'ba 'diyi tra yi ma ondua otuzu azini yi ma egata awazu. Ayiko fu angu ma alea o'du otita imbatani 'da ni ecazu ogogo risi.
nyn_prompt: Abeejumbiremu baketeerana kutunguura emyoga yaabo n'okubagana ebiteekateeko. Abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabwokuba eizooba ry'omushomo rikaba riri haihi kuhika.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance practical skills and foster collaboration among students, the university administration has planned a series of educational events. The first of these initiatives is a students' workshop aimed at addressing key academic and professional development topics.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obukugu n'enkolagana mu bayizi, abaddukanya yunivasite bategese emikolo egy'enjawulo egy'okusomesa. Ekisooka ku bino bye misomo gy'abayizi egigendereddwamu okwogera ku nsonga enkulu mu by'ensoma n'okukulaakulana mu by'ekikugu.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo diro me tic cing ki dongo ribe ikin lutino kwan, ludito me gang kwan me yunibaciti guyubu yub me pwonye mapol. Me acel I kin yub magi obedo kacoke me pwonye pa lutino kwan ma obedo ki miti me lok I kom lok mapigi tego I kom dongo kwan ki diro me tic.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong aitutuoro ka aisinyikokit aiswamanara kanejaas esisiak, etemokinit eyaitene loka eunibasite aswamisio nuipu. Nasodit kotoma ainapeta nu ngesi airiamun naka esisiak kanu aitemitem akiro nuepolok nuikamunitos apol naka asioman keda aswam.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ondua afa edele drisi 'diyiniri otuzu azini ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea, driceza univasiti niri otu e'yo onita ni 'diyi karakara. Otita 'diyi ma oko ri otita imbatani sukulu anzi eyini 'bani lezu e'yo okporu onita ma dria azini e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma ezota ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura emyoga n'okukwatanisa omu beegi, abarikukurira yunivasite batebekaniise emikoro mingi y'okwegyesa. Eky'okubanza aha nteekateeka ezi n'omushomo gw'abeegi ogugyendereire kukora aha nshonga nkuru z'okutunguuka omuby'obwegyese hamwe n'eby'emikono.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing agricultural landscape, many farmers are facing new challenges and uncertainties. To navigate these complexities effectively, they require expert support and direction.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobulimi ekyukakyuka ennyo leero, abalimi bangi boolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okupya n'obutali bukakafu. Okutambuza ebizibu bino obulungi, byetaaga obuyambi n'obulagirizi bw'abakugu.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma pur tye ka loke oyot-oyot tutwal, lupur mapol gitye ka nongo peko ki peko mapol. Me tic maber i kom peko magi, mite ni omyero gunong kony ki kony pa ludiro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka akoru loka lolo, etereikina akoriok keda atiokisio nuitetiak. Kanu aitolot atiokisio nu ejok, ekotosi kesi agangat keda aingarenikinio kama ejaasi ipirioitin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agirikica ni curu'do ojapi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea, 'ba karakara amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi esu. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma ti ojizu kililiru, eyi le atita azini imbata 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa ebirikuhinduka juba, abahingi n'abariisa nibatunga oburemeezi butari bumwe na bumwe. Okukoresa gye ebintu ebi, nibyetenga obuhwezi n'obwebembezi bw'abakugu.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for food production, the government has implemented new agricultural policies. As a result, more land has been provided for farmers.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'emmere obweyongera, gavumenti etaddewo enkola empya mu byobulimi. N'ekivuddemu, abalimi n'abalunzi baweereddwa ettaka eddala.
ach_prompt: Pi miti me cam matye kamede, gamente okatti ki cik manyen me pur. Macalo adwogi ne, kimiyo ngom mapol ki lupur.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo eyatakin lo akoru inyamat, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuitetiak nuka akor. Kanuka ngun, ijaikitai akoriok alupok nuipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu nyaka ma ezoza ma omgbo tuzu ri ma aza kozu, gamete 'ba azita agirikica ni o'diru 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi dri nyaku angiri.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti etandikireho engyenderwaho nsya y'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa ahabw'obwetaavu bw'eby'okurya obweyongyeire. N'ekyarugiremu, abahingi bahairwe eitaka erindi.

eng_prompt: In recent years, conflicts and natural disasters have displaced millions of people around the world. As a result, the number of individuals seeking safety and a better life has surged dramatically.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, entalo n'obutyabaga bw'obutonde bisengudde obukadde n'obukadde bw'abantu okwetooloola ensi yonna. N'ekivuddemu, omuwendo gw'abantu abanoonya obukuumi n'obulamu obulungi gweyongedde nnyo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lweny ki peko ma poto atura oryemo dano milion mapol tutwal I wilobo. Macalo adwogi ne, wel dano matye ka yenyo gwok ki kwo maber omede tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apotu ingungeta keda atiokisio nuka isuban ijaikisi imilionin luka itunga aibwot kotoma akwap kere. Kanuka ngun, eyatakin enaaba loka itunga luekotosi ayuwara keda aijar najokan noi.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, ngiringiri azini e'yo ewaru nyakuni 'diyi ofu 'ba milioni karakara wudrikuru ma alea ndulu. E'yo 'disi, kalafe 'ba yi ma ngulupisi ageitema ndapi azini idri muke ndeni ri ma omgbo tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, entaro hamwe n'ebihikiirizi bitengwire abantu baingi omu nsi yoona. N'ekyarugiremu, omuhendo gw'abantu abarikuronda oburinzi n'amagara marungi gweyongyeire munonga.

eng_prompt: Farmers often seek ways to maximize their income, and one effective strategy is to focus on cultivating specific types of plants. By choosing the right varieties, they can tap into lucrative markets and significantly increase their earnings.
lug_prompt: Abalimi batera okunoonya engeri y'okwongera ku nnyingiza yaabwe, era enkola emu ennungi kwe kussa essira ku kulima ebika by'ebimera ebimu. Bwe balonda ebika ebituufu, basobola okufuna akatale akalungi n'okwongera ku nnyingiza yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Lupur ipol kare gi yenyo yoo me medo cente gi, ki yoo acel maber aye me keto cwiny gi i kom puru kwai jami apita mapat-pat. Kace guyero kwai kodi mabeco, gitwero nongo cuk ma kelo cente madwong dok bene gi medo cente gi tutwal.
teo_prompt: Etapit akoriok aimo iponesio lu iyatakina ikapunukec, ido epone ediope lo iswamai ejok ngesi airaikin ikorion lu icie. Kowai lo aseun iponesio luajokak, epedorete kesi adolokin esokoni loepol noi kosodete aiyatakin edumune kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi tutuni geri nda eyini ani robia eyini esu ri ma omgbo otuzu, dika geri azi orodriru 'diyi ma azi eri asi 'bazu ori ndundu eyi ma ezota ma dria. Geri yini ori wura kililiru 'diyi opezurisi, yi eco cu orodriru 'diyi esu azini yi ma robia ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abahingi n'abariisa nibaronda oburyo bw'okwongyera aha ntaatsya yaabo, kandi enkora nungi n'okwemereza amaani omu kuhinga ebika by'ebihingirwe ebimwe. Kurabira omu kutoorana ebika ebihikire, nibabaasa kwejumba omu butare burungi kandi bongyere aha ntatsya yaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to combat climate change and improve air quality, the local community organized a tree-planting event. Volunteers gathered to contribute to the initiative, bringing shovels and saplings to the designated area.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa enkyukakyuka y'obudde n'okutumbula omutindo gw'empewo, abantu b'omu kitundu baategeka omukolo gw'okusimba emiti. Bannakyewa baakuŋŋaanye okuwaayo ssente mu kaweefube, nga baleeta ebibbo n'ensukusa mu bifo ebyateekebwawo.
ach_prompt: I tute me lweny i kom alokaloka pa piny ki yubu rwom me yamo, lwak guyubu yub me pito yadi. Dano ma odyere gugure me miyo cente pi yub eni kun gikelo pala ki yadi i kabedo ma kiyubu pi yub eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitikitik aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae ka aitojokar ekwam, apotu itunga luka atutubet itemonokisi aira ikito. Apotu itunga lu engarakinete kesi kotukokinos kanu aigang aswamisioit ngin, ayangautu iboro keda iraan aiboisit naitemokinitai.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu a'di 'dizu angu mile ma ojata be azini oli ma wura otuzu, ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu omu pati saza niri ra. Ba owi'ba 'diyi tra eyi robia fezu e'yo 'da ma dria, eyi eji kalafe azini ori eyi angu 'bani ope 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa empindahinduka y'obwire n'okutunguura omutindo gw'omwika, abantu b'omukyanga bakatebekanisa omukoro gw'okubyara emiti. Abarikwehayo baketeeranira hamwe kuhayo ahabw'ekigyendererwa ekyo, barikureeta ebikoomi n'emiti omu mwanya ogwabaire guretsirwe.

ach_prompt: Inge ngiyo kit ma camgi tye kwede, lupur oniang ni omyero gi nya poto gi. Me neno ni kac tye maber ikare me kac mabino, gumoko tamgi me medo cente gi I pito kodi mukene.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka awanyanar ejautene loka iraanakec, apotu akoriok kojenutu ebe ibusakinit kesi aitanyanyar amisirin kec. Kanu awanyun ebe epote kesi aisak ikorion luipu apakio nu etupakini, apotu kesi koseutu aipikakin ikito luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ba ori ezo'baa 'diyi ma rua ala ori yini 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu ra kini le eyi ma edri eyi ma amvu eyi ma kalafe ra. O'du emupi ri ma alea ori okuzu angiri, eyi 'du e'yo robia ayuzu ori azi eyi ma ezoza ma alea dika.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, the agricultural expert discussed various methods to improve crop yields and sustainability. He emphasized the importance of diversifying their farming practices to enhance resilience against market fluctuations.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko, abakugu mu byobulimi baakubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'okutumbula amakungula n'okuyimirizaawo. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukyuusa mu nnima zaabwe okusobola okugumira enkyukakyuka mu katale.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke, ludiro me pur guloko i kom yoo mapat-pat me medo rwom me kac ki dongo pa jami apita. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa diro me pur ma padi padi wek okony gi me cung matek I kom aloka loka me cuk.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet kangin, apotu ipirioitin lu akoru kitetemoto iwaitin lu itojokaret isakan keda aijar. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aijulakin iponesio luka akor kec tetere epedorete aitikitik aijulanakineta nuka esokoni.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, 'ba onita angiri be e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi agbatara gba geri ndundu eyini ecozu ori eyi ma ori eyi ma omgbo otuzu azini eyi ma ta mbazu ewu drialeri ma alea ra 'diyi ma dria. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okukoresa emiringo etari emwe n'emwe y'obuhingi n'oburiisa kwenda kwongyera amaani omu kuhikaana n'empindahinduka y'akatare.

eng_prompt: After a season of favorable weather conditions and diligent care, the fields flourished with abundant crops. As a result, the local economy is expected to thrive.

ach_prompt: Inge kare ma piny obedo ber dok ki gwoko maber, poto opito cam madwong. Macalo adwogi ne, byek tye ni biacara me tedero obi dongo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apakio nu ejokuka nuka ekuse ka etepe ka aidar ejok, apotu iraan lukokutu keda iraan luipu noi. Kanuka ngun, eomitai ebe ebuni edumune loka ikapun kotoma atutubet apoloun.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa angu mile ni aa'zu muke ri ma vutia azini angu ma ta mbaza kililiru ri ma vutia, amvu 'da eyi zo ori eyi ma omgbo angiri si. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ega e'yo robiani angu 'da ma alea 'diyi nga zo ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obwire bw'obwire burungi n'okureeberera kurungi, emisiri ekakurakurana n'ebihingirwe bingi. N'ekyarugiremu, entaasya y'ekyaro neeza kutunguuka.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing conflict and instability in their home countries, many displaced individuals found themselves in need of sustainable livelihoods. To help them adapt to their new environment, local organizations offered guidance on various skills, including agriculture.
lug_prompt: Olw'obukuubagano obugenda mu maaso n'obutali butebenkevu mu nsi zaabwe, abantu bangi abaasengulwa beesanga nga beetaaga okweyimirizaawo okw'olubeerera. Okubayamba okumanyiira embeera yaabwe empya, ebitongole by'omu kitundu byawa obulagirizi ku bukugu obw'enjawulo omuli n'obulimi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lweny matye kawot anyim ki peko me kuc I lobogi, dano mapol ma orwenyo gangi gi gunongo ni gimito yoo me kwo maber. Me konyogi me ngi ki kabedo gi manyen, dul mapat-pat me tedero gumiyo pwony i kom diro mapat-pat, ma I kingi obedo pur.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ingungeta keda amamus na ainapakina kotoma akwapin kec, apotu ikerai luipu odumutu ebe ekotos aijar na ejok. Kanu aingarakin kes ajenun aiboisio kec nuitetiak, apotu iriongeta luka atutubet ijaikisi kesi aicoreta nuikamunitos acoasinei nuegelegela, aimoriarit akoru.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni muzu drile azini e'yo ewaru yi vile kari akua 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, 'ba karakara emunyaleru 'diyi esu yi ma ngulupi le geri yini ecozu yi ma idri ta mbazuri ra. Yi ma aza kozu yi ojazu angu yi vile o'diru 'diyi ma alia, amuti angu ma alia 'diyi fe imbata ondua ndu ndu yi ma dria, alenia agirikica ma dria indi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko n'obutabanguko oburiyo nibubaho omu mahanga gaabo, abantu baingi ababingirwe omu maka gaabo, bakeeshangira nibetenga oburugo burungi. Okubahwera kumanyiira embeera yaabo ensya, ebitongore by'ebyaro bikabaha obuhabuzi aha myoga etari emwe, otwariiremu n'ey'obuhingi n'oburiisa.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the growing demand for organic eggs and chicken, the farmers decided to expand their operations. After conducting thorough market research, they concluded that poultry farming presented a lucrative opportunity.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya obwetaavu obweyongera obw'amagi n'enkoko ebikoleddwa mu butonde, abalimi baasalawo okugaziya emirimu gyabwe. Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo ku katale, baatuuka ku kusalawo nti okulunda enkoko mukisa gwa maanyi.
ach_prompt: Lupur gumoko tamgi me medo ticgi pien ni miti me cato tong gweno ki gweno ma kiyubu maber tye ka medde. Ingee timo kwed matut I kom cuk, gumoko ni gwoko gweno obedo gum maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Nawanyunia kesi eipud loka abeei keda akokorei, apotu akoriok kiyatakisi aswamukec. Akaulo naka aingic esokoni, apotu kesi kongicutu ebe erai aipit akokorei arereng najokan noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba amvu 'ya'ba 'diyi ni e'yo 'ba eyini lezu 'ba eyi ma gbe eyi ma ta mbazu azini au eyi pie ri ma omgbo ni tuzu 'bori ma e'yosi, eyi asi e'yo 'du eyi ma tujari ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo vuti ondaza cuu ma dria ri ma vutia, eyi esu e'yo kini aria eyi ma tambaza eri drileba azi orodriru ni i.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya obwetago bw'amahuri n'enkoko, abahingi bakasharamu kwongyera aha mirimo yaabo. Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi akatare,bakahendera ngu okuriisa enkoko n'omugisha murungi.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and discussions, the team finally secured the necessary approvals. With all preparations in place, they were eager to get started.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, ttiimu yasembye okufuna olukusa. Nga enteekateeka zonna zitegekeddwa, baali beesunga okutandika.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki nywako lok, dul ne dong gunongo twero ma mite. Ki yub weng matye, gubedo ki miti matek me cako tic.

lgg_prompt: Mba otuta 'yezu azini agbatara gbazu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da esu asizu rukusa 'bani lele 'diyi ra. Otuta dria ma vutia, eyi ndra avaru e'dozu.

eng_prompt: As the weather patterns shifted and the clouds gathered, agricultural experts noted the ideal conditions for planting. With the arrival of the monsoon, timely sowing could lead to a bountiful harvest.
lug_prompt: Ng'embeera y'obudde ekyuka n'ebire ne byeyongera, abakugu mu byobulimi baalaba embeera ennungi ey'okusimba. Ekiseera ky'obutiti bwe kituuka, okusiga mu budde kisobola okuvaamu amakungula mangi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma piny olokke ki pol pa pol, ludiro me pur guneno kabedo maber me pur. Kace kare me monsoon oromo, pito kodi ikare ki kome twero kelo kac madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Nejulakinor ekuse loka ikwamin kosodi apolor akwap, apotu ipiriotin luka akor kowanyutu ejautene loajokan noi loka akoru. Keda abongunet naka akwap, akoru kotoma apak epedori ayangaun aisak ikorion luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile ni i ojazu azini o'duko eyini tuzu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba onita be e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ndre geri onyiru 'bani ori sazu 'diyi ma dria. Ayi ti ni ecaria, ori saza sa'wa dria ri eco fe ori okuza angiri ni.
nyn_prompt: Embeera y'obwire kuyabaire neehinduka kandi ebire nibyeyongyera, abakugu omu by'obuhingi n'oburiisa bakareeba embeera nungi y'okuhingamu. Ahabw'okwija kw'obwire bw'obwire, okubyara omu bwire, nikibaasa kurugwamu amasharuura maingi.

eng_prompt: After months of anticipation and preparation, fans gathered at the stadium, eager to witness the kickoff of the season. Teams had been training hard, and the excitement in the air was palpable.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'emyezi gy'okusuubira n'okwetegeka, abawagizi bakungaanidde mu kisaawe nga beesunga okulaba entandikwa ya sizoni. Ttiimu zaabadde zitendekebwa nnyo era essanyu mu bbanga lyali lirabika.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me kuro ki yubbe, lucwak gugure I bar tuku, ma cwinygi obedo yom me neno acaki pa kare me tuku. Tim ne gubedo ka pwonye matek tutwal dok yom-cwiny ma obedo I yamo onongo nen tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemonokino keda aitemonokin, apotu amaak kotukokinos oisawe, ekotosi asesen ageunet naka abolia. Autasi itimun aituutoonor kagogong, ido apol noi aiyalama kotoma okwam.
lgg_prompt: Mba ma vutia, 'ba atita fepi 'diyi tra yi pari avita ni 'diyi ma alia avasi abala avita ni 'diyi ma e'dota ndrezu. Amuti avitani 'diyi ebi yi otu avasi, azini ayiko oli alia ri ndra e'dazaru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okweteekateekyera, abahagizi baketeeranira omu kishayi, baine ekihika ky'okureeba entandikwa ya sizooni. Tiimu zikaba zitendekirwe munonga kandi okushemererwa kukarebeka omu mwanya.

eng_prompt: After a series of disappointing performances and growing tensions within the squad, the management decided to take decisive action. In a meeting held earlier today, the players expressed their concerns about the coach's strategies and leadership.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'okukola ebintu ebimalamu amaanyi n'obunkenke obweyongera mu ttiimu, abaddukanya ttiimu baasalawo okubaako kyebakola. Mu lukiiko olwatudde leero ku makya, abazannyi balaze okweraliikirira kwabwe ku bukodyo n'obukulembeze bw'omutendesi.
ach_prompt: Inge tuko ma pe obedo ber ki telle matye kamedde I kin lutuku, ludito odilo gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. I kacoke ma obedo con tin, lutuku gunyutu lworo gi i kom diro ki tela pa lapwony tuku.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aswamisio nuipu nu mam iswamaete ejok keda aiyalongong kotoma aboliak, abu eyaitene koseu aswam nuepedori kere. Kotoma airiamunet na ajai lolo, apotu aboliak itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu iwaitin lu etuutooron keda eingarenone.
lgg_prompt: E'yo avita ni 'diyi ma vutia, e'yo asi otiza ni tupi amuti avita ni 'diyi ma eselea, driceza amuti avita ni 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo okporu 'yezu. Mitingi 'bani 'ye andru drioru ri ma alea, 'ba avitani 'diyi ece asi otiza yini geri embapi mupira ni 'diyi ma dria tualu driceza be.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okukora kubi munonga hamwe n'obunkenke obweyongyeire omu tiimu, abarikureeberera tiimu bakacwamu kukora eky'amaani. Omu rukiiko orwabaireho erizooba, abazaani boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo aha bukoryo n'obwebembezi bw'omutendeki.

eng_prompt: Despite their strong performance throughout the season, the players had high hopes for this crucial match. They had prepared extensively, believing they could secure a victory in front of their loyal fans.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga baazannye bulungi sizoni yonna, abazannyi baalina essuubi ddene mu mupiira guno omukulu. Baali beetegese nnyo nga balowooza nti bajja kuwangula mu maaso g'abawagizi baabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lutuku gutimo maber tutwal I kare me pyem tuku, lutuko gubedo ki gen madit tutwal I kom tuku man ma pire tek tutwal. Guyube matek tutwal, kun gitye ki gen ni gibiloyo I nyim lucwakgi ma lugen.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamata kesi ejok noi kapak naka abolia, ajaasi aboliak keda amuno naepol noi kanuka abolia na naepol noi. Apotu kesi itemonokinos noi, iyuunitos kesi ebe epedorete kesi aitelekaar koingaren egangitokokec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini avita 'yezu onyiru sa'wa driasi ri ma talasi, 'ba avitani 'diyi ma asi'baza abala okporu 'di ma dria angiri. Eyi otu eyi saaru a'ita be eyini egazu eyini ecozu agata esuzu 'ba eyini atita fepi 'diyi ma drilea ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okukora kurungi kwabo omu siizoni yoona, abazaani bakaba baine amatsiko maingi aha muzaano gw'amaani ogu. Bakaba beeteekateekire munonga, barikwikiriza ngu nibabaasa kusingura omu maisho g'abahagizi baabo.

eng_prompt: Success on the field is crucial for any sports organization. When players perform well and secure victories, the joy of the fans is palpable.
lug_prompt: Obuwanguzi mu kisaawe bwa mugaso nnyo eri ekitongole ky'ebyemizannyo kyonna. Abazannyi bwe bazannya obulungi ne bafuna obuwanguzi, essanyu ly'abawagizi lirabika.
ach_prompt: Loc I bar tuko obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I dul tuku mo keken. Ka lutuku gutuko maber dok guloyo pyem, yomcwiny pa lucwak tuku nen atyer kamaleng.
teo_prompt: Akerianut kotoma oisawe erai ibore yenepol noi kama ejaasi atukot naka aboliasio. Karai iswamaete aboliak ejok kosodete aitelekaar, eyalamasi amaak noi.

ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka poto I wii kwer, ngwec me jami acama ki dek ma ki tedo manyen opong I yamo. Ki miti madit tutwal me neno tekwaro pa lutedero, wele gubedo ki miti madit tutwal me nongo jami acama mapat-pat me acama.

lgg_prompt: Etuka ni ecaria omu 'da ma dria, arosi afa ndundu eyi ma dria azini nyaka 'bani a'di o'diru 'diyiniri ga angu ma alea tre. Asi 'baza be e'yo suruni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria, omu 'da eyi o'bi afa dria e'dozu nyaka nyazaru 'diyi ma dria kpere nyaka nyazaru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwahikire aha mukoro, akahoho k'ebihimba hamwe n'eby'okurya ebisya bikaijura omumwanya. Ahabw'okugira ekihika ky'okureeba eby'obuhangwa bw'ekyaro, abagyenyi bakanywa buri kimwe kuruga aha by'okurya ebirimu oburo n'eby'okunywa ebirimu oburo.

eng_prompt: The vibrant atmosphere of the music festival drew a diverse crowd, showcasing the universal appeal of music. People of all generations came together to celebrate their shared love for the art form.
lug_prompt: Embeera ennungi mu kivvulu ky'ennyimba yasikiriza abantu ab'enjawulo, ekiraga okusikiriza kw'ennyimba mu nsi yonna. Abantu ab'emyaka egy'enjawulo baakuŋŋaana wamu okujaguza okwagala kwabwe eri eby'emikono.
ach_prompt: Kwee ma obedo tye I yub me wer ne okelo dano mapol ma onyuto ber pa wer. Dano ma mwakagi pat pat gubino kacel me kwero mar ma gubedo kwede I kom cal.
teo_prompt: Apolou naka epucit loka ayoere abu koyangau itunga luegelegela, itodunit epone loajokan noi loka ayoere. Apotu itunga lu atekerin kere kimorikikinos ainumunum aminakec nejai aputosia.
lgg_prompt: Angu ndrizaru omu ongo ni 'da ma alea ri eji 'ba karakara eyi e'dazu e'yo ongo ni 'ba dria 'diyi dri ri. Ba ewu dria ma alea 'diyi emu tualu eyi ma leta e'yo e'da gbaza ni 'diyi ma dria ri inzizu.
nyn_prompt: Embeho y'omukoro gw'okweshongora ekareeta abantu b'emiringo mingi, ekyoreka oburungi bw'okweshongora omu bantu boona. Abantu b'emirembe yoona, bakaza hamwe okujaguza rukundo yaabo ey'eby'emikono.

eng_prompt: As society evolves, generational differences often emerge in values and beliefs. This is particularly evident in the way various age groups perceive and prioritize cultural traditions.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu bwe kikulaakulana, enjawulo mu mirembe n'enzikiriza zitera okuvaayo. Kino kyeyolekera nnyo mu ngeri abantu ab'emyaka egy'enjawulo gye batwalamu n'engeri gye bakulembezaamu eby'obuwangwa.
ach_prompt: Ka lwak tye ka dongo, apoka-poka me kare ki kare bedo tye I kom jami ma pigi tego ki niyee. Man nen tutwalle I kit ma dul mwaka mapat-pat neno kwede tekwaro.
teo_prompt: Nejulanakinor itunga, epote atiaketait naka itunga kotoma aiyuunikec keda iyuunikec. Ecai na noi kotoma epone loesesenete itunga luka ikar luegelegela ka aisingarenit nuka inonosio.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini zoria, esele coza ewu drialeri ma alea ri ni e'da e'yo orodri ni azini a'ita ni 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'di e'da kililiru geri 'ba eli ndundu 'diyi ni e'yo a'bini 'diyi 'duzu azini e'yo a'bini 'diyi 'duzu okporu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikugyenda nibahinduka, entaaniso y'eminyeeto neetandika omu migasho n'enyikiriza. Eki nikyerekwa munonga omu muringo ogu abantu b'emyaka etari emwe n'emwe barikureeba n'okwebembeza eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: The aroma of delicious dishes filled the air as guests mingled and laughed together. As the sun began to set, the buffet was unveiled, showcasing a feast that promised to delight every palate.
lug_prompt: Akawoowo k'emmere ewooma kajjula empewo ng'abagenyi beeyiwa era nga baseka wamu. Enjuba bwe yatandika okugwa, ekijjulo kyatongozebwa, nga kiraga ekijjulo ekyasuubiza okusanyusa buli muntu.
ach_prompt: Ngwec pa dek mamit opong I yamo I kare ma wele gubedo ka nywako lok dok bene gubedo ka nyero kacel. Ikare ma ceng ocako poto, ki yabo ot cam, ma onyuto karama ma ocikke me yomo cwiny dano weng.
teo_prompt: Apotu akinyet naka inyamat luajokak kilelebunos kokwam najaar ipejok kosodete akwena nepepe. Neageuna akolong aibiror, aponi kitegearai epucit loepedori aisiyalamikin itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Afa nyaka ndrizaru 'diyi ma oli ga oli alia 'ba omuru 'diyi ni yi osuzu azini guzu tualuri ma alia. E'yo etuka ni e'doria 'boria, 'ba e'do nyaka 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi e'da nyaka nyaza 'bani owizu ayiko fezu 'ba dria eyidri ri e'dazu.
nyn_prompt: Akahoho k'eby'okurya akarungi kakaija omu mwanya, abagyenyi barikushekyerera hamwe n'okushekyerera hamwe. Eizooba ku ryatandikire kurenga, eby'okurya bikatongozibwa, ebirikworeka embaga erikuraganisa kushemeza buri muntu.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various cultures have developed unique ways to create music using the resources available to them. This often led to the use of natural materials found in their environment.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, obuwangwa obw'enjawulo bufunye engeri ez'enjawulo ez'okukola ennyimba nga bakozesa ebintu ebiriwo. Kino kyaviirako okukozesa ebintu eby'obutonde ebisangibwa mu butonde.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro weng, tekwaro mapat-pat guyubu yoo mapat-pat me yubu wer kun gitiyo ki jami ma gitye kwede. Man pol kare kelo tic ki jami ma aa ki icwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo, etolomutu inonosio iponesio luitegelikina luka aitolom ikososinei itwasamaete iboro lu ejaas kesi. Abu ngin koyangau aitwasam iboro lu iswamao kotoma akwapukec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, suruni ndundu eyi e'do geri ndundu eyini ecozu ongo edezu afa eyini 'diyi ayuzu. E'yo 'di fe 'bani afa nyakuni 'bani isu angu yi ma ageia 'diyi ayuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, eby'obuhangwa bingi bitungire emiringo y'omutaano y'okukora ebyeshongoro barikukoresa ebintu ebi biine. Eki kikareetaho okukoresa ebintu eby'obuhangwa ebirikushangwa omu myanya yaabo.

eng_prompt: Uganda's rich musical heritage is reflected in its diverse array of artists. Among them, some stand out for their unique ability to capture the essence of traditional sounds.
lug_prompt: Eky'obuwangwa kya Uganda eky'okuyimba kyeyolekera mu bayimbi baayo ab'enjawulo. Mu byo, ebimu bivaayo olw'obusobozi bwabyo obw'enjawulo okukwata amakulu g'amaloboozi g'obuwangwa.
ach_prompt: Anywali me Uganda tye ki luwer ma dwong tutwal. I kingi, mukene pat ki mukene pi kero gi me mako dwon tekwaro.
teo_prompt: Erai Uganda akwap naejaasi keda ikososinei luegelegela luejaasi keda awook luegelegela. Kanejaas kesi, icie kes itegelikina kanu apedor kec naka aikamun akiro nuikamunitos ikososinei lu atekerin.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma e'yo ongo ni 'diyi e'da 'ba ongo ngopi kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. Eyi ma eselea, 'ba azi 'diyi e'da eyi ma okpo wura ndusi eyini ecozu e'yo a'di ni 'diyi 'duzu.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhangwa bwa Uganda omu by'okweshongora nibyorekwa omu kweshongora kw'abeeshongozi b'emiringo mingi. Omuri byo, ebimwe nibyetegyerezibwa ahabw'obushoboorozi bwabyo obw'omutaano obw'okukwata enshonga nkuru y'ebyeshongoro by'enzaarwa.

eng_prompt: The annual community festival showcased a variety of performances, highlighting the talents of both local and visiting musicians. As the event progressed, it became clear that the local music groups were particularly enthusiastic about sharing their repertoire.
lug_prompt: Ekivvulu ky'ekitundu ekya buli mwaka kyalaga ebivvulu eby'enjawulo, nga biraga ebitone by'abayimbi b'omu kitundu n'abagenyi. Omukolo bwe gwagenda mu maaso, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti ebibiina by'abayimbi ebya wano byali bya kwagala nnyo okugabana eby'okuyimba byabwe.
ach_prompt: Yub me caro man ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka nyutu yub mapat-pat ma nyutu diro pa lugo wer me tedero kacel ki lugo wer ma gubino ka winyo wer. Ikare ma yub ne tye ka wot anyim, nen atyer kamaleng ni lugoo wee me tedero gubedo ki miti madit tutwal me nywako wer gi.
teo_prompt: Abu epucit loka itunga kangol karu itodiar aswamisio nuegelegela, itodunit atalantan nuka awook luka atutubet keda ipejok. Neautar epucit ngol alosit, apotu kitodutu ebe ekotosi igurupun luka ayook luka atutubet aimor akiro kec.
lgg_prompt: Omu ongulumu eyini eli vusi ri e'da avita ndundu eyi e'dazu feta Munguni fe 'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyini tualu 'ba emu'ba omuru 'diyi pie. Omu 'da ni muzu drile, eri eca e'da kililiru kini ongulumu ongo co'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ava saaru e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi awazu.
nyn_prompt: Ekivvulu ky'omubyaro ekyabaireho buri mwaka, kikoresa emyoga y'abeeshongozi b'omubyaro hamwe n'abagyenyi. Omukoro ku gwagumire nigugyenda omu maisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu guruupu z'okweshongora ez'omubyaro zikaba nizikunda munonga okugabana ebyeshongoro byazo.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, the rich diversity of ethnic groups contributes to a vibrant tapestry of traditions and customs. One of the most visible aspects of this cultural heritage is the unique dressing styles that reflect the identity and values of each community.
lug_prompt: Mu Uganda, amawanga ag'enjawulo galeetera obuwangwa n'obulombolombo okuba obw'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bintu ebyeyoleka mu buwangwa buno bye ngoye ez'enjawulo eziraga obumanyirivu n'empisa za buli kitundu.
ach_prompt: I lobo Uganda, kaka mapat-pat tye ma weko tekwaro ki tekwaro tye mapol tutwal. Gin acel ma nen tutwal I kom tekwaro man obedo ruk mapat-pat ma nyutu kit ma dano acel-acel tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Ko Uganda, aiboisio nuegelegela nuka atekerin einakinitos aiboisio nuegelegela nuka inonosio keda inonosio. Adiopet koboro luejenete noi nuka einono lo ngesi epone loka ainap loitegelikina lo itodunit aijen keda iponesio luka itunga luka atutubet kangin.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, suru ndundu karakara 'diyi fe e'yo suruni azini a'bi eyini 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu. E'yo azi e'dapi tu e'yo suruni 'diyi ma dria ri eri geri 'bani bongo suzu ndu ndu e'dapi e'yo o'bi yi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu Uganda, amahanga gatarikushushana, nigareetaho engyenderwaho n'emigyenzo mirungi. Kimwe aha bintu ebirikureebeka munonga eby'obuhangwa obu n'emyenda y'omutaano erikworeka obuhangwa n'emitwarize y'abantu.

eng_prompt: The annual talent show drew a large crowd, eager to see the diverse range of performances. Among the participants, one local contestant stood out with an ambitious plan for their set.
lug_prompt: Omwoleso gw'ebitone ogutegekebwa buli mwaka gwaleeta abantu bangi nga baagala nnyo okulaba abayimbi ab'enjawulo. Mu beetabamu, omuvuganya omu ow'omu kitundu yavaayo n'enteekateeka ey'amaanyi eri ekibinja kyabwe.
ach_prompt: Yub me nyuto talanta ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka kelo dano mapol tutwal, ma gubedo ki miti me neno jami mapat-pat ma gitye katimo. I kin joo ma obedo tye, lacungu acel ma aa ki I tedero enoni obedo ki yub maber tutwal pi yub meggi.
teo_prompt: Abu aitodiaret naka atalantan kangol ekaru koyangau itunga luipu, lu ekotosi asesen aswamisio nuegelegela. Kotoma otunga luajaikina toma abolobol, abu ediopetunganan kojen keda ainapeta nuepolok noi nuikamunitos ainapeta kec.
lgg_prompt: Otita talanta eyi ma e'dazu eli vusi ri eji 'ba karakara eyi avasi eyini lezu avita ndundu 'diyi ndrezu. Ba fi'ba 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba alu a'bala 'yepi angu 'da ma alea ni e'da otita azi okporu ni be.
nyn_prompt: Omworeko gw'etaranta ogwa buri mwaka gukareeta abantu baingi, abaabaire nibenda kureeba ebyeshongoro bitari bimwe na bimwe. Omuri abo abaabaire beejumbiremu, omuvugi omwe owabaire ari omwihanga rye, akaba aine enteekateeka nungi y'okukora enteekateeka yaabo.

eng_prompt: Cultural identity plays a significant role in shaping our perspectives and values. As individuals grow up immersed in their own traditions and practices, they often develop a deeper connection to their heritage.
lug_prompt: Obuwangwa bulina kinene kye bukola mu kukola endowooza n'empisa zaffe. Abantu bwebakula nga banyweredde mu buwangwa bwabwe n'enkola zaabwe, batera okukulaakulanya enkolagana ey'omunda n'obusika bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Ngec me tekwaro konyo tutwal I yubu kit ma waneno ki jami ma pigi tego. Ka ngat acel acel odongo I tekwaro meggi ki tim meggi, pol kare gi dongo kubbe matut ki tekwaro gi.
teo_prompt: Ajenunet naka inonosio erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma aitolomun aomisio wok keda iponesio lukajokak. Kwape epoloete itunga kotoma inonosio kec keda iponesiokec, edumunete kesi arucokina naepol keda inonosio kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni 'diyi azi okporu nga egata amani 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Ba alu alu eyini zozu eyi ma e'yo a'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea, eyi tutuni eyi ma eselea e'yo eyi ma a'di ni 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhangwa nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omukukora enteekateeka n'emitwarize yaitu. Abantu ku barikukurira omu migyenzo yaabo n'emitwarize yaabo, nibakira kugira akakwate n'obuhangwa bwabo.

eng_prompt: Uganda is home to a rich cultural heritage that influences its artistic expressions. As a result, the music scene is vibrant and diverse, showcasing numerous genres and styles.
lug_prompt: Uganda nsi erimu eby'obuwangwa bingi ebireetawo enkulaakulana mu by'emikono. N'ekivuddemu, omuzannyo gw'ennyimba gujjudde abantu ab'enjawulo, nga gulaga engeri z'ennyimba ez'enjawulo n'engeri z'ennyimba ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda tye ki tekwaro ma beco tutwal ma okelo nyuto cal mapatpat. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo me goyo wer tye ki yomcwiny dok pat pat, ma nyutu kwai wer mapat-pat ki kit wer mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi Uganda keda inonosio luipu luepedorete aitodiar aputosia ke. Kanuka ngun, epol noi aiboisit naka ayoere keda iponesio luegelegela, itodunitos iponesio luegelegela keda iponesio luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri aku e'yo suruni lonyi be 'diyi ni e'dapi e'yo 'bani e'dazu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, angu ongo ni 'diyi ma alea 'ba eyi saaru dika eyi ndu ndu, eyi ma wura eyi karakara.
nyn_prompt: Uganda eine eby'obuhangwa bingi ebirikuteganisa eby'emikono byayo. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'okweshongora biriyo nibishemeza kandi nibitaana, birikworeka emicwe n'emitwarize mingi.

eng_prompt: In today's globalized world, many families are eager to expose their children to diverse cultural experiences. One popular way to achieve this is through music education, particularly in learning western musical instruments.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'ensi yonna, amaka mangi geegomba nnyo okulaga abaana baago eby'obuwangwa eby'enjawulo. Engeri emu emanyiddwa ennyo ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kuyita mu kusomesa eby'okuyimba naddala mu kuyiga ebivuga by'amawanga g'obugwanjuba.
ach_prompt: I kare man ma jami weng tye I wilobo, gangi mapol tye ki miti me nyutu tekwaro pa lutino gi. Yo acel ma oywek tutwal me cobo man obedo kwan me wer, tutwalle pwonyo jami me goyo wer me kupoto ceng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo naejaasi keda akwap kere, ekotosi ikalia luipu aisisianakin idwekec nuka inonosio luegelegela. Epone ediope loejok noi loka aitodolikin ngun ngesi aisisia ikososinei, kacut aisisia iboro luka ikososinei luka akwapin nuka imusugun.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ewu andruri ma alea, familia karakara eyi ava be anzi eyivile 'diyini e'yo suruni ndundu 'diyi 'yezu. Geri azi alu 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri geri onita ongoniri ma aliasi, tutuni afa ongo ngozu kari 'di ma woko etu ni 'diyi ma alea 'diyi onizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba erimu amahanga maingi, amaka maingi nigetenga kumanya eby'obuhangwa bw'abaana gaago. Omuringo gumwe ogurikumanywa munonga ogw'okukora eki n'okwegyesa eby'okweshongora, okukira munonga okwega ebikwato by'okweshongora eby'amahanga g'oburengyerwa-izooba.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing interest among diverse communities in preserving and celebrating indigenous cultures. This has led to an increase in cross-cultural exchanges and collaborations in the arts.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo obwagazi obweyongera mu bitundu eby'enjawulo mu kukuuma n'okujaguza obuwangwa. Kino kiviiriddeko okweyongera mu kuwaanyisiganya obuwangwa n'okukolagana mu by'emikono.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, miti me gwoko ki kwero tekwaro pa anywali tye ka mede ikin lwak ma padi padi. Man okelo mede pa winye ikin tekwaro mapat-pat kacel ki winye ikit me goyo cal.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai eipud loka itunga luegelegela aidar ka ainumunum inonosio lu atekerin. Eyangau na aiyatakin aineranara naka inonosio luegelegela keda aiswamanara kotoma aputosia.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, letaa ongulumu ndundu eyi ma eselea e'yo suruni 'diyi ma tambazu azini inzizu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'di fe ongmbo tualu tualu tualu tualu e'yo suruni 'diyi ma eselea tualu tualu e'yo ongoni 'diyi ma alia ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, abantu beeyongyeire kukunda kurinda n'okujaguza eby'obuhangwa bwabo. Eki kireesire okweyongyera kw'okugarukanisa eby'obuhangwa n'okukwatanisa omu by'emikono.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the global music scene has seen a growing interest in African artists. As a result, many Ugandan musicians have taken their talents beyond national borders.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, abayimbi mu nsi yonna beeyongedde okwagala abayimbi Abafirika. N'ekivuddemu, abayimbi bannayuganda bangi batutte ebitone byabwe okusukka ensalo z'amawanga.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, luwer me lobo Afrika gitye ki miti madit tutwal I komgi. Macalo adwogi ne, lugoo wee me lobo Uganda mapol gucwalo mot gi I lobe mukene bene.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor eipud loka ayook luko Africa kotoma akwap kere. Kanuka ngun, apotu awook luko Uganda luipu koyangautu atalantanakec toma akwapin nukokinga.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alia, ongulumu ongo cozani wudrikurusiri ndre ava tu 'ba ongo co'baa Africaa 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ongo ngopi kari Uganda niri ma alea karakara 'diyi ji eyi ma feta Munguni fe eyidri 'diyi kari eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, eby'okweshongora omunsi yoona byeyongyeire ahabw'abeshongozi ba Afirika. N'ekyarugiremu, abeeshongozi baingi omu Uganda batwaire entaranta zaabo aheeru y'ensharo z'amahanga gaabo.

eng_prompt: Local law enforcement has reported a surge in incidents over the past year. As a result, community leaders are expressing growing concern about public safety.
lug_prompt: Abakuumaddembe mu kitundu baategeezezza nti obubenje bweyongedde mu mwaka oguwedde. N'ekivuddemu, abakulembeze b'ekitundu balaga obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku bikwata ku bukuumi bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Dul ma gwoko cik I tedero guwaco ni tim maraco omede tutwal I mwaka ma okato. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me kabedo gi tye ka nyutu lworo I kom ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Apotu ipolisin luka atutubet olimosi aiyatakin naka akangasia kokaru lo atubor. Kanuka ngun, itodunitos engarenok lu atutubet aiyalongong kanu ayuara na itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ba azita ma ta mbapi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece kini e'yo onzi eyi ma omgbo tu eli ajerisi ra. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi asi otiza e'da e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu muke ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abarikukwatisa ebiragiro omu byaro, bagambire ngu ebihagaro byeyongyeire omu mwaka oguhwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, abeebembezi b'ebyanga booreka okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda kw'abantu.

eng_prompt: After receiving multiple complaints about livestock theft in the area, authorities launched an investigation. Their efforts led them to a suspect who was seen near the farm late at night.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna okwemulugunya okungi ku bubbi bw'ebisolo mu kitundu, ab'obuyinza baatandika okunoonyereza. Kaweefube waabwe yabaviiriddeko okutuuka ku ateeberezebwa eyalabibwa okumpi ne faamu ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo koko mapol I kom kwo pa dyangi I kabedo eni, lutela gucako kwed. Tute gi okelogi I kom ngat ma kineno cok ki poto I dyewor.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun angurian nuipu nuikamunitos akoko na ibaren katutubet, apotu apedorosio kogeutu aingic. Apotu aswam kec koyangautu kesi mama ejai loetepesenitai loabu kowanyun kofaamu kware.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani onuzu anyapa eyi ma ogu ma dria angu 'da ma alea karakara 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba eyi e'do e'yo eti ondaza. Okpo eyini 'ba ri fe eyini 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo ni 'bani ndre angu ori ezozaniri ma ageia inisi 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okutunga okwetomboitwa kwingi ahabw'okwibwa kw'amatungo omukyanga, ab'obushoborozi bakatandikaho okucondooza. Amaani gaabo gakabareetera okuhika aha muntu owabaire nateekateekwaho owabaire ari haihi na faamu nyekiro.

eng_prompt: In the dimly lit streets of the city, a sense of unease hung in the air as night fell. Reports of rising crime rates had left residents on edge, prompting them to be more vigilant during their evening commutes.
lug_prompt: Mu nguudo z'ekibuga ezaali zijjudde ekitangaala ekitali kya maanyi, abantu baatandika okweraliikirira ekiro bwe kyagenda kiyitawo. Amawulire g'obumenyi bw'amateeka obweyongera gaaleka abatuuze ku bunkenke, ne kibaleetera okubeera obulindaala nga batambula akawungeezi.
ach_prompt: I gudu matye ki mac manok tutwal I boma ne, lworo obedo tye ikare ma piny odoko col. Lok me medde pa rwom me timo bal oweko lwak gubedo ki lworo, ma oweko gubedo ma wanggi twolo ikare me wot otyeno.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orotin luka eibuga luemamete akimian, apotu itunga opuputu aiyalongong kapak kana aibiror akwap. Apotu iripotan luka aiyatakin naka abilibilio naka ikisila kojalakisi itunga lu aiyalongong, ido abu koinak kesi acoikina kapak naka alosit ebong.
lgg_prompt: Nzila aku ambu cityniri ma alia aci kokoru 'diyi ma alia, e'yo asi otiza ni ovu oli alia ini ni ecaria. O'duko e'yo onzi ma ongmbo ni tuzu ri ku 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi driasi, fe eyini aa'zu mile be sa'wa eyini acizu angu 'da ma alea ondresi ri ma alea.
