eng_prompt: In recent years, various law enforcement initiatives and community engagement programs have been implemented across the nation. As a result of these efforts, there has been a noticeable decline in criminal activities.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ez'okukwasisa amateeka n'okwenyigiramu kw'abantu zikoleddwa okwetooloola eggwanga. N'ekivuddemu, ebikolwa eby'obumenyi bw'amateeka bikendedde.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, dul mapat-pat me gwoko cik ki yub mapat-pat me kubbe I kin lwak otime I but lobo man mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi me tute magi, rwom me timo bal ojwik tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, aponi itolosai ainapeta nuka ikisila keda ainapeta nuka aimorikikin itunga kakwap. Kanuka aswamisio nu, ekidiokoto aswamisio nuarokok noi.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, 'ba e'do e'yo azita ma ta mbazu 'diyi azini otita ongulumu eyini 'diyi 'ye kari 'di ma alea ndulu. Okpo 'diyi ma e'yosi, e'yo onzi 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, enteekateeka z'okukuratira ebiragiro n'okugarukanisa abantu zitandikirweho okwetoroora eihanga ryona. Ahabw'amaani aga, ebikorwa by'enkozi z'ebibi bikyendeire.

eng_prompt: As crime rates continue to rise, many are left wondering about the sources of illegal weapons. The alarming frequency of armed robberies has sparked a debate about gun control and the underground market for firearms.
lug_prompt: Ng'obuzzi bw'emisango bweyongera okulinnya, bangi basigala beebuuza ku nsibuko y'ebyokulwanyisa ebimenya amateeka. Okubeerawo kw'obubbi bw'emmundu kuleeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukuumi bw'emmundu n'akatale k'emmundu mu nkukutu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma rwom me timo bal tye ka medde ameda, dano mapol pud tye ki ngeng I kom kama jami lweny ma turu cik aa ki iye. Rwom me kwalo dano ki muduku okelo laro lok I kom gengo nyayo muduku ki cuk me cato muduku I mung.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata abilibilio naka ikisila, mam itunga luipu ejenete aiboisio nuka imudun lumam ekisil ecamakinit. Apol naka akoko na imudun eyangaunit epeget loikamunit aitikitik imudun keda esokoni lo aiyeyea loka imudun.
lgg_prompt: Ongmbo e'yo onzi 'yezu ri ni mu drile turia, 'ba karakara eyi asi e'yo osu azita palaa ku 'diyiniri ma dria. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi oguzu osu be 'diyi ma omgbo ni fe agbatara eyi ma dria e'yo osu eyi ma tambazu ri ma dria tualu cuu 'bani osu eyi jezu 'diyi pie ri pie.
nyn_prompt: Obukozi bw'ebibi ku burikuguma nibweyongyera, baingi nibasigara nibeebuuza oburugo bw'ebikwato ebitarikwikirizibwa. Okweyongyera kw'obushuma bw'embundu, kireesireho okuhanuura aha nshonga y'okurwanisa embundu hamwe n'okuguza ebikwato omwihanga.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a troubling trend in juvenile delinquency rates. Many communities are grappling with the impact of youth crime on safety and social stability.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kulaga enkola eyeeraliikiriza mu bumenyi bw'amateeka mu bavubuka. Ebitundu bingi birwanagana n'engeri obumenyi bw'amateeka bw'abavubuka gye bukosaamu obukuumi n'obutebenkevu mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni rwom me timo bal ikin lutino tye ka medde tutwal. Kabedo mapol tye ka lweny ki adwoki me timo bal pa bulu i kom ber bedo ki ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuitodunitos nuka aingic pac itodunit ebe ejai ationis naepol noi kotoma abilibilio naka ikisila kama ejaasi atumunak. Ejaas itunga luipu ationis na abilibilio naka ikisila kama ejaasi atumunak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo asi otiza fepi e'yo anzi nyiri eyini e'yo onzi 'yezu 'diyi ma omgbo ni ra. Ongulumu karakara eyi dri ci e'yo 'ba ode eyini 'ye e'yo onzi 'diyisi ageitema ni azini aa'ta kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka enkora y'obwimukiriro omu minyeeto. Ebyanga bingi nibirwanagana n'obukozi bw'ebibi bw'eminyeeto ahaby'okwerinda n'obutebekana.

eng_prompt: In today's world, home security has become a major concern for many homeowners. Despite advancements in technology, criminals continue to find ways to bypass these protections.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, obukuumi bw'awaka bufuuse ensonga enkulu eri bannannyini mayumba bangi. Newankubadde waliwo enkulaakulana mu tekinologiya, abamenyi b'amateeka bakyanoonya engeri z'okuyita ku bukuumi buno.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni, gwoko ber bedo pa gangi odoko peko madit tutwal bot weggi odi mapol. Kadi bed ni tet manyen tye I tet manyen, lutim aranyi pud tye ka yenyo yoo me gengo gwok magi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo, erai ayuwara naka ireria nuepolok noi mama ejaasi ikulepek itogoi. Karaida ejai apol naka etatai loakwana, erongo abilak ikisila eutasi aimo iponesio luka aibil ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, ageitema aku ma alia ri eca asi otiza angiri ru 'ba aku e'ipiru 'diyi dri. E'yo tekenologia ni zozu ra ti, 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi mu drile geri ndazu tambaza 'diyi ma dri cezu ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, eby'okwerinda omu maka bihindukire eky'omugasho munonga aha bakama b'amaju. Oihireho entunguuka omu tekinorogye, abakozi b'ebihagaro nibagumizamu kuronda oburyo bw'okwetantara eby'okwerinda ebi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance their safety and protect their property, many homeowners are exploring various security options. One popular choice among those seeking peace of mind is hiring private security personnel.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okwongera ku bukuumi bwabwe n'okukuuma ebintu byabwe, bannannyini mayumba bangi banoonyereza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo ez'obukuumi. Ekimu ku bintu ebimanyiddwa ennyo mu abo abanoonya emirembe mu birowoozo kwe kupangisa abakuumi ab'obwannannyini.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo ber bedo gi ki gwoko jami gi, wegi odi mapol tye ka yenyo yoo mapat-pat me gwoko jami gi. Yub acel ma oywek tutwal I kin joo ma mito bedo ki kuc I cwiny gi obedo coyo lugwok kuc ma pe jenge I kom gamente.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong ayuwara kec ka ayuarite iborokec, eutasi ikulepek itogoi aingic iwaitin luegelegela luka ayuwara. Adiopet aseunet naejenara kanejaas ngul lu ekotosi aipuc erai aipagis itunga luka ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ageitema ma omgbo otuzu azini afa yini 'diyi ma ta mbazu, aku e'ipi karakara yi geri ageitema ni ndundu 'diyi onda. E'yo azi 'ba asi anzuru lepi 'diyi lepi tu 'diyi ma eselea ri 'ba ageitema ni ngulupisi 'diyi sizu'i.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okwongyera ahaby'okwerinda n'okurinda ebintu byabo, bakama b'amaju baingi bariyo nibasherura oburyo bw'okwerinda obutari bumwe na bumwe. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukirayo kukundwa abo abarikwenda obusingye, n'okupangisa ab'eby'okwerinda ab'abantu buntu.

eng_prompt: In recent months, there has been a noticeable increase in criminal activity in our neighborhoods. To enhance public safety and deter potential offenders, we need to explore effective measures.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise wabaddewo okweyongera mu bumenyi bw'amateeka mu kitundu kyaffe. Okutumbula obukuumi bw'abantu n'okutangira abamenyi b'amateeka, twetaaga okunoonyereza ku ngeri ennungi.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato ni, tim aranyi omede tutwal I kabedo wa. Me ilo malo rwom me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak ki gengo lutim bal, omyero wanong yoo me tic maber.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, eyatakinos noi aswamisio nuarokok kotoma aiboisio wok. Kanu aitogogong ayuara naka itunga ka aitikitik lu ediakaritos, ekot oni aimo iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo onzi eyi ma omgbo tu angu amavile 'diyi ma alea ra. O'bi yi ma ageitema otuzu azini 'ba ecopi e'yo onzi 'yepi ra 'diyi atrizu, le ama ma esu geri kililiru 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, habaireho okweyongyera kw'obukozi bw'ebibi omu byaro byaitu. Okutunguura ebyokwerinda omu bantu n'okuzibira abakozi b'ebihagaro, twine kuronda oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: In response to rising concerns about safety, community members have called for increased collaboration between local authorities and law enforcement. This partnership aims to address the root causes of crime and enhance public trust.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okulinnya ku by'okwerinda, abantu b'ekitundu basabye okwongera okukwatagana wakati w'abakulembeze b'ebyalo n'abakuumaddembe. Enkolagana eno eruubirira kukola ku nsibuko y'obuzzi bw'emisango n'okutumbula obwesige bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom gwoko kuc, lwak gulego ni winye obed tye ikin lutela me tedero ki joo ma gwoko cik. Ribbe man tye ki miti me lweny i kom jami ma kelo bal ki medo gen ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin aiyalongongo nuikamunitos ayuwara, elimokitos itunga aiswamanara kiding apedorosio nuka atutubet keda ipolisin. Alosikinet naka aimorikikina kangin ngesi aitemokin atiokisio nuepedorete ayangaun amuno naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi ageitema ma dria, 'ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ai ti ecita ma omgbo otuzu drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea azini 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi pie. Ti ecita 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo onzi fepi 'diyi ma aza kozu tualu asi'baza o'bi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda, abantu b'omubyaro bashabire okukwatanisa ahagati y'ab'obushoborozi n'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro. Enkoragana egi negyenderera okukora aha nshonga ezirikureetaho obukozi bw'ebibi n'okureetaho obwesigye omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to maintain peace and security, the government initiated a disarmament campaign in the conflict-affected areas. As part of this operation, the army conducted searches and outreach programs to encourage civilians to surrender their weapons.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma emirembe n'obutebenkevu, gavumenti yatandikawo kaweefube w'okuggya emmundu mu bitundu ebikoseddwa entalo. Ng'ekitundu ky'ekikwekweto kino, amagye gaakola enteekateeka z'okunoonya n'okubunyisa obubaka okukubiriza abantu ba bulijjo okuwaayo ebyokulwanyisa byabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo, gamente ocako yub me kwanyo muduku ki I kabedo ma lweny tye iye. Macalo but tic man, mony guyubu yub me yenyo ki cwalo ngec bot lwak me cuku cwiny dano me miyo jami lweny gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aidar ainapakin keda ayuwara, abu apugan kitegear ainapeta nuka alemar imudun kotoma aiboisio nuetiroritor ingungeta. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisioit kangin, abu ajore kitolot aingic keda aisisianakin itunga ailem imudun kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu asianzu azini ageitema ma ta mbazu, gamete e'do e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma osu 'duzu angu ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma alea risi. E'yo azi 'di ma azi ru, asikari 'diyi 'ye e'yo ndaza azini otita imbatani 'diyi 'ba asikari ru ku 'diyi ekazu nyafe yini 'diyi fezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda obusingye n'obutebekana, gavumenti ekatandikaho ehururu y'okwihaho ebikwato omu myanya erikuteganisibwemu entaro. Nk'ekicweka ky'ekikwekweto eki,amahe gakakora enteekateeka y'okuronda n'okureeba ngu abantu ba buriijo baheereze ebikwato byabo.

eng_prompt: The rising crime rates have become a significant concern for citizens and law enforcement alike. In particular, the increase in violent incidents has led to devastating consequences for many families.
lug_prompt: Omuwendo gw'obuzzi bw'emisango ogweyongera gufuuse okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi eri bannansi n'abakuumaddembe. Okusingira ddala, okweyongera kw'ebikolwa eby'obukambwe kivuddeko ebizibu eby'amaanyi eri amaka mangi.
ach_prompt: Rwom me timo bal matye kamede tye ka kelo lworo madit tutwal I kom anywali kacel ki joo ma gwoko cik. Tutwalle, medde pa tim gero okelo peko madit tutwal I kom gangi mapol.
teo_prompt: Aiyatakinio naka abilibilio naka ikisila erai ationis naepol noi kanejaas itunga keda ipolisin. Kacut, aiyatakinio naka amumu ayangau atiokisio mama ejaasi ikalia luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ongmbo e'yo onzi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri eca asi otiza angiri ru kari anzi eyi ma dria tualu 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi pie. Tutunisi, e'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'diyi fe e'yo onzi familia karakara eyini.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'obukozi bw'ebibi, nikyerarikiriza munonga abatuuragye hamwe n'abarikukwatisa ebiragiro. Okukira munonga, okweyongyera kw'obutabanguko, kireesireho oburemeezi bw'amaani omu maka maingi.

eng_prompt: Public health officials have been actively working to raise awareness about the importance of understanding and preventing sexually transmitted diseases. Their efforts have included community workshops, educational campaigns, and distribution of informative materials.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu babadde bakola nnyo okumanyisa abantu ku bukulu bw'okutegeera n'okutangira endwadde z'ekikaba. Kaweefube waabwe abaddemu emisomo gy'ekitundu, kampeyini z'okusomesa n'okugaba ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom gubedo katic matek me rweyo lwak i kom ber pa niang ki gengo two ma kobo i yo me butu imit. I kin tic gi obedo kacoke me pwonyo lwak, yub me pwonyo dano ki poko ngec.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete eswamak luka angaleu noi kanu aisisianakin itunga ajokis naka amisiikin ka aitikitik adekasinei nu ikopas aelo. Imoriaritos kesi airiamunun keda itunga, aisisianakin keda aikor iboro lu isisianakinete.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba alatani o'bi eyini 'diyi ebi azi nga okporu imbata fezu orodri e'yo onizu azini azo esule ali o'baza si 'diyi atrizu ri ma dria. Okpo yini 'diyi ma alia otita imbatani ongulumu eyini 'diyi, otita imbatani 'diyi azini afa imbatani 'diyi awazu indi.
nyn_prompt: Abakuru omu by'amagara, batwire nibakora munonga okumanyisa abantu omugasho gw'okwetegyereza n'okuzibira endwara ezirikuruga omu kuteerana. Omurimo gwabo gutwariremu emishomo y'abantu b'omubyaro, ehururu z'okwegyesa abantu, hamwe n'okugaba ebintu by'okwegyesa abantu.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing concern about the state of public health and the accessibility of medical care. To address these issues, the government has committed to improving healthcare infrastructure and resources.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okweraliikirira okweyongera ku mbeera y'ebyobulamu by'abantu n'okufuna obujjanjabi. Okukola ku nsonga zino, gavumenti yeewaddeyo okutumbula ebyobulamu n'ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, lworo tye ka mede I kom kit ma yot kom pa lwak tye kwede ki nongo kony me yot kom. Me tyeko peko magi, gamente oketo cwinye me ilo malo rwom me kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ejai aiyalongong naepol noi kanuikamunitos ejautene loka angaleu naka itunga keda adumun amukian. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu, ekapakina apugan aitojokar amukian keda iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, asi otiza e'bi tu e'yo alata o'bi eyini ri ma dria azini geri aro esuzu 'diyi ma esuta ma dria. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete owi i afa ayuzaru arojo eyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, hatwireho okwerarikirira ahaby'amagara g'abantu hamwe n'okutunga obujanjabi. Okukora aha nshonga ezi,gavumenti eyehaireyo kutunguura eby'amagara hamwe n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa.

eng_prompt: Adherence to prescribed medication regimens is crucial for effective treatment outcomes. However, many healthcare providers face challenges in ensuring that patients follow through with their treatment plans.
lug_prompt: Okunywerera ku nkola y'obujjanjabi eyalagirwa kya mugaso nnyo mu bujjanjabi obulungi. Newankubadde, abasawo bangi basanga okusoomoozebwa okulaba nga abalwadde bagoberera enteekateeka zaabwe ez'obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Lubu yoo me nongo yat ma kicimo pire tek tutwal pi nongo yat maber. Kadi bed kumeno, lutic yoto kom mapol ginongo peko me neno ni lutwo gulubu yub gi me nongo yat.
teo_prompt: Aitup ikisila luka amukian erai ibore yenepol noi kanu adumun amukian najokan. Konye, etereikina adekisia nuipu keda ainingosia kanu awanyun ebe atupakinit adekak aitemonokineta kec nuka amukian.
lgg_prompt: ꞋBani aro ꞌbani fele ꞌdiyi ma vuti obizu ri eri orodriru aro esuzu kililiru. Kani si, azi'ba arojo ni karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyini ani esu 'ba azoru 'diyi eyi ma otita aro esuzu 'diyi ma vuti obizu.
nyn_prompt: Okukuratira emibazi erikuhaburwa n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okuragurirwa kurungi. Kwonka, abashaho baingi nibatunga oburemeezi omu kureeba ngu abarwaire nibakuratira enteekateeka yaabo y'okuragurira.

eng_prompt: When faced with health issues, individuals often weigh their options for treatment. Many tend to seek professional help only when their condition escalates.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe boolekagana n'ebizibu by'obulamu, batera okulowooza ku bujjanjabi bwe balina. Bangi batera okunoonya obuyambi bw'abakugu ng'embeera yaabwe yeeyongedde.
ach_prompt: Ka dano tye ki peko me yot kom, pol kare gi tamo I kom yoo me nongo yat. Dano mapol giyenyo kony ki bot ludiro ka peko gi odoko rac.
teo_prompt: Karai etereikina keda atiokisio nuka angaleu, etapit itunga aomoom nuka amukian. Etapit luipu aimo aingarakinio kanejaas ipirioitin arai erono noi ejautenekec.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi esu, eyi tutuni geri eyini aro esuzu 'diyi ma ale andri. Ba karakara eyi tutuni azakoma nda 'ba onita be angiri 'diyi vu e'yo eyini aa'zu ri ka eca ewaru ria.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku barikutunga oburemeezi aha magara gaabo, nibateekateeka aha bujanjabi obu barikubaasa kukoresa. Baingi nibatera kuronda obuhwezi bw'abakugu embeera yaabo ku erikweyongyera.

eng_prompt: In response to recent outbreaks, various stakeholders have come together to implement effective public health strategies. Collaborative efforts are essential to ensure timely interventions and resource allocation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'obulwadde buno gyebuvuddeko, abakwatibwako ab'enjawulo bakwataganye okussa mu nkola enkola z'ebyobulamu ennungi. Kaweefube w'okukwatagana wa mugaso okulaba nti wabaawo okuyingira mu nsonga mu budde n'okugaba eby'obugagga.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two I kare ma okato cokcok-ki, dano mapol guribbe kacel me keto yub me yot kom maber I tic. Ribe obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me neno ni tic tye ka time ikare ki bene poko jami ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adekasinei, apotu itunga luipu kimorikikinos kanu aitegear iponesio luajokak luka angaleu naka itunga. Aswam na aiswamanara ejok kanu awanyun ebe eponio aitemokin akiro kotoma apak ka aikor iboro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo efupi o'diru 'diyi ma aza kozu, 'ba ambo ndundu eyi emu tualu geri kililiru e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea. E'yo ti icita ni 'diyi orodriru e'yo 'yezu sa'wa dria azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi awazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati, abantu baingi bakwatanisize kutaho oburyo burungi bw'okureeberera eby'amagara g'abantu. Enkora y'okukorera hamwe n'ey'omugasho, okureeba ngu habaho okugarukamu omu bwire n'okugaba eby'okukoresa.

eng_prompt: As healthcare systems adapted to the challenges posed by the pandemic, many patients found themselves facing delays and disruptions in their care. Consequently, navigating treatment options became increasingly complex for those in need of timely medical attention.
lug_prompt: Nga eby'obujjanjabi bikwatagana n'okusoomoozebwa okwaleetebwa ekirwadde bbunansi, abalwadde bangi beesanga nga boolekedde okulwawo n'okutaataaganyizibwa mu bujjanjabi bwabwe. N'ekyavaamu, okulambula obujjanjabi bwafuuka buzibu eri abo abeetaaga obujjanjabi mu budde.
ach_prompt: I kare ma yub me yot kom tye ka loko kit me tic i kom peko ma two korona okelo, lutwo mapol gunongo ni gi galle ki balo ticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, yoo me nongo kony me yot kom odoko tek tutwal pi joo ma mito kony me yot kom ikare ki kome.
teo_prompt: Neautar ewai lo amukian aitodolikin atiokisio nu eyangaunit adeka naka ekorona, apotu adekak luipu kodumutu aiyap keda aitolitol amukian kec. Kanuka ngun, etiono noi aimuke ngul lu ekotos amukian kotoma apak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo arojo ni 'diyi ni e'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri ni ejile 'diyi ma aza kozu 'boria, 'ba karakara eyi esu eyini sa'wa ezaza azini e'yo eyi ma tambazu ri isu ra. E'yo 'disi, geri aro esuzu 'diyi eca curu'do kongolokoru 'ba azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi lepi sa'wa dria 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Obu ebitongore by'eby'amagara byabaire nibihikaana n'oburemeezi obureesirweho endwara ruranda nsi, abarwaire baingi bakashanga oburemeezi n'okukyerererwa omu kuragurirwa kwabo. N'ekyarugiremu, okutunga obujanjabi kikaba kigumire munonga ahari abo abaabaire nibetenga obujanjabi bukiri kare.

eng_prompt: The uncertainty surrounding serious health conditions often leads individuals to avoid seeking medical evaluations. This hesitation can stem from a variety of factors, including fear of diagnosis and the emotional burden of potential outcomes.
lug_prompt: Obutali bukakafu obukwata ku ndwadde ez'amaanyi buviirako abantu okwewala okwekebejjebwa abasawo. Okubuusabuusa kuno kusobola okuva ku nsonga ez'enjawulo, omuli okutya okuzuulibwa n'obuzito bw'ebirowoozo ku biyinza okuvaamu.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki akala-kala I kom two mapigi tego I kare mapol weko dano weyo cito ka pime I ot yat. Lworo man twero aa ki I kom jami mapol, ma I kingi obedo lworo me nongo two ki peko me tam I kom adwogi ne.
teo_prompt: Atiokisio nuikamunitos adekasinei nuarokok einakinitos itunga ainac aimo amukian. Atiakatiaka na epedori alomun kama ejaasi akiro nuegelegela, aimoriarit akuriau naka adumun adekasinei keda aiyalongong naka atiokisio nuepedorete alomun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru azo onzi eyi ma dria ri ni fe 'ba eyini muzu arojoa ku. Asi otiza 'diri eco e'do e'yo karakara eyi si, alenia ori 'bani esuzu azini e'yo ecopi i 'yepi ra 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Obutahamya oburikukwata aha ndwara z'amaani, buriijo nibureetera abantu okwetantara kukyeberwa omu irwariro. Okwerarikirira oku nikubaasa kurugirira aha bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe, otwariiremu okutiina okukyeberwa hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'ebirikubaasa kurugamu.

eng_prompt: After years of struggling with his health, he finally decided to take his doctor's recommendations seriously. Determined to improve his quality of life, he committed to a new treatment plan.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyaka mingi ng'alwanagana n'obulwadde bwe, yasalawo okutwala amagezi ga dokita we ng'ekikulu. Ng'amaliridde okulongoosa omutindo gw'obulamu bwe, yeewaddeyo eri enkola empya ey'obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Ingee lweny ki two pi mwaki mapol, en dong omoko tamme me lubo tam pa dakta. Pi mitine me yubu rwom me kwone, en ocako yub me nongo yat manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka ainingosit keda angaleuke, abu ngesi kotub aomisio nuka emuronike. Apodokinit aitojokar adoketait naka aijarake, abu ngesi kiswamaun ainapeta nuitetiak nuka amukian.
lgg_prompt: Eli karakara erini dri cizu eri ma rua ala be 'bori ma vutia, asizu asizu asi 'du e'yo dakitari ma dria 'diyi 'du okporu. E'yo asi 'baza be eri ma idri ma wura otuzu, eri owi i aro esuzu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi arikurwana n'amagara gye, akacwamu kutwara ebiragiro by'omushaho we nk'ekintu kikuru. Ahabw'okwenda kutunguura omutindo gw'amagara gye, akeehayo kukora enteekateeka nsya y'okuragurira.

eng_prompt: The devastating outbreak of the disease has swept through communities, leaving countless families shattered. As a result, many children in the country are orphans because of this disease.
lug_prompt: Okubalukawo kw'obulwadde kubunye ebitundu, ne kuleka amaka mangi nga gakutuse. N'ekivuddemu, abaana bangi mu ggwanga bamulekwa olw'obulwadde buno.
ach_prompt: Poto pa two man okelo peko madit tutwal I kabedo mapatpat, ma oweko gangi mapol otur. Macalo adwogi, lutino mapol i lobo man gitye lutino kic pi two man.
teo_prompt: Abu abwangun naka adeka ngin kotub aiboisio nuipu, kojalak ikalia luipu atiokisio. Kanuka ngun, idwe luipu kotoma akwapuwok eraas ikokiok kanuka adeka na.
lgg_prompt: Azo 'da ma e'dota onzi ri ere o'bi eyi ma eselea, erini fezu familia karakara eyini awoko esuzu. E'yo 'disi, anzi nyiri karakara kari ma alia 'diyi emvuanzi azo 'di ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'endwara kureteire oburemeezi omu bantu, n'okureka amaka maingi gateganisiibwe. N'ekyarugiremu, abaana baingi omu ihanga n'efuuzi ahabw'oburwaire obu.

eng_prompt: Public health officials have raised concerns about the rising rates of infection. As awareness and testing improve, more individuals are being diagnosed with the virus each year.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu balaze obweraliikirivu olw'omuwendo gw'abakwatibwa obulwadde ogweyongera. Ng'okumanyisa n'okukebera kweyongera, abantu bangi bazuulibwa n'akawuka buli mwaka.
ach_prompt: Lutic yoto kom gunyutu lworo I kom medde pa wel dano matye ka nongo two. Ka ngec ki pimo dano tye kamedde, dano mapol tye kanongo ni gitye ki two eni mwaka ki mwaka.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak lu adekis itodutu aiyalongong kanu aiyatakin na adekasinei. Kwape aiyatakin aijen keda ainwakio, ipu itunga lu inwakunono ekurut ngol karu.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba alatani o'bi eyini 'diyi ece asi otiza eyi e'yo azo 'da ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma dria. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma mile ozizu azini eyi ma rua o'bizu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu, 'ba karakara eyi azo korona niri be eli alu alu vusi.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'oburwaire obweyongyeire. Okumanyisibwa n'okukyebera kweyongyeire, abantu baingi nibashangwa baine akakooko buri mwaka.

eng_prompt: Access to healthcare services in rural communities is often limited, leading to significant challenges for residents. As a result, many individuals struggle to obtain necessary medications.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi mu byalo kitera okuba ekitono, ekivaako okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi eri abatuuze. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi balwana okufuna obujjanjabi obwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom I caro pol kare bedo tek tutwal, ma man kelo peko madit tutwal I kom lutedero. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol nongo tek tutwal me nongo yat ma mite pigi.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian kocaaloi erai na etiono, ido eyangauni ainingosia nuipu nejaas itunga. Kanuka ngun, etionikinitos itunga luipu adumun ikee lu ipudai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta angu caluru 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni ca ku, e'yo 'di ni fe 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri e'yo ewaru eyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi dri ci aro eyini lele 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara omu byaro nikukye munonga, ekirikureetera abatuuragye oburemeezi bw'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi nibarwana kutunga emibazi ei barikwetenga.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a concerning trend in the spread of the virus among young populations. In particular, certain demographics, such as female youths, are facing increased vulnerability to infection.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga enkola eyeeraliikiriza mu kusaasaana kw'akawuka mu bavubuka. Okusingira ddala, abantu abamu, gamba ng'abavubuka abakyala, bali mu katyabaga k'okukwatibwa obulwadde.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto kit ma two eni tye ka nyaa kwede ikin jo matino. Ki lok ada, wel dano mukene calo anyira matino gitye ki gum me nongo two.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic napac ebe epol noi awea naka adeka naka ekorona kanejaas atumunak. Kacut, itunga ice kwape nat atumunak lu angor kes etereikina keda ationis na adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo asi otiza fepi azo 'da ma ereta 'ba ode eyi ma eselea ri'I. Tutunisi, 'ba kalafe azi 'diyi ekile 'ba ode ezoanzi ru 'diyi lepi 'diyi e'yo azo esuzu 'diyi esu drile.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka okujanjaara kw'akakooko omu minyeeto. Okukira munonga, abantu abamwe, nk'eminyeeto y'abakazi, beyongyeire kukwatwa akakooko.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to impact communities, many health facilities are struggling to meet the growing demand for medical supplies. This shortage has raised concerns about the ability to effectively diagnose and treat patients.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okukosa ebitundu, amalwaliro mangi galwana okutuukiriza obwetaavu bw'ebikozesebwa mu bujjanjabi obweyongera. Ebbula lino livuddeko okweraliikirira ku busobozi bw'okuzuula n'okujjanjaba abalwadde obulungi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two korona tye ka mede ki balo kwo pa lwak, odi yadi mapol tye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi lutwo. Can man okelo lworo I kom kit me niang ki tic i kom lutwo maber.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit adeka aimusung itunga, eutasi adekisia nuipu ainingosit aitodolikin eipuda loka iboro lu amukian. Ationis na ayangau aiyalongong kanu ajenun ka aimuke adekak ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni mu drile ongulumu eyi ma aza kozu, arojo karakara eyi dri ci afa ayuzaru arojoa 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza e'yo 'bani ecozu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma rua o'bizu azini aro fezu kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire burikugumizamu kuteganisa abantu, amarwariro maingi nigateganisibwa okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'eby'okukoresa omu marwariro. Eibura eri, nirireetaho okwerarikirira aha kukyebera n'okuragurira kurungi abarwaire.

eng_prompt: Many people find themselves relying on medication to manage chronic conditions. As the years go by, the dependency on these substances can become a significant part of their daily routine.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi beesanga nga beesigamye ku bujjanjabi okusobola okuvvuunuka embeera ezitawona. Emyaka bwe gigenda giyitawo, okwesigama ku bintu bino kuyinza okufuuka ekitundu ky'obulamu bwabwe obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol nongo gi jenge i kom yat me lweny i kom two ma pe cang. Ka mwaka woto ki kato, jenge I kom jami magi twero doko gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwo gi me nino ducu.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu edumununete awate kec toma amukian kanu aitikitik adekasinei nu mam edaunete angaleun. Kwape elosete ikar, epedorete aitosom iboro lu araun ibore yenepol noi kotoma aswamukec naka nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi eyi esu eyi asi'baza be aro eyi ma dria e'yo eyi ma aza kozu. Eli ka mu drile, e'yo yi atizu afa 'diyi ma dria ri ni eca e'yo yini 'ye o'du driasi 'diyi ma azi okporu ni ru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibeesherekyerera emibazi y'okukora aha ndwara zaabo ezitarikukira. Emyaka ku erikuhinguraho, okwegamira ebintu ebi nikibaasa kuba ekicweka kikuru ky'emirimo yaabo eya buriizooba.

eng_prompt: Despite the growing demand for healthcare supplies, the distribution network remains limited. Many regions struggle to access essential medications and medical equipment.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'obwetaavu bw'ebikozesebwa mu by'obujjanjabi bweyongera, enkola y'okubitambuza ekyali ntono. Ebitundu bingi birwana okufuna eddagala ery'omugaso n'ebikozesebwa mu kujjanjaba.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni miti me jami me ot yat tye ka medde, yub me cato gi pud tye manok. But lobo mapol tye ki peko me nongo yat ki jami tic me ot yat.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata eipuda lo iboro lu amukian, ikidioko iboro lu ekorio. Etionikinit aiboisio nuipu adumun ikee ka iswamasia lu amukian.
lgg_prompt: E'yo afa ayuzaru arojoa 'diyi ma cu ni tuzu ra ti, geri 'bani afa 'da eyi awazu ri ma omgbo ni nga po'di were. Angu karakara eyi dri ci aro orodriru 'diyi esuzu tualu afa ayuzaru arojoa 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okweyongyera kw'ebyetengo by'ebikwato by'eby'amagara, eby'okubitambuza nibiba biri bikye. Ebyanga bingi nibirwana kutunga emibazi n'ebyoma by'okukoresa omu marwariro.

eng_prompt: Despite widespread awareness campaigns and educational programs, the prevalence of sexually transmitted diseases continues to rise. This troubling trend highlights a significant gap in public adherence to recommended health guidelines.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo enteekateeka nnyingi ez'okumanyisa abantu ku ndwadde z'obukaba, omuwendo gw'abantu abakwatibwa endwadde z'obukaba gweyongera buli lukya. Omuze guno ogweraliikiriza gulaga ekituli ekinene mu bantu okugoberera ebiragiro by'ebyobulamu ebiragiddwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub me rweyo lwak ki pwonyo dano tye mapol, two ma kobo i butu imit tye kamede. Man nyutu ni dano pe tye ka lubu cik makwako yot kom.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai aisisianakino naepol noi, eyatakinos adekasinei nu ikopas aelo. Ationis na itodunit ebe emamei itunga lu etupitos aicoreta nuka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mile oziza ni azini otita onita ni 'diyi ma talasi, azo esule ali o'baza si 'diyi ma kalafe ni mu drile tu. E'yo ewaru 'di ece e'yo 'ba eyini azita o'bale e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi ma vuti obizu ku ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ehururu z'okumanyisa abantu hamwe na puroguraamu z'okwegyesa, oburwaire oburikuruga omu kuteerana nibweyongyera. Omuringo ogu ogurikwerarikiriza nigureetaho omwanya muhango omu bantu abarikukuratira ebiragiro by'ebyamagara ebirikuhaburwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising concerns about the virus, community officials recognized the need for increased awareness among young people. To address this issue, they have taken proactive steps to educate the youth on prevention and safety measures.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okulinnya ku kawuka, abakungu b'ekitundu baalaba obwetaavu bw'okwongera okumanyisa abavubuka. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga eno, batandise okusomesa abavubuka ku ngeri y'okwewalamu endwadde n'engeri y'okuzeekuumamu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom kwidi eni, lutic me kabedo ne gunongo ni omyero kimed rweyo lwak I kom two eni ikin bulu. Me tyeko peko man, gutiyo matek me pwonyo bulu i kom kit me gengo ki gwoko kwo pa lutino.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naka ekorona, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kojenutu eipuda lo aisisianakin atumunak. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, etolomutu kesi iwaitin lu isisianakinete atumunak nuka aitikitik adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza tupi azo 'da ma dria risi, azi'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi esu ra kini le 'ba ma fe 'ba ode eyini imbata ra. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, eyi 'ye e'yo okporu 'diyi 'ba ode eyini imbata fezu geri eyini ecozu eyi ma aza kozu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu okwerarikirira okweyongyeire ahabw'akakooko, abakuru omu byaro bakareeba ekyetengo ky'okumanyisa eminyeeto. Okukora aha nshonga egi, batandikire kushomesa eminyeeto aha by'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming election season, a workshop was organized to enhance the reporting capabilities of local journalists. The focus of the training was to equip them with essential techniques for covering high-energy events.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera sizoni y'okulonda ejja, omusomo gwategekebwa okutumbula obusobozi bw'amawulire mu kitundu. Ekigendererwa ky'okutendekebwa kwali kubawa bukodyo obwetaagisa okukwata emikolo egy'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi kare me yer matye kabino ni, kacoke me pwonye obedo tye me medo diro pa lucoo lok angea me tedero. Yub me pwonye ne obedo me miyo botgi diro ma mite me coyo lok I kom yub matego tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin kanuka aseo naebunit, aponi itemokinai airiamun kanu aitojokar apedor naka arotak iyemuto luka akwapuwok. Alosikinet naka aituutoorio kangin arai aituutoonor kesi keda acoasinei nuepolok nuepedorete kesi aitodolikin akiro nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa ni emupi ri ma otuta si, 'ba otu otita imbatani ni 'ba osisiani ogogo 'diyi ma okpo fezu e'yo o'dukoti edrizu ri ma omgbo otuzu. Asisile embatani 'da niri ndra eyini geri orodriru eyini ecozu e'yo okporu 'diyi ma dria ri fezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera oburuuru oburikwija, omushomo gukatebekanisibwa okwongyera aha myoga y'abanyamakuru b'omubyaro. Ekigyendererwa ky'okutendeka kikaba kiri okubaheereza obukoryo bw'okukora aha mikoro y'amaani.

eng_prompt: In today's fast-paced media landscape, reporters often find themselves navigating complex situations. From political unrest to natural disasters, the unpredictability of events can complicate their efforts to deliver accurate and timely information.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ey'emikutu gy'amawulire egy'amangu, abasasi b'amawulire batera okwesanga nga boolekaganye n'embeera enzibu. Okuva ku butabanguko mu byobufuzi okutuuka ku bikangabwa eby'obutonde, obutategerekeka bw'ebintu bisobola okukaluubiriza kaweefube waabwe okuwa amawulire amatuufu era mu budde.
ach_prompt: I kare me lok angeya me kareni, lucoo lok angea ipol kare nongo gitye ka tic i kom jami ma tek tutwal. Nicake I lok me lweny me cungu iwi-bye me oo I peko ma poto atura, peko me ngeyo ngo matye katime twero bedo tek tutwal I tute gi me miyo ngec matir ki I cawa kikome.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisit naka airot iyemuto naka lolo, etapit arotak iyemuto ajaut toma ojautene loetiono noi. Anyoun kotoma amumu naka politikis kitoni atiokisio nuka isuban, mam ajenun iboro lu iswamaununete epedorete aitolitol aswamukec naka aitodolikin akiro nuka abeit kotoma apak.
lgg_prompt: Angu o'dukoti edrizu andruri ma alia, 'ba osisia ni 'diyi yi esu e'yo kongolokoru 'diyi ma alea. Engazu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi ma alia kpere e'yo ewaru nyakuni 'diyi ma alia, e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma e'yo onzi 'diyi eco e'yo yi ma okpo fe e'yo ecezu kililiru azini sa'wa dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu mikutu y'amahurire ey'erizooba, abanyamakuru nibakira kweshangira bari omu mbeera ezigumire. Kuruga aha butabanguko bw'eby'obutegyeki kuhisya aha bihikiirizi eby'obuhangwa, okuteebereza ebirikubaho nikibaasa kuremesa amaani gaabo okuhisya amakuru agahikire kandi ag'omurembe.

eng_prompt: Despite his promises to turn his life around, he found himself in trouble once again. The police had been keeping a close eye on him ever since his last release.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga yasuubiza okukyusa obulamu bwe, yaddamu okwesanga mu buzibu. Poliisi ebadde emulondoola nnyo okuva lwe yasembayo okuyimbulwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni en ocikke me loko kwone, en dok odok I peko. Abili gubedo ka nene tutwal nicake ma kigonye.
teo_prompt: Karaida isumunit ngesi aijulakin aijarake, abu ngesi kodum akekuan toma ationis bobo. Auta ipolisin aingic ngesi noi ageun na elacakinere ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro owizu i ma idri ojazu ra ti, eri isu i e'yo ewaru ma alia dika. Polisi ri ebi eri ma mile 'ba e'dozu erini ofuzu asizu 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: N'obu araabe yaraganiise kuhindura aha magara gye, akagaruka yashangwa omu kabi. Abaporiisi babaire nibamucondooza kuruga obu yaarekurwa.

eng_prompt: Recent reports indicate a significant rise in crime rates, particularly in urban areas. As a result, residents are increasingly concerned about the safety of their vehicles.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti obuzzi bw'emisango bweyongedde nnyo naddala mu bibuga. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze beeyongera okufaayo ku bukuumi bw'emmotoka zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic manyen nyutu ni rwom me timo bal tye ka medde tutwalle I boma madongo. Macalo adwogi ne, lwak tye ka paro pi ber bedo pa mutokagi.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos iripotan lu atuboros ebe iyata noi abilibilio naka ikisila kacut kaiboisio nu otaun. Kanuka ngun, epodokitos itunga noi nuka ayuwara naka amotokan kec.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini e'yo onzi eyi ma omgbo tu tuni angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi otiza be mutukari eyivile 'diyi ma tambaza ma dria tutu.

eng_prompt: In a concerted effort to combat rising vehicle thefts, law enforcement agencies implemented new strategies and increased patrols in high-risk areas. As a result, many stolen cars were rescued by police last year.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa obubbi bw'emmotoka obweyongera, ebitongole ebikuumaddembe byassa mu nkola obukodyo obupya n'okwongera okulawuna mu bifo eby'obulabe. N'ekyavaamu, emmotoka nnyingi enzibe poliisi yazifuna omwaka oguwedde.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me lweny i kom kwo pa mutoka matye kamede, dul ma gwoko cik gutiyo ki yoo manyen dok gu mede ki wot me wot I kabedo matye ki peko madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, abili onongo mutoka mapol ma ki kwalo gi imwaka ma okato.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswam naepol noi naka aitikitik akoko naka imotokan, apotu atukona nuka ikisila itolomutu iwaitin luitetiak kosodete aiyatakin aiboisio nuetioko noi. Kanuka ngun, apotu ipolisin kolakutu amotokan nuipu nuakokwaritai okaru je.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bani 'ba tualu a'di 'dizu e'yo mutukari eyi ma ogu ni tupi tutu ri ma alea, amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi e'do geri o'diru 'diyi 'ye azini eyi ma angu andrita angu e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otu. E'yo 'disi, polisi eyi esu mutukari 'bani ogu 'diyi karakara eli ajerisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa obushuma bw'ebiiruka obweyongyeire, ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro bikataho oburyo busya n'okwongyera okurambura omu myanya y'akabi. N'ekyarugiremu, emotoka nyingi eziibirwe zikacungurwa poriisi omwaka oguhwaire.

eng_prompt: After being apprehended, he realized that cooperation might be his only chance for a lighter sentence. Reluctantly, he decided to come clean about his illicit activities.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukwatibwa, yakizuula nti okukolera awamu kuyinza okuba nga gwe mukisa gwokka ogw'okufuna ekibonerezo ekitono. Nga tayagala, yasalawo okwerangirira ebikolwa bye eby'obumenyi bw'amateeka.
ach_prompt: Inge make, en oniang ni winye twero bedo gum ma en tye kwede me nongo pwod mapiny. Labongo cwinye, en omoko tamme me waco bal ma en otimo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na aikamanario, abu ngesi koany ebe aiswamanara ngesi bon ngesi arereng naka adumun aitisilario. Kotoma aiyalongong, abu ngesi koseu einer nuikamunitos aswamisioke nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani eri bizu 'bori ma vutia, eri esu ra kini ti ecita eco nga ovu drileba erini esuzu e'yo lizari'i. Erini ava kokoru, eri 'du e'yo efuzu e'yo erini 'ye azita palaa ku 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okukwatwa, akeetegyereza ngu okukwatanisa nikibaasa kuba omuringo gwe gwonka gw'okutunga ekiheneso kikye. Atarikwenda, akasharamu kweyoreka ebikorwa bye ebitahikire.

eng_prompt: To ensure proper taxation and regulation, the government has implemented a comprehensive vehicle registration system. This system is managed by the Uganda Revenue Authority, which plays a crucial role in monitoring vehicle ownership and compliance.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa emisolo n'ebiragiro ebituufu, gavumenti etaddewo enkola enzijuvu ey'okuwandiisa emmotoka. Enkola eno eddukanyizibwa Uganda Revenue Authority, ekola omulimu omukulu mu kulondoola obwannannyini ku mmotoka n'okugoberera amateeka.
ach_prompt: Me neno ni ki ngolo mucoro ki cik maber, gamente oketo yub me coyo mutoka weng. Yub man dul me Uganda Revenue Authority aye doro, ma timo tic mapire tek tutwal me bedo ki wang mabit I kom wegge mutoka ki lubo cik.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe ecamakitai isolosinei keda ainapeta, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuka aiwadika amotokan. Erionget loka ikapun ngesi eyait ainapeta ngun, ido ejaasi keda aswam naepol noi naka aanyanar ikulepek imotokan keda aitup ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo musoro trazu kililiru azini azita eyi ma vuti obizu, gamete 'ba geri mutukari eyi ma ru sizu dria. Amuti Uganda Revenue Authority niri ni geri 'di ma ta mba, eri azi okporu nga mutukari eyi ma e'ipi eyi ma pamvu onezu azini azita eyi ma vuti obizu.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu hariho emishoro n'ebiragiro birungi,gavumenti eteireho enkora y'okuhandiikisa ebiiruka. Enkora egi neekorwa ekitongore ky'emishoro ekya Uganda Revenue Authority, ekirikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurondoora obugaiga bw'ebiiruka hamwe n'okukuratira ebiragiro.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation and a series of successful operations, law enforcement was able to locate and retrieve several stolen vehicles. The community expressed gratitude for the swift action taken by the police.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'ebikwekweto ebiwerako eby'obuwanguzi, abakuumaddembe basobodde okuzuula n'okununula emmotoka eziwerako ezibbibwa. Ekitundu kyalaga okusiima olw'ekikolwa eky'amangu poliisi kye yakola.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut ki tic mapol ma owoto maber, joo ma gwoko cik gunongo ki gamo mutoka mapol ma ki kwalo gi. Lwak gubedo ki pwoc pi gin ma abili otimo oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok keda aswamisio nuipu, apotu ipolisin odumutu ka adumun amotokan nuipu nu ekokotai. Apotu itunga itodiasi aiyalama kanu aswamisio nuka atipet nuka ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia azini 'yeta drile suzaru 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi esu azini esu mutukari 'bani ogu 'diyi karakara. Ongulumu eyi e'da awa'difo eyidri e'yo polisi eyini 'ye mbeleru risi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi n'okukora ebikwekweto bingi, abarikukwatisa ebiragiro bakabaasa kuronda n'okwihaho emotoka nyingi eziibirwe. Abantu bakooreka okusiima ahabw'ekikorwa ky'ahonaaho ekya pooriisi.

eng_prompt: Car theft has become a significant issue in urban areas, leading to various methods of disposing of stolen vehicles. One common practice among thieves is to dismantle the cars for their valuable components.
lug_prompt: Obubbi bw'emmotoka bufuuse kizibu kya maanyi mu bibuga, ekiviiriddeko enkola ez'enjawulo ez'okusuula emmotoka enzibe. Ekimu ku bintu ababbi bye batera okukola kwe kutemamu emmotoka okufuna ebitundu byayo eby'omuwendo.
ach_prompt: Kwalo mutoka odoko peko madit tutwal I boma madit, ma oweko tye yoo mapat-pat me balo mutoka ma ki kwalo. Tim acel ma lukwo maro timo en aye balo mutoka pi jami ma pigi tego.
teo_prompt: Akoko na imotokan erai ationis naepol noi kotoma aiboisio nuka itaunin, ido eyangauni iwaitin luegelegela luka aicak amotokan nu ekoko. Idiopebore yenetapit ikokolak aswam ngesi aibiror amotokan kanu adumun iboro lu epol ajokis.
lgg_prompt: Mutukari eyi ma ogu eca curu'do e'yo azi okporu ni ru angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea, dika eri fe geri ndundu eyini mutukari eyi oguzaru 'diyi 'bezu. Yeta azi alu ogua eyi ma eselea ri eri mutukari eyi ma esele orodriru 'diyi ofuzu.
nyn_prompt: Obushuma bw'emotoka buhindukire enshonga y'amaani omu myanya y'endembo, ekirikureetaho emiringo mingi y'okwihaho emotoka eziibirwe. Omuringo gumwe ogurikukira kukorwa abashuma, n'okushenya emotoka okuronda ebicweka byayo eby'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Car theft has become a growing concern in urban areas, with criminals constantly evolving their methods. As a result, law enforcement agencies are struggling to keep up with the tactics used by these skilled thieves.
lug_prompt: Obubbi bw'emmotoka bweyongedde mu bitundu by'omu bibuga, ng'abamenyi b'amateeka bakyusakyusa enkola zaabwe buli kaseera. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole ebikuumaddembe birwana okukwatagana n'obukodyo obukozesebwa ababbi bano abakugu.
ach_prompt: Kwalo mutoka odoko peko madit tutwal I boma madongo, lutim bal tye ka loko yoo gi I kare weng. Macalo adwogi ne, dul ma gwoko cik tye ka tute matek me lubu diro ma lukwo magi tiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Akoko na imotokan erai ibore yenepol noi kotoma aiboisio nu otaun, ido itolomete abilak ikisila iponesiokec. Kanuka ngun, eutasi atukona nuka ikisila ainingosit ajenun acoasinei nu itwasamaete ikokolak lu.
lgg_prompt: Mutukari eyi ma ogu eca curu'do e'yo azi okporu ni ru tawuni eyi ma alea, 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma geri eyi oja eyi sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'disi, amuti azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi dri ci e'yo onzi 'ba onduoru 'diyi ni 'ye 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Obushuma bw'emotoka bweyongyeire omu ndembo, kandi abakozi b'ebihagaro nibahindura emiringo yaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, ebitongore ebirikukwatisa ebiragiro nibirwana kurwanisa obukoryo oburikukoresibwa abashuma aba abakugu.

eng_prompt: Car thefts have become increasingly common in urban areas, particularly in locations where people tend to gather and let their guard down. Many vehicle owners are unaware of the risks they face when leaving their cars unattended while enjoying a night out.
lug_prompt: Obubbi bw'emmotoka bweyongedde mu bitundu by'omu bibuga naddala mu bifo abantu gye bakungaanira n'obukuumi bwabwe wansi. Bannannyini mmotoka bangi tebamanyi bulabe bwebasanga nga baleka emmotoka zaabwe nga tezirabirirwa nga banyumirwa ekiro.
ach_prompt: Kwalo mutoka omede tutwal I boma madongo tutwalle I kabedo ma dano gure iye dok giweko lugwok kuc gi piny. Wegi mutoka mapol pe gingeyo peko ma ginongo kace guweko mutokagi labongo gwok ka gitye ka nongo mit pa wot I dyewor.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi akoko na imotokan kaiboisio nu otaun, kacut aiboisio nu atukonokinata itunga kosodete ajalakin edarak kec kwap. Ikulepek imotokan luipu mam ejenete atiokisio nu ejaas kesi na ajalakinete amotokanakec komam idaritai kapak kana aiperikin kware.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mutukari eyi ma ogu ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu tawuni eyi ma alea tutu, tutuni angu 'ba eyini eyi trazu azini eyi ma ageitema esizu ele 'diyi ma alea. Mutukari ipika karakara eyi nini e'yo onzi eyini esu eyini mutukari eyivile 'diyi ku eyini acizu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ku risi ku 'diyi ma dria ku.

eng_prompt: Authorities in Uganda reported a rise in vehicle thefts, prompting an investigation into the whereabouts of a specific stolen car. After extensive searches, law enforcement agencies received a tip-off about the vehicle's location across the border.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza mu Uganda baategeezezza nti obubbi bw'emmotoka bweyongedde, ekyaleetedde okunoonyereza ku kifo emmotoka ennannyini enzibe weeri. Oluvanyuma lw'okunoonya ennyo, ebitongole ebikuumaddembe byafuna amagezi ku kifo ky'emmotoka emitala w'ensalo.
ach_prompt: Lutela me lobo Uganda guwaco ni kwo pa mutoka tye ka medde, ma oweko kicako kwedo motoka ma ki kwalo ni. Ingee yeny matek tutwal, dul ma gwoko cik gunongo ngec I kom kabedo pa mutoka I wang lobo.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio ko Uganda kitodutu ebe eyatakinos akoko naka imotokan, ido abu koyangau aingic aiboisit naka emotoka lo ekoko. Akaulo naka aingic noi, apotu luka ikisila kodumutu akiro nuikamunitos aiboisit naka emotoka koikoru.

eng_prompt: His talent was undeniable, captivating audiences with every performance. Many considered him a local legend, revered for his unique sound and heartfelt lyrics.
lug_prompt: Ekitone kye tekyebuusibwabuusibwa, era abantu baakwatibwanga buli lwe yabanga ayimba. Bangi baali bamutwala ng'omuzira ow'omu kitundu, nga bamussaamu ekitiibwa olw'eddoboozi lye ery'enjawulo n'ebigambo bye eby'omutima.
ach_prompt: Pe tye ngat mo ma twero kwero talanta ma en tye kwede, en obedo ka mako cwiny lwak I kare ma en tye ka tuko. Dano mapol gunene macalo dano ma oywek tutwal, ma kiworo pi dwane ki wer ma oa ki i cwinye.
teo_prompt: Mam epedorio aitepeg atalanta ke, abu isiyalamik itunga kotoma aitodiaretake kere. Apotu itunga luipu kowanyutu ngesi kwape itunganan yenitegelikina, loeyongitai noi kanuka eporotoke loitegelikina keda ikososineike luitegelikina.

eng_prompt: Everyone who met him felt an immediate connection, drawn in by his warmth and genuine interest in their lives. His kindness and ability to listen made him a beloved figure in the community.
lug_prompt: Buli omu eyamusisinkana yawulira akakwate ak'amangu, okusikirizibwa olw'ebbugumu lye n'okufaayo okwa nnamaddala mu bulamu bwabwe. Ekisa kye n'obusobozi bwe obw'okuwuliriza byamufuula omuntu omwagalwa mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Dano weng ma gurwate kwede gubedo ki wat macok kwede, cwinygi obedo yom dok bene gubedo ki miti i kom kwo gi. Kica ki kero ne me winyo lok oweko en obedo dano ma dano maro adada.
teo_prompt: Nginitunganan loabu kiriamunos keda ngesi apuputu arucokina katipet, apotu iponesioke lukajokak keda apodokinitike kotoma aijarakec koinakisi kesi aimorikikina. Amina ke keda apedorit ke naka aipup ijaikini ngesi itunganan yeniminanara noi kotoma atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ba dria ndra dri fu'ba eri be 'diyi ama yi ma eselea indikindi, asi ndriza erini azini asi 'baza a'da yini idri yini ma dria risi. Eri ma asi ndriza azini ecota erini e'yo erizu ri fe erini ovuzu 'ba lepi tu ni ru ongulumu eyi ma alea.

lug_prompt: Mu mirimu gye gyonna, yakwata ku bulamu bw'abantu bangi n'ekitone kye n'obwagazi bwe. Nga bw'alekawo olusika lw'ebiseera ebitayinza kwerabirwa, abawagizi be bajja kumujjukira bulijjo.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me ticce, en ogudo kwo pa dano mapol ki motte ki marre. Kit ma en oweko jami ma wigi pe biwil I komgi, lucwak mege bibedo ka poo I kome I kare weng.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamuke kere, abu ngesi kitodolik aijar naka itunga luipu keda atalanta ke. Kwape ejalakini ngesi aiboisit na mam imurokini, epote egangitokoke duc aiitun ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Sawa erini azi ngazu dria, eri elo 'ba karakara eyi ma edri feta Munguni fe eyini 'diyisi. Erini e'yo erini 'diyi kuzu vutiarisi, 'ba eri ma atita fe'baa 'diyi nga eri ma e'yo ega ewu driasi.

eng_prompt: After a long battle with illness, he reflected on his life and the dreams he had yet to fulfill. Friends and family gathered to support him during his final days, cherishing the memories they had created together.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulwanagana n'obulwadde okumala ebbanga eddene, yalowooza ku bulamu bwe n'ebirooto bye bye yali tannaba kutuukiriza. Ab'emikwano n'ab'enganda bakungaana okumuwagira mu nnaku ze ezasembayo, nga basiima ebijjukizo byebakola awamu.
ach_prompt: Inge lweny ki two pi kare malac, en otamo I kom kwo ne ki lek ma onongo pud pe ocobo. Lurem ki lugang gugure me cwake I kare me kwone me agiki, kun gi paro jami mabeco ma guyubu kacel.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi keda adeka, abu ngesi koomoom nuikamunitos aijarake keda airujasia nuebeit ngesi aitodolikin. Apotu ipapero keda lukokalekec kiriamunos aigangakin ngesi kotoma aparasia nuka awasia nuka aijarakec, aisiyalamikinete aiituneta nueswamauna kesi nepepe.
lgg_prompt: A'di 'dizu azo be sawa ezu ma vutia, eri ega e'yo i ma idri ma dria azini orobi erini nga 'ye 'diyi ma dria. Agyipi azini familia eyi tra eyi atita fezu eri dri o'du asizu 'diyi ma alea eyini e'yo eyini 'ye tualu 'diyi ma e'yo egazu.

eng_prompt: Throughout his life, he cherished his cultural heritage and often expressed it through music. His voice resonated with the stories and traditions of his people.
lug_prompt: Mu bulamu bwe bwonna, yasiima eby'obuwangwa bye era yabyogeranga mu nnyimba. Eddoboozi lye lyawulikika mu mboozi n'obulombolombo bw'abantu be.
ach_prompt: I kare me kwone ducu, en otero tekwaro mege calo gin ma pire tek dok pol kare onyuto man I wer. Dwonne obedo ka winyo lok ki tekwaro pa lwak mege.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijarake kere, abu ngesi isingarenit nuka einono ke ido abu kitodu ngun kopone loka ayoere. Apotu iporotoioke keda akiro keda inonosio luka itunga ke.
lgg_prompt: Idri erivileri ma alea dria, eri 'du e'yo a'bini erini 'diyi ma orodri saaru dika ece e'yo 'da geri ongo vurisi. Eri ma o'duko e'da o'duko azini e'yo suruni 'ba eri vile 'diyi ni 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu magara gye goona, akatwara eby'obuhangwa bwe nk'ekintu ky'omuhendo kandi akakira kubyoreka kurabira omu kweshongora. Eiraka rye rikahurirwa omu migane n'emigyenzo y'abantu be.

eng_prompt: As a passionate advocate for social change, he often used his music as a platform to inspire and inform his listeners. His lyrics were carefully crafted to resonate with both young and old, making complex topics accessible through catchy melodies.
lug_prompt: Ng'omulwanirizi omunyiikivu ow'enkyukakyuka mu mbeera z'abantu, yakozesanga ennyimba ze ng'omukutu okuzzaamu amaanyi n'okutegeeza abawuliriza be. Ebigambo bye byakolebwa n'obwegendereza okusikiriza abato n'abakulu, okufuula ensonga enzibu okutuukirirwa okuyita mu nnyimba ezikwata.
ach_prompt: Macalo lalweny matek pi kelo aloka-loka I kwo pa lwak, en pol kare tiyo ki wer mege me cuku cwiny ki miyo ngec bot luwiny. Lok mege kiyubu maber tutwal me winyo dwon pa jo matino ki ludito, weko pwony matego bedo yot tutwal kun gitiyo ki wee mamwonya tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape egangiton loka aijulakin ejautene loka itunga, etapit ngesi aitwasam ikososineike kwape epone loka aisinyikokin keda aitijenikin itunga. lgg_prompt: Ekile 'ba a'di 'dipi okporu e'yo ojatani o'bi yi ma eselea ri le, eri ri i vile ongoni ayu 'ba erini eri erizu 'diyi dri ava fezu azini imbata fezu. Ba ede eri vile e'yo 'diyi geri kililiru si ecozu 'ba oderu azini 'ba 'wara 'diyi ma e'yo 'yezu, e'yo kongolokoru 'diyi 'bazu ewakokoru geri ongo 'bani 'dule 'diyi vusi.
nyn_prompt: Nk'omurwanirizi w'empindahinduka omu bantu, akaba akira kukoresa ebyeshongoro bye nk'omuringo gw'okuhuumuriza n'okumanyisa abarikumuhurikiza. Ebigambo bye bikakorwa n'obwegyendesereza kubaasa kuhikaana n'abato n'abakuru, ekyareteire enshonga ezigumire kuhikwaho kurabira omu byeshongoro ebirikukwata.

eng_prompt: In the world of music, artists often use their platforms to express strong opinions and challenge societal norms. This can lead to passionate reactions from listeners, sometimes resulting in heated debates.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'ennyimba, abayimbi bakozesa emikutu gyabwe okulaga endowooza zaabwe n'okusomooza empisa z'abantu. Kino kisobola okuviirako abawuliriza okuba n'obwagazi, oluusi ne kiviirako okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I lobo me wer, lugoo wee ipol kare gitiyo ki kabedo gi me nyutu tam gi ki lweny i kom cik me kabedo gi. Man twero kelo cwiny pa luwiny, ikare mukene kelo laro lok ma lyet tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka ayoere, itwasamaete awook iponesiokec kanu aitodun aomisio nuegogong ka aitepeg iponesio luka itunga. Epedori ngin ayangaun aomisio nuepolok kanejaas itunga, ido acie apakio eyangauni epeget loepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ongoniri ma alia, 'ba ongo ngopi 'diyi tutuni yi ma pari yi ayu egata okporu 'diyi ecezu azini a'di 'dizu 'yeta ongulumu yini 'diyi be. E'yo 'di eco fe 'ba e'yo eripi 'diyi ma e'yo ega asi driasi, dika sawa azi 'diyisi eco fe agbatara okporu 'diyi ma alia ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'eby'okweshongora, abeeshongozi nibakira kukoresa emikutu yaabo kworeka ebiteekateeko by'amaani n'okuhakanisa emicwe y'abantu. Eki nikibaasa kureetaho okwetomboitwa kw'amaani kuruga omu bahurikizi, obumwe n'obumwe nikibaasa kurugwamu okuhanuura kw'amaani.

eng_prompt: During a recent community event, the minister emphasized the importance of role models in society. He highlighted how musicians, with their influence, have a unique responsibility to inspire others through their actions.
lug_prompt: Mu mukolo ogwabaddewo gyebuvuddeko awo mu kitundu, minisita yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okubeera n'ekyokulabirako ekirungi mu kitundu. Yassa essira ku ngeri abayimbi gye balina obuvunaanyizibwa obw'enjawulo okuzzaamu abalala amaanyi okuyitira mu bikolwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: I kare me yub mo ma otime cokcok-ki, minista oloko tutwal I kom ber pa bedo ki jo ma gitye lanen maber I kabedo wa. En onyuto kit ma lugoo wee gitye ki twero me cuku cwiny dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opucit loka itunga, abu eminista kitogogong ajokis naka itunga lu iswamaete ejok kotoma atutubet. Abu ngesi kitodu epone loejaatar awook keda epone loepedoriata kesi aisinyikokin luce kotoma aswamisiokec.
lgg_prompt: Sawa 'bani e'yo 'yezu ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma alea, minisita 'da fe okpo orodri 'ba ecopi aa'pi 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi niri ma dria ongulumu eyi ma alea. Eri ece e'yo kini 'ba ongo ngopi 'diyi ma azi wura ndusi 'ba azi 'diyi ma ava engazu e'yo yini 'ye 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu mukoro gw'ekyanga ogwabaireho juba, minisita akashoboorora omugasho gw'abarikureebeka gye omu bantu. Akashoborora oku abeeshongozi, n'obujunaanizibwa bwabo, baine obujunaanizibwa bw'omutaano obw'okugaruramu abandi amaani barikurabira omu bikorwa byabo.

eng_prompt: Throughout his career, he sought inspiration from those around him, always eager to learn from their unique perspectives and talents. This deep appreciation for creativity shaped his own artistic journey.
lug_prompt: Mu mirimu gye gyonna, yanoonya okubudaabudibwa okuva mu abo abamwetoolodde, bulijjo nga yeegomba nnyo okuyiga okuva mu ndowooza n'ebitone byabwe eby'enjawulo. Okusiima kuno okw'amaanyi eri obuyiiya kwabumba olugendo lwe olw'okuyimba.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me ticce, en obedo ka yenyo cuku cwiny ki bot jo ma orumu, I kare weng obedo ki miti me pwonyo ki I kom tam gi ki mot gi mapat-pat. Pwoc madit tutwal ma en tye kwede pi diro ma en tye kwede okelo wot mege macalo laling cal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamuke kere, abu ngesi komo aisinyikokinit kanejaas itunga luejaasi ngesi, duc ekoto aisisiaun kotoma aomisio kec keda atalantanakec. Apodokinit na naepol noi naka aitolomunun iboro abu koinak ngesi epone loka ainom aputosia.
lgg_prompt: Sawa dria erini azi ngazu ri ma alea, eri nda ava engazu 'ba eri ma ageia 'diyi vu, eri sa'wa driasi avaru e'yo onizu engazu egata eyini 'diyi vu azini feta Munguni fe eyidri 'diyi vu. E'yo 'bani 'ba e'da edepi 'diyi dri awa'difo feza okporu 'diri oja geri erini e'da gbazu 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu mirimo ye yoona, akasherura okuhuumurizibwa kuruga omu bantu abaabaire bamwetooroire, buriijo aine ekihika ky'okwega kuruga omu biteekateeko byabo eby'omutaano hamwe n'etaranta zaabo. Okusiima kwe okw'amaani ahabw'okujumbura kukareetaho orugyendo rwe nk'omuteezi w'ebishushani.

eng_prompt: His tireless efforts in promoting education and healthcare have made a significant impact on the community. Many recognize him as a champion for social justice and development in the region.
lug_prompt: Kaweefube we ow'obutaweera mu kutumbula ebyenjigiriza n'ebyobulamu akoze kinene mu kitundu. Bangi bamumanyi ng'omulwanirizi w'obwenkanya n'enkulaakulana mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Tute matek ma en oketo me ilo malo rwom me kwan ki yotkom okelo adwogi maber tutwal I kom lwak. Dano mapol gingeye macalo lalweny pi ber bedo ki dongo lobo I twok piny eni.
teo_prompt: Aswam ke naepol noi kanu aitopoloria asioman keda amukian ejaiki itunga ajokis. Ejenete itunga luipu ngesi kwape etelekaran loka etube loajokan keda apol kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Okpo erini 'bale okposi onita ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi 'ye ojata angiri ongulumu eyi ma dria. Ba karakara eyi eri ega ekile 'ba a'di 'dipi e'yo liza kililiru ni azini angu ezoma ni angu 'di ma alea ri ru.
nyn_prompt: Amaani agu yaataire omu kutunguura eby'obwegyese n'eby'amagara, gakora kihango omu bantu. Baingi nibamumanya nk'omurwanirizi w'oburingaaniza n'entunguuka omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: The local music scene has been dominated by various genres, but one style seems to be noticeably absent. Despite the rich cultural heritage of the area, the presence of gospel music remains limited.
lug_prompt: Eby'okuyimba bya wano bibadde bifugibwa ebika by'ennyimba eby'enjawulo, naye ekika ekimu kirabika nga tekiriiwo. Wadde nga ekitundu kirina eby'obuwangwa bingi, ennyimba z'eddiini zikyali ntono.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol gubedo ka goyo wer mapat-pat, ento tye yoo acel ma nen calo peke. Kadi bed ni kabedo eni tye ki tekwaro mapol, wer me dini pud tye manok.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi ikososinei luka atutubet keda iponesio luegelegela, konye esubit bala emamei epone ediope. Karaida ipu inonosio luka atutubet kangin, ikidioko ikososinei luka ekanisa.
lgg_prompt: Ongo kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma esele eyi karakara, te geri azi e'da kile yo. E'yo suruni angu 'di ma alea 'diyi ma ta tro ovuzu tre ra ti, ongo e'yo a'ita ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni nga ovu were.
nyn_prompt: Ebyeshongoro by'omubyaro bitwairweho emiringo etari emwe, kwonka omuringo gumwe nigureebeka ngu tiguriho. Oihireho eby'obuhangwa by'ekyanga, eby'okweshongora eby'ediini nibiba biri bikye.

eng_prompt: Many artists find inspiration and solace in spiritual settings. As a result, they often seek out communal experiences during significant moments in their lives.
lug_prompt: Abayimbi bangi bafuna okubudaabudibwa n'okubudaabudibwa mu mbeera z'eby'omwoyo. N'ekivuddemu, batera okunoonya byebayitamu awamu mu biseera ebikulu mu bulamu bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Lugoo wee mapol ginongo cuku cwiny ki kwe cwiny I kabedo gi me cwiny. Macalo adwogi ne, ipol kare giyenyo jami ma otimme ikare me kwo gi.
