lgg_prompt: Ba ongo ngopi karakara 'diyi ava esu tualu asi omiza be pari e'yo onitani 'diyi ma alia. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni e'yo eyini esu tualu 'diyi nda sa'wa orodriru eyini aa'zu edriru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Abeeshongozi baingi nibatunga okuhuumurizibwa n'okuhuumurizibwa omu by'omwoyo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kusherura eby'okureeberaho omu bwire bw'omutaano omu magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the intersection of faith and music has sparked considerable debate within the industry. As a result, many secular musicians claim to be Christians.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, okukwatagana kw'enzikiriza n'ennyimba kuleeseewo okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu kisaawe. N'ekivuddemu, abayimbi b'ensi bangi beeyita abakrisitaayo.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, ribbe pa dini ki wer okelo laro lok I kin luwer. Macalo adwogi ne, lugoo wee mapol giwaco ni gubedo lukricto.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, airiamunet naka aiyuun keda ikososinei eyangaunit epeget loepol noi kotoma okampuni. Kanuka ngun, ebalasi awook luipu ebe eraasi ikurisitayon.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, e'yo aita ni tualu ongoni pie ri fe agbatara angiri okalamvu 'da ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara ongo co'baa wudrikuru si 'diyi 'yo eyi Kristayo ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, enkwatanisa y'enyikiriza n'eby'okweshongora ereesireho okuhanuura kw'amaani omu by'okweshongora. N'ekyarugiremu, abeeshongozi baingi ab'ensi nibegira ngu n'abakurisitaayo.

eng_prompt: The influence of music extends beyond just sound; it often shapes the way individuals express themselves in everyday life. As a result, fans frequently emulate the styles and attitudes of their favorite artists.
lug_prompt: Obuyinza bw'ennyimba busukka ku maloboozi gokka; zitera okukyusa engeri abantu gye beeyisaamu mu bulamu obwa bulijjo. N'ekivuddemu, abawagizi batera okukoppa emisono n'enneeyisa y'abayimbi be baagala.
ach_prompt: Diro pa wer pe tye I kom dwon keken; pol kare loko kit ma dano nyuto kwede kit ma giwinyo kwede I kwo gi me nino ducu. Macalo adwogi ne, lucwak ipol kare gi lubo kit ki tam pa lugoo wee ma gimaro.
teo_prompt: Epone loepedoriata ikososinei aitodolikin iponesio luka itunga kotoma aijar naka nginiparan. Kanuka ngun, etapit egangitok aitodolikin iponesio keda iponesio luka awook kec lueminasi kesi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ongo ni 'diyi ma okpo aga lu o'duko ma dria ra; eri tutuni geri 'ba alu alu yini yi ma e'yo ecezu idri yini o'du vusi 'diyi ma alia 'diyi oja. E'yo 'disi, 'ba atita fepi 'diyi tutuni wura azini adriza 'ba ongo co'ba yini lele tu 'diyi niri o'bi.
nyn_prompt: Omugasho gw'okweshongora nigukira ahahurira kwonka, nigureetera abantu okworeka emicwe yaabo omu magara gaabo aga buriizooba. N'ekyarugiremu, abahagizi nibakira kutooreza emicwe n'emitwarize y'abeeshongozi abu barikukunda.

eng_prompt: This year's music festival has gained significant attention from fans around the world. As a result, the concert has attracted many international artists.
lug_prompt: Ekivvulu ky'ennyimba eky'omwaka guno kifunye okufaayo okw'amaanyi okuva mu bawagizi okwetooloola ensi yonna. N'ekivuddemu, ekivvulu kisikiriza abayimbi bangi okuva mu nsi z'ebweru.
ach_prompt: Yub me wer ma obedo tye I mwaka ni oyomo cwiny dano mapol tutwal I wilobo lung. Macalo adwogi ne, yub me wee eni okelo lugoo wee mapol ma aa ki ilobo mawoko.
teo_prompt: Abu epucit loka ikososinei loka ekaru kalo kodum aimorikikina kama ejaasi amaak kotoma akwap kere. Kanuka ngun, abu epucit ngol koyangau awook luipu luka akwapin ace.
lgg_prompt: Avita ongoni eli 'disi ri esu ava angiri engazu 'ba atita fepi 'diyi vu wudrikuru ma kalasi dria. E'yo 'disi, avita 'da eji 'ba ongo ngopi kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi karakara.
nyn_prompt: Ekivvulu ky'okweshongora eky'omwaka ogu kitungire ekitiinisa ky'amaani kuruga omu bahagizi okwetoroora ensi yoona. N'ekyarugiremu,omukoro gw'okweshongora guretsiremu abeeshongozi baingi kuruga omu mahanga g'aheeru.

eng_prompt: As the festival approached, excitement filled the air, drawing in music enthusiasts from all over the country. In a show of commitment to the arts, the cultural minister announced plans to enhance the experience for attendees.
lug_prompt: Ekivvulu bwe kyasembera, essanyu lyajjula mu bbanga, nga likungaanya abawagizi b'ennyimba okuva mu bitundu by'eggwanga byonna. Mu kulaga obumalirivu eri eby'emikono, minisita w'ebyobuwangwa yalangiridde enteekateeka okutumbula obumanyirivu eri abeetabye.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kwer ne cok, yom-cwiny opong I kabedo weng, ma okelo lumar wer ma aa ki I but lobo man mapat-pat. I nyutu cwiny me keto cwiny I kom lok me tekwaro, minista me tekwaro otito yub me medo rwom me ngec bot joo ma obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete epucit, apotu aiyalama kilelebunos, ido apotu itunga lueminasi ikososinei kotoma akwap kere. Kanu aitodun ebe ekapakina kesi aswam aputosia, abu eminisita loka inonosio kolimo aitemonokineta nuka aitojokar aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Omu 'da ni ecazu ogogo, ayiko ga angu 'da ma alea tre, dika eyi eji 'ba ongo lepi 'diyi engazu kari 'di ma alea ndulu. E'dazu asi feza e'yo onitani 'diyi ma dria, minisita e'yo suruni 'diyi niri azi otita 'ba emu'ba 'diyi dri e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omukoro gw'okujaguza ku gwahikire, okushemererwa kweijuga omumwanya, kukareetaho abakunzi b'ebyeshongoro kuruga omwihanga ryona. Omu kworeka okwehayo kwe omu by'emikono, minisita w'eby'obuhangwa akarangirira enteekateeka y'okutunguura eby'okureeberaho by'abaizire.

eng_prompt: Last summer, a vibrant celebration of global cultures took place in various cities across the United States. Among the highlights was a captivating performance by a troupe showcasing the rich traditions of Ugandan dance.
lug_prompt: Omusana oguwedde, ebikujjuko by'obuwangwa bw'ensi yonna byaliwo mu bibuga eby'enjawulo okwetoloola United States. Ebimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyali mu kivvulu ekyo kwe kuyimba kwa bannakatemba nga balaga obuwangwa bw'amazina ga bannayuganda.
ach_prompt: I kare me oro ma okato, yub me kwero tekwaro me wilobo obedo tye I citi mapat-pat I lobo Amerika. I kin jami ma pire tek tutwal obedo myel pa lugo myel ma gubedo ka nyuto tekwaro me myel me lobo Uganda.
teo_prompt: Apakio nu atuboros, aponi inumunumunai inonosio luegelegela luka akwapin nuko America. Kotoma akiro nuapolok ajai aitodiaret naejok noi naka ikososinei luko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Eli ajerisi, ayiko zuza e'yo suruni wudrikurusi 'diyi ma dria ri 'ye pari aku ambo karakara kari United States niri ma alea 'diyi ma alea. E'yo okporu 'diyi ma eselea ri ndra avita 'ba ongo co'baa 'diyi ni e'dazu e'yo a'bi kari Uganda niri ma ongo tuzani 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omushana oguhwaire, hakabaho okujaguza kw'eby'obuhangwa bw'ensi yoona omu ndembo nyingi okwetoroora United States. Omubikuru harimu omuzaano ogurikworeka eby'obuhangwa by'amazina ga Uganda.

eng_prompt: With a rich history spanning several decades, the group has consistently showcased their exceptional musical talent. Their dedication to preserving and innovating Ugandan music has earned them a prominent place in the industry.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebyafaayo eby'obugagga eby'emyaka mingi, ekibinja kibadde kiraga ebitone byabwe eby'ennyimba eby'enjawulo. Okwewaayo kwabwe mu kukuuma n'okuzza obuggya ennyimba za Uganda kibasobozesezza okuba n'ekifo eky'amaanyi mu kisaawe.
ach_prompt: Ki lok macon ma orii pi mwaki mapol, gurup eni obedo ka nyuto talanta gi me wer. Dyeregi me gwoko ki kelo wer manyen I lobo Uganda oweko gunongo kabedo ma oywek tutwal I tenge me wer.
teo_prompt: Keda akiro nukolo nuka ikar luipu, itodunit egurupu ngol atalanta kec naka ayoere. Ainakina kec kanu aidar keda aitolom ikososinei luko Uganda einakini kesi aiboisit naepol noi kotoma okampuni.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, ongulumu 'da e'da eyi ma feta Munguni fe eyini 'diyi sa'wa driasi. E'yo yini yi owizu ongo Ugandaniri ma ta mbazu azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ma edeta ma dria ri fe yi dri pari onyiru ni isu okalamvu 'di ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho kumara emyaka mingi, guruupu egyo etwire neeyoreka etaraanta yaabo y'okweshongora. Okwehayo kwabo omu kurinda n'okutunguura ebyeshongoro bya Uganda, kibahereize omwanya gw'amaani omu by'okweshongora.

eng_prompt: As the world continues to grapple with the ongoing health crisis, various industries have faced significant disruptions. In particular, the entertainment sector has been hit hard, leading to widespread changes in event scheduling.
lug_prompt: Nga ensi yeeyongera okulwanagana n'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso, amakolero ag'enjawulo gafunye okutaataaganyizibwa okw'amaanyi. Okusingira ddala eby'amasanyu bikoseddwa nnyo, ekiviiriddeko enkyukakyuka mu nteekateeka y'emikolo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo tye ka lweny ki peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, tic mapat-pat tye kanongo peko madit tutwal. Tenge me galo wang tutwalle onongo peko madit tutwal, man okelo aloka-loka madit tutwal I yub me yub mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit akwap kere ainingosit keda ationis naka angaleu, ejaas acuman nuegelegela keda ationis naepol noi. Kacut erionget loka aitelelio emunarit noi, ido abu koyangau aijulanakineta nuipu noi kotoma ainapeta nuka epucit.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni mu drile a'di 'dizu e'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi be, okalamvu ndundu eyi esu e'yo ewaru eyi. Esele e'yo ayiko fezani 'diyi ma dria ri esu candi amboru, erini fezu ojata 'yezu sa'wa dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku ensi erikugumizamu erwanagana n'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburiyo nibugyenda omu maisho, amakorero maingi gatungire oburemeezi bw'amaani. Okukira munonga, eby'amashemererwa bitahirirwe munonga, ekirikureetaho empindahinduka omu ntebekanisa y'emikoro.

eng_prompt: Many musicians and performers rely on live shows as a significant source of income. With the rise of global streaming platforms, touring has become an essential way for artists to connect with fans and boost their earnings.
lug_prompt: Abayimbi bangi n'abayimbi beesigama ku bivvulu ng'ensibuko y'ensimbi ey'amaanyi. N'okweyongera kw'emikutu gy'okutambuza obubaka mu nsi yonna, okulambula kufuuse engeri enkulu eri abayimbi okukwatagana n'abawagizi n'okutumbula ensimbi zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Lugoo wee ki lugoo wee mapol gijenge I kom yub me wee macalo yoo me nongo cente. Ki dongo pa yub mapat-pat me poko lok angeya iwi yamo iwi yamo iwi yamo I wilobo lung, wot me limo piny dong odoko yoo ma pire tek tutwal pi lugoo wee me kube ki lucwak gi ki medo cente gi.
teo_prompt: Awook keda ayook luipu emunokina aitodianareta kwape ewai lo edumununet ikapun. Keda apol naka aiboisio nuka airot airot airot airot airot, araun epone loajokan noi loka ayook arucokina keda egangitok kec ka aiyatakin ikapunukec.
lgg_prompt: Ba ongo ngopi azini 'ba ongo co'baa 'diyi ma karakara yi yi ati avita avita ni 'diyi ma dria geri yini ecozu robia esuzu 'diyi ru. Afa omvele global streaming platforms ru 'diyi ma omgbo tuzurisi, acizu angu ndundu eyi onezu ri eca geri azi orodriru 'ba ongo ngopi 'diyi ni eyi ecizu 'ba atita fepi eyidri 'diyi pie dika eyi ma robia ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Abeeshongozi n'abeeshongozi baingi nibegamira aha kukora ebivvulu nk'oburugo bw'esente. Ahabw'entunguuka y'emikutu y'ensi yoona, okutaayaaya kihindukire omuringo gw'amaani gw'abeeshongozi kukwatanisa n'abahagizi n'okwongyera aha ntaatsya yaabo.

eng_prompt: To promote cultural awareness and artistic expression among students, various initiatives have been introduced. One of the key programs is focused on enhancing musical education in schools.
lug_prompt: Okutumbula okumanyisibwa kw'ebyobuwangwa n'okuyimba mu bayizi, enteekateeka ez'enjawulo zitandikiddwawo. Ekimu ku pulogulaamu enkulu kwe kutumbula eby'okuyimba mu masomero.
ach_prompt: Me tyelo kor ngec me tekwaro ki nyuto cal ikin lutino kwan, yub mapat-pat okati. Yub acel ma pire tek tutwal tye me medo rwom me pwonye me wer i gangi kwan.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aijen naka einono keda aitodiaret naka aputosia kanejaas esisiak, etolomun iboro luegelegela. Adiopet kotoma ainapeta nuapolok erai aitojokar aisisia naka ikososinei kosomeroi.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'do e'yo ndundu eyi sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea imbata e'yo suruni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otuzu. Otita okporu 'diyi ma azi lezu onita ongoni sukulu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguura okwetegyereza eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'okworeka eby'emikono omu beegi, enteekateeka nyingi zitandikirweho. Emwe aha nteekateeka enkuru n'okutunguura eby'okweshongora omu mashomero.

eng_prompt: Uganda has become a vibrant hub for cultural exchange and artistic expression. As a result, the country has attracted numerous talented musicians and performers from around the globe.
lug_prompt: Uganda efuuse ekifo eky'amaanyi eky'okuwanyisiganya eby'obuwangwa n'okwolesa eby'emikono. N'ekivuddemu, eggwanga lisikiriza abayimbi bangi abalina ebitone okuva mu nsi yonna.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda odoko kabedo maber me nywako lok me tekwaro ki nyuto cal. Macalo adwogi ne, lobo man okelo lugoo wee ki lugoo wee ma ludiro mapol tutwal ki I but lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Erai Uganda aiboisit naejok noi naka aimor inonosio keda aitodianar aputosia. Kanuka ngun, eyangaunit akwap awook keda awook luipu luejaasi keda atalanta kotoma akwap kere.
lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri eca angu okporu e'yo suruni 'diyi awazu tualu e'yo e'da gbaza ni 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, kari 'di eji 'ba ongo ngopi talanta be 'diyi tualu 'ba ongo ngopi 'diyi pie engazu wudrikuru ma kalasi dria.
nyn_prompt: Uganda ehindukire omwanya murungi gw'okugabana eby'obuhangwa hamwe n'okworeka eby'emikono. N'ekyarugiremu,eihanga rikwakiira abeeshongozi n'abeeshongozi baingi kuruga omunsi yoona.

eng_prompt: When traveling through East Africa, one of the most remarkable experiences is the warmth of the local communities. In Uganda, the hospitality of the people truly stands out, making every visitor feel at home.
lug_prompt: Bw'otambula mu buvanjuba bwa Afirika, ekimu ku bintu ebyewuunyisa by'oyitamu bwe bbugumu ly'abantu b'omu kitundu. Mu Uganda, empisa y'okusembeza abagenyi ey'abantu yeewuunyisa nnyo, ekireetera buli mugenyi okuwulira ng'ali waka.
ach_prompt: Ka itye ka wot I but lobo mapat-pat manonge I Afrika kunyango, acel me kin jami mabeco tutwal ma inongo en aye cwiny me mar pa lutedero. I lobo Uganda, jo ma jolo welo gibeco tutwal, weko welo ducu giwinyo agonya.
teo_prompt: Nealosia jo East Africa, idiopet koboro luitegelikina lu iwanyunit ijo ngesi amina na itunga. Ko Uganda, iponesio luajokak noi luka itunga, einakini ngin epejonon apupi ore.
lgg_prompt: Eka aci angu Africa ma kala etuni efuria 'diyi ma alea, e'yo azi onyiru mini esu 'diyi ma azi eri ayiko ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyiniri'i. Kari Uganda niri ma alea, geri 'ba eyini 'ba eyi ai'zu ri eyi ma eselea saaru, erini fezu omu eyini aa'zu akuasi.
nyn_prompt: Ku orikugyenda orikurabira omu mahanga g'oburugwa-izooba bwa Africa, ekikuru n'embabazi z'abantu b'omu kicweka ekyo. Omu Uganda, abantu nibatangirirwa ahabw'okuba efura, ekirikureetera omugyenyi weena kwehurira gye.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, various forms of art have served as a bridge between diverse communities. One of the most powerful expressions of human experience is music, which transcends language and cultural barriers.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, ebifaananyi eby'engeri ez'enjawulo bikoze nga olutindo wakati w'ebitundu eby'enjawulo. Ekimu ku bintu eby'amaanyi abantu bye bayitamu kwe kuyimba, ekisukkulumye ku nnimi n'obuwangwa.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, cal mapat-pat obedo macalo guti me kubu kabedo mapat-pat. Acel me kin jami matego tutwal ma dano timo en aye wer, ma kato wang leb ki tekwaro.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, iswamaete aputosia nuegelegela kwape edaraca kiding itunga luegelegela. Adiopet kotoma aitodianareta nuepolok noi nuka itunga erai ikososinei, lumam itolitolete angajep keda inonosio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, e'da gbaza wura ndundu 'diyi nga azi ekile daraza ongulumu ndundu eyi ma eselea ri le. E'yo azi okporu 'bani e'yo 'ba ada eyini 'diyi ecezu 'diyi ma azi ongo ni, e'yo ti ni azini e'yo suruni 'diyi ma eselea ri'I.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, ebishushani by'emiringo etari emwe, bikozire nk'orutindo ahagati y'abantu b'emiringo etari emwe. Kimwe aha bintu by'amaani ebirikworeka ebirikukwata ahabantu n'ebyeshongoro, ebirikureetaho entaro omu ndimi hamwe n'eby'obuhangwa.

eng_prompt: After months of preparation and anticipation, the community finally welcomed their guests from across the ocean. The leader felt a deep sense of pride as he watched the cultural exchange unfold.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okwetegekera n'okusuubira, abatuuze baasembyeyo okwaniriza abagenyi baabwe okuva emitala w'ennyanja. Omukulembeze yawulira okwenyumiriza okw'amaanyi bwe yalaba okuwanyisiganya kw'ebyobuwangwa nga kugenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yubbe ki bedo ki byek, lwak ogamo wele gi ki tung lobo ma woko. Latela obedo ki awaka madit tutwal I kare ma oneno lok me tekwaro tye ka time.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin keda aomisio, apotu itunga ijaikisi ipejok kec luka akwapin ace. Abu engarenon kopup aiyalama naepol noi nawanyunia ngesi aineranara naka einono.
lgg_prompt: Mba otuza azini e'yo egaza ma vutia, ongulumu 'da ai asizu eyi ma omu engazu kari azi 'diyi ma woko amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ra. Drice'ba 'da esu afusi saaru erini e'yo 'bani e'yo suruni 'diyi awazu 'diyi ndreria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okweteekateekyera n'okuteekateeka, abantu bakahendera baakiira abagyenyi baabo kuruga aheeru y'enyanja. Omwebembezi akahurira ekitiinisa ky'amaani arikureeba okugaaniira kw'eby'obuhangwa nikugyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the demand for music education has surged across the country. As a result, more institutions have emerged to cater to aspiring musicians.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, obwetaavu bw'okusomesebwa mu by'okuyimba bweyongedde okwetooloola eggwanga. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole ebirala bivuddeyo okulabirira abo abaagala okuyimba.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, miti pa lutino kwan me wer omede tutwal I lobo man. Macalo adwogi ne, gangi kwan mapol dong ocake me konyo lugo wer matye kamito wer.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, apolor eipuda lo aisisia ikososinei kakwap. Kanuka ngun, apotu isomeroi luipu opotu kanu aidar lu ekotosi ayook.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, leta onita ongoniri ma dria ri tu kari 'di ma alea ndulu. E'yo 'disi, pari onita ni 'diyi efu drile 'ba lepi ongo ngopi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, ebyetengo by'okwegyesa eby'okweshongora byeyongyeire omu ihanga ryona. N'ekyarugiremu, amatendekyero maingi gatandikire kukora ahabw'abeeshongozi abarikwenda kwejumba omu by'okweshongora.

eng_prompt: After years of neglect and lack of maintenance, many once-thriving solar systems have fallen into disrepair. The rapid advancements in technology have rendered older models obsolete, leading to widespread abandonment.
lug_prompt: Oluvanyuma lw'emyaka gy'okulagajjalirwa n'obutalabirirwa bulungi, amasannyalaze g'amaanyi g'enjuba agaali gakola obulungi gagudde mu mbeera embi. Enkulaakulana ey'amangu mu tekinologiya efudde ebyuma ebikadde okuvvaako, ekiviiriddeko okusuulibwa mu bantu bangi.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me cayo ki bedo peke pa yub me gwoko mac ma aa ki iceng, pol pa yub me mac macon ma onongo tye ka dongo tutwal dong odoko rac tutwal. Alokaloka ma otimme oyot-oyot tutwal I kom tet manyen oweko motoka macon odoko gin ma konye odugu nok, ma oweko dano mapol dong guweko gioo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka apalunit keda amamus aitemonokino, isolosinei luipu lueswamaete ejok apotu ibiroros. Apol naka etatai loakwana ijaikini iponesio lumojong lumam epedorete aswam, ido eyangauni aibiror naka iponesio lumojong.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani adizu azini 'bani eyi edezu ku 'bori ma vutia, afa solar ru 'diyi ma azi andra okporu 'diyi e'de e'yo onzi ma alea. Zota mbele mbele e'yo tekenologia ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi 'ba afa andra drio 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria e'yo okporu ku, e'yo fezu 'bani yi adizu 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okunagaijura hamwe n'obutagarurwa busya, ebyoma by'amashanyarazi ga soora ebyabaire nibikora gye bigwa omu kabi. Entunguuka y'amaani omu tekinorogye eretsireho enkora y'ebiiruka ebikuru, ekyarugiremu okurekyerera abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: As the due date approached, she felt a mix of excitement and nervousness. Every day brought new changes as her body prepared for the arrival of their little one.

eng_prompt: As the due date approached, she felt a mix of excitement and nervousness. Friends and family eagerly awaited the arrival of the new baby.

lgg_prompt: O'du eri vile okporovururi ni ecazu ogogoruria, eri etumu ayiko azini urisi. Agyipi azini familia 'diyi te mva o'diruri ma ecata avasi.

ach_prompt: I kare ma abedo ka winyo arem matek adada, aniang ni kare ma abedo kakuru dong oromo. Gen ma onongo atye kwede olokke odoko cwer cwiny I kare ma awinyo arem me acel.

lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu okposi, ani ra kini sawa mani ebi te te ri 'di asizu 'di'i. Asi 'baza 'da oja i mbeleru e'yo ewaru ni ma e'yo erita ako ni e'doria.
nyn_prompt: Obusaasi ku bwayeyongyeire, nkamanya ngu obwire obu nabaire nintegyereza bukaba buhikire. Okuteekateeka kwangye kukarahuka kuhinduka oburemeezi obu naabaire ninyehurira obusaasi obwabandize.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown alarming trends in health outcomes among certain populations. Experts are particularly concerned about the increasing prevalence of untreated diseases.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga enkulaakulana eyeeraliikiriza mu byobulamu mu bantu abamu. Abakugu beeraliikirivu nnyo olw'okweyongera kw'endwadde ezitajjanjabibwa.

teo_prompt: Akiro nuitodunitos nuka aingic pac itodunitos iponesio luitukurianete luka angaleu kanejaas itunga ice. Iyalongongosi ipirioitin noi kanu aiyatakin na adekasinei nu mam imukia.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo onzi 'yepi e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi 'ba azi 'diyi ma eselea. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo azo 'bani ati ku 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka entunguuka y'embeera y'abantu omu by'amagara. Abakugu niberarikirira munonga okujanjaara kw'endwara ezitarikutambirwa.

eng_prompt: Despite the doctor's recommendations, she chose to forgo regular check-ups during her pregnancy. Her decision raised concerns among her family and friends about the potential risks involved.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'omusawo yamuwa amagezi, yasalawo obutagenda kukeberebwa buli kiseera ng'ali lubuto. Okusalawo kwe kwaleetawo okweraliikirira mu b'omu maka ge ne mikwano gye ku kabi akayinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni daktar owaco ni pe omyero ki pime kare ki kare I kare ma en oyac. Moko tam mege okelo lworo ikin lupacone ki lureme pi peko ma twero bedo tye.
teo_prompt: Karaida abu emuron kolimok ngesi, abu ngesi koseu ainyekikin ainwakio apakio nu epotiete ngesi. Abu aseuneteke koyangau aiyalongong kanejaas lukokaleke keda ipaperoke kanuikamunitos atiokisio nuepedorete alomun.
lgg_prompt: Dakitari ma egata ma talasi, eri 'du e'yo 'bani eri andrizu sawa driasi eri ma okporovururi ma aliari kuzu ja. E'yo erini pe ri eji asi otiza familia erini 'diyi ma eselea azini agyipi yi ma eselea e'yo ewaru ecopi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obuhabuzi bw'omushaho,akacwamu okureka kukyeberwa buri kaire obu yaabaire aine enda. Encwamu ye ekareetaho okwerarikirira omu maka ge n'abanywani be aha kabi akarikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: In a tragic turn of events, a severe storm swept through the region, causing widespread devastation. Emergency services struggled to respond as the situation escalated, leading to a heartbreaking loss of life.
lug_prompt: Mu nkyukakyuka ey'ekikangabwa, omuyaga ogw'amaanyi gwayita mu kitundu kyonna, ne guleetawo okusaanyaawo ebintu bingi. Ebitongole ebirwanirira obujjanjabi byalemaganye okuddamu ng'embeera yeeyongedde, ekyaviiriddeko okufiirwa obulamu mu ngeri ey'ennaku.
ach_prompt: I kare ma jami otimme marac tutwal, yamo magwar obalo jami mapol tutwal I but piny eni. Dul ma miyo kony pi peko ma poto atura onongo tek tutwal me timo gin mo ikare ma peko ne omedde, ma oweko dano mapol otoo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loerono noi, abu ekwam loapol kibirokin aiboisit ngin, ido abu komudia iboro luipu noi. Apotu lu engeso kongeroto aswam naarai apolor ejautene, ido abu koyangau atwanare naka itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma alea, oli okporu ni aci angu 'da ma alea dria, e'yo angu ezaza ni 'diyi ejizu angu ndundu eyi ma alea. Ba azakoma e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kopi 'diyi e'yo 'ye ewaru e'yo 'da ni tuzu drile, e'yo fepi 'ba eyi ma edri avizu asi nyoza ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu mpindahinduka y'akabi munonga,eihunga ry'amaani rikareetaho okusisikara kw'amaani omu kyanga. Abakozi b'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru, bakarwana kugarukamu embeera ku yaayeyongyeire, ekyarugiremu okufeerwa amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: Navigating the complexities of the job market can be overwhelming for young people. Therefore, it's essential for parents to play an active role in helping their children explore potential career paths.
lug_prompt: Okutambulira mu buzibu bw'okunoonya emirimu kiyinza okuba ekizibu ennyo eri abavubuka. N'olw'ekyo, kya mugaso nnyo abazadde okwenyigira ennyo mu kuyamba abaana baabwe okunoonyereza ku makubo g'emirimu.
ach_prompt: Lweny i kom peko me can tic twero bedo tek tutwal ki bulu. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal ni lunyodo omyero gutim tic matek me konyo lutinogi me nongo yoo me kwan maber.
teo_prompt: Aitodolikin atiokisio nuka esokoni loka aswamisinei erai ibore yenepol noi kanejaas atumunak. Kanuka ngun, ejokuka noi auriak aingarakin idwe kec aingic aswamisinei nu ebeit kesi aswam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru cu azi niri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu ri eco adri 'ba ode eyini okporu tu. Ka'dini, eri orodriru tipika eyini azi ngazu okporu eyini anzi eyivile 'diyi ma aza kozu geri eyini ecozu aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi onezu.

eng_prompt: The sun was setting, casting a warm glow over the community center as the sound of laughter and chatter filled the air. It was a special day for the parish, and everyone was excited to come together for the event.

eng_prompt: In order to maintain harmony and balance within the household, it's essential that everyone contributes to the family's well-being. Each person's unique strengths and responsibilities are vital to our collective success.

teo_prompt: Kanu aidar ainapakina ka ainapakina okalia, ejok itunga kere aswam kagogongu kanu aijar naka ekale. Iponesio luitegelikina luka itunganan luegogong keda lu epol ajokis kanu akerianut wok.

ach_prompt: I kare-ni, tye jami mapol ma weko wat ikin dano pe bedo maber. Gin acel ma kelo peko madit tutwal en aye bedo tye pa tim me pe woro ikin joo ma onyome.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naka lolo, ipu iboro lu eyangaununete amamus aijar naka eidicane loajokan. Adiopebon naetiono noi ngesi iponesio lumam eyongitai kanejaas ikiliok keda angor.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ewu andruri ma alea, e'yo ndundu eyi fepi e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ni aa'zu muke ku 'diyi. E'yo azi asi otiza fepi 'diyi ma azi adriza inzita kokoru 'ba eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma eselea ri i.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu b'erizooba, hariho enshonga nyingi ezirikureetaho enkora y'omukago etarimu magara marungi. Omuringo gumwe ogurikwerarikiriza n'emicwe y'obutaheereza ekitiinisa omu bashaija n'abakazi.

eng_prompt: In times of hardship, the community emphasized the importance of partnership and mutual support within families. As challenges mounted, it became clear that collaboration was essential for overcoming obstacles.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera ebizibu, ekitundu kyassa essira ku bukulu bw'okukolagana n'okuyambagana mu maka. Okusoomoozebwa bwe kweyongera, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti okukolera awamu kyali kikulu nnyo okusobola okuvvuunuka ebizibu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, lwak guketo cwinygi I kom ber pa ribbe ki kony ikin gangi. I kare ma peko omede, nen atyer kamaleng ni ribe obedo gin ma pire tek me loyo peko.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko, apotu itunga kitogogongoto ajokis naka aimorikikina keda aigangite ikalia. Neapotu atiokisio kiyatakinos, apotu kojenutu ebe ibusakinit aimorikikina aitelekaar atiokisio.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru 'diyisi, ongulumu 'da 'ba asi orodri aa'ta tualu azini atita fezu familia eyi ma eselea ri ma dria. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzurisi, eca e'da kini ti ecita eri orodriru e'yo ewaru 'diyi ndezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, abantu bakahamya omugasho gw'okukwatanisa n'okushagikana omu maka. Oburemeezi ku bwayeyongyeire, kikarebeka butunu ngu okukwatanisa kikaba kiri eky'omugasho omu kusingura oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: In times of conflict, it is essential for families to come together and support one another. By fostering open communication and understanding, they can create a nurturing environment for all.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obukuubagano, kya mugaso amaka okwegatta n'okuwagiragana. Nga batumbula empuliziganya ennungi n'okutegeeragana, basobola okutondawo embeera ennungi eri buli omu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me lweny, pire tek tutwal ki lugangi me ribbe kacel me konyo luwotgi. Ka gicuku cwiny dano me lok kacel ki niang maber, ci gi twero yubu kabedo maber pi dano weng.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nuka ingungeta, ejokuka ikalia aimorikikin kosodete aigangit yenice. Kowai lo aitopolor einer loepukora ka apuponoro, epedorete kesi aitolomun ejautene loejok kanu itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ngiringiri nirisi, eri orodriru familia eyini emuzu tualu azini eyi atizu eyi ma eselea. E'yo nzeza ngmboru azini vata ma omgbo otuza si, eyi eco angu imbata fezu 'ba dria eyidri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutabanguko, niky'omugasho amaka kukwatanisa n'okuhagana. Kurabira omukureetaho empurizagana n'okwetegyerezana, nibabaasa kureetaho obusingye burungi ahari boona.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for community and support among men, local leaders have come together to address various issues affecting their lives. After months of planning and discussions, they have officially established a new organization dedicated to fostering connection and empowerment.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'abantu n'obuyambi mu basajja, abakulembeze b'ebitundu bakwataganye okukola ku nsonga ez'enjawulo ezikwata ku bulamu bwabwe. Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo, bataddewo ekitongole ekipya mu butongole ekigendereddwamu okutumbula enkolagana n'okutumbula abantu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak kacel ki kony ikin coo, lutela me tedero guribe kacel me cobo peko mapat-pat matye ka yelo kwo gi. Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki nywako lok, gucako dul manyen ma mito kelo kubbe ki ilo malo rwom pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka itunga keda agangat kanejaas ikiliok, apotu engarenok luka atutubena imorikikinos aitemokin atiokisio nuetiroritos aijar kec. Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aitemonokin keda aitemitem, etolomutu kesi atukot naitetet naepedori aimorikikin keda aitigogong itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo lezu ongulumu eyini tualu atita agupi eyini ri pie ri ma omgbo otuzu, drice'ba angu eyini 'diyi emu tualu e'yo ndundu eyi ma edri 'diyi ma aza kozu. Mba otuta 'yezu azini agbatara gbazu 'bori ma vutia, eyi e'do amuti o'diru e'yo ti icita ni azini okpo feza niri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekyetengo ky'abantu n'obuhwezi ahagati y'abashaija, abebembezi b'ebyaro bakwatanisa kukora aha nshonga nyingi ezirikuteganisa amagara gaabo. Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okuhanuura, batandikireho ekitongore ekisya eky'okureetaho okukwatanisa n'okutunguura abantu.

eng_prompt: Growing up in a close-knit community, my family instilled in me the importance of faith and tradition. As a result, I have developed a deep connection to my spiritual roots.
lug_prompt: Olw'okuba nnakulira mu kitundu ekirimu enkolagana ey'oku lusegere, ab'omu maka gaffe banjigiriza obukulu bw'enzikiriza n'obulombolombo. N'ekivuddemu, nfunye enkolagana ey'oku lusegere n'ensibuko zange ez'eby'omwoyo.
ach_prompt: Dano me gangwa gupwonya ber pa dini ki tekwaro. Macalo adwogi ne, adongo wat matek tutwal I kin an ki lunyodo na.
teo_prompt: Apolor eong kotoma atutubet naejaasi keda aimorikikina, apotu lukokaleka isisianakisi eong ajokis naka aiyuun keda inonosio. Kanuka ngun, adumu eong arucokina naepol noi keda aiboisio nuka edini.
lgg_prompt: E'yo mani zozu ongulumu ti ecita be tu 'diyi ma alia, familia mavileri emba ma alia orodri aita ni azini e'yo a'bini 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, ma e'do aa'ta okporu ma vile ola oruleru 'diyi be.
nyn_prompt: Okukurira omu kicweka ekirikukwatanisa, eka yangye ekanyigiriza omugasho gw'okwikiriza n'eby'obuhangwa. N'ekyarugiremu, ntungire okukwatanisa kw'amaani n'emiringo yangye y'eby'omwoyo.

eng_prompt: The team was formed to promote diversity and inclusion in the workplace. It includes individuals from various backgrounds and experiences.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu yatondebwawo okutumbula enjawulo n'okusembeza abantu bonna ku mirimu. Kizingiramu abantu okuva mu mbeera n'obumanyirivu obw'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Dul enoni kicako gi me tyelo kor lok me bedo pat pat ki bedo tye pa dano weng I gang tic. I iye tye iye dano ma aa ki I kabedo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Aponi kitolomunai etimu ngol kanu aitopolorite aiboisio nuegelegela nuka aswam. Imoriarit ngin itunga luegelegela lu iswamaete iboro luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ba e'do amuti 'da e'yo esele coza ni azini 'ba eyi ma esele cozu pari azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea ri otuzu. Eri ma alia 'ba engapi angu ndundu eyi ma alea azini e'yo ndundu eyini esu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu ekatandikwaho okureetaho entaaniso n'okushoroora abantu omu myanya y'emirimo. Harimu abantu kuruga omu myanya etari emwe n'emwe.

eng_prompt: The construction crew has been preparing the area for weeks. Once the weather permits, they will begin the final phase of the project.
lug_prompt: Abakozi b'okuzimba babadde bateekateeka ekifo okumala wiiki eziwera. Embeera y'obudde bw'eneeba ekkirizza, bajja kutandika omutendera gwa pulojekiti ogusembayo.
ach_prompt: Lutic me gedo gubedo ka yubu kabedo ne pi cabit mapol. Kace piny tye maber, ci gubi cako tic me agiki me yub eni.
teo_prompt: Auta adukok aitemonokin aiboisit ngin adaun isabitin luipu. Arai ecamakin ekuse loka ikwamin, epote kesi ageun atutubet nawasia naka epurojekt.
lgg_prompt: Ba afa si'ba 'diyi ebi angu 'da otu sabiti eyi ma alea. Angu mile ka le 'bo, eyi nga e'do otita 'da ma esele asizu ri.
nyn_prompt: Abombeki batwire nibatebeekanisa omwanya kumara esande. Embeera y'obwire ku erikwikiriza, nibaza kutandika omutendera gwa purogyekiti ogw'ahamuheru.

eng_prompt: From the breathtaking landscapes to the fascinating stories shared along the way, every moment was filled with wonder. As we set out on our adventure, we knew it would be a memorable experience.
lug_prompt: Okuva ku bifo ebyewuunyisa okutuuka ku mboozi ezinyuma ezaagabanyizibwako mu kkubo, buli kaseera kaali kajjude okwewuunya. Bwe twatandika olugendo lwaffe, twamanya nti lwali lugenda kuba lwa byafaayo.
ach_prompt: Nicake I kom kabedo mamwonya tutwal me oo I kom ododo mabeco tutwal ma kinywako I yoo, kare weng obedo ki ngeng tutwal. Ikare ma wacako wotwa me cito ka limo piny, wangeyo ni man bibedo gin ma wi pe biwil iye.
teo_prompt: Anyoun kotoma aiboisio nuibusiak kitoni akiro nuibusiak nuelimoritai korot, apotu akiro kere kilelebunos keda aumokinio. Neautar sio alosit alosit, ijeni sio ebe ebuni ngin araun akiro numam imurokini oni.
lgg_prompt: E'dozu angu ndrizaru 'diyi vu kpere o'duko ndrizaru 'bani e'yo nze nzila dria 'diyi ma dria, sa'wa dria ma alia ri ga osuta si. Amani e'doria acita ama vileri ma alia, ama nii ra kini eri nga adri e'yo azi 'bani egazuri'i.
nyn_prompt: Kuruga aha bishushani ebirikutangaaza kuhisya aha bitebyo ebirikutangaaza ebyabaire nibigambwa omu muhanda, buri kaire kakaba kaijwire okutangaaza. Kutwatandikireho oruramburo rwaitu, tukaba nitumanya ngu nikiza kuba eky'okureeberaho ky'omutaano.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions and community feedback, local officials presented a proposal to improve infrastructure. In response to the growing need for better transportation, the government has allocated funds for road construction in our region.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi n'ebiteeso by'ekitundu, abakungu b'ebyalo baayanjudde ekiteeso ky'okutumbula ebizimbe. Olw'obwetaavu bw'entambula ennungi obweyongera, gavumenti etaddewo ensimbi ez'okuzimba enguudo mu kitundu kyaffe.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok mapol ki tam pa lwak, lutic me tedero gumiyo tam me yubu jami ma mite. Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo yoo me wot maber, gamente omiyo cente me yubu gudi i twok piny wa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara noi keda aomisio nuka itunga, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kitodiasi aomisio nuka aitojokar aiboisio. Kanu aitemokin eipud loka elose loajokan, abu apugan ibwaik ikapun kanu adukio irotin katutubetekosi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza angiri 'bori ma vutia azini o'dukoti feza ongulumu eyini 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi eji egata eyi afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'bani lezu acipa muke ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, gamete 'ba robia nzila eyi sizu angu amavileri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga hamwe n'okugarukwamu abantu, abakuru b'ebyaro bakaheereza ekiteiso ky'okutunguura ebyombeko. Ahabw'ekyetengo ky'entambura nungi ekyeyongyeire,gavumenti eteireho esente z'okukora enguuto omu kyanga kyaitu.

eng_prompt: In response to increasing traffic and safety concerns, local authorities have decided to enhance road navigation. As part of this initiative, new road signs have been put along Masaka road.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ebidduka n'obukuumi obweyongera, ab'obuyinza mu byalo basazeewo okutumbula entambula y'oku nguudo. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, ebipande by'oku nguudo ebipya biteekeddwa ku luguudo lw'e Masaka.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me gudu matye kamede ki ber bedo, lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me medo rwom me tic ki gudi. Macalo but yub man, kiketo lanyut manyen I teng gudu me Masaka.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin nuikamunitos amotokan keda ayuwara, aseutu apedorosio nuka atutubet aitojokar erot. Kwape ediope kotoma aswamisioit kana, aponi ibwaikinai ijenuneta luitetiak korotin luko Masaka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzila dria azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo acita nzila dria ri ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba o'ba eceta nzila dria o'diru 'diyi nzila dria Masaka-a.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'ebiiruka n'eby'okwerinda, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bashaziremu kutunguura eby'okutamburira aha nguuto. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, obumanyiso busya bw'ahanguuto, buteirwe aha ruguuto rwa Masaka.

eng_prompt: As I drove through the industrial area, I noticed the signs warning of weight restrictions. The rumble of engines and the sight of large vehicles made it clear that this was a busy transport route.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe nvuga mu kitundu ky'amakolero, nnalaba ebipande ebiragira obuzito obutono. Okuwuuma kwa yingini n'okulaba emmotoka ennene byalaga bulungi nti eno yali kkubo ly'entambula eririmu abantu abangi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka dwoyo motoka I kabedo me yubo jami, aneno lanyut mapat-pat ma ciko I kom peko me rwom ma malo. Dwon pa injin ki neno mutoka madongo onyuto maber ni man obedo yoo me wot ma dano dwong iye.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong airenge kotoma aiboisit naka icuman, abu eong aany apapulai nuikwenyarete nuikamunitos aitikitik adoketait naepol noi. Apolou naka einjin keda asesen amotokan nuapolok itodunit ebe erai lo erot lo elosi itunga luipu noi.
lgg_prompt: Ma vile mutukari ti ojizu angu okalamvu ni 'diyi ma aliarisi, ma ndre e'da e'yo 'bani bile ndu liza fezu e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma dria. O'duko inzini ni azini mutukari ambo 'diyi ma e'yo ndreza ece kini 'di geri acizu 'bani acizuri'i.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire nvuga omu mwanya gw'amakorero, nkareeba ebipande ebirikuhabura aha bikwatiraine n'oburemeezi. Orwari rw'amaani ga ingini hamwe n'okureebeka kw'ebiiruka bihango, bikareetera abantu kumanya ngu egi n'omuhanda gw'eby'engyenda ogurimu abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: As we walked through the quiet village, I realized we had lost track of time. I glanced at the map and noticed that the church is very far away.
lug_prompt: Bwe twali tuyita mu kyalo ekyesudde, nnakizuula nti twali tetumanyi budde. Natunuulira mmaapu ne nkiraba nti ekkanisa eri wala nnyo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma watye ka wot I caro ma piny oling mot, aniang ni pe wangeyo cawa. Aneno karatac me map ci aneno ni kanica ne tye kama bor tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neautar sio alosit ocalo loililingit, abu eong ajen ebe mam sio ijeni apak. Abu eong asesen amapu kosodi aanyun ebe elwana ekanisa.
lgg_prompt: Amani aciria calo 'da ma alea ciri ma alea, ma esu e'yo amani sa'wa ma dria ri avi ra. Ma andri mapu nderi ma alia azini ma ndre kini kanisa nderi re tu.
nyn_prompt: Kutwatamburiire omu kyaro ekirikwetuga, nketegyereza ngu tukaba tutarikumanya obwire. Nkareeba aha maapu nashanga ekanisa eri hare munonga.

eng_prompt: Despite our repeated requests to the city council, nothing seems to have been done about the road conditions. The potholes have only worsened over time, making our daily commute increasingly frustrating.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga twasaba enfunda eziwera akakiiko k'ekibuga, kirabika tewali kikoleddwa ku mbeera y'enguudo. Ebinnya byeyongedde okusajjuka ekiseera bwe kigenze kiyitawo, ekireetedde entambula yaffe eya buli lunaku okwongera okuba enzibu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni walego bot lutela me boma madit tyen mapol, nen calo pe tye gin mo ma kitimo I kom kit ma gudu tye kwede. Bur matye ni omede tutwal I ngee kare ma okato, ma oweko wotwa me nino ducu odoko tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida ilipenenei sio irwan ipu nejai ekansulo loka eibuga, esubit bala emamei ibore iswamaunitai kanuikamunitos ejautene loka irotin. Apolor aiboisio nuepolok noi kotoma apak naepol noi, ido ijaikini alosit wok naka nginiparan etiono noi.
lgg_prompt: Ama ni ta tro a'i aku ambu cityniri dri ra ti, e'da kile 'ba 'yeni nga e'yo nzila ma wura ma dria ku. Angu 'da eyi ma omgbo tu ra sa'wa driasi, erini fezu acita amavile o'du driasi ri ni ecazu ewaru.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okushaba kwaitu aha kakiiko k'orurembo, tihaine ekikozirwe aha mbeera y'enguuto. Ebiina byeyongyeire kumara obwire, ekirikureetera okugyenda kwaitu okwa buriizooba kweyongyera kuba okw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: As she stepped off the curb, she glanced at her phone, unaware of the approaching vehicle. The roar of the engine grew louder, but she didn't notice until it was too late.
lug_prompt: Bwe yava ku kkubo, yatunuulira essimu ye, nga tamanyi nti emmotoka yali ejja. Okuwuuma kwa yingini kweyongera naye teyakitegedde okutuusa nga obudde buyise.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma oa malo, en ongiyo cimme, kun pe ngeyo ni motoka tye kabino. Dwol pa injin omedde matek, ento en pe oniang wang ma obedo let tutwal.
teo_prompt: Neautar ngesi anyoun korot, abu ngesi kosesen esimu ke, komam ejenete emotoka lo ebunit. Abu eporoto loka einjin kiyatakin, konye mam ngesi abu kojen kitoni apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Erini efuzu nzila kalatia risi, eri ndre i vile simu ma dria, erini ani mutukari emupi ri ma dria ku. O'duko inzini vileri tu uru, te awini e'yo ndre kpere erini ovuzu vile 'bori ma vutia ku.
nyn_prompt: Ku yaaruga aha rubaju rw'enguuto, akareeba esimu ye, atarikumanya emotoka eyabaire neyija. Orwari rwa ingini rukaguma nirweyongyera, kwonka tiyaketegyereize kuhisya obu kyabaire kikyerereirwe munonga.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent outbreak in the region, health officials have mobilized teams to conduct screenings. As a precautionary measure, individuals showing symptoms are being prioritized for evaluation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde mu kitundu gyebuvuddeko, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakunga abantu okukola okukebera. Ng'ekyokwegendereza, abantu abalina obubonero bakulemberwa okwekebejjebwa.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me poto pa two ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic me yot-kom gu jogo dul pa dano me pimo lutwo. Macalo yoo me gwokke, dano matye ki lanyut me two tye ka mede anyim me pime.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona kotoma aiboisit kangin, apotu eswamak luka angaleu itolomutu itimun kanu ainwakio. Kwape epone loka ayuwar, itunga lu ewanyunitos awanyununeta kes isingarenitai ainwakio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo efupi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi tra amuti eyi azo eyi ma rua o'bizu. Ekile e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu, 'ba 'ba ecopi e'dapi eyi ma rua e'dapi ra 'diyi 'ba okporu eyi ma rua 'bani eyi ma rua andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara omu kyanga, ab'ebyamagara bateireho tiimu z'okukyebera. Nk'omuringo gw'okwerinda, abantu abarikureebekaho obumanyiso, nibo barikubanza kukyeberwa.

eng_prompt: Residents in the area have been eagerly awaiting the new schedule. With increased demand for medical services, the community is relieved to hear the news.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze mu kitundu babadde balindirira n'essanyu enteekateeka empya. Olw'obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongedde, abantu bafuna obuweerero bwe bawulira amawulire.
ach_prompt: Lutedero me kabedo eni gubedo kakuru yub manyen. Ki mede pa miti me nongo kony me yot kom, lwak bedo ki yweyo ka guwinyo lok angea ne.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luka atutubet aidar noi ainapeta nuitetiak. Keda eipud loepol noi loka amukian, iyalamasi itunga apupun iyemuto ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi sa'wa o'diru 'da te avasi. E'yo 'ba eyini lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri si, ongulumu eyi ayiko esu o'duko 'da erizu.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye b'omumwanya batwire nibategyereza enteekateeka ensya. Ahabw'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara obweyongyeire, abantu nibashemererwa ku barikuhurira amahurire.

eng_prompt: In the bustling hospital, the staff is dedicated to providing the best care possible. Their commitment is evident in the long hours they put in.
lug_prompt: Mu ddwaliro eririmu abantu abangi, abakozi beewaddeyo okuwa obujjanjabi obusoboka. Okwewaayo kwabwe kweyolekera mu ssaawa empanvu ze bateekamu.
ach_prompt: I ot yat ma dano dwong iye tutwal, lutic tye ki miti me miyo kony me yot kom maber loyo weng. Keto cwiny gi nen i cawa malac ma giketo I tic.
teo_prompt: Kotoma adekis naejaasi keda itunga luipu, ekapakina eswamak aijanakin amukian najokan kakere. Aponi kitodunai ainakina kec kotoma isawan luipu luiswamaete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Arojo 'da ma alea, azi'ba eyi owi eyi atita muke ndeni ri fezu. Eyi ma ava e'da sa'wa ezu eyini 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omwirwariro eririmu abantu baingi, abakozi behaireyo kuheereza obujanjabi burungi oburikubaasika. Okwehayo kwabo nikureebekyera omu bwire bureingwa obu bakozire.

eng_prompt: The hospital experienced a sudden surge in cases due to a seasonal outbreak. As a result, many patients were admitted last week.
lug_prompt: Eddwaliro lyafuna okweyongera okw'amangu mu balwadde olw'okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde mu sizoni. N'ekyavaamu abalwadde bangi baaweebwa ebitanda wiiki ewedde.
ach_prompt: Ot yat ne onongo wel lutwo mapol tutwal pi poto pa two ma time kare ki kare. Macalo adwogi ne, ki gamo lutwo mapol I ot yat I cabit ma okato.
teo_prompt: Abu adekis kodum aiyatakinio naka adekasinei kanuka abwangun naka adekasinei. Kanuka ngun, aponi iperikinai adekak luipu osabiti je.
lgg_prompt: Arojo 'da esu kalafe 'ba azo be 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra e'yo azo efupi sa'wa driasi 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'ba 'ba azoru karakara eyi arojoa wiki ajerisi.
nyn_prompt: Eirwariro rikatunga okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire. Ekyarugiremu, abarwaire baingi bakaheebwa ebitanda esande ehweire.

eng_prompt: Due to the increasing demand for services, the local authorities have decided to upgrade the facilities. As a result, the health centre is being renovated.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'obuweereza obweyongera, ab'obuyinza mu byalo basazeewo okulongoosa ebifo. N'ekyavaamu, eddwaliro liri mu kuddaabirizibwa.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me ilo malo rwom me jami ma mite pi konyo lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, kitye ka roco ot yat.
teo_prompt: Kanuka eipud loepol noi loka aijanakino, aseutu apedorosio nuka atutubet aisiteteun aiboisio. Kanuka ngun, eutai aitemonokino adekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele o'bi eyidri ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi asi e'yo 'du afa ndundu eyi edezu o'diru. E'yo 'disi, 'ba arojo 'da ede o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza obweyongyeire, ab'obushoborozi ahabyaro bashaziremu kutunguura ebyombeko. N'ekyarugiremu, eirwariro ririyo nirigarurwa busya.

eng_prompt: The community rallied together to support the local healthcare facility. Fundraising events and campaigns were organized to gather contributions for the much-needed improvements.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kyakungaanidde wamu okuwagira eddwaliro ly'ekyalo. Ebikujjuko by'okusonda ssente ne kakuyege byategekebwa okusonda ssente z'enkulaakulana ezeetaagibwa ennyo.
ach_prompt: Lwak guribbe kacel me konyo ot yat. Yub me jogo cente ki bito kwir obedo tye me jogo cente pi yubu jami ma mite tutwal.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga kimorikikinos nepepe kanu aigang adekis naka atutubet. Aponi kitemokinai aituk ikapun ka ikampeins kanu aituk ikapun lu ekotoi noi.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyi tra eyi tualu atita fezu arojo eyi ma alea. Ba otu e'yo robia trazu 'diyi tualu e'yo ti odaza ni 'diyi pie robia trazu e'yo otuza 'bani le saaru 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baketeerana hamwe okuhwera eirwariro ry'ekyaro. Emikoro y'okurundaana esente n'ehururu zikatebekanisibwa kurundaana esente z'okutunguura ebyetengo.

eng_prompt: The patients have been coming in with increasing urgency, and the shelves are looking alarmingly bare. We need to assess our inventory immediately to see what we can do.
lug_prompt: Abalwadde babadde bayingira mangu era amaterekero galabika nga makalu. Twetaaga okwekenneenya ebintu byaffe mu bwangu tulabe kye tuyinza okukola.
ach_prompt: Lutwo gubedo kabino oyot-oyot tutwal, ki kom pa lutwo bene nen nono tutwal. Omyero wanen jami ma watye kwede cut-cut wek waniang ngo ma omyero watim.
teo_prompt: Eponenete adekak katipet, ido esubit bala emamei idiobore. Ekot oni airereor iboro wok katipet kanu aanyun nu ipedori oni aswam.
lgg_prompt: Ba azoru 'diyi ebi emu e'yo mbeleru si, azini afa 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi e'da e'dazu e'da kokoru. Le ama ma andri afa amavile 'diyi ma ale indikindi ndrezu afa amani eco 'ye ra 'diyi ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Abarwaire beeyongyeire kwija n'obwegyendesereza, kandi ebishengye by'okuragurira biri busha munonga. Twine kushwijuma ebintu byaitu ahonaaho, okureeba eki turikubaasa kukora.

eng_prompt: In an effort to protect public health and prevent the spread of infectious diseases, a local health campaign was organized. Parents were informed about the importance of vaccinations for their children's well-being.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu n'okutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa, kaweefube w'ebyobulamu mu kitundu yategekebwa. Abazadde baategeezebwa ku mugaso gw'okugema eri obulamu bw'abaana baabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me gwoko yot kom pa lwak ki gengo nya pa two ma kobo oyot oyot, yub me miyo ngec i kom yot kom kiyubu ikabedo mapatpat. Ki niango lunyodo i kom ber pa gwero lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu ayuarite angaleu naka itunga ka aitikitik awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas, aponi kitemokinai nuikamunitos angaleu. Aponi olimokinai auriak ajokis naka aikis idwe kec ekato.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma tambazu azini e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta atrizu, 'ba otu e'yo nzeza e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria angu eyi ma alea. Ba lu tipika eyini imbata orodri aro soza niri ma dria anzi eyivile 'diyini aa'zu muke ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda amagara g'abantu n'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira, ehururu y'eby'amagara omu byaro ekatebekanisibwa. Abazaire bakamanyisibwa omugasho gw'okugyema abaana baabo.

eng_prompt: Due to budget cuts and resource limitations, the facility has been struggling to maintain its operations. As a result, essential tools and machinery have become increasingly scarce.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukendeeza ku mbalirira n'ebbula ly'ebikozesebwa, ekkolero libadde lifuba okukuuma emirimu gyalyo. N'ekivuddemu, ebikozesebwa ebikulu n'ebyuma byeyongedde ebbula.
ach_prompt: Pi ngolo byek me lim ki nok pa lim, ot yat ne obedo ka tute matek me gwoko ticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, jami tic mapigi tego dong odoko nok tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aitidisiar ebajet keda ikapun lu ikidioko, etionikinit aiboisit ngin aidar aswamuke. Kanuka ngun, ikidioko iboro lu itwasamao ka acuman nu epol ajokis.
lgg_prompt: Otita aje robia niri ma omgbo esizu azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma kalafe esizu kurisi, angu 'da ebi dri ci azi erini 'diyi ma ta mbazu. E'yo 'disi, afa ayuzaru azini cuma orodriru 'diyi eca curu'do wereru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyendeeza embaririra hamwe n'oburemeezi omu by'obugaiga, eikorero ritwire niritahirira kugumizamu n'emirimo yaaryo. N'ekyarugiremu, ebikwato n'ebyoma ebirikwetengwa munonga byeyongyeire kubura.

eng_prompt: Due to the increasing number of patients and the overwhelming demand for care, the hospital recognized the urgent need to expand its staff. After assessing the situation, the administration decided to take immediate action.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongera n'obwetaavu obw'amaanyi obw'obujjanjabi, eddwaliro lyategeera obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okugaziya abakozi baalyo. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera, abakulembeze baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Pi wel lutwo matye kamede ki miti madit tutwal me nongo kony, ot yat oniang ni mitte tutwal me medo luticgi. Ingee neno ngo matye katimme, lutela gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo cut.
teo_prompt: Kanuka enaaba loepol noi loka adekak keda eipuda loepol noi loka amukian, abu adekis koany ebe ibusakinit aiyatakin eswamakake. Akaulo naka airereor ejautene, abu eyaitene koseu aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azoru 'diyi ni tuzu tualu e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi pie, arojo 'da esu e'yo 'bani lezu azi'ba eyi ma kalafe otuzu mbeleru ri ra. E'yo 'da onezu 'bori ma vutia, driceza 'da 'du e'yo 'ye indikindi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ogweyongyeire hamwe n'obwetaavu bwingi bw'obujanjabi, eirwariro rikareeba ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okwongyera aha bakozi baayo. Ahanyima y'okushwijuma embeera, abebembezi bakasharamu kukora ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: The growing population and increasing healthcare demands have put a strain on our local medical facilities. As a result, many patients are experiencing long wait times for appointments and treatments.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'omuwendo gw'abantu n'obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera bitadde akazito ku malwaliro gaffe. N'ekivuddemu, abalwadde bangi balindirira ebbanga ddene okufuna okulamulwa n'obujjanjabi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol kacel ki miti me nongo kony me yot kom tye ka medo lyeto I kom odi yadi ma ikabedo wa. Macalo adwogi ne, lutwo mapol gitye ka kuro kare malac me nongo kony me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Apol naka enaaba loka itunga keda eipud loka amukian eyangaunit aiyalongong mama ejaasi adekisia nuka akwapuwok. Kanuka ngun, eutasi adekak luipu aidar apak naepol kanu adumun adekasinei keda amukian.
lgg_prompt: O'bi ma kalafe ni tuzu tualu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi pie ri fe okpo arojo amavile angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba azoru karakara eyi sa'wa ezu te aro esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu hamwe n'okwetenga kw'eby'amagara kweyongyeire, kireesireho oburemeezi aha marwariro gaitu. N'ekyarugiremu, abarwaire baingi nibatwara obwire bureingwa kutegyereza okuza omu irwariro hamwe n'okuragurirwa.

eng_prompt: After discussing our lifestyle choices and family medical history, the doctor emphasized the importance of preventive care. To ensure our well-being, she recommended that we prioritize our health.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri gye tutambuzaamu obulamu bwaffe ne ku byafaayo by'obulwadde mu maka gaffe, omusawo yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okwetangira. Okukakasa obulungi bwaffe, yatukubiriza okukulembeza obulamu bwaffe.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako tam i kom kit kwo wa ki lok macon me ot yat, daktar oketo cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa gengo nyayo two. Me neno ni kwo wa tye maber, en owaco ni omyero waket yotkom wa obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitemitem iponesio luka aijar wok keda akiro nukokale, abu emuron kitogogong ajokis naka aitikitik adekasinei. Kanu awanyun ebe ija oni jokan, abu ngesi kicorak ebe ibusakinit oni aisingarenit angalewok.
lgg_prompt: Bani agbatara gbazu geri ama ni aa'zu ri ma dria azini e'yo familia amavile 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, dakitari 'da 'ba asi orodri e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma aza kozu ri ma dria. Lezu ama ma aa muke, eri fe imbata amani ama ma 'du e'yo rua ala ni okori okporu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura aha mitwarize yaitu hamwe n'ebirikukwata aha magara g'amaka gaitu, dokita akashoboorora omugasho gw'okuzibira. Okureeba ngu nitubaho kurungi, akatuhabura ngu tukabanza kwebembeza amagara gaitu.

eng_prompt: During our orientation, the instructor emphasized the importance of understanding our rights and responsibilities. To ensure a safe and respectful environment, we were reminded of the legal guidelines we must follow.
lug_prompt: Mu kutulungamya, omusomesa yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okutegeera eddembe lyaffe n'obuvunaanyizibwa. Okusobola okuteekawo embeera ey'obukuumi era ey'ekitiibwa, twajjukibwa ebiragiro by'amateeka bye tulina okugoberera.
ach_prompt: Ikare me pwonyowa, lapwony owaco ni pire tek tutwal me niang twero ki tic ma omyero watim. Me neno ni kabedo wa tye maber dok ki woro, ki poyo wiwa i kom cik ma omyero walub.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aisisianakin sio, abu esisianakinan kitogogong ajokis naka amisiikin apedorosiowok keda aswamisineiwok. Kanu awanyun ebe ejai aiboisit na eyuara ka ayongite, aponi isiitikikinai sio ikisila luibusakinit oni aitup.
lgg_prompt: Sawa amani imbata fezurisi, embapi 'da 'ba asi orodri amani drilemgbo azini azi amani 'diyi vazu ri ma dria. Lezu angu amani aa'zu ri ma aa kililiru azini inzita be, 'ba ega amani azita amani le ma obi 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kwegyesibwa kwaitu, omwegyesa akata amaani aha mugasho gw'okwetegyereza obugabe bwaitu n'obujunaanizibwa bwaitu. Okureeba ngu hariho obusingye n'ekitiinisa, tukayebemberwa ebiragiro ebi tushemereire kukuratira.

eng_prompt: After extensive debates and discussions among lawmakers, a consensus was finally reached. As a result, significant changes were made to the governing document.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo okw'amaanyi n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu babaka ba palamenti, okukkakkana nga batuuse ku nzikiriziganya. N'ekyavaamu, enkyukakyuka ez'amaanyi zaakolebwa mu kiwandiiko ekifuga.
ach_prompt: Ingee laro lok mapol I kin luwang lwak I ot moko cik, winye obedo tye I agiki ne. Macalo adwogi ne, aloka-loka mapol otimme I waraga ma doro tic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ipegeta luipu keda ipegeta kanejaas imeeban luka ikisila, aponi kodolokinai acamanara. Kanuka ngun, aponi itolomunai aijulanakineta nuipu kotoma apapula naka apugan.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara azini agbatara angiri 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi ma eselea 'bori ma vutia, 'ba esu asizu ti ecita ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'ye ojata okporu 'diyi kokobi driceza ni 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura n'okuhanuura ahagati y'abany'eishengyero, hakabaho okukirizana. N'ekyarugiremu, empindahinduka z'amaani zikakorwa omu kihandiiko ekirikutegyeka.

eng_prompt: In light of recent developments and growing concerns among residents, the board decided it was essential to address the community directly. To ensure everyone had a voice, the chairman called for a community meeting.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bibaddewo gyebuvuddeko n'okweraliikirira okweyongera mu batuuze, akakiiko kaasazeewo nti kyali kyetaagisa okwogerako n'abantu obutereevu. Okusobola okukakasa nti buli omu alina eddoboozi, ssentebe yayita olukiiko lw'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki dongo lobo ma otime cokcok-ki ki lworo matye kamede I kin lwak, dul enoni omoko tamgi ni pire tek tutwal me lok ki lwak atir. Me neno ni dano weng tye ki dwon gi, won kom olwongo kacoke pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac keda aiyalongongo naka itunga, apotu lukapolok ocamutu ebe ejokuna einer keda itunga. Kanu awanyun ebe ejaasi itunga kere keda akiro, abu apolon eicolong onyarau airiamunet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma o'diru 'diyi ma dria azini asi otiza tupi 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ri si, board 'da 'du e'yo nzezu o'bi eyidri kililiru. Lezu nezu ra kini 'ba dria ma o'duko ci, ogua e'i omve mitingi ongulumu eyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entunguuka eyabaireho obwahati hamwe n'okwerarikirira kw'abatuuragye, akakiiko kakacwamu ngu kikaba kiri eky'omugasho kugamba butunu n'abantu. Okureeba ngu buri omwe aine eiraka, mukuru w'entebe akeeta orukiiko rw'ekyanga.

eng_prompt: During our meeting, the speaker emphasized the importance of social responsibility and the need for collective action. He urged us to focus on the pressing issues facing our community.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana lwaffe, omwogezi yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'obuvunaanyizibwa mu bantu n'obwetaavu bw'okukola awamu. Yatusabye okussa essira ku bizibu eby'amangu ebisangibwa mu kitundu kyaffe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke wa, lalok madit oloko tutwal I kom ber pa tic pi lwak ki miti me tic kacelo. En olego wa me keto cwiny I kom peko matye I kabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunetekosi, abu eraban kitogogong ajokis naka aswam nepepe keda itunga. Abu ngesi isinyikok iso apodokinit atiokisio nu etereikina keda itunga wok.
lgg_prompt: Sawa amani dri fuzurisi, anzenzea ei 'da fe okpo orodri e'yo 'yezu o'bi eyi ma eselea ri ma dria tualu e'yo 'yezu tualu ri ma dria. Eri ai ama asi 'bazu e'yo okporu ongulumu amani 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko rwaitu, orikukurira eishengyero akashoboorora omugasho gw'obujunanizibwa omu bantu hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okukorera hamwe. Akatuhiga kuta amaani aha nshonga z'amaani ezirikuteganisa abantu b'omukyanga kyaitu.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, we discussed the progress of our current projects. As the conversation shifted, the chairman turned to us for feedback.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko, twayogedde ku ntambula ya pulojekiti zaffe ezigenda mu maaso. Emboozi bwe yagenda ekyuka, ssentebe yakyukira ffe okufuna eby'okuddamu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke, wanywako lok I kom yub ma watye kwede kombedi. I kare ma lok ne olokke, won kom olokke botwa me penyo tam.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet, apotu sio etetemoto eipone lo elosiotor ipurojektin wok. Nejulakinor akiro ngun, abu apolon eicolong kobongok nejai sio kanu aingitun aomisio.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, ama agbatara gba e'yo ama vile otita curu'do 'diyi ni muzu drile ri ma dria. E'yo onzeza ni i ojazu 'boria, ogua e'i oja i ama vu egata esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, tukahanuura aha ntunguuka ya purogyekiti zaitu eziriho obwahati. Okugaaniira ku kweyongyeire, mukuru w'entebe akatugarukamu kutushaba eky'okugarukamu.

eng_prompt: Due to recent reports of contamination in the local water supply, health officials issued a warning. As a precautionary measure, we were advised to boil water before drinking it.
lug_prompt: Olw'amawulire agafulumye gyebuvuddeko ku bucaafu bw'amazzi mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baalabudde. Ng'ekyokwegendereza, twaweebwa amagezi okufumba amazzi nga tetunnaganywa.
ach_prompt: Lutela me yot kom gumiyo lok me ciko dano pi peko me poto pa pii ma otimme cokcok-ki. Macalo yoo me gwoke, kilego wa me tedo pii mapwod pe wamato.
teo_prompt: Kanuka iripotan luitetiak luka abilibilio naka akipi, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kikwenyasi. Kanu ayuara, aponi alimokin iso aipo akipi eringa imata.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi e'yo yi ezaza angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi fe bile ndu liza ra. Ekile e'yo tambaza ni ru, 'ba fe amani imbata yi a'dizu rakaka de nga po'di amvini yi ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu amaizi g'omukyanga gabiire gari amabi, ab'eby'amagara bakaha okurabura. Nk'eky'okwerinda, tukahaburwa kuteeka amaizi tutakaganyweire.

eng_prompt: As the job market becomes increasingly competitive, young people are seeking alternative career paths. One promising field that has caught their attention is agriculture, which offers both sustainability and innovation.
lug_prompt: Ng'okuvuganya ku mirimu kweyongera, abavubuka banoonya emirimu emirala. Ekimu ku bintu bye basinga okutwala ng'ebikulu bye byobulimi n'obulunzi, ebireetawo obuwangaazi n'obuyiiya.
ach_prompt: Ka pyem me nongo tic tye kamede, bulu tye ka yenyo yoo mukene me nongo tic. Tenge acel matye ki gen madit tutwal ma omako cwinygi obedo lok kom pur, ma kelo dongo lobo ki diro manyen.
teo_prompt: Kwape epol abolobol naka aswamisinei, eutasi atumunak aimo aswamisinei ace. Aswam adiopebon naepol noi naepedori aswam ngesi akor, naepedori aitolomun iboro luitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'bala ni ecazu cu azi niri ma alea tutu risi, 'ba ode eyi geri ndundu eyini ecozu azi ngazu 'diyi nda. Angu azi 'bani asi 'bazu drinia onyiru tu ni e'yo agirikica niri'I, e'yo 'bani ecozu aa'zu ewu drialeri ma alea ra azini e'yo o'diru 'diyi ejipi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu okurwanira emirimo kweyongyeire, eminyeeto eriyo neronda emiringo endiijo y'okukoramu. Omurimo gumwe ogurikworeka ngu niguza kubaho, nigwo by'obuhingi n'oburiisa, ekirikureetaho entunguuka n'okujumbura.

eng_prompt: Feeling overwhelmed by the pressures of modern life, the youth gathered their thoughts and decided to express their concerns. They wanted their voices to be heard and their struggles acknowledged.
lug_prompt: Nga bawulira nga bazitoowereddwa okunyigirizibwa kw'obulamu obw'omulembe guno, abavubuka baakungaanya ebirowoozo byabwe ne basalawo okwogera ebibaluma. Baali baagala amaloboozi gaabwe gawulirwe era n'obukuubagano bwabwe bukkirizibwe.
ach_prompt: Ki winyo ni peko me kwo ma ite kare ni omako gi tutwal, bulu gu coko tam gi dok gumoko tam gi me tito peko gi. Gubedo kamito ni kiwiny dwon gi dok bene ki niang peko gi.
teo_prompt: Apupiata atumunak ebe epol noi aijar naka apakio nu, apotu kesi kitukutu aomisiokec kosodete aitodun aiyalongongokec. Akotosi kesi apupio iporotoikec ka aijen ationisikec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ewu curu'dori ma alea 'diyisi, 'ba ode eyi tra egata eyivile 'diyi azini eyi ai e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi. Eyi le ndra 'ba ma eri o'duko eyivile 'diyi dika le 'ba ma ega e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu eminyeeto ekahwamu amaani ahabw'oburemeezi bw'ensi egi, ekarundaana ebiteekateeko byaayo reero yacwamu kworeka ebirikuteganisa. Bakaba nibenda amahurire gaabo gahurirwe kandi entaro zaabo zikwatibwe.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events and public feedback, the election committee emphasized the importance of maintaining order and professionalism during the campaign period. To ensure a fair and respectful electoral process, clear guidelines were established for all participants.

eng_prompt: In recent years, governments and organizations have made significant efforts to improve educational opportunities for all. As a result, numerous initiatives have been launched to ensure that financial barriers do not prevent children from attending school.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, gavumenti n'ebitongole bikoze kaweefube ow'amaanyi okutumbula emikisa gy'okusoma eri bonna. N'ekivuddemu, enteekateeka nnyingi zitandikiddwawo okukakasa nti ebizibu by'ensimbi tebiremesa baana kusoma.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a growing recognition of the importance of physical fitness and community engagement. As a result, various organizations and governments have prioritized funding for recreational programs and athletic facilities.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okutegeera okweyongera ku bukulu bw'okuba omulamu obulungi n'okwenyigiramu kw'ekitundu. N'ekivuddemu, ebitongole ne gavumenti ez'enjawulo zikulembezza okuvujjirira enteekateeka z'okwesanyusaamu n'ebifo by'emizannyo.
