lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo n'okukung'aanya obujulizi, poliisi yazuula omuntu omukulu ateeberezebwa mu bubbi obwaliwo gye buvuddeko. Oluvannyuma lw'okutegeezebwa omujulizi, baasobola okulondoola omuntu.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut ki coko caden, abili gunongo ngat ma byek tye I kome I kom kwo ma otimme cokcok-ki. I nge winyo lok pa lacaden mo, gunongo ngat ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic ejok ka aituk ajenanut, apotu ipolisin kodumutu itunganan yenikamunitos akoko. Akaulo naka aijen kama ejai ajenan, apotu kesi kopedosi aimo itunganan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru ma vutia azini afa ecetaru 'diyi trazu 'bori ma vutia, polisi eyi esu 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo okporu e'yo ogu ni 'diyi ma alea ri ra. O'duko engazu 'ba sadini vu 'bori ma vutia, eyi esu 'ba 'da ma pamvu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi n'okurundaana obujurizi, poriisi ekatunga omuntu mukuru omu bushuma obwabaireho. Bwanyima y'okugambirwa omujurizi, bakabaasa kurondoora omuntu.

eng_prompt: After being arrested for his involvement in the incident, he was held in custody for several days. The authorities gathered evidence and prepared the case against him.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukwatibwa olw'okwenyigira mu kabenje ako, yasibibwa mu kkomera okumala ennaku eziwera. Ab'obuyinza baakuŋŋaanya obujulizi ne bateekateeka omusango ogumuvunaanibwa.
ach_prompt: Inge make pi tim ne, kitweye I buc pi nino mapol. Lutela gu jogo caden ka guyubu adot i kome.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na aikamar ngesi kanu ajaut toma akangas kangin, aponi kowenarai ngesi adaun aparasia nuipu. Apotu apedorosio otukutu ajenanut kosodete aitemonokin emusago loetepesenitai ngesi.
lgg_prompt: Ba bi eri erini e'yo 'da 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba bi eri arujoa o'du karakara. Okpo e'ipi tra afa ecetaru 'diyi azini eyi otu kesi 'bani eri tozu ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okukwatwa ahabw'okwejumba omu kikorwa ekyo, akakomwa kumara ebiro bingi. Ab'obushoborozi bakarundaana obujurizi baatebeekanisa omushango gw'okumuhakanisa.

eng_prompt: Despite the overwhelming evidence against him, he maintained his innocence throughout the trial. The jury deliberated for hours before reaching their verdict.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waaliwo obujulizi bungi obwali bumulumiriza, yanywerera ku ky'okuba nti talina musango mu kiseera kyonna kye yamala mu kkooti. Abalamuzi baakubaganya ebirowoozo okumala essaawa eziwera nga tebannatuuka ku nsala yaabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni caden mapol tye i kome, en omedde ki waco ni en pe labal I kare weng me pido ne. Lungol kop ne gubedo ka lok pi cawa malac ma peya gumoko tamgi.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu ajenanut nuikamunitos ngesi, abu ngesi kitogogong ebe mam ngesi ediakarit kotoma apak naka emusago ngol kere. Apotu ikatubok itetemoto kanu isawan luipu eringa edolokina toma otubeikec.
lgg_prompt: Afa ecetaru eri ma rua 'diyi ma talasi, eri 'ba asi kini i e'yo kokoru sawa dria 'bani eri obizurisi. Ba e'yo lipi 'diyi 'du e'yo eyi ma dria sa'wa ezu de nga po'di eyi awini e'yo li ku.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obujurizi bwingi obwamuhakanisa, akaguma ataine rubanja omu kuhurira orubanja. Abaramuzi bakagamba kumara eshaaha nyingi batakahikire aha kucwa orubanja.

eng_prompt: The news had spread quickly through the small town, leaving everyone in shock. As he sat in silence, memories of happier times flooded his mind, overshadowed by the recent tragedy.
lug_prompt: Amawulire gaabuna mangu mu kabuga akatono, ne galeka buli omu mu ntiisa. Nga bw'atudde mu kasirise, ebijjukizo by'ebiseera eby'essanyu byajjula ebirowoozo bye, nga bibuutikiddwa ekikangabwa ekyaliwo gye buvuddeko.
ach_prompt: Lok angea ne onya oyot-oyot tutwal I taun matidi ne, oweko dano weng obedo ki ngeng tutwal. I kare ma obedo piny laling, wiye poo I kom kare me yom-cwiny macon ma obedo I wiye.
teo_prompt: Apotu iyemuto isiarakisi katipet otaun lodidi, kojalakisi itunga kere toma aumokin. Ne iboie ngesi kotoma aililing, apotu aiituneta nuka apakio nuka aiyalama kilelebunos kotoma aomisioke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'da ere i tawuni werea 'da ma alea dria mbeleru, fezu 'ba dria eyini osuta ma alea. Erini riria ciri, e'yo egaza sawa ayiko be 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ga eri ma omi ma dria, e'yo ewaru ebipi yi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Amahurire gakajanjaara ahonaaho omu tawuni yoona, buri omwe yaasigara aine ekiniga. Obu yaabaire ashutami omu kasirise, ebiijusyo by'ebiro by'okushemererwa bikaruga omu biteekateeko bye, ahabw'oburemeezi obwabaireho juba.

eng_prompt: In many societies, the rule of law is paramount to maintaining order and justice. However, when individuals take the law into their own hands, it can lead to severe consequences.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, amateeka ga mugaso nnyo mu kukuuma emirembe n'obwenkanya. Kyokka, abantu bwe batwalira amateeka mu ngalo, kiyinza okuvaamu ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, cik obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo. Kadi bed kumeno, ka dano acel-acel omako cik icing gi, man twero kelo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, erai ainapeta nuka ikisila nuepolok noi kanu aidar ainapakina keda etube loajokan. Konye, neyangaratar itunga ikisila akaninikec, epedori ayangaun atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, azita eyi ma vuti obiza eri orodriru tu e'yo otuza ni azini e'yo liza kililiru ri ma tambazu. Kani si, 'ba eyi ka azita 'du eyi ma dria eyi ma dria, eri eco e'yo onzi eyi eji ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bicweka bingi,ebiragiro nibyo bikuru munonga omu kurinda obusingye n'oburingaaniza. Kwonka abantu kubarikutwarira ebiragiro omu ngaro zaabo, nikibaasa kurugwamu ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: After a long night of celebration, she decided to take a step back and reflect on her choices. The weight of her responsibilities began to settle in, prompting a newfound clarity.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okujaguza ekiro ekiwanvu, yasalawo okudda emabega afumiitiriza ku bye yasalawo. Obuzito bw'obuvunaanyizibwa bwe bwatandika okumutuukako, ekyamusobozesa okufuna okutegeera okupya.
ach_prompt: Inge kwero nino pi dyewor mapol, en omoko tamme me tam I kom tam ma en omoko. Tic mapek ma en tye kwede ocako donyo I cwinye, man okelo niang manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ainumunum akware naepol, abu ngesi koseu aiyengun kosodi aomoom nu aseunet ke. Abu ationis naka aswamuke kogeu aibwo, ido abu koinak ngesi aijen naitetet.
lgg_prompt: Ayiko zuza ini ezu 'bori ma vutia, eri asi e'yo egazu e'yo erini pe 'diyi ma dria. Azi erini 'diyi ma nziza e'do e'da, erini ani e'yo 'yezu kililiru o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ekiro ky'okujaguza, akasharamu kugaruka yaateekateeka aha bi yaacwiremu. Oburemeezi bw'obujunaanizibwa bwe bukatandika kumuhwera kwetegyereza gye.

eng_prompt: As the storm raged outside, the hospital room felt eerily calm, filled only with the sound of beeping machines. With tears streaming down her face, she held her daughter's hand tightly, praying for a miracle that never came.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuyaga gukunta wabweru, ekisenge ky'eddwaliro kyawulira nga kikkakkamu, nga kijjudde amaloboozi g'ebyuma ebikuba. Ng'amaziga gakulukuta mu maaso ge, yakwata nnyo omukono gwa muwala we, ng'asaba ekyamagero ekitajja.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kot tye ka cwer matek woko, ot yat obedo ma opye mot tutwal, ma obedo opong ki dwon pa macin matye ka dwon keken. Ki pig wange ma obedo ka cwer, en omako cing nyare matek adada, kun lego pi tango ma pe otimme.
teo_prompt: Neapolor ekwam kokinga, apotu agola naka adekis inapakina noi, ido apotu acuman bon kopuputu. Keda akipi nuepukor oreeteke, abu ngesi kodema akanike, ailip aumonokineta nu mam apotu opotu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ozoo ni 'yeria amve, jo ale aliza arojo niri ma alea ri ndra e'yere saaru, lu masini 'diyi ma o'duko o'duko si. Mindresi eri ma andretia, eri bi i ma zi ma dri okporu, erini Mungu zizu e'yo azi ecopi i 'yepi ku ni 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Enju y'eirwariro ekaba erimu obucureera ahabw'eihunga ry'eihunga ry'amaizi. Akakwata omukono gwa muhara we n'amarira omu maisho, arikushaba eky'okutangaaza ekitarikwija.

eng_prompt: As she hurried across the street, her mind was preoccupied with thoughts of the meeting she was late for. Suddenly, the screeching of tires filled the air, and she turned just in time to see the vehicle approaching.
lug_prompt: Ng'ayanguwa okusala ekkubo, ebirowoozo bye byali ku lukungaana lwe yali aluddeyo. Amangu ago, okuwuuma kw'emipiira kwajjula empewo, era yakyuka mu budde okulaba emmotoka nga esembera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en tye ka ngwec I dye gudu, tamme obedo I kom kacokke ma en ogalle. Cutcut, winy pa mupira tyen motoka opong ki yamo, en olokke I kare kikome me neno motoka matye kabino.
teo_prompt: Neautar ngesi aitub erot katipet, apodokinit ngesi aomisio nuikamunitos airiamunet naebeit ngesi aiyap. Apotu iporotoi luka amopiran kilelebunos kokwam kere, kosodi ngesi aijulakin kotoma apak naepedori ngesi asesen emotoka ebunit.
lgg_prompt: Erini nzuzu mbeleru nzila dria, eri ma omi 'du e'yo mitingi erini ovuzu vile ri ma dria. Sawa 'disi, o'duko mupira mutukari ni 'diyiniri ga angu ma alia dria, azini eri oja i sawa dria mutukari ni emuria ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Obu yaabaire naarahuka kurabura oruguuto, ebiteekateeko bye bikaba biri aha rukiiko oru yaabaire atwire naakora. Ahonaaho, okuhuumura kw'emipiira kwejumba omu mwanya, yaahinduka omu bwire bw'okureeba emotoka erikwija.

eng_prompt: The nation was plunged into mourning as news spread of the beloved leader's sudden passing. Tributes poured in from all corners, reflecting the profound impact he had on the lives of many.
lug_prompt: Eggwanga lyali mu kukungubaga ng'amawulire g'okufa kw'omukulembeze omwagalwa gasaasaana. Okusiima kwakulukuta okuva mu buli kanyomero, ekiraga enkyukakyuka ey'amaanyi gye yakola mu bulamu bw'abantu bangi.
ach_prompt: Lobo ne opong ki koko I kare ma lok angea me to pa latela ma lamar-ri okato atura. Dano mapol guketo cwinygi I kome kun giwaco ni en okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo pa dano mapol.
teo_prompt: Abu akwap kibiror noi naarai aponi kolimorai akiro nuikamunitos atwanare naka engarenon loajokan. Apotu itunga luka aiboisio kere ituroto ngesi, itodunit epone loajokan loabu ngesi kiswama kotoma aijar naka itunga luipu.
lgg_prompt: Kari nderi e'de emvo alia o'duko erini drice'ba 'bani lele tu 'da ma drata ma e'yo erezurisi. E'yo inzita fezani 'diyi efu engazu kala dria ma alia ecepi e'yo onyiru erini 'ye idri 'ba karakara yi ma dria ri.
nyn_prompt: Eihanga rikagwa omu kukunguura amakuru g'okufa kw'omwebembezi orikukundwa. Okusiima kukaruga omu myanya yoona, okurikworeka entunguuka y'amaani ei yaakozire aha magara g'abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and securing permits, the project team finally received the green light. Excitement filled the air as the workers arrived on site, ready to start the long-awaited project.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteekateeka n'okufuna olukusa, ttiimu ya pulojekiti yasembayo okufuna ekitangaala. Obwenyumiriza bwajjula empewo ng'abakozi batuuse mu kifo, nga beetegefu okutandika pulojekiti ebadde ebadde erindiriddwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki nongo twero, dul pa lutic me project dong gunongo twero. Cwiny dano obedo yom totwal I kare ma lutic guo I kabedo ne, ma oyubbe me cako tic ma obedo kakuru pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitemonokin ka adumun apapulai, apotu etimu loka epurojekt kodumutu aica. Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos neadolunia eswamak aiboisit, ekapakina ageun epurojekt loedaunitai apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu azini kokobi eyi esuzu 'bori ma vutia, amuti otita 'da ma alea 'diyi esu asizu aci kililiru ni. Ayiko fu oli si azi'ba eyini ecazu angu 'da ma alea ngonde otita 'bani ebi te sa'wa ezu ri e'dozu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuteekateekyera n'okutunga orusa, tiimu ya purogyekiti ekahendera yaatunga ekyererezi. Abantu bakashemererwa munonga abakozi ku baahikire aha mwanya, beteekateekire kutandika purogyekiti eyabaire erinzire obwire buraingwa.

eng_prompt: I've always loved being in the water, and I've spent countless hours practicing my strokes. Over the years, I've honed my skills and gained confidence in my abilities.
lug_prompt: Njagala nnyo okubeera mu mazzi era mmaze essaawa nnyingi nga nneegezaamu. Emyaka bwe gizze giyitawo, nongezza obukugu bwange era nfunye obwesige mu busobozi bwange.
ach_prompt: I kare weng amaro bedo I pii, ki dong atero cawa mapol tutwal I pwonye me goyo goga. Pi mwaki ma okato angec, adongo diro na dok anongo tek cwiny I kom kero na.
teo_prompt: Amina eong duc ajaut toma akipi, ido adaunit eong isawan luipu aitetemonor eong. Kotoma okar lu atuboros, abu eong aitojokaar acoa ka ido adumunit eong amuno naka apedoriteka.
lgg_prompt: Ale sawa driasi ovuzu yi ma alia, azini ma eza sawa karakarau ma vile 'yeta avita ni 'diyi 'yezu. Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alia, ma otu ma vile ondua azini ma isu asi'baza ma vile okpo 'diyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire ninkunda kuba omu maizi, kandi nkamara eshaaha nyingi ndikwegyesa okuteera. Kumara emyaka mingi, ntungire obwengye bwangye n'obwesigye omu bushoboorozi bwangye.

eng_prompt: Despite the lifeguard's watchful eye, the partygoers were too distracted to notice her struggling in the water. Moments later, the laughter and splashes faded into a chilling silence.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde omukuumi w'amazzi yabadde bulindaala, abaabadde ku kabaga baabadde bawuguddwa nnyo ne batasobola kumulaba ng'alwana mu mazzi. Nga wayise akaseera katono, enseko n'okukuba enduulu byaggwaawo ne bifuuka akasiriikiriro.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lagwok kwo obedo ki wang ma neno piny, joo ma obedo I pati gubedo ki tam mapat tutwal ma pe guneno ni en tye ka lweny I pii. Ingee kare mo, nyero ki cwer cwiny ma obedo tye orweny odoko ling mot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida epodokinit edaran akipi, apotu itunga lu opucit kongeroto aanyun ebe ejai ngesi ationis akipi. Akaulo naka apak naedit, apotu akwena keda aibiror kongeroto.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba angu ta mbapiri ni ovuzu mile be ra ti, 'ba amuti 'da ma alea 'diyi ndra asi otiza be angiri eyini ani e'yo erini dri cizu yi ma alea ri ndrezu ku. Sawa were ma vutia, o'duko azini o'duko 'da eyi ma ti ga e'yere.
nyn_prompt: N'obu omukuumi w'amaizi yaabaire aine amaisho marungi, abaabaire bari aha mbaga bakaba bataine ky'okukora kumureeba arikurwana omu maizi. Bwanyima y'akaire kakye, okushekyerera n'okushekyerera byahwaho.

eng_prompt: Numerous accidents have occurred in the vicinity, raising serious concerns among the residents. As a result, many are hesitant to let their children play near the water.
lug_prompt: Obubenje bungi bubaddewo mu kitundu, ekireeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi mu batuuze. N'ekivuddemu, bangi batya okuleka abaana baabwe okuzannyira okumpi n'amazzi.
ach_prompt: Peko me gudi mapol otime I kabedo man ma oweko lutedero tye ki lworo madit tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, pol gi tye ki lworo me weko lutino gi otuk cok ki pii.
teo_prompt: Ajainikinos akangasia nuipu kotoma aiboisit kana, ido eyangauni aiyalongong kanejaas itunga. Kanuka ngun, mam itunga luipu ecamunitos alakakin idwekec abolia eidunya keda akipi.
lgg_prompt: Drileonzi karakara eyi 'ye i angu 'da ma agei 'diyi ma alea eyini ani asi otiza ejizu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi leni anzi eyivile 'diyi avi yi ma agei ku.
nyn_prompt: Butandu nyingi zitwire nizibaho omu byaro, ekirikureetaho okwerarikirira kw'amaani omu batuuragye. N'ekyarugiremu, baingi tibarikwenda kwikiriza abaana baabo kuzaanira haihi n'amaizi.

eng_prompt: After a long week of work, she decided to take a break and spend some quality time with family. With a basket of homemade cookies in hand, she made her way to her auntie's house.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki empanvu ng'akola, yasalawo okuwummulako asobole okubeera n'ab'omu maka ge. Ng'akutte ekisero ky'obuugi obukoleddwa awaka mu ngalo, yagenda mu maka ga ssenga we.

teo_prompt: Akaulo naka esabiti loewoja noi loka aswam, abu ngesi koseu aiyengun kanu ajaut keda ekaleke. Keda asaduku naka akwii nuiswamatai ore, abu ngesi kogeu alosit oreke loka ijaake.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti ezu azi ngazu 'bori ma vutia, eri asi e'yo 'du ava liza 'duzu sa'wa azi onyiru ni aa'zu familia ivileri be. A'bala keki edele akua 'diyi be, eri mu i ma adroyi vile joa.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande ndaingwa y'okukora, akasharamu kuhumuura kumara obwire burungi n'ab'omuka ye. Arikukwata ekibbo ky'ebikookye ebyakozirwe omuka, akagyenda omu nju ya shwenkazi we.

eng_prompt: After months of discussions and community meetings, local officials have finally reached a consensus on the best way to improve transportation in the area. As a result, they are planning to construct a bridge.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'enkiiko z'ekitundu, abakungu b'ebyalo batuuse ku nzikiriziganya ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okutumbula entambula mu kitundu. N'ekyavaamu, bateekateeka kuzimba lutindo.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me nywako lok ki kacoke pa lwak, lutic me tedero dong guwinye I kom yoo maber loyo me yubu wot I kabedo eni. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka yubbe me yubu pem.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ipegeta keda airiamununeta nuka itunga, adolokisi eswamak luka atutubet acamanar kanu aitojokar elose kaiboisit. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aitemonokin aiduk edaraca.
lgg_prompt: Mba e'yo onzezu azini drifuza ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma vutia, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi esu asizu ti ecita geri muke ndeni acipa ma omgbo otuzu angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, eyi otuta 'ye daraza sizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'okuhanuura hamwe n'enkiiko z'abantu, abakungu b'ebyaro baherize kwikirizana aha muringo murungi gw'okutunguura eby'engyenda omu kyanga. N'ekyarugiremu, nibateekateeka kwombeka orutindo.

eng_prompt: The earthquake struck in the early hours of the morning, catching many residents off guard. As the dust settled, the extent of the devastation became tragically clear.
lug_prompt: Musisi yakubye mu matumbi budde, n'awuniikiriza abatuuze bangi. Enfuufu bwe yagenda ekka, obunene bw'ebintu ebyayonoonebwa bweyoleka bulungi.
ach_prompt: Oyengyeng man otimme I cawa me odiko ma oweko lutedero mapol gubedo ki ngeng tutwal. Ikare ma apwa odok piny, rwom me bal ma otimme onen atyer kamaleng.
teo_prompt: Abu atiyatiyawun naka akwap kiswamau tupuruc, ido abu kiteleka itunga luipu noi. Neapotu akwap kibiroros, apotu itunga kojenutu adoketait na amunar iboro.
lgg_prompt: Nyaku asuza 'da 'ye i o'bitisi, erini 'ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'bizu mile kokoru. O'bu ni ecaria, e'yo angu ezapi 'diyi ma omgbo eca e'da kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omutsitsa gukabaho omu shaaha z'akasheeshe, gukabuzabuza abatuuragye baingi. Enfuufu ku yaagumire neeyoreka oburemeezi oburiho.

eng_prompt: Despite the initial plans for a swift completion, numerous delays have plagued the project. Various factors, including funding issues and supply chain disruptions, have contributed to the extended timeline.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waaliwo enteekateeka y'okumaliriza mu bwangu, okulwawo kungi kukosezza pulojekiti. Ensonga ez'enjawulo, nga mw'otwalidde ensonga z'ensimbi n'okutaataaganyizibwa kw'emirimu, bye byaviiriddeko obudde obwongezeddwayo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kiyubu yub me tyeko tic oyot-oyot, galle mapol okelo peko I yub eni. Tye jami mapol ma oweko kicwalo kare malac tutwal, ma I kingi obedo peko me lim ki balo yub me cato jami.

eng_prompt: After carefully considering all the evidence and listening to both sides of the argument, he weighed the options thoughtfully. In a situation fraught with tension and differing opinions, he remained calm and objective.

ach_prompt: Inge ngiyo ki diro caden weng ki winyo lok pa dano weng, en otamo matut I kom ngo ma omyero otimme. I kare me lworo ki tam mapat-pat, en obedo ma cwinye opye mot.

eng_prompt: In a nurturing family environment, the well-being of children is paramount. Parents play a crucial role in ensuring that their offspring receive the support and care they require to thrive.
lug_prompt: Mu maka agakuza obulungi, obulungi bw'abaana bwe businga obukulu. Abazadde bakola omulimu munene okulaba ng'abaana baabwe bafuna obuyambi n'okulabirirwa kwe beetaaga okukula obulungi.

nyn_prompt: Omu maka marungi, abaana nibo barikukirayo omugasho. Abazaire nibakora omurimo muhango okureeba ngu abaana baabo batunga obuhwezi n'okureeberera ebibarikwetenga, kugira ngu bakure gye.

eng_prompt: When considering the best ways to manage your finances, it's important to evaluate the security of your assets. One effective strategy is to utilize financial institutions for safeguarding your funds.

teo_prompt: Arai iwomomo ijo iwaitin luajokak luka aidar ikapun kon, ibusakinit ijo airereor ayuwara naka iborokon. Adiopet ewai lo iswamai ejok ngesi aitwasam iriongeta luka ikapun kanu aidar ikapun kon.

eng_prompt: I'm curious to know more about you. Can you tell me what you do for a living?

eng_prompt: After several break-ins in the neighborhood, we decided it was time to enhance our security measures. Installing a sturdy fence was the first step in protecting our property and ensuring our family's safety.

eng_prompt: By strategically allocating our resources, we can enhance our financial growth. This approach allows us to capitalize on various opportunities in the market.

eng_prompt: In a democratic system, elected officials play a crucial role in voicing the concerns and interests of their constituents. Each representative is tasked with advocating for the needs of the people in their specific area.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola ya demokulasiya, abakungu abalondebwa bakola omulimu omukulu mu kwogera ebiruma n'ebiruubirirwa by'abalonzi baabwe. Buli mukiise alina omulimu gw'okulwanirira ebyetaago by'abantu mu kitundu kye.

eng_prompt: In today's world, resources are essential for fostering growth and innovation. Without adequate funding, progress in various sectors can be severely hindered.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, eby'obugagga bikulu nnyo mu kutumbula enkulaakulana n'obuyiiya. Awatali buyambi bumala, enkulaakulana mu bitongole eby'enjawulo esobola okulemesebwa ennyo.

eng_prompt: After years of discussions and planning, the school board finally approved the renovation project. As a result, the old buildings in our school were demolished.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okuteekateeka okumala emyaka, akakiiko k'essomero kaamala ne kakkiriza pulojekiti y'okuddaabiriza essomero. N'ekyavaamu, ebizimbe ebikadde mu ssomero lyaffe byamenyebwa.

lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza azini otuta ma vutia eli karakara 'bori ma vutia, driceza sukulu niri ai asizu otita afa eyi edezu o'diru ri ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba onyo jo ama vile sukulua oku 'diyi ra.

eng_prompt: Many people seek out natural wonders during their travels. Among these, the breathtaking beauty of waterfalls often draws large crowds.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi banoonya ebyewuunyo by'obutonde nga batambula. Mu bino, obulungi obuwuniikiriza obw'ebiyiriro by'amazzi butera okusikiriza abantu abangi.

eng_prompt: I've always been fascinated by the diverse cultures and stunning landscapes of Africa. Recently, I've been particularly drawn to exploring the northern region of Uganda.
lug_prompt: Bulijjo mbadde nkwatibwako nnyo olw'ebyobuwangwa eby'enjawulo n'ebifo ebirabika obulungi mu Afirika. Gye buvuddeko, mbadde njagala nnyo okulambula ebitundu by'obukiikakkono bwa Uganda.
ach_prompt: I kare weng abedo ki miti madit tutwal I kom tekwaro mapatpat ki kabedo mamwonya tutwal I lobo Afrika. Cokcok-ki, abedo ki miti madit tutwalle me cito ka limo kumalo me Uganda.
teo_prompt: Etapit eong aisiyalamikin keda inonosio luegelegela keda aiboisio nuibusiak nuka Africa. Apakio nu, akoto eong noi airereor nyakoi nako Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Ma ebi sawa driasi ava esu e'yo suruni ndundu Africaa 'diyi ma dria tualu angu ndrizaru Africaa 'diyi pie. O'du 'diyi ma alia, ma ovu ava be tuni angu Uganda ma kala uruleruri ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ntwire ninshemezibwa eby'obuhangwa n'oburungi bw'eihanga rya Afirika. Obwahati, nyine ekihika ky'okurambura ekicweka ky'amatemba ga Uganda.

eng_prompt: Our class was excited for the day ahead as we boarded the bus for our school tour. The itinerary promised a fascinating exploration of Uganda's rich cultural heritage.
lug_prompt: Ekibiina kyaffe kyali kisanyufu olw'olunaku olwali mu maaso nga bwe tulinnya bbaasi okugenda okulambula essomero lyaffe. Olugendo lwasuubiza okunoonyereza okusanyusa ku by'obuwangwa bya Uganda eby'obugagga.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan wa gubedo ki yomcwiny pi nino ma tye anyim I kare ma watye I bac me cito ka limo cukulwa. Yub eni ocikke me ngiyo tekwaro me lobo Uganda maber tutwal.
teo_prompt: Eyalama ekosieklas noi kanu apaaran naebunit kapak kana aidokotor sio obasi kanu alosit aipejokin esomerokosi. Abu alosit ngin kisumun ebe ebuni ngesi airereonor akiro nuka einono luko Uganda.
lgg_prompt: Ama vile kilasiri ndra ayikosi o'du drilia 'diyisi amani tuzu basi ma alia acizu ama vile angu onezu sukulua. Afa 'bani acizu 'diyi fe asi'baza e'yo ndrizaru e'yo suruni kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi ma ale andrizu.
nyn_prompt: Ekibiina kyaitu kikaba nikishemererwa ahabw'eizooba eriri omu maisho, obwo twabaire nitutaaha omu baasi kurambura eishomero ryaitu. Enkora y'orugyendo ekaraganisa okucondooza okurikutangaaza aha by'obuhangwa bwa Uganda.

eng_prompt: Travel has always been a fundamental part of human experience, driven by curiosity and the desire for adventure. As a result, many individuals embark on journeys that take them far from home in search of unique sights and experiences.
lug_prompt: Okutambula kubadde kwa mugaso nnyo mu bulamu bw'omuntu, nga kino kiva ku kwagala okumanya n'okwagala okulambula. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi batandika entambula ezibatwala wala okuva ewaabwe nga banoonya ebifo eby'enjawulo n'ebyo byebayitamu.
ach_prompt: Wot I kare weng obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwo pa dano, malubbe ki miti me ngeyo jami mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol gi cako wot ma terogi kama bor ki gang me yenyo kabedo ki jami ma pat.
teo_prompt: Erai duc alosit ibore yenepol noi kotoma aijen naka itunga, itodunit ebe ekotosi kesi aijen iboro luipu. Kanuka ngun, elosenenete itunga luipu alosit aiboisio nu elwaka ore kanu aimo aiboisio nu itegelikina.
lgg_prompt: Acita ebi ovu sawa driasi afa orodriru e'yo 'ba ada eyini esu 'diyi ma azi, e'yo lezu e'yo ndundu eyi onizu azini ava lezu e'yo ndundu eyi onezu risi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi aci angu eyini 'diyi 'du angu ndundu eyi ndrezu azini e'yo ndundu eyini esu 'diyi ndrezu.

eng_prompt: Throughout human history, many civilizations have built remarkable structures that reflect their culture and achievements. These enduring landmarks serve as a testament to the ingenuity and resilience of our ancestors.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo by'omuntu byonna, enkulaakulana nnyingi zizimbye ebizimbe ebyewuunyisa ebiraga obuwangwa bwabwe n'ebituukiddwaako. Ebintu bino eby'edda biwa obujulizi ku bukugu n'obuvumu bwa bajjajjaffe.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro pa dano, tekwaro mapol guyubu gedo mabeco tutwal ma nyutu tekwaro gi ki jami ma gutimo. Kabedo magi matye pi kare malac tutwal tye macalo lanyut me ryeko ki tek cwiny pa kwarowa.

lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, ongulumu karakara eyi si jo onyiru 'diyi e'dapi eyi ma suruni 'diyi tualu e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi pie. Afa 'bani ecozu angu 'da ma alea sa'wa ezu 'diyi e'da geri ama a'bipi 'diyi ni e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo by'abantu byona, eby'obuhangwa bingi byombekire ebyombeko by'omutaano ebirikworeka eby'obuhangwa bwabo hamwe n'ebi batungire. Eby'okureeberaho ebirikubaasa kugumaho, nibyoreka obwengye n'obumanzi bwa baishenkuruitwe.

eng_prompt: Success often starts with a strong sense of self-confidence. When you trust your abilities and stay committed to your goals, the possibilities become endless.
lug_prompt: Obuwanguzi butera okutandikira ku kuba n'obwesige obw'amaanyi mu ggwe kennyini. Bw'oteeka obwesige mu busobozi bwo era n'osigala nga weewaddeyo eri ebiruubirirwa byo, obusobozi bufuuka butaggwaawo.

teo_prompt: Akerianut egeunete keda amunokina. Arai iyuunit jo apedoriakon kosodi aingarakin jo aitodolikin apeleikinata kon, epedorete ijo aswam iboro luipu.
lgg_prompt: Drile suza ni tutuni e'do asi'baza okporu be. Eka asi 'ba e'yo mini eco 'ye 'diyi ma dria azini mi asi 'ba e'yo mini le 'ye 'diyi ma dria, e'yo mini eco 'ye 'diyi eca asi koko.
nyn_prompt: Obusinguzi buriijo nibutandikira aha kugira obwesigye. Ku orikwesiga obushoboorozi bwawe kandi okahamira aha bigyendererwa byawe, ebirikubaasa kubaho tibirikuhwa.

eng_prompt: As you navigate through your day, it's important to stay mindful of your surroundings. This awareness can help you respond effectively to any situation that may arise.
lug_prompt: Nga bwotambula mu lunaku lwo, kya mugaso okufaayo ku bikwetoolodde. Okumanyisibwa kuno kusobola okukuyamba okukola obulungi mu mbeera yonna eyinza okujjawo.

teo_prompt: Kwape iuta jo alosit kotoma apaaran kon, ejokuna aidar akiro nuikamunitos aiboisio nukon. Ajenanut na ingarakini jo aswam ejok kotoma ojautene ediokere loepedori alomun.
lgg_prompt: Mini acizu mi vile o'du ma aliarisi, eri orodriru ovuzu mile be angu mi agei 'diyi ma dria. E'yo niza 'diri eco mi aza ko e'yo ci ecopi i 'yepi 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru ra.

eng_prompt: In any democratic system, individuals play a crucial role in shaping policies and representing the interests of the public. Their decisions can significantly impact the lives of citizens and the direction of the nation.
lug_prompt: Mu nkola yonna eya demokulasiya, abantu bakola omulimu omukulu mu kukola enkola n'okukiikirira ebyetaago by'abantu. Okusalawo kwabwe kusobola okukosa ennyo obulamu bwa bannansi n'obulagirizi bw'eggwanga.

eng_prompt: As the date approaches, everyone is starting to feel the pressure of the preparations. It's crucial to determine who will take the lead in organizing the details for the big day.
lug_prompt: Ng'olunaku lusembera, buli omu atandise okuwulira akazito k'enteekateeka. Kikulu nnyo okumanya ani anaakulemberamu okutegeka olunaku olukulu.

eng_prompt: Effective communication and collaboration among team members are essential for addressing challenges. By gathering together, we can brainstorm ideas and explore potential solutions.
lug_prompt: Empuliziganya ennungi n'okukwatagana mu bammemba ba ttiimu bikulu nnyo mu kugonjoola okusoomoozebwa. Bwe tukuŋŋaana awamu, tusobola okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okunoonyereza ku ngeri y'okugonjoolamu ensonga.

eng_prompt: In today's competitive job market, companies are increasingly focused on finding individuals who possess the right skills and qualifications. As a result, they prioritize candidates who demonstrate a strong ability to perform their tasks effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu katale k'emirimu ak'ennaku zino akavuganya, amakampuni geeyongedde okussa essira ku kunoonya abantu abalina obukugu n'ebisaanyizo ebituufu. N'ekivuddemu, bakulembeza abesimbyewo abooleka obusobozi obw'amaanyi okukola emirimu gyabwe obulungi.

nyn_prompt: Omu katale k'eby'emirimo ak'erizooba akarimu okuhayahayana kw'amaani, kampuni nizigyenderera okuronda abantu abaine emyoga n'ebirikwetengyesa. N'ekyarugiremu, nibatwara abeegi abarikworeka ngu nibabaasa kukora emirimo yaabo kurungi.

eng_prompt: In a democratic society, the process of selecting leaders is crucial for ensuring that the voices of the citizens are heard. These individuals are entrusted with the responsibility of making decisions that impact the community as a whole.

ach_prompt: I te loc alwak, yub me yero lutela pire tek tutwal me neno ni dwon pa anywali tye ka winyo. Kimiyo tic ki dano magi me moko tam ma gudo kwo pa lwak.

nyn_prompt: Omu demokurasiya, omuringo gw'okutoorana abebembezi n'ogw'omugasho munonga, okureeba ngu eiraka ry'abatuuragye rihurirwa. Abantu aba, nibaheebwa obujunanizibwa bw'okukora encwamu erikukwata aha bantu boona.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the ongoing challenges and feedback from staff and parents, the school board convened to discuss potential solutions. Ultimately, they concluded that a leadership change was necessary for the betterment of the school community.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza n'obwegendereza ku kusoomoozebwa okugenda mu maaso n'ebiteeso okuva mu bakozi n'abazadde, olukiiko lw'essomero lwatudde okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okukikolamu. Mu nkomerero, baamaliriza nti enkyukakyuka mu bukulembeze yali yeetaagisa ku lw'obulungi bw'ekitundu ky'essomero.
ach_prompt: Ingee tam matut I kom peko matye kawot anyim ki tam ma aa ki bot lutic ki lunyodo, lutela me gang kwan gubedo ka lok I kom yoo me cobo peko eni. I agiki ne, gumoko ni aloka loka me tela obedo gin ma mite pi ber pa lwak me gang kwan.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aomoom ejok nuikamunitos atiokisio nu elosi akonye keda aomisio nuka eswamak keda auriak, apotu lukapolok luka esomero iriamunos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu epedorio aitemokin. Kawasia, apotu kesi ongetakisi ebe ibusakinit aijulakin engarenone kanu ajokis na esomero.

eng_prompt: Everyone deserves the freedom to express their beliefs and desires. It's important for me to stand up for my own choices and values.
lug_prompt: Buli omu agwanidde eddembe okwogera ebyo by'akkiriza n'ebyo by'ayagala. Kikulu nnyo gye ndi okulwanirira bye nsazeewo n'empisa zange.
ach_prompt: Dano weng omyero gubed agonya me loko tam gi ki miti gi. Pire tek tutwal ki an me cung pi tam ma amoko ki jami ma amaro.
teo_prompt: Nginitunganan ekoto ailajara na alimun aiyuunikec keda ipudesiakec. Erai ibore yenepol noi kanu eong aibwo kanu aseuneta ka iponesioka.
lgg_prompt: Le 'ba dria ma esu drilemgbo e'yo a'ita yini azini afa yini leleri ecezu. Eri orodriru ma dri pa tuzu e'yo mani 'dule 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Buri omwe ashemereire kugira obugabe bw'okugamba ebi arikwikiriza n'ebi arikwenda. N'eky'omugasho ahariinye kwemerera ahabw'okusharaho kwangye n'emitwarize yangye.

eng_prompt: It is essential for us to uphold integrity in all our actions. We must find ethical solutions to our challenges.
lug_prompt: Kya mugaso nnyo gye tuli okukuuma obwesimbu mu bikolwa byaffe byonna. Tulina okufuna eby'okugonjoola ebizibu byaffe mu ngeri ey'empisa.

eng_prompt: The organizers emphasized the importance of adhering to the established guidelines to ensure a fair competition. As the event began, each participant was reminded of their responsibility to follow the rules closely.
lug_prompt: Abategesi bakkaatiriza obukulu bw'okugoberera ebiragiro ebyateekebwawo okulaba nga waliwo okuvuganya okulungi. Omukolo bwe gwatandika, buli eyeetabamu yajjukibwa obuvunaanyizibwa bwe okugoberera amateeka.

eng_prompt: Understanding the complexities of human emotions can often lead to surprising insights. For instance, some might find that moody people reveal their true feelings more readily than those who maintain a constant demeanor.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera obuzibu bw'enneewulira z'abantu emirundi egisinga kuviirako okuzuula ebyewuunyisa. Okugeza, abamu bayinza okukizuula nti abantu abali mu mbeera embi balaga mangu enneewulira zaabwe okusinga abo abali mu mbeera embi.

lgg_prompt: Vata e'yo 'ba ada eyini aa'zu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria ri ni e'yo ndundu eyi esu sa'wa driasi. Ekile ecetasi, 'ba azi 'diyi eco esu kini 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi yi ma e'yo a'da 'diyi ece ewakokoru ndeni aga 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi.

eng_prompt: Trust is a fragile thing, often shattered by the actions of those we least expect. In a world where loyalty is tested, the darker side of human nature emerges.
lug_prompt: Obwesige kintu kya kaseera buseera, ebiseera ebisinga kimenyeka olw'ebikolwa by'abo be tutasuubira. Mu nsi obugolokofu gye bugezesebwa, oludda oluddugavu olw'obutonde bw'omuntu lweyoleka.
ach_prompt: Gen obedo gin ma goro tutwal, pol kare tim pa jo ma pe wageno gi balo ne. I lobo ma kitye ka pimo bedo ki gen, kabedo marac me kwo pa dano tye ka katte.

nyn_prompt: Okwesiga n'ekintu ekitarikwetegyerezibwa, ekirikubaasa kusisikara ahabw'ebikorwa by'abo abu tutarikubasuubira. Omu nsi ahu obwesigwa burikugyezibwa, enshonga mbi z'abantu niziija.

eng_prompt: In a society where laws are often ignored, the question arises about the effectiveness of our legal system. We must consider the various methods available to ensure that those who commit wrongdoings are held accountable.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu amateeka gye gatera okubuusibwa amaaso, ekibuuzo kijja ku bukugu bw'enkola yaffe ey'amateeka. Tulina okulowooza ku ngeri ez'enjawulo eziriwo okukakasa nti abo abakola ebikolobero bavunaanibwa.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma cik ipol kare ki cayo ne, lapeny tye I kom kit ma cik tiyo kwede. Omyero watam I kom yoo mapat-pat matye me neno ni joo ma timo bal ki ngolo kop iwigi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naepalunitai ikisila, epote aingiseta nuikamunitos eswamae loajokan loka ikisila wok. Ibusakinit oni airereor iwaitin luegelegela lu ejai kanu awanyun ebe ngul lu iswamaete nuarokok eponio aitodun nuiswamauna.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'bani azita eyi adizu sa'wa driasi ri ma alea, zita efu geri amani azita eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma orodri ma dria. Le ama ma ega geri ndundu 'bani ecozu nezu ra kini 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi nga e'yo 'ye ra.

eng_prompt: After receiving the summons in the mail, we realized the seriousness of the situation. Our lawyer informed us that we needed to prepare our case quickly.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna ebbaluwa etuyita, twakitegeera nti embeera yali mbi nnyo. Munnamateeka waffe yatugambye nti twetaaga okutegeka omusango gwaffe mu bwangu.

teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun aiwororio naka epone ngol, apotu sio ajenutu ajokis naka ejautene. Abu epulidakosi olimok iso ebe ibusakinit sio aitemonokin emusago kosi katipet.

eng_prompt: The foundation of a thriving community lies in the education of its youth. As mentors and guides, educators shape the minds and futures of the next generation.
lug_prompt: Omusingi gw'ekitundu ekikulaakulana guli mu kusoma kw'abavubuka baakyo. Ng'ababuulirizi n'abalambika, abasomesa babumba ebirowoozo n'ebiseera by'omu maaso eby'omulembe oguddako.

lgg_prompt: Ongulumu drile suzaru ri ma vuti eri 'ba ode erini 'diyi ma onita ma alia. Ekile 'ba imbata fepi azini drice'ba ru, imba'ba eyi omi 'ba ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omusingye gw'ekyanga ekirikukurakurana, n'okushomesa eminyeeto yakyo. Abeegyesa, nk'abahabuzi, nibakora aha biteekateeko n'ebiro bya nyensya by'omurembe ogurikukurataho.

eng_prompt: As I immerse myself in my community's culture, I've come to realize the importance of connecting with my roots. One of the most meaningful ways to do this is through language.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe nneenyigira mu buwangwa bw'ekitundu kyange, ntegedde obukulu bw'okukwatagana n'ensibuko zange. Emu ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okukikolamu kwe kuyita mu nnimi.

teo_prompt: Neautar eong alomar toma inonosio luka atutubetekosi, abu eong amisiikin ajokis naka arucokina keda iraasiteka. Epone ediope loajokan noi loka aswam ngun ngesi kotoma angajep.
lgg_prompt: Mani ma ngulupi suzu ma vile ongulumu ma e'yo a'bi ni 'diyi ma alia, ma esu e'yo orodri e'yo 'bazu yi ecizu ma vile ola be 'diyi ma dria ra. Geri azi orodriru 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri ma azi eri ti ma aliasi.

eng_prompt: Effective instruction requires careful preparation and organization. To ensure that learning objectives are met, educators often rely on structured outlines for their lessons.

eng_prompt: In many countries, the education system is primarily funded and managed by the government. As a result, educators working in public institutions receive their salaries from government resources.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nnyingi, gavumenti y'esinga okuvujjirira n'okuddukanya ebyenjigiriza. N'ekivuddemu, abasomesa abakolera mu masomero ga gavumenti bafuna emisaala gyabwe okuva mu nsimbi za gavumenti.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent curriculum changes, the school administration has prioritized professional development. To ensure that all educators are equipped with the necessary skills, comprehensive training programs have been established.
lug_prompt: Olw'enkyukakyuka ezaakakolebwa mu nteekateeka y'ebisomesebwa, abakulembeze b'essomero bakulembezza okukulaakulanya eby'ekikugu. Okusobola okukakasa nti abasomesa bonna baweebwa obukugu obwetaagisa, enteekateeka z'okutendekebwa zitandikiddwawo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me aloka-loka ma otime I yub me pwonye ma okato cokcok-ki, ludito me gang kwan guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom dongo rwom me tic cing. Me neno ni lupwonye weng gunongo diro ma mite, ki keto yub me pwonye mapol.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aijulanakineta nuka aisisiaeta, abu eyaitene lo esomero isingarenit apol naka ipirioitin. Kanu awanyun ebe isisianakinak kere ejaas keda acoa na ekotoi, etolomun ainapeta nu aitutuonoro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ojata e'yo onitani 'diyi ma alia o'diru 'diyisi, driceza sukulu niri 'ba asi e'yo onita ni 'diyi ma ezota ma dria. Lezu nezu ra kini 'ba imba'ba dria eyini ondua lele 'diyi esu, 'ba e'do otita imbatani 'diyi dria.

eng_prompt: The company conducted a thorough review of employee performance over the past year. As a result of the evaluation, management made difficult decisions regarding staff retention.

eng_prompt: Recognizing and rewarding talent is essential for fostering a positive work environment. When employees feel valued for their contributions, they are more likely to remain engaged and productive.
lug_prompt: Okusiima n'okusasula ebitone kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula embeera ennungi ku mulimu. Abakozi bwe bawulira nga basiimibwa olw'ebirungi bye bakola, baba beetegefu okusigala nga bakola era nga bakola bulungi emirimu gyabwe.

teo_prompt: Ajenun keda ainanakin itunga luejaasi keda atalantan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor eswamae loajokan. Arai epupete eswamak ebe ejokuna kesi kanu aswamukec, epedorete kesi asalakin iswamaete ka aswam ejok.

eng_prompt: Taxation is a fundamental aspect of a functioning society, providing essential services and infrastructure. As such, it is crucial for individuals to contribute their fair share to support the common good.

eng_prompt: As global supply chains continue to face disruptions, businesses are struggling to keep up with rising expenses. This has led to significant increases in various operational costs, particularly in transportation.

eng_prompt: As global fuel prices continue to rise, businesses are facing significant challenges in managing their logistics. This shift in the transportation landscape is prompting companies to reevaluate their supply chain strategies.

eng_prompt: Many people underestimate the challenges involved in navigating natural obstacles. When faced with a wide, rushing river, one quickly realizes the complexities of making it to the other side.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and despair, we often seek solace in our faith. Many believe that when we reach out to the divine, our heartfelt requests do not go unheard.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'okuggwaamu essuubi, tutera okunoonya okubudaabudibwa mu kukkiriza kwaffe. Bangi bakkiriza nti bwe tutuukirira katonda, okusaba kwaffe okuva mu mutima tekulemwa kuwulirwa.

teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus ajenanut ka amunokina, etapit oni aimo agangat kotoma aiyuun wok. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe neilipiata oni mama ejai Edeke, mam ailipasineiwok mam epupokino.

eng_prompt: In many situations, individuals or groups must consider the needs and preferences of those who are unable to voice their opinions. This often leads to a complex process of weighing various perspectives and making choices that impact the wider community.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera nnyingi, abantu oba ebibinja birina okulowooza ku byetaago n'ebyetaago by'abo abatasobola kwogera ndowooza zabwe. Kino kitera okuviirako enkola enzibu ey'okupima endowooza ez'enjawulo n'okukola okusalawo okukosa ekitundu kyonna.
ach_prompt: I kare mapol, dano onyo gurup omyero gutam I kom miti ki miti pa joo ma pe twero miyo tam gi. Man ipol kare kelo yub matek tutwal me pimo tam mapat-pat ki moko tam ma kelo adwogi maber I kom lwak.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loepol, ekot itunga arai igurupun aomoom ipudesia keda ipudesia luka ngul lumam epedoritos einer aomisiokec. Eyangauni ngin duc ainapeta nuetioko nuikamunitos aomisio nuegelegela ka aitolomun aseununeta nuetiroritos itunga kere.

eng_prompt: When planning a new infrastructure project, one of the key considerations is the timeline for completion. Understanding the duration of construction is crucial for budgeting and scheduling purposes.

eng_prompt: In today's global economy, companies are constantly seeking new markets and opportunities for growth. One effective strategy is to leverage international trade by sourcing products from abroad.

teo_prompt: Arai iuta jo aimo iboro luegelegela keda aijaanakinio, erai aiboisit naegwelanarere nes aiboisit najokan kakere naibusakinit jo ageun. Erai aiboisit naepol noi naegwelanarere agwelanarak iboro kere anyoun kotoma iraan luitetiak kitoni iboro luitegelikina.

eng_prompt: As global economies become increasingly interconnected, it's essential to explore strategies that can enhance economic collaboration. One key area of focus is the promotion of international trade.

ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka ngiyo jami mapat-pat, atye ka poro wel ki diro me nongo wel ma ki dwoko piny. Miti na tye me lubu byek me lim ma atye kwede kun nongo jami weng ma amito.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong aanyanar aiboisio nuegelegela, etirianenei eong itiaisinei ka aimo ikapun luitidisiaritai. Alosikinet ka erai aitodolikin ebajet ka kapak kana adumun iboro kere lu akoto eong.
lgg_prompt: Mani angu ndundu eyi ma ale andriria, ma aje eyi o'bi geri kililiru si azini ma nda e'yo aje ofezaru 'diyi ma dria. Asisile maniri 'bazu bajeti mavileri ma alia yini nga kiri afa dria mani le 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ku ndikuraba omu myanya y'okushomeramu, ninyegyeragyeranisa emihendo n'obwegyendesereza oburiho. Ekigyendererwa kyangye n'okukuratira embaririra yangye n'okutunga buri kimwe eki ndikwenda.

eng_prompt: In recent years, Uganda has become a popular destination for people seeking better opportunities. This influx has significantly changed the demographic landscape of the country.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, Uganda efuuse ekifo ekimanyiddwa ennyo eri abantu abanoonya emikisa emirungi. Okuyingira kuno kukyusizza nnyo embeera y'abantu mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, Uganda odoko kabedo ma dano mapol maro cito iye ka yenyo gum me tic maber. Dano matye kabino ilobo ni guloko kit ma wel dano tye kwede ilobo ni tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, erai Uganda aiboisit na ejenara noi kanejaas itunga lu ekotosi arerengesio nuajokak. Ejulaki abwaak lu aiboisio nuka itunga kotoma akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, kari Uganda niri eca angu 'ba eyini muzu drileba muke ndeni 'diyi ndazu 'diyi ru. E'yo 'ba eyini emuzu kari 'di ma alea ri oja e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu kari 'di ma alea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, Uganda ehindukire omwanya gw'abantu abarikuronda emigisha mirungi. Okwija kw'abantu omu ihanga kuhindwire munonga omutindo gw'abantu omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: In any organization, maximizing efficiency is crucial for success. One way to achieve this is by ensuring that all available resources are utilized effectively.
lug_prompt: Mu kitongole kyonna, okukola obulungi kintu kikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi. Engeri emu ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kukakasa nti ebintu byonna ebiriwo bikozesebwa bulungi.
ach_prompt: I dul mo keken, medo rwom me tic obedo gin ma pire tek pi cobo miti ne. Yo acel me cobo man obedo neno ni kitiyo ki jami weng matye maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma orionget ediokere, aitodolikin eswamae ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut. Epone ediope loka aitodolikin ngun ngesi awanyun ebe itwasamao iboro lu ejaas ejok.
lgg_prompt: Amuti dria ma alea, e'yo 'yezu kililiru ri eri orodriru drile suza ni. Geri azi alu ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri lezu nezu ra kini 'ba afa dria ci 'diyi ayu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kitongore kyona, okukora gye n'eky'omugasho aha businguzi. Omuringo gumwe gw'okukora eki n'okureeba ngu eby'obugaiga byona ebiriho, bikozesibwa kurungi.

eng_prompt: Many communities face economic challenges that hinder their growth and development. Implementing sustainable initiatives can provide much-needed financial support and create job opportunities.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi bisanga okusoomoozebwa mu by'enfuna okulemesa okukulaakulana kwabyo n'enkulaakulana. Okussa mu nkola enteekateeka eziwangaala kisobola okuwa obuyambi bw'ensimbi obwetaagibwa ennyo n'okutondawo emirimu.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mapol nongo peko me lim ma gengo dongo gi. Keto yub me dongo lobo itic twero weko inongo kony me lim ma mite tutwal dok bene kelo gum me tic.
teo_prompt: Etereikina itunga luipu keda atiokisio nu ikapun nu isimikiete apol keda apol. Aitegear iboro lu iswamao ejok epedori aijaikin agangat na ikapun ka aitolomun aswamisinei.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu eyini ani zozu ku. Eꞌyo ꞌbani ꞌyele sawa ezu ꞌdiyi ma alia ꞌdiyi ma eꞌyo ꞌyezu ꞌdiyi eco atita robiani ꞌbani lele tu ꞌdiyi fe azini drileba ꞌbani azi fezu ꞌdiyi fe ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebyanga bingi nibishanga oburemeezi omu by'entaasya oburikuremesa entunguuka yaabo. Okuta omu nkora enteekateeka ezirikugumaho, nikibaasa kureetaho obuhwezi bw'esente n'emirimo.

eng_prompt: Despite careful planning and allocation, many projects face unexpected challenges. As a result, some resources never serve the intended purpose.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga pulojekiti nnyingi zitegekebwa n'okugabibwa n'obwegendereza, zisanga okusoomoozebwa okuteeberezebwa. N'ekivuddemu, ebintu ebimu tebiweereza kigendererwa kyabyo.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub ki yub tye maber, project mapol nongo peko ma pe byek tye I komgi. Macalo adwogi ne, jami mukene pe gitiyo pi miti gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida itemonokino ka aitemonokin ejok, ejaas ipurojektin luipu keda atiokisio numam eomitai. Kanuka ngun, mam iboro ice iswamaete nu ekotoi kes.
lgg_prompt: Ba ka tro otita eyi otu kililiru azini eyi awa ra ti, otita karakara eyi e'yo ewaru 'bani ega ku 'diyi esu. E'yo 'disi, afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma azi ngani azi eyini lele 'diyi nga ku.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho enteekateeka n'obwegyendesereza, purogyekiti nyingi nizitunga oburemeezi obutarikuteekateekwaho. N'ekyarugiremu, ebintu ebimwe tibirikubaasa kuhikiiriza ekigyendererwa kyabyo.

eng_prompt: In today's digital age, the skills required for success are constantly evolving. As technology becomes increasingly integrated into everyday life, understanding its applications is essential for the younger generation.
lug_prompt: Mu mulembe gwa digito ogw'ennaku zino, obukugu obwetaagisa okutuuka ku buwanguzi bukyuka buli kaseera. Nga tekinologiya yeeyongera okuyingizibwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo, okutegeera enkozesa yaayo kya mugaso eri omulembe omuto.
ach_prompt: I kare man me tic ki intanet, diro ma mite me cobo miti pa dano tye ka dongo kare ki kare. Kit ma tet manyen tye ka donyo I kwo pa dano, niang kit ma tic kwede tye kwede pire tek tutwal pi jo matino.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nu nuka elago, eutasi acoasinei nu ekotoi kanu akerianut aijulakin. Kwape ejai etatai loakwana toma aijar naka nginiparan, amisiikin eipone lo itwasamaere erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka atumunak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologia ni ewu andruri ma alea, ondua 'bani lele drile suza ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo tekenologia niri ni curu'do eca e'yo 'ba eyini aa'zu o'du driasi 'diyi ma alea, geri eyini eyi ayuzu 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru 'ba oderu 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa digito obwa hati, emyoga erikwetengwa kubaasa kuba omusinguzi neeguma neetunguuka. Obu tekinorogye erikweyongyera kwejumba omumagara gaabo aga buriizooba, okwetegyereza emikorere yaayo n'eky'omugasho aha minyeeto.

eng_prompt: As technology continues to advance at a rapid pace, many devices are becoming increasingly sophisticated. This complexity often leaves users feeling overwhelmed and confused about how to operate them effectively.
lug_prompt: Nga tekinologiya agenda mu maaso n'okukulaakulana ku sipiidi, ebyuma bingi byeyongera okuba eby'omulembe. Obuzibu buno buleka abakozesa okuwulira nga bazitoowereddwa era nga batabuddwa ku ngeri y'okubikozesaamu obulungi.
ach_prompt: I kare ma tet manyen tye ka dongo oyot-oyot tutwal, nyonyo mapat-pat tye ka doko tek-tek tutwal. Peko man pol kare weko lutic bedo ki lworo ki anywena-nywena i kom kit me tic kwedgi maber.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokini etatai loakwana apol, epote iboro luipu araun luitegelikina noi. Ationis na ijalakini duc itunga lu itwasamaete kes epupete lu itolitol ka aitolitol epone loka aitwasam kes ejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo tekenologia niri ni mu drile muzu drile okposi, afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo ewaru 'diri sawa driasi 'ba ayupi 'diyi ku e'yo yi ma aza kozu kililiru ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku tekinorogye erikugumizamu neetunguuka, ebyoma bingi nibyeyongyera kuba eby'omurembe. Oburemeezi obu buriijo nibureka abarikubukoresa barikwehurira batarikumanya oku bashemereire kubukoresa kurungi.

eng_prompt: Heavy rains have been falling in the region for several days, causing rivers to overflow their banks. Local authorities are warning residents to prepare for potential evacuations.
lug_prompt: Enkuba ebadde etonnya mu kitundu okumala ennaku eziwera, ekiviiriddeko emigga okubooga. Ab'obuyinza mu byalo balabudde abatuuze okwetegekera okusengulwa okuyinza okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Kot obedo ka cwer matek tutwal I twok piny eni pi nino mapol, ma oweko kulu mapol opong. Lutela me tedero tye ka ciko lwak me yube pi kobo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Etepenenei edou loepol noi kotoma aiboisit kangin adaun aparasia nuipu, ido abu ijaik icileta ailelebun. Icorakitos apedorosio nuka atutubet itunga aitemonokin kanuka aibwot.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo ebi 'di angu 'da ma alea o'du karakara eyini fezu yi ara eyini tizu tre. Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi fe bile ndu liza 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini eyi otuzu e'yo 'bani ecozu eyi ofuzu angu 'da ma alea risi.
nyn_prompt: Enjura nyingi etwire neegwa omu kyanga kumara ebiro bingi, ekirikureetera emigyera kwijurira. Ab'obushoborozi ahabyaro nibarabura abatuuragye okweteekateekyera okufururwa.

eng_prompt: Severe storms swept through the region, causing widespread destruction. As a result, many families lost their homes and belongings.
lug_prompt: Emiyaga egy'amaanyi gyakubye ekitundu kyonna ne kiviirako okwonooneka kw'ebintu. N'ekyavaamu, amaka mangi gaafiirwa amaka gaabwe n'ebintu byabwe.
ach_prompt: Yamo magwa obalo jami mapol tutwal I but piny eni. Macalo adwogi ne, lugangi mapol orwenyo odi gi ki jami gi.
teo_prompt: Apotu ekwam kibiroros aiboisit ngin, ido abu komudia iboro luipu noi. Kanuka ngun, apotu ikalia luipu kotwakiasi ireria kec keda iborokec.
lgg_prompt: Oli okporu 'diyi oli angu 'da ma alea dria eyini ani afa ezaza ejizu karakara. E'yo 'disi, familia karakara avi yi vile aku azini afa yini 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Emiyaga y'amaani ekateera ekyanga, ekyareteire okushisha kwingi. Ekyarugiremu, amaka maingi gakaferwa amaka gaago n'ebintu byago.

eng_prompt: In many parts of the world, communities are facing severe shortages due to ongoing conflicts and climate change. As a result, essential resources are dwindling, leaving families in desperate situations.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi eby'ensi, ebitundu byolekaganye n'ebbula ly'emmere olw'obukuubagano obugenda mu maaso n'enkyukakyuka y'obudde. N'ekivuddemu, ebintu ebikulu bigenda bikendeera, ekireka amaka mu mbeera embi.
ach_prompt: I but lobo mapol, lwak tye ka canne tutwal pi lweny matye kawot anyim ki alokaloka pa piny. Macalo adwogi ne, jami ma mite pi kwo tye ka dwogo piny, weko gangi tye I peko matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisio nuipu nuka akwap, etereikina itunga keda aikidiokus na iboro kanuka ingungeta keda aijulujuleta nuka ekuse keda loka ikwamin. Kanuka ngun, eutai aitidisiar iboro lu itwasamao, ido ijalakini ikalia ejautene loetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ma kala karakara eyi ma alea, ongulumu eyi e'yo afa ako ni 'diyi esu e'yo ngiringiri eyini mu drile ri ni azini angu mile ma ojata si. E'yo 'disi, afa orodriru aa'zu edriru 'diyi ma omgbo ni esi, familia eyi ku e'yo ewaru ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu bicweka bingi eby'ensi, abantu nibatunga eibura ry'ebintu ahabw'entaro ezirikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'empindahinduka y'obwire. N'ekyarugiremu, ebintu ebikuru biriyo nibikyendeera, ekirikureka amaka omu mbeera mbi munonga.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, it is crucial for those in power to prioritize the well-being of their citizens. Many communities are suffering from the effects of recent disasters and require immediate assistance.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, kikulu nnyo abo abali mu buyinza okukulembeza obulungi bwa bannansi baabwe. Ebitundu bingi bibonaabona olw'ebizibu ebyajjawo gye buvuddeko era byetaaga obuyambi obw'amangu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal ki joo matye I loc me keto cwiny gi I kom ber bedo pa anywali gi. Kabedo mapol tye ka deno can macalo adwogi me peko ma poto atura ma otimme cokcok-ki dok gimito kony oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko, ejokuna noi ngul luejaasi toma apugan aisingarenit aijar naka itungakec. Etereikina itunga luipu keda atiokisio nuka atiokisio nupac ido ekotosi aingarakinio katipet.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ma alia, eri orodriru 'ba opi dria 'diyi ni asi 'bazu e'yo onyiru kari anzi yini 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria. Ongulumu karakara eyi candi nya e'yo ewaru e'yo ewaru eyi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi dika eyi le azakoma mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, n'eky'omugasho abo abari omu bwebembezi kwebembeza eby'abantu baabo. Ebyanga bingi nibibonabona ahabw'ebihikiirizi ebyabaireho juba kandi nibyetenga obuhwezi ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Due to the recent heavy rainfall and subsequent flooding, the local communities are facing significant risks to their safety and infrastructure. To mitigate these dangers, effective measures must be taken to manage the water levels in the area.
lug_prompt: Olw'enkuba ennyingi eyaakavaako n'amataba, abantu b'omu kitundu boolekaganye n'obulabe obw'amaanyi eri obulamu bwabwe n'ebintu byabwe. Okukendeeza ku buzibu buno, enkola ennungi erina okukolebwa okusobola okukendeeza ku bungi bw'amazzi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Pi kot ma ocwe matek tutwal ki pong pa pii ma okato cokcok-ki, lwak tye ka nongo peko madit tutwal I kom ber bedo gi ki jami mukene. Me jwiko peko magi, omyero ki tii ki yoo maber me doro rwom me pii I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanuka edou loepol noi loatubor keda ebulone, etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nuepolok nuka ayuwara kec keda aiboisio nuegelegela. Kanu aitidisiar atiokisio nu, ekot aitolot iwaitin lu epedorio aitikitik adoketait na akipi katutubet.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'dipi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini yi tiza ma e'yosi, ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu ageitema eyini ri ma dria tualu afa eyini ayuzaru 'diyi pie. E'yo onzi 'diyi ma omgbo esizu, le 'ba ma 'du e'yo yi ma omgbo angu 'da ma alea ri ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enjura nyingi eyahererukireyo kugwa hamwe n'omwegyemure ogwakuratsireho, abantu b'omubyaro nibatunga akabi kahango ahaby'okwerinda n'ebyombeko byabo. Okutuubya aha kabi aka, hashemereire kubaho enkora nungi y'okureeberera amaizi omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: Heavy rainfall over the past few days has led to rising water levels in the rivers. As a result, many communities are facing severe flooding.
lug_prompt: Enkuba etonnya mu nnaku eziyise ereetedde amazzi okulinnya mu migga. N'ekivuddemu, ebitundu bingi byolekaganye n'amataba amabi.
ach_prompt: Kot ma ocwe matek tutwal I nino ma okato ni okelo mede pa pii I nam. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo mapol tye ka nongo pong pa pii.
teo_prompt: Apol naka edou loepol noi kotoma aparasia nu atuboros ayangau aiyatakin na akipi kotoma ocilet. Kanuka ngun, etereikina aiboisio nuipu keda ebulone loepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Ozo okporu o'du agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alia 'diyi fe yi ma omgbo tu yi ara yi ma alia ra. E'yo 'disi, angu karakara eyi e'yo yi tiza ni okporu 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Enjura nyingi etwire neegwa ebiro ebi, ereesire amaizi omu migyera kweyongyera. N'ekyarugiremu,abantu baingi nibatunga okushandara kw'amaizi.

eng_prompt: As climate change continues to alter weather patterns, many regions are experiencing increased humidity and temperature fluctuations. These environmental changes create ideal conditions for disease-carrying mosquitoes to thrive.
lug_prompt: Ng'enkyukakyuka y'obudde yeeyongera okukyusa embeera y'obudde, ebitundu bingi bifuna okweyongera kw'obunyogovu n'enkyukakyuka mu bbugumu. Enkyukakyuka zino mu butonde zitondawo embeera ennungi ensiri ezitambuza endwadde okukulaakulana.
ach_prompt: Kit ma alokaloka me piny tye kamede ki loko kit ma piny tye kwede, but lobo mapol tye ka nongo lyeto ki alokaloka me lyeto. Alokaloka man me kabedo ma orumuwa kelo jami mabeco tutwal pi ober matingo two me dongo.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae, itereikina aiboisio nuipu keda aijulanakineta nuka amwanis keda amwanis. Aijulanakineta nu ejaas akwap einakinitos ejautene loajokan noi kanu isiru lu eyangaununete adekasinei apoloun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile ni ojazu ri ni mu drile angu mile ma wura ojazu, angu karakara eyi e'yo angu driza ni azini angu driza ni 'diyi esu tualu. Ojata angu ama agei ri ma alea 'diyi angu muke 'diyi ede yiyia azo 'dupi 'diyini zozu.
nyn_prompt: Nk'oku empindahinduka y'obwire erikugumizamu neehindura embeera y'obwire, ebicweka bingi nibibonabona okweyongyera kw'obunyogovu hamwe n'empindahinduka y'obwire. Empindahinduka z'obuhangwa nizituma ensiri ezirikutwara endwara zikurira kurungi.

eng_prompt: In the aftermath of the disaster, the community was left in disarray. Many families lost their homes and belongings, leaving them vulnerable and exposed.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'akatyabaga, ekitundu kyalekebwa mu butabanguko. Amaka mangi gaafiirwa amaka gaago n'ebintu byaago, ne galekawo obwetaavu n'obutebenkevu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma peko enoni otimme, kabedo ne odong ma opong ki anywena-nywena. Gangi mapol orwenyo gangi gi ki jami gi, ma oweko gubedo ki peko mapol.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akangas kangin, aponi kojalakinai itunga lu atutubet amumu. Apotu ikalia luipu kotwakiasi ireria kec keda iborokec, apotu kojalakisi kesi ican.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'da ma vutia, ongulumu 'da ku e'yo ewaru ma alea. Familia karakara eyi avi aku eyivile 'diyi tualu afa eyivile 'diyi pie eyini ani aa'zu e'yo kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ebihikiirizi,ekyanga kikasigara omu butabanguko. Amaka maingi gakaferwa amaka gaago hamwe n'ebintu byago, ekyarekire gaine oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent disaster, officials have announced a comprehensive relief plan. This initiative aims to support those impacted by the crisis and ensure their immediate needs are met.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula akatyabaga akaaguddewo gyebuvuddeko, abakungu balangiridde enteekateeka y'obuyambi ey'awamu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu kuyamba abo abakoseddwa ekizibu n'okukakasa nti ebyetaago byabwe eby'amangu bituukirira.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko ma otimme cokcok-ki, lutic guyubu yub me miyo kony. Yub man tye ki miti me konyo jo ma peko eni ogudo komgi ki neno ni jami ma mite pi kwo gi ocobbe.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuapotu kotakanutu, alimosi eswamak aitemonokineta nuka aingarakinio. Alosikinet na erai aigang ngul lu etereikina keda ationis ka aanyun ebe itodolikinitai ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi azi otita azakoma fezu 'diyi ma dria. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu 'ba e'yo ewaru 'di ni bi 'diyi atizu azini nezu ra kini 'ba afa eyini le mbeleru 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebihikiirizi ebyabaireho obwahati, abakuru batumire enteekateeka y'obuhwezi. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okuhwera abo abateganisiibwe oburemeezi n'okureeba ngu ebyetengo byabo by'ahonaaho byahikiirizibwa.

eng_prompt: As the rainy season approached, meteorologists began to monitor the river's water levels closely. Concerns grew among local communities about the potential impact of excessive rainfall on the Nile's banks.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'enkuba bwe kyasembera, abakugu mu mbeera y'obudde baatandika okulondoola amazzi g'omugga. Okweraliikirira kweyongera mu bantu b'omu kitundu ku ngeri enkuba ennyingi gy'eyinza okukosaamu enzizi za Nile.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma kot tye ka cako cwe, ludiro ma kingeyo kit ma piny tye kwede gucako ngiyo kit ma pii tye kwede. Lworo omede ikin lutedero I kom adwoki pa kot ma ocwe matek tutwal I dog nam Nile.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka edou, apotu ipiriotin luka ekuse keda etepe kogeutu aanyanar adoketait na akipi nuka ecilet. Apotu itunga luka atutubet kopolutu aiyalongong kanuikamunitos epone loepedoriata edou aitolitol aiboisio nuka ecilet loka Nile.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ozo vurisi ri ni ecaria, 'ba onita anguni ma dria 'diyi e'do yi ma ongmbo yi ara ma dria ri ma pamvu one. Asi otiza zo ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea e'yo ozo okporu 'diyi ni eco 'ye angu nile ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'enjura ku bwahikire, abakugu omu by'embeera y'obwire bakatandika kureebuuza amaizi g'omugyera. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu bantu b'omubyaro, ahabw'oburemeezi bw'enjura nyingi aha rubaju rw'omugyera Nile.

eng_prompt: Despite warnings from local authorities about rising water levels, many residents remained stubbornly attached to their homes. The community had a long history of living by the river, and the thought of leaving was met with resistance.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde abakulembeze b'ebyalo baalabudde ku bbeeyi y'amazzi okulinnya, abatuuze bangi baasigala mu maka gaabwe. Ekitundu kyali kimaze ebbanga ddene nga kibeera ku lubalama lw'omugga, era ekirowoozo ky'okuvaawo kyaziyizibwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lutela me tedero gu ciko dano i kom pii matye kamede, lutedero mapol pud gumedde ki bedo I gangi gi. Lwak ne gubedo cok ki kulu pi kare malac dok tam me aa ne onongo tek adada.
teo_prompt: Karaida ikwenyaritos apedorosio nuka atutubet nuikamunitos aiyatakin na akipi, apotu itunga luipu kongeroto oreria kec. Ejaasi itunga luka atutubet ngin keda akiro nukolo nuka aiboi osiep keda ecilet, ido abu aomisioit naka anyoun kotereikina keda agogongu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo bile ndu liza engazu drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu e'yo yi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma dria ra ti, 'ba karakara aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi awi aku eyivile 'diyi ma alea. Ongulumu 'da aa'ki ewu ezu eyi ma alea yi rapi rara 'diyi ma tia, dika egata eyini muzu ri fu dri a'di 'diza be.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okurabura kuruga omu b'obushoborozi b'ebyaro, abatuuragye baingi bakaguma omu maka gaabo. Abantu aba bakaba batwire nibatuura aha rubaju rw'omugyera, kandi ekiteekateeko ky'okuruga kikaremwa.

eng_prompt: As the storm intensified, warnings were issued for residents in low-lying areas. Many families began to gather their belongings and prepare for evacuation.
lug_prompt: Embuyaga bwe yeeyongera, okulabula kwaweebwa abatuuze mu bitundu ebiri wansi. Amaka mangi gaatandika okukungaanya ebintu byago ne beetegekera okusengulwa.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma yamo magwar ne omedde, ki ciko lwak me kabedo ma piny piny. Gangi mapol gucako coko jamigi me yube me aa ki I kabedogi.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor ekwam, aponi ikwenyarai itunga luka aiboisio nuejaasi kwap. Apotu ikalia luipu kogeutu atukun iborokec kosodete aitemonokin anyoun.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'da ma okpo ni tuzurisi, 'ba fe bile ndu liza 'ba aa'pi angu ele 'diyi ma alea 'diyini. Familia karakara eyi e'do eyi ma afa eyi tra eyini ani eyi otuzu muzu angu ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omuyaga ku gwagumire nigweyongyera, okurabura kukahebwa abatuuragye abari omu myanya y'ahansi. Amaka maingi gakatandika kurundaana ebintu byago, kugira ngu beeteekateekye okufuruka.

eng_prompt: Due to a significant decrease in funding and rising operational costs, the local government is struggling to meet the needs of its community. As a result, essential programs and services are being compromised.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukendeera kw'ensimbi n'ebbeeyi y'emirimu okulinnya, gavumenti y'ebitundu erwana okutuukiriza ebyetaago by'abantu baayo. N'ekivuddemu, pulogulaamu n'obuweereza ebikulu biri mu kattu.
ach_prompt: Pi nok pa lim ki mede pa wel cente ma mite me tic, gamente me tedero tye ka tute matek me cobo miti pa lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, yub ki kony mapigi tego tye ka poto atura.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aitidisiario na ikapun keda aiyatakin na etiai loka ikapun, etiono apugan naka atutubet aitodolikin ipudesia luka itunga. Kanuka ngun, eutai aibiror ainapeta keda aijanakino.
lgg_prompt: E'yo robia ma omgbo esizuri ma e'yosi tualu aje 'bani azi ngazu 'diyi ma ongmbo tuzu risi, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi dri ci e'yo 'ba eyini le 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo 'disi, otita azini azakoma orodriru 'diyi e'yo ewaru ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyendeera kw'esente n'okweyongyera kw'ebishare by'okukoresa, gavumenti z'ebyaro niziteganisibwa okuhikiiriza ebyetengo by'abantu baayo. N'ekyarugiremu, puroguraamu n'obuheereza ebikuru biriyo nibiteganisibwa.

eng_prompt: After years of neglect and increasing complaints from residents, the condition of the roads has deteriorated significantly. To ensure safety and improve accessibility, the district needs to carry out road reconstruction.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulagajjalirwa okumala emyaka n'okwemulugunya okuva mu batuuze, embeera y'enguudo eyonoonese nnyo. Okukakasa obukuumi n'okutumbula entambula, disitulikiti yeetaaga okuddamu okuzimba enguudo.
ach_prompt: Ingee cayo gudu pi mwaki mapol ki koko mapol ma aa ki bot lwak, rwom me gudu ne odoko rac tutwal. Me gwoko ber bedo ki wot maber, district omyero oyub gudi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka apalunit ka angurian kanejaas itunga, adisiar ejautene loka irotin noi. Kanu awanyun ayuara ka aitojokar epatana alosit, ekot edisitrikt aitemokin irotin.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani nzila 'da eyi adizu risi azini onuza engazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu ri ma vutia, e'yo nzila 'da eyini aa'zu ri eza i saaru. Le distrikiti ma si nzila eyi kililiru azini e'yo acizu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okunagaijura n'okwetomboitwa kw'abatuuragye, embeera y'enguuto esiisire munonga. Okureeba ngu hariho oburinzi n'okutunguura entambura, disiturikiti eshemereire kwombeka enguuto.

eng_prompt: In recent meetings, community members expressed their frustrations regarding the current state of public transportation. As a result, the district leaders are looking out for solutions to improve the transport network.
lug_prompt: Mu nkiiko ezaakaggwa, abantu b'omu kitundu baalaga obwennyamivu bwabwe olw'embeera y'entambula ey'olukale eriwo. N'ekyavaamu, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti banoonya engeri y'okutumbula entambula.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma okato cokcok-ki, lwak gunyutu cwer cwiny gi i kom kit ma wot pa lwak tye kwede kombedi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me district tye ka yenyo yoo me yubu yub me wot.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamununeta pac, apotu itunga luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu ejautene loka elose loka itunga. Kanuka ngun, eutasi engarenok luka edisitrikt aimo iwaitin lu itojokaret elose.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi o'diru 'diyi ma alea, 'ba ongulumu eyi ma alea 'diyi ece e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi e'yo acipa o'bi eyini 'diyi ni aa'zu sa'wa 'disi ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi geri nda e'yo acipa ni 'diyi otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nkiiko ezihweireho, abantu b'omukyanga bakooreka oburemeezi bwabo ahabw'entambura y'abantu boona eriho hati. N'ekyarugiremu, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti bariyo nibaronda oburyo bw'okutunguura eby'engyenda.

eng_prompt: The government has invested significantly in infrastructure development over the past few years. As a result, the Uganda National Roads Authority has made substantial progress in enhancing the country's road network.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti etaddemu ssente nnyingi mu kutumbula ebintu mu myaka egiyise. N'ekivuddemu, Uganda National Roads Authority ekoze enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu kutumbula enguudo z'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Gamente oketo lim madit tutwal I yub me dongo lobo I mwaki ma okato ni. Macalo adwogi ne, dul me Uganda National Roads Authority otimo dongo lobo madit tutwal I ilo malo rwom me gudu I lobo man.
teo_prompt: Ebwaiki apugan ikapun luipu noi kotoma aitopol iboro luingarakinete itunga kotoma okaru lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, eswama Erionget Loka Irotin apol noi kotoma aitojokar irotin luka akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Gamete 'ba robia angiri afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ezota ma alia eli agapi were 'diyi ma alia. E'yo 'disi, amuti nzila eyi ma drilea omvele Uganda National Roads Authority ri isu zota okporu e'yo nzila eyi ma wura kari 'di ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti eteire esente nyingi omu kutunguura ebyombeko omu myaka mikye ehwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, ekitongore ky'enguuto ekya Uganda kitungire entunguuka omu kutunguura enguuto z'eihanga.

eng_prompt: As our population continues to grow and urban areas expand, the demand for better infrastructure becomes increasingly urgent. Investing in road construction is essential for improving transportation efficiency and ensuring public safety.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abantu bwe gweyongera okukula n'ebibuga bwe byeyongera okugaziwa, obwetaavu bw'ebizimbe ebirungi bweyongera okuba obw'amangu. Okusiga ensimbi mu kuzimba enguudo kya nkizo mu kutumbula entambula n'okukuuma abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano tye ka medde ki dongo ki kabedo me boma mapat-pat bene tye ka nyaa, miti me nongo jami me tic maber tye kamede ki dongo oyot-oyot tutwal. Keto lim I tic me yubu gudi pire tek tutwal pi ilo malo rwom me wot ki gwoko ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga keda aiboisio nuka itaunin, epol noi eipuda loka adumun iboro luingarakinete itunga. Aipikakin ikapun toma aiduk irotin ejok kanu aitojokar elose ka awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe amavileri ni mu drile tuzu azini angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni tuzu, e'yo afa ayuzaru muke 'diyi ma dria ri eca curu'do okporu. Robia 'bazu nzila sizu ri eri orodriru geri 'bani acizu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini o'bi eyini aa'zu ageitema be.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu omuhendo gw'abantu nigugumizamu nigweyongyera kandi n'emyanya y'endembo neyeyongyera, ekyetengo ky'ebyombeko birungi nikyeyongyera. Okutamu sente omu kukora enguuto n'eky'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'engyenda n'okurinda abantu.

eng_prompt: Due to a series of unexpected budget cuts and rising costs, the local government is struggling to maintain essential services. As a result, the district lacks finances to carry out road reparation.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukendeera kw'embalirira n'okulinnya kw'ebbeeyi, gavumenti z'ebitundu zirwana okukuuma obuweereza obwetaagisa. N'ekivuddemu, disitulikiti terina ssente za kuddaabiriza nguudo.
ach_prompt: Pi ngolo byek me lim mapol ma pe byek tye I komgi ki mede pa wel lim, gamente me tedero tye ka tute matek me gwoko kony ma mite pi kwo pa lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, district peke ki cente me yubu gudi.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aitub ebajet keda aiyatakin etiai loka ikapun, eutasi apuganisinei nuka atutubena ainingosit aidar ejanakine loejok. Kanuka ngun, emamiatatar edisitrikt keda ikapun lu itemonokinere irotin.
lgg_prompt: Otita ajeni 'bani ega kokoru azini aje tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri ci azi orodriru 'diyi ma tambazu. E'yo 'disi, distrikiti vu robia nzila eyi edezu yo.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okukyendeeza embaririra hamwe n'emihendo erikweyongyera, gavumenti z'ebyaro nizirwana kurinda obuheereza bw'omugasho. Ekirugiremu, disiturikiti teine sente z'okugarura busya enguuto.

eng_prompt: Local communities are facing significant challenges in infrastructure and public services. To address these issues effectively, it is essential to provide more financial support to local governments.
lug_prompt: Abantu b'omu byalo basanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu by'obutonde n'obuweereza bw'olukale. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga zino obulungi, kyetaagisa okuwa gavumenti z'ebitundu obuyambi bw'ensimbi obusingawo.
ach_prompt: Lwak tye ka nongo peko madit tutwal I tenge me gedo ki miyo kony bot lwak. Me tyeko lok magi maber, pire tek tutwal me medo kony me lim bot gamente me tedero.
teo_prompt: Etereikina itunga luka atutubet keda atiokisio nuepolok noi kotoma aitwasam iboro ka aijanakin itunga. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu ejok, ibusakinit aijaikin agangat na ikapun mama ejaasi apuganisinei nu okwap.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma alea tualu azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi pie. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, eri orodriru atita robia niri fezu gavumete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyini drile.
nyn_prompt: Abantu b'omubyaro, nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu by'okwombeka hamwe n'obuheereza. Okukora aha nshonga ezi kurungi, nikikuru okuheereza gavumenti z'ebyaro obuhwezi bw'esente.

eng_prompt: Due to recent budget cuts and declining revenue, the local government is facing significant financial challenges. As a result, essential services are being impacted across various departments.
lug_prompt: Olw'okusala ku mbalirira gye buvuddeko n'okukendeera kw'omusolo, gavumenti z'ebitundu zisanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi mu by'ensimbi. N'ekivuddemu, obuweereza obwetaagisa bukosebwa mu bitongole eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Pi ngolo byek me lim ma okato cokcok-ki ki wel lim matye kadok piny, gamente me tedero tye ka nongo peko me lim mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, yub me miyo kony mapigi tego tye kadeno can I tenge mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aitub ebajet keda aitidisiar ikapun, etereikina apugan na okwap keda atiokisio nuipu noi nuka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, eutai aitolitol aijanakino naka itunga kotoma oriongeta luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Otita aje robia niri ma omgbo esizu azini robia esuza ma omgbo esizu ri ma e'yosi, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, azi ngaza orodriru 'diyi e'bi ovu ewaru enyati ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okushara embaririra y'eihanga n'okukyendeera kw'esente, gavumenti y'ebyaro eriyo neetunga oburemeezi bw'amaani omu by'empiiha. N'ekyarugiremu, obuheereza obw'omugasho buriyo nibuteganisibwa omu bitongore bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges faced by commuters and businesses due to inadequate infrastructure, district leaders sought collaborative solutions. They initiated discussions with various stakeholders to enhance the efficiency of local transportation systems.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukimanya nti abasabaze n'abasuubuzi basanga okusoomoozebwa olw'ebizimbe ebitali bimala, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti baanoonya engeri y'okukikolamu nga bakolagana. Baatandika okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'abakwatibwako ab'enjawulo okutumbula enkola y'ebyentambula mu ggwanga.
ach_prompt: Lutela me district gunongo yoo me cobo peko ma luwot ki lutim biacara tye ka kato ki iye. Gu cako nywako lok ki dano ma padi padi pi ilo malo rwom me tic pa yub me wot.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuetereikina keda alotok keda agwelanarak kanuka amamus na iboro lu itwasamao, apotu engarenok luka edisitrikt kongicata iwaitin lu itemokinet ngun. Apotu kesi kogeutu aineranara keda itunga luegelegela kanu aitojokar elose lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi esu e'yo ewaru 'ba aci'ba azini tujari 'ye'ba 'diyini esu e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ongmbo ni cazu ku risi. Eyi e'do e'yo nze 'ba ambo ndundu eyi pie geri acizu kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi obu abarikugyenda n'obushubuzi barikutunga ahabw'ebyombeko ebitarikumara, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti, bakakoragana kuronda oburyo. Bakatandika okuhanuura n'abaine akakwate omu by'engyenda, kugira ngu eby'engyenda byongyere kukora kurungi.
