eng_prompt: In a small town plagued by unrest, the presence of military personnel was meant to restore order. However, the situation took a dark turn when a trusted army officer betrayed his duty in the most horrific way.
lug_prompt: Mu kabuga akatono akaabaddemu obutabanguko, okubeerawo kw'abajaasi kwali kwa kuzzaawo butebenkevu. Naye embeera yakyuka omukungu w'amagye gwe baali bataddemu obwesige bwe yalyamu olukwe omulimu gwe mu ngeri ey'entiisa.
ach_prompt: I taun matidi ma obedo ki kuku-kuku, bedo tye pa lumony obedo me kelo ber bedo. Kadi bed kumeno, jami olokke marac tutwal I kare ma lamony ma gene odoto ticce I yoo marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ko otaun lodidi loejaasi keda amumu, ajaut naka ajore arai kanu ainyakakin ainapakina. Konye, abu ejautene kijulakin naronon noi najaar eswaman lo emunoi kotoma ajore amengerikin aswamuke koipone kaloerono noi.
lgg_prompt: Tawuni werea e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi pie, asikari eyi ma aa'ta ri ndra e'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea ri 'bazu kililiru. Kani si, e'yo 'da oja i onzi azi asikari eyini asi'baza be ni azi erini nga ri ma o'dizu geri onzi ndeni ri si.
nyn_prompt: Omu tawuni nkye eyabaire erimu akaimukiriro, abaserukare bakaba baine ekigyendererwa ky'okureetaho obutebekana. Kwonka, embeera ekahinduka kubi, ofiisa w'amahe owabaire aine obwesigye kuyaraganiise omurimo gwe omu muringo mubi munonga.

eng_prompt: After months of deployment, the soldier returned home, eager to reconnect with his childhood sweetheart. Their reunion was filled with passion and nostalgia, leading to an unexpected turn of events.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi mingi ng'ali mu magye, omusirikale yakomawo eka ng'ayagala nnyo okuddamu okusisinkana omwagalwa we ow'omu buto. Okukwatagana kwabwe kwali kujjudde obwagazi n'okwegomba, ekyaviirako ebintu okukyuka mu ngeri etasuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe ma obedo I tic, lamony ne odok gang, ki miti matek me rwatte ki lareme me kare ma en pud tidi. Rwatte meggi obedo ki miti madit tutwal, ma okelo alokaloka ma pe byek tye I kom jami ma otimme.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aijukario, abu epolisit kobongok ore, ekapakina aimorikikin keda aminake naka idwe. Apotu kesi kiriamunos keda eipuda loepol noi, ido abu koyangau aijulakineta numam aomitai.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani eri ma ti pezu 'bori ma vutia, asikari 'da ego akua ava be e'yo nzezu i ma 'ba erini lele mva werea ri be. E'yo yini 'yezu tualuri ga ava be tualu asi otiza be, e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma ojata ovuni egarisi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'okuheebwa omu mahe, omuserukare akagaruka omuka, aine ekihika ky'okugaruka kugarukana n'omukundwa we w'omu buto. Okugarukana kwabo kukaba kuijwire ekiniga n'okwetenga, ekyarugiremu empindahinduka etarikuteekateekwaho.

eng_prompt: After receiving multiple reports of suspicious activity in the area, local authorities decided to take action. They gathered evidence and began to piece together the events leading up to the incident.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna alipoota eziwera ez'ebikolwa ebiteeberezebwa mu kitundu, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo. Baakung'aanyizza obujulizi era ne batandika okukwataganya ebintu ebyaliwo ebyali bivuddeko akabenje.
ach_prompt: Ingee nongo adwogi tic mapol ma byek tye I komgi I kabedo eni, lutela me tedero gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Gu jogo caden ka gucako yubu jami ma okelo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun iripootan luipu luka aswamisio nu eomitai ebe ejai aiboisit, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet koseutu aswam. Apotu kesi otukutu ajenanut kosodete ageun aimorikikin akiro nuapotu koyangautu akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Erini o'duko karakara eyi esuzu e'yo 'yeta 'bani ega eyi ma dria ku 'diyi ma dria angu 'da ma alea 'bori ma vutia, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'yezu. Eyi tra afa ecetaru azini eyi e'do e'yo eyi 'ye tualu e'yo 'da ma dri cepi 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okutunga ripoota nyingi z'emirimo etarikwetegyerezibwa omu kyanga, ab'obushoborozi omu byaro bakacwamu kukora. Bakarundaana obujurizi batandika kukwatanisa ebyabaireho.

eng_prompt: After the tragic incident that took their daughter's life, the community has rallied together in support of the grieving family. They believe that accountability is essential for healing and closure.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'ekikangabwa ekyatta muwala waabwe, abantu bakungaanidde wamu okuwagira ab'omu maka ago abakungubaga. Balowooza nti embalirira ya mugaso mu kudda engulu n'okuggalawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee peko ma otimme ma okwanyo kwo pa nyargi, lwak guribbe kacel me miyo kony bot lugang matye ka kumo. Gitye ki niyee ni tic ki kor tic obedo gin ma pire tek pi cango ki juku tic.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akangas nabu koyangau aijar naka akookec, apotu itunga lu atutubet imorikikinos kanu aigang ekale. Iyuunitos kesi ebe ejokuna aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun kanu angaleun ka agolokinio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzi eyi 'yepi eyi ma zi ni idri 'duzu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu eyi tra eyi tualu atita fezu familia candiru 'da ni. Eyi ai ra kini e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma dria ri eri orodriru atita esuzu azini e'yo eyi ma ti opizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'akabi akabeireho akaretsireho okufa kw'omuhara waabo, abantu b'omukyanga bakwatanisa kushagika eka y'omugyenzi. Nibateekateeka ngu embaririra n'ey'omugasho omukukira n'okukingaho.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have surfaced detailing the officer's controversial actions and statements. Many within the military community are concerned about the implications of his behavior on public perception.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumye gyebuvuddeko ziwa kalonda yenna akwata ku bikolwa n'ebigambo by'omuserikale ono ebirimu enkaayana. Bangi mu bantu b'amagye beeraliikirivu ku ngeri enneeyisa ye gy'eyinza okukosaamu endowooza y'abantu.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma okato cokcok-ki onyuto jami mapol ma abili ne otimo ki lok ma okelo apoka-poka. Dano mapol I kin lumony gitye ki lworo I kom adwoki pa tim mege I kom tam pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Aponi kitolomunai iripotan luitetiak lu itodunitos akiro keda aswamisio nuka epolisit kangol. Ipu itunga luka ajore lu epodokitos nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata iponesioke aitolitol aomisio nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi efu e'yo 'yeta azini e'yo nzeza azi'ba 'da ni 'diyi ma dria. Ba karakara ongulumu asikari eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo erini 'ye 'diyi ma dria o'bi eyi ma egata ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kurugaho, nizitwariramu ebikorwa n'ebigambo by'omuserukare. Abaserukare baingi niberarikirira oku ebikorwa bye birikubaasa kukwata aha miteekateekyere y'abantu.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation into the incident, the military authorities have decided to take action. As a result, the soldier will be charged in the court-martial.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo ku byaliwo, ab'obuyinza mu magye basazeewo okubaako kye bakolawo. N'ekyavaamu, omujaasi ajja kuvunaanibwa mu kkooti y'amagye.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut I kom ngo ma otimme, lutela me mony gumoko tamgi me timo gin mo. Macalo adwogi ne, bimoro adot i kom lamony ne I kot pa mony.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic akiro ngun ejok, aseutu apedorosio nuka ajore aswam nu ebeit. Kanuka ngun, eponio aitepesen esirikalet okooti loka isirikaalei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza e'yo 'da ma dria ri ma vutia, drice'ba marani ni 'diyi asi e'yo 'du e'yo 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga asikari 'da ombe dwani asikari eyini ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okucondooza kurungi ebyabaireho, ab'amahe bashaziremu kukora. N'ekyarugiremu, omuserukare naija kujunaanwa omu kooti y'amahe.

eng_prompt: Recent reports have highlighted a troubling trend in local crime statistics. Community leaders are increasingly concerned about the rising incidents of sexual violence.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga enkola etaataaganya mu bibalo by'obuzzi bw'emisango mu kitundu. Abakulembeze b'ekitundu beeyongedde okweraliikirira olw'obutabanguko mu by'okwegatta obweyongera.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto kit ma tim bal tye ka time kwede i kabedo mapatpat. Lutela me kabedo gi tye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom tim me tim gero me butu imit matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Apotu iripotan lu atuboros itodutu iponesio luajokak noi luka abilibilio naka ikisila kotoma akwapuwok. Iyalongongosi engarenok lu atutubet kanu aiyatakin naka amumu na aelo.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo asi otiza fepi kalafe e'yo onzi 'yepi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria ra. Drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi curu'do asi otiza be e'yo ngiringiri ali o'bazaniri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka enkora y'obukozi bw'ebibi omu byaro. Abeebembezi b'ebyanga beeyongyeire kwerarikirira ahabw'obutabanguko omu by'okuteerana obweyongyeire.

eng_prompt: Amid growing tensions within the military, allegations began to surface regarding the conduct of a high-ranking army officer. As the investigation unfolded, it became clear that security officials were exerting influence over the proceedings.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu bunkenke obweyongera mu magye, ebigambibwa byatandika okuvaayo ku nneeyisa y'omuserikale w'amagye ow'eddaala erya waggulu. Okunoonyereza bwe kwagenda mu maaso, kyalabika bulungi nti ab'eby'okwerinda baalina obuyinza ku misango.
ach_prompt: Ikare me telle matye kamede I kin mony, adot ocako katti I kom tim pa ladit mony madit. Ikare ma kwed tye kawot anyim, onen atyer kamaleng ni lugwok kuc gubedo ki twero i kom lok ne.
teo_prompt: Keda aiyalongongo naepol noi kotoma ajore, apotu aitoroneta kogeutu alomun kanu iponesio luka eswaman loapolon. Neautar aingic alosit, apotu kojenutu ebe ejaasi itunga luka ayuwara keda apedor toma akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi omiza ni tupi asikaria 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo 'bani 'yo 'diyi e'do efu e'yo azi'ba asikari ni okporu ni ma adriza ma dria. E'yo eti ondaza ni muzu drile, eca e'da kililiru kini azi'ba ageyitema ni 'diyi e'yo nde ma dria okpo 'ba.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'obunkenke obweyongyeire omu mahe, ebikwatiraine n'emitwarize y'omwebembezi w'amahe ow'amaani bikatandika kubaho. Obu okucondooza kwagyenda nikugyenda omu maisho, kikarebeka butunu ngu ab'eby'okwerinda nibo baabaire nibagyenda omu maisho omumishango egyo.

eng_prompt: After months of training and preparation, the soldier received orders for a new assignment. He packed his gear, ready to face the challenges that lay ahead.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okutendekebwa n'okwetegekera, omujaasi yafuna ebiragiro ku mulimu omupya. Yapakira ebintu bye, nga mwetegefu okwanganga okusoomoozebwa okwali mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me pwonye ki yubbe, lamony ne onongo cik me timo tic manyen. En oyubbe me lweny i kom peko matye anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aitutuonoro ka aitemonokin, abu epolisit kodum aicoreta nuka aswam naitetet. Abu ngesi ipikak iboro ke, ekapakina aitepeg atiokisio nuejaas ngaren.
lgg_prompt: Mba embata azini otuta ma vutia, asikari 'da esu azita azi o'diru ni. Eri tra i vile afa ayuzaru 'diyi, ngonde e'yo ewaru drilia 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okutendekwa n'okweteekateekyera, omuserukare akatunga ebiragiro by'okutunga omurimo musya. Akapakira ebintu bye, ayeteekateekire okurwanisa oburemeezi obwabaire buri omumaisho.

eng_prompt: After conducting a thorough investigation into the recent incidents, the detectives compiled their findings. Once finalized, the police submitted the report to the inspector general of police.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza ennyo ku bibaddewo gye buvuddeko, bambega baakuŋŋaanyizza bye bazudde. Oluvannyuma lw'okumaliriza, poliisi yawaayo alipoota eri ssaabaduumizi wa poliisi.
ach_prompt: I nge timo kwed matut I kom jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, lutim kwed gucoyo ngo ma gunongo. Ingee tyeko tic, abili gumiyo adwogi ticgi bot lador dul pa abili.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic akiro nuiswamasi pac, apotu ipolisin kitukokinos akiro kec. Akaulo naka angetakin, apotu ipolisin ijaikisi eripota mama ejai engarenon lokapolon loka ipolisin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza kililiru 'yezu e'yo yi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo eti ondapi 'diyi tra e'yo yini isu 'diyi. E'yo 'da dezu 'bori ma vutia, polisi eyi fe o'duko siza 'da inspector general of police dri.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza munonga ebyabaireho obwahati, bambega bakatebeekanisa ebyarugire omu kucondooza kwabo. Bwanyima y'okuhendera, poriisi ekaheereza ripoota owa mukuru wa poriisi.

eng_prompt: After gathering enough evidence from the crime scene, the detectives concluded that the suspect was responsible for the recent string of burglaries. It was clear that the criminal should be arrested.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okukung'aanya obujulizi obumala okuva mu bifo awakolebwa obuzzi bw'emisango, bambega baamaliriza nti ateeberezebwa y'avunaanyizibwa ku bubbi obw'omuddiring'anwa obwaliwo gye buvuddeko. Kyali kyeyoleka bulungi nti omuzzi w'emisango alina okukwatibwa.
ach_prompt: Inge coko caden ma oromo ki I kabedo ma bal otime iye, lutim kwed gumoko ni ngat ma byek me bal tye I kome en aye okelo bal me turu ot ma otime cokcok-ki. Onen atyer kamaleng ni omyero kimak latim bal ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka atukun aitogogongoret naedolit kotoma aiboisit naebilibilete ikisila, apotu ipolisin kongicata ebe loetepesenitai ngesi eyaunit akoko naka itogoi. Acai cut ebe ibusakinit arocun abilak ikisila.
lgg_prompt: E'yo afa ecetaru 'diyi trazu pari e'yo onzi 'yezuri ma alia 'bori ma vutia, 'ba eti ondapi 'diyi 'yo kini 'ba 'bani ega eza e'yo ra ada 'da ni e'yo ogu ni 'diyi ma dria. Eri ndra e'da kililiru kini le 'ba ma obi 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'da ci.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okurundaana obujurizi burikumara kuruga omu myanya y'ebihagaro, bambega bakahendera ngu orikuteekateekwaho kukora ebihagaro niwe yaakozire ebihagaro ebyabaireho. Kikarebeka butunu ngu omukozi w'ebibi ashemereire kukwatwa.

eng_prompt: After noticing their child's sudden disappearance, the worried parents searched the neighborhood for any clues. Frustrated by the lack of information, they decided to escalate the matter to the authorities.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulaba omwana waabwe ng'abuze mu bwangu, abazadde abaali beeraliikirivu baanoonya mu kitundu kyonna. Olw'obutaba na mawulire, baasalawo ensonga bagitwale mu b'obuyinza.
ach_prompt: Inge neno ni latingi orweny atura, lunyodo ma gubedo ki lworo guyenyo ngec mo keken I kabedo gi. Pi peko me bedo peke pa ngec, gumoko tamgi me cwalo lok eni bot lutela.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na awanyun ebe abu ikekoku kowolio katipet, apotu auriak lu ekuriaka ongicata aiboisio kere kanu aingic adiokirot. Apotu kesi itakadikisi naarai amamete kesi akiro, apotu kesi oyangasi akirot ngin mama ejaasi apedorosio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yini ndrezu yi ma mva ni avizu mbeleru 'bori ma vutia, tipika asi otiza be 'diyi onda angu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alia e'yo azi ecopi e'dapi ra 'diyi ndazu. E'yo eyi ma dria e'yo eyi ma dria yo risi, eyi ai e'yo 'da 'ba okpo e'iru 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okureeba okubura kw'omwana waabo ahonaaho, abazaire abaabaire beerarikirire bakataayaayira ebyaro okuronda obumanyiso. Ahabw'okugwera orubanja ahabw'eibura ry'amakuru, bakasharamu kutwara enshonga omu b'obushoborozi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent events, the military leadership has decided to take a closer look at the circumstances surrounding the incident. As part of this process, the army will carry out investigations to complete the file.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku ebyo ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko awo, abakulembeze b'amagye basazeewo okwekenneenya embeera eyaliwo. Ng'ekitundu ku nkola eno, amagye gajja kukola okunoonyereza okumaliriza fayiro.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, lutela me mony gumoko tamgi me ngiyo maber ngo ma otimme. Macalo but yub man, mony bitimo kwed me tyeko tic ne.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuapotu kotakanutu pac, acamutu engarenok luka ajore airereor akiro nuapotu kotakanutu. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, epote ajore aingic kanu angetakin akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, driceza asikari eyini ri 'du e'yo 'da ma ale andrizu kililiru. Otita 'di ma azi ru, asikari eyi nga e'yo eti onda kokobi 'da dezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyabaireho obwahati, abebembezi b'amahe bashaziremu kushwijuma enshonga ezabaireho. Nk'emwe aha nkora egi,amahe nigeija kukora okucondooza kumaririza fayiro.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation into the incident, the commanding officer decided that further action was necessary. As a result, the soldier will be brought before the unit disciplinary committee.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu ku byaliwo, omuduumizi yasalawo nti kyetaagisa okukola ekisingawo. N'ekinaavaamu, omujaasi ajja kuleetebwa mu maaso g'akakiiko akakwasisa empisa.
ach_prompt: Ingee timo kwed matut I kom ngo ma otimme, lador dul enoni omoko tamme ni omyero kimed timo gin mo. Macalo adwogi ne, kibikelo lamony ne inyim dul ma neno lok me woro cik.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic akiro ngun ejok, abu loapolon isirikaalei kotema ebe ibusakinit aswam nuipu. Kanuka ngun, eponio ayangaun ekiarit ngol oicolong loka ekomiti loka alecorio.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza e'yo 'da ma dria ri ma vutia, azi'ba drileru ri 'du egata kini le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo azi drile. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga asikari 'da eji komiti e'yo adriza onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma drilea.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okucondooza kurungi ebyabaireho,omuduumizi akasharamu ngu hakakorwa ekindi. Ekyarugiremu,omuserukare naija kutwarwa omu kakiiko akarikukwatisa emicwe.

eng_prompt: It is essential to invest in the education and development of young people today. By nurturing their potential, we can empower them to shape a better future for all.
lug_prompt: Kikulu nnyo okusiga ensimbi mu by'enjigiriza n'enkulaakulana y'abavubuka leero. Bwe tukuza obusobozi bwabwe, tusobola okubawa amaanyi okutondawo ebiseera eby'omumaaso ebirungi eri ffenna.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal me keto lim I kwan ki dongo pa bulu. Ka wadongo kero gi, watwero minigi kero me yubu anyim maber pi wan weng.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenepol noi aipikakin ikapun toma asioman keda apol naka atumunak ilolo. Kowai lo aitopolorite apedorosio kec, ipedori oni aitogogong kes aitolomun ingaren lu ejokuka kanuka oni kere.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru tujari 'yezu onita azini zota 'ba oderu 'diyiniri ma alia andru. E'yo eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma ezoza si, ama eco eyi ma okpo fe ewu drialeri 'ba dria eyini aa'zu muke ndeni ri sizu ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho munonga okuta esente omu kwegyesa n'okutunguura eminyeeto obwahati. Twabongyera amaani gaabo, nitubaasa kubahwera kugira ebiro birungi by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: Frustration had been building among the residents for months as they navigated the increasingly deteriorating streets. Finally, they decided it was time to make their voices heard and demand change.
lug_prompt: Okumala emyezi mingi abatuuze baabadde batabuse nga bwe batambulira ku nguudo ezigenda zeeyongera okwonooneka. Mu nkomerero, baasalawo nti kye kiseera okuleka amaloboozi gaabwe okuwulirwa n'okusaba enkyukakyuka.
ach_prompt: Cwer cwiny obedo ka dongo ikin lutedero pi dwe mapol I kare ma gubedo ka wot I gudu ma oballe tutwal. I agiki ne, gumoko ni kare dong oromo me winyo dwon gi ki mito aloka loka.
teo_prompt: Ajaasi itunga luka atutubet keda aiyalongong kanu ilapio luipu nautar kesi alosit korotin luerono noi. Kawasia, apotu kesi koseutu ebe erai kwana apak naka aiwe iporotoikec kosodete ailip aijulakin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini aa'zu candi si ri e'bi tu imba eyi ma eselea eyini aciria nzila eyini aa'zu muke ku 'diyi ma alea risi. Asizu, eyi 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bo 'bani eyi ma o'duko erizu dika eyi ai ojata.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye babaire batwire nibahurira kubi kumara ameezi, barikutamburira omu nguuto ezabaire zigumire nizikora kubi munonga. Ekyarugiremu, bakasharamu ngu hati n'obwire bw'okworeka eiraka ryabo kandi bashaba empinduka.

eng_prompt: Residents have expressed their concerns about the deteriorating infrastructure for years. Despite numerous promises from local officials, little progress has been made to address the issue.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze balaze obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku bintu ebigasiza awamu abantu ebyonoonese okumala emyaka. Newankubadde abakungu b'ebyalo baasuubiza nnyo, entambula ntono ekoleddwa okugonjoola ensonga.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gunyutu lworo gi pi jami ma tye ka bale pi mwaki mapol. Kadi bed ni lutic me tedero gucikke me timo jami mapol, ento pe kitimo jami mapol me tyeko peko eni.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuka adeka naka aiboisio kanu ikar luipu. Karaida isumunit eswamak luka atutubet aisumuneta nuipu, ikidioko nu iswamao kanu aitemokin ationis ngin.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'da asi otiza eyini e'yo afa ayuzaru aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini ecazu muke ku ri ma dria eli karakara 'bo. Azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma e'yo owizu karakara 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba e'bi e'yo nde ma aza ko were.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'ebyombeko ebibiire nibisisikara kumara emyaka mingi. Oihireho ebiraganiso bingi kuruga omu bakuru b'ebyaro, habaho entunguuka nkye omu kukora aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about accessibility and transportation in the area, local officials held a meeting to discuss infrastructure improvements. After careful consideration, the district decided to prioritize road development to enhance connectivity for residents.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku kutuuka n'entambula mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyalo baatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kulongoosa ebizimbe. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ennyo, disitulikiti yasalawo okukulembeza enkulaakulana y'enguudo okutumbula entambula y'abatuuze.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamede I kom yoo me wot I kabedo eni, lutic me tedero gubedo ki kacoke me nywako lok I kom yub me tic mapat-pat. Ingee tam matut, district omoko tamgi me keto yub me yubu gudi obed gin ma pire tek pi kelo kube maber ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naepol noi naikamunit aitodolikin keda elose kaiboisit, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kiswamata airiamun kanu aitemitem aitojokar aiboisio. Akaulo naka aomoom ejok, abu edisitrikt koseu aisingarenit aitolomun irotin kanu aitojokar arucokina naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni tupi angu 'da ma alea ri ma dria, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria. E'yo egazu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, distrikiti asi e'yo 'du e'yo nzila eyi ma ezota 'bazu okporu e'yo eyi ecizu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira ahaby'engyenda omu kyanga, abakuru omu byaro bakakora orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha by'entunguuka. Ahanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza, disiturikiti ekasharamu kwebembeza okukora enguuto, kugira ngu abatuura gye babaase kwegaita.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for improved infrastructure, local officials presented a comprehensive plan to enhance transportation in the region. After extensive discussions, the government approved significant funding to support these vital projects.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okutereeza ebizimbe, abakungu b'ebyalo baayanjudde enteekateeka ennambulukufu okutumbula entambula mu kitundu. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, gavumenti yakkiriza ensimbi nnyingi okuwagira pulojekiti zino enkulu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me yubu jami ma mite pi lwak, lutic me tedero gumiyo yub maber me ilo malo rwom me wot I twok piny eni. Ingee nywako lok mapol, gamente omoko cente madit tutwal me konyo yub magi mapigi tego.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loepol noi loka aiboisio nuejokuka, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kitodiasi ainapeta nuepedorete aitojokar elose kaiboisit. Akaulo naka ipegeta luipu, abu apugan kocam ikapun luipu kanu aigang ipurojektin lu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma wura otuzu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'da otita azi dria eyini ani ecozu e'yo acizu angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo onzeza angiri ma vutia, gamete ai robia angiri otita orodriru 'diyi atizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'okutunguura ebyombeko, abakuru b'ebyaro bakareeta enteekateeka y'okutunguura eby'engyenda omu kyanga. Bwanyima y'okuhanuura munonga, gavumenti ekaikiriza esente nyingi z'okushashurira za purogyekiti ezi.

eng_prompt: In many rural areas, infrastructure development has been severely neglected. As a result, essential services like healthcare and education remain out of reach for the local population.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu by'ebyalo bingi, enkulaakulana y'ebizimbe ebikozesebwa ebadde eragajjaliddwa nnyo. N'ekivuddemu, obuweereza obwetaagisa ng'ebyobulamu n'ebyenjigiriza busigala nga tebutuukirirwa bantu ba bulijjo.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol me caro, yub me dongo lobo dong kicayo ne tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, kony ma pigi tego calo yot kom ki kwan pud pe oo bot lutedero.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi luipu, epalunitai apol naka aiboisio. Kanuka ngun, mam itunga luka atutubet edumunenete aijanakino kwape nat amukian keda asioman.
lgg_prompt: Angu calua karakara 'diyi ma alia, 'ba adi e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma ezota ma dria ku. E'yo 'disi, azi orodriru ekile alata azini onita le 'diyi awi 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi dri ca ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya mingi y'ebyaro, entunguuka y'ebyombeko erekirweho munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu b'omubyaro tibarikubaasa kuhikwaho obuheereza nk'eby'amagara n'eby'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: Effective leadership is built on trust and accountability. To foster a positive organizational culture, leaders must prioritize open communication regarding resource allocation.
lug_prompt: Obukulembeze obulungi buzimbibwa ku bwesige n'embalirira. Okutumbula obuwangwa obulungi mu kitongole, abakulembeze balina okukulembeza empuliziganya ey'olwatu ku kugaba eby'obugagga.
ach_prompt: Tela maber ki yubu I kom gen ki tic ki kor tic. Me dongo tekwaro maber I dul mapat-pat, lutela omyero gubed ki lok I kom kit me poko jami.
teo_prompt: Engarenone loajokan edukio kotupitete amuno keda aitodunit eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun. Kanu aitopolor iponesio luajokak luka atukot, ekot engarenok aisingarenit einer nuikamunitos aikor iboro.
lgg_prompt: Driceza kililiru ri si asi'baza ma dria azini geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo otuta muke ni otuzu, le drice'ba eyi ma 'ba e'yo nzeza e'yo 'ba eyini 'diyi ma dria ri okporu.
nyn_prompt: Obwebembezi burungi, nibombekwa aha bwesigye n'embaririra. Okureetaho entwaza nungi omu bitongore, abebembezi bashemereire kwebembeza empurizagana ey'amazima aha bikwatiraine n'okugaba ebintu.

eng_prompt: The local government has announced plans to invest in new businesses and infrastructure. As a result, the community is expected to see significant economic growth.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebitundu erangiridde enteekateeka z'okusiga ensimbi mu bizinensi empya n'ebizimbe. N'ekinaavaamu, ekitundu kisuubirwa okulaba enkulaakulana ey'amaanyi mu byenfuna.
ach_prompt: Gamente me tedero otito yub me keto lim I biacara manyen ki gedo mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne,byek tye ni lwak gubi dongo ilok kom lim.
teo_prompt: Alimo apugan na okwap aitemonokineta nuka aipikakin ikapunukec toma obiasaran keda iboro luitetiak. Kanuka ngun, eomitai ebe ebuni atutubet ajenun apol naka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri azi otita eyini 'diyi robia ayuzu tujari o'diru 'diyi ma alea tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu 'da eyi nga zota e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alea ri esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebyanga erangirire enteekateeka y'okuta esente omu bizinesi n'ebyombeko ebisya. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu nibateekateekwaho kureeba entunguuka y'amaani omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming infrastructure project, officials emphasized the importance of thorough planning. To ensure the safety and efficiency of the new roads, extensive assessments were deemed necessary.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera pulojekiti y'ebizimbe ejja, abakungu baakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okuteekateeka obulungi. Okusobola okukakasa obukuumi n'obwangu bw'enguudo empya, okwekebejjebwa okw'amaanyi kwalabwa nga kwetaagisa.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi yub me gedo matye kabino anyim, lutic guwaco ni pire tek me yube maber. Me neno ni gudu manyen egoni tye maber dok gitiyo maber, kimoko ni omyero kikwed maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitemonokin epurojekt lo ebunit, apotu eswamak kitogogongoto ajokis naka aitemonokin ejok. Kanu awanyun ebe eyuara irotin luitetiak, aponi owanyunai ebe ibusakinit airereonor ejok.
lgg_prompt: Otita angu siza ni emupi 'diyi otuzu, azi'ba 'diyi 'ba asi orodri otita eyi 'yezu kililiru ri ma dria. Nzila o'diru 'diyi ma tambazu kililiru azini azi ngazu kililiru, 'ba 'du e'yo eyi ma ale andrizu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera purogyekiti erikwija, abakungu bakahamya omugasho gw'okukora enteekateeka nungi. Okureeba ngu enguuto ensya zikozirwe kurungi n'oburungi, okukyebera munonga kukareebwa nk'okw'omugasho.

eng_prompt: Collaboration among municipalities can lead to more efficient use of resources and better outcomes for residents. By pooling their expertise and sharing best practices, local governments can address common challenges more effectively.
lug_prompt: Enkolagana wakati wa munisipaali esobola okuviirako okukozesa obulungi eby'obugagga n'ebirungi ebivaamu eri abatuuze. Gavumenti z'ebitundu bwe zigatta obukugu bwazo n'okugabana enkola ennungi, zisobola okukola ku bizibu eby'awamu obulungi.
ach_prompt: Winye ikin municipality twero weko gitiyo ki lim maber dok bene adwoki me tic pa lwak bedo ber. I yo me ribo ngec gi kacel ki nywako jami mabeco ma otime, gamente me tedero twero cobo peko ma dano weng tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Aimorikikina kiding munisipaliti epedori ayangaun aitwasam iboro ejok ka aitodolikin iboro ejok kanuka itunga. Kowai lo aimorikikin acoa kec ka aimor iponesio luajokak, epedorete apuganisinei nu okwap aitemokin atiokisio nu itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Ti ecita munisipaliti eyi ma eselea ri eco fe 'bani afa ayuzaru 'diyi ayu kililiru dika e'yo eyini esu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri. E'yo onduoru yini 'diyi trazu tualu azini geri onyiru 'diyi awazu, local government eyi eco e'yo ewaru 'ba dria eyini esu 'diyi ma aza ko kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Enkoragana ahagati ya munisiparite neebaasa kureetaho okukoresa kurungi eby'obugaiga n'ebirugyemu birungi aha batuuragye. Gavumenti z'ebyanga nizibaasa kukora aha buremeezi bwa buriijo kurabira omu kukorera hamwe n'okugabana obukugu bwazo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to ensure accountability and transparency, the school board has outlined a new strategy. As part of this initiative, the district leaders will monitor government projects.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukakasa embalirira n'obwerufu, akakiiko k'essomero kafulumizza enkola empya. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti bajja kulondoola pulojekiti za gavumenti.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me neno ni tic ki kor tic tye atir, dul madoro gang kwan okatti ki yoo manyen. Macalo but yub man, lutela me dictrikgubi lubu kor yub pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na awanyun ebe ejai eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun ka aica, etolomu eyaitene lo esomero ainapeta nuitetiak. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, epote engarenok lu odisitrikt aanyanar ipurojektin lu apugan.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo dria 'yezu kililiru azini e'yo ada be, board sukulu niri e'do geri azi o'diru ni 'bo. Otita 'di ma azi ru, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi mu otita gamete ni 'diyi ma pamvu one.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureeba ngu hariho embaririra n'oburingaaniza,akakiiko k'eishomero katandikireho enkora nsya. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti, nibeija kureebuuza purogyekiti za gavumenti.

eng_prompt: In times of uncertainty and challenge, the role of leaders becomes increasingly vital. Their decisions and actions can significantly impact the well-being of the community they serve.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali bukakafu n'okusoomoozebwa, omulimu gw'abakulembeze gweyongera okuba omukulu. Okusalawo kwabwe n'ebikolwa bisobola okukosa obulungi bw'ekitundu kye baweereza.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ki peko, tic pa lutela doko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Tamgi ki timgi twero kelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kwo pa lwak ma gitiyo botgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuka amamus aijen ka atiokisio, epolor noi aswam naka engarenok. Aseununeta kec keda aswamisiokec epedorete aitojokara aijar naka itunga lu ijanakinete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alia, azi drice'ba eyini ri eca curu'do orodriru. E'yo yini pe azini e'yo yini 'ye 'diyi eco ongulumu yini azi ngazu 'diyi ma edri oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'obutegyendesereza hamwe n'oburemeezi, omurimo gw'abebembezi nigweyongyera kuba ogw'omugasho. Okusharaho kwabo n'ebikorwa byabo nibibaasa kukora kihango aha magara g'abantu abu barikuheereza.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for labor in the region, local authorities have encouraged construction companies to expand their workforce. As a result, the construction companies will recruit people from Moyo and Obongi districts.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'abakozi obweyongera mu kitundu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo bakubirizza kkampuni z'abazimbi okugaziya abakozi baazo. N'ekinaavaamu, kampuni ezizimba zijja kuwandiika abantu okuva mu disitulikiti y'e Moyo ne Obongi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lutic I but piny eni, lutela me tedero gucuku cwiny dul mapat-pat me gedo me medo wel luticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, dul mapat-pat me gedo gubi coyo lutic ma aa ki Moyo ki Obongi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin eipuda lo eswamak katutubet, isinyikokitos apedorosio nuka atutubet ikampunin luka aduko aiyatakin eswamakakec. Kanuka ngun, epote ikampunin lu edukere aitolom itunga luko disitriktan loko Moyo keda Obongi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu 'ba azi ngapi 'diyi ma omgbo angu 'di ma alea tuzu risi, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ai amuti afa sizu 'diyi azi'ba yini 'diyi ma kalafe otuzu. E'yo 'disi, amuti afa si'ba 'diyi nga 'ba eyi si engazu distrikiti Moyo ni azini Obongi ni 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obwetaavu bw'abakozi obweyongyeire omu kyanga, ab'obushoborozi omu byaro, bashabiire kampuni z'okwombeka okwongyera aha bakozi baazo. Ekyarugiremu, kampuni z'okwombeka niziija kutaho abantu kuruga omu disiturikiti ya Moyo na Obongi.

eng_prompt: To achieve our organizational goals, it is crucial to optimize our team's performance. This requires a focus on both productivity and resource management.
lug_prompt: Okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa by'ekitongole kyaffe, kikulu nnyo okulongoosa enkola ya ttiimu yaffe. Kino kyetaagisa okussa essira ku kukola n'okukozesa obulungi ebintu.
ach_prompt: Me cobo miti pa dul megwa, pire tek tutwal me yubu kit ma dul megwa timo kwede tic. Man mito keto cwiny I kom tic ki gwoko jami.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekosi, ejokuna noi aitojokar eswamae loka etimukosi. Ibusakinit ngin apodokinit aitolomunun iboro ka aitwasam kes ejok.
lgg_prompt: Asisile amuti amavileri niri esuzu, eri orodriru ama vile amuti 'diyi ma agata otuzu. Diri le 'ba ma 'ba asi e'yo azi ngazu kililiru azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa by'ekitongore kyaitu, n'eky'omugasho munonga okutunguura emikorere ya tiimu yaitu. Eki nikyetengyesa okuta amaani omu kukora n'okukoresa kurungi ebintu.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing healthcare needs of the community, local officials held a meeting to discuss improvements in emergency services. After reviewing the budget and assessing the situation, they decided to allocate funds for essential medical equipment.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'ebyobulamu obweyongera mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyalo baatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kutumbula obuweereza bw'amangu. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embalirira n'okukebera embeera, baasalawo okuwaayo ensimbi ez'ebikozesebwa mu bujjanjabi ebikulu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti pa lwak i kom kony me yot kom, lutic me tedero gubedo ki kacoke me nywako lok i kom medo rwom me kony me yot kom. Ingee ngiyo byek me lim ki neno ngo matye katimme, gumoko tam gi me miyo cente me wilo jami ma mite pi ot yat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo aiyatakin lo amukian naka itunga, apotu eswamak luka atutubet iriamunos kanu aitemitem nuka aitojokar ejanakine lo engeso. Akaulo naka airereor ebajet ka airereor ejautene, apotu kesi itolomutu ikapun kanu agwel iboro lu amukian.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo tupi ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo azakoma fele e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu ri ma dria. E'yo otita ajeni 'diyi ma ale andrizu azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo robia 'bazu afa ayuzaru arojoa 'diyi jezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'ebyetaago by'abantu omu by'amagara, abakuru omu byaro bakakora orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha nshonga y'okutunguura obuheereza. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embaririra hamwe n'okushwijuma embeera, bakasharamu kutaho esente z'okugura ebyoma by'amarwariro ebikuru.

eng_prompt: After a frantic rush through the city streets, the paramedics finally arrived at the hospital with the critically injured patient. Once they stabilized the situation, the team prepared to transfer responsibility to the hospital administration.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okudduka mu nguudo z'ekibuga, abasawo baatuuka mu ddwaliro n'omulwadde eyali afunye ebisago eby'amaanyi. Bwe baamala okutebenkeza embeera, ttiimu yeetegese okuwaayo obuvunaanyizibwa eri abaddukanya eddwaliro.
ach_prompt: Inge ngwec matek tutwal I gudu me boma madit, lutic yoto kom I agiki ne guo I ot yat ki latwo ma onongo awano marac adada. Ikare ma gucobo peko ne, dul pa ludor ot yat ne guyube me kobo tic bot ludor ot yat.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akerit noi korotin luka eibuga, apotu imurok luka adekis kodolokisi adekis keda adekak luemusunguna noi. Akaulo naka aitapatan ejautene, abu etimu okapakina aijukar aswam mama ejaasi eyaitene lo adekis.
lgg_prompt: Ongu nzuza okposiri ma vutia geri aku ambu cityniri ma aliasi, 'ba azoru 'diyi eca asizu arojoa 'ba azoru nya'biliko be onzi 'diyi be. Bani e'yo 'da otuzu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da otu eyi e'yo 'da ojazu driceza arojo niri vu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okwiruka kurabira omu nguuto z'orurembo, abashaho bakahika aha eirwariro n'omurwaire owabaire aine obuhuta bw'amaani. Bwanyima y'okutereeza embeera, tiimu eketeekateekyera kuhayo obujunanizibwa aha beebembezi b'eirwariro.

eng_prompt: As the sun set over the small village, the sound of laughter and chatter filled the air, creating a warm atmosphere. Despite the challenges they faced, the community opened their arms to those in need, eager to offer support and comfort.
lug_prompt: Ng'enjuba egwa ku kyalo ekitono, amaloboozi g'okuseka n'okunyumya gajjula empewo, ekyaleetawo embeera ey'ebbugumu. Ng'oggyeko okusoomoozebwa kwe baayolekagana nakwo, ekitundu kyaggulawo emikono gyabwe eri abo abali mu bwetaavu, nga beetegefu okuwa obuyambi n'okubudaabudibwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma ceng tye ka poto iwi caro matidi, dwon me nyero ki lok opong I yamo, ma okelo lyeto I kabedo ne. Kadi bed ni gukato ki peko mapol, lwak gu yabo cingi bot jo ma onongo peko tye i komgi, ki miti me miyo kony ki kwe cwiny.
teo_prompt: Neautar akolong aibiror kocalo, apotu aikwenyar keda einer kilelebunos kokwam, ido koinakisi itunga aiyalama. Karaida ejaas atiokisio nuetereikina keda kesi, apotu itunga luka atutubet kopukosi akaninikec mama ejaasi ngul lu ican, ekotosi aigang keda aisinyikokinit.
lgg_prompt: Etuka ni ecaria calo werea 'da ma dria, o'duko 'bani guzu azini e'yo nzezu 'diyi ga angu ma alea tre, e'yo driza fezu. E'yo ewaru yini esu 'diyi ma talasi, ongulumu 'da zi yi ma wu 'ba afa koko 'diyi dri, ava be atita fezu azini asi omiza fezu.
nyn_prompt: Omushana ku gwatandikire kurabira omu kyaro kikye, okusheka n'okugamba bikarugaho, kyareetaho embeera y'obufura. Oihireho oburemeezi obubatungire, abantu bakahereza obuhwezi n'okuhuumuriza abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: In our community, we prioritize kindness and support, fostering a sense of belonging among everyone. This strong bond creates an environment where people treat each other like brothers and sisters.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyaffe, tukulembeza ekisa n'obuyambi, okutumbula enneewulira y'okubeerawo mu buli omu. Enkolagana eno ey'amaanyi ereetawo embeera abantu gye bayisaamu bannaabwe ng'abooluganda.
ach_prompt: I kabedo wa, waketo cwiny me kica ki kony bedo gin ma pire tek tutwal, weko dano weng winyo ni gitye ikin gi. Ribbe matek man weko dano tero luwotgi calo omegi gi ki lumegi gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubetekosi, isingarenit sio aitim keda agangat, aitojokar eipud loka itunga kere. Eidicane lo loegogong nes ijaikini itunga ayait luce kwape iinacan keda ainacan.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu amavileri ma alea, ama asi 'ba asi ndriza azini atita ma dria, e'yo 'ba dria ma eselea aa'zu alenia ri ma omgbo otuzu. Erita 'ba eyi ma eselea okporu 'diri ni angu 'ba eyini eyi 'yezu eyi ma eselea adripika azini amvupika eyi le.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka kyaitu, nitwebembeza embabazi n'obuhwezi, okureetaho enhurira y'okuba hamwe omu bantu boona. Omukago gw'amaani ogu nigureetaho embeera ahu abantu barikutwarizana nk'ab'eishe - emwe na banyaanyazi - itwe.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing crisis, local leaders convened to discuss how best to support those fleeing violence. After much deliberation, they decided to offer assistance by allocating land for the refugees.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu obweyongera, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri esingayo obulungi ey'okuyambamu abo abadduka obutabanguko. Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo, baasalawo okuwaayo obuyambi nga bagabira abanoonyiboobubudamu ettaka.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko matye kamede, lutela me tedero gubedo ka lok i kom kit me konyo jo ma oringo tim gero. Ingee tam matut, gumoko tamgi me miyo kony ki poko ngom ki luring ayela.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu iyata, apotu engarenok luka atutubet iriamunos kanu aitemitem eipone lo igangakino ngul lu ekerete amumu. Akaulo naka aomisio nuipu, apotu kesi ocamutu aijaikin ikerai alupok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'di ma omvitaniria, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu atita fezu 'ba ngiringiri 'da ma alea 'diyi dri ri ma dria. E'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo azakoma fezu geri nyaku awazu emunyale eyini risi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obweyongyeire, abebembezi b'ebyaro, bakashutama kuhanuura oku barikubaasa kuhwera abo abarikuhunga obwimukiriro. Bwanyima y'okuteesa munonga, bakasharamu kuhayo obuhwezi obwo barikuhayo eitaka ry'empungi.

eng_prompt: To address the growing healthcare needs of the community, it is essential to improve access to emergency medical services. One effective strategy could involve utilizing available resources more efficiently.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukola ku byetaago by'ebyobulamu ebyeyongera mu kitundu, kyetaagisa okwongera ku busobozi bw'okufuna obujjanjabi obw'amangu. Enkola emu ennungi eyinza okuzingiramu okukozesa obulungi ebintu ebiriwo.
ach_prompt: Me tyeko peko me yot kom matye kamede I kin lwak, pire tek tutwal me yubu yoo me nongo kony me yot kom ma opoto atura. Yoo acel maber en aye me tic ki jami ma tye i yo maber.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka amukian kotoma atutubet, ejokuna noi adumun amukian na engeso. Adiopet ewai lo iswamai ejok epedori aimoriarit aitwasam iboro lu ejaas.
lgg_prompt: Lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu ongulumu eyini tupi tutu 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi mbeleru 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu. Otita azi alu ecopi azi ngapi kililiru ri ma alea afa 'bani esu 'diyi ayuzu geri kililiru 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okukora aha byetaago by'abantu omu by'amagara, ni kikuru okutunguura omutindo gw'obuheereza bw'amarwariro ag'ahonaaho. Enteekateeka emwe nungi neebaasa kutwariramu okukoresa kurungi eby'obugaiga ebiriho.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for medical services, the local government allocated funds for upgrades. As a result, the hospital has been equipped with health equipment.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera, gavumenti z'ebitundu zaawaayo ensimbi z'okutumbula. N'ekyavaamu, eddwaliro liweereddwa eby'okukozesa mu kujjanjaba.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo kony me yot kom, gamente me tedero oketo lim I yub me medo rwom me kony me yot kom. Macalo adwogi ne, ot yat onongo jami tic me ot yat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin eipuda lo amukian, abu apugan naka atutubet ijaik ikapun kanu aitojokar. Kanuka ngun, aponi ijaikinai adekis iboro lu amukian.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma e'yosi, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri 'ba robia e'yo 'da ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba fe arojo 'da ni afa ayuzaru arojoa 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara, gavumenti y'ebyaro ekataho esente z'okutunguura eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, eirwariro riheirwe ebyoma by'okukoresa omu irwariro.

eng_prompt: The community relies heavily on local medical facilities for their health needs. As a result, access to quality care is essential for the well-being of residents.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kyesigamye nnyo ku malwaliro g'omu kitundu ku byetaago by'ebyobulamu. N'ekyavaamu, okufuna obujjanjabi obw'omutindo kikulu nnyo eri obulamu obulungi bw'abatuuze.
ach_prompt: Lwak jenge tutwalle I kom odi yadi me tedero pi jami ma mite pi yoto komgi. Macalo adwogi ne, nongo kony me yot kom maber pire tek tutwal pi ber bedo pa lutedero.
teo_prompt: Emunokina itunga noi adekisia nuka atutubet kanu amukian kec. Kanuka ngun, adumunun amukian na adoketait ejok erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da eyi asi 'ba arojo ogogo 'diyi ma dria e'yo eyi ma rua ala ni 'diyi esuzu. E'yo 'disi, geri alata muke ri esuzu ri eri orodriru aa'ta muke 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyiniri ni.
nyn_prompt: Abantu nibeegamira munonga aha marwariro g'omubyaro, ahabw'ebyetaago byabo by'eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, okutunga obujanjabi burungi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'oburungi bw'abatuuragye.

eng_prompt: Advancements in technology and infrastructure have transformed healthcare accessibility. As a result, communities are now equipped with local clinics and telemedicine options.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana mu tekinologiya n'ebizimbe ekyusizza enkola y'okufuna obujjanjabi. N'ekyavaamu, ebitundu kati birina amalwaliro n'obujjanjabi obw'oku ssimu.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo I kom tet manyen ki gedo mapat-pat okelo aloka-loka I yoo me nongo kony me yot-kom. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo mapat-pat dong tye ki odi yadi ki yoo me tic ki cim.
teo_prompt: Apol naka etatai loakwana keda iboro luingarakinete itunga aijulakin eipone lo adumunun amukian. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi kwana itunga keda adekisia nuka aiboisit keda amukian naka aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Ojata tekenologia ni azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma alia 'diyi oja geri 'bani ecozu e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu ri ra. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu eyi ma alea arojo eyi sa'wa 'disi azini geri aro esuzu geri simu si 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Entunguuka omu tekinorogye n'ebyombeko ehindwire omuringo gw'okutunga obujanjabi. N'ekyarugiremu, ebyanga hati biine amarwariro g'omubyaro hamwe n'emiringo y'okuragurira aha mikutu.

eng_prompt: Emergency services are designed to provide critical care and assistance during life-threatening situations. Misusing these resources can put lives at risk and divert attention from those who truly need help.
lug_prompt: Obujjanjabi obw'amangu butegekeddwa okuwa obujjanjabi obw'amaanyi n'obuyambi mu mbeera eziteeka obulamu mu matigga. Okukozesa obubi ebintu bino kiyinza okuteeka obulamu mu matigga n'okuggya ebirowoozo ku abo abeetaaga obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Yub me miyo kony pi peko ma poto atura kiyubu pi miyo kony ikare ma kwo tye kama rac tutwal. Nywaro tic ki jami magi twero balo kwo pa dano ki weko dano pe paro pi joo ma mito kony.
teo_prompt: Aiboisio nu engeso kes itolomunitai kanu aijaunun amukian ka aingarakinio kotoma ojautene loetukurianete aijar. Aitosom iboro lu erono epedori aipikakin aijar toma ationis kosodi aijulakin itunga lu ekotos aingarakinio.
lgg_prompt: Ba ede azakoma e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu azini azakoma fezu sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alia. Afa 'diyi ayuzu geri onzi si ri eco 'ba eyi ma edri 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea dika eri eco 'ba asi 'bazu 'ba azakoma lepi saaru 'diyi vurisi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ebirikuhwera abarwaire abatarikwetegyerezibwa, bikozirwe kuragurira abantu abarwaire munonga n'okubahwera omu bwire bw'akabi. Okukoresa kubi ebintu ebi nikibaasa kuta amagara omu kabi n'okwihaho abo abarikwetenga obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: Following a thorough investigation into the incident, it has become clear that there were significant lapses in judgment and protocol. As a result, the district leaders will be held accountable for the misuse of the ambulance.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu ku byaliwo, kyeyoleka bulungi nti waaliwo ensobi mu kusalawo n'enkola. N'ekinaavaamu, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti bajja kuvunaanibwa olw'okukozesa obubi emmotoka etambuza abalwadde.
ach_prompt: I ngee kwed matut I kom ngo ma otimme, nen atyer kamaleng ni bal madongo obedo tye I tam ki cik. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me dictrikibingolo kop iwi gi pi nywaro tic ki ambulance.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic akiro ngun, ecai cut ebe ajai aibucaret naepol noi kotoma aomisio keda ainapeta. Kanuka ngun, eponio aingit engarenok luka edisitrikt kanu aitolitol amotoka nadekis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza e'yo 'da ma dria ri ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini e'yo liza azini azita vuti obiza ma alia e'yo onzi 'diyi ci. E'yo 'disi, 'ba nga drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi omvi e'yo 'bani ambulansi ayuzu geri onzi si ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okucondooza munonga ebyabaireho, kimanyirwe butunu ngu hakaba hariho enshobi nyingi omu kucwamu n'okukuratira ebiragiro. N'ekyarugiremu, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti, nibaija kujunanwa ahabw'okukoresa kubi ambyurensi.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic unfolded, public trust in health authorities began to wane. Misinformation spread rapidly, leading to widespread skepticism about scientific recommendations.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyagenda kyeyongera, obwesige bw'abantu mu b'ebyobulamu bwatandika okukendeera. Obubaka obukyamu bwasaasaana mangu, ekiviiriddeko abantu bangi okubuusabuusa ebyo bannassaayansi bye bagamba.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma two opoto, gen pa lwak I kom lutic yoto kom ocako dok piny. Lok goba onyaa oyot-oyot tutwal, ma oweko dano mapol gubedo ki akala-kala I kom tam pa lucayan.
teo_prompt: Neautar adeka naka ekorona, abu amunokina naka itunga mama ejaasi apedorosio nuka angaleu kogeu aibiror. Apotu akiro nuarokok ikoparata katipet, ido abu koyangau aomisio nuikamunitos akiro nuka esayanis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni ecaria, o'bi ma asi'baza 'ba e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma dria ri e'do esi ra. E'yo onzi eyi ere i mbeleru fezu 'ba karakara eyini aa'zu asi otiza be e'yo 'bani 'yo sayansini 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire ku bwabaire nibujanjaara, abantu bakaba batakiikiririzamu ab'eby'amagara. Amakuru g'ebishobobo gakajanjaara juba, ekyareteire abantu baingi kubangaanisa ebiteiso bya sayansi.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming elections, the electoral commission held a meeting with all registered candidates. They emphasized the importance of reaching voters effectively in a digital age.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera okulonda okujja, akakiiko k'ebyokulonda kaatuuza olukiiko n'abeesimbyewo bonna abeewandiisa. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'okutuuka obulungi ku balonzi mu mulembe guno ogwa digito.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi yer matye kabino ni, dul madoro yer obedo ki kacoke ki lucungu weng ma oconne. Guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me cwalo kwena bot lubol kwir i kare man me tic ki intanet.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin kanuka aseo naebunit, abu ekomision loka aseo iriamunos keda abwoak kere luiwadikauna. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka adolokin aseak ejok kotoma apakio kanu nuka elago.
lgg_prompt: Otuta 'yezu opeta emupi 'diyi ni, amuti e'yo opetaa ni ondrepi ri 'ye mitingi 'ba dria pa tupi 'diyi pie. Eyi fe okpo orodri cazu 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi vu geri kililiru si sa'wa 'di ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera akaruuru akarikwiija,akakiiko k'eby'oburuuru kakakora orukiiko n'abeesimbireho boona. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okuhikiirira abateezi b'akaruuru omu murembe gwa digito.

eng_prompt: Many opposition candidates struggle to gain visibility in the media landscape. As a result, they often rely on grassroots campaigning rather than expensive advertising.
lug_prompt: Abeesimbyewo bangi ku ludda oluvuganya gavumenti balwana okufuna ekitiibwa mu mikutu gy'empuliziganya. N'ekivuddemu, batera okwesigama ku kunoonya obululu okuva wansi okusinga okulanga okw'ebbeeyi.
ach_prompt: Pol pa lucungu iwi bye ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente gitye ka yele me nongo nying I kin lucoo lok angea. Macalo adwogi ne, pol kare gijenge I kom bito kwi ma aa ki bot lwak me kaka cato wil ma welgi tek.
teo_prompt: Abwaak luipu luka etepegak eutasi ainingosit adumun ajenara kotoma oyemuto. Kanuka ngun, etapit kesi aibwaikin ikampeins kama ejaasi itunga luka atutubet itia alimonor ikapun luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ba pa tupi amuti politiki ni kari ma dricepiri ma alea ku 'diyi ma alea 'diyi dri ci eyini ani e'dazu geri o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, eyi tutuni eyi ati e'yo ti odaza ni 'diyi ma dria aga e'yo ajeru 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Abeesimbireho aha rubaju orurikuhakanisa gavumenti nibarwana munonga okureebeka omu mikutu y'amahurire. N'ekyarugiremu, nibakira kwesigama aha kuronda akaruuru k'ahansi, omu mwanya gw'okuronda akaruuru k'omuhendo gw'ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: In recent debates, lawmakers expressed growing concern over the influence of media on public perception. They argued that misleading narratives can distort the truth and manipulate voter opinions.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakaggwa, ababaka baalaze obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku ngeri emikutu gy'empuliziganya gye gikyusamu endowooza z'abantu. Baagamba nti ebigambo ebibuzaabuza bisobola okukyusakyusa amazima n'okukyusakyusa endowooza z'abalonzi.
ach_prompt: I kare me laro lok ma okato cokcok-ki, luwang lwak I ot moko cik gunyutu lworo I kom kit ma odi poko ngec tye ka loko kwede tam pa lwak. Guwaco ni lok goba twero nyweno lok ada dok nyweno tam pa lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Kotoma opegeta pac, apotu imeeban itodutu aiyalongong naepol noi kanuka epone loepedoriata arotak iyemuto aijulakin aomisio nuka itunga. Apotu kesi kotemasi ebe akiro nuka aisab epedorete aijulakin abeit kosodete aitolitol aomisio nuka aseak.
lgg_prompt: Agbatara o'diru 'diyi ma alea, 'ba azita si'ba 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo geri o'dukoti edrizu 'diyini o'bi eyi ma egata ma dria ri ma dria. Eyi 'yo kini e'yo enzoru 'diyi eco e'yo ada oja dika eyi eco 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma egata oja ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho, abanyishengyero boorekire okwerarikirira aha by'empurizagana aha miteekateekyere y'abantu. Bakagira ngu enshonga ezitahikire nizibaasa kuhindura amazima n'ebiteekateeko by'abateezi b'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: In a troubling turn of events, the government has intensified its crackdown on dissenting voices. As a result, opposition candidates have been denied access to media stations.
lug_prompt: Mu nkyukakyuka etaataaganya, gavumenti eyongedde okufufuggaza amaloboozi agawakanya. N'ekyavaamu, ab'oludda oluvuganya gavumenti tebakkirizibwa ku mikutu gya mawulire.
ach_prompt: I kare man me peko, gamente omedo rwom me lweny i kom dwon pa jo ma kwero lok pa miri/gamente. Macalo adwogi ne, lucungu iwi bye ma pe yee ki lok pa gamente pe ki yee gi me tic ki odi poko ngec.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijulakineta nuetioko, eyataki apugan aiticanicanikec mama ejaasi itunga luegelegela. Kanuka ngun, mam ecamakitai abwoak luka etepegak alomar toma aiboisio nuka iyemuto.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea, gamete otu e'yo erini 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba oga 'ba pa tupi amuti politiki ni kari ma dricepiri ma alea ku 'diyi dri geri o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi ayuzu si.
nyn_prompt: Omu mpindahinduka y'ebintu erikuteganisa,gavumenti eyongyeire amaani omukufuuhirira amahurire agatari gamwe na gamwe. N'ekyarugiremu, abesimbireho aha rubaju orurikuhabura gavumenti tibarikwikirizibwa kuhika aha mikutu y'amahurire.

eng_prompt: In many countries, the electoral process is marred by widespread corruption and manipulation. As a result, citizens often feel disenfranchised and question the legitimacy of the outcomes.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi nnyingi, okulonda kwonoonese olw'obuli bw'enguzi n'okukozesa obubi abantu. N'ekivuddemu, bannansi batera okuwulira nga baggyibwako eddembe era babuusabuusa obutuufu bw'ebinaavaamu.
ach_prompt: I lobe mapol, yub me bolo kwir tye ki bal me camcana. Macalo adwogi ne, anywali ipol kare giwinyo ni pe gitye ki twero dok gipenyo kace adwogi ne tye kakare.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwapin nuipu, ejaasi ainapeta nuka aseo keda amidicio naka apiyai. Kanuka ngun, epupete itunga ebe emamiatatar kesi keda apedorosio kec kosodete abuonokin abeit naka akiro ngun.
lgg_prompt: Kari karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi eza eyi e'yo anyamgbolo ni 'diyi pie. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, kari anzi eyi ega eyi ma drilemgbo yo dika eyi e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma eti onzi.
nyn_prompt: Omu mahanga maingi, enkora y'okuteera akaruuru esiisikara ahabw'obushomankuzi n'okubuzabuza. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye nibahurira batiine bugabe kandi nibabangaanisa oburingaaniza bw'ebirugiremu.

eng_prompt: Concerns have been raised about the transparency of the electoral process. Many believe that stakeholder input is crucial for a fair and inclusive election planning.
lug_prompt: Okweraliikirira kuleeteddwa ku bwerufu bw'enkola y'okulonda. Bangi bakkiriza nti ebiteeso by'abakwatibwako bikulu nnyo mu nteekateeka y'okulonda ey'obwenkanya era erimu abantu bonna.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo tye I kom ada pa yub me bolo kwir. Dano mapol gitye ki niyee ni tam pa dano mapol pire tek tutwal pi yub me yer matye atir dok ma dano weng tye iye.
teo_prompt: Aponi itodunai aiyalongong kanu abeit naka ainapeta nuka aseo. Iyuunitos itunga luipu ebe epolok noi aomisio nuka itunga kanu aitemonokin nuka aseo.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ni 'diyi efu e'yo opetaa ma e'yo ada ma dria. Ba karakara eyi ai ra kini 'ba ambo eyi ma egata eyi orodriru e'yo opetaa ni 'diyi otuzu kililiru azini 'ba dria eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Hariho okwerarikirira ahabw'oburingaaniza omu by'oburuuru. Baingi nibaikiriza ngu ebiteekateeko by'abaine akakwate n'eby'omugasho omu kutebeekanisa akaruuru akarungi kandi akarimu abantu boona.

eng_prompt: Due to regulatory restrictions and frequency allocation, the broadcasting options in this region are quite constrained. As a result, the area is limited to only two radio stations.
lug_prompt: Olw'obukwakkulizo obuli mu mateeka n'okugabanyizibwamu kw'obubonero, eby'okuweereza mu kitundu kino bikugirwa nnyo. N'ekivuddemu, ekitundu kirina emikutu gya laadiyo ebiri gyokka.
ach_prompt: Pi kigeng ma gamente oketo i kom tic ki nyonyo me poko ngec, yoo me poko ngec I but lobo man tye magoro tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo ne tye ki redio station aryo keken.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aitikitik ikisila keda aiboisio nuijaikitai, ikidioko aitodianareta kotoma aiboisit kana. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi aiboisit keda iredion iarei bon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azita ni 'diyi ma e'yosi azini geri 'bani e'yo oyuzu 'diyi ma awazuri ma e'yosi, geri 'bani e'yo oyuzu angu 'di ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra. E'yo 'disi, angu 'da ma alea rediyo eyi lu iri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebiragiro ebirikuzibirwa hamwe n'okugabira abantu obwire, eby'empurizagana omu kicweka eki tibirikwetengwa. N'ekyarugiremu,omwanya gurimu reediyo ibiri zonka.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about the impact of advertising on public opinion, several experts weighed in on the effectiveness of various outreach strategies. Amidst this debate, some politicians expressed skepticism about the role of media campaigns in influencing voter behavior.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gyebuvuddeko ku bikwata ku bulango ku ndowooza y'abantu, abakugu bangi baayogera ku bukugu bw'enkola ez'enjawulo ez'okutuusa obubaka ku bantu. Wakati mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo kuno, bannabyabufuzi abamu baalaga okubuusabuusa ku mulimu gwa kampeyini z'emikutu gy'amawulire mu kukyusa enneeyisa y'abalonzi.
ach_prompt: I nyamo lok ma otime cokcok-ki I kom adwoki pa cato wil I kom tam pa lwak, ludiro mapol guwaco ni yoo mapat-pat me cwalo lok angeya bot lwak tye maber tutwal. Ikare me laro lok man, lucung iwi-bye mukene gunyutu akala-kala I kom tic pa bito kwi I odi poko ngec I doro tim pa lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei luitetiak nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata alimonoreta aitodolikin aomisio nuka itunga, apotu ipiriotin luipu kinerata nuikamunitos aitodolikinio naka iwaitin luegelegela. Kotoma opeget lo, apotu icie politisians itodutu abuonokin nuikamunitos aswam naka ikampeins luka elago kanu aitodolikin iponesio luka aseak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alea e'yo 'bani e'yo 'bazu o'bi eyi ma eselea ri ma dria, 'ba karakara eyi nze e'yo geri ndundu eyini ecozu e'yo eyi 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ra. Agbatara 'di ma talasi, 'ba politiki ni 'diyi ma azi eyi e'da asi otiza e'yo ti odaza geri o'dukoti edrizu 'diyiniri ma dria e'yo 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyi ma adriza ojazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okwabaireho ebiro ebi aha bikwatireine n'okuranga abantu, abakugu baingi bakagamba aha bukoryo bw'okutunga abantu. Ahagati y'okuhanuura oku, ab'eby'obutegyeki abamwe bakagira okubanganisa omurimo gwa kampiini z'abanyamakuru omu kutegyeka emicwe y'abateezi b'akaruuru.

eng_prompt: In today's political landscape, the influence of media on public perception has become increasingly significant. As a result, candidates with established recognition often benefit disproportionately from extensive media coverage.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobufuzi eya leero, amaanyi g'emikutu gy'amawulire ku ndowooza y'abantu geeyongedde okuba amakulu. N'ekivuddemu, abeesimbyewo abamanyiddwa ennyo baganyulwa nnyo mu mikutu gy'empuliziganya.
ach_prompt: I lok me cungu iwi bye me kare-ni, kero pa odi poko ngec I kom tam pa lwak tye ka mede. Macalo adwogi ne, lucungu ma oywek tutwal ipol kare ginongo ber pa lok angeya mapol.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisit naka epolitikis loka lolo, apolor noi apedor naka arotak iyemuto kotoma aomisio nuka itunga. Kanuka ngun, abwaak lu ejenara noi imedaunenete noi kama ejaasi arotak iyemuto.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni andruri ma alia, okpo 'ba oyuyuani 'diyi ni o'bi yi ma egata ma dria ri eca curu'do okporu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba pa so'baa 'bani nile ra 'diyi tutuni orodri isu geri o'dukoti edrizu 'diyi vurisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki eby'erizooba, amahurire nigakora kihango aha miteekateekyere y'abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, abesimbireho abarikumanywa munonga, nibakira kugasirwa munonga omu by'amahurire.

eng_prompt: As the election season approaches, many politicians are grappling with the increasing reliance on data-driven strategies. They feel that the current methods of campaigning undermine the personal connections that voters crave.
lug_prompt: Nga sizoni y'okulonda esembera, bannabyabufuzi bangi balwanagana n'okwongera okwesigama ku bukodyo obwesigamiziddwa ku biwandiiko. Balowooza nti engeri z'okunoonya akalulu eziriwo zityoboola enkolagana y'obuntu abalonzi gye beegomba.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me yer tye cok, lucung iwi-bye mapol tye ka lweny ki jenge I kom diro me tic ki ngec. Gitye ki tam ni yoo me bito kwir matye kombedi tye ka balo wat ikin lubol kwir.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, eutasi ipolitisans luipu ainingosit keda eipone lo eyangaritere akiro. Eomitos kesi ebe iponesio luka aisup aseeta luka apakio nu itidisiarete aiswamanara keda aseak.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecazu ogogo risi, 'ba karakara politiki ni 'diyi dri ci e'yo 'bani asi 'bazu e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria. Yi ega kini geri 'bani agbatara ti odazaniri 'yezu sawa 'disi 'diyi e'yo 'ba voti 'bepi 'diyini lezu yi ma eselea 'diyi ma omgbo esi ra.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku burikuhika haihi, ab'eby'obutegyeki baingi nibarwanagana n'okweyongyera kwesiga oburyo bw'okukoresa ebihandiiko. Nibateekateeka ngu enkora y'okuronda akaruuru eriho obwahati, netuma abateezi b'akaruuru batakwatanisa n'abantu baabo.

eng_prompt: As the number of COVID-19 cases continues to rise, concerns about public safety during the electoral process have intensified. Many leaders are calling for a reevaluation of the election timeline to prioritize the health of citizens.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongera okulinnya, okweraliikirira ku by'okwerinda kw'abantu mu biseera by'okulonda kweyongedde. Abakulembeze bangi basaba okuddamu okwetegereza ebiseera by'okulonda okusobola okukulembeza ebyobulamu bya bannansi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde, lworo I kom ber bedo pa lwak I kare me yer bene tye kamede. Lutela mapol tye ka lego ni myero kilok kit ma yer tye kawot kwede wek oket pi yotkom pa anywali obed gin ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona, apolor aiyalongong naka ayuwara naka itunga kotoma apak naka aseo. Ekotosi engarenok luipu airereor ainapeta nuka aseo kanu aisingarenit angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ni tutu, asi otiza e'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu ageitema be sa'wa opetaa nirisi ri ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. Drice'ba karakara eyi ai 'bani sa'wa opetaa ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu dika eyini ani e'yo kari anzi eyini 'diyi ma rua ala niri 'duzu okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 nigugumizamu kweyongyera, okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda kw'abantu omu bwire bw'oburuuru kweyongyeire. Abeebembezi baingi nibashaba ngu obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru bugarukye busha, kugira ngu eby'amagara g'abantu bigyende omu maisho.

eng_prompt: In today's political landscape, the reliance on data-driven strategies and targeted messaging has transformed the way campaigns are conducted. As a result, many candidates focus on appealing to specific demographics rather than engaging with the broader electorate.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera y'ebyobufuzi eya leero, okwesigama ku bukodyo obwesigamiziddwa ku biwandiiko n'obubaka obulambikiddwa kikyusizza engeri kampeyini gye zitambuzibwamu. N'ekivuddemu, abeesimbyewo bangi essira baliteeka ku kusikiriza abantu mu kifo ky'okukwatagana n'abalonzi abagazi.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me cungu iwi bye ma ite kare ni, jenge I kom diro me tic ki ngec ki kwena ma kicwalo I yoo ma atir oloko kit ma yub me bito kwir time kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, lucungu mapol giketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom lok ki dano mapat-pat me kaka lok ki lubol kwir mapol.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ojautene loka politikis loka lolo, amunokina iwaitin lu itwasamaere akiro keda akiro nuitemokinitai ijulakini epone lo itolosere ikampeins. Kanuka ngun, ekotosi abwaak luipu aisinyikokin itunga luipu itia aisinyikokin aseak luipu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo politiki ni andruri ma alia, asi'baza geri 'bani e'yo 'yezu 'diyi ma dria ri oja geri 'bani ti odaza 'yezu ri ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara pa tupi 'diyi asi 'ba e'yo yi 'yepi 'ba yi ma eselea 'diyi ma dria aga e'yo yi 'yezu 'ba karakara voti 'bepi 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obutegyeki eby'erizooba, okwesiga oburyo bw'okukoresa ebihandiiko hamwe n'obutumwa obugyendereirwe, kihindwire omuringo ogu kampeyini zirikukorerwamu. N'ekyarugiremu, abesimbireho abingi nibata omutima aha kusikiriza abantu batari bamwe, omu mwanya gw'okukwatanisa n'abateezi b'akaruuru boona.

eng_prompt: In the wake of recent controversies surrounding election integrity, tensions have escalated between political parties and regulatory bodies. As a result, some politicians have vowed not to follow the electoral commission guidelines.
lug_prompt: Olw'okusika omuguwa okwaliwo gye buvuddeko awo ku bikwata ku bulungibwansi mu kulonda, obunkenke bweyongedde wakati w'ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi n'ebitongole ebivunaanyizibwa ku kulonda. N'ekivuddemu, bannabyabufuzi abamu beeweze obutagoberera bulagirizi bw'akakiiko k'ebyokulonda.
ach_prompt: Ikare me laro lok ma obedo tye cokcok-ki I kom ber bedo pa yer, telle omede ikin dul me cungu iwi bye ki dul ma doro yer. Macalo adwogi ne, lucungu iwi bye mukene gukwonge pe me lubu cik pa dul ma doro yer.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ingungeta luka aseo, eyatakinos ingungeta kiding ipatei keda atukona nuka aseo. Kanuka ngun, esumunitos ipolitisans ice mam atupakinit aicoreta nuka ekomision loka aseo.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako e'yo opetaa ni aa'zu kililiru ri ma dria ri ma e'yosi, e'yo ngiringiri ni amuti politiki ni 'diyi ma eselea amuti e'yo politiki ni ondrepi 'diyi pie ri ma omgbo tu ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba politiki ni 'diyi ma azi eyi so oyo azita amuti legico niri ma vuti obizu ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutaikirizana oburiho obwahati ahabw'oburingaaniza omu by'oburuuru, obutaikirizana bweyongyeire ahagati y'ebibiina by'obutegyeki n'ebitongore ebirikujunanizibwa ahaby'oburuuru. N'ekyarugiremu, ab'eby'obutegyeki abamwe barahiire ngu tibarikwija kukuratira ebiragiro by'akakiiko k'eby'oburuuru.

eng_prompt: In many cultures, traditional practices often dictate the timing of marriage. As a result, families prioritize securing advantageous alliances for their daughters early in life.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa bungi, enkola z'obuwangwa zitera okusalawo obudde bw'obufumbo. N'ekivuddemu, amaka gassa essira ku kufuna emikwano emirungi eri bawala baago nga bakyali bato.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mapol, tekwaro aye doro kare me nyom. Macalo adwogi, lugangi gi keto cwiny gi tutwalle I kom bedo ki lurem mabeco pi lutino anyira gi con.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio luipu, iponesio luka einono kes itodunitos apak naka edukone. Kanuka ngun, isingarenitos ikalia aimorikikin keda apesur kec kapak kana edisiak.
lgg_prompt: A'bi karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo suruni 'diyi sa'wa driasi e'yo 'ba eyini eyi 'duzu agupia ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, familia eyi e'yo okporu 'ba eyi ma ezoanzi eyini aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa
nyn_prompt: Omu buhangwa bwingi, emicwe y'obuhangwa niyo erikukwata aha bwire bw'okushwera. N'ekyarugiremu, amaka nigatwara nka kikuru okureebeka ngu abaishiki baabo batungire omukago murungi bakiri bato.

eng_prompt: In recent discussions about improving educational resources for young girls, it has become clear that there is a significant gap in knowledge regarding sexual health. To address this issue, the district must take proactive steps to ensure that girls receive accurate and comprehensive information.
lug_prompt: Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko ku ky'okutumbula eby'enjigiriza by'abawala abato, kyeyoleka bulungi nti waliwo ekituli ekinene mu kumanya okukwata ku byobulamu mu by'okwegatta. Okukola ku nsonga eno, disitulikiti erina okubaako ky'ekolawo okulaba ng'abawala bafuna obubaka obutuufu era obujjuvu.
ach_prompt: I kare me nywako lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom medo rwom me kwan pa anyira matino, nen atyer kamaleng ni ngec me yot kom me butu imit tye mapol tutwal. Me tyeko peko man, district omyero ocak tic matek me neno ni lutino anyira gunongo ngec matir.
teo_prompt: Kotoma oineresinei lu atuboros nuikamunitos aitojokar isomeroi luka apesur nudidika, ecai cut ebe emamei acoa naepol noi naikamunit angaleu naka aelo. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, ekot edisitrikt aswam kagogongu kanu awanyun ebe edumunenete apesur akiro nu abeit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo nzeza o'diru 'diyi ma alea afa ezoanzi nyiri eyini sukulu lazu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ma alea, eca e'da kini ondua e'yo ali o'baza ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo esi ra. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, le distrikiti ma 'du okpo nezu ra kini ezoanzi eyi o'dukoti kililiru azini dria 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kuhanuura okuhweireho okurikukwata aha kutunguura eby'obwegyese bw'abaishiki, nikyoreka butunu ngu hariho omwanya muhango omu kumanya ebirikukwata aha magara g'okuteerana. Okukora aha nshonga egi, disiturikiti eshemereire kukora kyona ekirikubaasika kureeba ngu abaishiki batunga amakuru agahikire.

eng_prompt: As couples spent more time at home together due to restrictions, many found themselves reevaluating their family plans. The combination of increased intimacy and reduced distractions led to a noticeable rise in conception rates.
lug_prompt: Nga abaagalana bamala obudde bungi awaka nga bali bombi olw'obukwakkulizo, bangi beesanga nga baddamu okwetegereza enteekateeka zaabwe ez'amaka. Okwegatta kw'okweyongerayongera kw'omukwano n'okukendeera kw'ebiwugulaza byaviiriddeko okweyongerayongera mu bungi bw'abaana abafuna embuto.
ach_prompt: Kit ma joo ma onyome gubedo ki kare malac I gang kacel pi kigeng mapat-pat, polgi gunongo ni gitye ka ngiyo yub me gang gi. Rwom me bedo ki wat macok ki dano kacel ki jami ma dwoyo tam pa dano ojwik oweko wel lutino ma oyac omede tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kwape itosomaete itunga luedukokina apak ore nepepe kanuka ikisila, apotu luipu kowanyutu ebe ibusakinit kesi airereor nuikamunitos ekale kec. Aimorikikina naka aimorikikina naepol keda aitidisiario naka iboro abu koyangau apol naka apesur nu epotiete.
lgg_prompt: Ekile 'ba eyi ecipi aku si 'diyi sa'wa angiri aa'zu tualu e'yo 'bani eyi atrizu 'diyisi, karakara eyi esu eyi otita eyivile familia ni 'diyi ma ale andri dika. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma eselea aa'zu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tualu e'yo 'bani eyi ogazu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo esi ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Abashaija n'abakazi kubarikumara obwire bwingi omu maka hamwe ahabw'ebiragiro, baingi bakeeshanga nibagaruka bashwijuma enteekateeka zaabo z'amaka. Okweyongyera kw'omukago gw'omunda hamwe n'okukyendeeza aha bintu ebirikuhuzya, kikareetaho okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abaishiki abarikutwara enda.

eng_prompt: It is crucial for parents to be aware of the influences surrounding their children during their formative years. Negative peer pressure can lead to harmful behaviors and choices that may impact their future.
lug_prompt: Kikulu nnyo abazadde okumanya ebintu ebikosa abaana baabwe nga bakyali bato. Okupikirizibwa kw'emikwano okubi kusobola okuviirako enneeyisa ey'obulabe n'okusalawo ebiyinza okukosa ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Pire tek tutwal ki lunyodo me bedo ki ngec i kom jami ma balo kwo pa lutino gi ikare ma gitye ka dongo. Lyeto pa lurem ma pe ber twero kelo tim maraco ki moko tam ma twero balo kwo gi me anyim.
teo_prompt: Erai ibore yenejok noi auriak aijen iboro luepedorete aitolitol idwe kec kapakio nu idwe kec. Ainingosit naka ipaupa epedori ayangaun iponesio luarokok keda aseununeta nuepedorete aitolitol ingaren kec.
lgg_prompt: Eri orodriru tipika eyini aa'zu mile be e'yo eyi ma anzi eyini zozu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'ba eyi ma eselea onzi 'diyi eco fe 'ba eyini adriza onzi 'diyi 'yezu azini e'yo eyi pezu ecopi eyi ma ewu drialeri 'yepi ra 'diyi 'yezu ra.
nyn_prompt: N'eky'omugasho munonga abazaire kumanya ebirikuteganisa abaana baabo omu myaka yaabo y'obwegyese. Okugyemeserezibwa kw'eminyeeto, nikubaasa kurugwamu emicwe mibi n'okucwamu kubi, ebirikubaasa kuteganisa ebiro byabo by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: Recent statistics from local health clinics reveal a concerning trend in adolescent pregnancies. In fact, the numbers indicate a significant rise in cases among teenage girls in the area.
lug_prompt: Ebibalo ebiva mu malwaliro g'ebyobulamu mu kitundu biraga omuze ogweraliikiriza ogw'embuto mu bavubuka. Mu butuufu, omuwendo gulaga okweyongera okw'amaanyi mu bawala abato mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Wel ma okato cokcok-ki ma aa ki bot odi yadi me tedero nyutu ni anyira matino tye ka yac mapol tutwal. Ki lok ada, wel ne nyutu ni wel lutino anyira matino matye ka nongo two omede tutwal I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuitodunitos nuka adekisia nuka atutubet itodunit ebe epol noi apol naka apotun kanejaas apesur nudidika. Kabeit, itodunit inaabai ebe eyatakinos noi apesur nudidika kotoma aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe o'diru engazu arojo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ece e'yo asi otiza ni e'yo ezoanzi nyiri eyini ecazu okporovu ru ri ma dria. A'danisi, kalafe 'da eyi e'da kini ezoanzi eli capiku 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ebibaro kuruga omu marwariro g'omubyaro, nibyoreka enkora y'abaishiki okutwara enda bakiri bato. Omu mazima, omuhendo nigworeka okweyongyera kw'emishango omu baishiki abakiri bato omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a concerning trend regarding adolescent behavior. Many young girls are exploring their sexuality earlier than previous generations.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga enkola eyeeraliikiriza ku nneeyisa y'abavubuka. Abawala abato bangi batandika okunoonyereza ku by'okwegatta nga bukyali okusinga ab'omulembe oguyise.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto jami mapol ma kelo lworo i kom tim pa bulu. Anyira matino mapol gitye ka kwedo lok me butu imit con ka iporo ki anyira macon.
