nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka enkora y'emicwe y'eminyeeto erikwerarikiriza. Abaishiki bato abaingi bariyo nibacondooza ebikwatiraine n'eby'okuteerana bakiri bato, okukira abashaija n'abakazi aba ira.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic forced many families to stay home, it became essential to find productive ways to engage children. Encouraging young minds to explore entrepreneurship can foster creativity and resilience during these challenging times.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyawaliriza amaka mangi okusigala awaka, kyafuuka kikulu okufuna engeri ez'omuganyulo ez'okwenyigiramu abaana. Okukubiriza abavubuka okunoonyereza ku by'obusuubuzi kisobola okutumbula obuyiiya n'obuvumu mu biseera bino ebizibu.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma two korona oweko gangi mapol odong gang, obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me nongo yoo me konyo lutino. Cuku cwiny dano matino me cako biacara twero weko gi bedo ki diro me tic I kare man ma kwo tek tutwal-li.
teo_prompt: Kwape abu adeka koinak ikalia luipu aiboi ore, ajokuna noi adumun iwaitin lu iswamaete ejok kanu aisisianakin idwe. Aisinyikokit atumunak aingic nuka agwelanar epedori aitopolor acoa naitetet kotoma apakio kanu nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'dezaniri ni familia karakara eyi omi aa'zu akua risi, eri eca orodriru geri orodriru 'diyi esuzu anzi nyiri eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu. E'yo 'ba ode eyini ava fezu e'yo tujari 'yezu ri ma omgbo otuzu ri eco fe 'ba eyini aa'zu 'ba e'yo ndundu eyi edepi 'diyi be sa'wa ewaru 'diyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwa korona ku bwareteire amaka maingi kuguma omuka, kikareetaho oburemeezi bw'okusherura oburyo burungi bw'okureeta abaana omu by'okwega. Okugaruramu amaani eminyeeto okushwijuma eby'obushubuzi, nikibaasa kureetaho okujumbura n'okugumisiriza omu bwire obu obw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: As families adjusted to life at home, many parents began to notice changes in their children's daily routines. With schools closed and activities canceled, children found themselves exploring new interests and hobbies.
lug_prompt: Amaka bwegeeyongera okumanyiira obulamu bw'awaka, abazadde bangi baatandika okwetegereza enkyukakyuka mu mirimu gy'abaana baabwe egya buli lunaku. Ng'amasomero gaggaddwa n'emirimu ne gisazibwamu, abaana beesanga nga banoonya ebintu ebipya bye baagala n'ebyo bye baagala ennyo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma gangi gubedo ka ngiyo ki kwo me gang, lunyodo mapol gucako neno aloka-loka I kwo pa lutino gi. Ki loro gangi kwan ki ngolo tic mapat-pat, lutino gunongo ni gitye ka yenyo jami manyen me atima.
teo_prompt: Neajeniata ikalia aijar ore, apotu auriak kowanyutu aijulanakineta kotoma aswamisinei nuka idwekec. Keda agolokinio na isomeroi ka aikisario naka aswamisinei, apotu idwe odumutu kesi epodokinito aswamisinei nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: Familia eyini e'dozu aa'zu akua risi, tipika karakara eyi e'do ojata eyi ma anzi eyi ma 'yeta o'du driasi 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ndre. Sukulu eyi ma ti opizu azini 'yeta eyi atrizu risi, anzi nyiri eyi esu eyi e'yo ndundu eyini le 'ye eyi ma ngulupi si.
nyn_prompt: Amaka ku garikwetegyereza amagara g'omuka, abazaire baingi bakatandika kureeba empindahinduka omu mirimo y'abaana baabo eya buriizooba. Ahabw'okukinga amashomero n'okushazamu emirimo, abaana bakeesherurira eby'okukunda ebisya.

eng_prompt: Engaging children in hands-on experiences can foster a strong work ethic and a sense of responsibility. One effective way to achieve this is by introducing them to activities that promote teamwork and self-sufficiency.
lug_prompt: Okwenyigiramu abaana mu bye bayitamu kisobola okutumbula empisa z'emirimu ez'amaanyi n'obuvunaanyizibwa. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okutuukiriza kino kwe kubayingiza mu mirimu egitumbula okukolera awamu n'okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: Kelo lutino I jami ma otimme I komgi twero weko gibedo ki cwiny me tic matek dok bene giwinyo ni gitye ki twero. Yo acel maber tutwal me cobo man en aye me nyutu botgi jami ma weko gitiyo kacelo dok gi nongo jami ma mite pigi kengi.
teo_prompt: Aijaikin idwe aswam iboro lu iswamaete kesi epedori aitopolor eswamae loajokan keda aswam ejok. Epone ediopebon loka aitodolikin ngun ngesi aitodiar kes aswamisinei nu isinyikokitos aswam nepepe ka aitodolikin kes ikulepek bon.
lgg_prompt: E'yo anzi nyiri eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu eyi ma dria 'diyi ma alea ri ni fe eyini aa'zu azi ngazu okporu azini eyi ma aa e'yo azi ngazu kililiru 'diyi ma alea. Geri azi orodriru 'bani ecozu e'yo 'di 'yezu ri eri 'bani eyi e'dazu e'yo azi ngazu tualu dika eyi ma ngulupi ma ta mbazu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Okureetera abaana kwejumba omu mirimo erikukwata aha mikono, nikibaasa kureetaho emicwe mirungi aha mirimo hamwe n'obujunaanizibwa. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okukora eki n'okubeegyesa emirimo erikureetaho okukorera hamwe n'okwebaisaho.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a significant increase in teenage pregnancies within the community. As a result, district leaders are concerned about the potential impact on education and resources.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti omuwendo gw'abawala abafuna embuto gweyongedde nnyo mu kitundu. N'ekyavaamu, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti beeraliikirivu ku ngeri gye biyinza okukosaamu ebyenjigiriza n'ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni wel lutino anyira matye ka yac tye ka medde tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me district tye ki lworo I kom adwogi ne I kom kwan ki lim.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic napac ebe iyata noi apesur nudidika nu epotiete kotoma atutubet. Kanuka ngun, epodokitos engarenok luka edisitrikt nuikamunitos epone loepedoriata kesi aitolitol nuka asioman keda iboro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini ezoanzi nyiri eyini ecazu okporovu ru 'diyi ma kalafe tu ongulumu eyi ma alea ra. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo ecopi 'yepi onita ma dria azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka okweyongyera kw'abaishiki okutwara enda bakiri bato omu bantu. N'ekyarugiremu, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti, niberarikirira oku kirikubaasa kukwata ahaby'obwegyese hamwe n'eby'obugaiga.

eng_prompt: Open and honest communication about sexual health is crucial for young women. By discussing these topics, parents can help their daughters make informed choices.
lug_prompt: Okuwuliziganya mu bwesimbu ku byobulamu bw'okwegatta kwa mugaso nnyo eri abakyala abato. Mu kukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga zino, abazadde basobola okuyamba bawala baabwe okusalawo obulungi.
ach_prompt: Lok I ada ki ada I kom yotkom me butu imit obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi mon matino. Ka gunywako lok I kom lok magi, lunyodo twero konyo lutino anyira gi me moko tam maber.
teo_prompt: Einer na epukora ka abeit nuikamunitos angaleu naka aelo erai ibore yenepol noi kanejaas angor nudidika. Kowai lo aitemitem akiro nu, epedorete auriak aingarakin apesur kec aiswamaun aseununeta nuajokak.

nyn_prompt: Okugamba amazima n'obwesigwa aha magara g'okuteerana n'eky'omugasho munonga aha bakazi bato. Abazaire ku barikuhanuura aha nshonga ezi, nibabaasa kuhwera abaishiki baabo kucwamu gye.

eng_prompt: In response to recent concerns about adolescent health, the school board has decided to enhance its educational programs. As part of this initiative, the district leaders will send sex education messages to the girls.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okwaliwo gye buvuddeko ku bulamu bw'abavubuka, akakiiko k'essomero kasazeewo okutumbula pulogulaamu zaako ez'okusoma. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti bajja kusindikira abawala obubaka obukwata ku by'okwegatta.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma obedo tye cokcok-ki I kom yotkom pa lutino anyira, dul ma doro lok kom kwan omoko tamgi me medo rwom me yub me kwan gi. Macalo but yub man, lutela me dictri komyero gucwal kwena me pwonyo lutino anyira i kom butu imit.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin nuikamunitos angaleu naka atumunak, abu eyaitene lo esomero kitogogong ainapeta ke nuka aisisia. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, epote engarenok luka edisitrikt aijukar akiro nuka aisisianakino nuka aelo mama ejaasi apesur.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza o'diru e'yo anzi zopi zozo 'diyi ma rua ala ma dria 'diyisi, sukulu ma driceza asi e'yo 'du otita onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu ra. Otita 'di ma azi ru, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi nga o'dukoti imbatani e'yo ali o'baza niri ma dria 'diyi ma ti pe ezoanzi eyidri.
nyn_prompt: Omu kugarukamu okwerarikirira okurikukwata aha magara g'eminyeeto,akakiiko k'eishomero kashaziremu kutunguura enteekateeka zaako z'eby'obwegyese. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti, nibeija kusindikira abaishiki obutumwa oburikukwata aha kuteerana.

eng_prompt: In response to rising concerns about illegal immigration and potential threats, officials have been evaluating current border policies. As a result of these assessments, the government has increased security at the border.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okulinnya ku kuyingira mu bukyamu n'okutiisibwatiisibwa okuyinza okubaawo, abakungu babadde beekenneenya enkola z'ensalo eziriwo. Olw'okukebera kuno, gavumenti eyongedde obukuumi ku nsalo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamede I kom dano ma donyo ilobo I yoo ma pe atir ki peko ma twero bedo tye, lutic gubedo ka ngiyo cik me wang lobo matye kombedi. Macalo adwogi me ngiyo jami magi, gamente omedo rwom me gwoko kuc I wang lobo.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naepol noi naikamunit abwotunak lumam ekisil ecamakinit keda atiokisio nuepedorete atakanun, eutasi eswamak airereor ainapeta nuka ikoruo. Kanuka airereonor akiro nu, eyataki apugan ayuwara koikoru.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi e'yo 'ba efipi kari amve 'diyi ma alea geri azita palaa ku 'diyisi azini e'yo ewaru ecopi e'dapi ra 'diyi ma dria, azi'ba eyi ebi azita boda eyini aa'zu sa'wa 'disi 'diyi ma ale andri. E'yo eti ondaza 'diyi ma e'yosi, gamete otu e'yo agei temani boda milea 'diyi ma omgbo ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira okurikukwata aha bantu abarikuruga omu ihanga bataine rusa hamwe n'oburemeezi oburikubaasa kubaho, abakungu batwire nibashwijuma engyenderwaho y'ensharo eriho obwahati. Ahabw'okushwijuma ebintu ebi, gavumenti eyongyeire eby'okwerinda aha nsharo.

eng_prompt: In response to rising concerns about safety and security, officials have been discussing strategies to enhance law enforcement in vulnerable regions. Recent reports indicate a significant increase in crime rates along the borders, prompting urgent action.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bikwata ku bukuumi n'obutebenkevu, abakungu babadde bateesa ku ngeri y'okutumbula okukwasisa amateeka mu bitundu ebyesudde. Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti obuzzi bw'emisango bweyongedde ku nsalo, ekireetera abantu okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom gwoko kuc ki ber bedo, lutic gubedo ka lok I kom yoo me medo rwom me keto cik itic I kabedo ma peko tye iye. Lok ma okati cokcok-ki nyutu ni rwom me timo bal tye ka medde tutwal I wang lobo ma oweko omyero kitim gin mo oyot oyot.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naepol noi naikamunit ayuwara keda ayuwara, eutasi eswamak aitemitem iwaitin lu itikitikere ikisila kotoma aiboisio nuetioko. Itodunitos iripotan lu atuboros ebe iyata noi abilibilio naka ikisila koikoru, ido itodunit ebe ibusakinit aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi ageitema ma dria, azi'ba eyi e'bi agbatara gba geri eyini ecozu azita eyi ma ta mbazu angu e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma dria. O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini e'yo onzi eyi ma omgbo ni tu boda mile eyi ma dria ra, e'yo 'di fe 'bani e'yo 'yezu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira ahaby'okwerinda, abakuru batwire nibagamba aha mihanda y'okureeberera ebiragiro omu byanga ebitarikwebaasa. Ripoota eziherize kukorwa, nizooreka okweyongyera kw'obukozi bw'ebibi aha nsharo, ekirikworeka ngu hariho ekishemereire kukorwa ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: In light of the escalating tensions and recent conflicts, it is crucial for all military personnel to work together. Unity among the troops will be essential for maintaining stability and fostering trust within the community.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bunkenke obweyongera n'obukuubagano obwaliwo gye buvuddeko, kikulu nnyo abajaasi bonna okukolera awamu. Obumu mu magye bujja kuba bwa mugaso mu kukuuma obutebenkevu n'okutumbula obwesige mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle matye kamede ki lweny matye cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal ni lumony weng omyero gutii kacelo. Ribe ikin lumony bibedo gin ma pire tek pi gwoko kuc ki gen ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo iyatakinor atiokisio keda ingungeta, ejokuna noi isirikaalei kere aswam nepepe. Aimorikikina kiding ajore erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar ainapakina ka aitopolor amunokina kotunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tupi 'diyi ma e'yo si, eri orodriru asikari dria yini azi ngazu tualu. Ti ecita asikari eyi ma eselea ri ni mu adri orodriru asianzu ma tambazu dika asi'baza ejizu ongulumu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obunkenke obweyongyeire hamwe n'entaro ezihweireho, niky'omugasho abaserukare kukorera hamwe. Okukwatanisa omu mahe nikiija kuba eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obusingye n'okureetaho obwesigye omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In recent months, escalating tensions and cross-border conflicts threatened the nation's security. To address these challenges, the government deployed additional troops to the region.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, obunkenke obweyongera n'obukuubagano ku nsalo byatiisa ebyokwerinda by'eggwanga. Okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kuno, gavumenti yaweereza amagye amalala mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato cokcok-ki, telle ki lweny matye I kin lobo mapat-pat oketo ber bedo pa lobo man I peko. Me tyeko peko magi, gamente ocwalo lumony mukene I twok piny eni.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, apol naka ingungeta keda ingungeta luka akwapin abu kitukurian ayuwara naka akwap. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu, abu apugan ijukak ajore aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, e'yo asi omiza ni tuzu tualu e'yo a'di 'diza boda milea 'diyi pie ri fe e'yo ageyitema ni kari 'di ma alea ri ni ecazu ewaru. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete eji asikari azi eyi angu 'da ma alea dika.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, obunkenke obweyongyeire hamwe n'entaro aha nsharo z'amahanga bikashiisha ebyokwerinda by'eihanga. Okukora aha buremeezi obu, gavumenti ekongyera amahe omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: In a recent escalation of conflict in the region, armed clashes broke out between local militias and government troops. Reports indicate that the Uganda People's Defence Forces were engaged in intense combat operations.
lug_prompt: Mu kwongera kw'obukuubagano mu kitundu gye buvuddeko, okulwanagana kw'emmundu kwabalukawo wakati w'abayeekera b'omu kitundu n'amagye ga gavumenti. Lipoota ziraga nti Uganda People's Defence Forces yeenyigira mu kulwanagana okw'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma lweny omedde I but lobo eni cokcok-ki, lweny obedo tye ikin lumony me tedero ki mony pa gamente. Adwogi tic nyutu ni Uganda People's Defence Forces obedo I lweny matek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apol naka ingungeta kotoma aiboisit kangin, apotu ingungeta kiding ajore keda ajore naka apugan. Itodunitos iripotan ebe ajai ajore nako Uganda toma ojie loepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'di 'diza angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma alea, e'yo a'di 'diza nyafe be 'diyi e'do asikari gamete ni 'diyi pie. O'duko ece kini asikari Uganda People's Defence Forces ni 'diyi fi e'yo a'di ni okporu 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu butabanguko obwahwaireho omu kyanga, hakabarukaho okurwanagana ahagati y'amahe ga gavumenti n'abantu b'omubyaro. Ripoota nizooreka ngu amahe ga Uganda People's Defence Forces gakaba gari omu mirimo y'amaani y'okurwanisa.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing conflicts and instability affecting several countries in East Africa, it is crucial for Uganda to take a proactive role in regional diplomacy. Collaborative efforts with neighboring nations can help address shared security challenges and promote lasting peace.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku ntalo n'obutali butebenkevu ebigenda mu maaso mu mawanga mangi mu buvanjuba bwa Afirika, kikulu nnyo Uganda okubaako ky'ekolawo mu nsonga z'omu kitundu. Kaweefube w'okukwatagana n'amawanga agaliraanyeewo asobola okuyamba okugonjoola okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyokwerinda era n'okutumbula emirembe egy'olubeerera.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lweny matye ka time I lobo mapat-pat manonge I but lobo Afrika kunyango, pire tek tutwal ni Uganda omyero obed tye I lok me cungu iwi-bye mapat-pat manonge I but lobo man. Ribe kacel ki lobe ma orumuwa twero konyo me tyeko peko me gwoko kuc ki kelo kuc ma rii.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ingungeta keda amamus na ainapakina kotoma akwapin nuka East Africa, ejokuna noi Uganda aitolot aswam naepol noi kotoma atutubet kangin. Aswam nepepe keda akwapin nu idunyare ingarakini aitemokin atiokisio nuka ayuwara ka aitopolor ainapakin na edaun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni azini e'yo ewaru kari East Africa ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru Uganda ni azi okporu 'yezu e'yo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma alea. Okpo 'bazu tualu kari jo ejele ru 'diyi pie ri eco azakoma fe e'yo ewaru eyini esu e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi ma aza kozu azini asianzu sa'wa ezu ri ma omgbo otuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entaro n'obutabanguko ebirikugyenda omu maisho omu mahanga g'oburugwa izooba bwa Africa, ni kikuru munonga Uganda kukora omurimo gw'amaani omu by'obutegyeki. Enkora y'okukwatanisa n'amahanga agatuherereire, neebaasa kuhwera omu kurwanisa oburemeezi bw'eby'okwerinda n'okureetaho obusingye.

eng_prompt: The country's strategic location in East Africa allows it to engage in trade with several neighboring nations. As a result, Uganda has developed a diverse export market to boost its economy.
lug_prompt: Ekifo ky'eggwanga mu buvanjuba bwa Afirika kisobozesa okwenyigira mu by'obusuubuzi n'amawanga agaliraanyeewo agawerako. N'ekivuddemu, Uganda efunye akatale k'ebyamaguzi ebweru w'eggwanga okusobola okutumbula ebyenfuna byayo.
ach_prompt: Kabedo pa lobo man maber tutwal I Afrika kunyango weko obedo ki gum me cato wil ki lobe mapol matye cok kwede. Macalo adwogi ne, Uganda odongo cuk ma pat pat me cato jami ma aa ki woko me medo rwom me lim meggi.
teo_prompt: Aiboisit naejok noi naka akwap kana ko East Africa einakini ngin agwelanar keda akwapin nuipu nu idunyare. Kanuka ngun, adumu Uganda esokoni lo egwelanarere iboro kinga kanu aitopolor edumune loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'di ma angu onyiru Africa ma kala etuni efuria ri ni fe erini tujari 'yezu kari jo ejele ru 'diyi pie. E'yo 'disi, kari Uganda niri esu cuu ndundu 'bani afa ozizu kari amve 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu geri robia esuzu 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omwanya murungi gw'eihanga omu mahanga g'oburugwa izooba bwa Afirika nigurikwikiriza kwejumba omu by'obushuubuzi n'amahanga agatwetorwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, Uganda etungire akatare k'ebintu ebirikuguzibwa aheeru y'eihanga kutunguura entaasya yaayo.

eng_prompt: In times of division and conflict, it is essential for those in power to set aside their differences. By prioritizing unity, they can foster a more harmonious and prosperous environment for everyone.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'enjawukana n'obukuubagano, kyetaagisa abo abali mu buyinza okulekawo enjawukana zaabwe. Nga bakulembeza obumu, basobola okutumbula embeera ey'obumu n'okukulaakulana eri buli omu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me apoka-poka ki lweny, pire tek tutwal pi joo matye I loc me weko apoka-poka meggi. Ka gimiyo ribe obedo gin ma pire tek, ci gi twero kelo kuc ki ber bedo pi dano weng.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu atiakatiaka ka ingungeta, ejokuna ngul luejaasi toma apugan ajalakin atiakatiaka kec. Kowai lo aisingarenit aimorikikina, epedorete kesi aitopolor aiboisit na imorikikina ka apol kanu itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa esele coza ni azini ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma alia, eri orodriru 'ba opi dria 'diyi ni e'yo yi ma esele cozu 'diyi kuzu kalaa. E'yo ti ecita niri 'bazu okporu risi, eyi eco angu aa'pi tualu tualu 'ba dria eyini ri ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okwebaganisamu n'obutabanguko, niky'omugasho abo abari omu bwebembezi okureka entaaniso zaabo aha rubaju. Kubarikutwara okukwatanisa nka kikuru, nibabaasa kureetaho obusingye n'obusingye ahabwa buri omwe.

eng_prompt: In any conflict, finding common ground often leads to more productive outcomes. When individuals work together, they can achieve goals that would be impossible alone.
lug_prompt: Mu bukuubagano bwonna, okufuna ensonga z'okkiriziganyaamu kitera okuvaamu ebirungi. Abantu bwe bakolera awamu, basobola okutuuka ku biruubirirwa bye batasobola kutuukako bokka.
ach_prompt: I lweny mo keken, nongo yoo me winye ipol kare kelo adwogi maber. Ka dano gitiyo kacelo, gitwero cobo miti ma onongo pe twero cobo gi kengi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma ongunget ediokere, adumun acamanara eyangauni akiro nuejokuka. Karai iswamaete itunga nepepe, epedorete kesi aitodolikin apeleikinata nu mam epedorete kesi aswam bon.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri ciri ma alea, e'yo ti icita ni 'diyi esuzu ri ni tutuni e'yo orodriru 'diyi eji. Ba alu alu ka azi nga tualu, eyi eco e'yo eyini eco 'ye eyi ma ngulupi si ku 'diyi esu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu ntongane zoona, okushanga enshonga z'okwikirizamu, nikireeta ebirikurugamu ebirungi. Abantu ku barikukorera hamwe, nibabaasa kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa ebi batabaasize kukora bonka.

eng_prompt: In recent months, community leaders have worked tirelessly to foster collaboration and understanding among residents. As a result, there is a growing sense of togetherness and shared purpose in Moyo district.
lug_prompt: Mu myezi egiyise, abakulembeze b'ekitundu bakoze butaweera okutumbula enkolagana n'okutegeeragana mu batuuze. N'ekivuddemu, waliwo okweyongerayongera kw'obumu n'ekigendererwa eky'awamu mu disitulikiti y'e Moyo.
ach_prompt: I dwe ma okato ni, lutela me tedero gutiyo matek tutwal me kelo winye ikin lutedero. Macalo adwogi ne, ribbe ki miti tye kamede i Moyo.
teo_prompt: Kolapio luatuboros, eswamata engarenok lu atutubet agogongu kanu aitopolor aiswamanara keda apuponoro kanejaas itunga. Kanuka ngun, ejai aimorikikina naepol noi kodisitrikta loko Moyo.
lgg_prompt: Mba agapi 'diyi ma alea, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi nga azi okposi ti ecita azini vata ejizu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, ti ecita azini e'yo 'bani 'yele tualuri distrikiti Moyo niri ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu myezi ehingwireho, abeebembezi b'ekyanga bakozire munonga okureetaho okukwatanisa n'okwetegyerezana omu batuuragye. N'ekyarugiremu, hariho okweyongyera kw'obumwe n'ekigyendererwa omu disiturikiti ya Moyo.

eng_prompt: The school organized a special event to enhance the skills of its student leaders. As part of this initiative, a comprehensive leadership training session was held yesterday.
lug_prompt: Essomero lyategese omukolo ogw'enjawulo okutumbula obukugu bw'abakulembeze baayo abayizi. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, okutendekebwa kw'obukulembeze okw'awamu kwabaddewo eggulo.
ach_prompt: Gang kwan ne oyubu yub ma pire tek tutwal me medo diro pa lutela pa lutino. Macalo but yub man, kipwonyo lutela weng laworo.
teo_prompt: Abu esomero itemok epucit lo itegelikina kanu aitojokar acoa naka engarenok lu esisiak. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi itolosai aituutoorio na engarenok bian.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu 'da otu omu azi wura ndusi ni ondua sukulu anzi eyi ma drice'ba eyini 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba 'ye imbata drice'ba eyi ma dria dria ri aje.
nyn_prompt: Eishomero rikatebekanisa omukoro gw'omutaano kutunguura emyoga y'abebembezi b'abeegi. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, omushomo gw'obwebembezi gukabaho nyomwebazyo.

eng_prompt: As civil unrest escalated and protests turned violent, the government faced mounting pressure to restore stability. In response to the growing chaos, officials made the difficult decision to deploy military forces.
lug_prompt: Obwegugungo bweyongera era okwekalakaasa ne kufuuka okw'effujjo, gavumenti yasanga akazito okweyongera okuzzaawo obutebenkevu. Olw'obutabanguko obweyongera, abakungu baakola okusalawo okw'amaanyi okw'okuyiwa amagye.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lweny omede ki jemo odoko gero, gamente onongo lyeto me dwoko kuc. Macalo adwogi me lweny matye kamede, lutic gumoko tam matek tutwal me cwalo mony.
teo_prompt: Kwape abu amumu kiyatakin kosodi aidiya araun na amumu, apotu apugan odumutu agogong naka ainyakun ainapakina. Kanuka amumu na iyata, apotu eswamak kiswamata aseunet na etiono noi naka aipikakin ajore.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni kari ma eselea 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu tualurisi, gamete isu e'yo okpo 'bazu asianzu ejizu ri ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo ngiringiri ni tupi tutu ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba eyi 'du e'yo ewaru asikari eyi ma ti pezu.
nyn_prompt: Obwimukiriro bw'abantu ku bwayeyongyeire hamwe n'okwesharinga okuhindukire okw'akaimukiriro, gavumenti ekatunga oburemeezi bw'okugaruraho obutebekana. Ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire, abakuru bakakora encwamu egumire y'okutamu amahe.

eng_prompt: In a bid to strengthen regional cooperation, leaders from various nations gathered for a crucial summit. The agenda focused on economic development and security challenges facing the region.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okunyweza enkolagana mu bitundu, abakulembeze okuva mu mawanga ag'enjawulo baakuŋŋaanidde mu lukiiko olukulu. Enteekateeka zaabadde ku nkulaakulana y'ebyenfuna n'okusoomoozebwa kw'ebyokwerinda mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I yub me jingo winye ikin lobe mapat-pat, lutela me lobe mapat-pat gugure pi coko mo ma pire tek tutwal. Yub eni oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom dongo lobo ki peko me gwoko kuc ma twok piny eni tye ka kato ki iye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong aiswamanara na aiboisio, apotu engarenok luka akwapin nuegelegela kimorikikinos toma airiamunet naepol noi. Apodokinit ainapeta ngun apol naka ikapun keda atiokisio nuka ayuwara nu ejaas atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu ti ecita angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, drice'ba kari ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi tra eyi mitingi okporu ni ma alea. Otita 'da 'ba asi e'yo angu ezoma ni azini e'yo ewaru ageyitema ni angu 'di ma alea 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura okukwatanisa omu byanga, abebembezi kuruga omu mahanga gatari gamwe, baketeeranira hamwe omu rukiiko rw'amaani. Ebirikukorwa bikaba nibikwata aha ntunguuka y'eby'entaasya hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'eby'okwerinda omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: After a thorough investigation into the incident, the department faced mounting pressure from the community to address the officers' actions. In a press conference, the chief of police acknowledged the severity of the situation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okunoonyereza mu bujjuvu ku byaliwo, ekitongole kyafuna akazito okuva mu bantu okukola ku bikolwa by'abasirikale. Mu lukung'aana lwa bannamawulire, akulira poliisi yakkiriza nti embeera yali mbi nnyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee kwed matut I kom ngo ma otimme, dul ne onongo lyeto madit tutwal ki bot lwak me timo gin mo I kom tim pa abili. I kare ma en tye ka lok ki luco lok angeya, ladit wi abili oyee ni peko ne obedo rac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aingic akiro ngun, abu edipatiment kodum aiyatakin kanejaas itunga kanu aitemokin nueswamaete eswamak. Kotoma airiamunet keda arotak iyemuto, abu lokapolon ipolisin kocam ationis na ejautene.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza e'yo 'da ma dria ri ma vutia, arakala 'da esu okpo engazu o'bi eyi vu e'yo 'yeta azi'ba 'da eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo nzeza 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie ri ma alea, drile polisi niri ai e'yo ewaru e'yo 'da ma dria ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okucondooza kurungi ebyabaireho,ekitongore kikashanga oburemeezi kuruga omu bantu kukora aha bikorwa by'abaserukare. Omu ruteerane rw'abanyamakuru, mukuru wa poriisi akaikiriza oburemeezi bw'embeera.

eng_prompt: In light of the escalating tensions and recent events, we sought guidance on how to express our concerns effectively. After considering our options, he advised us to resort to peaceful demonstrations.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke obweyongedde n'ebintu ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko, twanoonya okulambikibwa ku ngeri y'okwolesaamu ebitweraliikiriza mu ngeri ennungi. Oluvannyuma lw'okulowooza ku ngeri gye tuyinza okukikolamu, yatukubirizza okwekalakaasa mu mirembe.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle matye kamedde ki jami ma otimme cokcok-ki, wayenyo kony me nyutu lworo ma watye kwede maber tutwal. Ingee tam I kom ngo ma omyero watim, en omiyo itwa tam me jemo I kuc.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo iyatakinor atiokisio keda akiro nu iswamasi pac, apotu sio amoutu aingarenikinio kanu aitodun iboro lu epodokinit sio. Akaulo naka aomoom nuibusakinit oni aswam, abu ngesi kolimok iso alosit aidiya nainapakina.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu e'yo yi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi pie, ama nda imbata geri amani ecozu e'yo amani 'diyi ecezu kililiru ri ma dria. E'yo amani eco 'ye 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, fe amani imbata e'yo ngiringiri ni asianzuru 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obunkenke obweyongyeire hamwe n'ebyabaireho juba, tukashaba obuhabuzi aha ku turikubaasa kworeka enshonga zaitu kurungi. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma eby'okukora, akatuhabura ngu tukorese obwesharingo obw'obusingye.

eng_prompt: As part of the health screening process for our upcoming trip, the clinic required us to undergo several tests. One of the most important tests on the list was for tuberculosis.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekimu ku bikolwa by'okukebera ebyobulamu ku lugendo lwaffe olujja, akalwaliro kaali katwetaagisa okukeberebwa emirundi egiwerako. Ekimu ku by'okukebera ebisinga obukulu ku lukalala kwe kukebera akafuba.
ach_prompt: Macalo yoo me pimo yot kom pi wot wa matye kabino anyim, ot yat obedo kamito ni wapim jami mapol. Pimo acel ma pire tek tutwal I kin jami ne obedo me pimo two aona opio.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediope kotoma ainwakio kanu alositekosi, abu adekis kilip sio alosit ainwakio nuipu. Adiopet kotoma ainwakio naepol noi kotoma aiwadikaet kangin arai kanu adeka naka atapong.
lgg_prompt: Afa 'bani ama ma rua o'bizu aci ama vile emupi ri ma alea ri ma azi ru, arojo 'da le ama ma 'ye ama ma rua o'biza karakara. Afa 'bani o'bizu orodriru ndeni otita 'da ma alea ri ma azi eri azo tibi niri.
nyn_prompt: Nk'ekicweka ky'okukyeberwa ahabw'orugyendo rwaitu orurikwija, eirwariro rikwenda ngu tukyeberwe emirundi mingi. Kimwe aha kukyebera okw'omugasho okwabaire kuri aha rukarara.

eng_prompt: Recent reports indicate a significant rise in mosquito populations in the region. As a result, health officials are concerned about the increasing incidence of malaria.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti omuwendo gw'ensiri gweyongedde nnyo mu kitundu. N'ekyavaamu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu beeraliikirivu olw'okweyongera kw'omusujja gw'ensiri.
ach_prompt: Lok ma okati cokcok-ki nyutu ni wel ober tye ka medde tutwal I twok piny eni. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me yot kom tye ki lworo I kom nyaa pa two malaria.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos iripotan lu atuboros ebe iyata enaaba loka isiru kotoma aiboisit. Kanuka ngun, epodokitos eswamak luka angaleu kanu aiyatakin na eimidi.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini yiyia ma kalafe tu angu 'di ma alea ra. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo azo malaria niri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka okweyongyera kw'ensiri omu kyanga. N'ekyarugiremu, abakuru omu by'amagara berarikiriire okweyongyera kw'omushwija gw'ensiri.

eng_prompt: In many tropical regions, the prevalence of mosquito-borne diseases poses a significant health risk. Among these diseases, malaria particularly affects younger populations, leading to serious health complications.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi eby'obutiti, okusaasaana kw'endwadde z'ensiri kuleeta akabi ak'amaanyi eri obulamu. Mu ndwadde zino, omusujja gw'ensiri okusinga gukosa abantu abato, ekivaako obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu byobulamu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol ma piny lyet, bedo tye pa two ma ober kelo kelo peko madit tutwal I kom yotkom. I kin two magi, malaria tutwalle yelo jo matino, ma kelo peko mapol i komgi.
teo_prompt: Kaiboisio nuipu nu ekwam, epolor noi adekasinei nu eyangaununete isiru. Kotoma adekasinei nu, esuronokini eimidi itunga ludidik, ido eyangauni atiokisio nu angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Angu drizaru karakara 'diyi ma alia, azo yiyia ni eji 'diyi ma omgbo ni e'yo rua ala ni onzi 'diyi eji. Azo 'diyi ma eselea, malaria ni tutuni 'ba oderu 'diyi 'ye candi fepi e'yo rua ala ni onzi 'diyi ejipi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bicweka bingi eby'obutiti, okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikureetwa ensiri, nikireeta akabi kahango aha magara. Omu ndwara ezi, omushwija gw'ensiri nigukira kuteganisa abantu bato, ekirikureeta oburemeezi bw'amaani aha magara gaabo.

eng_prompt: After experiencing mild symptoms and a positive test result, she decided to take precautions for the safety of those around her. As a result, she has been under self-isolation for a week.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna obubonero obutono n'ebyava mu kukebera okuzuuliddwa, yasalawo okwegendereza olw'obukuumi bw'abo abamwetoolodde. N'ekyavaamu, abadde mu kweyawula ku balala okumala wiiki nnamba.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo lanyut matino-tino ki adwoki me pim ma obedo ber, en omoko tamme me gwokke pi ber bedo pa joo ma orumu. Macalo adwogi ne, en obedo kene pi cabit acel.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ajaut keda aanyuneta nuepataka keda akiro nuka ainwakio, abu ngesi kotema ebe ibusakinit ngesi ayuwar itunga luejaasi ngesi. Kanuka ngun, egitakina ngesi bon adaun esabiti ediope.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erini e'dazu 'bori ma vutia azini e'yo 'bani eri ma rua o'bizu 'bori ma vutia, eri asi 'du e'yo 'duzu 'ba eri ma ageia 'diyi ma ta mbazu. E'yo 'disi, ebi i ma esele co sabiti alu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okureeba obubonero bukye n'ebyarugire omu kukyeberwa, akasharamu kwegyendesereza ahabw'okwerinda kw'abo abaabaire bamwetooroire. N'ekyarugiremu, atwire omu keeshereko kumara esande emwe.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote health and wellness in the workplace, the company decided to implement a comprehensive health screening program. As part of this initiative, all employees were tested for diabetes.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulamu n'obulamu obulungi mu bifo by'emirimu, kampuni yasalawo okussa mu nkola enteekateeka y'okukebera ebyobulamu mu bujjuvu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, abakozi bonna baakeberebwa obulwadde bwa sukaali.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor lok me yot kom I gang tic, dul ne omoko tamgi me keto yub me pimo yot kom I tic. Macalo but yub man, kipimo lutic weng pi two diabetes.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor nuka angaleu keda aijar najokan kotoma aiboisio nuka aswam, abu ekampuni kitolomu ainapeta nuka ainwakio. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi inwakai eswamak kere kanu adeka naka esukali.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo alataa ni azini aa'ta muke ri ma omgbo otuzu pari azi ngazu 'diyi ma alea, amuti 'da 'du e'yo 'yezu otita 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua o'bizu dria ri 'bazu 'yeta ma alea. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba andri azi'ba dria yi ma rua sukari azo si.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'amagara n'amagara marungi omu myanya y'emirimo, kampuni ekasharamu kutaho enteekateeka y'okukyebera eby'amagara. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, abakozi boona bakakyeberwa oburwaire bwa sukaari.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continued to spread, health officials issued new guidelines for public safety. In a meeting with our community leaders, we discussed the importance of social distancing measures.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyeyongera okusaasaana, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baafulumya ebiragiro ebipya eby'obukuumi bw'abantu. Mu lukiiko n'abakulembeze b'ekitundu kyaffe, twayogedde ku bukulu bw'okwewa amabanga.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma two korona omedde ki nya, lutic yoto kom gumiyo cik manyen me gwoko kwo pa lwak. I kacoke ma wabedo kwede ki lutela me kabedo wa, wanywako lok I kom ber pa bedo mabor ki dano mukene.
teo_prompt: Neinyikokinit adeka aisiarakin, apotu eswamak luka angaleu itolomutu aicoreta nuitetiak kanu ayuara na itunga. Kotoma airiamunet keda engarenok lu atutubetekosi, apotu sio etetemoto ajokis naka alaikina.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ma ereta ni mu drile, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ofu azita o'diru eyi o'bi eyi ma tambazu. Drifuza ama vile drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie ri ma alea, ama agbatara gba orodri 'bani 'ba eyi ma esele cozu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire ku bwayeyongyeire kujanjaara, abakuru omu by'amagara bakataho ebiragiro bisya by'okwerinda abantu. Omu rukiiko n'abebembezi b'ebyanga byaitu, tukahanuura aha mugasho gw'okwerinda amaizi.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, the health official outlined the importance of following safety protocols. To protect ourselves and others, he emphasized that we should wear our masks.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko, omukungu w'ebyobulamu yalambika obukulu bw'okugoberera amateeka g'obukuumi. Okusobola okwekuuma n'okukuuma abalala, yakikkaatirizza nti tulina okwambala masiki zaffe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke, latic me yot kom otito ber pa lubu cik me gwoko kwo. Me gwoko kwo wa ki jo mukene, en owaco ni myero waruk labo dog ki um.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet, abu eswaman loka angaleu kitetem ajokis naka atupakin ainapeta nuka ayuwara. Kanu ayuarite awatewok keda luce, abu ngesi kitogogong ebe ibusakinit oni ainap aitabalan nurapis aituk keda ekume.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, azi'ba alatani 'da ece orodri e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma vuti obizu ri ra. Ama ta mbazu ama ma ngulupi ma ta mbazu tualu 'ba azi 'diyi pie, eri 'ba asi kini ama ma osu ama vile afa andreti a'buzu 'diyi ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, orikukurira eby'amagara, akashoboorora omugasho gw'okukuratira ebiragiro by'okwerinda. Okwerinda hamwe n'abandi, akakihamya ngu tushemereire kujwara masiki zaitu.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, the safety officer emphasized the importance of protecting our sensitive information. He encouraged us to adhere to all the security measures.
lug_prompt: Mu lukiiko, omukungu w'ebyokwerinda yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukuuma obubaka bwaffe obw'ekyama. Yatukubiriza okugoberera amateeka gonna agakwata ku by'okwerinda.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacoke, latic me gwoko kuc owaco ni pire tek tutwal me gwoko ngec ma itye kwede. En ocuku cwiny wa me lubu cik ma kwako gwoko kuc ki ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet, abu eswaman loka ayuwara kitogogong ajokis naka ayuwar akiro nuka aiyeyea. Abu ngesi isinyikok iso aitup ainapeta kere nuka ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, azi'ba ageitema ni 'da fe okpo orodri amani e'yo amani 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria. Eri ai ama azita dria ageitema ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, ofiisa w'eby'okwerinda akasisinkana omugasho gw'okurinda amakuru gaitu ag'ekihama. Akatuhiga kukuratira ebiragiro by'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: After noticing some unusual symptoms, the group gathered to discuss their health concerns. Concerned about their well-being, they agreed it was time to seek professional advice.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulaba obubonero obutonotono, ekibinja kyakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku byobulamu byabwe. Olw'okufaayo ku mbeera yaabwe, bakkiriziganya nti kye kiseera okufuna amagezi okuva eri abakugu.
ach_prompt: Inge neno lanyut mogo mapat-pat, dul ne gugure me nywako lok I kom lok me yot-komgi. Pi lworo pi kwo gi, guye ni kare dong oromo me nongo tam kibot ludiro.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na awanyun ijenuneta ice lumam etapit, apotu egurupu kiriamunos kanu aitemitem nuikamunitos angaleukec. Kanu apodokinit nuka aijar kec, apotu kesi ocamutu ebe erai apak na adumun aicoreta nuka ipirioitin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ecetaru 'diyi ndrezu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyi ma rua ala ni 'diyi ma dria. Asi otiza eyidri ma e'yosi, eyi ai ra kini sa'wa ca 'bo imbata esuzu 'ba nita be angiri 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okureeba obubonero butari bwa buriijo, guruupu ekateeranira hamwe kuhanuura ahaby'amagara gaabo. Ahabw'okwerarikirira aha magara gaabo, bakaikirizana ngu n'obwire bw'okuronda obuhabuzi bw'abakugu.

eng_prompt: After weeks of battling a severe illness, she finally received the good news from her doctor. The relentless fever and fatigue had taken a toll on her, but now she could finally see a light at the end of the tunnel.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera ng'alwanagana n'obulwadde obw'amaanyi, yafuna amawulire amalungi okuva eri omusawo we. Omusujja ogutaggwaawo n'obukoowu byali bimukosezza, naye kati yasobola okulaba ekitangaala ku nkomerero y'omukutu.
ach_prompt: Inge lweny ki two marac pi cabit mapol, en dong onongo kwena maber ki bot dakta. Lyeto kacel ki oolo ma obedo ka medde ameda onongo dong okelo peko madit tutwal I kome, ento kombedi dong onongo twero neno mac I agiki me lyeto ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aitiji adeka naronon, abu ngesi kodum iyemuto luajokak kanejai emuronike. Amuna ngesi noi adeka naka eimidi keda apasit, konye kwana abu ngesi kopedo asesen aica kangetakinet naka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani a'di 'dizu azo onzi be 'bori ma vutia, eri esu asizu e'yo onyiru engazu i vile dakitari vu ra. Azo feza azini andeza okporu 'diyi 'du eri ma dria okpo angiri, te sawa 'disi eri eco asizu aci ndre angu 'da ma asiria ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara esande nyingi arikurwana n'oburwaire bw'amaani, ahamuheru akatunga amahurire marungi kuruga owa dokita we. Omushwija ogutahwaho hamwe n'oburuhe bikamutwariraho amaani, kwonka hati akaba naabaasa kureeba omushana ahamuheru gw'omuhanda.

eng_prompt: In an effort to maintain order and uphold the rule of law, the government has announced strict measures against those who defy official instructions. As a result, individuals who openly challenge the authority of the presidency will face serious consequences.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma emirembe n'obukulembeze bw'amateeka, gavumenti erangiridde ebikolwa ebikakali eri abo abajeemera ebiragiro ebitongole. N'ekyavaamu, abantu abawakanya pulezidenti mu lwatu bajja kufuna ebizibu eby'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me gwoko kuc ki woro cik, gamente otito yoo matek tutwal me lweny i kom joo ma kwero lubu cik pa gamente. Macalo adwogi ne, dano ma kwero twero pa ladit lobo I wang lwak binongo adwogi marac tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aidar ainapakina keda apugan na ikisila, elimorit apugan nuepedorete aswam mama ejaasi ngul lumam etupitos aicoreta nuka apugan. Kanuka ngun, itunga lu itepegete apedor naka lokapolon akwap epote adumun atiokisio nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu kililiru azini azita ma ta mbazu, gamete azi e'yo okporu 'diyi 'ba azita o'bale 'diyi ma ti ga'baa 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba drice'ba kari ni 'diyi ma okpo a'di 'dipi 'diyi nga dri fu e'yo onzi eyi be.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda obusingye n'obutegyeki, gavumenti erangirire ebikorwa by'amaani ahari abo abarikuhakanisa ebiragiro by'eihanga. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu abarikuhakanisa obushoborozi bw'omwebembezi w'eihanga, nibaija kutunga ebiraarugyemu.

eng_prompt: As the crowd grew restless and tensions escalated, the officers were ordered to take control of the situation. With their faces set in grim determination, they prepared to enforce the law without hesitation.
lug_prompt: Abantu bwe beeyongera okutabuka n'obunkenke ne bweyongera, abasirikale baalagirwa okufuga embeera. Olw'obumalirivu bwabwe obw'amaanyi, beetegekera okukwasisa amateeka awatali kulonzalonza.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak gubedo ma cwinygi pe yom dok lworo omedde, ki lego abili me doro ngo matye katimme. Ki wanggi ma ocung matek tutwal, guyube me keto cik itic labongo galle.
teo_prompt: Neapolor itunga aiyalongong ka aiyalongong, aponi kolimokinai ipolisin aitikitik ejautene. Apotu kesi kopedosi aitodolikin ekisil ngol komam abuonokin.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini ecazu ava koko dika e'yo eyi ma eselea ri ni tu uru, 'ba fe azita azi'ba eyini e'yo 'da ma aza kozu. Yi ma andretia e'yo asi driasi, eyi otu eyi azita 'da 'bazu okpo alea e'yo kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Abantu ku baayeyongyeire kutabanguka hamwe n'obunkenke, abaserukare bakahaburwa kutwara embeera omu ngaro. Baketeekateekyera kuta ebiragiro omu nkora bateine kubuzabuzibwa.

eng_prompt: After weeks of battling a high fever and debilitating fatigue, the doctors finally confirmed their worst fears. Despite their efforts to treat him, the illness had taken a devastating toll on his body.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala wiiki eziwera nga balwanagana n'omusujja n'obunafu, abasawo baasobola okukakasa okutya kwabwe. Wadde nga baakola kyonna ekisoboka okumujjanjaba, obulwadde bwali bukosezza nnyo omubiri gwe.
ach_prompt: I ngee cabit mapol me lweny i kom lyeto ki olo, ludaktari dong gumoko lworo gi marac loyo weng. Kadi bed ni gutiyo matek me cango two ne, two ne obalo kome tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka aitiji eimidi loepol noi keda apasit naepol noi, apotu imurok kitogogongoto akuriau kec. Karaida apotu kesi iswamata kagogong kanu aimuke ngesi, apotu adekasinei onyamata akuan ke noi.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia a'di 'dizu rua driza be tualu andeza be, dakitari eyi esu asizu e'yo eyini 'ye onzi ndeni 'diyi ra. Yi ma okpo eri atizu ra ti, azo 'da eza eri ma rua onzi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okurwana n'omushwija gw'amaani hamwe n'oburuhe, abashaho bakahendera bahamya okutiina kwabo. Oihireho amaani agu bateireho kumuragurira, oburwaire bukaba bumutwarize kubi munonga.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continued to spread, many individuals found themselves grappling with new health guidelines. One of the most contentious measures was the requirement to wear masks in public spaces.
lug_prompt: Ekirwadde bwe kyagenda kyeyongera okusaasaana, abantu bangi beesanga nga batawaanyizibwa n'ebiragiro by'ebyobulamu ebipya. Ekimu ku bintu ebyasinga okukaayanirwa kwe kwambala masiki mu bifo eby'olukale.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma two korona omedde ki nya, dano mapol onongo tek tutwal me lubu cik manyen me yot kom. Yub acel ma obedo ki apoka-poka madit tutwal obedo cik me ruko labo dog ki um I kabedo ma lwak tye iye.
teo_prompt: Neinyikokinit adeka aisiarakin, apotu itunga luipu odumutu ebe etionikinitos keda aicoreta nuitetiak nuka angaleu. Adiopet koboro lu engunget noi ngesi ainap aitabala narapis aituk keda ekume kotoma aiboisio nuipu itunga.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ma ereta ni mu drile, 'ba karakara eyi esu eyi dri ci azita o'diru e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyisi. E'yo azi 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma su afa andreti a'buzu 'diyi pari o'bi eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea ri ma azi.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwagumiizemu kujanjaara, abantu baingi bakashanga nibarwanagana n'ebiragiro ebisya ebirikukwata ahaby'amagara. Kimwe aha bintu ebyabaire nibihakanisa munonga, n'ekiragiro ky'okujwara masiki omu myanya y'abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: Despite the ongoing pandemic and strict regulations in place, she decided to go out without a mask. Authorities had warned the public repeatedly about the importance of following health guidelines.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe n'ebiragiro ebikakali, yasalawo okufuluma nga tayambadde kakookolo. Ab'obuyinza baali balabudde abantu enfunda n'enfunda ku bukulu bw'okugoberera ebiragiro by'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni two korona tye ka nyaa ki cik matek tutwal, en omoko tamme me cito woko labongo labo dog ki um. Lutela gu ciko lwak tyen mapol pi ber pa lubu cik me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai adeka naka ekorona keda ikisila luipikakinitai, abu ngesi koseu alosit kinga komamei aituk keda ekume. Apotu apedorosio ikwenyasi itunga irwan ipu nuikamunitos ajokis na atupakin aicoreta nuka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ni muzu drile azini azita okporu 'diyi ma talasi, eri 'du e'yo muzu amve afa andreti a'buzuri kokoru. Okpo e'ipi 'diyi fe bile ndu liza o'bi eyini e'yo orodri azita alata ni 'diyi ma vuti obizu ri ma dria pale karakara.

eng_prompt: Health officials are closely monitoring the situation as new variants continue to emerge. Recent reports indicate a surge in infections across several regions.
