ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom tye ka ngiyo kit ma jami tye ka time kwede pien kwai two mapat-pat matye kabino. Adwogi tic ma otimme cokcok-ki nyutu ni wel dano matye ka nongo two omede tutwal I but lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Eutasi eswamak lu adekis aanyanar ejok ejautene ngol naarai iyata iponesio luitetiak luka adekasinei. Itodunitos iripotan lu atuboros ebe eyatakinos adekasinei kotoma aiboisio nuipu.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'yo nderi ma pamvu andri e'yo esele o'diru 'diyi ni e'daria. O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo esupi 'diyi ma kalafe tu angu kala karakara eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bariyo nibareebuuza embeera ahabw'okugira ngu endwara z'emiringo etari emwe n'emwe nizigumizamu niziija. Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka okweyongyera kw'oburwaire omu byanga bitari bimwe na bimwe.

eng_prompt: In light of recent health concerns, it is crucial to prioritize cleanliness and hygiene. Experts recommend implementing strict sanitation practices to reduce the risk of infection.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku byobulamu ebibaddewo gyebuvuddeko, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza obuyonjo n'obuyonjo. Abakugu bakubiriza okuteekawo enkola ey'obuyonjo okukendeeza ku bulabe bw'okukwatibwa obulwadde.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal me keto lengo obed gin ma pire tek. Ludiro miyo tam me gwoko lengo pi dwoko piny rwom me nongo two.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos nuka angeleu, ejokuna noi aisingarenit nuka aila ka aila. Icorakitos ipirioitin aitodolikin ainapeta nuka aila kanu aitidisiar ationis naka adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo alata ni 'diyi 'duzu okporu. Ba e'yo nipi saaru 'diyi fe imbata geri alata ni okporu 'diyi 'bazu e'yo azo ni 'diyi ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enshonga z'eby'amagara, n'eky'omugasho kwebembeza obuyonjo n'obwegyendesereza. Abakugu nibahabura okukuratira engyenderwaho y'eby'obuyonjo okukyendeeza akabi k'okukwatwa oburwaire.

eng_prompt: After months of uncertainty and isolation, we eagerly awaited any news about the restrictions. The day finally arrived when we heard the announcement that the lockdown would be lifted.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'obutali bukakafu n'okweyawula, twalinda n'obwagazi amawulire gonna agakwata ku bukwakkulizo. Olunaku lwatuuka lwe twawulira ekirangiriro nti omuggalo gwali gugenda kuggyibwawo.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me bedo ki akala-kala ki bedo kenwa, wabedo kakuru ki miti madit lok angeya mo keken I kom kigeng ne. Nino oo I agiki ne I kare ma wawinyo lok angeya ni kiloro piny woko.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka amamus acamanar keda luce, apotu sio idarakisi akiro nuikamunitos ikisila. Abu aparan kodolu kapak kana apupunia sio alimoret ebe eponio alemar agolokinio naka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani aa'zu e'yo kokoru azini aa'zu a'dule 'bori ma vutia, ama te asi driasi e'yo azi e'yo 'bani 'ba atrizu 'diyi ma dria ri te. O'du 'da eca asizu amani e'yo erizu kini 'ba nga angu ti opiza 'da 'du ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi gatari gamwe, tukategyereza amakuru agarikukwata aha bukwakurizo. Eizooba rikahika obu twahurira ekirango ngu akeshereko nikaza kwihwaho.

eng_prompt: Law enforcement plays a crucial role in maintaining public safety and order. Their primary responsibility is to uphold the law and ensure that those who break it are held accountable.
lug_prompt: Abakwasisa amateeka bakola omulimu gwa maanyi mu kukuuma emirembe n'obutebenkevu mu bantu. Obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe obukulu kwe kukuuma amateeka n'okukakasa nti abo abagaamenya bavunaanibwa.
ach_prompt: Lugwok cik tye ki tic madit tutwal I gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pa lwak. Tic gi ma pire tek aye me gwoko cik ki neno ni joo ma turu cik ki ngolo kop iwigi.
teo_prompt: Apedorosio nu ikisila iswamaete aswam naepol noi kowai lo aidar ayuwara keda ainapakina. Aswam kec naepol noi erai aitogogong ikisila ka awanyun ebe ngul lu ebilibilete ikisila eponio aitepesen.
lgg_prompt: Ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi azi okporu nga o'bi eyi ma tambazu. Azi yini okori lezu azita ma ta mbazu azini ndrezu kini 'ba azita nyo'baa 'diyi nga e'yo 'ye ra.
nyn_prompt: Abarikukwasa ebiragiro nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda obusingye n'obutebekana omu bantu. Obujunanizibwa bwabo obukuru n'okurinda ebiragiro n'okureeba ngu abo abarikubihenda nibajunanwa.

eng_prompt: After discussing our schedules and priorities, we realized that attending wasn't feasible for us. Ultimately, we decided it was best to focus on other commitments.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ku nteekateeka zaffe n'ebyo bye tukulembeza mu bulamu, twakizuula nti okubeerawo tekusoboka gye tuli. Mu nkomerero, twasalawo nti kyandibadde kirungi okussa essira ku bintu ebirala.
ach_prompt: Inge nywako lok I kom yub megwa ki jami ma wamito, waniang ni bedo tye I yub ne pe obedo gin ma watwero timone. I agiki ne, wamoko tam wa me keto cwiny wa I kom jami mukene.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitemitem nuikamunitos ainapetawok keda iboro luapolok, apotu sio awanyutu ebe mam alosit epedori oni. Kawasia, apotu sio aseutu ebe ejokuna noi apodokinit aswamisinei ace.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzezu ama vile otita azini e'yo okporu 'diyi ma dria 'bori ma vutia, ama esu ra kini muzu 'da econi ama dri ku. Asizu, ama 'du e'yo kini eri muke ndeni asi 'bazu e'yo azi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura aha ntebeekanisa yaitu hamwe n'ebi tushemereire kwebembeza, tukareeba ngu okuzayo tikirikubaasika ahariitwe. Ekyarugiremu, tukasharamu ngu nikirungi okuta amaani aha mirimo endiijo.

eng_prompt: Before entering the restaurant, we noticed a sign reminding patrons to maintain good hygiene. Following the guidelines, we made sure to wash our hands at the entrance.
lug_prompt: Nga tetunnayingira mu kirabo ky'emmere, twalaba ekipande ekijjukiza abaguzi okukuuma obuyonjo. Nga tugoberera ebiragiro, twakakasa okunaaba engalo zaffe nga tuyingira.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe wadonyo I ot cam, waneno lanyut ma poyo wi luwil me gwoko lengo. I lubu cik, wanen ni walwoko cingwa I kare ma watye kadonyo.
teo_prompt: Erongo sio elomaria ooteri, apotu sio awanyutu apapula naisiitikini itunga aidar aila. Atupitos aicoreta, apotu sio aanyutu ebe ilosi sio akanin kosi kapatania sio.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di ama fi pari nyaka nyazu 'da ma alea ku, ama ndre e'da 'ba afa je'baa 'diyi egazu alata ma tambazu. Azita o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obizu, ama ne ra kini ama oji ama ma dri yini firia.
nyn_prompt: Tutakaizire omu hooteeri, tukareeba ekipande ekirikwijusya abaguzi kuguma bari abayonjo. Okukuratira ebiragiro, tukahamya ngu twanaaba omungaro twaheza kutaaha.

eng_prompt: Despite widespread awareness campaigns about the importance of vaccinations, a significant number of families remained hesitant. Concerns about vaccine safety and misinformation contributed to the decline in immunization rates.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waaliwo okusaasaanya amawulire ku bukulu bw'okugema, amaka mangi gaasigala gatya. Okweraliikirira ku bukuumi bw'eddagala erigema n'obubaka obukyamu byaviirako okukendeera kw'emiwendo gy'okugema.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub me rweyo lwak i kom ber pa gwero dano obedo tye, pol pa gangi gubedo ki lworo. Lworo pi gwero dano ki ngec ma pe atir okelo dwoko piny rwom me gwero dano.
teo_prompt: Karaida ikampeins luipu luka aisisianakin itunga ajokis naka aikis ekato, apotu ikalia luipu kibiroros. Apodokinit nuka ayuwara naka ikee luikisere ekato keda akiro nuarokok abu koyangau aibiror naka aikis ekato.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani imbata fezu 'ba eyi ma dria e'yo orodri aro soza niri ma dria ri ma talasi, familia karakara eyi awi asi otiza be. Asi otiza e'yo azo atrizu 'diyi ma tambaza ma dria azini o'duko enzoru 'diyi fe ongmbo aro soza niri ma omgbo esizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ehururu y'okumanyisa abantu omugasho gw'okugyema, amaka maingi gakaguma gatarikwikiriza. Okwerarikirira ahabw'oburinzi bw'okugyema hamwe n'amakuru agatahikire bikareetaho okukyendeera kw'omuhendo gw'okugyema.

eng_prompt: To protect public health and prevent the spread of infectious diseases, it is essential that every child receives their vaccinations on schedule. Health experts strongly recommend that parents ensure their children are immunized against preventable illnesses.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu n'okutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa, kikulu nnyo buli mwana okugemebwa mu budde. Abakugu mu byobulamu bakubiriza nnyo abazadde okukakasa nti abaana baabwe bagemebwa endwadde eziziyizibwa.
ach_prompt: Me gwoko yotkom pa lwak ki gengo nya pa two ma kobo oyot, pire tek tutwal ni lutino weng gunong yat agwera gi ikare ki kome. Ludiro me yot kom cuko cwiny tutwal ni lunyodo omyero gunen ni ki gwero lutino gi i kom two ma gengo.
teo_prompt: Kanu ayuarite angaleu naka itunga ka aitikitik awea naka adekasinei nu ikopas, ejokuna noi ngin ikoku adumun ekato ke kotoma apak. Icorakitos ipirioitin luka angaleu noi auriak awanyun ebe ekato idwekec kanuka adekasinei nuitikokinos.
lgg_prompt: O'bi ma rua ala ma ta mbazu azini e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta atrizu, eri orodriru anzi nyiri dria eyini aro soza esuzu sa'wa dria. Ba nita be e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi fe imbata okporu tipika eyini nezu ra kini 'ba oso anzi eyivile 'diyi aro soza azo 'bani eco atri ra 'diyi si ra.
nyn_prompt: Okurinda amagara g'abantu n'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira, nikikuru ngu buri mwana agyemeshwe omu bwire obuhikire. Abakugu omu by'amagara nibahabura munonga abazaire okureeba ngu abaana baabo bagyemeserezibwa endwara ezirikubaasa kwetantarwa.

eng_prompt: Due to a series of complications during her delivery, the hospital staff was unable to administer the necessary vaccinations. As a result, she was not immunized at birth.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebizibu eby'enjawulo bye yafuna ng'azaala, abakozi b'eddwaliro tebaasobola kumugema. N'ekyavaamu, teyagemebwa nga yaakazaalibwa.
ach_prompt: Pi peko mapol ma obedo tye ikare me nywal, lutic me ot yat onongo pe gitwero miyo yat agwera ma mite. Macalo adwogi ne, pe ki gwere ikare ma kinywale.
teo_prompt: Kanuka atiokisio nuipu kapak naka aidoun, mam eswamak luka adekis apedoritos aikis ekato. Kanuka ngun, mam aponi ikisai ngesi ekato kapak na aidoun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru eri vile osita ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi awini aro soza kililiru 'diyi fe ku. E'yo 'disi, 'ba awini eri oso aro azo atrizurisi erini osizu 'bori ma vutia ku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi omu kuzaara, abakozi b'eirwariro tibarabaasize kumugyema. N'ekyarugiremu, taragyemirwe obu yazaarwa.

eng_prompt: In many communities, access to healthcare services can vary significantly. As a result, some health centres do not immunize children.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, okufuna obujjanjabi kuyinza okwawukana ennyo. N'ekivuddemu, amalwaliro agamu tegagemesa baana.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, yoo me nongo kony me yot kom pat-pat tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, odi yadi mukene pe gwero lutino.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, epatana adumun amukian. Kanuka ngun mam adekisia ace imukiaete idwe ekato.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, geri 'bani azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu ri eco aa ndu ndu saaru. E'yo 'disi, arojo azi 'diyi oso anzi nyiri eyi aro azo atrizu ri si ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu byanga bingi, okuhika aha buheereza bw'eby'amagara nikitaana munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, amarwariro agamwe tigarikusirika abaana.

eng_prompt: In today's world, children are exposed to various risks and challenges that can impact their well-being. It is essential for caregivers to take proactive measures to ensure their safety and development.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero, abaana boolekaganye n'obulabe obw'enjawulo n'okusoomoozebwa ebiyinza okukosa obulamu bwabwe. Kikulu nnyo abalabirira abalwadde okubaako kye bakolawo okulaba nga bakuuma obulamu bwabwe n'okukulaakulana kwabwe.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma ite kare ni, lutino nongo peko mapol ma twero balo kwo gi. Pire tek tutwal ni joo ma gwoko lutwo omyero gutim jami weng ma twere me gwoko gi ki dongo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap na ilolo, etereikina idwe keda atiokisio nuegelegela nuepedorete aitolitol aijar kec. Erai ibore yenepol noi itunga lu idarete adekak aswam kagogongu kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara keda apolokec.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru andruri ma alia, anzi nyiri yi e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru ndundu ecopi yi ma edri onzi 'diyi isu ra. Eri orodriru 'ba azakoma fe'baa 'diyi ni e'yo eyi 'yezu eyini ani ecozu eyi ma ta mbazu tualu eyi ma zota be.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba, abaana nibatunga akabi n'oburemeezi oburikukwata aha magara gaabo. N'eky'omugasho abarikureeberera abarwaire kukora ekirikwetengyesa kureeba ngu baba gye n'okutunguuka.

eng_prompt: Vaccination plays a crucial role in protecting children from preventable diseases. Therefore, it is essential to educate caregivers on the benefits and safety of immunizations.
lug_prompt: Okugema kukola omulimu gwa maanyi nnyo mu kukuuma abaana okuva ku ndwadde eziziyizibwa. N'olw'ekyo, kya mugaso okusomesa abalabirira ku migaso n'obukuumi bw'okugema.
ach_prompt: Gwer konyo totwal me gwoko lutino ki i kom two ma gengo. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal me pwonyo joo ma gwoko lutwo i kom ber pa gwero lutwo.
teo_prompt: Ejaasi aikis ekato keda epelu loepol noi loka ayuarite idwe kanejaas adekasinei nuitikokinos. Kanuka ngun, erai ibore yenepol noi aisisianakin itunga ajokisio keda ayuwara naka aikis ekato.
lgg_prompt: Aro soza eri orodriru anzi nyiri yi ma ta mbazu azo 'bani eco atri ra 'diyi vurisi. Ka'dini, eri orodriru imbata fezu 'ba aro fe'baa 'diyi dri orodri aro soza ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Okusirika nikukora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda abaana oburwaire oburikubaasa kuzibirwa. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho kwegyesa abarikureeberera abarwaire aha migasho n'oburinzi bw'okugyema.

eng_prompt: Despite advancements in medical science and widespread vaccination programs, many children around the world remain vulnerable to preventable illnesses. This ongoing issue highlights the importance of continued efforts in public health education and access to vaccines.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde waliwo enkulaakulana mu byobulamu ne pulogulaamu z'okugema, abaana bangi okwetooloola ensi yonna bakyasobola okukwatibwa endwadde eziziyizibwa. Omuko guno ogugenda mu maaso gulaga obukulu bw'okufuba okugenda mu maaso mu kusomesa abantu ku byobulamu n'okufuna eddagala erigema.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni rwom me diro me yot kom tye malo ki yub me gwero dano mapol, lutino mapol I wilobo weng pud gitye ki peko me nongo two ma gengo. Lok man matye kawot anyim nyutu ber pa mede ki yub me pwonyo lwak i kom yotkom ki nongo yat agwera.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai apol naka esayanis keda ainapeta nuka aikis ekato, idwe luipu kotoma akwap kere eringa edumununete adekasinei nuepedorio aitikitik. Akiro nu iswamasi itodunit ajokis na aswam agogongu kanu aisisianakin itunga nuka angaleu ka adumun ikee luikisere ekato.
lgg_prompt: E'yo zota sayanisi arojoni ma alia azini otita aro soza ni 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma talasi, anzi nyiri karakara wudrikuru ma kalasi ndulu 'diyi nga po'di azo 'bani eco atri ra 'diyi isu ra. E'yo mupi drile 'di ece orodri okpo 'bazu muzu drile e'yo onita fezu o'bi eyidri e'yo rua ala nisi azini aro soza esuzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka omu sayansi y'eby'amagara hamwe na puroguraamu y'okusirika, abaana baingi omunsi yoona bakiri omu kabi k'endwara ezirikubaasa kwetantarwa. Ekicweka ekirikugyenda omu maisho nikyoreka omugasho gw'okugumizamu n'amaani omu kwegyesa abantu eby'amagara n'okutunga emibazi y'okusirika.

eng_prompt: As the cold and flu season approaches, concerns about respiratory illnesses are on the rise. The fear of easily spreading infections has left many feeling anxious about even the slightest cough.
lug_prompt: Nga sizoni y'ennyogovu n'omusujja gw'ensiri esembera, okweraliikirira ku ndwadde z'okussa kweyongedde. Okutya okusaasaana kw'endwadde kulese bangi nga beeraliikirivu olw'okusesema okutono.
ach_prompt: Ka kare me ngic ki aburu dong cok, lworo I kom two ma mako yweyo tye ka mede. Lworo me nyaa pa two oweko dano mapol gibedo ki lworo kadi wa I kom cado matidi.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka eimidi keda eimidi, iyata aiyalongong kanu adekasinei nu eyengane. Akurianu na awea na adekasinei ajalakisi itunga luipu aiyalongong kanuka aola naedit.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ambiza azini flu niri ni ecazu 'boria, asi otiza azo oli seza ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo ni tu uru. Uri azo eyi ma ereta ewakokoru ri fe 'ba karakara eyini aa'zu asi otiza be e'yo osiza were si ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'obufuki hamwe na senyiga ku burikuhika haihi, okwerarikirira aha ndwara z'okwisya kweyongyeire. Okutiina okujanjaara kw'oburwaire kuretsireho okwerarikirira ahabw'okusesema kukye.

eng_prompt: Access to healthcare services is a fundamental right for all individuals. One of the key components of public health initiatives is ensuring that preventive measures, such as vaccinations, are accessible to everyone.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi ddembe lya buli muntu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nteekateeka z'ebyobulamu kwe kukakasa nti enkola eziziyiza, gamba ng'okugema, zituukirirwa buli omu.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom obedo twero pa dano weng. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub me yot kom pa lwak obedo neno ni dano weng tye ki yoo me gengo two calo gwero dano.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian erai apedor naka itunga kere. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi luka angaleu naka itunga ngesi awanyun ebe epedorete itunga kere adumun iwaitin lu itikitikere, kwape nat aikis ekato.
lgg_prompt: Le 'ba dria ma esu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ra. Afa azi okporu e'yo alata ni o'bi eyini 'diyi ma alea ri eri nezu ra kini geri 'bani azo atrizu ekile aro soza le 'diyi 'ba dria eyini.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuheereza bw'eby'amagara n'obugabe bw'omuntu weena. Kimwe aha bintu by'omugasho omu nteekateeka y'eby'amagara n'okureeba ngu eby'okwerinda nk'okugyema byahika ahari buri omwe.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing health crisis, community leaders gathered to discuss ways to support local families. They decided that providing essential protective gear for children would be a crucial step in ensuring their safety.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okuyambamu amaka g'omu kitundu. Baasazeewo nti okuwa abaana eby'okwekuumisa ebikulu kyandibadde ddaala lya mugaso mu kukakasa obukuumi bwabwe.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, lutela me kabedo gugure me nywako tam i kom kit me konyo lugangi. Gumoko tamgi ni miyo jami ma gwoko lutino obedo yoo acel ma pire tek me gwoko lutino.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu igangakino ikalia. Apotu kesi ocamutu ebe aijaikin idwe iboro lu eyuaritos kes erai ibore yenepol noi kanu ayuarite kes.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu familia eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi ma dria. Eyi 'du e'yo kini afa tambaza ni orodriru 'diyi fezu anzi nyiri eyidri ri eri e'yo azi okporu eyini ani ecozu eyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho, abeebembezi b'ebyanga bakateerana kuhanuura aha mihanda y'okuhwera amaka g'omubyaro. Bakasharamu ngu okuheereza abaana ebikwato by'okwerinda, n'omuringo murungi gw'okureebeka ngu baine oburinzi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to combat preventable diseases, local health officials launched a widespread vaccination campaign. As a result, many children were immunized this year.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okulwanyisa endwadde eziziyizibwa, abakungu b'ebyobulamu mu byalo baatandikawo kaweefube w'okugema abantu bangi. N'ekyavaamu, abaana bangi baagemebwa omwaka guno.
ach_prompt: I tute me lweny i kom two ma gengo, lutic me yot kom me tedero gucako yub me gwero dano mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, ki gwero lutino mapol imwaka ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitikitik adekasinei nuitikokinos, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kogeutu aikis ekato mama ejaasi itunga kere. Kanuka ngun, aponi ikisai idwe luipu ekato okaru lo.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo a'di 'dizu azo 'bani eco atri ra 'diyi be, azi'ba arojo ni angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do otita aro soza niri 'ba karakara eyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba oso anzi nyiri karakara eyi aro azo atrizu ri si eli 'disi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurwanisa endwara ezirikubaasa kwetantarwa, abakuru omu by'amagara omu byaro batandikireho ehururu y'okusirika abantu baingi. Ekyarugiremu, abaana baingi bakagyemwa omwaka ogu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to ensure equitable access to healthcare, the government announced new guidelines regarding vaccination costs. As a result, parents were informed that they should not pay for immunization.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okufuna obujjanjabi obw'obwenkanya, gavumenti yalangiridde ebiragiro ebipya ebikwata ku nsaasaanya y'okugema. N'ekyavaamu, abazadde baategeezebwa nti tebalina kusasulira kugemebwa.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me neno ni dano weng nongo kony me yot kom marom, gamente okati ki cik manyen ma mako wel cul me gwero dano. Macalo adwogi ne, ki niango lunyodo ni pe omyero gucul pi gwero lutino gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitam awanyun ebe epatana adumunun amukian, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak nuikamunitos etiai loka ikapun luka aikis ekato. Kanuka ngun, aponi olimokinai auriak ebe mam ibusakinit kesi aitac ikapun luka aikis ekato.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu geri kililiru 'bani ecozu e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esuzu, gamete azi azita o'diru 'diyi ma dria aje aro soza niri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba lu tipika eyini kini le eyi ma ofe robia aro soza esuzu ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okureeba ngu abantu boona batunga obujanjabi, gavumenti ekarangirira ebiragiro ebisya ebirikukwata aha nshohoza y'okugyema. N'ekyarugiremu, abazaire bakamanyisibwa ngu tibashemereire kushashurira kusirikwa.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming health initiative, we are organizing a series of educational sessions. These sessions will focus on the importance of vaccinations and their role in public health.
lug_prompt: Nga twetegekera enteekateeka y'ebyobulamu ejja, tuteekateeka emisomo egy'enjawulo. Emisomo gino gijja kussa essira ku bukulu bw'okugema n'omulimu gwabyo mu byobulamu by'abantu.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi yub me yot kom matye kabino ni, watye ka yubu yub me pwonyo dano mapol. Kacokke magi biketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom ber pa gwero dano ki ticgi I yot kom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin nuikamunitos angaleu, iuta sio aitemonokin aisisiaeta nuipu. Epote airiamununeta nu aitemitem ajokis naka aikis ekato keda aswam ke kotoma angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Otuta e'yo alata ni emupi 'diyi ma alia, ama otita onita ni 'diyi otu tre. E'yo 'duza 'diyi nga asi 'ba orodri aro soza niri ma dria azini azi erini nga e'yo alata o'bi eyini ri ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera enteekateeka y'eby'amagara erikwija, turiyo nitutebekanisa emishomo mingi. Enteerane ezi niziija kuta omutima aha mugasho gw'okugyema n'omugasho gwabyo omu by'amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: Health officials have reported a concerning rise in fatalities linked to the ongoing outbreak. As the situation continues to escalate, communities are bracing for the impact.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu bategeezezza nti omuwendo gw'abantu abafa olw'ekirwadde kino gweyongedde. Ng'embeera yeeyongera okwonooneka, ebitundu byetegekera okukosebwa.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom guwaco ni wel dano matye katoo ikare me poto pa two eni omede tutwal. Kit ma peko ne tye ka medde ameda, lwak tye ka yubbe pi adwogi ne.
teo_prompt: Apotu eswamak luka angaleu olimosi ebe iyata noi atwakisia nuka itunga luetwakito kanuka abwangun naka adeka kana. Kwape inyikokini ejautene aiyatakin, eutasi itunga aitemonokin kanuka ngun.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ece kini 'ba odrapi azo korona niri si 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra. E'yo ni mu drile tuzu, ongulumu eyi eyi otuta 'ye e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara bagambire aha kweyongyera kw'abantu abarikufa ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire oburiho hati. Oburemeezi ku burikuguma nibweyongyera, abantu nibeteekateekyera ebirikubaasa kubaho.

eng_prompt: After receiving treatment for his condition, the hospital administration reviewed the patient's account. They determined that it was time to settle any outstanding charges.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okufuna obujjanjabi ku mbeera ye, abaddukanya eddwaliro beetegereza akawunti y'omulwadde. Baasazeewo nti kye kiseera okusasula emisango gyonna egyali teginnasasulwa.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo kony me yot kom pi two ne, ludito me ot yat guneno kor tic pa latwo ne. Gumoko ni kare dong oromo me culu cul weng ma pud pe kiculu gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na adumun amukian kanu ejauteneke, apotu eyaitene lo adekis airereonorata akiro nuka adekan. Apotu kesi kotemasi ebe erai kwana apak naka aitac ikapun lu mam kesi epedoritos aitac.
lgg_prompt: Erini aro esuzu eri ma wura ma e'yosi 'bori ma vutia, driceza arojo niri andri 'ba azoru 'da ma e'yo dria. Eyi 'du e'yo kini sa'wa ca 'bo e'yo dria 'bani eyi ofezu ku 'diyi ofezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okutunga obujanjabi ahabw'embeera ye, abarikukurira eirwariro bakashwijuma akawunti y'omurwaire. Bakasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okushashura emishango yoona etakahikire.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent influx of displaced individuals, the government announced a new policy to ensure proper support and resources. To facilitate this process, all refugees were requested to register.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kuyingira kw'abantu abaasengulwa gyebuvuddeko, gavumenti yalangiridde enkola empya okulaba nga wabaawo obuyambi n'ebikozesebwa ebituufu. Okusobola okwanguyiza enkola eno, abanoonyiboobubudamu bonna baasabibwa okwewandiisa.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki wel dano ma orwenyo gangi gi cokcok-ki, gamente okati ki cik manyen me neno ni kimiyo kony ki jami ma mite. Me tyelo kor tic man, ki lego luring ayela weng me coone.
teo_prompt: Katupitos eipone lo apolor noi loka itunga luekerete aiboisio kec, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak kanu awanyun ebe ejaas agangat keda iboro luedolitos. Kanu aitapatan ainapeta nu, aponi kolimokinai ikerai kere aiwadikaun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba angu kokoru 'diyi ma emuta ma e'yosi, gamete azi azita o'dini atita kililiru azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, 'ba ai emunyale dria eyi eyi ru sizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'abantu baingi ababingirwe omu maka gaabo,gavumenti ekarangirira engyenderwaho nsya y'okureeba ngu habaho obuhwezi n'ebintu ebirikumara. Okuhwera omunkora egi, empungi zoona zikashabwa kwehandikisa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to prevent the spread of infectious diseases, the government implemented strict health screenings at the border. As part of these measures, all immigrants were tested for yellow fever.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa, gavumenti yassaawo okukebera okw'amaanyi ku nsalo. Ng'ekimu ku bino, abagwiira bonna baakeberebwa omusujja gw'enkaka.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me gengo nya pa two ma kobo, gamente oketo yub matek me pimo dano I wang lobo. Macalo yoo acel me timo man, kipimo dano weng ma obudonyo ilobo man pi two yellow fever.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitikitik awea na adekasinei nu ikopas, abu apugan kitegea ainwakio na adekak koikoru. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, aponi inwakai abwotunak kere kanu eimidi loidosoikini akonye.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma ereta atrizu, gamete 'ba e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma rua o'bizu okporu boda eyi ma alea. E'yo 'diyi ma azi ru, 'ba obi 'ba dria efipi kari 'di ma alea 'diyi azo yellow fever nirisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara ezirikuturira, gavumenti ekataho enkora y'okukyebera abantu aha nsharo. Nk'emwe aha mihanda egi, abafuruki boona bakakyeberwa omushwija gw'enkaka.

eng_prompt: After showing symptoms of a highly contagious illness, the patients were quickly assessed by the medical team. In order to prevent further spread, the authorities decided to implement strict quarantine measures.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okulaga obubonero bw'obulwadde obusiiga amangu, abalwadde baakeberebwa mangu abasawo. Okusobola okutangira okusaasaana kw'obulwadde, ab'obuyinza baasalawo okussaawo enkola ya kalantiini enkakali.
ach_prompt: Inge nyutu lanyut me two ma kobo oyot tutwal, lutic yoto kom ongiyo lutwo ne oyot-oyot tutwal. Me gengo nya pa two corona, lutela gumoko tamgi me keto kigeng matek tutwal I kom lutwo corona.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aitodun ijenuneta luka adekasinei nu ikopas noi, apotu imurok owanyutu adekak. Kanu aitikitik awea na ekorona, apotu apedorosio itolomutu ainapeta nuka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Ba arojo ni 'diyi andri 'ba azoru 'diyi e'dazu e'dapi kini eyi azo eyi erepi sa'wa ezu 'diyi ma alea 'bori ma vutia. E'yo ereta ma omgbo esizu, drice'ba eyi 'du e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu aa'zu 'ba azi 'diyi pie ku 'diyi 'bazu a'dule.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okworeka obubonero bw'oburwaire oburikuturira munonga, abarwaire bakashwijumwa tiimu y'abashaho. Kubaasa kuzibira okujanjaara kw'oburwaire, ab'obushoborozi bakacwamu kutaho enkora y'okukuratira enkora ya karantiini.

eng_prompt: As the pandemic continues to affect daily life, health officials are closely monitoring the spread of the virus. Recent reports indicate a significant rise in local infections, raising concerns among residents and authorities alike.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekirwadde bbunansi kyeyongera okukosa obulamu obwa bulijjo, abakungu b'ebyobulamu balondoola nnyo okusaasaana kw'akawuka. Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti abalwadde beeyongedde nnyo mu kitundu, ekireeseewo okweraliikirira mu batuuze ne mu b'obuyinza.
ach_prompt: Kit ma two korona tye ka medde ki balo kwo pa dano, lutic me yot kom tye ka neno kit ma two eni tye ka nya kwede. Adwogi tic ma otimme cokcok-ki nyutu ni wel dano matye ka nongo two tye ka medde tutwal, ma man okelo lworo ikin lwak ki lutela bene.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokit adeka aitolitol aijar naka nginiparan, eutasi eswamak luka angaleu aanyanar awea naka ekorona. Itodunitos iripotan lu atuboros ebe eyatakinos noi adekasinei nuka ekorona, eyangauni aiyalongong kanejaas itunga keda apedorosio.
lgg_prompt: Azo ongulumu karakara eyi ezapiri ni mu drile e'yo eyi 'yezu o'du driasi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'yo azo 'da ma ereta ma pamvu one. O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo esupi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra, e'yo 'di eji asi otiza 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea tualu drice'ba eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Oburwaire bwa korona ku burikugumizamu nibuteganisa entuura y'abantu, ab'eby'amagara bariyo nibareebuuza oku oburwaire burikweyongyera kujanjaara. Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka okweyongyera kw'oburwaire omu byaro, ekirikureetaho okwerarikirira omu batuuragye hamwe n'ab'obushoborozi.

eng_prompt: In recent weeks, several employees reported experiencing symptoms consistent with a viral infection. As a precaution, the management decided to conduct testing and monitor the health of staff members.
lug_prompt: Mu wiiki eziyise, abakozi abawerako baategeezezza okufuna obubonero obukwatagana n'okukwatibwa akawuka. Ng'ekyokwegendereza, abaddukanya emirimu baasalawo okukebera n'okulondoola obulamu bw'abakozi.
ach_prompt: I cabit ma okato cokcok-ki, lutic mapol guwaco ni ginongo lanyut me two korona. Me gwoke, ludito tic gumoko tamgi me pimo ki ngiyo kit ma lutic tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Kosabitin lu atuboros, apotu eswamak luipu kotemasi ebe ejaasi kesi keda ijenuneta luka adeka naka ekorona. Kwape ayuwara, abu eyaitene kitutub ainwakio ka aanyanar angaleu naka eswamak.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, azi'ba karakara eyi ece e'yo eyini esu azo korona niri be 'diyi. Ekile ageitema ru, driceza 'da 'du e'yo 'ba eyi ma rua o'bizu azini eyi ma rua ala onezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu sande ezihweireho, abakozi baingi bakagamba ngu bakaba baine obubonero oburikworeka ngu bakwasirwe akakooko ka muzibwe. Nk'eky'okwerinda, abarikukurira ekitongore bakacwamu kukyebera n'okureebuuza amagara g'abakozi.

eng_prompt: After a week of monitoring symptoms and conducting tests, the medical team gathered to review the latest results. They hoped for a clear outcome that would ease the patients' concerns.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki nnamba nga balondoola obubonero n'okukebera, abasawo baakuŋŋaana okwekenneenya ebyava mu kukebera. Baasuubira ebyavaamu ebitangaavu ebinaakendeeza ku kweraliikirira kw'abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit acel me ngiyo lanyut ki timo pim, lutic yoto kom gugure me neno adwogi ticgi manyen. Gubedo ki gen me nongo adwogi maber ma obi dwoko lworo pa lutwo piny.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka esabiti ediope loka aanyanar aanyuneta keda ainwakio, apotu imurok kimorikikinos airereor akiro nuitetiak nuelomunitos. Amuno kesi adumun akiro nuecaete nuikamunitos adekasinei nuepedorete aitidisiar aiyalongong naka adekak.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti alu ma vutia eceta eyi ma pamvu onezu azini eyi ma rua o'bizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti arojo ni 'diyi tra eyi e'yo efupi o'diru 'diyi ma ale andrizu. Eyi asi 'baza be e'yo eyi ma aza kozu kililiru eyini ani asi omiza 'ba azoru 'diyi niri ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande emwe y'okureebuuza obubonero n'okukyebera, tiimu y'abashaho ekateeranira hamwe kushwijuma ebyarugire omu kukyebera. Bakaba baine amatsiko g'ebirugyemu ebirikwetegyerezibwa kurungi ebirikubaasa kukyendeeza okwerarikirira kw'abarwaire.

eng_prompt: In light of recent outbreaks and the increasing global interconnectedness, it is crucial for us to understand the impact of health issues that can spread rapidly. Awareness and education are key components in preventing the transmission of these diseases.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kubalukawo kw'obulwadde buno gyebuvuddeko n'okweyongerayongera kw'okukwatagana kw'ensi yonna, kya mugaso nnyo gye tuli okutegeera ebiva mu nsonga z'ebyobulamu ezisobola okusaasaana amangu. Okumanyisibwa n'okusomesebwa bintu bikulu mu kutangira okusaasaana kw'endwadde zino.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki poto pa two ma otimme cokcok-ki ki medo kubbe I kin lobo mapat-pat, pire tek tutwal pi wan me niang adwoki pa peko me yot-kom ma twero nya oyot-oyot tutwal. Miyo ngec ki pwony obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I gengo nyaa pa two magi.
teo_prompt: Katupitos abwangun naka adekasinei nupac keda epone loeyatakinor akwap kere, ejokuna noi oni amisiikin atiokisio nuka angaleu nuepedorete aisiarakin katipet. Aisisianakino keda aisisianakino kes iboro lu epolok lu itikitikere awea na adekasinei nu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi azini wudrikuru ma esele coza tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru ama ni e'yo rua ala ni i erepi mbeleru 'diyi ma e'yo vazu. Imbata feza azini onita eri afa okporu e'yo azo 'diyi ma ereta atrizu 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'oburwaire obwahati hamwe n'okweyongyera kw'okukwatanisa kw'ensi yoona, n'eky'omugasho munonga kwetegyereza oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikubaasa kujanjaara juba. Okumanyisibwa n'okwegyesa n'ebintu bikuru omu kuzibira okujanjaara kw'endwara ezi.

eng_prompt: Recent studies have shown a significant increase in the number of cases reported in our community. As a result, health officials are urging everyone to take precautions.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kulaga nti omuwendo gw'abalwadde abazuuliddwa mu kitundu kyaffe gweyongedde nnyo. N'ekyavaamu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakubiriza buli omu okwegendereza.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto medde pa wel dano matye ki two I kabedo wa. Macalo adwogi ne, lutic me yot kom tye ka lego dano weng me gwoke.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aingic napac ebe iyata noi enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka ekorona kotoma atutubetekosi. Kanuka ngun, isinyikokitos eswamak luka angaleu itunga kere aidar ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi ece kini kalafe 'ba e'yo onzi 'yepi 'diyi ma kalafe tu ongulumu amavile 'diyi ma alea ra. E'yo 'disi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ai 'ba dria eyi e'yo eyi ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire omu byanga byaitu. N'ekyarugiremu, abakuru omu by'amagara nibashaba buri omwe kwegyendesereza.

eng_prompt: Despite the ongoing health campaigns emphasizing the importance of hygiene, many individuals still overlook basic sanitation practices. This negligence can lead to the spread of germs and illnesses in communities.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde kampeyini z'ebyobulamu zigenda mu maaso okussa essira ku bukulu bw'obuyonjo, abantu bangi bakyasimbira ekkuuli enkola z'obuyonjo ezisookerwako. Obulagajjavu buno busobola okuviirako okusaasaana kw'obuwuka n'endwadde mu bitundu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni yub me miyo ngec me yot kom tye kawot anyim ma nyutu ber pa gwoko lengo, dano mapol pud cayo yoo me gwoko lengo. Cayo tic man twero kelo nya pa kwidi ki two I kabedo mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas ikampeins luka angaleu lu isinyikokitos nuka aila, eringa itunga luipu epalunitos nuka aila. Atiakatiaka na epedori ayangaun awea na ikur keda adekasinei kotoma atutubena.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ti odaza e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma talasi, 'ba karakara eyi nga po'di e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria ku. Adi 'di eco fe o'bu azini azo eyi ma ereta ongulumu eyi ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho ehururu y'eby'amagara erikugyenda omu maisho erikworeka omugasho gw'obuyonjo, abantu baingi nibarekyerera emihanda y'obuyonjo. Okurekyerera eki nikibaasa kureeta okujanjaara kw'obukooko n'endwara omu bantu.

eng_prompt: As the outbreak continues to escalate, health officials are urging the public to take necessary precautions. In response to the alarming rise in cases, doctors are doing their best to prevent the disease from spreading.
lug_prompt: Okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde bwe kweyongera, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bakubiriza abantu okwegendereza. Olw'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ogweyongera ennyo, abasawo bakola kyonna ekisoboka okutangira ekirwadde okusaasaana.
ach_prompt: Kit ma poto pa two tye kamede kwede, lutic me yot kom tye ka lego lwak me gwokke. Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two, ludaktari tye katimo jami weng ma twere me gengo nya pa two eni.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyata abwangun na adeka, isinyikokitos eswamak luka angaleu itunga aitikitik adekasinei. Kanu aiyatakinio naka adekasinei, eutasi imurok aswam kagogong aitikitik awea naka adeka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo 'da ma e'dota ni mu drile tuzu, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi o'bi eyi ai e'yo tambaza kililiru 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'ba azo be 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu okporu risi, dakitari eyi e'yo eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi 'ye azo 'da ma ereta atrizu.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'endwara kuriyo nikweyongyera, abakuru omu by'amagara nibashaba abantu okwerinda. Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abarwaire, abashaho bariyo nibakora kyona ekirikubaasika kutangira okujanjaara kw'endwara.

eng_prompt: Despite significant advancements in medical research and prevention strategies, malaria continues to pose a serious threat in many parts of the world. The disease, transmitted by infected mosquitoes, remains a leading cause of illness and death, particularly in tropical regions.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde wabaddewo enkulaakulana mu kunoonyereza ku byobujjanjabi n'enkola z'okuziyiza, omusujja gw'ensiri gukyali gwa bulabe mu bitundu by'ensi bingi. Obulwadde, obusaasaanyizibwa ensiri ezirwadde, bukyasinze okuleeta obulwadde n'okufa, naddala mu bitundu by'obutiti.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kwed me yot kom ki yoo me gengo two tye ka dongo, two malaria pud tye peko madit tutwal I but lobo mapat-pat. Two man ma ober ma tye ki two aye kobo, pud obedo gin ma kelo two ki too tutwalle I kabedo ma piny lyet.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai apol noi kotoma aingic naka adekisia keda iwaitin lu itikitikere, eringa eimidi erai ationis naepol noi kotoma aiboisio nuipu nuka akwap. Adeka na ekorete isiru, erai na eyangauni adekasinei keda atwakisia, kacut kotoma aiboisio nu ekwam.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo vuti ondaza ni azini geri 'bani azo atrizu 'diyi ma talasi, malaria ni nga po'di e'yo onzi eji wudrikuru ma kala karakara eyi ma alea. Azo 'di, yiyia esupi azo be 'diyisi, nga kiri e'yo 'ba eyini azo fezu azini drazu ri'I, tutuni angu drizaru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho entunguuka y'amaani omu kucondooza ahaby'amagara hamwe n'emihanda y'okuzibira, omushwija gw'ensiri gukiri eky'akabi munonga omu bicweka bingi eby'ensi. Oburwaire oburikurabanisibwa ensiri, nibwo burikukirayo kureeta endwara n'okufa, okukira munonga omu myanya y'obutagasi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost sales during the holiday season, the store implemented a new pricing strategy. As a result, they gave discounts to every buyer.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula eby'okutunda mu biseera by'ennaku enkulu, edduuka lyassa mu nkola enkola empya ey'ebbeeyi. N'ekyavaamu, baawa buli muguzi ebisaanyizo.

lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu afa oziza ma omgbo otuzu sa'wa natali nirisi, dukani 'da 'ba geri o'diru aje ozizu 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, eyi fe aje were 'ba dria afa je'ba 'diyi dri.

eng_prompt: In a heartwarming gesture of community support, local professionals gathered to organize a charity drive. Their goal was to provide essential items to those in need, particularly focusing on vulnerable groups.
lug_prompt: Mu kabonero akasanyusa ak'obuyambi bw'ekitundu, abakugu b'omu kitundu baakuŋŋaanye okutegeka kaweefube w'okugaba obuyambi. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kyali kya kuwa abo abali mu bwetaavu ebintu ebyetaagibwa mu bulamu obwa bulijjo nnaddala abo abali mu mbeera embi.

teo_prompt: Kanu aitodun ebe igangitos itunga, apotu ipirioitin luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemokin ainapeta nuka aingarakinio. Alosikinetekec arai aijanakin iboro lu itunga lu ican, kacut igurupun lu ican.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support the local community during the holiday season, the volunteers organized a charity drive. Their generous contributions included various essential items for those in need.

eng_prompt: In the spirit of community service, a local organization organized a campaign to support the orphanage. As news spread about the need for assistance, an overwhelming response from the public followed.

eng_prompt: The community has recognized the urgent need for more support services for families in crisis. As a result, plans have been set in motion to establish a facility dedicated to providing care for infants and their mothers.

eng_prompt: After a long week of uncertainty and hunger, the community came together to support the struggling families. With boxes of food arriving at the local shelter, the atmosphere was filled with hope and relief.

eng_prompt: In Uganda, many children are in need of care and support due to various social challenges. As a result, numerous baby homes have been established to provide shelter and assistance to these vulnerable infants.

lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri ma alea, anzi nyiri karakara eyi le ta mbata azini atita e'yo ewaru ndundu o'bi eyini esu 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'do aku odekua eyini 'diyi karakara eyi aku fezu azini azakoma fezu odekua e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi dri.

eng_prompt: Many children face unimaginable hardships due to circumstances beyond their control. As a result, a significant number find themselves in babies' homes, separated from their families.
lug_prompt: Abaana bangi boolekagana n'ebizibu eby'ekitalo olw'embeera gye batasobola kukyusa. N'ekivuddemu, omuwendo omunene gwe basanga mu maka g'abaana, nga baawuddwa ku maka gaabwe.

lgg_prompt: Anzi nyiri karakara eyi e'yo ewaru 'bani ega ku 'diyi esu e'yo eyini eco 'ye ku 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, kalafe angiri ni eyi esu eyi aku odekua eyini 'diyi ma alea, eyi esele aku eyivile 'diyi pie.

eng_prompt: Many individuals fleeing their home countries face immense challenges and trauma. As a result, the psychological toll of their experiences can lead to feelings of hopelessness and despair.

eng_prompt: Many communities rely on the guidance and influence of religious leaders to address social issues. One significant area of their involvement is in the care and support of vulnerable children.
lug_prompt: Ebitundu bingi byesigamye ku bulagirizi n'obukulembeze bw'abakulembeze b'enzikiriza okukola ku nsonga z'abantu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu bye bakola kwe kulabirira n'okuyamba abaana abateesobola.

eng_prompt: In a fit of rage, the crowd surrounded the man who had just stolen from them. Fueled by anger and a desire for justice, they decided to take matters into their own hands.
lug_prompt: Mu busungu obungi, abantu baazingako omusajja eyali yaakababba. Olw'obusungu n'okwagala okufuna obwenkanya, baasalawo okutwalira ensonga mu ngalo.
ach_prompt: I akemo madit tutwal, lwak orumu lacoo ma onongo pud okwalo jami ki botgi-ni. Pi akemo ki miti me nongo ngol matir, gumoko tam gi me tero lok eni icing gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma anyunyura, apotu itunga kolukutu etunganan loabu kokokwa kaneejaasi kesi. Kanuka anyunyura keda eipud loka etube loajokan, apotu kesi koseutu ayangar akiro akanin kec bon.
lgg_prompt: Aoko si, o'bi ongulumuru 'diyi ce agupi ogupi engazu yi vu 'bori ma kalasi kuru. Aoko si tualu ava e'yo liza kililiru ri si, eyi 'du e'yo 'du eyi ma dria eyi ma ngulupi si.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ekiniga ky'amaani, abantu baketorora omushaija owabaibireho. Ahabw'okugira ekiniga n'ekyetengo ky'oburingaaniza, bakasharamu kutwara enshonga omu mikono yaabo.

eng_prompt: In a moment of anger, he felt overwhelmed by frustration and helplessness. As the argument escalated, he made a decision that he would soon regret.
lug_prompt: Mu kaseera k'obusungu, yawulira ng'aweddemu amaanyi era nga talina ky'ayinza kukola. Okukaayana bwe kweyongera, yakola okusalawo kwe yali agenda okwejjusa mu bbanga ttono.
ach_prompt: I kare ma en tye ki akemo, cwinye ocwer tutwal. I kare ma laro lok ne omedde, en omoko tam ma pe obedo ki kare me koko ange.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apak naka anyunyura, abu ngesi kowomit ebe mam ngesi epedori aingarakin. Neapolor epeget, abu ngesi kiswama aseunet naepedori ngesi aiitun.
lgg_prompt: Sawa aokosi, eri etumu e'yo ewaru azini e'yo erini eco 'ye ku 'diyisi. Erita ako ni tuzu uru, eri 'du e'yo erini nga ovu asi otizaru mbeleru ni.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'ekiniga, akeehurira ataine ky'okukora. Okuhayahayana ku kwayeyongyeire, akakora okusharamu oku yaabaire naija kwefuuza.

eng_prompt: In a just society, it is essential to recognize the inherent dignity of every individual. This principle forms the foundation of our understanding of equality and justice.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekirimu obwenkanya, kya mugaso okutegeera ekitiibwa kya buli muntu. Omusingi guno gwe gusinziirwako okutegeera kwaffe okw'okwenkanankana n'obwenkanya.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma opore, pire tek tutwal me niang woro pa dano weng. Cik man obedo guti me niang kit ma wawinyo kwede lok me rwate ki ngolo kop atir.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet najokan, ejok ajenun angosibib naka nginitunganan. Erai ainapeta ngun atukot naka amisiikinikosi nuikamunitos airiamara keda etube loajokan.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu kililiru 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru inzita 'ba alu alu niri ma e'yo egazu. E'yo 'di ni geri amani e'yo egazu trotro azini e'yo liza kililiru ma dria ri ma vuti si.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka ekirimu oburinganiza, nikikuru kumanya ekitinisa ky'omuntu weena. Omusingye ogu nigwo musingye gw'okwetegyereza kwaitu okw'oburinganiza n'oburingaaniza.

eng_prompt: In the heat of the competition, it became clear that some individuals would stop at nothing to achieve their goals. The intensity of their actions left many shocked and questioning their motives.
lug_prompt: Mu bbugumu ly'okuvuganya, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti abantu abamu tebajja kukkiriza kintu kyonna kubalemesa kutuuka ku biruubirirwa byabwe. Ebikolwa byabwe eby'amaanyi byaleka bangi nga bawuniikirira era nga babuusabuusa ebigendererwa byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me pyem matek tutwal, onen atyer kamaleng ni dano mukene pe gi bi juko timo gin mo keken me cobo miti gi. Telo tol pa timgi oweko dano mapol gubedo ki ngeng dok bene gubedo ki akala-kala I kom miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abolobol naepol noi, apotu kojenutu ebe mam icetunga epedorete aitikitik idiobore kere kanu aitodolikin apeleikinata kec. Apol naka aswamisiokec abu kojalak itunga luipu aumokin ido abuonokin alosikinetekec.
lgg_prompt: A'bala 'da ma alea, eca e'da kililiru kini 'ba azi 'diyi nga pa so e'yo ci eyini ani e'yo eyini lele 'diyi esuzu. E'yo eyini 'ye okporu 'diyi fe 'ba karakara eyini aa'zu osuta si dika eyi e'yo eyi ma egata eyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'empaka, kikarebeka butunu ngu abantu abamwe tibarikubaasa kurekyera aho kuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byabo. Amaani g'ebikorwa byabo gakareetera abantu bingi okwerarikirira n'okubuzabuza ebigyendererwa byabo.

eng_prompt: In the tense courtroom atmosphere, the defendants exchanged worried glances, knowing their fate rested in the hands of the judge. With a deep breath, their lawyer stepped forward to address the court.
lug_prompt: Mu mbeera ya kkooti ey'obunkenke, abawawabirwa baatunudde mu maaso nga beeraliikirivu, nga bakimanyi nti ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso byali mu mikono gy'omulamuzi. Munnamateeka waabwe yayimirira mu maaso okwogera eri kkooti ng'assa omukka.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lyeto obedo tye I ot kot, jo ma ki keto bal i komgi gubedo ki lworo I kingi, kun gingeyo ni anyimgi tye I cing langol kop. Ki yweyo matek, lapilida meggi okato anyim me lok ki kot.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aiboisit naetiono noi kotoma okooti, apotu itunga luetepesenitai koinakisi kesi aanyunet, naarai ajeni kesi ebe ejaasi kesi toma akanin nuka ekatubon. Keda aimony naepol noi, abu epulidakec kogeu einer adieket.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru dwaniniri ma alia, 'ba 'bani to 'diyi oja yi ma mile asi otiza si, yini nii ra kini yi ma ewu drile ri 'ba e'yo lipiri ma dria. Eyi ma 'ba e'yo lipiri so pa drile ava angiri si e'yo nzezu dwania.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bwa kooti obw'obunkenke, abarikujunaanwa bakarebana amaisho, barikumanya ngu ebiro byabo by'omumaisho biri omu mikono y'omuramuzi. Puriida waabo akagyenda omu maisho kugamba omu kooti.

eng_prompt: After discovering the lifeless body in the alley, the witnesses exchanged worried glances. Realizing the gravity of the situation, they knew they had to take action.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuzuula omulambo ogutalina bulamu mu luguudo, abaabaddewo baatunudde mu maaso nga beeraliikirivu. Olw'okukitegeera nti embeera yali mbi nnyo, baali bakimanyi nti balina okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Inge nongo lyel ma pe kwo I teng gudi, lucaden ne gubedo ki lworo I kin gi. Pien guniang kit ma peko ne rac kwede, guniang ni omyero gutim gin mo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka adumun akuan naemamei aijar korot, apotu luapotu kowanyutu ngun kopegata. Kanu ajenun ationis na ejautene, apotu kesi kojenutu ebe ibusakinit kesi aswam ibore.
lgg_prompt: Ba sadiniru 'diyi e'bi yi ma mile 'be asi otiza be 'bori ma vutia avu idri kokoruri esuzu 'bori ma vutia. E'yo ewaru e'yo 'da ma dria 'diyi nizu 'boria, eyi nii ra kini le eyi ma 'ye e'yo ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushanga omutumbi ogutaine magara omu muhanda, abajurizi bakarebeka hamwe. Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi bw'embeera, bakamanya ngu bashemereire kugira ekibakora.

eng_prompt: After weeks of strict rules and unexpected punishments, the atmosphere at the school became increasingly tense. Frustration grew among the students as they felt their voices were being ignored.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera ez'amateeka amakakali n'ebibonerezo ebitasuubirwa, embeera ku ssomero yeeyongera okusika omuguwa. Okuggwaamu essuubi kweyongera mu bayizi nga bawulira nti amaloboozi gaabwe tegawulirwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me keto cik matek ki pwod ma pe byek tye I komgi, lyeto omedde I gang kwan ne. Cwer cwiny omede ikin lutino kwan pien guwinyo ni pe kitye ka winyo dwon gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka ikisila luitikitikitai keda alecorio numam eomitai, abu ejautene kosomero kiyatakin. Apotu esisiak itakadikisi naarai apupiata kesi ebe mam epupio akiro kec.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani azita okporu azini panga 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi ma vutia, angu sukulu 'da ma alea ri eca asi otiza ru. Asi nyoza tu sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea eyini egazu kini 'ba 'duni eyi ma o'duko ku risi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'ebiragiro by'amaani hamwe n'ebibonerezo ebitarikuteekateekwaho, embeera aha eishomero ekeyongyera kuba ey'obunkenke. Okwerarikirira kweyongyeire omu beegi ahabw'okugira ngu amahurire gaabo gakaba gatarikwetegyerezibwa.

eng_prompt: Kampala has been facing significant challenges with crime rates on the rise. As a result, the safety of its residents has become a growing concern for local authorities.
lug_prompt: Kampala ebadde esanga okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi n'obuzzi bw'emisango okweyongera. N'ekivuddemu, obukuumi bw'abatuuze baayo bweyongedde okweraliikiriza abakulembeze b'ebyalo.
ach_prompt: Kampala obedo kanongo peko madit tutwal ki rwom me timo bal matye kamede. Macalo adwogi ne, ber bedo pa lutedero ne dong odoko lworo madit tutwal bot lutela me tedero.
teo_prompt: Etereikina Kampala keda atiokisio nuepolok noi naarai iyata abilibilio naka ikisila. Kanuka ngun, aiyuwara naka itunga luka atutubet erai aiyalongong naepol noi kanejaas apedorosio nuka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Kampala ebi e'yo ewaru 'diyi esu e'yo e'yo onzi ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi. E'yo 'disi, ageitema 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyiniri eca asi otiza ru 'ba okpo e'iru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Kampala etwire neetunga oburemeezi bwingi ahabw'obukozi bw'ebibi kweyongyera. N'ekyarugiremu,okwerinda kw'abatuuragye baayo kweyongyeire kureetera ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro okwerarikirira.

eng_prompt: In some cultures, traditional gender roles can lead to an imbalance of power within marriages. This often results in harmful behaviors that affect the well-being of women.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa obumu, emirimu gy'ekikula ky'abantu giyinza okuviirako obutali bwenkanya mu buyinza mu bufumbo. Kino kitera okuvaamu enneeyisa ey'obulabe ekosa obulamu bw'abakyala.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mukene, tic tekwaro pa mon ki coo twero kelo apoka-poka me twero ikin jo munyome. Man ipol kare kelo tim maraco ma balo kwo pa mon.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio ice, epedorete aswamisio nuka ikiliok keda angor ayangaun amamus airiamara naka apedor kotoma odukonekec. Etapit ngin ayangaun iponesio luarokok lu itolitolete aijar naka angor.
lgg_prompt: E'yo suruni azi 'diyi ma alia, e'yo oku eyini aa'zu agupi eyi be 'diyi eco fe okpo eyi ma esele cozu ku aku eyi ma alea. E'yo 'di ni tutuni adriza onzi fe oku eyini ani aa'zu muke ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obuhangwa ebimwe, emirimo y'abashaija n'abakazi ey'obuhangwa neebaasa kureetaho obutakwatanisa omu by'obushoborozi omu bushwere. Eki nikikira kurugwamu emicwe y'akabi erikuteganisa amagara g'abakazi.

eng_prompt: After months of deliberation and numerous hearings, the case has finally reached its conclusion. All parties involved are preparing for the final arguments.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi egy'okuteesa n'okuwulira emisango mingi, omusango gutuuse ku nkomerero. Enjuyi zonna ezikwatibwako zeetegekera ensonga ezisembayo.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me tam ki winyo lok mapol, lok ne dong oo I agiki ne. Dano weng matye I lok ne gitye ka yubbe pi lok me agiki.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aomisio keda apupio na imusagon, adau kwana emusago ngol angetakin. Eutasi ipatei kere lu ikamunitos akiro ngun aitemonokin kanuka epeget lo awasia.
lgg_prompt: Mba egata ma vutia azini e'yo eriza karakara 'diyi ma vutia, kesi 'di asizu ca asizuri ma alia. Ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi yi otuta 'ye e'yo asizu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi mingi y'okuteesa n'okuhurira omushango, omushango gwahwaire. Enjuyi zoona ezirikukwatwaho, ziriyo nizetebekanisiza enshonga z'ahamuheru.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent increase in medical emergencies, officials announced a new initiative to enhance healthcare accessibility. As part of this effort, the government distributed ambulances to different districts.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweyongerayongera mu bujjanjabi obw'amangu gyebuvuddeko, abakungu balangiridde enteekateeka empya ey'okutumbula okufuna obujjanjabi. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, gavumenti yagabira disitulikiti ez'enjawulo emmotoka ezitambuza abalwadde.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa peko me yot kom ma opoto atura cokcok-ki, lutic gunyuto yub manyen me medo yoo me nongo kony me yot kom. Macalo but tic man, gamente opoko ambulance bot districts mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyatakinio naka adekasinei nu engeso, apotu eswamak kolimosi ainapeta nuitetiak kanu aitopolor adumunun amukian. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, abu apugan okorak amotokan nuadekis idisitriktan luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, azi'ba azi 'diyi azi e'yo o'diru azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu. Okpo 'di ma azi ru, gamete awa ambulansi eyi distrikiti ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'oburwaire obw'ahonaaho, abakuru bakarangirira enteekateeka nsya y'okutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'amagara. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi,gavumenti ekagabira za ambyurensi omu disiturikiti ezitari zimwe.

eng_prompt: As we approached the event venue, a staff member greeted us with a smile. "Welcome! Please make sure to check in before heading inside," they instructed.
lug_prompt: Bwe twasemberera ekifo awategekebwa omukolo, omu ku bakozi yatulamusa n'akamwenyumwenyu. "Mwaniriziddwa! Bambi kakasa nti okebera munda nga tonnayingira," bwe baalagidde.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma wanyiko cok ki kabedo me yub, latic mo omot wa ki bwunyo. "Walegu! Tim ber I nen ni I donyo mapwod pe I cito I gang," en aye ngo ma guwaco.
teo_prompt: Neadolunia sio aiboisit na ajaikinor epucit, abu eswaman kiyoga sio keda aimurimuria. "Ijau ijo! Kelipit koany ebe ibusakinit jo alomar eringa eloto toma," apotu kesi icorakisi.
lgg_prompt: Amani drilia pari e'yo 'yezuri ma alia, azi'ba azi zi ama cinya. "Mi a'i ra! Kirikirisi le mi ma ne ra kini emi fi rakaka de nga po'di mi fi alenia ku," yi fe azita ra.
nyn_prompt: Ku twahikire aha mwanya gw'omukoro, omwe aha bakozi akaturamutsya n'akamwenyo. "Mwakiriziibwe! Nyabura we rebeeka ngu okyebera otakatandikire omunda," nibo baragiire.

eng_prompt: After a harsh winter and heavy rainfall, the condition of the infrastructure has deteriorated significantly. As a result, drivers are facing increasingly bumpy rides.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'obutiti obw'amaanyi n'enkuba ennyingi, embeera y'ebizimbe eyonoonese nnyo. N'ekivuddemu, abavuzi b'ebidduka boolekedde entambula ey'ebinnya.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare me koyo matek tutwal ki kot ma ocwe matek tutwal, rwom me jami me tic tye ka bale tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, ludwo mutoka tye ka nongo peko me gudu.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akwap naetiono noi keda edou loepol noi, amunar ejautene loka adukena. Kanuka ngun, etereikina iderepan keda airenge naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ambizaru azini ozo okporu 'diyi ma vutia, afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma wura eza i onzi onzi. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, dereva eyi ma acita nzila dria 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obwire bw'obufuki n'enjura nyingi, embeera y'ebyombeko esiisire munonga. N'ekyarugiremu, abavugi b'ebiiruka nibatunga oburemeezi omu kuvuga.

eng_prompt: After responding to multiple emergency calls, the paramedics noticed that the siren was malfunctioning. As a result, they concluded that the ambulance needs to be repaired.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuddamu amasimu ag'amangu agawerako, abasawo baakizuula nti siringi yali tekola bulungi. N'ekyavaamu, baatuuka ku kusalawo nti emmotoka etambuza abalwadde yeetaaga okuddaabirizibwa.
ach_prompt: Inge gamo lwongo ma obedo tye pi peko ma opoto atura, lutic yoto kom guniang ni siren ne pe tye ka tic maber. Macalo adwogi ne, gumoko ni omyero ki yub ambulance.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka abongokin ainom isimun luipu lu engeso, apotu imurok lu adekis kowanyutu ebe mam esairini iswamai ejok. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi ongicata ebe ibusakinit aitemokin amotoka nadekis.
lgg_prompt: O'duko 'bani omve e'yo azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi omvizu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba azakoma fepi 'diyi ndre kini sireni ri azi nga onzi. E'yo 'disi, eyi 'yo kini le 'ba ma ede ambulansi 'da ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okugarukamu esimu nyingi ez'akabi, ab'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru bakareeba ngu esiirini ekaba etakora kurungi. N'ekyarugiremu,bakahendera ngu ambyurensi neeyetenga okukanikwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing population and increasing demand for healthcare, local governments recognized the need for improved medical facilities. As a result, community leaders advocated for better infrastructure to support public health initiatives.
lug_prompt: Olw'omuwendo gw'abantu ogweyongera n'obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi obweyongera, gavumenti z'ebitundu zaalaba obwetaavu bw'ebifo by'obujjanjabi ebirongoofu. N'ekyavaamu, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baalwanirira ebizimbe ebirungi okuyambako enteekateeka z'ebyobulamu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano kacel ki mede pa miti me nongo kony me yot kom, gamente me tedero oniang miti me medo rwom me odi yadi. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me kabedo gulego pi yub mabeco me konyo yub me yot kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga keda eipud loka amukian, apotu apuganisinei nuka atutubena kojenutu eipuda lo aiyatakin aiboisio nuka amukian. Kanuka ngun, apotu engarenok luka atutubet igangakisi adukena nuajokak kanu aigangite nuka angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyi ma kalafe ni tuzu tualu e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma rua ala ma tambazu ri pie, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo lezu arojo eyi ma omgbo otuzu ri ra. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi a'di 'di afa ayuzaru alata o'bi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abantu hamwe n'obwetaavu bw'eby'amagara,gavumenti z'ebyanga zikareeba ekyetengo ky'eby'amagara. N'ekyarugiremu, abeebembezi b'ebyanga bakarwanirira ebyombeko birungi kushagika enteekateeka y'eby'amagara.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing need for emergency medical services in their community, a local group has come together to support a vital cause. Their goal is to ensure that everyone has access to timely medical assistance when it matters most.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'obujjanjabi obw'amangu mu kitundu kyabwe, ekibinja ky'abatuuze kyegasse wamu okuwagira ensonga enkulu. Ekigendererwa kyabwe kwe kukakasa nti buli omu afuna obujjanjabi mu budde nga bwe kisinga okuba eky'omugaso.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo kony me yot kom i kabedo gi, dul pa lutedero mogo guribbe kacel me miyo kony pi gin ma pire tek tutwal. Miti gi tye me neno ni dano weng gunongo kony me yot kom ikare ma mite.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipud loka amukian na engeso kotoma atutubetekec, apotu igurupun luka atutubet imorikikinos kanu aigang aswam na epol ajokis. Alosikinetekosi erai awanyun ebe epedori nginitunganan adumunun amukian kotoma apak naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azakoma e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma aza kozu ongulumu eyivile 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, ongulumu azi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi emu tualu atita fezu e'yo azi orodriru ni ma dria. Asisile yiniri lezu nezu ra kini 'ba dria eco azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi esu sa'wa kililiru ri ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza bw'eby'amarwariro omu byanga byabo, guruupu y'abantu b'omubyaro eyegaitsire hamwe kuhwera omurimo gw'omugasho. Ekigyendererwa kyabo n'okureeba ngu buri omwe yaatunga obuhwezi bw'eby'amarwariro omu bwire.

eng_prompt: Due to an increase in demand for their services, the logistics team realized they needed to expand their fleet. After assessing their current capacity, they decided to take immediate action.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu obweyongedde obw'obuweereza bwabwe, abakola ku by'okutambuza ebintu baakiraba nti beetaaga okugaziya ebyamaguzi byabwe. Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obusobozi bwabwe, baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Pi dongo pa miti pa luticgi, joo ma tiyo ilok me wot ki jami gu niang ni omyero gi tyel kor tic gi. Ingee neno kero gi kombedi, gumoko tam gi me timo gin mo cut.
teo_prompt: Kanuka eipud loepol noi loka aijaanakinikec, abu etimu loka agwelanar kojen ebe ibusakinit kesi aitanyanyar aiboisio kec. Akaulo naka airereor apedorosiokec, apotu kesi koseutu aswam katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma azakozu ri ma omgbo ni tuzu risi, amuti e'yo ndundu eyi 'yepi 'diyi esu ra kini le eyi ma otu eyi ma mutukari eyi ma kalafe ra. E'yo yini eco 'ye sawa 'disi ri ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eyi 'du e'yo 'ye indikindi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'obwetaavu bw'obuheereza bwabo, tiimu y'abarikugaba ebintu eketegyereza ngu eshemereire kwongyera aha nkora yaabo. Bwanyima y'okushwijuma obushoboorozi bwabo obwahati, bakasharamu kukora ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: It's important to recognize the wisdom and experiences that come with age. By valuing the perspectives of those who have lived longer, we can learn valuable lessons for our own lives.

teo_prompt: Nealosia ngesi agola, abu amuno ke kitodu, itodunit ebe eyuunit ngesi ebe ejokuna adepar itunga kere luejaas. Neangisit eong aomisioitike, abu ngesi konger aingiseteka keda aimurimuria.

eng_prompt: As the years went by, scientists began to notice alarming changes in the ecosystem of Lake Victoria. Reports indicated that the once-thriving lake was experiencing significant fluctuations in its water levels.

eng_prompt: The residents of Arua have long struggled with access to clean drinking water. Despite efforts to improve infrastructure, many areas still face significant challenges in obtaining reliable water sources.

eng_prompt: In a significant move to promote environmental conservation, Uganda has taken steps to protect its rich biodiversity. As part of this initiative, the country signed a convention to mark the world wetlands day.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube ow'amaanyi ow'okutumbula okukuuma obutonde bw'ensi, Uganda ekoze emitendera okukuuma obutonde bwayo obw'enjawulo. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, eggwanga lyassa omukono ku ndagaano y'okukuza olunaku lw'entobazi mu nsi yonna.
ach_prompt: I yoo me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa, Uganda otimo jami mapol me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Macalo but yub man, lobo ne oketo cinge I winye me kwero nino me dagu I wilobo.

lgg_prompt: Kari Uganda niri 'ye e'yo azi okporu angu ama agei ri ma tambazu ri ma alea, afa nyakuni 'diyi ma tambazu. E'yo 'di ma azi ru, kari 'di ti dri otita azi ma dria o'du 'bani angu yiru 'diyi ma ta mbazu wudrikurusiri inzizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu nteekateeka y'amaani y'okurinda eby'obuhangwa, Uganda ekozire emiringo y'okurinda eby'obuhangwa byayo. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi,eihanga rikata omukono aha ndagaano y'okwijuka eizooba ry'ebisharara omunsi yoona.

eng_prompt: After extensive negotiations and discussions among member states, a consensus was finally reached on the proposed international convention. As a result, the majority of the countries ratified the convention.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'enteeseganya n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu mawanga agali mu mukago, okukkaanya kwaliwo ku nteekateeka y'endagaano y'ensi yonna. N'ekyavaamu, ensi ezisinga obungi zaassa omukono ku ndagaano eyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee winye ki nywako lok mapol ikin lobe ma obedo lumemba me dul enoni, winye obedo tye I kom yub me winye me kin lobe mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, lobe mapol guketo cingi I winye ne.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ipegeta luipu keda ipegeta kanejaas akwapin, aponi kodolokinai acamanar kotoma aitutuket naka akwapin kere. Kanuka ngun, apotu akwapin nuipu itigogongoto aitutuket ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otuza azini e'yo onzeza angiri ma vutia kari memba ru 'diyi ma eselea, 'ba eca asizu ti ecita ma dria e'yo 'bani lezu otuta kari yi ma eselea ri ma dria ra. E'yo 'disi, kari abari 'diyi ati e'yo 'di ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuteisa n'okuhanuura ahagati y'amahanga agajwekyeirwe, hakabaho okukirizana aha nteekateeka y'endagaano y'amahanga goona. N'ekyarugiremu, amahanga amaingi gakikiriza endagaano egyo.

eng_prompt: As urban development expands and agricultural practices intensify, natural water sources are increasingly threatened. The impact of human activity on ecosystems is becoming more evident, particularly in relation to freshwater resources.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana y'ebibuga bwe yeeyongera n'ennima bwe yeeyongera, ensibuko z'amazzi ez'obutonde zeeyongera okuteekebwa mu matigga. Obuzibu obuva mu bikolwa by'abantu ku butonde bweyongedde okweyoleka naddala mu bikwatagana n'obugagga bw'amazzi amayonjo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dongo lobo me boma tye kamedde ki dongo ki pur bene tye kamede, kabedo me nongo pii ma lubanga aye ocweyo tye kamede ki bedo kama rac tutwal. Adwogi pa tic pa dano i kom cwec ma orumuwa tye ka nen tutwalle I kom pii maleng.
teo_prompt: Kwape iyatakinor apol naka itaunin keda akoru naepol noi, iyatasi aiboisio nu akipi nu akwap. Epone loepedoriata aswamisio nuka itunga aijulakin ejautene lo akwap, kacut nuikamunitos akipi nu elaete.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni tawuni eyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu dika e'yo agirikica ni 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri si, geri yi nyakuni 'diyi ma tambazu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo 'ba ada eyini 'ye angu ama agei 'diyi ma dria ri ni i e'da sa'wa driasi, tutuni e'yo yi ala ni 'diyi ma dria.
