eng_prompt: Due to recent supply chain disruptions and increased demand, essential items have seen significant price hikes. One such item that has become increasingly expensive is the jerrycan, which is crucial for storing and transporting liquids.
lug_prompt: Olw'okutaataaganyizibwa kw'ebintu ebifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko n'obwetaavu obweyongedde, ebbeeyi y'ebintu ebikulu erinnye nnyo. Ekimu ku bintu ebyo ebyeyongedde okuba eby'ebbeeyi ye jerrycan, ey'omugaso mu kutereka n'okutambuza amazzi.
ach_prompt: Pi peko ma obedo tye ikare ma okato cokcok-ki kacel ki mede pa miti pa jami mapigi tego, wel jami mapigi tego omede tutwal. Gin acel macalo man ma welgi omede tutwal obedo jereken, ma pire tek tutwal me gwoko ki cwalo pii.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aibiror naka akorio naka iboro keda eipuda loepol noi, eyatakinos itiaisinei luka iboro luipudasi itunga. Adiopebore kwape kangin naepol etiai ngesi jerikan, naepol noi kanu aidar keda aitolot akipi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru afa ozizaru 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, aje afa orodriru 'diyi ma ongmbo tu ra. Afa azi alu 'dile 'bani eca curu'do ajeru tu 'diyi jerekeni, eri orodriru yi ma tambazu azini yi ojizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburiho obwahati hamwe n'okweyongyera kw'ebyetaago, emihendo y'ebintu ebikuru eyeyongyeire. Ekintu kimwe nk'ekyo ekyeyongyeire kuba eky'omuhendo gw'ahaiguru n'ekya jerekeni, ekirikukoresibwa munonga omu kubiika n'okutwara amaizi.

eng_prompt: In an effort to protect the region's biodiversity and promote sustainable development, local officials have proposed new conservation measures. As part of this initiative, the government will gazette the wetlands of Enyau river.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukuuma obutonde bw'ekitundu n'okutumbula enkulaakulana ey'olubeerera, abakungu b'ekitundu bateesezza enkola empya ez'okukuuma obutonde. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, gavumenti ejja kutereka entobazi z'omugga Enya.
ach_prompt: I tute me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa ki dongo lobo, lutic me tedero guyubu yoo manyen me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Macalo but yub man, gamente obi yubu dagu me nam Enyau.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na ayuarite iboro luegelegela luka aiboisit ka aitopolor apol, etemokisi eswamak luka atutubet iwaitin luitetiak luka aidar iboro luegelegela. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ebuni apugan aiwadika isama luka ecilet loka Enyau.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu angu 'di ma alea afa idriru 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini angu ezoma ewu drile ri ma alea ri ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi fe egata geri o'diru 'bani ecozu afa idriru 'diyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi ma dria. Otita 'di ma azi ru, gamete ni mu angu yiru yi rapi rara Enyau niri ma alea 'diyi ma ta mba.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okurinda eby'obuhangwa omu kyanga n'okureetaho entunguuka, abakuru omu byaro bateireho oburyo busya bw'okurinda eby'obuhangwa. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi,gavumenti neija kuhandiika ebisharara by'omugyera Enyau.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns about environmental degradation, local authorities have prioritized the protection of natural resources. As part of this initiative, the ministry of water and environment will demarcate most of the wetlands in Arua.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku kwonoona kw'obutonde bw'ensi, ab'obuyinza mu byalo bakulembezza okukuuma eby'obugagga eby'omu ttaka. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, minisitule y'amazzi n'obutonde bw'ensi ejja kusala ensalo z'entobazi ezisinga mu Arua.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamedde I kom balo cwec ma orumuwa, lutela me tedero gucako gwoko cwec ma orumuwa. Macalo but yub man, jang gamente ma loyo lok kom pii ki cwec ma orumuwa biketo wang ngom I kom dagu mapol matye I Arua.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongong naepol noi naikamunit amunar alupok, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubena kisingarenitos ayuarit iboro lu isuban luka Edeke. Kwape ediope kotoma ainapeta ngun, ebuni erionget loka akipi keda isama aitemokin ikoruo luka isama luipu ko Arua.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza tupi angu ama agei ri ma ezaza ma dria, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ba e'yo okporu afa nyakuni 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria. Otita 'di ma azi ru, okalamvu yi ni azini angu amani aa'zu alenia ri niri ni mu angu yiru Arua 'diyi ma kala oku.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira aha nshonga y'okushisha eby'obuhangwa, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bateire omutwe omu kurinda eby'obuhangwa. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, minisiture y'amaizi n'obuhangwa bw'ensi neija kutaho ensharo z'ebisharara ebirikukira obwingi omuri Arua.

eng_prompt: In light of the alarming rate of climate change and habitat destruction, it has become imperative for those in power to take decisive action. Effective governance requires a commitment to sustainable practices that protect our planet for future generations.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukyuka kw'embeera y'obudde n'okusaanawo kw'obutonde bw'ensi, abo abali mu buyinza balina okubaako kye bakolawo. Enfuga ennungi yeetaaga okwewaayo eri enkola ezisobola okukuuma ensi yaffe eri emirembe egijja.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki alokaloka me piny ki bale pa kabedo ma dano bedo iye, obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal ki joo matye I loc me timo gin mo. Tela maber mito keto cwiny I kom jami ma twero gwoko lobowa pi anyim.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aijulanakineta nuka ekuse keda ecae keda amunar aiboisio nu akwap, erai ibore yenibusakinit ngul luejaasi toma apugan aswam kagogongu. Epugae loajokan ekoto ainakina aitodolikin iponesio lu eyuwarete akwap wok kanuka itunga lu oingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile ma ojata azini angu 'bani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma ezaza ma dria, eri curu'do orodriru 'ba opi dria 'diyi ni e'yo 'yezu okporu. Driceza kililiru ri le 'ba ma 'ba asi e'yo ecopi angu amavile 'diyi ma ta mbapi ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma ta mbapi ra 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'empindahinduka y'obwire n'okusisikara kw'obuhangwa bw'ensi, ab'obushoborozi bashemereire kugira eki bakozire. Obwebembezi burungi nibwetaga okwehayo omu mirimo erikubaasa kurinda ensi yaitu ahabw'eminyeeto ya nyensya.

eng_prompt: Wetlands play a crucial role in maintaining the health of our ecosystems. By absorbing excess rainwater, they help to regulate water levels in surrounding areas.
lug_prompt: Entobazi zikola omulimu munene mu kukuuma obulamu bw'ebiramu byaffe. Nga zifukirira amazzi g'enkuba agasukkiridde, ziyamba mu kutereeza omutindo gw'amazzi mu bitundu ebiriraanyewo.
ach_prompt: Kama dagu tye iye pire tek tutwal I gwoko kwo pa cwec ma orumuwa. Pi gamo pii me kot ma dwong tutwal, gikonyo me doro rwom me pii I kabedo ma orumu gi.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete isama aswam naepol noi kanu aidar aijar naka isuban. Kowai lo aimat akipi nuka edou, ingarakinete kesi aitikitik akipi kotoma aiboisio nu idunyare.
lgg_prompt: Angu yiru 'diyi azi okporu nga angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma ta mbazu. Yi ozoo ma omgbo angiri si, yi yi ma omgbo angu yi ma ageia 'diyi ma alia ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Ebisharara nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kureeberera eby'obuhangwa. Ahabw'okwiba amaizi g'enjura, nigahwera omu kukyendeeza amaizi omu myanya erikwetorwaire.

eng_prompt: Wetlands play a crucial role in maintaining the health of our ecosystems. They act as natural filters, trapping pollutants and sediments before they enter larger bodies of water.
lug_prompt: Entobazi zikola omulimu munene mu kukuuma obulamu bw'ebiramu byaffe. Zikola nga filita ez'obutonde, okukwata obucaafu n'ebitosi nga tezinnaba kuyingira mu bifo ebinene eby'amazzi.
ach_prompt: Kama dagu tye iye pire tek tutwal I gwoko kwo pa cwec ma orumuwa. Gitiyo macalo filta me cwec ma lubanga aye ocweyo, mako jami ma cilo ki cwec mukene mapwod pe gudonyo I pii madongo.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete isama aswam naepol noi kanu aidar aijar naka isuban. Iswamaete kesi kwape akinyeta nuka akwap, aikamanar iboro luepedorete amunar akwap eringa elomaria akipi nuapolok.
lgg_prompt: Angu yiru 'diyi azi okporu nga angu amani aa'zu alenia 'diyi ma ta mbazu. Eyi azi nga ekile afa edele ra 'diyi le, eyi afa onzi 'diyi obi dika eyi e'deta eyi 'ye de nga po'di eyi fi angu yi ni ambo 'diyi ma alea ku.
nyn_prompt: Ebisharara nibikora omurimo gw'amaani omu kureeberera eby'obuhangwa. Nibakora nk'ebihweezo by'obuhangwa, nibikwata ebintu ebirikutokooza hamwe n'ebisharara bitakahikire omu maizi amahango.

eng_prompt: The rapid expansion of urban development and agriculture has significantly altered the natural landscape. As a result, many ecosystems have been disrupted, leading to changes in water flow patterns.
lug_prompt: Okugaziwa okw'amangu okw'enkulaakulana y'ebibuga n'ebyobulimi kikyusizza nnyo obutonde bw'ensi. N'ekyavaamu, ebitonde bingi bikoseddwa, ekiviiriddeko enkyukakyuka mu ntambula y'amazzi.
ach_prompt: Yub me dongo boma ki pur ma tye ka dongo oyot-oyot tutwal okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kom cwec ma orumuwa. Macalo adwogi ne, jami makwo mapol oballe, ma okelo aloka loka I kit ma pii mol kwede.
teo_prompt: Apol naka apol naka itaunin keda akor ejulaki noi akwap. Kanuka ngun, aponi itolitolorai isuban luipu, ido ayangau aijulanakineta kotoma epone loka akipi.
lgg_prompt: Angu tawuni eyini tuzu okposi tualu agirikica be ri oja angu nyakuni 'diyi saaru. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, 'ba eza afa idri ta mbazu 'diyi karakara, e'yo fepi yi ma acita ni ojazu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguuka kw'endembo hamwe n'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa kuhindwire munonga eby'obuhangwa. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'obuhangwa bingi bitabukire, ekirikureetaho empindahinduka omu nkora y'amaizi.

eng_prompt: Wetlands play a crucial role in maintaining biodiversity and regulating water quality. Educating the public about their ecological significance is essential for conservation efforts.
lug_prompt: Entobazi zikola omulimu munene mu kukuuma obutonde n'okulungamya omutindo gw'amazzi. Okusomesa abantu ku bukulu bw'obutonde bw'ensi kya mugaso nnyo mu kaweefube w'okubukuuma.
ach_prompt: Kama dagu tye iye pire tek tutwal I gwoko jami makwo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kabedo mapat-pat I kab Pwonyo lwak i kom ber pa cwec ma orumuwa pire tek tutwal I yub me gwoko cwec ma orumuwa.
teo_prompt: Iswamaete isama aswam naepol noi kanu aidar iboro luegelegela ka aidar adoketait na akipi. Aisisianakin itunga nuikamunitos ajokis naka isuban lu akwap erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aidar ejautene lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: Angu yiru 'diyi azi okporu nga afa idriru 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini yi ma wura otuzu. O'bi eyini imbata fezu orodri angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma dria ri eri orodriru okpo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu ri ni.

eng_prompt: Given the alarming rates of deforestation and its impact on biodiversity, it is crucial for the government to take proactive measures. One effective strategy to combat these issues is to enhance efforts in reforestation and tree planting initiatives.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bungi bw'okutema ebibira n'engeri gye kikosaamu obutonde bw'ensi, kikulu nnyo gavumenti okubaako ky'ekolawo. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okulwanyisa ensonga zino kwe kwongera amaanyi mu kutema ebibira n'okusimba emiti.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki rwom me tongo yadi ki adwoki ne I kom jami makwo mapol, pire tek tutwal ni gamente omyero otim gin mo. Yoo acel maber tutwal me lweny i kom peko magi en aye me medo kero me poto yen ki pito yadi.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo epol noi loka atubutubio naka ikito keda epone loetiroritor ngesi aijar naka itiang, erai ibore yenepol noi apugan aitolomun nuiswama. Adiopet ewai lo ejok kanu aitiji atiokisio nu ngesi aiyatakin aswam naka aira ikito keda aira ikito.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo 'bani pati eyi ogazu 'diyi ma omgbo onzi 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru gamete ni e'yo eyi 'yezu okporu. Otita azi okporu e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu ri okpo 'bazu e'yo pati saza ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu okutema emiti kuri aha rurengo rw'amaani n'oku kirikukwata aha biine amagara, nikikuru gavumenti kukora kyona ekirikubaasika. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okurwanisa enshonga ezi n'okwongyera amaani omu by'okutema emiti n'okubyara emiti.

eng_prompt: The rapid expansion of agriculture and urban development has significantly altered the landscape in Arua district. As a result, natural habitats are increasingly being lost to human activities.
lug_prompt: Okweyongera kw'ebyobulimi n'enkulaakulana y'ebibuga kikyusizza nnyo embeera mu disitulikiti ya Arua. N'ekivuddemu, obutonde bweyongera okufiirwa olw'emirimu gy'abantu.
ach_prompt: Dongo tic me pur ki dongo lobo I boma mapat-pat I Arua okelo alokaloka madit tutwal I kabedo mapat-pat manonge I Arua. Macalo adwogi ne, jami ma lubanga aye ocweyo tye ka rweny pi tic pa dano.
teo_prompt: Apol naka akoru keda apol naka itaunin ijulakisi noi aiboisio nuka edisitrikta loko Arua. Kanuka ngun, eutai aibiror aiboisio nuka Edeke kanuka aswamisinei nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo agirikica ni azini tawuni eyi ma ezota ni tupi mbeleru ri oja angu Arua distrikitia ri ra. E'yo 'di ma e'yosi, angu 'bani afa nyakuni 'diyi ma ta mbazu 'diyi curu'do eyi avi e'yo 'ba ada eyini 'ye 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Okweyongyera kw'eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa hamwe n'entunguuka y'endembo, kihindwire munonga entwaza y'eihanga omu disiturikiti ya Arua. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'obuhangwa biriyo nibisisikara ahabw'emirimo y'abantu.

eng_prompt: After months of planning and community meetings, the local government implemented a new water management strategy. As a result, the district has improved on the supply of water in the area.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okuteekateeka n'enkiiko z'ekitundu, gavumenti y'ebitundu yassa mu nkola enkola empya ey'okuddukanya amazzi. N'ekivuddemu, disitulikiti eyongedde ku bungi bw'amazzi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me yube ki kacokke pa lwak, gamente me tedero okatti ki yoo manyen me tic i kom pii. Macalo adwogi ne, districte omedo rwom me poko pii ikabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka aitemonokin keda airiamununeta nuka itunga, apugan naka atutubet abu kitutub ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aidar akipi. Kanuka ngun, etojokaar edisitrikt akorio na akipi katutubet.
lgg_prompt: Mba 'bani otita eyi o'bazu tualu mitingi ongulumu eyini 'diyi pie 'bori ma vutia, gamete angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do geri yi ma tambazu o'diru 'diyi 'yeta ma alea. E'yo 'disi, distrikiti otu geri yi awazu angu 'da ma alea ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyezi y'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'enkiiko z'abantu, gavumenti y'ebyaro ekataho enkora ensya y'okureeberera amaizi. Ekyarugiremu, disiturikiti eyongyeire amaizi omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: The region had been experiencing unusually high temperatures and minimal rainfall for several months. As a result, local farmers began to worry about the impact on their crops and livestock.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kifuna ebbugumu eritali lya bulijjo n'enkuba ntono okumala emyezi egiwerako. N'ekyavaamu, abalimi b'omu kitundu baatandika okweraliikirira engeri ekyo gye kikwata ku birime byabwe n'ebisolo byabwe.
ach_prompt: But piny eni obedo ka nongo lyeto madit tutwal ki kot manok tutwal pi dwe mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, lupur me tedero gucako bedo ki lworo I kom adwogi ne I kom camgi ki dyangi gi.
teo_prompt: Ajaas aiboisit ngin keda amwanis naepol noi keda edou loedit adaun ilapio luipu. Kanuka ngun, apotu akoriok luka atutubet kogeutu aiyalongong kanuikamunitos epone loepedoria ngesi aimusung iraanakec keda ibarenakec.
lgg_prompt: Angu 'da ma alea ri ebi angu driza ma omgbo tu dika ozoo ma omgbo esi mba karakara 'bo. E'yo 'disi, 'ba ori ezo'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi e'do asi otiza be e'yo ecopi 'yepi ori yini 'diyi ma dria tualu anyapa yini 'diyi pie ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga kitwire nikitunga obutagatsi bwingi n'enjura nkye kumara ameezi maingi. N'ekyarugiremu, abahingi b'omubyaro bakatandika kwerarikirira aha bikwatireine n'ebihingirwe byabo hamwe n'amatungo gaabo.

eng_prompt: The climate patterns in Uganda vary significantly across different regions, leading to distinct seasonal changes. Among these, the Northern and West Nile regions face a prolonged dry spell during the cooler months.
lug_prompt: Embeera y'obudde mu Uganda ya njawulo nnyo mu bitundu eby'enjawulo, ekivaako enkyukakyuka mu sizoni ez'enjawulo. Mu bino, ebitundu by'obukiikakkono ne West Nile bisanga ekyeya ekiwanvu mu myezi egy'obunyogovu.
ach_prompt: Kit ma piny tye kwede I lobo Uganda pat-pat I but lobo mapat-pat, ma man kelo alokaloka I kare me mwaka mapat-pat. I kin magi, but lobo mapat-pat manonge I kumalo ki kupoto ceng me Nile nongo peko me ceng I kare me koyo.
teo_prompt: Egelegela ekuse ka etepe ko Uganda kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela, ido ijaikini aijulanakineta nuka apakio nuegelegela. Kanejaas nu, atutubena nuko Nyakoi keda West Nile ejaas keda akamu naepol noi kotoma ilapio luelilim.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu mile ni kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi co esele angu ndundu eyi ma alea, e'yo 'di ni fe angu eyi ma sa'wa eyi ma oja eyi sa'wa ndundu eyi si. Eyi ma eselea, angu kari Uganda niri ma woko oruleru ri ma alea azini angu westnile niri ma woko etuni 'deria 'diyi ma alea, etuka ni sa'wa ezu ri esu imba ambizaru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Embeera y'obwire omu Uganda neetaana munonga omu bicweka ebitarikushushana, ekirikureetaho empinduka y'obwire. Omuri ebi, ebitongore by'omumatemba hamwe na West Nile nibitunga ekyanda ky'obwire buraingwa omu myezi y'obufuki.

eng_prompt: In response to growing environmental concerns and public health issues, the government of Uganda has recognized the urgent need for improved sanitation infrastructure. As part of its commitment to sustainable development, officials have decided to invest in critical water management projects.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'obutonde bw'ensi okweyongera n'ensonga z'ebyobulamu mu bantu, gavumenti ya Uganda etegedde obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okulongoosa eby'obuyonjo. Ng'ekimu ku bigendererwa byayo eby'enkulaakulana ey'olubeerera, abakungu basazeewo okusiga ensimbi mu pulojekiti z'amazzi ez'omugaso.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo peko me cwec ma orumuwa kacel ki peko me yot kom pa lwak, gamente me Uganda oniang ni omyero oyub yub me gwoko lengo oyot-oyot tutwal. Macalo but miti gi me dongo lobo maber, lutic gumoko tam gi me keto lim I yub mapigi tego me gwoko pii.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo na akwap keda nuka angaleu naka itunga, abu apugan ko Uganda koany eipud loka aitojokar aiboisio nuka aila. Kwape ediope kotoma ainakina kec kanu apol, aseutu eswamak aipikakin ikapunukec toma ipurojektin lu idarere akipi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ama agei ri ma tambazu tualu e'yo rua ala ni 'diyi pie, gamete Uganda niri esu e'yo lezu e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu mbeleru ri ra. E'yo 'bani asi 'bazu angu ezoma ni ewu drile ri ma alea ri ma azi ru, azi'ba eyi 'du e'yo robia ayuzu otita okporu yi ma tambazu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ya Uganda, ahabw'enshonga z'obuhangwa bw'ensi hamwe n'eby'amagara g'abantu, eyorekire ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okutunguura eby'obuyonjo. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka y'entunguuka, abakuru bashaziremu kutamu sente omu purogyekiti z'amaizi.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing concerns about water scarcity and infrastructure challenges, local authorities have prioritized sustainable solutions. As part of this initiative, the National Water and Sewerage Corporation is establishing a water management project.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira okweyongera ku bbula ly'amazzi n'okusoomoozebwa kw'ebizimbe, ab'obuyinza mu byalo bakulembezza eby'okugonjoola ebiwangaazi. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, National Water and Sewerage Corporation etaddewo pulojekiti y'okuddukanya amazzi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo ma tye kamede I kom peko me nok pa pii ki gedo mapat-pat, lutela me tedero guketo cwinygi I kom yoo me cobo peko matye. Macalo but yub man, dul me National Water and Sewerage Corporation tye ka kati ki yub me gwoko pii.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naikamunit ekadakada loka akipi keda atiokisio nuka aduketait, apedorosio nuka atutubena apodokinit aitemokin ationis ngin. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, euta Erionget Loka Akipi aitolomun epurojekt loka aidar akipi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ma omgbo tupi e'yo yi ako ni azini e'yo ewaru afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie 'diyi ma dria, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi 'ba e'yo eyi ma aza kozu sa'wa driasi. Otita 'di ma azi ru, amuti National Water and Sewerage Corporation ni otita azi yi ma tambazu ni e'do.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'okwerarikirira ahabw'eibura ry'amaizi hamwe n'oburemeezi bw'ebyombeko, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bateireho oburyo bw'okukora aha nshonga egyo. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, ekitongore ky'amaizi ekya National Water and Sewerage Corporation kiriyo nikitandikaho purogyekiti y'okureeberera amaizi.

eng_prompt: In response to the increasing demand for water supply, local authorities initiated a project to enhance the region's infrastructure. As part of this initiative, water reservoirs have been established in the area.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'amazzi obweyongera, abakulembeze b'ebyalo baatandika pulojekiti okutumbula ebizimbe by'ekitundu. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, amabibiro g'amazzi gazimbiddwa mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me pii, lutela me tedero gucako yub me ilo malo rwom me tic mapat-pat I but piny eni. Macalo but yub man, ki yubu ka gwoko pii I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo akipi, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet kogeutu epurojekt lo aitojokar aiboisio nuka aiboisit. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, adukio aiboisio nu akipi katutubet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu yi ma ayuza ma omgbo tuzu ri ma e'yosi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'do otita azi angu 'da ma alea afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. Otita 'di ma azi ru, 'ba si angu yi tambazu 'diyi angu 'da ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwenda kw'amaizi kweyongyera, ab'obushoborozi bakatandika purogyekiti y'okutunguura ebyombeko by'ekyanga. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, amarindiro g'amaizi gatandikirweho omukyanga.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for water in urban areas, the government has announced a new initiative. This plan aims to enhance infrastructure and improve access to clean water for residents.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'amazzi obweyongera mu bibuga, gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka empya. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okutumbula ebizimbe n'okutumbula okufuna amazzi amayonjo eri abatuuze.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me pii I boma madongo, gamente okatti ki yub manyen. Yub man tye ki miti me medo rwom me gedo ki nongo pii maleng pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo akipi kaiboisio nu otaun, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuitetiak. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitojokar adumunun akipi nu elaete nejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu yi ma omgbo tupi angu tawuni ru 'diyi ma alea ri ma aza kozu, gamete azi e'yo azi o'di ni. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu azini geri 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini yi ala esuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka nsya ahabw'okwenda kw'amaizi omu ndembo kweyongyera. Enteekateeka egi negyenderera okutunguura ebyombeko n'okutunguura okutunga amaizi marungi aha batuura gye.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing demand for water supply and infrastructure improvements, the government has initiated several projects. These efforts aim to enhance the efficiency and capacity of the existing water distribution system.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'amazzi n'okulongoosa ebizimbe, gavumenti etandiseewo pulojekiti ez'enjawulo. Kaweefube ono agendererwamu okutumbula obulungi n'obusobozi bw'enkola y'amazzi eriwo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa miti me nongo pii ki yubu jami mukene, gamente ocako yub mapat-pat. Yub eni tye me medo rwom ki kero pa yub me poko pii matye kombedi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo eyas loka akipi ka aitojokar iboro, etolomu apugan ipurojektin luipu. Alosikinet naka aswam ngun erai aitojokar eswamae loajokan lo akipi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu yi awazu tualu afa ayuzaru 'diyi pie, gamete e'do otita karakara eyi. Okpo 'dayi lezu geri yi awazu ci 'diyi ma okpo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti etandikireho purogyekiti nyingi ahabw'obwetaavu bw'amaizi obweyongyeire n'okutunguura ebyombeko. Amaani aga nigagyenderera okwongyera omutindo n'obushoboorozi omu nkora y'okugaba amaizi eriho obwahati.

eng_prompt: The local government has been working diligently to meet the necessary criteria for city designation. As a result, the community is optimistic about the potential changes that could follow this achievement.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebitundu ebadde ekola n'obunyiikivu okutuukiriza ebisaanyizo ebyetaagisa mu kulonda ekibuga. N'ekivuddemu, abantu balina essuubi ku nkyukakyuka eziyinza okubaawo oluvannyuma lw'obuwanguzi buno.
ach_prompt: Gamente me tedero obedo katic ki mit kom me cobo miti me bedo city. Macalo adwogi ne, lwak tye ki gen I kom aloka-loka matwero timme ingee cobo miti man.
teo_prompt: Iswamai apugan na okwap kagogong kanu aitodolikin nutupitono kanu aseun esite. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi itunga keda amuno naka aijulakineta nuebeit alomun akaulo naka aitodolikinio na.
lgg_prompt: Gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri ebi azi nga okporu e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba ma 'du aku ambo eyi ma alea 'diyi 'yezu. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu eyi asi'baza be e'yo ojata ecopi 'yepi e'yo 'di ma vutia 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti y'ebyanga etwire neekora n'amaani okuhikiiriza ebirikwetengwa omu kutaho orurembo. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baine amatsiko aha mpindahinduka ezirikubaasa kubaho ahanyima y'okutunga obuhanguzi obu.

eng_prompt: During his visit to the region, the president emphasized the importance of development and modernization for local communities. He assured the residents that their aspirations for growth would be prioritized in his administration's agenda.
lug_prompt: Mu kukyala kwe mu kitundu, pulezidenti yakkaatirizza obukulu bw'enkulaakulana n'okuzza ebintu ku mulembe eri abantu b'omu kitundu. Yagumizza abatuuze nti okwegomba kwabwe okw'okukulaakulana kujja kukulemberwa mu nteekateeka z'obukulembeze bwe.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma en olimo but lobo man, ladit lobo oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa dongo lobo ki dongo lobo I kare-ni. En ocuko cwiny lwak ni miti gi me dongo lobo obi bedo gin ma pire tek ikare me tela mege.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aipejonoke toma atutubet kangin, abu lokapolon akwap kitogogong ajokis naka apol keda aitojokaar aiboisio nuka atutubet. Abu ngesi kisinyikok itunga ebe eponio aisingarenit aomisio kec nuka apol kotoma apuganikec.
lgg_prompt: Sawa erini muzu angu 'da ma alea risi, prisdent 'da fe okpo orodri angu ezoma ni azini e'yo ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyiniri ongulumu angu 'da ma alea 'diyini. Eri fe asi'baza 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri kini e'yo eyini lezu zozu ri nga ovu e'yo okporu eyi ma driceza ni 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu kutaayaaya kwe omu kyanga, omwebembezi w'eihanga akahamya omugasho gw'entunguuka n'okutunguura ebyaro. Akahamiza abatuuragye ngu ebyetengo byabo by'entunguuka nibiija kwebembera enteekateeka y'obwebembezi bwe.

eng_prompt: The government has allocated significant funding to improve the region's infrastructure. As a result, several key water projects are currently underway.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti etaddewo ensimbi nnyingi okutumbula ebintu ebikozesebwa mu kitundu. N'ekyavaamu, pulojekiti z'amazzi ez'omugaso nnyingi zigenda mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Gamente omiyo cente madit tutwal me yubu jami me tic i twok piny eni. Macalo adwogi ne, yub mapol madongo me pii tye kawot anyim.
teo_prompt: Abu apugan ibwaik ikapun luipu kanu aitojokar aiboisio nuka aiboisit. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ipurojektin luipu lu akipi aswam kwape kwana.
lgg_prompt: Gamete 'ba robia angiri angu 'da ma afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo 'disi, otita yi ni okporu 'diyi curu'do mu drile.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti eteireho esente nyingi, okutunguura ebyombeko by'ekyanga. N'ekyarugiremu, purogyekiti z'amaizi nyingi nizigyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: The construction crew began their work early in the morning, preparing to lay new water pipes throughout the neighborhood. However, unforeseen complications arose as heavy machinery was brought in to dig trenches.
lug_prompt: Abakozi b'okuzimba baatandika emirimu gyabwe ku makya ennyo nga beetegekera okussaawo payipu z'amazzi empya mu kitundu kyonna. Newankubadde, ebizibu ebitasuubirwa byajjawo nga ebyuma ebinene byaleetebwa okusima emifulejje.
ach_prompt: Lutic me gedo gucako ticgi odiko con, kun giyube me keto paipo me pii I kabedo wa weng. Kadi bed kumeno, peko ma pe byek tye I komgi obedo tye ikare ma kikelo Cuma madongo me tongo tangi.
teo_prompt: Apotu adukok kogeutu aswamukec tupuruc tupuruc, aitemonokin aibwaikin apaipon nuka akipi katutubet. Konye, apotu atiokisio nu mam aomitai opotu naarai aponi koyangaunai acuman nuelangir noi kanu aibok alupok.
lgg_prompt: Ba afa si'ba 'diyi e'do eyi ma azi o'bitisi drioru, eyi oturia eyi ma paipu yi ni o'diru 'diyi sizu angu ama agei 'diyi ma alea ndulu. Kani si, e'yo ewaru 'bani ega kokoru 'diyi efu ekile 'bani masini nzizaru 'diyi ejizu yi ogazu.
nyn_prompt: Abombeki bakatandika emirimo yaabo omu kasheeshe kare, barikweteekateekyera kutaho payipu z'amaizi omu byaro byona. Kwonka, hakabaho oburemeezi obubaire butarikwetegyerezibwa obu ebyoma by'amaani byareesirwe kusima emifuregye.

eng_prompt: After careful consideration of the project requirements, the contractor ensured that all necessary permits and approvals were obtained. This commitment to compliance was evident throughout the entire process.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya n'obwegendereza ebyetaago bya pulojekiti, omukozi yakakasa nti olukusa n'ebikkirizibwa byonna ebyetaagibwa bifunibwa. Obumalirivu buno obw'okugondera amateeka bwalabikira mu nkola yonna.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo ki diro jami ma mite pi yub eni, latic ne oneno ni kimiye twero ki twero weng ma mite. Cikke man me lubu cik nen I kare weng me yub eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejok ipudesia luka epurojekt, abu ekonturakit koany ebe edumunitai apapulai kere nu ekotoi. Aponi kojenunai ainakina ngin kotoma ainapeta kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani le otita 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, 'ba azi ngapiri ne ra kini 'ba isu kokobi dria azini driwala dria lele 'diyi ra. E'yo 'bani lezu azita vuti obizu 'diri e'da sa'wa dria 'bani e'yo 'yezu ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma n'obwegyendesereza ebirikwetengwa omu purogyekiti, owakozire purogyekiti akareeba ngu akatunga orusa n'ebiragiro ebirikwetengwa. Okwehayo kwe kukuratira ebiragiro, kukarebeka omu nkora yoona.

eng_prompt: In response to growing demands for better land management and accessibility, the government announced a series of initiatives aimed at improving local services. One of the key steps in this plan was the establishment of new regional offices.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula obwetaavu obweyongera obw'okuddukanya obulungi ettaka n'okutuukirirwa, gavumenti yalangiridde enteekateeka ez'enjawulo ezigendereddwamu okutumbula obuweereza mu kitundu. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebyali mu nteekateeka eno kwe kutandikawo woofiisi empya mu bitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti me tic ki ngom maber ki yoo me nongo ngom, gamente onyuto yub mapol ma ki keto pi ilo malo rwom me miyo kony bot lwak. Yub acel ma pire tek tutwal I yub man obedo yabo office manyen I but lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin eipuda lo iyatakinet lo eyaitene lo alupok keda epatana adolokin, abu apugan kolimo ainapeta nuipu nu ekotosi aitojokar ejanakine loka itunga. Adiopet koboro luapolok luka ainapeta ngun arai aitolomun iyapesin lu aiboisio nuitetiak.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu e'yo nyaku ma tambaza kililiru ri ma dria, gamete azi e'yo ndundu 'bani lezu azakoma fele o'bi eyidri 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma dria. E'yo okporu otita 'di ma alea ri ma azi ndra ofisi angu ndundu eyi ma alea o'diru 'diyi sizu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'ebyetaago by'okureeberera eitaka kurungi, gavumenti ekarangirira enteekateeka nyingi ezirikugyenderera okutunguura obuheereza omu byaro. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru omu nteekateeka egi, n'okutandikaho ofiisi nsya omu byanga.

eng_prompt: Due to the recent economic downturn and rising interest rates, financial institutions have tightened their lending policies. As a result, many individuals are finding themselves in a difficult position this holiday season.
lug_prompt: Olw'okukendeera kw'ebyenfuna n'okulinnyisibwa kw'amagoba, ebitongole by'ensimbi binywezezza enkola yaabyo ey'okuwola ssente. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi beesanga mu mbeera enzibu mu kiseera kino eky'ennaku enkulu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me lim ma obedo tye cokcok-ki ki mede pa wel magoba, dul mapat-pat me lim omedo rwom me miyo lim den. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol gitye ka nongo peko ikare me yweyo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanuka aibiror naka ikapun keda apol naka ameda, apotu iriongeta luka ikapun kitogogongoto ainapeta kec nuka aijaun ilonin. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi itunga luipu toma ojautene loetiono kapakio nuapolok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma e'yosi azini orodri tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, amuti robia ni 'diyi otu azita yini mari fezu 'diyi ma omgbo ra. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara eyi eyi esu eyi e'yo ewaru ma alea sa'wa natali nirisi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugwa kw'eby'entaasya okwabaireho obwahati hamwe n'emihendo y'amagoba erikweyongyera, ebitongore by'esente byongyeire amaani omu kugaba za rooni. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi nibeshangwa omu mbeera egumire omu bwire obu obw'ekihuumuro.

eng_prompt: To ensure legal protection and proper documentation of property ownership, it is essential for landowners to take proactive steps. One important action they can take is to register their land with the ministry of lands.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa obukuumi mu mateeka n'okuwandiisa obulungi obwannannyini ku ttaka, kya mugaso nnyo bannannyini ttaka okukola emitendera egy'obwegendereza. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu bye bayinza okukola kwe kuwandiisa ettaka lyabwe ne minisitule y'ebyettaka.
ach_prompt: Pi gwoko cik ki coyo coc maber I kom rwom me ngom, pire tek tutwal ni wegi ngom omyero gutim jami ma mite. Gin acel ma pire tek ma gitwero timone aye me coyo ngom gi bot ministry me ngom.
teo_prompt: Kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara ikisila keda aiwadikaet na abeit naka alupok, ibusakinit ikulepek alupok aswam ngun. Adiopebore na epol ajokis na epedorete kesi aswam ngesi aiwadika alupok kec keda erionget loka alupok.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo azita ni 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini kokobi e'dazu kililiru e'yo nyaku ma e'ini 'diyi ma dria, eri orodriru nyaku ipika eyini e'yo eyi 'yezu okporu. E'yo azi orodriru eyini eco 'ye ri nyaku eyivile 'diyi ma ru osizu okalamvu nyaku niri be.
nyn_prompt: Okureeba ngu hariho obukuumi omu biragiro hamwe n'ebihandiiko ebirikworeka mukama w'eitaka, nikirungi bakama b'eitaka kukora ekirikwetengyesa. Ekintu kimwe ky'omugasho ekibarikubaasa kukora n'okuhandiikisa eitaka ryabo omu minisiture y'eby'eitaka.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote property ownership and secure land rights, the government has implemented a new registration process. Once individuals complete the necessary steps, they will be granted official recognition of their land holdings.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula obwannannyini ku ttaka n'okukuuma eddembe ly'obwannannyini ku ttaka, gavumenti etaddewo enkola empya ey'okuwandiisa. Abantu bwe bamala emitendera egyetaagisa, bajja kukkirizibwa mu butongole okuba n'ettaka lyabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor bedo ki ngom ki gwoko twero me ngom, gamente okatti ki yoo manyen me coyo dano. Ka ngat acel acel otyeko timo jami ma mite, ci kibiye ni en tye ki ngom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor apedorosio nuka itunga keda alupok, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aiwadikao. Arai engetakin itunga ainapeta nu ekotoi, eponio aijaikin kes ajenun ebe ejaasi kesi keda alupok.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo nyaku ma e'ipiru ri ma omgbo otuzu azini drilemgbo nyaku ma dria ri ma tambazu, gamete 'ba geri o'diru 'bani 'ba eyi ma ru osizu ri 'yeta ma alea. Ba ka e'yo 'ba yi ma ngulupisi 'diyi de 'bo, 'ba nga yi ma nyaku ma e'yo 'du ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura obwannannyini bw'eitaka n'okurinda obugabe bw'eitaka, gavumenti eteireho enkora nsya y'okuhandiikisa eitaka. Abantu ku baraahende emitendera erikwetengwa, nibaija kuheebwa orusa rw'okumanya ngu eitaka ryabo n'eryaabo.

eng_prompt: Due to unforeseen budget constraints and staffing shortages, the government faced challenges in implementing its plans. As a result, the ministry of lands delayed opening its regional offices.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu mu mbalirira n'ebbula ly'abakozi, gavumenti yasanga okusoomoozebwa mu kussa mu nkola enteekateeka zaayo. N'ekyavaamu, minisitule y'ebyettaka yalwawo okuggulawo woofiisi zaayo mu bitundu.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me byek me lim ki nok pa lutic, gamente onongo peko me keto yub megge itic. Macalo adwogi ne, jang miri makemme ki lok kom ngom ogalle ki yabo opicgi I but lobo mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ationis naka ebajet keda ekadakada loka eswamak, abu apugan kodum atiokisio kotoma aitodolikin ainapeta ke. Kanuka ngun abu erionget loka alupok iyap apukor iyapesin ke.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru bajeti ni azini azi'ba eyi ma ako si, gamete esu e'yo ewaru otita erini 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea. E'yo 'disi, okalamvu nyaku niri eza sa'wa ofisi erini angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ma ti zizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'embaririra hamwe n'eibura ry'abakozi, gavumenti ekashanga oburemeezi omu kuta enteekateeka zaayo omu nkora. Ekyarugiremu, minisiture y'eby'eitaka ekakyerererwa kwiguraho ofiisi zaayo omu byanga.

eng_prompt: After months of anticipation and community meetings, the announcement finally came. Residents gathered to discuss the potential benefits these offices would bring to their local economies.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okusuubira n'enkiiko z'ekitundu, ekirango kyatuuka. Abatuuze baakuŋŋaanye okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku miganyulo ofiisi zino gye zijja okuleeta mu by'enfuna by'ebitundu byabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me kuro ki kacokke pa lwak, lok angeya ne dong otum. Lutedero gugure me nywako lok I kom ber pa office magi I kom biacara me tedero.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luipu luka aidar keda airiamununeta nuka itunga, aponi koinakinai alimoret ngin. Apotu itunga kotukokinos kanu aitemitem ajokisio nuepedorete eyapesin lu ayangaun kotoma akwapukec.
lgg_prompt: Mba ma vutia e'yo egazu azini drifuza ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma vutia, e'yo azi 'da eca asizu ra. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu orodri ofisi 'diyi ni nga eji angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okutegyereza hamwe n'enkiiko z'ekyanga, ekirango kikahwaho. Abatuuragye baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha migasho ei ofiisi ezi zireije kureeta omu by'entaasya yaabo.

eng_prompt: In an effort to boost local agriculture and support small farmers, the government has introduced a new lending program. This initiative aims to provide financial assistance to those who own land, allowing them to leverage their assets for funding.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebyobulimi n'obulunzi mu ggwanga n'okuyamba abalimi abatonotono, gavumenti etongozza enteekateeka empya ey'okuwola ssente. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa obuyambi bw'ensimbi eri abo abalina ettaka, okubasobozesa okukozesa eby'obugagga byabwe okufuna ensimbi.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor pur ki konyo lupur matino tino, gamente okatti ki yub manyen me deno lim. Yub man tye ki miti me miyo kony me lim ki joo ma tye ki ngom, ma weko gitiyo ki jami gi me nongo lim.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong akoru na akwap keda agangat nejaas akoriok ludidik, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aijaun ilonin. Alosikinet na erai ainakin agangat na ikapun mama ejaasi ngul lu ejaas keda alupok, kanu aingarakin kes aitwasam iborokec kanu adumun ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu agirikica ma omgbo otuzu azini atita fezu 'ba amvu 'ya'ba werea 'diyi dri, gamete e'do otita o'di mari fezu ri'I. Asisile 'di niri lezu azakoma robia niri fezu 'ba nyaku ipika 'diyi dri eyini ani ecozu lonyi eyini 'diyi ayuzu robia esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa n'okushagika abahingi n'abariisa, gavumenti etandikireho enteekateeka y'okuguza abantu za rooni. Ekigyendererwa n'okuheereza obuhwezi bw'esente abo abaine eitaka, kugira ngu babaase kukoresa ebintu byabo kutunga esente.

eng_prompt: Recent advancements in technology have made it possible for individuals to complete land registration processes online. This shift has significantly reduced the need for in-person visits to government offices.
lug_prompt: Enkulaakulana mu tekinologiya eyaliwo gye buvuddeko esobozesezza abantu okumaliriza enkola z'okuwandiisa ettaka ku mutimbagano. Enkyukakyuka eno ekendeezezza nnyo obwetaavu bw'okukyala mu ofiisi za gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Dongo lobo ma otime I kare-ni okonyo dano me tyeko tic me coyo ngomgi kun gitiyo ki intanet. Alokaloka man odwoko piny rwom me limo gangi tic pa gamente.
teo_prompt: Apol naka etatai loakwana nes ijaikit itunga aitodolikin ainapeta nuka aiwadika alupok kolago. Etidisiari aijulanakineta ngun noi eipud loka itunga aipejonokin eyapesin luka apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu ezoma ni o'diru 'diyi fe 'ba eyini ecozu e'yo nyaku ma ru siza ni 'diyi dezu geri oli aliasi ra. Ojata 'di esi e'yo 'ba eyini acizu ofisi gameteni 'diyi ma alea eyi ma ngulupi si ri ra.
nyn_prompt: Okutunguuka kwa tekinorogye okwabaireho obwahati, kushoboororeire abantu kuhandikisa eitaka aha intaneeti. Empindahinduka egi ekyendeezeire munonga ekyetengo ky'okutayayira ofiisi za gavumenti.

eng_prompt: As the government announced new regulations for land ownership, many residents began to worry about the financial implications. The process of registering land was expected to become increasingly complicated and costly.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti bwe yalangirira amateeka amapya ku bwannannyini ku ttaka, abatuuze bangi baatandika okweraliikirira ku biyinza okuvaamu mu byenfuna. Enkola y'okuwandiisa ettaka yali esuubirwa okweyongera okukaluba n'okubeera ey'ebbeeyi.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma gamente otito cik manyen me bedo wegge ngom, lutedero mapol gucako bedo ki lworo I kom adwogi ne I kom lim. Yub me coyo ngom onongo byek tye ni obi doko tek tutwal dok bene bicato cente madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Nealimor apugan ikisila luitetiak nuikamunitos alupok, apotu itunga luipu kogeutu aiyalongong nuikamunitos atiokisio nuka ikapun. Aitemonokineta nuka aiwadika alupok eomitai ebe etiono noi ido epol etiai noi.
lgg_prompt: Gamete ni o'duko ecezu azita o'diru nyaku ma e'ipika eyi ma dria risi, 'ba karakara eyi e'do asi otiza be e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria. Geri 'bani e'yo nyaku ma ru sizu ri ni nga eca ewaru azini ajeru.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti ku yarangiriire ebiragiro ebisya ebikwatiraine n'obwannannyini bw'eitaka, abatuuragye baingi bakatandika kwerarikirira aha bikwatiraine n'esente. Enkora y'okuhandiikisa eitaka ekaba neeza kweyongyera kuba ey'amaani n'omuhendo gw'ahaiguru.

eng_prompt: In light of the increasing economic disparities and the rising cost of living, it is essential to address the needs of the most vulnerable populations. By prioritizing social welfare, we can ensure that everyone has access to basic necessities.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutafaanagana mu by'enfuna okweyongera n'ebbeeyi y'ebintu okulinnya, kyetaagisa okukola ku byetaago by'abantu abateesobola. Bwe tukulembeza ebyetaago by'abantu, tusobola okukakasa nti buli omu afuna ebyetaago by'obulamu obwa bulijjo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki apoka-poka me lim matye kamede ki wel jami ma mite pi kwo, pire tek tutwal me cobo miti pa dano ma goro. Ka waketo yub me konyo lwak obed gin ma pire tek, ci wabineno ni dano weng tye ki jami ma mite pi kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo iyatakinor atiakatiaka naka ikapun keda aijar naepol noi, ejokuna aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga lu ican. Kowai lo aisingarenit nuka aijar naka itunga, ipedori oni awanyun ebe edumunete itunga kere iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: E'yo esele coza e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alia tualuri ma e'yosi azini aje idri nyazani tualuri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo 'yezu 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma aza kozu. E'yo o'bi eyini aa'zu muke ri 'bazu okporu ri si, ama eco ne ra kini 'ba dria eyi esu afa lele aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa'zu aa
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutakwatanisa obweyongyeire omu by'entaasya hamwe n'okweyongyera kw'emihendo y'ebintu, n'eky'omugasho kukora aha byetaago by'abantu abatarikwebaasa. Okwebembeza eby'obuhangwa, nitubaasa kureeba ngu buri omwe atunga ebyetengo by'omutaano.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing economic disparities and rising social unrest, the administration has developed a comprehensive plan. This initiative aims to address the root causes of inequality and improve the living conditions of the most vulnerable populations.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutafaanagana mu by'enfuna n'obutabanguko obweyongera mu bantu, gavumenti ekoze enteekateeka enzijuvu. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okumalawo ensibuko y'obutafaanagana n'okutumbula embeera y'obulamu bw'abantu abateesobola.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me kelo apoka-poka ikit me timo biacara ki lweny ikin lwak matye kamede, gamente okatti ki yub maber tutwal. Yub man tye ki miti me tyeko jami ma kelo apoka-poka ki yubu rwom me kwo pa dano ma goro.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiakatiaka naka ikapun keda amumu naka itunga, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuepolok. Alosikinet naka ainapeta ngun erai aitemokin ationis naka amamus airiamara ka aitojokar ejautene loka aijar naka itunga luicanasi noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo esele coza e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma alia azini ngiringiri ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri ma omgbo otuzu, driceza 'da e'do otita azi dria 'diyi 'bo. Otita 'di ma asisile lezu e'yo esele coza ejipi 'diyi ma aza kozu azini geri 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma edri otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutakwatanisa obweyongyeire omu by'entaasya hamwe n'obutabanguko obweyongyeire omu bantu, abebembezi bakozire enteekateeka y'omutaano. Ekigyendererwa n'okukora aha nshonga ezirikureetaho obutaingana n'okutunguura emituurire y'abantu abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: In an effort to support the aging population, the government has implemented a new financial assistance program. This initiative aims to provide a monthly stipend to help elders meet their basic needs.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okuyamba abantu abakaddiye, gavumenti etaddewo enteekateeka empya ey'obuyambi bw'ensimbi. Enteekateeka eno egendereddwamu okuwa abakadde ensimbi buli mwezi okusobola okutuukiriza ebyetaago byabwe.
ach_prompt: I tute me konyo joo ma otii, gamente okatti ki yub manyen me miyo kony me lim. Yub man tye ki miti me miyo cente dwe ki dwe me konyo joo ma otii me cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aigang itunga lu emojongitos, etolomu apugan ainapeta nuitetiak nuka aingarakinio keda ikapun. Alosikinet na erai ainakin itunga lu emojongitos ikapun kangolilap kanu aingarakin kes aitodolikin ipudesia kec.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu 'ba eli be 'diyi atizu, gamete 'ba otita azakoma robia ni o'diruni. E'yo 'di lezu robia fezu mba vusi 'ba depi 'bo 'diyi ma aza kozu afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okuhwera abantu abakuzire omu myaka,gavumenti etandikireho enteekateeka nsya y'obuhwezi bw'esente. Ekigyendererwa ky'enteekateeka egi n'okureetaho esente z'okushashurira abantu abakuzire omu myaka buri kwezi, okubaasa kuhikiiriza ebyetengo byabo.

eng_prompt: Many individuals rely on farming as a primary source of income. This reliance on agriculture is driven by the need to support their families and communities.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi beesigamye ku bulimi ng'ensibuko y'ensimbi enkulu. Okwesigama kuno ku bulimi kuvudde ku bwetaavu bw'okulabirira amaka gaabwe n'ebitundu.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol jenge I kom pur macalo yoo me nongo cente. Keto gen eni I kom pur tye macalo adwogi me miti me konyo gangi gi ki kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu ejarete kotoma akoru kwape epone loka adumun ikapun. Amuno na na akoru nes elomunit kanuka eipud loka aigang ikalia kec keda atutubena kec.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi 'ba eyi agirikica ma dria geri eyini robia esuzu okori ru. Asi'baza 'di agirikica ma dria ri e'yo lezu atita fezu familia yini azini ongulumu yini 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibegamira aha buhingi n'oburiisa nk'oburugo bw'entaasya. Okwesiga eby'obuhingi n'oburiisa nikirugirira aha kyetengo ky'okureeberera amaka gaabo n'ebyanga byabo.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, individuals and communities have sought ways to meet their basic needs and improve their quality of life. As societies evolved, the exchange of goods and services became a fundamental aspect of human interaction.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abantu ssekinnoomu n'ebitundu babadde banoonya engeri y'okutuukiriza ebyetaago byabwe ebikulu n'okutumbula omutindo gw'obulamu bwabwe. Nga ebitundu bikulaakulana, okuwanyisiganya ebintu n'obuweereza byafuuka ekintu ekikulu mu nkolagana y'abantu.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro weng, dano ki kabedo mapatpat gubedo ka yenyo yoo me cobo miti gi ki yubu rwom me kwo gi. Ikare ma kabedo mapat-pat odongo, wilo jami ki miyo kony odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, emoi itunga keda itunga iponesio luka aitodolikin ipudesia kec ka aitojokar adoketait na aijar kec. Kwape apolor itunga, araun ainapeta nuka agwelanar iboro keda aijanakino nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, 'ba alu alu azini ongulumu eyi nda geri eyini ecozu eyini afa eyini lele aa'zu edriru 'diyi esuzu dika eyi ma edri otuzu. Ongulumu eyini zoria, e'yo afa ozizaru 'diyi awazu tualu azini azi ngazu 'diyi eca e'yo orodriru aa'ta 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ru.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu n'abantu batwire nibasherura oburyo bw'okuhikiiriza ebyetengo byabo n'okwongyera aha mutindo gw'entuura yaabo. Obu ebyanga byabaire nibikura, okugaba ebintu n'obuheereza kikahinduka ekintu kikuru omu kukorengana kw'abantu.

eng_prompt: Access to quality healthcare remains a significant challenge in many communities. To address this issue, targeted initiatives are essential for improving public health outcomes.
lug_prompt: Okufuna obujjanjabi obw'omutindo kukyali kusoomooza kwa maanyi mu bitundu bingi. Okukola ku nsonga eno, enteekateeka ezitegekeddwa za mugaso mu kutumbula ebyobulamu by'abantu.
ach_prompt: Nongo kony me yot kom maber pud obedo peko madit tutwal I kabedo mapol. Me tyeko peko man, yub ma ki keto tye pi ilo malo rwom me yot kom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Adumunun amukian na abeit eringa erai ainingosit naepol noi kotoma atutubena nuipu. Kanu aitemokin ationis na, ibusakinit aitolomun ainapeta nuepedorete aitojokar nuka angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Geri alata muke ri esuzu ri nga po'di e'yo ewaru ni angu karakara eyi ma alea. E'yo 'di ma aza kozu, e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma aza kozu 'diyi orodriru e'yo alata o'bi eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Okutunga obuheereza burungi bw'eby'amagara, kikiri ekizibu ky'amaani omu bantu baingi. Okukora aha nshonga egi, enkora nungi n'ey'omugasho omu kutunguura eby'amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: Recent evaluations have highlighted significant gaps in the district's oversight processes. As a result, many projects are falling short of their intended goals and timelines.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko kwalaga ebituli ebinene mu nkola ya disitulikiti ey'okulondoola. N'ekivuddemu, pulojekiti nnyingi ziremererwa okutuukiriza ebigendererwa byazo n'ebiseera ebiteekeddwateekeddwa.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto peko madongo matye I yub me doro tic pa district. Macalo adwogi ne, yub mapol pe tye ka cobo miti gi ki kare gi.
teo_prompt: Aingic napac itodunit atiokisio nuepolok noi kotoma ainapeta nuka aimaniman nuka edisitrikt. Kanuka ngun, mam ipurojektin luipu itodolikinete apeleikinata kec keda apakio nu ebeit aitodolikin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza o'diru 'diyi e'da e'yo onzi distrikiti ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, otita karakara eyi e'de e'yo eyini lele 'diyi ma alea ku dika eyi e'de sa'wa eyini 'bale 'diyi ma alea ku.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okuhweireho kworeka oburemeezi bw'amaani omu nkora ya disiturikiti. N'ekyarugiremu, purogyekiti nyingi niziremwa kuhika aha bigyendererwa byazo hamwe n'obwire bwazo.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing needs of the aging population, officials have been discussing various initiatives. As part of these efforts, the government will provide support to the elders.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'abantu abakaddiye obweyongera, abakungu babadde bateesa ku nteekateeka ez'enjawulo. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, gavumenti ejja kuwa abakadde obuyambi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa dano ma otii, lutic gubedo ka lok I kom yub mapat-pat mapat-pat. Macalo but yub eni, gamente obi miyo kony ki ludito.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga lu emojongitos, eutasi eswamak aitemitem akiro nuegelegela. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ebuni apugan aijaikin agangat nejaas itunga lu emojongitos.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba eyi e'bi agbatara gba e'yo 'ba eli capiku 'diyiniri ma dria. Okpo 'diyi ma azi ru, gamete ni mu atita fe 'ba 'wara eyini.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu abakuzire omu myaka, abakuru batwire nibagamba aha bintu bitari bimwe na bimwe. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka ezi,gavumenti neija kuheereza abantu abakuru obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: As the election season approached, excitement and anticipation filled the air. Many citizens felt a strong desire to witness history in the making.
lug_prompt: Ekiseera ky'okulonda bwe kyasembera, essanyu n'okusuubira byajjula mu bbanga. Bannansi bangi baawulira okwagala okw'amaanyi okulaba ebyafaayo nga bikolebwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kare me bolo kwir tye ka bino, yomcwiny ki byek obedo tye. Anywali mapol gubedo ki miti matek me neno kit ma jami macon tye ka time kwede.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete apak naka aseo, apotu aiyalama keda aiyalama kilelebunos kokwam. Apotu itunga luipu opupoto eipud loepol noi loka asesen akiro nuiswamauna kotoma akiro nukolo.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa opetaa niri ni ecaria, ayiko azini asi 'baza ga angu ma alea tre. Kari anzi karakara eyi le ndra saaru e'yo adi ni 'diyi ma e'yo ndrezu.
nyn_prompt: Obwire bw'okuteera akaruuru ku bwabaire nibuhika haihi, abantu bakaba bashemereirwe munonga. Abatuuragye baingi bakagira ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okureeba ebyafaayo nibikorwa.

eng_prompt: Many individuals are struggling to make ends meet in today's economy. As a result, financial instability has become a widespread issue affecting countless families.
lug_prompt: Abantu bangi bafuba okweyimirizaawo mu by'enfuna by'ennaku zino. N'ekivuddemu, obutali butebenkevu mu by'enfuna bufuuse kizibu ekibunye amaka mangi.
ach_prompt: Dano mapol tye ka tute matek me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi ikare me can lim me kare-ni. Macalo adwogi ne, peko me can lim odoko peko madit tutwal ma tye ka yelo gangi mapol tutwal.
teo_prompt: Eutasi itunga luipu aijar kotoma aijar naka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, amamus acamanar kotoma ikapun erai ationis naepol noi naetirori ikalia luipu.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara eyi dri ci afa esuzu ewu curu'do 'di ma alea. E'yo 'disi, e'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni ma alia 'diyi eca curu'do e'yo familia karakara eyini candi fepi ni'I.
nyn_prompt: Abantu baingi nibarwana kwebaisaho omu by'entaasya ebirikugyenda omu maisho. N'ekyarugiremu, obutabanguko omu by'entaasya buhindukire enshonga y'amaani erikuteganisa amaka maingi.

eng_prompt: In times of difficulty, individuals often seek comfort and guidance from those closest to them. The emotional bonds formed through friendship play a crucial role in navigating life's challenges.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera ebizibu, abantu banoonya okubudaabudibwa n'obulagirizi okuva mu abo abali ku lusegere lwabwe. Enkolagana y'ebirowoozo ekolebwa okuyita mu mikwano ekola kinene nnyo mu kwolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa kw'obulamu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, dano mapol giyenyo kwe cwiny ki kony ki bot jo ma cok kwedgi. Wat ma tye ikin dano ikare me bedo lurem konyo totwal me lweny i kom peko ma inongo ikwo.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu etioko, etapit itunga aimo agangat keda aicoreta kama ejaasi ngul lu idunyasi keda kes. Eidicane lo itolomunitai kotoma epaperone iswamai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitodolikin atiokisio nu aijar.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru 'diyisi, 'ba eyi sa'wa driasi asi omiza azini imbata nda engazu 'ba eyi ma agei 'diyi vu. E'yo 'bani 'ba eyi 'bazu eyi ma eselea geri agyi nirisi 'diyi azi okporu ni nga e'yo ewaru idri ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, abantu nibasherura okuhuumurizibwa n'obuhabuzi kuruga ahari abo ababaherereire. Enkoragana erikuruga omukukwatanisa, neekora omurimo gw'amaani omu kusingura oburemeezi bw'amagara.

eng_prompt: Throughout her life, she has been deeply involved in various political causes, advocating for her country's sovereignty and rights. Her unwavering commitment to her beliefs has made her a prominent figure in local activism.
lug_prompt: Mu bulamu bwe bwonna, abadde yeenyigira nnyo mu byobufuzi eby'enjawulo, ng'alwanirira obwetwaze n'eddembe ly'eggwanga lye. Obumalirivu bwe eri enzikiriza ye bumufudde omuntu omututumufu mu kulwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I kare me kwone ducu, en obedo I lok me cungu iwi bye mapol, kun lwenyo pi twero ki twero pa lobo mege. Cwinye ma pe lokke I kom niyene oweko en odoko ngat ma oywek tutwal I lok me lweny I kom gamente.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijarake kere, ajai ngesi toma akiro nuka epolitikis, aigang aipuga keda apedorosio nuka akwapuke. Ainakina ke naepol noi mama ejaasi iyuunike einakinit ngesi araun itunganan yen ejenara noi kotoma akiro nuka apugan.
lgg_prompt: Idri eriniri ma alia dria, eri ebi ovu e'yo politiki ni ndundu 'diyi ma alia, a'di 'dizu driwala azini driwala kari eriniri ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo erini asi 'bazu e'yo erini a'i 'diyi ma dria ri fe erini ovuzu 'ba okporu e'yo a'di 'diza ni angu ma alia 'diyi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Omu magara gye goona, ayejumbire munonga omu by'obutegyeki, arikurwanirira obugabe n'obugabe bw'eihanga rye. Okwehayo kwe aha nyikiriza ye kimuhindwire omuntu w'amaani omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: In a bold move to heal the nation's divisions, the president announced a plan to bring back those displaced by conflict. This decision resonated deeply with the public, fostering a sense of unity and hope for a brighter future.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube ow'obuvumu ow'okumalawo enjawukana mu ggwanga, pulezidenti yalangirira enteekateeka y'okuzzaayo abo abaasengulwa entalo. Okusalawo kuno kwakwata nnyo ku bantu, ne kuleetawo obumu n'essuubi mu biseera eby'omu maaso ebitangaavu.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me tyeko apoka-poka matye I lobo man, ladit lobo owaco yub me dwoko cen jo ma lweny oryemogi. Moko tam man oyomo cwiny lwak tutwal, okelo ribe ki gen pi anyim maber.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aswamisioit naka aitemokin atiakatiaka kotoma akwapuwok, abu lokapolon akwap kolimo ainapeta nuka ainyakar ngul luekeriaka kanuka ingungeta. Abu aomisioit ngin koinak itunga aimorikikina keda amuno naka aijar naejok koingaren.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi driasi lezu e'yo esele coza kari ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu, prisdent azi otita 'ba e'yo a'di ni 'diyi ofu'ba 'diyi omvizu vile. E'yo 'duza 'diri fe o'bi eyini asi'baza tualu asi'baza ewu drialeri ni ri pie.
nyn_prompt: Omu nteekateeka y'amaani y'okugaruraho okwebaganisamu omu ihanga, omwebembezi w'eihanga akarangirira enteekateeka y'okugarura abo ababingirwe entaro. Encwamu egi ekashemeza abantu munonga, ekareetaho okukwatanisa n'amatsiko g'ebiro bya nyensya birungi.

eng_prompt: In response to the community's growing concerns, a meeting was held to gather input from local residents. After compiling their feedback, the officials decided to take action on their behalf.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okweraliikirira kw'ekitundu okweyongera, olukiiko lwategekebwa okukungaanya ebirowoozo okuva mu batuuze. Oluvannyuma lw'okukung'aanya endowooza zaabwe, abakungu baasalawo okubaako kye bakolawo ku lwabwe.
ach_prompt: Pi peko ma lwak tye kwede, kacoke obedo tye me nongo tam ki bot lutedero. Ingee coko tam gi, lutic gumoko tam gi me timo gin mo pi gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naka itunga, aponi kitolomunai airiamunet kanu adumun aomisio kanejaas itunga luka atutubet. Akaulo naka aituk aomisio kec, apotu eswamak koseutu aswam kanukec.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, 'ba 'ye mitingi e'yo eyi trazu engazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu. Eyi ma egata trazu 'bori ma vutia, azi'ba 'da eyi 'du e'yo eyi 'yezu eyi ma paria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira kw'abantu, hakabaho orukiiko rw'okuronda ebiteiso kuruga omu batuuragye. Bwanyima y'okurundaana ebiteiso byabo, abakuru bakasharamu kukora aha bwabo.

eng_prompt: Tensions have been rising in the region due to resource allocation and political disagreements. As a result, local leaders are struggling to maintain peace and cooperation among the various districts.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bubadde bweyongera mu kitundu olw'okugabana ebintu n'obutakkaanya mu byobufuzi. N'ekivuddemu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo balwana okukuuma emirembe n'okukwatagana mu disitulikiti ez'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede I but lobo eni pi yub me poko jami ki telle I lok me cungu iwi bye. Macalo adwogi ne, lutela me tedero tye ka tute matek me gwoko kuc ki winye ikin districts ma padi padi.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kotoma aiboisit kangin kanu aikor iboro keda amamut acamanara naka epolitikis. Kanuka ngun, eutasi engarenok luka atutubena ainingosit aidar ainapakin keda aimorikikina kiding idisitriktan luegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri ebi tu angu 'da ma alea e'yo lonyi awaza ni azini erita ako politiki ni 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi dri ci asianzu azini ti ecita ma tambazu distrikiti ndundu eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera omu kyanga ahabw'okugaba ebintu hamwe n'obutakwatanisa omu by'obutegyeki. N'ekyarugiremu, abebembezi b'ebyaro nibarwana kurinda obusingye n'okukwatanisa omu disiturikiti ezitari zimwe.

eng_prompt: In an effort to address the ongoing disputes over territorial boundaries, the local government has decided to revisit historical documents. This approach aims to provide clarity and resolution to the conflicting claims among the communities involved.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okugonjoola enkaayana ezigenda mu maaso ku nsalo z'ebitundu, gavumenti y'ebitundu esazeewo okuddamu okutunula mu biwandiiko by'ebyafaayo. Enkola eno egendereddwamu okuwa obutangaavu n'okugonjoola ensonga ezikontana mu bitundu ebikwatibwako.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyeko laro lok matye I kom wang lobo, gamente me tedero omoko tamme me ngiyo coc macon. Yoo man tye ki miti me miyo niango ki tyeko lok I kom lok mapat-pat matye ikin lwak matye I lok eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin engunget lo elosi akonye kanu ikoruo luka aiboisio, aseun apugan naka atutubet airereor aiwadikaeta nukolosek. Alosikinet naka epone ngol erai kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo mupi drile boda mile ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete angu 'da ma alea 'diyi asi e'yo 'du kokobi ewu driori ma alea 'diyi ma ale andrizu dika. Geri 'di lezu e'yo nzezu ri lezu e'yo nzezu kililiru azini lezu e'yo 'ba eselea 'diyi ma eselea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okukora aha ntongane ezirikugyenda omu maisho aha nsharo z'ebyanga, gavumenti y'ebyanga eshaziremu kugaruka kushwijuma ebihandiiko by'ebyafaayo. Enkora egi negyenderera okureetaho okutangaaza n'okutereeza enshonga ezitarikukwatanisa omu bantu abarikukwatwaho.

eng_prompt: In response to growing concerns from the community, the district officials held a meeting to address pressing issues affecting residents. They acknowledged the urgent need for action and committed to finding effective solutions.
lug_prompt: Olw'okweraliikirira kw'abantu okweyongera, abakungu ba disitulikiti baatuuza olukiiko okukola ku nsonga ez'amangu eziruma abatuuze. Bakkirizza obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola era ne beeyama okunoonya eby'okugonjoola ebizibu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lworo matye kamede pa lwak, lutic me district gubedo ki kacoke me lok I kom peko matye ka yelo lwak. Guye ni omyero kitim gin mo oyot oyot dok gucikke me nongo yoo me cobo peko eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin aiyalongongo naka itunga, apotu eswamak luko disitrikt iriamunos aitemokin atiokisio nuetapit itunga. Apotu kesi kocamutu ebe ibusakinit aswam katipet ido apotu kesi iswamata kagogongu kanu aitemokin ngun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi otiza ongulumu eyini tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, azi'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi 'ye mitingi e'yo ewaru 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Eyi ai ra kini le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo eyi mbeleru dika eyi owi eyi e'yo eyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okwerarikirira kw'abantu, abakuru aha disiturikiti, bakakora orukiiko, okukora aha nshonga z'amaani ezirikuteganisa abatuuragye. Bakaikiriza ngu hariho ekishemereire kukorwa ahonaaho kandi beehayo kuronda oburyo burungi.

eng_prompt: In light of recent tensions and community unrest, the district leaders recognized the urgent need for a collaborative approach. They gathered to discuss strategies that would foster dialogue and promote harmony among residents.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bunkenke n'obutabanguko mu kitundu gyebuvuddeko, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti baalaba obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukolagana. Baakungaanidde okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okutumbula enteeseganya n'obumu mu batuuze.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle ki lweny ma obedo tye cokcok-ki, lutela me district guneno ni omyero gutii kacelo. Gucokke me nywako tam i kom yoo mapat-pat ma twero kelo laro lok ki ribbe ikin lutedero.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ingungeta keda amumu naka atutubet, apotu engarenok luka edisitrikt kojenutu eipud loka aimorikikin. Apotu kesi kotukokinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu itolomete aineranara ka aimorikikina kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo asi omiza ni azini e'yo ngiringiri ni ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi esu e'yo 'bani lezu e'yo 'yezu tualu ri ma orodri mbeleru. Eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu e'yo nzezu azini aa'ta tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obunkenke n'obutabanguko omu bantu, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti bakareeba ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okukorera hamwe. Bakateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha mihanda erikubaasa kureetaho okuganiira n'okukwatanisa omu batuuragye.

eng_prompt: Tensions between the two factions have escalated dramatically over the past few months. As a result, many communities have found themselves caught in the crossfire.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke wakati w'ebiwayi ebibiri bweyongedde nnyo mu myezi egiyise. N'ekivuddemu, ebitundu bingi bisangiddwa mu butabanguko.
ach_prompt: Lworo I kin dul aryo egoni omede tutwal I dwe ma okato ni. Macalo adwogi ne, kabedo mapol gunongo ni gitye I peko.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kiding atukona aarei kotoma olapio lu atuboros. Kanuka ngun, ewanyunitos itunga luipu ebe ejaasi kesi toma akiro nuarokok.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri esele iri 'diyi ma eselea ri tu ra mba agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, ongulumu karakara eyi esu eyi e'yo eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ahagati y'ebibiina bibiri bweyongyeire munonga omu myezi mikye ehwaire. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi bakwasirwe omu butabanguko.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the annual council gathering, the leaders emphasized the importance of diverse perspectives. To ensure comprehensive discussions, they decided that each district would send a delegation.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera olukungaana lw'olukiiko olutegekebwa buli mwaka, abakulembeze baakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okuba n'endowooza ez'enjawulo. Okusobola okukubaganya ebirowoozo mu bujjuvu, baasalawo nti buli disitulikiti ejja kusindika ekibinja kyayo.
ach_prompt: Ikare me yubbe pi kacoke me kancil ma bedo mwaka ki mwaka, lutela guwaco ni ber tutwal me bedo ki tam mapat-pat. Me neno ni nywako lok weng obedo tye, gumoko tamgi ni distrik acel acel obi cwalo luwang gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aitemonokin airiamunet naka ekaru, apotu engarenok kitogogongoto ajokis naka aomisio nuegelegela. Kanu airereonor akiro kere, apotu kesi ocamutu ebe ibusakinit ngol edisitrikt aijukar abwoikinitok.
lgg_prompt: Otuta mitingi kanisulu ni eli vusi ri ni ri ma alia, drice'ba eyi 'ba asi orodri e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu ri ma dria. E'yo o'yozu dria ma dria, eyi ai distrikiti alu alu eyi ma 'ba eyi ma ti pezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kwetebeekanisiza orukiiko rw'akakiiko orurikubaho buri mwaka, abebembezi bakahamya omugasho gw'ebiteekateeko bitari bimwe. Okureeba ngu habaho okuhanuura kw'omutaano, bakasharamu ngu buri disiturikiti eshemereire kwohereza abajwekyerwa baayo.

eng_prompt: After extensive discussions and debates regarding the proposed legislation, the committee reached a consensus on the urgent need for action. Recognizing the importance of the issue at hand, the parliamentarians promised to follow up the matter.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuteesa ennyo n'okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bikwata ku tteeka eriteeseddwa, akakiiko kaatuuka ku nzikiriziganya ku bwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola. Olw'okumanya obukulu bw'ensonga eriwo, ababaka ba paalamenti baasuubiza okugoberera ensonga.
ach_prompt: Ingee nywako lok ki laro lok mapol I kom cik ma kimito kelo, dul ne owinye I kom miti me timo gin mo oyot-oyot. Pi niang ber pa lok eni, lumemba me parliament gucikke me lubu kor lok eni.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aineranara keda epeget loepol kanuikamunitos ekisil loitemokinitai, abu ekomiti kodolok acamanar nuikamunitos eipud loka aswam katipet. Kanu ajenun ajokis naka akirot ngin, apotu imeeban luka airabet isumunoto atupakinit akirot ngin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onzeza azini agbatara angiri ma vutia azita 'bani leleri ma dria, komiti 'da esu ti ecita e'yo 'yezu mbeleru ri ma dria. E'yo orodriru e'yo 'di ma dria 'diyisi, memba koloseni ni 'diyi so oyo e'yo nde ma vuti obizu ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okuhanuura n'okuhanuura munonga ebikwatiraine n'ebiteiso by'ebiragiro, akakiiko kakaikirizana aha nshonga y'okukora ahonaaho. Ahabw'okumanya omugasho gw'enshonga eriho, abany'eishengyero bakaraganisa kukuratira enshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: After months of conflict and unrest, the community leaders have finally reached a consensus. With renewed hope and collaboration, the residents are committed to fostering harmony and understanding.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'obukuubagano n'obutabanguko, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baatuuka ku nzikiriziganya. Olw'essuubi eppya n'okukolagana, abatuuze beewaddeyo okutumbula obumu n'okutegeeragana.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me lweny ki lweny, lutela me kabedo eni dong guwinye. Ki gen ki ribe manyen, lutedero tye ki miti me kelo ribe ki winye ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka ingungeta keda amumu, adolokisi engarenok luka atutubet acamanar. Keda amuno naitetet keda aiswamanara, ekapakina itunga aitopolor aimorikikina keda apuponoro.
lgg_prompt: Mba ngiringiri azini e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma vutia, drice'ba ongulumu ni 'diyi esu asizu ti ecita ra. Asi 'baza o'diru tualu ti ecita be, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi owi eyi ti ecita azini vata ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'ameezi g'obutabanguko n'obutabanguko, abeebembezi b'ekyanga baherize kwikirizana. Ahabw'okugaruka kugira amatsiko n'okukwatanisa, abatuuragye beehaireyo kureetaho obusingye n'okwetegyerezana.

eng_prompt: The ongoing tensions in the region escalated into violent confrontations. As a result, the situation became increasingly dire for many individuals caught in the crossfire.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke obwali bugenda mu maaso mu kitundu bweyongedde ne buvaamu okulwanagana okw'amaanyi. N'ekyavaamu, embeera yeeyongera okuba embi eri abantu bangi abaakwatibwa mu butabanguko.
ach_prompt: Lweny ma obedo tye I but lobo enoni omede ki lweny magwar. Macalo adwogi ne, lok ne odoko rac tutwal pi dano mapol ma onongo gitye I peko.
teo_prompt: Akangasia nu elosi akonye kotoma aiboisit kangin apotu kijulakinos toma ojiisinei lu amumu. Kanuka ngun, abu ejautene koraun lo erono noi kanejaas itunga luipu lu aponi kodumunai.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri angu 'da ma alea ri ma omgbo tu eca a'di 'diza okporu ru. E'yo 'disi, e'yo eca curu'do onzi 'ba karakara eyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke oburiho omu kicweka ekyo, bwarugiremu okurwanagana kw'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu,embeera ekeeyongyera kuba mbi ahabantu baingi abakwasirwe omu butabanguko.

eng_prompt: In a well-functioning society, adherence to established rules is essential for maintaining order and justice. Therefore, it is crucial for individuals to understand their responsibilities as citizens.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ekikola obulungi, okugoberera amateeka agateekebwawo kya mugaso mu kukuuma emirembe n'obwenkanya. N'olwekyo, kikulu nnyo abantu kinnoomu okutegeera obuvunaanyizibwa bwabwe nga bannansi.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma kwo tye maber, lubu cik ma kiketo pire tek tutwal pi gwoko kuc ki ber bedo. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal pi dano me niang tic gi macalo anywali.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet na iswamai ejok, aitup ikisila lu itemokinitai ejok kanu aidar ainapakina keda etube loajokan. Kanuka ngun, ejokuna noi itunga amisiikin aswamisinei kec kwape itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu azi ngapi kililiru 'diyi ma alea, azita 'bani o'bale 'diyi ma vuti obiza eri orodriru e'yo otuza ni azini e'yo liza kililiru ri ma tambazu. Ka'dini, eri orodriru 'ba alu alu 'diyini azi yini kari anzi ru 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu abarikukora kurungi, okukuratira ebiragiro ebiteirweho n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda oburinganiza n'oburingaaniza. N'ahabw'ekyo, n'eky'omugasho munonga omuntu weena kwetegyereza obujunanizibwa bwe nk'omutuuragye.

eng_prompt: In a society where personal belongings hold significant value, it is essential to foster a culture of consideration and care. Understanding the importance of boundaries can lead to healthier relationships and a more harmonious community.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu ebintu by'omuntu gye bitwalibwa okuba eby'omuwendo, kya mugaso okukuza obuwangwa obw'okufaayo n'okufaayo. Okutegeera obukulu bw'ensalo kisobola okuleetawo enkolagana ennungi n'obwegassi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I kabedo ma jami pa ngat acel acel obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal, pire tek tutwal me dongo tekwaro me tamo ki gwoko dano. Niang ber pa wang lobo twero weko dano bedo ki wat maber ki kuc ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet naejaatar iboro luka itunganan kwape lu epol ajokis, ejok aitopolor einono loka apodokinit ka apodokinit. Amisiikin ajokis naka ikoruo epedori ayangaun eidicane loajokan keda atutubet na imorikikina.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu azi 'bani afa 'ba ma ngulupi ni 'diyi 'duzu orodriru 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma ta mbazu azini eyi ma ta mbazu ri ma omgbo otuzu. E'yo egazu orodri boda eyini 'diyi ma dria ri eco fe 'ba eyi ma eselea aa'ta muke dika eyi ma eselea aa'ta tualu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu ahu ebintu by'omuntu weena biri eby'omugasho munonga, n'eky'omugasho kutunguura eby'obuhangwa by'okureeba hamwe n'okureeberera. Okwetegyereza omugasho gw'ensharo nikibaasa kureetaho enkoragana nungi n'obumwe omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In a bid to address historical land disputes, the government has decided to provide parliamentarians with essential documents. This includes the colonial map, which is crucial for understanding the origins of current land ownership issues.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okugonjoola enkaayana z'ettaka ez'ebyafaayo, gavumenti esazeewo okuwa ababaka ba paalamenti ebiwandiiko ebikulu. Kino kitwaliramu ne maapu y'abafuzi b'amatwale, ey'omugaso mu kutegeera ensibuko y'ensonga z'obwannannyini ku ttaka mu kiseera kino.
ach_prompt: I yub me tyeko laro lok me ngom macon, gamente omoko tamme me miyo waraga mapigi tego bot lumemba me parliament. Man kwako karatac ma nyutu kit ma loc me lobo ne obedo kwede, ma obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me niang kit ma lok me ngom ocakke kwede I kare-ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ingungeta luka alupok, abu apugan ocam aijaikin imeeban luka airabet apapulai nuepolok. Imoriaritos nu amapu naka akolo, na epol ajokis noi kanu amisiikin epone loageunet akiro nuikamunitos alupok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri e'yo nyaku ma dria 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete 'du e'yo kokobi orodriru 'diyi fezu 'ba paliamentia 'diyi dri. Di ma alia mapu ogara'ba eyini ri, orodriru e'yo nyaku ma e'ipika eyini aa'zu sa'wa 'disi 'diyi vazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okukora aha ntongane z'eitaka,gavumenti eshaziremu kuheereza abakiiki b'eishengyero ebihandiiko by'omugasho. Eki nikitwariramu maapu y'amatware, n'eyomugasho munonga omu kwetegyereza oburugo bw'eshonga z'obwannannyini ahaitaka oburiho hati.

eng_prompt: Understanding the historical context of colonialism is essential for fostering meaningful dialogue about territorial disputes. Acknowledging the complexities of these borders can help promote respect for the diverse cultures and communities they encompass.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera ebyafaayo ebikwata ku bufuzi bw'amatwale kya nkizo mu kutumbula enteeseganya ez'omugaso ku nkaayana z'ettaka. Okukkiriza obuzibu bw'ensalo zino kisobola okuyamba okutumbula ekitiibwa ky'ebyobuwangwa n'ebitundu eby'enjawulo bye bizingiramu.
ach_prompt: Niang ngo ma otimme ikare ma loc pa luwang lobo obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me kelo lok matye ki tyen lok I kom telle me ngom. Niang peko matye I wang lobo magi twero weko woro bedo tye pi tekwaro ki kabedo mapat-pat matye I kingi.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin akiro nukolo nuikamunitos apugan naka apugan erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor aineranara naejok nuikamunitos ingungeta luka alupok. Ajenun atiokisio nuka ikoruo lu ingarakinete aitopolor ayongit mama ejaasi inonosio keda atekerin nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo a'dani e'yo ogara'ba eyini 'diyi ma dria ri ma vata eri orodriru e'yo nzeza kililiru 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu e'yo ngiringiri angu ma dria 'diyi ma dria. Eꞌyo ꞌbani egazu eꞌyo ewaru boda ꞌdiyi ma dria ꞌdiyi eco fe inzita ꞌbazu eꞌyo aꞌbi yini ndu ndu ꞌdiyi ma dria azini ongulumu yini ovuzu alenia ꞌdiyi ma dria ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza ebyafaayo by'obutegyeki bw'amatware n'eky'omugasho omukureetaho okuhanuura okw'omugasho aha nshonga z'eitaka. Okwetegyereza oburemeezi bw'ensharo ezi nikibaasa kuhwera omu kuheereza ekitiinisa eby'obuhangwa n'ebyanga ebitarikushushana.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing unrest, community leaders gathered to discuss the recent protests. They expressed concern over the treatment of demonstrators and called for immediate action to address the situation.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko obweyongera, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kwekalakaasa okwaliwo gye buvuddeko. Baalaga obweraliikirivu olw'engeri abekalakaasi gye bayisibwamu era ne basaba wabeewo ekikolebwa mu bwangu okutereeza embeera.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me jemo matye kamede, lutela me kabedo gucokke me nywako lok I kom jemo ma otime cokcok-ki. Gunyutu lworo gi i kom kit ma kitero kwede lujemo dok gulego ni myero kitim gin mo pi tyeko peko eni.
teo_prompt: Kanuka amumu naepol noi, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem nuka aidiya napac. Apotu kesi itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuka epone loeyaitotor itunga lu ediyak kosodete ailip aitemokin ejautene ngol katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo ngiringiri ni ebipi o'diru 'diyi ma dria. Eyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo 'bani 'ba ngiringiri 'yepi 'diyi 'yezu ri ma dria dika eyi ai 'bani e'yo 'da ma aza kozu mbeleru.
