nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire, abeebembezi b'ekyanga baketeeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha kwesharinga okwabaireho. Bakoreka okwerarikirira ahabw'okutwarizibwa kw'abeshaaringi kandi baashaba ngu habeho ekyokukora ahonaaho kukora aha nshonga egyo.

eng_prompt: In light of the escalating tensions between the two parties, it is crucial to find a resolution before the situation worsens. Effective communication and collaboration will be key to addressing the underlying issues.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku bunkenke obweyongera wakati w'enjuyi zombi, kikulu nnyo okuzuula eky'okugonjoola embeera nga tennayonooneka. Empuliziganya ennungi n'okukwatagana bijja kuba bikulu mu kukola ku nsonga enkulu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle matye kamedde I kin dul aryo egoni, pire tek tutwal me nongo yoo me tyeko lok man ma peya lok ne odoko rac tutwal. Lok ki winye maber bibedo gin ma pire tek me tyeko peko matye.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ingungeta lu iyata kiding ipatei iyarei, ejokuna noi adumun epone lo itemokinet erongo ejautene erono. Einer loajokan keda aiswamanara nes ibusakinit aitemokin atiokisio nuepolok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo erita ako ni tupi kala iri 'diyi ma eselea ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru e'yo 'di ma aza kozu de nga po'di e'yo 'di ma omgbo esi ku. E'yo nzeza kililiru tualu ti ecita be ri ni nga ovu orodriru e'yo okporu 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutaikirizana obweyongyeire ahagati y'ebibiina bibiri, niky'omugasho okusherura eky'okukora embeera etakahikire kubi munonga. Okuhurizagana kurungi n'okukwatanisa nibiija kuba ebikuru omu kukora aha nshonga ezi.

eng_prompt: In times of division and uncertainty, it is crucial for communities to come together. By fostering connections and understanding, we can create a stronger, more resilient society.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'enjawukana n'obutali bukakafu, kya mugaso nnyo eri ebitundu okwegatta. Bwe tukuza enkolagana n'okutegeeragana, tusobola okutondawo ekitundu ekinywevu era ekigumira embeera.
ach_prompt: Ikare me apoka-poka ki peko, pire tek tutwal pi lwak me ribbe. I dongo kubbe ki winye, watwero yubu kabedo matye ki kero ki kero.
teo_prompt: Kapakio nu atiakatiaka ka amamus ajenanut, ejokuna noi itunga aimorikikin. Kowai lo aitopolor aiswamanara keda apuponoro, ipedori oni aitolomun itunga luegogong ido lu igogong.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ti ecita ako ni 'diyi ma alea, eri orodriru ongulumu eyini emuzu tualu. E'yo ti icita ni azini vata ma omgbo otuzu risi, ama eco ongulumu okporu azini okporu ni e'do ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'okwebaganisamu, n'eky'omugasho abantu kukorera hamwe. Kurabira omukureetaho okukwatanisa n'okwetegyerezana, nitubaasa kureetaho abantu b'amaani kandi barikwetegyerezana.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent unrest and escalating tensions, community leaders gathered to discuss the pressing issues facing the region. They emphasized the need for a unified approach to restore peace and ensure the safety of all residents.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutabanguko obwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'obunkenke obweyongedde, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bizibu eby'amangu ebisangibwa mu kitundu. Baakakasizza obwetaavu bw'enkola ey'awamu okuzzaawo emirembe n'obukuumi bw'abatuuze bonna.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lweny ma obedo tye cokcok-ki ki telle matye kamede, lutela me kabedo gucokke me nywako lok I kom peko matye I twok piny eni. Guketo cwinygi tutwal I kom miti me tic kacelo me dwoko kuc ki ber bedo pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Katupitos amumu keda aiyalongongo na ajai pac, apotu engarenok luka atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem akiro nuepolok nu ejaas atutubet. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto eipud loka aimorikikina kanu ainyakun ainapakin ka awanyun ayuara naka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ngiringiri ni o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo okporu angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Eyi fe okpo e'yo 'bani lezu 'ba eyi ma ti ecizu tualu asianzu ejizu azini 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini aa'zu ageitema be.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obwabaireho obwahati hamwe n'obunkenke obweyongyeire, abeebembezi b'ebyanga bakateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha nshonga z'amaani eziri omu kyanga. Bakashoboorora ekyetengo ky'okukorera hamwe kugaruraho obusingye n'okureeba ngu abatuuragye boona batunga oburinzi.

eng_prompt: Tensions between the two factions have escalated dramatically in recent months. Despite numerous attempts at negotiation, both sides remain entrenched in their positions.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke wakati w'ebiwayi ebibiri bweyongedde nnyo mu myezi egiyise. Wadde nga wabaddewo okugezaako okuteesa, enjuyi zombi zikyali mu bifo byazo.
ach_prompt: Lworo I kin dul aryo egoni omede tutwal I dwe ma okato ni. Kadi bed ni dano mapol oteme me winye, dul aryo weng pud gumoko tam gi.
teo_prompt: Apolor noi ingungeta kiding atukona ngun iarei kolap lo atubor. Karaida etamitai nuipu aineranara, eringa kesi iboyete kotoma aiboisio kec.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri esele iri 'diyi ma eselea ri tu ra mba agapi 'diyi ma alea. O'bita karakara eyi 'yezu e'yo otuzu ra ti, kalati iri 'diyi awi okporu eyi ma pari eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ahagati y'ebibiina bibiri bweyongyeire munonga omu myezi ehwaire. Oihireho okuteeraho kwingi okuteisa, enjuyi zombi zikaguma ziri omu myanya yaazo.

eng_prompt: As tensions escalated in the region, law enforcement struggled to maintain order. In the chaos that ensued, many individuals turned to desperate measures to survive.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwe bwagenda bweyongera mu kitundu, abakuumaddembe baagezaako okukuuma emirembe. Mu butabanguko obwaddirira, abantu bangi baanoonya engeri z'okuwonawo.
ach_prompt: I kare ma telle omedde I twok piny eni, lugwok cik gubedo ki peko me gwoko kuc. Ikare me kuku kuku ma obedo tye, dano mapol gutiyo ki yoo mapat-pat me gwoko kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor aiyalongong kotoma aiboisit kangin, apotu ipolisin kongeroto aidar ainapakina. Kotoma amumu nabu kotup, apotu itunga luipu koloto aiboisio nuepedorete kesi aijar.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu angu 'da ma alea, 'ba azita eyi ma ta mbapi 'diyi e'bi dri ci e'yo eyi ma aza kozu. Ngiringiri emupi 'da ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi oja eyi e'yo eyi 'yezu aa'zu edriru.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke ku bwayeyongyeire omu kyanga, ab'eby'obutegyeki bakarwana kurinda obusingye. Omu butabanguko obwarugiremu, abantu baingi bakahindukira omu miringo y'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: After the devastating storm swept through the region, entire neighborhoods were left in ruins. As a result, many families found themselves displaced and without shelter.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'omuyaga okusaanyaawo ekitundu kyonna, ebitundu byonna byalekebwa nga bifuuse matongo. N'ekyavaamu, amaka mangi geesanga nga gasenguddwa era nga tegalina we basula.
ach_prompt: Inge kot ma okelo peko madit tutwal I but piny eni, kabedo weng odoko obur. Macalo adwogi, gangi mapol gurwenyo gangi gi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na ekwam lo amunar aiboisit, aponi kojalakinai idunyeta kere kwap. Kanuka ngun, apotu ikalia luipu odumutu ebe emamiatatar keda neperot.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo okporu 'da ni angu 'da ma alea 'bori ma vutia, angu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea ndulu 'diyi awi i ezazaru. E'yo 'disi, familia karakara eyi esu eyi aku kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'eihunga ry'amaani okurabira omu kicweka ekyo, ebyaro byona bikasigara nibihwerekyerezibwa. N'ekyarugiremu, amaka maingi gakeshangwa bateine butaaho.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, conflicts over territory have often arisen from a desire for power and resources. In many cases, individuals or groups have sought to expand their influence by encroaching on the land of others.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, obukuubagano ku ttaka bubadde buva ku kwagala obuyinza n'eby'obugagga. Ebiseera ebisinga, abantu ssekinnoomu oba ebibinja byagezaako okugaziya obuyinza bwabwe nga biyingirira ettaka ly'abalala.
ach_prompt: I kare weng me tekwaro pa dano, lweny i kom ngom pol kare aa ki miti me bedo ki twero ki lonyo. I kare mapol, dano acel-acel onyo dul mapat-pat otemo medo twero gi kun gi donyo I ngom pa dano mukene.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, apotu ingungeta luka aiboisio kolomutu kanu eipud loka apugan keda iboro. Kapakio nuipu, ekotosi itunga keda igurupun aitanyanyar apedorosiokec kopone lo alomar toma alupok luka luce.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, ngiringiri angu ma dria 'diyi e'bi e'do e'yo lezu okpo azini lonyi si. E'yo karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba alu alu kani ongulumu eyi o'bi eyi ma okpo otu eyini fizu 'ba azi 'diyi ma nyaku eyi ma alea risi.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, entaro ahabw'ebyanga zitwire niziruga omu kwetenga amaani n'eby'obugaiga. Emirundi mingi, abantu buntu nainga guruupu z'abantu, zikozire kyona ekirikubaasika okutaahirira eitaka ry'abandi.

eng_prompt: As the demand for sustainable food sources has increased, many communities have sought alternative methods of agriculture. One innovative approach that has gained popularity is aquaculture.
lug_prompt: Ng'obwetaavu bw'ensibuko z'emmere eziwangaala bweyongedde, ebitundu bingi byanoonyezza engeri endala ez'okulimamu. Engeri emu ey'obuyiiya ebadde emanyiddwa ennyo kwe kulunda mu mazzi.
ach_prompt: Kit ma miti me nongo cam matye ki moc cam ma oromo omede kwede, lwak mapol guyenyo yoo mukene me pur. Yoo acel manyen ma oywek tutwal en aye gwoko lee i pii.
teo_prompt: Kwape eyatakinor eipuda lo inyamat, etojokaasi itunga luipu iponesio ice luka akor. Adiopepone loitetet lo ejenara noi ngesi akoru na akipi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba eyini lezu nyaka eyini aa'zu ewu drile ri ma alea ri ma omgbo ni tuzu ri si, ongulumu karakara eyi nda geri agirikica ni 'diyi ma azi eyi. Geri 'bani ecozu e'yo 'yezu o'diru 'diyi ma azi 'bani esu saaru ri eri e'yo anyapa asea 'diyi ma ta mbazuri'i.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugira ngu eby'okurya ebirikubaasa kugumaho byeyongyeire, abantu baingi batandikire kuronda emiringo endiijo y'obuhingi n'oburiisa. Omuringo gumwe ogw'okujumbura ogurikumanywa munonga, n'okuriisa eby'omu maizi.

eng_prompt: After being charged with multiple offenses, the judge decided to impose strict measures on him. As a result, he has been under house arrest for twenty days.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuvunaanibwa emisango egiwerako, omulamuzi yasalawo okumukugira. N'ekyavaamu, abadde mu kaduukulu k'awaka okumala ennaku abiri.
ach_prompt: Inge ngolo kop i kome pi bal mapol, langolkop omoko tamme me ngolo kop matego i kome. Macalo adwogi ne, kitweye I ot buc pi nino pyeraryo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo na itepesenere ngesi imusagon luipu, abu ekatubon koseu aitikitik ngesi. Kanuka ngun, ewenitai ngesi kotogo kanu apaarasia akaisarei.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani eri tozu e'yo onzi karakara 'diyisi 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo lipiri asi 'du e'yo okporu 'diyi 'bazu eri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, ebi ovu arujoa joa o'du kaliri.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okujunaanwa emishango mingi,omuramuzi akasharamu kumuteeraho ebiragiro by'amaani. N'ekyarugiremu, atwire omu kihome kumara ebiro makumi abiri.

eng_prompt: The recent survey revealed significant dissatisfaction among parents and students regarding the current state of the school's facilities. Immediate action is necessary to address these concerns and restore confidence in the district's leadership.
lug_prompt: Okunoonyereza okwakakolebwa kwalaga obutali bumativu obw'amaanyi mu bazadde n'abayizi ku bikwata ku mbeera y'ebintu by'essomero eriwo kati. Tulina okubaako kye tukolawo mu bwangu okusobola okugonjoola ebizibu ebyo n'okuzzaawo obwesige mu bukulembeze bwa disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: Kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto cwer cwiny madit tutwal ikin lunyodo ki lutino kwan I kom kit ma jami me gang kwan tye kwede kombedi. Omyero kitim gin mo oyot oyot me tyeko peko magi wek odwok tek cwiny I kom lutela me district.
teo_prompt: Abu aingic napac kitodu amamut aiyalama kanejaas auriak keda esisiak kanuikamunitos ejautene loka iboro lu esomero. Ekot aswam katipet kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ka ainyakun amuno naka engarenok luka edisitrikt.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza 'bani 'ye eturisi ri ece kini ayiko ako angiri tipika eyi ma eselea sukulu anzi eyi pie e'yo afa sukulu ni 'diyi ni aa'zu sa'wa 'disi ri ma dria. Le 'ba ma 'ye e'yo mbeleru e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu azini asi'baza fezu driceza distrikiti niri dri.
nyn_prompt: Okucondooza okwakozirwe obwahati, kworeka okwetomboita kw'abazaire n'abeegi ahabw'embeera y'ebyombeko by'eishomero eriho hati. Hariho ekishemereire kukorwa ahonaaho, okukora aha nshonga ezi, n'okugaruraho obwesigye omu bwebembezi bwa disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: The region of West Nile is known for its fertile land and favorable climate. As a result, many residents rely on farming as their primary source of livelihood.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kya West Nile kimanyiddwa olw'ettaka lyakyo eggimu n'embeera y'obudde ennungi. N'ekivuddemu, abatuuze bangi beesigama ku bulimi ng'ensibuko yaabwe enkulu ey'okweyimirizaawo.
ach_prompt: Kabedo me West Nile ngene pi ngom ma moc ki piny ma ber. Macalo adwogi ne, lutedero mapol jenge I kom pur macalo yoo me kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Ejenara aiboisit nako West Nile kanu alupok ke nu ekoru ka ekuse ka etepe. Kanuka ngun, ejarete itunga luipu noi kotoma akoru.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni angu westnilea 'diyi nyaku onyiru azini angu mile kililiru 'diyisi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara angu 'da ma alea 'diyi yi ati agirikica ma dria geri eyini aa'zu edriru ri ru.
nyn_prompt: Ekicweka kya West Nile kimanyirwe ahabw'eitaka ryaryo eririmu orwezo n'embeera y'obwire nungi. N'ekyarugiremu, abatuuragye baingi nibegamira aha buhingi n'oburiisa nk'oburugo bwabo oburikukirayo.

eng_prompt: The ongoing turmoil has left communities in disarray, with many struggling to survive. As tensions escalate, the economic impact is becoming increasingly evident.
lug_prompt: Obutabanguko obugenda mu maaso bulese ebitundu mu butabanguko, nga bangi balwana okuwangaala. Obunkenke bwe bweyongera, n'ebizibu ebiva mu by'enfuna byeyongera okweyoleka.
ach_prompt: Lweny matye ni oweko kabedo mapat-pat tye I peko, ki dano mapol tye ka tute matek me kwo. Ka telle tye kamede, adwogi ne I kom biacara tye ka nen atyer kamaleng.
teo_prompt: Akangasia nu elosi akonye ajalakisi itunga lu aiboisio nu amunaros, ido itunga luipu eutasi ainingosit aijar. Kwape iyata aiyalongong, eponi aanyun atiokisio nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri mupi drile ri ku ongulumu eyi e'yo onzi ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi dri ci eyi ma edri ta mbazu. E'yo ewaru eyini tuzu 'bori ma vutia, e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma dria 'diyi e'da i ewakokoru.
nyn_prompt: Obutabanguko oburiyo nibugyenda omu maisho, burekyeire abantu omu butabanguko, kandi baingi nibarwana kwebaisaho. Okweyongyera kw'obutaikirizana, nikweyongyera kureetaho oburemeezi omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: Recent events have led to significant changes in various communities. As a result, people's lives have been affected.
lug_prompt: Ebintu ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko bireeseewo enkyukakyuka mu bitundu eby'enjawulo. N'ekivuddemu, obulamu bw'abantu bukoseddwa.
ach_prompt: Jami ma otimme cokcok-ki okelo aloka-loka madit tutwal I kabedo mapat-pat. Macalo adwogi ne, kwo pa dano pe tye maber.
teo_prompt: Akiro nu iswamasi pac ayau aijulanakineta nuipu kotoma atutubena nuegelegela. Kanuka ngun, etirorit aijar naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi eji ojata okporu ongulumu ndundu eyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba eyi ma edri eyi eza ra.
nyn_prompt: Ebyabaireho obwahati, bireesireho empindahinduka y'amaani omu bantu baingi. N'ekyarugiremu, amagara g'abantu gateganisiibwe.

eng_prompt: In any society, maintaining peace and safety is essential for the well-being of its citizens. Therefore, it is crucial for authorities to take proactive measures to ensure that rules are followed.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyonna, okukuuma emirembe n'obutebenkevu kya mugaso eri obulamu obulungi bwa bannansi baakyo. N'olwekyo, kikulu nnyo ab'obuyinza okubaako kye bakolawo okulaba nti amateeka gagobererwa.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken, gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pire tek pi ber bedo pa anywali ne. Pi meno, pire tek tutwal ni lutela omyero gutim gin mo me neno ni ki lubu cik.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet adio, aidar ainapakin keda ayuwara erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aijar naka itungake. Kanuka ngun, erai ibore yenepol noi apedorosio aanyun ebe etupitai ikisila.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu dria ma alea, asianzu ma tambaza azini ageitema ma tambaza eri orodriru aa'ta muke kari anzi erini 'diyiniri ni. Ka'dini, eri orodriru 'ba drice'ba ru 'diyi ni e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu nezu ra kini 'ba azita eyi ma vuti obi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bantu boona, okurinda obusingye n'oburinzi n'eky'omugasho ahabw'oburungi bw'abantu baayo. N'ahabw'ekyo, nikikuru ab'obushoborozi kukora kyona ekirikubaasika kureeba ngu ebiragiro nibikuratirwa.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent tensions and conflicts, the community leaders gathered to discuss strategies for fostering harmony. They recognized the urgent need for collective action and collaboration among residents.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke n'obukuubagano obwaliwo gye buvuddeko, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baakuŋŋaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okutumbula obumu. Baazuula obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okukola awamu n'okukolagana mu batuuze.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle ki lweny ma obedo tye cokcok-ki, lutela me kabedo gucokke me nywako tam i kom yoo me kelo ribe. Gu niang ber pa tic kacel ki ribe ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ingungeta keda ingungeta lu atuboros, apotu engarenok lu atutubet kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iwaitin lu aitopoloria aimorikikina. Apotu kesi kojenutu eipud loka aswam nepepe keda aiswamanara kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako azini ngiringiri o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu geri eyini ecozu aa'ta tualu ri ma omgbo otuzu 'diyi ma dria. Eyi esu e'yo 'bani 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ti ecizu tualu ri ma orodri mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obunkenke n'obutaikirizana oburiho obwahati, abebembezi b'ekyanga bakateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha mihanda y'okureetaho okukwatanisa. Bakareeba ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'okukorera hamwe n'okukwatanisa omu batuura gye.

eng_prompt: In many religious teachings, the importance of compassion and kindness towards others is emphasized. One of the most profound principles found in these texts is the call to treat others with the same care and respect we give to ourselves.
lug_prompt: Mu njigiriza z'enzikiriza nnyingi, obukulu bw'okusaasira n'ekisa eri abalala bukkaatirizibwa. Emu ku misingi emikulu egisangibwa mu byawandiikibwa bino kwe kuyitibwa okuyisa abalala n'okufaayo n'ekitiibwa kye kimu kye twewa.
ach_prompt: I pwony me dini mapol, pire tek tutwal me bedo ki cwiny me kica ki kica bot jo mukene. Cik acel ma pire tek tutwal ma nonge I coc magi en aye lwongo me tero jo mukene ki woro ki gwok marom ma wamiyo ki wan kikomwa.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aisisianakineta nuka idiinin luipu, isinyikokitai ajokis naka aitim keda asianut mama ejaasi luce. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi luejaasi toma aiwadikaeta nu ngesi ainapeta nuka ayait luce keda epodokinit keda ayongit na ijaikini oni awatewok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo dini ni karakara 'diyi ma alea, 'ba asi orodri asi ndriza azini asi ndriza 'ba azi 'diyi vu ri ma dria. E'yo azi okporu 'bani esu e'yo 'diyi ma alea ri eri omveta 'bani 'ba azi 'diyi 'yezu asi ala azini inzita amani fele ama ma ngulupi driri be.
nyn_prompt: Omu nyegyesa nyingi z'ediini, omugasho gw'okugirira abandi embabazi n'embabazi nigugambwaho munonga. Emwe aha misingye y'amaani eri omu byahandiikirwe ebi n'okushaba kutwaza abandi nk'oku turikwetwaza.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, it is crucial for communities to unite and lend a helping hand. The recent tragedy has left many families in need of assistance and compassion.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, kya mugaso nnyo eri ebitundu okwegatta n'okuwaayo omukono gw'obuyambi. Ekikangabwa ekibaddewo kyaleka amaka mangi nga geetaaga obuyambi n'okusaasirwa.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, pire tek tutwal ki lwak me ribe kacel me miyo kony. Peko ma otimme cokcok-ki oweko gangi mapol mito kony ki kica.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, ejokuna itunga aimorikikin kosodete aingarakin. Akangasia nupac ajalakisi ikalia luipu ipudasi agangat ka aitim.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, eri orodriru ongulumu eyini ti ecizu tualu azini eyi ma aza kozu. E'yo ewaru ebipi o'diru 'diyi fe familia karakara eyini azakoma azini asi ndriza lezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, ni kikuru abantu kukwatanisa kandi bakabahwera. Ekikangabwa ekyabaireho obwahati kireesire amaka maingi garikwetenga obuhwezi n'okusaasirwa.

eng_prompt: In response to the challenges facing our community, leaders have emphasized the importance of collaboration. They believe that unity is essential for overcoming obstacles and achieving common goals.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebisoomooza ebisangibwa mu kitundu kyaffe, abakulembeze bakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukolagana. Balowooza nti obumu bwetaagisa nnyo okusobola okuvvuunuka ebizibu n'okutuuka ku biruubirirwa eby'awamu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko matye I kabedo wa, lutela guwaco ni ribe obedo gin ma pire tek. Gitye ki niyee ni ribe pire tek tutwal me loyo peko ki cobo miti gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejaas otunga wok, apotu engarenok isinyikokisi ajokis naka aimorikikina. Iyuunitos kesi ebe ejokuna aimorikikina kanu aipikor atiokisio ka aitodolikin apeleikinata.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu amavileri ni esu 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba eyi 'ba asi orodri ti icita niri ma dria. Yi a'i ra kini ti ecita eri orodriru e'yo ewaru 'diyi agazu azini e'yo eyi ma eselea 'diyi esuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi obu abantu baitu barikurabamu, abebembezi bagambire aha mugasho gw'okukwatanisa. Nibiikiriza ngu okukwatanisa n'eky'omugasho omu kusingura oburemeezi n'okuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byabo.

eng_prompt: In any community, the wisdom and experience of our elders can provide valuable insights. It is essential to listen to their perspectives before making any decisions.
lug_prompt: Mu kitundu kyonna, amagezi n'obumanyirivu bw'abakadde baffe bisobola okuwa amagezi ag'omuwendo. Kya mugaso okuwuliriza endowooza zaabwe nga tonnaba kukola kusalawo kwonna.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mo keken, ryeko ki ngec pa luditowa twero miyo ngec ma pire tek. Pire tek tutwal me winyo tam gi mapwod pe imoko tam mo keken.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubet adio, acoa keda amisiarit naka itunga luapolok ijaikini oni acoa naepol noi. Erai ibore yenepol noi aipup aomisiokec eringa iswama edio aseunet.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu ciria, ondua azini nita ama vile 'ba 'wara 'diyiniri eco ondua orodriruni fe ra. Eri orodriru e'yo eriza yiniri erizu rakaka de nga po'di 'duni e'yo azini ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu kicweka kyona, obwengye n'obumanyirizi bw'abakuru nibubaasa kuhwera munonga. N'eky'omugasho kuhurikiriza ebiteekateeko byabo batakakozire encwamu yoona.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing disputes over land ownership and usage, it has become increasingly clear that a collaborative approach is necessary. To address these tensions effectively, stakeholders are urging the government to intervene.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku nkaayana ezigenda mu maaso ku bwannannyini ku ttaka n'engeri y'okulikozesaamu, kyeyoleka bulungi nti okukolera awamu kyetaagisa. Okusobola okugonjoola obunkenke buno obulungi, abakwatibwako basaba gavumenti okuyingira mu nsonga.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle matye kawot anyim I kom twero ki tic ki ngom, nen atyer kamaleng ni winye obedo gin ma pire tek. Me tyeko telle magi maber, joo ma timo tic gi tye ka lego gamente me donyo I lok eni.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ingungeta lu elosi akonye nuka alupok keda epone lo itwasamaere alupok, ecai cut ebe ibusakinit aimorikikin. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu ejok, eutasi itunga ailip apugan alomun.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako mupi drile e'yo nyaku ma e'ipiru azini ayuza ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi, eca curu'do e'da kililiru kini geri 'bani azi ngazu tualuri eri orodriru. E'yo ewaru 'diyi ma aza kozu kililiru, 'ba ambo ndundu eyi ai gamete ni e'yo nde 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'entongane ezirikugyenda omu maisho ahabw'obwannannyini n'okukoresa eitaka, nikyeyoreka butunu ngu enkora y'okukorera hamwe neeyetengwa. Okukora aha nshonga ezi kurungi, abu kirikukwataho nibashaba gavumenti kugira eki ekora.

eng_prompt: Residents have expressed growing concerns about their safety. Recent incidents have highlighted the vulnerabilities in local security measures.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze balaze obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku bikwata ku bukuumi bwabwe. Ebintu ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko biraga obunafu obuli mu by'okwerinda by'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gunyutu lworo I kom ber bedo gi. Jami ma otimme cokcok-ki onyuto goro matye I yub me gwoko kuc I tedero.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu ayuwara kec. Akiro nuiswamasi pac itodunitos aibucanaro kotoma ayuwara naka akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo eyi ma tambazu ri ma dria. E'yo ebipi yi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo okpo koko e'yo ageyitema ni kari ma alia 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ra.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'okwerinda kwabo. Ebintu ebyabaireho obwahati, byoreka obunafu omu by'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: Residents have expressed growing concerns about safety and an increase in criminal activity. To address these issues, community leaders are urging local authorities to take action.
lug_prompt: Abatuuze balaze obweraliikirivu obweyongera ku by'okwerinda n'obumenyi bw'amateeka obweyongera. Okukola ku nsonga zino, abakulembeze b'ekitundu bakubiriza abakulembeze b'ebyalo okubaako kye bakolawo.
ach_prompt: Lutedero gunyutu lworo I kom ber bedo ki tim aranyi matye kamede. Me tyeko peko magi, lutela me tedero tye ka lego lutela me tedero me timo gin mo.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga itodutu aiyalongongo naepol noi kanu ayuwara keda aiyatakinio naka abilibilio naka ikisila. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu, isinyikokitos engarenok luka atutubet apedorosio nuka atutubet aswam ngun.
lgg_prompt: Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo onzi eyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ri pie. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ai drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'yo 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye boorekire okwerarikirira ahabw'eby'okwerinda hamwe n'obukozi bw'ebibi obweyongyeire. Okukora aha nshonga ezi, abebembezi b'ebyaro nibashaba ab'obushoborozi kukora aha nshonga.

eng_prompt: In light of recent security concerns and increased incidents of illegal crossings, local authorities have intensified their efforts. As part of this initiative, the police are committed to defending the border area.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweraliikirira kw'eby'okwerinda okwaliwo gye buvuddeko n'obubenje obweyongedde obw'okusala mu bumenyi bw'amateeka, ab'obuyinza mu byalo bongedde amaanyi mu kaweefube waabwe. Ng'omu ku kaweefube ono, poliisi yeewaddeyo okukuuma ebitundu by'oku nsalo.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki lok me gwoko kuc ma obedo tye cokcok-ki ki medde pa tim me ngolo wang lobo iwi alii, lutela me tedero gumedo kero gi. Macalo but yub man, abili tye ki miti me gwoko wang lobo.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aiyalongongo naka ayuwara keda aiyatakinio naka itunga luekorete ikisila, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet iyatakisi aswamukec. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, ekapakina ipolisin ayuwar aiboisio nu oikoru.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo ageyitema ni ma dria o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi tualu e'yo 'bani 'ba yi alizu azita palaa ku 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu 'diyi pie, drice'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu okpo eyini 'diyi ma omgbo ra. Otita 'di ma azi ru, polisi eyi owi eyi ageitema fezu angu boda ni 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enshonga z'eby'okwerinda ezibaireho obwahati hamwe n'oburemeezi obweyongyeire, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro bongyeire amaani omunkora yaabo. Nk'emwe aha nteekateeka egi, poriisi eyehaireyo kurinda ensharo.

eng_prompt: After weeks of discussions and negotiations, the time has come for the leaders to make a decisive conclusion. They have gathered all the necessary information and feedback from their teams.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga tukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okuteesa, ekiseera kituuse abakulembeze okusalawo. Bakung'aanyizza obubaka bwonna obwetaagisa n'ebiteeso okuva mu ttiimu zaabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me nywako lok ki winye, kare dong oromo pi lutela me moko tam gi. Gujogo ngec weng ma mite ki tam ma aa ki bot luticgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin luipu luka ipegeta keda ipegeta, adolu kwana apak naka engarenok aitolomun aseunet. Apotu kesi odumutu akiro kere nu ekotoi ka abongokineta kanejaas itimun kec.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti 'bani e'yo onzezu azini e'yo otuzu 'bori ma vutia, sawa ca 'bo drice'ba eyini e'yo 'duzu e'yo okporu ni ma dria. Eyi tra e'yo dria lele 'diyi tualu egata eyivile 'diyi pie engazu amuti eyivile 'diyi vu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande z'okuhanuura n'okuteesa, obwire buhikire abebembezi kukora eky'okuhendera. Batungire amakuru goona agarikwetengwa hamwe n'ebiteiso kuruga omu tiimu zaabo.

eng_prompt: In preparation for the upcoming community meeting, the district leaders gathered feedback from residents to ensure their voices were heard. This input will be crucial as they advocate for the needs of their constituents.
lug_prompt: Mu kwetegekera olukungaana lw'ekitundu olujja, abakulembeze ba disitulikiti baakuŋŋaanyizza endowooza okuva mu batuuze okukakasa nti amaloboozi gaabwe gawulirwa. Ebintu bino bijja kuba bya mugaso nnyo nga balwanirira ebyetaago by'abantu baabwe.
ach_prompt: I yubbe pi kacokke pa lwak matye kabino anyim, lutela me district gu gamo tam ki bot lwak me neno ni ki winyo dwon gi. Kony man bibedo gin ma pire tek tutwal ikare ma gitye ka lweny pi miti pa lubol kwir gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemonokin airiamunet na ebunit, apotu engarenok luka edisitrikt otukutu akiro kanejaas itunga kanu awanyun ebe epupio iporotoikec. Erai ibore yen epol ajokis naarai igangitos kesi ipudesia luka itunga luka atutubenakec.
lgg_prompt: Otuta mitingi ongulumu eyini emuzu ri ni risi, drice'ba distrikiti ni 'diyi tra egata engazu 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi vu nezu ra kini 'ba eri o'duko eyivile 'diyi ra. E'yo 'diyi nga ovu orodriru yini a'di 'diria e'yo 'ba angu yini opi nyazani 'diyi ni leleri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kweteekateekyera orukiiko rw'ekyanga orurikwija kubaho, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti, bakarundaana ebiteiso kuruga omu batuuragye, okureeba ngu eiraka ryabo rihurirwa. Eki nikiija kuba eky'omugasho munonga ahabw'okurwanirira ebyetaago by'abantu abu barikujwekyera.

eng_prompt: In light of the escalating tensions and potential for conflict, the leaders convened to discuss their options. They recognized the importance of finding a solution that would maintain harmony among all parties involved.
lug_prompt: Olw'obunkenke obweyongera n'obukuubagano obuyinza okubaawo, abakulembeze baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri gye bayinza okukikolamu. Baakitegeera obukulu bw'okunoonya eky'okugonjoola ekiyinza okukuuma obumu mu bantu bonna abakwatibwako.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki telle matye kamedde ki lweny matwero bedo tye, lutela ne gubedo kacoke me nywako tamgi. Gu niang ber pa nongo yoo me cobo peko matye ma weko winye bedo tye ikin dano weng matye I lokke.
teo_prompt: Katupitos aiyalongongo naepol noi keda atiokisio nuepedorete atakanun, apotu engarenok iriamunos aitetem nuepedorete kesi aswam. Apotu kesi kojenutu ajokis naka aitemokin ationis naepedori aidar aimorikikina kanejaas itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru tupi tupi 'diyi ma e'yosi, drice'ba eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria. Eyi esu orodri e'yo eyi ma aza kozu eyini ani aa'zu tualu 'ba dria e'yo nde ma alea 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obunkenke obweyongyeire hamwe n'obutabanguko oburikubaasa kubaho, abebembezi bakashutama kuhanuura aha nshonga zaabo. Bakareeba omugasho gw'okutunga eky'okukora ekirikubaasa kurinda obumwe ahagati y'abantu boona abakukwatwaho.

eng_prompt: Tensions had been rising between the local communities over land disputes, and the recent actions taken by local officials only fueled the fire. In a controversial move, the district chairman decided to mark the contested territory with a signpost, igniting further outrage among residents.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bwali bweyongedde wakati w'abantu b'omu kitundu olw'obukuubagano bw'ettaka, era ebikolwa ebyakolebwa abakungu b'ekitundu gye buvuddeko byayongera ku muliro. Mu kaweefube, ssentebe wa disitulikiti yasalawo okuteeka akabonero mu kitundu ekivuganyizibwako, ekyayongera okuleetawo obusungu mu batuuze.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo ka mede ikin lwak me tedero pi laro lok me ngom, ki jami ma lutic me tedero otimo cokcok-ki omedo mac. I lok ma kelo apoka-poka, won kom me dictrik omoko tamme me keto alama I kabedo ma pyem tye iye, man okelo akemo I kin lutedero.
teo_prompt: Apolor atiokisio kiding itunga luka atutubet kanu ingungeta luka alupok, ido aswamisioit naka eswamak luka atutubet abu iyatak akim. Kotoma aswamisioit naka epeget, abu apolon eicolong loka edisitrikt kotema ebe ibusakinit ngesi aipikakin aiboisit naepikakinitai keda aiboisit naka aiboisit kangin, ido abu kitogogong anyunyura kanejaas itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ngiringiri ri e'bi tu 'ba angu ma alia 'diyi ma eselea e'yo ngiringiri nyaku ma dria 'diyi ma dria, dika e'yo azi'ba angu ma alia 'diyi ni 'ye o'diru 'diyi fe aci ma omgbo ni tu ra. E'yo erita ako ni ma alea, ogua e'i distrikiti niri 'du e'yo angu 'bani agata gazu 'da ma dria e'dazu, e'yo 'da fe 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyini aokosi.
nyn_prompt: Obunkenke butwire nibweyongyera ahagati y'abantu b'omubyaro ahabw'entongane z'eitaka, kandi ebikorwa ebikye ebyakozirwe abakuru b'ebyaro, bikongyera aha muriro. Omu muringo gw'obutaikirizana, mukuru w'entebe ya disiturikiti, akasharamu kutaho akamanyiso omu mwanya ogurikuhakanisibwamu, ekyayongyeire kureetaho ekiniga omu batuuragye.

eng_prompt: In the wake of the devastating fire that swept through Maracha district, many families lost their homes and livelihoods. Recognizing the urgent need for assistance, local officials called for immediate intervention to help those impacted by the disaster.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'omuliro ogw'amaanyi ogwakwata disitulikiti y'e Maracha, amaka mangi gaafiirwa amaka gaago n'eby'okweyimirizaawo. Olw'okumanya obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'obuyambi, abakungu b'ebyalo baasaba okuyingira mu nsonga mu bwangu okuyamba abo abakoseddwa akatyabaga.
ach_prompt: I ngee mac ma obalo kabedo mapol I dicitrwik me Maracha, lugangi mapol gurwenyo gangi gi ki jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Ki niang ni kony tye kamitte oyot, lutic me tedero gulego ni myero kikony jo ma peko eni otimme I komgi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka akim naenyamit akwap nako Maracha, apotu ikalia luipu kotwakiasi ireriakec keda aijarakec. Apotu eswamak luka atutubet kowanyutu eipud loka aingarakinio katipet kanu aingarakin ngul luetirorit akangas.
lgg_prompt: Aci okporu distrikiti Maracha niri ma alea ri ma e'yosi, familia karakara eyi avi aku eyivile 'diyi tualu afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi pie. Erini e'yo 'bani azakoma lezu mbeleru ri ma e'yo egazu risi, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ai 'ba e'yo ewaru 'da ni 'diyi ma aza kozu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo gw'omuriro ogwakwatsire disiturikiti ya Maracha, amaka maingi gakaferwa amaka gaago hamwe n'ebibarikubaisaho. Ahabw'okumanya ngu hariho ekyetengo ky'amaani ky'obuhwezi, abakuru b'ebyaro bakashaba ngu habeho okuhwera abo ababaire bateganisiibwe ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: Emergency services responded quickly to the scene of a devastating blaze that engulfed several buildings. As the flames spread, local residents were forced to evacuate, leading to a significant impact on the community.
lug_prompt: Abakola ku by'amangu baayanukudde mangu mu kifo omuliro ogwakutte ebizimbe ebiwerako we gwali. Omuliro bwe gwagenda gusaasaana, abatuuze b'omu kitundu bawalirizibwa okuva mu bifo byabwe, ekyaviirako abantu okukosebwa ennyo.
ach_prompt: Joo ma miyo kony oyot oyot gukelo kony oyot ikare ma mac omako odi mapol tutwal. Ikare ma mac omako kabedo mukene, lutedero ki diyo gi me weko kabedo gi, man okelo peko madit tutwal I kom lwak.
teo_prompt: Apotu lu engeso kobongokisi katipet ne abu akim onyam itogoi luipu. Nealalakina akim, aponi kobuikinai itunga anyoun kotoma aiboisio kec, ido abu ngin koyangau ationis naepol noi mama ejaasi itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ba azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi 'ye e'yo mbeleru aci okporu jo karakara eyi ezazu ri ma dria. Aci nde ni i erezurisi, 'ba omi 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi apazu angu 'da ma alea risi, erini fezu e'yo onzi 'yezu ongulumu eyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ab'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru, bakakora ahonaaho omuriro gw'amaani ogwakwatsire ebyombeko bingi. Omuriro ku gwagumire nigujanjaara, abatuuragye bakagyemeserezibwa kuruga omu myanya yaabo, ekyarugiremu oburemeezi bw'amaani aha bantu.

eng_prompt: In many cultures, traditional building materials are often sourced from the local environment. One common practice among rural communities is to utilize natural resources for construction.
lug_prompt: Mu buwangwa bungi, ebintu by'okuzimba eby'ennono bitera kuggyibwa mu kitundu. Enkola emu eya bulijjo mu byalo kwe kukozesa eby'obugagga eby'obutonde mu kuzimba.
ach_prompt: I tekwaro mapol, jami gedo me tekwaro ki gamo gi ki I kabedo gi. Tic acel ma dano mapol timo icaro obedo tic ki jami ma lubanga aye ocweyo pi gedo.
teo_prompt: Kotoma inonosio luipu, edumunio iboro lu edukere kotoma aiboisio nu atutubet. Idiopebore yenetapit itunga lukocaloi aswam ngesi aitwasam iboro luka Edeke kanu aduko.
lgg_prompt: A'bi karakara eyi ma alea, 'ba tutuni afa jo sizu 'diyi esu engazu angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea. Yeta azi alu o'bi calua 'diyi ma eselea ri afa nyakuni 'diyi ayuzu afa sizu.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obuhangwa bingi, ebintu by'okwombekyesa eby'obuhangwa nibikurwa omu byaro. Ekikorwa kimwe omu byaro n'okukoresa eby'obuhangwa omu kwombeka.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing humanitarian crisis, local officials organized a fundraising campaign. With the support of various organizations, they were able to gather essential supplies for those in need.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'obuntubulamu ekigenda mu maaso, abakungu b'ebyalo baategeka kaweefube w'okusonda ssente. Olw'obuyambi bw'ebitongole eby'enjawulo, baasobola okukung'aanya ebintu eby'omugaso eri abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me konyo dano matye kawot anyim, lutic me tedero guyubu yub me jogo cente. Ki kony pa dule ma padi padi, guyubu jami ma mite pi joo matye ki peko.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu itunga, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kitemokisi aituk ikapun. Keda agangat naka iriongeta luegelegela, apotu kesi opedosi atukun iboro lu itunga lu ican.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru o'bi eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu e'yo robia trazu ni. Atita amuti ndundu eyini risi, eyi oku afa orodriru 'diyi 'ba afa koko 'diyi dri ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu oburikugyenda omu maisho, abakuru b'ebyaro bakatebekanisa ehururu y'okushorooza esente. Ahabw'obuhwezi bw'ebitongore ebitarikushushana, bakabaasa kurundaana ebintu by'omugasho ahabw'abatarikwebaasa.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing needs of the community, the local government organized a charity event. Recognizing the urgency of the situation, the minister stepped forward to help those in need.
lug_prompt: Olw'obwetaavu bw'ekitundu obweyongera, gavumenti y'ebitundu yategeka omukolo gw'okugaba obuyambi. Olw'okumanya obukulu bw'embeera, minisita yavaayo okuyamba abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me dongo miti pa lwak, gamente me tedero oyubu yub me miyo kony bot lupeko. I kare ma minista oniang kit ma peko ne tye kwede, en okato anyim me konyo jo ma onongo peko tye I komgi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga, abu apugan naka atutubet itemok ainapeta nuka agangat. Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuka ejautene, abu eminista kogeu aingarakin ngul lu ican.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma aza kozu, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea ri otu omu 'ba azakoma fepi 'diyi niri ra. E'yo 'da ma e'yo egazu mbeleru risi, minisita 'da fu drile 'ba azakoma lepi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebyetaago by'abantu, gavumenti y'ekyaro ekatebekanisa omukoro gw'obuhwezi. Bwanyima y'okumanya oburemeezi bw'embeera, minisita akaza omu maisho kuyamba abo abaine ebyetengo.

eng_prompt: The sky darkened ominously as the rain began to fall in relentless sheets. Residents had been warned about the potential for severe weather, but no one anticipated the devastation that would follow.
lug_prompt: Eggulu lyeyongedde okuzikiza ng'enkuba etandise okutonnya. Abatuuze baali balabuddwa ku mbeera y'obudde embi, naye tewali n'omu yali alowooza ku kusaanyaawo ebintu ebyanaddirira.
ach_prompt: Polo odoko col matek tutwal I kare ma kot ocako cwer. Ki ciko lwak i kom peko me piny marac tutwal, ento pe tye ngat mo ma otamo I kom bal ma obilubu.
teo_prompt: Apotu akuj komutono noi naarai abu edou kogeu aibiror. Aponi ikwenyarai itunga nuikamunitos ekuse ka etepe loaronon, konye mam idiotunganan aomit ebe ebuni amunar.
lgg_prompt: Angu eca iniru ozoo ni e'doria e'dezu o'duko kokoru 'bori ma vutia. Ba fe bile ndu liza 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi dri e'yo angu mile ni ecazu okporu ri ma dria ra te 'ba azi ega ni e'yo ewaru ecopi 'ye 'diyi ma dria ku.
nyn_prompt: Eiguru rikashwekyerera munonga enjura ku yaatandikire kugwa. Abatuuragye bakaraburwa aha mbeera y'obwire erikubaasa kubaho, kwonka tihaine owabaire naamanya oku okucwekyereza okwabaire nikwija kukuratira.

eng_prompt: A large blaze erupted in the downtown area late last night, engulfing several buildings in flames. Eyewitnesses reported seeing thick smoke billowing into the sky as emergency services rushed to the scene.
lug_prompt: Omuliro omunene gwakutte ekibuga ekiro ekikeesezza olwaleero ne gukuma omuliro mu bizimbe ebiwerako. Abaabaddewo baategeezezza nti baalaba omukka omungi nga gubuuka mu bbanga nga abasawo b'amangu badduka mu kifo.
ach_prompt: Mac omako odi mapol tutwal I dyewor mukato. Lucaden guwaco ni guneno mac madit tutwal ma obedo kabino I polo I kare ma lutic me ot yat gucito I kabedo ne.
teo_prompt: Abu akim naepol noi kogeu aibiror koibuga kiding kware, ido abu komudia itogoi luipu. Apotu ajenak kotemasi ebe apotu kesi kowanyutu ekwam loepol noi kotoma akuj naarai apotu lu engeso koloto aiboisit.
lgg_prompt: Aci okporuni e'do aku ambu tawuni niri ma alea ini ajerisi, erini jo karakara eyi ma ti ojizu. Ba e'yo ndrepi 'diyi 'yo kini eyi ndre taba omgbo angirisi ni ri ri ni ri tu angu ma alea 'ba azakoma lepi mbeleru 'diyi ni emuria angu e'yo 'da ni i'yezu ri ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omuriro muhango gukabarukaho omu tawuni omukiro kya nyomwebazyo, gwashwekire ebyombeko bingi omu muriro. Ababiireho bakareeba omwika gw'amaani niguguruka omu iguru obu ab'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru baabaire nibahika aha mwanya.

eng_prompt: As communities continue to face the challenges posed by the pandemic, health officials emphasize the importance of protective measures. One key strategy that has proven effective is maintaining space between individuals to reduce transmission risk.
lug_prompt: Nga ebitundu bikyagenda mu maaso n'okusanga okusoomoozebwa okwaleetebwa ekirwadde bbunansi, abakungu b'ebyobulamu bassa essira ku bukulu bw'enkola z'okwekuuma. Ekimu ku bintu ebikoze obulungi kwe kukuuma ebanga wakati w'abantu okukendeeza ku bulabe bw'okusiigibwa kw'akawuka.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak tye ka medde ki nongo peko ma two korona okelo, lutic me yot kom tye ka cuko cwinygi tutwal I kom ber pa gwoko kwo pa dano. Yoo acel mapire tek ma otiyo maber tutwal obedo bedo ma bor ikin dano me dwoko piny peko me nyaa pa two corona.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos itunga ajaut keda atiokisio nu eyangaunit adeka naka ekorona, isinyikokitos eswamak luka angaleu ajokis naka ayuwara. Adiopet ewai lo iswamat ejok ngesi ajaut keda alalau kiding itunga kanu aitidisiar ekorona.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini mu drile e'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri ni ejile 'diyi esuzu risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi asi 'ba orodri e'yo tambaza ni 'diyi ma dria. Otita azi okporu azi ngapi onyiru tu ri eri esele 'ba eyi ma eselea ri ma tambazu e'yo azo eyi ma ereta niri ma omgbo esizu.
nyn_prompt: Obu abantu barikugumizamu nibatunga oburemeezi oburetsirweho endwara ruranda nsi, abakuru omu by'amagara nibashagika omugasho gw'okukoresa emiringo y'okwerinda. Omuringo gumwe ogw'omugasho ogurikworeka ngu nigukora n'okurinda obwire ahagati y'abantu okukyendeeza akabi k'okujanjaara kw'akakooko ka muzibwe.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent community needs assessment, a plan has been developed to allocate essential resources. To ensure fairness and efficiency, village leaders will be responsible for distributing the resources.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kunoonyereza okwakolebwa gye buvuddeko ku byetaago by'ekitundu, enteekateeka ekoleddwa okugabanya ebintu ebikulu. Okukakasa obwenkanya n'obwangu, abakulembeze b'ebyalo bajja kuvunaanyizibwa ku kugaba ebintu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki kwed ma otimme cokcok-ki I kom jami ma mite pi lwak, kiyubu yub me poko jami ma mite pi lwak. Me neno ni jami weng tye marom dok maber, lutela me caro gubi bedo ki tic me poko jami.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuka aingic ipudesia luka itunga, etolomun ainapeta nuka aikor iboro lu itwasamao. Kanu awanyun ebe ejokuna ka ejokuna, engarenok lu ocaalo kes ikamunitos nu aikor iboro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo vuti ondaza e'yo ongulumu eyini le 'diyi ma dria o'diru ri ma e'yosi, 'ba e'do otita azi afa orodriru 'diyi awazu. Lezu e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu kililiru, drice'ba calo ni 'diyi nga azi nga lonyi eyi awazu.
nyn_prompt: Kurugirira aha kucondooza okwakozirwe ahabyetaago by'abantu, enteekateeka ekozirwe y'okugaba ebintu ebirikwetengwa. Okureeba ngu hariho oburinganiza n'oburingaaniza, abebembezi b'ebyaro nibaija kujunanizibwa aha kugaba ebintu.

eng_prompt: In response to the devastating landslides that struck the region, local volunteers mobilized to provide assistance. The organisation quickly gathered resources and prepared to help those affected by the disaster.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula okubumbulukuka kw'ettaka okw'amaanyi okwali mu kitundu, bannakyewa b'omu kitundu baakunga abantu okubawa obuyambi. Ekitongole kyakuŋŋaanya mangu ebyetaago ne kyetegekera okuyamba abo abaakosebwa akatyabaga.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me muk pa piny ma okelo peko madit tutwal I twok piny eni, lutic me tedero gukelo kony. Dul ne gurayo kony oyot-oyot dok guyube me konyo jo ma peko ma poto atura obalo pacigi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiyatiyawun na akwap na abu odum aiboisit, apotu itunga luka atutubet kimorikikinos aijaikin agangat. Abu erionget kituk iboro katipet kosodi akapanakin aingarakin ngul luetirorit akangas.
lgg_prompt: E'yo angu asuza onzi angu 'da ma alea 'diyiniri ma aza kozu, 'ba owi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi tra eyi azakoma fezu. Amuti 'da tra afa ayuzaru 'diyi mbeleru dika eyi otu eyi azakoma fezu 'ba e'yo ewaru 'da ni 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okurahuka kw'eitaka okw'amaani okwareteire ekicweka ekyo, abarikwehayo omu byaro bakakoresa amaani gaabo kuhayo obuhwezi. Ekitongore kikarundaana eby'okukoresa ahonaaho kyeteekateekyera kuhwera abo ababaire bateganisiibwe ebihikiirizi.

eng_prompt: Despite the strict financial oversight in place, he found a way to manipulate the accounting records. As the treasurer, he felt the pressure of mounting personal debts and saw an opportunity to resolve his financial troubles.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waaliwo okulondoola okw'amaanyi mu by'ensimbi, yafuna engeri y'okukyusakyusa mu biwandiiko by'embalirira. Ng'omuwanika, yawulira akazito k'okweyongera ku mabanja era n'alaba omukisa okugonjoola ebizibu bye eby'ensimbi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kitye ka doro tic ki lim matek tutwal, en onongo yoo me nywaro tic ki rekod me lim. Macalo lagwok lim, en owinyo lyeto me bedo ki banya mapol dok oneno gum me tyeko peko me lim ma en tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejai aingic naepol noi naka ikapun, abu ngesi kodum epone loka aijulakin aiwadikaeta nuka ikapun. Kwape agwelanaran, abu ngesi kopup ainingosit naka adumun apesenin nuipu noi ido abu ngesi koany arereng naka aitemokin atiokisio ke nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma pamvu andrizu okporu 'diyi ma talasi, eri esu geri azi ecozu e'yo robia ni 'diyi ojazu ra. Ekile 'ba lonyi ta mbapiri ru, eri etumu e'yo mari isuzu 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ra azini eri ndre drileba e'yo ewaru erini robia esu 'diyi ma aza kozu ra.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho okurambura kw'amaani omu by'empiiha, akatunga omuringo gw'okukoresa kubi ebihandiiko by'ebitabo. Nk'omubiiki w'esente, akahurira oburemeezi bw'okwongyera amabanja, reero yaareeba omugisha gw'okumaraho oburemeezi bwe bw'esente.

eng_prompt: In times of economic uncertainty, vulnerable populations often face the greatest challenges. To address these issues, targeted support initiatives are being proposed to assist those in need.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obutali butebenkevu mu by'enfuna, abantu abateesobola batera okwolekagana n'okusoomoozebwa okusinga. Okusobola okukola ku nsonga ezo, waliwo enteekateeka ezikolebwa okuyamba abo abali mu bwetaavu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko me can lim, dano ma goro ipol kare ginongo peko madit loyo. Me tyeko peko magi, gitye ka miyo tam me miyo kony ki joo ma peko tye i komgi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko nuka ikapun, itunga lu icanasi kesi itereikina keda atiokisio nuepolok noi. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu, eutai aitolomun agangat nejaas lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru e'yo robiani 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ma alia, 'ba e'yo ewaru isu'baa 'diyi e'yo ewaru ndeni 'diyi isu. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, 'ba otu e'yo azakoma fezu 'ba afa koko 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'eibura ry'esente, abantu abatarikwebaasa nibatunga oburemeezi bw'amaani. Okukora aha nshonga ezi, hariho enteekateeka y'okuhwera abo abarikwetenga obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: During the meeting, the team discussed the urgent needs of displaced families affected by the recent crisis. Recognizing the gravity of the situation, the woman leader urged the organization to donate more relief items to refugees.
lug_prompt: Mu lukungaana, ttiimu yakubaganya ebirowoozo ku byetaago eby'amangu eby'amaka agaasengulwa olw'obuzibu obwaliwo gye buvuddeko. Ng'ategeera obubi bw'embeera, omukulembeze w'abakyala yasaba ekitongole okuwaayo obuyambi obulala eri abanoonyiboobubudamu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me kacokke, dul ne gunywako lok I kom jami ma mite pi gangi ma peko ma otimme cokcok-ki obalo pacigi. I nge niang peko matye ni, latela pa mon olego dul ne me miyo kony mukene bot luring ayela.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamunet, apotu itimun kitetemoto ipudesia lu atipet luka ikalia lu apotu kotakanutu kanuka ationis na pac. Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuka ejautene, abu angarenon na angor ilip erionget aijaikin agangat nejaas ikerai.
lgg_prompt: Mitingi 'da ma alea, amuti 'da eyi agbatara gba e'yo familia eyini aa'zu angu ndundu eyi ma alea ku 'diyi ma aza kozu mbeleru e'yo ewaru eyi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma dria. E'yo ewaru e'yo 'di ma dria 'boria, oku drice'ba 'da ai amuti 'da afa ayuzaru 'diyi fezu emunyale eyidri drile.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko, tiimu ekahanuura aha byetaago by'amaani eby'amaka agatarikwebaasa ahabw'oburemeezi obwabaireho. Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi bw'embeera, omwebembezi w'abakazi akashaba ekitongore okwongyera kuhayo obuhwezi aha mpungi.

eng_prompt: Heavy rains fell for days, overwhelming the riverbanks and causing water levels to rise dangerously high. As the storm intensified, residents braced for the worst, fearing the impending disaster.
lug_prompt: Enkuba ey'amaanyi yatonnya okumala ennaku, n'ebuutikira emigga era n'ereetera amazzi okulinnya waggulu mu ngeri ey'akabi. Ng'omuyaga gweyongera, abatuuze beetegekera ekisinga obubi, nga batya akatyabaga akagenda okubaawo.
ach_prompt: Kot ocwe matek tutwal pi nino mapol, ma opongo wang pii ma oweko pii omede malo tutwal. I kare ma yamo magwar ne omedde, lutedero guyube pi gin marac loyo weng, pien gubedo ki lworo I kom peko matye kabino ni.
teo_prompt: Abu edou loepol kibiror adaun aparasia nuipu, ido abu akipi kibiror noi. Neapolor ekwam, apotu itunga okapakina kanuka nuarokok, akuriaka nuikamunitos ationis naebunit.
lgg_prompt: Ozoo 'dipi okporu 'diyi 'de o'du karakara, yi tizu yi tia azini fe yi ma omgbo tu uru onzi onzi. Ozoo 'da ma okpo ni tuzurisi, 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi otu eyi e'yo onzi ndeni 'diyi 'yezu, eyini orisi e'yo ewaru ecapi ewu drialeri ma alea ri si.
nyn_prompt: Enjura y'amaani ekagwa kumara ebiro bingi, ekareetera amaizi g'omugyera kweyongyera. Omuyaga ku gwagumire nigweyongyera, abatuuragye bakeeteekateekyera ekirikubaasa kuba kibi munonga, barikutiina akabi akari haihi kubaho.

eng_prompt: I've tried everything to enjoy my home, but the constant racket from next door makes it impossible to relax. Every night feels like a battle against the sounds of their loud music and shouting.
lug_prompt: Nagezezzaako buli kimu okunyumirwa amaka gange, naye eddoboozi okuva ku muliraanwa liremesa okuwummulamu. Buli kiro kiwulikika ng'olutalo n'amaloboozi g'ennyimba zaabwe ez'omwanguka n'okukuba enduulu.
ach_prompt: Atemo jami weng me bedo ki yomcwiny I gang mega, ento woo ma aa ki I gang matye jiraniwa weko bedo tek tutwal me yweyo. Dye wor ducu bedo calo lweny I kom dwan wergi ki woo gi.
teo_prompt: Atamit eong iboro kere kanu alelakin ore ka, konye amumu naka idunyet ijaikit eong etiono aiyengun. Kanginikware apupi bala ejai ejie keda ikososinei keda aimony kec.
lgg_prompt: Ma o'bi e'yo dria ayiko esuzu aku mavileri ma alea ra, te o'duko engapi jo ejeleru 'diyi ma alea ri ni fe mani ava liza esuzu ku. Ini vusi eri ekile a'di 'diza ni yi ma ongoni okporu azini o'duko yini 'diyi be le.
nyn_prompt: Ngyezeho buri kimwe okushemererwa omuka wangye, kwonka orwari orurikuruga aha rubaju rwangye nirurugwamu okuhuumura. Buri kiro nikireebeka nk'orugamba rw'okurwanisa eiraka ry'okweshongora kwabo okw'amaani n'okuteera enduuru.

eng_prompt: Understanding the patterns of fire outbreaks is crucial for effective prevention and response strategies. In Uganda, these incidents tend to follow a specific trend that raises concerns among local communities.
lug_prompt: Okutegeera enkola y'okubalukawo kw'omuliro kya mugaso nnyo mu kutangira n'okukola ku nsonga. Mu Uganda, ebintu ng'ebyo bitera okubaawo mu ngeri ezimu ezireetawo okweraliikirira mu bantu b'omu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Niang kit ma mac cakke kwede pire tek tutwal pi gengo ki lweny i komgi. I Uganda, jami magi timme malubbe ki jami ma kelo lworo ikin lwak.
teo_prompt: Amisiikin iwaitin lu ibwangunor akim erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitikitik keda aitemokin ngun. Ko Uganda, etapit akiro nu aitodolikin epone ediope lo eyangauni aiyalongong kanejaas itunga luka atutubet.
lgg_prompt: Geri aci eyini e'dozu 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru geri kililiru eyini ecozu aci eyi atrizu azini eyi ma aza kozu. Kari Uganda niri ma alea, e'yo 'dile 'diyi tutuni e'yo azi fepi asi otiza ongulumu eyi ma eselea ri ma vuti obi.
nyn_prompt: Okwetegyereza emiringo y'okubarukaho kw'omuriro n'eky'omugasho munonga omu kuzibira n'okugarukamu. Omu Uganda, ebikorwa ebi nibikuratira enkora erikureetaho okwerarikirira omu bantu b'omubyaro.

eng_prompt: As tensions rose among the large group of young people gathered in the trading centre, local business owners expressed their concerns about potential disturbances. In response to the escalating situation, law enforcement arrived to restore order.
lug_prompt: Obunkenke bweyongera mu kibinja ky'abavubuka abaali bakungaanidde mu kabuga, bannannyini bizinensi mu kitundu baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe olw'obutabanguko obuyinza okubaawo. Olw'embeera eyali egenda yeeyongera, abakuumaddembe baatuuka okuzzaawo obutebenkevu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lworo omedde ikin dul pa bulu mapol ma gugure I trading centre, lutim biacara me tedero gunyutu lworo gi I kom peko ma twero bedo tye. Macalo adwogi me medde pa peko enoni, lugwok cik gubino me kelo ber bedo.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor aiyalongong kanejaas atumunak luipu lu atukokinos osenta, apotu agwelanarak luka atutubet itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuka amumu. Kanu aitemokin ejautene loajai, apotu ipolisin kopotu kanu ainyakakin ainapakina.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako ni tuzu ongulumu karakara 'ba ode eyi trapi angu tujari 'yezu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma eselea, tujari e'ipi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo ecopi 'ba eyi ezazuri ma dria. E'yo 'da ma omgbo ni tuzu tutu risi, 'ba azita ma ta mbapi 'diyi eca e'yo otuza ejizu.
nyn_prompt: Obu obunkenke bwabaire nibweyongyera omu guruupu y'eminyeeto omu maduuka, bakama ba bizinesi bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'obutabanguko oburikubaasa kubaho. Ahabw'embeera eyeyongyeire, ab'eby'obutegyeki bakaija kugaruraho obusingye.

eng_prompt: After spending years behind bars for a crime he didn't commit, the community rallied around him in support. His long-awaited release sparked a wave of excitement and anticipation among his friends and family.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi mu kkomera olw'omusango gwe yali takoze, abantu baamuwagira. Okuteebwa kwe okwabadde kulindiriddwa okumala ebbanga eddene kwaleetawo essanyu n'okusuubira mu mikwano gye ne mu b'omu maka ge.
ach_prompt: Inge bedo I buc pi mwaki mapol pi bal ma en pe otimo, lwak gugure me cwake. Gonye ma obedo kakuru pi kare malac okelo yom-cwiny madit tutwal ikin lureme ki luganggi.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka adaun ikar luipu kojera kanu emusago lomam ngesi iswamat, apotu itunga kimorikikinos kanu aigang ngesi. Aponi koinakinai ngesi alacakinio na apak naepol noi, abu koyangau aiyalama keda aiyalama kanejaas ikapaperoke keda lukokaleke.
lgg_prompt: Erini ovuzu arujoa eli karakara erini e'yo onzi erini 'ye kuri ma e'yosi 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu tra yi eri ma ageyia atita fezu. E'yo 'bani eri ofuzu sawa ezu ri fe ayiko tualu asi 'baza be 'ba eri ma agyipi azini familia 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi omu kihome ahabw'ekihagaro eki yaabaire atakozire, abantu baketeerana kumushagika. Okurekurwa kwe okwabaire kurindirwe kumara obwire buraingwa, kikareetaho okushemererwa n'okushemererwa omu banywani be hamwe n'ab'omuka ye.

eng_prompt: As news spread quickly through the community, excitement filled the air with anticipation of his return. Friends and neighbors gathered, eager to welcome him back after his long absence.
lug_prompt: Amawulire bwe gaasaasaana mangu mu kitundu, essanyu lyajjula mu bbanga olw'okusuubira okudda kwe. Mikwano ne baliraanwa baakuŋŋaanye, nga beesunga okwaniriza okukomawo kwe oluvannyuma lw'obutabaawo okumala ebbanga eddene.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lok angea ne onya oyot I kin lwak, yom-cwiny opong I kom dwogone. Lurem ki jirani gugure, ma cwinygi obedo yom me jolo en I nge kare malac ma en pe obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Neakerianar akiro katipet kotoma atutubet, apotu aiyalama kilelebunos keda aiyalama naarai abongununei ngesi. Apotu ipaperoke keda idunyetake kitukokinos, ekotosi aijaun ngesi akaulo naka apak naepol.
lgg_prompt: O'duko ni i erezu mbeleru ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, ayiko ga angu eyi ma alea eyini ani egazu eri ma emvizu ri si. Agyipi azini jo ejele eyi tra eyi, eyini ava be eri ai'zu emvizu sa'wa ezu erini aa'zu ku 'bori ma vutia.
nyn_prompt: Amahurire g'okugaruka kwe kukakurakurataho omu bantu, okushemererwa kweyongyeire omu bantu. Banywani n'abaturanyi baketeeranira hamwe, baine ekihika ky'okumuramutsya bwanyima y'obwire buraingwa atakibaho.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing crisis and the need for social distancing, the president addressed the nation with a heartfelt message. He emphasized the importance of faith and unity during these challenging times.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu obuliwo n'obwetaavu bw'okwewa amabanga, pulezidenti yayogeddeko eri eggwanga n'obubaka obuva ku mutima. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okukkiriza n'obumu mu biseera bino ebizibu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko matye kawot anyim ki miti me bedo mabor ki dano mukene, ladit lobo oloko ki lwak I lok ma oa ki I cwinygi. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa bedo ki niye kacel ki ribe ikare me peko eni.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis na elosi akonye keda eipud loka alaikina, abu lokapolon akwap kiner keda akwap keda akirot naepol noi. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aiyuun keda aimorikikina kotoma apakio kanu nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru mupi drile azini lezu 'ba eyi ma esele cozu eyi ma eselea risi, prisdent nze e'yo kari 'di ma alea o'duko engapi asi driasi. Eri fe okpo orodri aita ni azini ti ecita ni 'diyi ma dria sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi oburikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okwetantara abandi, omwebembezi weihanga akagambira eihanga obutumwa kuruga aha mutima. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okwikiriza n'okukwatanisa omu bwire obu obw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: As the number of COVID-19 cases continued to rise in the community, health officials held a press conference to address the growing concerns. They emphasized the importance of taking precautions to protect public health.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongera okulinnya mu kitundu, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baatuuza olukungaana lwa bannamawulire okwogera ku kweraliikirira okweyongera. Baassa essira ku bukulu bw'okwegendereza okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano matye ki two korona tye ka medde, lutic me yot kom gubedo ki kacoke pa lucoo lok angeya me lok I kom peko matye kamede. Guwaco ni pire tek tutwal me gwoko yotkom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19 kotoma atutubet, apotu eswamak luka angaleu kiswamata einer keda lu iyemuto kanu aitemitem akiro nuepolok. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ajokis naka aitikitik angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ni mu drile tuzu ongulumu eyi ma alea risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ye e'yo nze 'ba osisia ni 'diyi pie e'yo 'da ma aza kozu. Eyi fe okpo orodri 'bani e'yo ndundu eyi 'yezu o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma tambazu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ku gwagumire nigweyongyera omu bantu, abakuru omu by'amagara bakakora orukiiko rw'abanyamakuru kugamba aha nshonga ezirikweyongyera. Bakashoboorora omugasho gw'okwerinda, okurinda amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: As tensions rose in the city due to ongoing protests, authorities imposed a strict curfew to maintain order. Despite the warnings, many individuals found themselves on the streets, unaware of the severe consequences that awaited them.

nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'amaizi oburikugyenda omu maisho omu byaro,gavumenti ekakora orukiiko rw'amaani okureeba ngu amaizi marungi gabaho. N'ekyarugiremu, abeebembezi ba disiturikiti, bakaragiirwa kugarura busya naikondo omu byaro byabo.

eng_prompt: To protect yourself and others during an outbreak, it's essential to adopt effective hygiene practices. One of the most important measures you can take is to ensure your hands are clean.
lug_prompt: Okwekuuma n'okwekuuma abalala mu kiseera ky'okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde, kikulu nnyo okugoberera enkola ennungi ey'obuyonjo. Ekimu ku bintu ebisinga obukulu by'oyinza okukola kwe kulaba ng'emikono gyo giyonjo.
ach_prompt: Me gwokke keni ki jo mukene ikare me poto pa two, pire tek tutwal me lubu yoo me gwoko lengo. Gin acel ma pire tek ma itwero timone aye me neno ni cingi leng.
teo_prompt: Kanu ayuarite akonikuan keda luce kotoma apakio nu abwangunor adekasinei, ejokuna noi aidar aila. Adiopet koboro lu epol ajokis lu ipedori ijo aswam ngesi awanyun ebe elai akanin kon.
lgg_prompt: Mi ma ta mbazu mi ma ngulupi ma ta mbazu azini 'ba azi 'diyi pie sa'wa azo efupi 'diyinirisi, eri orodriru e'yo alata ni 'diyi 'duzu. E'yo azi okporu mini eco 'ye ri eri kini mi dri yi alaru.
nyn_prompt: Okwerinda n'okwerinda abandi omu bwire bw'okubarukaho kw'endwara, n'eky'omugasho okukuratira engyenderwaho nungi y'eby'obuyonjo. Kimwe aha bintu by'omugasho ebi orikubaasa kukora, n'okureeba ngu engaro zaawe nizejunda.

eng_prompt: After months of community meetings and concerns about water shortages, the local government finally addressed the issue. In response to the growing demand, the district engineer promised the availability of water in all areas by next year.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'enkiiko z'ekitundu n'okweraliikirira ku bbula ly'amazzi, gavumenti y'ebitundu yasembye okutereeza ensonga. Mu kwanukula obwetaavu bw'amazzi obweyongera, yinginiya wa disitulikiti yasuubiza nti amazzi gajja kubaawo mu bitundu byonna omwaka ogujja we gunaatuukira.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me kacokke pa lwak ki lworo pi peko me nok pa pii, gamente me tedero dong otyeko cobo peko ne. Pi miti me pii matye kamede, engineer me district ocikke me bedo ki pii I kabedo weng I mwaka manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio luka airiamununeta nuka itunga keda aiyalongongo kanu aikidiokus na akipi, abu apugan naka atutubet kopedo aitemokin akirot ngin. Kanu aiyatakin eipuda lo akipi, abu eijinia lo edisitrikt isumun ebe ebuni akipi ajaut aiboisio kere okaru ngol.
lgg_prompt: Mba dri fuza ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma vutia tualu asi otiza eyi ma dria e'yo yi ako niri ma dria, gamete angu ndundu eyini 'diyi asizu e'yo nde ma aza ko ra. E'yo 'bani lezu yi ma omgbo tuzu ri ma aza kozu, inginiya distrikiti niri owi i yi ma esuta angu dria eyi ma alea eli drusirisi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi mingi y'orukiiko rw'abantu hamwe n'okwerarikirira ahabw'eibura ry'amaizi, gavumenti y'ekyaro ekaheza kukora aha nshonga egyo. Ahabw'obwetaavu bw'amaizi obweyongyeire, inginiya wa disiturikiti akaraganisa ngu amaizi nigaija kubaho omu myanya yoona omwaka ogurikwija gutakahikire.

eng_prompt: As the number of COVID-19 cases surged globally, governments began implementing strict measures to protect public health. In response to the escalating crisis, officials convened to discuss the best course of action for the nation.
lug_prompt: Ng'omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gweyongera mu nsi yonna, gavumenti zaatandika okussa mu nkola enkola enkakali okukuuma obulamu bw'abantu. Olw'obuzibu obweyongera, abakungu baatuula okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri esingayo obulungi eggwanga gye lirinaakolebwamu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma wel dano matye ki two korona omedde I wilobo lung, gamente gucako keto cik matek me gwoko yot kom pa lwak. Macalo adwogi me peko matye kamede, lutic gubedo kacoke me nywako tam i kom ngo ma omyero otimme pi lobo man.
teo_prompt: Neyatakinor enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19 kotoma akwap kere, apotu apuganisinei kogeutu aitegear ikisila luikidioko kanu ayuarite angaleu naka itunga. Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu iyata, apotu eswamak iriamunos kanu aitemitem nu ebeit aswam kanuka akwap.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ni tuzu wudrikurusi ndulu risi, gamete eyi e'do e'yo okporu 'diyi 'ye o'bi eyi ma rua ala ma tambazu. E'yo ewaru ma omgbo tupi 'disi, azi'ba eyi tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo muke ndeni kari ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 kukweyongyera omunsi yoona,gavumenti zikatandika kutaho oburyo bw'okurinda amagara g'abantu. Ahabw'oburemeezi obweyongyeire, abakuru bakashutama kuhanuura ekishemereire kukorwa eihanga.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of COVID-19 cases, the Ugandan government implemented strict health measures for foreign nationals. As part of these measures, health officials conducted widespread testing at entry points across the country.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe ogweyongera, gavumenti ya Uganda yassaawo emitendera gy'ebyobulamu egy'amaanyi eri bannansi b'amawanga amalala. Ng'ekimu ku bisaanyizo bino, abakungu b'ebyobulamu baakola okukebera okw'amaanyi ku bifo eby'okuyingira okwetooloola eggwanga.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, gamente me Uganda oketo cik matek me gwoko yot kom pi anywali me lobo ma woko. Macalo yoo acel me timo man, lutic me yot kom gupimo dano mapol I kabedo weng ma dano donyo iye ilobo ni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka itunga luejaasi keda adeka naka COVID-19, abu apugan nako Uganda kitegea ainapeta nuka angaleu mama ejaasi itunga luka akwapin ace. Kwape ediopet koboro kalu, apotu eswamak lu adekis itolosoto ainwakio kotoma aiboisio nu elomunete akwapuwok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma kalafe tupi tutu ri ma e'yosi, gamete Uganda niri 'ba azita okporu e'yo rua ala nisi kari anzi kari amve 'diyi ni 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'diyi ma azi ru, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi 'ye o'bita angu 'bani fizu kari 'di ma alea 'diyi ma alea dria kari 'di ma alea ndulu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'omuhendo gw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 ogweyongyeire, Gavumenti ya Uganda ekataho engyenderwaho y'amaani omu by'amagara g'abanyamahanga. Nk'emwe aha nkora egi, abakuru omu by'amagara bakakora okukyebera kwingi aha myanya y'okutaaha omwihanga okwetoroora eihanga ryona.

eng_prompt: Uganda has long been known for its open-door policy towards those fleeing conflict and persecution. As a result, many individuals seeking safety have found a welcoming haven within its borders.
lug_prompt: Uganda emaze ebbanga ddene nga emanyiddwa olw'enkola yaayo ey'okuggulawo oluggi eri abo abadduka entalo n'okuyigganyizibwa. N'ekivuddemu, abantu bangi abanoonya obukuumi basanze ekifo ekirungi mu nsalo zaayo.
ach_prompt: Lobo Uganda dong oywek pi yub me jolo dano ma gitye ka ngweco lweny ki aunauna. Macalo adwogi ne, dano mapol matye ka yenyo gwok gunongo kabedo maber I wang lobo ne.
teo_prompt: Ejenara noi Uganda kanu ainapeta ke nu engara nejaas ngul lu ekerete kotoma ojie keda aiticanio. Kanuka ngun, itunga luipu lu ekotosi ayuwara adumutu aiboisit na isiyalamikitai kotoma oikoruon ke.
lgg_prompt: Ba ni kari Uganda niri sa'wa ezu e'yo 'bani eri ma ti zizu 'ba eyini apazu e'yo ngiringiri ni azini candi fezu 'diyi vu risi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba karakara angu agei temani ndapi 'diyi esu angu 'bani yi a'izuri yi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Uganda emazire obwire bwingi emanyirwe ahabw'okwikiriza abo abarikuhunga entaro n'okuhiiganisibwa. N'ekyarugiremu, abantu baingi abarikuronda oburinzi, batungire obuhungiro omu nsharo zaayo.

eng_prompt: Uganda's stunning landscapes and rich biodiversity attract many adventurous travelers. However, the allure of its natural beauty often leads some to bypass legal entry procedures.
lug_prompt: Ebifo bya Uganda ebirabika obulungi n'ebiramu eby'enjawulo bisikiriza abatambuze bangi. Newankubadde, okusikiriza kw'obulungi bwayo obw'obutonde butera okuleetera abamu okubuuka emitendera gy'okuyingira mu mateeka.
ach_prompt: Kabedo mamwonya me lobo Uganda kacel ki jami makwo mapat-pat ma tye iye kelo lulim piny mapol. Kadi bed kumeno, leng pa cwec ma orumuwa ipol kare weko jo mukene pe donyo I lobo man malube ki cik.
teo_prompt: Aiboisio nuibusiak noi nuko Uganda keda iboro luegelegela luka ekwam ingalaunete itunga luipu luepedorete alosit aiboisio nuegelegela. Konye, ajokis naka aibuses na akwap einakinit icie itunga mam alomar toma.
lgg_prompt: Angu ndrizaru kari Uganda niri ma alea 'diyi tualu afa nyakuni karakara 'diyi pie 'diyi 'ba acipi angu ndundu eyi onepi 'diyi eji. Kani si, e'yo onyiru angu 'da ma alea ri ni fe 'ba azi eyini fizu geri azita palaa 'diyisi ku.
nyn_prompt: Eby'obuhangwa bwa Uganda ebirikutangaaza hamwe n'obuhangwa bw'ebihangirwe nibireeta abarambuzi baingi. Kwonka, oburungi bw'obuhangwa bwayo, nibureetera abamwe okwetantara emiringo y'okutaaha omu ihanga.

eng_prompt: Health officials have been closely monitoring the outbreak for the past few weeks. Recent testing and reporting have revealed a concerning increase in infections.
lug_prompt: Abakungu b'ebyobulamu babadde balondoola nnyo okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde okumala wiiki ntono eziyise. Okukebera n'okuwa alipoota gye buvuddeko kulaga okweyongera kw'abakwatibwa obulwadde.
ach_prompt: Lutic me yot kom gubedo ka ngiyo kit ma two eni opoto kwede pi cabit ma okato ni. Pimo ki kwed ma otime cokcok-ki onyuto ni wel dano matye ka nongo two tye ka medde tutwal.
teo_prompt: Ewanyunitos eswamak lu adekis abwangun naka adeka ngin kanu isabitin idis lu atuboros. Ainwakio keda aiwadikaeta nuka pac itodunit ebe iyata noi adekasinei.
lgg_prompt: Azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ebi e'yo azo 'da ni e'dozu ri ma pamvu one sabiti agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea. O'bita azini o'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini 'ba azo esupi 'diyi ma kalafe tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ab'ebyamagara batwire nibareebuuza okubarukaho kw'endwara kumara esande nkye ezihweire. Okukyebera n'okuheereza ripoota ebyahweireho, kworeka okweyongyera kw'oburwaire.

eng_prompt: In a recent outbreak within the community, health officials conducted widespread testing among frontline workers. As a result, two health workers tested positive for the virus.
lug_prompt: Mu kubalukawo kw'ekirwadde mu kitundu gyebuvuddeko, abasawo baakola okukebera okw'amaanyi mu bakozi abali ku mwanjo. N'ekyavaamu, abasawo babiri baazuuliddwamu akawuka.
ach_prompt: Ikare me poto pa two ma otimme cokcok-ki I kin lwak, lutic me yot-kom gupimo dano mapol I kin lutic ma gitye ka lweny i kom two corona. Macalo adwogi ne, kipimo lutic yoto kom aryo kinongo ni gitye ki two eni.
teo_prompt: Kotoma abwangun naka adeka naka ekorona kotoma atutubet, apotu eswamak luka angaleu inwakisi itunga luipu noi. Kanuka ngun, aponi inwakunai eswamak lu adekis iarei luejaasi keda ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo efupi o'diru ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma alea, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi o'bi eyi ma rua o'bi eyi ma eselea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba esu azi'ba arojo ni iri yi ma rua azo 'da ci.
nyn_prompt: Omu kubarukaho kw'endwara omu bantu, ab'eby'amagara bakakora okukyebera kw'amaani omu bakozi abarikukora omumaisho. Ekyarugiremu, abashaho babiri bakyebeirwe bashangwa baine akakooko.

eng_prompt: In response to the rising number of infectious disease outbreaks worldwide, there has been an urgent need to enhance the skills of healthcare professionals. To address this challenge, various international organizations have launched initiatives aimed at improving the preparedness of health workers.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'okubalukawo kw'endwadde ezisiigibwa mu nsi yonna, wabaddewo obwetaavu obw'amangu obw'okutumbula obukugu bw'abakugu mu byobulamu. Okukola ku kusoomoozebwa kuno, ebitongole by'ensi yonna eby'enjawulo bitandiseewo enteekateeka ezigendereddwamu okutumbula obwetegefu bw'abasawo.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa two ma kobo ikin lobe mapol, omyero kimed diro pa lutic yoto kom. Me tyeko peko man, dul mapat-pat me wilobo mapat-pat gucako yub mapat-pat ma tye ki miti me yubu yub pa lutic me yot-kom.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka adekasinei nu ikopas kotoma akwap kere, ejai eipud loka aitojokar acoa naka eswamak luka angaleu. Kanu aitemokin ainingosit na, etolomutu iriongeta luegelegela luka akwapin ace nu ekotosi aitojokar akapakina naka eswamak luka angaleu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru kalafe tupi tupi azo eyi erepi 'diyi ma e'dota ma e'yosi, le 'ba ma otu azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma ondua mbeleru. E'yo ewaru 'di ma aza kozu, amuti karakara wudrikurusi 'diyi e'do otuta azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi ma otuta otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okubarukaho kw'endwara ezirikuturira omu nsi yoona, hatwireho ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okwongyera aha myoga y'abakugu omu by'amagara. Okukora ahaburemeezi obu,ebitongore by'ensi yoona bingi bitandikireho enteekateeka ezirikugyenderera okwongyera ahabweteekateeko bw'abashaho.

eng_prompt: In the midst of the ongoing health crisis, the importance of training for frontline workers became increasingly evident. During the meeting, she emphasized the critical need for comprehensive education in safety protocols.
lug_prompt: Wakati mu buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso, omugaso gw'okutendeka abakozi abali ku mwanjo gweyongera okweyoleka. Mu lukungaana, yakkaatirizza obwetaavu bw'okusomesa abantu bonna ku mateeka agakwata ku by'okwerinda.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, ber pa pwonyo lutic ma gitye ka lweny ikare me two omede ki nen atyer kamaleng. Ikare me kacoke en owaco ni omyero ki pwony dano weng i kom kit me gwoko kwo pa dano.
teo_prompt: Kokiding naka ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye, apol ajokis naka aitutuonoro naka eswamak luka engarenok. Kotoma airiamunet, abu ngesi kitogogong eipud loka aisisianakin itunga nuikamunitos ayuwara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile 'diyi ma talasi, orodri imbata fezu 'ba azi nga'ba e'yo rua alanisi okori ma dria ri eca e'da sa'wa driasi. Mitingi 'da ma alea, eri fe okpo e'yo 'bani imbata fezu 'ba dria eyidri e'yo tambaza ni 'diyi ma dria ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahagati y'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburiyo nibugyenda omu maisho, omugasho gw'okutendeka abakozi b'omumaisho gukeeyongyera kureebeka. Omu rukiiko, akasisinkana ekyetengo ky'okwegyesa abantu ebirikukwata ahaby'okwerinda.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve access to healthcare services, the government has announced new initiatives to support health workers. One of the key measures includes providing free transport to health centres.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula okufuna obujjanjabi, gavumenti erangiridde enteekateeka empya okuyamba abasawo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu ebijja okukolebwa kwe kuwa abantu entambula ey'obwereere okugenda mu malwaliro.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me nongo kony me yot kom, gamente otito yub manyen me konyo lutic yoto kom. Yub acel ma pire tek obedo miyo kony me wot me nono I odi yadi.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitam aitojokar adumunun amukian, elimorit apugan iboro luitetiak lu igangit eswamak lu adekis. Adiopet koboro luapolok imoriaritos aijaikin alosit na atitai adekisia.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma esuta ma omgbo otuzu, gamete azi e'yo o'diru 'diyi atita fezu azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi dri. E'yo azi okporu 'diyi ma azi eri geri acizu arojo eyi ma alea pirini ri fezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura obuheereza bw'eby'amagara,gavumenti erangirire enteekateeka nsya y'okuhwera abashaho. Kimwe aha bintu ebikuru ebirikubaasa kukorwa, n'okuheereza eby'engyenda bya busha omu marwariro.

eng_prompt: As the world grappled with the challenges of the pandemic, many essential workers stepped into the spotlight. However, behind the scenes, laboratory assistants played a crucial role in supporting research and testing efforts.
lug_prompt: Ng'ensi erwanagana n'okusoomoozebwa kw'ekirwadde bbunansi, abakozi bangi ab'omugaso baayimiridde mu ssanyu. Newankubadde, emabega w'empenda, abayambi ba laabu baakola omulimu omukulu mu kuwagira okunoonyereza n'okukebera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lobo ne tye ka lweny ki peko ma poto pa gemo ni, lutic mapigi tego mapol gubino I wang lwak. Kadi bed kumeno, lupwonye me ot pim gutiyo tic mapire tek tutwal me cwako tic me kwed ki pimo.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina akwap keda atiokisio nuka adeka naka ekorona, apotu eswamak luipu kopotu toma aijen. Konye, kokiding aiboisio, apotu eswamak luka aiboisit nainwakere iswamata aswam naepol noi kanu aigang aingic keda ainwakio.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru ni dri ciria e'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri be, 'ba karakara azi nga'ba orodriru 'diyi e'da e'yo yi ma dria. Kani si, 'ba azakoma fepi pari azo o'bizuri ma alia 'diyi nga azi okporu atita fezu e'yo vuti ondaza ni azini e'yo o'bizuri ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Obu ensi yoona yaabaire neetwara oburemeezi bw'endwara ruranda nsi, abakozi b'omugasho baingi bakarebeka. Kwonka, enyima y'ebishushani, abahwezi ba labaratore bakakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kushagika okucondooza n'okukyebera.

eng_prompt: As the outbreak of the virus continues to spread, it is crucial for health workers to be equipped with the latest information. Proper training and resources are essential for effective response and management of the situation.
lug_prompt: Ng'okubalukawo kw'akawuka kugenda mu maaso n'okusaasaana, kikulu nnyo abasawo okufuna obubaka obusembyeyo. Okutendekebwa okutuufu n'ebikozesebwa bikulu nnyo okusobola okukola obulungi n'okuddukanya embeera.
