ach_prompt: Kit ma two korona tye ka nya kwede, pire tek tutwal pi lutic yoto kom me bedo ki ngec manyen. Pwonye ki jami tic mabeco pigi tego tutwal pi tic maber ki doro peko eni.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit abwangun naka ekorona aisiarakin, ejokuna noi eswamak luka angaleu ajaut keda akiro nuitetiak. Aituutoonor ka iboro lu itwasamao ejok eraas lu epolok noi kanu aitemokin ka aitikitik ejautene.
lgg_prompt: E'yo azo korona niri ma ereta ni mu drile i erezu, eri orodriru azi'ba arojo ni 'diyini o'dukoti o'diru 'diyi esuzu. Imbata kililiru azini afa ayuzaru 'diyi orodriru e'yo nde ma aza kozu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'akakooko kurikweyongyera kujanjaara, n'eky'omugasho aha bashaho kumanya ebirikugyenda omu maisho. Okutendeka kurungi hamwe n'ebintu ebirikwetengwa, n'eby'omugasho omu kukora kurungi n'okureeberera embeera.

eng_prompt: Due to their constant presence in patient care areas, hospital staff face heightened risks. Among them, hospital cleaners are more exposed to the virus.
lug_prompt: Olw'okubeera mu bifo awajjanjabirwa abalwadde buli kiseera, abakozi b'amalwaliro boolekaganye n'obulabe obw'amaanyi. Mu bo, abayonjo mu malwaliro be basinga okukwatibwa akawuka.
ach_prompt: Pi bedo tye pa lutic me ot yat ikare weng I kabedo me gwoko lutwo, gi nongo peko mapol tutwal. I kingi, lutic me ot yat ma gwoko lengo aye gi nongo two eni.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ajaut kec aiboisio nu idarere adekak, etereikina eswamak lu adekis keda atiokisio nuipu. Kanejaas kesi, eswamak lu elai adekisia kes epatana adumun adeka.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eyini aa'zu sa'wa driasi angu 'ba azoru 'diyi ma tambazu 'diyi ma alea risi, azi'ba arojo ni 'diyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu sa'wa driasi. Eyi ma eselea, 'ba arojo eyi ma alea angu inipiri ma alea 'diyi azo 'da esu ewakokoru ndeni.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okuguma bari omu myanya y'okureebereramu abarwaire, abakozi b'amarwariro nibatunga akabi kahango. Omuri bo, ab'eby'obuyonjo omu marwariro nibo barikukira kukwatwa akakooko.

eng_prompt: Regular check-ups during pregnancy are essential for monitoring the health of both the mother and the baby. These visits provide valuable information and support throughout the pregnancy journey.
lug_prompt: Okukeberebwa buli kaseera ng'oli lubuto kikulu nnyo mu kulondoola obulamu bwa maama n'omwana. Okulambula kuno kuwa obubaka obw'omugaso n'obuyambi mu lugendo lwonna olw'olubuto.
ach_prompt: Pimme kare ki kare ikare me yacu pire tek tutwal me neno yotkom pa mego ki latin. Limo magi miyo ngec ki kony ma pire tek tutwal ikare me yacu.
teo_prompt: Aanyanar angaleu na apotu erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aanyanar angaleu naka toto keda ikoku. Einanakini aipejonokin ngin akiro nuepolok ka agangat kotoma apak naka apotu.
lgg_prompt: Ba ma andri eyi ma rua sa'wa driasi sa'wa okporovu nirisi ri eri orodriru e'yo rua ala ayia eyini azini odekua eyini ri ma pamvu onezu. Omuru 'diyi o'dukoti orodriru azini atita fe aci okporovururi ma alia dria.
nyn_prompt: Okukyeberwa buri kaire omu bwire bw'enda n'eky'omugasho omu kureebuuza amagara g'omukazi n'omwana. Okutayayira oku nikuheereza amakuru ag'omugasho n'obuhwezi omu rugyendo rw'enda yoona.

eng_prompt: As we continue to navigate the challenges posed by the ongoing pandemic, it's crucial to prioritize the health and safety of ourselves and those around us. One effective way to reduce the spread of the virus is by implementing simple preventive measures.
lug_prompt: Nga tweyongerayo okutambuza okusoomoozebwa okwaleetebwa ekirwadde kya ssenyiga omukambwe ekigenda mu maaso, kikulu nnyo okukulembeza obulamu n'obukuumi bwaffe n'abo abatwetoolodde. Engeri emu ennungi ey'okukendeeza ku kusaasaana kw'akawuka kwe kuteeka mu nkola enkola ennyangu ez'okuziyiza.
ach_prompt: Ka wamede ki lweny i kom peko ma two korona okelo, pire tek tutwal me keto pi yotkom ki ber bedo pa wan ki joo ma orumuwa obed gin ma pire tek. Yo acel maber loyo me gengo nya pa two en aye me keto yoo ma yot me gengo ne itic.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinit sio aitodolikin atiokisio nu eyaunit adeka naka ekorona, ejokuna noi aisingarenit angaleu keda ayuwara wok keda itunga lu idunyasi oni. Epone ediopebon loka aitidisiar awea naka ekorona ngesi aitegear iwaitin lu epataka lu itikitikere.
lgg_prompt: Amani mu drile e'yo ewaru azo 'dezaniri ni ejile 'diyi ma ti ojizu, eri orodriru e'yo rua ala ni azini ageitema ni ama ma ngulupi ni azini 'ba ama agei 'diyi pie ri 'duzu okporu. Geri azi okporu 'bani ecozu azo 'da ma ereta ma omgbo esizu ri eri geri azi ewakokoru 'bani ecozu eyi atrizu 'diyi 'duzu.
nyn_prompt: Twagyenda omu maisho n'oburemeezi obureesirwe endwara ruranda nsi erikugyenda omu maisho, n'eky'omugasho kwebembeza amagara n'oburinzi bwaitu n'abo abatwetooroire. Omuringo gumwe murungi gw'okukyendeeza okujanjaara kw'akakooko n'okukoresa oburyo bukye.

eng_prompt: In response to recent feedback about patient care, the hospital administration has prioritized staff development. To enhance the quality of service, the director has taken the initiative to implement comprehensive training programs.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ebyayogerwa gyebuvuddeko ku kulabirira abalwadde, abaddukanya eddwaliro bakulembezza enkulaakulana y'abakozi. Okutumbula omutindo gw'obuweereza, dayirekita ataddewo enteekateeka y'okutendeka abantu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me lok ma okato cokcok-ki I kom gwoko lutwo, ludito me ot yat guketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom dongo pa lutic. Me ilo malo rwom me miyo kony, lador dul enoni oketo yub me pwonye I tic.
teo_prompt: Kanu abongokin akiro nuitodunitos nuka aidar adekak, abu eyaitene lo adekis isingarenit aitopol eswamak. Kanu aikeun adoketait na ejanakine, abu apolon eicolong kiswama nu aitegear ainapeta nu aitutuonoro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo o'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ma e'yosi, driceza arojo niri 'ba asi azi'ba eyi ma ezota ma dria. Azakoma fele o'bi eyidri ri ma omgbo otuzu, dricere 'du e'yo otita imbatani 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugarukwamu ebikwatireine n'okureeberera abarwaire, abarikukurira eirwariro bateire amaani omu kutunguura abakozi. Okutunguura omutindo gw'obuheereza, mukuru w'eishomero ataireho enteekateeka y'okutendeka abantu boona.

eng_prompt: Despite the growing demand for healthcare services in the community, the district task force faced significant budget constraints. As a result, they had to make difficult decisions regarding resource allocation for training programs.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'obwetaavu bw'obujjanjabi bweyongedde mu kitundu, akakiiko ka disitulikiti akadduukirize kaayolekaganye n'obuzibu obw'amaanyi mu mbalirira. N'ekyavaamu, baalina okusalawo mu ngeri enzibu ku bikwata ku kugaba ebyetaago mu pulogulaamu z'okutendeka.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni miti me kony me yot kom tye kamede, dul ma doro lok kom yoto kom I district onongo peko me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, omyero gumok tam matek I kom yub me pwonyo dano.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata eipud loka amukian kotoma atutubet, apotu atukot naka itunga luingaranakinete luce kodisitrikt odumutu ationis naepol noi naka ebajet. Kanuka ngun, apotu kesi kiswamata aseununeta nuetioko nuikamunitos aitwasam iboro lu itutuonorere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani lezu azakoma fele e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma omgbo ni tuzu ra ti, amuti e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ondrepi distrikitia 'diyi esu e'yo ewaru robia ayuza ma dria 'diyi ra. E'yo 'disi, le yi ma 'du e'yo kongolokoru e'yo lonyi 'bani fele otita imbatani 'diyiniri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okweyongyera kw'ebyetengo by'obuheereza bw'eby'amagara omu bantu,akakiiko ka disiturikiti kakabona oburemeezi bwingi omu mbaririra. N'ekyarugiremu, bakaba baine kukora encwamu egumire aha bikwatiraine n'okugaba ebintu by'okutendeka abantu.

eng_prompt: A massive blaze erupted in the heart of the community late last night, engulfing several residential buildings in flames. Emergency services worked tirelessly to contain the fire, but the damage was extensive.
lug_prompt: Omuliro ogw'amaanyi gwabalukawo mu kitundu ekikeesezza olwaleero, ne gukwata ebizimbe by'abatuuze ebiwerako mu muliro. Ab'eby'amangu baakola butaweera okukkakkanya omuliro, naye ebyayonoonebwa byali bingi.
ach_prompt: Mac omako odi mapol tutwal I dyewor mukato. Lutic me nongo kony oyot oyot gutiyo matek tutwal me gengo mac ne, ento bale ne obedo dwong tutwal.
teo_prompt: Abu akim naepol noi kogeu aibiror kotoma atutubet kangin kware, ido abu komudia itogoi luipu noi. Apotu lu engeso iswamata agogongu kanu aitikitik akim, konye apol noi amunar.
lgg_prompt: Aci okporu ni e'do angu 'da ma alea ini ajerisi, erini jo karakara aku eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea vezu. Ba azakoma mbeleru 'diyi nga azi okposi aci nde ma aza kozu, te e'yo ezaza ni 'diyi ndra angiri.
nyn_prompt: Omuriro gw'amaani gukacwekyereza abantu nyekiro, gwatwara ebyombeko by'obutuuro bingi omu muriro. Ab'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru bakakora n'amaani okurwanisa omuriro, kwonka ebyasisikaire bikaba biri bingi.

eng_prompt: As global travel continues to increase and urban populations grow, health experts are increasingly concerned about potential outbreaks. The interconnectedness of our world makes it easier for pathogens to move rapidly from one region to another.
lug_prompt: Ng'entambula y'ensi yonna yeeyongera n'omuwendo gw'abantu mu bibuga gweyongera, abakugu mu byobulamu beeyongera okweraliikirira okubalukawo kw'ekirwadde. Enkolagana y'ensi yaffe eyanguyira endwadde okutambula amangu okuva mu kitundu ekimu okudda mu kirala.
ach_prompt: Kit ma wot me wilobo tye kamede ki dongo ki wel dano matye I boma madongo, ludiro me yot kom tye ka bedo ki lworo I kom poto pa two. Kube matye ikin lobo wa weko bedo yot ki kwidi ma kelo two me aa ki I kabedo acel me cito I kabedo mukene.
teo_prompt: Kwape inyikokinitos alosit naka akwap kere aiyatakin keda enaaba loka itunga luejaasi otaunin, iyalongongosi ipiriotin luka angaleu nuikamunitos abwangun na adekasinei. Aimorikikina naka akwap wok einakinit adekasinei alosit katipet anyoun kotoma aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Acita wudrikurusiri ni mu drile tualu kalafe 'ba eyini aa'zu aku ambo eyi ma alea ri pie ri pie, 'ba onita be e'yo rua ala nisi 'diyi asi otiza be e'yo ewaru ecopi e'dozu 'diyi ma dria. Wudrikuru amavileri ma ti ecizuri ni fe eri ewakokoru azo 'diyi ni acizu mbeleru engazu angu alu ma alia cazu azini ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Okutambura kw'ensi yoona nikweyongyera kandi n'omuhendo gw'abantu omu ndembo nigweyongyera, abakugu omu by'amagara beeyongyeire kwerarikirira okubarukaho kw'endwara. Enkoragana y'ensi yaitu neehwera oburwaire kutambura kurungi kuruga omu kicweka kimwe kuza omu kindi.

eng_prompt: As the clock struck twelve, a faint glow flickered in the distance. Suddenly, the peaceful night was shattered by the crackling sound of flames.
lug_prompt: Essaawa bwe yakubye kkumi na bbiri, omusana omutono gwaka mu bbanga. Amangu ago, ekiro eky'emirembe kyataataaganyizibwa eddoboozi ly'omuliro.
ach_prompt: Ikare ma cawa ocako oo apar wiye aryo, mac mo matidi obedo ka ryeny I bor piny. Cutcut, mac ma obedo ka lyel matek tutwal obalo dyewor ma onongo piny opye mot tutwal-li.
teo_prompt: Neautar esawa ainom isawan itomonaarei, abu akimian kibiror kokinga. Apotu akim naka akim kibiroros kware nainapakina.
lgg_prompt: Sawa ni suzu sawa mudri drini irisi, aci werea ni e'da angu zoza ma alia. E'deta aci ni 'diyi eza ini asianzuru 'da te.
nyn_prompt: Eshaaha kuyabaire eteera shaaha ikumi na ibiri, omushana mukye gukaba nigwaka omubwire. Ahonaaho, ekiro ky'obusingye kikashishwa orwari rw'omuriro.

eng_prompt: Recent incidents of fire at various educational institutions have raised significant concerns among parents and administrators. Investigations into these alarming events are currently underway, but no definitive conclusions have been reached.
lug_prompt: Eby'omuliro ebibaddewo mu matendekero g'ebyenjigiriza ag'enjawulo gye buvuddeko bireeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi mu bazadde n'abakulira amasomero. Okunoonyereza ku bino ebyewuunyisa mu kiseera kino kugenda mu maaso, naye tewali kukomekkereza kwa nkomeredde kutuukiddwako.
ach_prompt: Mac ma obedo ka mako gangi kwan mapatpat cokcok-ki okelo lworo madit tutwal ikin lunyodo ki ludito gang kwan. Kwed I kom jami magi matye katimme kombedi tye kawot anyim, ento pwod pe kicobo miti ne.
teo_prompt: Akimian nuapotu kiswamaunos kotoma osomeroi luegelegela eyangautu aiyalongong kanejaas auriak keda eyaitok. Angicak nuikamunitos akiro nuarokok nuiswamasi kes elosi akonye, konye emamei nuitolomunitai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aci eyini eyi 'yepi sukulu karakara eyi ma alea o'diru 'diyi eji asi otiza angiri tipika eyi ma eselea drice'ba eyi pie. E'yo vuti ondaza e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma dria 'diyi curu'do mu drile, te 'ba esuni nga e'yo azi e'yo ada ma dria ni ku.
nyn_prompt: Okubarukaho kw'omuriro omu matendekyero gatari gamwe, kireesireho okwerarikirira kw'amaani omu bazaire n'abebembezi b'amashomero. Okucondooza ebyabaireho obwahati kuriyo nikugyenda omu maisho, kwonka tihaine ekirikubaasikaho.

eng_prompt: In recent years, there has been a surge in construction projects across Uganda. However, many of these developments have raised concerns about the standards of materials and workmanship used.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, wabaddewo okweyongera mu pulojekiti z'okuzimba okwetoloola Uganda. Newankubadde, bingi ku bino ebikoleddwa bireeseewo okweraliikirira ku mutindo gw'ebikozesebwa n'emirimu egyakolebwa.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, yub me gedo omede tutwal I lobo Uganda. Kadi bed kumeno, pol pa dongo lobo magi okelo lworo I kom rwom me jami ki tic ma kitiyo kwede.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, epuakata ipurojektin lu aduko ko Uganda kere. Konye, apolou na nuipu ayangau aiyalongong kanu adoketait na iboro ka aswam na itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, otita afa sizu 'diyi ma omgbo tu kari Uganda niri ma alea ndulu. Kani si, e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma pari eji asi otiza e'yo wura afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma dria azini geri 'bani azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, hariho okweyongyera kwa purogyekiti z'okwombeka omu Uganda yoona. Kwonka, bingi ahari ebyo ebikozirwe bireesire okwerarikirira aha mutindo gw'ebintu n'omuringo gw'okukoresa.

eng_prompt: In rural areas, traditional architecture often features thatched roofs, which are popular for their aesthetic appeal and insulation properties. However, this design poses significant fire risks, especially in densely populated regions.
lug_prompt: Mu byalo, ebizimbe by'obuwangwa bitera okuba n'akasolya k'essubi, nga zino zimanyidwa olw'obulungi bwazo n'engeri zaago ez'okuziyiza. Newankubadde, enkola eno ereetawo obuzibu bw'omuliro naddala mu bitundu ebirimu abantu abangi.
ach_prompt: I kabedo me caro, gedo me tekwaro ipol kare bedo ki wii lum, ma oywek tutwal pi leng meggi ki jami gi me gengo yamo. Kadi bed kumeno, yub man kelo peko madit tutwalle I kabedo ma dano dwong iye.
teo_prompt: Kocaaloi, aduketa nu atekerin etapit ajaut keda atuluru na emudunga, nu ejenara noi kanuka aibusesikec keda aitogogong iboro. Konye, epone lo ejai atiokisio nu akim, kacut aiboisio nu ipu itunga.
lgg_prompt: Angu caluru 'diyi ma alea, afa edele a'bini 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma dria, 'ba ni yi ma dria saaru e'yo onyiru yini 'diyi ma e'yosi azini e'yo yi ma dria 'diyi ma e'yosi. Kani si, otita 'di ni e'yo aci ni 'diyi eji tuni angu 'ba eyini aa'zu 'diyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu myanya y'ebyaro, ebyombeko by'obuhangwa nibikira kuba biine akasolya k'ebishaka, ekirikumanywa munonga ahabw'oburungi bwabyo hamwe n'oburungi bwabyo. Kwonka, enkora egi neetaho akabi kahango k'omuriro, namunonga omu myanya erimu abantu baingi.

eng_prompt: Despite the challenges they face, community officials have been working tirelessly to implement fire prevention measures. It's important to recognize that external factors often contribute to these incidents beyond their control.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga basanga okusoomoozebwa, abakungu b'ekitundu babadde bakola butaweera okussa mu nkola enkola z'okutangira omuliro. Kya mugaso okukimanya nti ensonga ez'ebweru zitera okuleetawo ebintu bino bye batasobola kukola.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gitye ka nongo peko mapol, lutic me tedero gubedo ka tic matek me keto yub me gengo mac itic. Pire tek tutwal me niang ni jami ma aa ki woko ipol kare kelo peko magi ma pe gitwero gengo ne.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaas atiokisio, iswamaete eswamak lu atutubet agogongu kanu aitegear iwaitin lu itikitikere akim. Erai ibore yenepol noi ajenun ebe iboro lu okinga kes eyangaunenete atiokisio nu mam kesi epedoritos aitikitik.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru yini esu 'diyi ma talasi, azi'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi ebi azi nga okpo kokoru geri aci atrizu 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alea. Eri orodriru nizu kini e'yo engazu amve 'diyi tutuni e'yo yi 'yepi yi ma dria ku 'diyi eji indi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho oburemeezi obubarikushanga, abakuru omu byaro batwire nibakora n'amaani okuta omuriro omu nkora. N'eky'omugasho kumanya ngu enshonga z'aheeru nizikira kureetaho oburemeezi obu, obutarikubaasa.

eng_prompt: In times of challenge, we have come together to support one another. Our shared values and goals have fostered a strong sense of belonging.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'okusoomoozebwa, tuzze wamu okuwagiragana. Emitindo gyaffe egy'awamu n'ebiruubirirwa bitumbudde enneewulira ey'amaanyi ey'okubeera awamu.
ach_prompt: I kare me peko, waribe kacel me konyo luwotwa. Jami ma pigi tego ma watye kwede kacel ki miti ma watye kwede weko wawinyo ni watye kacel.
teo_prompt: Kotoma apakio nuetioko, imorikikinos oni aigangakin yenice. Iwaitin keda apeleikinatawok lu aimorikikina kes eyaunitos aimorikikina naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa ewaru 'diyisi, ama emu tualu ama atizu ama eselea. Ama vile e'yo orodriru tualu asi 'baza be 'diyi fe amani aa'zu 'ba azi 'diyi ma eselea okporu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, tukwatanisa kuhwerana. Emitwarize yaitu hamwe n'ebigyendererwa byaitu bitwire nibitureetera kwehurira gye.

eng_prompt: As the harsh winter approaches, many are struggling to make ends meet. It is crucial to address the essential requirements for survival during this challenging time.
lug_prompt: Ng'obutiti obukambwe busembera, bangi bafuba okweyimirizaawo. Kikulu nnyo okukola ku byetaago by'obulamu mu kaseera kano akazibu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma kare me koyo matek tye ka bino, dano mapol tye ka yele me nongo jami ma mite pi kwo gi. Pire tek tutwal me timo jami ma mite pi kwo I kare man me peko.
teo_prompt: Neyapiete akwap naetiono noi, eutasi itunga luipu ainingosit adumun ikapunukec. Erai ibore yenepol noi aitemokin atiokisio nu aijar kotoma apakio kanu nuetioko.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ambizaruri ni ecaria, 'ba karakara eyi e'yo esu afa eyini aa'zu 'diyi esuzu. Eri orodriru e'yo 'ba eyini le aa'zu edriru sa'wa ewaru 'di ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Obu obwire bw'obutiti burikweyongyera, abantu baingi nibarwana kwebaisaho. N'eky'omugasho munonga okukora aha byetaago by'abantu omu bwire obu obw'oburemeezi.

eng_prompt: In response to the recent natural disaster that devastated the region, local officials have been working tirelessly to provide assistance. As part of their relief efforts, the government has donated iron sheets to the affected people.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutyabaga obw'obutonde obwaliwo mu kitundu gye buvuddeko awo, abakungu b'ekitundu babadde bakola butaweera okuwa obuyambi. Ng'omu ku mirimu gyabwe egy'obuyambi, gavumenti egabidde abantu abaakosebwa amabaati.
ach_prompt: I kare ma peko ma poto atura obalo kabedo man cokcok-ki, lutic me tedero gubedo ka tic matek me miyo kony. Macalo but yub gi me miyo kony, gamente omiyo bati bot dano ma onongo peko.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin atiokisio nuka edeke nuapotu omunasi aiboisit, eutasi eswamak luka atutubet aswam agogongu kanu aijaikin agangat. Kwape ediope kotoma agangat kec, abu apugan ijaik abaatin mama ejaasi itunga luetirorit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ebi azi nga okpo kokoru azakoma fezu. Okpo eyini 'ba 'diyi ma aza kozu ri ma azi ru, gamete fe karatasi eyi 'ba e'yo 'da ma alea 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'ebihikiirizi by'obuhangwa ebyahererukireho omu kyanga, abakuru omu byaro batwire nibakora n'amaani okuheereza obuhwezi. Nk'emwe aha nkora yaabo y'obuhwezi,gavumenti egabiire abantu abaine oburemeezi amabaati.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous appeals for assistance, the community has been left to fend for itself in the aftermath of the devastating blaze. Many residents are growing increasingly frustrated with the lack of response from local officials.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo abantu bangi abasabye obuyambi, abantu mu kitundu kino balekeddwa okweyimirizaawo oluvannyuma lw'omuliro. Abatuuze bangi beeyongedde okunyiiga olw'abakulembeze b'ebyalo obutabaako kye bakola.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni dano mapol gulego pi kony, dano me kabedo eni pud gitye ka gwokke kekengi inge mac ma obalo jami mapol tutwal. Lutedero mapol cwiny gi tye ka cwer tutwal pi tic ma lutic me tedero pe tye ka timone.
teo_prompt: Karaida ilipitos itunga luipu aingarakinio, aponi kojalakinai itunga aijar bon akaulo naka akim naededeng noi. Apotu itunga luipu itakadikisi naarai mam eswamak luka atutubet ingarakinete kes.
lgg_prompt: Erini tro omvezu 'ba karakara eyi ma aza kozu ra ti, 'ba ku ongulumu 'da eyi ma ta mbazu eyi ma ngulupi si aci okporu 'da ma e'yosi. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi ma asi eza e'yo azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyini eyi ma aza kozu kurisi.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okushaba kwingi kw'obuhwezi, abantu b'omukyanga barekirwe kwebaisaho ahanyima y'omuriro. Abatuuragye baingi beeyongyeire kuhwa amaani ahabw'abakozi b'ebyaro obutagarukamu.

eng_prompt: I could see thick smoke rising in the distance, and the sound of sirens filled the air. Everyone in the neighborhood gathered outside, anxiously watching as the flames engulfed the building.
lug_prompt: Nalaba omukka omungi nga guva wala era nga n'amaloboozi ga siringi gajjudde mu bbanga. Buli omu mu kitundu yakungaanidde wabweru ng'atunuulira n'obweraliikirivu ng'omuliro gukutte ekizimbe.
ach_prompt: Onongo atwero neno mac madwong ma aa ki kama bor, ki dwon me siren ma opong ki yamo. Dano ducu ma cok ki gang gugure woko, kun gitye ka neno mac ma tye ka mako ot.
teo_prompt: Apedori eong asesen ekwam loepol noi kotoma apak naelwana, ido apotu isirikaalei kilelebunos kokwam. Itunga kere luka idunyeta apotu kotukokinos kinga, asesenete keda aiyalongong epone loabu akim kibiror aduketait.
lgg_prompt: Ma ndre ndra arosi angiri ni engazu angu re azini o'duko sirenini 'diyi ga angu ma alia tre. Ba dria jo ejele ru 'diyi tra yi amve, yi ndre asi otiza be aci ni jo ma alia ri.
nyn_prompt: Nkabaasa kureeba omwika gw'amaani gurikuruga omu mwanya, n'eiraka ry'eby'okwerinda ryiijwire omumwanya. Buri omwe omu kicweka akakungaana aheeru, arikureeba n'obwegyendesereza omuriro ogwabaire nigukwata ekyombeko.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous complaints from tenants about flickering lights and frequent power outages, the landlord ignored the warnings. Eventually, the neglected issues culminated in a devastating incident.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde abapangisa beemulugunya nnyo ku bitaala ebiyakaayakana n'amasannyalaze agavaako buli kaseera, nnannyini mayumba teyafaayo ku kulabula. Ku nkomerero, ensonga ezaasuulirirwa zaatuuka ku ntikko mu kabenje ak'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lupang ot mapol gukok I kom mac matye ka ryeny ki mac matye ka rweny kare ki kare, rwod ot okwero winyo lok me ciko dano. I agiki ne, lok ma kicayo ni okelo peko madit tutwal.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu angurian kanejaas itunga lu epagisak kanu aica naka akimian keda amamus na akim, abu elope itogoi kipalunit aikwenyar. Kawasia, apotu akiro nu aponi ipalunitai kitodutu ationis naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onuza karakara engazu 'ba angu e'ipiru 'diyi vu e'yo aci aci oseza ni azini aci ako ni 'diyi ma dria ra ti, angu e'ini bile ndu liza 'da ma dria ku. Asizu, e'yo 'bani adile 'diyi eca e'yo onzi ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okwetomboitwa kwingi kuruga omu bapangisa ahabw'ebitaara ebirikubwatuka hamwe n'amashanyarazi kurugaho, mukama w'enju tarahurikiize okurabura. Ekyarugiremu, enshonga ezabaire zitarikufayo, zikarugamu akabi kahango.

eng_prompt: The community was devastated as flames engulfed the area, spreading rapidly and leaving chaos in their wake. Emergency services struggled to contain the blaze, but the damage was already extensive.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kyayonoonebwa ng'omuliro gukutte ekitundu, ne gusaasaana mangu ne gulekawo akavuyo. Ab'eby'amangu baalwana okuziyiza omuliro, naye ebyayonoonebwa byali bingi.
ach_prompt: Lwak ne gunongo peko madit tutwal I kare ma mac omako kabedo ne, ma onya oyot tutwal dok oweko kuku kuku I kabedogi. Joo ma miyo kony pi peko ma opoto atura guyele matek me gengo mac enoni, ento bale ne obedo dwong tutwal.
teo_prompt: Aponi omunarai itunga noi naarai abu akim onyam aiboisit, kosodi aisiarakin atipet kosodi ajalakin amumu. Apotu lu engeso kongetakisi aitikitik akim, konye apol noi amunar naka akim.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da eza eyi saaru aci eyini angu 'da ma alea ri si erini i erezu mbeleru erini ani ngiringiri kuzu eyi ma vutia. Ba azakoma e'yo mbeleru 'diyi ma alea 'diyi o'bi aci nde ma okpo ndezu, te e'yo ezaza ni 'diyi ma omgbo angiri.
nyn_prompt: Abantu bakahwerekyerera ahabwokuba omuriro gukacumbagiza omwanya, gukajanjaara ahonaaho, gwaasigaho akavuyo. Ab'eby'amagara g'ahaiguru bakarwana kurwanisa omuriro, kwonka ebyasisikaire bikaba biri bingi.

eng_prompt: The flames quickly spread through the crowded building, engulfing everything in their path. Panic ensued as people rushed to escape the chaos.
lug_prompt: Omuliro gwasaasaana mangu mu kizimbe ekyali kijjudde abantu ne gwokya buli kimu ekyali mu kkubo lyabwe. Obunkenke bwabalukawo ng'abantu badduka okuva mu kavuyo.
ach_prompt: Mac ne okobo oyot-oyot tutwal I ot ma opong ki dano, ka omako jami weng matye I yo meggi. Lworo omako dano mapol tutwal I kare ma gubedo ka ngwec me lwi ki I kuku kuku ma obedo tye.
teo_prompt: Abu akim isiarakin katipet kotoma aduketait naejaasi keda itunga luipu noi, kosodi ailik iboro kere luejaasi orot kec. Apotu itunga kokuriaka noi naarai apotu kesi kokerata anyoun kotoma amumu kangin.
lgg_prompt: Aci aci 'da ere i jo 'da ma alea mbeleru, erini afa dria eyini esu 'diyi okizu. Ori eca 'ba eyi ma eselea 'ba eyini arizu apazu e'yo ngiringiri ni 'da ma alea risi.
nyn_prompt: Omuriro gukajanjaara juba omu kyombeko ekyabaire kirimu abantu baingi, gwatwara buri kimwe ekyabaire kiri omu muhanda gwazo. Hakabaho okwerarikirira ahabwokuba abantu bakahunga akavuyo.

eng_prompt: As the flames engulfed the building, the frantic cries of the residents echoed in the background. With time running out, the firefighters' team rushed inside, determined to salvage anything they could.
lug_prompt: Omuliro bwe gwakutte ekizimbe, enduulu z'abatuuze zaawuluguma emabega. Ekiseera bwe kyagenda kiggwaako, abazinya mwoto baddukira munda nga bamalirivu okutaasa buli kimu kye basobola.
ach_prompt: I kare ma mac omako ot ne, koko pa lutedero obedo ka winyo I ngeye. I kare ma cawa tye ka rweny, joo ma lwenyo mac gudonyo iot, ma gumoko tamgi me laro gin mo keken ma gitwero.
teo_prompt: Nealomunia akim aduketait ngin, apotu aimony naka itunga kopuputu kau. Neatwania apak, apotu itunga lu etwakete akim koloto toma, lu ekapakina alakun iboro kere lu apedorete kesi.
lgg_prompt: Aci ma aci ni jo 'da ma alea risi, o'duko 'ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyiniri e'da angu 'da ma vutia. Sawa ni i deria, 'ba aci anyupi 'diyi ari yi ma alia asi 'baza be afa dria yini eco 'diyi opazu.
nyn_prompt: Omuriro ku gwatandikire kuturira ekyombeko, okurira kw'abatuuragye kukareetwa enyima. Obwire ku bwabaire nibuhwaho, abarikurwanisa omuriro bakahunga omunda, bamazireyo kucungura ekintu kyona ekyabaire nikibaasika.

eng_prompt: In light of recent safety concerns, the landlord held a meeting to discuss electrical issues in the building. He emphasized the importance of hiring qualified professionals for any electrical work.
lug_prompt: Olw'eby'okwerinda ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko, nannyini mayumba yatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku nsonga z'amasannyalaze mu kizimbe. Yakikkaatirizza obukulu bw'okuyingiza abakugu mu mirimu gy'amasannyalaze.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me gwoko kuc ma obedo tye cokcok-ki, won gang obedo ki kacoke me nywako lok kom mac I ot ne. En oketo cwinye tutwal I kom ber pa coyo ludiro matye ki ngec ma mite pi tic mac mo keken.
teo_prompt: Katupitos nuikamunitos ayuara napac, abu elope itogoi kijaik airiamun kanu aitemitem akiro nuka akim kotogo kangol. Abu ngesi kitogogong ajokis naka aitac ipirioitin lu itutuoritai kanu aswam naka akim.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo ageitema ni 'diyi ma dria, angu e'i 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo aci ni jo 'da ma alea 'diyi ma dria. Eri fe okpo orodri 'bani 'ba onita be 'diyi sizu azi dria aci oseza ni 'diyi ngazu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'enshonga z'eby'okwerinda ezabaireho juba, mukama w'enju akakora orukiiko rw'okuhanuura aha nshonga z'amashanyarazi omu kyombeko. Akashoboorora omugasho gw'okutunga abakugu omu mirimo y'amashanyarazi.

eng_prompt: When the flames erupted from the old shed, panic spread through the quiet neighborhood. Without hesitation, his neighbours sprang into action, grabbing hoses and buckets to combat the growing inferno.
lug_prompt: Omuliro bwe gwabalukawo okuva mu kiyumba ekikadde, obunkenke bwasaasaana mu kitundu ekyali kisirifu. Awatali kulonzalonza, baliraanwa be baabuuka mu bikolwa, nebakwata obuyumba n'ebibbo okukomya omuliro ogwali gugenda gweyongera.
ach_prompt: I kare ma mac ocako lyel ki I ot macon, lworo omako dano ma I kabedo ne. Labongo lworo, jirani ne gucako tic, gumako gangi ki baket me lweny i kom mac matye kamede.
teo_prompt: Neabwangunor akim kotogo loemojongit, apotu itunga luka atutubet kokuriaka. Amamei aiyalongong, apotu idunyetake kolomutu toma aswamisioit, apotu ikamasi itogoi keda abakets kanu aitikitik akim naepol noi.
lgg_prompt: Aci ni e'dozu engazu jo oku 'da ma alea risi, ori ere angu jo ejele ru 'diyi ma alea dria. E'yo kokoru, jo ejele eri vile 'diyi e'do e'yo 'ye ra, yi o'duko azini baketi yi 'du e'yo acini tupi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Omuriro ku gwatandikire kuruga omu kishengye ekikuru, obwimukiriro bukajanjaara omu myanya y'okutuuramu. Hatariho okwerarikirira, bataahi be bakaza omu nkora, bakakwata enju n'ebikondo kurwanisa omuriro gw'omuriro ogwabaire nigweyongyera.

eng_prompt: In response to a series of safety incidents involving faulty electrical work, local authorities launched a crackdown on unlicensed contractors. As a result, police have arrested all unauthorized electricians in the community.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula eby'okwerinda ebiwerako ebyetabye mu mirimu gy'amasannyalaze amakyafu, ab'obuyinza mu byalo baatandika okufufuggaza ba kontulakita abatalina layisinsi. N'ekyavaamu, poliisi ekutte abasuubuzi b'amasannyalaze bonna abatalina lukusa mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me gwoko kuc mapol ma obedo I kom mac ma pe tiyo maber, lutela me tedero gucako lweny i kom lutic ma peke ki lancic. Macalo adwogi ne, abili omako lutic mac weng ma pe ki twero I kabedo eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin akiro nuka ayuwara nuikamunitos akim na mam iswamat ejok, apotu apedorosio nuka atutubet kiswamata kagogong mama ejaasi itunga lumam ejaasi keda alasisi. Kanuka ngun, apotu ipolisin ikamasi eswamak lu akim lu mam ecamakitai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo aci ako ni 'diyi ma dria, drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi e'do e'yo 'ba azi ngapi kokobi azi ngazu ri kokoru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo 'disi, polisi obi 'ba dria aci oseza 'yepi kokobi kokoru ongulumu 'da ma alea 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amashanyarazi, ab'obushoborozi b'ebyaro batandikireho omurimo gw'okurwanisa abarikukora emirimo etarikwikirizibwa. N'ekyarugiremu, poriisi ekwasire ab'amashanyarazi abatarikwikirizibwa omu kyanga.

eng_prompt: Local authorities have reported an alarming increase in fire incidents. Residents are growing concerned about the safety of their homes and the effectiveness of fire prevention measures.
lug_prompt: Ab'obuyinza mu byalo baategeezezza nti omuliro gweyongedde mu ngeri eyeeraliikiriza. Abatuuze beeyongera okufaayo ku bukuumi bw'amaka gaabwe n'obwangu bw'enkola z'okutangira omuliro.
ach_prompt: Lutela me tedero guwaco ni peko me mac omede tutwal. Lutedero tye ka paro pi ber bedo pa gangi gi kacel ki diro me gengo mac.
teo_prompt: Apotu apedorosio luka atutubet olimosi ebe iyata noi akim. Eutasi itunga aiyalongong kanu ayuara na ireria kec keda iwaitin lu itikitikere akim.
lgg_prompt: Drice'ba angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi ece kini e'yo aci ni 'diyi ma omgbo tu ra. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea 'diyi curu'do asi otiza be e'yo aku eyini 'diyi ma tambazu ri ma dria tualu geri eyini aci atrizu 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ab'obushoborozi omu byaro bagambire ngu omuriro gweyongyeire munonga. Abatuuragye beeyongyeire kufayo ahaby'okwerinda kw'amaka gaabo hamwe n'omuringo murungi gw'okuzibira omuriro.

eng_prompt: Due to budget constraints and declining revenue, the council had to make difficult decisions regarding funding. As a result, they allocated less money to the city last year.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'embalirira n'okukendeera kw'omusolo, akakiiko kaalina okusalawo mu ngeri enzibu ku nsonga z'ensimbi. N'ekyavaamu, baagabira ekibuga ssente ntono omwaka oguwedde.
ach_prompt: Pi peko me byek lim ki wel lim matye kadok piny, kancil omyero omok tam matek I kom lok me lim. Macalo adwogi ne, gimiyo cente manok bot city imwaka ma okato.
teo_prompt: Kanuka ationis naka ebajet keda aitidisiario naka ikapun, apotu ikansulo kiswamata aseununeta nuetioko nuikamunitos agangat naka ikapun. Kanuka ngun, aponi ijaikinai ikapun idis nejai esite okaru je.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru bajeti ni azini robia ma omgbo esizuri ma e'yosi, kanisulu 'da 'du e'yo ewaru robia ma dria 'diyi. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'ba robia aku ambu city niri dri eli ajerisi were.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'embaririra hamwe n'okukyendeera kw'esente,akakiiko kakaba kaine kukora encwamu egumire ahaby'esente. N'ekyarugiremu, bakataho esente nkye omu rurembo omwaka oguhwaire.

eng_prompt: The community has been facing numerous challenges lately, and many residents have expressed their concerns. In response to these issues, our district leader is so committed to serving the people.
lug_prompt: Ekitundu kibadde kisanga okusoomoozebwa kungi ennaku zino era abatuuze bangi balaze okweraliikirira kwabwe. Mu kwanukula ensonga zino, omukulembeze wa disitulikiti yaffe yeewaddeyo nnyo okuweereza abantu.
ach_prompt: Lwak gubedo ka nongo peko mapol I kare-ni, lutedero mapol gunyutu lworo gi. Ma lubbe ki lok magi, latela me dictrik megwa oketo cwinye me tic pi lwak.
teo_prompt: Etereikina itunga keda atiokisio nuipu apakio nu ido itunga luipu itodunitos aiyalongongokec. Kanu aitemokin akiro nu, ekapakina engarenon lo edisitriktakosi aijanakin itunga.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu 'da ebi e'yo ewaru karakara eyi esu o'du 'diyi ma alea, dika 'ba karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyi ma dria. E'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu, ama vile drice'ba distrikiti niri owi i azi ngazu o'bi eyidri.
nyn_prompt: Ekyanga kitwire nikitunga oburemeezi bwingi ebiro ebi, kandi abatuuragye baingi boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo. Omu kugarukamu enshonga ezi,omwebembezi wa disiturikiti yaitu ayehaireyo kuheereza abantu.

eng_prompt: In response to the growing student population and the need for improved educational facilities, local officials prioritized infrastructure development. As a result, significant investments were made to enhance the learning environment for all students.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula omuwendo gw'abayizi ogweyongera n'obwetaavu bw'ebikozesebwa mu masomero okulongoosebwa, abakungu b'ebyalo baakulembeza enkulaakulana y'ebizimbe. N'ekyavaamu, ssente nnyingi zaateekebwawo okutumbula embeera y'okusomeramu abayizi bonna.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me medde pa wel lutino kwan ki miti me medo rwom me gangi kwan, lutic me tedero guketo yub me dongo gangi kwan obedo gin ma pire tek. Macalo adwogi ne, kiketo lim madit tutwal I tic me ilo malo rwom me kwan pa lutino kwan weng.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin enaaba loka esisiak keda eipud loka aiboisio nu isisiaere nu itojokaritai, apotu eswamak luka atutubet kisingarenitos aitopol iboro. Kanuka ngun, aponi ibwaikinai ikapun luipu kanu aitojokar asioman naka esisiak kere.
lgg_prompt: E'yo sukulu anzi ma kalafe ni tuzu tualu lezu afa onita ni 'diyi ma omgbo otuzu, azi'ba angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ba okpo e'yo angu ezoma ni 'diyi ma ezota ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba 'ba lonyi angiri angu onita ni sukulu anzi dria eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'omuhendo gw'abeegi hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okutunguura eby'obwegyese, abakuru omu byaro bakabanza kutunguura ebyombeko. N'ekyarugiremu, eby'obushubuzi bingi bikakorwa kutunguura eby'obwegyese bw'abeegi boona.

eng_prompt: In response to rising living costs and demands for better public service, the government has decided to review compensation for its employees. As a result, salaries of civil servants have been raised during this financial year.
lug_prompt: Olw'ebbeeyi y'ebintu erinnya n'obwetaavu bw'empeereza ennungi eri abantu, gavumenti esazeewo okwetegereza empeera y'abakozi baayo. N'ekyavaamu, emisaala gy'abakozi ba gavumenti gyongezeddwa mu mwaka guno ogw'ebyensimbi.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me mede pa wel cente me kwo ki miti me miyo kony maber bot lwak, gamente omoko tamme me ngiyo kit ma kiculu kwede luticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, kimedo mucara pa lutic pa gamente I mwaka me lim eni.
teo_prompt: Kanu aiyatakin etiai loka aijar keda eipuda lo aijanakin itunga ejok, abu apugan ocam airereonor ikapun lu eswamak ke. Kanuka ngun, aponi iyatakinai eropit loka eswamak luka apugan kokaru kalo loka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo aje idri nyazaniri tuzu tualu e'yo 'bani lezu azi ngazu o'bi eyidri muke ndeni ri be risi, gamete asi e'yo 'du ofeta 'ba erini azi ngazu 'diyi ma dria ri ma ale andrizu. E'yo 'disi, 'ba otu musara azi'ba gameteni 'diyiniri eli robiani 'disi ra.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'emihendo y'ebintu kweyongyera hamwe n'okwetenga obuheereza burungi, gavumenti eshaziremu kushwijuma empeera y'abakozi baayo. N'ekyarugiremu, emishaara y'abakozi ba gavumenti eyongyeirwe omu mwaka gw'eby'esente ogu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to improve local business compliance, the district committee held a meeting to discuss the importance of timely payments. They emphasized that prompt payment of license fees is crucial for maintaining community services and support.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula eby'obusuubuzi mu kitundu, akakiiko ka disitulikiti kaatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bukulu bw'okusasula mu budde. Baakakasizza nti okusasula amangu ebisale bya layisinsi kya mugaso mu kukuuma obuweereza n'obuyambi mu kitundu.
ach_prompt: I tute me medo rwom me lubu cik pa lutim biacara me tedero, dul me district committee gubedo ki kacoke me nywako lok I kom ber pa culu cente ikare ki kome. Guketo cwinygi tutwal I kom culu cente me license oyot-oyot tutwal pi gwoko tic ki kony pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitogogong nuka agwelanar, abu ekomiti loka edisitrikt iriamunos kanu aitemitem ajokis naka aitac ikapun kotoma apak. Apotu kesi kitogogongoto ebe aitac ikapun luka alasisi katipet ejok kanu aidar ejanakine keda agangat na itunga.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu tujari angu 'da ma alea 'diyini azita vuti obizu ri ma omgbo otuzu, komiti distrikiti ni 'diyi 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu orodri 'bani robia ofezu sa'wa dria ri ma dria. Eyi 'ba asi kini robia kokobi azi ngazu ri ofezu mbeleru ri eri orodriru azakoma fezu ongulumu eyini ri ma tambazu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obushubuzi, akakiiko ka disiturikiti kakakora orukiiko, okuhanuura aha mugasho gw'okushashura omu bwire. Bakashoboorora ngu okushashura esente za rayisinsi bukiri kare n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okurinda obuheereza n'obuhwezi omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing health crisis and the need for social distancing, the local government has made several adjustments to its operations. As a result, all council meetings have been postponed due to the pandemic.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku buzibu bw'ebyobulamu obugenda mu maaso n'obwetaavu bw'okwewa amabanga, gavumenti z'ebitundu zikoze enkyukakyuka nnyingi mu mirimu gyayo. N'ekivuddemu, enkiiko z'akakiiko zonna zongezeddwayo olw'ekirwadde bbunansi.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim ki miti me bedo mabor ki dano mukene, gamente me tedero otimo aloka-loka mapol I ticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, kicoro kacoke pa kancil weng pi peko me two korona.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye keda eipud loka alaikina, eswama apugan naka atutubet aijulanakineta nuipu kotoma aswamuke. Kanuka ngun, aponi isiekikinai airiamununeta nuka ekansulo kere kanuka adeka naka ekorona.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi mupi drile azini lezu 'ba eyi ma esele cozu eyi ma eselea risi, gamete angu 'da ma alea 'diyi 'ye ojata karakara eyi e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi ma alea. E'yo 'disi, 'ba idri drifuza kanisulu ni 'diyi ma o'du dria e'yo azo 'dezaniri ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'okwetantara abantu, gavumenti y'ebyaro ekozire empindahinduka nyingi omu mirimo yaayo. N'ekyarugiremu,enkiiko zoona z'akakiiko zikongyezibwayo ahabw'oburwaire.

eng_prompt: As communities faced unprecedented challenges, local governments struggled to adapt to the rapidly changing circumstances. Many essential services were disrupted, leading to a reevaluation of priorities and resources.
lug_prompt: Ng'ebitundu byolekaganye n'okusoomoozebwa okutali kwa bulijjo, gavumenti z'ebitundu zaalwana okutuukana n'embeera ezaali zikyuka amangu. Empeereza nnyingi ez'omugaso zaataataaganyizibwa, ekyaletera okuddamu okwetegereza ebintu ebikulu n'ebikozesebwa.
ach_prompt: I kare ma lwak tye ka nongo peko mapol, gamente mapat-pat me tedero gubedo ka tute matek me ngiyo ki alokaloka matye ka time oyot-oyot tutwal. Tic mapol ma pire tek tutwal oballe, ma oweko kimoko tamgi I kom ngo ma omyero gukwong ki jami ma mite me tic kwedgi.
teo_prompt: Kwape etereikina itunga keda atiokisio numam itereikina, apotu apuganisinei nuka atutubena kongicata aitodolikin ejautene lo ijulakina katipet. Aponi itolitolunai aijaanakinio naka itunga luipu, ido abu koyangau airereonor iboro luepolok ka iboro lu itwasamao.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu eyini e'yo ewaru ndundu eyi esuzu risi, gamete angu ndundu eyi ma alea 'diyi esu e'yo eyi 'yezu e'yo eyi ojapi mbeleru 'diyi ma alea. Azi ngaza orodriru 'diyi ma karakara eyi eza eyi eyini ani e'yo eyini lezu aa'zu e'yo okporu 'diyi ma alea dika afa ayuzaru 'diyi ma ale andrizu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Obu abantu baabaire nibatunga oburemeezi,gavumenti z'ebyaro zikaba niziteganisibwa okuhikaana n'embeera ezaabaire nizihinduka juba. Obuheereza bwingi obw'omugasho bukateganisibwa, ekyaretsire okugaruka kushwijuma eby'okwebembeza hamwe n'eby'okukoresa.

eng_prompt: In response to the ongoing health crisis, many organizations have implemented strict guidelines to ensure public safety. As a result, the ministry has established new attendance limits for gatherings.
lug_prompt: Mu kwanukula ekizibu ky'ebyobulamu ekigenda mu maaso, ebitongole bingi biteekeddewo ebiragiro ebikakali okukakasa obukuumi bw'abantu. N'ekivuddemu, minisitule etaddewo ekkomo eppya ku kukungaana.
ach_prompt: Macalo adwogi me peko me yot kom matye kawot anyim, dul mapat-pat guketo cik matek tutwal me gwoko ber bedo pa lwak. Macalo adwogi ne, gangkal oketo kigeng manyen I kom dano ma cokke kacel.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ationis naka angaleu na elosi akonye, etolomutu iriongeta luipu aicoreta nu eyuara kanu ayuarite itunga. Kanuka ngun, abu erionget ibwaik ikisila luitetiak luka itunga lu atukonokin.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi ma aza kozu, amuti karakara eyi 'ba azita okporu 'diyi o'bi eyi ma tambazu. E'yo 'disi, okalamvu alataniri o'ba e'yo o'diru 'bani 'ba eyi trazu ongulumu eyi ma alea ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'amagara oburikugyenda omu maisho,ebitongore bingi bitaireho ebiragiro by'amaani okurinda abantu. N'ekyarugiremu, minisiture eteireho obukwakurizo obusya aha nteerane.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent surge in COVID-19 cases, it is crucial that we take necessary precautions during our meetings. To ensure everyone's safety, we must implement health guidelines for all attendees.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kweyongera kw'abalwadde ba ssenyiga omukambwe gyebuvuddeko, kikulu nnyo okwegendereza mu nkiiko zaffe. Okukakasa obukuumi bwa buli omu, tulina okussa mu nkola ebiragiro by'ebyobulamu eri bonna abeetabye.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki medde pa wel dano matye ki two korona, pire tek tutwal ni omyero wagwokke ikare me kacokke. Me neno ni dano weng tye agwoka, omyero waket cik me yot kom itic pi dano weng matye I yub eni.
teo_prompt: Katupitos eipone lo iyata noi loka adekasinei nuka COVID-19, ejokuna aitwasam ikisila lu ekotoi kapak naka airiamununokosi. Kanu awanyun ebe eyuwara itunga kere, ekot oni aitegear aicoreta nuka angaleu kanuka itunga kere luejaasi toma.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani 'ba azo COVID-19 niri be 'diyi ma omgbo tuzu o'diru ri ma e'yosi, eri orodriru amani e'yo 'duzu kililiru sa'wa amani mitingi 'yezu 'diyisi. Ba dria ma ta mbazu, le ama ma 'ba azita e'yo rua alanisi 'diyi 'ba dria emu'ba 'diyi dri.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okweyongyera kw'abarwaire ba COVID-19 omu bwire butari bwa hare, ni kikuru kwegyendesereza omu nkiiko zaitu. Okureeba ngu buri omwe aine obukuumi, twine kutaho ebiragiro by'eby'amagara aha bantu boona abaizire.

eng_prompt: The team has been working diligently to finalize the financial projections. After several rounds of revisions, we are nearing completion of the budget for the upcoming year.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu ebadde ekola n'obunyiikivu okumaliriza okuteebereza kw'ebyensimbi. Oluvannyuma lw'okukyusaamu emirundi egiwerako, tunaatera okumaliriza embalirira y'omwaka ogujja.
ach_prompt: Dul ne obedo katic ki mit kom me tyeko yub me lim. Ingee ngiyo kor tic mapol, watye cok ki tyeko byek lim me mwaka manyen.
teo_prompt: Iswamat etimu keda agogongu kanu angetakin aomisio nuka ikapun. Akaulo naka airereonor ikapun irwan ipu, eyapie sio angetakin aitolomun ebajet loka ekaru ngol.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da ebi azi nga avasi otita robia ni 'diyi dezu. E'yo ama ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, ama nga mu otita aje robia ni eli drusirisi ri de 'bo.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu etwire neekora n'amaani okuhendera enteekateeka y'esente. Bwanyima y'okugaruka kushwijuma, turi haihi kumaririza embaririra y'omwaka ogurikwija.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the local government has relied heavily on private investments to support its initiatives. As a result, the financial contributions from the business community have become increasingly vital to the district's operations.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, gavumenti z'ebitundu zeesigamye nnyo ku bamusigansimbi ab'obwannannyini okuwagira enteekateeka zaayo. N'ekivuddemu, obuyambi bw'ensimbi okuva mu basuubuzi bweyongedde okuba obw'omugaso mu mirimu gya disitulikiti.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, gamente me tedero ojenge tutwalle I kom dul ma pe jenge I kom gamente wek okony yubgi. Macalo adwogi ne, kony me lim ma aa ki bot lutim biacara dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal I tic pa district.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, emunokina apugan na okwap ikapun luipu noi kama ejaasi itunga luingaranakinete ikapunukec. Kanuka ngun, agangat naka ikapun kama ejaasi itunga luitolosete ibiasaran erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka aswamisio nuka edisitrikt.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'diyi ma alea, gamete angu ndundu eyini 'diyi e'bi asi 'ba tujari 'yepi ngulupisi 'diyi ma dria e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi atizu. E'yo 'disi, atita robia ni engazu 'ba tujari 'yepi 'diyi vu ri eca curu'do orodriru e'yo distrikiti ni 'diyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka egi, gavumenti y'ebyanga eyegamire munonga ahari ba invesita ab'abantu buntu kushagika enteekateeka zaayo. N'ekyarugiremu, obuhwezi bw'esente kuruga omu by'obushubuzi bweyongyeire kuba obw'omugasho omu mirimo ya disiturikiti.

eng_prompt: In an effort to address the growing needs of the community, the school district has decided to expand its staff. As a result, they are actively seeking qualified candidates to fill various positions.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okukola ku byetaago by'ekitundu ebyeyongera, disitulikiti y'essomero esazeewo okugaziya abakozi baayo. N'ekivuddemu, banoonya n'obunyiikivu abantu abalina ebisaanyizo okujjuza ebifo eby'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I tute matek me cobo miti pa lwak matye kamede, district me cukul omedo wel luticgi. Macalo adwogi ne, gitye ka yenyo lutino kwan ma gupore me cobo tic mapat-pat.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga, abu edisitrikta lo esomero itutub eswamak ke. Kanuka ngun, eutasi kesi aimo itunga luepedorete ailelebikin aiboisio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo ongulumu eyini lele tu 'diyi ma aza kozu, distrikiti sukulu niri 'du e'yo azi'ba eyini 'diyi ma kalafe otuzu ra. E'yo 'disi, eyi 'ba agapi ra 'diyi nda azi ndundu eyi 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okukora ahabyetaago by'abantu, disiturikiti y'eishomero eshaziremu kwongyera aha bakozi baayo. N'ekyarugiremu, nibaronda abantu abatendekirwe kwijuza emyanya etari emwe.

eng_prompt: In recent years, the government's revenue generation efforts have focused on increasing tax compliance and expanding the tax base. As a result, the financial contributions from citizens have significantly boosted the national budget.
lug_prompt: Mu myaka egiyise, kaweefube wa gavumenti ey'okufuna omusolo essira alitadde ku kwongera ku mateeka g'emisolo n'okugaziya omusolo. N'ekivuddemu, obuyambi bw'ensimbi okuva mu bannansi butumbudde nnyo embalirira y'eggwanga.
ach_prompt: I mwaki ma okato cokcok-ki, yub pa gamente me nongo lim oketo cwinygi tutwalle I kom lubu cik me mucoro ki medo rwom me mucoro. Macalo adwogi ne, kony me lim ma aa ki bot lwak omedo rwom me byek lim pa lobo.
teo_prompt: Kokaru lu atuboros, ekot apugan aitolomun ikapun kanu aiyatakin aitup ikisila luka isolosinei keda aitanyanyar esolo. Kanuka ngun, agangat na ikapun kanejaas itunga eyataki noi ebajet lo akwap.
lgg_prompt: Eli agapi 'bo 'diyi ma alea, okpo gameteni robia esuzu ri 'ba asi e'yo musoro ma vuti obiza ma omgbo otuzu azini musoro ofeza ma ongmbo otuzu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, robia fele engazu kari anzi eyivu ri otu otita ajeni karisi ri saaru.
nyn_prompt: Omu myaka etakahwireho, gavumenti eteire amaani omu kutunguura emishoro n'okwongyera aha mutindo gw'emishoro. N'ekyarugiremu, obuhwezi bw'esente kuruga omu bantu bwongyeire aha mbaririra y'eihanga.

eng_prompt: The government has allocated a significant budget to enhance the well-being of its citizens. This funding aims to address various critical areas in public health.
lug_prompt: Gavumenti etaddewo embalirira ennene okutumbula embeera z'abantu baayo. Ensimbi zino zigendereddwamu okukola ku bintu ebitali bimu ebikulu mu byobulamu by'abantu.
ach_prompt: Gamente oketo byek lim madit tutwal me ilo malo rwom me kwo pa anywali ne. Cente man tye ki miti me tic i kom jami mapigi tego ma kwako yot kom pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Abu apugan ibwaik ebajet loepol noi kanu aitojokar aijar naka itungake. Alosikinet naka ikapun ngun erai aitemokin aiboisio nuepolok nuka angaleu naka itunga.
lgg_prompt: Gamete 'ba bajeti angiri kari anzi erini 'diyi ma edri otuzu. Robia feza 'diri lezu e'yo 'yezu e'yo ndu ndu e'yo alata ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Gavumenti eteireho embaririra y'amaani y'okutunguura entuura y'abantu baayo. Esente ezi nizigyenderera kukora aha nshonga z'eby'amagara g'abantu.

eng_prompt: In an effort to enhance educational outcomes and foster creativity, policymakers are increasingly recognizing the importance of nurturing students' skills. As a result, initiatives have been launched to support various talent development programs within the education system.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula ebikolebwa mu by'enjigiriza n'okutumbula obuyiiya, abakola amateeka beeyongera okutegeera obukulu bw'okukulaakulanya obukugu bw'abayizi. N'ekivuddemu, enteekateeka zitandikiddwawo okuyamba pulogulaamu ez'enjawulo ezikulaakulanya ebitone mu nkola y'ebyenjigiriza.
ach_prompt: I tute me ilo malo rwom me kwan ki dongo diro manyen, luyub cik tye ka niang ber pa dongo diro pa lutino. Macalo adwogi ne, kicako yub mapat-pat me dongo diro pa lutino kwan.
teo_prompt: Kotoma agogongu na aitojokar eswamae lo asioman ka aitopoloria acoa, ejenete itunga ajokis na aitopoloun acoa naka esisiak. Kanuka ngun, etolomun ainapeta kanu aigang ainapeta nu itopoloere atalantan kotoma asioman.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu onita ma omgbo otuzu azini e'yo edeza ma omgbo otuzu, 'ba azita sipi 'diyi curu'do e'yo orodri sukulu anzi eyi ma ondua ezozu ri ma dria. E'yo 'disi, 'ba e'do e'yo ndundu eyi atita fezu otita talanta eyini 'diyi ezozu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'obwegyese n'okureetaho okwetegyereza, abarikukora ebiragiro beeyongyeire kumanya omugasho gw'okutunguura emyoga y'abeegi. N'ekyarugiremu, enteekateeka zitandikirweho kushagika enteekateeka z'okutunguura etaraanta omu by'obwegyese.

eng_prompt: In an effort to promote the arts and foster community spirit, the district has decided to hold annual music competitions. To ensure a vibrant showcase of talent, participation from every school is mandatory.
lug_prompt: Mu kaweefube w'okutumbula eby'emikono n'okutumbula omwoyo gw'ekitundu, disitulikiti esazeewo okutegeka empaka z'okuyimba buli mwaka. Okukakasa okwolesebwa kw'ebitone, okwetabamu okuva mu buli ssomero kikakatako.
ach_prompt: I tute me tyelo kor yub me goyo wer ki dongo cwiny lwak, district omoko tamme me bedo ki pyem me wer mwaka ki mwaka. Pi nyutu diro pa lutino kwan, omyero gangi kwan weng gubed tye.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitopolor aputosia ka aitopolor eswamae lo itunga, aseunit edisitrikt aitolot abolobol naka ayoere kangolikaru. Kanu awanyun ebe itodiaritai atalantan, ibusakinit kangin esomero ajaut toma.
lgg_prompt: Okpo 'bazu e'yo ongoni 'diyi otuzu tualu ava ongulumu eyini ri ma omgbo otuzu, distrikiti 'du e'yo abala ongo ni 'diyi 'yezu eli driasi. O'bi eyini ani ecozu ani feta Munguni fe eyini 'diyi e'dazu ra, le sukulu dria eyi ma fi e'yo 'da ma alea indi.
nyn_prompt: Omu kaweefube w'okutunguura eby'emikono hamwe n'okureetaho emyoga omu bantu, disiturikiti eshaziremu kukora empaka z'okweshongora buri mwaka. Okureeba ngu hariho okworeka emyoga, buri eishomero niriteekwa kwejumbamu.

eng_prompt: As the school year progresses, students eagerly anticipate the upcoming events and competitions. The administration has planned a variety of engaging sports programs to promote teamwork and physical fitness.
lug_prompt: Ng'omwaka gw'essomero gugenda mu maaso, abayizi beesunga nnyo emikolo n'empaka ezijja. Abakulembeze bategese pulogulaamu z'ebyemizannyo ez'enjawulo ezisikiriza okutumbula okukolera awamu n'obulungi bw'omubiri.
ach_prompt: Ka mwaka me kwan woto anyim, lutino kwan tye ka kuro yub ki pyem matye kabino anyim. Lutela me dul enoni guyubu yub me tuku mapat-pat me tyelo kor tic kacel ki bedo ma komgi yot.
teo_prompt: Kwape elosi ekaru lo esomero, ekotosi esisiak noi aitolot akiro keda abolobol na ebunit. Etemoki eyaitene ainapeta nuka aboliasio nuegelegela kanu aitopolor aswam nepepe keda angaleu.
lgg_prompt: Eli sukulu niri ni mu drile, sukulu anzi eyi e'yo emupi 'diyi te avasi. Driceza 'da otu otita avita eyini 'diyi karakara eyini ani azi ngazu tualu azini rua ma aa kililiru ri ma omgbo otuzu.
nyn_prompt: Omwaka gw'eby'obwegyese ku gurikugyenda omu maisho, abeegi nibashemererwa ahabw'emikoro n'empaka ezirikwija kubaho. Abeebembezi batebekaniise puroguraamu z'eby'emizaano ezitarikushushana, okureetaho okukwatanisa hamwe n'okugira amagara marungi.

eng_prompt: In today's educational landscape, the emphasis on physical fitness and teamwork has become increasingly important. As a result, educators are stepping up to ensure that students receive comprehensive training in various sports.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi y'ebyenjigiriza ey'ennaku zino, okussa essira ku by'omubiri n'okukolera awamu kweyongedde okuba okw'omugaso. N'ekivuddemu, abasomesa beeyongedde okukakasa nti abayizi bafuna okutendekebwa okujjuvu mu mizannyo egy'enjawulo.
ach_prompt: I gangi kwan me kare-ni, keto cwiny I kom yot kom ki tic kacel dong odoko gin ma pire tek tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, lupwonye tye ka neno ni lutino tye ka nongo pwony i kom tuku mapatpat.
teo_prompt: Kowai lo aisisia ilolo, epol noi aitigogongio naka angaleu keda aswam nepepe. Kanuka ngun, eutasi esisianakinak aanyun ebe edumunenete esisiak aitutuoro kotoma aboliasio nuegelegela.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onitani andruri ma alia, okpo 'bazu rua ma rua kililiru azini azi ngazu tualu 'diyi ma dria ri eca curu'do orodriru tu. E'yo 'disi, imba'ba eyi mu drile nezu ra kini sukulu anzi eyi imbata kililiru esu avita ndundu eyi ma alea.
nyn_prompt: Omu by'obwegyese ebiro ebi, okuta amaani omu by'omubiri n'okukorera hamwe kweyongyeire kuba okw'omugasho. N'ekyarugiremu, abegyesa bariyo nibagyenda omu maisho okureeba ngu abeegi batunga okutendekwa omu mizaano etari emwe.

eng_prompt: We received some surprising news during assembly today. It seems that changes are happening in our school's staff.
lug_prompt: Twafunye amawulire ag'ekitalo mu lukungaana lwa leero. Kirabika enkyukakyuka zigenda mu maaso mu bakozi b'essomero lyaffe.
ach_prompt: Wanongo lok angea mogo ma weko wabedo ki ngeng tutwal I kare me kacoke ma obedo tye tin. Nen calo aloka-loka tye ka time ikin lutic me cukulwa.
teo_prompt: Apotu sio adumutu iyemuto lu itegelikina kotoma airiamun ilolo. Esubit bala eutasi aijulanakineta nuiswamasi kosomerokosi.
lgg_prompt: Ama esu o'duko azi osutaru ni eyi sa'wa drifuza ni andru ri si. Eri ena kile ojata yi 'yeria azi'ba ama vile sukulua 'diyi ma eselea.
nyn_prompt: Tukatunga amahurire g'omutaano omu rukiiko erizooba. Nikireebeka empindahinduka ziriyo nizibaho omu bakozi b'eishomero ryaitu.

eng_prompt: After a season filled with hard work and dedication, the athletes showcased their skills in every match. Their determination paid off as they advanced through the playoffs.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa sizoni ejjudde okukola ennyo n'okwewaayo, bannabyamizannyo baayolesa obukugu bwabwe mu buli mupiira. Okumalirira kwabwe kwavaamu ebibala bwe baayita mu mpaka za 'playoffs'.
ach_prompt: Ingee kare me pyem ma opong ki tic matek ki keto cwiny, lungwec gunyuto diro gi I pyem weng. Cwiny gi okelo adwogi maber ikare ma gukato I pyem tuku odilo me pyem tuku odilo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka apak naepol noi naka aswam keda agogongu, apotu akerak itodutu acoasineikec kotoma aboliasio kere. Apotu kesi kopedosi aitodolikin aswamukec kotoma abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abolia naka abo
lgg_prompt: Ayi ti azi ngaza okporu azini asi feza be 'diyi ma vutia, 'ba ongu onzu'ba 'diyi e'da eyi ma ondua abala dria eyi ma alea. Asi 'baza yiniri ofe yi yini agazu avita avita avizu 'diyi ma aliarisi ra.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'obwire bwingi bw'okukora n'amaani n'okwehayo, abairuki boorekire emyoga yaabo omu mizaano yoona. Okumariirira kwabo kukashashurwa, obu baamazire kuza omu mpaka za 'playoffs'.

eng_prompt: After analyzing last year's results and implementing new training strategies, our team is feeling optimistic. The athletes have shown significant improvement in their skills and teamwork during practice sessions.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyava mu mwaka oguwedde n'okussa mu nkola enkola empya ez'okutendekebwa, ttiimu yaffe erina essuubi. Abaddusi balaze okukulaakulana mu bukugu bwabwe n'okukolera awamu mu kutendekebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo adwogi tic me mwaka ma okato ki keto yub me pwonye manyen itic, tim megwa tye ki gen. Lungwec gunyutu dongo pa diro gi kacel ki winye ikare me pwonye.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor akiro nuka ekaru je ka aitegear iwaitin lu itutuonorere, epupete etimukosi loajokan noi. Apotu akerak itodutu aitojokaar acoasineikec keda aswam nepepe kapak naka aitetemonor.
lgg_prompt: Vutinia agata eli ajerisi 'diyi ma ale andrizu azini geri embatani o'diru 'diyi 'bazu 'yeta ma alia 'bori ma vutia, ama vile amuti 'diyi asi 'baza be. Ba ongu onzu'ba 'diyi e'da otuta okporu eyi ma ondua ma alea tualu azi ngaza amuti ru 'diyi pie sa'wa eyini imbata 'yezu risi.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebyarugire omu bigyezo by'omwaka oguhwaire n'okuta omu nkora engyenderwaho nsya z'okutendeka, tiimu yaitu eine amatsiko. Abairuki boorekire okutunguuka omu myoga yaabo hamwe n'okukorera hamwe omu bwire bw'okwegyezamu.

eng_prompt: Building a strong sense of awareness and understanding among community members is crucial for fostering peace. By addressing the root causes of tension, we can promote harmony and cooperation.
lug_prompt: Okuzimba okumanyisibwa okw'amaanyi n'okutegeeragana mu bantu b'ekitundu kya mugaso nnyo mu kutumbula emirembe. Bwe tukola ku bintu ebireetawo obunkenke, tusobola okutumbula enkolagana n'obwegassi.
ach_prompt: Bedo ki ngec ki niang ikin lwak obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal me kelo kuc. Ka walwenyo i kom jami ma kelo telle, watwero kelo winye ki winye.
teo_prompt: Aitogogong acoa ka apuponoro kanejaas itunga erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aitopolor aipuc. Kowai lo aitemokin iboro lu eyangaununete ingungeta, ipedori oni aitopolor aimorikikina keda aiswamanara.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'ba ongulumu eyi ma eselea 'diyi ma mile oziza azini vata ma omgbo otuzu ri eri orodriru asianzu ejizu. E'yo e'yo ngiringiri ejipi 'diyi ma aza kozu risi, ama eco ti ecita azini ti icita ma omgbo otu ra.
nyn_prompt: Okwombeka okwetegyereza n'okwetegyerezana omu bantu, n'eky'omugasho munonga omukureetaho obusingye. Twakora aha nshonga ezirikureetaho obutaikirizana, nitubaasa kureetaho obusingye n'okukwatanisa.

eng_prompt: As part of their religious practices, the community emphasizes the importance of rest and reflection. To honor their beliefs, they set aside time each week for spiritual rejuvenation.
lug_prompt: Ng'ekimu ku bikolwa byabwe eby'eddiini, ekitundu kikkaatiriza obukulu bw'okuwummula n'okufumiitiriza. Okussa ekitiibwa mu nzikiriza zaabwe, bateekawo obudde buli wiiki okuzza obuggya eby'omwoyo.
ach_prompt: Macalo but yub me dini gi, lwak gi keto cwiny gi i kom ber pa yweyo ki lwodo lok. Me woro niyee gi, gigwoko kare mo cabit ki cabit me nongo kony me cwiny.
teo_prompt: Kwape ediini kec, isinyikokitos itunga ajokis naka aiyengun keda aomoom. Kanu ayongite iyuunikec, itemonokinete kesi apak kangolisabiti kanu aisiteteun akiro nuka Edeke.
lgg_prompt: Ekile 'yeta yini e'yo aitanisi 'diyi ma azi ru, ongulumu 'da eyi okpo 'ba ava liza azini e'yo egaza ma orodri ma dria. E'yo yini a'ita yini 'diyi inzizu, yi sawa 'du sabiti alu alu ma alia e'yo yi ma eselea 'diyi 'yezu o'diru.
nyn_prompt: Nk'emwe aha migyenzo yaabo y'ediini, abantu nibahamya omugasho gw'okuhuumura n'okuteekateeka. Okuheereza ekitiinisa enyikiriza zaabo, nibateekaho obwire buri sande, kugira ngu bagaruze amaani omu by'omwoyo.

eng_prompt: Many of these individuals dedicated their lives to the cause, often putting themselves in harm's way. However, their contributions have gone unrecognized and unrewarded.
lug_prompt: Bangi ku bantu bano beewaddeyo obulamu bwabwe eri ensonga, emirundi egisinga nga bateeka obulamu bwabwe mu matigga. Newankubadde, emirimu gyabwe tegisiimiddwa era tegisiimiddwa.
ach_prompt: Pol pa dano magi gumiyo kwogi pi tic man, kun giketo kwogi I peko mapol. Kadi bed kumeno, ticgi pe obedo ki pwoc ki pwoc.
teo_prompt: Apotu itunga luipu koinakisi aijarakec aswam ngun, ido apotu kesi ipikosi aijarakec toma ationis. Konye, mam ainanakineta kec ejenuna ido mam aponi oropai.
lgg_prompt: Ba karakara 'diyi owi eyi ma edri e'yo 'di 'yezu eyini ani eyi ma ngulupi 'bazu e'yo onzi eyi ma alea. Kani si, 'ba awini eyi ma azakoza 'diyi esu ku dika 'ba awini eyi fe awa'difo ku.
nyn_prompt: Baingi aha bantu aba, bakaheereza amagara gaabo ahabw'ekigyendererwa kyabo, obumwe n'obumwe bakeeta omunkora y'akabi. Kwonka, ebintu ebi bakozire tibarikubisiima kandi tibarikubisiima.

eng_prompt: Despite their service and dedication, certain groups within the military face restrictions when it comes to financial assistance. This disparity raises questions about the criteria used to determine eligibility for loans.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko obuweereza bwabwe n'okwewaayo, ebibinja ebimu mu magye bisanga obukwakkulizo bwe kituuka ku buyambi bw'ensimbi. Enjawulo eno ereetawo ebibuuzo ku misingi egikozesebwa okusalawo abo abalina ebisaanyizo by'okufuna looni.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni gutiyo ki cwinygi weng, dul mony mukene nongo kigeng ka odok ilok me nongo kony me lim. Apoka-poka man kelo lapeny I kom yoo ma kitiyo kwede me moko ni ngat moni opore me nongo lim den.
teo_prompt: Karaida ejaasi kesi toma aswamukec keda ainakina kec, icie igurupun luka ajore itereikina keda aitikitik na ikapun. Atiaketait ngin eyangauni aingiseta nuikamunitos iwaitin lu itwasamao kanu ajenun itunga luepedorete aijaun ilonin.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngaza yini azini asi feza yiniri ma talasi, amuti asikari eyini 'diyi ma alea 'diyi ma azi eyi esu e'yo 'bani eyi ma aza kozu geri robia nirisi 'diyi ci. Esele coza 'diri fe e'yo eyi ma aza ko geri 'bani 'ba eyini ecozu mari esuzu 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho obuheereza n'okwehayo kwabo, guruupu z'amahe ezimwe nizizizibirwa obuhwezi bw'esente. Entaaniso egi nereetaho ebibuuzo ebirikukwata aha mihanda erikukoresibwa kumanya ngu omuntu naabaasa kweguza.

eng_prompt: After years of reliable service, the aging car finally broke down beyond repair. With limited funds and rising expenses, they decided to postpone purchasing a new one.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi ng'ekozesebwa bulungi, emmotoka enkadde yafuna obuzibu n'ebula okuddaabirizibwa. Olw'ensimbi entono n'ebisale ebyeyongera, baasalawo okwongezaayo okugula empya.
ach_prompt: Ingee mwaki mapol me tic maber, mutoka macon-ni otum ma pe twero yube. Pi nok pa lim ki mede pa wel cente, gumoko tamgi me medo nino me wilo mutoka manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ikar luipu luka aswam ejok, abu emotoka ngol loemojongit konye mam apedori aitemokin. Keda ikapun lu ikidioko keda itiaisinei lu iyatakinos, apotu kesi kiswamautu aisukunyar agwelia naitetet.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani mutukari 'da ayuzu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, mutukari deza 'da eza i asizu 'bani ecozu eri edezu ku. Robia ma omgbo esizu azini aje tupi tupi 'diyisi, eyi asi 'du e'yo 'duzu o'diru jezu drile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'emyaka mingi y'okukora n'obwesigwa, emotoka enkuru ekahendera yashenyuka etarikubaasa kugarurwa busya. Ahabw'okugira ngu esente zikye n'enshohoza erikweyongyera, bakacwamu kwongyerayo okugura enju ensya.

eng_prompt: Despite rising threats and increasing violence in the region, officials have been slow to respond to the needs of vulnerable communities. Many citizens have expressed their concerns about safety, but their pleas seem to fall on deaf ears.
lug_prompt: Wadde ng'okutiisibwatiisibwa n'obutabanguko byeyongedde mu kitundu, abakungu balwawo okukola ku byetaago by'abantu abateesobola. Bannansi bangi balaze okweraliikirira kwabwe ku by'okwerinda, naye okwegayirira kwabwe kulabika ng'okugwa mu matu.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni bura ki tim gero tye ka mede i twok piny eni, lutic tye ka galle me miyo kony bot lwak ma peko tye i komgi. Anywali mapol gunyutu lworo gi i kom gwoko kuc, ento nen calo dano pe giwinyo lega gi.
teo_prompt: Karaida iyata aitukurianeta keda amumu kotoma aiboisit, iyap eswamak aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga lu ican. Apotu itunga luipu itodutu aiyalongongo kec kanu ayuwara, konye esubit bala mam epupete ailipasinei kec.
lgg_prompt: Ori gbaza tupi tupi azini ngiringiri tupi angu 'da ma alea ri ma talasi, azi'ba eyi ebi e'yo 'ye ewakokoru 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma aza kozu. Kari anzi karakara eyi ece asi otiza eyini ageitema ma dria ra te e'yo eyini ai'zu 'diyi e'de bile kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okutiinatiinisa n'obutabanguko obweyongyeire omu kyanga, abakungu batwireho kukora aha byetaago by'abantu abatarikwebaasa. Abatuuragye baingi boorekire okwerarikirira kwabo ahaby'okwerinda, kwonka okushaba kwabo nikureebeka nk'okutarikuhurirwa.

eng_prompt: Despite the countless hours of investigation and the tireless efforts of the families seeking justice, the truth remains elusive. The community is left grappling with the tragic loss, feeling the weight of unfulfilled promises for accountability.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga bamaze essaawa nnyingi nga banoonyereza era nga n'ab'omu maka ago bafubye nnyo okufuna obwenkanya, amazima gakyaliwo. Ekitundu kisigadde nga kirwanagana n'okufiirwa okw'ekikangabwa, nga kiwulira obuzito bw'ebisuubizo ebitatuukiridde eby'embalirira.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kikwedo pi cawa malac tutwal ki tute matek tutwal pa lugangi me nongo ngol matir, lok ada pud pe onen. Dano ma ikabedo eni pud gitye ka lweny ki can ma otimme I komgi, kun giwinyo peko me cikke ma pe gucobo.
teo_prompt: Karaida adaun isawan luipu luka aingic keda agogong naka ikalia aimo etube loajokan, mam abeit ejenuna. Aponi kojalakinai itunga ationis na atwaniar, epupete ationis na aisumuneta numam itodolikinitai kanu aitodun eipone lo itwasamatere ikapun.
lgg_prompt: E'yo eti ondaza ma alia sawa karakara 'diyi ma talasi azini familia yini e'yo liza kililiru ri ndazu 'diyi ma talasi, e'yo adari nga po'di e'da ku. Ongulumu 'da eyi dri ci e'yo ewaru aviza ni 'diyisi, eyini e'yo 'bani eyi owizu e'yo eyi 'yepi 'diyi ma dria ku 'diyi ma e'yo egazu.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho eshaaha nyingi z'okucondooza hamwe n'amaani g'amaka kuronda oburingaaniza, amazima tigarikwetegyerezibwa. Abantu basigaire nibarwanagana n'okufeerwa kwabo, barikwehurira oburemeezi bw'ebiraganiso ebitahikiiriziibwe.

eng_prompt: Many students have reported feeling marginalized and excluded based on their backgrounds. This has raised concerns among parents and educators alike.
lug_prompt: Abayizi bangi bagamba nti bawulira nga basuuliddwa ebbali era nga tebafiibwako okusinziira ku nsibuko yaabwe. Kino kireeseewo okweraliikirira mu bazadde n'abasomesa.
ach_prompt: Lutino kwan mapol guwaco ni giwinyo calo ki kwero gi pi kabedo gi. Man okelo lworo ikin lunyodo ki lupwonye.
teo_prompt: Ebakasi esisiak luipu ebe epupete kesi epalunitai ka alemanar kotupitete aiboisio kec. Eyangaunit na aiyalongong kanejaas auriak keda esisianakinak.
lgg_prompt: Sukulu anzi karakara eyi 'yo e'yo eyini aa'zu amve azini eyini aa'zu alenia ku 'diyi ma dria e'yo eyini engazu angu eyini aa'zu 'diyi vurisi. E'yo 'di eji asi otiza tipika eyi ma eselea imba'ba eyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Abeegi abaingi bagambire ngu nibashoroorwa ahabw'oburugo bwabo. Eki kireesire okwerarikirira omu bazaire n'abeegyesa.

eng_prompt: Recent reports indicate a rise in criminal activity in areas previously controlled by former rebel groups. As these individuals reintegrate into society, concerns are growing about their potential vulnerability to exploitation.
lug_prompt: Lipoota ezifulumizibwa gye buvuddeko ziraga nti obumenyi bw'amateeka bweyongedde mu bitundu ebyali bifugibwa ebibinja by'abayeekera. Abantu bano bwe baddayo mu kitundu, okweraliikirira kweyongera ku ngeri gye bayinza okutulugunyizibwamu.
ach_prompt: Adwogi tic manyen nyutu ni tim aranyi tye ka mede i kabedo ma dul adwii macon aye obedo ka doro. I kare ma dano magi gudok cen I kabedo gi, lworo tye ka mede I kom kit ma kitwero tic kwedgi I yoo marac.
teo_prompt: Itodunitos iripotan luitetiak ebe eyatakinos aswamisio nuarokok kotoma aiboisio nuapolok. Neipedoria itunga lu abongokin toma atutubet, eyatakin aiyalongong kanu aitolitol kesi.
lgg_prompt: O'duko efupi o'diru 'diyi ece kini e'yo onzi eyi ma omgbo tu angu andra oku gburundua ru 'diyi ma okpo alea. Ba 'diyi ni ecaria ongulumu eyi ma alea dika, asi otiza eyi ma dria e'yo 'bani ecozu eyi ayuzuri ma omgbo ni tu ra.
nyn_prompt: Ripoota eziherize kukorwa nizooreka okweyongyera kw'obukozi bw'ebibi omu myanya eyabaire eri omu mikono y'ebibiina by'abahekyera. Abantu aba ku barikugaruka omu bantu, okwerarikirira nikweyongyera ahabw'okukozesa kubi abantu.

eng_prompt: The event was originally scheduled to take place in the downtown conference center, but due to unforeseen circumstances, we had to find a new location. Despite the change in scenery, the agenda and participants remain the same.
lug_prompt: Omukolo gwali gulina kubeera mu kibuga wakati naye olw'embeera etasuubirwa, twalina okunoonya ekifo ekipya. Newankubadde embeera ekyuse, enteekateeka n'abeetabamu bisigala byebimu.
ach_prompt: Yub eni onongo myero otimme I dye boma madit me city conference centre, ento pi jami ma otimme atura, omyero wanong kabedo manyen. Kadi bed ni jami olokke, jami ma mite me atima ki joo matye I yub enoni pud tye marom.
teo_prompt: Aponi itemokinai aitolot aswamisioit ngin ko osenta loka itaun, konye kanuka iboro lumam ewanyunitai, apotu sio adumutu aiboisit naitetet. Karaida ijulujulai ejautene, ainapeta keda lu ajaas kes esalakinete eputosi.
lgg_prompt: Ba 'ba ndra otuta e'yo nde ni pari 'duzu angu okuza ni aku ambu tawuni niri ma alea, te e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma e'yosi, le ama ma esu angu azi o'dini. E'yo ojata ma talasi, otita azini 'ba fi'ba yi ma alia 'diyi awi alurile.
nyn_prompt: Omukoro gukaba gutebekanisiibwe kubaho omu rurembo ahagati y'omwanya gw'enteerane, kwonka ahabw'embeera etarikwetegyerezibwa, tukaba twine kuronda omwanya musya. Oihireho empindahinduka y'embeera, enteekateeka hamwe n'abeejumbiremu nibigyenda omu maisho.

eng_prompt: Frustrated by the lack of resources and assistance during the crisis, community leaders gathered to voice their concerns. Many residents expressed their disappointment, highlighting the growing challenges they face daily.
lug_prompt: Olw'obutaba na bikozesebwa n'obuyambi mu kaseera k'obuzibu, abakulembeze b'ekitundu baakuŋŋaanye okwogera ebibaluma. Abatuuze bangi baalaga obwennyamivu bwabwe, nga balaga okusoomoozebwa kwe basanga buli lunaku.
ach_prompt: Ki cwer cwiny pi bedo peke pa jami ki kony ikare me peko eni, lutela me kabedo gucokke me tito peko gi. Lutedero mapol gunyutu cwer cwinygi kun giwaco peko ma gitye ka kato ki iye nino ki nino.
teo_prompt: Apotu engarenok lu atutubet kongurianata kanu amamus na iboro ka agangat kapak naka ationis ngin. Apotu itunga luipu itodutu amamut aiyalama kec, itodunitos atiokisio nu itereikina keda kesi nginiparan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo afa ayuzaru azini azakoma ako ni sawa e'yo ewaru 'di ma alea risi, drice'ba ongulumu eyini 'diyi tra eyi e'yo eyi ma dria 'diyi oluzu. Ba aa'pi angu 'da ma alea karakara eyi ece e'yo eyini aa'zu ayikosi ku 'diyi e'da e'yo ewaru eyini esu o'du driasi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okugwera orubanja ahabw'eibura ry'ebintu n'obuhwezi omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, abeebembezi b'ebyanga baketeeranira hamwe kworeka enshonga zaabo. Abatuuragye baingi bakooreka oburemeezi bwabo, barikugamba ahaburemeezi obweyongyeire obubarikushanga buriizooba.

eng_prompt: The team received a sudden briefing that their deployment was imminent. With little time to prepare, they gathered their gear and awaited further instructions.
lug_prompt: Ttiimu yafuna okutegeezebwa okw'amangu nti okusindikibwa kwabwe kwali kumpi. Olw'obudde obutono okwetegeka, baakungaanya ebintu byabwe ne balinda ebiragiro ebirala.
ach_prompt: Dul ne gunongo ngec atura ni gicok cwalo gi I tic. Pien kare me yubbe onongo nok tutwal, guyubo jami gi me tic ka gukuro cik mukene.
teo_prompt: Abu etimu odum alimoret na atipet ebe eyapie aitolomio kec. Keda apak naedit kanu aitemonokin, apotu kesi kitukokinos iboro kec kosodete aidar aicoreta ace.
lgg_prompt: Amuti 'da esu o'dukoti mbeleru kini 'ba nga eyi ma ti pe angu ndundu eyi ma alea mbeleru. Sa'wa eyini aa'zu eyi otuzu were risi, eyi tra eyi ma nyafe eyi dika eyi te azita eyi dika.
nyn_prompt: Tiimu ekatunga okumanyisibwa kw'omutaano ngu okwihaho kwabo kukaba kuri haihi kubaho. Ahabw'obwire bukye bw'okweteekateekyera, bakarundaana ebikwato byabo bategyereza ebindi biragiro.

eng_prompt: In times of tragedy, the community often rallies to support those in need. However, for this particular family, the silence is deafening.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'akatyabaga, abantu bakungaana okuyamba abo abali mu bwetaavu. Newankubadde, eri amaka gano ag'enjawulo, obusirise buziba amatu.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko ma poto atura, lwak ipol kare gi rwatte me konyo lupeko. Kadi bed kumeno, pi jo me ot man, ling alinga obedo gin ma winyone tek tutwal.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, iriamununete itunga aigang ngul lu ican. Konye, kanuka ekale kalo, etionikinit noi aililing ngin.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru ni 'diyisi, ongulumu eyi oku eyi atita fezu 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi dri. Kani si, familia 'diri ma dria, e'yo 'bani 'yozu 'da eri ewaru tu.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, abantu nibateerana kuhwera abatarikwebaasa. Kwonka, aha ka egi, okuhunama nikureetaho okuhurira kubi munonga.

eng_prompt: Despite numerous petitions and public outcry, the funding for orphanages continues to dwindle. Many citizens are frustrated by the lack of attention given to vulnerable children in the system.
lug_prompt: Wadde nga waliwo okwemulugunya kungi n'okukaaba kw'abantu, ensimbi eziweebwa ebifo ewakuumirwa bamulekwa zeeyongera okukendeera. Bannansi bangi bennyamivu olw'obutafaayo eri abaana abateesobola mu nkola.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni lwak gukok matek tutwal, lim ma kimiyo pi gangi pa lutino kic pud tye kadok piny. Anywali mapol cwinygi pe yom ki kit ma gamente pe tamo I kom lutino ma goro.
teo_prompt: Karaida ipu ailipasinei keda aimony naka itunga, ikidioko ikapun luka ireria lu idarere ikokiok. Apotu itunga luipu itakadikisi kanu amamus apodokinit idwe lu ican.
lgg_prompt: Erita ako karakara eyi ma talasi, robia fele aku emvu anzi eyini 'diyi ma tambazu 'diyi ma alea ri ma omgbo ni mu drile esi. Kari anzi karakara eyi candi nya e'yo 'bani asi fezu anzi nyiri e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi ma dria ku ri si.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okwetomboitwa kwingi n'okwetomboitwa kw'abantu, esente ezirikushashurirwa amaju g'efuuzi niziguma nizikyendeera. Abatuuragye baingi nibahurira kubi ahabw'obutafayo aha baana abatarikwebaasa omu by'obutegyeki.

eng_prompt: Human rights organizations have raised concerns about the treatment of individuals in custody. Reports indicate that many are held for extended periods without trial or adequate legal representation.
lug_prompt: Ebitongole ebirwanirira eddembe ly'obuntu bireese okweraliikirira ku kuyisibwa kw'abantu abali mu kaduukulu. Lipoota ziraga nti bangi basibiddwa mu nkomyo okumala ebbanga eddene nga tebawozeseddwa oba okuyimirirwa mu mateeka.
ach_prompt: Dule ma neno lok kom twero pa dano gunyutu lworo gi i kom kit ma kitero kwede dano ma tye I buc. Adwogi tic nyutu ni kimako polgi pi kare malac labongo pido onyo cung pi gi i kot.
teo_prompt: Apotu iriongeta luka apedorosio nuka itunga itodutu aiyalongongokec kanuikamunit epone loeyaitotor itunga lu ikamaritai. Itodunitos iripotan ebe iwenan luipu iwenanario adaun apak naepol noi komam apupokinio adieket keda abwoikinitok kotoma okisila.
lgg_prompt: Amuti driwala o'biyini 'diyi ece asi otiza eyini e'yo 'bani 'ba arujoa 'diyi 'yezu ri ma dria. O'duko ece kini 'ba karakara eyi 'ba arujoa sa'wa ezu 'bani eyi obizu koko azini 'ba pa tupi eyidri kililiru 'diyi kokoru.
nyn_prompt: Ebitongore ebirikurwanirira obugabe bw'abantu, byorekire okwerarikirira aha kutwarizibwa kw'abantu omu bihome. Ripoota nizooreka ngu baingi nibakomwa kumara obwire bureingwa batarikushangwa omu kooti kandi bataine barikubajwekyera omu biragiro.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, many communities have faced relentless challenges and obstacles. As a result, their lives have been defined by the demands of labor and perseverance.
