lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, ebitundu bingi bibadde bisanga okusoomoozebwa n'ebizibu ebitakoma. N'ekivuddemu, obulamu bwabwe bukyusiddwa olw'obwetaavu bw'okukola n'okugumiikiriza.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, kabedo mapol gunongo peko mapol tutwal. Macalo adwogi ne, tic matek kacel ki diyo cwiny aye okelo kwo gi.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, etereikina itunga luipu keda atiokisio keda atiokisio nuipu. Kanuka ngun, ejaasi kesi keda aijar naepol noi na aswam keda agogongu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, ongulumu karakara eyi esu e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru eyi sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'disi, eyi ma edri e'bi aa e'yo azi ngaza ni azini asi teza ni 'diyisi.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu baingi batungire oburemeezi n'oburemeezi. N'ekyarugiremu, amagara gaabo gatwairwe okukoresa amaani n'okugumisiriza.

eng_prompt: The atmosphere in the holding area was tense as the guards called out names one by one. In the dimly lit room, anxious faces reflected the uncertainty of their fates.
lug_prompt: Embeera mu kkomera yali ya bunkenke ng'abakuumi bayita amannya ga buli omu. Mu kisenge omwali ekitangaala ekitono, ffeesi ezirimu obweraliikirivu zaalaga obutali bukakafu ku biseera byabwe eby'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Lworo obedo tye ikin lugwok kuc I kare ma gubedo ka lwongo nying dano acel ki acel. I ot ma mac pe ryeny maber tutwal-li, wang pa dano ma onongo gitye ki lworo onyuto ni pe gitye ki gen i kom anyimgi.
teo_prompt: Arai ejautene loejok noi kotoma aiboisit naidarere ngun naarai apotu edarak konyarautu ikiroria idiope adiope. Kotoma agola naejaasi keda aica naedit, apotu iponesio luka itunga luejaasi keda aiyalongong itodunit ebe mam kesi ejenete nuikamunitos ingaren kec.
lgg_prompt: Angu angu 'bani 'ba o'bizu 'da ma alea ri ma alea ri ndra e'yere 'ba ageitema ni 'diyi ni ru eyi omvezu alu alu. Jo ale aliza ma aliari ma alia, andretia asi otiza be 'diyi ece e'yo yi ma ewu drusiri ma e'yosi.
nyn_prompt: Embeera omu kihome ekaba eri ey'obunkenke ahabw'abakuumi okwetwa amaziina g'omuntu omwe ahari omwe. Omu kishengye ekitarikwaka gye, amaisho gaabo garikworeka okwerarikirira aha magara gaabo ag'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: Despite the harsh conditions and uncertainty of their situation, the prisoners often share stories of their lives before incarceration. They cling to the belief that justice will prevail and freedom will eventually be theirs.
lug_prompt: Ng'oggyeko embeera embi n'obutali bukakafu bw'embeera yaabwe, abasibe batera okwogera ku bulamu bwabwe nga tebannasibwa. Banywerera ku nzikiriza nti obwenkanya bujja kuwangula era eddembe ku nkomerero lijja kuba lyabwe.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni kwo tek tutwal, mabuc ipol kare giloko i kom kwogi mapwod pe ki tweyo gi. Gitye ki gen ni ngol matir biloyo dok agiki ne bedo megi.
teo_prompt: Karaida etiono noi aijar keda amamus ajenun ejautenekec, etapit iwenan aitetem akiro nuikamunitos aijarakec eringa ewenere. Apotu kesi kimakakinos aiyuun ebe ebuni etube loajokan aibwo kosodete kesi ajaut keda ailajara.
lgg_prompt: Ka tro ovu e'yo ewaru azini e'yo ewaru yini ma alia 'diyi ma talasi, aru 'da eyi tutuni e'yo eyi ma edri ma dria de nga po'di 'ba ombe eyi arujoa ku 'diyi olu. Yi asi 'ba a'ita ma dria kini e'yo liza kililiru ri nga aga ra azini driwala ni nga asizu eca yini.
nyn_prompt: N'obu haraabe hariho embeera mbi, abasibe nibagamba aha magara gaabo batakasibirwe. Nibamirira aha kwikiriza ngu oburingaaniza nibwija kuhangura kandi obusingye nibwija kuba bwabo.

eng_prompt: The situation surrounding the teacher's detention has raised significant concerns among parents and students alike. Despite ongoing negotiations, authorities have yet to reach a resolution.
lug_prompt: Embeera eyeetoolodde okusibibwa kw'omusomesa ereeseewo okweraliikirira okw'amaanyi mu bazadde n'abayizi. Wadde ng'enteeseganya zigenda mu maaso, ab'obuyinza tebannatuuka ku kya kugonjoola.
ach_prompt: Lunyodo ki lutino gitye ki lworo madit tutwal I kom kit ma kimako kwede lapwony. Kadi bed ni winye tye kawot anyim, lutela pwod pe gunongo yoo me tyeko lok eni.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuikamunitos aikamanario naka esisianakinan abu koyangau aiyalongong kanejaas auriak keda esisiak. Karaida elosete ipegeta, mam apedorosio edolokinitos ationis.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani imbapi 'da ombezu arujoa ri eji asi otiza angiri tipika eyi ma eselea sukulu anzi eyi pie. Erita ako yini tro muzu drile ra ti, drice'ba eyi esuni nga e'yo eyi ma aza ku.
nyn_prompt: Embeera erikukwata aha kukwatwa kw'omwegyesa, ereesireho okwerarikirira kw'amaani omu bazaire hamwe n'abeegi. Oihireho okuteesa okuriyo nikugyenda omu maisho, ab'obushoborozi tibakatungire eky'okukora.

eng_prompt: After conducting a thorough assessment of the conditions in the facility, the team gathered to discuss their findings. Their focus shifted to the well-being of the inmates, prompting a detailed analysis of potential improvements.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya obulungi embeera mu kifo, ttiimu yakungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bye baazudde. Essira lyabwe lyasengukira ku bulungi bw'abasibe, ekyaletera okwekenneenya mu bujjuvu enkulaakulana eziyinza okukolebwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma jami tye kwede I ot yat, lutic gucokke me nywako lok I kom ngo ma gunongo. Gucako keto cwinygi I kom ber bedo pa mabuc, ma oweko gukwedo matut kit ma jami twero yube kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejok ejautene loka adekis, apotu etimu kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem nu adumunitos kesi. Apotu kesi kopodokinit aijar naka iwenan, ido abu koinak kesi airereonor akiro nuepedorete aitojokar.
lgg_prompt: Bani e'yo angu 'da ma alea 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu e'yo eyini esu 'diyi ma dria. Asi 'baza yiniri oja'i e'yo 'ba aru ru 'diyi ma ta mbazuri ma dria, erini fezu e'yo 'bani eco otuzu ra 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma embeera omu eirwariro, tiimu ekateeranira hamwe kuhanuura aha bibatungire. Ekigyendererwa kyabo kikahindukira aha magara marungi g'abasibe, ekyaretsireho okucondooza aha bintu ebirikubaasa kutunguuka.

eng_prompt: Recognizing the challenges faced by educators, the school administration held a meeting to discuss potential improvements. Many staff members expressed their concerns about the current conditions and the need for a more supportive atmosphere.
lug_prompt: Olw'okumanya okusoomoozebwa abasomesa kwe basanga, abakulembeze b'essomero baatuuza olukiiko okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku ngeri y'okutereezaamu. Abakozi bangi baalaga obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku mbeera eriwo n'obwetaavu bw'embeera ey'obuwagizi.
ach_prompt: Pien guniang peko ma lupwonye tye ka kato ki iye, ludito me gang kwan gubedo ki kacoke me nyamo kit me yubu jami. Lutic mapol gunyutu lworo gi i kom jami matye katimme kombedi ki miti me bedo ki kuc ikin gi.
teo_prompt: Kanu ajenun atiokisio nuetereikina keda esisianakinak, abu eyaitene lo esomero kitolomu airiamunet kanu aitemitem aitojokaario. Apotu eswamak luipu itodutu aiyalongongokec kanu ejautene loejai ka eipud loka aiboisit naigangit.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru imba'ba eyini esu 'diyisi, driceza sukulu niri 'ye mitingi agbatara gbazu e'yo otuza eyini eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma dria. Azi'ba karakara eyi e'da asi otiza eyini e'yo eyi 'yepi sa'wa 'disi 'diyi ma dria tualu e'yo eyini lezu aa'zu 'ba eyi ma aza kopi ra 'diyi pie.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'okumanya oburemeezi obu abeegyesa barikurabamu, abebembezi b'eishomero bakakora orukiiko okuhanuura aha bintu ebirikubaasa kutunguuka. Abakozi baingi bakoreka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'embeera eriho obwahati hamwe n'ekyetengo ky'obuhwezi.

eng_prompt: Success in life often hinges on the foundation we build during our formative years. By dedicating ourselves to our education, we set the stage for future opportunities.
lug_prompt: Obuwanguzi mu bulamu butera okwesigama ku musingi gwe tuzimba mu myaka gyaffe egy'okutendekebwa. Bwe twewaayo mu kusoma kwaffe, tuteekawo omutendera gw'emikisa egy'omu maaso.
ach_prompt: Loc I kwo pol kare jenge I kom guti ma wagedo I kare ma watye ka dongo. Ka waketo cwiny wa I kom kwan wa, ci wayubu yo pi gum me anyim.
teo_prompt: Akerianut kotoma aijar itodunit atutubet na edukuni oni kotoma apakio nu idwe. Kowai lo ainakina sio toma asioman wok, itemokini sio adoketait naka arerengesio nuka oingaren.
lgg_prompt: Drile suza idri ma alia ri ni tutuni aa'zu e'yo amani si eli amavile 'diyi ma alea ri ma dria. Asi feza amani onita amavileri ma dria risi, ama pari 'ba drileba ewu drialeri ni 'diyi ni.
nyn_prompt: Obusinguzi omu magara, buriijo nibugyendera aha musingye ogu turikwombeka omu myaka yaitu y'obwegyese. Twayemalira ahaby'obwegyese bwaitu, nitutebeekanisa emiringo y'emigisha y'omubiro by'omumaisho.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the team's roles and responsibilities, it has become clear that we need to establish clearer guidelines. To ensure everyone understands their contributions, we shall formalize their job descriptions.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya emirimu n'obuvunaanyizibwa bwa ttiimu, kyeyoleka bulungi nti twetaaga okuteekawo ebiragiro ebitegeerekeka obulungi. Okusobola okukakasa nti buli omu ategeera bye bakola, tujja kuteeka mu butongole emirimu gyabwe.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo tic ki tic pa dul enoni, nen atyer kamaleng ni omyero wanong yoo me tic matir. Me neno ni dano weng oniang ngo ma omyero gutim, wabinyuto kit ma tic gi tye kwede.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor aswamisinei keda aswamisinei nuka etimu, ecai cut ebe ibusakinit oni aitolomun aicoreta nuecaete. Kanu awanyun ebe ejeni nginitunganan aswamuke, ibuni sio aitodolikin nuikamunitos aswamukec.
lgg_prompt: Azi amuti 'da ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eri eca e'da kililiru kini le ama ma e'do azita kililiru 'diyi. Lezu nezu ra kini 'ba dria ni e'yo eyini 'ye 'diyi va, ama nga azi eyini 'diyi ece kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma emirimo n'obujunaanizibwa bwa tiimu, kimanyirwe butunu ngu twine kutaho engyenderwaho nungi. Okureeba ngu buri omwe naayetegyereza obuhwezi bwe, nitwija kworeka emirimo ye omu butongore.

eng_prompt: To ensure a thorough understanding of the material, it's important for students to engage with their studies regularly. Establishing a daily routine can significantly enhance retention and mastery of the subject matter.
lug_prompt: Okukakasa nti ebintu bitegeerekeka bulungi, kya mugaso abayizi okwenyigira mu kusoma kwabwe buli kaseera. Okuteekawo enteekateeka ya buli lunaku kisobola okwongera ku kujjukira n'okukuguka mu nsonga.
ach_prompt: Pi niang maber, pire tek ni lutino omyero gubed ka kwan kare ki kare. Keto yub me nino ki nino twero weko dano wigi po dok gingeyo gin ma gitye ka pwonyone.
teo_prompt: Kanu amisiikin akiro ngun ejok, ejokuna noi esisiak aisisia duc. Aitolomun ainapeta nuka nginiparan epedori aitojokar aiitun ka aijen akiro.
lgg_prompt: E'yo onitani 'diyi vazu kililiru, eri orodriru sukulu anzi eyini fizu onita eyivile 'diyi ma alea sa'wa driasi. E'yo 'bani 'ye o'du driasi 'diyi ma e'dota ni e'yo 'bani 'ye o'du driasi 'diyi ma e'yo egazu azini e'yo 'bani 'ye 'diyi ma dria ri ma omgbo otu.
nyn_prompt: Okuhamya ngu abeegi nibeetegyereza kurungi ebirikugambwaho,ni kikuru abeegi kwejumba omu kwega kwabo buri kaire. Okutaho engyenderwaho eya burizooba nikibaasa kwongyera aha kukwata n'okumanya ebintu ebirikugambwaho.

eng_prompt: Recent incidents have highlighted significant vulnerabilities in our systems. As a result, it has become imperative to address these issues promptly.
lug_prompt: Ebintu ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko biraga obunafu obw'amaanyi mu nkola zaffe. N'ekivuddemu, kifuuse kya nkizo okukola ku nsonga zino mu bwangu.
ach_prompt: Jami ma otimme cokcok-ki onyuto goro mapol tutwal I yub megwa. Macalo adwogi ne, dong pire tek tutwal me cobo peko magi oyot-oyot tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuiswamasi pac itodunitos aibucanaro naepol noi kotoma ainapetawok. Kanuka ngun, erai ibore yenepol noi aitemokin atiokisio nu katipet.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ebipi yi 'yepi o'diru 'diyi ece e'yo okporu ama vile otita 'diyi ma alia 'diyi ra. E'yo 'disi, eri curu'do orodriru e'yo 'diyi ma aza kozu mbeleru.
nyn_prompt: Ebyabaireho obwahati, byoreka oburemeezi bw'amaani omu nkora yaitu. N'ekyarugiremu, n'eky'omugasho kukora aha nshonga ezi ahonaaho.

eng_prompt: Maintaining strong family connections is crucial for the emotional well-being of incarcerated individuals. Allowing prisoners to visit with their loved ones can significantly aid in their rehabilitation and reintegration into society.
lug_prompt: Okukuuma enkolagana ennungi mu maka kya mugaso nnyo mu mbeera z'abantu abasibe. Okukkiriza abasibe okukyala n'abaagalwa baabwe kisobola okubayamba ennyo mu kuddaabirizibwa n'okuddamu okwegatta mu bantu.
ach_prompt: Gwoko wat matek ikin jo me ot pire tek tutwal pi bedo maber pa dano ma tye I buc. Miyo kare ki mabuc me limo jo gi me amara twero konyo tutwal I yubu kwo gi ki dok I kabedo gi.
teo_prompt: Aidar eidicane loajokan keda ikalia erai ibore yenepol noi kanu aijar naka itunga lu ikamaritai. Aicamakin iwenan aipejokin luminan kec epedori aingarakin kesi aisiteteun ka aimorikikin keda itunga.
lgg_prompt: Aa'ta familia eyi ma eselea okporu ri ma tambaza eri orodriru 'ba arujoa 'diyi ma aa'ta muke ri ni. Driwala fezu aru'ba eyini muzu omuru eyi ma 'ba leletu 'diyi pie ri ni nga eyi ma aza ko ra eyini ani aa'zu ongulumu eyi ma alea ogogo.
nyn_prompt: Okugumizamu n'enkoragana nungi omu maka n'eky'omugasho ahabw'okugira emiteekateekyere mirungi y'abantu abari omu bihome. Okwikiriza abasibe kutaayaaya n'abakundwa baabo, nikibaasa kuhwera munonga omukutereeza entuura yaabo n'okugaruka omu bantu.

eng_prompt: In the face of increasing cyberattacks and physical security breaches, the team quickly devised a comprehensive strategy. Their proactive measures not only addressed immediate concerns but also laid the groundwork for long-term resilience.
lug_prompt: Olw'obulumbaganyi obweyongera ku mikutu gya yintaneeti n'obutabanguko mu by'okwerinda, ttiimu yayanguwa okukola enteekateeka enzijuvu. Enkola zaabwe ez'obwegendereza tezakoma ku kukola ku bizibu ebiriwo mu kaseera kano naye era zaateekawo omusingi gw'okugumira embeera mu bbanga eggwanvu.
ach_prompt: I kare ma dano mapol tye ka lweny i komgi kun gitiyo ki intanet, dul pa dano ne guyubu yoo me tic oyot-oyot tutwal. Gin ma gutimo con pe otiyo I kom peko matye I kare-ni keken ento bene guketo guti me lweny pi kare malac.
teo_prompt: Kojautene loepol noi loka asurokinio naka elago keda abilibilio naka ayuwara, apotu etimu kitolomutu ainapeta nuepedorete kesi aswam. Mam kesi apotu kopedosi aitemokin atiokisio nuka atipet konye apotu kopedosi aitolomun ainapeta nuka apak naepol.
lgg_prompt: E'yo amvuta oli aliasiri ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu e'yo ageyitema ni 'diyi pie, amuti 'da e'do otuta azi okporu ni mbeleru. E'yo eyini 'ye okporu 'diyi awini lu e'yo ewu drialeri ma alea 'diyi ma aza ko ku te eyi 'ba vini e'yo eyi ma aza ko sa'wa ezu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'obutabanguko obweyongyeire aha mikutu hamwe n'okuhenda ebiragiro by'eby'okwerinda, tiimu ekataho omuringo murungi. Enkora yaabo ey'obwegyendesereza, ekaba etarikukora aha nshonga z'ahonaaho, kureka ekataho n'omusingye gw'okugumizamu.

eng_prompt: In light of the recent economic challenges, it is crucial to support those who are struggling. Many families are facing hardships that require immediate assistance from the government.
lug_prompt: Okusinziira ku kusoomoozebwa kw'ebyenfuna okwaliwo gye buvuddeko, kikulu nnyo okuyamba abo abali mu buzibu. Amaka mangi goolekaganye n'ebizibu ebyetaagisa obuyambi obw'amangu okuva mu gavumenti.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me can lim matye cokcok-ki, pire tek tutwal me konyo jo matye ka canne. Gangi mapol tye ka nongo peko ma mito kony ki bot gamente.
teo_prompt: Katupitos atiokisio nuka ikapun, erai ibore yenepol noi aigang ngul lu itereikina. Ejaas ikalia luipu keda atiokisio nu ekotosi aingarakinio katipet kanejai apugan.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni ma alia 'diyi ma e'yosi, eri orodriru atita fezu 'ba e'yo ewaru 'diyi dri. Familia karakara eyi e'yo ewaru eyi esu eyini ani lezu azakoma mbeleru engazu gamete vu.
nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'eby'entaasya obwahati, n'eky'omugasho okuhwera abo abarikurwana. Amaka maingi gariyo nigatunga oburemeezi oburikwenda obuhwezi bukye kuruga omu Gavumenti.

eng_prompt: Recent statistics reveal a troubling rise in incidents of gender-based violence across the country. It is imperative that we address this urgent issue to protect vulnerable individuals and promote a safer society for all.
lug_prompt: Ebibalo ebisembyeyo biraga okweyongera kw'obutabanguko obwesigamiziddwa ku kikula okwetooloola eggwanga. Kikulu nnyo okukola ku nsonga eno ey'amangu okusobola okukuuma abantu abateesobola n'okutumbula embeera y'obudde ennungi eri abantu bonna.
ach_prompt: Wel ma okato cokcok-ki nyutu ni tim gero ikin mon ki coo tye ka medde tutwal I lobo man. Pire tek tutwal ni omyero walweny i kom peko man me gwoko dano ma goro ki medo rwom me gwoko kuc ki ber bedo pi dano weng.
teo_prompt: Itodunit aiwadikaeta nuitetiak ebe iyata noi nuka amumu na okalia kotoma akwapuwok kere. Erai ibore yenepol noi aitemokin ationis na kanu ayuarite itunga lu ican ka aitopolor aiboisit na eyuwara kanuka itunga kere.
lgg_prompt: Kalafe o'diru 'diyi ece kini e'yo ngiringiri agupi eyi ma eselea oku eyi pie ri ma omgbo ni tu kari 'di ma alea ndulu. Eri orodriru amani e'yo mbeleru 'diri ma aza kozu 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alia 'diyi ma ta mbazu azini ongulumu ma ageitema ejizu 'ba dria dri.
nyn_prompt: Ebibaro ebirikugyenda omu maisho nibyoreka okweyongyera kw'obutabanguko bw'ekikura ky'abantu omu ihanga ryona. N'eky'omugasho kukora aha nshonga egi ey'ahonaaho, okurinda abantu abatarikwebaasa n'okureetaho obusingye omu bantu boona.

eng_prompt: In many communities, religious practices play a central role in daily life. One of the key aspects of Islamic faith is the emphasis on communal worship and prayer.
lug_prompt: Mu bitundu bingi, enkola z'eddiini zikola omulimu omukulu mu bulamu obwa bulijjo. Ekimu ku bintu ebikulu mu nzikiriza y'Obusiraamu kwe kussa essira ku kusinza awamu n'okusaba.
ach_prompt: I kabedo mapol, tic me dini obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal I kwo me nino ducu. Gin acel ma pire tek tutwal I dini cilam en aye keto cwiny I kom lega kacel ki lega pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma atutubena nuipu, iswamaete iponesio luka ediini aswam naepol noi kotoma aijar naka nginiparan. Adiopet koboro luepolok noi luka aiyuun naka isiramun ngesi ailip keda ailip nepepe.
lgg_prompt: Ongulumu karakara eyi ma alea, e'yo dini ni 'diyi azi okporu 'ye edri o'du driasi 'diyi ma alea. E'yo azi okporu e'yo a'ita isilamu eyini 'diyi ma alea ri eri okpo 'bazu inzita azini izita ongulumu eyini 'diyi ma dria ri i.

eng_prompt: In today's rapidly changing world, it is crucial to empower the younger generation to take an active role in shaping their future. By fostering their involvement, we can harness their creativity and energy for the betterment of society.
lug_prompt: Mu nsi ya leero ekyukakyuka amangu, kikulu nnyo okuwa abavubuka amaanyi okwenyigira mu kukola ebiseera byabwe eby'omu maaso. Nga tubakubiriza okwenyigiramu, tusobola okukozesa obuyiiya bwabwe n'amaanyi gaabwe ku lw'obulungi bw'ekitundu.
ach_prompt: I lobo ma lokke oyot-oyot tutwal I kare-ni, pire tek tutwal me miyo kero ki joo matino me tic matek I yubu kwo gi me anyim. Ka wacuku cwiny gi me bedo tye, watwero tic ki diro ki kero gi me kelo ber pa lwak.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akwap naka lolo na ijulakina katipet, ejok aitigogong atumunak kanu aswam kagogong kotoma aitolomun ingarenikec. Kowai lo aisinyikokit kesi ajaut toma, ipedori oni aitwasam acoasineikec keda agogongukec kanu ajokis na itunga.
lgg_prompt: Wudrikuru curu'do i ojapi mbeleru ri ma alea, eri orodriru okpo fezu 'ba oderu 'diyi dri azi okporu 'yezu ewu ewu drialeri ma edeta ma alea. E'yo eyini aa'zu alenia ri ma omgbo otuzu risi, ama eco geri eyini afa eyi edezu o'diru azini okpo eyini 'diyi ayu o'bi eyi ma edri otuzu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu nsi y'erizooba ehindukire munonga, n'eky'omugasho munonga okuhwera eminyeeto kwejumba omu kutebeekanisa ebiro byabo eby'omumaisho. Twabareetera kwejumba, nitubaasa kukoresa obusinguzi bwabo n'amaani gaabo kutunguura abantu.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the project requirements, the team gathered to discuss the resources allocated for the upcoming initiative. They quickly realized that the package given by the commission was too small.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya ebyetaago bya pulojekiti, ttiimu yakungaana okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku bikozesebwa mu pulojekiti ejja. Baakiraba mangu nti ssente ezaaweebwa akakiiko zaali ntono nnyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo jami ma mite pi yub eni, dul pa lutic gucokke me nywako tam i kom jami ma omyero ki mi pi yub matye kabino ni. Guniang oyot-oyot ni cente ma dul enoni omiyo obedo matidi tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ipudesia luka epurojekt, apotu etimu kimorikikinos kanu aitemitem iboro lu ijaikitai kanu epurojekt lo ebunit. Apotu kesi kojenutu atipet ebe edit noi ikapun lu ijaikitai ekomision.
lgg_prompt: E'yo otita 'da ni le 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, amuti 'da tra eyi agbatara gbazu afa 'bani fele otita 'da ni emuzu ri ma dria. Eyi esu mbeleru kini robia amuti 'da ni fele 'diyi were tu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma ebirikwetengwa omu purogyekiti, tiimu ekateeranira hamwe kuhanuura ahabintu ebirikuheebwa purogyekiti erikwija. Bakareeba juba ngu esente ezi akakiiko kabahereize zikaba zikye munonga.

eng_prompt: In light of the ongoing humanitarian crisis, various organizations have stepped forward to address the needs of those displaced. As a result, the foreign funders are willing to help the refugees.
lug_prompt: Olw'obuzibu bw'abantu obugenda mu maaso, ebitongole eby'enjawulo bivuddeyo okukola ku byetaago by'abo ababundabunda. N'ekivuddemu, abavujjirizi b'ensimbi okuva ebweru beetegefu okuyamba abanoonyiboobubudamu.
ach_prompt: Ma lubbe ki peko me konyo dano matye kawot anyim, dul mapat-pat okatti anyim me miyo kony bot joo ma orwenyo gangi gi. Macalo adwogi ne, lumii kony me lim ma aa ki lobo mawoko tye atera me konyo luring ayela.
teo_prompt: Katupitos ationis na itunga, apotu iriongeta luipu kolomutu kanu aitemokin ipudesia luka itunga lu aponi itobwotarai. Kanuka ngun, ekapakina agangat naka ikapun luka akwapin ace aingarakin ikerai.

nyn_prompt: Ahabw'oburemeezi bw'abantu oburikugyenda omu maisho,ebitongore bingi birugireyo kukora ahabyetaago by'abo ababingirwe omu maka gaabo. N'ekyarugiremu, abaheereza b'obuyambi kuruga aheeru y'eihanga beeteekateekire kuhwera empungi.

eng_prompt: In times of crisis, vulnerable populations often require additional support. One such group that deserves our attention and assistance is the orphans in our communities.
lug_prompt: Mu biseera by'obunkenke, abantu abateesobola batera okwetaaga obuyambi obulala. Ekibinja ekimu ekirina okufaayo n'obuyambi bwaffe ze bamulekwa mu bitundu byaffe.
ach_prompt: Ikare me peko, dano ma goro ipol kare gimito kony mukene. Dul acel ma omyero waket cwiny wa i komgi dok wakony gi obedo lutino kic ma ikabedo wa.
teo_prompt: Kapak naka atiokisio, ekotosi itunga lu ican agangat na iyatakina. Idiopetunganan yenibusakinit oni apodokinit ka aingarakin ngesi ikokiok luka atutubetekosi.
lgg_prompt: Sa'wa e'yo ewaru 'diyisi, 'ba e'yo ewaru ma alea 'diyi le atita azi dika. Ongulumu alu 'dile lepi ama ma 'ba asi azini ama ma fe azakoma 'diyi emvuanzi amavile angu amavile 'diyi ma alea 'diyi.
nyn_prompt: Omu bwire bw'oburemeezi, abantu abatarikwebaasa nibetenga obuhwezi obundi. Guruupu emwe nk'egyo eshemereire kutaho omutima n'obuhwezi bwaitu, n'efuuzi eziri omu byaro byaitu.

eng_prompt: Despite their best efforts to express themselves, the children's actions were often misinterpreted by the adults around them. As a result, their true feelings and intentions remained hidden beneath a veil of confusion.
lug_prompt: Newankubadde baagezaako okwogera bye balowooza, ebikolwa by'abaana bitera okutaataaganyizibwa abantu abakulu ababetoolodde. N'ekyavaamu, enneewulira zaabwe entuufu n'ebigendererwa byasigala nga bikwekeddwa wansi w'ekibikka ky'okutabulwa.
ach_prompt: Kadi bed ni guketo tek me waco gin ma tye i cwinygi, lutela ma orumu lutino ne pol kare ginongo tam marac i kom jami ma lutino ne gubedo katimo. Macalo adwogi ne, kit ma giwinyo kwede ki miti gi obedo ka kanne I ngee bur me anywena-nywena.
teo_prompt: Karaida iswamaete kesi kagogongu kanu einer nu epupiata kesi, apotu itunga luapolok kotoma aiboisitikec kongeroto aswamisiokec. Kanuka ngun, apotu iponesio kec luka abeit keda apeleikinata kec kongopasi.
lgg_prompt: Yi ma okpo e'yo nzezu ra ti, 'ba 'wara yi ma ageia 'diyi e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi va onzi. E'yo 'disi, yi ma egata azini egata a'da 'diyi awi ozizaru e'yo ewaru ma alia.
nyn_prompt: Oihireho okuteeraho kwabo kw'okworeka ebiteekateeko byabo, ebikorwa by'abaana bikaba nibitahurirwa kubi abantu abakuru ababaherereire. N'ekyarugiremu, enyehurira zaabo ezihikire hamwe n'ebigyendererwa byabo bikaguma bisherekirwe.

eng_prompt: Many citizens are expressing their concerns about the recent policy changes. Clear communication is essential to address the misunderstandings that have arisen.
lug_prompt: Bannansi bangi balaze obweraliikirivu bwabwe ku nkyukakyuka mu nkola ezaakolebwa gye buvuddeko. Empuliziganya ennambulukufu ya mugaso mu kugonjoola obutategeeragana obuzzeewo.
ach_prompt: Anywali mapol tye ka nyutu lworo gi I kom aloka loka ma otime I cik. Lok maber pire tek tutwal me tyeko tele matye.
teo_prompt: Itunga luipu itodunitos aiyalongongokec kanu aijulanakineta nuka ikisila. Einer lo ecai nes ejok kanu aitemokin atiokisio nu apotu opotu.
lgg_prompt: Kari anzi karakara eyi asi otiza eyi e'da e'yo ojata o'diru 'diyi ma dria. E'yo nzeza kililiru ri eri orodriru e'yo erita ako efupi 'diyi ma aza kozu.
nyn_prompt: Abatuuragye baingi nibereka okwerarikirira kwabo ahabw'empindahinduka y'ebiragiro eyabaireho juba. Okugamba kurungi n'eky'omugasho omu kumaraho obutetegyerezana oburiho.

eng_prompt: Throughout history, countless lives have been lost and communities shattered due to the relentless cycle of conflict. It is time for humanity to seek peace and prioritize cooperation over violence.
lug_prompt: Mu byafaayo byonna, abantu bangi nnyo bafiiriddwa era n'ebitundu bingi byasaanyizibwawo olw'entalo. Kye kiseera abantu okunoonya emirembe n'okukulembeza enkolagana okusinga obutabanguko.
ach_prompt: I kare macon, dano mapol orwenyo kwogi ki kabedo mapatpat otur pi lweny ma obedo tye. Man obedo kare ma dano omyero guyeny kuc dok guket winye obed gin ma pire tek loyo tim gero.
teo_prompt: Kotoma akiro nukolo kere, atwakiasi aijar naka itunga luipu noi ido apotu itunga kotwakiasi aijarakec kanuka ingungeta. Erai kwana apak na itunga aimo ainapakin ka aisingarenit aiswamanara adepar amumu.
lgg_prompt: E'yo ewu driori ma alea, 'ba karakara eyi avi eyi dika ongulumu karakara eyi eza eyi e'yo ngiringiri ni 'diyi ma e'yosi. Sa'wa 'di 'ba ada eyini asianzu ndazu tualu ti ecita ejizu okporu aga ngiringiri 'yezu ri.
nyn_prompt: Omu byafaayo byona, abantu baingi bakafa kandi ebyanga bikacwekyerezibwa ahabw'entaro ezitarikuhwaho. N'obwire bw'abantu kuronda obusingye n'okwebembeza okukwatanisa okukira obwimukiriro.

eng_prompt: As I flipped through the pages, I braced myself for the worst, expecting to encounter horrifying details. However, to my surprise, I found that not everything was as alarming as I had anticipated.
lug_prompt: Nga bwe nsoma empapula, nneetegekera ekisinga obubi, nga nsuubira okusanga ebintu ebitiisa. Naye kyanneewuunyisa nnyo okukizuula nti si buli kimu nti kyali kya ntiisa nga bwe nnali nsuubira.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka ngiyo potbuk, ayubbe pi gin marac loyo, kun abedo ki byek me nongo lok matut ma kelo lworo. Kadi bed kumeno, abedo ki ngeng tutwal I kare ma aniang ni jami weng pe obedo marac kit ma onongo atamo kwede.
teo_prompt: Nealipia eong atutubena ngun, abu eong akapakina kanuka nuarokok, aomit eong ebe abuni eong adumunun akiro nuitukurianete. Konye, abu eong aumokin, abu eong adum ebe mam iboro kere itukurianete eong kwa eomit eong.
lgg_prompt: Mani buku 'da ma ale andriria, ma otu ma ma ngulupi e'yo onzi ndeni 'diyi ma dria, erini egazu e'yo dria ori fepi 'diyi esuzu. Kani si, ma dri osutasi, ma esu kini e'yo dria ovuni asi otizaru mani egarisi ku.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire ninshwijuma empapura, nketeekateekyera ekirikubaasa kuba kibi munonga, ninteekateeka ngu ninza kushanga ebintu ebirikutiinisa munonga. Kwonka, kikantangaaza okureeba ngu ebintu byona tibirikwerarikiriza nk'oku naabaire ninteekateeka.

eng_prompt: Recent developments have prompted a thorough review of the ongoing issues. As we analyze the data, we hope to gain a better understanding of the circumstances at hand.
lug_prompt: Ebintu ebibaddewo gye buvuddeko bireetedde okwekenneenya ensonga ezigenda mu maaso. Nga twekenneenya obubaka, tusuubira okufuna okutegeera okulungi ku mbeera eriwo.
ach_prompt: Jami ma otimme cokcok-ki okelo ngiyo matut I kom lok matye katimme kombedi. Ka watye ka ngiyo lok ne, watye ki gen me niang maber I kom ngo matye katimme kombedi.
teo_prompt: Akiro nuapotu kotakanutu pac isinyikokisi airereonor akiro nuiswamasi. Kapak kana aanyanar akiro, imuno sio adumun amisiikin naejok nuikamunitos ejautene loejai.
lgg_prompt: E'yo i 'yepi o'diru 'diyi fe 'bani e'yo mupi drile 'diyi ma ale andrizu kililiru. Amani e'yo nde ma ale andriria, ama asi 'baza be vata kililiru isuzu e'yo yi 'yepi sawa 'disi 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Ebiherize kubaho, bireesireho okushwijuma enshonga ezirikugyenda omu maisho. Ku turikushwijuma ebihandiiko, nituteekateeka ngu nituza kwetegyereza gye embeera eriho.

eng_prompt: After serving their country bravely, many veterans sought financial assistance to rebuild their lives. However, they faced unexpected obstacles when applying for loans.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuweereza eggwanga lyabwe n'obuvumu, abaazirwanako bangi baanoonya obuyambi bw'ensimbi okuddamu okuzimba obulamu bwabwe. Kyokka, baayolekagana n'ebizibu bye baali batasuubira nga basaba okwewola ssente.
ach_prompt: Ingee tic matek pi lobogi, lumony macon mapol guyenyo kony me cente me yubu kwo gi odoco. Kadi bed kumeno, ginongo peko ma pe gitye ka byekone ikare me penyo pi lim adena.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aijanakin akwapukec keda atiting, apotu lumojong luipu kongicata agangat na ikapun kanu aisiteteun aijar kec. Konye, apotu kesi odumutu atiokisio numam kesi eomitos kapak kana ailip ilonin.
lgg_prompt: Azi ngazu kari yini asi driasi 'bori ma vutia, asikari a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di 'dipi a'di Kani si, eyi esu e'yo ewaru eyini ega ku 'diyi eyini mari eyi aizu risi.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okuheereza eihanga ryabo n'obumanzi, abazirwanireho baingi bakashaba obuhwezi bw'esente kwombeka amagara gaabo. Kwonka, bakatunga oburemeezi obu batabaire nibateekateeka obu baabaire nibashaba za rooni.

eng_prompt: After weeks of planning and anticipation, the event organizers finally confirmed the new location. Attendees were relieved to hear that the schedule and activities would remain the same.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lwa wiiki eziwera nga bateekateeka n'okusuubira, abategesi b'omukolo baasembyeyo okukakasa ekifo ekipya. Abeetabye mu lukungaana baafuna obuweerero bwe baategeezebwa nti enteekateeka n'emirimu byali bya kusigala nga bwe byali.
ach_prompt: Ingee cabit mapol me yube ki byek, luyub yub ne gumoko kabedo manyen. Joo ma obedo tye gubedo ki yom cwiny I kare ma guwinyo ni yub ki tic weng bibedo marom.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka isabitin lu aitemonokin ka aomisio, apotu lu etemonokinak apotu itigogongoto aiboisit naitetet. Apotu lu ajaas opucit opotu kopuputu ebe ebuni ainapeta keda aswamisinei asalakin eputosi.
lgg_prompt: Sabiti eyi ma vutia otuta 'yezu azini e'yo egazu 'bori ma vutia, 'ba e'yo otupi 'diyi asizu angu o'diru 'da ma eti 'bo. Ba emu'ba 'diyi ovu ava be erizu kini otita azini e'yo yi 'yepi 'diyi nga ovu alurile.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'esande nyingi z'okuteekateekyera hamwe n'okuteekateeka, abatebekanisa omworeko, bakahendera bahamya omwanya omusya. Abaizire omu ruteerane bakahuumura ku baahuriire ngu enteekateeka hamwe n'emirimo nibiija kuguma nikyo kimwe.

eng_prompt: In order to gain valuable intelligence on their operations, we must find a way to infiltrate the organization. Understanding their strategies is crucial for our next move.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okufuna obubaka obukwata ku ngeri gye bakolamu emirimu gyabwe, tulina okunoonya engeri y'okuyingira mu kitongole. Okutegeera obukodyo bwabwe kya mugaso nnyo eri ekiddako.
ach_prompt: Me nongo ngec matut I kom ticgi, omyero wanong yoo me donyo I dul ne. Niang diro gi obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal pi ngo ma wabitimo anyim.
teo_prompt: Kanu adumun akiro nuepolok nuikamunitos aswamisio kec, ekot oni adumun epone loka alomar toma atukot ngin. Amisiikin iwaitin kec erai ibore yenepol noi kanuka nu ebeit aswam.
lgg_prompt: Lezu e'yo onduaru 'diyi esuzu azi yini 'diyi ma dria, le ama ma esu geri azi ecozu fizu amuti nde ma alia ra. Otita yini 'diyi ma vata eri orodriru ama vile muzu drile ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Kubaasa kutunga amakuru g'omugasho aha mirimo yaabo, twine kuronda omuringo gw'okutaaha omu kitongore. Okwetegyereza oburyo bwabo n'eky'omugasho ahabw'ekindi ekiturikwenda kukora.

eng_prompt: In many organizations, managers play a crucial role in maintaining workplace standards. As part of their duties, they can be responsible for disciplinary actions.
lug_prompt: Mu bitongole bingi, ba maneja bakola omulimu munene mu kukuuma omutindo gw'emirimu. Ng'omu ku mirimu gyabwe, bayinza okuba n'obuvunaanyizibwa ku bikolwa eby'okukangavvula.
ach_prompt: I dul mapat-pat, ludito tic gitiyo tic mapire tek tutwal I gwoko rwom me tic. Macalo but tic gi, gitwero bedo ki twero me miyo pwod.
teo_prompt: Kokampuni luipu, iswamaete engarenok aswam naepol noi kanu aidar adoketait na aswam. Kwape adiope kotoma aswamukec, epedorete kesi aitolomun alecorio.
lgg_prompt: Amuti karakara eyi ma alea, drice'ba eyi azi okporu ni nga angu azi ngazu 'diyi ma tambazu. Azi yiniri ma azi ru, yi eco ovu e'yo 'bani 'ba eyi ma dria adriza onzi 'diyi 'yezu ra.
nyn_prompt: Omu bitongore bingi, abarikukurira emirimo, nibakora omurimo gw'amaani omu kurinda omutindo gw'emirimo. Nk'emwe aha mirimo yaabo, nibabaasa kujunanizibwa aha bikwatiraine n'okukwatisa emicwe.

eng_prompt: In a surprising turn of events, the government has decided to ease restrictions on media personnel. This new policy aims to promote transparency and encourage diverse perspectives in journalism.
lug_prompt: Mu ngeri eyeewuunyisa, gavumenti esazeewo okukkakkanya obukwakkulizo ku bannamawulire. Etteeka eppya ligenderera kutumbula obwerufu n'okukubiriza endowooza ez'enjawulo mu by'amawulire.
ach_prompt: I aloka-loka ma obedo me ur tutwal, gamente otyeko moko tamme me dwoko lageng matye I kom lucoo lok angea. Cik manyen man tye ki miti me tyelo kor lok ada ki cuku cwiny dano me bedo ki tam mapat-pat I lok kom coyo lok angeya.
teo_prompt: Koipone kalo itegelikina, abu apugan olakak ikisila mama ejaasi arotak iyemuto. Alosikinet naka ainapeta nuitetiak erai aitopolor aica ka aisinyikokit itunga aomisio nuegelegela kotoma airot iyemuto.
lgg_prompt: E'yo yi ojazu osuta si, gamete 'du e'yo azita 'ba osisia ni 'diyi ma dria 'diyi ma omgbo esizu ra. Azita o'diru 'diri lezu e'yo ada ma omgbo otuzu dika lezu 'ba ma ega e'yo ndundu e'yo osisia ni 'diyi ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu muringo ogurikutangaaza, gavumenti eshaziremu kukyendeeza ebiragiro aha banyamakuru. Ekigyendererwa ky'ebiragiro ebisya n'okureetaho amazima n'okureetaho emiteekateekyere etarikushushana omu by'amahurire.

eng_prompt: Before proceeding with the distribution of resources, we need to assess the legitimacy of the claims made by the individuals involved. Ensuring that the support reaches the right people is crucial for the success of our initiative.
lug_prompt: Nga tetunnagenda mu maaso na kugaba bya bugagga, twetaaga okwekenneenya obutuufu bw'ebigambibwa abantu ssekinnoomu abakwatibwako. Okukakasa nti obuyambi butuuka ku bantu abatuufu kikulu nnyo eri obuwanguzi bw'enteekateeka yaffe.
ach_prompt: Mapwod pe wacako poko jami, omyero kong wanen kace lok pa dano matye iye tye kakare. Neno ni kony oo bot dano ma opore pire tek tutwal pi cobo miti wa.
teo_prompt: Eringa inyikokinit aikor iboro, ekot oni airereor abeit naka akiro nuinerasi itunga. Aanyun ebe edolonokinete agangat itunga luedolitos erai ibore yenepol noi kanu akerianut naka aswam wok.
lgg_prompt: De nga po'di ama e'doni afa ayuzaru 'diyi awa ku, le ama ma one e'yo 'ba alu alu 'diyi ni 'yole 'diyi ma e'yo ada ra. Nezu ra kini atita ni ca 'ba kililiru 'diyi vu ri eri orodriru e'yo ama ni 'diyi ma drile suza ni.
nyn_prompt: Tutakagyenzire omu maisho n'okugaba eby'obugaiga, twine kushwijuma oburingaaniza bw'ebigambo ebirikugambwa abantu abarikukwatwaho. Okureeba ngu obuhwezi bwahika aha bantu abahikire, nikikuru aha businguzi bw'ekigyendererwa kyaitu.

eng_prompt: Implementing a strict code of conduct and promoting transparency among students is essential. By fostering an environment of authenticity, we can ensure that only genuine individuals thrive in our school community.
lug_prompt: Okussa mu nkola amateeka amakakali agakwata ku mpisa n'okutumbula obwerufu mu bayizi kya mugaso. Bwe tukuza embeera ey'obwesimbu, tusobola okukakasa nti abantu aba nnamaddala bokka be bakulaakulana mu kitundu kyaffe eky'essomero.
ach_prompt: Keto cik matek tutwal I tic ki medo ada I kin lutino kwan pire tek tutwal. Ka wacuku cwiny lutino kwan me bedo ki ada, ci wabineno ni lutino kwan ma ada keken aye gitye ka dongo i gang kwan wa.
teo_prompt: Aitodolikin ainapeta nuka iponesio ka aitopoloria eswamae lo ecai kanejaas esisiak erai ibore yenepol noi. Kowai lo aitopolor aiboisit na abeit, ipedori oni awanyun ebe itunga lu abeit bon kes iswamaete ejok kosomerokosi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo adriza kililiru 'diyi 'bazu azini e'yo ada ma omgbo otuzu sukulu anzi eyi ma eselea ri eri orodriru. Angu e'yo ada be ri ma ta mbaza si, ama eco ne ra kini 'ba e'yo ada be 'diyi nga zo ama vile ongulumu sukulu niri ma alea ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuta ebiragiro by'emitwarize omu nkora n'okureetaho amazima omu beegi n'eky'omugasho. Okureetaho embeera y'amazima, nitubaasa kureeba ngu abantu abahikire bonka nibo barikukora kurungi omu mashomero gaitu.

eng_prompt: After submitting my application and eagerly waiting for a response, I received an email inviting me to the next stage of the hiring process. Excitement and nerves filled me as I prepared for the opportunity ahead.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okuwaayo okusaba kwange era nga nnindirira n'obwagazi okuddibwamu, nafuna email ennayita mu mutendera oguddako mu nkola y'okupangisa. Essanyu n'obunkenke byanzijjuza nga bwe nneetegekera omukisa oguli mu maaso.
ach_prompt: Inge cwalo waraga me penyo pi tic ki kuro lagam ki miti madit tutwal, anongo email ma lwonga me cito I tyen me tic mukene. Yomcwiny ki lworo opong I koma I kare ma atye ka yubbe pi gum matye anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka aijukar alipan ka kosodi aidar abongokinet, abu eong adum email naenyaraunit eong toma adoketait naetupakini naka aitolomio. Apotu aiyalama keda aiyalongong kilelebunos eong kapak kana aitemonokin kanuka arereng naka ngaren.
lgg_prompt: Ma vile waraga azi zizuri ma ti pezu 'bori ma vutia azini tezu asi driasi e'yo omvizu 'bori ma vutia, ma isu email mani ma omvezu pari 'duzuri ma alia. Ayiko azini asi omiza ga ma dria mani ma otuta 'yeria drileba drilia ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okuheereza okushaba kwangye n'okutegyereza n'ekihika eky'okugarukwamu, nkatunga email y'okunyeta aha rurengo orurikukurataho omu kukora emirimo. Okushemererwa n'okwerarikirira bikanyija omu bwire obu naabaire nintebekanisa omugisha oguri omu maisho.

eng_prompt: As I weighed my options, I felt an overwhelming urge to break free from the constraints of my current situation. Despite the potential consequences, I knew I had to follow my instincts.
lug_prompt: Bwe nnalowooza ku ngeri gye nnyinza okukikolamu, nnawulira nga njagala nnyo okwekutula ku buzibu bwe nnina kati. Wadde nga waaliwo ebyandivuddemu, nnali nkimanyi nti nnalina okugoberera endowooza yange.
ach_prompt: I kare ma atye ka tamo I kom gin ma omyero atim, awinyo miti matek tutwal me weko peko ma atye kwede. Kadi bed ni adwogi ne twero bedo rac, angeyo ni omyero alub tamma.
teo_prompt: Neautar eong aomoom nuipedori eong aswam, apotu eong apuputu eipuda loepol noi loka alacakin eong kotoma atiokisio nuka ejautene ka. Karaida ejaas nuepedorete atakanun, ajeni eong ebe ibusakinit eong atupakin aomisioka.
lgg_prompt: Mani e'yo mani eco 'ye 'diyi ma ale andriria, ma etumu asi 'baza okporu lezu fuzu e'yo mani ovuzu sawa 'disiri ma alia 'diyi vurisi ra. E'yo efupi ewaru 'diyi ma talasi, ani ra kini le ma ma obi e'yo ma ngulupi ni 'diyi ma vuti.
nyn_prompt: Ku naabaire ninteekateeka aha nshonga zangye, nkahurira ekyetengo ky'amaani eky'okwihaho oburemeezi oburi omumbeera yangye eriho hati. Oihireho ebirikubaasa kurugamu, nkaba nimanya ngu nyine kukuratira ebiteekateeko byangye.

eng_prompt: Throughout my life, I have always sought the counsel of others before taking any significant steps. Their insights and perspectives have shaped my choices, ensuring that I never bear the burden of a solitary decision.
lug_prompt: Mu bulamu bwange bwonna, mbaddenga nnoonya amagezi g'abalala nga sinnakola kintu kyonna kikulu. Okutegeera kwabwe n'endowooza zikoze ku kusalawo kwange, okukakasa nti sisitula buzito bw'okusalawo nzekka.
ach_prompt: I kwo na weng, abedo ka penyo pi tam pa jo mukene mapwod pe atimo gin mo ma pire tek. Ngecgi ki tamgi okelo alokaloka I tam ma amoko, neno ni pe ayelo peko me moko tam kena.
teo_prompt: Kotoma aijaraka kere, etapit eong aingitun aicoreta nuka luce eringa aswam nuepolok. Apotu aomisiokec keda aomisiokec itopoloutu aseuneta ka, aanyun ebe mam eong apedori aswam aseuneta bon.
lgg_prompt: Idri maniri ma alia dria, ale sawa driasi embata 'ba azi 'diyi vu de nga po'di 'duni e'yo azi orodriruni ku. Egata yini azini egata yini 'diyi oja e'yo mani 'dule 'diyi ra, erini nezu ra kini ma econi e'yo 'du ma ngulupisi ku.
nyn_prompt: Omu magara gangye goona, buriijo nsherura okuhaburwa kw'abandi, ntakakozire kintu kyona ky'omugasho. Ebiteekateeko byabo n'obwengye bwabo, bikampwera omu by'okucwamu, okureeba ngu tindikwetwara oburemeezi bw'okusharamu nyenka.

eng_prompt: In order to achieve our goals, collaboration has been essential. I believe that fostering a strong team dynamic is key to our success.
lug_prompt: Okusobola okutuukiriza ebiruubirirwa byaffe, okukwatagana kubadde kukulu nnyo. Nzikiriza nti okukulaakulanya enkola ya ttiimu ey'amaanyi kye kisumuluzo ky'obuwanguzi bwaffe.
ach_prompt: Pi cobo miti wa, ribbe obedo gin ma pire tek tutwal. Atye ki niyee ni dongo wat macok ikin lumemba obedo gin ma pire tek pi cobo miti wa.
teo_prompt: Kanu aitodolikin alosikinetekosi, ejokuna noi aiswamanara. Eyuunit eong ebe aitopolor etimu loegogong nes elacet lo akerianut wok.
lgg_prompt: Afa amani lele 'diyi esuzu, ti ecita ebi ovu orodriru. Ma a'i ra kini ti icita okporu ri ezozu ri eri fungua drile suza amavileri niri'i.
nyn_prompt: Okuhikiiriza ebigyendererwa byaitu, okukwatanisa n'okw'omugasho munonga. Ninyikiriza ngu okwombeka tiimu n'ekishumuuruzo ky'obusinguzi bwaitu.

eng_prompt: Reflecting on your past experiences can provide valuable insights. If you could revisit a pivotal moment in your life, what changes would you consider making?
lug_prompt: Okufumiitiriza ku by'oyitamu kiyinza okukuwa amagezi ag'omugaso.
ach_prompt: Lwodo lok I kom jami ma otimme I kare macon twero mini ngec ma pire tek.
teo_prompt: Aomoom nuiswamat jo kapakio nukokau epedori aijaikin ijo acoa naejok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo egazu e'yo mini ebi 'ye drio 'diyi ma dria ri eco mi dri ondua orodriruni fe ra.
nyn_prompt: Okuteekateeka aha bi waarabiremu enyima nikibaasa kukuheereza obwengye bw'omugasho.

eng_prompt: After months of diligent saving and careful planning, the members of the community savings group gathered for their long-awaited meeting. Excitement filled the air as they prepared to discuss the distribution of their hard-earned funds.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'emyezi gy'okutereka n'okuteekateeka n'obwegendereza, bammemba b'ekibiina ekitereka ssente mu kitundu baakuŋŋaana mu lukiiko lwe baali baludde nga balindiridde. Essanyu lyajjula mu bbanga nga bwe beetegekera okukubaganya ebirowoozo ku kugabana ensimbi zaabwe ze baakola n'amaanyi.
ach_prompt: Ingee dwe mapol me gwoko cente ki yube maber, lumemba me dul me community savings group gugure pi kacoke ma gubedo kakuru pi kare malac. Cwiny dano obedo yom tutwal I kare ma gubedo ka yubbe me nywako lok I kom kit me poko cente ma gutiyo matek me nongo.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka ilapio lu aimono ikapun ka aitemonokin ejok, apotu imeban luka egurupu loka aimono ikapun kotukokinos kanu airiamunet kec naedaunitai apak naepol noi. Apotu aiyalama kilelebunos kokwam kwape ekapakina kesi aitetem nuikamunitos aikor ikapun luiswamaete kesi kagogong.
lgg_prompt: Mba ma vutia 'bani robia trazu asi driasi azini otuta kililiru 'yezu 'bori ma vutia, memba amuti ongulumu ma ta mbazani 'diyi tra yi ma mitingi 'bani ebi te sawa ezu ri ma alia. Ayiko fu oli ma alia yini yi oturia agbatara gbazu geri yini ngazu yi vile robia azi ngazuri awazuri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'ameezi g'okubiika n'okuteekateekyera kurungi, ba memba b'ekibiina ky'okutereka omu byaro, bakateerana omu rukiiko rwabo orwabaire rurindirwe kumara obwire buraingwa. Abantu bakashemererwa munonga ahabw'okweteekateekyera oku bashemereire kugabana esente ezi bakozire n'amaani.

eng_prompt: After reviewing the terms of the agreement, I couldn't help but feel uneasy about the odds. It seemed like a risky gamble that favored the other party far too much.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwetegereza amateeka agaali mu ndagaano, nnawulira nga sirina mugaso. Kyalabika ng'okusiba ku zzaala okw'obulabe okwaviirako oludda olulala okuganyulwa ennyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo cik me winye ne, pe atwero weko lworo ma onongo atye kwede. Nen calo obedo tuku ma pe ber ma okonyo dul me cungu iwi-bye mukene tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereor ikisila luka acamanar, mam eong apedori aingarakin aipup amamut aiyalama kanuka atiokisio. Esubit bala arai epiki loetiono noi loimedauni ewai ece noi.
lgg_prompt: Ma vile azita e'yo atiza ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, ma econi ndra e'yo ega e'yo ewaru 'diyi ma dria ku. E'da kile e'yo avita ni e'yo ewaru ni lepi amuti azi 'diyi dri ri le.
nyn_prompt: Ahanyima y'okushwijuma ebirikwetengwa omu ndagaano, nkaba ntarikubaasa kwetantara oburemeezi. Kikaba nikireebeka nk'eky'akabi munonga ekyabaire nikihwera orubaju orundi munonga.

eng_prompt: After analyzing the company's recent performance and market trends, I believe we significantly undervalued our potential. It's clear to me that our growth trajectory warrants a much higher valuation.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya enkola ya kampuni gyebuvuddeko n'ebikolebwa mu katale, nzikiriza nti tutadde nnyo wansi obusobozi bwaffe. Kyeyoleka bulungi gye ndi nti enkulaakulana yaffe yeetaaga okubalirirwa ennyo.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma dul ne tye katimo kwede cokcok-ki ki kit ma jami tye ka wot kwede icuk, atye ki niyee ni pe watye ki kero me timo jami ma wamito. Nen atyer kamaleng ni dongo lobo wa mito wel ma lamal tutwal.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor eswamae loka ekampuni keda epone loka esokoni, aomit eong ebe mam sio apodokinit apedorosiowok. Aticepak ecai eong ebe ibusakinit aitodun etiai loepol noi kanu apolowok.
lgg_prompt: E'yo amuti 'da ma agata o'diru ri ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia tualu e'yo cuu ni 'diyi pie, ma a'ira kini ama e'de e'yo amani eco 'ye ra 'diyi ma omgbo ra. Eri ma dri e'da kililiru kini geri ama vile zozuri le 'ba ma 'ba aje uru tu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma enkora ya kampuni n'emikorere y'akatare, ninteekateeka ngu tukamaraho amaani gaitu. Nikyeyoreka butunu ngu entunguuka yaitu neeyetenga omuhendo gw'ahaiguru munonga.

eng_prompt: In recent meetings, I've observed a pattern of choices that seem to prioritize short-term gains over long-term stability. As a result, I have concerns about the direction in which the company is heading.
lug_prompt: Mu nkiiko gye buvuddeko, ndabye enkola y'okusalawo okulabika ng'ekulembeza amagoba ag'ekiseera ekitono okusinga obutebenkevu obw'ekiseera ekiwanvu. N'ekivuddemu, nnina okweraliikirira ku ludda kkampuni mw'egenda.
ach_prompt: I kacoke ma okato cokcok-ki, aneno yoo me moko tam mapat-pat matye ki miti me nongo magoba pi kare manok ma ka bedo ki kuc pi kare malac. Macalo adwogi ne, atye ki lworo I kom yoo ma dul ne tye ka lubu.
teo_prompt: Kotoma airiamununeta nupac, awanyunit eong ainapeta nuka aseununeta nuebeit aisingarenit ameda naka apak naedit adepar ainapakina naka apak naepol. Kanuka ngun, ajaasi eong keda aiyalongong kanu aingarenikinio naka ekampuni.
lgg_prompt: Drifuza o'diru 'diyi ma alia, ma ndre e'yo 'bani lezu orodri sawa weresi 'diyi 'duzu okporu aga asianzu sawa ezu ri. E'yo 'disi, ma ovu asi otiza be geri amuti 'di ni muzu ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Omu rukiiko orwahwireho, nkareeba enkora y'okucwamu erikureebeka nk'ey'omugasho gw'obwire bukye kukira obusingye bw'obwire bureingwa. N'ekyarugiremu, nyine okwerarikirira aha muringo ogu kampuni erikugyenderamu.

eng_prompt: I heard some rumors about changes in management, and I'm curious about your decision. Can you share what's prompting you to move on?
lug_prompt: Nawulira olugambo ku nkyukakyuka mu bukulembeze, era njagala okumanya okusalawo kwo.
ach_prompt: Awinyo lok angea mogo I kom aloka-loka I tela, dok atye ki miti me ngeyo tam ma imoko.
teo_prompt: Apupunit eong akiro nuikamunitos aijulanakineta nuka eyaitene, ido akoto eong aijen nuikamunitos aseunet kon.
lgg_prompt: Ma eri o'duko azi yi ojata driceza ma alia 'diyi ma dria, azini ma ava be e'yo mini pe ri ma dria.
nyn_prompt: Mpuriire engambo ezirikukwata aha mpindahinduka omu bwebembezi, kandi nyine ekihika ky'okumanya ensharamu yaawe.

eng_prompt: After years of witnessing the challenges faced by our community, a group of us decided it was time to take action. We gathered together to brainstorm ideas and develop a plan for a new initiative.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okumala emyaka mingi nga tulaba okusoomoozebwa abantu b'omu kitundu kyaffe kwe boolekaganye nakwo, abamu ku ffe twasalawo nti ekiseera kituuse okubaako kye tukolawo. Twakungaanidde wamu okukubaganya ebirowoozo n'okukola enteekateeka y'ekintu ekipya.
ach_prompt: Ingee neno peko ma lwak wa tye ka kato ki iye pi mwaki mapol, gurup mo ikinwa omoko tamgi ni kare dong oromo me timo gin mo. Wacokke kacel me nywako tam ki yubu yub pi yub manyen.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka awanyun ainingosia nuetereikina keda itunga wok, apotu sio egurupu koseutu ebe erai kwana apak naka aswam ibore. Apotu sio atukokinos nepepe kanu aitemitem aomisio ka aitolomun ainapeta nuka aswam naitetet.
lgg_prompt: Eli 'bani e'yo ewaru ongulumu amavileri ni esu 'diyi ndrezu 'bori ma vutia, ongulumu amani 'diyi asi 'du sawa 'du e'yo 'yezu ra. Ama tra ama tualu e'yo otuzu azini otuta 'yezu e'yo azi o'diruni 'yezu.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okumara emyaka mingi turikureeba oburemeezi obu abantu b'omukyanga kyaitu barikurabamu, guruupu yaitu ekasharamu ngu n'obwire bw'okukora. Tuketeeranira hamwe okuhanuura n'okukora enteekateeka y'ekigyendererwa ekisya.

eng_prompt: After analyzing the market trends and our financial performance, it became clear that we were facing significant challenges. Given the economic climate and our strategic decisions, the losses we incurred last year were anticipated.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera y'akatale n'enkola yaffe ey'ebyensimbi, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti twali twolekedde okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi. Okusinziira ku mbeera y'ebyenfuna n'okusalawo kwaffe okw'obukodyo, okufiirwa kwe twafuna omwaka oguwedde kwali kusuubirwa.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo kit ma jami tye kawot kwede I cuk ki kit ma ticwa me lim tye kawot kwede, nen atyer kamaleng ni watye ka nongo peko mapol tutwal. Ma lubbe ki lok me can lim ki tam ma wamoko, rweny pa lim ma wanongo imwaka ma okato obedo gin ma byek tye I komwa.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejautene loka esokoni keda eswamae wok loka ikapun, apotu kojenutu ebe itereikina sio keda atiokisio nuepolok. Katupitos ejautene loka ikapun keda aseunetekosi, apotu sio atwakiasi ikapun okaru je.
lgg_prompt: E'yo e'yo cuu ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia azini geri ama vile robia ayuzuri ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, eca e'da kililiru kini ama dri fu e'yo ewaru amboru 'diyi be. E'yo ewaru e'yo robia ni 'diyi ma dria azini e'yo amani 'dule geri kililiru si 'diyisi, afa amani avile eli ajerisi 'diyi ndra kililiru.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma entatsya y'akatare hamwe n'omurimo gwaitu gw'esente, kikarebeka butunu ngu tukaba twine oburemeezi bw'amaani. Ahabw'embeera y'eby'entaasya hamwe n'okucwamu kwaitu, okufeerwa okwatairweho omwaka oguhwaire kukaba nikuteekateekwaho.

eng_prompt: Recent market fluctuations and geopolitical tensions have led to unexpected challenges for many investors. As a result, the losses are arising out of a major investment in the oil sector.
lug_prompt: Enkyukakyuka mu katale gye buvuddeko n'obunkenke mu byobufuzi bireetedde abasigansimbi bangi okusoomoozebwa okuteeberezebwa. N'ekivuddemu, okufiirwa kuva ku kuteeka ssente nnyingi mu kitongole ky'amafuta.
ach_prompt: Alokaloka matye I cuk ki telle matye I kin lobe mapat-pat okelo peko ma pe byek tye I kom lutim biacara mapol. Macalo adwogi ne, rweny pa lim tye ka bino macalo adwogi me keto lim madongo I tenge me moo.
teo_prompt: Aijulanakineta nuka esokoni keda ingungeta luka politikis eyangautu ainingosia nu mam eomitai kanu agwelanarak luipu. Kanuka ngun, eutasi ikapun luetwakiaritai kotoma aipikakin ikapun luipu toma orionget loka akinyet.
lgg_prompt: Ojata cuu ni o'diru 'diyi tualu e'yo politiki ni 'diyi pie fe e'yo ewaru 'ba angu ezoma ejipi 'diyi dri. E'yo 'disi, afa aviza 'diyi efu engazu lonyi vuti aleza angiri okalamvu odu niri ma alia risi.
nyn_prompt: Empindahinduka y'akatare hamwe n'obutaikirizana omu by'obutegyeki, bireesireho oburemeezi obutarikuteekateekwaho omu ba invesita baingi. N'ekyarugiremu, okufeerwa kuriyo nikuruga omu kutamu sente nyingi omu kitongore ky'amajuta.

eng_prompt: Many entrepreneurs enter the market with high hopes and ambitious goals. However, they often face challenges that can lead to financial setbacks.
lug_prompt: Abasuubuzi bangi bayingira akatale n'essuubi n'ebiruubirirwa ebinene. Newankubadde, batera okusanga okusoomoozebwa okuviirako obuzibu mu byenfuna.
ach_prompt: Lutim biacara mapol donyo I cuk ki gen ki miti madongo tutwal. Kadi bed kumeno, ipol kare ginongo peko ma kelo peko me lim.
teo_prompt: Agwelanarak luipu elomanarete osokoni keda amuno naepol ka apeleikinata nuepolok noi. Konye, etapit kesi adumun atiokisio nuepedorete ayangaun atiokisio nuka ikapun.
lgg_prompt: Ba tujari 'yepi karakara 'diyi fi cu ma alia asi'baza be angiri azini asi'baza ambitioru 'diyi be. Kani si, eyi sa'wa driasi e'yo ewaru ecopi fepi eyini e'yo ewaru robia esuzu 'diyi esu.
nyn_prompt: Abashuubuzi baingi nibaza omu katare baine amatsiko maingi n'ebigyendererwa by'amaani. Kwonka, buriijo nibatunga oburemeezi oburikubaasa kureetaho oburemeezi omu by'entaasya.

eng_prompt: After analyzing the market trends and our recent sales figures, it became clear that we were facing significant challenges. Given the increased competition and rising costs, we braced ourselves for a tough financial year ahead.
lug_prompt: Oluvannyuma lw'okwekenneenya embeera y'akatale n'emiwendo gyaffe egy'okutunda gye buvuddeko, kyategeerekeka bulungi nti twali twolekedde okusoomoozebwa okw'amaanyi. Olw'okuvuganya okweyongera n'ebbeeyi erinnya, twetegekera omwaka gw'ebyensimbi omuzibu ogujja.
ach_prompt: Ingee ngiyo jami matye katime I cuk ki wel jami ma wacato cokcok-ki, onen atyer kamaleng ni watye ka nongo peko mapol. Ma lubbe ki pyem matye ka mede ki wel cente matye ka ito malo, wayube pi mwaka me lim matek tutwal matye anyim.
teo_prompt: Akaulo naka airereonor ejautene loka esokoni keda enaaba loka agwelanar wok, abu kojen ebe itereikina sio keda atiokisio nuepolok noi. Koipone kalo eyatakinor abolobol keda itiaisinei lu iyatakinos, apotu sio akapakina kanuka ekaru loka ikapun loetiono noi.
lgg_prompt: E'yo 'bani e'yo cuu ni 'diyi ma ale andrizu 'bori ma vutia, kalafe amani ozile o'diru 'diyi pie, eca kililiru kini ama dri fu e'yo ewaru amboru 'diyi be. E'yo baka seza ma omgbo ni tuzu tualu aje tuzu 'diyi pie, ama otu ama ma ngulupi eli robiani ewaru drilia ri ni.
nyn_prompt: Bwanyima y'okushwijuma entunguuka y'akatare hamwe n'omuhendo gw'ebintu ebi twagurize, kikarebeka butunu ngu tukaba twine oburemeezi bw'amaani. Ahabw'okuhayahayana kweyongyeire hamwe n'emihendo erikweyongyera, tuketeekateekyera omwaka gw'eby'esente oguri omu maisho.

eng_prompt: I heard everyone is going to have a great time tonight. Are you really planning to stay home instead?
lug_prompt: Mpulidde buli omu agenda kwesanyusa ekiro kya leero.
ach_prompt: Awinyo ni dano weng gubi bedo ki yom cwiny I dyewor matin.
teo_prompt: Apupunit eong ebe epote itunga kere aiyalama akware nalolo.
lgg_prompt: Ma eri e'yo kini 'ba dria yi nga mu sa'wa esu onyirusi andru.
nyn_prompt: Mpuriire ngu buri omwe naaza kushemererwa munonga ekiro eki.
